Mkul agdud yeḥwaj tilleli, mkul tilleli teḥwaj lḥerma, mkul lḥerma teḥwaj tadukli, mkul tadukli teḥwaj lefhama”.  Ifyar-agi n yieaggasen n sebɛin i d-yenna Umedyaz Ben Muḥamed  i yecna ucanay aqbayli ameqran Idir, llan d ahil i waɣref akken ad ad yedlu ɣef wanda yedda laṣel-ines d wamek teḍra d timadit-ines. Nekwa tebna ɣef kra iferdisen ger-asen  tutlayt ara yezdin agdud,  akal anda ara yefti wagdud,  ansayen ara yeqnen agdud ɣer iḍeli-ines, asekud  ara d yesneɛten abrid i uzekka i wagdud. Ger ifardisen yettḥaraben ɣef cetla amezruy yeṭṭef azal meqran.  Igduden yegan ccan i tamagit-nsen (identité)  senden  ɣef wajgu n yiḍeli akken ad llasen ussu i wamha( présent) amer yis ad affen abrid yenǧer  srid ɣer yimal.  Deg akka nettaf igduden-agi  ggan azal  meqran  i tanfusin, timucuha, tidyanin , trad akked  irgazen yettakken di lebni n tɣerma-nsen. Igududen- agi ddan ɣef tagmert n waktayen( mémoires) akken ad zdin iḍeli ɣer wass-a . Seḥbibiren  fella-sen( ɣef iktayen-nni) akken werǧin aten-tɣum takka n tatut. Aktay ɣer yal agdud d netta i d-aɣalad yettḥeziben ɣef laṣel.  Yeqqar Winston Churchil : «  agdud yettun iḍel-ines, du leqrar ad as-yalles ». Deg unamek n wawal yenna diɣ Ababsa Dahadj : «  Win yettun  amezruy xas inni yettu ula d iman-is. D acu  i d-azal n temɛict ɣer win yettun iman-is ? Ɣef aya yettban belli win yettun  ideli-ines, lumut-is tif tudert-is, meqqar ad teɛtaq-it  seg leɣrur n ddunit ».  Akken ad smenɛen  yigduden aktayen-nsen, yeẓḍen leɣrẓa n timadit-nsen ɣef ufagag n umezruy, ggan isbediyen , iɛencuren (stèles, statues, monuments), uran tinfusin-nsen deg adlisen, akken lemri yewwin lxeẓra ɣer wamek yella yiḍeli n uɣref werǧin a tt-dergen  ɣef tmuɣli iragen n tatut. Si leqdim n zzman uran igduden akken ad sneɛten i tisutwin ara d iḍefren amek ddren, s wacu umnen, amek i qublen tixidas d wussan akked isaggasen . Uran  ɣef yiẓra, ɣef aglim n iɣerṣiwen, ɣef asɣar,  ɣer lkaɣeḍ ulac acu ǧǧen. Akken a nissin udmawen-nsen akked d-asekud-nsen d liman nsen, reqmen ɣef yiẓra  tugniwin id yettmalen amek tedder di tallit-nsen timeti id snulfan. Imaziɣen am yal agdud di ddunit yeǧǧa-d ula d netta later-is. Tugniwn yellan di Tasili d anagi ɣef anact-a. Lejdud-nneɣ snulfan tira akken ad mmlen i nekni yettidiren ass-a, d acu llan d wamek llan. Tifinaɣ,  yellan d tira taqburt ger taqburin, tefka-d lemqud i waya. Nnig tira lejdud-nneɣ ggan i yixfawen-nsen isem, ccuden nekwa ɣer senjaq n timadit masalwalen imaziɣen.  Rran tansa i wakal-nsen sawalen-as  tamazɣa.  Akken  werǧin a netlef deg tiregwa n wussan  ǧǧen-d lumayer s wacu, xas nettu, ad nemkti. Tugniwin-agi ur llin-t ara kan di ṣeḥra imi ula di tama ugafa( nord) imusnawen n later akked imazrayen ( historiens) uffan iɛencuren( stèles)  id yettmalen d akken deg usamer ɣer umalu, seg anẓul ɣer ugafa tamurt  n tefriqt ufella d tamurt n  imaziɣen. Ger tisbediyin n tama ugafa yettwasnen s tuget, tella tiɛencurt n Umnay n Ubizar. Amnay Ubizar d tiɛencurt i d-yeskfel Henri Aucapitaine di taddart n Ubizar deg At Djennad  deg aseggas n 1858 .  Ɣef tiɛencurt-agi  yesɛan lmitra di tehri yettbaned  yiwen umnay yerkeb ɣef agmer ( cheval) yeddem  anecab ( javelot) akked aɣar ( bouclier) . Nnig-as nezmer a nwali tira s tifinaɣ. Tiɛencurt n  umnay n ubizar tettwenǧer 2000 isaggasen uqbel tallalit n Ɛissa. Ass-a tella deg aslay ( musée) n bardo.

Akken aktay-agi a tissin tasuta tamirant,   tadukli tadelsant yewwin isem n Umnay n Ubizar ( iqedcen di taddart n Ubizar s timad-is )  tasawel i kra n- inaẓuren itawlen di taẓuri n tasreɣta( sculpture) akked tuklut( pienture)  ger-asen anaẓur, yettwasnen aṭas s leqdic-ines deg aḥric-agi n tasreɣta akked tulkut,  Iɣerusen Manṣur akken ad yalles i tamtilt n tiɛwencurt n umnay n ubizar. Deg akka assen lǧemɛa yezrin imezdeɣ n taɣiwent n Timizart s uneḥdur n waṭas n-inebgawen am usalway n tɣiwent Mass Tiouchichine Mohand , aɛegal n tasqamut n Lwilaya  Ouguemat Kamel,  iɛgalen n tadukli tadelsant   Yusef Uqasi am Mass Ait Slimane Noredine, amusnaw  n Ubizar Da Mexluf akken ad tili tulya tunṣibt i tisbeddit-agi  id yerran aktay aqbur n taddart n Ubiẓar ɣer imawlen-is. Ass-a yal amnerzuf  ɣer taddart n Ubiẓar lwelha-ines ad tecelqef tiɛencurt ( stèle) n umnay n ubizar iɛejren i tlamest n reḥba deg Abizar ddew leɛnaya n tisbeddit  n ucennay agrawli Matoub Lounes( ula d nettat d anaẓur Iɣerusen Manṣur itt- yeggan) yellan kan din ɣer tama-s. Imezdeɣ n Ubizar, wukud nemeslay  ɣef leqdic n tadukli tadelsent n umnay n ubizar, nnan-d d wagi  i d-abriɣ n yiseɣ. Agdud ilaq d netta ara yesḥbibiren ɣef aktayen-is. D netta ara d yeskeflen izumal ɣef acu tezdew timadit-ines. Ass –a nerra-d Amnay  Ubizar ɣer taddart-is , mazal ad yilli wacu ara d neskfel nniḍen ɣer zdat imi amzruy N At Jennad yewet s telqay deg leqrun. Nnan-d diɣ nasarem ad tili tisbeddit di tmanaɣt n tɣiwant n Timizart( Suq N Lḥed)   ara yillin d asnad i umdyaz ameqran Yusef Uqasi. Nna-d diɣen  nesfilit akken ad nebnu tezeqa ara yillin d salay ( musée) akken iferdisen ɣef tebna nekwa-nneɣ ur ttruḥun ara d asfel di tregwa n lawan. 

Aselway n tɣiwant Mass Mohand taouchichine ula d netta iweked-d ɣef anect-a  akken  ayen  id ǧǧen lejdud d azamul n  tirugza akked   nnif ad yegri d lewhi i tsutwin n tura akked i  tid ara  d-iḍefren.  Yenna  umedyaz deg awal-is :  « ulac tejra ur nesɛi aẓar ». Mebla cekk s leqdic am wagi n tadukli yadelsant amanay  n ubizar kra di tecriḥ t n wagdud yezzid ɣer tafaka-s . Inazuren am Manṣur Iɣerusen neɣ Buswel  Ɛali, ixedmen di tili , tewwid asen- nner tajmilit ihulen , tisemɣert  id-asen ilaqen. Amusnaw am da Mexluf yewwi-d  a neɛnu akken ayen-id yewwi d isefra ɣef umzruy N-At jennad ad yettwensex  ad yefeɣ d- adlis akken d awezɣi aten-tečč targa n tatut. D wagi i d-izan id-aɣ d fken iɣermaniyen n Ubizar assen  lgemɛa yezrin s dema n leqdic yerran sser ɣef imezdeɣ-is.  Lǧemɛa deg iseɣ yezzid s akal-is.

akemyarhem rebi 
 Yerza lwali n ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu, deg taggara n ddurt iɛddan, ɣer waṭas n tɣiwanin n ugerzu, gar-asent taɣiwant n Lemɛatqa, anda yesuẓet aṭas n yisenfaren n unegmu, d usefqed n kra n srabes n uwanek d leqdicat yemgaraden n yisquma n tuddrin. Gar wayen yettwajarden deg wahil n tirza n lwali, d asunẓet usekcum n lgaz n temdint i uɣerbaz amenzu Takour Mohammed n Zlibou, i mi d tikkelt tamenzut ara yecɛel lgaz n temdint deg uɣerbaz amenzu deg tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa. Tirza n lwali d uselway n Usqamu aɣerfan n ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu akked yemḍebbren n srabes yemgaraden, tella-d diɣ d asefqed ɣer uxxam n usejji n tɣiwant yenḥafen deg yal tama, ama seg tama n yimejjayen, ttawilat n tujjya neɣ d idigan n tujjya. Dɣa ifures uselway n Usqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa tagnit-agi i uskan n lexṣas yellan deg uxxam-agi n usejji d iɣeblan n tɣiwant s umata. Syin iweɛɛed lwali d akken ad tili tallel i tɣiwant deg yeḥricen yemgaraden. Deg wahil n tirza, diɣ, yessefqed tasqamut n taddart n At Zɛim d tddukkla tadelsant Tigejdit n At Zɛim anda yessers tameqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef lerwaḥ n 44 n yimeɣrasen n taddart. Syin, iruḥ ɣer usalay n tddukkla, anda iweɛɛed diɣ s tallslt n taddart. Deg taggara n tirza ɣer tɣiwant, yesunẓet lgaz n temdint deg taddart n Tizi Tzeggart , anda yecɛel s wudem unṣib lgaz deg Tsirt n uzemmur n Mass Raib Ammar. Tirza n lwali, tewwi-t ɣer waṭas n tɣiwanin n ugerzu anda yesunẓet, yessefqed isenfaren n unegmu , seg tɣiwant n Buɣni, Ssuq letnin d Lemɛatqa.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Yella-d yiwen n uɣbel di taddart n Yiɣil Mḥend, i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Uzeffun, gar yimezdaɣ n taddart akked ADE n tɣiwant n Uzeffun. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, ugar n 10 n wussan, teqqim taddart mebla ama. Aya, yesserkeb lɣiḍ n yimezdaɣ ɣef usɛuẓẓeg n ADE. Xas akken cetkan acḥal n tikkal ɣer tkebbanit-agi, meɛna am win ‘’iceṭṭḥen i uderɣal’’, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan yimezdaɣ n taddart n Yiɣil Mḥend. Sdat n wugur-a, kkren yimezdaɣ, kksen imsiḍnen n waman (compteur) n yixxamen-nsen. Anect-a, akken ad d-sbegnen reffu-nsen mgal anegzum-a n waman seg wacḥal n ussan. Yenna-d daɣen yiwen seg yimezdaɣ n taddart ‘’d akken uran aṭas n tebratin i wid teɛna temsalt n useqɛed n liḥala-agi, maca ar ass-a ulac win i d asen-d-yeslan’’. Ikemmel yenna-d :’’belli gezmen yimezdaɣ assaɣen akked ADE n Uzeffun imi d nutni ara yesqaɛden taswiɛt’’.

  Y.S. 

  
 Meskud tcaḍ tsuta i izeglen almad n tutlayt-is tanyemmat deg uɣerbaz, ala ttawil n internet, idlisen d uheggi n temsirin i d-yeqqimen i win ur nebɣi ad yemmet d awreɣri (analphabète) di tutlayt-is. Dɣa, deg yiwen n yiswi, aṭas n tddukkliwin i d-yettheyyin timsirin n ulmad n tutlayt taqbaylit deg ukuẓ n tɣemmar n tmurt n Yiqbayliyen. Dɣa, ussan-a kan, tlul-d tikti-a daɣen ula deg tɣiwanin n Ukeffadu d Ticci. Deg Ukeffadu, tella-d tiɣri i yakk imezdaɣ n tɣiwant, amecṭuḥ d umeqqran, i yebɣan ad lemden tutlayt-nsen. Ad d-yettili waya, akken i d-yedda deg wulɣu, yal taggara n ddurt deg temkarḍit taɣiwant n Tniri n Ukeffadu, sɣur uselmad Ḥamid Ihden. I win yebɣan ugar n yisallen, yezmer ad isiwel i wuṭṭun-a: 07 93 39 53 99. 

 Ma deg temnaḍt n Ticci, d aselmed ara yilin ɣef yiri n snat n tselmadin, Massat Nasima Xuxi d Lindi Buseksu, s uheggi n tddukkla tadelsant Asaki n Ticci i d-yettwassnen s warmuden-is idelsanen, abeɛda akuden-a ineggura. Ɣef wayen i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ, ad d-ttmaggant temsirin n ulmad yal ass n sed tameddit, deg Uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Bakaru. Si tama tayeḍ, ulamma yella lebɣi ɣur yilemẓiyen n umussu asdukklan, yewwi-d ad d-nemmeslay ɣef wugur i d-yettwattemlilayen ɣur tmetti deg teɣriwin-a i ulmad n teqbaylit, imi drus i d-yettarran. Amedya n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, deg usamar n Bgayet, ideg i d-grent teɣri tddukkliwin Adrar n Fad d Usirem n Krun deg useggas n 2017, maca ulac win i d-ibeggnen aheggi-ines. Ahat imi ssuma tazamulant tella imir-nni 500 n yidinaren i wayyur.nAkken yebɣu nuḥen yiɛewwiqen, llan wid i d-iferrsen abrid. Wamma, akken yenna Dda Lmulud At Mɛemmer: «Win yebɣan tamaziɣt, yissin tira-s».

  M. K. 

  
 Yesmekta-d ass-nni n larebɛa yezrin 01/08/2018, Usalay amniḍan n ujahed n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tamhelt n jumelles, i d-yellan deg 22 yulyu 1959 di tmurt n Leqbayel. Yella-d usmekti n wass-agi amazray, yesɛan azal meqqren deg tegrawla tazzayrit 1954-1962, s wahil d amerkanti. Deg tesebḥit maḍi, tella-d tirza ɣer tzeɣwa n temsikniyin, ideg i d-llant kra n temsikniyin yeqqnen ɣef temhelt-agi s wuzzig akked tid yerzan tagrawla s umata. Syin akkin deg tzeqqa n yisaragen, yebda leqdic s wudem unṣib s useɣet aɣelnaw “Qasaman”. Tin ɣur-s, yella-d usarag n uduktur deg umezruy n tegrawla, mass Sahel Youcef, i d-yewwin awal s telqey ɣef temhelt-agi d wayen s wacu i d-tegla i lwilaya tamazrayt tis tlata (Tamurt n Leqbayel). Mi yesuli usarag-agi, yella-d uskaci s tuttriwin i d as-yettunfken i umsarag, netta si tama-s yerra tiririyin i lmend n yisteqsiyen n wid yellan dinna. Am wakken daɣen i d-llant snat n tnagiyin n sin yimeɣras-agi: Almanasba Arezki d Belkacem Youcef, i d-yefkan ccfawat-nsen ɣef temhelt-agi n jumelles. Yella-d diɣ usbadu n kra seg yiwudam imazayen n tegrawla, i yemmuten deg waggur n yulyu. Yella umeslay ɣef tudert d yimuhal n yimɣrasen-agi: Amar Ouamrane, Zamoum Mohamed yettwassnen s yisem n Si Salah, Aissat Idir akked Karim Rabah. Uqbel ad yesali leqdic-agi, tella-d tɣuri n yizen n Amirouche Ait Hamouda i yinelmaden n tmussni, ma ɣer taggara d talilt (chorale) n tiddukkla “Tarwa n Bugarfan” n Ath Yahia Moussa, i d-yewwin kra n ccnawi n lgirra. Ma ɣer taggara, ad nesmekti belli, leqdic-a yella usuddes-ines sɣur Usalay amniḍan n umjahed s tallelt n Ddiwan n yisɣuren n yilmeẓyen (ODEJ) n Tizi Uzzu. 

  A. A. 

  
 Ulama ɛerḍen kra n yilemẓiyen n temnaḍt ad as-d-rren rruḥ, s uheggi n kra n tigawin timecṭuḥin deg-s, acu kan mazal kra ur d-iban ɣef unammas-a adelsan n Lberj n Mira, deg tɣiwant n Tsexriwt, i yeggugen s wazal n 60 n yikilumitren ɣer Usamar-anẓul n Bgayet. D ferru i yettraǧu s lḥir akk umussu asdukklan n tɣiwant-a akken ad afen amḍiq yilemẓiyen anda zemren ad xedmen kra n warmud. Ad d-nesmekti d akken yečča uxxam-a n yidles tiyita meqqren asmi t-serɣen. Setta n yiseggasen tura ɣer deffir. Tamentilt n waya, d urrif i ten-yeṭṭfen imir-nni seg tulacit n tnezduɣin i ssutren. Dɣa, walan kan gar wallen aḥraq n unammas-a adelsan, armi teɣreq iseggasen-a ineggura tɣiwant-a deg txessast n warmuden n umussu asdukklan, abeɛda deg uḥric n yidles. Ula d tafaska n umunulug i tuɣ tettheyyi-d tddukkla Tigelzi n Rrif, iɣab later-is lawan-a. Tuget n yiɛeggalen yettwammerẓ-asen ufud armi bran i ṭṭbel deg waman, ur walan amḍiq neɣ d tazeqqa-nniḍen, anda ad neǧmen ad kemmlen aheggi n tfaska-a i yettwassnen akkin i twilayin-nniḍen. Imi ula d anaẓur Fellag, yella iɛedda syinna. Yewwi-d daɣ ad d-nesselɣu belli aql-it akka tura unammas-a adelsan deg yiri n Tenmehla n yidles n waɣir n Bgayet. Seg wakken aɛiwed n ureqqeɛ-ines yessutur-d aṭas n tedrmit, twala tɣiwant taqburt n Tsexriwt ala tikci-ines i tenmehla i d asellak, akken ad d-yuɣal i waddad amezwaru ideg i t-tuɣ. Maca, seg wass-nni, ur d-iban deg unnar wayen ara texdem tenmehla-a, deg wakud ideg ɛewqen yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant-a, ur gzin taluft.

  M. K. 

  
 Lgaz d yiwen n usafar yettselliken amdan seg tsuqas n tasmuḍi n wussan d wuḍan n ccetwa. Yettuneḥsab d allal i ssexdament twaculin deg yixxamen i umager n usemmiḍ d ugris i swayes i d-tgellu tegrest yal mi ara d-zzin wussan-is. 

 Ttafen-t yimdanen d amwanes, ladɣa deg wuḍan n ccetwa isemmaḍen, yesseḥmaw axxam ɣef tikkelt. Deg yiseggasen-a ineggura, aṭas n tamiwin n tmurt i mazal ur yekcim usafar-a, ssawaḍen kra n yimezdaɣ armi gezzmen iberdan, zun d tawsit n usuter i tuqqna n tnezduɣin-nsen s lgaz, i ubaɣur akk yesɛa. Maca, seg tama-nniḍen, ɣur-s lmaḍerrat, ur nenekker ara belli d allal amihan, i izemren ad yessiweḍ amdan alamma d tamettant, ma ur yeḍfir ara tarrayin n usemres-ines, neɣ ur iḥuder ara. Yal aseggas, mi ara tebdu tegrest, deg wussan-is imenza, ttɣawalen yimdanen ɣer ucɛal n lgaz deg yixxamen, ula d aneggaru-a seg tama-s, yettɣawal ɣer uḥwaṣ n terwiḥin i yestehzayen deg useqdec-is tikwal. Yessegray-d s twuɣa. Ɣef waya, tettheggi-d Tenmehla n Sonelgaz n Lezzayer tamanaɣt (tama n Gué de Constantine), tuffɣiwin n yiqeddacen-is ɣer yiɣerbazen, akken ad ssegzi u ad fken iwellihen ɣef wamek ilaq ad ḥadren iman-nsen yinelmaden seg tamiwin-nsen, ad ssiwḍen isallen-a i twaculin-nsen. 

 Nesteqsa tamasayt n teywalt deg tkebbanit-a n Sonelgaz, s ttawil n tilifun, tenna-aɣ-d “Nettheggi-d ussan-agi n useɛlem kraḍ n yiseggasen-aya, yal tallit n tegrest, imi deg-s i ṭṭuqutent twuɣa-a icudden ɣer lgaz, akken inelmaden ad ḥussen s umihi i d-yettekken seg-s, ad ssiwḍen isallen srid i yimawlan-nsen, akken ineggura-a, ad heggin tarrayin iwulmen, ara d-nadin ama deg internet, ama deg usira n uḥader ɣef umihi n lgaz deg tkebbanit-nneɣ”. Ma d Mass Tidadini Ali, d ajenyur deg tkebbanit, d yiwen gar yiɛeggalen i irezzun ɣer yiɣerbazen i useɛlem n twacult tasnedwalt, ikemmel yenna-d, ɣef wansa i d-ittek umihi, d wacu n yiwellihen i ttmuddun deg tuffɣiwin-nsen “Ur d-yettili ara ufras n yiteyyuten n lgaz. Rnu, sseqdacen iteyyuten ur nelhi ara, ssishilen tuffɣa n usafar n lgaz seg-s, dɣa imir i d-tḍerru twaɣit. Ilaq ɣef yimdanen ad ttaǧǧan xerṣum cwiṭ n tullya ama n ṭṭaq, ama n wayen-nniḍen, i unekcum n ubeḥri, u ad d-yettili ufras n yiteyyuten-nsen uqbel ad tebdu tsemhuyt n tegrest deg yal aseggas (ayyur n cutember neɣ tuber)”. 

  
 Teddun, ttimγurent teftilin-nni sdat wallen-nsen, ḍefren lewhin-sent almi d-ufan iman-nsen sdat n yiwen lbeṛğ amaynut annect-ila-t. Aγyul, iḍal si ṭṭaq s uεenqiq-is aγezzfan akken ad iwali d acu yellan. Ayaẓiḍ: ‘’Aha fru-aγ-tt-id, ini-aγ-d d acu twalaḍ a ddin qessam-ik!’’. Aγyul: ‘’Tirbutin n yal lewqam n wučči d tissit, yal tarbut zzin fell-as imakraḍen, meccḥen seg tiẓeṭ yellan deg-s s tawant d ustummen’’. Ayaẓiḍ: ‘’Ah ya ssiεqa! D nekkni iwumi i d-tewwi ad nessider kra deg yimawen-nne&amp;gamma,; aql-aγ njaf si laẓ’’. Aγyul yecna-as-d kra n yimeslayen seg tizlit n umedyaz-nne&amp;gamma,; yenna-as: “ Mdel tiṭ-ik tuγaleḍ, limmer ad ak-id-nessaki!”. Uγalen myesmuqalen akken ma llan, yal wa yessaked wayeḍ s allen-is, gzan, ḥulfan akk yessefk ad d-afen kra n ttawil akken ad snejlin imakraḍen-nni. “ Win yettnadin, yettaf daγen”, ula d nutni ufan-d tikti-agi: – Aγyul yessuli idaṛṛen-is imezwura almi d ṭṭaq. – Aṭarus ineggez γef teεrurt n uγyul. – Amcic yeckunteḍ almi yewweḍ γer nnig tzagurt n uqjun. – Ayaẓiḍ i d-yeggran d aneggaru, yessrafeg, yuli γef uqerru n umcic, ssulin taqebbet n Eiffel ( Tour Eiffel ). Akken ṣeggmen imeddaḥen n Tizi n Kwilal iman-nsen akken iwata, serrḥen i igerjyam-nsen, uqmen-asen i imakraḍen-nni tamuffirt n usef qeε s ccna n akappella. Suγen γef yiwet tikkelt: Aγyul yesmermiḥ, aqjun yesseglaf, amcic yesmiεεiw ma d ayaẓiḍ yerra-tt i tuddna. Imcumen-nni n imakraḍen wa yedduqes, wa yefrawes, wayeḍ yettlejlij, ulac win inudan deg-sen aqerruy-is yufa-t imiren…  Tettkemmil  

  Seg tsekla taqbaylit 

  
 Mbeɛd araǧu iḍullen kra n lweqt, yessuffeɣ-d ucennay Amar Sersour yiwen n uḍebsi d amaynut. D win i d-yeffɣen ɣer teẓrigin Massinissa di Tizi Uzzu ass-nni n 12 yunyu 2019.

 Aḍebsi iwumi yefka asentel Gar-ak d yiman-ik. D leqdic i ɣef yeɛteb Amar Sersour, ɣef waya i yekka fell-as gar kraḍ ar ukkuẓ n yiseggasen n uxeddim. Yewwi-d deg-s ɣef waṭas n yisental d temsal yerzan timetti, tadukli, leɛwayed, leɣḍer d leḥzen.

  Deg walbum-a, ad naf 8 n tezlatin; tamezwarut “Gar-ak d yiman-ik” i yefka dɣa d azwel i tesfift-is. Kra n tezlatin-nniḍen s yizwal “Aḥbib”, d tizlit tis tlata. Tizlit tis xemsa, isemma-as “Adrar yecfan”. Tis sḍiset yefka-as asentel n “Ṭṭejra yettrun”. 

 Ma d tis ṭamet, izewwel-itt “Nniɣ-ak anef-iyi”. I usmekti, Amar Sersour gar yinaẓuren iqdimen i yecnan s teqbaylit, u mazal-it ar ass-a icennu, aṭas i yesuzen s ṣṣut-is icebḥen. Gar tezlatin mucaɛen i d-yeǧǧa, ad naf tizlit icebḥen “Cfu ay ixef-iw” deg useggas n 1981. Tizlatin “Ayennat, A yemma yemma”. Akked tezlit yesɛan azal “Yibbas” i yesdukel akked yisefra n Ben Muḥemmed deg useggas n 1982. 
  Kh. A. 

  
 Dγa terra-tt d taxeddamt-is, ma yella d gma-s, fsin-as-d, yuγal am netta am ccix deg uxxam. Dγa taqcict ma tettru d lehwa, ma teḍsa d iṭṭj, ma temceḍ sya ad d-yeγli ddheb sya d lfeṭṭa. Σeddan kra n wussan, taqcict terfed tadist. Yiwen wass, teqqim rrif n lbir la tmecceḍ. Tessawel-as i Σica ad as-temceḍ, akken tṛuḥ, tesγafel-itt kan, tdegger-itt γer daxel n lbir. Ikcem-d ccix yaf-d tameṭṭut-is ulac-itt. Yesteqsa fell-as Σica, tenna-as, teffeγ seg uxxam seg ṣṣbeḥ ur d-tuγal ara. Argaz yekka ddunit n Ṛebbi meṛṛa fell-as, ur tt-yufi ara. Yiwen wass, Σica tṛuḥ γer uxxam n yiwet n stut ad tt-tciweṛ d acu ara texdem i gma-s nni ameksa, tenna-as: ‘’Ad am-d-awiγ aman n temda, mi ten-yeswa, ad yuγal d izerzer. Dγa akken i teḍra: Aqcic akken kan yeswa aman-nni, yuγal d izerzer, lameεna yessfuḥ rriḥa n uletma-s di lbir, dγa itezzi kan γef lbir-nni, ur yezmir umeγbun ad d-yini din i tella. Ttεeddin wussan, taqcict tesεa-d akniwen, ma yella d izerzer yettawi yakk lqut ara t-id-iṣaḥen yeṭṭeggir-it γer daxel n lbir, nettat tettru tcennu: ’’Gma izerzer meskin Nekkini di lbir leγmiq Ḥsen d Lḥusin deg yirebbi-inu Talafsa nnig uqerru-inu. Ṛuḥ a zman zzi yya-d zman, almi d yiwen wass iwala ccix izerzer idegger aγrum γer daxel n lbir. Akken iḍal, isel iṣṣut n tmeṭṭut la tcennu, yessawel γer daxel ad iẓeṛ anta-tt tmexluqt-agi yellan din, amek ara tt-id yessukkes syin. Tameṭṭut tenna-d anta i d nettat, d acu kan ur tezmir ara ad teffeγ kan akka si lbir, axaṭeṛ tella tlafsa la tt-tettqaraε nettat d warraw-is ad tent-tečč…  Tettkemmil  

  Seg tgemmi n teqbaylit 

  
 D lecfer n wallen i ibeɛden ɣef lmut. Lmut tɛuss bab-is yal ass, d ameqqran
neɣ d ameẓyan, d argaz neɣ d tameṭṭut. Lmut ur tferren ara, tettawi ameqqran,
tettawi amecṭuḥ, tettawi wid lɛali, tettawi wid yeffɣen i ubrid. Akken yebɣu
yili d amuḍin neɣ s tezmert-is, win iwumi d-yewweḍ wass-is, ad d-tas ad t-tawi.
Nekni nettalas-as lqut, netta yettalas-aɣ lmut. Ulac win izemren ad yerwel
fell-as, d ṭṭlaba n ddunit. Anda ma tebɣuḍ tiliḍ, ad ak-in-taweḍ. Xas ma tesɛiḍ
idrimen, ur tezmireḍ ara ad tt-taɣeḍ, neɣ ad tefkeḍ tijɛal, akken ur ak-tettawi
ara. Ur tezmired ara ad trewwleḍ fell-as ma yella tesɣam-ak-d. Ili-k d
ameṛkanti, d asaɛi neɣ d igellil, nettat d mm lḥeqq : yiwen ubrid kan ay
tessen, abrid-is d abrid n lḥeqq.

 Lmut d abrid ur nexli. Aṭas ur nettḥulfu s lmut, nwan-tt d awal kan, alarmi
d asmi ara ten-id-taweḍ s axxam i ttḥulfun yis-s. Aṭas ur nettamen ara belli
yiwwas ad mten, acku sɛan cci, sɛan tazmert. Asmi ara d-testeqsi fell-asen, ur
ttamnen. Aṭas i yewwḍen i lmut, ur mmuten ara, xas ma ad t-yeɣṣeb waṭan, yiwwas
kan yeḥla, dayen yekker, tselfas kan lmut, tkemmel abrid-is, tewwi wiyad di
tikli-s. Aṭas n yimdanen ur numin ara belli mmuten.

 Lmut yesrusuy-d lɣiḍ ɣef yimdanen merra. Lmut tuɛer, yella deg wawal «Lḥif
i tekkes, tuɛer kan lmut». Lmut mi ara d-terzu s axxam n walbaɛḍ, lɣaci n
tuddar ttbaddaden s idis n uxxam n umerḥum akken At wexxam, ur ttḥulfun ara s
yilem i d-yeǧǧa uɛeggal-nni tewwi lmut.

 Tuget n lɣaci akken kan ara slen s lmut n umezdaɣ n taddart, ttṛuḥun ɣer uxxam
n umeṛḥum ttɣimin dinna ass kamel, iḍ kamel. Lɣaci ttheggin ayen akk ilaqen,
akken ad ɛawzen ɣef umerḥum iḍ-nni. Wiyaḍ, seddaw laɛnaya n ṭṭamen n wedrum n
umeṛḥum-nni, ssawaḍen isalli n temḍelt ɣer tuddar i ten-iqerben, iwasila akked
twelliyin n umerḥum anda ma llan. Wiyaḍ ttheggin trisiti di lḥara n wexxam n
umerḥum akken ad tili tafat deg yiḍ-nni. Wiyaḍ ttawin iṭaburiyen ɣef wi ara
qqimen lɣaci, wiyaḍ ttɛassan deg webrid ttmagaren iberraniyen d-yettasen ad
ẓuren…

 D anebdu neɣ d tagrest, d asemmiḍ neɣ d aɣamac, d ageffur neɣ d iṭij, xas
ma d adfel lɣaci ur ttakken ara afus ɣef umerḥum. Ddakalen akken ad tifsus
taɛkemt ɣef imawlan-is. Yal taddart amek xeddmen. Xas ma llsas n tuddsa-agi ur
d-yeqqim ara deg waṭas n tuddar n tmurt n Leqbayel, maca llant tamiwin deg i
mazal ṭṭfen deg tuddsa n temḍelt. Akken imezdaɣ n taddart merra ad ilin deg
yiwen webrid, ulac igellil neɣ amerkanti, ulac aberkan neɣ amellal, imdanen
merra yiwen n uẓekka-nsen.

 Deg uḍris-agi, bɣiɣ ad mmeslayeɣ ɣef lɛerc n at-Yeǧǧer s umata, imi
tuddar-is mazal ṭṭfent deg tuddsa n temḍelt. Di tuget n tuddar, mi ara tili
temḍelt, imezdaɣ beṭṭun leḥzen-nsen akked twacult n umerḥum. ṭṭamen n wedrum,
seddaw leɛnaya n tesqamut n taddart, yeggar-d iman-is, yettili s idis n wexxam n
umerḥum deg wayen akk i uḥwaǧen, d wayen akk ilaqen i umerḥum. Anda yebɣu
yemmet umezdaɣ n yal taddart yettili, yettili alarma ssawḍen-t-id ɣer taddart.
Ama di ssbiṭar, ama di tmurt n Fransa neɣ timura n yinig sumata.

 Di tmurt n Fransa, imezdaɣ n lɛerc n at-Yeǧǧar ddukklen, sɛan tasqamut am
wakken di taddart ay ttidiren. D nutni i d-yettḍebbiren ɣef temsalt n umerḥum
ma yella ɣur-sen, xeddmen-as lekwaɣeḍ akked d wayen akk i t-ialqen alarma
ceggɛen-t-id ɣer tmurt, ɣer taddart-is.

 Tulawin di yal taddart mi slant s yisali n umerḥum, ttṛuḥunt ttcewwiqent
fell-as, tuget deg-sent d timɣarin, ttcewwiqent alarma iṛuḥ ad d-yeɣli ṭṭlam.
Syinna akin ad ǧǧent nnuba i yergazen. Tulawin ttcewwiqent deg uzal, irgazen
deg yiḍ. Mi tewweḍ d 22 : 00, ixuniyen ad zzin i umerḥum ad bdun acewweq
fell-as. Mi cewwqen tasaɛet neɣ snat ad ḥebsen ad steɛfun, wa ad isew aman, wa
d latay, wa d afenǧal n lqehwa…. Akken alarma qrib ad yali wass. Ssyinna ad
d-uɣalent tlawin d nnuba-nsent, ad ṭṭfent amkan n yergazen s ucewweq, alarma
qrib ad t-awin ar tmeqbert.

 Yal taddar, tesɛa tarbaɛt i yeqqazen aẓekka, zgan llan. Mi slan s lmut n
walbeɛḍ, ẓran iman-nsen, fiḥel ma yenna-yasen bab n wexxam, neɣ ṭṭamen, ssnen
iman-nsen n waygar-asen, win ulac wayeḍ yella. Uqbel ad teflali tafat, nutni
wwḍen timeqbert, bdan taɣuzi, ssya ar d-kkren akk lɣaci yettewjad uẓekka. Llan
wid i tessun alim i uẓekka, llan wiyaḍ tessun tasselt, wid d-yettawin tasselt
daɣen zgan, sɛan-tt d aɣbel, d nutni i tt-id yettawin ass n temḍelt, werǧin
ttun aggay-ines.

 Tamḍelt tettili azekka-nni n lmut n umerḥum. Tasqamut n taddart txeddem
anejmuɛ tanzayt n wass ɣef 7 : 00 deg wussan n unebdu, ɣef 8 : 00 deg wussan n
tegrest. Imezdaɣ akk n taddat ttekkaren-d akken ad nnejmaɛen am nutni am
yimezdaɣ merra, ulac aɛeggal ur nettqadar ara anejmuɛ-agi. Ulac win ara
yesmeɛẓgen i tiɣri d-teggar tesqamut n taddart, ulac win izemren ad yerẓ isuḍaf
tesbed taddart i lmend n waya. Yal anejmuɛ, tasqamut n taddart tessawal-d akk i
yismawen n yimezdaɣ akken kecmen tajmaɛt. Win ur d-nerri ara ɣef yisem-is, neɣ
win yettun iman-is deg wussu, yettwalas, mi d-yelḥeq s anejmuɛ, ad yerju ad
alsen i yisem-is ad iṛuḥ ad yefk 50 idinaren. Win ur neḥdir ara i unejmuɛ s
wadda, daɣen yettwalas, yewwi-d fell-as ad yefk 200 idinaren. 

 Yettili-d waya akken imezdaɣ ad ɛedlen. Wid yesɛan tiḥuna, ttemdalen-tent
alarma yemḍel umerḥum. Lɣaci mazal tafrit deg wallaɣ-nsen, mazal aẓar n
telsawit deg ulawen-nsen.

 Yettili-ak neɣ ur ak-yettili ara, imezdaɣ akk teɛna-ten temsalt n temḍelt,
acku ass-a fell-i, azekka fell-ak. Tamḍelt tettili-d ɣef 11 : 30. Mi iberreḥ
ccix n lǧamaɛ : « Ad awin amerḥum s amkan-is », dɣa lɣaci akk ad mlilen deg
wexxam n umerḥum, ssyinna ad awin abrid-nsen ɣer tmeqbert, anda ara afen aẓekka
ihegga. 

 Deg webrid ar tmeqbert, ixuniyen-nni ttcewwiqen fell-as, tarbaɛt sdat,
tayeḍ sdeffir, ayen d-nnan imezwura, a s-d-alsen ineggura. D icewwiqen
yettciṭṭiwen tafekka n wemdan.

 Di tmeqbert, mi ẓẓullen ɣef umerḥum d abrid ar ddaw tmurt. Wid-nni iɣazzen
aẓekka ttilin dinna, d nutni i t-ibennun s tallelt n lɣaci iḥeḍren dinna, wa
iɛeǧǧen, wa yettak ayen uḥwaǧen ibennayen-nni, wiyaḍ ttarran akal i uẓekka,
tekksen akal d-yettagaren dinna, ttaǧǧan amkan d azeddgan. Mi tekfa temḍelt,
yal wa ad yeɛnu ccɣel-is.

 Lǧiran akked iwasila n twacult n umerḥum ttuɣalen s axxam-is i wazal n
tlata wussan. Alarma d ass n tuddza uẓekka n umerḥum-nni. Lǧiran ttawin-as-d i
twacult-nni imekli akked imensi i wazal n tlata wussan, rnu ttɛawazen alarma d
azgen n yiḍ d yemwansa i twacult n umerḥum.

 Ass wis telta, tafejrit, tawacult n umerḥum, irgazen, tulawin akked
igerdan, ttruḥun ɣer tmeqbert akken ad ddzen aẓekka. Llan lɣaci n taddart i
iteddun, ṭṭaqa deg-sen d tulawin. Di tuddza uẓekka, yal wa d acu yettawi, llan
kra ttawin lgaṭu, ttmer, ččina… ferqen-tt i lɣaci yeddan. Ttačaren tabuqalt n waman
srusuyen-tt ɣef uẓekka n umerḥum, zzuzuren nneɛma d yirden ɣef uẓekka. 

 Ttɣiman dinna azal n uzgen n ssaɛa, uqbel ad yeflali yiṭij ttuɣalen-d.
ttuɣalen-d, yal wa ad yennejmaɛ s axxam-is, akken alarmi d ass n rebɛin n
wussan ara ad mlilen. Tawacult n umerḥun txeddem lweɛda n seksu d lḥemmeẓ akked
lbaṭaṭa d zrudiya, tessufuɣ-itt ɣer wegni n taddart ad tt-ččen lɣaci.

 S umata akka i d-tettili temḍelt gar imezdaɣ n lɛerc n at Yeǧǧer. Xedmen
lecɣel n taddart s tɛerfit, s tegmat. Ttbeddaden am yiwen di tegnit n ddiq,
ulac win yettaǧǧan wayeḍ, zedɣen tuddar-nsen, ttḥebbiren am wakken ttḥebbiren
deg yixxamen-nsen.

 kra n yicewwiqen ttawint tlawin ɣef yimerḥum

 Asefru 01

 Ay axxam-iw ameɛzuz

 Win iwalan ssuq

 Cubaɣ-as i wakal-is

 Am lfeṭṭa deg usenduq

 Qqimet a tarwa beslama

 Tura yeḥḍer-d faruq

 Ay axxam-iw ameɛzuz

 Win iwalan leswaq

 Cubaɣ-as i wakal-is

 Am lfeṭṭa deg yiḍwaq

 Qqimet a tarwa beslama

 Teḥḍer-d teswaɛt n lefraq

 Asefru 02

 A timeqbert ukermus

 A tin i yi-igezmen afus

 Lmut n win ɛzizen

 Teǧǧa-d afud-iw yessus

 A timeqbert n WEGNI 

 A tin i yi-igezmen iri

 Lmut n yelli taɛzizt

 Teǧǧa-d afud-iw yeɣli

 Asefru 04

 A win iruḥen d larebɛa

 Ad yekkes ccahed iwala

 Ad iẓer win ɛzizen

 Ad iẓer ma werɛad yerka

 A wi ruḥen deg wass lexmis

 Ad yekkes ccahed i yixef-is

 Ad iẓer win ɛzizen

 Amek i teḍra d weksum-is

 Asefru 05

 Kerheɣ lexbar i d-yusan

 Lǧemɛa lewhi n ṣṣbeḥ

 Yeɣli-d ddihcan fell-i

 Iẓri-w am lehwa iserreḥ

 Ceggɛet akk i leḥbab-iw

 Ma ruḥen-d ad nemsamaḥ

 Kerheɣ lexbar i d-yusan

 Lǧemɛa lewhi n ṭṭhur

 Yeɣli-d ddihcan fell-i

 Iẓri-w yeɣleb acercur

 Ceggɛet akk i leḥbab-iw

 Ma ruḥen-d nebɣa ad nemẓur

 Asefru 06

 Dekkreɣ-k a llah s nneyya

 Alarma idub weksum-iw

 Yewweḍ-d lmut ad mmteɣ

 Sumḥeɣ a kra ẓrant wallen-iw

 Dekkreɣ-k a llah s nneyya

 Alarma duben yeɣsan

 Yewweḍ-d lmut ad mmteɣ

 Sumḥeɣ a kra d iyi-yeẓran

 Asefru 07

 Ay axxam seddaw n lqaɛa

 A win i ak-yerran tigejdit

 Ad ak-iseqqef s tmedlin

 Ula ansi tɛedda tiqqit

 Mačči d aẓekka i nugad

 D ayen nexdem ɣef ddunit

 Ay axxam seddaw tmurt

 A win i ak-yerran tigejda

 Ad ak-iseqqef s tmedlin

 Ula ansi tɛedda lehwa

 Mačči d aẓekka i nugad

 D ayen nexdem ɣef ddenya

 Asefru 08

 Ddura kkiɣ timeqbert

 Ala ttwaḥideɣ Rebbi

 Ufiɣ qqazen aẓekka

 D ajdid ur as-gin lemri

 Izerman tiwekkiwin

 Yezdeɣ-it wul ur yebɣi

 Ddura kkiɣ timeqbert

 Ala ttwaḥideɣ axellaq

 Ufiɣ aẓekka d ajdid

 Bnan-t ur as-gin ṭṭaq

 Izerman tiwekkiwin

 Yezdeɣ-it wul ur ixaq

 Asefru 09

 Hataya lmut hataya

 Гef wejgu i d-iɛelleq

 A yemma iɛuss-iyi-d

 Rruḥ-iw ad at-yecleq

 Axxam yeččur d lɣaci

 Ur yezmir yiwen ad iyi-yeɛteq

 Hataya lmut hataya

 Hataya yedduri-d rref

 A yemma iɛuss-iyi-d

 Rruḥ-iw ad a t-yeccelqef

 Axxam yeččur d lɣaci

 Ur yezmir yiwen ad iyi-yeṭṭef

 Asefru 10

 Ad mmteɣ ad iyi-yawin

 Ad iyi-ssersen sdat leṣfuf

 Ad iyi-meḍlen ad d-uɣalen

 Ad iyi-ǧǧen dinna i lxuf

 A lmalayek tiɛzizin

 Wansemt win n-yusan d anerzuf

 Ad mmteɣ ad iyi-yawin

 Ad iyi-ssersen sdat limam

 Ad iyi-meḍlen ad d-uɣalen

 Ad iyi-ǧǧen dinna i ṭṭlam

 A lmalayek tiɛzizin

 Wansemt inebgi i n-yusan

 Asefru 11

 Ulac lwexda am wassenni

 Imi i yi-refden ɣef nnɛac

 Lḥut deg lebḥer yussaḥ

 Lexwan yerkeb-iten rrɛac

 Terwiḥt ad tt-refden lmalayek

 Aksum d nnṣib n ibeɛɛac

 Ula lwexda am wassenni

 Imi i yi-refden ad iyi-awin

 Lḥut deg lebḥer yussaḥ

 Ṭṭelba ǧǧan tilwiḥin

 Tarwiḥt ad tt-refden lmalayek

 Aksum d nnṣib n twekwin

 Asefru 12

 Aql-iyi ttḥebbireɣ

 I wass n nnuba-w n lmut

 Tarbeɛt teɣɣaz s leḥmeq

 Tayeḍ tɛeǧǧen takurt

 Taẓallit n ṭṭhur ad nruḥ

 Bqaɛlaxir a tamurt

 Aql-iyi ttḥebbireɣ

 I wass n nnuba-w n weḍlaq

 Tarbeɛt tɛeǧǧen takurt

 Tayeḍ teɣɣaz s leḥmeq

 Taẓallit n ṭṭhur ad nruḥ

 A leḥbab yusa-d lefraq

 Asefru 13

 Bqaɛlaxir a leḥbab

 Nekni d abrid tura ad nruḥ

 Ɣer wexxam seddaw tmurt

 Ur tesɛi tawwurt wala lluḥ

 Ur nettɛawad timeẓra

 Ala win yurgan rruḥ

 Bqaɛlaxir a leḥbab

 Nekni d abrid ad nefreq

 Ɣer wexxam seddaw tmurt

 Ur telli tewwurt wala ṭṭaq

 Ur nettɛawad timeẓra

 Ala win yurgan ma ixaq

 Asefru 14

 Am uferruǧ ɣer tala

 Yewwet uṣeggad s uxatel

 Di lmut n win ɛzizen

 Nekk rrẓeɣ di lemfaṣel

 Yettru wul ḥedd ur t-yewwit

 Amzun iɛedda fell-as lbaṭel

 Tukkist deg wadlis IZLAN N TLAWIN,
d-yeffɣen di teẓrigin n RICHA -Elsam deg useggas n 2017.

 Yuɣal yessewhem i tikkelt-nniḍen taɣamsa d wat tsertit uselway n Marikan Donald Trump. Aya, mi d-iberreḥ ussan iɛeddan, deg temrect taneggarut, s ubeṭṭel-ines n temlilit i yellan tettraǧu-t akked uselway n Rrus Vladimir Putin i wass n 1 duǧember yezrin, i lmend n tedwilt n G20 di Buenos Aires. Aṭas ur negzi d acu yellan deffir rray-a n uselway amaynut n Marikan maca, ɣef wakken i d-tewwi tɣamsa tamaḍalant, icudd waya srid ɣer umcubbek qessiḥen i d-yellan taggara-a gar yiɛessasen n wafayen (sswaḥel) Irusiyen akked yiɣerrabuyen ukraniyen deg yilel Aberkan. Teḍra-d tedyant-a ass n 25 unbir, ayen yeǧǧan Kiev ad d-tɛeyyen s tegnit n tegrawla di tmurt-is lqidar n wayyur. Ulamma tuɣ yenna-d ta d tagnit iwulmen i temlilit, wanag azal n usrag umbaɛd, yuɣal Donald Trump ɣer deffir, ibeddel rray ɣef usihar. Syin, yessegza-d taɣtest-is s yiwen n yizen di Twitter, ideg i d-yenna belli werɛad serrḥen Yirusiyen i yiɣerrabuyen ukraniyen i ṭṭfen ass-nni. Seg tama-nniḍen, llan wid yettwalin mačči d tin i d tamentilt tidettit i yeǧǧan Trump ad yagi ad yemẓer d Putin, imi yezmer lḥal ɣef ssebba n wayen i d-yeqqar ubugaṭu n uselway-a n Marikan, mi d-yenna belli yeskaddeb ɣef taluft terza-t di tmurt n Rrus. Ɣur wid yeṭṭafaren tasertit n umaḍal, tigawt-a n Trump d tuccḍa, imi yella yezmer ad ifares tagnit akken ad as-yemmeslay i uselway n Rrus ɣef wayen ur as-yehwi, daɣen ad mcawaren ɣef tifrat n kra n tlufa iɣef ur msefhamen ar tura. Ulamma ur as-d-yelli umlaqa-nni akked uselway n Marikan, ifures Vladimir Putin tirzi-nni-ines i Arjuntin akken ad yemlil d yiselwayen n tmura-nniḍen, am wakken iga yiwen n usarag i yesferḥen ayendin ineɣmasen i d-yerzan seg ukuẓ n tɣemmar n ddunit.

  M. K. 

  
 Yal amdan, iseɛɛu iqeddicen yemgaraden deg tudert-is. Yettak-asen akud i asen-ilaqen akken ad ten-yefru deg teswiɛin iwulmen. Aya iban yettili-d s leḥsabat d wahil yettmaggan deg wussan, imi seg yiwet n tama, llan lecɣal i yessefk ɣef yiwen ad ten-yexdem war aɛeṭṭel neɣ ssuturen-d abellez i wakken ad frun.

 Maca, seg tama-nniḍen, llan ula d iqeddicen i yezmer walbaɛḍ ad ten-yeḍfer s ttawil, neɣ ad asen-yettak drus n wakud, ɣas ahat seg win n yiɣimi-ines. Dɣa, ma nemmeslay-d ɣef lecɣal i yessihil umdan seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ, ad d-nebder addal i simmal ttnernayen wid yettekcamen deg-s, neɣ wid i t-ixeddmen d iqeddac n yidigan. Aya, yettili-d ama daxel n yixxamen neɣ berra, deg yiberdan d tzeɣwa-ines anda ttilin akk ttawilat-is d dduzan-is ilaqen. Deg usamar n Bgayet ihi, aṭas i yerran tamawt ɣef lexsas n tzeɣwa n waddal-a i yelhan i tdawsa n umdan, ladɣa tidak n tlawin neɣ tid anda zemrent ad t-xeddment ma bɣant. Imi ad naf kan di kra n temnaḍin tizeɣwa-nni n waddal, maca ttekcamen-tent anagar irgazen. Ɣas ahat d ayen i d-yekkan seg tama-nsent, imi tuget seg-sent ur ttakkent azal i waddal d ubaɣur i d-yessegray, ḥaca ma uḍnent kra, ceyyɛen-tent yimsujjiyen ad t-gent, wanag si tama-nniḍen llant tid yebɣan ad lhunt d tfekkiwin-nsent, ad sɛunt daɣen lqedd amurqiq yeddukklen. « Ssarameɣ seg wacḥal-aya, ad tili xersum di taddart-nneɣ yiwet n tzeqqa n waddal ara aɣ-yefken tagnit i wakken ad nxeddem deg-s tigawin ara aɣ-yessenqasen lmizan, maca ar ass-a ulac-itt. Aql-i mazal ttraǧuɣ-tt, acku ma tnuḥ-d yiwwas ad iliɣ gar tmezwura ara yettruḥun ɣer din ». I d-tenna yiwet n tlemẓit seg Ayt Smaɛel.

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Deg tdiwennit-agi akked Mass Sahnoun Hocine, anemhal n tiliẓri n teqbaylit TQ5, nesqerde-d kra timsal yerzan taɣamsa tamaziɣt s umata d usliẓri aqbayli s wuzzig. Ad d-nawi diɣ yid-s awal ɣef usenfar n tiliẓri-agi tamaynut TQ5, ha-t-an ihi wayen i d-yenna.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Deg   tazwara, amek tettwaliḍ   taɣamsa tamaziɣt deg Tmazɣa? 

  Sahnoun Hocine:  Nmeyyez aṭas deg temsalt-agi n tɣamsa tamaziɣt, nufa-d belli yella lexṣaṣ meqqren deg uḥric-agi deg tmurt n Tmazɣa. Yerna ur teǧhid ara, yal tamurt tesɛa kra n yiɣmisen d kra n rradyuwat akked tiliẓri. Nekk ttwaliɣ belli, ur tban ara lwelha n tɣamsa-agi, imi ur tefri ara anwa asekkil swayes ara tettwaru, yerna ulac taɣara (qualité) n yihallen.

  I di tmurt n Lezzayer, amek-itt? 

 Nettwali-tt belli ur d aɣ-tqeneɛ ara, imi si tama n tiliẓriwin, ala yiwet i yellan s tmaziɣt zeɛma, acu kan yella deg-s wamur i tutlayt n taɛrabt. Acuɣer ihi deg tiliẓriwin n taɛrabt, ur d-sɛeddayen ara ihallen s tmaziɣt neɣ s teqbaylit, s wakka nezmer ad neḥseb Tv4 d tarbibt n ENTV. Llant daɣen tiliẓriwin yewwin isem amaziɣ, yecban; Numidya, Ǧurǧura…atg, meɛna s taɛrabt kan i xeddment. Ma si tama n rradyuwat, ula d nutenti ur slikent ara seg yihallen s taɛrabt. S wakka zemreɣ ad d-inniɣ belli ulac asliẓri (audiovisuel) amaziɣ i yiman-is. Ulamma niqal, tamurt n Lezzayer telli-d tawwurt i yimseftiyen uzzigen deg uḥric-agi n tɣamsa, maca din din ḥebsent.

  S yisem-ik d anemhal n tiliẓri n teqbaylit TQ5, amek i ak-id-tusa tikti n usnulfu-ines? 

 Nennejmaɛ d agraw, nwala belli ulac asliẓri amaziɣ i d-yelhan s tmurt tamaziɣt neɣ s uɣref-is, dɣa nemcawar akked wid yellan deg unnar, nenna-as acuɣer ur d-neslal ara tiliẓri s teqbaylit. Imi nwala belli Tv4 ur d-terri ara lwelha-s ɣer lexṣaṣ yettidir ugdud-agi, d isem-nni kan n tmaziɣt i tewwi, wamma ahil-is ur yeddi ara d wayen yeḥwaǧ umaziɣ ass-a. Annect-agi, i d aɣ-yewwin ad nxemmem ɣer usnulfu n tiliẓri TQ5?

  Amek i muggren yiqbayliyen ahil-ines yebdan ass-nni n 12 yennayer 2018? 

 Muggren-t-id yiqbayliyen neɣ imaziɣen s umata s lferḥ meqqren. Imi ẓran belli d tiliẓri taqbaylit tilellit, ara ten-yessduklen i meṛṛa. Ayen ara d-isbeggnen annect-agi, d tuzzya i d aɣ-d-zzin yiqbayliyen am umeqyas, yal wa yebɣa ad iɛiwen s wayen yezmer. Aṭas n yimssuffɣen n yisura i d aɣ-d-yefkan isura s teqbaylit, acu kan nekni nesɣerbel-iten i lmend n wayen neḥwaǧ. Ma d kra n tamiwin, ḥesben-tt d tiliẓri n kra n umussu aserti neɣ n kra n tama tasertant, ma d nekk ad d-wekdeɣ belli d tiliẓri tilellit, d tiliẓri n teqbaylit daya.

  D acu ara yilin d leqdic deg-s ɣef teɣzi n useggas, s umata? 

 Tcudd lwelha-nneɣ aṭas ɣer yisental n tmetti d wayen iḍerrun deg-s. Llan yisura, llant tedwilin i tsekla taqbaylit; i wakken ad nefk yis-sent azal i yimura-nneɣ. Yella daɣen wahil i yilmeẓyen d yigerdan, yella daɣen usewwi…atg. Neɛreḍ ad d-nejmel akk taɣulin neɣ iḥricen n tudert n umdan aqbayli, imi d tiliẓri tamatut mačči d tuzzigt, ilaq ad d-tettawi ɣef yal tɣawsa.

  Imi d tiliẓri n teqbaylit, acuɣer mačči di tmurt-is i d-tnulfa? 

 D tidet a win yufan ad d-tlal deg tmurt n leqbayel, maca tlul-d deg tmurt n Canada. Acku deg tmurt n Canada, ur d ak-ttḥettimen ara ad yili uzgen n wahil s tutlayt tafransist neɣ taglizit, azgen-nni-nniḍen s tmeslayt tayemmat. Imi daɣen dihin tamaziɣt, tettwaḥsab d tutlayt tayemmat, ihi nextar ad tt-nexdem 100% s teqbaylit. Acu kan, tuget n wayen ara d-yettɛeddin deg-s, ad yettwasekles deg yistudyuten yellan deg tmurt n leqbayel.

  Ugten wuguren i d-tmuggrem mi itt-id-tesnulfan neɣ ala? 

 Ugur amezwaru d win n yidrimen, imi swayen nekseb kan nekni s tkebbanit-agi takanadit i swayes nebda. Ugur wis sin d win n usekcem-ines deg ugensa (asatilit), imi llan kra igensa, yessutren-aɣ aṭas n udrim ma d nekni ur nezmir ara. Ɣer taggara, nemsefham akked yimḍebbren n ugensa “Badr-5 West Africa Steerable beam”. Llan daɣen wuguren-nniḍen, mačči d yiwen akken ad t-id-nebder, maca nerẓa asalu i uḥric-agi, nessaram ad aɣ-d-ḍefren wiyaḍ.

  Ma yella, ur txemmem ara ɣer useqdec n tantaliyin-nniḍen n tmaziɣt? 

 Negzem-itt deg rray, d tilibizyu n teqbaylit mačči n tmaziɣt. Ulamma ad tettawi isallen neɣ amaynut n tamiwin-nniḍen timaziɣin maca s teqbaylit. Nemsefham kulec ad yili s teqbaylit, ma d tira ad tili s usekkil alatini. D tiliẓri n Tefriqt n ugafa neɣ n yimaziɣen meṛṛa, ma d ameslay fell-as ad d-yili s teqbaylit kan. D annect-agi i yeǧǧan atmaten-nneɣ imaziɣen si yal tama seqsayen-aɣ-d ma zemren ad sɛun tiliẓriwin-nsen s tantaliyin-nsen. Nekni si tama-nneɣ, nenna-asen nezmer ad ten-nɛiwen i wakken ad sɛun tilibizyuwat i yiman-nsen.

  D acu i d-yessenfalay wugzul-agi TQ5? 

 Nextar ad as-nsemmi akkagi i wakken ad tili d tiliẓri n yiqbayliyen meṛṛa. Ma d anamek-is d wagi; “T” d tiliẓri neɣ tilibizyu, “Q” d taqbaylit, ma d xemsa-nni (5), yesɛa sin inumak, amezwaru d 5 imenẓawen (continent) ideg ttidiren leqbayel, wis sin d xemsa-nni n leɛruc (tiqbilin) iqbayliyen yellan zik.

  Amek tettwaliḍ imal n usliẓri amaziɣ? 

 Nekk ttwaliɣ imal n usliẓri amaziɣ, ad yeǧǧuǧeg u ad yegmu, ad yennerni, acu kan s uxeddim zeddigen, yesɛan aswir meqqren. Yerna ilaq ad yesɛu taɣara yelhan, i wakken ad yekkes lexsas yellan deg wahil n usliẓri-nni yellan yakan. Ilaq daɣen ad ddukklen yiɣallen n yimaziɣen i usefti i waṭas deg uḥric-agi n usliẓri, yesɛan azal meqqren deg unegmu, ama n tmurt, ama n umdan s timmad-is.

  Awal-ik n taggara… 

 Ɣer taggara, ad d-greɣ tiɣri i tarwa n tmurt n Leqbayel, ideg ara as-iniɣ, TQ5 d tiliẓri-nwen meṛṛa, nettkel fell-awen akken tetteklem fell-aɣ. D tiliẓri tilellit, ara awen-yilin di lmendad di yal taswiɛt, zgant llint tewwura-s i usenqed d uskasi ibennun.

  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Seg useggas n 2008 ar ass-a, d lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i yettaṭṭafen taqacuct n umyezwar n lwilayat deg tlata n yikayaden-agi iɣurbizen n taggara n ulmud (Aswir wis 5, BEM akked BAC). Yerna yettili-d waya s watug aɛlay i yettɛeddayen s waṭas yal aseggas atug aɣelnaw. Mi d-banen yigemmaḍ n ukayad-agi, ass-nni n lexmis, yeḍḥa-d belli d lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i d-yufraren i tikkelt tis mrawet d snat (12), ta deffir ta, ula deg ukayad-agi n BAC. Atug n rrbeḥ deg ukayad n BAC, di lwilya-agi n Tizi Uzzu di tezrigt-agi n 2019, yewweḍ ɣer 71,60%. Ma neserwes-it ɣer watug aɣelnaw, ad d-naf belli yugar-it s waṭas, imi aneggaru-agi ur iɛedda ara 54,56%. Azal n 304 n yinelmaden, wwin-d tazmilt yemsawan neɣ yugaren 16/20, ɣer tama n 48 n yinelmaden i yessawḍen ɣer tezmilt yufraren ɣef 17/20. D tanelmadt Hemzaoui Imane n tesnawit n Dehmani Mohamed n Boghni i d-yewwin tazmilt tameqqrant di lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu s 18,58/20. Llant 65 n tesnawiyin ɣef 68 i tesɛa lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, sɛant agemmuḍ yugaren atug aɣelnaw n 54,56%. D tasnawit n Abizar n tɣiwant n Timizart i d-yufraren deg tesnawiyin s ugemmuḍ n 96,88%. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, d lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i d-yufraren yakan deg ukayad n uswir wis 5 d win n BEM.

  Atug n rrbeḥ aɣelnaw yewweḍ ɣer 54,56% 

 Iberreḥ-d ass-nni n lexmis, uneɣlaf n Usegmi aɣelnaw, Abdelhakim Belabed s yigemmaḍ n ukayad n taggara n ulmud asniwi, yettwassnen s yisem n BAC, yenna-d belli atug n rrbeḥ aɣelnaw i useggas-agi n 2019, yewweḍ ɣer 54,56%. Iglem-d uneɣlaf Belabed igemmaḍ-agi, yenna-d fell-asen belli d ilemmasen yerna rekden, imi ur bɛiden ara ɣef wid n useggas iɛeddan, yewwḍen ɣer 55,88%. 

 Ulamma ur tgerrez ara liḥala n tmurt, maca, annect-a ur yegli ara s usubbu n watug n rrbeḥ. Azal n 674.831 n yinelmaden i yesɛeddan akayad-agi gar 16 d 20 yunyu iɛeddan, gar-asen 411.431 d wid yeqqaren deg tesnawit akked 263.400 d imsizwiren imunan. D asaka n tusnakt i yeṭṭfen taqacuct n umyezwar n yisakayen s watug n 78,61%. Iger-d diɣ uneɣlaf n usegmi tamawt ɣef watugen yennernan deg useggas-agi, gar-asen; win n yiɣerbazen n lɛesker i yewwḍen ɣer 99,40%, ma d tullas yeqqaren dinna wwint-d 100% ɣer tama n watug n yinelmaden imeɛdar yewwḍen ɣer 59,14%. 

 Am wakken diɣ i d-wwin yinelmaden yellan di lḥebs atug n 46,12%. Ad d-nesmekti kan, belli inelmaden-agi i yesɛan tazmilt n 10/20 neɣ ugar ad ruḥen deg wussan-agi ad jerden iman-nsen deg useggas amezwaru n tesdawit. 
  Gh. A. 

  
 Ass-nni
n lḥedd, 8 deg unbir 2020, i d-yella usarag n umussnaw Dahmane Mazed s usentel
‘’ Tisuraf timenza n tfizikt s tutlayt taqbaylit’’. Yeḍra wayagi srid deg uẓeṭṭa
anmetti, asmel n facebook, n Tesdawit tamaziɣt n tuṛuft, s lmndad n Jeǧǧiga
Issad. Ma ɣef usarag s timmad-is, yenna-d Mass Mazed: ‘‘Asarag agi, yerzan
« Tisuraft timenza n tfizikt s tutlayt taqbaylit », yuli ɣef xemsa
yixfawen. 

 Deg
tizwara, mmesslayeɣ-d ɣef udlis-iw i d-yeffɣen ussan agi (Amawal n tfizikt
tatrart s tutlayt taqbaylit) ɣer Teẓrigin « Editions Universitaires
Européennes). Nniɣ-d i yimeɣriyen yellan di tmurt, d akken a-t-an, gar-aɣ agur
neɣ sin, ad d-iffeɣ di tmurt, i wid yebɣan ad t-id-aɣen dinna. 

 S deffir n tezwart, newwi-d awal ɣef umezruy n tfizikt, seg tallit n teglest ar tallit talemmast; tallit n taleslalit (Renaissance), tallit n leqrun (timida) n tifawin (siècle des lumières) d wamek i d-nessegra s tallit tamirant. Ideg i d-nudder taneflit tamaklalt n tlallit n tfizikt tatrat : tiẓriwin tifizikin titrarin : Timasseɣt tusligt (relativité restreinte); timasseɣt tamatut (relativité générale) d tfizikt takwanṭit (physique quantique)’’. Ma ɣef tussna n tfizikit, yenna-d: ‘’nesmekta-d amek i tettwafrak tussna n tfizikt d ticuḍaḍ d ifurken. 

 Yal afurk, d acu n temsal i yerza, gar-asen : Tafizikt n tanga taneggaḍt, Tafizikt tabelkamit, Tafizikt taɣisant; Tamikanikt tanyuṭunit, Tamikanikt tusliḍt, Tamikanikt tameɣẓant, Tamikanikt n wuzzilen, TaẓeɣladinamiktTasnagurt, Tagurfizikt, takusmulujit, Tajyufizikt d tussna n wakal; Takimit-tafizikt, tadrafizikt, Taliktṛunit d isegran, Tananutiknulujit;Tafizikt tamdeswalt, Tamsikda, Taliktṛamagniḍit, Tasnisla; Tafizikt taẓrayant, Tamikanikt takwanṭit d Tiẓri n yigran, Tafizikt t-tizleɣwa, Timmasseɣt tusligt &amp; Timmasseɣt tamatut;  Tasduklit (Unification), Tafizikt taddadant, Igzanen idasilen, Tarrayin tusnakin d Tarrayin tumḍinin, Tasnezgemt d tesnudemt, Ineglan n uselkim. 

 Deg yixf wis kraḍ, dhiɣ-d s kra n tektiwin yerzan tarrayin tisnagmanin (méthodes pédagogiques) d ikalan uselmed n tfizikt s teqbaylit deg yiswiṛen amenzu, alemmas, usnawi d usdawan. Syin ssawḍeɣ asarag i wakken ad d-ssdeɣ awal ɣef isuḍaf i ttwaliɣ ilaq ad ten-neḍfer ma d-yeḥdeṛ ad naru adlis, neɣ timsirin n tfizikt i yinelmaden d imeɣriyen s tutlayt taqbaylit. Aladɣa amek iwulem ad nesseqdec tasniremt tussnant tatwilant (Terminologie scientifique et technique)’’.   Ar taggara, yeebder-d kra n yisenfaṛen n tsuqilt n yidlisen, iḍrisen d imuhal imazrayen (ouvrages historiques) yellan d isulas iɣef tuli tfizikt ass-a. Yekfa usarag s usqerdec d tuttriwin n wid iḥedṛen, ssulin-t s uskasi amatu ɣef waṭas n temsal yerzan asentel is i d-yedha.

  Hocine
Moula

 Seld mi tekfa tsemhuyt n uɛumu, uɣalen yiɛewwamen d yimerrayen s ixxamen-nsen, ggrant-d teftisin n Bgayet akken ma llant deg yiwen n waddad i ur yebɣi ad iwali uɣerman i iḥemmlen aɣir-is.

 Sanda ma tmuqleḍ, sanda ma tegreḍ asurif, ad ak-d-temlil tculliḍt, taqerɛunt, neɣ d tabewwaḍt ɣef yijdi. Ulamma llan kra n yinebgawen d yiḥewwasen i d-yelhan d tɣawsiwin-nsen mi ččan neɣ mi kfan tirza, maca tuget seg-sent walan tiftisin-nni d agudu i uḍegger n wayen i d-yewwi Rebbi. Dɣa, mi d-teḥḍer tinna n « Qlilit wid ibennun, wid-n ara ihudden ɛummen », d tugna yesḥissifen i yeččuren ayendin d tiftisin, amedya deg Suq Letnin, Melbu, Aweqqas, Ticci d waṭas-nniḍen. « Ussan iɛeddan mi akken i d-yekcem lexrif, rziɣ-d ɣer Ticci akken ad ɛumeɣ, maca daɣen ad dawiɣ acku aṭas i yi-iwessan i uɛumu di lawan-a. D acu, ayen i yi-yesḥassfen d agudu-nni i d-mmlaleɣ deg ubrid-iw, i iɛemren akk liḥala », i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen seg umalu n Bgayet. Si tama n yimḍebbren n tɣiwanin, zgan ttɛawaden-d d akken d ccɣel n uɣerman waya, i yewwi-d ad yili d aɣarim send kullec, imi ur tezmireḍ ad d-tɛusseḍ akk medden deg unebdu. Ulamma llan ɛerḍen akked yimezdaɣ ad sizedgen tiftisin yal mi ara d-yettaẓ yunyu, maca yettuɣal-d kullec mi ara tekfu tsemhuyt yeḥman. « Nekk ttwaliɣ, ilaq usaḍuf akken ad yeg umdan azal i twennaḍt. Lemmer tettili-d leɣrama ɣef win ara iḍeggren ahicur deg wanda ur ilaq, tili yeḍra-d kra n useggem », d awal n yiwet n teḥdayt i iqeddcen deg wallus (recyclage) n uplastik.

  M. K. 

  
 Seg wakken di tmurt n leqbayel εziz wakal, armi aṭas n temsal i iḍerrun, gar yimdanen, armi menγen ula d irgazen γef tlisa, dγa ula d Ccix Muḥend iqubel aṭas n ddεawi yecban-aya degmi i as-yeqqar:
  «La ttnaγen medden γef tmurt
  Ur iẓri ḥedd wi tt-ilan
  Nekni nettalas deg-s ala lqut
  Netta bab-is d sselṭan
  I nekni tegguni lmut
  Leqrar-nneγ d iẓekwan».
  Qqaren, yiwen wass, sin yimdanen, llan d lğiran, yiwen seg-sen d ṭṭameε, iγil ad izdeγ lebda di ddunit, ad yeğğ lğaṛ-is ad iγfel, ad iẓẓiẓ talast ad d-iḥeṛ cwiṭ n wakal. Lğaṛ-is, d uḥdiq. Ifaq maca yessusem. Ṭṭameε, yugi ad yeṛwu, simmal irennu iẓaẓay di tlisa armi yessaweḍ azal n xemsa lmitrat s teγzi deg yiger. Yiwen wass, lğar-is uḥdiq, yeddem-d yeččuṛ tacekkart uqenṭar s wakal, iccud-itt yeğğa-tt. Yessawel-as, yeffeγ-d ṭṭameε, yenna-as i wuḥdiq: “Anεam a lğar”. 
  Lğar uḥdiq: “Bγiγ kan ad ak-ḍelbeγ ad iyi-tεiwneḍ. 
  -Ulac uγilif ad ak-εiwneγ, d acu tebγiḍ? 
  -Ad i yi-tawiḍ tacekkart-inna n wakal s axxam, nekk aql-i uγeγ-tent deg 
  uzagur-iw. Iruḥ lğar-nni ṭṭameε, ittaεraḍ ad tt-yerfed, ur izmir. “Awah ay aḥbib wagi d awezγi, lukan s-zmireγ mačči d aγilif”, I as-yenna. Yuγal yenna-as wuḥdiq-nni: “Annaγ a lğar ameεzuz, yiwet n tcekkart n wakal ur as-tezmireḍ ara! Tekkreḍ i xemsa n lmitrat s teγzi s tehri”. Yenṭeq ṭṭameε: “Semmeḥ-iyi a lğar i wudem n Ṛebbi.
   Yahia Yanes 

  
 Ulac win izemren ad yettu ayen sɛeddan ilindi yinelmaden n tɣiwanin n Ayt Smaɛel d Tsexriwt deg tesnawit-nsen n “Maɛuc Idris”.

 Nezmer ad d-nini akraḍyur amezwaru ur t-ɣrin ara maḍi. Ayen sruḥen d ussan sendilindi d yilindi yewweḍ ahat ɣer 3 n wayyuren. Imir-nni, wa yessuter tuɣalin mi t-id-sḥebsen seg tɣuri, wayeḍ yettnaraf ad itett, ad yesɛu amḍiq deg usečču n tesnawit. Caḍent lḥasun ssebbat i d-igan ugur-nni, armi d-yeḍḥa d asergel ameqqran i yinelmaden. Yuɣ-itent useɛdi ɣef umcum, imi ula d tidukkla n yibabaten n warrac ur d-texdim acemma. D ayen i d-yesmektayen dɣa ayen iḍerrun ussan-a deg tesnawit tamaynut n “Ayt Smaɛel”, imi inelmaden tetteddu ahat i 15 n wussan ur ɣrin. D acu kan ugur n tikkelt-a mačči sɣur yinelmaden i d-yekka, maca d sandika n Cnapeste n Bgayet i yellan deffir waya. Deg yiwen n wulɣu i d-yessufeɣ, iger tiɣri i yakk wid i t-yeṭṭafaren ad gen tagant, ad ḥebsen leqraya alama i d-terra tmehla n usegmi n Bgayet i tsutriwin-nsen. Seg tama n yinelmaden, yezmer tazwara n wussan-nni, llan wid iwumi yehwa lḥal, ɣas ulamma qrib ad d-awḍen yimuras n tegrest. Meɛna, simmal tettzid tagant, simmal yettekcam-iten unezgum imi ẓran sruḥen aṭas seg wahil-nsen. « Asmi tebda tagant i aɣ-yesḥebsen taɣuri ur cliɛeɣ ara. Nniɣ ad nesgunfu meqqar, imi ɣilleɣ ur tettɛedday 3 n wussan. Maca, uɣaleɣ ttqellqeɣ mi tugi ad teḥbes, ḥareɣ ad uɣaleɣ ɣer temsirin, acku ulac wid yenṭerren amek nenṭer nekni s wid yeqqaren ». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n unelmad seg tesnawit n “Ayt Smaɛel”. D ayen yesḥissifen s waṭas, imi tazwara, llan kra n wuguren deg tesnawit n “Ayt Smaɛel”, ma d tura mi d-terfed ixef-is, tuɣal-d tesɛa ttawilat, teḍḥa-d tagant ad teṭṭef amkan, ad tesruḥ i warrac ussan deg tɣuri-nsen, ad asen-twexxer ula d ikayaden i niqal ad mmaggen ass n 10 deg wayyur-a n duǧember.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Waqil mazal asaru-nni n yimenɣi d usemres n yiɣil deg tesdawiyin n tmurt yettkemmil. Mbeɛd acḥal d abaxix yeḍran ussan-a yezrin d wayen i d-ssegran, d wayen akk iḍerrun deg yiseggasen iɛeddan. Asexdem n yiɣil yessaweḍ ad ɣlint terwiḥin, seld tamettant n yilemẓi-nni deg tnezduɣt tasdawant deg tmanaɣt, akken daɣ i iruḥ d asfel yiwen usdawan seg tmurt n Zimbabwé. 

 Deg tesdawit n Wehran, ass n aram yezrin, medlent tewwura n tesga n tutlayin sɣur Tiddukkla tamatut n yinelmaden izzayriyen, ssebba n waya, d imenɣi i d-yellan gar yiwen unelmad d uselmad-is deg ugezdu n tutlayt taglizit. Ma d timental n yimenɣi-a, yeɛreḍ unelmad-nni daxel n tzeqqa n ukayad ad d-yeddem azmam, ɣas yeẓra d ayen yeffɣen i usaḍuf, d ayen i yeǧǧan aselmad ad as-yekkes tifert n ukayad, dɣa tiririt tella-d s yiɣil d tyita sɣur anelmad-nni ur neqbil ara ṛṛay-a. 

 Ayen yessewhamen deg taluft-a, d anelmad-nni i iruḥen sakkin yessers acetki ɣur Tiddukkla tamatut n yinelmaden izzayriyen, d ayen i ten-yeǧǧan ad medlen tiwwurra n tesga-a i sin n wussan. Annect-a, yegla-d s yiwen n ugraw meqqren azekka-nni, anda i d-mlalen yiselmaden merra n ugezdu d unemhal n tesdawit d kra n yiɛeggalen seg tiddukkla n yinelmaden, ayagi akken ad d-afen tifrat i wugur-a. Ma d asteqsi i d-yettuɣalen dima; d acu-tent tmental i d-yessawaḍen imenɣiyen yettilin zik deg yiberdan ɣer daxel n tesdawit yettuneḥsaben d aɣbalu n tmussni u d adeg yesɛan iseɣ? D acu i d tifrat n wugur-agi ? *

<p style="text-align:right">   K. A. 

  
 Tberreḥ-d ussan-a kan tkebbanit tameqqrant Google d akken ur tesnuzuy sya d tasawent iseɣẓanen d wallalen isenselkamen i termist tacinwant Huawei, ḥaca iqeddicen n uɣbalu yeldin.Yella-d waya send rray i yeddem uselway n Marikan, Donald Trump, i ugdal ɣef termisin timarikanin asenzi n wallalen isenselkamen i kra n termisin tiberraniyin.Tamentilt n teɣtest-a, ɣef wawal n uselway n Marikan, d mi asen-tuɣal Huawei d « amihi » i tɣellist taɣelnawt, armi tt-gren deg wumuɣ aberkan. Dima ɣef wakken i d-nnan kra n yimḍebbren n tmurt n Marikan, iban-d cukkten tettɛassa-ten Huawei i lfayda n Pékin. Seg tama-s, tenna-d tkebbanit tacinwant, ayen akka tga Washington mgal-is, ad yessefcel asnulfu i yerzan tasuta tis 5, am wakken ara yemdel tawwurt i waṭas n Yimarikanen ad farsen seg tetiknulujiyin tineggura deg umaḍal. Ilaq ad d-nini yessewhem uberreḥ-a n uselway Trump amaḍal s timmad, imi aṭas n tlufa i yellan deffir-s, am tegrawla n tnezzut. Ɣef wawal n kra n yimaslaḍen ɣef yisental-a isertanen, ssebba tidettit mi yejbed Google iman-is ur terzi taɣellist n Marikan, wanag tcudd ɣer tugdi n tmurt-a ad d-taweḍ ad tt-id-tɛaneḍ ccinwa, ad teṭṭef nettat tisura n tetiknulujit deg umaḍal-a. Abeɛda imi ma nemmeslay ɣef tsuta tis semmus (5G), a-t-an teskanay-d leɛjubat tmurt n Ccinwa. Yuɣ lḥal, ar tura yella Huawei deg 170 n tmura, yeṭṭef amḍiq wis sin n yismartfunen deg umaḍal. Ayen akka tga Google d tiyita tameqqrant i Huawei, ma neẓra belli ismartfunen-is d tfelwiyin-is leḥḥunt s unagraw Android, i d-tesbedd Google. Si tura, tettḥebbir-d termist-a Huawei tifrat i yiman-is, akken ur tettili ddaw leɛnaya n Marikan, daɣen ur ttenṭerrayen yimelyan n yiseqdacen-is imekdiyen deg umaḍal. Ula d awanek acinwa, ibeggen-d ibeddi-ines ɣer yidis n Huawei. Dɣa, tekkat Marikan ad tesseḥbes Ccinwa asenfar-is n lebni n uẓeṭṭa-s n tsuta tis 5. D ayen i izemren ad d-yeḍru, meskud aṭas n wallalen s wayes i d-txeddem, am tecriḥin (puces) d yisekkaren (iprusisuren), tella tettaɣ-iten-id si Marikan. Ma ɣef tedrimt, ayendin ara sruḥen yeqqadacen imarikanen, am Intel, AMD, Qualcomm, imi d imelyan n yidularen i llan ssekcamen-d sɣur Huawei.

  M. K. 

  
 Aṭas n lecɣal n tneflit i d-yettwaheggayen taggara-a deg tɣiwant n Amizur, i yeggugen s wazal n 25 n yikilumitren seg waɣir n Bgayet.

 Deg yal aḥric, ad iwali yiwen kra yettmagga, bedden-as s wudem yelhan yimḍebbren n tɣiwant-a. D ayen kan i suturen yimezdaɣ n yal tamnaḍt, imi anezgum-nsen i yellan gar yimezwura, d tilin n wallalen n tudert ilaqen i wakken ad izmiren ad qablen ussan n tudert tartar. Dɣa, deg uḥric n tneflit d uselhu n tudert n yimezdaɣ, yella-d umaynut yessecrahen i Taddart Tameqqrant, imi d tamnaḍt i yesɛeddan ayendin d iḥeyyaren seg uɣilif n waman, n tissit abeɛda, i tt-icewwlen acḥal d iseggasen, tugart tugart deg unebdu. Aya imi, ɣef wamek i d-iban, qdimen maḍi yiqadusen i asen-yessawaḍen aman s ixxamen-nsen, armi i d-bran i ssḍiḍ. Maca, ɣef leḥsab n teɣbalut-nneɣ i iqerben i tɣiwant-a iɣef nettmeslay, ur mazal ad iɛeṭṭel xilla wugur-a ad yefru, akken ad snuffsen akk yiɣermanen n taddart-a. Meskud asenfar yerzan aseggem n uẓeṭṭa n usiweḍ n waman yezdigen – wid n tissit – ad yebdu ussan-a i d-iteddun, neɣ deg yimalasen-a n sdat-neɣ ma iɛeṭṭel. I lmend n waya, tebda yakan iqeddicen-is termist i yettukellfen s ureqqeɛ, ɣef wakken i d-tenna daɣen teɣbalut-nneɣ, send mi tqeɛɛed iman-is deg wadeg ilaqen i useqleɛ n lecɣal imezwura. Yezmer send anebdu, ad ilin mden yiqeddicen. Yewwi-d ad d-nesmekti daɣen belli yettuɣal wazemz n usbedd n uẓeṭṭa aqbur n waman deg taddart-a ɣer useggas n 1999, ulamma yettwawi kan ɣer tlemmast n udrum. Wamma seg yimir-nni, d iɣermanen s timmad-nsen i ixeddmen tuqqna i yixxamen-nsen seg uqadus-nni, akken ufan ur akken iwulen. Ɣef waya ara yenfeɛ s tidet uẓeṭṭa-a amaynut akk imezdaɣ n tuddar timecṭaḥ n tama-a, am umedya n Teymunt, Targa n Wiran, Tizi n Wuccen akked tlemmast n Taddart Tameqqrant. Ma yellan d taɣbalut n beṭṭu n waman, ad d-tas seg tneḍḍaft (acaṭu) i d-yezgan deg Msala, ɣer tansiwin n wid akk i asen-yesran. 

  M. K. 

  
 Tewwi-d terbaεt n waddal n Kempo n tmurt n Lezzayer amḍiq wis kraḍ (03) deg tezrigt tis 16 n telɣuɣa n ddunit n tmurt n Sepenyul, i d-yellan seg 25 ar 27 seg waggur n yebrir 2019, anda i d(tḥella terbaεt taɣelnawt 50 n cciεat. Gar-asent, 11 n wuraɣ, 22 n cciεat n teẓruft d 17 n cciεat n udrenz, deg yiwet n temsizzelt anda ttekkant 33 n tmura n ddunit. Tikkelt-agi, turar terbaεt taɣelnawt s yilmeẓyen yesεan ddaw 21 n yiseggassen, yecban Malak Day Touba (19 n yesgassen), i d-yewwin snat (02) n cciεat n wuraɣ, deg taggayt n semi-Kempo d Full-Kempo. Sḥassfen aṭas yimḍebbren n terbaεt n yinaddalel seg maḥyaf yessemres unefray n yiwet n temlilit, i yekksen cciεa n wuraɣ i unaddal Fayçal Chennah. Tettekka tmurt n Lezzayer deg temsizzelt-agi s 19 n yinaddalen, s tlawin d yirgazen, deg taggayin yemgaraden n waddal n Kempo, anda qesden ad d-ḥellin amur ameqqran n cciεat deg talɣuɣa-agi, wa ad d-ilin deg yimeḍqan imezwura deg umyezwar n temsizzelt.

   Ali Zalouk 

  
 Tettuɣal-d Tefsut n yimaziɣen s lfuruḥ d tmeɣriwin yal mi ara d-tezzi. Ɣef teɣzi n mraw n wussan ineggura n yebrir, ttilin-d leqdicat idelsanen yemxalafen; tuget d wid i d-ssuddusent tddukkliwin tidelsanin. 20 yebrir, daɣen, d yiwen n wazemz i d-yettuɣalen s waktay-nniḍen, imi ass-nni i aɣ-yeǧǧa yiwen wudem n ccna d ssinima n teqbaylit zeddigen. Wagi d acennay Amroun Mhenni i tewwi tmettant deg wass n 20 yebrir 2012. Ɛemrun Mhenni, d anaẓur aqdim. 

 Ilul ass n 3 duǧember 1938 deg Buzgan. Seg temẓi-s i yebda ccna, mi akken iḥeffeḍ s wul tizlatin n Sliman Ɛazem. Uqbel ad tekker tegrawla n Lezzayer, iruḥ ɣer tmurt n Fransa, yekki di tfidiralit n FLN deg temdint n Marseille. Mi d-yuɣal ɣer tmurt seld tagrawla, yekcem ɣer rradyu, din i yexdem geddac n tceqqufin n umezgun akked wudmawen yettwassnnen deg umezgun n teqbaylit. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer ssinima, yekki deg waṭas n yisura yesɛan inumak lqayen n tmetti d wayen icudden ɣur-s, gar-asen Aḥlil aḥli, Axxam n Dda Meẓyan… Ma d ccna, ad naf gar tezlatin yettwassnen i d-yeǧǧa Mhenni Ɛemrun, ad d-nebder deg-sent Tettcekkireḍ-iyi-d jeddi-k, A jeǧǧiga. 

  Kh. A. 

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis yezrin, 29 deg waggur n meɣres 2018 ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, tella-d temlilit taseklant tis sebɛa sɣur Mass Kacimi Samir deg Temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D timlilit yeddan ɣef teɣzi n snat sswayaɛ anda yemmeslay-d umaru akked uneggal yettarun s tutlayt n taɛrabt ɣef waṭas n temsal. D tanemhalt n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu Massa Gouméziane Nabila i d-yellan ɣef lmendad n temlilit-agi taseklant, d nettat i d-yefkan awal n tazwara, sakin tefka-as aṣawaḍ i bab n usarag i d-imslayen s telqayt ɣef wungal azzayri, am wakken daɣen i d-yewwi awal ɣef umecwar-is ɣezzifen deg tira n wungalen. Mi yessuli asarag-agi-ines umaru d uneggal Samir Kacimi, iger-d tiɣri i yilmeẓyen ldɣa inelmaden yellan dinna, i wakken ad ɣren idlisen n yimura-nneɣ meqqren n tmurt, uqbel ad ɣren iberraniyen. Ma ɣer taggara maḍi n temlilit-agi yekfan lewhi n 12h00, yella-d deg-s wazal n 45 n ddqayeq n tririt ɣef yisteqsiyen n wid yellan dinna. Ad d-nesmekti belli, Mass Samir Kacimi d amaru n waṭas n wungalen s tutlayt n taɛrabt yecban; Ass ameggaz n lmut 2009, Aberreḥ s rrwaḥ 2010, Win yettargun 2012, tayri di lexrif immalen 2014…atg. Am wakken i ttusuqlen waṭas n wungal-is ɣer tutlayin tiberraniyin. Dɣa ungal “Tayri di lexrif immalen” yettusuqel ɣer tefransist s uzwel-agi “L’amour au tournant”, ma d ungal-nni “Win yettargun” yettusuqel ɣer teglizit d telmanit.

   Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Azekka n ttlata 19 yunyu 2018, ara tebdu temlilit tagraɣlant ara d-yilin d tajmilt i yiwet gar tgejda n tezlit taqbaylit. I lmend n usmekti n umulli wis 20 ɣef tmenɣiwt n umedyaz d ucennay neɣ anaẓur aqbayli amḥaddi Lwennas Matub.

 Thegga-d tesdawit Abderrhmane Mira n Bgayet yiwet n temlilit tussnant tagraɣlant, ara yeddun ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan-agi: ttlata 19, larebɛa 20 akked lexmis 21 deg waggur n yunyu ideg nella. D timlilit ara d-yawin awal ɣef tudert neɣ tameddurt n Lwennas Matub, gar tnagiyin d temsal yerzan timeɣnest-ines ɣef tmagit d yidles amaziɣ akked yizerfan n umdan. Ad ilin daɣen yisaragen ɣef tmedyazt-is d yisefra-s, ama s tezrawin n unadi neɣ s tselḍin n yimusnawen n tmedyazt. Am wakken diɣ ara d-ilin yisaragen ɣef uẓawan akked ccna n uḥeddad n wawal-agi aqbayli, yefkan tudert-is d yiman-is d asfel ɣef tmurt n Leqbayel. D tasga n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt akked tmezdayt n tsekliwin d tutlayin n tesdawit n Bgayet d idisan i d-yessuddsen temlilit-agi tameqqrant ara d-yilin deg tzeqqa n yisaragen n tesdawit Abderrhmane Mira n lwilaya n Bgayet, deg tesdawit yettwasnen s yisem n Abudaw. Yetturaǧu ad ḥedren timlilit-agi waṭas n yiselmaden, ad naf tuget deg-sen d iselmaden deg tesdawiyin n tmurt n Lezzayer, gar-asen Kamel Bouamara, Allaoua Rabhi, Mohammed Djellaoui, Mohand Akli Salhi, Saɛid Chemakh…atg. Llan daɣen yiselmaden n tesdawiyin n tmura tiberraniyin, gar-asen: Kamel Nait Zerrad, Tassadit Yacine, El Husscina Farhad…atg. Ma d iswi n temlilit-agi, ɣef wakken i t-id-nnan yimsuddsen-agi deg wulɣu-nni n temlilit-a, ad yili d asissen iwatan ɣef wayen akk i d-yefka d wayen i d-yeǧǧa Matub ama d tamedyazt, ama d aẓawan ama d isental iɣef yessefra akked talɣiwin swayes yessefra…atg. D tagnit ara d-yesddukklen imussnawen d yiselmaden d wid akk iḥemmlen Lwennas, d tagnit daɣen n tmussni d tussna, imi ad yili ubeddel n tmuɣliwin d tmussniwin ɣef urgaz-agi ameqqran. Tger-d Massa Lynda Ouatah, s yisem-is d taɣellayt n ugezdu n tmaziɣt n tesdawit-agi, tiɣri i yinelmaden d yimdanen iḥemmlen azamul n tezlit taqbayli Lewnas Matub i wakken ad d-rzun akk ɣef tezɣi n tlata wussan-agi, i wakken ad as-rren ula d nutni tajmilt, wa ad ḥedren timlilit-agi ara asen-d-yawin aṭas n tmussniwin yeffren deg umedyaz-acennay Matub.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Deg wussan-agi kan yezrin, i d-tefka tneɣlaft n Usegmi aɣelnaw Massa Nouria Benghabrit, deg tansa (le site) n tneɣlaft-is leğrida n yikayaden unṣiben n taggara n useggas-agi aɣurbiz 2017 / 2018. Akayad n 5e akked wid n BEM ad d-ilin deg waggur n Ṛemḍan, ma d win n BAC ad d-yili deffir-s kan. Annect-agi yusa-d mebɛed mi temcawer tneɣlaft-agi akked d yinelmaden d yiselmaden ɣef wazemz n ukayad n BAC. Ineggura-a, fernen ad d-yili deffir waggur n Ṛemḍan. Ha-ten-in amek ara d-asen: akayad n taggara n uswir amenzu 5e, ad d-yili ass n larebɛa 23 deg waggur n maggu (23/05/2018). Ma d win n taggara n uswir n ulmud alemmas, yettwassnen s yisem n BEM, ad d-yili seg wass n letnayen 28 alamma d ass n larebɛa 30 seg waggur yunyu (28-29-30/05/2018). Ma d win n taggara n uswir n tsenawit neɣ ayen iwumi qqaren BAC, ad d-yili seg wass larebɛa 20 yunyu arma d ass letnayen 25 deg waggur n yunyu (20-21-23-24-25/06/2018). Ayen yerzan ikayaden n 5e akked BEM, akken i tent-id-summer tikkelt tamezwarut i qqimen, ur ibeddel ara wazemz-nsen. Ikayaden-agi deg sin yid-sen, ad ten-sɛeddin yinelmaden deg waggur n Remḍan, ma d akayad n BAC ad t-sɛeddin yinelmaden kra wussan kan deffir lɛid tameẓyant. Ad d-nesmekti kan, belli akayad n waddal ama d win BEM neɣ d win BAC, ad t-sεeddin yinelmaden deg yiɣerbazen-nsen am yiseggasen i iɛeddan. Akayad-a, ad d-yili gar talemmast n waggur n meɣres d tazwara n waggur n yebrir n useggas i d-iteddun. Ad nesmekti d akken akayad n taggara n uswir amenzu 5e n useggas aɣurbiz 2017/2018, ad t-sεeddin yinelmaden deg yiɣerbazen-nsen, mebla ma rzan ɣer yiɣerbazen-nniḍen, am wakken xedmen deg sin n yiseggasen-agi yezrin. 

  Gh. A. 

  
 Lebni n 76 n yidigan n tenzuyt, d yiwen gar yisenfar i seg-i d-tesfaydi tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa yettujerden deg wahil n uselway n tmurt, yeɛnan lebni n 100 n yidigan n tenzuyt di yal Taɣiwant. Yella-d usenfar- i uxlaq n yimeḍqan n lxedma anda ara d-sfaydin yilmeẓyen n temḍiqt-agi yenḥafen deg unegmu n yal aḥri. Maca, ar ass-a, urɛad ttunefken yidigan-agi, ɣas ma ugar n 4 n yiseggasen segmi kfan s lexedm. D ayen i d-yessekkren lɣiḍ meqqren ɣer yilmeẓyen yessersen i karamen-nsen i wakken ad ten-id-isaḥ udigan ideg ara xedmen. Idigan-agi n tenzuyt, ha-ten-an deg yir liḥala imi ur ttwesmersen ara. Dɣa, tiɣri n yilmeẓyen n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa i yemḍebbren, teɛna temsalt-agi n ufraq n yidigan i lfayda n yimezdaɣ.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Am yal aseggas segmi i d-tennulfa, tella-d deg wussan n 18, 19, 20 d 21 deg wayyur-a n yebrir, deg temdint n Tubiret, taɣiwant n Leqser, teẓrigt tis tlata n tfaska n tmedyazt tamaziɣt, d tajmilt i wid yeɣlin deg tefsutin n 1980 d 2001. Tafaska-a, ɣef wamek i d-nnan kra n wid i as-iḥeḍren, temmug akken ilaq seg yal tamiwin, ama n usnubget, n llhu neɣ n wayen-nniḍen. Ladɣa imi leqdic-is sdukklent fell-as afus ugar n kraḍet n tdukkliwin-a, gar-asent: Amaziɣ, Tafat d Talwit. D ayen dɣa i yeǧǧan taɛkemt n uheggi-ines ad tifsus, i yeǧǧan daɣen wid yerzan ɣer dinna, ad d-uɣalen s ixxamen-nsen s ucmummeḥ n wudem, imi asen-hwan wakuden i sɛeddan deg-s. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer wahil i d-yellan deg teɣzi n rebɛa n wussan n ttiɛad-a adelsan, ad d-nebder tazwara timsizzelt n tmedyazt ideg kkin 63 n yimedyazen, gar-asen 13 n tlawin, d tmenna n yisefra n berra temsizzelt i d-yettwawin sɣur kra n yimedyazen-nniḍen. Asenz n yidlisen s ubuddu, yella-d daɣen, anda fursen yimeskaren tagnit, tuget seg-sen d imedyazen, sersen-d ayen i d-ssufɣen di tewriqin i win yebɣan ad yaɣ, ad iɣer ayen uran. Ula d aḥewwes ur yettwazgel deg wahil-nni, imi d-tella tirzi ɣer Tkejda, amekkan acebḥan yettwassnen di Tubiret. Ma deg yiḍ, tettwaxdem tmeɣra n ccna sɣur ucennay Kamal Cennan. Ass aneggaru n tfaska, ttwaberrḥen-d yigemmaḍ n temsizzelt i d-tefka tseqqamut n yinzurfa, gar-asen amedyaz Mebarek Gamar, ttwaferqen 15 n warrazen: 5 i wid i d-yufraren, 10 nniḍen, ttunefken i usebɣes. Arraz amezwaru yewwi-t Ǧilali Fawzi, arraz wis sin isaḥ-d i Ṭaher Arezqi, arraz wis kraḍ yettunefk i umedyaz Belqasem Siqadir, atg.

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Tahanout d yiwet gar 23 n tuddar n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i d-yezgan deg ugafa n tɣiwant-agi u deg ugafa n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tebԑed ɣef Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan yellan deg Lebḍaḥi s wazal n 10 km. Ttidiren yimezdaɣ-is iseggasen-agi ineggura deg ukukru d tugdi, ladɣa deg tallit n ccetwa. Imi simmal ṭerdiqen yinessisen n waman, simmal yettseyyix wakal. Dɣa deg kra wussan kan iɛeddan, glan waman i d-yewwten s waṭas s yiwen usyax meqqren, i d-yellan deg umḍiq iwumi qqaren Tizi Tkharoubt, yellan tama n ubrid ameqqran n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Yegla-d usyax-agi s uɣelluy n yiwet n teslent tameqqrant, i iḥebsen tikli n tkerrusin deg ubrid-agi ɣef teɣzi n yiwen wass. Acu kan, ur d-yegli ara s txeṣṣarin ama deg terwiḥin, ama deg tkerrusin, imi tasebḥit n wass i d-teɣli, ɣef lewhi n lxemsa n ssbeḥ. Annect-agi, yekka-d seg yir asewseɛ n ubrid aɣiwan, yeqqnen gar Lekhali akked Ighil Bouchene. Ma dayen yessewhamen deg temsalt-agi, d akken ur d-giren ara yimḍebbren n tɣiwant afus-nsen deg temsalt-agi n usyax n wakal i d-yettilin di tɣiwant. Mazal ar tura kra n yimukan tama n ubrid-agi aɣiwan, i izemren ad d-seyxen deg wussan i d-iteddun. Am wakken daɣen i yella yiwen wuẓru nnig n ubrid-agi aɣiwan deg umḍiq n Targa Lqahwa, sdat kan cwiṭ n taddart-agi, yesserhab imsebriden yettawin abrid-agi yal ass. Imi ẓran belli yeɣli-d yiwen-nniḍen deg useggas iɛeddan, ugaden ad d-yernu wagi ibedden kan ɣef ssebba. Imsebriden yettɛeddayen syin-a tasebḥit n wass, tuɣalen-d tameddit-is, senharen s lxuf meqqren, ladɣa deg wussan n ugeffur iǧehden. Ɣef wannect-a, gren tiɣri deg wid teɛna temsalt, i wakken ad lhun s taluft-agi, uqbel ad d-ḍrunt twaɣiyin.

  A. Abdelghani 

  
 S leḥzen meqqren i nemmuger lmut n yiwen gar wudmawen imagdayen i yettnaɣen ɣef yizerfan n umdan, d yiwen yettallen imeɣban d wid terra tmetti ɣer rrif. D yiwen seg wigad yebɣan ad beddlen udem i tsertit ɣer ubrid n tidet d win n ṣṣwab. 

 Ahat ad ilin wid ur t-nessin ara deg unnar aserti, imi yettnaḍaḥ di tsusmi. Wagi d Ḥamid Ferḥi, d asmideg, d amasay deg Umussu amagday inmetti (MDS), i yewwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi imalas-a. Ayen i yernan lɣiḍ di tmettant-is, d akken yuḍen kra n wussan uqbel ad yemmet, izad fell-as waṭṭan deg yiwen yiḍ, dɣa wwin-t s lɛejlan ɣer sbiṭar n Bni Messus di tmanaɣt, maca ayen yessewhamen, nnan-as-d ulamek ara tkecmeḍ imi ččurent texxamin. 

 Ayen i t-yeǧǧan ad yessezri iḍ-nni deg ugnir ɣef ukersi, yesbur yiwet n tḥayekt. Ahat d yiwet seg tmental yesɛejlen ussan-is, armi yewweḍ s anda ara naweḍ ass-nni n 5 deg furar. Ḥamid Ferḥi, yettekki deg waṭas n tmesbaniyin d yibeddiyen i d-yettilin mgal wid yettɛeddayen di ccreɛ deg lbaṭel. 

 D amedya-nniḍen n yir udem n ssbiṭarat n tmurt-nneɣ, d tewtilin yuɛren i ttafen din yimuḍan d ustehzi meqqren ur nesɛi tilas i swayes leḥḥun yixeddamen. Maca asteqsi ur nufi ara tiririt, ayɣer imasayen n tmurt, ttazzalen yal tikkelt ɣer tmura ideg tujjya telḥa u tuẓa isurifen meqqren akken ad dawin din? Ar melmi ara kemmlent tɣawsiwin-a d yir aselḥu n tsudwin d ustehzi deg yal taɣult? Ar melmi ara d-yili umuqel s tiṭ n lḥeq ɣer yimdanen yettruḥun d iseflan ur uklalen? Sya ar yimir, ad as-nessirem talwit d tmella i Mass Ḥamid Ferḥi.

<p style="text-align:right">  K. A. 

  
 Ageffur aneggaru d udfel i d-yeɣlin s ṭṭaqa deg waɣir n Bgayet, glan-d s waṭas n txessar d wuguren i yimezdaɣ. Ɣef wakken i d-yewwi Uḥuddu aɣarim (Protection civile) n Bgayet, deg wulɣu i aɣ-d-yewwḍen, ugar n semmus n yiberdan i imedlen deg sin n wussan-nni ideg yettwaɣ lḥal maḍi. Amedya n udrar n Yicellaḍen, ideg teḥbes tikli deg ubrid aɣelnaw wis 26A. Snat n tnilliwin n Leqser ttwamedlent daɣen ɣef ssebba n ufiḍi n Wasif Asemmam (Sumam), armi d abrid aɣelnaw wis 75 i d-imugren d asellak wid iḥeslen. Ijerred daɣen Uḥuddu aɣarim aṭas n tuffɣiwin i ferru n yiɣilifen d usellek n medden. Gar-asent, ad d-nebder, tuffɣa ɣer Melbu, ɣer Termist ICOTAL n Bgayet d Saket, mbeɛd aggelgel n waman. Yettwajerred daɣen usellek n temrawt n tfunasin i iḥeslen deg wasif, tamnaḍt n Rmila, akked tukksa n yiwet n ṭṭejra d tameqqrant, i d-yeɣlin ɣef uɣlad deg Leqser. Ad d-nesmekti d akken llant-d ula d kra n usyax n wakal, abeɛda deg Leflay, Tiban, d Bulimat.

  M. K. 

  
 D tiddukkla “Itri adelsan n Uqbu”, ara d-isuddsen timlilit tis mraw d snat (12) n tfaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt n Ṣummam, ara d-yilin seg 27 alamma d 30 deg duğember 2018.

 I lmend n waya, tger-d tiɣri i wid yettfeṣilen awal i wakken ad jerden iman-nsen deg temsizzelt-agi n tmedyazt. Ad tili deg Uxxam n yilmeẓyen Abderreḥman Fares n temdint n Uqbu, deg lwilaya n Bgayet. Timlilit-agi, ad tt-gen d tajmilt i tmedyazt tameqrant Nadya Bennaɛmer. Ma d wid neɣ tid yebɣan ad ttekkin deg tfaska-agi-agi n tmedyazt deg tezrigt-is tis 12, ilaq fell-asen ad aznen 3 n yisefra-nsen, yettwarun s ttawil n uselkim, s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, yerna s usekkil alatini. Isefra-agi swayes ara ttekkin deg-s, ur ilaq ara ad ilin ttekkan yis-sen deg temsizzliyin-nniḍen n tmedyazt. Ass aneggaru ideg ara sersen isefra-nsen, wid yebɣan ad ttekkin, ad yili ass n 30 seg waggur n unbir 2018. Ad tili tuzna n yisefra ɣer tansa-agi taliktrunit: <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="1e6a7f737b7a677f646a2c2e2f265e79737f7772307d7173" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a> , acu kan ur ilaq ad iseddu usizwer isem-is neɣ uṭṭun n usiwel-is deg yisefra-agi ara yazen. Ma i wugar n yisalan ssiwlet ɣer wuṭṭun-agi: 034 33 45 78 neɣ 0775 54 57 76. D tiɣri i yiḥeddaden n wawal, ama d amedyaz ama d tamedyazt, neɣ d win yettewzanen awal deg usefru-s, yessefk kan ad yili yiles-is d amaziɣ daya. D timsizzelt ara yesqerdcen tamedyazt tamaziɣt s tantaliwin-is yemgaraden: taqbaylit, tacenwit, tamahaqt…atg. Annect-agi imi d tafaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt, i d-yesddukklen imedyazen imaziɣen s umata. Yetturaǧu ad yili wahil n tfaska-agi d anesbaɣur: Gar isaragen ɣef tmedyazt, timsikniyin yemxalafen, asenzi n yidlisen s yibuddan, ladɣa, wid n tmedyazt. Rnu ɣer temsizzelt-agi n tmedyazt, ad tili diɣ tmenna n yisefra berra n temsizzelt…atg. D ttiɛad adelsan yuɣen aẓar deg lwilaya n Bgayet, yefka afud i tmedyazt tamaziɣt, imi yettuneḥsab d aɣerbaz n tmedyazt, acḥal d amedyaz i d-yeffɣen syin. Asiher-agi, ara yeddun ɣef teɣzi n rebɛa wussan, ad yebdu s wudem unṣib ass n 27 duǧember 2018 s tulya tunṣibt d temlilit d yimedyazen. Ma d ass aneggaru n temlilit-agi, ad yili ass n 30 deg duğember 2018, anda ara d-tili tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i wid yettekkin deg temlilit-agi tis mraw d sin, am wakken daɣen ara fken arrazen i wid ara d-yufraren. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli tiddukkla-agi “Itri adelsan n Uqbu”, tebda leqdicat-is s wudem unsib ass n 2 deg meɣres 1976. Ma d tafaska-agi, tebda deg useggas n 2005, yal aseggas yettili-d deg-s umaynut.

  Kraḍ n warrazen   i temsizzelt-agi tis 12 

 Tazrigt-agi tis 12 n temsizzelt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt n Ṣummam, ad tefk 4 n warrazen i setta n yimedyazen ara d-yufraren deg snat n tewsatin n temedyazt: Tamensayt (taqburt) akked tmirant (tamaynut). Acu kan d arrazen imzumal (symbolique) kan imi iswi n temlilit-agi mačči d arraz, d asnerni n tmedyazt taqbaylit, ɣef leḥsab n yiεeggalen n tddukkla-a tadelsant. Di tmedyazt tamirant, ad ilin sin warrazen i tlata n yimedyazen imenza ara d-yifriren: Bab n umḍiq amenzu, ad as-d-suffɣen ammud n tmedyazt weḥd-s. Ma d bab n umḍiq wis sin d wis tlata, ad asen-d-suffɣen yiwen wammud ara d-ijemlen isefra n sin-agi imedyazen. Ma di tmedyazt tamensayt, ad yili yiwen kan warraz, ara yilin d ammud n tmedyazt i tlata n yimedyazen ara d-yifriren deg umyezwar deg ṣṣenf-agi n tmedyazt. D adlis, ara d-ijemlen isefra n umedyaz ara yawin amḍiq amezwaru d win n umḍiq wis sin akked bab n umkan wis tlata. Annect-agi, yuɣal ɣer lexṣaṣ n tedrimt n tddukkla-agi, ɣef wakken i t-id-nnan yiɛeggalen-is.

  Gh. A. 

  
 Segmi kan i yuzzel wawal deg uzetta n FB γef tedyant yerzan aselmed n tmaziγt, anda iɛeggalen n tejmaɛt taγerfant taγelnawt gguman ad ddun deg wawal n ukabar n yixeddamen anda yessuter d akken tamaziγt ad tettuselmed di twilayin imerra yerna mebla ma xtaren-tt yinelmaden.

 D ayen yesserfan mačči d kra isdawayen ukkud yinelmaden ama n tesnawiyin neγ n yiγerbazen ilemmasen. D timesbaniyin i inedhen di yal tamnadt, iberdan ɛemren, iγerbazen xlan, tiseddawiyin ikcem-itent uhetwir. S ya γer da, ad nsel d akken iγallen n laman ur fkin ara ttriḥ i wid ara yelḥun, maca mebla ma yella-d kra n lḥers. D acu kan, Tubiret, yiwet seg twilayin yettilin di ttiɛad, tezga tettxellis tabzert ugar n tiyad. Acimi ? Mi kkren yinelmaden n tesdawit Akli Mohand Oulhadj i wakken ad xedmen tamesbanit ass n letnayen yezrin, zzin-d yiγallen n laman i tesdawit, ur gin ara abrid n tuffγa i yinelmaden i wakken ad lḥun deg temdint. Yekker lhem d ameqqran, tiyita si yal tama : isdawayen s yizra d twedcin, imsulta s llakrimujan. Ayen yekka wass, lhem ur yeḥbis. Azekka-nni, tella-d tikli, mebla lexsara neγ taruẓi, ddan deg waṭas yid-sen. D acu kan, akken kan i d-uγalen yimesbaniyen γer tesdawit, mmuggren-ten kra n yiɛeggalen n tuddsa n yisdawayen s yiwet n tewlaft n uselway Boumediène. D ayen yesserfan imesbaniyen, i yekksen tteswira-a. Dγa din i yendeh umennuγ almi llan ddeqs n yimejraḥ. Ass n larebɛa, imi yuzzel wawal belli d wid ur neqqar ara deg tesdawit i d-yusan d imɛiwan i wid yellan mgal tamaziγt, aṭas n yilmeẓyen i d-ikecmen Tubiret deg yiwet n tikli tameqqrant, anda i tella ula d taruẓi, almi wwḍen ula γer yiwen n uγaram i cukken deg-s i llan wid yewwten isdawayen imesbaniyen. Da, d abrid n cwal gar sin n yigduden : Leqbayel d wid ur nettmeslay tamaziγt. Maca, acu yessawḍen tamsalt n uselmed n tmaziγt γer gar yimdanen ? Taluft iwulem kan ad tezdi adabu d yimdanen yettnaγen γef tutlayt-a, mebla ma yella-d yimenγi gar yigduden. Atas n yimdanen ass-a i yessawalen γer lehna, γer lemḥadra, imi times ma tecɛel gar yimdanen d tiwaγiwin kan ara d-tesseggri. I wakken ur yettnerni ara lhem, tanmehla n tesdawit teṭṭef rray n umdal n tewwura n tesdawit, ahat ad yeffeγ reffu isdawiyen, mi akken aṭas n yimdanen ttnadin tifrat i taluft.

  M. Smail 

  
 Tetthegi-d Tddukkla tadelsant Amgud n tɣiwant n Draɛ Lmizan, s lemɛawna n tesbeddit Matub Lwennas, tazrigt tis 11 n warraz Matub Lwennas mgal tatut. Ad yettunefk warraz-agi, lexmis-agi sdat-nneɣ 11 tuber 2018 deg temkerḍit n tɣiwant n Draɛ Lmizan. Afran n wazemz-agi n 11 tuber, yeqqen ɣer usmekti wis 30, ɣef wasmi wten yiǧadermiyen aɣewway amaziɣ s rrṣaṣ, deg Ɛin Lḥemmam (Micli zik), ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna Mass Karim Larbi, aselway n tddukkla Amgud. Yetturaǧu, ad d-yili deg tesfugla ufraq n warraz-agi ara yettunefken i yiwudam n yidles, yecnan imedyazen, imura, icennayen…atg. Am wakken daɣen yetturaǧu, ad ilint temsikniyin n umecwar i d-tewwi tddukkla-a Amgud, d umecwar akked kra n tewlafin n unaẓur Lwennas Matub. Ad ilint diɣ tnagiyin d umeslay s telqey ɣef ucennay-agi yuran isem-is deg umezruy amaziɣ. Am yal aseggas, mi ara ferqen arrazen-agi, wid mazal ddren, d nutni s timmad-nsen i t-yettawin, ma d wid yemmuten, d iɛeggalen n twaculin-nsen iwumi i ten-ttakken. Ad yessali leqdic-a s ufraq n warrazen i yiwudam ara d-yufraren deg umsizwer, d wid mucaɛen, gar-asen acennay Slimane Azem i lmend n tesmiḍent ɣef tlalit-is. Ali Yeḥya Abdennur akked Newara, ad ilin d inebggawen n yiseɣ d lḥerma. Am wakken daɣen ara asen-yettunefk warraz-agi. Rnu ɣer wid ara d-yiffriren deg umyezwar n warraz-agi, deg waṭas n yiḥricen yecban ; aẓawan, tasekla, tamedyazt…atg. Ad d-nesmekti imsizwren n tezrigt tis mraw, wigi d Mass Acab Remḍan, Anemhal n tezrigin Acab, Mass Usalem Muḥend Weɛmer, d aselmad n tdamsa , d ameɣnas diɣ akked Massa Linda Wataḥ d taɣellayt n ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ n Bgayet. Ɣer taggara, ad nini belli arraz-agi Matub Lwennas mgal tatut, yennulfa-d i tikkelt tamezwarut deg useggas n 2007, sɣur tiddukkla-agi Amgud i ttakken yal aseggas i yimeɣnasen d wid ixeddmen ɣef tmaziɣt d yidles-is s umata. Matub Lwennas, yettwanɣa ass n 25 yunyu 1998 deg Tala Bunan, deg ubrid-is ɣer Wat Dwala, di leɛmer-is ala 42 n yiseggasen.

  Adaoun Abdelghani
