 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Sxelḍet iɣes n lkuca s ciṭ n waman yemmuzeɣlen, tanfem-as ad yefsi. Daxel n tbaqit, sxelḍet lfarina, awren, lmelḥ akked yiɣes-nni alamma yuɣal d arekti. Gget-t ciṭ, tanfem-as ad yali. Qqlut-d lebsel s zzit neɣ s smen, syin ternum-as aksum yeẓdan, ticcert, zrudiya d ṭumaṭic. Qqlut-t-id 5’. Melmi yuli urekti-nni, xedmet takurin s urekti, seḥmut lmeqli, meslet-tent daxel-is, terrem-asent lmarqa-nni, syin teddlem-t s wudem-nniḍen. Sewwem-tent s tmes taḥmayant. 

  Daya 

  
 Gar tɣiwanin timenza deg lɣella n uzemmur deg ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu, ad naf taɣiwant n Lemɛatqa, yesɛan ugar n 3000 n ihikṭaren n wakal ideg yella uzemmur, i d-yeggaren azal n 60 000 n yiqenṭaren n uzemmur deg useggas. Ma neserwes gar sin yiseggasen iɛeddan, ad naf d akken aseggas-agi, tennerna s waṭas lɣella n uzemmur deg temḍiqt-agi n leqbayel. D ayen i d-yenna imeḍebber amezwaru n srabes n tfellaḥt n dayra n Lemɛatqa, Mass Mezyani :  »Anerni n lɣella, yusa-d deg tazwara imi ur telli ara lɣella deg useggas iɛeddan, dɣa aseggas-agi tella. Rnu ɣef waya, leqdicat n uwelleh, d useɛlem ɣef ilugan igerrzen deg tfellaḥt n uzemmur, ama dayen yeɛnan afras d lemḥadra n tejra ». Aḥric n lɣella n uzemmur, d aḥric agejdan deg temḍiqt-agi n Leqbayel, yettwaḥsab d tallelt n tedrimt i kra n twaculin , dɣa aḥric-agi, yesɛa assaɣ adelsan d wuden adamsan, dayen icudden ɣer wansayen n Leqbayel. Tesɛa dayra n Lemɛatqa ugar n 50 n tesyar n uzemmur, d amḍan ad d-iwekkden s wazal yesɛa uḥric-agi deg tdamsa n dayra-agi, ladɣa ma ad naf ilemezyen, raṭlen-d tadrimt i usefti deg waḥric-agi.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Macahu tellem cahu, Ṛebbi ad tt-iselhu, ad tt-iɣzif annect n usaru. Yettwessi umɣar mmi-s: “A mmi, ɣur-k ad d-tegneḍ siwa ma ɣef leḥrir, taduli-k d tarakna. Ɣur-k ad d-teččeḍ siwa ma s uksum d wudi d tament. Ɣur-k ad d-tsewwqeḍ siwa ma sdat n tewwurt. A-ten-an yisurdiyen-inu, ma d nekk a mmi, tefna tudert-iw”. Mi i yewweḍ umɣar-nni leεfu n Ṛebbi, teffeɣ ɣef uqcic lewṣaya-nni n baba-s: Lmakla-s taguni-s d ssuq-is ala ttnefxa. Yuɣal, yekfa udrim-nni, yeqqim akken d aẓawali, win ɣer yerra yenna-as: “Ulac”. Armi i d-yemmekta yiwen n uḥbib n baba-s, iruḥ ɣur-s, iεawed-as-d tamacahut. 

 Yeḍsa umɣar-nni, yenna-as: “Ur ttagad a mmi, baba-k yerra leḥsab-is ɣas yemmut yeǧǧa-d awal d lmaεna ɣur-i. Ad ak-yeqqar baba-k tura, hatt tjarbeḍ? A-ten-an idrimen-agi-inu ɣur-k, maca sya d tasawent ur gan alamma yenɣa-k naddam i wakken anda tufiḍ ad d-teɣliḍ, ur tett alamma yenɣa-k llaẓ i wakken ad d-teččeḍ mebla ttnefxa. Ma d ssuq, ffeɣ ɣer beṛṛa ad d-teẓreḍ anda wwḍen lecɣal.

  Yahia Yanes 

  
 Sdat n 5 000 n yimferǧen i yecna ucennay ameqqran Idir, ass-nni, lexmis akked lǧemɛa deg tzeqqa n Mohamed Boudiaf, deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt.

 D tameɣra tamezwarut ara yexdem mebɛed lɣiba n 39 n yiseggasen-yecna i tikkelt taneggarut deg useggas 1979. Ussan-d deg yal tiɣmert n tmurt n Lezzayer : meẓẓi meqqer ; aqcic, taqcict ; argaz tameṭṭut. Ussan-d i wakken ad walin acennay Idir i yecnan deg yal tamaneɣt n ddunit ala deg Lezzayer. Ussan-d ad t-walin s leqreb imi amur ameqqran n yilmeẓyen werǧin i t-walan sdat-sen, neɣ ɛad mazal urɛad i d-lulen asmi yecna i tikkelt taneggarut deg useggas n 1979. Deg uḥric amezwaru n tmeɣra-a, yefka Idir tagnit i talilt (chorale) n taddart-is At Yanni, iwumi yebɣa ad yefk afud igerrzen, i wakken ad d-cebbḥen taswiɛt u ad d-beggnen iman-nsen d akken ula d nutni d itran n uzekka. Cnan-d tizlatin n Idir, Sliman Ɛazen, d wiyaḍ-nniḍen, ayen yeǧǧan imferǧen ad tɛeǧǧben seg ssut aḥlawan n warrac d taḥdayin-agi i yesɛan gar 8 d 18 n yiseggasen deg tudert-nsen. Acu kan, tella-d tegnit tameqqrant i yeččuren d iḥulfan mi akken i d-yekcem winna akk ttraǧun wid-nni i d-yusan ɣer tmeɣra, acennay Idir. Ma yella ferḥen yis-s yimdanen-nni, netta qrib ur yumin ara swayen i as-yeḍran ass-nni. ‘’Ur tezmirem ara ad d-txemmem ayen akka s wayes i ḥulfaɣ, tuɣalin-iw ɣer ccna sdat n widak-inu’’, i d-yenna s yiḥulfan ucannay ameqrran. Syin, bdan la ttuɣun ‘’Imaziɣen, Imaziɣen’’, ayen yeǧǧan Idir ad asen-d-yerr akka ‘’Aql-aɣ akk da i wakken ad taf iman-is tmaziɣt. Tamaziɣt d iseɣ-nneɣ’’. Yebda tameɣra s tezlit ‘’Yezha wurar’’, syin ‘’Asefru’’. Deg wakken yewhem imi ula d imecṭaḥ ssnen tuqac-is, ɣlin-as-d yimeṭṭawen seg yiḥulfan. Uqbel ad yecnu tizlit ‘’Aɣrib’’, yenna-d kra n wawalen ɣef ssebba i yeǧǧan imdanen ttinigen zik-nni, neɣ ɛad deg yiseggasen 1970. Mi d-yecna ‘’Cfiɣ’’ akked ’’A vava inuva’’, iwala imferǧen la cennun yid-s, dɣa yenna-asen ‘’Kemmlet kan akken, nekk ad ruḥeɣ ad d-sweɣ lqahwa’’. Syin tecna-d yelli-s Tanina yiwen n ucewwiq igerrzen dayen kan, yella gar tezlatin n Idir (Ufiɣ). Am wakken yebɣa ad yessebgen belli ula d netta yettnaɣ ɣef yizerfan n tlawin, dɣa yehda-anent-id tizlit ‘’Sendu’’, mebwed mi d-yemmeslay ɣef unamek n usefru. Deg taggara, yettunefk-as uḍebsi n uwraɣ i lmend n umecwar-is n ccna sɣur anemhal n ONDA, am wakken i as-yessels, diɣ, abernus.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Gar yunyu 2018 d yunyu 2019, nezmer ad d-nini d akken amḍan n wid yenḍeṛṛen deg teftisin n Bgayet yenqes. Ayagi dɣa d ayen yeṣefṛaḥen nezzeh, yerna yettwekkid-d d akken iqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim bedden ɣef uxeddim-nsen akken ilaq. 

 Ccil yerna umḍan n teftisin yettwaεussen, dɣa aseggas-a yelḥeq ɣer 34, imi llant ilindi 33 n teftisin kan, lameεna iqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim gren iman-nsen deg 585 n tuffɣiwin deg wayyur n yunyu n useggas-a. Ma yella deg win n 2018, gren iman-nsen deg 1175 n tuffɣiwin. Rnu ɣer waya, deg yunyu n useggas yezrin, selken-d 422 seg lmut timḥettemt, ma yella deg win n useggas-a tuder-d ɣer 302 n yimdanen, yerna ulac wid yemmuten s uɣṛaq. 

 Ma yella seg tama n tmes, deg yunyu 2018, tender deg 41 n yidigan, anda i gren yiqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim deg 44 n yineḍṛuyen. Dɣa teṣṛeɣ tmes-a ugar n 8,4 Ha n yimɣan, deg-sent 36 n ttjuṛ n yigumma. D acu kan, deg yunyu n useggas-a, yuli nezzeh umḍan n tmes, imi tender deg 216 n yidigan, anda i teṣṛeɣ ugar n 90 Ha n yimɣan, gar-asen 800 n ttjuṛ n yigumma. 

 Ɣer taggara, ɣef yisehwa n yiberdan, wwḍen-aɣ-d yisallen belli deg yunyu 2019, llan 252 n yisehwa, deg-sen jerḥen 337 n yimdanen, mmuten kṛaḍ-nniḍen. S umata deg uṣḍiṣyur n 2019 ḍṛan 934 n yisehwa, anda i jerḥen 1144, mmuten 22. 
  K. K. 

  
 Simmal ttnernin yisenfaren d lecɣal i d-yettilin deg tudert n umdan, i yettmaggan s tebɣest d lebɣi. Ladɣa s ttawilat, ama d wid n tedrimt neɣ n wayen-nniḍen, i yessefk ɣef win yegren deg kra ad ten-ikesseb d imezwara, imi iban ma ulac-iten ur yettwawwaḍ yiswi. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef yiwen seg yisenfaren-a i d-yettlalen seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ, ad d-nebder tanemẓiḍt (pâtisserie) tansayant i yeldin ussan-a kan iɛeddan sdat n uɣerbaz amenzu di tama Lberj n Mira i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Tsexriwt i ibeɛden s wazal n 60 n yikilumitren ɣef waɣir n Bgayet. Tanemẓḍit-a tamaynut, ddment fell-as acqirrew snat n tsetmatin Tismaɛliyin I wakken ad d-sbeyynent tizemmar i tesɛa daɣen tmeṭṭut deg yiqeddicen yettwaxdamen di berra. Ad ilint ula d nutenti heggant s ucmummeḥ d leqder i usnubget n yimsaɣen ara yettekcamen ɣer dinna seg qeddac n yidigan yemgaraden, ama d ibeɛɛaden neɣ d widak iqerben. Ma nuɣal dɣa ɣer yisenfan n yingulen i yettnuzun deg tnemẓiḍt-nni tansayant, nezmer ad d-nini qqnen seg yiwet n tama ɣer yisem i as-yettunefken imi deg-s aṭas n yingulen insayanen akked d kra seg tgella taqburt i d-yettmaggan seg zik daxel n yixxamen n Yiqbayliyen, am umeḍluɛ d lesfenǧ. Maca seg tama-nniḍen, amsaɣ i yewwin ubrid ɣer dinna, ad yaf ula d isenfan n yingulen imaynuten i mačči aṭas n wakud segmi d-nnulfan, akked lqahwa i win i tt-yebɣan. Talalit n tnemẓiḍt-a tansayant, tessefreḥ nezzeh lɣaci i teɛna temsalt, abeɛda imezdaɣ i iqerben ɣer umkan ideg tnuḥ. Imi ɣas ahat niqal ttaɣen-d ingulen seg tnemẓiḍin-nniḍen n temnaḍt, tura mi d-tella tin i asen-iqerben ugar, iban d tinna ara ttekcamen i tiɣin.

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Ass n 8 deg maggu 1945, d azemz i yettunefken i tedyanin neɣ i tmesbaniyin yeḍran deg Lezzayer, lawan n umnekcam afransis. Bdant seg umenzu n maggu, wwḍent armi d agguren-nniḍen sdat-s. Maca, d 08 maggu i d ass aberkan, ddeqs n temgraḍ i yeɣlin ass-nni, Ddeqs n tudrin i yerɣan; ttwahuddent. Ass n umenzu n maggu n useggas 1945, i d-yezgan d ass n tfaska n yixeddamen. Iɣella n Umussu aɣelnaw, ssawlen ɣer tmesbaniyin deg ddeqs n temnaḍin n wakal azzayri. Rran-d yimdanen i teɣri deg ddeqs n liwlayat. Ffɣen-d ɣer yizenqan d yiberdan. Tiɣri-nsen d yiwet; d tilelli n Lezzayer d userreḥ n Messaali Lḥaǧ seg usekraf. Ɣef uqerru n ymesbaniyen, yella-d ukabar n uɣref azzayri. Iswi-nsen, iban. Bɣan ad d-smektin Fransa ɣef lweɛd i tefka i yizzayriyen i ittekkkin ɣer yidis-s deg ṭṭradat igreɣlannen. Deg ṭṭrad amezwaru (1914-1918), ad naf 172 749 n yiserdasen izzayriyen i yeddan ɣer umennuɣ: 25 711 seg-sen mmuten-d, ma 72 035 d imejraḥ. Ma deg ṭṭrad wis sin (1939-1945) i yellan gar yimesddukliyen akked yinaziyen, ad naf 257 000 n yiserddasen izzayryen i yeddan ɣer yidis n Fransa: 8600 seg-sen ɣlin d asfel deg unnar n ṭrad. Syin, mi yekfa ṭrad wis sin, ur teṭṭif ara Fransa deg lweɛd i tefka i tmurt n Lezzayer. Lweɛd-agi d tukci n uzarug i Lezzayer. Ihi, sɛuẓẓgen yiserdasen akked yimsulta n Fransa ɣef wayen ṛeggmen, zzin s weɛrur i teɣri n yimesbaniyien. S ddɣel d rsas s wayes iten-qublen. Ma neṭṭef amedya ; timesbaniyin yeḍran deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt, seg ddeqs n tamiwin i d-bdan tekliwin. Llan wid i d-yebdan seg yizenqan n Lqeṣba. Wiyaḍ seg Bab Lwad, ma d wiyaḍ seg Balkur (Belwezdad n wass-a). I wakken ad mlilen akk deg Lbuṣṭa Tameqqrant. Imsulta, qqerṣen-d fell-asen s rsas. Ttwanɣan 07 n yimesbaniyen, rnu ddeqs n yimjraḥ. Ma ɣer yidis n Yifransiyen, yemmut yiwen n umsulti. Syin, uɣen temesbaniyin tuget n wakal azzayri, ladɣa timnaḍin n usamar : Ǧiǧel, Qsenṭina, Galma, Ɛennaba, Skikda, Xennecla, Bgayet, Tbatent, Tizi Uzzu, Busɛada, Siṭif, Sidi Belɛebbas… Acu kan, timnaḍin yenṭṭarren, ad naf Ṣtif, Galma akked Xeṛṛaṭa ideg yeḍra ubaxix d txezzabiyin meqqren . Ddeqs n yidamen yuzlen, ddeqs n tuddar yerɣan, yettwakkes sser ɣef yimezdaɣ …atg. Ad yeqqim umezruy d inigi ɣef yilemzi Buzid Seɛɛal, i yesɛan n 22 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is mi yerfed annay azzayri. Ɛerḍen yimsultiyen, ad as-teksen, netta yugi ad as-yebru, yeqres fell-as umsulti s rṣar armi i as-yeffeɣ yiziɣer-is.

  Tadyant n Buzid Seɛɛal 

 Aḍris-agi, d yiwen n umjahed iwumi ssawalen Ɛissa Cerraga i d-yettalsen tadyant n Ṣiṭif, deg-s yewwi-d awal ɣef yilemzi-agi. Yenna-d: «…Tikli-nni, tella tetteddu tṣeggem, lɣaci llan cennun s taɣect εlayen imseɣret (nnacid) n « Ḥayyu ccamal, ḥayyu Ifriqya“, d acu kan, mi d-kecmen yemsulta, teḥbes din din kan tikli-nni, yerna d win ay d ifeṭṭiwej yessaɣen times n ccwal ara yeqqimen sin n wagguren. Tidyanin-a, bdant-d mi yewweḍ lɣaci ɣer sdat n tneɣlust n « Café de Franc », i d-yezgan deg tlemmast n temdint n Sṭif. Usan-d ɣur-i ṛṛebεa n yimsulta, bdan ttdemmiren-iyi, ssemguclun-iyi i wakken ad i yi-kksen azamul n uɣlan s lekmal-nnes, d aɣlan i yellan itteddu akken ad ibeddel akk umezruy-ines, maca nekk ur ten-ǧǧiɣ ara ad i yi-rnun. Mi i yi-d-yeẓra Buzid Seɛɛal la ttedduɣ ad ɣliɣ, yeffeɣ-d gar lγaci-nni, yekkes-iyi takbabt-nni (taεellamt), yerna yerfed-itt d asawen. Ula d Seɛɛal, i yesεan 22 n yiseggasen, ur yeǧǧi imsulta ad as-kksen takbabt n lḥeṛma n tmurt, yerna ur yugad seg tuggziwin-nsen (menaces). Sakin, yiwen n umsalti i iḥulfan amzun yeɣli leqder-nnes sdat n yilemẓi-nni azzayri, i yugin ad yaɣ awal, iqres s lqerb ɣef Saɛɛal Buzid, aqcic-nni yeγli. Mi yeffeγ leεqel lγaci, ur nezmer ara, ad nẓer swaswa anwa amsalti i iqersen ɣef Seɛɛal. Yuɣ lḥal, ur neẓri ma d Olivieri (yellan d imḍebber n terbaεt yettewliwilen n yemsulta) neɣ d amaswaḍ Laffont, neɣ d Tort… Yessekf ad teẓrem d imsulta-nni i iqerssen d imezwura i d ssebba n tazla-nni n yidammen i d-yellan ussan-nni. Wid i d-yennan nessuffeγ-d imrigen (leslaḥ) seg yibernyas d tqendyar deg tikli-nni, skaddben ».

  Lexsarat n tedyanin n 8 maggu 

 Seg yineḍruyen n maggu 1945, tban-d tebɣest n yizzayriyen yebɣan beṭṭu d Fransa, sran ad yidir di tlelli akked wussan yeḥlan. Akken daɣen, iban-d wudem n umnekcam afransis, yesxedmen akk ttawilat d lḥerǧ aɛesekkri. Ur yemniɛ seg-s win meqqren neɣ win meẓziyen. Yedda uterras, yedda lmal agugam. Tidayni n maggu, glant-d s lexsarat timeqqranin i sin n yidisan yettnaɣen, ama deg cci neɣ deg tmegraḍ. Igemmaḍ n wid yemmuten deg tmesbaniyin, d leḥsabat ur nerkid. Yal tama, acḥal i d-tettak. Ma nessaked ɣer leḥsabat i d-tefka tedbelt n Fransa di tallit-nni ɣef yiles n uneɣlaf n daxel n Fransa, yenna-d : ‘’Azal n 50 000 n yimesbaniyen i ittekkin deg tmesbaniyin. ɣlin wazal n 88 n yifranisyen (Gar yimsulta akked yiminigen imhersiyen) akked 150 n yimjraḥ’’. Ma yella ɣer yid-is n yizzayriyen, yenna-d : ‘’Gar 1 200 ɣer 1 500 n yimesbaniyen i yemmuten’’. Ma yella d leḥsab i d-ittunefken sɣur izzayriyen iɛedda nnig n wayen i d-tefka Fransa. Ad naf 45 000 n yimesbaniyen i yettwanɣan. Ula leḥsabat i d-fkant tmura tiberraniyin yemgarad, iteddu gar 50 000 armi 70 000. Tasɣunt « Al Baṣayer » i d-tesuffuɣ Tddukkla n Lɛulama Izzayriyen, fkan-d 85 000 n lmuta. Imceyyeɛ n tmura n Marikan yedduklen deg Lqahira, tamanaɣt n Maser, yenna-as i uselway n Tddukkla n tmura tiɛrabin belli azal n 45 000 n yimesbaniyen i yeɣlin. D aya i yeserfan adabu afransis. Ajerred n wid yemmuten deg tedyanin-agi yettkemmil seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ, acku ddeqs i d-ittwajerden ɣer yittafttaren n teɣdemt n Lezzayer deffir n timunent. Deg tallit tamirant, yella-d wawal deg rehbat d temliliyin n tsertit akken ad ttwaḥsaben wid ijerhen deg tedyanin-agi am wid yemmuten d imeɣrasen. Acu kan, ar ass-a, mazal ur ttwasemlen ara… Yettkemmil 

  Lyes Belaidi 

  
 Tazrigt tis semmuset (5) n tfaska n yimɣan n usejji, i d-yettilin yal aseggas deg taddart n Mzeggen, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Yilula Umalu deg ladayra n Buzgan, ad tili aseggas-a, di ddurt i d-iteddun. D ttiɛad adelsan, ara yeddun 4 ɣef teɣzi n 3 wussan, imi yebdu s wudem unṣib taggara n ddurt i d-iteddun, 160 deg waggur-agi n ɣuct ideg nella, ad temdel tiwwura-s ass n ssebt 18 ɣuct 2018. Ma d ahil ara yettwaxdamen deg 3 wussan-agi n tfaska, yetturaǧu ad yili d anesbaɣur. Deg tṣebḥit n wass n lexmis, ad tili tesfugla n tulya tunṣibt n tezrigt-agi, syin akkin ad tuɣal tejmilt meqqren i yiwen neɣ yiwet kar yimejjayen imeqqranen n taddart. Deffir-s kan, ad bdun temsikniyin, yecban tin n yimɣan n usejji, tin n useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt d ugama, timsikent n tẓuri, tin n yisekla d yijeǧǧigen, timsikent d usenzi n yidlisen yerzan imɣan n udawi…atg. Di sin wussan-nni-nniḍen, yetturaǧu ad ilin waṭas n leqdicat-nniḍen, yecban: isaragen ɣef ɣef yimɣan n udawi, tirza ɣer umḍiq “Alma”, anida i d-ttawin imɣan-agi n udawi. Am wakken daɣen ara fersen tagnit yimsuddsen-agi, i wakken ad xedmen tukcci n warrazen i yinelmaden i d-yewwin ikayaden n taggara n useggas (5eme, BEM akked BAC). Turart n tmezgunin akked tmeɣriwin n ccna, llant ula d nutenti deg wahil. Ad yili diɣ uskan n zzwaǧ d tmeɣra n Leqbayel n zik, rnu ɣur-s zedwa n wurar n lxalat…atg. Ɣer taggara, ad nesmekti belli leqdic-agi ad yili s lemndad n Tiddukkla tadelsant “Tigemmi n Mzeggen” akked Tesqamut n taddart-agi. S tallelt n waṭas n yidisan-nnḍien. 

  A. Gh. 

  
 Ɣas ma yella s wazuḥ, ɣas akken s ulac i d-ssalin iman-nsen, meεna lebɣi d tayri i sεan i taddart d tɣiwant-nsen s umata, yeǧǧa-ten leḥḥun deg ubrid yeččuren d isennanen, ttkemmilen tikli ccil ma yella ḥafi. Ɣef wanect-a, dɣa, i d-snulfan wat nnif d tismin, i yettwaqerḥen seg waddad n temnaḍt anda i ttidiren, tiddukkla At Idris tamellalt. Imi win yebɣan ad tbeddel, ad yezwir deg yiman-is. D annect-a i ten-yeǧǧen ad sbeggnen tigzi d waṭas n tḥerci deg unnar. D tarbaεt n yilemẓiyen i yesεan allaɣ meqqer, imi s lebɣi-nsen ssawḍen sduqqsen-d aṭas n wid yellan gnen, ur cliεen seg liḥala n taddart-nsen. Arrac n Kefrida, deg wussan yezrin, uɣen-d ṭṭwabel d yikersiyen i tddukkla i wakken ad ten-sqeddcen at taddart deg lfeṛḥ neɣ deg lqerḥ-nsen. Rnu ɣef waya, bdan axeddim deg usizdeg d ucebbeḥ n yizergan d yiberdan-nsen. Seld anejmuε n yiεeggalen, gren tiɣri i yimezdaɣ i wakken ad d-gren iman-nsen , ad d-fken afus n tallelt, yal yiwen s wayen yezmer, ama s tedrimt, s leqdic neɣ xersum s wawal aẓiḍan. Ula d imezdaɣ seg tama-nsen ur stehzan ara deg taluft, imi akken ma llan tehwa-asen tikti. Ayagi, iban-d deg temlilit tamezwarut i d-swejden yiεeggalen n tddukkla, i yellan ass n 25 di cutembeṛ yezrin deg Uεwin, i wakken ad sebɣen leḥyuḍ, dɣa aṭas i d-yerran i teɣri-a. Ihi akken i d-nnan at taddart :« Nessaram-as teɣzi n leεmer i tddukkla-agi i wakken ad tkemmel deg leqdic-is igerrzen. Akken qqaren, temẓi txeddem ɣef temɣer, ihi ilemẓi ilaq ad ifaṛes tazmert i yesεa ».

  K. K. 

  
 Qqarren, yiwet n tikkelt, deg unejmaε, yebda ara d-ihedder umeqran n taddart, yal tikkelt ara d-yini : “Lemmer nuksan ilaq waya”. 

 Yenna-d awal-agi εecrin n yiberdan, lγaci yeεjeb-asen wayen i d-yeqqar, acku s tidet d iγeblan d tlufa ttidiren i γef d-ihedder. Armi yekfa, yenṭeq-d yiwen n urgaz mbeεid mi d-iṣella, yenna-asen: “Ay ameqqran, ayen yakk i d-tenniḍ yesdeq, maca lemmer d i nuksan, yyaw ad awen-iniγ. Nnan-as: “Ini-aγ-d”. 
 Argaz: “Yyaw seg uzekka ad nuksanet, ilaq ad nuksan, ihi ad nuksan”.
  Yahia Yanes 

  
 D asiher i d-yellan deg taddart n Yiḥemziyen, gar 26 akked 27 ɣuct-agi iɛeddan. D tafaska n tqendurt n Leqbayel i d–tettheggi yal aseggas tiddukkla tadelsant “Tagmat” n taddart-agi n Yiḥemziyen, yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Yilula Umalu di Buzgan.

 D tafaska i d-yuɣalen aseggas-a deg tezrigt-is tis ttesɛa (09), tedda ɣef teɣzi n 2 wussan, imi tebda ass-nni n lḥedd 26 deg waggur n ɣuct, deg tasebḥit n wass, temdel tiwwura-s azekka-nni n letnayen 27 deg waggur-nni n ɣuct yezrin. Deg tedwilt-agi n useggas-a, yella-d usenɛet n waṭas n tewsatin (leṣnaf) n teksiwin n tmurt n Leqbayel. D tagnit anda i ttwasneɛtent teksiwin n yal tama, tawaḍiwt, taɛeẓẓugt, taḥemzit…atg. Llant teksiwin tiqdimin n zik, llant daɣen tmaynutin-agi i d-yettnulfun. Am wakken daɣen i d-llant waṭas n temsikniyin-nniḍen, yecban afexxar, tamemt, lfeṭṭa, idlisen…atg. Yella-d diɣ wahil adelsan deg ttiɛad, timeɣriwin n ccna, asenɛet n wamek i d-yettili zzwaǧ n zik, asenɛet n yiselsa n zik, timezgunin…atg. Amaynut n tezrigt-agi, d timsizzelt n “tqendurt n wuraɣ” i yettunefken i tqendurt ifazzen, i usebɣes n urmud-agi n lexyaḍa. Ula d isaragen, ama ɣef tgemmi tadelsant s umata neɣ ɣef llebsa n zik, llan-d di ttiɛad, i wakken ad ẓren yilmeẓyen azal n lbus-agi d wacu i d anamek-nsen, azalen-nsen ɣef tdamsa d tmetti. Tazrigt-agi tis 9, gan-tt d tajmilt i tcennayt Malika Domrane, i lmend n tikli-ines taẓurant deg ccna aqbayli, i d-yefkan aṭas i tezlit taqbaylit. D tiddukkla tadelsant « Tagmat n Yiḥemziyen » i d-yessuddsen leqdic-a, s tallelt n tesqamut n taddart akked Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Yilula Umalu. S tallelt n waṭas n yidisan gar-asen: Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Tanmehla n usegmi taɣelnawit n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu…atg. Ɣer taggara, ad nesmekti kan belli, taddart-agi n Yiḥemziyen i ibeɛden s wazal n 60 n yikilumiṭren ɣef unẓul-asamer n Tizi Uzzu, tufrar-d taddart-a n 600 n yimezdaɣ, tesɛa ugar mraw d semmus n tnemsal n tigni (lexyaḍa).

   A. A. 

  
 Tettkemmil tddukkla tadelsant Tiɛwinin n Buzgan, aheggi n temlilit taseklant yal ddurt, s usnubget n walbaɛḍ n yimura, n yimassanen neɣ n yimeɣnasen. Tikkelt iɛeddan dɣa, d Mass Remḍan Ɛeccab i yellan d inebgi tameddit n wass akken ad d-yawi awal ɣef teqbaylit di tnekkra n 2019 ladɣa. Deg tazwara n wawal-is, yeɛreḍ umsarag ad d-yefk tamuɣli tamatut ɣef umezruy n kra n tutlayin, d ɣef wacimi llant ass-a tmeqqranin i yettwassnen deg umaḍal merra akked tmecṭuḥin i ttmeslayen drus n yigduden. Ɣef tidmi-s, d tamhersa i yellan deffir waya imi amenzay-is d arkaḍ akked uḥettem. Amedya n tefransist, ma yella tuɣ aẓar di Tferka, armi tt-id-tḥettem Fransa deg temhersiwin akk i texdem din. Syin, yerra awal-is Mass Ɛeccab ɣer tegnit i tettidir Lezzayer akka lawan-a s tnekkra taɣerfant i yettkemmilen ar tura. Akken i d-yenna, ur ilaq ad d-yejbed Uqbayli iman-is seg wayen iḍerrun, zun a-t-an ur t-teɛni ara taluft. Nemgal, yewwi-d ad d-yesbeggen, i d-yenna, ula d netta ayen yebɣa s wudem yelhan. Yesḥassef Mass Remḍan ula ɣef wid i yessuturen s teɛrabt di Tizi Uzzu amzun akken d tin i d tutlayt-nsen. Isemmed deg wawal-is umsarag ɣef taluft-nni n « Mačči d lawan ». Yefka-d amedya n tlawin i issuturen izerfan-nsent, maca qqaren-asent mačči tura i d lawan-is. Yenna-d d tikellax waya imi akken i llan qqaren-asen-d ula deg yiseggasen-nni n 1980 mi ssuturen imir-nni tamaziɣt. Deg uskasi, yerra-d umsarag i kra n yisteqsiyen, gar-asen ayen yerzan tasussmi n waggagen ɣef wayen akka iḍerrun di tmurt. Deg tririt-is, yenna-d icudd waya ɣer ukukru imi am wakken llan wid i yugaden ɣef uxeddim-nsen. Yerna-d daɣen belli aṭas i d-yesuffɣen taggara-a imagraden di tɣamsa akken ad d-ffken tamuɣli-nsen, ad wellhen agdud.
   M. K. 

  
 Iqjan imenṭaren, d yiwen uɣbel ameqqran i d-ttmagaren yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Uɣrib, ladɣa widak yettidiren deg tlemmast n tɣiwant iwumi qqaren Agni Ucerqi. Aɣbel-a n yiqjan imenṭaren yeččuren tamdint, yettzad umḍan-nsenn seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ, yerna ddawaren d tirebbuyaɛ timeqqranin deg tlemmast n tɣiwant akken i asen-yehwa mebla akukru. D ayen yesnrnayen deg tugdi ɣef tdawsa n yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant. Deg tegnit yecban-tagi, yewwi-d ɣef srabes teɛna temsalt, ad d-afen tifrat i uɣbel-agi, imi aya, yezmer ad d-yeglu s yibaxixen i tudert n yimdanen ileḥḥun deg temḍiqt-agi, ladɣa inelmaden n yiɣerbazen. Yezmer, diɣ, wugur- agi, ad d-yeglu s kra n waṭṭanen, imi tirebbuyaɛ n yiqjan-agi, ttidirent seg ugudu n temḍiqt-agi, ula d tussḍa n yiqjan, zemren ad d-teglu s lemḍera ɣef tdawsa d tudert n yimdanen. Tiɣri n yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Uɣrib i yimḍebren, terza tamsalt n tifin n tifrat i wugur n yiqjan-agi imenṭaren.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 seg wasmi i d-ilul, ur iḥemmel tamḥeqqranit. Ur iqebbel azaglu. Yeqqar deg wawal-is:’’ Ad narrez wala ad neknu’’ . Akka, dɣa, i llan wussan-is. Amecwar-is meqqar d ayen i yettwarun s yidammen-is. Tizlatin-is, yessenṭaq-d yis-ssent yal amdan: yal tamsalt di tudert, yewwi-d fell-as. Ttawḍen yisefra-is srid ɣer wul . Tamedyazt-is, d timsirin. Si zik yekkat ɣef tutlayt-is, si zik yebɣa ad d-yessebgen idles amaziɣ. Si Muḥend U mḥend, Sliman Azem, Cix Mḥemlmed El Ɛenqa , Cix Arab Buyezgaren, ismawen-a, suzren di Lwennas tayri n ccna, tayri n tẓuri tazedgant. Dɣa seg yimir, i yebda deg umecwar-is. Xas akken leɛmer yekcim ɣer uɣerbaz n uẓawan, maca tamussni-is d ayen ifaze , d ayen i tt-itteqden . Ma yella nuɣal-d ɣer umennuɣ-is, ad t-naf yerza tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ. Iḥemmel-it ugdud amaziɣ di yal amḍiq imi d yiwen urgaz i iteddun ɣef tidet , d win i d-yewwin lewhi ɣer udrar. Yesɛa afud iǧehden swayes yettqabal uccanen i d-itezzin ɣer tama-is. D bab n lfen, d agrawliw. Ur yezmir ḥedd ad t-yenkar. Xas iruḥ, mazal later-is, yal tallit ad t-id-tader.

  Xas ass-a tarwiḥt-ik ulac-itt , ṣṣut-ik 

 mazal-it yettlal-d deg yidurar i t-id-yessekren. Yettlal-d deg yal aqbayli. Xas ɛeddan yiseggasen, xas yettseggix lǧerḥ yal tikkelt, xas tidet werɛad i d-tban, maca yiwen wass kan ad d-testeqsi , ad d-terr ttar n yal ass iɛeddan war Lwennas . 

  Yamani Souhila 

  
 Akken i tuɣ tanumi tddukkla tadelsant Tigejdit n AT Zɛim, i iqedcen deg taddart n Atn Zɛim, i d-yezgen deg tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa, s leqdican-is yemgaraden, tikelt-a, ad suddes Tazrigt tis 8 n tmeɣra n tzemmurt, ara yilin seg 21 ɣer 24 Meɣres 2018.

 Aya, ad yili i lmend n usfugel n Wass aɣelnaw n useklu d Wass agraɣlan n teẓg, anda yettuɛeggen, ad ttekkin ugar n 80 n yimsikniyen ara d-yasen seg rebɛa n tɣumar n tmurt. Aseggas-agi, ad yili usentel n tmeɣra ɣef tɣara n zzit n uzemmu « gGar tmuɣi tussnant d tmuɣli tadelsant n tmetti taqbaylit ». Ma nesemres gar snat n tmuɣliwin ad naf amgarad meqqer gar-asent. Dɣa tazrigt-agi, d tagnit i usqerdec n temsalt n tɣara n zzit, d useqreb n tmuɣliwin gar sin n yidisan i lfayda n tdamsa n temḍiqt n leqbayel. Deg tmeɣra-agi, ad ilin aṭas n wudmawen, ama d imussnawen n uḥric n tfellaḥt, ama d ifellaḥen, srabes n tfellaḥt, imesdawiyen, imɛelmen n tesyar n uzemmur d waṭas-nniḍen. Heggan-d yiɛgalen n tddukkla yiwen n wahil s wazal-is i lemend n tmeɣra-agi n tzemmurt. Gar wayen yettwajerden deg waḥil, ad naf timsikniwin d lbiɛ n zzit n uzemmur n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa, n tɣiwanin n ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu, Bgayet, Tubirett d Bumedes. Ad ilint, diɣ, timzikniwin n yisufar yetabaɛen ɣer lɣella n uzemmur : legric, abaliɣ, aɛbuẓ, amurej, tisnatin d waṭas nniḍen n yisufar. Am wakken ara ilint temsikniyin d lbiɛ n yisufar-nniḍen ladɣa tazart ( iniɣman- iḥbuben), tament akked d tid n temzikniwin d lbiɛ n tesnayin n uzemmur, tisyar n uzemmur, asewwi n Leqbayel, afexxar n Lemɛatqa, lfeṭṭa, tiqneddyar…atg. Zyada êf wanect-a, ad ilin yisaragen ɣef tɣara n zzit n uzemmur, gar tmuɣli tussnant d tmuɣli tadelsant, ɣef ttawilat n usegmu n uḥric n uzemmur, amḍiq n zzit n uzemmur, ssuq aɣelnaw deg tdamsa n temḍiqt n Leqbayel. Ad ilin yisaragen-agi s tallelt n yimussnawen n uḥric n uzemmur, anda ara yilin imesdawiyen n Mouloud Mammeri, ITFV Sidi Aiche, CNCC El Harrache, SRPV Draa Ben Khedda, ITMAS Boukhalfa. Ad ilint, daɣen, tamhalin n tuzzut, n ufras d uleqqem n uḥeccad ( aẓebbuj) akked tuẓḍa n uzemmur s tarrayt taqburt, asewwi n sabun. Leqdic meqqren ara yilin deg tegnit-agi, anda ad d-mlilen akk wudmawen n uḥric n tfellaḥt i usqerdec n temsal yeɛnan yal yiwen, ama d iɣeblan, ama d timuɣliwin i unegmu n uḥric n uzemmur n temḍiqt n leqbayel. Tameɣra-agi i d-yettilin yal aseggas deg taddart n At Zɛim, d tajmilt i yiwen gar yisekla igejdanen n tuddart deg temḍiqt n leqbayel d tmura n yilel agrakal. D azamul n Yimaziɣen seg zik ar tura. Assuddes n tmeɣra-agi, yebda deg useggas n 2009, aṭas n umaynut i d-tewwi i lefayda n uḥric n uzemmur deg temḍiqt n Lemɛatqa, imi yal tikkelt yettili-d uwellah d usemres n ttawilat atraren, d tmussniwin tussnanin deg unnar n uḥric n uzemmur.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 «Ma tennid-d ad temteḍ ma, tessusmeḍ ad temteḍ. Meqqar ini-d, temteḍ»… ilul Tahar Gaεut ass n, 11 deg yennayer 1954, deg Ulxu di Tizi Uzzu. Yeɣra deg uɣerbaz amenzu n taddart-is armi d aseggas n 1964, anda tunag twacult-is ɣer Lezzayer tamanaɣt. yewwi-d agerdis n lisens deg tusnakt seg tesdawit n Lezzayer. 4 n yiseggassen uqbel, yura tullist Les insoumis. Tewwi arraz n temsizelt taseklant Zone des enquêtes, imir i d-yeffaɣ udlis-is Les chercheurs d’os. Yebda yettaru deg uɣmis n El Moudjahid, syin ɣer L’Hebdomadaire. 

 Yunag ɣer tmurt n Fransa netta d tmettut-is d yessi-s akken ad iɣer armi d 1987. Yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt-is. Dinna ibeddel abrid seg yidles ɣer tsertit. Di tɣamsa, yerna-d ungal-nniden L’Invention du désert. Ad d-yeslal deg 1992 ɣer tama n Urezqi Meṭref d wiyaḍ aɣmis Ruptures, ad yernu sin wungalen L’Exproprié d Les Vigiles. Yettwawet s ṛsas sɣur imṭurfa ass n, 26 deg maggu 1993, sdat n uxxam-is s snat n teṛsasin s aqerru. Yemmut ass n, 2 deg yunyu 1993. 

 Ungal-is aneggaru, isem-is Le dernier été de la raison, yeffeɣ-d deg 1999. Seld lmut-is, yeslul-d Ugraw n tsekliwin n Fṛansa taɣessa i useḥbiber ɣef yimyura. Uɣalent-as aṭas n tejmilin am BBC ixeddmen fell-as asaru, isem-is shooting the rwitter, Lwennas Maεtub ixdem-as tizlit Kenza yelli-s n Tahar Ǧaεut d tajmilt deg-s yeqqar-as « Γas neqqden acḥal d itri, igenni ur inegger ara».

  Nisma Tigrine 

  
 Yessuffeɣ-d uselmad n tmaziɣt Adel Bachouche, adlis-is wis sin deg wussan-a, ɣer teẓrigin Tira. Sin n wagguren kan segmi i d-yessuffeɣ “Tamudemt n tfertin n temsirin”, iḍfer-it-id gma-s s usentel “Timsirin – Iluɣma – Aseɣti n yiluɣma”. Imi ameskar d aselmad yellan deg unnar, yefren ad d-yawi s leqdic-is amaynut ɣef uselmed, akken ad yessiǧhed ugar tamkerḍit n yidlisen n uselmed, acku d annar yesran i tektabin, akken ad yennerni. Ula d imazzagen n tutlayt seg yimesnilsanen d yiselmaden n tesdawit, xeddmen-d tizrawin u ssuffuɣen-d idlisen deg taɣult-a. Adlis-a, yebḍa-t Adel ɣef kraḍ n yiḥricen igejdanen : Timsirin + iluɣma + aseɣti n yiluɣma. D adlis yerzan ahil n uswir wis sin alemmas, n tsuta tis snat. Uqbel yal tamsirt, yettili uḍris, sakin ad d-ḍefrent temsirin n yiferdisen n tutlayt, am tjerrumt, tirawalt d tseftit. 

 Ɣer taggara n yal tamsirt, ad naf asiteg d yiluɣma. Ineggura-a, ttwaseɣtan deg uḥric aneggaru n udlis. Yerra umeskar lwelha-s ɣer kra n yiḥricen ilan azal deg uselmed s usenfar, am tegnit n tmenna, tamsirt n tmedyezt, tagnit n useɣred akked kra n temsirin n umawal. Ma neddem-d amedya n Tegnit n tmenna, ad t-naf d aḥric s wazal-is deg uselmed atrar, irennun-d abaɣur seg waṭas n tamiwin i unelmad. Nezmer ad as-nsemmi tanfalit s timawit, yezmer ad tt-ibedd uselmad ɣef tɣawsiwin-a; tugniwin, aḍris yuran neɣ ayen yettwali yerna isell-as (audio visuelle). Ma d tizemmar iɣer ara yessiweḍ, ɣef wakken i d-yedda deg udlis n Adel Bachouche; “Tettrebbi anelmad ɣef tmussni n tutlayt akken ad tt-yettmeslay ɣef yiles, asenfali s timawit war uguren, tettekkes leḥya ɣef unelmad ma yella ur yennum ara yettmeslay, tettrebbi-t ad yettqadar tawala-s (nnuba-s) deg tmeslayt”. 
  Kh. A. 

  
 Ɣef leḥsab n yimeslayen n yiɛeggalen n Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Mɛatqa, ɣef ugerru-nsen Mass Laguel Lyes, d akken ad d-yili usenfar n usiweḍ n lgaz n temdint ɣer tuget n yiɣerbazen imenza n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa. Yebda usenfar-agi n usiweḍ n lgaz n temdint deg useggas iɛeddan, anda i d-sfaydin sin n yiɣerbazen imenza yellan deg taddart n At Ahmed, d uɣerbaz n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa. Deg wussan-agi n imuras n yinelmaden, aṭas n yiɣerbazen i deg bdan isenfar n usiweḍ n lgaz, akken ad sɛeddin yinelmaden tagrast mebla asemmiḍ. Dɣa gar yiɣerbazen i d-yesfaydin seg usenfar-a, ad naf aɣerbaz n At Zɛim I. Ɣef leḥsab n uselwaɣ n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa, asenfar-agi mazal ad ikemmel, alamma yewweḍ yakk ɣer yiɣerbazen imenza n tɣiwant.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Ass-nni n lǧemɛa yezrin 26/04/2019, tella-d tfuglan n usmekti n umerḥum Mouloud Yarkal, i wumi tettuɣal tejmilt s temsizzelt n ddabex uḍar. Ɣef 8h30 n ssbeḥ, nejmaɛen-d medden d tirni ɣef uẓekka-s, gar yiɛeggalen n twacult-is d yimeddukkal akked yiɛeggalen n ugraw anaddal n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i d-iheggan leqdic-a. Yella-d usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka-s, syin akkin d ddqiqa n tsussmi. Am wakken daɣen i d-llant tnagiyin d waktayen n yimeddukkal-is d twcult-is. Maca, uqbel annect-a, yettili-d ussan-a usiher n waddal, sɣur ugraw n waddal n Ait Aissa Mimoun i gan d tajmilt i umarḥum Yarkal Mouloud, i yellan d ufrin (élu) deg Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Ass-nni n lǧemɛa, 19 yebrir 2019, i tebda temsizzelt n temliliyin n ddabex uḍar n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, i d-yettilin deg unnar aɣiwan yellan deg Tiplakine.

 D timsizzelt n temliliyin, ara yeddun ɣef teɣzi n waṭas n wussan, imi aṭas n temliliyin i yellan. Mbeɛd mi i d-tella temlilit n tazwara, ass-nni n lǧemɛa iɛeddan ɣef 17h30 n tmeddit gar snat n trebbuyaɛ-agi: Tarbaɛt n taddart n Tahanouts ( taddart n umerḥum-agi) mgal tin n taddart n Ighil Bouchene (taddart n yimsuddsen). Ttkemmilent temliliyin-agi i d-yettilin yal tameddit n wass ɣef 17h30 n tmeddit deg unnar aɣiwan n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Yetturaǧu sya ar timlilit n taggara, ara d-yilin ass n lexmis, 09 mayyu 2019, ad d-ilint 14 n temliliyin, sya ar imir. Ɣer taggara, ad nesmekti belli Mass Yarkal yewweḍ leɛfu Rebbi ass n, 18 yebrir n useggas yezrin, yeǧǧa-d deffir-s sin warraw-is d ilqaqen. 

  A. A. 

  
 Seld lɣiba iḍulen ḥawla n yiseggasen, yuɣal-d unaẓur Ɛetmani, ilindi, s uḍebsi n ccna amaynut. Ayendin seg wid i t-iḥemmlen i llan ttraǧun ma d-yernu ad d-yessufeɣ unaẓur-a bu tezlit tamḥaddit neɣ uhu, ladɣa mi ula deg temliliyin d yisiharen n ccna ur d-yettbin taggara-a. Dɣa, mi akken i d-yesres deg ulzuz iseɣrez-a, iwumi yefka azwel “Ay Aqbayli”, d tumert i yeṭṭfen tasga tameqqrant deg wulawen-nsen. Aya, imi udem swayes i d-yuɣal bab n tezlit tamazrayt « Ah ya tawaɣit », yesken-aɣ-d belli ur yebdil ɣef yiseggasen imenza mi yebda akken-nni ccna amḥaddi di temẓi-s. D winna iwumi slan medden deg yiseggasen n 1970, s tezlatin yecban « Ah ya taɣawit », « I Umaziɣ », « A medden slet-d », i d-yeqqlen deg wayyuren-a iɛeddan. Ula d kra n yinaẓuren, gar-asen Ḥasen Aḥres, snagan (cehden) ɣef waya, mi d-yenna i lmend n tejmilt i as-yuɣalen i Ɛetmani deg Yiburayen: « Dda Ḥemmic, d yiwen i yekkin s tehri deg lebni n ufakan n tezlit taqbaylit (…). Ad as-yesseɣzef Rebbi di leɛmer, acku, mi ara nsel i yiseɣrez-ines aneggaru, neḥsa yezmer ad yernu ad d-yefk i tezlit taqbaylit ». Deg uḍebsi-ines, ddant-d snat n tezlatin d tiɣezfanin cwiṭ, « Ay Aqbayli » d « Ay asmi terɛeḍ ». Yeqqar deg tezlit tamezwarut: Ay Aqbayli mebla nnekwa, melmi ad d-yas wass ideg ad tt-nesɛut. Ma dduklen Leqbayel ass-a, tutlayt-nneɣ ar d ad tt-narut. S tmaziɣt i cebḥent tira, di tutlayt n medden neɛya, s yidles-nneɣ ad teḍwi tmurt. Akk walan Ɛetmani d bu yimenzayen, i mazal yesnuzgum ar tura ɣef liḥala n yidurar, n tutlayt d yidles. Ma deg tezlit tis snat, yedda-d waya deg tsetna (refrain): Ay asmi terɛeḍ ur tewwit, nruḥ di twaɣit, la nettɛerrib ur nuki. Yeḍra-d leɛǧeb nettwali-t, s lferḥ neqbel-it, smecḥen-aɣ qeḍran s imi. Simmal la nrewwel i tjaddit, a d nnger n ddunit, amek armi nɛemmed i yakk tigi?

  M. K. 

  
 Yiwen gar yiɣeblan igejdanen i mazal yecɣel imezdaɣ n tɣiwanin n ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu, d aɣbel n lexṣas n usafar n uyefki n tcekkart deg tḥuna, i iḥuzan aṭas n tɣiwanin n ugerzu, ladɣa tiɣiwanin n unẓul n ugerzu, ad nebdar gar-asent, taɣiwant n Lemɛatqa, Ssuq l Tniyen, Amecras, Tizi n Ttlata, Iwaḍiyen, Ait buwaddu…atg.

 Tuɣal tcekkart n uyefki d amerẓi n yal ass. Ttkubrin yimezdaɣ sdat n tḥuna seg mi ara d tefrari tafat, deg tezrarin ur nkeffu ara ɣef tcekkart neɣ snat n uyefki, ula d wid yesnuzun ayefki, semrasen kra n tarrayin yeffɣen i usaḍuf, dayen i d-yessekkaren lɣiḍ n yimdanen, anda ad naf asemres n tiɣin n uyefki n tcekkart d tmerna n tiɣin n uyefki n tfunast (testan) yettnuzun s ssuma n 50 ɣer 80 n yidinaren i litra neɣ tiɣin n usafar-nniḍen n luzinat n uyefki. Imsedellal (commerçants) n uyefki iwumi ttunefken ttesriḥat n usnuzu n uyefki yesɛan tallelt n uwanek, tikwal ttawin-d asafar-agi yiwen neɣ sin n wussan kan deg ddurt. Sdat n warway n ufraq n uyefki, imḍebbren n uḥric n tenzzuyt, sfehmen-d aya. Mass Ahcene Belhadji imeḍebber i d-yelhan s ussudes n ssuq d usali n tdamsa deg tmehla n Tenzzuyt n ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu, yenna-d deg wawal-is ‘’ Ssebba n warway i d-yellan deg ufraq n uyefki d lexṣas-is deg tḥuna, d asenqes deg umur n uyefki afrur (poudre) i as d-yettunefken seg Umaris (office) aɣelnaw i ugerzu Tizi-Uzzu’’. Yuɣal-d deg wawal daɣen ɣef warway deg ufraq n uyefki, anda i d-iwwked d akken srabes-ines hegan-d yakk leblanat iwatan i ṭmana n ufraq yelhan usafar-agi agejdan n twaculin. Dɣa yefka-d yiwet n tmentalt i d-uixelqen lexṣas n uyefki deg ssuq, d aseqdec n usafar-agi deg leqhawi. Dɣa srabes n tenzzuyt hegan-d yiwen n usaḍuf ara iḥetmen ɣef yimɛelmen n leqhawi ad sqedcen isufar n uyefki-nniḍen. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken deg ugerzu n tizi-Uzzu llant (4) rebɛa n luzinat n uyefki n imdanen usligen ( privés), dima ɣef leḥsab n Mass Belhadji, agerzu n Tizi-Uzzu yettsaḥit-id umur n 1213 n tunn n uyefki abrur yal agur, rebɛa n luzinat n uyefki sufuɣent-d azal n 498 500 n litrat n uyefki yal ass, wid iferqen asafar-agi, ha-ten-in deg umḍan n 135 y id-sen.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Akken i d-yeqqar uzwel-is, iseɣrez aneggaru i d-yessufeɣ di tlemmast n 2018 unaẓur Murad Ɛedwan s uzwel «Taqbaylit-nni», deg-s aṭas n wayen ara isel umeẓẓuɣ si tama n uẓawan, d wayen ara yettḥesses wallaɣ si tama n umeslay d yiwellihen ɣef teqbaylit d yidles s umata.
 
Ma newwi-d awal ɣef tezlit tamezwarut n mmi-s n Bgayet, iwumi isemma “Win yennan truḥ“, ad d-nebder taseddart-a i d-yewwin agzul fell-as.
 
D tanaslit si ljed n ljed i aɣ-d-tekka
 
D tigejdit fell-as i tbedd Tmazɣa
 
S tfenṭaẓit
 
D taqbaylit 
 
D tamaziɣt
 
Semmit-as akken i awen-yehwa.

 Deg tezlit tis snat “Asmenteg“, tettkemmil daɣen tiɣri n ucennay d usaki ɣef wamek i tent-yuɣ yidles-nneɣ talliyin-a tineggura. Yenna-as:
 
Neɣreq deg ujdid
 
A Seksu n uderyis
 
Taɛacurt, lɛid
 
Yennayer yettirxis
 
Ur nteddu srid
 
Yeɛreq-aɣ lqis
 
Ur iban ubrid
 
Ala ma ur nefris.

 Deg tezlit tis kraḍet ara d-yasen, ad d-naf asentel n tayri d wamek yettbeddil zzman tilufa, ayen yebɣu yeḍmeɛ-it yiwen. Deg tis ukuẓet, “Ameqyas“, d ameslay ɣef tayri i d-yewwin azday gar sin, d wamek yettaf urgaz iman-is d tin ukud yecrek tudert-is. Deg tezlit “Ay at Rebbi“ ara d-iḍefren srid, d tamuɣli n unaẓur i yettemɛebbaren d wallaɣ-is ɣef tmetti tamirant d tlufa akk i d-yetteḥnunnuḍen s amdan, am lɣiba n laman, abdal n leḥbab, atg. 

 Deg tis sḍiset, d awellih i win akken yezgan ireffed iqejjiren-is di tudert, ɣas ulamma yal alluy turǧa-t trusi. Syinna, d tizlit iwumi yefka azwel “Anda llan“, ideg yella unadi n umekti d uxiqi ɣef wayen i d-tettak ddunit tettekkes-it. Ɣef zzman yettɛeddayen am lberq, yettbeddil addaden, yettawi ayen yebɣa, yettaǧǧa-d ccfawat. Deg tezlit “Lmektub“, d aberreḥ n unaẓur s tẓuri d waṭas n yiḥulfan ɣef kra n wuguren i izemren ad ḥazen yal amdan. Ma deg tizlit send taneggarut, “Taqbaylit-nni“, d tuɣalin ɣer usentel agejdan iɣef yebna yiseɣrez, s ussad n wawal ɣef teqbaylit. S tseddart-a ad nwali cwiṭ udem n tezlit:
 
Ay asmi i aɣ-yezdeɣ lḥir
 
Nesseḥbibir
 
Leɛwayed-nneɣ neḥrez-itent
 
Amsedrar ur yettmesxir
 
Tidak n dir
 
Ur yettqerrib ɣer ɣur-sent
 
Ma d ass-a yefla ulemsir
 
Ḥzen a yebrir
 
Deg-neɣ la segrurubent
 
Ɣer tudrin yewweḍ-d zzhir
 
Nefka abendir
 
I Xira ad teɛmer tarkent.

 Ɣer taggara, yefren Murad Ɛedwan ad yerr tajmilt i terbaɛt n Mob deg tezlit tis 10. Yettnuzu akka tura walbum di ddeqs n yimeḍqan i win yebɣan ad inadi fell-as, imi yuklal s tidet asmuzget.

 I tikkelt tamezwarut di lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu ad yili uɣerbaz n tɣamsa akked teywalt. Wagi d aɣerbaz n Media pro. Iselmaden n uɣerbaz-a, d ineɣmasen, ama di TV, deg umaṭṭaf neɣ di tɣamsa yettwarun. Xeddmen timsirin deg wayen yeɛnan taɣamsa s umata. Ddurt iɛeddan, fkan-asen igerdasen i yinelmaden i yekkfan tannant deg uɣerbaza. Xeddmen yineɣmasen tidwilin am wakken deg srid. Yal yiwen yemmeslay-d ɣef tirmit-is deg uɣerbaz-agi. Syin yal yiwen, yewwi-d asentel deg tedwilt i d-yeslal netta s timmad-is.Akka dɣa ara naf tidwilin ɣef yidles, tatiknulujit , isallen sya u sya, addal…atg. Ma yella d anemhal n uɣerbaz Mass Ould Oulhadj Karim, netta si tama-is, ibarreḥ-d s yiwen n usenfar n tlallit n umaṭṭaf di le Web. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken amaṭṭaf n JSK seg uɣerbaz-agi i yebda. Ihi akken i d-nenna belli amaṭṭaf n uɣerbaz d amezwaru ara d-yilin di lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ad tili daɣen tansa tiliktrunit ara yestkelfen s yisallen yemxallafen. Ma yella nuɣal ɣer yisenfren i yexdem Mass Ould Oulhaj Karim nezmer ad d-nader : anasiw n tira s tmaziɣt akked usnas AZUL i uselmed n tutlayt n tmaziɣt i yigerdan. Ad neqqim kan deg uselmed, maca tikkelt-a, ad d-yekcem umaṭṭaf imi ad yili usenfar : tidwilin ɣef uselmed n tmaziɣt ara d-yilin s lemɛawna n Useqqamu unnig n timuzɣa akked d Tneɣlaft n teywult. Anect-a, d asebɣes i yilmeẓyen i iḥemmlen taɣamsa daɣen d asnerni d usuzer n tutlayt n tmaziɣt, acku i wakken ad d-tifrir tmeslayt, ilaq ad tt-mmeslayen yimdanen.

D yiwet n tigawt s wazal-is i ɣer i d-yessawel uselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Mεatqa, Mass Lyes Laguel d tarbaεt-is, anda i d-heggan yakk ttawilat iwatan akken ad d-teddu twiza akken iwata, ladɣa lḥarǧ ameqqren yecban ikumya d tmacinin. 

 Tella-d tigawt seld iḍumen i izelgen yakk tiɣemmar n temdint, d lexsas meqqren deg umḍan n yixeddamen i d-yelhan s usizdeg deg srabes n tɣiwant n Mεatqa. Xedmen yimezdaɣ d tddukliwin iffaden akken ad d-rren taɣiwant d tazeddgant, mebla iḍumman d iguduyen yezelgen udem n tɣiwant. Dɣa akken ineḥsa deg wussan-agi inggura, sdat n tmesbaniyin yemgaraden mgal adabbu amesbaṭli, aṭas n tigawin n usizdeg d ugerrez n tɣiwanin d yizenqan i d-yellan deg tuget n temḍiqin n tmurt n Lezzayer.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 D akken neẓra di ddunit merra, imdanen, sexdamen di tmucuha aṭas iγersiwen, acku i wakken tamεayt ad tεeddi u ad taweḍ γer yiswi, ttadren-d yal tikkelt iγersiwen akken ad sen-tishil tegnit, amedya γur-neγ s Leqbayel, nessexdam uccen i tḥerci, izem i tebγest d tezmert… Deg waya, ssawalen-d wat zik yiwet n tmacahut γef win yesderγil ṭṭmeε. Yiwen wass, yuḍen ugellid n lḥut, yewweḍ γer lmuḥal. Ihi, cekkṛen-as ul n wuccen d ddwa. Iceyyeε ixeddamen-is i wakken ad as-d-muqqlen uccen. Mi ttnadin γef rrif n lebḥeṛ, walan yiwen n wuccen la yeddewwiṛ din, ssawlen-as: “Ay uccen”. Uccen: ”Anεam”. Acu akka ara txeddmeḍ ay uccen ? 

 Aql-aγ la nettnadi lmektub.
 Tlata wussan-ayagi, nekni d anadi fell-ak. 
 D lxiṛ kan? 
 A d agellid-nneγ i yebγan ad yeg tameγra, maca yebγa ad yesseḥdeṛ yakk iγersiwen n tmurt. Tura neεreḍ akk iγersiwen ala kečč i ixussen, ula d tameγra teḥbes γef lğal-ik, ihi sellek iman-ik, ayen tectaqeḍ din, ad teṛwuḍ, kullec yella. Uccen, yesderγel-it ṭṭmeε.
  -Besseḥ ur ssineγ ara ad εummeγ. 
  -Awah ! Ay uccen, akken newwi meṛṛa imεerḍen ara ak-nawi. Semlalen iman-nsen, gan-as-d amkan gar-asen. Yerkeb, ruḥen. Akken kecmen talemmast n lebḥeṛ, yenṭeq yiwen uḥewtiw γer wayeḍ: “Ilaq-aγ ad nγiwel neğğa-t-in yenṭeṛ aṭṭas”. Uccen am win i as-d-yefkan abeqqa. Yemmekta-d mi i as-tenna yemma-s ul-nneγ d ddwa i leḥwat. Yenṭeq yiwen uḥewtiw γer wuccen: “Ay uccen, ayγer akka tessusmeḍ, εni ur yezhi ara wul-ik ?”.
  Uccen ifuṛes asteqsi-nni : “Awah! Ala ul-iw ur t-id-wwiγ ara, ttuγ-t-in γef rrif n lebḥeṛ”. Dγa feqqeεen leḥwat imi ayen akken ḥwağen, ur d-yeddi ara. Neṭṭqen γur-s: “S tidett ay uccen, ur d-tewwiḍ ara ul-ik?”. Uccen: “Dayen ttuγ-t-in”. Leḥwat: “Ala ay uccen ad nuγal ad t-id-tawiḍ yis-s ara tezhud di tmeγra”. Uγalen-d s temγawla, akken i d-wwḍen γer rrif n lebḥeṛ, uccen ijelleb yerwel. Leḥwat: “Aniγer ay uccen ? Awi-d ul-ik tuγaleḍ-d γer tmeγra”. Uccen: “Awah! Tameγra n lebḥeṛ urğin telli”.
  Yahia Yanes 

  
 Imezdaɣ n taddart n Tḥanut deg tɣiwant At Ɛissa Mimun, ttefɣen-d, tameddit n yal taggara n ddurt, deg waggur-agi n Ṛemḍan i wakken ad sizedgen taddart-nsen. D tiɣri n tesqamut n taddart-agi, iwumi i d-yerra yal amezdaɣ meẓẓi, meqqer. Yal wa ixeddem ayen yezmer, yal wa yefka-d ayen yesɛa, wa d cci wa d tikti…atg. Ddukklen yiffaden-nsen ɣef yiwen yiswi i ten-yerḥan d aseḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt d usizdeg n taddart. Acḥal d abrid tura i d-ffɣen, yal tikkelt d acu xeddmen. Tikkelt d afraḍ n tregwa n waman d yiberdan yellan daxel n taddart-agi, tikkelt d tuẓut n yijeǧǧigen d ṭṭjur (…). Cebbḥen taddart-nsen s yijeǧǧigen, amḍiq ansi i d-tɛeddaḍ yettriḥ iẓid. Ugar n 100 n yijeǧǧigen d 100 n yisekla i teẓẓa tddukkla “Amgud”, yesseḥbibiren ɣef ugama deg taddart-agi n Tḥanut. Mi d tameddit, ad twaliḍ ttefɣen medden wa deffir wa, yal yiwen acu i d-yewwi yid-s. Yiwen d taberwiṭ, wa d aqabac d lmesḥa, wayeḍ, wayeḍ… Xeddmen deg tegnatin n tumert d unecraḥ, dayen i d-irennun sser i lxedma-agi-nsen. D tagnit ideg ttemɛawanen wat taddart ɣef tɛekkumt ẓẓayen, yecban tin n twennadt. Yal taqrart txeddem deg udewwar-is, i wakken ad tesban iberdan d tregwa n waman ireglen. Yal yiwen ad iḥulfu i yiman-is yessizdig lḥara-s neɣ axxam-is, acu kan ddukklen ur tt-fiqin ara alamma ufan-d iman-nsen gerrzen adewwar neɣ taqrart-nsen. D tagnit n umlaɛi daɣen, dɣa wannect-agi; yenna-d yiwen urgaz n taddart-agi: “Di lecɣal yecban wigi, ttemyuɣalen medden ladɣa ma yecrek-iten uxeddim. Llan kra ttkemmilen tudert lwaḥid, llan wiyaḍ mi yekfa ccɣel-nni yal wa yettuɣal s amkan-is”. D amedya daɣen i tuddar n tɣiwant-agi n At Ɛissa Mimun, i wakken ad tent-cbun. I lmend n waya, yenna-d yiwen umɣar si taddart-agi: “Ur umineɣ ara taddart-nneɣ ad tuɣal ad teddukkel am zik, i wakken ad d-nebgen iman-nneɣ nesɛa akk lḥir d leḥmala n taddart-nneɣ. Nessaram ula d tudrin-agi i d aɣ-d-yezzin, ad aɣ-ɛandent ula d nutenti ɣer wayen yelhan”.

  A. A 

  
 Teɣra Lynda Hantour tussna n tɣamsa deg tesdawit n Ben Ɛeknun (di Lezzayer tamanaɣt) deg wayen yerzan taɣamsa yuran. Deg tdiwennit-agi, newwi-d awal ɣef wungal-is “Iseflan n tudert” akked tira s umata. 

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen : Amek i am-d-tusa tikti n tira n wungal-agi ?  
 Lynda Hantour : Uriɣ ungal-agi “Iseflan n tudert” i tikkelt tamezwarut ahat 10 n yiseggasen akka ɣer deffir , s tutlayt n trumit. Yella kan deg-s aḥric amezwaru akked wis sin semmaɣ-as “La foligamie” : tagi d tamacahut n Raju i yeǧǧa ugas-is Kennu . Di taddart, iweṣṣa-t akken ad yesbedd axxam-is akked dderya-as. Netta iruḥ ad yegmu tamussni, ad yuɣal d ccix n lǧameɛ. Nettat, teqqim tesseḥbibir ɣef warraw-is. Yiwet n tikkelt, iceggeɛ-as-d urgaz-is, yenna-as : “A-t-an ad ruḥeɣ, sewjed iman-im ad nexdem tameɣra. Sizdeg axxam. Ihi yusa-d urgaz i iruḥen d anelmad, yuɣal-d d aselmad. 

 Tefreḥ taddart. Tameṭṭut tameɣbunt tqeddec , tcebbeḥ i warraw-is, maca tettu iman-is, neɣ ahat d ayen-nniḍen : d lɛib ad tcebbeḥ i urgaz-is. Wagi d yiwen n ugdal i yellan deg tmetti n yimir-n. Ihi, ɣer tmeddit n wass tekcem tmeṭṭut ɣer texxamt akken ad d-tawi iɛdilen i yinebgawen i d-yeddan akked urgaz-is, teḍher-as tmeṭṭut, teqqim ɣef wussu, tcebbeḥ am teslit: terra amendil ɣef uqerru-is, truḥ ɣur-s tenna-as : “ A tinebgit n lḥerma, a tin yeččuren d sser”. Tettmeslay-as s yisefra, tenwa d abrid i d as-iɛerqen imi i dterza ɣer texxamt-is. Terra-as d tnebgit-nni : “ Abrid, ur i yi-yeɛriq ara, aql-i deg umḍiq-iw, nekk d tameṭṭut n ccix Kennu”. Syin mi teḥṣa Raju d takna i d as-d-yewwi, tefsex, dɣa tesleb…

  Tewwiḍ-d awal s umata ɣef tmeḥqqranit mgal tameṭṭut…  
 Deg wungal-agi, ur d-ttmeslayeɣ ara kan ɣef meḥyaf i d-yettilin sɣur timetti mgal tameṭṭut, acku meḥyaf, yettili-d gar tmeṭṭut akked tayeḍ. Tella yiwet n temsalt, ilaq ad nerr ddehn-nneɣ ɣur-s. Mi ara d-nettmeslay ɣef ddɣel ɣef tmeṭṭut, nezga neqqar-d d argaz i d sebba. Ala, ur ilaq ara ad nettu d akken ddɣel n tmeṭṭut ɣer tmeṭṭut, wagi yugar-itent merra. Mi ara nwali liḥalat n berru, nezga nettaf-d belli tettili-d tmeṭṭut tis kraḍet deg temsalt : d tamɣart-is, d tanudt-is neɣ d talwest-is. Nek jebdeɣ-d lwelha ɣef wanect-agi. Tella daɣen tmuḥeqqranit ɣef urgaz, amdya : Argaz ur yezmir ara ad d-yini belli yettwaḥqer sɣur tameṭṭut-is neɣ d uletma-s i iḥekkmen deg uxxam. Ihi, argaz yettwaḥqerr kter , imi ur yezmir ara ad yeffeɣ ɣer berra ad yini belli yettwaḥqer, d lɛib. Argaz, ur ilaq ara ad yili d aɛewwiq i tmeṭṭut. Ilaq ad ibedd ɣer tama-is, ad as-yefk tabɣest akken ad tennerni deg yisenfar-is.

  Amek armi i d-terriḍ ungal-agi ɣer tmaziɣt?  
 Nekk ur ɣriɣ ara tamaziɣt. Asmi i uriɣ tamacahut-agi, uriɣ-t s trumit. Syin, iruḥ ɣur-i Mass Saɛid Cemmax, yenna-yi-d : “ Acimi ur tettaruḍ ara s tmaziɣt ? Nniɣ-as : “ Ur ssineɣ ara, ur ɣriɣ ara , yenna-ak : “Aru akken i tettmeslayeḍ. Taqbaylit-im teqɛed aru yis-s. Ilaq, ad nessimɣur tamkerḍit n tmaziɣt. Mačči d aman ara ternuḍ i tutlayin-nniḍen, ilaq ad tqeḍceḍ ɣef tutlayt-im”. Dɣa seg yimir-n, yexdem-iyi-d lḥir. Dɣa seg imir-n, bdiɣ ttaruɣ s tmaziɣt. Uriɣ-t akken i ttmeslayeɣ, syin akkin d yiwet n tnelmadt i yi-t-id-yuran, yesseɣta-iyi-t Takfarinas Nat Caɛban akked Ɛli Bexti. Ad-asen-iniɣ tanemmirt-nwen . 

  D acu ara d-tiniḍ i tid yettarun s tmaziɣt, maca ggumant ad siẓergent tira-nsent…  
 Am d-mmeslayeɣ ɣef yiwet, tenna-iyi-d: “Bɣiɣ ad aruɣ taqṣidt-iw, maca kukreɣ. Amyaru, mi ara d-yeḥku taqsidt, iban kan ad yagum si tala-s, syin akkin ad as-yernu ciṭ n yimeslayen, ciṭ n ucebbeḥ, ciṭ n usugen. 80% n wayen i d-yettwarun d ayen i yedder umyaru. Ihi kra n tulawin mi ara ruḥent, ad arunt, ttkakrunt timetti. Mi ara taɣeḍ argaz amzun akken tuɣeḍ akk lɛerc-is. Mi ara tiliḍ d tilemẓit, taddart yakk, tettekka deg-m. Ihi mi ara taruḍ, tebɣiḍ neɣ ur tebɣiḍ, nutni ad d-ddun , ad d-ddun di tmacahut-im. D wagi i d aɣbel amezwaru. Syin, akkin, ilaq win ara sent-yeffken afud. Nekk, ahat lukan ur i yi-d-iwehha ara Saɛid Cemmax, ur ttaruɣ ara s teqbaylit. Aɣbel wis tlata d aseẓreg : Yewɛer akken ad taruḍ s tmaziɣt, syin akkin wissen ma yella ad tenz neɣ ala.

  Awal n taggara…  
 Win yettarun taqbaylit ur ixezzer ara ɣer tedrimt, axaṭer tira s teqbaylit d imenɣi. Ad d-iniɣ azemz n, 08 deg meɣres, mačči n ccḍeḥ. Azemz-agi, d imenɣi n tlawin. Ssarameɣ yal ass agraɣlan n tmeṭṭut, ad teffeɣ tektabt n tmezgun. Ma yella ɣef tira s tmaziɣt, ad d-iniɣ :”Ǧerǧer ay adrar n ṣsber, aẓar n tmazɣa ur yettɣar” 
  Yamani Souhila 

  
 Di tirza i yexdem Mass Assad ɣer lwilaya n Skikda i lmend n usfugel n umulli wis 23 n usebded n Useqqamu unnig i timmuzɣa , ibarreḥ-d d akken yella yiwen n wuṭṭun azegzaw anda wid yettnadin kra s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, ama d tasuqilt, ama d asegzi n wawalen, yezmer ad yessiwel ɣer wuṭṭun-a. Akken daɣen zemren yimdanen ad fernen ismawen imaziɣen i warraw-nsen. D yiwen n wallal ara ideggren imdanen akken ad ttarun s tutlayt-a, ad afen, diɣ, ayen ttnadin. Iwekked-d umaru amatu n Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa belli llant-d lemɛawnat d yiɣlifen d tsuda tunṣibin yemgarraden. Gar-asen aɣlif n usegmi aɣelnaw d uɣlif n teywalt. Yenna-d Mass Assad d akken yella-d usurif igerrzen ɣer sdat deg wayen yeɛnan aselmed n tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Syin iberreḥ-d belli ad tebdu, ad tettwaselmad tmaziɣt deg Skikda seg unekcum aɣurbiz i d-itteddun. Akken daɣen i d-ixebber ɣef tilin n umastir n tsuqqilt tamaziɣt-taɛṛabt deg unekcum asdawan i d-iteddun deg Usudu n tsuqqilt n tesdawit n Lezzayer. Yerna yenna-d : ‘’Aseqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa, ad yexdem asenfar asdawan amaziɣ deg tesdawit n Skikda. Ula di lwilaya n Wergla, a-t-an ad-yili usileɣ n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt n uɣerbaz amenzu .

  Y.S. 

  
 D taddart Azemmur U Meryem i yewwin amekkan amezwaru n timsizzelt Aïssat Rabah n taddart tazeddgant.

 Ass-nni n lḥedd iɛeddan, 14 deg tuber 2018, i d-yella uberreḥ, deg Uxxam n umezgun Katen Yacine n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, s 10 n tudrin i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt n useggas-a, deg tezrigt-is tis 6. D timsizzelt i d-yettheggi Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ma nmuqel ɣer yigemmaḍ n tikkelt-a, ad naf d akken d taɣiwant n Tirmitin i d-iḥellan aḥric ameqqran deg usiher-a, imi 3 n tudrin-is i d-yufraren : amḍiq amezwaru, wis tlata akked wis rebɛa. Deg umekkan amezwaru, taddart Azemmur U Meryem n tɣiwant n Tirmitin, wis sin taddart At Saɛid n tɣiwant n At Wizgen, wis tlata taddart Cbaba n tɣiwant n Tirmitin, wis rebɛa tewwi-t taddart Megdul n tɣiwant n Tirmitin, wis xemsa, iṣuḥ-d taddart Tisguwin n tɣiwant n Bujimaɛ, deg umekkan wis setta, tufrar-d taddart At Amer n tɣiwant n At Buwaddu, ma deg umḍiq wis sebɛa, ad naf taddart Icliben n tɣiwant n Abi Yusef, amḍiq wis tmanya, tewwi-t taddart Buyeɣzer n tɣiwant n Friqat, amekkan wis tesɛa, tezga-d deg-s taddart At Ɛisi U Yeḥya, ma d amḍiq aneggaru wis xecra, tefka-t teseqqamut n uktazal i taddart Tamkadbut, taddart tis snat i yewwin arraz deg tɣiwant n At Buwaddu. Arrazen-agi, sqamen-d azal n 44 n yimelyan n ddinar, mačči s 33 n yimelyan am useggas iɛeddan. Mraw-agi n warrazen i yettwaferqen, llan gar 2 d 9 n yimelyan n ddinar. Taddart tamezwaru, tewwi 9 n yimelyan, tis snat tewwi 7 n yimelyan, tis tlata tewwi 6 yimelyan, tis rebɛa, ṣaḥen-tt-id 5 n yimelyan, tis xemsa 4 n yimelyan, ma d tin i d-yufraren deg umḍiq wis setta d wis sebɛa akked wis tmanya, wwint yakk 3 n yimelyan i yal yiwet deg-sent. Ma d taddart i yeṭṭfen amḍiq wis tesɛa akked wis ɛecra, wwint 2 n yimelyan i yal yiwet. Ula d tafelwit n uktazal, swayes txeddem teseqqamut n uktazal, yella-d deg-s umaynut imi yettili-d usenqeḍ ɣef 100 tenqqiḍin. 25 tneqiḍin, rzant iberdan n taddart, 25 tneqqiḍin-nniḍen n useddu n yiḍuman d wammus, ma d imeḍqan uzyizen (publique), yecban tajmaɛt, imekwan n tizzegzewt…atg ɣef 20 tneqqiḍin, 10 tneqqiḍin-tiyaḍ i tliwa d yiɣbula n waman. Ma d imeḍqan n yidles d tmussni akked yisebdaden ɣef 10 tneqqiḍin, timqebrin s 7 tneqqiḍin, ma d tlata-nni i d-yeqqimen i leqwanen n useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt. Ad d-nesmeki, belli timsizzelt-agi n taddart tazedgant, yettheggi-tt-id yal aseggas Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya (APW) n Tizi Uzzu. Deg tezrigt n useggas yezrin, d taddart n Tiferdoud i yewwin arraz amezwaru, ma d tinna uqbel-is d taddart n Boumessoud i tt-yewwin d tamezwarut deg 2016. Ma d aseggas-agi, ihi d taddart Azemmur U Meryem i t-yewwin. Tazrigt-agi tamynut n useggas-a, yewweḍ wuṭṭun n tuddar i issersen zzmamat n uttekki ɣer 101, yennerna wuṭṭun-agi s lqidar n 25% ɣef tezrigt-nni n yilindi. Deg wussan-nni ineggura n waggur n cutember, i tessuli tufɣiwin-is teseqqamut n tezdeg d tezmert akked twennaḍt n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya, i yellan d taseqqamut n uktazal n temsizzelt-agi ɣer tudrin yettekkin deg tezrigt-agi tis 06. Tallit n uktazal n 101 n tudrin-agi yettekkan, tella-d gar tazwara n waggur n yulyu armi d taggara n waggur-agi n cutember iɛeddan. Azemz-agi n 14 deg tuber i deg i d-yella usfugel, yemwata d wass ideg yettwanɣa uselway aqdim n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya Aissat Rabah deg useggas 2006.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Am tuddar akk n yidurar, taddart n At Smaεel, ɣas ma yella aṭas i ibedlen deg-s, ladɣa iseggasen-agi ineggura, meεna ddeqs n uxeddim d lecɣal i d-yeggran i wakken ad yelhu waddad n tɣiwant-agi.

 Ama d lexsas n waman, neɣ d tamsalt n yiberdan, ɣef wacu zgan yimezdaɣ ttcektin seg liḥala-nsen. Seg yiwet n tama, ma yella nemmeslay-d ɣef yiberdan imeqqranen, nezmer ad d-nini yekfa deg-sen uxeddim, am win yellan gar Lburj n Mira akked d At Smaεel. Rnu i waya, wid yessawaden seg tlemmast n tɣiwant i tuddar-is-nniḍen. Ma seg tama-nniḍen, iberdan n tezniqin d yizriben imecṭah, mazal ur ssulin deg-sen lecɣal. D ayen i yeǧǧan imdanen ccektayen, ladɣa imi d tagrest i d-iteddun. «Limer kan kemmlen i wayen i d-bdan. Aqli-ken tettwalim aɣebbar amek i yuli, akka deg unebdu. Ma yella di tegrest, d aluḍ i yeččuren tizniqin-agi», i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n urgaz seg At Tεisiwt. Ma d yiwet-nniḍen tenna-d:« Llant tuddar, iberdan-nsent akk d abiṭun, ula d nekni nessaram ad d-yas was anda ara yekfu fell-aɣ lhem-agi». Mi netseqsa aselway n tɣiwant-a, yerra-aɣ-d : «Ur nezmir ad nkemmel lecɣal-agi uqbel ad yekfu usenfar n lgaz. Acku, akken qqaren: ’Ameyyez uqbel aneggez’. Ur nxeddem ara ccɣel snat n tikkal. Aseggas-agi ad d-nelhu d usenfar n lgaz, asmi ara yekfu, imir-n ad nseggem liḥala n yiberdan-agi». Lḥasul, ssaramen yimezdaɣ deg yimḍebbren n tɣiwant, ad ssamden lecɣal, s wayen ara d-yawin abaɣur i taddart s umata.

  K. K. 

  
 I lmend n wass aɣelnaw n yimeɛḍar, i d-yettuɣalen yal 14 meɣres, heggant-d tddukkliwin i iqeddcen i yidis n umeɛḍur yiwet n tikli akked yimiyupaten d yimeɛḍar akken ad sutren izerfan d ttawil deg tmurt-nsen. Imi ulamek ara mlilen deg yiwen n umḍiq, tella-d yiwet n tikli di Tezmalt, tayeḍ di Bgayet, tayeḍ deg Yiderginen, asamar n Bgayet. Deg Tezmalt dɣa, tebda tikli-nni ɣef 10:00 n tnezzayt, seg uxxam n tddukkla n yimiyupaten n Bgayet (DEFI) armi d taɣiwant, syin akkin i tdayra n Tezmalt. Gar wayen sutren wid i d-yeffɣen s abrid, awenneɛ n liḥala n umeɛḍur di tmurt-is, asishel n ukcam-ines di tmetti, aqeɛɛed n usaḍuf ɣef wayen yerzan izerfan-is akked usemɣer n tjernant-is tamayyurt i yellan d 4 000 n yidinaren ar tura. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ayendin d tiddukkliwin i yekkin deg tikli-a akken ad d-fkent afud i yimeɛḍar, ama d tid n yimdanen at wasrayen uzzigen, tid n yimuḍan n ssker neɣ d tid n lɛali d lxir s umata. « Nella di ttiɛad ass-nni n 14 meɣres akken deg-s ad d-nesmekti ass aɣelnaw n yimeɛḍar, deg-s ad nessuter izerfan-nneɣ di tmurt-nneɣ. Acku ar tura, yettwarkeḍ ḥawla umeɛḍur imi ur as-tga ddula ttawil akken ad iɣer neɣ ad yexdem s teshel, am deg tmura-nniḍen », i aɣ-d-tenna tselwayt n tddukkla n yimiyupaten n Bgayet, Massa Nura Ayt Ɛebderreḥman. Send ad tkemmel ɣef taluft-nniḍen: « Wamma tajernant-nni tamayyurt fiḥel ad d-nini. Ladɣa imi ddula tẓerr-itt d tikci kan, mačči d azref n umeɛḍur. Ɣef waya i tt-tesseḥbes kan di 4 000 n yidinaren seg wacḥal tura d aseggas ». Yewwi-d ad d-nini belli ɣef temsalt-a n tjernant n umeɛḍur, aṭas i d-yekkren deg wayen iɛeddan ssuturen asali-ines, ama d tiddukkliwin, imḍebbren idiganen d yirgazen isertanen, maca yesɛuẓẓug uwanek i tiɣriwin. 
  M. K. 

  
 Akken i t-id-iberreḥ deg umiḍan-is n Facebook, yeffeɣ-d ussan-a iɛeddan uḍebsi n ccna n Meẓyan Xalifi, iwumi isemma « Azuzzen ». Seld acḥal d akud i d-yettewten deg usekles d lecɣal-nniḍen yerzan asufeɣ n yiseɣrez, yelḥeq-d lawan ideg yezmer kra n win iḥemmlen asefru d uẓawan s teqbaylit, ad yettḥesses i sebɛa n tezlatin i yecna unubi Meẓyan deg uḍebsi-ines. Meẓyan Xalifi i d-ilulen deg useggas n 2002, i d-yekkren deg taddart n Ayt Smaɛel i yettwassnen s leqdicat-is idelsanen, gar-asen tafaska n tmedyazt i d-tettheggi yal ayyur n meɣres, yefren ula d netta tutlayt-is swayes ara yebnu awal, ara yessiweḍ i yimsefliden iznan s taɣect d uẓawan. Ladɣa imi segmi i d-yessen i yebda tayri i ccna d wayen yeqqnen i tẓuri, i yebda yettaru isefra, yesnulfay-d iẓawanen. Ad d-nesmekti d akken Meẓyan, yella yekki deg uḍebsi « Tifrat » i d-yessufeɣ gma-s Mhenni deg 2015, anda yecna yid-s amsin deg tezlit n unelmad. Yerra daɣen tajmilt s usefru i unaẓur Ɛli Ideflawen deg teẓrigt tis mraw d yiwen n tfaska n Udrar n Fad, anda i d-yettwaɛreḍ Dda Ɛli ad yili d inebgi. Aseggas-a dɣa, ɣas ilehhu ula d tɣuri-ines, yewweḍ ayen i yessarem seg wacḥal-aya mi yessekles, yessufeɣ-d album-is amezwaru. Liḥala n ugerruj, Anecṭayen, Aselmad-iw, Ccfawat, Eḍs i ddunit, Tameɣra, d Timseɛraq, i d sa n yizwal i yefka Meẓyan Xalifi i tezlatin-is timaynutin, ideg i d-ttwawin yisental yemgaraden s umeslay iweznen d uẓawan icebḥen. « Tuffɣa n walbum-a-inu amezwaru d ayen ibanen teslal-iyi-d tumert. Ferḥeɣ imi awal-iw ad as-slen wiyaḍ, maca ad umreɣ ugar ma yehwa i yimsefliden. Aya ad i yi-d-yernu tabɣest i wakken ad neǧreɣ abrid ». I aɣ-d-yenna Meẓyan Xalifi.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Yebda yakan uheggi n tezrigt tis mraw d seddiset (16) n tmeɣra n tazart, i d-tessuddus yal aseggas tuddsa “Figuiers-culteurs” n Béni Maouche deg lwilaya n Bgayet.

 Tazrigt n usegga-agi, ad d-tili ussan n 27 d 28 akked 29 cutember 2018, dima deg ssuq n tama n Béni Maouche, yettwassnen mliḥ s tneqlin. Yetturaǧu deg tezrigt n useggas-a, ad yili wahil d anesbaɣur, ama si tama n yirmad idelsanen ama si tama n temsikniyin. Aṭas n yimsikniyen ara yilin di ttiɛad, gar-asen wid ara yilin n dinna kan n Béni Maouche d wid ara d yerzun si tamiwin-nniḍen n Bgayet, ɣer tama n wid n lwilaya n Ṣeṭṭif d wiyaḍ…atg. Am wakken daɣen i yetturaǧu ad d-yili wawal s telqey ɣef yibaɣuren n lbexsis d tazart ɣef tezmert n umdan akked wazal-is deg tdamsa n tmurt. D tagnit i yimerriyen i wakken ad d-isinen tamnaḍt-agi n Béni Maouche i icebḥen s waṭas. Am wakken daɣen ara d-walin ayen tekseb d agerruj, gar-asen leṣnaf yemxalafen n lexrif. D tagnit daɣen i wid yebɣan ad a-aɣen iḥbuben neɣ iniɣman s leṣnaf-nsen yemgaraden. Ma d iswi n usiher-agi, i yuɣen amkan deg tama-agi d tmurt n Leqbayel merra, d asuddukkel gar yifellaḥen yesnuzun akked yimerriyen i d-yettaɣen ayen bɣan. D tagnit diɣen i usenɛet n lɣella yemxalafen n tazart d wayen i d-ittekken seg-s, am wakken daɣen i d-tettawi tmeɣra-agi abaɣur i temnaḍt-agi n Béni Maouche. Ɣer taggara, ad-nesmekti kan belli, deg useggas yezrin ugar n 157 n temsikniyin i d-yellan, sɣur ifellaḥen n 21 n tɣiwanin, 11 deg-sent d tid n Bgayet ɣer yidis n 10 tiyaḍ seg Ṣeṭṭif.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Tazrigt tamezwarut n rreḥba taɣelnawt n tfellaḥt d usnulfu, ad tili ussan n 1, 2 d 3 tuber i d-i teddun deg lwilayan Tizi Uzzu, akka i tt-id-ssuzer Texxamt n tfellaḥt n lwilaya (CAW) deg yiwen wulɣu, imi d nettat s timmad-is i d tamsuddest n leqdic-agi. Ma d iswi n rreḥba-agi, d asexdem n wallalen atraren deg tfellaḥt ara d-yuɣalen s ubaɣur ɣef tdamsa n tmurt. D abrid swayes ara neǧǧren abrid gar tesdawit akked yifellaḥen, i wakken ad yili usfaydi s tmussni d yinadiyen n yisdawen-agi deg uḥric-agi n tfellaḥt akked tiknulujit tamaynut. D tagnit daɣen, ara d-yessemlilen imussnawen n tiknulujit d yifellaḥen, i wakken ad yili useḥres n usexdem n tarrayin tijdidin n ufares, yettɛwanen deg usnerni n lɣella d usefti ugar di kra n urmud i ixeddem ufellaḥ, d imeslayen i d-yenna i ssrabes n yissalen n Lezzayer (APS), Mass Abdelghani Benali, imsuddes n rreḥba-agi. Yetturaǧu deg wahil n rreḥba-agi tamezwarut, ad yili d anesbaɣur, gar yisaragen akked temsikniyin, asenɛet n tarrayin timaynutin n tfellaḥt, akked waṭas n leqdicat-nniḍen. ad tili rreḥba-agi, deg tzeqqa tanaddalt Said Tazrout n Temdint tamaynut n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, anda yetturaǧu, ad rzun ddeqs n yimsikniyen d yisdawanen ara d-yerzun seg waṭas n lwilayat n tmurt. Ad nesmekti kan belli, rreḥba-agi ad tili s tallelt n waṭas n yidisan di lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yecban; Tanmehla n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu n ssrabes n tfellaḥt, Aseqqamu aɣerfan awilay (APW)… atg.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 <em>Inig n lweqt-a</em>, d aḍebṣi amezwaru n Demmuc Seddiq « Ccix Ṣeddiq », album ara yilin deg unnar ass n 12 deg yennayer, d azemz mačči kan akka i d-yusa imi yextar-it unaẓur d inig ɣef teqbaylit n tuɣac-is d wansayen-is. Deg tezlatin-is, yerra mmi-s n taddart n Tqerbust tajmilt i tmurt n Leqbayel s umata akked taddart n Sliman Ɛmiṛaṭ « Taqerbust » deg Tubiret, maca ur yettu ara Bgaye, am wakken ur yezgil ara Tizi Uzzu anda yesεedda azul d aḥmayan i yimsdurar-nni ibedden ur ɣlin. Di tesṛeṭ amedyaz, yewwi-d ɣef yiεessasen d yirgazen yettwameḍlen deg ukkuẓ n tɣemmaṛ n tmurt n leqbayel seg Gurara, Sidi Ɛmar Crif,  Azṛu n Ṭhur neɣ Sidi Udris. D tamedyazt yeččuren d inzan d lemεun deg yal yiwet n tmanya tezlatin-is. Aẓawan, d asuɣu n yimdanen. Ma deg uḍebṣi Inig n lweqt-a, d asuɣu n unaẓuṛ ɣef Lezzayer yuḍnen, yenteṛṛen neɣ ahat maḍi yesselqafen d tmurt n leqbayel ideg yenta acḥal d ajenwi n lesnin, tikwal srid, tikwal yetturar s wawal. Anaẓur yeggujlen seg temẓi akken i d-iban deg tezlit Ay iḥbiben-iw, anda yessuter i wul-is acuɣer yeḥzen, dɣa winna ad yenfel d ticeqfatin n ccfawat n temẓi. Si lḥif ɣer lḥif, yudder-itent-id yakk unaẓur imi deg tezlit Anda ara ak-id-geɣ, imawlan  d-yewwin ɣef ddunit taḥercawt, ur ncuḥ ula i yiwen armi yewweḍ unaẓur yendem i wass n tlalit-is.

 « Anef-iyi kan »neɣ « Inig lweqt-a » azwel n uḍebsi-agi d tizlatin yeččuṛen d afrayen, d iḥulfan akked yinumak. Asirem, yella deg « Itij ɣef lejba »imi ɣas ddunit tettarǧam deg yimdanen, iṭij d ulaqrar ad yali ɣef tɣaltin n tudert-nsen s ṣṣwab, tidet d teqbaylit akken yenna unaẓur

 ‘’Ceyyεɣ ilindi, qabel wissen ma ad yeqbel.

 Ad nazzel, ad nqabel taswiɛt,

 Amennuɣ n leqbayel seg zik ɣef laṣel.

 Muḥal newwi tayhudit,

 Win yeldin tiṭ i lɣafel ad as-yeɣli usfel,

 Ad as-teεṛaq ula d taqbaylit.

  Tigrine Nisma 

  
 Teɣzi n tegrest-a, am yal tagrest dɣa, sɛeddan-tt yinehharen n tɣiwanin n Tsexriwt d Ayt Smaɛel deg teqlaq d tugdi. Aya imi abrid i ten-yettawin tasebḥit i ten-id-yettarran tameddit, ulac akk deg-s taɣellist i ilaqen ad tili deg yal abrid. Ayen i d-yettilin deg-s, d isyaxen n yal ccetwa, yeǧǧa at tkeryas ttkukrun ad t-sqedcen, imi tezga deg-s tudert-nsen deg umihi. 

 Seg tikkelt iɛeddan, asmi yeɣli umur ameqqran seg ubrid-nni deg yiwen n umkan, ur yerkid s wudem yelhan wakal n temnaḍt-a. Ass-nni, teḥbes din tikli kra n wussan, ttɛeddayen yinehharen n Ayt Smaɛel di leɛḍil seg taddart n Rrif, armi i t-id-terra yiwet n termist yezmer ad yettwaseqdec. Aseggas-a dɣa, ɣas tuɣ yettwaččur yilem n ubrid isaxen, yuɣal yelḥa wakal-nni tikkelt-nniḍen, iga-d aceqqiq di tlemmast n ubrid, rnu mačči ḥaca deg yiwen n umḍiq. 

 D ayen i yernan yewwi-d ugar n tugdi d unezgum i yiseqdacen n ubrid-a awilay wis 06. « Akk akal n temnaḍt-nni itteddu kra kra. Nwala yal aseggas ad yernu ad iḥerrek cwiṭ, abeɛda deg tsemhuyt n tesmuḍi d yigeffuren ideg ṭṭuqquten waman », i d-yenna yiwen n unehhar n Ayt Smaɛel. Ɣur yimḍebbren n tɣiwanin uɣur yeqqen ubrid-a, Tasexriwt d Ayt Smaɛel, ur sɛin ar tura tifrat-nniḍen i ubrid-a yettseyyixen, ala aččar d ureqqeɛ-ines yal mi ara yelḥu neɣ izuq. Ulamma ɣur tuget n yiɣermanen, ur ilaq ara attkel kan ɣef ubrid-a ayiwen, imi yezmer ad iruḥ akkit ass-a neɣ azekka.

 « Ttwaliɣ, yewwi-d ad nwali amek ara nexdem abrid-nniḍen d amaynut ara yilin d amsellek sya ɣer sdat. Abrid-a aqbur, ma kemmlen yiseyyaxen deg-s, ur yettdumu ara aṭas n yiseggasen », d awal n yiwen n umezdaɣ n tama n Unẓul-asamar n Bgayet.

<p style="text-align:right">  M. K. 

  
 Aɣbel n lexsas n tedrimt i uselḥu n tesmaččiwin n yiɣerbazen imenza, mazal ar ass-a yeɛgeb aṭas deg-sent deg tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa, dayen i d-yessekkren lɣiḍ ameqqran n yimawlan n yinelmaden, dayen iɛewqen, diɣ, inemhalen n usegmi, rnu ɣef waya, yeɛgeb tasertit n uselḥu n Isquma iɣerfanen n tɣiwanin. Sdat n teswiɛt-agi i iweɛren nezzeh, iɛeggalen n Tesqamut n taddart n At Zɛim, s tallelt n yimezdaɣ n taddart, d yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa, heggan-d yiwet n temsatla, anda i d-jemɛen tadrimt akked yisufar n wučči i lfayda n snat n tesmaččiwin n yiɣerbazen imenza n taddart ; wigi d aɣerbaz amenzu n At Zɛim I akked uɣerbaz amenzu At Zɛim II. Tella-d temsetla-agi deg ddurt iɛeddan deg tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa, seld mi d ssutren yinemhalen n usegmi n yiɣerbazen-agi imenza, tallelt deg tesqamut n taddart, dayen i d-yellan seld yir liḥala ideg llant tesmaččiwin, d lexsas deg wučči ttmudun i yinelmaden. Tella-d tegnit-agi seld lexsas n tedrim i d-yettunefken seg Tneɣlaft n usegmi s wazal n 30 DA i unelmad, d tallelt n Usqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant s wazal n 40 DA i unelmad, maca aya, drus maḍi, dɣa ad naf tuget n tesmaččiwin ḥebsent. Ayen i d-ixelqen aɣbel-agi, d leblan dmen yiɛeggalen n udabbu n tmurt n Lezzayer i ibeddlen anagraw n uselḥu n tesmaččiwin n yiɣerbazen imenza seg Tenmehla n usegmi ɣer Yisquma iɣerfanen n tɣiwanin, dayen i d-yeglan s waṭas n uɛeggeb deg uselḥu, ladɣa seld n usenqes n tedrimt yettunefken i uselḥu n lecɣal n tɣiwanin s wazal n 60% n tedrimt.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Ad d-tessuddes tddukkla tadelsant n taddart n Yiɣilt n Teqḍibin n temḍiqt n Iberquɛen, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Mɛatqa, i ibeɛden s wazal n 10 n yikulimitren ɣef tlemmast n tɣiwant, ass n sem, 27 seg waggur n duǧember 2019, assečči n Uɣrib deg Taddart n Yiɣil n Teqḍibin. Akken tuɣ tannumi tddukkla-a s leqdicat-is idelsanen, i yesseḥbibiren ɣef yal ansay yesɛan assaɣ d tgemmi n ugdud aqbayli. Dɣa ansay n Ussečči d yiwen unsay aqbur n taddart-agi, yezdin tagmat n yimazdaɣ n taddart d yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa. Ɣef wanect-a dɣa, ha-tt-an tenced-d tddukkla tadelsant n Yiɣil n Teqḍibin akk imdanen yebɣan ad d-ruḥen ɣer ussečči n Uɣrib, tinnubga i yal yiwen seg rebɛa n tɣumar n ugezdu n Tizi Uzzu. 

  Ali Zalouk
