  Aheggi 

 Qqlut-d timẓin-nni daxel n tmeqqlit alamma uɣalent d tiwraɣin. Mi qqlant timẓin, rnut lḥemmeẓ-nni diɣ kif kif. Ẓdet timẓin-nni, syin sɛeddit awren-nni daxel n uɣerbaz i wakken ad as-kksen yicelman i d-yeggran deg-s. Ternum, daɣen, teẓdem lḥemmeẓ-nni. Sxelḍet tura awren n temẓin d win-nni n lḥemmeẓ. Syin, terrem-as lmelḥ. Tzemrem ad teččem arkul-a s tbexsisin (d asisen). S tezmert-nwen.

 Daya

  
 Mebɛred mi d-yessufeɣ sin yidlisen, yakan de yiseggasen iɛeddan. ‘’L’Algérie au Carrefour’’ anda i i d-yessizreg, deg useggas n 2012, iḍrisen n baba-s Imache Amar i yellan gar tgejda n Umussu aɣelnaw, ladɣa, deg Yitri n Teriqt ugafa (Etoile nord-africaine- ENA), syin yerna yessuffeɣ-d ungal-is amezwaru s uzwel ‘’La mort du vieux chêne’’, deg useggas 2017, ha-t-an yeffeɣ-d udlis-is-nniḍen iwumi yefka isem ‘’Proverbes et dictons kabyles’’, deg taggara n useggas-a 2017. Deg udlis-agi-ines aneggaru, ijmeɛ-d Chabane Imache kra n yinzan mechuren deg tmetti taqbaylit, u yerna-d yessekfel-d kra ur nettwassen ara, inzan i qrib yegren deg tatut. I wakken ad gzun yimdanen, s telqayt, neɣ ad ten-iɛiwen akka ciṭ deg unamek n tenfaliyin-a akked wazal ttawint, yerra-ten-id Chabane Imache ɣer tefrensist, neɣ yefka-asen anamek i yezmir ad yili s tefrensist. Ugar n waya, yerna-d umyaru kra n tedyanin yeḍran deg tmetti i iwala netta zemret ad ilint d amedya deg ttrebga deg tmetti. ‘’Proverbes et dictons kabyles’’, d ammud i d-yeffɣen ɣer tezrigin Numidie , azal-is 300DA. Ilul Chabane Imache deg useggas 1952 deg taddart n At Mesbah deg tɣiwant n At Dwala, lwilya n Tizi Uzzu. Xas ulamma inuda Chabane Imache ad d-yerr ɣer tatut ayen i qrib ad yenger, acu kan amur ameqqran n yinzan akked tenfaliyin i d-yerra s annar, llant yakan deg yidlisen-nniḍen. Tis snat, lukan limer i yeqqin ɣer yal inzi neɣ tanfalit ɣer umezruy-is akked wamek i tt-id-yesnulfa bab-is. Tili, win ara yeɣren adlis, ad yegzi mliḥ anamek n yinzan, ladɣa mi ara nzer amur n yimeɣriyen n tmaziɣt i yellan akka tura, d ilmeẓyen neɣ d inelmaden, ur nesli ara i yinzan-agi srid ɣer yimawlan-nsen. Akken yebɣu yili, adlis-a n Imache Chabane yerna-d ɣer tsekla n tmaziɣt s umata.

  Hocine Moula 

  
  Ha-ta-n wayen i d-nnan  

 Goumeziane Nabila, d tanemhalt n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu 

 « Nebɣa ad nessiweḍ rreḥba-agi n udlis i yimezdaɣ merra n lwilaya-nneɣ, dayen i d aɣ-yeǧǧan ad nexdem ahil d amerkanti deg yimukan n yidles tesɛa lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Dɣa nessekcem rreḥba-agi s leqdicat idelsanen deg 5 n temkerḍiyin n tɣiwanin, iɣerbazen n usegmi, deg wammas adelsan Matoub Lounès…atg. Nexter ad as-nner tajmilt meqqren i urgaz meqqren deg unnar n tira ama dagi deg tmurt n Lezzayer neɣ deg tmura n leǧnas, ula d tajmilt-agi tekcem deg tesmiḍent n tlallit n umaru, n umazray, n umnadi, n umussnaw Mulud Mɛemmri. Ulamma yal aseggas nettara-as tajmilt, maca netta yuklal ugar n waya i lmend n wayen i d-yefka i yidles n tmurt n Leqbayel s wuzig neɣ win n tmurt n Lezzayer s umata. Ad snimreɣ aṭas udmawen n lḥerma i d-yerran i tiɣri-nneɣ, i wakken ad tɛeddi rreḥba-agi deg tegnatin igerrzen, mebla ma ttuɣ imura d tezrigin i d-yerzan seg tamiwin yemxalafen n tmurt, ad snimreɣ daɣen wid i d-yefkan isaragen, akked wid i d-yellan ɣef lmendad n yisikwan i nexdem. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef usentel n rreḥba-agi, nextar-it imi nwala belli asentel-a yedda d leqdicat n usfugel n tesmiḍen n Mulud Mɛemmri, yerna mačči dayen i tzemreḍ ad d-temmeslayeḍ ɣef Dda Lmulud deg 5 n wussan kan. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella waṭas n umaynut deg tezrigt-a tis mraw, nessaram ɣer taggara ad nessiweḍ ɣer yiswi-nneɣ agejdan (asnerni n wazal n udlis deg tmetti-nneɣ).

  Mohamed Abdellah, d amaru i d-yerzan seg Tlemcen 

 «Rziɣ-d i tikkelt tamezwarut ɣer rreḥba-agi Ǧerǧer n udlis dagi deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, iɛǧeb-iyi aṭas lḥal imi walaɣ inelmaden neɣ ilemẓyen qqaren idlisen ladɣa ungalen, ulamma ula d nekk d ilemẓi n 20 n yiseggasen, maca rran-iyi-d asirem warrac-agi. Ssarameɣ ad d-uɣaleɣ aseggas-nniḍen s udlis-nniḍen, ad cekkreɣ aṭas imsuddsen n leqdic-agi, d wid i yi-id-inecden i wakken ad iliɣ gar watmaten-iw imura iqbayliyen.

  Yesteqsa-ten A.A 

  
 Yal tallit-a n ulqaḍ d ubray n uzemmur, yettnekkar-d yiwen n unezgum d ameqqran ɣer wat lmaɛesrat n uzemmur deg ukuẓet n tɣemmar n tmurt. Mi ara yettwajmeɛ dayen zzit sɣur yimsaɣen, yetteggra-d bu lmaɛesra deg leḥsabat imeqqranen i as-d-yesnulfuyen iɣilifen. Ssebba n waya d iɣes n uzemmur i d-yettɣiman d taffa sdat lmaɛesra-s mi ara yekfu ubray. Ur as-d-banen waṭas n yiberdan ɣef wamek ara as-yexdem akken ur yettḍurru tawennaḍt, ur irennu iman-is. Ladɣa imi, ilaq ad d-nesmekti, diri-t ayendin yiɣes-a i wakal d wanda yakk llant ṭṭjur. Seg wakken yesɛa kra n tangiwin tisemmamin, ansi yekka yiɣes-a n uzemmur ad yesreɣ, ad yeǧǧ ayen iḥuza ur yesliḥ i kra. Daymi ur ilaq uḍegger-ines anda i d-yewwi Rebbi kan. D ugur ageɛmir i d-ibanen tallit-a taneggarut, urɛad i as-d-ttwawfent tifrat iwulen, ama sɣur medden neɣ sɣur yinesdabuyen. Neẓra at zik ur d-mugren aɣbel-a, acku ma ur t-serɣen deg ukanun deg tsemhuyt n tegrest, llan xeddmen-t d leɣbar i tbeḥyar. Maca tura mi iɛum lgaz, ulac ikanunen. Mi ttzident tnezduɣin, ulac tbeḥyar. « Nella ntessra-as aṭas iɣes-a n uzemmur. Aha i useḥmu neɣ i leɣbar. Maca tura aseḥmu nesseqdac lgaz, ma d tibeḥyar ur nxeddem imerjaɛ igeɛmura am zik ». I d-tenna yiwet n tmeṭṭut seg Ayt Smaɛel. Ɣer kra n yimussnawen n taɣult, ala allus (recyclage) n yiɣes i ttwalin d ferru i d-yeggran i uɣilif. Ladɣa imi ar tura mačči aṭas i t-iɛerḍen, neɣ xilla n luzinat i yellan, akken ad d-ibin ugemmuḍ-is ma yettsuddu neɣ ala. 

  M. K. 

  
 Aḥric 1

 Zik, yella uγyul n dda Qasi n Tubiret yesdeḥdiḥ γef yiman-is, yettεebbi-as mraw (10) n tikkal deg wass ḥala ma yugi ad yeddem. D awezγi yella melmi i as-yenna ay aqerruy-iw, εeggu ur t-yessin. Imiren, ula mi ara yili dda Qasi gar yimdanen, yettqadar nezzeh, γas ma llan ttmeslayen γef temsal timeqqranin, ulac tagnit neγ taqṣiṭ ideg ur d-yessekcam ara aγyul-is deg umeslay, ḥala yis-s i yettlejlij. Asmi i tent-id-tenna tgecririt-is, γlin icekkaben-is, ur yezmir ara yakk i tuddma, ira ad t-yesenz neγ ad t-yessufeγ seg uxxam. Yenna-as i temγart-is: Ma ur as-d-tefki ara twenza-s win ara t-yaγen ngum amenzu n yennayer, ad t-awiγ metwal Beclul, ad as-ḍelqe&amp;gamma,; ahat ad glun yis-s waεraben-nni n Sṭif yesnuzun taεeṭṭart. Ur stufaγ ara ad ttruẓuγ aqeṛṛu-iw amek d wacu ara yedder umerdiḍ-inna, yerna d tagrest mm ṣṣmaḍiḥ i d-iteddun. Aγyul ageswaḥ, γas akken γlin imeẓẓuγen-is, yesla-as i bab-is d acu i d as-yettheggi. Yenna-as i wul-is, γas akka d aγyul i lli&amp;gamma,; yessefk ad d-afeγ ttawil amek ara rnuγ ussan i d-yeggran di liser. Ala, ala tudert gar Lεelma d Lyacir. Yuker-as i bab-is lγiḍa n teylut d umendayer, yennejla seg udaynin, yeṭṭef abrid n udrar γer Tizi n Kulal, ira ad yettmeddiḥ dinna di tεebbuḍt n Ǧeṛğeṛ, ad d-yessis aγrum-is s yiγallen-is gar imerrayen yetturaren taḥnaccaṭ n udfel di Tigejda. Yewweḍ γer yiwet n tala i d-yusan sdat n taddart n Beclul, yeswa almi d tikli ad yeṭṭerḍeq uεebbuḍ-is, yerfed aqeṛṛuy-is s igenni, iger-d tiγṛi, yessawel: ‘’Ttxil-k, ẓẓel-d afus-ik! Nezga nettwet nessusem. aql-i seddaw tecḍaḍ-ik, ay agellid Belqasem! γas deg-neγ yettu Yillu, ahat XA fell-aγ yesεa ul. S yis-k aṭṭan-iw ad yeḥlu, ay agellid n Beclul’’. Yessuli kan ameslay, yesla i useglef yettaken anzi s anaza&amp;epsilon,; dγa yeḍfer lewhi n wansi i d-yekka wayen i wumi yesla s tikli…  Tettkemmil  

  Seg tsekla taqbaylit 

  
 Amenzu n yennayer d leḥsab n tazwara n useggas ɣer yimaziɣen. Xas ulamma aṭas n yimharsen i iɛeddan ɣef ugdud-a, meɛna aya-gi ur t-yeǧǧi ara akken ad ttun aẓar-nsen d yidles –nsen, neɣ ahat ad mmalen ɣer yidles n imḥarsen i iɛeddan si tmura n umaziɣ. Jjguglen deg wayla-nsen: seg Tegzirin tiknariyin seg umalu ɣer Siwa di Maṣer; seg yilel agrakal seg ugafa arlamma d timura tiberkanin deg unẓul. D tagi i d tamazɣa i yeṭṭfen deg wayla-s. Xas ulamma di tmurt n Lberrani i llan yiqbayliyen anect-a, ur d yuzgi ara d aɛewwiq akken ur sfugulen ara ixef n useggas n yimaziɣen , aṭas n tdukliwin tidelsanin i d-iheggan i tugnit-a, gar tddukkliwin–a, ad nader : tidukla ACBO i yextaren sin yinaẓuren sin n tgejda n cna n teqbaylit , akken ad asen-arren tajmilt wigi d : Sliman Azem akked Cheikh El Hasnaoui , aṭas n wid i yecnan di tmeɣra-a : Agraw Amzik, Cherif Hamani, Malika Yami , Rachid Mesbahi, Lounes Kaci, Kamal Syammour. Yella-d usfugel-a ass n 13 deg yennayer 2018 di Le Château des Rochers n temnadt n OISE. Mi nesteqsa aselway n tddukkla Mass Baaziz Karim ɣef usfugel n yennayer di tmurt n lɣerba ha-t-an wayen i d-yenna : ‘’Nesfugul yennayer am Leqbayel merra, tameddit n wass n 11 deg janvier, nxeddem seksu bu sebɛa yisufar, nettemlili akked leḥbab. Yesɛa leqdic adelsan azal meqqren deg usejhed n tutlayt d yidles, ladɣa di tmura n lɣerba’’. Si tama-nniḍen, tella-d daɣen tddukkla n « Afus deg Ufus » di temnadt n Lille. Iɛeggalen n tdukkla-a, ur zgilen ara tagnit-a akken ad heggin ula d nutni kra n leqdicat i lmend n umenzu n yennayer. Yella-d wahil-nsen s usewjed n seksu akken i d-yella di merra n yixxamen iqbayliyen, am wakken i tella tarbaɛt n yiḍebbalen akked terbaɛt n cdaḥ . Ma yella d tiddukkliwin tidelsanin i yellan di temnadt n Leqbayel, ula d nutenti ur zgilent ara tafaska-a. Nezmer ad d-neder, d amedya, tiddukkla tadelsant Tussna n taddart n Ubizar, ula d nettat texdem ahil s wazal-is imi ass n Sebt 2 deg yennayer 2968 xedmen timsizzelt gar yiɣerbazen ilemmasen: Amatoui Mohammed akked aɣerbaz les frères chouhada Mehala. Tella-d temsizzelt-a, d tajmilt i uselmad d unaẓur Mass Nouredin Ait Sliman, syin ɣer-s, fkan azal i yimedyazen n taddart akken ad ɣren isefra-nsen. Mebla ma ttun tazeqqa n yicewwiqen anda agraw n temɣarin, ṭṭfent leqdic-a. Anect-a, d ayen ara yesbaɛden tatut ɣef yicewwiqen, akken daɣen i d-tella tzeqqa n tira n tfinaɣ i selḥan yiselmaden n tmaziɣt anda ffkan i warrac imecṭaḥ tagnit akken ad lemden tifinaɣ . Yenna-aɣ-d yiwen seg yiɛeggalen n tddukkla d akken: “ tazeqqa-a n tira, nexdem-itt akken ad d-nexlaq assaɣ gar yigerdan akked tira n tmaziɣt taqburt “. Ɣef 11h, tella-d tejmilt i Mass Nouredin Ait Sliman s tillin n uselway n tɣiwant akked yinemhalen n yiɣerbazen. Ma yella tameddit n wass, turar-d terbaɛt n umezgun taceqquft n Muḥya ‘Tacbaylit’’. Tekfa tfaska s ccnawi n yinaẓuren n taddart . Akka ihi i sfuglent tddukkliwin tidelsanin ixef n useggas n Imaziɣen. Mmxallafit wahilen, mmxallafit wadagen anda i d-llan, maca iswi d yiwen, lebɣi d yiwen, ayen yugaren aya d tinekkit ɣer umezruy alqayan n ugdud-a.

  Souhila Yamani 

  
 Macahu tellem cahu, Rebbi ad tt-yesselhu, ad tt-iɣzif annect n usaru.
  Yiwen n wass, yella yiwen n yilemẓi yebɣa yiwet n teqcict ad izweǧ yid-s, maca yemma-s n uqcic, tugi ad as-tt-id texḍeb, acku tebɣa-as tin yellan d yelli-s n umerkanti i wakken ad yesεu tuyat.
  Ihi yal tikkelt, ad as-yini: “a yemma, ruḥ, ḍleb flantiya, yelli-s n leflani”. Ad as-d-terr: “ala, ur d-ttawiɣ ara tinna, d leḥram ma tekcem-d ɣer texxamt-iw”. Asmi d as-tguber yiwet d yelli-s n flan, meḥsub d bu udrim, tewwi-tt-id, lamaεna txelleṣ, acku taqcict, twulef lεez d trika, tura a wid neɣ rḍel-d. Bdant temcukal d ccwal, aḍegal, yenna-asen: “Nekk, fkiɣ-awen taqcict, rniɣ-as-d lmektub-is, maca mačči d lwert ad i yi-twertem”. Akken texdem temɣart d daεwessu. Tenṭeq ɣer mmi-s: “Ammi, amek ara nexdem, tagi ur as-nezmir ara cuṛuṭ-is meqqrit?”. Mmi-s: “A yemma, nniɣ-am d kemm i iḍebbren, amek tura kemm?A yemma, tecfiḍ ɣef tin bɣiɣ zzman a-tt-an tura tezweɣ, thenna, seg tjerreb ddunit tiwweḍ ɣer uxxam-is tεemmeṛ-it, ttif tameṭṭut iḥerzen, tayuga ikerzen, ma d nekk ur d-yewwiɣ tin iḥerzen wala tayuga ikerzen, ḍebber”. Tam$art: “Annaɣ a mmi, nekk ɣileɣ meqqreɣ, sneɣ, ziɣ mazal bdiɣ tussna, armi d tura i fehmeɣ belli lxir mačči d sεaya, lxir d ul”.
  Aqcic: “A yemma, lxir n bab-is”.
    Yahia Yanes 

  
 Ahat mi ara yekcem ugrud i tikkelt tamezwarut ɣer uɣerbaz, ugur-is ameqqran d aɣerbaz s timmad-is. Meskud ad as-yekkes axxam-is i kra n wakud, ad t-yessebɛed seg yirebbi yeḥman n tyemmat d usnefcec-nni n yimawlan. Ilaq kra n wayyuren akken ad yennam unelmad amaynut axxam-is n tmussni-nniḍen i yeqqnen srid ɣer uxxam-is n tnezduɣt.D acu kan, llan wuguren i d-yettbinen umbeɛd, ḍḥan-d d iɛewwiqen i uqcic deg umecwar-is n tɣuri. Amezwaru d taẓayt n uqrab-is, i yettɛeddayen tikwal lqidar n wayen iwumi yezmer d ttɛebga. Ladɣa mi ara yili wahil n uselmed ur yettwaqader akken iwulem sɣur uselmad, neɣ dɣa deg wahil n useggas aɣurbiz i yella wugur. Dinna, yettaf iman-is uqcic yettɛebbi deg uzagur-is ayen swayes ara iɣer sin n wussan, ama s ukukru neɣ s uḥettem. « Ttɣaḍen-iyi nezzeh warrac-a mi ara ten-id-maggreɣ ttɛebbin aqrab qrib yewweḍ-iten-id di teɣzi. Ttwaliɣ ilaq kan ad nbeddel tarrayt n uselmed akken ad nessifsus taɛkemt fell-asen ». D awal n yiwen n ubabat seg Ayt Smaɛel. Yewwi-d ad d-nesmekti d akken ugar n leɛtab iwumi ur neǧmen, taẓayt-nni tezmer ad d-teglu s waṭas n waṭṭanen, gar-asen wid icudden ɣer ujgu n uɛrur. Ugur wis sin i d-yettqabalen anelmad amaynut deg uɣerbaz, d aselmad-is. D ayen yesḥissifen imi d tilawt yellan. Deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel dɣa, i yeggugen s wazal n 65 n yikilumiṭren ɣef Bgayet, aṭas i tesɛa d tinagiwin ɣef kra n yiselmaden ur nessin amek ad gen lxedma-nsen s wudem yelhan. Tikwal d nutni i yettilin d ssebba ma yella ur yeẓwir uqcic deg tɣuri. « Yiwet n tikkelt yekcem-d mmi s axxam itettru. Mi t-steqsaɣ acimi, yenna-yi-d d aselmad-is i t-yegren deg texzant n tneɣrit i xilla n wakud. Ɛni d win i d abrid swayes ara txellseḍ anelmad ma ur yessin neɣ yeɣleḍ di kra? » I aɣ-d-tenna s usḥissef yiwet n tyemmat. Send ad d-ternu: « Seg yimir-nni iɛuf aɣerbaz. Tuɣal-as tneɣrit d rrehba armi yettaggad ad tt-yekcem ». Aṭas n yinelmaden i isebbren deg tsusmi ɣef wayen sɛeddayen d lbaṭṭel deg tneɣrit-nsen. Daymi ilaq ɣef tdukkliwin n yibabaten n warrac, ad ldint ugar allen, ladɣa ma neẓra d akken akk imal n unelmad yeqqen ɣer uselmad.

   M. K. 

  
 Gar yiwellihen uɣur ssawḍen, deg taggara, wid yekkan deg temlilit tagraɣlant i d-thegga tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu ussan 3, 4 d 5 deg waggur-agi n duǧember, ad naf “Asekcem n yiḍrisen n umyaru d umussnaw Mulud Mɛemmri ɣer yidlisen n uɣerbaz azzayri.

 Tebda temlilit-a yewwin azwel ‘’Mouloud Mammeri: une oeurvre multiforme et polyphonique’’ s yisaragen n Mass Saim Bousad akked Mass Hamid Mehdi anda i d-wwin awal ɣef ungal ‘’Tawrirt yettwattun’’ (La Colline oubliée). Ma d tameddit n wass, yezzi wawal ɣef Yisefra n “Si Muḥend U Mḥend: aɛeddi si timawit ɣer tira”…atg. Ass wis sin, nezmer ad nebder asarag n Mass Allalou Med i d-yewwin awal ɣer tmuɣliwin yellan deg ungal “Amezgar’’ (La Traversée) anda i d-yenna belli tella tmuɣli n Wat Umalu akked tmuɣli tineslemt. Ma d Mass Hend Sadi, yemmeslay-d ɣef uhethir yekkren asmi i d-yeffeɣ wungal ‘’Tawrirt yettwattun’’ (La Colline oubliée) anda i t-llumen aṭas n yimdanen imi i d-yemmeslay deg ungal-agi ɣef tedyanin kan yeḍran deg tmurt n leqbayel, yerna ur d-yudir ula d yiwet n tikkelt isem n Lezzayer. Ɣef wakken i d-yenna Mass Hand Sadi, ungal-a, i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 1952, yemgarad akked wungal ‘’Le Sommeil du juste’’, i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 1955, aseggas kan ɣef ṭṭrad n Lezzayer. “Xas ma yella ur d-yudir ara Lezzayer deg ungal “La colline oubliée”, acu kan lmeqsud n Mulud Mɛemmeri iɛedda tilisa n tmurt n leqbayel. Ma d ungal Le Sommeil du juste, yemgarad mliḥ ɣef umezwaru-agi, imi Le Sommeil du juste yeffeɣ-d deg lgirra”, i d-yenna Mass sadi. “Tabrat i Muḥend Azwaw”, tella-d d asentel n tezrawt i d-wwin yiselmaden n tmaziɣt Mass Chemakh akked Boukherouf anda i d-sfehmen taɣessa d tewsit n uḍris-a. Ddeqs n yisaragen-nniḍen i d-yellan ɣef teɣzi n temlilit-a, yecban “Aseḥbiber ɣer tgemmi: abrid yenǧer Mɛemmeri”, sɣur Hamid Bilak, “Snat n tezwarin…”, sɣur Halouane anda i d-yuɣal ɣef umgarad yellan gar tinna yettwarun s tefrensit akked tinna yuran s tamziɣt. “Tinna yuran s tefrensist, tettmeslay-d ɣef wudem ussnan, amek i d-yejmeɛ isefra-nni. Yewwi-d awal Mɛemmeri ɣef tarrayt yesseqdec. Ma seg tama n tezwert n tmaziɣt, yettwellih deg-s Mɛemmeri ɣef useḥbiber n tgemmi”, akka i iwala Mass Halouane. Deg taggara n temlilit, ssuffɣen-d iwellihen-agi: ilaq ad yettili warraz aseklan M.Mɛemmeri, ilaq ad d-tettuɣal temlilit-agi yal aseggas, asizreg n wayen yura akk Mɛemmeri, asekcem n yiḍrisen n Mɛemmeri deg yidlisen n uɣerbaz, asuqel n leqdicat-is. Am wakken, diɣ, bɣan ad yuɣal uxxam-is d asalay. “ Mačči aṭas i yeslan s temlilit-a, acku wid i d-iheggan leqdic-a, ur d sɛelmen ara armi kra kan n tsaɛtin uqbel timlilit-a, mačči kan tikkelt-a, meɛna yal tikkelt mi ara d-illint temliliyin” i d-nnan kra n yinelmaden n tesdawit.

  S.Yamani 

  
 I lmend n tuɣalin-is i usayes ddurt yezrin, yeqbel Mennad ad aɣ-d-yerr i kra n yisteqsiyen, i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Deg Montréal i d-tuɣaleḍ i usayes (scène) seld lɣiba meqqren. Amek i ak-id-tqenneɛ tddukkla Imdukkal n TQ5 ?  
 Mennad: Ur yeshil wara. Ddeqs n wawal i ilḥan gar-aneγ, ɣer taggara, nemsefham d terbaɛt n TQ5 γef tirza-inu γer Montréal. 

  Ad d-yeḍfer waya kra n ttiɛad nniḍen akked uzayez (public) ma yella tufiḍ tignatin igerrzen ?  
 Ur d-qqareγ ara ala ma llant tegnatin n lɛali ideg zemreγ ad d-senfaliγ kra n wayen-nni akk i jemɛeγ iseggasen-agi yezrin.

  Gar sebbat n lɣiba-k, d liḥala iweɛren n unaẓur di tallit-nni. Ma yella d ta kan i d sebba, ur twalaḍ belli tuyseḍ ɣef zik lḥal ?  
 Tɛedda s lekmal taɛecret (décennie) n 80 ur d-mlaleγ d walbaɛḍ ara yi-yesselḥun deg umaḍal n usayes. Dγa uyseɣ, lhiγ-d d wayen-nniḍen.

  Gar yirgazen n yidles i temlaleḍ, yella Dda Lmulud d Muḥya. Awal ɣef wassaɣ-ik akked umaru Ɛmer Mezdad, imi tecniḍ kra n yiḍrisen-is…  
 Nekk d Ɛmer Mezdad nemyussan si tazwara n yiseggasen n 70. Netta yella imir-n d anelmad n tesnujjya di Lezzayer tamaneγt. Ma d nekk lliγ d anelmad n tesnawit. Tessemlalaγ teswiɛt deg temsirin n Dda Lmulud di « La Fac Centrale ». Syin akkin, Ɛmer yettmuddu-yi-d sya γer da iḍrisen i wakken ad ten-cnuγ. Akken-nni armi sawḍeγ ad d-suffγeγ yiwen n walbum di 1980, wis sin di 1983. Deg-sen ddeqs n yisefra-ines.

  Neẓra telliḍ d anemhal n usenfar n usisleg n Nello ɣer teqbaylit. Mmeslay-aɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef waya…  
 D imdebber n tiliẓri BRTV, Mass Muḥemmed Saɛdi, i yi-d-inecden i wakken ad suqleγ γer teqbaylit tiftarin (documents) n wunuγen yettewliwilen, yecban Tristan et Yseult, Nello, Père Castor, atg. Niqal kukraγ, mi bdiγ armud-a, ufiγ d ayen yesɛan azal, iseg ad d-sfaydin yimecṭaḥ-nneγ. Ladγa mi as-ufiγ lbenna.

  Amek twalaḍ ccna n teqbaylit iseggasen-a ineggura ? 
 Walaγ tizlit taqbaylit am akken tulwa. Azayez (le public) s umata yessutur kan ayen isehlen, ladγa imi tuget n yinaẓuren yewwi-ten lmil γer din. D ayen iɣef nezmer ad nesḥissef. Cwi kan llan wid i d-isqeɛden tagnit, am Ɛli Ɛemran, Tenna, Ǧamal Kalun, Tirebbuyaɛ Talsa akked Amzik.

  Ad   ak-nesnemmer. Awal-ik n taggara… 
 Tanemmirt i wid yuzzlen i wakken tuγalin-iw γer uẓawan ad tili d tilawt. Ladγa TQ5, tiliẓri taqbaylit (tazwawt) n Kanada. Ad farṣeγ tagnit i wakken ad ak-d-iniγ i kečč a Mhenni tanemmirt tafwayant γef uxeddim-ik. 
  Yesteqsa-t M. K. 

  
 Yessufeɣ-d ussan-a iɛeddan umaru Yusef Zirem adlis wayeḍ i yura ɣef uɣewwaɣ Lwennas Meɛtub am wakken i t-id-yeqqar dɣa uzwel-is: « Matoub Lounes, la fin tragique d’un poète ». Yeffeɣ-d udlis-a di tmurt n Fransa ass n 14 yunyu yezrin, ɣer tezrigin Fauves Editions. Dɣa, yedda-d deg-s abeɛda umeslay ɣef umecwar n umedyaz, ɣef umennuɣ-is d tmenɣiwt-ines ass n 25 yunyu 1998. Ɣef wawal n umeskar, ad naf deg udlis-a, ugar n tmeddurt yettwafesslen n Lwennas At Lewnis, aṭas n tɣawsiwin-nniḍen werǧin ttwannant-d deg wayen iɛeddan. « Aqeddic-a, tazwara d tajmilt i yiwen i yefkan tudert-is ɣef yidles. D ameslay ɣef umecwar-is akked yineḍruyen imeqqranen i yedder. Daɣen d tasleḍt ɣef tmedyazt-is. D tamuɣli ula ɣef ccraɛ n wid i t-yenɣan ur d-nelli ar ass-a ». I aɣ-d-yenna umeskar, Mass Yusef Zirem. Akka tura, yebda yakan umaru adellel d usissen n udlis-is di Fransa, s uheggi n waṭas n temliliyin tiseklanin. Rnu, ayen i d-ijebden awellih, d mi ṭṭuqqten ayendin wid i d-yettasen ɣer ttiɛadat-a iseklanen, ttaɣen adlis-a amaynut ɣef mmi-s n Tewrirt Musa. « (…) Werǧin yettu Lwennas Meɛtub igellilen. Deg tefsut n useggas n 1997, mi d-yekcem ɣer tmurt i kra n wussan, iwala lmeḥnat n yal ass n uɣref. « Mlaleɣ-d dinna taɣlayt n yisafaren d tudert, imdanen ur nezmir ad kksen laẓ i yiman-nsen. Yella kra seg kullec maca s ssuma ɣlayit, ihi ur rzan medden merra. Iɣeblan-a ad ilin deffir waṭas n tɣawsiwin ur nelhi, akked taluft-a n rrebrab i yessidir udabu », i d-yenna s ttbut, i uneɣmas Mestafa Harzun ». Aya d ciṭṭuḥ i nezmer ad nɣer seg udlis-a. Ilul Yusef Zirem di Tmurt n leqbayel, aseggas n 1964. D aneɣmas, d amaru i d-yessekren tamrawt n yidlisen ar tura, seg-sen ad d-nebder Les enfants du brouillard (Arrac n wagu), La vie est un grand mensonge (Tudert d tikerkest tameqqrant), Histoire de Kabylie (Amezruy n tmurt n leqbayel), akked l’Homme qui n’avait rien compris (Amdan ur negzi acemma).

  M. K. 

  
 Ɣas ma tewɛer tudert n yiɣriben deg tmura tiberraniyin, maca llan wid yesseɣlaben ɣef yiɛewwiqen akken ad d-sbeggnen imanen-nsen d lasel ladɣa. D ameslay ɣef Tdukkla Tadelsant n Yimaziɣen n Biljik i d-ilulen deg useggas n 1990, i d-yekkren i leqdic ɣef wayen yeɛnan idles aqbayli, neɣ amaziɣ s umata. Tidukkla-a, ulamma lawan-nni xussen maḍi ttawilat, tella tuggdi, ulac laman, wannag iɛeggalen-is Izwawen, ddmen acqirrew berra n wakal-nsen, armi ssawḍen snulfan-tt-id s lebɣi ameqqran d tayri tazedgant i ttawin i yidim d tmagit. Amecwar n wugar n 27 n yiseggasen i d-telḥa tdukkla tadelsant n Yimaziɣen n Biljik, yeččur d leqdicat iwennɛen, d tijmilin i d-yesmektayen, akked usnulfu yettqenniɛen. Aya, dɣa, yeǧǧa isem-is ad yettwassen, ad yessisen idles aqbayli d unsay-is i Yibiljikiyen. D ayen i tt-yeǧǧan daɣen, ar ass-a, tettkemmil tikli-s deg tmurt-nni n Biljik, anda ttidiren waṭas n Yimaziɣen. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer leqdicat n tdukkla-a, ad d-nebder ttiɛadat i tesfuggul, am umenzu n yennayer d usmekti n tefsut n yimaziɣen i d-yettilin yal 20 deg yebrir. Nnig yiqeddicen-a d wiyaḍ, Tidukkla Tadelsant n Yimaziɣen n Biljik, tger deg usnerni n umaynut i yellan d asufeɣ n tesɣunt n yiḍrisen s teqbaylit d tefransist, iwumi fkan azwel « Tiziri ». S tikkin n wid iḥemmlen ad ddmen imru deg uceyyeɛ n yiḍrisen-nsen ɣer tansa n tdukkla, tebda tneggarut-a, deg useggas n 1995, tessufuɣ-d yal akaraḍyur tasɣunt-a mm 56 n yisebtar, ideg llan qeddac n yisenfan d yisental n yiḍrisen, am tmucuha, isefra, iḥricen seg wungalen, amezruy, tasnilest, tasertit, atg. War ma nettu tallelt n tedrimt i tufa daɣen ɣur yimekkiyen d Yimaziɣen i yettidiren di Biljik, i iɛerḍen ad fken afus n temɛawna s wayen iwumu zemren. Dɣa, ussan-a iɛeddan kan, yeffeɣ-d wuṭṭun wis 90, amezwaru deg useggas-a amaynut, n tesɣunt-nni i yettnuzun kan deg Biljik. Ma ɣef wid i tt-yebɣan deg tmurt n Yiqbayliyen, neɣ anda-nniḍen, yenna-d Mass Crif Ḥamdis, aselway n tdukkla tadelsant n Yimaziɣen n Biljik: « win yebɣan “Tiziri” yezmer ad d-yekcem ɣer ɣur-neɣ. Ma d wid ur nebɣi ara tiddukla-nneɣ, ilaq fell-as ad ixelles yiwen n unnezdi (abonnement) deg useggas akken ad tt-yekseb». Wid iran ad yekki s yiḍrisen-is deg tesɣunt i d-iteddun, neɣ ad d-yawi ugar n yisallen fell-as ɣef tdukkkla tadelsant n Yimaziɣen n Biljik, yezmer ad yazen ɣer tansa-a: “<a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="bad9d2dfc8d3dc94d2dbd7ded3c9fac9d1c3d4dfce94d8df" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a>”. Nessaram teɣzi n tudert i tdukkla tadelsant n Yimaziɣen n Biljik. Seg zik win iḥemmlen lasel d awezɣi s wayeḍ ad t-ibeddel, anda yedda, ad yettwaɛqel.

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Ɣef wakken yuzel wawal, ussan-agi kan iɛeddan, nnan-d d akken ufan-d yiwen usebdad amaziɣ i yellan, yakan, 300 n yiseggasen-aya uqbel talallit n Ɛisa.

 Tifin-a, tella-d deg taddart Amalu i d-yezgan deg Wat Ɛisa Mimun, tama n Wat Wagennun, lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Xas ulamma tettwassen tamnaḍt-agi deg uḥric n trikkisent (archéologie) imi ayendin n yisebdad-nniḍen iqburen akked later n umezruy i d-ufan seg waṭas n tamiwin, yecban Tarihant, Afir, Tigzirt, Ifri,…atg, acu kan,llan wid ur numin ara s tifin-agi taneggarut. Ur uminen ara belli d asebdad i d-izeggren lweqt seg 300 n yiseggasen uqbel talallit n Ɛisa ar tura. Ihi, i wakken ad nwali ugar deg temsalt-agi, nesteqsa Ali Hadjaz imi d netta i d-yessuffɣen isalli, s wudem unsib, ɣer unnar. Ha-t-an wacu i aɣ-d-yenna :’’ Asebdad-agi, yufa-t-id yiwen yilemẓi, Amar Boussad, n taddart Amalu, seg tama n At Ɛisa Mimun, deg Wat Wagennun, deg waggur n unbir 2017. Acu kan, ur as-yefki ara ccan i yuklal. Ur yeẓri ara, ahat, azal i yesɛa usebdad-agi. Ihi, yejmeɛ-it deg uxxam. Yexdem-as kra n ttsawir, syin yessuzer-itent deg Facebook. Ɣas akken, meɛna ulac win yerran ddehn-is d akken d asebdad ajdid i d-yettwafen. Tkemmel teswiɛt armi d yiwen wass, mi d-yewwi uqcic-agi la carte mémoire i wakken ad as-d-yessuffeɣ mmi tteswirat deg usdudyu-inu. Mi yettnadi deg tteswirat, yufa tteswira n usebdad-agi. Yesteqsa-t, yerra-as-d belli dbtifin i t-yufa deg temnaḍt-nni-nsen. Mi yesla mmi i tedyant-a, yenna-as i lukan ad as-iniɣ i baba ɣef wanect-a imi netta yettnadi deg uḥric-agi n umezruy akked yidles ? Ha-t-an amek i yi-d-yewweḍ lexbar n usebdad-agi’’. Syin, ikemmel Ali Hadjaz anadi-ines i wakken ad yegzu ugar s temsalt-a, ladɣa imi yella yakan d amnadi deg uḥric-agi n uẓarmezruy n tama-gi n Wat Wagennun. Iruḥ ɣer win i d-yufan asebdad-a, yebda isteqsiyen ɣef ttbut n usebdad. ‘’Ruḥeɣ, zriɣ-d win uɣur yella usebdad. Aya yella-d deg waggur n maggu iɛeddan, deg Remḍan. Ihi, mi twalaɣ, teṭṭef-iyi tawla, ferḥeɣ dayen kan. Nekk yettnadin deg uḥric-agi i ixedmen asaru Taqbilt ɣef lecɣal-agi, zriɣ azal-is. Acu kan, mazal ttbut ɣef tilin-is ma n tidet neɣ ala. Nwala amussnaw n tsekkisent Mass Kaci Hamdad, s yisem-is d anemhal deg uḥric-agi deg Tigzirt, iwekked-d d akken d asendad aḥeqqani n tallit 300 n yiseggasen uqbel tallalit n Ɛisa. Aya, yenna-t-id s wudem unsib ass-nni n 25 junyu iɛeddan. Yezmer ɛad ad yili d agelli Mass Qba i yettwassnen deg umezruy seg tama-agi n Trihant, taɣiwant n Buǧimaɛ’’. Ma ɣef wayen ara xedmen sya d afella, yenna-d Mass Hadjaz : ‘’Aql-aɣ nessaɛlem tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Nemmeslay yid-sen i wakken ad nwali amek i d laqrar n usebdad-agi’’. Sya ar d-yessali uɣenja ayen yellan deg tasilt, nessaram kan ur d-iɣelli ara usebdad-agi gar yifassen n wid i ten-yessidrigen, neɣ wid i ten-yesnuzun i usalay aberrani. 

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Simmal i d-yettbin di tallit-a tamirant amek yettarra umdan tasreṭ gar tmentilin i yeskarayen amennuɣ, deg wayen ara tili d tin i d-yettawin talwit si yal tama. 

 Dɣa, ussan-a ineggura di taddart n Tregragt, taɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, qrib nnuɣen kra n yimẓulla akked limam n lǧamaɛ mi d-yecceḍ deg uxṭab ansayan i d-yettawi. Ɣef wakken i d-tenna teɣbalut-nneɣ, yekcem limam deg taluft n nnekwa d tutlayt armi yenna ur ilaq asiwel n « Azul » deg wadeg n sslam n Waɛraben. 

 Aṭas i d-yeffɣen imir-nni d imẓulla seg lǧamaɛ, imi ḥulfan ttwaḥazen deg yiseɣ d tillit-nsen, rnu llan bɣan tazwara ad ssutren aṭixxer n limam-a. «Zik mi tuɣ lecyux d at taddart i ten-id-yesbeddayen, ur ttekcamen di kra n tlufa i yerzan nnekwa d lasel. Ma d tura imi tekcem tsertit di ddin, d awanek i ten-yettxellisen, yal tikkelt amaynut i d-ttawin, neɣ tikti i bɣan ad zerɛen», i d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ seg Ayt Smaɛel. 

 Ad d-nerr awellih d akken amcubbek gar ccix n lǧamaɛ d yimẓulla ur yelli d amaynut deg Ayt Smaɛel d tuddar-is. Ugar n wayen i d-yellan taggara-a di taddart n Ayt Tɛisiwt, mi d-tekker yiwet n terbaɛt i yellan mgal ccix aqbur tebna lǧamaɛ d amaynut, ad d-nesmekti daɣen amennuɣ-nni i d-yeḍran di Tregragt, deg useggas n 2015, gar terbaɛt i yellan mgal ccix n lǧamaɛ « Al huda », d terbaɛt i yellan yid-s. 

 Lawan-nni, sutren kra n yimdanen deg Tenmehla n tlufa n ddin ad asen-tbeddel liman wayeḍ. Di leɛḍil ad d-uɣalent tjemmuyaɛ ara iqeɛɛden tikli n tmetti, nettwali ur d-wwin leǧwamaɛ aseggem-nni meskud amdan yeffeɣ i ubrid. 
  M. K. 

  
 Ahat tɛedda twinest n tuffɣiwin i d-ihegga, ar ass-a, Ugraw n yiḥewwasen n Uweqqas ɣer waṭas n yimeḍqan yemgaraden n yidurar n Tmurt Taqbaylit abeɛda. Dɣa, yessuddes-d Ugraw-a, ddurt yezrin, yiwet n tuffɣa tamaynut ɣer yidurar n tɣiwanin n Temriǧt d Yiderginen. Tikli i gan yimekkiyen ɣef uḍar tɛedda ahat 22 n yikilumitren di teɣzi, imi tebda seg temnaḍt n Temriǧt, teḥbes deg tin n Yiderginen. Ula d iɛeggalen d yimeltaɣen n tddukkla « Alto anaddal n Skikda » llan d inebgawen n tirza-a, imi d-usan deg 42 deg-sen. 

 Dɣa, kkren-as yiḥewwasen i uḥerrek seg taddart n Ɛekkac, di tɣiwant n Temriǧt, ṭṭfen syin abrid deg yiberdan n yidurar armi d-subben deg taddart tabaḥant n Ayt Felkay. Din, furṣen tagnit wid itteddun, ad d-ɛeddin seg yimazzaren icebḥen i inuḥen deg temnaḍt-nni. Am yal tikkelt, ulamma tella tewɛer ɣef kra gar usawen d ukessar, tesmurres tuffaɣa-a-nniḍen n Ugraw n yiḥewwasen n Uweqqas, deg tegnatin n tumert, lebɣi d teḍsa. D ayen i yezmer ad d-yessenfali ḥedd deg urebbi n ugama d ccbaḥa i d-ttakkent tugniwin i wallen n yimedduyen. Ayen i d-ijebden daɣen ddhen di ttiɛad-a, d mi yekki ula d yiwen n uḥewwas n Skikda i yessawḍen 79 n yiseggasen di tmeddurt-is. Seld aḥewwes-a s adrar, ɛeggnen-d yakan yimheggiyen i wid yeṭṭafaren armuden-nsen s tuffɣa-nniḍen ɣer Tgemmunt d Buxlifa, anda ara ɛeddin seg Taɛzibt armi d Ayt Genduz.

  M. K.   

  
 D leqdic i d-thegga tddukkla tadelsant Taflest n Tizi Uzzu s tallelt n Wammas n Lhu Ussnan (CLS) n Tizi Uzzu, ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan. 

 Yebda iḍelli n lḥed, 30 yulyu 2019, ad ikemmel ass-agi n letnayen, 1 yulyu 2019, deg Wammas n Lhu Ussnan n Tizi Uzzu. Aṭas n leqdicat idelsanen i d-yettilin deg-s, gar-asen timsikniyin ɣef tudert d yimuhal n bab n tejmilt-agi Tahar Ousseddik. 

 Ɣer tama n temsizzelt n tmedyazt yettwasrekben (montage poétique), ad ilin yisaragen n yimsirgen-agi: Abdenour Abdeslam, Helouan Hachene, Bilak Hamid, Abdennbi Ramdhan akked Chemakh Said. Deffir n usarag-agi kan, yella-d usenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen uran yimsirgen-agi. 

 Ma d inebgawen n lḥerma n tfaska-agi d acennay ameqqran Taleb Tahar akked umedyaz Ahcene Mariche. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti kan belli Tahar Ousseddik, ilul ass n, 20 yennayer 1913, deg Sidi Naamane (Tigzirt), yemmut ass n, 26 tuber 1994, deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt. Yella d aselmad i wacḥal d aseggas, yuɣal d amaswaḍ, yexdem daɣen deg tkadimt n Lezzayer. 

 Di tira, yeǧǧa-d: Llala Fatma n Summer, Les poulains de la liberté, Oumeri, Si Smail, La Berberie…
  Gh. A.

Tuqqsa n tizit-agi, ur temgarad ara ɣef tin n tizit menwala, maca tizit taksilt tetteqqes kan deg uzal, yerna tezmer ad tneqqel aṭtanen yettwasnen s yismawen “Chikungunya”, “La dengue” d “Zika” i d-yettaken tawla taqehrit d uqraḥ meqqren n lḥekkat…

 tiqessulin ddaw lemḥabes s yijdi (rrmel) i ibezgen i wakken ad tesgunfum merra anebdu.

  Tala Umaziɣ 

  
 Mbeɛd mi yeqqim usinaryu n usaru azal n 30 n yiseggasen-agi, segmi yewjed, tura yewweḍ-d lweqt-is i wakken ad yuɣal d asaru. 

 Asinaryu-agi, i yura Mohamed Mouzaoui acḥal-aya, yebda-t umseḍru-agi ass-nni n ssebt 19 yennayer 2019. Ad yili deg taddart n Lǧemɛa n Ssariǧ, deg tɣiwant n Meqleɛ deg Tizi Uzzu. Ad yili usaru-agi ɣef tudert d tẓuri n umedyaz aqbur Si Muḥend U Mḥend. 

 Asnulfu n warraz aɣelnaw Si Muḥend U Mḥend 
 Yetturaǧu ad d-yenulfu warraz aɣelnaw n tmedyazt tamaziɣt, ara yilin d tajmilt i umedyaz mucaɛen deg tsekla tamaziɣt, wagi d Si Muḥed U Mḥend (tamedyazt tamaziɣt gar tensayit d tetrarit). Tlul-d tikti-agi, deg temlilit tis snat ɣef tsekla tamaziɣt i d yeḍran di Bumerdas, anida i d-nnan yimsuddsen n temlilit-agi, ad yettunefk yal aseggas deg tmeɣra n usfugel n yennayer. Yetturaǧu ad tebdu temsizzelt-agi n warraz n Si Muḥend U Mḥend, deg tallit i d-iteddun.

 Tudert n umedyaz Si Muḥend u Mḥend 
 Ilul gar useggas n 1940 d useggasn 1945, deg taddart Icerɛiwen, taɣiwant n Tizi Raced, ladayra n Lareɛa Nat Yiraten. Yella d amedyaz, d afsiḥ ɣef sin n leɛrac. Yettwassen aṭas s talɣa-nni n yisefra-s (9 n yifyar, A/A/B). Yemmut ass n 28 duǧember 1905 deg Ɛin Lḥemmam.

<p style="text-align:right">  A. A. 

  
 Ttunefken-d yigemmaḍ n tsestant-a ass n larebɛa deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt s tilin n Tuddsa n yiɣlanen yeddukklen.

 Tbeggen-d yiwet n tsestant neɣ n tezrawt taɣelnawt i iga Uɣlif n tdawsa, s lemɛwna n Tuddsa tanmaḍalt n tdawsa, belli deg tallit n 2016-2017, ugar n 14% seg yizzayriyen, yesɛan gar 18 d 69 n yiseggasen, sɛan aṭṭan n ssker. « Agemmuḍ n waṭṭan n ssker yella 8% deg useggas n 2003, s akkin yewweḍ ɣer 10% deg 2012. Ma deg useggas iɛeddan 2017, yewweḍ ɣer 14% », ɣef wakken ay d-nnan yigemmaḍ n tsestant i d-yellan ɣef tmekkest (wid iɣef xeddmen tasastent-a) n 7450 n yimdanen i d-yettgensisen (yettmetilen) timnaḍin yemgeraden n tmurt n lezzayer. Yerna tuget deg-sen d wid yesɛan gar 18 ar 69 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-nsen. Ttunefken-d yigemmaḍ n tsestant-a ass n larebɛa deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt s tilin n Tuddsa n Yiɣlanen Yeddukklen. Yella-d waya i lmend n Wass amaḍlan n waṭṭan n ssker ay sfugulen yal 14 unbir. Ɣef leḥsab n tsestant-a, 53,5% seg wid i yettwattren (iɣef xedmen tasastent-a) werǧin qassen ssker-nsen uqbel. Ma 29,7% seg yimuḍinen n waṭṭan-agi, ttdawin s tensulin, ma d 78,2% ttdawin s yisafaren n tissit. Am wakken daɣen i d-yenna wulɣu-agi, belli llant 8 n tmental neɣ ssebbat tigejdanin n waṭṭan-agi deg tmurt n Lezzayer.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 I lmend n tmeɣra n taggara n useggas aɣurbiz, tefka, ddurt iɛeddan, tddukkla Summam Aqbu arrazen i yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg ukayad n BAC. Deg temlilit-a, diɣ, fursen yimsuddsen i wakken ad snemmren tanelmadt Lisya Benali i d-yewwi 20/20 deg tmaziɣt. D tanelmadt n taddart Iɛezzunen, yeqqaren deg tesnawit Debbih Cherif n Uqbu. D tikelt tamezwarut deg umezruy di tmurt n lezzayer ara tuɣal tejmilt i unelmad i d-yewwin agemmuḍ deg yikayaden n tutlayt tayemmat di tmurt n leqbayel. Aya mebla ccek, d ayen ara yernun di ccan n tutlyat tayemmat , d asurif ɣer sdat. “Ferḥaɣ aṭas aṭas imi wwiɣ arraz-agi, xas akken ferḥaɣ asmi i d-fɣen yigemmaḍ n BAC imi i d-yedda yisem-iw, maca lferḥ n wass-a yugar-it, imi di tutlayt-iw i deg i d-ufrareɣ, wa ad snemmreɣ aṭas aṭas amyaru n teqbaylit Amar Mezdad i yi-d-yuznen arraz-nniḍen i ɣef ur bniɣ ara ’’, i d-tenna tnelmadt Lisya . War ccek , azal i fkan yimḍebbren d yimɛinen n tddukkla Summam Aqbu, ad yesnerni di lebɣi n yinelmaden, wa ad d-yejbed lwelha-nsen ugar i wakken ad d-ttifriren yal aseggas deg yikayaden n tmaziɣt deg yiswiren yemxalfen. Ar taggara, ad d-nesmekti iɣerbazen i d-yufraren aseggas-agi di lwilaya n Bgayet ama di BEM ama di BAC d wid anda inelmaden i sɛeddan akayad n tmaziɣt.

  B. Benhamouche 

  
 Newwi-d, tikkelt-a, awal ɣef umawal n tfizikt s teqbaylit akked kra n temsal deg umahil-is .

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> (Aḥric wis sin) </span>

  Neẓra-k tezgiḍ tesseqdaceḍ amawal n tfizikt s teqbaylit. Ɣef leḥsab-ik, nezmer ad nesselmed yis-s tanga-a (matière) lemmer yella lebɣi asertan? 

 D tidet. Maca, ayen? Acku imir ara as-dhuɣ di kra n temsalt n tfizikt, friɣ d yiman-iw d akken ssiffiyeɣ-tt s teqbaylit, selṭeɣ-tt s tmeẓla tussnant (logique scientifique) yebnan ɣef yisuraf i lemdeɣ si temẓi-w, teddun s tmuɣli taqbaylit. Ma nga asurif, nesnefli-d kra n yirmawen ussnanen imaynuten s teqbaylit, ur tufiḍ acu n umgarad yellan gar uselmed n tfizikt s teglizit, taṭelyanit, tafṛansist neɣ taɛrabt. D tafizikt i nla ad tt-nesselmed s teqbaylit. Ma d ayen icudden ɣer wuguren yerzan tasertit, yif-it ur tekkseɣ ara tayerrist n uyeddid-agi, iɣef ma kkreɣ ad d-ffiɣ deg-s, ad d-yemmir wakali ɣef tikkelt! Ur ntess, ur ntekkes fad ɣef yilsawen-nneɣ. Ur nessawaḍ tadiwennit-agi ɣer yiswi i as-d-nbudd mi tt-id-nebda tazwara.

  Tettwaliḍ d akken tiẓri   n tallunt-akud n Anecṭayen   ur d-yettili ara ubeddel   deg-s ɣer sdat? 

 Tafizikt, neɣ tussna s umata, mačči d “Adlis n Rebbi”! Simmal yettmiri wakud, tezzint, ttbeddilent tilla. Simmal tettaẓ ugar tussna-nneɣ n ugama, simmal tettifrir tagut i aɣ-yedlen allen, tettizdig tmuɣli-nneɣ ɣer Umeɣrad i lmend n tmussni tamaynut i d-yefrurin deg unnar n unadi ussnan. Akka dɣa, deg tallit-nni n teglest, llan yimdanen nwan d akken Akal (ddunit) d taleffast, tweṭṭa, teɣwes am unnar n userwet. Ur telli ara d tagnunnayt (sphérique) am wakken i neẓra ass-a. Yerna tella tres ɣef uzagur n ujeɣlal n kra n yifker azeɛluk! Ass-a, nettaḍsa mi ara d-nebder tamuɣli-a. Yak akka! Maca imir-nni, tedda am tussna n wass-a. Ihi ula d tussna-nneɣ n umaḍal d Umeɣrad ass-a, xas ulamma tefruri, teflali, tuẓa ɣer sdat, tbeddel ayendin, mačči drus. Maca i mazal-as! Rniɣ, smektiɣ-d d akken ula d Albert Einstein s timmad-is, imi t-id-tbedreḍ, yella yettwali belli tallunt-akud d tudmist (statique). Meḥsub d tamagant (inerte). D ayen maḍi i t-yewwin ad yeg agul-ines ameqqran, swayes yessḥassef ayendin ɣer taggara, ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna netta s timmad-is! Ihi, taggara n waya, nniɣ-d d akken tafizikt d tussna takusmulujit akked tesṭrufizikt, akken i tezga tettifrir, tettbeddil ayendin segmi yebda umezruy n talsa, i tezmer ad tfal ugar i tlisa n tizi n wass-a ɣer sdat.

  Yadra tesɛam kra n yisenfaren ucriken lwaḥid? 

 Tiktiwin llant, mačči d yiwet! Tazmert-nneɣ tefti. Ad neḥmed Rebbi, iɣallen, zgan xemmlen i yiseɣ. Maca nuɣ-itent deg lexsaṣ n wallalen d tedrimt. Skud urɛad bedden yisulas n tmurt-nneɣ. Ur tettafeḍ ara tamurt n Lezzayer ad ak-tɛiwen deg yisurifen yecban wigi, xas d ayen fessusen i as-nessutur. Acku teẓram d akken di tallit-agi deg i d-neggra, d idrimen i yessedduyen isenfaren. Tazmert kan s timmad-is ur tessawaḍ ara. Nekk si tama-w, akked kra n yimussnawen Iqbayliyen (Mass Ḥamid Ayt Ɛebderraḥim, Mass Muḥend Tilmatin…) nessussi annar iseggasen-agi ineggura i yiwet n tekti n usbeddi n wayen iwumi semmaɣ « Tasbeddit Taqbaylit i Tussna » (Fondation Kabyle des Sciences). Ahat amer ad taɣ ɣer sdat. Xas ulamma aṭas n yimussnawen Iqbayliyen mazal am wakken ttkukrun, ggaren aḍar ɣer deffir, imir kan slan i wawal-agi n « Taqbaylit! ». Ayen i ttaggaden iman-nsen, am wakken yeqqar umedyaz Lewnis At Mengellat? D ayen yessewhamen ayendin mačči drus! Madjid, si tama-s diɣen, ha-t-an iger-d yiwen n usenfar yecban wagi. Nemsawal ussan yezrin i lmend n temsalt-a. Nniɣ-as yessefk ad nezdi armud-nneɣ amer tikkelt-a, ad naf imassanen Iqbayliyen-nniḍen ara d-yerren i tiɣri-nneɣ. Imi ass yecban ass-a, tedda tekti-a n usnefli n tussna taqbaylit ugar n yiseggassen-nni yezrin. Ad iban.

  Tanemmirt a Mass Deḥman At Ɛli ɣef tririyin-a. Amek tebɣiḍ ad tt-nseqqef? 

 Ad ak-d-alseɣ, ad ak-snemmreɣ keččini a Mhenni Xalifi mi yi-d-tefkiḍ tagnit-agi i wakken ad ssiwdeɣ izen-a i yinelmaden iqbayliyen d warraw n tmurt-iw, d yimeɣriyen n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen, d yiqeddacen d yineɣmassen-is s umata. Buddeɣ-awen afud igerzen, d usiweḍ deg umecwar i yal yiwen. Ad nfakk, neɣ ad tt-nseqqef am wakken i d-tennid. S tekti-agi. nettimɣur, nettaẓ di leɛmer, tettnerni tmussni-nneɣ i lmend n tɣuri d unadi-nneɣ, d uselmed i d-nettawi mačči kan sɣur yibabaten-nneɣ. Maca, ula sɣur warraw-nneɣ xas ulamma d imeẓyanen. Am wakken i t-id-yenna yiwen n ufiluẓuf amassan: « Tussna d ayen yesselmad baba-s i mmi-s, ma d tatiknulujit d ayen yemmal mmi-s i baba-s »! Ar tayeḍ, di lehna.

  Yesteqsa-t Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Tasebḥit n wass n ahad yezrin, tendeh yiwet n tmes meqqren deg yiwen n lluzin n zznad (les batteries) deg tama n Marsa Lḥeǧǧaǧ, asun n Beṭṭiwa. Limer mačči d imsexsiyen i d-yegren iman-nsen di lawan, tili yeḍra-d ubaxix, iḥun Rebbi kan ur d-llint ara akk lexsarat deg terwiḥin. Lluzin-a, ad tesɛu azal n 1 500 m2. Tezga-d swaswa deg taddart iwumi qqaren Ǧfafla. Seg tama-s, teldi terbaɛt n tɣellist d temsulta yiwen unadi akken ara d-tban tmentilt n txessart-a.

   Khaled. A 

  
 Tettwaḥsab tɣiwant n Souk El-Ténine, yetabaɛen ɣer dayra n Lemɛatqa, i d-yezgan deg unzul n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, d yiwet n tɣiwanin gar tɣiwanin yettwattun ɣer yidis n tnigas, taɣiwant n Lemɛatqa.

 Tesɛa tɣiwant-agi azal n 15 000 n yimezdaɣ, iferqen ɣef sebɛa n tudrin, aṭas n lexsas i yellan deg temḍiqt-agi n leqbayel, deg yal aḥric n tudert. Ladɣa deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura, anda ur ttujerden ara isenfar n unegmu, ala asenfar n lebni n temkarḍit n tɣiwant d usenfar n lebni n lbusta. Mazal ar ass-a urɛad kkfan, rnu, ɣef waya, aɣbel n tesmaččiyin n yiɣerbazen imenza ur nebdi ara asewwi, ɣas ma tanmeḥla n usegmi, tuɣal deg rray i-d-teddem deg leblan yeɛnan aneḥbus n tesmaččiyin n yiɣerbazen imenza, s sebba n taluft n tedrimt i iḥuzan tadamsa n tmurt. 

  Taɣiwant mebla lgaz n temdint 

 Deg tegres i icuban tagi, anda asemmiḍ la igezzem iḍarren, deg yiwen n wakud anda tuget n tudrin deg tmurt n leqbayel, sɛant lgaz n temdint ula d tid yellan deg tɣaltin n yidurar ; deg yiwet n teswiɛt anda amḍan n tudrin ideg yecɛel lgaz ugar n 75% deg ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu, maca imezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Souk El Ténine, mazal ar tura urɛad yecɛil ɣur-sen lgaz n temdint. Ula deg tlemmast n tɣiwant, ala tudrin n Tiɣilt Maḥmud, Agni n Wufal d At Izzid ideg yella, ɣas ma ur iḥuza ara tuget n tnezduɣin n tudrin-agi. Alaḥsab n yisalli anegaru i d-fkan srabes teɛna temsalt n taɣiwant n Souk El-Ténine, wekden-d d akken lgaz n temdint, yennul kan 30% n tnezduɣin n tɣiwant. Aɣbel-nniḍen i iḥuzan tamḍiqt-agi, d asenfar n trisiti, anda llant ar ass-a kra n tnezduɣin deg tuddrin ur nekcim ara, ladɣa tinezduɣin timaynutin akked tid yellan deg temḍiqin yeffɣen ɣef taddart. Ma dayen yeɛnan tiftin n tzayazt ( éclairage public) deg tlemmast n tɣiwant yakan, llan yibardan ur tent-nesɛi ara ar ass-a. Dɣa ula deg kra n tudrin ur sɛin ara tiftilin.

  Tarawnat (anarchie) deg tlemmast n tɣiwant 

 Ɣas ma yella-d yakan yiwen n usenfar n useqqɛed n wudem n tɣiwant deg useggas n 2013, maca xemsa n yiseggasen seld asenfar-agi, acemma ur yessefraḥ deg tɣiwant, imi mazal ar tura kra n temḍiqin deg tlemmast n tɣiwant mebla aseqqɛed ama deg wayen yeɛnan iberdan neɣ iqadusen n waman n ugeffur d waṭas n temsal-nniḍen i iɛeggben anegmu deg tɣiwant. Timḍiqin n tzegzuwt, d yimukan n ustaɛfu urǧin llan deg wahil n tɣiwant, dɣa ula d tiḥuna tiqdimin i d-yefkan yir udem i tɣiwant, mazal urɛad twahuddent. Ula d aɣbel n uɣlaq n yibardan s seba n yir aselḥu n tḥuna-agi , d tuget n imsebriden yesɛan tikerwas. Dɣa taluft tettzad deg wussan n suq. I wakken ad tɛeddiḍ deg tlemmast n tɣiwant, ilaq ad tesɛuḍ sber meqqren, ladɣa ma yella mlilen-d sin n yikumya imeqranen. Tawaɣit-nniḍen, tcudd ɣer liḥala n wwid yesnuzun ɣer rrif n yiberdani ten-ittaɣlaqen s sselɛa-nsen. Ɣas ma ttwabnant tḥuna i widak-agi, maca ugin ad senzen deg-sent, ayen ibeddlen udem i teùdint-agi. Iɣab ula d aḥric n laman deg tamḍiqt-agi n leqbayel, dɣa tikarḍiwin, lbiɛ n lehyuf d crab deg yiberden, d ayen i d-igellun s yibaxixen yemxalafen, takarḍa n tḥuna, d takarḍa n yimdanen d waṭas n tlufa-nniḍen yettḥazen taɣiwant-agi.

  Taɣiwant mebla annar d tzeɣwa n waddal    

  Uysen yilmeẓyen n Souk-El Ténine seg yir liḥala n temɛict ideg i ttidiren. Ula d annar-nni n ddabex uḍar i d-yezgan deg umḍiq iwum qqaren Ifekran, anda llan tturaren, yettunefk i usenfar n lebni n sbiṭer, ur yebdin ara ar ass-a. Tiddukliwin d trebuyaɛ n ddabex uḍar, ur ufint ara anda ara urarent. Tuget deg-sent, turarent deg tɣiwanin-nniḍen. D ayen ur yezmir umdan ad yales imi tuqtent tlufa deg temḍiqt-agi n leqbayel, ama d ayen yeɛnan aḥric n yidles ur nsɛi amkan, ama d ayen yaɛnan aseḥbiber ɣef ugama d tezdeg. Dɣa, lxedma ur telli ara, akk, imi tuget n yimdanen, ttruḥun ɣer temdinin timeqqranin akken ad nadin axeddim. Iḥi tiɣri n yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant i yimḍebbren teɛna tamsalt i useqqɛed n liḥala n tɣiwant-nsen yettwattun. 

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Taqcict temmeγ kan γef wallen-is tefka-as-tent, tewwi ddheb-nni. Afeḥḥam yewwi-d allen-nni yeqqel γer uxxam, taqcict tessuter γer tlawin-nni aceqquf n times, dγa wwint-as-t-id, teddem cwiṭ di ccεeṛ-nni i as-yefka uzrem tesserγ-it, ccεeṛ-nni yefka-as asmi i t-tufa deg ubrid yegzem-it ugris, iεenna deg-s ad t-tejmeε ad as-yer lxiṛ mačči d ayen i deg ara tendem. Teddem tewwi-t yid-s γer uxxam, teffer-it deg ukufi almi d asmi yeḥma lḥal, tessufeγ-it-id, akken yekker ad iṛuḥ, yefka as cwiṭ si ccεer-nni n temgerḍt-is yenna-as : ‘’mi t-teḥwaǧ ad t- tesserγ’’. Ihi, tesserγ ccεer-nni n uzrem almi ha-t-an yewweḍ-d tawwurt, yenna-as i teqcict-nni: ‘’ Dacu i tebγiḍ?’’ Taqcict tenna-as: ‘’ Aqli-k la tettwaliḍ liḥala-w’’. Yenna-as: ‘’Ddem allen-nni, err-itent γer wallen-im’’ Dγa yemceḥ-as-tent abrid akka, abrid akka, uγalent wallen n teqcict xiṛ n zik, taqcict tefṛeḥ s wallen-is, tenna-as i uzrem: ‘’Σṭi-k ṣṣaḥḥa, aqli-k teqḍiḍ ddin-ik’’. Tekker teqcict, teṭṭef abrid-is γer taddart n ccix, tewweḍ deg yiḍ tesṭebṭeb, tessuter tin Ṛebbi. Yeffeγ-d ccix d tmeṭṭut-is, nettat ur tt-teεqil ara axaṭeṛ tban-d kan d tinebgit n Ṛebbi, yessekcem-itt ccix γer uxxam. Σica, ur tebγi ara mi tt-yessekcem, teǧǧa-tt di tesga γer tama n umeksa-nni iεelqen. Akken i as-d-wwin ad tečč tugi, tenna-asen: ‘’Ur tetteγ ara alamma tessersem-d lxelq-inna ad yečč’’. Ccix-nni yugi, yenna-as: ‘’Wahin d akeddab d axeddaε d wahin i d amkan-is !’’ Tenna-as: ‘’ Yirbeḥ a Sidi, dacu mi čči&amp;gamma,; rret-t s amkan-is’’. Ddmen, sersen-d ameksa ad yečč lqut netta d tnebgit n Ṛebbi, dγa tebda la d-ḥekku taqṣiṭ-is seg wasmi d tebda ar almi d-tewweḍ γer din-a. Ccix-nni yefhem yakk taqṣiṭ amek tella. Yenna-as d acu i tebγa ad as-texdem tura i Σica. Taqcict tenna-as : ‘’Ur tt-neqqeγ ara εlaxaṭeṛ d uletma’’.

  Tettkemmil Seg tgemmi n teqbaylit 

  
 Mebɛed mi teɣleb tarbaɛt n Yilmeẓyen n Leqbayel JSK tarbaɛt n MCA, u terbeḥ USMBA tarbaɛt n CRZ, ihi ad tili temlilit n taggara n teqbuct n Lezzayer gar JSK d USMBA.

 D tikkelt tis 11 ara taweḍ terbaɛt n JSK ɣer temlilit n taggara n teqbuct n Lezzayer. Tewwi-tt i tikkelt taneggarut deg useggas n 2011. I wakken wwḍen yilmeẓyen n leqbayel ɣer temlilit-agi n taggara n teqbuct, aseggas-a, wwin-d amecwar igerrzen deg temliliyin n teqbuct, mačči am uswir-nsen i iṣubben maḍi deg temliliyin n telɣuɣa, xas ulamma yebda la d-yettifrir deg taggara-a, ladɣa segmi i d-yewweḍ usleɣmay Youcef Bouzidi. Ihi, mebɛed mi tella tetturar JSK ɣef wamek ara teqqim deg uswir amezwaru n telɣuɣa n Lezzayer, acḥal d aseggas-aya tura, ha-tt-an ihi, terra-d asirem i yimferǧen i yettraǧun ad d-tuɣal tarbaɛt-nsen ɣer uswir-is n zik, asmi tella ‘’D taqbaylit, d tasedda n Tefriqt, Imaziɣen d asirem’’. Akken i as-yenna winna. Ma ɣef temlilit n ½ n taggara n teqbuct n Lezzayer i turar akked tarbaɛt n MCA, ass-nni n lǧemɛa, 13 deg yebrir 2018, deg Qsenṭina, nnan-d akk d timlilit n dir i urarent, snat n trebbayaɛ-agi, deg temliliyin akk i d-yellan gar-asent. Am wakken walan d akken timlilit igerrzen akk gar JSK akked MCA, tella-d deg useggas n 1983. Ɣef uswir iṣubben deg temlilit-agi, yenna-d usleɣmay Bouzidi : ‘’D ayen kan iwumi zemren yimyuraren imi aṭas n yimejraḥ i yellan deg terbaḥt n JSK. Nwessa, diɣ, imyuraren i wakken ad ḥadren acebbak-nsen u ad asen-d-ttawin ara iswiyen, daymi ur d-yelli ara wurar am tikkelt iɛeddan’’. Ma ɣef ccwal i yellan deg temlilit-a, gtent sebbat n waya, ɣef wakken i walant kra n tamiwin. Ṭṭlima tamezwarut, rran-tt ɣef yimḍebbren n ddabax uḍar, ladɣa tafidiralit akked tneɣlaft n waddal d yilmeẓyen. Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, tenhewwal Tizi Uzzu s lferḥ ass-nni n lǧemɛa deg yiḍ. Akken kan tekfa temlilit-nni gar JSK akked MCA, feggḍen-d yimdanen ɣer temdint n Tizi Uzzu, u sekkren ahetwir, ladɣa deg umraḥ n usalay n tlemmast n temdint. Acḥal-aya, ur tteqqiden akken. Nutni icennun tizlit-agi n Zedek ‘’Yid-m ass-a d uzekka, nekni dayem akka, ma d urar i aɣ-d-yettawin. Ma trebḥeḍ, nettakka, ma txesreḍ d JSK, acḥal i yecbaḥ yisem-im’’. Neɣ ‘’Asmi akken ur neneṭṭeq, mi yesɛeb lmenṭaq, d kemm i aɣ-d-yesneṭṭqen’’. Afud igerrzen i terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 I wakken ad tesseḥbiber ɣef yilmeẓyen ur ɣellin ara deg ucebbak n lehyuf d ddexxan, texdem Temsulta n Bechloul deg twilayt n Tubiret,deg yimalas yezrin, yiwet n tberza n ddabex n uḍar anda ttekkint trebbaɛ n temnaḍt-a.

 Imi ass n waram tameddit ulac deg-s leqraya, tettuheyya-d taggara n temsizzelt-a anda i yurarent snat n trebbaɛ i d-yessemlalen aṭas n yimnezhen, tuget deg-sen d inelmaden n tesnawit d wid n uɣerbaz alemmas. Mi tekfa temlilit, d tagnit i tfures temsulta i wakken s kra n wid yellan deg unnar ad ḥeḍren i yiwen n usarag i d-yewwin awal ɣef lehyuf d ddexxan d lemḍerrat i d-ttawin i tezmert n umdan. I waya, d amejjay n tnefsit, d umejjay n « tezmert » d yiwen n umḍebber n temsulta i d-yemmeslayen, yal wa deg uḥric ideg yettwaxeṣṣeṣ. Fkan-as wid iḥeḍren azal i usentel, imi aṭas n yiseqsiyen i d-yettunefken, ladɣa ayen i icudden ɣer wamek ara d-tili tririt n talast i waṭṭan-a. Dɣa d ayen yeǧǧan C.Fares, d imḍebber deg temsulta, ad d-yini : « ass-a, d addal i d abrid amenzu ara naɣ i wakken ilmeẓyen-nneɣ ur ɣellin ara deg ucebbak n lehyuf d ddexxan’’. Iwulem ad nesbedd tirebbaɛ n waddal, ad nessewjad yal tikkelt tiberza i wakken ur nettaǧǧa ara amkan i waṭṭan-a ad yezdeɣ gar yilmeẓyen-nneɣ. Seg tama-nneɣ, newjed i wakken ad d-nefk afus n tallelt i wakken ad nesseddu addal d temliliyin n ddabex ama n uḍar ama n ufus dagi». Uqbel ad yekfu usarag-agi, tella-d tikci n warrazen s-ɣur temsulta i wid yettekkin di temliliyin-s n ddabex n uḍar. Am wakken i iwulem ad d-nesmekti d akken deg waggur n meɣres yezrin, timsulta-a n Bechloul, tsedda yiwet n tiggawt yerzan aḥareb ɣef twaɣiwin n yiberdan. D inelmaden n uɣerbaz amezwaru i teɛna taluft i wakken ad sseḥbibren fell-asen.

  M. Smail 

  
 Texdem Massa Nurya Ben Ɣebriṭ taneɣlaft n usegmi aɣelnaw, yiwet n tirza n lxedma ɣer waɣir n Wehran ass n acer iɛeddan. Tirza-a, tella-d i usqerdec n kra n temsal yeɛnan aḥric n tɣuri, tapidagujit n uselmed d wuguren yellan deg unnar neɣ deg yiɣerbazen, ladɣa ayen yerzan ttawil n useḥmu i ixussen daxel n tneɣriyin. Tenna-d d akken aɣbel-a yettuɣal ɣer lqedma n wallalen n useḥmu, u tifrat a-tt-an deg usileɣ igerrzen n yixeddamen. Terna tenna-d belli mačči d ugur meqqren, acku anagar 15% deg yiɣerbazen i yettmagaren aɣbel-a. Tirza-ines tebḍa ɣef sin n yiḥricen. Taṣebḥit n wass tella-d tuffɣa ɣer yiwen n usudu d amaynut, anda i texdem asunẓu-s i wammas-a n usileɣ n yiselmaden imaynuten i irebbḥen deg temsizliyen n usegmi. Tga tuffɣa-nniḍen ɣer wiyeḍnin deg tama n El Ḥasi, anda i tfureṣ tagnit, tbedd s timmad-is ɣef lixṣaṣ i d-yettilin, i d-ttmagaren yixeddamen, terna temmeslay d yinemhalen n wammasen-a akken ad yili uwenneɛ n waddad n yixeddmaen-nsen. Ma d tameddit n wass-nni dima, yella-d unejmuɛ i tt-id-yessemlalen d yiqerra d yinemhalen n yiɣerbazen n tsuddest 2 n kraḍ n yiswiren, anda i temmeslay u tesla s lqreb i waddad d uswir ideg tella tama-a. Terna twelleh inemhalen-a ad ilin d assaɣ igerrzen i usiweḍ gar yiselmaden d yimawlan n yinelmaden, akked usebɣes n yiselmaden d usmeḥses i wuguren-nsen, acku ɛlaḥsab-is d anemhal i d aqerru amenzu deg uɣerbaz. I wakken ad yelḥu, ad iseggem uɣerbaz-a, yewwi-d fell-as ad isseḥres ɣef kra n temsal. Annect-a merra, yettuɣal-d i lfayda n uɣerbaz d usnerni n uswir n yinelmaden.

  Ass n yibeddi sdat n tenmehliwin n usedwel  
 Tusa-d tirza-a n tneɣlaft yiwen n wass uqbel asunded uɣur i d-berrḥen inmula ilelliyen, akken ad d-yili uɛawed n umuqel n wuguren yeckunetḍen ɣef uɣerbaz azzayri acḥal d iseggasen-aya. Wid yerzan ama d iselmaden, ama d inedbalen. Ɣef waya i d-yella usunded ass-nni n arim qrib deg yakk tamiwin, imi yewweḍ ɣer 57% i d-nnan trebbuyaɛ n yinmula, ma d tinmehliwin n usedwel skadben aya, nnan-d ala 8% i d-yerran i tiɣri. Ma d ass n aram, yella-d yibeddi deg tenmehliwin , d akemmel i usunded, d acetki daɣen ɣef uwenneɛ n liḥala n yixeddamen. Deg Wehran, rzan-d s ṭṭaqa, azal n 200 n yixeddamen i ibedden, refden iberriḥen n usuter d tririt n wazal i uxeddam n uḥric n usegmi. Massa N. Benɣebriṭ, seg tama-s, ass-nni n tirza-ines ɣer waɣir n Wehran, temmeslay d tɣamsa, tenna d akken taɣlift tettwahegga ad teldi tiwwura n udiwenni i tifrat n wuguren-a. Maca inmula ugin adiwenni-a, imi ṭṭfen deg ṛṛay n uḥbas ɣef lxedma, acku ulac amaynut i d-yettawi umeslay, ma neẓra belli liḥala ur teqɛid ara. Ihi ɛlaḥsab-nsen, ilaq d asunded d leḥris ara yilin akken ad d-tesmeḥses teɣlift i yiɣeblan-nsen, ad d-awin izerfan-nsen. D ayen i tt-yeǧǧan ula d nettat ad terr s usenɣes deg tjerniḍin n wid yeṭṭfen deg usunded. Maca ayagi yezmer kan ad yesnerni, ad yesluɣ, u ad yessemɣer tilufa 

<p style="text-align:right"> Khaled Achoui 

  
 Gar-aɣ d kra kan n yimalasen, ad tendeh lḥemla n ucraw n uzemmur.

 Am yal aseggas, ifellaḥen, ttḥhirin ad jemɛen rrezq-nsen win akken yettɛeggicen aṭas n twaculin. Lferḥ neɣ tumert, tettan-d deg wudmawen n yimdanen mi ara walin igefran di tallit n taggara n lexrif, acku aman i d-iɣellin ttakken rruḥ i uɛeqqa. Maca, aseggas-a, ahat yezga-d yemgarad ɣef wid yezrin ɣas ulamma tella lehwa akken i tt-yettmenni yal afellaḥ. Acimi ? Ihi, ɣef leḥsab n waṭas n yimdanen i d-nemmuger, ccektayen ɣef tilin n yiwen n ubeɛɛuc i ikecmen aɛeqqa. D tawekka yettefruruxen s lɛejlan, tettett aɛeqqa alamma tekkes-as tazmert i wakken ur n-yettɣimi ara deg tzemmurt. Akka tura, dima ɣef leḥsab n yimeslayen-nsen, win ara d-iɛeddin tama n yiḥerqan d wurtiyin, ad iwali tuget n ugummu yeɣli-d ɣer lqaɛa, drus maḍi i n-yettɣimin deg tzemrin. Seg tama-nsen, imḍebbren n tfellaḥt yellan di yal taɣiwant, ur ṣṣawḍen ara ad xedmen akka kra ara iḥebsen aṭṭan-a iḥuzan isekla, d ayen ara yeǧǧen ddeqs n twaculin ad idirent deg lixsas imi aṭas i yettkalen ɣef zzit i wakken ad d-skecmen tadrimt swayes ara yidiren.

   Smail. M 

  
 Addal d yiwen n uḥric yesɛan azal ɣer umdan, imi yettɛawan-it ad yerfed tafekka-ines, ad yessebɛed aṭṭanen akked ubaɣur swayes i d-igellu i kra n yilɣuɣen i d-yettarran tadrimt. Llant kra n twaculin, bdu-tt seg ubabat, tṣubbeḍ-d akken ɣer tarwa-s, ad ten-tafeḍ ḍefren yiwen n waddal, wa yettaǧǧa-t-id i wa, ama s leḥmala, ama s tukci n Rebbi. D akka i teḍra d twacult Ouaras yettidiren deg Wehran, imi yettuneḥsab waddal n lɛum d tazwart (priorité) iɣef ur zmiren ara ad beɛden, acku ddeqs n yilɣuɣen i d-tefka twacult-a taqbaylit i waddal-a. 

 Ma nebder-d kan Muḥemmed Rasim d Ranya i iḍefren tikli n baba-tsen Ɛellawa. Dɣa deg tmeɣra i d-yellan ussan-a deg uzaduɣ n El Bahya s uneḥḍur n yimasayen n twilayt, tella-d tririt n tejmilt i twacult Ouaras ɣef wayen i d-fkan i waddal n lɛum u mazal ttmuddun-d, ladɣa aseggas yezrin 2018. Muḥemmed Rasim, yesɛa 16 n yiseggasen kan di leɛmer-is, yerbeḥ talɣuɣa n yimecṭaḥ n tmurt n Lezzayer ɣef 1 500 n lmitrat n lɛum ilelli di tmanaɣt. Ma d uletma-s Ranya, 14 n yiseggasen, tuɣal-d seg Ɛennaba s sin n warrazen n wureɣ deg 100 d 200 n lmitrat n lɛum ɣef wammas. Akken diɣen i d-terna kraḍ n warrazen deg talɣuɣa taɣelnawt i d-yellan deg temdint n Tlemsan ɣer yimecṭaḥ maḍi (minime). 

 Ma d baba-tsen 55 n yiseggasen, d netta i asen-d-ineǧren abrid, mazal-it ar tura iqeddec deg waddal-a n lɛum, ddeqs n warrazen i yewwi ladɣa asmi yella d ilemẓi. A-t-an imir-a, yettekki ɣer terbaɛt n usedwel anaddal n Ɛin Tturk iɣef yella i lmendad usleɣmay Butbina Anwar, ma d netta d amɛiwen-is. Mi t-nesteqsa ɣef sser yeǧǧan tawacult-is ad d-tufrar deg waddal-a, yenna-d “Ulac kra n sser yeffren, tamezwarut d nekk i yebdan s leḥmala n waddal n lɛum dɣa ufrareɣ-d, syin arraw-iw mi i yi-d-ẓran akken, ɣetsen ad uɣalen am nekk neɣ ugar”. I usmekti, tadra n twacult-a seg Tizi Uzzu.

Ma d arraz wis kraḍ, tewwi-t Massa Nura Ḥemmudi. Ɣur kra n yimedyazen, teɛdel amcemma teẓrigt-a tamezwarut ulamma yefreɣ deg-s wahil. Imi ula d asarag ɣ akked umunulug i llan tturaǧun, ur muggen ara ɣer taggara. Maca d ayen i izemren ad yili d asebɣes i uwenneɛ n yiqeddicen ugar ɣer sdat.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Nemlal Pr Moussa Imarazen deg tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tamda anda i d-yexdem asarag ɣef yennayer akked tmaziɣt s umata. Newwi-d awal, deg tdiwennit-a, ɣef kra n temsal icudden ɣer tutlayt, takadimit d wayen-nniḍen.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Akka kan s kra n wawalen, anda tedda tmaziɣt-nni ?  

  Moussa Imarazen :  Ass-a, tuɣal tmaziɣt d tameslayt tunsibt, yennayer d ass n lficṭa. Deg yiseggasen iɛeddan, ala aḥric-agi n uselmed, ama deg uɣerbaz neɣ deg tesdawit, i iḥebsen ɣef leqraya. Yerna, dagi kan ɣur-neɣ i tmurt n Leqbayel. Ass-a, ha-t-an ihi yuɣal yennayer d tameɣra taɣelnawt, d ass n lficṭa i Yizzayriyen akken ma llan u anda ma llan, deg yal tama n tmurt. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ, nekk s timmad-iw, d akken Yennayer yuɣal d azamul tura.

  Ad d-tlal ula d takadimit i tmaziɣt, deg wagguern i d-iteddun, amek i tt-tettwaliḍ ?  

  Dayen yelhan i usnerni n tutlayt. Nessaram ad d-tbedd ɣef yiḍarren-is deg ussan i d-iteddun u ad ilin yiɛeggalen imeɛnen, ifazen ara tt-isedduyen, wid yuklalen amekkan-nsen, sɛan aswir iwulmen i wanect-nni. Am wakken diɣ, ara sɛun lḥir deg usnerni n tutlayt tamaziɣt. Aslali n tkadimit-agi, ad d-yili d asurif ameqqran-nniḍen deg umecwar n tmaziɣt, xas ulamma ilaq ha-tt-an tlul-d acḥal-aya. Sin n yiseggasen seg wasmi i tt-id-bedren yimḍebbren. Acu kan, maɛlic s leɛḍil-a, ma yella ad d-teglu s wayen tettraǧu tutlayt.

  Ɣef wakken tettwaliḍ kečč, anwa i iwulmen ad yili deg-s ? 

 Akken ttwaliɣ nekk akked waṭas-nniḍen i yi-yecban, ilaq ad ilin wid iqeddcen ɣef tmaziɣt, wid yessnen ad arun u ad mmeslayen tamaziɣt. Mačči d wiyaḍ-nniḍen i ilaqen ad d-ruḥen ad ssersen iḍarren-nsen dinna, neɣ ad ten-id-ssersen dinna. Ilaq d wid yellan deg unnar, qeddcen ɣef tmaziɣt, ffkan-d. Aṭas i d-wwin u aṭas i mazal ad t-id-awin. Ad yili leqdic, deg tazwara ɣef tutlayt, syin ɣef umezruy, timetti akked wayen akk icudden ɣef tmaziɣt.

  Llan kra qqaren-d ilaq ad d-texleq tkadimit-agi tamaziɣt, yiwet n tutlayt ara sseqdacen akk deg yal tamnaḍt. Llan wiyaḍ,   qqaren-d ilaq ad kemmlen asnerni n tmeslayt taqbaylit i wakken d nettat ara yuɣalen d tamaziɣt. I kečč yellan d amussnaw deg uḥric-agi n tutlayin, amek i twalaḍ timsal ? 

 Akken ma llant tantaliyin n tmaziɣt, sɛant yiwet n tjerrumt, am wakken llan wawalen i tent-yesdukklen u mazal diɣ awalen ijdiden i ilaq ad ten-id-nesnulfu. Acu kan, akken ttwaliɣ nekk, d taqbaylit i yuẓen akka tura ɣer sdat, ihi d nettat i nezmer ad nesnerni, d netta iɣef ara nebnu i wakken ad tt-nesnerni imi d nettat i yelḥan aṭas deg unnar. Maca, ilaq ad nuɣal ɣer tantaliyin-nniḍen i wakken ad d-nawi ayen ulac di teqbaylit. D amedya kan, ma nruḥ ɣer tetergit, ad naf aṭas n wawalen i mazal deg-sen, nutni yuɣ lḥal negren anda-nniḍen, syin ad ten-nesseqdec deg teqbaylit i wakken ad tuɣal d nettat i d tameslayt tamaziɣt taɣbalut. Ma nniɣ-d akka, axater ur nezmir ara ad nesnerni tantaliyin akken ma llant i wakken ad d-nessufeɣ, syin akkin, yiwet n tmeslayt. Ilaq d yiwet ara yeqqlen d yiwet, mačči d aṭas ara yeqqlen d yiwet.

  Aṭas dɣa i as-yeqqaren d akken d taqbaylit i bɣan ad slemden mačči d tamaziɣt. Acu ara asen-tiniḍ i wigi ?  

 Sya akk i d-ɛeddant tutlayin. Ma neṭṭef tarumit i ttmeslaen Yirumyen tura, d tameslayt n Paris, yerra-tt Ugellid d tameslayt n tura imi d tameslayt-is. Ma neṭṭef tameslayt n taɛrabt, ad naf d tameslayt n Qurayc, mačči d tameslayt n waɛraben akken ma llan. Ihi, ula d taqbaylit, tezmert ad tuɣal d tameslayt n yimaziɣen akken ma llan. Sya i d-ɛeddant akk tutlayin, akka i leḥḥunt, akka i tt-nernayent. Ilaq ur ttelint ara tuččḥiwin, ilaq ad nqabel tilufa akken llant. Akka i as-ilaq i tmaziɣt ihi, ur nettuɣal ara leqrun ɣer deffir. Iwata ass-a, ad naẓ ɣer sdat, ad tt-id-nessenser seg wayen i tt-icudden, i tt-sadren : tsub aṭas. Yuɣ lḥal ilaq ad tali, d nekni kan i izemren ad tt-nessali.

  I ɣef wayen yerzan tira, acu ara d-tiniḍ, xas ulamma tefra deg tmurt n leqbayel acḥal-aya ? 

 Amek ara naru tamziɣt ? D asteqsi yeddewwiren acḥal d aseggas-aya. Deg yiwen unejmuɛ akked HCA deg Zeralda, di lweqt-nni, nefra-tt akk, ad tt-naru s tlaṭinit. Ha-t-an yuɣal-d uskasi ɣer ṭṭabla, swayes ara tt-naru daɣen ! Ihi, ilaq d takadimit-agi ara tt-yefrun, mačči d wiyaḍ ara d-yekken s berra ara d-yinin, ad tt-tarum akka, neɣ ad tt-tarum akka, i wakken ad netixer i lɛeba-gi. Ihi, ilaq ad teddukkel tira s yiwen usekkil, alamma nebɣa ad teqqim kan akka s tlata n yisekkilen. La d-ttmeslayeɣ ɣef udem unsib n tutlayt, axater amdan i yiman-is, yezmer ad tt-yaru akken i as-yehwa ; akken yessen, xas ulamma aṭas n tira s tfinaɣ ara nettwali akka tura deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt.

  D acu tettwaliḍ deg ugezdu n   tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ n Tizi Uzzu, deg taggara-a ? 

 Ha-t-an la iteddu. Acu ara ak-iniɣ, s ttawil-agi LMD, ddeqs i ibeddlen. Aṭas ideg i nuɣal ɣer deffir, xas ulamma aṭas i nelḥa ɣer sdat deg uḥric-agi n unadi. Am wakken aṭas, diɣ, n yiselmaden i d-yewwin duktura-nsen tura, uɣalen d iprufisuren. Yennerna, diɣ, ugemmuḍ n yinelmaden, dayen yelha, acu kan aṭas n temsalt i deg-i nuɣal ɣer deffir. Rnu-as, am wakken teẓram, inelmaden n tura mačči am widak n zik, xussen ciṭuḥ, mačči am widak n zik ttaken leɛtab i yiman-nsen i wakken ad d-awin timussniwin. Wigi n tura, yella wanda jebbden taqejjart ɣer deffir. 

  Yesteqsa-t   Hocine Moula 

  
 Mack Nat Frawsen, d yiwen i ixeddmen deg tsenselkimt , akken daɣen d amaru i ikeccmen deg ubrid n tira , yessaweḍ ad yaru 07 n wammuden n yisefra, ad nebder Le bleu du littoral , Le vers de la mélodie , La rivière espérance , Les beaux rêves demain , Vers au vent , Le souffle du zéphyr Akked wammud s tmaziɣt i iwumi isemma : “Agris n unebdu”. Am wakken i yura, diɣ, ungal “Le voyage avec Elise”. Nesteqsa-t ɣef waya. Ha-t-an wacu i –yerra.

  Aɣmis n yimaiɣen: Awal ɣef wammud-agi n yisefra Agris n unebdu… 
 Mack Nat Frawsen: Wagi d ammud n yisefra amezwaru i d-uriɣ s teqbaylit. Uriɣ-t s teqbaylit, syin akkin xedmeɣ-as tasuqilt ɣer trumit. Tasuqilt-agi ɣer trumit, tusa-d tewɛer cit acku ttaɛraḍeɣ akken ad ḥedreɣ ɣef tira-nni-ines tamezwarut. Ad ɛerḍeɣ akken ur tteffɣeɣ ara seg unnar-nni n teqbaylit . Azwel-agi i d-as ffkiɣ akken twalam, deg-s anemgal imi deg unebnu ulac agris. Nekk ḥemmleɣ ad urareɣ s yimeslayen. Deg uzwel-agi, bɣiɣ ad cuddeɣ gar sin yinemgalen .

  Melmi i tebdid tira ? 
 Bdiɣ tira asmi i sɛiɣ 20 n yiseggasen, maca ur ttajmaɛeɣ ara ayen i ttaruɣ. Syin akkin, nniɣ-as ayen ur ttaruɣ ara akken ad d-ssufɣeɣ idlisen. Dɣa, syagi i tebda tikti deg ubrid n tira . 

  D acu n yiseltal anda i tettafeḍ iman-ik deg tira ? 
 Di tira, yal yiwen anda i d yesuzur imeslayen. Nekk ahat ma zemreɣ ad iniɣ, d akken smenyifeɣ tira ɣef tayri akked tira xfifen, tira tilellit .

  Anda tettafeḍ iman-ik, deg tira s trumit neɣ s teqbaylit ?  
 Tarumit d tutlayt s wayes i d uriɣ tuget n yidlisen-iw, maca isental i yi-itteqraḥen s waṭas, ttruḥun-d s teqbaylit imi d nettat i d tutlayt tayemmat-iw. Am umedya, tuget n yisefra i d-uriɣ, ttmeslayen-d ɣef leḥzen, anuɣni, timmetti « Allaɣ yetthubu waḍu »,  » Ay allaɣ i iwumi xerben lexyuḍ  » 

  Awal ɣef wungal-ik Le voyage avec Elyse… 
 D yiwen wungal i d-yeffɣen deg ɣuct 2017. Yettmeslay-d ɣef 02 n wudmawen igejdanen i d-yettemlilin yal tikkelt, syin akkin, ad d-tlal tayri gar-asen, xas ulamma Elyse tezweǧ , syin akkin ad mbaɛaden…

  Ad tili tsuqilt ɣer teqbaylit ? 
 tidet kan, ɣer teqbaylit, mazal urɛad i d-swejdeɣ i usenfar-agi , acku bɣiɣ ad t-xedmeɣ nekk s timmad-iw, ladɣa i yisefra. Ma yella d ungal, ssarmeɣ limer ad d-affeɣ win ara t-id-yessuqqlen ɣer teqbaylit.

  Yella kra n umaynut ?  
 Ih , ad yili wammud n yisefra deg kra n wayyuren-agi i d-iteddun. Aql-i-n ssewjadeɣ-as , imi akken ad txedmeḍ kra, ilaq ad-as-tefkeḍ aṭas n wakud akken ad yili yemmed . 
  Testeqsa-t Yamani Souhila  

  
 Tella-d di tɣiwant n Ccmini, seg 16 armi d 17 unbir, teẓrigt tamezwarut n tfaska n udlis s tikkin n 58 n yimura, 17 n tmaruyin, 10 n yicennayen d waṭas n teẓrigin.

 Ɣef wawal n wid yekkin din, aṭas n yimdanen d yimezdaɣ i yerzan i rreḥba-a imi yehwa-asen umaynut-a n tddukkla tinmettitadelsant Agraw, i d-yesɛan ttesriḥ-ines deg useggas 1998. D acu, i lmend n teẓrigt-a tamezwarut, gten wid iwalan ilaq ad yili usnerni n tikti i teẓrigt tis snat. Amedya n tinḍi (artisanat) d tgella i walan yimura ilaq-asen taẓrigt weḥd-sen akken ad yaf udlis iman-is ugar. Neɣ daɣen d adlis amaziɣ iɣef i d-nnan yelha ad yesɛu aẓayer afellay. Akli Muhubi d yiwen n umedyaz si taddart n Iɣil Wiss deg Uweqqas. Yessufeɣ-d ar tura yiwen udlis n tmuɛay ideg i d-iḥawec kra n tmuɛay seg tgemmi taqbaylit. Ulamma ur yessenz ara aṭas di rreḥba-a, yettwali teffeɣ ɣef udlis amaziɣ. « Ɣur-i teffeɣ ɣef udlis amaziɣ, acku yeṭṭef amur ageɛmir di ttiɛad. D acu, lemmer ad d-tuɣal d tafaska n udlis amaziɣ, ad yili xir, imi idlisen n tefransist d teɛrabt, sɛan imeɣriyen, sɛan tignatin-nniḍen, ma d adlis aqbayli, yettnuzu kan di tmurt n leqbayel. Ma d timsikniyin n tgella, ur yelhi ara ad ttwazdint akked yidlisen deg yiwet n tfaska », i d-yenna. Nesteqsa Lɛerbi Yeḥyun, amaru n temnaḍt n Uqbu, i d-yessuffɣen kra n yidlisen, gar-asen adlis “Taqbaylit, iles d yidles”: « Tura ad d-ibin wayen ara gen yiɛeggalen di teẓrigt i d-iteddun, acku waqila ad d-snulfun ula d yiwen n warraz i yeɛnan taqbaylit, abeɛda ma ufan aspunsur yelhan. Fkiɣ-asen kra n tmuɣliwin, am wayen yeɛnan asdukkel n yiḥbuben akked yidlisen. Maca, s umata, telha teẓrigt-a tamezwaut, ama si tama n usuddes, n tikkin n yimura neɣ d tirza n medden ». Ɣur uneggal Lehdir Sideɛli, bab n wungal “Tirga n wul”, tusa-d tfaska-a d tagnit iwennɛen i umaru: « Tafaska-nni d ayen yessefraḥen imi tesseqreb amaru ɣer yimeɣri, ladɣa wid ur nezmir ad ilin di SILA (…). Ma d tafaska, nwiɣ ilaq ad tili i tutlayin merra akken ad d-tekkes tutlayt-nneɣ iman-is gar tutlayin-nniḍen (…) », i aɣ-d-yerra. Tamedyazt Lilya Seɛdi, twala telha s umata teẓrigt-a: « Ɣur-i tgerrez teẓrigt-a. Ulamma tuget n yinerzafen rezzun ɣer yidlisen n tefransist, maca teffeɣ cwiṭ ɣef udlis amaziɣ », i t-twala. « Tɛedda tfaska nnig n wamek nenwa nekni. Ur nurǧa ara ad ilin annect-n d imekkiyen, ad d-rzun annect-nni n lɣaci. Ahat wwḍen 5 000 i d-yerzan », i d-yenna Nadir Uddak, d aɛeggal deg tddukkla timheggit Agraw. Send ad d-yemmeslay ɣef umaynut ara yilin deg teẓrigt tis snat: « Nesɛa tikti, ad nesselḥu ɣer sdat tfaska, imi a-t-an nettheggi akked teseqqamut i uslal n yiwen n warraz s tallelt n Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa, ara yerzun adlis amaziɣ. Seg yennayer-a i d-iteddun, ad d-nger tiɣri i yimura ».

  M. K. 

  
  Isufar 

 – 100 gr n wudi

 – uraw n yineɣman

 – 2 n tmellalin

 – 75 gr n ssker

 – 2 n tcelwiḍin n yiɣes

 – 300 ml n uyefki

 – 500 gr n lfarina

  Aheggi 

 Sifet lfarina, rnut-as iɣes, syin rwit-ten. Terrem-t daxel n urubu, ternum-as timellalin, ssker, akked wudi. Ttesmirit-as ciṭ ciṭ n uyefki i wakken ur ineṭṭeḍ ara urekti. Kkset aɛenqud n yineɣman, tgezmemt-ten d iḥricen imecṭaḥ. Anfet ad yali urekti azal n ssaɛa. Mi yuli, mmeslet-t d taqqrist, syin terrem-t d tiberyucin. Seḥmut lkuca ɣer 180°c, tessersem tiberyucin ɣef silicone, yuɣ lḥal tdehnem-ten s wureɣ n tmellalt u terram daxel-nsent iniɣman. Anfet ad yeww azal n 25’. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Tawennaḍt, d amkan i d-yewwi ɣef umdan ad yesseḥbiber fell-as, ad t-yeǧǧ zeddig, acku yettuɣal-d s lfayda i umdan-nni s timmad-is. Ur d-yettawi aṭṭanen, ad ifaṛes agama yelhan, ad yeɛǧeb lḥal i wid iḥemmlen ad ffɣen, ad merrḥen deg tebḥirin neɣ di tẓegwa. 

 Maca, llan kra n yidigan ur netteɛǧab ara tiṭ. Ɣef waya, dɣa, ttilin-d wussan n usizdeg seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ. Akka i d-yella deg tɣiwant n Msergin deg Wehran, anda i d-mmlalen ass n aram 15 yennayer, mwatan ad ssizedgen u ad reqqɛen tiẓgi n udrar n yizmawen, sɣur imaɣzalen d tddukkliwin n uḥareb ɣef twennaḍt.

 D tanmehla n twennaḍt d wammas n ujmaɛ n yiḍuman d waggur azeggaɣ azzayri i d-yessudsen timlilit-a (initiative). Aṭas n yiḍuman i rran ɣer yicekkaren meqqren, fersen isekla, rnan ẓẓan kra-nniḍen, s tallelt n yimdanen akk yellan din, armi yuɣal tameddit n wass yettfeǧǧiǧ, ladɣa deg tlemmast n teẓgi-a, anda llan ikersiyen n usɣar ideg ttfarasen tiɣimit ddaw n yisekla ɛlayen. 

 Mmsefhament tddukkliwin-a, ɣef yal ass n ssebt ad d-tili tmaɣzelt (volontariat) yecban tagi, yal tikkelt sani ara ruḥen, akken ad d-grin yidgan n umerreḥ deg waddad icebḥen. D annect-a i d-tenna tnemhalt n twennaḍt : “Nessuter deg kra n yixeddamen i wakken ad ttilin deg teẓgi-a taggara n yimalas, deg-s ad nebbhen (ad weṣṣin) ɣef yimdanen, ur ttaǧǧan ara iḍuman-nsen dinna, deg-s d lḥemla n useḥses ɣef ubaɣur i d-yettak ugama i umdan ma yeǧǧa-t zeddig”.

<p style="text-align:right">  Khaled A. 

  
 « Ṭṭmna-inu d akken ur d-ttilin ara idammen di Lezzayer, ur d-tettili ara tmenɣiwt di Lezzayer « . S yimeslayen-agi i d-yekcem Budyaf akal n tmurt-is d waṭas n usirem swayes i d-yegla deg ul-is asmi i t-id-necden i wakken ad yuɣal d aselway n Lezzayer. 

 Syin, yettwanɣa srid deg wass n 29 junyu 1992 deg temdint n Ɛennaba. Ilul Muḥemmed budyaf ass n, 23 yunyu 1919, di Msila. D aεeggal n Ukabar n uyref azzayri. Gar wid i d-yeslulen tuddsa timezlit (Organisation Spéciale) n umussu i trennawt n tlelliyin timagdayin (MTLD), maca tettwaceqqeq tuddsa-agi deg useggas n 1950. 

 Yettwazref Budiaf d iɛeggalen-is. Ikemmel Budiaf amennuɣ-is deg Fransa, syin yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt deg 1954 anda i d-yeslul-d akked kra n yimeddukkal (CRUA) u yuɣal d aselway. Yella, diɣ, deg ugraw n 22 n ukabar n FLN i ifernen amenzu n unbir. 

 Deg ugraw n Ssumam n ɣuct 1956, yuɣal d aεeggal n (CNRA), yettwaṭṭef ass n, 22 tuber 1956 netta d iεeggalen n FLN s ubeddel n ubrid i temsrifegt. Si lhebs, i yesselḥay timsal n tfidiralit n fransa n FLN i t-yerran deg 1958 d aneɣlaf n uwanek n Unabad uɛḍil n tegduda tazzayrit (GPRA). Syin akkin d anamzul n uselway deg 1961. Yeffey-d si lhebs ass n, 18 meyres 1962, seld imsisiyen n « Evian », din i d-banen wid yebɣan ad nebḍen d wid yebɣan tugdut deg Lezzayer tazzayrit. 

 Deg tegnatin-agi i d-yeslal Budiaf akabar n tegrawla tanemlayt (PRS), yettwaṭṭef ɣer lḥebs i tikkelt-nniden ass n, 23 yunyu 1963, deg unẓul n tmurt anda i yettwaḥkem s lmut. Yunag yunag s tmara ɣer fransa deg useggas 1964, syin ɣer Merruk. 

 Deg 16 yennayer 1992, yejbed iman-is deg tselwayt uselway n tegduda Chadli Ben Jdid. Syin, ssawlen i Budyaf ɣer Merruk i waken ad yuɣal d aselwaya n Lezzayer imi ttwaḥebsent tefranin. Yenna- deg wawal-is deg usarag-is aneggaru: «Timura i aɣ-yezwaren, s wacu i aɣ-zwarent ? Zwarent-aɣ s tmussni…» 

 Awalen-a d ineggura-ines deg Uxxam n yidles n temdint n Ɛennaba ass n, 29 Yunyu 1992, uqbel ad ṭṭreḍqent tersasin n dɣel d tisselbi. D tinnuzya, tid yenɣan idles, tussna akked d Mass Budiaf i wakken Lezzayer ad tkemmel ad tekcem ugar deg tesraft n yidammen.

 Azwel n udlis-is «Où va l’Algérie ? S anda i teteddu Lezzayer?» d asteqsi i nezmer ad neg ass-a n wussan. Yenna Meɛtub deg tezlit i as-iga d tajmilt: «Tneǧreḍ-d iswi i ccetla, tura steεfu Mass Budiaf».
  Nisma Tigrine 

  
 Tberreḥ-d tenmehla n tumnayt n Bgayet ass n aram, 12 di Fuṛaṛ yezrin, ɣef yisalli i yehwan aṭas ama i medden, neɣ i wid yebɣan ad xedmen deg usenfaṛ-a. Acku aṭas i yesεan ifurguten n tumnayt bɣan ad xedmen, meεna ur asen-tettunefk ara tegnit i waya deg wayen iεeddan. 

 Abeεda ɣur tɣiwanin i yettwaḥezqen nezzeh seg lexṣas n tumnayt, neɣ deg kra n tudrin i d-yezgan deg yidurar, neɣ tid yeggugen ɣef umḍiq anda i llant tɣiwanin. Dɣa ɣef usentel-a, tanmehla n tumnayt, tessuter-d deg kra n win yebɣan ad itekki, d akken ilaq-as ad yesεu ttawil n tumnayt iwulmen, yerna ilaq-asen ad aznen ikaramen-nsen s ttawil n tṣerqest ɣer tensa n tenmehla uqbel ad εeddin 30 n wussan segmi i d-berrḥen isalli. 

 Ddeqs n tɣiwanin i teεna temsalt, amedya, Xeṛṛaṭa, Taṣexṛiwt, Tizi n Berber, Amizur, Bgayet, d tiyaḍ. Ad d-nesmekti d akken taɣiwant n tṣexṛiwt, tella tesεa aɣbel meqqeṛ deg temsalt-a, d ayen i yeǧǧan isalli-a yeseffṛeḥ aṭas imezdaɣ n taddart, ladɣa wid izeddɣen deg Rrif, akked At Mbarek. At taddart nnan-aɣ-d deg kra n tnagiwin-nsen, belli acḥal segmi tcekktayen seg yir liḥala n tumnayt ɣur-sen, meεna yiwen ur d-yesli i taɣect-nsen.Ɣer tagarra, yewwi-d ad d-nemmeslay ula ɣef ssuma n tumnayt i yettalin myal tikkelt, dɣa yessaram ugdud ur d-yettili ara wayagi tikkelt-a.

<p style="text-align:right"> K. K. 

  
 Seg taddart ɣer tayeḍ, seg tiɣilt ɣer tayeḍ, yettkemmil umalas ilemẓi Fares Idir tirziwin-ines ɣer temnaḍin yemgaraden n tmurt, anda yettemlil igerdan, i tegnatin n usiwel n tmucuha. Seg wansi ara iɛeddi, ad yeǧǧ dinna tamsirt idumen i warrac imecṭaḥ. Dɣa, deg ussan-a n remḍan, yewwi-t ubrid ɣer Tizi Uzzu, ad d-yawi kra n tmucuha i lmend n wass agraɣlan n ugrud, deg wuḍan n tmucuha. Gar temliliyin i as-d-yellan deg kraḍ n tuddar, ad d-nessuk awal ɣef tinna n At Waɛban, anida yessur (yexleḍ) umyi (mythe), tamsirt, anecraḥ d umezruy. Deg teɣzi n wazal n usrag d uzgen, yessaweḍ umalas Fares igerdan i as-d-yefkan tameẓẓuɣt ɣer yiwen n umaḍal, ala nutni i as-iḥulfan yella. Ddeqs n warrac i iḥeḍren dinna, akk-nsen mmɣen deg yineḍruyen i d-yettilin deg teqsiḍt. « Tikkelt-a, ferneɣ ad d-awiɣ amaynut, mi d-ssawleɣ timucuha i d-snulfan warrac s timmad-nsen deg yiḥuna i xedmeɣ yakan. Ulamma yella wayen i d-rniɣ akken ad cebbḥeɣ tamacahut, maca tikti ǧǧiɣ-tt d tinna-nsen ». I aɣ-d-yenna Fares Idir. Send ad d-yernu: « S lebɣi n wul i rziɣ ɣer dinna, ladɣa imi yi-igan leqder tddukkliwin-nni. Sḥasfeɣ imi llan wid ur nxeddem azal i tmacahut d umalas. ɣas ma kecmen di tẓuri d yidles ula d nutni ». Ad d-nesmekti belli, ikemmel Fares Idir abrid-is seg Wat Waɛban sriḍ ɣer Tferdud, taɣiwant n Abi Yusef di Micli, i yiwen n yiswi: timlilit akked warrac. D awellih dɣa ɣef taddart n Tferdud, imi din ara tili tfaska i d-iteddun Siwel-Taẓuri. Ɣef wawal n umalas, azal n 400 n yiterrasen, tuget deg-sen d arrac, i iḥeḍren i kraḍ n yisiharen iɣer yettwaɛreḍ sɣur tddukkliwin tidelsanin n temnaḍin-nni.

  M. K. 

  
 Sin n yiseggasen ɛeddan segmi i tuɣal tmaziɣt d tutlayt tunṣibt di tmurt n Lezzayer.

 I lmend n wya, thegga-d Tenmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu yiwen n wahil akken ad tesfugel amulli win sin n usenṣeb n tmaziɣt, ahil i d-yellan deg temkarḍit n tɣuri n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, ass n 6 akked 7 deg furar, anda i d-llant temsikniyin n yidlisen n tmaziɣt n waṭas n yixxamen n usezreg akked yimyura, gar-asen Brahim Ben taleb. Syin, yella-d yiwen n usarag sɣur Mass Saɛid Cemmax (d aselmad n tmaziɣt di tesdawit , d amyaru ), Mass Ḥelwan Ḥassan (D aselmad n trumit di tesdawit , d amyaru ) akked Mass Bilek Ḥamid, anda i d-mmeslyen ɣef tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Aṭas n wid i yellan deg usarag : iselmaden n tmaziɣt, inelmaden n tesnawit, aselwan n tdukkla Numidia n Wehran Said Zalouch, Asqamu unnig n timuzɣa. Yebda usarag s wawal n tnemhalt n yidles Massa Nabila Goumeziane i d-yennan d akkan tamurt n Lezzayer ‘’tesɛa amxalef n tentaliyin, anect-a d ayen yelhan’’ , syin tberreḥ-d d akken ad yili leqdic ass n 21 di furar i lmend n wass agraɣlan n tutlayt n tyemmat. Si tama-s, yenna-d Mass Ḥelwan : “Ma yella temmeslayeḍ tameslayt n walbaɛd dagi tefkiḍ-as azal, ma yella temmeslayeḍ tameslayt-ik d kečč i tt-ismuɣren, axater ur tezmireḍ ara ad timɣureḍ kan s wayla n medden ”. Ikemmel yerna-d : “win iḥerzen ayla n lejdud yelha, meɛna win i t-yesnernayen yif-it. Tamaziɣt, yis-s ara timɣureḍ, ma yella tettewteḍ yis-s ara tettewteḍ. Ihi, ilaq ad tuɣal d aɛekkaz deg ufus-ik mačči d aɛekkaz deg uɛrur-ik “. S iwellihen-a i d-yessuzer i yinelmaden i yellan di tzeqqa i d-yekfa-d awal-is deg usarag. Ma d Mass Cemmax, yenna-d : “ Tamaziɣt, tesɛa aṭas n tantaliyin, tura ayen i d-yeqqimen, ilaq ad nessiweḍ, ad nesɛu titiknulujiyin timaynutin, ur ilaq ara ad neḥqar tutlayt-nneɣ “ . Yekfa usarag s yisteqsiyen n wid iḥeḍren . Ma yella deg wass wis sin, yella-d daɣen usarag akked Mass Dourari Abderrezak d Mass Boujemɛa Aziri . Sin n yiseggasen seg wasmi i tettwanṣeb tmaziɣt, sin yiseggasen segmi ttmeslayen deg usqamu aɣerfan ɣef uṣenṣeb-a, meɛna ayadra ass n wass-a, tella tmaziɣt deg unnar ? Ayadra tamaziɣt yettwakkes-as uẓayer-nni s lxetyar deg uselmed ? Xas ulamma taneɣlaft n uselmed, teqqar-d ussan-agi kan d akken tamaziɣt tettwaselmed deg waṭas n lwilayat, asteqsi ad yeqqim deg unnar.

  S.Yamani 

  
 Thegga-d tiddukkla “Eco Action” i igedcen deg tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, yesseḥbibiren ɣef ugamma daxel n tesdawit-agi, yiwen wass n useɛlem n yisdawanen ɣef wamek yezmer ad ad iḥder ɣef twennaḍt. Yella-d leqdic-agi amerkanti, daxel n tesdawit n Ḥesnawa 1, sdat n temkerḍit tasdawant, ideg xedmen ddeqs n temsikniyin yesɛan assaɣ akked uḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt. Llant temsikniyin ɣef kra n yisufar n tuččit yeṭṭur amdan am Tireɣlin, Abquq…atg. Llant daɣen tid i d-imeslayen ɣef yiḍuman, d wamek ara asen-yexdem umdan i wakken ur yeṭṭuru ara akal neɣ igenni. Llant daɣen tid i d-yewwin awal ɣef wammus s leṣnaf-is yemxalafen. Yerna yal timsikent tesɛa ilemẓi neɣ tilemẓit ara d-yesfehmen i win yerran lwelha-s ɣer kra n temsikent. Leqdic-agi yedda ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan, imi yebda ass-nni n lḥed 17 meɣres 2018 tkemmel azekka-nni n letnayen 18 meɣres 2018. D tagnit anida ẓẓan yiɛeggalen n tiddukka-a akked yisdawanen, ugar n 500 n yisekla (ṭṭjur) s leṣnaf yemxalafen deg yimeḍqan yemgaraden n tesdawit-agi n Ḥesnawa 1. Ad nesmekti kan belli tiddukkla-agi, tlul-d deg useggas n 1999 sɣur agraw n yiselmaden d yinelmaden, yeqqaren neɣ yessɣaren deg yigezda yemxalafen n tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu. Seg yimir ar ass-a nettat d leqdic deg unnar-agi n useḥbiber ɣef ugamma daxel n tesdawiyin yellan deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Mass Takfarinas Belɛidi, s yisem-is d amaray amatu n tiddukkla-agi “Eco Action”, ha-t-an wayen i d-yenna: “ I lmend n wass amaḍlan n useklu, i d-yettilin yal 21 meɣres, tiddukka-agi-nneɣ thegga-d sin wussan n useɛlem ɣef ugamma d twennaḍt daxel n tesdawit. Neɛreḍ s temsikiniyin yemxalafen, ama ɣef wammus, ama ɣef yibaɛɛec neɣ yimɣan n useǧǧi, i wakken ad nsefhem isdawanen d acu d ammus n ugamma, amek i d-yettili d wamek nezmer ad t-nekkes”.

  G. A. 

  
  Isufar

  Aheggi 

 Daxel n tbaqit, sifet lfarina, syin rnut-as awren, lmelḥ akked yiɣes i yettwaxelḍen s waman. Uqbel ad tɛerkem arekti-nni, rnut-as ciṭ n waman yemmuzeɣlen. Syin, tkemmlem tuggin n urekti alamma yefka-d leɣri. Deg taggara, ɣummet-t s ubeḥnuq, teǧǧem-t ad yali. S ufella n lkettan, tessuzrem fell-as lfarina. Rret arekti-nni d takurin (snat neɣ tlata), syin, tmeslem-tent d tiqqrisin u tanfem-asent azal n ssaɛa i wakken ad alint. Yeqqim-d kan tura ad wwent. S tezmert-nwen.
