 I lmend n usmekti n umulli wis 20 n tmenɣiwt n umedyaz d ucennay neɣ anaẓur aqbayli amḥaddi Lwennas Matub, thegga-d tesdawit n Abderrhmane Mira n Bgayet yiwet n temlilit tussnant tagraɣlant, ara yeddun ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan-agi: ttlata 19, larebɛa 20 akked lexmis 21 deg waggur n yunyu i d-iteddun. D timlilit ara d-yawin awal ɣef tudert neɣ tameddurt n Lwennas Matub, gar tnagiyin d temsal yerzan timeɣnest-ines ɣef tmagit d yidles amaziɣ akked yizerfan n umdan. Ad ilin daɣen yisaragen ɣef tmedyazt-is d yisefra-s, ama s tezrawin n unadi neɣ s tselḍin n yimussnawen n tmedyazt. Am wakken diɣ ara d-ilin yisaragen ɣef uẓawan akked ccna n uḥeddad n wawal-agi aqbayli, yefkan tudert-is d yiman-is d asfel ɣef tmurt n Leqbayel. D tasga n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt akked tmezdayt n tsekliwin d tulayin n tesdawit n Bgayet i d idisan i d-isuddsen temlilit-agi tameqqrant ara d-yilin deg Tzeqqa n yisaragen n tesdawit n Abderrhmane Mira n lwilaya n Bgayet, deg tesdawit yettwasnen s yisem n Aboudaou. Ad yili uceggeɛ n yizwal n teywalin d yigzulen n yisaragen n wid yebɣan ad ttekkin deg temlilit-a, ɣer tensa-agi: <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="582c3135343134312c762c2d2b2b3639362c183f35393134763b3735" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a> uqbel 21 deg waggur n yebirr 2018. Ad tili tririt ɣef teywalin-agi sɣur tesqamut tussnant n temlilit-agi, ass n 30 yebrir 2018. Gar wid ara yilin deg usqamu ussnan, ad naf tuget deg-sen d iselmaden deg tesdawiyin n tmurt n Lezzayer, gar-asen Kamel Bouamara, Allaoua Rabehi, Mohammed Djellaoui, Mohand Akli Salhi…atg. Llan daɣen yiselmaden n tesdawin n tmura tiberraniyin, gar-asen: Kamel Nait Zerrad, Tassadit Yacine, El Husscina Farhad…atg. Aṭas n yiselmaden n tesga d tutayt d yidles amaziɣ i d-yellan s deffir n usuddes n temlilit-agi tagraɣlant, am wakken daɣen i tettekki Massa Lynda Ouatah, s yisem-is d aɣella n tesga-agi. Ma d iswi n temlilit-agi, ɣef wakken i t-id-nnan yimsuddsen-agi deg wulɣu-nni n temlilit-a, ad yili d asissen iwatan ɣef wayen akk i d-yefka d wayen i d-yeǧǧa Matub ama d tamedyazt, ama d aẓawan ama d isental iɣef yessefra akked talɣiwin swayes yessefra…atg. D tagnit ara d-isddukklen imussnawen d yiselmaden d wid akk iḥemmlen Lwennas, d tagnit daɣen n tmussni d tussna, imi ad yili ubeddel n tmuɣliwin d tmussniwin ɣef urgaz-agi ameqqran.

 Ass-nni n larebɛa yezrin, 29 deg waggur n unbir 2017 ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, tella-d temlilit taseklant tis xemsa sɣur Mass Bendameche Abdelkader deg Temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D timlilit yeddan ɣef teɣzi n snat sswayaɛ, immeslay-d umaru akked umnadi deg wayen yerzan idles d tɣerma n ugdud azzayri s umata. D tanemhalt n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu Massa Gouméziane Nabila i d-yellan ɣef lmendad n temlilit-agi taseklant, d nettat i d-yefkan awal n tazwara, syin akin tefka-as awal i Massa Sebki s yisem-is d timḍebbert n usizreg n tesɣunt “Livers”, nettat s timmad-is texdem-d agzul i yimuhal d tudert n uselmad d umnadi Bendameche. Sakin, tefka-as aṣawaḍ i bab n usrag. Mi yessuli asarag-agi-ines ucennay d umnadi Mass Abdelkader Bendameche, iger-d tiɣri i yilmeẓyen ladɣa inelmaden yellan dinna, i wakken ad ɣren idlisen n yimura meqqren n tmurt, uqbel ad ɣren ibarraniyen. Yerna ad ṭṭfen deg wansayen d yizamulen-nsen, mačči d ayla n medden ara d-ttawin. Ɣer taggara maḍi n temlilit-agi yekfan lewhi n 15h00, yella-d deg-s wazal n 30 n ddqayeq n tririt ɣef yisteqsiyen n wid yellan dinna. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella ufraq n wugar n 100 n tkerḍiwin timsadrin n yinaẓuren n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, d tagnit n lferḥ akked tumert ɣer yinebgawen akk. Ad d-nesmekti belli, Mass Abdelkader Bendameche, ilul ass n 26 tuber 1949 deg Mazagran deg lwilaya n Mostaganem. Yeffeɣ-d seg uɣerbaz aɣelnaw n tedbelt s ugerdas. Syin yexdem deg uɣlif n yidles ddeqs n yiseggasen. syin ɣer-s yuɣal d aɛeggal deg usqamu aɣelnaw adamsan akked yimetti. Yuɣal ixeddem yiwet n tedwilt deg tiliẓri n tmurt. Yedda lweqt yuɣal, d imḍebber amezwaru ɣef usqamu aɣelnaw n lmusiga n cceɛbi. Tura akka, d amaru n waṭas n yidlisen, am wakken d aprufissur n tgemmi tadelsant…atg.

   A. A 

  
 Yebda yakan uheggi n tezrigt tis mrawet d yiwet (11) n tmeɣra n tbexsisn, i d-tessuddus yal aseggas tddukkla Tiɣilt n taddart n Lemṣella deg Buzgan. Tazrigt n usegga-agi, ad d-tili ussan n 24 d 25 ɣuct 2018, ddima deg taddart-agi n Lemṣella, yettwassnen mliḥ s tneqlin. Imsuddsen n leqdic-agi, fernen tanfalit-agi “Tibexsisin di tmeɣra, d afran igerrzen”, i wakken ad yili d asentel n tezrigt-agi tamaynut. Yetturaǧu deg tezrigt n useggas-a, ad yili wahil d anesbaɣur, ama si tama n yirmad idelsanen ama si tama n temsikniyin. Aṭas n yimsikniyen ara yilin di ttiɛad, gar-asen wid n tqendurt, wid n usɣar, wid n tamemt…atg, ɣer tama n Wat taddart-agi. Am wakken daɣen i yetturaǧu ad d-yili wawal s telqeyt ɣef yibaɣuren n lbexsis ɣef tezmert n umdan. D tagnit i yimerriyen i wakken ad d-issinen taddart n Lemṣella i icebḥen aṭas. Am wakken daɣen ara d-walin ayen tekseb d agerruj, gar-asen leṣnaf yemxalafen n lexrif. D tagnit daɣen i wid yebɣan ad d-yaɣ lbexsis aẓidan s leṣnaf-is yemgaraden. D leqdic adelsan ara d-suddsen waṭas n yidisan, ad d-nebder gar-asen: Tiddukkla tadelsant Tiɣilt n taddart n Lemṣella akked tesqamut n taddart-agi, Asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan (APC) n Yilula Umalu, Asqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, s tallelt n tenmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu.

  A. A 

  
 D 7 seg furar, amulli wis sin segmi tuɣal tmaziɣt d tutlayt tunṣibt deg tmendawt tazzayrit. D amulli wis sin i d-yesseglan s usenṣeb n yennayer d lficṭa i yizzayriyen i merra. Asfugel s yigumma yecban wigi i d-yusan s leɛtab meqqren, yella-d tikkelt-a deg Tubiret deg leḥzen. D yiwen seg yimenza yessudfen tamaziɣt s aɣerbaz azzayri i teccelqef lmut uqbel ad yidir ayen iɣef yennuɣ tudert-is i merra. D Akli AOUN, mmi-s n Haizer i yewḍen leɛfu n Rebbi di leɛmer-is 56 n yiseggasen. Am netta am wid i t-yecban gar tizyiwin-is, zik i d-yerra s lexbar ɣef lbaṭel tettmagar tutlayt-is d yidles-is. D ayen i t-yeǧǧan yella gar wid isuɣen deg tefsut n tmanyin deg temdint n Tubiret i wakken ad d-yerr azal i lasel-is. Amennuɣ-is, ur yeḥbis ara, imi yal tikkelt n leḥris yettili ɣer tama n watmaten-is imeɣnasen. Seg Umussu Adelsan Amaziɣ, ɣer tlallit n yikabaren, Akli Aoun, yeṭṭafar anerni n teswiɛin, i wakken ad yili seg wid yesseddan aɣunzu n uɣerbaz deg useggas n 1994. Deg waggur n ɣuct n 1995, yettwafren seg wid ara yettikkin deg tannant n usileɣ n yiselmaden imenza n tmaziɣt i d-yessewjed deg lawan-nni Usqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa deg tesdawit n Ben Aknoun. Yettuɛeggen d aselmad n tutlayt-is tayemmat deg tesnawit Houari Boumediène n temdint n Tubiret, Akli yessaweḍ ad ireṣṣi tutlayt-a imi d win yumnen s wacu i ixeddem daɣ sser yekseb deg taywalt yebnan s ucmumeḥ d wawal aẓidan. Dɣa d ayen yeǧǧan kra akk ukked yexdem, ttqadarent merra. Ɣer tama n yimeddukkal-is Djafar Abdeddou d Ali Chouimet, slalen-d Tiddukkla tadelsant Taɣerma anda ssawḍen ẓẓan aselmed n tmaziɣt berra i uɣerbaz deg temdint n Tubiret, leqdic yernan ɣer waṭas n uxeddim yecban isaragen, d usfugel s yisihar yemxallafen. Uqbel akka ad yessali amecwar-is deg uḥric n usegmi, Akli Aoun, yuɣal d anemhal deg uɣerbaz amezwaru deg taddart n Ugentur anda yezdi tagmat gar yiselmaden i wakken ad d-iḥelli igemmaḍ igerzen. Yeḥsan d akken rrbeḥ yettas-d s tdukkli, d awal i d-yegmer ɣer Matoub i d-yennan : « Ma nnan-awen acu i d tafat, init-asen d iɣallen yeddukklen. » D chada ara d-fken akk wid i t-yesnen deg unnar n usegmi imi yessawal i tegmat i wakken ad ilin d amedya i yinelmaden ara yuɣalen d irgazen d tulawin n uzekka. Ɣer temḍelt-is, aṭas i d-yusan, maca imeddukkal-is n 1995 banen-d am yitran. L’Hocine, Abdellah, Hamdane, Ali, Messaoud, Ahmed, Mahfoudh d wiyad, i merra bedden s aqerruy-is, d tamuɣli taneggarut ara rren i umeddakkel n umennuɣ, win akken yezzewren lasel uqbel ayen-nniḍen. Ma nebder-d Akli ass-a, ur nezmir ad nettu Nour Ould Amara, s temsirin-is deg tiliẓri, neɣ Ferhat Ait Mohand d Ferhat Chelmouni widen akken yellan d imenza s annar n uselmed n tmaziɣt asmi akken qessiḥet teswiɛt. ineggura-agi, d aṭṭan uffir i ihemjen tifekkiwin-nsen almi i ssufɣen tarwiḥt. Am wakken ara d-nebder Madani n tama n Bgayet i iruḥen ɣef zik lḥal am wakken i iruḥ Mokhtar Zeddam i teccelqef tmettant deg twaɣit n ubrid. Awal i d-yeǧǧa Didouche Mourad lawan n tegrawla iwulem ass-a ad t-neḍfer deg tallit-a mi d-yenna : « Ma nemmut, ḥadert ɣef tidmi-nneɣ ». Nekni, neɣ ahat wid yellan deg unnar n uselmed n tmaziɣt, tajmilt ara nerr ass-a i yimeɣnasen-nneɣ, d akemmel deg ubrid uɣen s nnif, s uzday n lqedd. Gnet deg talwit, mazal tarwa n leḥlal ara ikemmlen i umennuɣ.

  M. Smail 

  
 Deg umenzu n waggur n furar n 2019, tettwaxleq-d yiwet n tddukkla tamaynut n yimawlan n yinelmaden n yiɣerbazen imenza n taddart At Zεim I d At Zεim II. Yeḍra-d waya s tallelt n teseqqamut n taddart, yettabaεen ɣer tɣiwant n Mεatqa. Ɣas ma drus n wussan seg-mi i d-tlul tddukkla-agi, meɛna aṭas n leqdicat, s wazal-nsen, i d-yettwaxedmen yakan deg unnar. 

 Dɣa gar yisenfaren imenza ideg i d-tefka tallelt, ad d-nebder asenfar n usekcem n lgaz n temdint ɣer yiɣerbazen, imi tuget n yiεeggalen, fkan-d afus n tallelt deg usenfar-agi akken ad d-sfaydin yinelmaden. Deg tazwara n ddurt iεeddan i sawḍen ad d-caεlen tikuzinin deg yakk tizeɣwa n yiɣerbzen imenza n taddart.

  Gar tigawin n tddukkla,daɣen, ad naf awenneε d ugerrez n yiɣerbazen d usizdeg n yimeḍqan n ustaεfu. Aya, yella-d sdat n ustehzi n yimḍebbren teεna temsalt, ama d iεeggalen n Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Mεatqa, neɣ Tanmehla n usegmi. Dɣa ɣef lehsab n yimḍebbren, addad-agi iɣer i wweḍen yiɣerbazen, yella-d s ssebba n uɣbel n lexṣas n tedrimt i d-tesseggra taluft n uṣbbu n leswami n bitrul deg leswak n ddunit. 

 Ssawḍen yiεeggalen n tddukkla s tallelt n yimezdaɣ n taddart n AT Zεim, yal wa s wayen yezmer, i wakken ad d-gerrzen addad n yiɣerbzzen imenza n addart. Ula d tuččit deg tesmaččiwin, bedden fell-as akken iwata s tallelt s tedrimt, imi drus n tedrimt i d- yettunefken seg tɣiwant.

  Aheggi 

 Fetlet seksu, trennum-as aman. Mi d-ifur i tikkelt tis tlata, dehnemt n wudi. Daxel n tasilt, gezmet lebsel d amecṭuḥ, ternum aksum, zzit n uzemmur akked leɛqaqer. Rnu-t aman akked yisufar-nni-nniḍen, teǧǧem kan taxsayt ara ternum deg tlemmast n tiwwin. Anfet ad yeww s ttawil kan, tessefqadem-t ɣef lmelḥ. S tezmert-nwen

  Daya 

  
 Ass-a, yeffeɣ-d ugdud s tmmad-is, s lekmal-is. Urǧin, ahat, i teḍra tikli am ta deg Tzi Uzzu. Ilaq, ad iruḥ udabu-agi. Ulac leɛḍil, ulac tikerkas. Ilaq, ad yuɣal leḥkem s agdud, s tugdut, anda yal yiwen ad yaf iman-is deg Lezzayer n uzekka. Nezmer ad d-nini ass-a, aql-aɣ deg tmeɣra tis snat n uzarug n Lezzayer. Ihi, yeqqim-d kan rrwaḥ n udabu-agi. Syin, asbeddi n Tegduda tis snat tafidiralit. 

   Yesteqsa-ten H. M. 

  
 Tuɣal tura d tisirit wansay-agi n lewziɛa neɣ timecret deg taddart n Tala Ɛetman, i ibeɛden ɣef Tizi Uzzu s wazal n 15 n yikilumitren.

 Tettwakkes niqal tmecret-agi deg yiseggasen iɛeddan, ladɣa seg useggas n 1998, mi akken nɣan acennay Matub Lwennas. Syin akkin, rran-tt-id deg tazwara n yiseggasen n 2000. Acu kan ur tdum ara imi d-yeḍra, diɣ, wayen i d-yeḍran : Tafsut taberkant. Deg tlata n yiseggasen-agi ineggura, tekker taddart tarra-d ansay-agi i icudden s waṭas ɣer tgemmi taqbaylit s umata ugar n temsalt n ddin. Akka, dɣa, ara naf, tineggura-a, kkren-d kra yimṭurfa, bɣan ad tt-kksen. Qqaren-asen i yimezdaɣ n taddart belli lewziɛa-agi d’’leḥram, d lbidɛa’’. « Cwi kan drus yid-sen, yerna ur ǧǧhiden ara, wammag ad aɣ-agin ad nexdem timecret-agi. Ɛerden ad sluɣen tagnit, meɛna ur ssawḍen ara imi ur sɛin ara la lǧehd wala lḥeqq ». I d-yesmekta yiwen umezdaɣ n Tala Ɛetma, u yerna-d : « Nutni ur ttawin ara lewẓiɛa, ur ḥeddren ara deg yinejmuyaɛ n taddart ɣef wayen yerzan tamsalt-a. Limmer am nekk, tili aql-aɣ nessuffeɣ-iten deg ttufiq n taddart. Win ur neddi s wayen ɣef wayeg i temsefham tajmaɛt, i as-d-yeggran d aɛzal. Meɛna, teẓriḍ amek. Aql-aɣ akk d imawlan, yerna d iɛeggalen n tesqamut n taddart i d-izeggiren tikwal ». Akken yebɣu yili, tella-d tmecret, teḍra deg sser d liser, deg unecreḥ n yigerdan akked swab n yimeqqranen. Mlalen Wat taddart d agraw deg umraḥ ameqqran iwumi qqaren Abraḥ, ass-nni n lɛid, i wakken ad mɣafaren, ad qesren, ad d-awin kra n temsal tiqdimin gar-asen. Ladɣa, wid i d-yusan seg temdinin, wid ur nezdiɣ ara dinna. ‘’D ass yifen akk ussan’’, akken qqaren yimezwura, xas ulamma aṭas n tɣawsiwin ur rfident ara tsutwin-agi n tura. « Lɛid ɣer yimezwura mačči kan d aksum-nni ara ččen, meɛna d azalen-nni i tettawi tmecret deg yicuḍaḍ-is. Timecret, d tagmat, d anecraḥ, d asddukkel n wid yunneɣnan. D aseɛdel n wid yemɣunzan gar-asen. D asmekti n leɛwayed-nneɣ nekni s leqbayel. Dɣa, gar leɛwayed-nneɣ, ad naf anekcum n uqcict ɣer lewziɛa. Ass n tmecret, ad t-id-yawi baba-s neɣ yiwen seg twacult-is i wakken ad yawi iɣes. S lɛadda-agi ara t-issinen akk Wat taddart. Ad issinen isem-is akked yimawlan-is ». I d-yessefhem Dda Muḥend, ikemmel deg umezruy n lɛaddat « Syin mi yekcem ɣer lewziɛa, ssnent akk Wat taddart, ilaq ad t-issinen wiyaḍ, ladɣa imeddaukkal n baba-s. Ihi, mi meqqer ciṭ, ad t-awen ɣer ssuq, ad t-issinen yimsewqen, wid i yessnen baba-s, syin ad d-yaɣ aqerru. Qqaren-d i wakken ad iheggi iman-is, ad yuɣal d aqerru n uxxam. Asmi ara yaweḍ 18 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, meḥsub yuɣal d argaz, ad yekcem ɣer tejmaɛt. Ad yuɣal d aɛeggal-is, ad d-yettak rray-is deg-s. Ha-t-an ihi kra n wansayen n tmurt n leqbayel asmi yal yiwen yesseḥbibir ɣef twacult-is. Asmi ttuɣalent wallen n umeẓyen sdat tid n umeqqran. Ihi, ‘’lecɣal n taddart, meqqrit, nekni meẓẓiyit’’, i as-qqaren Wat Zik ». Am wakka, dɣa, ay bɣan kra n yimezdaɣ ad tuɣal taddart-nsen. « Ad d-tuɣal tegmat, umsefham i yellan zik gar-asen. Nella d amedya gar tudrin, ass-a, wa ijebbed ɣer uyeffus, wayeḍ ɣer uẓelmaḍ », i d-yenna Dda Meẓyan. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken taddart n Tala Ɛetman, llant-d snat n lewziɛat : yiwet deg taddart n Wadda, tayeḍ deg taddart n Ufella. Acu kan deg Taddart n Wadda, urǧin i d-yeḍra umgarad gar-asen. Xas ad d-yili kra, yettili-d d uffir, ur d-nettifrir, imi iferru uqbel ad ifiḍ. Ayen yelhan, yelha. ‘’Win ur nessin ad yels abernus-is, ad yessiked ɣer ɛemmi-s’’. Sya ar din, lɛid tameggazt i yal yiwen.

  H. Moula 

  
 Tawaɣit i d-yeḍran, imalas-a, deg temdint n Wehran, teǧǧa imdanen di lḥir. D yiwet n teqcict yeqqaren deg uɣerbaz alemmas, tin iwumi qqaren Aya, 13 n yiseggasen di leɛmer-is, i iɣaben ass-nni n lḥed iɛeddan ɣef uxxam-nsen. Timental n tuffra-ines, ɣef wakken i ttmeslayen yimdanen, d tukerḍa i tettwaker. Tadyant teḍra deg ugmam anida tezdeɣ, Mimuza yettabaɛen iɣrem El Badr ur nebɛid ara aṭas ɣef uzaduɣ asdawan. Seld mi tekfa timsirin tuzzigin, teffeɣ-d, seg yimir ulac fell-as isali. D ayen i yeǧǧan tawacult-is ad truḥ ɣer temsulta, ad tessuter anadi akken ara d-tban yelli-tsen uqbel ad ifat lawan. D asmekti kan, tukerḍa-agi n warrac d yiwen n usaru mucaɛen deg Wehran, imi yal tikkelt la nsel s twaɣit teḍra. Ɣef waya i d-yewwi ɣef yimawlan ad sseḥbibren ɣef dderya-nsen ladɣa imecṭaḥ, ad tteddun yid-sen s anda ruḥen.

  Khaled. A 

  
 Macahu, tellemcahu ad tt-yeḍbeε Ṛebbi d asaru. Qqarren zzman, yella yiwen n umdan d amesbaṭli acku d bab n draε u yesεa adrim swayes yuγ akk imdanen. Uuγalen s ddaw n ufus-is. Yiwen n umdan, yesεa tabγest (d akuraji), yugi ad yuγal am wiyaḍ d axeddam-is, neγ xersum ad yessusem am umeγbun n taddart-nni yečča lḥif d tmara.   Yahia Yanes 

  
 Amek i d-nenna ussan yezrin, llan yiɣerbazen di Xeṛṛaṭa ur uklalen ara isem n uɣerbaz, acku ur ksiben ara ula d ttawilat imecṭah i ilaqen ad d-ttuhiggin i yinelmaden iṭuṭiḥen, ladɣa taɣellist (Sécurité), tezdeg, d umḍiq i iwulmen i tɣuri. 

 Imawlan n yigerdan-a, fernen ad gren dderya-nsen deg yir addad, axir ma qqimen deg yixammen-nsen, ad semḥen di tmussni. Ɣef waya i ṣebren i wayen yellan. Meεna deg yimuṛas-a, furṣen tagnit i wakken ad qeɛεden ayen i d-yewwi ad yettwaqeεεed, daymi dduklen ddeqs deg-sen deg kra n yiɣerbazen di Xeṛṛata, i wakken ad d-ssizedgen kra deg-sen. Amedya d ayen i gan deg uɣerbaz amenzu n taddart n Ṭtabya deg tɣiwant n Xeṛṛata. 

 Dɣa, dehnen leḥyuḍ-is, berrzen tineɣriyin, yerna ssizedgen-tent i wakken ad tteklen d akken arraw-nsen deg laman ara ilin di tuɣalin-a. Seg tama-nniḍen, deg tɣiwant n Draε n Lqayed, texdem tddukkla n yibabaten n warrac akked kra n yimezdaɣ n taddart n Ṣṣnaḍla leqdic igerrzen. 

 Qeεɛden aɣerbaz alemmas n Xennic Sliman i wakken ad t-id-afen yinelmaden d yiselmaden ihegga. Iqeddicen-a, εejben nezzeh imezdaɣ n tuddar-a, acku iswi-nsen d yiwen; ad ḍemnen tudert yelhan i unelmad, i wakken ad ssiwḍen ɣer yigemmaḍ igerrzen. Ad nekfu s wawal n yiwen n uselmad i yellan d ababat daɣen: «Nessaram leqdicat am wigi ad ttilin mkul taggara n ddurt. Imi ayen yelhan yelha, am wakken i ssarameɣ ula d iɣerbazen-nniḍen ad ḍefṛen tikti-agi».

<p class="has-text-align-right"> K. K. 

  
 Yekker ussan-a, deg umaḍal merra, wawal ɣef yiwen n usnas (Application) i d-ibanen tazwara d urar an, maca simmal yettwaseqdac, iban-d wudem-is amihan (dangereux) n tidet.

 Asnas-a, yettarra d aklan akk arrac d yinubiyen i d-yeɣlin deg wurar-is. Rnu yeddemmir-iten ɣer taggara I wakken ad nɣen iman-nsen. Ula iwumi ara d-nebder isem n usnas-a. D acu, yewwi-d ɣef yal ababat ad iɛas tigawin n tarwa-s i ikesben tilifunat ifehmen. Dɣa, gar wayen i d-yessutur wurar-a, iɛedda i sswab, ajraḥ n tfekka, tanekra deg yiḍ i umuqel n usaru yessaggad, neɣ d aɣunzu n ḥedd n yimdanen teɣzi n wass. Armi yewweḍ ukellex ɣer umecwar aɛlayan, ad asen-yessuter wurar ad gen tilist i tudert-nsen. « Ur umineɣ ara d akken ilemẓiyen ad xulḍen s tidet urar-a, neɣ ad as-fken tagnit, ad ten-ikellex ». I d-yenna yiwen n ubabat seg Ayt Smaɛel. Ɣef wawal n tɣamsa tamaḍlant, win i d-yesnulfan asnas-a, yeḍfer tizrawin n tussna n tnefsit. Mi t-id-ṭṭfen yinesdabuyen n tmurt-is, iqarr-d d akken yesnulfa-d asnas-a akken ad ineɣ akk arrac imexsas n tegzi, i d-isemma d agudu abyuluji. Dɣa, segmi i d-banen kra n warrac d teqcicin i yenɣan iman-nsen seg usnas-a, gren aṭas n yibabaten deg tɛessast d uwessi n tarwa-nsen akken ur ttekcamen deg tqeffet n yir amdan. Am wakken yessawel uneɣlaf n teɣdemt Ṭeyyeb Luḥ, ad yettwasewḥel usnas-a deg tmurt n Lezzayer.

  M. K. 

  
 Ad tessuddes Texxamt n tfellaḥt n lwilaya n Tizi-Uzzu s lmendad n tenmehla n srabes n tfellaḥt n Tizi-Uzzu d Iferḥunen, yiwen n wass n tussna ad d-yilin ass-agi, 24 deg waggur n yulyu 2019, ɣef 10h n tsebḥit, deg taddart n Zubga, yettabaεen ɣer tɣiwant n Illilten.

 Ad d-yili usentel n temlilit-agi ɣef yidles d wayen i icudden ɣer tfellaḥt n unetrum, neɣ Lḥebb Lemluk (cerise). Ɣef waya dɣa, tger-d Texxamt n tfellaḥt n Tizi Uzzu tiɣri i yifellaḥen n temḍiqt-agi akken ad d-asen s ṭṭaqa, akken ad-d sfaydin seg temlilit-agi ideg ara yilin aṭas n yimussnawen n uḥric n tfellaḥt.

 Ad-d-awin yimussnawen-agi awal ɣef useklu n lḥebb lemluk, d wazal n lɣella-agi, ama seg tama n tdawsa, ama seg tama n tdamsa. Am wakken ara mmeslayen diɣ ɣef wamek i ilaq ad d-tili tuẓut iwatan n useklu-agi, amek i t-fersen d wamek i t-leqmen. 

 Gar yimussnawen ara d-yessidren timlilit, ad naf Mass Kaci Boukhelfa, d amazzay, d amaswaḍ n wayen yeεnan yakk iberden n useḥbiber ɣef yimɣan d yisekla. Rnu ɣef waya d imeḍebber deg tenmehla n srabes n tfellaḥt n Tizi Uzzu.
  Ali Zalouk  

  
 Tagi, d tamacahutt γef win i iγurren iman-is, yenwa yefhem ddunit. Tameṭṭut inehhun yelli-s γer leṣlaḥ acku teẓra mebla ṣṣwab ulac tifrat, ma d tin i irenun zzit i tmes, deg yijufar-is kan ara teṭṭef. 

 Yiwet n tmeṭṭut si tid ur tt-nebni γef ṣṣeḥ, truḥ γer yelli-s, tufa-tt-in tezεef, mi i tt-testeqsa γef sebba, tenna-as: « Ulac a yemma, d cwiṭ n wawal kan i d-yellan gar-i d urgaz-iw. 

 Di lεuḍ ad tt-twehhi γer ṣṣwab, ad as-tini ‘’a yelli tameṭṭut iḥercen d tin yettsaεafen argaz-is, d tin isebbṛen ittsaεafen, win ittqabalen igersan d izilan γef lağal-is’’, tenna-as: « Welleh a yelli, ma hennaγ alamma walaγ-kem terriḍ-t ddaw iḍaṛṛen-im ». Mi i as-thedder, argaz issel-d seg umnaṛ n tewwurt, tameṭṭut tγil deg uzniq i yella. Nettat teqqaṛ-as: « A yelli, argaz am sellum ali-t kan dderğa dderğa alamma tuliḍ-t.

  Imiren ad txedmeḍ deg-s ṛṛay-im. Yuγal, yekcem-d urgaz, yenna-as: « Lεeslama a taḍegalt ». Taḍegalt, teffeγ ur as-terri ara.Yenna urgaz i tmeṭṭut-is: « Acu akka yuγen yemma-m, εni tqerjeḍ-as daγen cwiṭ-nni n wawal yellan? ». Tameṭṭut: « Ahakan, ayen tebγiḍ ɣer γur-s ad tawḍed ». Yiwen wass, tebɣa tmeṭṭut, ad terkeb aḍu-nni i as-temla yemma-s. Yewwi-tt-id urgaz-is, yesleγẓam-as afus-is.

 Truḥ-d yemma-s la tettcetki i lğiran. Yeffeγ urgaz-nni γer tḍegalt-is: « Ala a taḍegalt, mačči d nekk i as-yeslγeẓmen afus. Yelli-m, tebγa ad tali γef sellum-nni i as-d-temliḍ, yuγal tezgel yiwet n dderğa, dɣa, teγli-d. Tameṭṭut, tefhem tamsalt, tuγ-itt mkemmed tessusem. Ya saεd n win yemlan abrid n ṣṣwab.

<p style="text-align:right">  Yahia Yanes 

  
 Azday adelsan n Uwqas, yesuddes-d timlilit tadelsant ɣef teɣzi n ddurt-agi ideg nella, imi tebda sendiḍelli n ssebt 10 di furar, ad tekfu ass n ssebt 17 furar 2018. Leqdic-agi adelsan anesbaɣur, ad yili d tajmilt i tlata n yiwudam n yidles d tmussni i d-tefka twacult n Reḥmani n tama n Uwqas, wigi d Sliman, Ɛebdelqader akked Lwiza. Timlilit-agi meqqren, ad tili deg wammas adelsan yewwin isem n yiwen gar yiwudam-agi, wagi d Sliman Reḥmani. Ma d ahil n leqdic-agi, ad yili akka: Ɣef teɣzi n ddurt, ad tili temsikent n tfelwin n teklut akked temsikent s usenzi n yidlisen n yidles amaziɣ. Sendiḍelli n ssebt 10 furar 2018, ɣef 13h00 n uzal, yella-d usarag ɣef tudert d yimuhal n Mass Sliman Reḥmani, sɣur Mass Amara Ɛebderraḥman akked Mass Meǧdub. Ma ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, tella-d teswiɛt n ccna n kra n tezlatin n Sliman Ɛazem, syin ɣer-s, d timenna n tmedyazt sɣur yimedyazen-agi: Farid Ṭayri, Caɛban Muḥamed, Dwadi Akli, Ḥassan Muḥamed…atg. Ma d azekka n ttlata 13 deg furar 2018, ɣef 13h00 n uzal, d talilt (chorale) n terbeɛt “Imma Tadrart” ara d-yewwin kra n tezlatin tiqbayliyin i ifazzen ayen din. Tin ɣur-s, d tamezgunt s ṣṣenf n umunlug, ara d-yilin sɣur Nadir Miluli yettwassnen s yisem n Jusra. Ma i wass n leǧemɛa-agi sdat-nneɣ, yetturaǧu ad yili ɣef 13h00 n uzal usenɛet n yiwen n usaru meẓiyen ɣef tudert d yimuhal n Mass Ɛebdelqader, syin ɣur-s d asarag s ṣṣenf n “table ronde” ddima ɣef umecwar-is. Am wakken yetturaǧu ad d-yili usarag s uskasi d usenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen n tmarut Taseɛdit Yasin ɣef wammud-is n tmucuha n tayri n tmurt n Leqbayel iwumi tga azwel-agi: “Souviens-toi ramier”.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Deg wussan n taggara n yimalas, ttilin-d leqdicat idelsanen deg yixxamen n umezgun neɣ ixxamen n yilmeẓyen, ama d ccna, d ccḍeḥ neɣ d amezgun. D tagnit i wid iḥemmlen idles d wid i d-irezzun ɣer yixxamen-a akken ad ttun cwiṭ leɛtab n yixeddim n wussan n ssmana i yixeddamen, neɣ i warrac daɣen akken ad steɛfun kra seg teɛkemt n temsirin d yiluɣma n yiselmaden-nsen i ten-yettabaɛen ssmana kamel. D leqdic yerzan ama d imeqqranen, ama d imecṭaḥ acku idles ur yesɛi ara leɛmer, imi yal taggayt s uḥric-is. 

 D ccɣel-a i yettaččaren ahil n Uxxam n umezgun amnaḍan Ɛebdelqader Ɛellula n Wehran yal tikkelt. Ma nwala-d deg yennayer-nni, aṭas n yirmad i d-yellan u rzan, ladɣa, asfugel n useggas amaynut n yimaziɣen. Deg waggur n furar ihi, yetturaju wahil-nniḍen, d ahil anesbaɣur ara yezrin s tmezgunin neɣ s ccna d uẓawan ɣef teɣzi n waggur. Yal taggara n yimalas d wass n aram tameddit, ad d-yili leqdic adelsan. S tewzel ɣef kra n tceqqufin n umezgun neɣ n uẓawan ara d-yilin; yebda wahil ass n 2 furar s yiwet n tceqquft i yimeqqranen s usentel “Makbet” n umezgun aɣelnaw Azzayri. 

 Syin deg wass n 5, d taceqquft “Tizizwit” neɣ “En-nahla” n Uxxam n umezgun n Ɛ/ ɛellula yakan i warrac imeẓyanen. Ad kemmlent akken tceqqufin-a ar wass n 9 deg furar, anda i yetturaǧu ad d-tettwasenɛet tmezgunt “La tranchée” n Uxxam n umezgun amnaḍan n Bgayet. D timseḍsa neɣ d timsirin i d-nettagem seg umezgun ara ikemmlen akken armi d ass n 22 furar ɣef 16h, tetturaǧu yiwet n tmeɣra n yiwen uɣanib n ccḍeḥ aklasiki n terbaɛt Kid’s scool. Ma d ass n 24, d aḥric n uẓawan ara yeṭṭfen adeg sɣur Asudu Arumi, s tulmisin akk sseqdacen deg uẓawan. Ad yekfu wahil deg wass n 27 furar ɣef 18h n tmeddit s tmeɣra n ccḍeḥ n Flamenco n Usudu Aspenyul di Wehran.

  D asmekti kan, d akken Axxam n umezgun amnaḍan Ɛebdelqader Ɛellula, s yisem-is n zik (Opéra de place d’arme), yal tikkelt neɣ tagnit, yesteqbil s yal leqdic yerzan idles. Akken daɣen i d-ssenɛatent dinna trebbuyaɛ n ccna, n umezgun neɣ n ccḍeḥ n yinelmaden n yiɣerbazen imahilen-nsen. Rnu imi i d-yezga deg wul n temdint, daymi i t-nettaf dima yettaččar s wid i d-yettasen ad kksen ɣef lxaṭer, u ad d-sfaydin seg wayen i d-yettilin d wayen i ttwalin.

<p style="text-align:right">  Khaled Achoui 

  
 iḍelli n lḥed 25 meɣres 2018, ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, i tebda s wudem unṣib tezrigt tis tesɛa n tfaska “Taɣuri s wurar”, deg temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n Tizi Uzzu.

 D leqdic i d-thegga Tenmehla n yidles ɣef teɣzi n ddurt, imi yebda iḍelli n lḥed 25 deg meɣres, ad tekfu ass n ssebt 31 deg waggur-agi n meɣres. Ad d-tili tezrigt-agi deg 5 n yimukan n yidles d tmussni deg wakal n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu yecban: Axxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri d Tneḍfart-is n Azazga, Tamkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, ulmis adelsan Matoub Lounes n Ain El Hammam akked kra n tamimiwin n lwilaya. Yettwahegga-d yiwen wahil d amerkanti, ideg ara d-tili rreḥba n yidlisen (timsikniyin sɣur 20 n tezrigin, d yisenza s yibuddan sɣur waṭas n yimura), ama deg Uxxam n yidles ama deg Tneḍfart-is n Azazga neɣ deg Temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, seg 9h n ssbeḥ alamma d 16h n tmeddit ɣef teɣzi n ddurt, am wakken daɣen ara d-ilin waṭas n yisaragen akked yisikwan ɣef teɣzi n 7 wussan. Ma d ahil n ttiɛad-agi idelsan uzzig n yigerdan, ad d-yili d amerkanti. Ad nezwir s yisikwan n temkerḍt n tɣuri, ad d-ilin ddeqs n yiskiwan gar-asen: Urraren n usegmi, asikew n tutlayt tamaziɣt, win n tira d tzabut, win n usuneɣ d win tulsa n tmacahut…atg. Ma d wid n Uxxam n yidles d tneḍfart-is n Azazga, ad d-ilin akka; win n tifinaɣ, win n tmaziɣt, win n usuneɣ, n tmucuha, asikew n yimuhal n ufus…atg. Yerna yal asikew yesɛa timsizzelt, ideg ara d-ifriren tlata n yimsizwaren. Am wakken daɣen ara d-tili temsizzelt tameqqrant, deg Temkerḍit n tɣuri, ass n larebɛa akked lǧemɛa i d-iteddun. Timsizwert-agi, ad tili ɣef yimuhal n ufus. Ma d tin n wass n lexmis 29 meɣres, ad tili ɣef sin-agi ixeddimen akked tsuqqilt seg tefransist ɣer teqbaylit n yiwen uḥric seg yiwen n wungalen n Mulud Mɛemmeri. Wayeḍ ad d-yili azekka n ttlata, d agzul n wungal “Le fils du pauvre” n Mulud Ferɛun. Ma d rrebɛa n yisaragen yetturaǧun ad d-ilin deg wussan-agi i d-iteddun, d wigi: sin imezwura, ad d-ilin sɣur umaru d uneɣmas ilemẓi Anis Ben Tayeb, yiwen s usentel-agi “Amekkan n umennay deg tmacahut taqbaylit” ad d-yili ass-agi ɣef 10h00 deg tzeqqa n yisaragen n uxxam n yidles. Wis sin, ad d-yili azekka n ttlata 26 meɣres 2018, s usentel-agi “Liɣ d ilemẓi yerna uriɣ adlis”, ddima sɣur Anis Ben Tayeb deg tzeqqa n yisaragen n uxxam n yidles. Wis tlata, ad d-yili ass n larebɛa 28 meɣres, sɣur yiwen imḍebber n laman n lwilaya ɣef tɣellist n yigerdan mgal yir asexdem n ttawil n Internet. Ma d wis rebɛa, ad d-yili azekka-in n lexmis 29 meɣres, sɣur Ali Ferɛun ara d-yawin awal ɣef wungal “Le fils du pauvre” n baba-s Mulud Ferɛun. Ma deg tzeqqa n ssinima, Ammas adelsan Matoub Lounes akked Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb yacine, yetturaǧu ad d-yili wahil meqqren n yisihren. Gar tceqqufin n umezgun, imseḍsa, aseḥḥar akked usenɛet n yisura, timeɣriwin n ccna…atg. Am wakken daɣen yetturaǧu, ad d-tili teɣlamt (caravane) n tmucuha n leqbayel ara d-iẓuren aṭas n tamiwin, sɣur tiddukkla tadelsant Ixulaf n Ǧerǧer n Tizi Uzzu. Mebla ma nettu tamkerḍit yettembiwilen (bibilobus), ara yerzun ɣer ddeqs n yimukan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ad d-yili daɣen wahil n tuqribin, ara yebdun seg wass n ttlata 27 meɣres 2018, ara d-yilin deg tɣiwanin-agi: Tigzirt, Tizi Uzzu, At Dwala, Ililten…atg. Ass n ssebt 31 meɣres 2018, ad d-tili tesfugla n taggara deg Uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer, ideg ara ttunefken yigerdasen n uttekki i yimekkiyen deg tfaska-agi, d warrazen i warrac ara d-yifriren deg yal asikew d yal timsizzelt tameqqrant.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Taṣebḥit n wass-nni n lǧemɛa 1 deg waggur n duǧamder 2017, wehmen akk yimezdaɣ n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i iruḥen ad d-awin aɣrum ufan-t yewweḍ ɣer 15,00 Da i yiwet n tbagiṭ, mebɛed mi yella ixeddem ala 10,00 Da. Timerna-agi, tusa-d mi d-llan sin n yinejmuɛen n tiddukkla taɣelnawt n yimsenziyen d yinḍan (ANCA) i d-yellan akka; ass-nni ttlata 28 unbir 2017, tella-d temlilit n uniraw aɣelnaw n ANCA akked wid i tt-yettmetilen deg 67 n tɣiwanin n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, akked wid i tt-yettmetilen deg 48 n lwilayat n tmurt. Azekka-nni n larebɛa 29 deg unbir 2017, tella-d temlilit n wid yettmetilen ixebbazen (wid yesewwayen aɣrum deg lkucat) n 48 n lwilayat, akked tdukla n yixebbazen n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Msefhamen i wakken ad qqadren iwellihen i d-yeffɣen deg temlilit tamatut i d-yellan ass-nni n ttlata 28/11/2017. Iwellihen swayes i d-ffɣen deg timlilit-agi d wigi; timerna n ssuma n uɣrum s wazal n 5 n yiddinaren i tbagiṭ, asenqes deg lmizan s wazal n 50 n yigramen, am wakken daɣen axebbaz ad isenz aɣrum i bab n tḥanut s 14 n yiddinaren. Ixebbazen akk n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, msefhamen i wakken ad qqadren leqwanen-agi, dɣa dayen i xedmen seg umenzu n waggur-agi ideg nella. Dɣa ɣef wannect-agi, yenna-aɣ-d bab n yiwet n tḥanut deg tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimun: “ Ur d-wwiɣ ara aɣrum deg wussan-agi ssebt, lḥed akked letnayen, imi ur teffiɣ ara felli tmerna-agi n ssuma n uɣrum, drus maḍi ɛecrin dduru i tbagiṭ ara awiɣ, imi ma yewwi-tt yiwen deg tcelwiḍt dɣa xesreɣ akin akka, nessutur ad aɣ-t-id-ren ɣer 12,5 n yiddinaren, i wakken ad ten-senz nekkni s 15 n yiddinaren…”. Ma d yiwen n umezdaɣ n tama-agi yenna-d: “Ur d-ttawiɣ ara aɣrum s axxam, imi nejmaɛen kan gar-asen ssuffɣen-d ccɣel-agi, mebla ma teẓra tneɣlaft n tunzzut, yerna mačči s 5 Da ara yernu ɣef tikkelt, yerna ayɣer i d as-neqsen 50g deg lmizan, imi i d as-rnan 05 Da ɣef ssuma taqdimt, ad greɣ tiɣri s yisem-iw d amezdaɣ n tɣiwant-agi, i wakken ur d-nettaɣ ara aɣrum deg wussan-agi s ssuma-a, alamma iban-d belli d lḥeqq-nsen timerna-agi, acku ala nekni s yiɣermanen (citoyens) i yeččan tiyita, kulec yuli, ala imdanen i yettirxisen deg tmurt-a”.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ssebt-agi i d-iteddun, 13 deg waggur-a n yennayer ideg nella, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, ad tili temlilit taseklant s tewsit n “Café Littéraire” deg Wammas adelsan Ferhat Ramdane n Buzgan deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D timlilit ideg ara yezzi wawal ɣef usentel-agi : “Tutlayt Taqbaylit: seg tsekla ar tussna”. Ad d-yili wawal ɣef wamek i d-tezger teqbaylit seg tsekla taqburt, tedder armi tuɣal d tutlayt n tussna d tmussni am nettat am tutlayin-nniḍen, d wagi i d asentel agejdan i yettraǧun seg temlilit-agi taseklant. Am wakken daɣen ara d-imeslay uselmad d umaru d umnadi deg uḥric n yidles amaziɣ Mass Yahioun, ɣef udlis-is aneggaru “Taqbaylit : Iles d yidles”, i d-yessazreg deg useggas n 2016, ad yili diɣ usenzi s ubuddu-ines i wid yebɣan ad t-aɣen. Ad d-nesmekti imeɣriyen-nneɣ i wumi ur tettunefek ara tegnit ad rzun ɣer dinna, zemren ad as-slen srid deg rradyu n tiddukkla tadelsant Tiɛwinin, deg tansa-agi n Internet: www.act-bouzeguene.org/radio. Awal ɣef umara. Larbi Yahioun deg tazwara d amaru n 4 n yilisen. Adlis-is amezwaru d tamedyazt, yis-s i yenǧer abrid n tira, “Tayri n umedyaz”, yeffeɣ-d ɣer Usqamu Unnig n Timuzɣa (HCA), deg useggas n 2014. Syin, yerna-d tamezgunt “Lewsaya n baba” deg 2015. Sakin, yessuffeɣ-d amnir i wumi isemma “Abrid ɣer ukayad n Tmaziɣt” deg 2015. Ma deg taggara n useggas 2016, yessuffeɣ-d adlis-is aneggaru, win iwumi isemma “Taqbaylit, iles d yidles”. Deg tis snat d amnadi, imi yexdem yakan tizrawin, yebnan ɣef unadi ussnan deg unnar n tutlayt d yidles n Teqbaylit, ɣef tmedyazt tamensayt, ɣef wungal n teqbaylit…atg. Yesselmad daɣen tamaziɣt deg uɣerbaz deg lwilaya n Bgayet. Am wakken daɣen ara d-nesmekti imeɣriyen-nneɣ, belli d tagi i d timlilit taseklant deg useggas-agi amaynut n 2018, nessaram ad idum leqdic n tiddukkla-a i lebda.

  G. A. 

  
 Yettuneḥsab waṭṭan n ssker di tallit-a, gar waṭṭanen yettcewwilen amdan s waṭas. Ɣas ma yella tessaweḍ tesnujjya ad t-teḥkem, wanag ineqq armi d amelyun d uzgen n yimdanen yal aseggas deg umaḍal. Di Tmurt n leqbayel, ɣef leḥsab n waṭas n tddukkliwin, yettzid umḍan n yimuḍan yal aseggas s tɣara i yessewhamen yal yiwen. Ama d amɣar, d alemmas, d ilemẓi neɣ d agrud, akk iḥricen-a n tmetti yettḥaz-iten waṭṭan-a n ssker, ɣas s ssebbat yemgaraden tikwal. 

 Dɣa, i lmend n wass amaḍalan n waṭṭan-a n ssker, 14 unbir, llant tddukkliwin i d-iheyyan ussan n usḥulfu d uɛeyyer ɣef waṭṭan-a i yuɣalen d anezgum di tudert-a tatrart. Yelha ad d-nini d akken ayen iɣef ttwessin yimsujjiyen s umata bac ur iteṭṭef yiwen aṭṭan-a, d tagella tuqɛidt (équilibrée), yexḍan cwiṭ i ssker aragaman, akked waṭas n uḥerrek neɣ n waddal. Ɣef wawal-nsen, amili i malen yimdanen ɣer lgazuz d yingulen, yella gar tmentilin i d-yewwin aṭṭan-a. Rnu-as daɣen ccyaḍa n uksum d tassemt ɣur kra, imi ur xeddmen addal, ur leḥḥun annect i ilaq ad yelḥu umdan deg wass. 

 Ilaq ad d-nebder taluft n unqas n warmud n kra n tddukkliwin i yennumen ssuddusent-d kra yal ass amaḍalan n waṭṭan n ssker, acku kksent-asen akud i yiɛeggalen-nsent tekliwin timalasin n ugdud i d-yettilin yal sem. Taggara, yewwi-d ad d-nesmekti d akken tikwal ur seḥḥan leḥsabat ara i d-ttakkent tddukkliwin d yisɣuren n tdawsa n da d din. Acku, ugar n yimuḍan ur nettuneḥsab akken, meḥsub ur ttwajerrden ara, imi ssenf n waṭṭan-nsen d afessas, llan ahat d igiman n yimdanen i yesɛan ssker maca ur ẓrin. Ɣef usentel-a, ttnebbihen yimsujjiyen ɣef wazal n uɛeyyer deg teklinikin d tzeɣwa n tdawsa s umata.

  M. K. 

  
 Xas ulamma ẓran yimdanen lemḍarat swayes i d-igellu uculliḍ n uplastik, ama ɣef twennadt ama ɣef tezmart n umdan, ladɣa bu tiɣmi taberkant , maca ad t-naf yettwaḍeggar di yal amkan. Aya,i icemmet tugna n twennadt di tmurt. Yesluɣuy uma d aman. D tawaɣit i yiselman d wayen akk yettidiren daxel n waman-a. Ilaq ad neḥsu d akken, ur ttruḥun ara s shala yculliḍen n uplastik si twennaṭ.Ttɣiman azal n 100 n yiseggasen. Ula d tazmert n umdan, tettili deg umuhi (danger). Amedya, mi ara tuɣal tgella yeḥman deg uculliḍ-a. Akken nezra, allalen-nni s wayes yettwaxdem uculliḍ-nni, ur nelhi ara. Ihi, ad d-glun s lemḍarrat ɣef tgella-nni. Syin, ad tt-yečč umdan mebla ma ifaq s wanect-a. Ɣef wanect-a, dɣa, i d-ttwaxlaqen aṭas n tddukkliwin deg taggara-a di tmurt. Ad nebdar tiddukkla n Gourara n taddart n Triḥant di tɣiwant n Bujimeɛ. Tiddukkla-a, tefka azal ameqqran i usentel-a: texdem yiwen n wahil i tebda deg useggas n 2013. Deg yiseggasen-a, ssawḍen akken ad jemɛen azal n ṭun n uplastik, i yettwaɛawden asexdem. Akken daɣen i xedmen imekwan i iḍuman di taddart, akken imezdaɣ ur ttdeggiren ara iḍuman-nsen deg twennadt. Zyada ɣef waya, thegga-d tddukkla-a, s lemɛawna n yiwet n termist, di tɣiwant n Tigzirt, ajmaɛ n uplastik. Gar yiswiyen n tddukkla n twennadt Gourara d asuzer txeddem akken at zuzerakke useɛlem n yimdanen s lemḍarrat i d-igellu uplastik, ama ɣef twennadt , neɣ ɣef tezmart n umdan , aɣersiw akked imɣan.

  Yamani Souhila 

  
 Yekker Boualem yegza ifuk sswab, tfuk tudert, d anebdu aneggaru i d-yeqqimen send ad isekker umezruy tiwwura. Yuɣal wakud war tisemhuyin, war ccbaḥa, war lbenna. D aberkan kan, ur iban ansi i yebda neɣ ansi i yekfa. Igenni, yendem deg tafat i d-yettak zik. Itij, yugi ad yeslef i kra-nni n yimdanen i mazal ur rwilen ara. Mazal ssaramen ad d-yezzi i wakken ad yeslef i tfekkiwin-nsen s yizenzaren n tafukt. Yuɣal s tuffra kan i d-iteffeɣ ssbeḥ, yeṭṭaffar s lemɣawla tameddit, amzun akken yugad ula d netta. Anebdu-agi, gten irebraben. Yal tanzayt, ad d-sfeqden ɣer teftisin akken ad debbren ɣef yimdanen amek ara succfen, amek ara rsen iselsa. S iqendyar, isandalen, iccumar iɣezzfanen d irabuzen, sseɣlin-d rrebrab ɣef yimdanen deg teftisin. Tilawin, hetmen fell asent lhijab aberkan, ma d irgazen, ad succfen kan anda ulac tilawin yerna s iserwula. Tayri, taḍsa, tumert, talwit, asirem, tirga ggujlen. Imdanen rreglen yiwen yiwen ɣef teftisin armi i d-yegra yillel weḥd-s, yenfel d tusaft d leḥzen. Boualem Yekker, yugi ad yebru i lwaw am wiyad. Yeẓra imcumen-agi bɣan ad ssuddsen tudert akken i asen-yehwa. Bɣan ad d-sseɣlin tugdi ɣef yimdanen akken ad awḍen ɣer yiswi-nsen. Nessaram d akken imdanen, ad sɛun tabɣest, ur ttaggan-ara at iččumar, ad xedmen awanek ineslem deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Akken yuɣ tanummi deg yisegasen yezrin, Boualem Yekker, yeddem takerrust-is, yerna tawacult-is, yeṭṭef abrid ɣer yillel. Ruḥen ɣer yiwet n teftist tecbeḥ ugar n targit deg yiwen umekkan anda yemlal udrar akked lebḥer. Amekkan-agi, yebɛed ɣef tmanaɣt, mazal deg-s talwit, mazal ur as-faqen ara yirebraben. Sbedden aqiḍun-nsen ɣef yiri n teftist. Ḥemmlen ad slen i zzhir n lemwaji ticki i tturaren-t. Boualem d twacult-is, sɛeddan 3 n smanat n yimuras acek-itent. Kksen lxiq akken iwata xas akka llan kra n wuguren i wakken ad d-aɣen kra n tɣawsiwin, amedya aɣrum. Yecfa Boualem ɣef ass aneggaru n yimuras-nsen i d-yeɣlin ass amenzu n cutember. Imi i d-kkren ssbeḥ, uffan-d igenni d yillel rfan aṭas, heznen d ayen kan. Abeḥri yezuɣur isigna. Isigna, xedmen-d tili anect-ila-tt deg teftist. Iṭij, ur yezmir ad d-yesken iman-is. Boualem d mmi-s, ruḥen ɣer yigran i d-yezzin ɣef teftist akken ad asen-innin, qqimet di lehna, ar tufat, tanemmirt ɣef ccbaḥa-nwen i aɣ-iwansen acḥal aya! Boualem d mmi-s Kamal, leḥḥun deg ugama, wehmen deg ccbaḥa n yisekla, n yimɣan, n yiɣersiwen…Xas akka tekkat lehwa, ur nḥerwan ara. Taggara, uɣalen ɣer teftist, rnan ččuren allaɣen-nsen s tugniwin n ccbaḥa send ad uɣalen s axxam. Gren tiɣawsiwin i d-wwin yid-sen ɣer tkerrust, ṭṭfen abrid n tuɣalin. Imi mazal azal n 50 ikilumitren ad awḍen ɣer tmanaɣt, uffan-d kra n yilmeẓyen s iččumar, rsan iselsa am widak-nni i ttrusen deg tmurt n Afghanistan. Deg yifassen-nsen, ṭṭfen ibeckiḍen, ijenwiyen, irabuzen…gezzmen abrid s yidɣaɣen. Sseḥbasen-d tikerrusin, ttmuqulen tilawin ma yella rsan-t lḥijab neɣ ala. Boualem Yekker, yecca times, yekkuffer deg lbaṭel i xeddmen, maca ur yezmir d acu ara yexdem. Yesḥassef ɣef nnif i yeffɣen imdanen… <em> Yettkemmil  </em>

  Tahar Djaout. Tasuqqilt sɣur Hammar Boussad 

  
 Deg yiseɣrez amaynut 2018 n unaẓur Ṭaleb Ṭaher, yella wanida i d-yewwi amaynut ama seg tama n uẓawan neɣ n usefru. Ad d-naf deg-s 9 n yizwilen: “Agellid”, “Jeddi, Jidda”, “Aṭṭan”, “Qqim kan qqim”, “Dduḥ-iw gar sin n leqrun”, “Amehraz“, “Lefhama“, “Ameksa“ akked “Amendil“. Deg tezlit tamezwarut ideg yekki ucennay ameqqran Ɛetmani, yella usqerdec ɣef tmurt d tayri-s s umata. Tizlit “Jeddi, Jidda”, yecna deg-s tujjma n zzman aqbur. Amek tessenfel tudert d liḥala n uxxam, imi aṭas i yettwaǧǧen d iɛeryanen. Yeqqar : « Ukiɣ-d kkreɣ tasebḥit, walaɣ ddunit, tban-iyi-d amzun teččeḥ ». Deg tis kraḍet, i d-yebda s tezlit n Ayt Bumendil, iger unaẓur awal n tekyes d usebɣes i umuḍin, akken tebɣu tili lḥala. Abeɛda wid yezgan xaqen di sbiṭar, guggen ɣef uxxam d yimawlan. Maca daɣen deg-s tajmilt i yinaẓuren merra i tewwi tmettant. Yella ussefru deg tezlit tis ukuẓet, s uzwel n “Qqim kan qqim“, ɣef ugama n kra n tɣawsiwin, d kra n yisuḍaf n tudert. « Qqim kan qqim yir aserdun ur t-ttdeqqim ɣas ad yeddu d yileɣman. Qqim kan qqim, yir asɣar ur yettleqqim ɣas njer-as targa n waman. Qqim kan qqim, yir argaz hder neɣ qqim yerna ad ak-yexdeɛ di laman ». Tizlit i d-yusan deffir-s, iwumi isemma “Dduḥ-iw gar sin n leqrun“, iga-d taḥawact s tɣara-is ɣef tikli n tudert-is d tlufa n zzman. Ideg yenna tazwara: « Ddunit am umezgun, wa yurar-itt d aɛeggun, wa yurar-itt s lefhama ». D ameslay ɣef tezlit tis 6, iban-d umaynut ula di tmeɣrut i yebna s ABC. D kra seg wayen yenna deg-s dɣa: « Ṭaleb Ṭaher mi ak-yewzen, fiḥel leḥruz, fiḥel llif d lhemza ». Yeqqar daɣen deg tsetna n taɣect “Lefhama“: « Anda tella lefhama, win d-temlaleḍ ad tferḥeḍ. Anda akken ulac lefhama, rfed lqecc-ik truḥeḍ ». Deg tezlit tis ṭamet “Ameksa“, nezmer ad nsel i: « Aql-i qqleɣ d ameksa, d lmal n medden i kesseɣ, tameddit mi ara t-id-rreɣ, s imawlan-is. Ur ttɛeddiɣ ɣef tlisa, ẓriɣ anida ara ɛefseɣ, tedduɣ s lqis ». S wudem n tkessawt ihi, yewwi-d Ṭaleb Ṭaher kra n yimedyaten ɣef lɛada d tmussni n tudert. Ahat d asmekti n tigawt-a i yettuqan, imi ula d netta yella d ameksa di tegrudant. « Amendil » d tizlit taneggarut deg yiseɣrez-a. Akken i d-yeqqar uzwel-is, yerra-d awellih unaẓur ɣer uselsu-a ansayan i simmal yettenqas useqdec-ines taggara-a. Deg wawalen-nni n useḥbiber d usaki, yenna-d abeɛda: « Kemm lasel-im ur t-ttbeddil, cfu i am-d-tehder yemma-m. Kem lḥiǧab-im d amendil, irennu-am di lqima-m ». Album-a, i yettnuzun akka tura deg tḥuna n yiḍebsiyen n ccna, tlaq-as s tidet tmesliwt.

  M. K. 

  
 Ass-nni n arim, 13 deg maggu iɛeddan, i yemmut Abdelḥafiḍ Idres bab n umawal ameqqran Tamaziɣt/Tafrensist. Tafrensist/Tamaziɣt. Iruḥ yiwen n wudem i tmaziɣt deg wussan-a imenza n Remḍan, d tablaḍt-nniḍen i as-inesren i tmaziɣt, imi d yiwen i d-yeǧǧan leqdic meqqren u mazal yezmer ad yeqdec sya ar sdat. Dɣa amzun d timkerḍit i imedlen tiwura-s s lmut n Abdelḥafiḍ Idres i yewwḍen leɛfu n Rebbi ɣef leɛmer n 73 n yiseggasen ass n arim, 13 deg maggu iɛeddan, deg temdint n Bgayet.

  Yettwassen Mass Idres, ladɣa, s ufaris meqqren d ugerruj i d-yeǧǧa aseggas iɛeddan kan s umawal ameqqran n tmaziɣt-tafransist / tafransist-tamaziɣt, anda i yessaweḍ ad d-yegmer 75 716 n wawalen yettwasuzren ɣef 200 n yisebtar, mbeɛd leqdic d unadi d leɛtab n wacḥal d aseggas. Yerra-as ilindi Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa tajmilt deg waggur n Remḍan di temkerḍit tazayezt n Bgayet, anda i d-yessenɛet amawal-a ameqqran, akken diɣen i d-yella umeslay fell-as, iga i wid i d-yusan ad t-aɣen abuddu-ines. 

 Ɣef umeslay n kra seg wid i t-iqerben, yella yettheggi leqdic-nniḍen ɣef unaẓur Sliman Ɛazem, maca lmut tezwar ɣur-s. Yemḍel ass-nni n ttlata ɣef 12h00 n uzal deg taddart-is Timanacin deg tɣiwant n Buxlifa, tama n Tici. Ilul Abdelḥafiḍ Idres deg useggas 1946 deg taddart Timanacin deg twilayat n Bgayet. Yella ixeddem deg tnqlaft n yilmeẓyen d waddal, syin yuɣal ɣer tkebbanit Sonatrach armi i d-yewwi tastaɣt (lantrit) deg useggas n 1999. Deg yimir i yebda amahil-is ameqqran : Aheggi n umawal ameqqran i d-yesuffeɣ s tallelt n Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa akked ENAG I lmend n Rreḥba tis 22 tagraɣlant n udlis n Lezzayer. 

  Khaled Achoui.  

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis 28 meɣres 2019, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, i tebda s wudem unṣib tezrigt tis mrawet n tfaska “taɣuri s wurar”, deg temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n Tizi Uzzu. D leqdic i d-thegga tenmehla n yidles ɣef teɣzi n ddurt, yetturaǧu ad ifak ass n lexmis, 04 yebrir 2019. Tettili-d tezrigt-agi deg 6 n yimukan n yidles d tmussni deg wakal n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu yecban: Axxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri d Tneḍfart-is n Azazga, Tamkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, Axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, ulmis adelsan Matoub Lounes n Ain El Hammam akked kra n tamimiwin n lwilaya. Yettwahegga-d yiwen wahil d amerkanti, ideg ara i d-tettili rreḥba n yidlisen (timsikniyin sɣur tezrigin, d yisenza s yibuddan sɣur waṭas n yimura), ama deg Uxxam n yidles ama deg Tneḍfart-is n Azazga neɣ deg temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, seg 9h n ssbaḥ alamma d 16h n tmeddit ɣef teɣzi n ddurt, am wakken daɣen ara d-ilin waṭas n yisaragen akked yisikwan ɣef teɣzi n 07 wussan. Ma d ahil n ttiɛad-agi idelsan uzzig n yigerdan, ad d-yili d amerkanti. Ad nezwir s yisikwan n temkerḍt n tɣuri, ttilin-d ddeqs n yiskiwan gar-asen: Uraren n usegmi, asikew n yimuhal n ufus, win n usuneɣ d win tulsa n tmacahut, tira…atg. Ma d wid n Uxxam n yidles d tneḍfart-is n Azazga, ttilin-d akka; win n usuneɣ, n tmucuha, asikew n yimuhal n ufus, taklut, ccḍeḥ aklasik…atg. 

 Isaragen d leqdicat-nniḍen 
 Ma d tlata n yisaragen yettwaheggan i lmend n tezrigt-agi tamynut, llan-d akka: Amezwaru, yella-d ass-nni n lexmis 28 meɣres 2019 sɣur umaru d uneɣmas ilemẓi Massilias Ferhani. Wis sin, yella-d sendiḍelli n sseb 29 meɣres, sɣur tneggalt Chabha Ben Gana, i d-yewwin awal ɣef wungal-is “Amsebrid”. Wis tlata, ad d-yili ass-agi ɣef 14h00, sɣur Lounes Salah, ara d-imeslayen ɣef yimura izzayriyen. Isaragen-agi, i tlata yid-sen llan-d deg temkerḍit tagejdit n tɣuri tagejdant n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ma deg tzeqqa n ssinima, Ammas adelsan Matoub Lounes akked Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, yettili-d wahil meqqren s waṭas n yisihren; isura, timezgunin, isikwan…atg. Ma d ahil n Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, yekcem deg leqdicat i d-yettwaheggan i lmend n yimuras n tefsut. Am wakken daɣen yetturaǧu, ad kemmelent temsizzeliyin, temsikniyen d leqdicat-nniḍen sya ar ass n lexmis. Mebla ma ttuɣ timkerḍit yettembiwilen (bibilobus), ara yerzun ɣer ddeqs n yimukan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Yettili-d daɣen wahil n tuqribin, i yebdan seg wass n lexmis 28 meɣres 2019, ara d-yilin deg tɣiwanin-agi: Tizi Ghennif, Makouda, At Dwala, Azeffoun…atg. Ass n lexmist, 04 yebrir 2019, ad d-tili tesfugla n taggara deg Uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer, ideg ara ttunefken yigerdasen n uttekki i yimekkiyen deg tfaska-agi, d warrazen i warrac ara d-yifriren deg yal asikew d yal timsizzelt tameqqrant.
   Gh. A. 

  
 Am yal anebdu, tettuɣalen leqdicat idelsanen di tmurt n Leqbayel. Da d tafaska, dihin d tameɣra, dihen akkin d timlilit…atg.

 Tura d lawan n tmeɣra n uẓeṭṭa deg taddart n Ath Hicham deg Ain El Hammam. Tameɣra-agi deg tezrigt-is tis mrawet d yiwet (11), ad telli tiwwura-s s wudem unṣib ass n lexmis 9 ɣuct, deg tṣebḥit n wass. Yetturaǧu, ad tessali ahil i yettwajerden i lmend n tezrigt-a, ass n letnayen 13 seg waggur-agi n ɣuct ideg nella. D ttiɛad adelsan i ttraǧunt s ccuq tlawin yeggaren iẓeḍwa n tama-agi n Ath Hicham, imi d tagnit ideg i d-ttafent iman-nsen-s idis ɣer yidis n yimsaɣen (acheteurs). D tagnit daɣen ideg ttfarasen madden tirza n umereḥ d tiɣin n tɣawsin i ḥwaǧen deg yixxamen-nsen, ladɣa tilawin. Ad tili tafaska-a ɣef teɣzi n 5 wussan, deg taddart n Ath Hicham di tɣiwant n Ath Yahia, i ibeɛden s wazal n 50 ikilumiṭren ɣef unẓul-asamer n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Di tezrigt-agi tis 11, yetturaǧu ad ttekkint deg-s wazal n 10 n lwilayat, ara d-isneεten axeddim-nsent. Am wakken daɣen ara, d-siknen wazal n 80 n yinḍan tiɣawsiwin i xeddmen. Ulamma tuget deg-sen d wid i xeddmen aẓeṭṭa, maca ad ilint diɣ temsikniyin n ufexxar, n lfeṭṭa, tamemt, taqendurt, tɣawsiwin n ufus, asɣar…atg. Ma d ɣef wahil n tezrigt-agi tamaynut, tenna-d massa Ben Aissa Fatiha, d taɛeggalt deg tiddukkla “Aẓeṭṭa”, belli: “Ad ilin yisaragen ɣef uẓeṭṭa n Ath Hicham, timeɣriwin n ccna, turrart n tmezgunin, timsikniyin n usenzi…atg”. Ma ɣef yiswan n tmeɣra-agi, tkemmel tenna-d: “ Amezwaru, d asḥbiber d useḥfeḍ n urmud-agi aqbur n Ath Hicham i tsutwin-agi timaynutin. Wis sin, d userni-ines n lḥirfa-agi i wakken ad teddu d wakud amiran”. Tasfugelt n taggara, yetturaǧu ad tili, ass n letnayen-agi sdat-nneɣ, 13 ɣuct i d-iteddun. D tameɣra n taggara ideg ara ad tili tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i widak akk yettekkin deg tezrigt-agi tis 11 n uẓeṭṭa n Ath Hicham, i d- slulent i lmend n useḥbiber d userni n uẓeṭṭa. D leqdic s wazal-is, i d-tettheggi yal aseggas tiddukkla “Aẓeṭṭa” n tlawin iẓeṭṭen n Ath Hicham s ufus n tallelt n waṭas n yidisan-nniḍen. Dɣa, deg usuddes n tezrigt-agi n useggas-a, ddeqs n yidisan i yettekkin deg uheggi n leqdic-agi ameqqran gar-asen : Tasqamut n taddart n Ath Hicham, Asqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Taɣiwant n Ath Yahia, s lemɛawna n tmehliwin-a; tin tmerrit d tinḍi, tin n waddal d yilmeẓyen, tin usileɣ akked texxamin n yiremad d tinḍi n Tizi Uzzu. Imḍebren i d-heggan leqdic-agi, bɣan ad ẓẓun imɣi n usefti d ulmad n yilmeẓyen i urmud-agi yesεan azal d ameqqran, imi si tama ad ṭṭfen deg wansayen , tgemmi d irmad-nneɣ iqburen, ma si tama-nniḍen d axeddim adamsi (économique), i lmend n wayen i d-issekcam n udrim. Tameɣra-agi, tuɣ amkan deg Lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, imi ur tettafeḍ ara amkan anida ara tedduḍ deg wussan n temsikniyin. Yal wa ansi d-yusa; ttruḥun-d madden si rebɛa n tɣemar lwilaya-agi. Yal wa d acu i d-yusa ad yaɣ, wa d aceṭṭiḍ, wa d taẓerbit, wayeḍ wayeḍ. Yetturaǧu, ad rzun geddac n yimerriyen ɣer tmeɣra-agi, i d asen-yuɣalen d tannumi. Imi yal aseggas, d anerni i yettnerni wuṭṭun n yimdanen i irezzun ɣer taddart-agi n Ath Hicham, i d-isuddusen tameɣra-agi n uẓeṭṭa neɣ ɣer tudrin-nniḍen i d-yettheggin timeɣriwin d tfaskiwin tiyaḍ. D iremad yecban wagi, s ways ara yili unegmu deg udrar, imi yettɛawan aṭas tiwaculin tiqbayliyin deg temɛict-nsen, ma mačči d wagi i d aɣbalu awḥid n kra deg-sent. Ma si tama-nsent tilawin-agi ixedden kan deg uxxam, ssuturent deg yimḍebbren terza taluft, asuget n tegnatin n tunzut n yisufar i icudden ɣer tinḍi, ladɣa aẓeṭṭa s wanawen-is yemxalafen.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Ass n amhad yezrin i d-tella temlilit taseklant deg Uxxam n tddukkla Numidya n Wehran. D timlilit iga umyaru aneggal Youcef Achouri, yewwi-d asarag i wazal n tamert, deg-s yewwi-d awal ɣef wungal-is amaynut i d-yeffɣen taggara n 2018 ɣer teẓrigin Aṭfaluna, d ungal iwumi yefka azwel “Ixef n usennan”. 

 D yiwen n wungal daɣen iwumi iga umyaru tasuqilt neɣ tiririt ɣer teqbaylit s wayen iwumi neqqar amsasa (adaptation), d tikti i d-yewwi seg udlis “Captive bride” n umyaru aglizi Rosemary Carter. Asarag-a, ḥeḍren-t kra n yiɛeggalen n tddukkla d kra-nniḍen seg wid iḥemmlen ad ɣren idlisen s tmaziɣt. 

 Ar taggara, yella-d usqerdec d uskasi gar umsarag d yimeɣriyen, yefka-d agzul Mass Ɛacuri ɣef udlis-is i d-yettmeslayen ɣef tayri lqayen yezdin gar Ṭariq d Ruza, maca jeddi-s n Ruza yugi tadukli-a, acku Ṭariq d aẓawali u yella ixeddem ɣur-s iferreḍ i zzwayel. D ayen i yeǧǧan Ṭariq ad iɣab acḥal d aseggas, ad d-yerfed iman-is u ad d-yuɣal d amerkanti.

  Ɣer taggara, ad iruḥ ad d-yaɣ akk ayen yekseb jeddi-s n Ruza. Ma ɣer taggara n usarag, yella-d usenzi s ubuddu d tugna yezdin akk widak iḥeḍren i temlilit-a. Ar tura, Mass Youcef Achouri, ɣur-s kraḍ n wungalen, ammud n yisefra, ammud n tullisin d tsuqelt n yiwet n tmezgunt n Abdelkader Alloula.

 Akken yella deg wansayen n yimezwura-nneɣ seg waṭas-aya, i lmend n uɛeddi n 40 n wussan seg tmettant n tmarut Kaysa Xalifi, i d-yeḍran ass n 25 yunyu 2018, thegga-d twacult n tmerḥumt-a, akked kra seg wid i tt-iqerben, kra n yiqeddicen i d-yeṭṭafaren ass-nni, i yemmugen merra ɣef rruḥ n Kaysa. Syin, kra n teswiɛt, zdin yimezdaɣ n taddart unuden n tgella i d-yettwaheggan beddemma n waya, ama i tlawin deg uxxam, neɣ i yirgazen di berra. Yal yiwen yesɛa-d dɣa tidmi s tɣara-is ɣef tmarut tilemẓit Kaysa Xalifi, i yettwaḥemmlen aṭas, armi, amecwar n wakud d amecṭuḥ, tella-d tirza i uẓekka-ines s waṭas n leḥzen d yiḥulfan. Deg wadeg, sersen wid ibedden i uqerruy n Kaysa snat n tmuqqinin n yijeǧǧigen, deg tegnit n umeslay akked yiman. Yewwi-d ad d-nernu talɣut belli deg yiẓekwan akk yellan di tjebbant-nni n Tizi Lwali, d win n Kaysa i d amezwaru i yettwarun s tutlayt taqbaylit, segmi yebda umezruy ahat. Yesmektay-d waya ugur adelsan n tmetti taqbaylit n wass-a. Sgunfu di talwit a Kaysa!

 Aḥric wis 2

 Yers-d yiḍ, iceggeɛ-d ugellid stut m lebtut ɣer uxxam anda yeggan urgaz. S tmes tesserɣ-as allen-is almi yedderɣel, ṭṭfen-t di 20 yid-sen, refden-t, wwin-t, ḍeggren-t ɣef yiri n yilel. Ǧǧan-t dinna akken ad-t-ččen wuccanen. Acḥal yewɛer lexdeɛ, deg wul n urgaz iḥerreq, yekker, yeggul ad d-yerr ttar. Yekcem ɣer yilel, allen-is smarayent idammen. Yewwi abrid gar waman, yessared anezgum s temreɣ n yilel, yesserɣ urfan s lḥammu n yiṭij, iteddu kan, ur yeẓri sani. mi yewweḍ ɣer yiwen uẓru, isenned, yerẓa-t ɛeggu, yewwi-t nadam. M id-yuki si tnafa, yufa iman-is deg ussu, sdat-s iḥulfa i tmeṭṭut, yemḥaḥed, yebɣa ad yekker, tenna-as : « Tbaneḍ-d d amennay, neɣ d anegmar, sgunfu ur ttagad ». Tɛawez fell-as 7 n wussan, d 7 n wuḍan. Yal ass, tseffaḍ-as allen-is s tḥergiwin (potion magique), armi d ass-nni i deg i d-yeldi allen-is. A tafat i d-yeflalin fell-as, a tayri i t-id-yeqqsen, mi yeẓra tameṭṭut i t-id-ijemɛen. I yecbeḥ uglim-is, i zuggaɣ-it tcenfirin-is, ɣef tuyat yeɣli-d umzur-is. Yeẓra-d tiziri deg uzal, yeshetrif wer aṭan, teqqes-it-id tayri. Deg wul-is ṭṭreḍqen yiḥulfan, ifeggeḍ d leḥmala, yesmar-d asirem. Tameṭṭut ula d nettat d tanegmart, aneccab-is (flèche) d usdid, werǧin yezgel tanegmirt (proie). Tetteddu d yiɣersiwen, anda truḥ ad dduklen yid-s. Zgan wuccanen d izamaren, iqejjan, iwtal, ifrax, tizerzert d izerzaren. S anda ma tedda, tedda tenguft-is (escorte), ttcalin deg teẓgi, am wakken ttcalin yiselman s ddaw waman. Meɛna mačči ala iɣersiwen ukkud teddukkul. Ɣur-s tiklatin, gar-asent llant 7 n tyessetmatin, teddunt yid-s, qeddcent fell-as, xeddment leḥruz imi d tiwkilin. Yal ta tif uletma-s : Tamezwarut, ṣṣut-is d aleggaɣ, mi ara d-tecnu awaɣezniw yettuɣal d llufan ; tis-snat, tessen i uẓawan, mi ara tetturar snitra ula d Rebbi yeggan ; tis-kraḍet, tessen i ccḍeḥ yettban, mi ara thuz tuyat, deg uzal ttirriqen yitran ; ma d tayeḍ, d tanaẓurt s ccan, s yiniten tesbeɣ ula d igenwan. Uletma-s, tettbeddil timeqwa n waman, yis-ent txeddem iseɣwan (bijoux). Tikent-is, tgennu tiksiwin mebla lkettan, tettfeṣṣil tirkasin s lmerǧan. Taneggarut, tif di ssifa kra yellan, yewwi daɛwessu kra itt-iwalan.  … Tettkemmil  

  Seg tsekla taqbaylit 

  
 Yenna-d ussan-a iɛeddan unemhal amatu n uxxam aɣelnaw n yizerfan n umeskar (ONDA), deg yiwen n usarag i iga, d akken yella wayen ara d-yennulfun d amaynut deg taluft n uxelles n yizerfan n umeskar, abeɛda acennay. Mass Sami Bencix yenna-d: « Ilaq ɣef wat iṭaksiyen, tizeɣwa n useṭṭel, iseččuyen d kra n yimeḍqan-nni n ttjara ideg i d-xeddmen aẓawan, ad ttxellisen izerfan n umeskar i ONDA. Aya yettmagga deg yakk timura yuẓen ». 

 D ayen i d-yesselɣa Mass Bencix i taɣamsa. Sya d tasawent, ur trezzu ara ihi taluft at yiṭaksiyen kan, maca ula d kra n yixxamen n ttjara ideg i d-xeddmen aẓawan, am deg tḥuna n wučči, n useṭṭel, atg. Deg wayen i d-yerna deg wawal-is, aya mačči d ayen ara yilin ɣlay ɣef wid yettxellisen, imi iswi d ajmaɛ n uzref n unaẓur akken ur yettenḍeggar ara. Amedya n bab n uṭaksi, ad ixelles azal n 2000 n yidinaren. « I win yesɛan aṭaksi, yezmer kan ad ixelles armi d 2000 n yidinaren i useggas. Aya mačči d ssuma tageɛmirt i netta, maca i ONDA d yinaẓuren, ta d taɣbalut n lɛali. Llan dɣa kra n yisensuyen i yettxellisen armi d 4 n yimelyan santim i useggas », I d-yessegra Mass Bencix.

   M. K. 

  
 Gar temsal i iceɣben amur ameqqṛan n yilemẓiyen di tmurt, d tamsalt n usmad (crédit) n Ansej, Cnac. Imi ilemẓiyen-a, llan ur sεin ara axeddim, ihi tettunefk-asen tegnit i wakken ad kecmen deg umaḍal n uqeddic s wayen i nwan ad yebnu imal-nsen. Meεna, akken i qqaren, ‘’iteddu waḍu akken ur as-yehwi i uɣeṛṛabu’’, acku isenfaren-a ur smurrsen ara s umata. Dɣa rnan-d i terbaεt n yilemẓiyen lhem ɣef wayeḍ, imi tura uɣalen mačči kan d wid ur nxeddem, besseḥ d wid ur nxeddem yerna ttwalasen. Taswiεt tḍaq ɣef yiremmasen-a, yerna ddeqs deg-sen d ibabaten n twaculin. D ayen i ten-yeǧǧan ssuturen deg yimdebbṛen n tmurt tifrat s uɣiwel i uɣbel-a. Ɣef leḥsab n yilemẓiyen-a, ddula di tezwara tenna-asen ad teṭṭfem afmiḍi n 20% deg lacɣal n tkebbaniyin n tmurt, yerna ad ten-tεiwen deg usimɣer n tkebbaniyin-nsen. Meεna ass-a, ḥeṛṣen-ten i wakken ad d-rren asmad-nsen ɣas ma yella ur xeddmen ara, rnu i waya, gran-ten di ccra&amp;epsilon,; yerna ssagden-ten s llḥebs. Daymi i msefhamen akken ma llan deg unejmuε i xeddmen di Seḍḍuq, ass n sem 13 di deǧember yezrin, bac ad d-ffɣen s iberdan, ahat wid teεna temsalt ad d-slen i taɣect-nsen, wa asen-d-εallen ttawil uqbel ad lḥunt tregwa akken-nniḍen.

  K. K.

  Aheggi 

 Rekmet aman s jumbu, syin ternum-asen temẓin, anfem-asent alamma wwant. Squddret-tent u tjemɛem lkas n waman-nni. Sirdet krafeẓ, ifelfel azeggaɣ d taxsayt, tgezmem-ten d iḥricen imecṭaḥ. Sizedget tireɣlin, syin tgezmem-tent d timḍewwrin. Rret zzit uzemmur daxel n tmeqqlit, terrem-as ticcert, syin terrem akk lxeḍra-nni daxel-is, rnut-as ifelfel aberkan d lmelḥ, ternum temẓin, tanfem-as ad yeww. Rnut tura taḥcict-nni. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Akken i yenna umedyaz “Seg ucrured ɣer tikli”, neɣ akken i t-qqaren wat zik “Aɛeqqa, aɛeqqa alamma nessaweḍ meyya” i tutlayt tamaziɣt d yidles-is i ileḥḥun simmal ɣer sdat skud yettɛeddi lweqt. Neẓra d akken seg kra n tamiwin, d tuɣalin s kra n yisurifen ɣer deffir i yeṭṭfen amnaṛ, maca neḍmeɛ mi ara nettwali seg tamiwin tiyaḍ yettlal-d umaynut yessemhazen tutlayt-a ɣer sdat. Akal, d yiwen n wawal, yemmal unamek-is lqaɛa, tamurt d fessu (azuǧǧeg) d usefti ɣer wayen yakk icudden s asirem d wayen yelhan. 

 D Akal i d awal i yettwafernen ad yettunefk i ukabar amaziɣ amezwaru i d-ilulen deg tmurt n Tunes ussan-a kan. Ɣef umeslay n umaray-is amatu, Mass Fady Mansri, yenna-d belli “Yettwaxleq-d s wudem unṣib ukabar Akal ass n, 6 maggu 2019, mbeɛd aṭas n temliliyin i d-yellan yakan uqbel, rnu ɣer waya, nesqerdec kra n temsal yerzan isuḍaf d yilugan i swayes ara yelḥu”. Yerna yessegza-d deg yiwet n tdiwenni-nniḍen i iga deg yiwet n tiliẓri, d akken akabar-a n Akal ad d-yawi tamuɣli tamaynut i tmurt n Tunes, d tamuɣli ara ibedden s wudem n llsas d tumast tamaziɣt. I usmekti daɣen, akabar-a ɣas melmi kan i d-ilul d amaynut, maca ad yekki deg tefranin (législatives) d tid n tselwit n tmurt n Tunes. Ad yeṭṭef 80 n wumuɣen ifranen akked yiwen n yimrecceḥ ɣer tefranin n tselwit. 

  K. A. 

  
 Mbaɛd ugar n ddurt n usunded n yimasnayen n yimessikliyen n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa, yettawin seg tlemmast n tɣiwant ɣer tuddar n At Aḥmed, At Zɛim, Iɣil Zeggaɣen, Tizi Tzegart, Tajediwt, lɣil Aṭwen, Taxribt, d Lbir s sebba n yir addad ideg i d-yeggra ubrid ideg xeddmen, uɣalen ass-nni n arim iɛeddan ɣer uxeddim seld aṛgam (promesse) n yimḍebbren teɛna temsalt s uqɛad n ubrid-agi aɣiwan, sya ɣer unebdu anda ad d-tili tduli-ines akken iwata lḥal. 

 Dɣa d takebbanit yetabaɛen ɣer Tenmehla n useḥbiber n tẓegwa (Djurdjura) i yebdan yakan deg uqɛad d usewsaɛ n ubrid-agi seg ddurt iɛeddan, anda i d-tella tduli n kra n yidigan i d-yeggran deg yir addad s ṛmel azuran. Am wakken daɣen ɣummen tuget n yixejḍan yeččuren abrid. Assunded-agi i iɛeggeben imezdaɣ n ṭamet n tudrin n tɣiwant, ladɣa arrac n yiɣerbazen yemgaraden n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa. Mbaɛd ugar n kraḍ n yiseggasen n ssber ɣef yir addad n ubrid-agi aɣiwan d usɛuẓẓeg n tmeẓẓuɣt n yimḍebbren teɛna temsalt ɣef wayen ssuturen yimasnayen d imsebriden, ladɣa iɛeggalen n Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Mɛatqa, d Tenmehla n lwilaya i d-yelhan s ixeddimen n uzayaz, gezmen-tt deg rray yimasnayen s uneḥbus ɣef uxeddim mebla tillas, yebdan ass-nni n acer, 17 seg unbir armi d ass-nni n arim, 25 deg unbir, seld amtawa i d-yellan deg unejmuɛ yezdin imasnayen d imeḍebber amezwaru n wasun n Mɛatqa, aselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Mɛatqa, imḍebbren n Tenmehla n yixeddamen n uzayaz, anda i d-yella waṛgam ɣef uqɛad n ubrid-agi d tduli-ines akken iwata deg unebdu i d-itddun.

  Ali Zalouk  

  
 Ussan-agi kan iɛeddan i d-yeffeɣ, ɣer Tezrigin Ccix Muḥend Ulḥusin, udlis Iziran n temẓi n Fahim Messaoudene. Deg udlis-a i d-ihegga umyaru i warrac imecṭaḥ, ad naf deg-s tullisin, tineqqisin akked yiḍrisen. Ha-t-an ciṭ n wayen i d-yuran deg usebtar wis 4 n tduli. “Inelmaden, kkren s uẓẓu n yisekla d yiselmaden-nsen, wa yeqqaz, wa iteẓẓu…Deg uzniq, imdanen ur d-cqin ara deg twennaḍt i deg ttidiren. Abrid yeččur d tiqraɛtin, icekkaren d lekwaɣeḍ…Inelmaden, walan, yiwen urgaz yečča tabanant, dɣa, iḍegger ticlemt-ines ɣer lqaɛa. 

 Tluɛa-t Tziri, tenna-as: “A Mass, ayen i tḍeggreḍ ticlemt n tbanant ɣer lqaɛa? Ayen i tessamaseḍ tawennaḍt-nneɣ? Ur teẓriḍ ara belli yezmer ad tesseɣli albaɛḍ deg-neɣ ma yukel fell-as! Muqel kan ma tettwaliḍ iḍumman di lqaɛa, tawennaḍt n uɣerbaz-nneɣ zeddiget”. Yenna-as Uɣilas: “Deg uɣerbaz-nneɣ, yal tiɣmert nessers tanefsrast. Nekni, yal ass nleqqeḍ lekwaɣeḍ deg uzniq. Aselmad-nneɣ, yenna-aɣ-d ur ilaq ara ad nessamas tawennaḍt i deg nettidir”. Din din, argaz-nni yeddem ticlemt-nni ɣer tnefrast, yenna-asen: “Surfet-iyi ay arrac uḥricen”.

 D tukkist seg uḍris i yettawin azal meqqren, i d-yemmalen tarrayt s wayes i yezmer umdan ad irebbi igerdan ɣef useḥbiber n ugama. Aselmed, yettili-d s tigawt, mačči s tmenna kan. Wid yebɣan ad d-aɣen adlis-a, ilaq-asen kan ad rǧun kra n wussan sya ara yaweḍ tinedlisin, ɣef wakken i t-id-iwekked yimḍebber n Tezrigin Ccix Muḥend Ulḥusin, Mass Gemmar Mbarek, deg uɣrab-is n Facebook. Fahim Messaouden, d amedyaz u d aneggal s teqbaylit. 

 Yesɛa agerdas n DEUA di tliktrunit. Yella yakan d aselmad deg uɣerbaz n lḥirfat. Yeqdec aṭas deg umussu adelsan. Yura tamezgunt “Ar melmi ara idum waya?”, deg useggas 1999. D aneɣmas, diɣ, ama deg rradyu Numidya n Kanada, ama deg yiɣmisen n La Dépêche de Kabylie akked La Cité. Yura ula deg tesɣunt Aselmad. Yewwi arraz n Muḥemmed Dib s wungal-is Anza. Am wakken i t-id-iṣaḥ umekkan wis sin deg umsizwer uzzig Dda Lwennas n wungalen Asdawan, Iḥulfan d Imehbal s uḍris-is “Ay izem”.

  Hocine Moula

 -1 n tmeqquntb

 n nneɛnaɛ azegzaw

 -1 n tebselt

 -4 n tdeggar n ticcert

 -½ n lkas n zzit n uzemmur

 -2 kg n uwren alemmas

 -lmelḥ

  Aheggi 

 Cerwet-d iferrawen-nni n nneɛnaɛ mebla ma yedda-d uɣeddu-s. Tessirdem-ten daxel n waman isemmaḍen i wakken ad asen-yettwakkes uɣebbar. Gezzmet-ten s tmacint neɣ s lums. Rnut-as ticcert akked lebsel, tɛerkem-ten akken iwata. Rret awren daxel n tbaqit, tesmirem-as s ufella-s zzit n uzemmur, tesxelḍem-t akked nneɛneɛ-nni i d-yettwaheggan, syin teggum arekti alamma yexleḍ mliḥ. Messlet tiqrisin akken i awen-yehwa, tessewwem-tent daxel n uḍajin, s tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 S tidet-nni i nessen ɣur-s, yerra-aɣ-d s tumert ucennay Ɛli Ideflawen i yisteqsiyen-nneɣ di tdiwennit-a.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Acu tenniḍ ɣef temlilit n ccna taneggarut i tgiḍ di Buṭeɣwa akked Iflis? 

  Ɛli Ideflawen:  Tamezwarut n tmezwura, ad asen-iniɣ ayyuz i yakk ilemẓiyen n tddukkla-nni i yesmursen aqeddic yelhan n umezgun n tzegzewt di taddart. Yuqa waya akken ad t-tafeḍ anda-nniḍen. Ccɣel-a, ikeccemm deg umezruy. D ayen yelhan aṭas i yidles-nneɣ. Ur ilaq ara ad ncuḥ deg usṭuqqet n warmuden ara d-icebbḥen amḍiq am winna.

  Aql-ik gar wid ur ncennu s waṭas deg yixxamen n ddula. Acimi ɣef tmuɣli-k? 

 Annect-a ur i yi-yecqi aṭas. Zemreɣ ad ak-d-iniɣ bniɣ-as, acku yal yiwen yettnadi ayen yeffɣen fell-as. Yezmer llan wid iwumi ur neɛjib, maca ilaq ad teṭṭfeḍ tamasit-ik. Amedya di Lezzayer tamaneɣt, tura azal n 18 n yiseggasen ur cniɣ dinna. Sawalen-aɣ-d kan yiseqquma n tuddart, tiɣiwanin, tiddukkliwin d yimeɣnasen. Am tikkelt yezrin deg Uweqqas mi yi-d-tessawel tddukkla-nni. Lḥasul akka, akken yella was, ad t-yeks umeksa.

  Awal-ik ɣef unaẓur Iflis? 

 Kamal d aqcic n lɛali, d ameɣnas. Icennu akken ilaq, ixeddem ayen iwumi yezmer. Ɣef waya, yewwi-d ad t-nessebɣes.

  Aṭas i yebɣan ad ẓren d anwa iwumi teqqareḍ « abudali » deg uḍebsi-inek aneggaru? 

 Dagi ad d-iniɣ d ayen yellan deg tiẓri, neɣ deg usugen. Smenyifeɣ ur d-beddreɣ ara isem, acku yezmer ad yelhu i waṭas n yimdanen.

  Acḥal tura ur d-tessuffɣeḍ amaynut? 

 16 n yiseggasen.

  Acimi? 

 Ah teẓriḍ ara, ur iqeddec ara unaẓur n tidet s tsutert. Mačči d tamacint i yella. Llan kra, war ma nebder-iten-id, ad as-tiniḍ xdem-iyi-d tizlit ɣef usentel-a, di ddurt, ad ak-tt-id-yexdem. Maca nekk ttwaliɣ anaẓur n tidet, iqeddec kan ɣef wamek yettḥulfu. Ma ur iḥulfa s tɣawsa, ur tt-id-ixeddem ara. Ihi, dagi kan i yella umgarad.

  D ta kan i ssebba, neɣ ula d akud yekkes-ak-tt? 

 Ala, ala. Deg uḍebsi-a, llant tezlatin azal n 10 n yiseggasen tura segmi tent-xedmeɣ, maca qqiment kan akken. Llant tmaynutin, am tinna « yemma-s d mmi-s », d tejmilt i Muḥend Uyeḥya.

  Deg uḍebsi-a, llant tezlatin d kečč i tent-yuran? 

 Ih, llant.

  Deg yiseɣrez-a, terriḍ tajmilt daɣ i Muḥend Uyeḥya… 

 Ah, ur zmireɣ ara ad t-ttuɣ. Acku d yiwen n umdan ukud xedmeɣ aṭas. Lḥiɣ yid-s, ssneɣ-t, nemxalaḍ mliḥ. Ihi, ur zmireɣ ad qqimeɣ ur t-id-ttadreɣ ara. Muḥend Uyeḥya d yiwen n umdan i yesɛan azal meqqer.

  Acḥal ahat i tecniḍ d isefra n Muḥend Uyeḥya? 

 Ur zmireɣ ad ak-d-iniɣ. Aṭas i yi-d-yeǧǧa. Mazal daɣen, imi yeččur ukufi. Rnu urɛad i d-ffɣen maḍi i uzayez. Ḥaca nekk i ten-yesɛan. Yeǧǧa-yi-d daɣen ammud n yinzan n wazal n 300 n yisebtar. D inzan n teqbaylit i d-yegmer send 1980.

  Mmeslay-aneɣ-d ɣef tezlit-nni   « Iles-iw »… 

 Rǧu, tura ad ak-d-segzuɣ. Tinna, d tamɛayt n Ucili Viktur Xara i necna deg-s. Asefru-nni d akemmel n tezlit « ǧǧet-aɣ abrid ad nɛeddi ».

  Ula di tezlit « Yemma-s d mmi-s », d ameslay ɣef tlelli… 

 Tinna d tamacahut n Ɛli Laymac, i yellan d ameɣnas urmid di tallit n teɣẓint n tmaziɣt di 1949. Yemma-s ad as-teqqar ur ttali s amadaɣ, netta yettarra-as ilaq ad ruḥeɣ.

  Tilelli dima tettuɣal-d di   tezlatin-ik… 

 Aya d taɣawsa iwumi ur nezmir ad nerwel. D ayen yellan deg yidammen. Ur nezmir ad nekkes i yiwen tilelli-s, ma ulac yewwas ad d-yekker ad ak-yini « ay aḥbib mačči d ccɣel ». Mazal ad d-nernu ɣef tlelli (taḍsa).

  Acuɣer asefru n taggara tewwiḍ-t-id s tmenna mačči s ccna? 

 Asefru-nni, ma yehwa-ak, yesmektay-d tafsut n tmanyin. Lliɣ zemreɣ ad t-cnuɣ, maca ferneɣ ad t-id-awiɣ d timenna.

  D acu tesɛiḍ d ismektiyen seg tfaska n Udrar n Fad mi ak-tuɣal tejmilt? 

 Tinna, ad teqqim deg uqerruy, ur zmireɣ ad tt-ttuɣ. Sarameɣ yewwas ad n-uɣaleɣ ɣur-wen. Tafaska-nni, d ayen igerrzen nezzeh.

  Awal i widak i ak-iḥemmlen… 

 Ad d-iniɣ kra n win i yi-iḥemmlen, ḥemmleɣ-t. Yesteqsa-t:

  M. K. 

  
 Yuγal-d unaddal Yanis Soualah γer tmurt s yiwen n warraz n uẓref i d-iḥella deg temlilit tagraγlant n Taekwondo i d-yellan deg La Corée n Wadda. D mmi-s n Tubiret, yessaweḍ azal n 15 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, yefren addal-a n Taekwondo segmi yella d anelmad deg uγerbaz amenzu γer tama n gma-s Manis, i d-iḥellan ula d netta aṭas n warrazen. Timlilit-a i t-yessawḍen almi d La Corée n Wadda, tusa-d mi akken itri-a n Tubiret, yezzi-d i twilayin n tmurt anda i d-yella d alγu&amp;gamma,; syin iruh almi d Maser anda i d-iḥella cciɛa n wureγ. Mi d-yuγal γer tmurt, d aγerbaz Nadjah n Tubiret i as-yerran tajmilt γef wudem i d-yefka i Lezzayer deg tmura tiberraniyin. Mačči kan d aγerbaz-is i t-id-yemmektan, maca ula d taγiwant-is tanaslit, Saharidj, i d-yezgan deg lɛerc n Yimceddalen, terra-as tajmilt s wazal-is ass n ssebt yezrin anda i hedren waṭas n yimdanen i as-yefkan tabγest i wakken ad yeddu ugar γer sdat. Ad d-nesmekti kan, niqal ad yettikki deg talɣuɣa n ddunit deg Perou ach kan ur kkin ara netta akked temdakkelt-is Nihad. Mebɛed mi xedmen tannant i wakken ad ruḥen ɣer Perou akked terbaɛt taɣelnawt u sebblen kra n lweqt deg leqraya-nsen, imḍebbren n terbaɛt-a, ur asen-d heggan ara visa deg lawan. Ayen i ten-yeǧǧan ur ttekkan ara deg talɣuɣa n ddunit. Tedra telɣuɣa-agi n Corée n wadda seg 4 ar 8 deg duǧenmer-agi i deg-i nella u kkint deg-s 72 n tmura.
