 – 2 n tdeggar n ticcert

 – ifelfel aberkan

 – 1 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n lkemmun

 – 2 n tɣenjawin n lmakla n zzit uzemmur

 -lmelḥ

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 ẓzdet ibawen-nni alamma uɣalen am urekti. Aya, ad d-yili mi ara wwen, uqbel, deg ufuru. Syin ternum-asen zzit uzemmur, leɛqaqer, lmelḥ, ticcert. Rnu-as tiwwin azal n snat n ddqayeq kan. Tzemrem ad sxedmen ibawen-nni akken llan. S tezmert-nwen

  Daya 

  
 I lmend n usmekti s umulli wis 13 n tmenɣiwt n uselway aqbur n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Mass Rabah Aissat, yettwanɣan deg 12 seg waggur n tubeṛ n useggas 2006, deg lqahwa, sdat n yimddukkal-is ukud yetturar deg taddart-is deg Ɛin Zawya, tuɣal-as yiwet n tejmilt meqqren, sɣur imeɣnasen n ukabar n Terni n yiɣallen nemlayen (FFS), tawacult d yimeddukkal-is. Tella-d tejmilt ass-nni n sed, 12 deg tuber iɛeddan, deg taddart-is deg Ɛin Zawya, dayra n Draa El Mizan, i ibeɛden s 40 n yikulimitren ɣef unẓul n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Deg tazwara, yella-d usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka n umerḥum, anda teḥḍer twacult n umeɣnas, iɛeggalen n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi-Uzzu, iɛeggalen n Useqqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Ɛin Zawya, imeɣnasen n Ukabar n Tirni n yiɣallen Inemlayen ( FFS) d imeddukkal-is. 

 Deg wawal i as-yettunefken i uselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Mass Youcef Aouchiche, deg tejmilt-agi, yewwi-t-id ɣef umahil n Mass Aissat i yellan d amedya i yimezdaɣ n ugezdu. Aṭas i refdent tsutiwin n yimeɣnasen seg umahil-is, ɣas ma yemmut.  » Dda Rabah d amatar, d ameɣnas amudam. 13 n yiseggasen seld timenɣiwt-ines s yifassen n leɣder, mazal yettmalaɣ abrid yelhan, s tenfut-is meqqren. Yella d amdan lɛali, yettmuddun afus n tallelt i yimdanen n lwilaya”, i yenna Mass Youcef Aouchiche i d-iwekkden i tikkelt-nniden s lebɣi-is ɣef unadi n tegnatin n tmenɣiwt-is. Dima ɣef Leḥsab n uselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ha-t-an yella lebɣi i wakken ad d-tili tukci n yisem n umeɣnas Rabah Aissat i tesnawit n Ɛin Zawiya deg wussan i d-teddun. 

  » Ass-agi, bɣiɣ ad d-ḅerḥeɣ d akken xeddmen yakk ayen iwatan akken ad semmin tasnawit n Ɛin Zawya s yisem n Rabah Aissat, aya, ad d-yili dɣa deg ddurt i d-yetdun. » Dɣa deg useggas n 2017, yella-d lebni n usmektay ɣef ccfaya n umeɣmas deg tɣiwant n Ɛin Zawiya. Rnu ɣef waya, isem n umeɣras n tugdut, yettunefk i temsizzelt n warraz n taddart tazedgant deg ugezdu, i d-yessuter ad-tili ass-mi yella yedder. 

 S kra seg umahil n Rabah Aissat 
 Yella Rabaḥ Aissat, d aselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Ɛin Zawiya seg useggas n 1997 armi d aseggas n 2002. Syin, yettwaffren d aselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu deg useggas n 2002 anda yettuɛawed i tikkelt-nniḍen deg useggas n 2005. 
  Yettwanɣa ass n, 12 deg waggur n tubeṛ 2006, lewhi n tmeddit, deg waggur n Remḍan, seg yiwet n terbaɛt yettwaselḥen, ɣef tabla n duminu, sdat n yimeddukkal-is ukud yetturar, deg taddart-is. Seg yimir, yezga yessutur ukabar Tirni n yiɣallen inemlayen tasastant ɣef tmenɣiwt tamsertit n umeɣnas-agi n tugdut. 

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Tettkemmil tddukkla "Oxy-jeunes" deg tɣiwant n Yiderginen, azal n 45 n yikilumiṭren ɣer Usamar n Bgayet, asemres n wahil-ines i d-thegga i useggas-a n 2018.

 Dɣa, i lmend n usenfar « Iderginen Yezdigen », tessuddes-d ussan-a yezrin taẓrigt tis snat n usizdeg d ucebbeḥ deg umkan n 22 n Tnezduɣin, deg tlemmast n Yiderginen. Aqeddic-a n twizi, yella-d s tallelt akked yimsenza d yimezdaɣ n tama-nni. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, seld tigawt-a yelhan, mazal ad d-ḍefrent tiyaḍ, s teqreb, deg tuddar-nniḍen n tɣiwant. S wakka i d-tessekfel tddukkla “Oxy-jeunes“ tiwizi, yiwen seg wansayen yelhan n temɛiwna d tdukkli. Deg teɣzi n wakud i tekka, tella-d tigawt-a n ubraz deg unnecraḥ, tumert d tegmat. Akka, dɣa, ihi tɛedda deg tegnatin igerrzen. Ttwasizdgen yizenqan n urwiḥ, ttwacebbḥent tseddarin (escaliers), ttwaẓẓan ayendin d yijeǧǧigen d ṭṭjur. Am wakken daɣen ttwasersen 6 n yibidunen n yiḥuccan deg lemsaq, i uḍegger n yiguda deg-sen. S umata, yella-d wass s wazal-is i ubaɣur n twennaḍt, d useḥbiber fell-as. Ɣer taggara, tesnemmir tddukkla “Oxy-jeunes“ akk imdanen i yekkin deg ccɣel-a, abeɛda imsenza d yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt-nni i iqedcen seg wul d tayri. Sya ɣer da, tturaǧunt tigawin-nniḍen n tddukkla-a tilemẓit, deg wayyur-a n remḍan.  M. K. 

  
 Ass-nni n, 12 deg yennayer 2018, yella-d yiwen n wahil s wazal-is i lmend n usfugel n unsay n Yennayer akken ad ikcem ussegas amaynut 2968 ɣef Yimaziɣen s umata. Anect-a s ddaw leɛnaya n tɣiwant n Ibudraren, agraw n tsekla Tira Tura n At Yanni, tiddukla tadelsant n Iɣil n Wammas d uɣerbaz alemmas n Ibudraren ƐMARA Racid. Ihi di temlilit-a, yella-d usihar n yidlisen n tmaziɣt i d-xedmen yiferdisen n ugraw n tsekla Tira Tura n At Yanni akked temsikent n yiwen n tguri i d-yettmeslayen ɣef Yennayer i d-yexdem umaṭṭaf wis rebɛa n tmaziɣt. Syin yella-d yiwen usarag ɣef umezruy n Yennayer s ɣur Mass BACUCI Ali anida i d-yessegzi laṣel n unsay-agi si tallit-nni n ugelid Cacnaq mi yennuɣ netta d ugelid aferɛun Ramsis III di tallit 950 n yissegasen uqbel tamasiḥt, yenna-d daɣen amek i d-sfugulen ansay-agi di yal tamnadṭ n tmurt n Lezayer neɣ berra n tmurt. Ɣef 12h, ters-d tanalt, imdanen akk ččan imekli n Yennayer, syin ikemmel wahil s ufraq n warrazen i kraḍ n tnelmadin n uɣerbaz alemmas i d-yufrarin d timenza di temsizelt n tzabut i d-yeḍran di ddurt iɛeddan anida i ttekin 16 n yinelmaden n yiswiren yemgaraden. Di tmeɣra-agi, yella-d aṭas n ccna sɣur icennayen d terbaɛin tidiganin akked yisefra. Di taggara, imdanen akk, ferḥen s leqdic-a, u ssaramen yal assegas ad sfuglen akka. Assegas Ameggaz.

  Dahlal Chanez 

  
 Tettwawexxer tbeddi n uqeyyem n wayla n ucennay ameṛḥum Matoub Lounes, d tin ay ssefran naqal ass n larebɛa deg texxamt n tnefrut n Tizi Uzzu, yernu ad d-tili ass n 7 umbir, ɣef wakken ay aɣ-d-xebbren din. Ssebba n uwexxer-a d aɣabi n yemma-s n “Uɣewwaɣ”, imi ah-tt-an d tamuḍint deg usegnaf, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna Tesbeddit n Matoub Lounes yernu twekked-it-id daɣ tmeṭṭut n umeṛḥum, Nadia Matoub-Barhimi, ay yessutren asemmi n umazzay ara iqeyymen ayla n Matoub Lounes i yettwanɣabn ass n 25 Yunyu 1998. Malika Matoub, weltma-s n Lounes, teḥdeṛ din yernu tenna-d belli nettat d yemma-s, s yisem-nsent d tiwṛitin tinegtiyin n 77% seg wayen ay d-yeǧǧa unaẓur-a, fkant amur-nsent i Tesbeddit n Matoub ay d-yelhan s uḥraz n tkatut n Uɣewwaɣ. Twekked-d Malika Matoub belli aqeyyem-a ad d-iḥaz akk ayla n unaẓur-a ay iwten ɣef timmuzɣa d tugdut, yernu tettekka deg waya tkerrust-nni aydeg yella mi t-nɣan, allalen-nnes n uẓawan…atg.

  
 I tikkelt-nniḍen, yella-d unadi akked tezrawt ɣef yisebtar n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen i yettilin yal letnayen deg uɣmis La Dépêche de Kabylie.

 Mebɛed akatay n duktura akked waṭas n turagin ɣef tira n tmaziɣt i yettilin deg uɣmis-a, ha-t-an, tikkelt-a, yella-d unadi akked tezrawt ɣef umawal i yettwaseqdacen deg yisebtar n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen. D Leqdic i xedment snat n tnelmadin n tesdawit n Tubiret, Lacène Tamazight akked Nouri Samia, s usentel « Aglam n tesnulfawalt deg Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen n La dépêche de kabylie ; i lmend n talɣa d unamek’’. Tella-d i lmendad-nsent tselmadt Douik Rzika. Tazrawt, tekcem taɣult n tesnilest imi asentel icudd ɣur-s (Aglam n tesnulfawalt i lmend n talɣa d unamek). Ma d talɣiwin n usnulfu, yeɛna asuddem, asuddes, arwas akked ureṭṭal n wawalen. Ɣef yiswi n umahil, urant-d : Ad nẓer ma yella Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen n La dépêche de Kabylie, yesseqdec tasnulfawalt, d wamek i tt-yesseqdac ? Amek i d-yella usexdem-is, d wacu n talɣiwin tisnulfawalanin yegten deg-s ? Ad nẓer, diɣen, ma yella tasnulfawalt tettwafham sɣur yimeɣriyen. Ad neglem tasnulfawalt yellan deg Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen n La dépêche de Kabylie” ama d isuddimen, isuddisen, arwas akked ureṭṭal i lmend n talɣa d unamek.

  Asteqsi agejdan   akked turdiwin 

 Ma d asteqsi agejdan i ɣef treṣa tezrawt d wa : Ma tella-d tesnulfawalt deg Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen n La dépêche de Kabylie, d wamek i d-yella usexdem-is deg yimagraden? Zyada ɣef usteqsi agejdan, llan sin yisteqsiyen inaddayen-a :  D acu-tent talɣiwin timawalanin yellan deg-s, d wacu n talɣiwin yegten? Amek i d-yella ufham n unamek n yisnulfawalanen ɣer yimsulɣa? Ma dayen yeɛnan turdiwin, ad naf turda tagejdant-agi : Yella-d usexdem n tesnulfawalt deg Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen n La dépêche de Kabylie akked turdiwin tinaddayin-agi : Ahat tasnulfawalt ur d-telli ara s waṭas. Yella-d usmeskel deg usexdem n talɣiwin n tesnulfawalt ama d asuddem, asuddes, arwas akked ureṭṭal. Deg wayen yerzan ammud, gelment-d azal n “437” n yisnulfawalen, i bḍant d lesnaf: Isnulfawalen iḥerfiyen war alɣacen, llan azal n 38, 44%, azal n 9, 61% n yisuddimen, 7, 09% n yisuddisen, 6, 63% d talɣa n urwas, 38, 44% n ureṭṭal. Ɣef waya, nnant-d : ‘’ Nufa-d belli talɣa n wawalen iḥerfiyen tuget s waṭas, imi d tayunin timaynutin. Daɣen, ireṭṭalen d nutni i iṭṭfen amur ameqqran deg wammud. Anect-a yuɣal s usemres n yemsiwal i tutlayin-a n tefransist d taɛrabt. I wakken, daɣen, ad kksen lixṣaṣ n umawal n tmaziɣt. Ma d talɣiwin-a n usuddem, asuddes d urwas, ur gtent ara’’. Acu kan, ɣef wakken i d-nnant tnelmadin-agi, yettili-d wugur n usegzi n tesnulfawalt ɣer kra n yimeɣriyen. Ɣef wakken walant ‘’ Yella-d wugur n tesnulfawalt ɣer yimeɣriyen, imi sɛan aɛewwiq i ufham n unamek, imi d awalen imaynuten ɣur-sen, ladɣa wid ur nelmid ara tamaziɣt’’. Ula d amgarad n unamek n wawalen deg yisegzawalen, yeḍḥa-d d ugur, imi i d-nnant ‘’ Ma d ugur-nniḍen i d-nemmuger, d isegzawalen yegten, imi yal asegzawal yemgarad ɣef wayeḍ deg usegzi n wawalen’’. Ɣef wakken walant temnadiyin-agi, d akken asexdem n yireṭṭalen yekkes amekkan n yisnulfawalen deg Uɣmis, ‘’imi smenyifen asemres n wawalen n tutlayin tiberraniyin, ɣas akken llan s tutlayt n tmaziɣt’’.

  Tiririt ɣef yisteqsiyen 

 Ɣer taggara, ssawḍent tnelmadin-a ad d-rrent ɣef usteqsi agejdan i ɣef tebna tezrawt-a, ufant : ‘’Ineɣmasen di tira n yimagraden-nsen, ssexdamen tasnulfawalt. Anect-agi, yella-d s tarrayin n usileɣ n yisnulfawalen ama d asuddem, asuddes, arwas akked ureṭṭal. Tella-d tesnulfawalt deg Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen n La Dépéche de Kabylie”, s yesnulfawalen yemxallafen, maca ur gten ara. Sxedmen talɣiwin n usuddem, asuddes, arwas akked ureṭṭal. Talɣa yegten seg talɣiwin-a, d talɣa n ureṭṭal seg tutlayin-nniḍen. Deg yisnulfawalen-a, llan wawalen ur ttwafhamen ara ɣer yimsulɣa, llan wiyaḍ ttwafhamen. Ɣer taggara n tezrawt-a, nnant : ‘’Nessaweḍ ɣer yiswi-nteɣ. Nesbeggen-d belli Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen n La Dépêche de Kabylie d aɣmis yessexdamen tasnulfawalt s talɣiwin n usnulfu n tayunin timawalanin timaynutin yemgaraden. Talɣa n ureṭṭal i yegten s waṭas, yeṭṭef aḥric meqqren di tmeslayt n yal ass. Llan yisnulfawalen ifehmen yimeɣriyen, gzan anamek-is, wiyaḍ ur ten-fhimen ara, anect-a, yuɣal ɣer useqqdec-nsen’’. Deg taggara, ad nini, s yisem n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen n La Dépêche de Kabylie, ayyuz i tnelmadin-agi, nessaram-asent amecwar ɣezzifen deg unadi-nsent akked leqraya-nsent. I usmekti. Aṭas n yiḍrisen i d-ttekksen yiselmaden n tmaziɣt deg Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen i wakken ad ten-sqedcen deg yikayaden neɣ deg temsirin. Ad naf imagraden n Uɣmis-a ula deg yidlisen iɣurbizen. 

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Sdat n tmerna deg leswami n usɣer s wazal n 80% ɣer 90%, tuget n wid yesseqdacen aṭas asafar-agi n usɣer, ladɣa les menuisiers, ḥebsen lxedma deg yisekwan-nsen deg tɣiwant n At Zmenzar, taɣiwant i d-yezgan deg wunzul n temdint n Tizi-Uzzu, i ibeɛden s wazal n 11 n yikilumitren ɣef tlemmast n temdint, dayen i aɣ-d-wekkden kra n yimɛelmen n yisekwan. Taɣiwant n At Zmenzer yasɛan ugar n 100 n yisakwan (ateliers) i d-ixelqen aṭas n yimukan n lexadma deg temḍiqt- agi, seld n tmerna deg leswami n usafer agejdan n usɣer, tufa-d iman-is gar ẓzebra d ufḍis, imi deg waguren-agi iɛdan aṭas gar- asen i iɣelqen isakwan-nsen. Aya, iḥuza ula d ixeddameni d-yufan iman- nsen mebla lxedma. Dayen iḥuzan, diɣ, imezdaɣ s sebba n tmerna deg yal taɣawsa yettwaxedmen s usɣer, dɣa summa n lkadra n ṭṭaq yellan yeswa deg tazwara n useggas 4500 DA, ass-a yewweḍ ɣer 8500 DA, timerna n usɣer yella s wazal muqqren, dɣa asɣer yellan 8000 DA i M3 yuɣal la yettnuz s 15000 DA i M3. Tlul-d taluf-agi seld leblan ddmen yimeḍbbren n tmurt n Lezzayer yeɛnan aneḥbus ɣef umaktar n wazal n 1000 n yisufar i d-tettawi tmurt seg tmura n lbara-ni, aya dayen iɛeggben aṭas n yiḥricen deg tdamsa n tmurt n Lezzayer. 

  A. Z. 

  
 Tettheggi iman-is tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu i usuddes n yiwet n temlilit tussnant tagraɣlant, ɣef ccna aqbayli d umaziɣ, ara yeddun ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan. 

 Tettuɛeggin ad yili usiher-a deg taggara n waggur duǧember yezrin, aca kan ur tessaweḍ ara tesdawit, dɣa suẓzent ɣer sdat. Yetturaǧu ad tebdu s wudem unṣib temlilit-agi ass 11 meɣres 2019, ad tessali seldazekka-in 13 deg waggur n meɣres i d-iteddun. D tazeqqa n yisaragen n tesdawit Ḥesnawa ideg ara d-tili temlilit-agi tameqqrant ara yilin d tajmilt i ccna d yinaẓuren merra n ugdud amaziɣ. 

 D timlilit tussnant ara d-yawin awal ɣef ddeqs n yisental di taɣulin yemgaraden, gar-asent: Tasnilest, tasekla d tsugent, amezruy d yidles, tudyizt, tasusyulujit d tunṭrupulujit…atg. Yal amsireg ara d-ixedmen taywelt, ad isexdem kra n tarrayt d taɣult gar taɣulin-agi i d-nebder yakan, i wakken ad d-imel amek i tt-iwala deg uḥric n ccna amaziɣ s umata, ɣef wakken i t-id-tenna Massa Hassina Kherdousi, i yellan d taselway n teseqqamut tussnant n temlilit-a. 

 Imi d timlilit tagraɣlant, yetturaǧu ad d-ilin waṭas n yisaragen sɣur yimussnawen d yiprufisuren akked udukturen n tesdawiyin n tmurt n Tmazɣa (Lezzayer, Tunes d Lmerruk), ɣer tama n tmura tibarraniyin, yecban Fransa, Ṭelyan…atg. Ad d-ilin yisaragen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt sɣur imnadiyen n tesdawiyin-a: Bgayet, Tizi Uzzu d Tubiret, ad ilin daɣen yisaragen-nniḍen s tutlayt n taɛrabt, s tefransist. Am wakken daɣen i yezmer lḥal ad ilint kra ula s teglizit, ɣef wakken i d-tberreḥ yis-s Massa Kherdousi.

 Iswi n temlilit-a tagraɣlant 
 Ma ɣef yiswi n temlilit-agi, tenna-d tselway n tesqamut tussnant, Massa Kherdouci: “ Tamezwarut, ɛerḍeɣ ad nnaleɣ merra iḥricen yerzan ccna amaziɣ, imi tizlit d tumant timettit terza akk imdanen. Dɣa bɣiɣ yal yiwen ad imeslay fell-as ɛlaḥsab n taɣult-is. Tis snat, d asissen (askan) n yidles amaziɣ i umaḍal merra, ulamma yettwassen yakan, maca nekni nebɣa ad as-nernu. Annect-agi, ad yili s ubrid n ccna d tẓuri i yellan d lemri n yidles d tmagit n ugdud”. 

 Tkemmel tenna-d: “Yal amdan, ad yefhem ccna-nneɣ n leqbayel neɣ n yimaziɣen s umata, s ubrid n yal taɣult d yal tarrayt. Tis kraḍet, nebɣa ad d-nbeggen belli ccna amaziɣ yesɛa tulmisin n ccna amaḍlan, daɣen i wakken ad nseḥbiber fell-as”. Am wakken daɣen i d-tberreḥ s waya: “Nessaram ad as-nefk afud iwatan i ccna-agi-nneɣ i wakken ad yaẓ u ad yeddu ɣer sdat”. Ɣer taggara, tenna-d: “Am wakken neẓra, tutlayt n uɣref amaziɣ, tettwaṭṭef neɣ tettwaseḥbiber s ccna…”.

 Acu yetturaǧun deg temlilit-agi? 
 Yetturaǧu seg temlilt-a tagraɣlant ɣef ccna amaziɣ, iḍrisen ara d-yilin deg teywalin dayen ara d-yawin amaynut i ccna-agi amaziɣ, yerna ara t-id-yessifriren gar ccnawi wiyaḍ. Am wakken daɣen yettuɛeggen usizreg n yisaragen-agi n temlilit-agi deg yiwet n tesɣunt ara d-yilin i lmend n wannect-a. “Nessaram ad tɛeddi deg tegnatin igerrzen temlilit-agi, nessaram daɣen ad teɛǧeb kra win ara d-yerzun ɣur-s”, s tenfalit-agi i tessuli Massa Kherdouci awal-is.

<p style="text-align:right">  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ahat ɣur merra inehharen n waɣir n Bgayet, amḍiq akk i ttkukrun i tenhert d abrid n ufalu n Xerraṭa deg ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9, i d-yezgan gar temdint-a i d-nebder d Lberj n Mira, taɣiwant n Tsexriwt. Ula d asiwel, fkan-as seg waṭas-aya tiɣri n « Afalu n lmut ». Aya, imi yal mi ara tkecmeḍ s ukerrus deg-s, mačči d amihi (danger) kan, neɣ sin, i ak-yeṭṭafaren deg teɣzi n wazal n 7 n yikilumitren i ixeddem. D timrawin dɣa n yimdanen i yettmettaten din yal aseggas, seg wayendin d isehwa n tikli i n-iḍerrun. Daymi kkren yinesdabuyen idiganen sqelɛen asenfar n ussuseɛ d ureqqeɛ n ubrid n Ɛecba, i wakken ad yili d asellak i usenqes seg umxudneq d yisehwa ineqqen i d-yettilin deg ufalu-a aqbur, i yettwabnan deg yiseggasen n 1980. Iseggasen-a ineggura, tqeddec dinna tkebbanit taṭurkit akked ETRHB Heddad i t-yeṭṭfen, armi dayen thegga yiwen n uḥric seg-s, i yettwaldin ass 1 n yulyu yezrin. Deffir waya, ɣef wawal n yinehharen s timmad-nsen, yettban-d zun yenqes am acemma uḥras deg ufalu-a, abeɛda deg umezwaru-nni mi ara d-taseḍ si Xerraṭa ɣer Lberj n Mira. Imi winna ar tura, seqdacen-t ala wid i d-yettasen si Xerraṭa. Wamma wid yettruḥun si Lberj n Mira, yal mi ara kfun afalu wis sin, ad zegren dindin ɣer ubrid amaynut n Ɛecba, i d-gant tkebbaniyin-a i d-nebder. « Ɣas mazal ur yenqis ara umihi deg wayen yeɛnan isehwa, maca xersum yekfa ddiq deg yiwen n ufalu. Nettraǧu kan ad yekkes merra usenfar n ussuseɛ n ubrid n Ɛecba akken ad tserreḥ tikli s tidet », i d-yenna yiwen n unehhar seg usamar n Bgayet. Ayen yehwan i yinehharen deg ufalu amaynut, d mi yella yiwen n yizirig n tikli deg-s, meḥsub ala wid yettalin i t-yessemrasen, rnu tnuḥ xilla tafat deg-s, ad as-tiniḍ deg wass i telliḍ.

  M. K. 

  
 Ilul Rachid Alliche ass n 7 yebrir 1953, deg taddart n Taguemount Azouz yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Ait Mahmoud deg Ath Douala. Yelmed deg yiɣerbazen n Tizi Uzzu, syin akkin yewwi-d agerdas DES n tfizikt seg tesdawit n Lezzayer. Iruḥ ɣer tmurt n Fransa, ikemmel dinna almud-ines di tsekla, dɣa yewwi-d agerdas n DEUG n tsekla, seg tesdawit n Lyon n tmurt n Fransa. Tin ɣur-s, yuɣal yesɣer dinna tasekla deg tesdawit-agi aṭas n yiseggasen. Ur d as-tettunfek ara tegnit i wakken ad yelmed tutlayt n tyemmat akken ilaq lḥal, deg yiɣerbazen d tesdawit n tmurt, maca yeɣra i yiman-is ɣer tama n wayen i d-yelmed ɣer uselmad amezwaru n tamziɣt Mouloud Mammeri. Rnu ɣer lebɣi-ines i tmeslayt-is tanaṣlit taqbaylit, d ayen i t-yeǧǧan ad yaru s teqbaylit sin wungalen s wazal-nsen. Amezwaru d “Asfel”, i yura deg useggas n 1981, aseggas kan mbeɛd Tafsut n yimaziɣen 20 yebrir 1980. Xemmsa n yiseggasen kan ɣer sdat, dɣa deg useggas n 1986, yerna yessuffeɣ-d ungal-is wis sin “Faffa”. Yettuneḥsab Rachid Alliche, d aneggal wis sin s tmaziɣt seld Belaid Ait Ali, yuran “Lwali budrar”. Yettuneḥsab daɣen d ameɣnas n tutlayt tamaziɣt, imi deg lawan ideg tettwagdel tmaziɣt deg tmurt n Lezzayer, Mass Alliche, mačči kan yettmeslay-itt neɣ yettaru-tt i yiman-is, maca yessuffeɣ-d sin wungalen s tmaziɣt. Yennuɣ ɣef yidles d tutlayt tamaziɣt, ɣer tama n wayetma-s seg useggas n 1970 armi d asmi yemmut. Yefka-as-d i tsekla tamaziɣt udem-nniḍen, mbeɛd mi tella d timawit, tuɣal tedda deg ubrid n tira. Yexdem daɣen d aneɣmas deg rradyu tis snat, anida i d-yettawi tidwilin i warrac imecṭaḥ ladɣa wid ur nessin ara ad ɣren. Yufa-tt d tagnit i wakken ad ikemmel amennuɣ-is s wawal ɣef yidles amaziɣ s umata. Ma nger tiṭ ɣef wayen yettwaxdamen fell-as, ad naf drus maḍi imi netta aṭas i d-yefka i tsekla tamaziɣt s wuzig d tutlayt tamaziɣt s umata. Aṭas n tezrawin tisdawanin yettwaxdamen ɣef wungalen-is, d wayen i d-yeǧǧa. Deg useggas n 2014, tisebdit takanadit n tamaziɣt, tesnulfa-d arraz n Rachid Alliche i wungal ifazzen. Am wakken daɣen i d as-tettuɣal tejmilt deg tɣiwant-is si teswiɛt ɣer tayeḍ. Yewweḍ leɛfu Rebbi ass n 18 meɣres 2008 deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt, di leɛmer-is 55 n yiseggasen kan. Ass-nni lḥed iɛeddan i wweḍen 10 n yiseggasen ɣef tmettant-is, ulamma yemmut maca leqdic-is mazal-it yedder, ulac win ara d-imeslayen ɣef wungal amaziɣ ma ur d-yeddi ara yisem-is. Ɣer taggara, am wakken qqaren: “Ulamma yeǧǧa-aɣ, yeǧǧa-aɣ-d”. 

  A. A. 

  
 Ma yella deg tudrin ur d-ttafen ara yimezdaɣ uguren akken ad d-sɛeddin ɣef tezmert-nsen, deg temdinin tigejdanin, am Bgayet d Uqbu, iban-d waya d aɣilif ameqqran, tallit-a taneggarut abeɛda. Ugar n tuɛert akken ad tafeḍ amsujji i yebɣa wul, yettili-d waṭas n lḥers d uraǧu deg tzeɣwa, send ad d-taweḍ i yiwen nnuba. « Ma yella ur teẓwireḍ, ur tezmireḍ ara ad d-tesɛeddiḍ si Bgayet, ad tawḍeḍ di lawan s axxam-ik. Aɣilif mačči d tebɛed n umkan, meɛna d araǧu iḍulen send ad d-taweḍ nnuba ». I d-yenna yiwen n urgaz seg usamar n Bgayet. Ɣef tmuɣli tamatut n medden, ur icudd ara kan waya ɣer lexsas n yimsujjiyen imazzagen akka tura, maca daɣen icudd ula ɣer umḍan n yimuḍan i yettziden, irennu. Imi umuɣ n wid ara yesɛeddin, yal tikkelt yeččaray, yettfiḍ. Ayen yerran ahat araǧu d taɛkemt i yimuḍan deg tzeɣwa n yimsujjiyen, d imi uqan wid i d-yesrusuyen kra i yimsaɣen-nsen deg wacu ara ceɣben, ur ttḥulfayen s taẓayt n wakud yettɛeddin. « Werǧin kecmeɣ i tzeqqa n ṭṭbib, ad afeɣ rsen-d yidlisen i tɣuri. Akken meqqar, yezmer yiwen ad yenɣ akud-is deg wayen yelhan, wala ma yeqqim yettgani s uttqelleq ». D awal n yiwet n teḥdayt. Ahat aɣbel-a n ugani, mazal ur d-terri tuget ddhen ɣur-s. Wamma tili deg yal tazeqqa n umsujji, ad yaf walbaɛḍ kra ad t-yeg deg wakud-nni, d taɣuri neɣ d kra-nniḍen, alamma tuɣal d tannumi deg yal taddart.

  M. K. 

  
 Yir tudert, d ammud n yisefra n umedyaz Cherif Lasheb i d-yeffɣen, agguren yezrin, ɣer tezrigin Tamagit. Deg udlis-a n 64 n yisefra, yennul umeskar, deg-s, qrib akk isental i icudden ɣer tmetti, yecban tawennadt, tasertit, tameṭṭut, uguren n tmetti, temɣer, tayri d wayen-nniḍen i t-iceɣben netta s timmad-is neɣ i iḥuzan imdanen-nniḍen imi ɣef wakken i d-tenna, yelli-s, Laeticia, deg tezwert i as-texdem i wammud-a. 

 « Yir tudert, mačči d ayen kan i yesɛedda netta, maca yewwi-d isefra ɣef wayen ttidiren wiyaḍ am ssekran, tidderwect, amɣar, taqendurt…atg ». Mi ara iɣer yiwen isefra n Cherif Lasheb, ad as-d-iban later n jida-s i yuɣen aẓar deg wallaɣ-is. Jida-s i yellan tettawi-d isefra ɣef wuguren n tmetti, tibuɣarin deg tmeɣriwin akked yisefra n lemdeḥ deg lǧanazat. 

 Akka ara naf awal n sswab, yufrar-d s waṭas deg yisefra n umedyaz akked yiwellihen yeqqnen ɣer ddin s umata, xas ulamma llant, yakan, kra n tektiwin i yeǧǧa wakud, yecban tamuɣli-s ɣef tmeṭṭut n tura d wayen-nniḍen. Acu kan, ad yeqqim waya d rray-is akked tmuɣli-s netta. Gar yisefra i d-yessizreg, imi aṭas i as-mazal, ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna, ad d-nebder Lxir, Axxam, A gma, A ssaɛd-iw, Arruḥ ajqayan, Lexdeɛ, Taggara n umcum, Beddeɣ di ttewḥid, Ibeddel zzman…atg. Ilul Cherif Lasheb deg useggas n 1973 deg Tala Xlil, taɣiwant n At Dwala. Zyada ɣef wammud-agi n yisefra, yebda la yesuddus tizlatin. Am wakken yessuli, yakan, yiwet n tmezgunt. Yettnuz udlis s 250 DA, ɣur-s 120 n yisebtar. Taɣuri igerrzen.

<p style="text-align:right">  H. M. 

  
 Mi ara leqḍen azemmur zik, yettεedday-d γef sin n yiberdan, mgaraden, γer wanda leḥḥun : Afares n zzit s yiγallen i xeddment tlawin deg uxxam akked ufares anḍayan i xeddmen yirgazen. 

 Asmi ur d-leqqḍen ara aṭas n uzemmur, zemrent ad t-zḍent tlawin deg yixxamen-nsent, akka i as-tḍerru i uzemmur-nni i d-yewwin ad yettwakkes d azegzaw, acku ur yeṭṭif ara amḍiq lεali deg useklu yerna tcaḍ tili fell-as, neγ yella deg yimeḍqan d igrawiyen, wagi qqaren-as “Azemmur azebli”. Ma d iiεeqqayen n uzemmur i iruḥen ad kemcen, fγen-ten waman, wigi ttaken-d zzit εzizet mliḥ, qqaren-as “Zzit n uberray”. Ihi, ẓẓadent tlawin azemmur-a akkit deg yixxamen-nsent ; ha-ten-an ttawilat i sexdament : Tissirt n ublaḍ (abray), i wakken ad yettwanγed uzemmur-nni; axmuj i usired (lberka); axmuj-nniḍen (aḥaḍun) din i d-jemεent zzit n uberray. Zzit ttezzrent-t s leḥmu.

 Deg temnaḍt n Yiflisen (Lacoste-Dujardin 1982), azemmur i d-yetteγlayen, ttejmaεent-t-id, sewwayent-t s waman neγ s urɣu, umbeεed fessrent-t s ufella n yiferrugen i yiṭij deg wass i wakken ad yekkiw. Jemεent-t-id deg yiḍ, rennunt fell-as isγaren n yisekla. Tasemrest-a, mazal-itt ar ass-a teqqim deg waṭas n tudrin deg lεerc n Ayt Σebbas (Iγil Σli), asmi ara yekkaw, iεeqqayen-nni n uzemmur, ttawint-ten γer uberray (tissirt d uṭγaγ). 

 Ibeεbayen-nni, ttaǧǧant-ten din, ma d arekti n yiεeqqayen-nni, ttawint-t srusayent-t sdat n lberka, d axmuj n usizdeg, sbedden-t s yiblaḍen, wa sdat n wa, ṭṭfen-ten s temcent n wakal am win i ixeddmen deg lqaε n uberray. lqay s 60 n yisantimitren. Iεeqqayen i yuγalen d arekti, senγadent-ten, rennunt-asen kra n waman deg teswiεet γer tayeḍ. Imir-n ihi i d-tetteffeγ zzit ; ayen i d-yeqqimen d arekti ad t-awint s uḥellab (d tacmuxt d tameqqrant temmug s wakal) γer ukessar, ddaw n unnar, anda yella uḥaḍun (aḥḍun), d axmuj n usizdeg immug am lberka. Ttkemmilent, sexlaḍent, rnu εerkent i urekti-nni zzit akked waman s umehraz. S kra kra, zzit-nni tettali-d umbeεed ttawint-tt γer uxxam i wakken ad tt-zzrent s leḥmu (Lacoste-Dujardin 2008.    Tasuqqilt sɣur Hamitouche Abdennour 

  
 Ass-nni n letnayen yezrin, i d as-tuɣal tejmilt i yiwen gar yijga n tsekla tamaziɣt, wagi d aneggal amezwaru s tmaziɣt Rachid Alliche. Yella-d usmekti n umulli wis 11 n tmettant-is, s yiwet n tejmilt i d as-yuɣalen sɣur yimezdaɣ n taddart-is Taguemount Azouz. Yella-d deg-s, usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen d ibeddi n ddqiqa n tsussmi. Tella-d tejmilt-agi s tilin n yiɛeggalen n twacult Alliche d yigensasen n tesbeddit Maoub Lounes akked yiɛeggalen n tddukkla Mouloud Feraoun. Am wakken daɣen, i d-tella tegnit n tnagiyin, ideg i d-mmeslayen yiɛeggalen n twacult-is akked wid akk i t-yessnen. Ula d uletma-s n tasa, tefka-d ayen din d iktayen, i d tt-icerken d gma-s, yerna i mazal reṣṣan deg wallaɣ-is mebɛed 11 n yiseggasen segmi medlent wallen-is. Llan diɣ wid i d-yemmeslayen ɣef tudert d yimuhal n umeɣnas yefkan tudert-is d asfel i tmentilt tamaziɣt. Ulamma tuɣal-as tejmilt-agi, maca netta yuklal ugar n waya, i lmend n wayen i d-yefka i tsekla tamaziɣt.
  Arraz n wungal Rachid Alliche d tezrawin ɣef leqdic-is
  Ma nger tiṭ ɣef wayen yettwaxdamen fell-as, ad naf drus, imi netta aṭas i d-yefka i tsekla tamaziɣt s wuzig d tutlayt tamaziɣt s umata. Aṭas n tezrawin tisdawanin i yettwaxdamen ɣef wungalen-is, d wayen i d-yeǧǧa. Ama deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu neɣ deg tin n Bgayet neɣ ɛad deg tinna n Tubiret. Yal tazrawt, anwa ungal i textar ad texdem fell-as tasleḍt, yal wa daɣen acu n usentel i yettnadi deg-sen. Deg useggas n 2014 d tasawent, tesnulfa-d tesbeddit takanaddit n tamaziɣt “Tiregwa” arraz n Rachid Alliche i wungal ifazzen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Yal aseggas, ttifriren-d deg-s 3 n warrazen i ttawin yineggalen n tutlayt taqbaylit. Ma d iswi n warraz-agi, si tama d tajmilt i uneggal-agi amezwaru n tmaziɣt, si tama-nniḍen d asebɣes n yineggalen s tmaziɣt.

  Tudert-is d yimuhal-is 
  Ilul Rachid Alliche, ass n sa (sebɛa) di yebrir 1953, di taddart n Taguemount Azouz , yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Ait Mahmoud deg Ath Douala. Yelmed deg yiɣerbazen n Tizi Uzzu, syin akkin yewwi-d agerdas “DES” n tfizikt seg tesdawit n Lezzayer. Iruḥ ɣer tmurt n Fransa, ikemmel dinna almud-ines di tsekla, dɣa yewwi-d agerdas n “DEUG” n tsekla, seg tesdawit n Lyon n tmurt n Fransa. Tin ɣur-s, yuɣal d aselmad, yessɣer dinna tasekla deg tesdawit-agi aṭas n yiseggasen. Ur d as-tettunfek ara tegnit i wakken ad yelmed tutlayt n tyemmat akken ilaq lḥal, deg yiɣerbazen d tesdawit n tmurt, maca yeɣra i yiman-is ɣer tama n wayen i d-yelmed ɣer uselmad amezwaru n tamziɣt Mouloud Mammeri. Rnu ɣer lebɣi-ines i tmeslayt-is tanaṣlit taqbaylit, d ayen i t-yeǧǧan ad yaru s teqbaylit sin wungalen s wazal-nsen. Amezwaru d “Asfel”, i yura deg useggas n 1981, aseggas kan mebɛed tafsut yimaziɣen n 20 yebrir 1980. Xemmsa n yiseggasen kan ɣer sdat, dɣa deg useggas n 1986, yerna yessuffeɣ-d ungal-is wis sin “Faffa”. Yettuneḥsab Rachid Alliche d aneggal amezwaru s tmaziɣt, d ameɣnas n tutlayt tamaziɣt, imi deg lawan ideg tettwagdel tmaziɣt deg tmurt n Lezzayer Mass Alliche, mačči kan yettmeslay-itt neɣ yettaru-tt i yiman-is, maca yessuffeɣ-d sin wungalen s tmaziɣt. Yennuɣ ɣef yidles d tutlayt tamaziɣt, ɣer tama n wayetma-as seg useggas n 1970 armi d asmi yemmut. Yexdem daɣen d aneɣmas deg rradyu tis snat, anida i d-yettawi tidwilin i warrac imecṭaḥ ladɣa wid ur nessin ara ad ɣren. Yufa-tt d tagnit i wakken ad ikemmel amennuɣ-is s wawal ɣef yidles amaziɣ s umata. Am wakken daɣen i d-igmer aṭas n yiḍrisen n tmedyazt n tmeṭṭut, asmi akken iqeddec akked tseddut “ONDA” n tmurt n Lezzayer. Yewweḍ leɛfu Ṛebbi ass n 18 meɣres 2008 deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, di leɛmer-is 55 n yiseggasen kan. Ulamma ɛeddanan 11 n yiseggasen ɣef tmettant-is, maca, leqdic-is mazal-it yedder, ulac win ara d-yemmeslayen ɣef wungal amaziɣ ma ur d-yeddi ara yisem-is. Ɣer taggara, am wakken qqaren: “Ulamma yeǧǧa-aɣ, yeǧǧa-aɣ-d”, ihi xas sgunfu di talwit, teǧǧiḍ-d deffir-k agerruj i tsutwin i d-iteddun.  A. A 

  
  Aḥric 1u 

 
 Tella yiwet teẓgi n ṭṭlam s ddaw taddart n At Weεban, win ara tt-ikecmen deg uzal qayli, ad teccirew yakk ṣṣura-s, ad iḥulfu s ucebbub-is yuli deg yigenni seg rrebrab tessekcam s ulawen. Dda Mira bu yisγaren, tameṭṭut-is Miγisa d warraw-nsen Ḥmiṭuc d Duduc, zedγen deg tlemmast-is. Dda Mira, yettarra-tt ḥala i unegzum n yisγaren, maca amzun ulac d acu yettsami deg-sen. Seg wakken temcubbak akk teẓgi n ṭṭlam, am wakken yal afurk yellan deg-s, yesni γer wayeḍ. Tawacult-agi n Dda Mira bu-yisγaren, d taẓawalit almi d ayen. Iεeggalen-is, ur lḥiqen ara yakk iman-nsen ; ula d aγrum aḥefrur ur teṛwin ara. Yiwen wass gar wussan, akken i d-tewweḍ tmeddit, yeẓẓel dda Mira bu-yisγaren deg teγmert, yeṭṭef aqerruy-is yesnuzgum. Yuγal yenna-as i tmeṭṭut-is: ‘’Amek ara nekkes tura laẓ i warrac-agi? Nekni s timmad-nneγ a-t-a yeṭṭeḍ-itt mmi-s, ur d-yegri kra n weεwin i swayes ara nemmager ussan, xerṣum ad nessebded tigecrar-nneγ”. Terra-as-d awal tmeṭṭut, tenna-as: ‘’Teẓriḍ amek ! Tegra-d kan ad neglu yis-sen azekka s alqaε n teẓgi, ad ten-nessiweḍ ḥala ma d anida ur as-ttafen ara yakk ixef-is i tuγalin. Yal yiwen deg-sen ad as-nekmes tiḥdert n uγrum s afus-is, mi tennesseγfel kan akken ur ttfaqen ara, ad asen-neğğ aḍu γer deffir’’. Dda Mira bu yisγaren: ‘’Ala a tameṭṭut, wagi d yir ttawil, ur zmireγ ara ad sseγreγ tasa-w fell-asen. Amek akka ad n-ğğeγ arraw-iw deg welqaε n teẓgi, nekk ad d-uγaleγ s axxam?’’. Miγisa: ‘’A ziγ kečč d timint ay axessar-iw! Ihi anef-as akka, ad d-terzu tmettant, ad d-taf meqqar d acu ad teddem, ihi ad aγ-terfed deg ukkuẓ (4) yid-neγ γef yiwet tikkelt. Yelha wakka? Yeffeγ fell-ak wayagi?’’. Dda Mira bu yisγaren, yeεfes γef wul-is, iwufeq-itt.   Seg Kabyle.com 

  
 Akken i d-nenna deg yisallen iɛeddan, yekcem unezgum d tteeqlaq imezdaɣ n temnaḍt n Ayt Smaɛel ɣef waddad n tegnawt i d-ixedmen lḥamu, taɣart akked temḍerrit deg tsemhuyt n tegrest yezrin.

 Maca, segmi i d-teldi tefsut tiwwura-ines s kra n wussan, yebda yettbeddil lḥal, simmal tesseɣlab tesmeḍ ɣef lḥamu aqesḥan, armi I d-tebrez amkan-is deg ugama i yellan qrib ad ibeddel akk tugna s fad i t-yeṭṭfen. Dɣa deg wayyur n meɣres iɛeddan, ladɣa deg wussan-is ineggura, aṭas n yigeffuren d yideflawen i d-yewwten ɣef tmurt. Yeswa wakal, swant tebḥirin d ṭṭjur. Swan yimɣan, rwan aman i ten-ixussen seg wacḥal-aya. D ayen i d-yeslalen tumert i wid merra i yellan ttkukrun ussan i d-iteddun, ttuggaden yir igemmaḍ swayes zemren ad d-glun. D acu kan, lehwa i d-yeɣlin s waṭas, tga-d kra n temḍerrit deg temnaḍin yemgaraden, gar-asent tin n Ayt Smaɛel i ibeɛden s wazal n 70 n yikilumitren ɣef waɣir n Bgayet. Aya seld ayen yeḍran ɣef tmentilt n yiɣeẓran d tregwa i yeččuren armi i d-feggḍen, d iḥemmalen i yewwin kra n yiberdan, rwin tibḥirin, swaɣen ayen yettwaẓẓan deg-sent. Am yilel i teqqel lqaɛa s waman i tt-yessarden seg yiwet n tama, i tt-yeswesxen seg tama-nniḍen, imi truḥ d idigan. Iḥemmalen-nni, szeɛfen nezzeh imezdaɣ n taddart n Ayt Smaɛel imi ẓran mačči d igenni i yeccḍen mi i d-yebra i waman s ccyaḍa, maca d astehzi n tɣiwant i yekkin s umur ameqqran deg tuffɣa-nsen seg yiɣeẓran d tregwa i yemmuggen i ujmaɛ. Ladɣa imi acḥal d akud tura, segmi yekker umeslay fell-asen, yella deg wahil ad asen-yettwakkas tikwal uhicur, ad d-ttwassizdagen akken ad yili deg-sen listaɛ, wannag ar ass-a urɛad gren deg ccɣel-nsen.

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Tuḍen tezmert n umaḍal, aṭṭan ur as-zmiren imejjayen tḥuza-ten ula ad nutni, dɣa d aṭṭan amenṭaḍ ur yesεi ddwa, maca la amejjay la amdawi, nezmer-as ala s ukman deg yixxamen. Axeddim yeḥbes yeḥbes yal taɣawsa di dunnit yefka-yas amur-is. yessers-as-d amur-is deg ukman, yeḥbes lbabuṛat timesrifin, timacinin n tmerrit, luzinat, dabex n uḍar…..atg, d wayen iḥemmlen akk lɣaci, yal taɣawsa, tikuryas……atg ). Yeṣṣaweḍ yenɣa amerkanti, agellil, yegla s yineɣlafen, d tmeṭṭut, agrud, ilemẓi….atg, Yefka tawaɣit i yimɣaren, tamurt tuɣal ad as-tiniḍ d tallit-nni n nissan ( di tallit-a ur yezmir yiwen ad yečč isekla ulayɣar ad qqaren….). Taswiɛt ur telli am tin i iεeddan, tenbeddal daɣen mačči am tin n yiḍelli, agdud yefqeε yerna yeččeḥ ɣef udabu mačči d kra. Acḥal yessaram ad i as-d-yefk afus n tallelt i wakken ad ibeddel taswiεt. Agdud, ur yeqqin ifassen-is, ur yeǧǧi tama neɣ abrid, iεedda-ten yakk, macca adabu, yerra awal-is ɣer deffir n umeẓẓuɣ-is akken i d-qqaren At zik “Nekk qqazeɣ aẓekka n baba-s, netta irewwel-iyi s ugelzim”. Inzi yenna: “Afus-is deg ufus-inu, leεyaḍ-is yewweḍ agemmaḍ”. Adabu, ur yemḥaḥad wul-is, iεemmed i twaɣit yal taswiɛt ad yessuffeɣ ulɣu ad yernu kra n wussan n ukman, agdud teɛṛeq-as teswiɛt, yerwi wallaɣ-is, yerwi mačči d kra. Ddɣel yewweḍ-d ɣer yimnaṛen, taxriḍt n yimdanen, tekfa. Tban-d ɣef uqadum-is, agdud ijab-d ussan am dkir ɣer wuzzal, terwi fell-as, tura ha-t-an yettraǧu melmi ara d-yali wass, ad yecreq yiṭij n tudert, ad tbin tafat, yal yiwen ad yuɣal ɣer umekkan-is, ad yejji udeddic uqbel ad ifat lawan. Ad yeqcer, ad nuɣal sani i d-nekka, azeǧǧig n usirem ad yettriḥ deg yal tama n tmurt n tmazɣa s umennuɣ n talwit.
  Daoued Mekhous .

  
 Am yal aseggas mi ara d-yaweḍ Yennayer, ttheggint-d tddukkliwin ahilen s wayes ara d-smektint tafaska-agi n yixef useggas n yimaziɣen. D ansay n usmekti n umezruy d laṣel i tsuta i d-yettnekkaren. Ihi, ula d Tiddukkla tadelsant “Imnar n tdukli” n tɣiwant n At Ɛissa Mimun, ur tezgil ara tafaska-agi imi i d-sewwjed yiwen n wahil i yesɛan assaɣ akked yixef n useggas n yimaziɣen. Tasebḥit n wass n Yennayer, kkren yiɛggalen n tddukkla, ssersen tameqqunt n yizeǧǧigen ɣef temḍelt n yiwen n umeɣras d umeɣnas ameqqran i d-yefkan aṭas i yidles amaziɣ, wagi d Muḥend Aɛrab Bessaɛud. 

 Am yal tikkelt di yennayer, llant-d temsikniyin n wallalen yemxallafen am uẓeṭṭa, tiqendyar n leqbayel, tiwlafin i yerzan ɣer yennayer d umezruy-is. Syin akkin, xedmen yigerdan n temnaḍt-a yiwen n Karnaval s yiselsa iqburen n yimaziɣen. Am wakken i d-thegga tddukkla Imnar n tdukli yiwet n tzeqqa iwumi tsemma ‘Tazeqqa n lejdud’, anda i d-seknen allalen iqdimen i sexdamen yimaziɣen. Syin, d timsizwert “Imensi n Yennayer” n uswwi amensay ifazen akked wayen yeɛnan aḍris igerrzen s tutlayt n tmaziɣt. 

 Mi yezgen uzal, tella-d lweɛda n Yennayer i win i d-yerzan ɣer taddart n Tḥannut. Tameddit n wass, tettwahegga-d yiwet n tmeɣra n ccna sɣur yilmeẓyen akked tukci n warrazen i wid i d-yufraren deg merra umsizwer i d-yellan di tsebḥit-nni. D leqdic-a i tga tddukkla d iswi i useḥbiber ɣef tgemmi d umezruy imi irmad i d-thegga icudd ɣer tfaska-agi . Seg tama-s, yenna-d uselway n tddukkla Mas Adaoun Abdelghani : “ Iswi-nneɣ s tddukkla deffir n usfugel n yennayer 2970 : Tamezwarut, d aqabel n tewwura n useggas akked yimezdaɣ n tuddar-nneɣ. Tis snat, i usefhem n meddem belli yennayer mačči kan d seksu d uyaziḍ, maca d amezruy lqayen. Tis tlata, d areṣṣi di tmetti ansayen-nneɣ iqburen i wakken ur ttruḥun ara u d tagnit daɣen i yilmeẓyen i wakken ad issinen amezruy-nsen, ansayen-nsen, idles-nsen…atg. yennayer ameggaz i yal yiwen d yiwet.” 

  Souhila Yamani 

  
 Am yal aseggas deg tefsut, yettili-d deg tɣiwant n Tifra, tadayra n Sidi Ɛic, yiwen n warmud i yuɣalen tura d lɛada, ttraǧun-t akk yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt-nni. D ayen icudden dɣa ɣer tfaska n Uderyis i d-tettheggi tdukkla Itri n Yiburayen yal ayyur n meɣres. I lmend dɣa n teẓrigt tis sa, ara yemmaggen deg kra n yimalasen kan, d yiwet gar tgejda n tezlit tazwawt iwumi ara tuɣal tejmilt: wa d Ɛetmani. Ɣef wakken i d-tenna teɣbalut-nneɣ, ad tili teẓrigt-a s ssifa-s weḥd-s ideg ara ḥeḍren waṭas n yinaẓuren i yebɣan ula d nutni ad rren si tama-nsen tajmilt i bab n tezlit « I Umaziɣ ». Ulamma s lexsas n wallalen, ladɣa ugur n tedrimt i d-yeḍḥan d anezgum ageɛmir n tddukkliwin merra, ɛewwlen yiɛeggalen n tdukkla Itri n Yiburagen, ad sɛeddin ttiɛad-a akken ilaq lḥal, am yal tikkelt.

  M. K. 

  
 Mebɛed mi yetturaǧu ad tessali ass-nni n lexmis 15 unbir 2018, tallit n ujerred n yinelmaden ɣer yikayaden n taggara n ulmud (BAC, BEM d 5e), tesseɣzef-itt, ihi, Tneɣlaft n usegmi aɣelnaw Massa Nouria Benghabrit, i d- yuran yiwen wulɣu deg tansa (le site) n tneɣlaft-is. Ad naf terna ddurt-nniḍen i tallit n ujerred, yeddan si 15 tuber alammi d 15 unbir, acu kan ad ikemmel ujerred-agi alamma d ass n lexmis 22 unbir 2018. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli leğrida n yikayaden unṣiben n taggara n useggas-agi aɣurbiz 2018/2019, ad mseḍfaren akka: Ad d-yezwir ukayad n taggara n uswir amenzu 5e, i yetturaǧun ad d-yili ass n larebɛa 29 deg waggur n maggu (29-05-2019). Tin ɣur-s, d win n taggara n uswir n ulmud alemmas, yettwassnen s yisem n BEM, ad d-yili seg wass n lḥed 09 alamma d ass n ttlata 11 seg waggur yunyu (09, 10 d 11/05/2019). Ma d akayad n taggara n uswir n tesnawit neɣ ayen iwumi qqaren BAC, yetturaǧu ad d-yili d aneggaru, seg wass lḥed 16 yunyu ala!ma d ass lexmis 20 deg waggur n yunyu (16, 17, 18, 19 d 20/06/2019). 

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Aḥric 2, taggara
 Yekcem urgaz, qqimen ttqesiren deg uxxam, armi kfan lqahwa, yenna-as urgaz: “Ihi ma tewjed lamana-nni, nekk d lawan a ak-ğğeγ lehna! Aḥbib-is: “Tewjed, yerna ddem-itt-id s ufus-ik”. 
  -Anida-tt? 
  -A-ten-an yisurdiyen d axel n teqbuct-nni γef udekkan. 
  Iẓẓel afus-is urgaz, yaf ayen akken yebγa, yerra isurdiyen γer lğib ubelṭun-is, yenna-yas: “Qqim di lehna, ar d-wejden ad ak-d-rreγ lxir-ik. Aḥbib-is: “S laεqel-ik…”. Argaz mi yeqḍa lmetza-ines, yettu win γur ten-id-iddem s ufus-is, ma ur yelli yekkes-iten i terwiḥt-is! Maca win yessnen, yezwar ṣṣbeṛ. Iεedda zzman γuzzif, wa ur yenni i wa. Tezzi teswaεt, armi argaz-nni yeḥwağ daγen isurdiyen. Yemmekta-d win akken i as-d-ireḍlen, yenna-as: “Ad ruḥeγ kan s aḥbib-iw, d netta kan i yi-yettselliken”. Mi yewweḍ, yessawel-as, yeffeγ-d γur-s: “Mreḥba yis-k, acu akka i ak-id-yesmektan deg-neγ, d lxiṛ kan?”. Argaz: “Acu n lxiṛ! Tmerret-aγ ddunit, ur ttεeṭṭileγ ara fell-ak, usiγ-d, nniγ-as ma ad afeγ γur-k kra n yidrimen aql-i uqeεeγ?”. Aḥbib-is: “Acu ara ak-inniγ? Muqel kan taqbuct-nni”. Argaz, yecfa γef umkan-is, yuzzel, yeddem-itt-id, yessekcem afus-is, yaf-itt d tilemt, yenna-as: “Ulac daxel-is acemma, ur ufiγ ara”. Aḥbib-is: “Tikkelt tamzwarut i teskecmeḍ afus-ik, tufiḍ neγ ala?” yenna-yas: “Ufiγ ». Aḥbib-is: “Ih, lemmer i d-terriḍ ayen tewwiḍ, ass-a ad ten-id-tafeḍ di teqbuct-nni. Taggara. Ihi amdan, ilaq γas taggara-nneγ yiwet d tamettant, s win yesεan s win ur nesεi kra, ilaq ad yissin amek ara iseddu lecγal-is. Ma yella cceṛ yettaweḍ armi i issen abrid-is, lxiṛ abrid-is yelha yessutur leḥder d ṣṣbeṛ. Win yeččan lamana neγ yexdaε lemḥibba, taggara-s d yir tagnit, acku ma ğğan-k widen yelhan, d acu i d ak-d-yeqqimen?
   Yahia Yanes 

  
 Yessufeɣ-d, ussan-a kan, umedyaz Ɛezzun Ḥmed ammud-nniḍen n yisefra s tedrimt n tdukkla Itri Adelsan n Uqbu. Ad d-nesmekti d akken tesɛa-tt d lɛada tdukkla-a, tessaẓrag-d ammuden n yisefra, s uzwel “Tacemlit”, i yimedyazen i d-yettufraren deg umsizwer n tmedyazt i d-tettheggi deg tegrest n yal aseggas. Imi dɣa amedyaz Ɛezzun Ḥmed, mmi-s n Ayt Smaɛel, iḥella-d deg teẓrigt n yilindi amḍiq amezwaru deg temlilit-a n Uqbu, isaḥ-as-d, useggas-a, wammud s 68 n yisebtar d 30 n yisefra. D ammud n wawalen icebḥen wis sin i yesɛa tura, seld win i as-d-tessufeɣ tdukkla tadelsant Adrar n Fad deg useggas n 2016. Dɣa, tura akka, yettheggi umedyaz i kra n tuffɣiwin i tnezzut n ubuddu ara t-id-ijemɛen akked wid i t-iḥemmlen, ḥemmlen isefra-s.

  M. K. 

  
 Banent-d kraḍet n tfekkiwin n tlemẓiyin war rruḥ di teftist n Ɛin Tturk n Wehran, zuɣrent-tent-id lemwaji n yilel ɣer yejdi. Ɣef wakken i d-nnan, d sin n yiṣeggaden n yiselman i tent-iwalan, syin xebbren tamsulta d ssrabes terza temsalt. Syin, usan-d yiɣallen n usellek aɣarim i usukkes-nsent, ttwasawḍent ɣer sbiṭar Ben Zerǧeb. Ɣef wakken i d-iban deg unadi i gan, tiqcicin-a, ruḥent ad zegrent ɣer tmura n umalu (Sepenyul), maca ur ssawḍent ara, acku addad n tegnewt ur yethedden ara ussan-a ineggura. D lewhayem, acku zik d ilmeẓyen i iḥerqen s tuget ɣer wakin i lebḥer, maca taggara-a, banent-d tewsatin-nniḍen n yimdanen ( ama d tilmeẓyin, llant ula d tid yettawin llufanat gar yifassen, ama d imɣaren yeddan mliḥ deg usemmud). Ay-a, yessebgan-d lɣiḍ d layas yeččuren ulawen n yizzayriyen s umata, ur nufi ara lehna di tmurt-nsen. Annect-a iḍerru-d 64 d aseggas seld timunent n Lezzayer.

  Khaled. A 

  
 Am wakken yettuɛeggen, ddurt iɛeddan, i bdan lecɣal n lebni n sin yisebdaden n usmekti, yiwen i uɣewway Matoub Lounès wayeḍ i ugrawliw Imache Amar. 

 Sin-agi n yirgazen i yefkan tarwiḥt-nsen d asfel ɣef tmurt, yiwen i tegrawla tazzayrit wayeḍ i umennuɣ amaziɣ. Mbeɛd, mi d-yella usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka n umeɣras, yellan deffir n tlalit n Yitri n Tefriqt n Ugafa (ENA) deg useggas n 1926, wagi d Imache Amar. D tagnit i ḥedren yiɛeggalen n tddukkla Imache Amar d wid n Tesbeddit Matoub Lounès ɣef uqerru-is Malika Matoub, taselwayt n tesbeddt-a, llan diɣ imḍebbren n tɣiwant n At Dwala. 

 Dinna i d-iberreḥ Mass Fekhar Amar, imḍebber deg tɣiwant n At Dwala s waya : “Am wakken i d asen-nṛeggem i snat n twaculin-agi d yimezdaɣ-nneɣ, yewweḍ wass i nurǧa acḥal-aya. Ass-a (letnayen 08/07/2019), d ass ur necbi wiyaḍ, ad yeqqim deg umezruy n temnaḍt-nneɣ, i yerran tajmilt meqqren i sin yirgazen-is meqqren”. Ikemmel yenna-d: “Aḥric amenzu n usenfar-agi, ad yesqam s wazal n 680 n yimelyan: 380 imelyan, d taɣiwan-nneɣ ara ten-iqablen ma d 300 imelyan-nniḍen d Aseqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya ara ten-iqablen. Ad ttwaxdamen yisebdaden-agi ɛlaḥsab n yilugan igraɣlanen swayes xeddmen isebdaden”. 

 Beddu n lecɣal n sin n yisebdaden-agi, yella-d i lmend n usmekti n umulli wis 124 n tlalit n Imache Amar, i d-yellan ass n 07 yulyu 1895. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, aẓru amezwau n lebni-nsen, yettwasers ass-nni n 25 yunyu iɛeddan, i lmend n umulli wis 21 n tmenɣiwt n ucennay Matoub Lounes. Ad d-yili lebni-nsen deg tlemmast n temnaḍt n At Dwala, sdat kan n usɣim n ladayra. 
  Gh. A. 

  
 Rabah Bedaouche, d ilemẓi-amedyaz s tutlayt n Molière. Deg tdiwennit-a, newwi-d awal yid-s ɣef tira-s akked yisenfaren-is sya d afella. 

  Aɣmis n Yimazɣen: Deg tazwara ini-d anwaid Rabah Bedaouche ?  
  Rabah Bedaouche: Nekk, d ilmẓi i ilulen deg tmurt n Leqbayel deg useggas1993 di tɣiwant n Uweqqas. D amedyaz s tutlayt tafransist. Ar tura, suffeɣeɣ-d sin n wammuden ɣer tezrigin Tafat. Amenzu, semmaɣ-as « Le sentier des plaies » ma d wis sin fkiɣ-as azwel « Un arc-en-ciel en plein nuit ». Rnu ɣer waya, aql-iyi d asdawan, ḍefreɣ aḥric n taywalt.

  Melmi i tebdiḍ tessefruyeḍ ?  
  Tamedyazt, sneɣ-tt lwaḥi d ccna n teqbaylit. Send ad kecmeɣ ɣer uɣerbaz, lliɣ selleɣ i uẓawan n waṭas n yicennayen, gar-asen: Meɛtub Lwennas, Ayt Mengellat, Sliman Σazem d wiyaḍ. Akka i d-bdiɣ tamedyazt. Bdiɣ akka, rnu ɣef waya, kkreɣ-d deg twacult d tigellilt tsel nezzeh i ccna. Yettɛeddi wakud, ttaruɣ ciṭ ciṭ. Cfiɣ, asefru amezwaru, uriɣ-t ɣef Meɛtub Lwennas mi lliɣ d anelmad deg uɣerbaz alemmas. Nella di tzeqqa, imeddukkal-iw, lhan-d d temsirin, nekk rriɣ-tt i tira. D acu kan, sḥassfeɣ imi asefru-nni amezwaru i uriɣ, iruḥ-iyi, ur ẓriɣ anda yerra.

  Amek armi s tefransist i tessefruyeḍ mačči s tutlayt-nniḍen ?  
  Yak tezriḍ belli adabu-agi, yekkes-aɣ ayefki n tyemmatin-nneɣ! Ulac ula d yiwen n wass i deg i ɣriɣ tutlayt-iw deg uɣerbaz. Γef waya ur zmireɣ ara ad aruɣ yis-s, axater ur ssineɣ ara ilugan-is akken iwata. Ufiɣ-d tafransist d tifrat i wakken ad d-iniɣ ayen ttwaliɣ d wayen txemmimeɣ, ayen ssaramaɣ, d wayen i yi-iceɣben. Maca, Taqbaylit tezga yid-i.

  Anwa-ten yinaẓuren i ɣer tmaleḍ ? 
  Ttagmeɣ-d s tuget seg ccna i ḥemmleɣ aṭas. Yerna taẓuri tezdeɣ-iyi deg yidammen. Ttagmaɣ-d ɣer yimedyazen d yinaẓuren n Teqbaylit, ad nebder gar-asen: Amedyaz ameqqran Si Muḥend Umḥend, Nna Crifa, Lwennas Meɛtub, d wiyaḍ. Ma seg yibeṛṛaniyen ad naf: Maḥmud Darwich, Charles Baudelaire.

  D acu d isenfaren i tesɛiḍ sya ɣer sdat ? 
  Akka tura, aql-iyi ttheggiɣ yiwen n wungal. ssarameɣ ad d-yeffeɣ deg wayyuren i d-iteddunu. Llan daɣen yisenfaren ɣer sdat, maca ɣef wakken ttwaliɣ ad ɛeṭṭlen. Ad neǧǧ akud ad yexdem ccɣel-is. Akka tura aql-i lhiɣ-d d wammud-inu aneggaru I d-yeffɣen deg taggara n wayyur n yebrir yezrin.

  D acu I d uguren i d-tufiḍ deg unnar n usizreg ? 
  Tanemmirt ɣef usteqsi-agi. D tidet, uguren-is ggten s waṭṭas ! Akken ttwaliɣ, nekni s yilemẓiyen, ur nesɛi ara azref ad nextir. Ɣas ma yella s yidrimen-nneɣ, meɛna nettaf-d ẓẓrubat d imeqqranen. D ayen i yessefcalen mi ara nẓer kra n temsal ɣef ur nebni. Maca yelha usirem.

  Awal n taggara swayes ara nessali tadiwennit-a… 
  Awal-iw ɣer da, ad snemmreɣ wid d tid i yi-d-yefkan tallelt gar-asen: Mass Mebruk Sennun, Farid Idrisi akked tnaẓurt Bahiya Ḥamdi i yi-d-ixedmen unuɣ i wammud-iw n yisefra war ma teṭṭef tadrimt. War ma ttuɣ imdanen d wid akk i yi-d-yettaken tabɣest i wakken ad dduɣ ɣer sdat. Tanemmirt daɣen i uɣmis n Yimaziɣen i yi-d-yefkan tagnit-a.

  Yesteqsat Mouhoubi Akli 

  
 Sdat n uneḥbus n usenfar n 100 n tnezduɣin LPA n tɣiwant n Draa Ben Khedda, ugar n useggas aya, yeggra-d usenfar deg yir liḥala s sebba n yigefran i d-yewwten s ṭaqqa deg wagguren iɛeddan. Yegla-d s lexsarat timeqqranin usetehzi d yir aselḥu n yisenfaren yetabaɛen i uwanak. Dɣa, tawaɣit tḥuza tuget n tnezduɣin yekfan yakan, ladɣa ajeyyer n leḥyuḍ, twiqan akked tewwura i d-iqelɛen akk. Deg liḥala yecban tagi, wid teɛna temsalt, ama d OPGI n Tizi Uzzu, Imḍebber n tkkebanit i d-yelhan s lebni n usenfar-agi, neɣ d tiddukkla n yineɣmasen d yimceyyɛen n tɣamsa taɣelnawt , xedmen lḥir i tifrat n uɣbel n usenfar-agi i d-yegran deg yir liḥala. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken aɣbel yebda seld win n lexṣas n tedrimt n uwanak i iɛeggben tuget n yisenfaren deg rebɛa n tɣummar n tmurt n Lezzayer. Imḍebber n tkebbanit n lebni yeqsed ad ikemmel asenfar-agi seld lexlas n tuget n tedrimt yettalas i OPGI n TiziUzzu. Asenfar, yettuɛegnen ad yettunefk deg taggara n useggas iɛeddan 2017, meɛna deg teswiɛt yecban tagi, ha-t-an ad iḍul, ur d-yettili ara deg ttiɛad-ines. Cudden yiɣeblan ɣer leɣsas n tedrimt deg yisenfaren n lebni i iɛumen taggara-agi deg ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu. Dɣa tuget n tkebbaniyin yerkeb-itent lɣiḍ meqqren ɣef waya. Kra n tkebbaniyit unfent i yisenfaren-nnsent i lebdda. 

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Ilaq ad d-nini aṭas i yellan d anuɣni deg tmetti ɣef taluft yerzan tameɣra n tallit-a, d wayen i tt-id-yeṭṭafaren di tmurt n leqbayel. Tidet yellan, d timḍerrit-nni i d-yewwi usetrer (modernisation) n tmeɣriwin-a, ama i yidles d wansayen, neɣ i tmetti d yimezdaɣ. Amedya n DJ i yekksen amḍiq i yicennayen, i yiḍebbalen d wurar n lxalat. Rnu, yettɛedday-d wayen i d-yewwi Rebbi d ccna, s yal tutlayt d yal asentel, i yeffɣen akk i tannumi n tudert n yimesdurar. Iseggasen-a ineggura, yennulfa-d ula d asṭerḍeq n tḥerrayqin-nni timeqqranin i yesbeɛziqen akk ixxamen. D ayen i yeǧǧan dɣa agraw n kra n tddukkliwin di tɣiwant n Ayt Rẓin, tadayra n Yiɣil Ɛli, ad d-gent yiwen n ulɣu ɣef taluft-a, send anejmuɛ gar yiɛeggalen-nsent, i yimezdaɣ akk n temnaḍt-nni. Deg-s, nwan xersum ad ḥazen kra n lecɣal i bɣan ad kksen. Gar yisaḍufen i d-ssuffɣen wat tddukkliwin-a, yella yiwen yeqqen i wakud n ccna s DJ deg yiḍ, i d-yettwaɛeyynen ɣer ttnesfa n yiḍ, ma iɛeṭṭel. Wayeḍ yerza ingulen (igaṭuten) n tbewwaḍt i walan ulayɣer ad ttwamsaɣen sya d tasawent. Mcawren ula ɣef tgella n dewwara, i kksen daɣen imi d-tettmagga s wayen inuḥen deg ukecric n tfunast. Wayeḍ n usaḍuf, icudd ɣer tedrimt ara yettunefkayen d ccerḍ yal tissulya. Ma yella d taxatemt, sersen ssuma tafellayt deg 100 000 n yidinaren. Gar tmentilin n waya, akken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ, d mi walan aṭas n yigellilen i yeqqimen war arcal ɣef ssebba n teɣlayt n tmeɣra. Ad d-nesmekti d akken seg 9 n tddukkliwin i iḍebbren ɣef rray-a, llant abeɛda tid n yidles, n usɣan akked yiseqquma n tuddar. Ahat d asurif amezwaru, akken ad izmirent tddukkliwin ad d-ḥettment asaḍuf yelhan deg tuddar, sya ar d-uɣalent tjemmuyaɛ s annar.

  M. K. 

  
 I lmend n teẓrigt tamenzut n Tfaska n uderyis, thegga-d tddukkla tinmettitadelsant Tala di taddart Iɣil Ɛemmar, taɣiwant n Tmezrit, yiwen n uneḍruy s wazal-is ass n 01 meɣres iɛeddan, deg uɣerbaz amenzu Ḥemdawi Saleḥ Ǧimaɛ. Deg wahil n wass-nni, tettwahegga-d tazla ɣef 10:00 n tnezzayt i yinaddalen d yilemẓiyen n temnaḍt-nni, ama d arrac neɣ d tiqcicin. 

 Dɣa, i lmend n uzgen n umaraṭun-a, tella teffeɣ-d tiɣri kra n wussan send, i yilemẓiyen yesɛan gar 10 d 17 n yiseggasen, ma bɣan ad kkin s uxelles n 100 n yidinaren. Syinna, mettwal 14:00 n uzal, tella-d teldayt tunsibt n tfaska-a, di teẓrigt-is tamezwarut. Aredqal, d amaru amekfaḍu deg umaṭṭaf n Sumam, Mass Karim Cix, i d-yewwin asarag s uzwel «Aderyis; ansay, anamek ». Deffir usarag, yesseḍfer-d tanezzut s ubuddu n yidlisen-is i d-yessufeɣ taggara-a. Armi ahaqel-itt d 15:30, tɛedda-d talilt n uxxam n yilemẓiyen Mulud Ferɛun n Leqser i tiwin n kra n ccnawi i yimeḥḍar i yellan di ttiɛad. 

 Meqrub 16:00 n tmeddit, yewweḍ-d lawan n tceqquft n umezgun i d-sneɛten yilemẓiyen n ugraw « Imdukkal ». Deg ukemmel n wahil, tella-d syin d tasawent tedwilt n tmenna n yisefra sɣur kra n yimedyazen, am wakken i d-yemmug yiwen n uskač n unecraḥ sɣur terbaɛt « Itran ». Mi d-tuɣal i tikkelt-nniḍen talilt i kra n ccnawi, ɛeddan yimheggiyen i tikci n warrazen i wid i d-yesseknen teẓwer. Akken ɣer taggara n warmud, zdin merra yimekkiyen I seksu n uderyis. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef umezruy n tddukkla-a tilemẓit Tala, ad t-naf yebda ass n 08 mayu aseggas n 2013. Tura akka d Mass Nabil Mercic i yellan ɣef uqerruy-is.

<p style="text-align:right">  M. K. 

  
 Tameddit n wass-nni n lexmis 7 deg duǧember 2017, deg tzeqqa n tameqqrant n Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine n Tizi Uzzu, i d-bannen yigemmaḍ ineggura n temsizzelt n Muḥya n wureɣ.

 D timsizzelt deg tezrigt-is tis rebɛa n warraz n Muḥya n wureɣ n uḍris n umezgun ifazzen s tmaziɣt. Ɣef lewhi n 16h00, tella-d tukci n warrazen i tlata n yiḍrisen i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt-agi, sɣur tesqamut n uktazal n yiḍrisen. Yufrar-d : Mass Boudarène Ali deg umḍiq amezwaru, d netta i yewwin arraz n Muḥya n wureɣ, s lqidar n 150.000 DA. Ma d arraz n lfeṭṭa yewwi-t Sid Nas Mohamed Larbi s wazal n 100.000 DA. Ma deg umḍiq wis tlata, win n udrenz (Bronze) s wazal n 50.000 DA, isaḥ-d Toufik Kaoudji. Am wakken daɣen i d-rnan yimsuddsen n temsizwert-agi aseggas-a arraz n tebɣest neɣ n tesqamut. Maca aseggas-agi yenqqes wazal n yidrimen n warrazen-agi s uzgen winna yellan 300.000DA yuɣal 100.000DA. Ma d win yellan n 200.000DA, tura yuɣal ɣer 100.000DA. Ma d wis tlata yellan s 100.000 DA, aseggas-agi yuɣal ɣer 50.000.00DA. Maca uqbel tukci n yismawen n wid i d-yufranen, yella-d usenɛet n usaru-nni “Imdnanen-agi heddren kan”, i yura Muḥya d aḍris, syin akkin rran-tt d asaru. Syin ɣer-s, yewwi-d Nourddine Ait Slimane, kra n yisefra n Muḥya. Ma ɣer taggara maḍi, tella-d turart n tceqquft “Mmet ihi” n Salem Amrane i yewwin arraz n Muḥya n lfeṭṭa n usegass n 2016, i yerra ɣef usayes Massinissa Hadbi. Am wakken daɣen i rzan waṭas n yiwudam n yidles ɣer uẓekka n Muḥya, sersen fell-as tameqqunt n yijeǧǧigen, syin fkan tinagiyin-nsen ɣef ubabat n umezgun aqbayli. Am wakken daɣen i d-tella tɣuri n yisefra sɣur umedyaz Kadir Meddour, llant-d diɣ snat n temsikniyin ɣef tmeddurt d yimuhal n Muḥya, yiwet deg uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mɛemmer, tayeḍ deg uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine. Tella-d tmeɣra-agi n taggara s tilin n waṭas n yiwudam, ama d tawacult n yidles ideg tella Massa Gouméziane Nabila d tanemhalt n yidles, d Mass Farid Mahiout d anemhal n Uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine. Llan daɣen watmaten n Muḥya, Mohamed d Mouloud, am wakken diɣen i llan yiwudam n tsertit yecban: Ouahab Ait Menguellat d aselway n tɣiwan n Tizi Uzzu, d win n At Yanni…atg. Ma d asrusi n yiḍrisen n umezgun yettekin deg temsizzelt-a, sersen-ten imawlan-nsen uqbel 20 deg unbir iεeddan. Yella-d usersi-nsen ama deg Tenmehla n yidles d Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer neɣ deg Uxxam n umezgnu amniḍan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ɣer taggara n ujerred, 12 n yiḍrisen i yemḥezwaren ɣef 3 n yimeḍqan imenza, sɛeddan-ten wat tesqamut n uktazal deg uɣerbal, dɣa d Mass Omar Fetmouche i d aselway n tesqamut-agi, am wakken daɣen i llan ɣer tama-s yimussnawen deg tutlayt tamaziɣ akked umezgun. Ad d-nesmekti s yidisan idelsnen i d-iheggan leqdic-agi, gar-asen: Tanmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, akked Usqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya ( A.P.W) n Tizi Uzzu, s tallelt n Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu, s lemεawna n Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine. Tameddurt n Muḥya Ilul Mass Muḥend u Yeḥya s yisem-is n ṣṣaḥ Abeddlah Muḥya, deg wass amenzu n waggur n unbir deg useggas n 1950 deg Yiεezzugen, ma d laṣel-ines n taddart Ath Eurbah deg tɣiwant n Iboudranene. Ikemmel almud-is asniwi deg tesnawit n Amirouche deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu, ma deg useggas n 1968, yekcem ɣer tesdawit n Lezzayer Tamaneɣt , syin deg useggas n 1972, yeffeɣ-d s ugerdas n turagt deg Tussnakt (licence de Mathématique). Aseggas kan sdat-s, yebda axeddim deg tesdawit n Paris VIII. Dɣa dinna deg tmurt n Fransa i d-yessnulfa netta d yimeddukkal-is, yiwen n usikew n tsuqilt akked tserwest. Yeɣra kra n temsirin n tmaziɣt, deg tesdawit n Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, ɣer Mulud Mɛemmri.Yemmut deg tmaneɣt Paris deg tmurt n Fransa, ass n 7 deg waggur n duǧember 2004. Yettuneḥsab d ababat neɣ d tigejdit n umezgun s teqbaylit, am wakken daɣen i yeqdec aṭas deg tmedyazt. Am wakken daɣen i ixdem tasuqilt d tserwest i waṭas n tceqqucin seg tutlayin-nniḍen, gar-asen-t: “Am win yettraǧun Ṛebbi” (En attendant Godot) n Samuel Beckett, “Aneggaru ad d-yerr tawwurt” (La Décision) akked “Llem-ik, ddu d uḍar-ik” (L’exception et la régle) n Bertolt Brecht, (La jarre) neɣ “Tacbaylit” swayes yettwasen aṭas…atg. Tura daɣen ddeqs n tmucuha akked tullisin, akked yisefra i yettwacnan sɣur inaẓuren imeqqranen, d wagi i d abrid n timeɣnest-ines ɣef tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ s umata akked win n leqbayel s wuzig.

  Adaoun Abdel Ghani 

  
 Muḥ Lɛid Deflawi d amedyaz, d aɛeggal deg ugraw «Isekkilen». Ɣas di Kanada i yettidir seg 2002, acu kan yettkemmil dinna, akked imeddukkal-is, leqdic ɣef yidles aqbayli.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Ɣer wanida tettuɣal temlilit-nwen, kečč d usefru?  
  Muḥ Lɛid Deflawi : Timlilit-iw yid-s d assaγ tuker temẓi i temγer, d temγer yettun temẓi-s. Timlilit-iw d usefru-w, d tudert tis snat. Deg useggas n 1986, aseggas amezwaru-inu di tesnawit, i tekcem tira n usefru deg-i war ma ẓriγ d acu-t uxemmem n tira i yi-yerran d iminig i yesnugan iman-iw. Ur neẓri amek, iwumi ? Asefru d aεwin n tesnagrayt-iw, d tanaga gar yisteqsiyen. D asefru-nneγ i d tasekla γas ma tiswiεin yettuγal d ilugan n tmeddurt-nneγ. Ddut kan yid-s ay at tmurt ma tewεam! 

   Tesnulfam-d, taggara-a, annar n tsekla Isekkilen. Mmeslay-aɣ-d fell-as akked yiswiyen-is ?  
  Lemmer kan s teqbaylit; akken yebγu yili iziεqer, ad iγellet yiεiqqer. Qrib tura sin n yiseggasen-aya segmi i d-nesnulfa annar aseklan s teqbaylit, di Montéal, iwumi nsemma “Isekkilen”.Talalit n unnar-a d tigzi n usḥissef, d tiftilt i ṣṣwab, d targa i usekkil ameγradan, d tafat kan i teqbaylit. La d-nettawi inebgi di yal taggara n wayyur, akken ira yili usentel, maca s teqbaylit! Iswan n unnar-a-nneγ, d taqbaylit: Uggten yinurar d tddukkliwin di tmurt neγ deg yinig i d-yessuddusen timliliyin d tfaskiwin s tutlayin tijenṭadin, zun am wakken ṭṭfen-d izem deg ujeḥniṭ, ladγa ur tufiḍ d acu i d-γellten i taggara. Iswan n “Isekkilen” d tasekla, d tamedyezt taseklant, d taẓuri, d amezruy, d tussniwin s umata…ara yilin d tudert s ta-nneγ ! 

  Awal ɣef wammud-ik n yisefra? 
  D ixemmimen n temẓi i leqqmeγ akked wid n “tura” i rriγ d lγella, d ammud n 2014. Fkiγ-as azwel: “Nnig n usirem”. Ssefraγ, uriγ γef Teqbaylit, γef umezruy n yidles, γef yimeddukkal n tẓuri, γef yinig, γef umaḍal amhersan, γef talsa, γef tmedyezt.

  Amek twalaḍ aqeddic n uɣerbaz Inas n Montréal i d-yessufuɣen tasɣunt ideg tettaruḍ ?  
  Zgiγ ttaruγ yal ass xerṣum d tasenna n yisekkilen neγ d tafyirt kan akka… i yettuγalen d aḍris, d asefru, d amagrad… Dγa mi yi-d-ssawlen i tesγunt, ttafen-d akufi-w yeččuṛ. Aγerbaz n “INAS” ilul-d deg useggas n 2009 di Montréal. Dγa d ul kan, d ul n teqbaylit, i iṣṣawḍen iεeggalen-is ad as-ldin tiwwura-ines γas akken ṭṭuqten wuguren. S cwiṭ n ttawilat i sεan, tikti tuγal d awal, awal yuγal d aṣenfar, aṣenfar yuγal d aγerbaz. Aṭas n yigrawen n yinelmaden i yellan: Iṭiṭuḥen, ilemẓiyen, imeqranen. 

  Aql-ik tettheggiḍ kra i warrac. Mmeslay-aɣ-d ɣef waya… 
  Akken walaγ, mi ḥṣiγ smedyizeγ ttaruγ adlis asegmisan (pédagogique). Zedmeγ-d tikti asmi lliγ d aselmad deg uγerbaz amenzu di Tmurt deg useggas n 1997-1998. Nniγ-as, amek akka cennun warrac-nneγ, inelmaden-nneγ di taggara n useggas aγurbiz s teεṛabt neγ s tṛumit? Yuεeṛ fell-aγ ad nessiwel, ad nẓawen aya s teqbaylit tucbiḥt? Deg yilel-a aseklan i rriγ tasnagrayt-iw d tumert n tudert n tmettant-iw. Nniγ-as, ad d-aruγ kra i warraw-iw, i warraw-nneγ. Dɣa nniɣ-as:

 Ini tidet! Akken (ad) ak-yimlul uzekka Cnu tidet!
  Ad ak-ḥemmlen di yal tama Ddu d tidet!
  Ad ddun yid-k meṛṛa
  Sbur tidet! 
  Ad tizdigeḍ i lebda 
  Sefti tidet!
  Deg umaḍal war ceḥḥa
  Uγal d tidet!
  D iṭij d aman n tliwa

  Txeddmeḍ isefra ula i kra n yicennayen. Efk-aɣ-d tamuɣli-k ɣef tezlit taqbaylit? 
  Ma yettẓawan wawal, ad yemmeslay uẓawan-is. D tidet, ḥemmleγ aẓawan, cennuγ ttẓawaneγ mi d-yerza uneγlan n lxiq, ladγa tizlit taqbaylit. Iseggasen-a ineggura, akud-iw, yeddem-it akk yimru-w i usekkil aqbayli: Ttaruγ i wiyaḍ war ma kfiγ iṣenfaren-iw n tira. Tizlit taqbaylit, yewwi-d ad tili ad telhu, ama deg uḍris-is neγ deg uẓawan-is. Yessefk fell-as ad tekcem deg tegnawt taḥerfit, ad teddu deg ubeḥri n tγara. Nettak aṭas azalen i umeslay d uẓawan, maca nettu abrid n ṣṣut n ucennay, abrid i uγerbaz n taγect… Ulayγer ad nettayes, ixuṣṣ-aγ waya! Tin γur-s, ma teffeγ-aγ tnila n ubeḥri-nneγ, iwumi-tt tezlit ur nelli d taqbaylit ? 

  Yesteqsa-t M. K. 

  
 Ayeni d-yeskan ayen belli tamnaḍt n At Smaεel, tetteddu ɣer sdat segyal tama, d iqeddicen n warraw-is iyezgan ttḥebbiṛen ɣef wadegansa ara d-agmen tamussni. Amedya d Massa Karima Idir, tameṭṭut n Meǧǧuǧ, iyeṛẓan azaglu tikkelt-a s tikti ara d-yawin aṭas n ubaɣur i wat taddart, ladɣa ilemẓiyen deg-sen. 

 Ayagi, imi d-tesnulfa aɣerbaz n usileɣ deg tutlayin, am tutlayt-nneɣ tagejdant taqbaylit, tarumit, taεṛabt akk ed teglizit. Rnu iwaya, tenwa ad texdem ula d asileɣ deg tsenselkimt. Deg udew enni i d-newwi akked Massa Karima, tenna-d belli d iseɣ d ameqqṛan inettat imi teldi aɣerbaz-a n usileɣ, acku d amezwaru deg taddart n Udrar n Fad. 

 Terna temmeslay-aɣ-d ɣef usirem ageεmir itesεa d akken aɣerbaz-a, aṭas ara d-yernu iterwa n At Smaεel s umata. Acku am nettat, am wid iqeddcen yid-s, ad xeddmen ugar n wayen iwum uzemren iwakken adfken afus n tallelt iwid yettnadin tamussni, ama d wid yeqqaṛen deg uɣerbaz amenzu, alemmas, neɣ deg tesnawit. Massa Meǧǧuǧ, deg wawal-is, twekked-aɣ-d belli, xas ma yella s ciṭṭuḥ n ttawilat ara bdun, meεna tebɣest-nsen tugar iεewwiqen ara d-mmagren. 

 Ma yella ɣef yisragen n tneldayt, ad yeldi deg wussan n dduṛt akkit, imi ad faṛsen ula d ussan n taggara n ddurt, acku d wigad i d ussan n usteεfu n y inelmaden. Seg tama tayeḍ, tberreḥ-aɣ-d ula ɣef ssuma n temsirin I yettruḥun seg 600 armi d 800 n yidinaṛen. Di taggara, yewwi-d ad nessebɣes tiktiwin-a igerrzen, ladɣa tikci n wazal itutlayt taqbaylit. 

 Dɣa terna-aɣ-d Massa Meǧǧuǧ: «D tidet ur aɣ-tennufkara tegnit iwakken adnɣer tamaziɣt deg tallit-nneɣ, meεna nekk ass-a εewwleɣ-d ad iliɣ gar yinelmaden n tmaziɣt deg uɣerbaz-a, acku bɣiɣ ad issineɣ tutlayt n yemma d baba. Tanemmirt i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen i d-yerzan daɣen». <p style="text-align:right">   K. K.  

  
 Asmi i d-yettwaberreḥ yisalli n usnulfu n TQ5, tiliẓri taqbaylit tamezwarut deg umezruy, ayendin d asirem i d-yenneɣlen ɣef yimesdurar, acku ḥsan s wazal n wallal-a n teywalt i nutni d teḍfert-nsen. D acu kan, seg maggu yezrin, ufan Yiqbayliyen ur tetteddu ara tiliẓri-a deg ugensa, send ddeqs n wayyuren n uqeddic.

 Tamentilt n waya, ɣef wakken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ, tcudd s tseddart tamezwarut ɣer teɣẓint n tedrimt i yeṭṭfen takebbanit TQ5 Media. Iban-d lḥal dɣa, ur ssawḍen yimḍebbren-is ad qidden i uxelles n wayen akk ilaqen i tikli iwatan n tiliẓri-a. Ulamma tuɣ yella-d wugur deg uxxam n tkebbanit-a n usliẓri mi ṭṭaxren seg-s kra n yiɛeggalen imesbeddiyen, imi ur ssawḍen ad msefhamen ɣef kra n tlufa. 

 Di tallit-nni, iga-d asarag yiwen seg-sen akken ad d-yemmeslay i tɣamsa ɣef tsebba n uṭixer-is. Maca, mačči d ayen i yerẓan ifadden i tiliẓri-a, acku tkemmel asenɛet seg yimir-nni. Armi dɣa i d-yennulfa wugur-nniḍen imalasen-a ineggura, akken teḥbes. «Neḥbes akked ArabSat acku mačči d ayen yeffɣen fell-aɣ si tama n tedrimt. Ad d-nuɣal di kra n wakud deg ugensa-nniḍen ideg zemren ad aɣ-d-ttwalin merra. Ur nettɛeṭṭil ara ad d-nberreḥ ɣef usentel-a», i aɣ-d-yenna Racid At Ɛli Uqasi, yiwen seg yimasayen n TQ5. Ad d-nesmekti d akken axxam n TQ5 Media yezga-d di Montréal, tamurt n Kanada. 

 Tebda asenɛet n wahilen-is seg yennayer 2018, deg ugensa ur nettwassen aṭas Yahsat, syin tuɣal i Arabsat. Ddeqs n tedwilin i d-iɛeddan deg-s, gar-asent tid n tsekla, n tetiknulujit, n waddal, n tẓuri, n tsertit, n warrac, d wayen-nniḍen. Deg useggas n 2017, ayendin d ineḍruyen i d-yettwaheggan i useqleɛ n usenfar-a n TQ5 d usḥulfu n medden ɣef wazal-is, ama d imensi imezdi, igalaten n ccna, isaragen di Tmurt d Turuft, ameslay i tɣamsa d uheggi n ustudyu iwulmen d terbaɛt ara yesselḥu ahilen n tiliẓri-a.Tura akka, meskud aḥbas n TQ5 d amakud kan, ttraǧun Yiqbayliyen tuɣalin-is s lḥir. 
  M. K. 

  
 Lḥir i izedɣen tuget n yimeɣnasen n tmaziɣt ɣef taluft n usebded n tkadimit tazzayrit n tutlayt n tmaziɣt d win iɣef i d-yemmeslay ddurt yezrin uneɣlaf amezwaru Ahmed Ouyahia, lawan mi yeldi tiwwura n rreḥba tagraɣlant n udlis deg temdint n Lezzayer. Dɣa, d tagnit i ifures yimḍebber n tneɣlaft tamezwarut i wakken ad d-yini : « Talallit n tkadimit tazzayrit n tutlayt n tmaziɣt,tella deg tmendawt. Aselway n tegduda yesseḥres i wakken ad tbedd uqbel taggara n useggas-a ideg nella. » D yiwen n yisalli ahat ara yekksen aṭas n leckuk i yettezzin ɣef temsalt-a, imi ɣef leḥsab n waṭas n yimeɣnasen, aṭas n wakud i wwint « lemcawrat », rnu ɣer-s aṭas i yerkeb lḥir i wakken ad ẓren aniwi 50 n yimdanen ara tt-iɛemren. Iwulem, ad d-nesmekti d akken tamsalt-a n tkadimit, tlulen-d mi d-yella uɛiwed n tmendawt, anda tamaziɣt tḥella-d ddeqs n yiḥricen ama d ayen yerzan asenseb n tutlayt, tiririt n yennayer gar wussan n leɛyudat d uslali n tkadimit.  Smail. M  

   

  
 Tberreḥ-d tesqamut n warraz aseklan Mohamed Dib, s tiɣri n uttekki deg tezrigt tis sat (7) n warraz aseklan Mohammed Dib n useggas-a 2019-2020. Am yal aseggas, mḥezwaren fell-as aṭas n yineggalen, yettarun s 3 tutlayin-a: Tamaziɣt, tafransist akked taɛrabt. 

 Imsizewren yebɣan ad ttekkin deg tezrigt tis 7 n Warraz ameqqran n wungal “Mohamed Dib”, yessefk ad ceggɛen ungalen-nsen uqbel ass n 05 yennayer 2020. Ma ɣef tegnatin n uttekki, yenna-d wulɣu n warraz-agi “ilaq ad ilin wungalen swayes ara ttekkin d imaynuten; Ttwasargen-d ɣer tezrigin tizzayriyin, gar 01 n waggur n tuber 2018 alamma d ass n 05 yennayer 2020. 

 Ilaq ad ttwarun s tlata n tutlayin-agi: Taɛrabt, tamaziɣt akked tefransit. Ala ungalen ay d-yeffɣen deg tmurt n Lezzayer yernu uran-ten yimeskaren izzayriyen i yesɛan azref ad ttekkin deg warraz-agi ameqqran”. 

 Mebɛed ass n 07 yennayer 2020, ara yilin d ass aneggaru n ussersi n wungalen ara i ttekkin deg tezrigt-agi tis sebɛa, ad tili tɣuri n wungalen-agi sɣur tesqamut n ufran, ideg ara yilin yimura d yimussnawen n tsekla n tlata n tutlayin-agi i d-nebder yakan. Yal aneggal, yebɣan ad ittekki deg tezrigt-agi tamaynut, ilaq fell-as ad iqader isuḍaf iɣef yebna warraz-agi. 

 Tamezwarut, ad iceggeɛ ungal-is s talɣa n PDF d tduli n udlis-agi, uqbel 07 deg waggur n yennayer i d-iteddun, ɣer tansa-agi taliktrunit: <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="50333f3e24313324103c313722313e34353d3139233f3e34353439327e333f3d" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a>. 

 Tis snat, ad yazen daɣen sin wungalen-is s talɣa n lkaɣeḍ (ungal s timmad-is), ɣer tansa-a: Association culturelle La Grande Maison. El Mechouar-BP 364. Tlemcen 13000. Tis kraḍet, ur ttaṭtafen ara ungalen n yineggalen yemmuten neɣ wid iwumi i d-ugin yakan idisen-nsen deg tezrigin iɛeddan. Ilaq daɣen, ungal ad yesɛu ma drus 100 n yisebtar, i wakken ad yettekki yis-s bab-is. 

 Ma d zzmamat n uttekki, ad ilin akka: Tuttra yettwarun s ufus, tiferkit n yisallen n umeskar, aglam n wungal deg yiwet n twarqet, d yiwet n tugna i yal amsizwer. Iswi n temsizwert-a, d asebɣes n tira n wungal akked usebɣes daɣen n yineggalen. D asiher i d-yettuɣalen yal taggara n useggas, i ttraǧun s ccuq yimura akked yimeɣriyen. Ma d asenqed n wungalen, yettili-d ɣef snat-agi n tulmisin: Azal aseklan n wungal d ccbaḥa-ines d wacu i d amaynut i d-yewwi i tsekla tazzayrit. 

 Ɣer taggara, ad d-nini belli, yella daɣen warraz Mohamed Dib n tullist yufraren, isuḍaf n uttekki-ines d widak n wungal. Ad d-nesmekti s yineggalen i d-yufraren deg tezrigt yezrin: Fahim Messaoudene, i yewwin arraz-agi n tutlayt tamaziɣt s wungal-is “Anza”. Ma s tutlayt n tefransist d Mohamed Saadoun, i d-yufraren s wungal-is “Débâcle”, ma s taɛrabt, yufrar-d Yebrir Smail s wungal-is “Bab n Lḥara”.

 Ass-nni n letnayen yezrin 30 yunyu 2018, i d-tessuffeɣ tesbeddit Takanadit tamaziɣt “Tiregwa” ulɣu anda i d-tefka ismawen n wid i d-yufraren deg sin warrazen n tsekla (Rachid Aliche i wungal akked Belaid Ait Ali i tullist). Semmus n yimura n tmurt n Leqbayel i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt-agi n tsekla i useggas 2017/2018. Arraz n Belaid Ait Ali n tullist, deg tezrigt-is tis xemsa, ufrarent-d tlata n tullisin. Arraz amezwaru, yuɣal i umaru Larbi Yahioun, s tullist-is “Tudert-nniḍen”. Ma d arraz wis sin tewwi-t, Massa Bellal Tilelleli s tullist-is “Tayri n Facebook”. D igli n tlelli, i yewwin arraz wis kraḍ s tullist-is “Rsen-d s yigenni”. Ma d arraz n Rachid Alliche i wungal ifazen, di tezrigt n useggas-a, yuɣal i uneggal ilemẓi Hocine Louni. D ungal-is wis sin “Asebbaɣ” swayes i d-yufrar deg temsizzelt-agi n tsekla, i d-tettheggi yal aseggas tesbeddit-agi. Ad nesmekti kan belli, arraz-agi n Rachid Alliche i wungal ifazen, yebda deg useggas n 2014. D Amar Mezdad i t-yewwin tikkelt tamezwarut, syin d Amer Ulamara, deffir s d Salem Zenia. Ma di tezrigt-agi taneggarut, yufrar-d deg-s Hocine Louni. Ma d arraz n Belaid Ait Ali i tullist ifazen, yebda deg useggas n 2012, tura akka yewweḍ ɣer tezrigt tis semmuset. Ma d iswi n temsizzelt-agi, ɣef wakken i t-id-nnan yimsuddsen n tezrigt-agi: “Asebɣes i yimura-nneɣ yettarun s teqbaylit akked usebɣes daɣen n usnulfu di tsekla taqaylit”.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Mbeɛd mi tezwar Tizi Uzzu ɣer usuddes n temsizzelt yecban tagi di 2006, yettwassnen s yisem n temsizzelt n tezdeg “Aissat Rabah”, terna-d Bgayet s usuddes n temsizwert n tezdeg, i yebdan yakan, tura tezzi-d nnuba n Tubiret, i wakken ad sewjed ula d nettat timsizzelt-is tuzzigt n tezdeg. 

 Tberreḥ Tenmehla n twennaḍt n lwilaya n Tubiret, s usnulfu n temsizzelt n taddart neɣ lḥuma tazedgant i useggas-agi n 2019. D tazrigt tamezwarut ara d-yilin deg wussan i d-iteddun, ara yefken azref i tuddar neɣ lḥumat n lwilaya-a i wakken ad ttekkint deg-s. Yebda yakan ujerred n tudrin neɣ lḥumat yenwan ad ttekkint deg tezrigt-agi tamezwarut n temsizzelt n tezdeg. 

 Yetturaǧu sya ɣer taggara n waggur-agi n ɣuct, ad tessali tallit n ujerred i d-yettilin deg Usɣim n Tenmehla n twennaḍt n lwilaya-agi. Mi tekfa tallit-agi, ad tebdu teseqqamut n yinzurfa icerken aṭas n taɣulin, tuffɣiwin-ines ɣer tuddar akked lḥumat yettwajerden, ad yebdu waya seg 27 tuber 2019. Ad yili usenqeḍ d uktazal n temsizzelt ɣef 100 n tezmilin, ama i taddart tazeddgant, ama i lḥuma tazedgant. Ad ttwaferqent akka: Tlata n temsal uɣur ara muqlen mi ara ktazlen lḥuma tazegdant. 30 n tneqqiḍin i uselḥu n yiḍuman, 30 n tneqqiḍin-nniḍen i useddu yimeḍqan izegzawen ɣer tama n 40 n tezmilin tiyaḍ i waddad amatu n lḥuma-nni. Ma deg usenqeḍ n taddart tazedgant, tefren teseqqamut i d-yettwasbedden ad twali ɣer 6 n temsal-agi. Anda fkan 40 n tneqqiḍin i liḥala n yiberdan uzyizen, imeḍqan n lɛamma s 20 n tezmilin, 10 n tneqiḍin i tliwa, timeqbert ɣef 10 n tezmilin ula d imeḍqan n yidles d yisebdaden ɣef 10 n tneqqiḍin ɣer tama n 10 n tezmilin-nniḍen i useddu n yiḍuman. 

 Ma ɣef warrazen n temsizzelt-agi, tenna tnemhalt n twennaḍt Massa Djouhar Hadj Haddadou belli ad ttwafernent snat n tuddar akked snat n lḥumat timezwura. D Aseqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tubiret ara yefken tadrimt i tid ara d-yufraren, 5 n yimelyan n dinar i snat n lḥumat ara d-yufaren, 3 n yimelyan i tin ara yeṭṭfen amḍiq amezwaru, 2 n yimelyan i tin ara yawin arraz wis sin. Ma d tuddar ara d-yufraren ad awint 8 n yimelyan n dinar; 5 n yimelyan i tin ara yawin arraz amezwaru, 3 n yimelyan-nniḍen i tin ara yawin arraz wis sin n temsizzelt-agi di tezrigt-is tamezwarut. 

 Ma ɣef yiswi n temsizwet-agi, tenna-d Massa Djouhar Hadj Haddadou “d asebɣes n twizi gar yimezdaɣ n tudrin d usnerni n tnnumi akked yidles n useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍ deg lwilaya n Tubiret”. Yetturaǧu ad d-banen yigemmaḍ n temsizzelt-agi ass n, 11 duǧember 2019, i lmend n wass amaḍlan n udrar.
  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Leqdic adelsan i yuɣalen ɣer deffir ɣef teɣzi n useggas-aya tura, ḥebsen yisaragen, timezgunin, timeɣriwin n ccna …atg. D aṭṭan-nni amcum i d ssebba, iger-d iɣallen i umaḍal, gar-asen tamnaḍt n Leqbayel. Maca akken yebɣu yili, mačči s wayen n diri kan i d-yegla imi lulent-d tigawin yelhan ; d tid yecban tallelt d uzeṭṭa n tegmat gar yimdanen. Tegla-d yid-s tallit-a ula s leqdic adelsan s wudem amaynut. Tira d tvidyutin deg uzeṭṭa inmetti i yuɣalen d ifri uɣur i d-ttemlilin wid ifuden idles d tira. Deg tallit-nni n lekmin i d-tlul yiwet n “Tcemlit”, d tin iwumi zdin iɣallen aṭas seg wid yettarun, iḥemmlen ad d-awin amaynut s tikta ur nettfakka. Dɣa tlul-d “Tcemlit n Tefsut Imaziɣen”, deg wayyur n Yebrir 2020, aggur kan, ḍefrent-d snat-nniḍen “D tajmilt i yinaẓuren Lwennas d Yidir”, d ticemliyin i d-yeffɣen deg wagguren n Mayu d Yunyu 2020, imi ulamek ara yili leqdic deg unnar, yella-d s ttawil-nniḍen, ur ixuṣṣ ara deg ubaɣur i swayes i d-yegla. D iḍrisen ilelliyen n tsekla, d tinagiyin, d isefra d wayen-nniḍen. Aṭas n yimura i yellan akka imir-a deg unnar-a i d-yerran i tiɣri. 

 Uran-d, sumren-d tikta-nsen, rran-d i teɣri i d-iger deg uzeṭṭa inmetti Facebook, Mass Remḍan Ɛebdenbi, d netta i iqeɛden iḍrisen, yerra-ten s talɣa PDF, iga-as-d unuɣen icebḥen, akken ad yeɛǧeb i yimeɣriyen. Ticemliyin yezrin, ulamek ara kfunt neɣ ara ḥebsent, ur d-gellunt ara s tayeḍ. Tagi  d “Tacemlit n Yennayer”, I lmend n umagger n yixef n useggas n Yimaziɣen 2971, iberreḥ-d daɣen win i d-yefkan tikti, imi Yennayer n useggas-a ur d-yelli ara s tuget deg unnar, ɣef tmentilt n waṭṭan-nni dima, ayɣer ala ur yettili ara s tikti-nniḍen. Leqdic i yetturajun ad yuɣal ɣer udlis s talɣa PDF, ad yewjed i wusan i d-iteddun. Deg-s ad naf aṭas n yiḍrisen n yimura i d-yerran i teɣri. D taḥawact n yiḍrisen ilelliyen ɣef Yennayer, ɣef Cacnaq, ɣef umezruy d useggas amaynut 2971. Ad ilin yisefra iqburen, awal n tyemmat, tigemmi, tikti, asumer, tamuɣli d rray aḥerfi. D leqdic ara yilin gar yifassen-nneɣ, d win kan i ibanen ad d-yernu amur-is n ubaɣur i yidles Amaziɣ.

   Aɣerbaz deg usiher i usfugel n Yennayer «2971»  
 Ɣas qrib aseggas segmi yeḥbes leqdic adelsan s taɣulin-is yakk, aṭṭan n covid-19 mazal ur yeffiɣ ara seg umaḍal n talsa s wudem unṣib, mazal akukru, d netta i d tamentilt yerran idles ɣer deffir, deg tallit-is yenqeṣ leqdic.

 Maca s tisin d umager n yixef n useggas n Yimaziɣen, ulamek ara zeglen Leqbayel d Yimaziɣen asiher ameqqran am Yennayer. D aneḍruy i d-yettuɣalen s tumert yal aseggas, d win umi ggaren iɣallen Yimaziɣen s tuɣalin ɣer laṣel d ucuddu deg tnekkit.

 D annect-a i yeǧǧan ula d inelmaden d yiselmaden, imasayen d yinemhalen n yiɣerbazen s kraḍ n yiswiren ad gen leqdicat yemxalafen ɣef teɣzi n yimalas, ladɣa segmi i d-tceyyeɛ teɣlift n usedwel ulɣu i wakken ad d-yili usfuggel n uneḍruy-a. Nwala-d ama deg yizeḍwa inmettiyen, ama di kra n tiliẓriyin, leqdicat idelsanen i d-yellan ilmend n waya ; d ccna, d amezgun, isefra, inzan, tiwin d usenɛet n tɣawsiwin tiqburin i icudden ɣer wansayen n lejdud, tuččit yemgaraden i d-yersen deg yimraḥen n yiɣerbazen, talusi n tqendyar d teksiwin i teqcicin d yiqeccabiyen d yibrenyas i warrac.

  Ur ilaq ara ad yettwasfugel Yennayer s wudem afulkuri  
 Ayen i as-yernan deg wazal i Yennayer deg uɣerbaz, d akken iselmaden ur ttun ara tigin n temsirin n umezruy n Yennayer, d usefhem i yinelmaden anamek d tmentilt d wacu uɣur icud umenzu n Yennayer, akken ur yettɣimi ara di ccḍeh kan d ccna, neɣ s unamek-nniḍen s wudem afulkluri. Akken, inelmaden ad ḥṣun s umezruy-is, ad ẓren belli tafada n Yimaziɣen d tin i icudden ɣer wakal, seg-s ay d-tettek tudert. Yal aseggas ad t-id-smektin, acku d inelmaden n wass-a i d imal n uzekka, wa ad tt-yeqqar i wa. D arrac n wass-a i d irgazen n uzekka, d wigi ara yawin asafu n yidles, n tgemmi, n tutlayt. Tasuta ad tesselmed tayeḍ, lǧil ad yerfed wayeḍ, aɣref Amaziɣ ɣer yiswi-s ad yaweḍ. 

  Ɣabent tdukkliwin, yeḥḍer Cacnaq  
 Ɣas ma yella Yennayer n useggas-a, ur kkint ara deg-s s tuget tdukkliwin tidelsanin ɣef tmentilt n waṭṭan i d-yersen, d tewtilin i tent-icudden, maca llan-d wahilen ɣas d imecṭaḥ sya u sya, am tigin n usebdad ameqqran n ugellid Cacnaq di temdint n Tizi Wezzu. D win i mmugren yimezdaɣ n tmurt n Leqbayel s lferḥ, s tirza-nsen ɣer umkan d tuṭṭfa n tugniwin ar tama-s. D ayen i d-yessebganen azal n uneḍruy yecban Yennayer, i yettwasfugulen deg yiseggasen-a ineggura deg merra tamiwin n tmurt n Lezzayer akked tmura n Tefriqt Ugafa d tmura n lberrani, i usuffeɣ n tgemmi d yidles imaziɣen yellan d iqdimen n lqedma ɣer umaḍal.

  Tacemlit n Yennayer, d abaɣur-nniḍen  
 Aṭṭan-a amcum i d-yegren iɣallen i umaḍal, gar-asen tamnaḍt n Leqbayel, mačči s wayen n diri kan i d-yegla. Imi lulent-d tigawin yelhan ; d tid yecban tallelt d uzeṭṭa n tegmat gar yimdanen. Tegla-d yid-s tallit-a ula s leqdic adelsan, tira tividyutin deg uzeṭṭa inmetti, i yuɣalen d ifri uɣur d-ttemlilin wid ifuden idles d tira. Deg tallit-a n lekmin i d-tlul Tcemlit, umi zdin iɣallen aṭas seg wid yettarun, iḥemmlen ad d-awin amaynut s tikta ur nettfakka. Dɣa tlul-d Tcemlit n Tefsut Imaziɣen, Tajmilt i yinaẓuren Lwennas d Yidir, imi ulamek ara yili leqdic deg unnar, yella-d s ttawil-nniḍen, ur ixuṣṣ ara deg ubaɣur i swayes i d-yegla. Armi i d-yewwi yid-s ula d Tacemlit n Yennayer ara yilin akka gar yifassen-nneɣ, d tin kan i ibanen ad d-ternu amur-is n ubaɣur i yidles Amaziɣ.

  Khaled Achoui 

  
 Ass-nni n lḥed 25 meɣres iɛeddan, i yebda ujerred n tudrin yebɣan ad ttekkint deg tezrigt tis setta n temsizzelt n tezdeg Aïssat Rabah.

 Ma d ttiɛad aneggaru n ujerred yetturaǧu ad d-yili ass n letnayen 30 yebrir 2018. Timsizzelt-agi n taddart tazedgant, yettheggi-tt-id yal aseggas Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya (APW) n Tizi Uzzu, ma d iswi-ines d acebbeḥ d usizdeg n tuddar n leqbayel. D asebɣes dɣa i tuddar i d-yettifriren di yal tazrigt, yerna tura tuɣal d ansay, ttemɛnadent tudrin fell-as. Tuddar yenwan ad ttekkint, ilaq fell-asent ad sersent zzmamat-nsent ɣer Useqqamu Aɣerfan n lwilaya, uqbel 30 yebrir i d-iteddun. Ma deg waggur n maggu d asawen, ad tebdu tufɣa ɣer tuddar ijerden iman-nsent, sɣur tesqamut yettwakelfen s twennaḍt d tezdeg akked tdawsa deg useqqamu-agi, i wakken ad ktazlen wa ad fernen ɣer sdat 10 n tuddar zeddigen i tezrigt-agi tis setta.

  Amaynut n tezrigt-agi tis setta 

 Tazrigt-agi tis 6 n temsizzelt-agi n tezdeg, tewwi-d amaynut i useggas-agi n 2018, ideg ara tefk tesqamut n ufran 10 n warrazen, mačči 8 am useggas iɛeddan, Ad d-sqimen mraw-agi n warrazen s 44 imelyan n ddinar, mačči s 33 imelyan am useggas iɛeddan. Taddart ara yawin arraz amezwaru ad tawi 9 imelyan n yidinaren, tis snat ad tawi 7, tis tlata ad tawi 6, tis rebɛa ad tt-id-ṣahent 5, tis xemsa 4, ma d tin ara yawin arraz wis setta d wis sebɛa akked wis tmanya, ad awint yakk 3 i yal yiwet deg-sent. Ma d taddart ara yeṭṭfen amḍiq wis tesɛa akked wis mraw, ad awint 2 i yal yiwet. Ma d ilugan yessedduyen timsizzelt-agi, ad d-ilin akka-agi; snat-nni n tuddar ara yawin arraz wis 9 d wis 10, sɛant azref ad ttekkint deg tezrigt i d-iteddun, ma d tlata-nni n tuddar ara d-yifriren d timenza, ur sɛint ara lḥeqq ad ttekkint deg temsizzelt-agi alamma ɛeddan xemsa n yiseggasen. Ma d tudrin ara yeṭṭfen amkan wis 4 akked wis 5, ur sɛint ara azref n uttekki alamma zrin 3 n yiseggasen, ma d tuddar ara yeṭṭfen amḍiq wis 7 akked wis 8, sɛant lḥeqq ad kkint deg-s mi ɛeddan ɛamayen.

   

  Amek ara d-yili uktazal n tezrigt-agi ? 

 Ma si tama n tfelwit n uktazal, ad d-yili usenqeḍ ɣef 100 tenqiḍin. 25 n tneqiḍin, rzant iberdan n taddart, 25 tneqiḍin-nniḍen n useddu n yiḍuman d wammus, ma d imeḍqan uzyizen (public), yecban tajmaɛt, imekwan n tizegzewt…atg ɣef 20 tneqiḍin, 10 tneqiḍin-tiyaḍ i tliwa d yiɣbula n waman. Ma d imeḍqan n yidles d tmussni akked yisebdaden ɣef 10 tneqiḍin, timqebrin s 7 tneqiḍin, ma d tlata-nni i d-yeqqimen i leqwanen n useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt. Ɣer taggara maḍi, ad d-nesmekti belli tazrigt n useggas yezrin, d taddart n Tiferdoud i yewwin arraz amezwaru, ma d tinna uqbel-is d taddart n Boumessoud i tt-yewwin d tamezwarut deg 2016.

  G. A. 

  
  Aḥric wis 8 

 Nettat tuḥṛict tejgugel γef yiwen ufurk si tama, tenṭeg am tebkit γer wayeḍ di tama-nniḍen, tneggez γer tγerγert, terwel, teεna daγen aseklu-nni n tjujtin, terra-as i ufṛux acebḥan icettiḍen icebḥanen, telsa ijerbuben, tuγal s amḍiq-is n tguni, anida i tt-in-ufan teẓẓel. Ass wis kraḍ n tmeγra, akken uγen abrid-nsen daγen iεeggalen n twacult s axxam n ugellid, teεna ula d nettat aseklu n tjujtin i d-yemγin γef uẓekka n yemma-s, tenna-as:

  “ Huzz iman-ik, mmhihed ttxil-k ay aseklu,   akken igenni ideg tella yemma, s wuraγ d lfeṭṭa ad d-yeglu!” 

 Iḍegger-as-d taqendurrt yifen akk tiqnedyarr ssnen yimdanen, werğin tella yiwet am nettat yerna-as-d tarkasin n wuraγ. Akken tewweḍ s axxam n tmeγra, ibedd-asen umeslay i lγaci-nni yellan din, u yeεrreq-as d acu ara yini, wayeḍ γas ur yekcim ara εemrrayen, maca ur yezmir ara ad yessali awal, amzun yeṭṭef-it buberrak, yal wa, yal ta d acu n uεewwiq i d-yemlal. Mmi-s ugellid ḥala yid-s kan i yecḍeḥ, daγen ula d ass-nni, yeṭṭef deg wawal-is, yeqqar-asent akk i sut tεenqiqin-nni yulin deg igenni: ‘’Ɣas sersemt iman-nkent, nekk d tagi kan, d tagi, ḥala yid-s ara ceḍḥeγ’’. Akken i d-yewweḍ lawan ideg ad teqqel s iγiγden yuran di twenza-s, ira urgaz ad tt-yessiweḍ s axxam, ad tt-iwanes deg ubrid, maca nettat tessenser daγen idaṛrren-is s uγiwel mi akken yezzi udem-is s anda-nniḍen. Ula d netta daγen d uccen, yendi-as ticerrket war ma tfaq.Yendeh i sin yimγiden-nsen, yenna-asen: ‘’Mi tt-twalam kan tusa-d, nneγlet tiquftin n llazuq γef tseddarrin, ur tettut ara ula d iran’’. Ɣas akken tessufeγ-d iman-is si tseddarrin-nni ideg i d as-teḍra am tin i d-izegren asif aεebbas mi ara d-yeḥmel, maca tessegran deffir-s tarkast-is tazelmatḍt, yeckunteḍ deg-s llazuq, yeqleε-as-tt-id. Mmi-s n ugellid, yufa-d tarkast-nni tessegra deffir-s, yerfed-itt, yufa-tt d tameẓyant, d taleqqaqt yerna d urraγ akken ma tella. Tettkemmil

  Yerra-tt-id seg talmanit Essaid Ait Maamar 

  
 Deg yakk tiɣemmar n tmurt, ttkemmilen yibaxixen n ubrid gellun s terwiḥin, am wass am yiḍ. Ass n acer yezrin dɣa, 17 deg furar-a, yeḍra-d yiwen n usehwu ineqqen di tɣiwant n Melbu, mettwal 07:35 n tnezzayt.
