Ɣef wakken i d-yewwi Uḥuddu aɣarim n waɣir n Bgayet, d yiwet n tkamyunt tafessast, i yettwajerrden di tmurt n Tunes, i yegrarben ɣer ucruf rrif yilel, mi d-teffeɣ seg ufalu amezwaru n ubrid Jijel-Bgayet. Seld ayendin d anadi deg yilel sɣur yiɛewwamen n Uḥuddu aɣarim, s uḥḍar n kra n yimḍebbren n Suq Letnin d Melbu, ssawḍen yirgazen n usellek, ad d-suffɣen taɣtast tamezwarut.

 Wa d argaz bu 32 n yiseggasen, s tmezwura n B. H, i ilulen di Tahir, tawilayt n Jijel. Seg yimir-n, ttkemmilen yinadiyen akkin i 500 n lmitrat seg rrif, sɣur Tegriwa (marine) taɣelnawt d Uḥuddu aɣarim, ma ad afen lǧettat-nniḍen, imi yezmer lḥal mačči yiwen n umdan i tuɣ di tkerrust mi teɣli, i d-tenna teɣbalut-nneɣ. Amattan-nni amezwaru yettwawi deg uzudyak ɣer teftist n Tasift, deg Suq Letnin, syinna tewwi-t tkerrust n usaɛef i texxamt n yimattanen n tzeqqa n udawi n Suq Letnin. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, mi yesla s twaɣit, yerza Mass lwali ɣer umkan-nni akked kra n yimḍebbren-nniḍen, ad d-steqsin ɣef taluft.

<p style="text-align:right">   M. K. 

  
 Zik tudrin akk leqbayel, seddun-tent tjemmuyeɛ. Iɛeggalen-nsent fernen-ten imezdaɣ. 

 Lamin d ṭṭemman i t-ittḥamin; d imdanen i d-yufraren gar wiyaḍ, d wid issawaḍen tidet, ittbeddan ɣef sswab d lḥaq, ur tetten tijɛal. Ttḥaraben ɣef tgemmi, ɣef lesrar, ɣef ccan d lḥerma n taddart. Lehhun medden ɣer tegmat… Ulac win i ten-iselḥuyen, ur sɛin kra n wawal neɣ n wassaɣ d ddewla, neɣ d udabu. I ten-iceɣben d lecɣal n taddart. 

 Tura, tbeddel tajmeɛt aṭas. Am taddart tameqqrant am d temecṭuḥt neɣ tansawt, tajmeɛt yiwen-is. Deg-s 15 n yiɛeggalen yerna ilaq ttesriḥ sɣur ddewla. Yal aɛeggal, ad issers akaram (dossier), ad beḥten fell-as, alamma sɛeddan-ten deg uɣerbal, ara asen-d fken ttesriḥ i leqdic (l’agrément). 

 Xas akken bɣan-ten, fernen-ten imezdaɣ n taddart, awal aneggaru i ddewla. D tidet, ddunit n wass-a mačči am tin n yiḍelli, tuẓa aṭas ɣer sdat. Ass-a, gten wallalen n taywalt: Isallen, ttawḍen imdanen s temɣawla, alammi ddunit tuɣal amzun d taddart. Asalli ad-iffeɣ imiren di Marikan, din yewweḍ adrar Leqbayel. 

 Ihi, ula d tajmeɛt, ilaq ad teddu ɣer sdat, amek ? Ddewla, tɛawed tamuɣli i usedduy n tudrin, tesnulfa-d tiddukkliwin. Yal taddart, akken ad d tesbedd tajmeɛt, issefk ad teḍfer lqanun n tddkkliwin. Xas tella tɣiwant, xas imezdaɣ fernen lmir-nsen, maca tlaq tiddukkla ara ixedmen yid-sen, ma ulac, ulac asenfar i taddart. Tijemmuyeɛ n tura, ṭṭafarent s umata akabar isedduyen taɣiwant. TTilint seddaw leɛnaya-nsen. 

 D ayen i d-isseglayen aṭas s meḥyaf gar yimezdaɣ. Yettili-d ucerrig gar yimdannen, tettnejla tegmat, fettxent tjemmuyeɛ. Akka i teḍra d tejmeɛt n Tala-Ixlan, ur tdum ara, tefsex. Ayagi iban am zzit ɣef waman. 

 Kra ara yeḍrun neɣ ara xedmen Yiqbayliyen, issefk ad t-tẓer ddewla, ur iteffeɣ ara afus-is. Acuɣer tudrin leqbayel ur seɛɛunt ara, ur ttuɣalent ara d tiɣiwanin, s lmyur-nsent am wakken xedmen anda nniḍen ? Wigi ad ten-fernen yimezdaɣ n taddart, ad ttwaxellasen sɣur ddewla. 

 Azal n tlata n yiseggasen seg wasmi tefsex tejmeɛt taneggarut n Tala-Ixlan. Agraw aneggaru isedduyen tajmeɛt, ilul-d mbeɛd yiwet n txessart n ṭumubil i d-isseglan s lmut n rebɛa n yilmeẓyen n taddart. D yiwet n tuqriḥt i issergagin, i isselwaḍin tasiwin n yimdannen. Lmut tesmektay-d amdan belli kullec isɛa taggara, kullec ittfaka, d amdan, d abaɛuc, d aɣersiw, d imɣi, d ayen d-ixlaq Rebbi ɣer ddunit s terwiḥt illa isɛa taggara. 

 Tugdi d lweḥc i d-tesseḍfar lmut, tessenṭeq-d amdan, tettaǧǧa-t ittar-d lwelha ɣer gma-s, itteɛraḍ ad ixdem lxir, ittissin Rebbi. Akka, ass di d-teḥder lmut, yal wa amek i as-yeqqa : “Wa yeqqara-as d Rebbi aɣ-d-iqassen. Yuzen-aɣ-tt-id Rebbi d tunṭict i wayen nxeddem n diri”. Wayeḍ, yeqqar: “Tlaq-aɣ tmecreṭ akken ad kfunt txessarin”… Lḥasul, imdanen ugaden ayen yugar aya… 
  Yettkemmil R Lasheb 

  
 Ugar n uɣilif n lexsas n waman, abeɛda deg unebdu, i ttraǧun yimezdaɣ ad yefru, yella wugur n yir iqadusen n waman, di kra n tuddar deg Ayt Smaɛel, am Ayt Tɛisiwt d Tala Ɛṭa. Iqadusen-a n uẓeṭṭa n beṭṭu n waman, ur ten-mazal ara selḥen I wakken ad ssiwḍen aman i yixxamen. Imi, seg wakken d iqburen s waṭas n yiseggasen, yerka u yettseddid umur ameqqran deg-sen. Ihi, ur tezmir tezdeg ad d-tekk seg-sen. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, acḥal tura segmi ttawin aya d anezgum yimezdaɣ n tuddar-a i d-nebder. Ssutren deg yimḍebbren n tɣiwant ad asen-ɛiwden iqadusen imaynuten. Ɣef wanect-a, yettuḥettem fell-asen wagem seg taliwin yemgaraden n temnaḍin-nni, ma bɣan ad swen aman zeddigen. Tuget seg wat yixxamen i yerza uɣbel-a n yiqadusen yettwaɣen, rran aman-nni yumsen n tbernint ḥaca i usired d useyyeq. Akkin ɣer tama n yimasayen n tɣiwant, yewwi-d ad d-nini, yella deg wahil n Useqqamu aɣerfan amaynut, useggem n uẓeṭṭa n usiweḍ n waman, am wakken i aɣ-d-yesselɣa taggara-a kan uselway-is. D ayen i yeǧǧan imezdaɣ n temnaḍin, ttganin tuffɣa n tsemhuyt-a tasemmaḍt akken ad yili wamek ad ttwabedlen yiqadusen-nsen n waman, xersum send anebdu i izemren ad yiqsiḥ, am yal tikkelt. Rnu-as daɣ asenfar n usiweḍ n waman seg teɣbalut n Lɛenser Azegza i tettraǧu tɣiwant merra.

  M. K. 

  
  Aḥric wis 10 

 Yerfed-itt γef teεrurt n uεewdiw-is, yesγam-itt sdat-s, yewwi-tt ad tt-yer d tameṭṭut-is. Akken wwḍen γer sadt useklu-nni n tjujtin, ccnan-asen-d daγen yetbiren-nni tizlitt-agi:

 “ Tarkast teččur d idammen, tamnayt-agi ur tettneḥcam.

 Ihi tislit iwulmen, d tin i n-teğğam deg uxxam“.

 Yessaked urgaz s idaṛrren n tmeṭṭut, iwala iqacirren icebḥanen i d-telsa, uγalen akk d izeggaγen seg yidammen.Yebren-as aqeṛrru i uεewdiw, yerra-tt s axxam, yanna-asen: ‘’Ula d tagi mačči d nettat i d tislit iwulmen, yella kra n teqcict-nniḍen i tesεam deg uxxam?’’. Baba-s n Mm Yiγiγden: ‘’Ala, ḥala yiwet yelli-s n tmeṭṭut-iw tamezwarut yemmuten. D tamecṭuḥt, tecmet, terka yerna tečcuṛ akk d iγiγden, d awezγi ad tili d tislit iwulmen’’.

 Mmi-s ugellid: ‘’Ssufγet-tt-id kan γer beṛṛa ad tt-waliγ!’’

 Yambaba-s: ‘’Ala, Mm Yiγiγden tumes aṭas’’.

 Mmi-s ugellid: ‘’Nniγ-awen aha ssufγet-tt-id ad tt-waliγ!’’

 Teffγ-ed tmeṭṭut tebra i wallen-is, tessedreg akka acemma udem-is s yifassen-is, tekna sdat n mmi-s ugellid, netta yefka-as tarkast-nni n wurraγ. Teqqim γef yiwen uqejmuṛ yersen deg ufrag sdat n yiseqqif, tessufeγ-d adarr-is seg tqebqabin-nni n usγaṛ aqurran telsa, tessekcem-itt deg terkast-nni n wurra&amp;gamma,; tusa-d fell-as s lqis. Yewwi-tt mmi-s ugellid γef wayes. Akken i d-terfed s uqeṛrru, yessaked-itt mmi-s ugellid s allen-is, yeεqel-itt d nettat i d taqcict-nni i γef niqal yerhen temẓi-s lemmer ur tt-yufi ara… Tettkemmil

  Yerra-tt-id seg talmanit 

  Essaid Ait Maamar 

  
 I lmend n usmekti s wass agraɣlan n tlelli n tɣamsa, i d-yettilin di 03 maggu n yal aseggas, tanmehla n yidles s tallelt n tiddukkla n yineɣmasen d yimazzanen n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu (AJCTO), heggan-d leqdic d anesbaɣur ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan. Tazrigt n useggas-agi, yezzi deg-s wawal ɣef usentel-agi: “Timlilt timettit n uneɣmas”, i d-yellan deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri akked uɣerbaz alemmas Mulud Ferɛun n Tizi Uzzu. Ass-nni n lexmis 03 maggu 2018, yella-d deg-s ɣef 09h00 n ssbeḥ, usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef usebdad n tlelli n tɣamsa, yellan deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Ma ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, yella-d usarag s ṣṣenf n table ronde deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri. Yezzi deg-s wawal ɣef wuguren i d-tmugger tɣamsa tazzayrit d wanida tewweḍ tlelli n tɣamsa deg tmurt n Lezzayer sɣur Lazhari Labtar akked Belkacem Mostefaoui. D tagnit, diɣ, anda i tuɣal tejmilt i yineɣmasen Sadek Ait Hamouda akked Salah Yermeche. Am wakken daɣen, i d-llan waṭas n temsikniyin n tugniwin akked yimagraden n tɣamsa tazzayrit yemgaraden, deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin n Uxxam n yidles ɣef teɣzi n wass. Tella-d diɣen temsirt tapidakujit ɣef wass agraɣlan n tlelli n tɣamsa, sɣur yineɣmasen Mohamed Haouchine, Said Ait Mebarek akked Rachid Hammoutene, anida i d-fkan ilugan n tira n yimagraden yemxalafen; addal, idles, isallen. Xedmen diɣ timsizzelt n unelmad aneɣmas, i d-yellan i lfayda n yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas Mulud Ferɛun, deg tmeddit n wass-nni n lexmis. Ass-nni n lǧemɛa 04 maggu 2018, yella-d usersi n waṭas n tmeqqunin n yijeǧǧigen ɣef yiẓekwan d yisebdaden n yineɣmasen yefkan tarwiḥt-nsen i tɣamsa tazzayrit d tlellit-is.

  … Ula d Bgayet   tella deg ttiɛad 

 Tiddukkla n yineɣmasen imazzanen n lwilaya n Bgayet (AJCB), tella ula d nettat deg ttiɛad n usmekti n wass agraɣlan n tlelli n tɣamsa, i d-yellan ass-nni n lǧemɛa iɛeddan, 03 maggu 2018, deg Temkerḍit tagejdant n Bgayet. I lmend n wannect-a, tsuddes-d ahil d amerkanti, ideg ara naf asersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen deg Umraḥ n tlelli n tneflit Said Mekbel, yellan deg temdint n Bgayet. Syin ɣur-s, d taɣuri n ugenna (déclaration) n tddukka n yineɣmasen imazzanen n lwilaya n Bgayet, anida i d-begnen lɣiḍ-nsen ɣef waddad n tlelli n tɣamsa deg tmurt n Lezzayer d wuguren i d-ttmagaren yal ass deg umahil-nsen yineɣmasen akked yimazzanen. Ma ɣef 13h00, tella-d tejmilt meqqren s kra n tbidyutin i yineɣmasen yemmuten i d-tefka lwilaya n Bgayet, i d-yefka aṭas i tɣamsa n tmurt tazzayrit. Yella-d diɣ usarag d uskasi, sɣur uneɣmas-amaru Ammar Belhimer, i d-yewwin awal ɣef usentel-a “Addad n tlelliyin deg tmurt n Lezzayer”. 

  Gh. Amazigh 

  
 Deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura, tezga Tenmehla n srabes n tfellaḥt n ugzdu n Tizi Uzzu d leqdicat yemgaraden, ama d timliliyin tussnanin, ussan n tussna d uwelleh, asuddes n rreḥbat n yisufar iqburen, asefqed n yisenfaren n tfellaḥt neɣ iberden n tfellaḥt. Thegga-d Tenmehla yiwen wahil s wazal-is i waggur n cutember, anda ara naf, deg tazwara , timlilit ara d-yilin ass n larebɛa, 18 seg waggur n cutember, ɣef 09h00 n tsebḥit, deg Uxxam n tfellaḥt n Tizi Uzzu, i usqerdec n tecrawt (bilan) n tsemhuyt n tmegra d userwet, 2018/2019.

  Rnu ɣef waya abeddel n tektiwin ɣef temsal i icudden ɣer uheggi n tsemhuyt n ukraz d teẓẓtin, 2019-2020. Ad ḥeḍren timlilit-agi yimḍebbren n Uxxam n tfellaḥt n Tizi Uzzu (CAW), Tanmehla n srabes n tfellaḥt (DSA), Aseqqamu n lwilaya n gar usader n uḥric n ufares (céréale) ( CWIF céréales) , Tamyawest n ufares d tidelt yeqquren ( CCLS) n Draa Ben Khedda, Lbanka n tfellaḥtf d unegmu (BADR), Asenduq anemnaḍ n umyawel n tfellaḥt (CRMA ), Tasdut n ITGC akked Tesdut n INSID. Thegga-d daɣen yiwen n wass n tussna ɣef yidles n Safran , ara d-yilin ass n lexmis, 19 deg waggur n cutember 2019, deg Ulemmas n ITMAS n Boukhalfa, ɣef 9h00 n tsebḥit.

  Ad ḥeḍren deg wass-agi n tussna, Tanmehla n Srabes n Tfellaḥt, Tiddukkla Taɣelnawt n Safran, Axxam n Tfellaḥt n Tizi-Uzzu, Tiddukkla n Tlawin Timesdurar, BDAR, ANSEJ, CNAC, CRMA, ANGEM, Tasdut n Uḥraz n tẓegwa.Ma d ass n letnayen, 23 seg waggur n cutember 2019, ɣef 9h00 n tseḥit, deg tɣiwant n Illula Umalu, ad d-tili yiwet n temlilit tussnant ɣef unegmu n yidles n tbexsisin d ineɣman deg ugezdu n Tizi Uzzu. Ad d-sidren timlilit-agi, Tanmehla n Srabes n Tfellaḥt, Axxam n Tfellaḥt, Tasdut n Uḥraz n tẓagwa, ITMAS, ITAFV, INRAA, SRPV n Draa Ben Khedda, CRMA d Tiddukkla Tadelsant Tiɣilt n Lamsella n Ilulen Umalu. Am waken ara tili daɣen yiwet n temlilit tussnant, ass n lexmis, 26 cutember 2019, ɣef 9h00 n tsebḥit deg Ulemmas n ITMAS n Boukhalfa, deg ugezdu n Tizi Uzzu, ɣef unegmu n lɣella n ukermus deg Tizi Uzzu. 

  Ad d-sidren timlilit-agi, Tanmahla n Srabes n Tfellaḥt n Tizi-Uzzu, Axxam n Tfellaḥt n Tizi Uzzu, ITMAS, ITAFV, CRMA, HCDS, INRAA, SRPV, d Tiddukkla Taɣelnawt n Ukermus. Deg taggara n waggur n cutember, ad d-tessewjed Tenmehla n Srabes n Tfellaḥt n Tizi Uzzu yiwet n temlilit tussnant tanemnaḍt ɣef unegmu n uḥric n uyefki deg Tizi-Uzzu. Ad tili temlilit deg Ulemmas n ITMAS, ma d azemz mazal urɛad i d-yettunefk sɣur yimḍebbren teɛna temsalt. Ad ḥeḍren timlilit-agi, Tanmehla n Srabes n tfellaḥt n Tizi Uzzu, Axxam n Tfellaḥt n Tizi Uzzu, CWIF n uyefki, ONIL, ITMAS. 

  A. Z.  

  
 Seld mi yenqes wawal fell-as deg wussan iɛeddan, qrib ttun medden ayen yexdem d timḍerrit mi yewwi acḥal d tirwiḥin n warrac imecṭaḥ, iban-d d akken urar n uslem aniyli mazal yettkemmil umihi-ines i yettdeggiren igerdan ad nɣen imanen-nsen. Tikkelt-a dɣa, teḍra-d twaɣit ussan-a yezrin deg unẓul n tmurt n Merruk, mi tenɣa iman-is yiwet n tegrudt i yesɛan kan 11 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer. Isalli n tmettant n teqcict-a iwumi qqaren Haǧer, yessexleɛ aṭas imdanen i as-yeslan, abeɛda imawlan-is d yiselmaden-is. Yessekcem-asen daɣen tisewham ɣef wamek tessaweḍ tmecṭuḥt am nettat ad teg tilisa i tudert-is. Maca mbeɛd anadi d ubḥat, tettwafhem taluft mi d-iban d urar n uslem aniyli i yellan deffir tedyant-nni tarẓagant. Ladɣa mi tt-tufa yemma-s deg uxxam-nsen i teɣli ɣef lqaɛa, tajeɛbubt n temcuceft (baignoire) i yettcabin tamrart tettwaqqen ɣer ṭṭaq, terna tezzi ɣef yiri-s am umeqyas. Ɣef wawal n kra n wid i tt-iqerben, tasfelt-a tameẓyant, tella teqqim weḥd-s daxel tnezduɣt-nsen tameddit n wass n twaɣit, dɣa, imir-n, i yeḍra wayen yeḍran skud ur yelli yid-s win ara as-imenɛen ad tenɣ iman-is, neɣ ara tt-isellken seg tqeffet n wurar. Mazal yettnerni umḍan n warrac i yessekcam deg tuccḍa i d-yessegrayen agemmuḍ n tmettant ma ur yettwaǧ zik. « Isalli n tmettant n Haǧer yusa-aɣ-d am tiyita yettunefkayen s tɣeffal. Yewɛer-iyi lḥal ad amneɣ. Ussan iɛeddan tella d taqcict am yakk tiqcicin; tefreḥ, taḍsa tezga deg yimi-s. Ur tettmeslay ara aṭas deg tesmilt, maca mi ara tt-steqsiɣ tettarra-d akken ilaq. Azal-is ameqqran deg uɣerbaz teǧǧa-t-id yura’’. I aɣ-d-yenna uselmad-is n tmaziɣt. Ad yeqqim wurar-a, d amihan ɣef warrac imecṭaḥ, imi ur ẓrin d acu-tt temḍerrit yellan deg-s. Daymi ilaq ɣef yimawlan ad ttɛassan ugar tarwa-nsen akken ad ilin deg tɣellist, acku d nutni i d imasayen imezwura fell-asen.

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Assn-nni n lexmis 28 yunyu 2018, i d-tella tesfugla n taggara deg uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine, rreḥba tamewazurt n unelmad di Tizi Uzzu. Bdan tasugla-a, s tallilt n Tizi Uzzu, i d-yecnan snat n tezlatin tiqburin, tiɣratin akked lkef xedmen cceɣlen-nsen di tzeqqa. Yella-d deg-s wawal n taggara n Mass Anis Ben Tayeb, aselway n tesqamut n usuddes n leqdic-agi, yenna-d deg wawal-is: “Ad xedmeɣ kan taḥawact tameẓẓyant ɣef leqdic-agi, ttekkint deg-s 7 n lwilayat, llan ugar n 42 n yimsikniyen. Tedda rreḥba-agi ɣef tlata wussan, ideg ahil-nsen yella d anesbaɣur…”. Ikemmel awal-is ɣef tegnatin ideg tɛedda temlilit-agi, yerran tajmilt i unelmad d usdawan, dɣa yenna-d: “Ferḥeɣ aṭas imi tɛedda deg tegnatin igerrzen tezrigt-a tamezwarut, i d-heggan yilmeẓyen i yilmeẓyen, nessaram sya ara qabel ad tuɣal d taɣelnawt”. Yella-d diɣ deg-s ufraq n waṭas n warrazen i yinelmaden, ama d wid i d-yufraren deg leqraya-nsen di tesdawit neɣ wid i d-yufraren deg kra n waddal, fkan-asen daɣen i kra n yimeɛdar i wakken ad ten-sbeɣsen ɣef uxeddim-nsen. Maca uqbel annect-a, llan-d leqdicat-nniḍen ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan d uzgen uqbel tasfugla-agi, i d-yellan ɣef 13h00 n tmeddit. Ass-nni amezwaru n rreḥba-agi, i d-yellan ass-nni n ttlata 26 yunyu 2018, tella-d deg-s tulya tunṣibt n temlilit, syin ɣur-s, llan-d sin n yisaragen ɣef usdawan d wazal-is di tmetti. Ma di tmeddit n wass, ɣef 13h00 d asawen, yella-d beddu n 4 n yisikwan n usileɣ yemxalafen. Tin ɣur-s ɣef 15h30, yella-d umeslay sɣur massa Nabila Goumeziane akked massa Djelti Rabia, i d-yewwin awal ɣef unelmad si tesdawit ɣer wannar n uxeddim. Ma deg wass wis sin, i d-yellan ass-nni n larebɛa 27 yunyu 2018, llan-d 7 n yisikwan n usileɣ i lfayda n yinelmaden ijerden iman-sen. Seg 15h00 alamma 18h00 n tmeddit, yella-d ysarag n mass Amer Meftahi, d yimeddukkal-is, i d-imeslayen ɣef useddu n tkebbanit tameẓyant. Am wakken daɣen i d-tella tikli deg udrar n Redjaouna, i wakken ad seftin yilmeẓyen deg tmerrit n udrar, dɣa d wagi i asentel n tikli-agi. Ma deg tseqqa n ssinima n Tizi Uzzu, tella-d temlilit-askasi akked massa Nadia Labidi, i d-yewwin awal ɣef usefti deg ssinima tazzayrit, akked tirmit-ines daɣen s timmad-is deg uḥric-agi. Ma d ahil n tṣebḥit n wass-nni n lexmis iɛeddan, yella-d deg-s usarag ɣef tirmit i ilaq ad yesɛu yal ilemẓi iteddun ɣer unnar n uxeddim. Ma seg 10h00 alamma d 12h00 n uzal, yella-d ukemmel n 4 n yisikwan-nni n usileɣ i d-yeqqimen deg wahil. D rreḥba n tamniḍant n unelmad, yewwin isem-agi “Afaqukum” neɣ “Asirem” akken i d as-semman nutni s tmaziɣt. Ttekkant deg-s 7 n lwilayat-agi: Tizi Uzzu, Bgayet, Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, Blida…atg. Am wakken daɣen i ttekkan wazal n 42 n yimsikniyen, gar yiɣerbazen ufrinen uzzigen, tisdawiyin, ulmisen n usileɣ d uselmed, tmehliwin…atg. D takebbanit Media “Startub”, i d-isuddsen leqdic-agi ameqqran, s tallelt n tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmer, tmehla n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu…atg. 

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Deg usamar n Bgayet, ar tura mazal ur temmiɣ tmeṭṭut deg umussu asdukklan. Am deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, i yeggugen s wazal n 60 n yikilumitren ɣer Unẓul-asamar n Bgayet, ur tnuḥ ulamma d yiwet n tddukkla i selḥayent tlawin akken ad qedcent ama ɣef wayen i tent-yeɛnan, neɣ deg usnerni n tzemmar-nsent deg taɣulin yemgaraden. Ula d aselway amaynut n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, Mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi, yewwi-d deg wahil-is n tefranin yezrin kra n tektiwin i usebɣes n teḥdayin, ladɣa, deg uɛeddi ɣer tigawt n usnulfu n tddukkla, d ulday n ubrid i tlawin-nniḍen akken ad kecment deg umussu asdukklan. Imi, ugar n 13 n tddukkliwin i iqeddcen imir-a deg Ayt Smaɛel, war ma tban-d ula d tili n tmeṭṭut deg-sent. D acu, akka tura dɣa, ttheggint kra n tlemẓiyin ad zdint d agraw i usnulfu n yiwet n tddukkla n tlawin n Ayt Smaɛel. Ma nsenned ɣef teɣbalut-nneɣ i iqerben ɣer terbaɛt-a, ad yili yiswi agejdan n tddukkla-a ara d-ilalen, d aseḥbiber ɣef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut s umata, akked uheggi n warmuden i yerzan lxalat, timetti d yidles. « Nɛewwel tikkelt-a s tidet ad d-nesnulfu tiddukkla tamenzut n tlawin n Ayt Smaɛel. Mazal kan ad yamed lqidar n tɛeggalin i ilaqen akken ad nekker i umecwar wis sin n uxdam n lekwaɣeḍ. Nessaram ad nessiweḍ ɣer lebɣi s tekti-a tamaynut ». I d-tenna yiwet seg tid i d-yettheyyin asnulfu-a. Ahat d asurif amenzu ara yeǧǧen tameṭṭut n Ayt Smaɛel, ad d-teffeɣ seg umeslay-nni n nnig ukanun, akken ad temmeslay ɣef usnerni n tmetti d tifin n tifrat i wuguren-is. D ayen ara yesǧehden ugar amussu asdukklan, s yisenfan-is yemgaraden, deg temnaḍt-a tamsedrart.

   M. K. 

  
 Tezga-d tɣiwant n At Mlikec deg twinest n Tezmalt, s tebɛed n wazal n 80 n yikilumiṭren ɣer Unẓul-amalu n waɣir n Bgayet. Tettwassen abeɛda s umezruy-is iqerben, imi d taddart i d-yefkan lqidar n 1 000 n yimeɣrasen di tegrawla n 54-62. 

 Ussan-a kan dɣa, s tallelt n uxxam n tɣiwant, thegga-d dinna tddukkla tussnant n At Mlikec « Tibḥirt n tmussni » tafugla i yilemẓiyen i d-yewwin akayad n BAC seg yigemmaḍ i d-yeffɣen ass n 18 yulyu. Deg 88 n yinelmaden n uswir wis kraḍ i yettwajerrden deg Tesnawit 1000 n yimeɣrasen, 49 seg-sen ssawḍen ḥellan-d tasiregt-nni n uɛeddi ɣer tesdawit. Di tfuggla-a i yemmuggen deg tesnawit, ḥeḍren yimḍebbren n tɣiwant d tdayra akked kra n yinebgawen i d-ɛerḍen yimheggiyen i tegnit-a. 

 Deg wawal n unemhal n tesnawit-a, Mass Racid Rebbaɛi, yesnemmer abeɛda wigad i d-yeddan yid-s deg teɣzi n useggas, am wakken yessawel i kra n wid yeqqnen i uḥric-a n tɣuri di temnaḍt-nni ad qedcen s wugar n tnimar ɣer sdat i ussali n uswir d ufmiḍi n usmurres, imi aseggas-a, i telɣut, tewwi-d kan afmiḍi n 54.44%. D ayen i yeǧǧan kra n urbaɛ zeɣnen agemmuḍ-a d umḍiq wis 44 i d-tewwi tesnawit-a 1000 n yimeɣrasen At Mlikec. 

 Dima ɣef wawal n unemhal n tesnawit-a, lemmer ad ddukklen ugar wid i terza taluft deg tɣiwant-nni, tezmer ad taweḍ qabel tesnawit-a ɣer ufmiḍi n 80% n usmurres di Bakalurya acku wid ara iɛeddin tura i uswir wis kraḍ gerrzen s tlemmasin i sɛan. Ma d ayen yeɛnan allalen ipidagujiyen deg tesnawit-a, tenna-d teɣbalut-nneɣ d akken tura nuḥen ɣur-sen, ɣas ma tuɣ tella aṭas n txessast ilindi. Yeqqim-d ihi yal wa ad yeg amahil-is – inelmaden, imawlan, iselmaden d yimḍebbren – akken ad taẓ tesnawit-a ɣer sdat. 
  M. K. 

  
  (Aḥric wis 2, taggara) 
 Deg uḥric-agi, yella-d wawal ɣef wuguren n tuddsiyin n tudrin.

  Tala-Ixlan 

 Leǧǧessa n win yemmuten, tsergagay amdan, tessqraḥ-it. Tesduqqus-it-id, tessakay-it-id belli kullec ɣur-s taggara, ifennu. Akken ad isɛeddi lweqt n tuqriḥt imi ur izmir ara ad iɣleb lmut wala ad ittu. Yesnulfa-d umdan leɛwayed yerzan acebbaḥ n win yemmuten. Ttcebbiḥen yimdanen win yemmuten, ttbeddan fell-as akken ilaq. Issefk ad iruḥ zeddig. 

 Ɣef waya sucufen-as, qqaren leqran, ttseddiqen fell-as akken ad ittwaneqbal ddaw wakal. Ɣef waya, apsikanalist S. Freud si tama-s, yenna ayen akk ixeddem umdan i win immuten, ixeddem-it aṭas i yiman-is, akken ad iḥareb ɣef yiman-is, netta d-iggran di ddunit. Yenna-ak, mi ara yemmet yiwen, tawacult-is, wid i t-iqerben mliḥ, ttbeddan fell-as, ttagaden ad t-serfun acku kra n yisallen i ikemnen deg wallaɣ n wid d-yeggran, ttalin-d, ttufraren-d ttaren amdan deg tugdi. 

 Ɣef waya, imdanen–a xas tikwal ur ḥemlen ara win-a yemmuten, meɛna ttcebbiḥen-t akken ilaq, akken ad ifraḥ. Ttagaden ad yerr ttar, ad ten-id-iwwet si laxart akken qqaren. Ihi, tugdi, tejreḥ n wulawen i d-tessegray lmut, tessergagay amdan, tessiḥninit, tesslalay-d deg-s tagmat, ibeqqu ad ixdem lxir. Akka i kkren kra n n yilmeẓyen, nnan-as, issefk ad nennejmeɛ, ad d-nesbedd tajmeɛt, ad nseggem taddart. Lɣaci akk ddan deg wawal-nsen, lǧemɛa i d-iḍfren, tennejmaɛtaddart. 

 Sbedden-d kra n yilmezyen iman-nsen, imezdaɣ ferḥen. Deg wussan-nni kan bdan leqdic. Qedcen ayen qedcen, am tejmeɛyin iɛeddan, maca zrin kra n wagguren dɣa bdan feččlen neɣ sefcalen-ten wiyiḍ. Akka, ttensaren yiwen yiwen armi tefsex akk tejmaɛt. Seg tefsax tejmeɛt taneggarut n taddart n Tala-Ixlan, yal yiwen ixeddem akken i as-yehwa. Wa ad icɛel rradyu neɣ tilibizyu alamma slan-as-d. Mi i as-yenna walbeɛḍ a leflani bezzef, ad d-yini, aql-i deg uxxam-iw, ad xedmeɣ akken i yi-ihwa. Nuɣen sin ɣef tlisa, ulac win i d-yusan ad ten-ifru. Kkemlen sekren-tt armi ur ǧǧin tawwurt i tifrat. Akka seg tefsax tejmeɛt taneggarut, yal wa akken i as-yehwa i ixeddem. Iḍumman ferzaɛen deg yibardanan, ula d timeqbert d unnar n ddabex uḍar ur mniɛen ara. Ad tafeḍ din ipuciḍen mkul ini, plastik, tiqraɛtin… 

 Tin i tent-yugaren, d aqfel n ubrid n taddart azal n waggur. Yiwen uterras, ikker-d ssbaḥ, yufa-d taqerɛunt n crab sdat n uxxam-is, yenna-as: “Teḥrem ar yiwen ma iɛedda-tt ssya”. Yeqfel abrid n tumubilat ulac win ara iɛeddin. Ulac win d-yennan aḥ. Ula d wid ɣef i buṭin madden, ur d-nṭiqen ara, sussmen, bran i ṭbel deg waman am medden yakk. Smenyafen lɣaci ad aɣen abrid issawnen, akken ad ffɣen neɣ ad d-kecmen s axxam, wala ad inin mačči akka. wissen ma d tugdi neɣ d aḥezzeb ! 

 Akka, gugmen yimawen, ǧǧan-t ɣer lɣerḍ-is, armi i as-yehwa. Iffeɣ-d usenfar n tilifun, ferḥen ad sɛun medden Internet deg uxxam. Yuɣal wid iṛṛayin, ferqen-t am tunṭict, wa fkan-as, wa zeglen-t. I lemmer telli tejmeɛt, yili mačči akka i inna yiwen !

  Gar nnger akked twaɣit 

 Ass-agi, mi berḥen ad tennejmeɛ taddart, ferḥen akk medden, nwan akk d asbeddi ara d- sbedden tajmeɛt. Ad d-ilin yimsewqen ijdiden ara isewqen ɣef taddart. Ad kfun wuguren, ad tekfu tmḥuḥeqqranit, ad uɣalent tlisa i meyaf, ad ikkes leḥsed, ad ikfu d nekk i d nekk, ad ikfu akken i i-ihwa… 

 Ass-a, wi icqa wi i d-issawlen s anejmuɛ, n tama ufella neɣ n tama wedda. Nnan akk medden d ayen ilhan. Ussan-d yakk yimezdaɣ, ad nnejmaɛen, wwḍen uqbel ttiɛad. Wid i d-issawlen, banen-d walen-ten, d udmawen ijdiden, ad d-awin ajdid i d-yenna umɣar. Qqimen akken, ṭṭfen tama n ufella akken ad-d-mmeslayen. Ibda-d yiwen n yilemẓi ameslay, izwar-d s wawal n Rebbi. Syin, isḥassef aṭas ɣef liḥala deg tettidir taddart. Yenna: “Ikfa leqder, tennejla leḥya, armi baba-s d mmi-s, tessen crab akken. Armi ilemẓi d tlemẓit ceṭṭḥen akken, ilaq ad nerr tilisa i waya, ad necbu inselmen”. 

 Ayen iwulmen i taddart n Tal-Ixlan d lǧamaɛ. Ikemmel-d yiwen n yilemẓi-nniḍen di lǧara-s, yenna: “Tadrimt, mačči d aɣbel”. Wa deffir wa, yiwen n wawal, iswi yiwen : “Ad nebnu lǧamaɛ”. Tura d ayen ḥsan lɣaci i wacu i d-ssawlen imexluqen-agi. Ziɣen mačči d agraw n tejmeɛt i ten-iceɣben. Ttemyexzaren kan yimdanen. Udmawen kersen, imawen ggugmen, qebren wulawen. Yuɣal inteq-d yiwen n umɣar yenna : “Nesɛa lǧamaɛ anda ara nezzal, i wumi lǧamaɛ-nniḍen, cukkeɣ yella wayen yezwaren aya. Ikfa awal-is, ikfa unejmuɛ, ulac win d-yernan awal, ggugmen yimawen. 

 Ula d wid-nni i issawalen s tugdut sussmen, nnan-d ḍemɛen ad ten-id iṣaḥ cwiṭ seg usenfar. Seg wasmi yemmut umɣar, iwwet iɣisi deg uxxam, iɛeggalen-is, wa ijebbed, wa ikerref, yal wa sanda i tt-yerra. yiwen yerra-tt kan i cḍeḥ, yenwa d wagi i d idles. Wayeḍ yerra-tt i teqrɛat, deg ubrid yessalay ṣṣut-is, ittcuffu idmaren-is. Ma d wayeḍ-in yerra aqerru ɣer lqebla, yenna-as yella uẓekka. Malḥa deg uxxam tecɛel tilibizyu, terra-tt ɣer ccerq. Wwet ad tekker !
  R Lasheb 

  
 Deg yiseggasen-a ineggura, ṭṭfent tkebbaniyin tibeṛṛaniyin amḍiq ameqqṛan n uxeddim di tmurt n Lezzayer. Ladɣa tigad n Ṭṭurk akked d tid n Ccinwa. Am tkebbanit n CRCC i yeṭṭfen asenfaṛ n ubrid amazzal (autoroute) i yellan gar Lezzayer tamaneɣt, yettuṛaǧu ad yettwakemmel armi d Bgayet. Ass n ahad 24 di yennayer yezrin, yiwen n uxeddam seg termist-a, i yesεan azal n 45 n yiseggasen, yeḥṣel deg wasif Asemmam ( Ssumam ), deg umḍiq iwumu qqaṛen Agemmaḍ, taɣiwant n At Leflay di tdayṛa n Sidi Ɛic. 

 Imi yella inehher yiwet n tmacint, itekkes iεewwiqen yellan deg umḍiq-nni i wakken ad sεeddin syinna abrid. Ɣef leḥsab n yiqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim, teḍra temsalt-a ɣef wazal n 02:25 n tnezzayt.

  D ayen i ten-yeǧǧan, gren iman-nsen i wakken ad fken afus n tallelt, ad d-sselken anehhaṛ-a. Ama s yimenṭaben ( plongeurs ), neɣ s yikamyunen n unekcum, s lemεawna n termiṣt n CRCC. Seld ugar n sin n yisragen, ṣṣawḍen selken-t-id. Imḍebber n terbaεt n usellek n Uḥeddu aɣarim, yessawel imir-n i unemhal n twilayt n Bgayet, i yessawlen s nnuba-s i Lwali.

<p style="text-align:right">  K. K. 

  
 Yunes Drisi, d yiwen n yilemẓi i yesεan 27 n yiseggasen kan di leεmeṛ-is, ɣas ma yella meẓẓi, meεna ayen yexdem yessemɣeṛ-it deg wallen n umaḍal s umata. Aqcic-agi, seg wid ifaqen d akken imal n tezmert, d tudert n umdan, yebna ɣef waddad n tezdeg n twennaḍt. Akken neẓṛa, deg yiseggasen yezrin, ṭṭuqten lehlakat deg tmura n ddunit s umata, dɣa seg usrag ɣer wayeḍ, ttnulfun-d ddeqs n waṭṭanen. Amihan deg-sen d win n uxenzir iwumi qqaṛen lehlak n leqṛen. Mebla ma nefka i yiman-nneɣ tuttriwin ɣef tmentilt-nsen, tiririt tban am tafukt; imi d abeddel i d-yeḍṛan deg twennaḍt gar zik d tura i d-yesnulfan yal aṭṭan. Ccil tura aṭaṣ i d-terna tetiknulujit i tmetti ur tt-neksib zik, meεna seg tama-nniḍen, tegla s ugama d tezdeg-is, s udem amatu tessexser tawennaḍt. Gar yimeɣnasen i yekkaten ɣef yizerfan n twennaḍt, Yunes Drisi i d-yesnulfan tikti n » Trash tag challenge « , neɣ s teqbaylit « Acqirrew n ugudu ». Tikti-a, tabna ɣef usizdig n umḍiq i yellan yexnunes, win igan leqdic-a n usizdeg, ad yexdem tawlaft deg umkan-nni uqbel ad t-yessizdeg, am wakken ad yernu tayeḍ seld asizdeg. Ayagi i wakken ad walin medden amgarad yellan gar snat n tewlafin-a, ama seg tama n ccbaḥa, n yemɣan i d-yettemɣayen neɣ seg tin n uḥulfu n umdan. Ad d-nesmekti d akken leqdic-a, yebda-t-id Yunes, dɣa yebḍa-t deg uẓeṭṭa Internet, syin bḍan-t aṭas n medden, ddmen ccɣel-is d amedya n umennuɣ ɣef tkulujit. Yuɣal Yunes d agellid n twennaḍt deg umaḍal s umata, acku zzhir n tiɣri-s yewweḍ s tsussmi deg ukuẓ n tɣemmaṛ-is, dɣa aṭas i yeddan deg ubrid-is ɣiwlen i uceyyeε n tewlafin sdat yimeḍqan i berzen nutni. Ɣer taggara, yewwi-d fell ad t-nessebɣes, acku ayen yexdem, d ayen ara d-yawin abaɣur i tmetti tamaḍlant. Nessaram ad lḥun yilemẓiyen deg ubrid-is. 

  K. K. 

  
 Ass-nni n ssebt, 10 deg unbir 2018, i tessuli s wudem unṣib tezrigt tis 23 n rreḥba taɣraɣlant n udlis n tmurt n Lezzayer, yettwassnen s yisem n SILA, i yebdan ass-nni letnayen 29 tuber.

 Ma d tikkelt-agi, fernen yimsuddsen n rreḥba-agi tamurt n Ccinwa i d-yellan d tinebgit n lḥerma, i d-yewwin yid-s azal n 150 n yiwudam n tsekla, gar tezrigin d yimura. Gar-asen dɣa, aneggal Mo Yan i yewwin arraz n Noblel di tsekla deg useggas n 2012. Ma ɣef tḥawact n tezrigt n useggas-agi, ttekkint deg-s ugar n 970 n tezrigin, gar-asent 271 n tmurt n Lezzayer d wazal 499 n tezrigin-nniḍen i d-yerzan seg wazal n 47 n tmura tiberraniyin. Azal n 300 000 n yidlisen s tutlayin yemgaraden n umaḍal; Tmaziɣt, Tafransist, Taɛrabt, Taglizit, Tacinwat…atg, i d-yettwasneɛten ɣef teɣzi n 10 wussan. Am wakken i as-tuɣal tejmilt meqqren deg usiher-agi, ɣer tama n wahil anesbaɣur i d-tewwi tmurt-agi n Ccinwa. Fkan daɣen yimsuddsen n leqdic-agi, tagnit i wazal n 70 n yimura ilmeẓyen izzayriyen i wakken ad sneɛten idlisen-nsen i umaḍal merra. Am wakken diɣen i d-llan leqdicat idelsanen-nniḍen, yecban 40 n temliliyin tiseklanin, isaragen, isaragen iwezzlanen d uskasi n wayen icudden merra ɣer udlis s umata. Ula d tijmilin i yiwudan n tsekla d yidles s umata, llant-d di ttiɛad, ama d izzayriyen yecban, Amine Zaoui, Rachid Boudjedra, Merzak Bagtache ama d iberraniyen yecban, Abou Kassem Saad Allah, Mourad Bourboune…atg.

  Ahil anesbaɣur sɣur temkerḍit tagejdant   n Tizi Uzzu 

 Ula d tamkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n Tizi Uzzu, tella di ttiɛad s waṭas n leqdicat d yirmad ɣef teɣzi n usiher-agi. Seg wass-nni n tulya tunṣibt, i d-yellan ass 29 tuber 2018, i bdant temsikniyin n tuddsa-a, yecban idlisen, irmad, arraten n zawiya Sid Ali Moussa…atg. Yella-d diɣ usikew n tira s tifinaɣ sɣur Yanik Ikhou d Saliha Ouahioune, ɣer tama n usenzi s ubuddu sɣur ddeqs n yimura gar-asen: Attaf Mohamed, Mariche Ahcene, Yefsah Abderahmane…atg. tella-d diɣen tɣuri d usiken n yimuhal n yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas Mouloud Feraoun n Tizi Uzzu. Ass-nni n ttlata, 30 tuber 2018, llan-d yisaragen iwezzlanen sɣur yimura-a: Ahcene Mriche, Akli Drouz d Rachid Ouerk, yella-d diɣ usikew n usuneɣ d usnulfu sɣur yiḥafaḍen ɣef usentel-a “Adlis-iw d wunuɣen-iw”. Ula d asenzi s yibudduyen n yimura, llan deg ttiɛad, gar-asen Halouane Hocine, Choitene Lynda, Nait Abdellah Mohand…atg. Ma d ass-nni n larebɛa, yezzi wawal deg tgida timeḍwert ɣef wassaɣ n tsuqqilt i lmend n usnerni n udlis n tmaziɣt. D Hamid Bilek d Brahim Tazaghart akked Djamel Lasheb, i iseqerdcen awal ɣef usentel-agi, deffir-s kan, yella-d usikew n tsuqqilt. Llan-d daɣen yisenza n yibudduyen sɣur Bentaleb Brahim, Kammel Nacer akked Koudache Lynda, i ibudden idlisen-nsen i yimeɣriyen. Ass aneggaru n wahil-agi, yekfa ass-nni n umenzu n unbir 2018, tella-d tejmilt i umjahed d umaru Salah Mekacher, s usenɛet n yidlisen d tudert d umecwar n umjahed-agi. Leqdic-a, yella-d i lmend n usmekti n umulli wis 64 n beddu n tegrawla tazzayrit, llant-d diɣ tnagiyin sɣur wid i t-yessnen. Ula d idlisen n umezruy, llan di ttiɛad, anda i xedmen yimura-a Imache Chabane d Mohammed akked Zamoum Rabah. Ɣer taggara, ad nesmekti belli ass aneggaru n rreḥba-a, yella-d ssebt, 10 deg unbir 2018. 

   Gh. A. 

  
 Abeddel yekcem deg tikli tagamant n tudert, daymi ddunit tezga tettemhaz, tettbeddil. Ayen akk yettidiren deg lqaɛa, yewwi-d ad yekcem deg umussu n tudert, war leɛtab, war amennu&amp;gamma,; maca s lebγi, acku ddunit s timad-is d abeddel. Amussu n tudert, yettawi-d yid-s tanufli, isenfaren imaynuten, asirem d tirga yettuγalen d tilawt. Abeddel d tamuγli tamaynut, d tikli tamaynut deg ubrid amaynut i ilaq ad neḍfer akken ad nheggi iman-nneγ i tudert n uzekka, tudert n tumert d liser. Ma nebγa, ayγer ala ! Amdan, d ayen i yettxemmim. ‘’Akken i yettxemmim deg wallaγ-is i yettidir ula d tudert-is’’. Anamek n waya: amdan d lemri n wayen akken i yettxemmim. Tikli-s akked tigawin-is d lγella n uxemmem-is. Am yimγi ara d-yeffγen seg tzerraɛt, war nettat, ur yezmir ad yili. Ttlalent-d tigawin-nneγ seg tzerraɛin tuffirin n yixemmimen-nne&amp;gamma,; yerna ur zmirent ara ad ḍrunt war tizerraɛin-a. S wakka, yal tikli d yal tigawt ara yeg umdan, d afaris n uxemmem-is. Tigawt, d tajeǧǧigt n uxemmem, tumert akked wurrif d igumma-ines. S wakka, amdan iγellet igumma ẓiden neγ rẓagen n wayen akken yeẓẓa s uxemmem-is. Nekkni akk d tugna n yixemmimen-nneγ. Ayen akk nedder d wayen ara nidir d nekkni i t-yebnan s tektiwin-nneγ. Ma yella nettxemmim γef wayen n diri, leɛtab d lmerta ad aγ-ḍefren akken i ttemseḍfaren wass d yiḍ, ur aγ-xeṭṭun ara. Ma yella neẓẓa deg-neγ axemmem yelhan, yufraren, talwit d tumert, ad d-neγlen fell-aγ am udfel-nni acebḥan, mi ara d-yeγli γef tmurt, ad yesfeḍ akk ayen yellan berrik. Ihi, d amdan i ibennun u d netta i yessedramen tudert-is s uxemmem-is. Kra ur yelli s lqeḍra neγ kan akka s ugacur. Deg tebḥirt n yixemmimen-nneγ i d-yesnulfuy imrigen swayes ara yeγḍel tudert-is, maca dinna diγen i yezmer ad yebnu iγaladen iseḥḥan ara iḥudden γef ddunit-is, u ad yeḍmen i yiman-is tudert n talwit, n rrezg d tumert n lebda. Tasarut, ha-tt-an gar yifassen-nwen, d axemmem-nwen. Ma tebγam ad ffγent tirga-nwen, ad tawḍem γer yiswan-nwen, ili-ken d ufraren deg yixemmimen-nwen, ad teǧǧuǧeg tudert-nwen. Xemmet, rǧut, sirmet ayen tebγam, ad tawḍem lebγi-nwen.

  Larbi Yahioun 

  
 Deg tdiwennit-a, newwi-d awal akked Younes Boudaoued ɣef umecwar-is deg ccna akked ssinima.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Amek i tebdiḍ amecwar-is di ssinima ?  

 Younes Boudaoued: Tazwara, tusa-d kan akka ur d as-heggaɣ ara. Imi nella neqqim nekk d yiwen umeddakkel , dɣa yenna-id: ‘’Ayen ur tettaraḍ ara les clipes-agi-inek d isura?’’. Dɣa seg yimir-n tebda tikti-a tkeccem i deg wallaɣ. Syin nniɣ-as ayen ala. Xedmeɣ kra n usileɣ deg useḍru ama dagi di Fransa , ama di tmurt n lalman. Syin, suffɣeɣ-d isura s teqbaylit, gear-asen : Wejṭuṭi , Tenna-iyi yemma , Axxam n mmi…

  Mass Boudaoued d acennay daɣen…  

 Ih, cennuɣ, xedmeɣ tizlatin anda i sɛeddayeɣ izen s yiwet n tarrayt yesseḍsayen. Ḥku-aɣ-d ɣef tezlit n Wardiya n 13 Tizlit-a, wwiɣ-tt-id seg umezruy n tmurt n leqbayel. Tagi d yiwet n teqsiḍt n tmeṭṭut i d-yusan si tama-nni n Uqbu ɣer dagi ɣer Usqif n ṭṭmana. Txeddem deg usensu isem-is Transatlantique , tettwahqar , ttasmet seg-s tiqcicin n taddart. Syin ssawalen-as wardiya n treiz , akka ihi i d-xedmeɣ taqsidt-agi d tizlit

  Ma tebɣiḍ ad d-nawi awal tura ɣef Tfaska n usaru amaziɣ deg Fransa… 

 Tafaska-agi tella d tilellit, d tiddukkla tadelsant Faḍma N Sumer i tt-id-iheggan, anda i nger tiɣri i wid yesɛan isura s tmaziɣt di tmura n tmazɣa akken ad ttekkin deg temsizzelt-a. Syin, teḍra-d tfaska-agi deg waggur n tuber di tmurt n Fransa, anda i d-ussan wid i itekkan deg temsizzelt , ama si tmurt-nneɣ ama si tmurt n Lmaruk. Arraz n usaru ifazen yuɣal i Hocine Tahiri s usaru Aberray si tmurt n Lmaruk. Yuɣal warraz n usebgar ifazzen i Zahia Ezahiri. Ma d tira (asinaryu), yewwi-t Mohamed Rahal. Bɣiɣ daɣen ad d-iniɣ belli asinaryu i d-yexdem Mass Djamel Kacher igarrez, maca aɣbel i d-ufan wid ifernen deg temsizzelt, d akken llan yiɣawasen n dir, dɣa kukran akken ad as-yuɣal warraz. Maca, ad d-iniɣ d akken asinaryu yelha, syin yuɣal warraz i Muḥemed Reḥal. Asebgar ifazzen, isuḥ-d Mass Rabaḥ Yaɛbaden deg usaru “Selyuna”.

  D acu n yiɛewwiqen i yellan deg ssinima amaziɣ ?  

 Tamezwarut d tadrimt , ulac win ara d-iɛawnen isura. Ad nernu, daɣen, di tmurt-nneɣ ur ttaɣen ara isura. Syin, ad naf di tiliẓri acḥal d lesnin, aṭas n yisura i d-yettɛeddin, meɛna ur ttwaxellaṣen ara. Tura, qqaren-d ilaq d kunwi ara d-inadin tadrimt akken ad yeddu usaru. Di timetti-nneɣ, urɛad i faqqen akken ilaq i tarrayt n uspunsur, acku mazal ɣilen aseḍru (asufeɣ), d asɛeddi n lweqt kan, neɣ d urar kan. Ur zrin ara d akken amsuffeɣ d yiwen i d-yessufuɣen , yeḥwaj win ara t-iɛawnen. Aɛewwiq ameqqran i nekni d lemɛawna n wid yettwalin ssinima amaziɣ akked wid i t-yeṭṭafaren. Ma yella agdud ur yettwali ara ayen i d-nessufuɣ , ma yella imawlan ur ttawin ara dderya-nsen ɣer tzeɣwa akken ad walin ticeqqufin n umezgun, d isura-nniḍen, nekni ttruzun-aneɣ ifadden s wanect-a, dɣa din i nḥebbes. Bɣiɣ ad xedmeɣ tiɣri i tddukkliwin akken ad xedment ahilen, am umedya : ad sɛeddayent isura imaziɣen yemxallafen. D ayen ara yefken afud i wid ixeddmen di taɣult-a n ssinima akken ad ikkemel, mačči kan d aya imi s usaru, s umezgun agdud ad yissin ama d tutlayt-is ama d idles-is. Maca akken ttwaliɣ di tmurt-nneɣ, tiddukkliwin,tencadent-d icennayen kan , ttaken-as aṭas azal i wayen ukk yeɛnan ccḍeḥ, ttun d akken yella ssinema, tella temedyazt. Ma yella nexdem amgarad gar ssinima di tmurt n lmaruk akked tin n tmurt-nneɣ, ad naf d akken s waṭas i d-aɣ-ifen, ulac tiddukkla ara ixeddmen tameɣra ur d-txeddem ara asaru. Maca ɣur-nneɣ ulac anect-agi , ḥemmlen yakk ad d-addren Muḥya maca qqlilit tddukkliwin i ixeddmen taceqquft n Muḥya. Xedmeɣ tiɣri i tddukkliwin ɣef wanect-a, maca ala snat i yi-d-yerran awal : Tiddukkla n Tqerbust akked tiddukkla deg Yiɛezzugen .

  Ma yella nuɣal-d ɣer usaru Axxam n mmi. Tenniḍ ussan iɛeddan ur t-tettkemmileḍ ara. Ayen ?  

 Nufa-d aspunsur , maca aɣbel –nneɣ deg tedrimt, imi ma yella yefka-ak-d uspunsur tadrimt swayes ara yeddu usaru , ddewla ad tawi 12% seg uspunsur. Rnu-as, tafzert, ad awin 20%. Anect-a, ttawin-ten si raselmal. Syin, ad ternuḍ ayen yakk ara tserfeḍ ɣef usaru, ad d-tafeḍ iman-ik ur terbiḥed ara. D ayen i yi-yeǧǧan nniɣ-d d akken ur ttkemileɣ ara asaru n Uxxam n mmi. Ad rnuɣ ɣer wanect-a mi ara d-yeffeɣ usaru , neɣ tizlit, les CD ur ttnuzun ara imi Youtube tura yerza-aɣ. Aṭas n wid i yettawin ayen i d-nessufuɣ, xeddment dinna s yisem-nsen. Rnu, wigi imfarasen (les producteurs) i d-yeqqaren yenɣa-aɣ le piratage, nutni s timad-nsen snuzun s 50 DA 100 n tezlatin .

  Yella kra n usenfar i d-tessewjadeḍd sya ɣer sdat ?  

 Tura ur cukkeɣ ara , ma yella nufa-d aspunsur ad d-nessufeɣ , ma yella ulac aqlaɣ neqqim.

  Awal-ik n taggara…  

 Ad d-iniɣ d akken tafaska n usaru amaziɣ d yiwet n tfaska tilellit, acku aṭas i iɣillen d akken tafaska tesɛa assaɣ akked MAK, dɣa bedden-aɣ-d d iɛewwiqen. Nekk ass n wass-a, ad iniɣ belli nekni iswi-nneɣ d idles amaziɣ, nexḍa i tsertit, nexḍa i skra yesɛan assaɣ akked ikubar yemxallafen. Nekni d tiddukkla i d-iheggan tafaska , akken ad d-nejmaɛ isura imaziɣen si tmura n tmazɣa , ur nxeddem ara tasertit, maca d yidles akked tmaziɣt daya kan .

  Testeqsa-t Yamani Souhila 

  
 Ass n sed yezrin, deg uxxam n tddukkla Numidya n Wehran, am tannumi, yal mi ara yili ttiɛad adelsan, mlalen-d yiɛeggalen n tddukkla d kra n yimezdaɣ akked yinebgi i d-yusan, aselway n tddukkla Itri Adelsan n Uqbu, Akli Utamazirt i yettheggin asaru ɣef umecwar n tmedyazt, akked wudem i teɛna temsalt, tamedyazt, tamyarut, tamsuqelt, tanaẓurt, Nadya Benamar, d tamezdaɣt n Wehran, seg tmurt n Leqbayel. Asentel n temlilit, d awal i yezzin ɣef Nadya tamedyazt d umecwar-is akk i d-telḥa, ama deg yidles, deg ubrid n timmuɣnest ɣef tmaziɣt, u ladɣa deg tmedyazt. Ssebba n temlilit-a, d aheggi i tejmilt ara as-yuɣalen i tmedyazt-a di twilayt n Bgayet, deg Uqbu swaswa, seg 27 ar 30 duǧember 2018 sɣur tddukkla Itri Adelsan n Uqbu, di tfaska n tmedyazt i xeddmen akka tura i tikkelt tis 12. Heḍren-d akk wid i d-yusan, fkan-d tanagit-nsen d wayen akk ssnen si lbeɛd neɣ si lqerb ɣef tnaẓurt yettfeṣṣilen awal, Nadya Benamara. Yiwen n wawal iɣef mwatan merra wid yellan din, d akken tuklal tajmilt-a ara as-yuɣalen, imi d asṭeɛref ɣef ubrid d umecwar meqqren i d-tewwi segmi tella meẓẓiyet, tebges ad terreẓ leqyud i icudden tameṭṭut d yir tamuɣli n tmetti ɣur-s. Ɛla ḥsab n umeslay n kra n yimeɣnasen n tsuta-nni n yiseggasen n 80 d 90, gar-asen amyaru ameɣnas Ǧamal Ben Ɛuf, nnan-d d akken Massa Nadya, gar tlawin qlilen ur nugad ara, ur nesris ara ifassen-is deg waɣir n Wehran s lekmal-is, ussan-nni iberkanen n tɛecret n 1990 d tebrek i swayes i d-yegla rrebrab. Tleḥḥu di tallit-nni war lḥiǧab s tfenṭazit, tmuger tallit-nni s tebɣest d tẓuri, am nettat am kra seg tnuddiwin-is. Tajmilt-a seg yiwet n tama, d azal d tumert ara yeččaren ul-is d lferḥ, acku ur d-yezzi ara useggas segmi yemmut urgaz-is. ‘’Ɣef waya ihi, ilaq yal mi ara tettunefk tegnit, yewwid-d ad d-nemmekti inaẓuren, imedyazen d yimeɣnasen imenza i d-ineǧren abrid, akken ass-a xerṣum tamaziɣt tban-d deg unnar ɣas s kra, maca werɛad tessaweḍ, abrid mazal ɣezzif’’, i d-yenna yiwen seg yimsuddsen n temlilit-a. 

  Khaled. A 

  
 Tuɣal-d aseggas-agi lxedma n yigelman deg tmurt n Lezzayer, mebɛed mi teḥbes acḥal-aya. Walan yimussnawen n tdamsa lecɣal-a, d abaɣur i tdamsa taɣelnawt, ara yefrun ugur n yigelman (cuirs). D annect-agi, i yeǧǧan, dɣa, awanek n tmurt n Lezzayer, ad yexdem ticemlit n ujmeɛ n yilmesyar n wakraren i imezlen ass-nni n lɛid tameqqrant. Ugar n 900 000 n yigelman n yizamaren i d-yettwajemɛen deg setta n lwilayat n tmurt ideg i d-yella ulqaḍ-nsen. Am wakken i t-id-yefka Unemhal amatu n tegrawt tanagdudt n lkettan akked uglim (Getex), Mass Mokrane Zerrouki, deg uktazal n temhelt-agi tamezwarut, yenna-d : « Nessaweḍ ad d-nejmeɛ ugar n 900 000 n yigelman n yizamaren i d-yellan deg setta n lwilayat-agi : Lezzayer tamanaɣt, Wehran, Qsenṭina, Ǧiǧel, Sṭif akked Tbatent. D agemmuḍ yelhan ideg temzelt-agi tamezwarut n usegrew n yigelman n yikerriyen, i d-yellan ass-nni n tizli n lɛid-agi tameqqrant iɛeddan ». Am wakken daɣen yetturaǧu deg useggas i d-iteddun ad yili ujmeɛ deg waṭas n lwilayat, dayen ara yessalin ula deg wuṭṭun n yigelman-agi. Ikemmel yenna-d : «Tamzelt tis snat n usegrew n yigelman n yikraren, ad ten-nesmatu seg lɛid tameqqran i d-iteddun deg wakal n tmurt merra, aya ad aɣ-yessiweḍ s asegrew n yakk ilemsiren n yizamaren ara yemmezlen. Ad nessiweḍ ɣer 4,5 ar 5 n yimelyunen n yilmesyar ara d-nessegrew, imi yal aseggas azal n xemsa n yimelyan n yixfawen n yizamaren i zellun Yizzayriyen». 

  Gh. A. 

  
 Mebɛed mi d-yella ujerred deg wussan iɛeddan yisikwan (ateliers) imaynuten n Temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ad yebdu deg-sen uselmed seg uzekka n ttlata, 9 tuber 2018, deg tmeddit n wass, akken i d-yeffeɣ deg yiwen wulɣu n Tenmehla n yidles n liwaya-agi. Setta n yisikwan (ateliers) isensegmanen ara d-yernun ɣer tlata-nni yellan yakan: Timucuha, imuhal n ufus akked usuneɣ. Gar setta-agi ijdiden, ad naf rebɛa deg-sen rzan tutlayin-a: Tamaziɣt, tafransist, taglizit akked taɛrabt, rnu ɣer sin-nni-nniḍen, d asikew n tussnaggurt (astronomie) wayeḍ d agraw n tɣuri. Ma ɣef yiswan n yisikwan-agi imaynuten, tenna-d Massa Goumeziane Nabila, tanemhalt n yidles n liwlaya n Tizi Uzzu: “D Isikwan yellin tiwwura-nsen i yinelmaden yesɛan gar 10 alamma d 15 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-nsen.Yal asikew s wahil-is. D tagnit i tmussni d usnerni n tmussniwin, ama deg tutlayin ama deg tɣuri d wayen-nniḍen”.

  Ghani Adaoun 

  
 Tessufeɣ-d lbanka tazayrit tugzimin tibankatin akked tepyasin timaynutin ara yettwasselḥun seg tlemmast n wayyur n furar-a, ɣef leḥsab n teɣbalut-nneɣ.Tamsalt-a abeεda, teεna snat n tugzimin n 500 n yidinaren akked tin n 1 000 n yidinaṛen. 

 Ma yella seg tama n tepyasin, d tin n 100 n yidinaṛen i d-yennulfan. Ayagi, ɣef leḥsab n umaray amatu ( secrétaire général ) n lbanka tazzayrit Mass Leḥbib Gubi, yella-d i wakken ad rren tadrimt d tamaynut. Mass Gubi, yessegza-d d akken tadrimt-agi tajdidt, ad teddu lwaḥi d tinna n teqbuṛt, imi azal d ssuma-nsent d yiwet. Ad d-nesmekti belli tugzimin-a, sεant azemz n umenzu n unbir 2018.

 Ma yella ɣef tsekta-nsent ( dimension ): 150 × 71,7 mm i tin n 500 n yidinaṛen, anda i d-seknen Lezzayer s wudem n teknulujit n yisalli akked teywalt, anda i d-yedda wunuɣ n Masinisa. Ma yella d tugzimt n 1 000 idinaṛen, tasakta-s 160 × 71,9 mm, asentel-is ɣef yidles, ansayen, akked tetrara, anda i d-yedda wunuɣ n Lamir Ɛebdelqader. Ayen yeεnan tapyast n 100 n yidinaṛen, tettwaxdem s wuzzal ur nrekku, yerna d win ur nfessi s sshala. 

 Di tagarra, tamsalt-a n uqeεεed n tedrimt, d tin ilaqen, akken i d-yenna yimdebbeṛ n lbanka tazzayrit di unbir yezrin, d ayen iwulmen, imi tella tedrimt i yesεan ugar n 300 n yiseggasen segmi i d-teffeɣ. Seg tama n ugdud azzayri, yebɣa ad yali wazal n usuṛdi mačči ad d-twabeddlent tugzimin, ɣef leḥsab n tnagiwin-nsen.

<p style="text-align:right">  K.K. 

  
 I lmend n wass aɣelnaw n yimeɛder, i d-yettuɣalen yal 14 meɣres n yal aseggas, tiddukkla tanaddalt “Hndi Sport Kabyle”n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, thegga-d yiwen n leqdic s wazal-is deg Wammas n zzhu ussnaw (CLS) n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Ulamma melmi kan i bdan yiɛeggalen n tddukkla leqdic deg unnar, maca ssawḍen ad suddsen yiwen wahil d amerkanti i lfayda n warrac imecṭaḥ meɛduren, imi d tabɣest d lebɣi akked leḥrara n uxeddim i ten-yeǧǧan ad gren isurifen ɣer sdat, xas s lqella n wallalen. Yella-d leqdic-agi ɣef teɣzi n wass-nni n lexmis 14 meɣres 2019, i yebdan lewhi n 10h00 n ssbeḥ s waṭas n temsikniyin ɣef waṭas n yisental yemgaraden.

  Am wakken daɣen i fkan tagnit i yigerdan imeɛdar i wakken ad uraren s waṭas n wuraren i d-asen-d-wwin yiɛeggalen n tddukkla-agi. Syin akkin, tella-d turart n yiwet n tmezgunt i warrac, tin ɣur-s, tella-d tukci n waṭas n warrazen d wuraren i warrac-agi imecṭah i d-yerzan ɣer leqdic-agi. Mi yezgen wass, yella-d ttiɛad n temlilit akked lwali n Tizi Uzzu Mass Abdelhakim Chater, anda fuṛsen tagnit yiɛeggalen n tddukkla-agi tanaddalt “Hndi Sport Kabyle” mmeslayen-d ɣef lexsasat i d-ttmagaren deg unnar. 

 Ma d lwali si tama-s, iṛeggem-asen ad d-yefk afus n tallelt d ibeddi-ines ugar ɣer yidis n yimdanen-agi meɛduren. Yessulli leqdic-agi, s yiwet n tegnit n leferḥ akked tumert, ama si tama n yimsuddsen-agi neɣ si tama n yigerdan i d-yerzan ɣer dinna. Yella-d diɣ ufraq n yikersiwen yettḥariken i lfayda n yigerdan imeɛduren di tikli. 

 Ad nesmekti kan belli, tiddukkla-agi, txeddem leqdicat-nniḍen ɣef teɣzi n useggas, gar-asen turart n waṭas n leṣnaf n waddal i tturaren yimeɛdar, yal taggayt s waddal i d as-iwulmen. Ɣer taggara, nessaram-as i Tddukkla-agi amecwar ɣezzifen d tiddin ɣer sdat deg uxeddim-nsen.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis akked wass-nni n lǧemɛa 8/9 deg furar 2018, yella-d usmekti n tmettant tis 58 n umussnaw ameqqran deg Umussu aɣelnaw “Amar Imache”. Yebda leqdic-agi, ass-nni amhad 8 deg waggur-agi n furar ideg nella, ɣef 08h00 n ṣṣbeḥ deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin « Zmirli » n Uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, s snat n temsikniyin, yiwet n tudert d umecwar-is deg Umussu aɣelnaw d tegrawla tazzayrit, ma tayeḍ n tugniwin-is. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella usenzi n yidlisen sɣur tizrigin « Koukou », yella-d diɣ usenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen n mmi-is Imache Chabane. Ma ɣef 10h00 n ṣṣbeḥ, deg uɣerbaz alemmas Mulud Ferɛun n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, tella-d temlilit n Mass Imache Mohamed (mmi-s n Imache Amar) akked yinelmaden n uɣerbaz-agi, yewwi-d awal s telqayt ɣef tudert d umecwar n baba-s. Ikemmel wahil deg tmeddit n wass, dɣa ɣef 14h00, yella-d usarag n Mass Salhi Karim yellan d aselmad n umezruy deg Ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmri. Yezzi wawal deg usrag-agi s umata ɣef usentel-agi : « Imache Amar : tuɣalin s abrid n umeɣnas n umussu aɣelnaw ». Deffir-s kan, yella-d usarag n Mass Imache Mohamed, yellan ula d netta d aselmad n umezruy deg tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu. Netta yewwi-d awal ɣef tmeddurt d wazal n Imache Amar deg Umussu aɣelnaw azzayri. Ass-nni n sem yezrin, ruḥen akk medden ɣer taddart-is tanaṣlit Ait Mesbah deg ladayra n Ath Douala, dɣa ɣef 09h30 n ssbeḥ, sersen tameqqunt n yijeğğigen ɣef usebdad n taddart n Ait Mesbah, syin sersen tayeḍ ɣef uẓekka n Imache, yellan deg taddart-is ɣef 10h30, sakin yella-d diɣen umeslay sɣur waṭas n yiwudam d yimdanen, gar-asen : Nabila Goumeziane, aɣella n ladayra n Ath Douala, aselway n tɣiwant n Ath Doula, atmaten d warraw n Dda Amar. Ad d-nesmekti belli, aṭas n yidisan d tamiwin i yettekkin deg useddes d uheggi n leqdic-agi adelsan, ad d-nebder deg-sen: Tanmehla n yidles, Axxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer, ladayra d tɣiwant n Ath Douala, s tallelt tiddukkla tadelsant n Amar Imache akked Tesqamut n taddart-agi-ines(…)atg.

  A. A. 

  
 Xas ulamma, aseggas-a ur tuqtent ara tddukkliwin tidelsanin neɣ tuddar i d-imuggren yennayer n tikkelt-a, maca tiddukkla tadelsant “Inegman” n taddart n Yixelwiyen, tella di ttiɛad, imi yella-d usfuggel-ines ass-nni n lǧemɛa iɛeddan. D asiher adelsan meqqren, i d-yellan ɣef teɣzi n wass deg umraḥ n taddart n Yixelwiyen. Akken kan tewweḍ tsaɛet d 08h00 n ssbeḥ, bdan yimezdaɣ n taddart-a d tuddar i as-yezzin, ttawḍen-d yiwen yiwen. Ahil i d-yellan ɣef teɣzi n wass, yella-d d amerkanti, imi ɣef 09h00 d tasawent, bdant temsikniyin; tiqnedyar n Leqbayel, iɣerman (taḥbult, lemsemen, aɣrum uquran…), idlisen, amezruy n yennayer d wayen i d-icudden ɣur-s. 

 Tella-d diɣ temsizzelt n tmedyazt s tmaziɣt gar yinelmaden yeqqaren anda i d-ufraren tlata n yigerdan-a. Deg umḍiq amezwaru, ad naf Illula Iman, ma deg umkan wis sin, ad naf Katya Ɛelllam, deffir-s kan d Rabaḥ Ɛutman. Am wakken diɣ tettunefk tegnit i ccnawi d yicewiqen n temɣarin n taddart, ɣer tama n yiḍebbalen i iseḥman taqaɛet. Tella-d diɣ tmeɣra n ccna, ideg cnan ddeqs n yicennayen gar-asen : Karim Xelfawi, Ḥsen Bedrani, Ɛebdennur Aggaw d wiyaḍ. Mi yezgen wass, tella-d lweɛda n yennayer (seksu s uyaziḍ), i d-yettwaferqen ɣef wid i d-yerzan ɣer tmeɣra-agi meqqren.

 Ugar n 180 n yiyuzaḍ d waṭas n seksu, i d-yetunefken i lmend n waya. Ula d amezgun, yewwi aḥric-is, imi tella-d turart n kra n tmezgunin sɣur kra n yilmeẓyen.“Ad nesnemmer s tussda, imḍebbren n tɣiwant-nneɣ i d-yerran i teɣri. Ad iniɣ diɣ, tajmilt tameqqrant i wid akk i d-yefkan afus n tallelt i wakken ad d-yili leqdic-a. Nessaram tazrigt tis tlata n usfuggel n yennayer di taddart-nneɣ, ad tili ugar n snat-agi iɛeddan”, akka i d-tenna Katya Ḥamali, Taselwayt n tidukla-a.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Yennulfa-d ussan-a kan, deg ukampus n Amizur, umaynut i llan ttraǧun ddeqs n yinelmaden i iẓewren deg tɣuri, abeɛda deg tusnakt. Wagi ihi d aɣerbaz afellay n tusnakt, ara yebdun asnubget n yinelmaden deg unekcum asdawan i d-iteddun 2018-2019. Ad d-nesmekti d akken aberreḥ s waya yella-d seg yimi n uneɣlaf , Mass Taher Ḥeǧǧar, i lmend n teldayt n yiqeddicen n uswir wis 70 n Tesseqamut tagraɣlant i tezrawt d uwenneɛ n uselmed n tusnakt. Yemmeslay-d dɣa ɣef uɣerbaz-a ajdid, ayen akk yellan deffir usnulfu-ines, d yiswan i d-gan wid i d-yeslalen asenfar. Ɣef wawal-is, aɣerbaz am akken d tajmilt neɣ d asṭeɛref i waɣir n Bgayet, imi yeqqen ayendin umezruy-is ɣer tussna s umata akked tin n tusnakt abeɛda. Aya yesmektay-d ladɣa leqrun imenza d yilemmasen seld talalit n Sidi-tneɣ Ɛisa. Si tama-nniḍen, yebder-d Mass aneɣlaf tiririt i tiɣri n yinelmaden d yiselmaden deg uḥric-a n tussna, i yessaramen seg wacḥal-aya tura ad d-yili usenfar-a n uɣerbaz n tusnakt. Ma nwala ihi, d ayen ara yeldin tiwwura timaynutin i wid yebɣan ad farsen tamussni d tikci-nsen deg ubeggen n tzemmar-nsen d usnerni n tusnakt deg Bgayet tugart tugart. Ɣef waya dɣa, deg wayen yerzan afran n twilayt n Bgayet akken ad yettwasbedd uɣerbaz, iwekked-d uneɣlaf belli yeqqen waya i kra n leḥsabat n tura d wid umezruy aqbur. Imi, akken i d-yenna, aṭas n yisdawanen i d-yettarran ɣer Bgayet i unadi n ḥawla n tẓuriwin d tussniwin, gar-asent tusnakt. Yewwi-d amedya n Uṭalyan Léonardo de Pise, i yellan d aselmad n tusnakt, maca daɣen i d-yufan deg Bgayet i tikkelt tamezwarut asiḍen akked yimḍanen. Ad d-nerr kan awellih belli ur iban lasel n tidet n yimḍanen-a, imi llan qqaren-d d izwawen, llan qqaren-d iɛraben. Yessefreḥ ayendin isalli-a inelmaden i yeṭṭafaren taɣult-a n tusnakt, imi llan d isnawanen maca ferḥen i wayen ten-yettraǧun mi ara smurrsen deg ukayad n BAC. « Mazal beɛdeɣ cwiṭ si tesdawit, imi aql-i deg useggas wis sin di tesnawit. Maca imi ḥemmleɣ tusnakt, ssarameɣ ad snernayeɣ aswir-iw akken ad sawḍeɣ ad kecmeɣ deg uɣerbaz aɛlayan n tusnakt n Amizur ». I d-yenna yiwen n yilemẓi. Yewwi-d awal uneɣlaf ula ɣef tikkin n Lezzayer n tura, neɣ n Tmazɣa talemmast, deg usissen n tusnakt di Turuft d umaḍal s umata.

  M. K. 

  
 Sendiḍelli n ssebt 28 yebrir 2018, i d as-tuɣal tejmilt meqqren i ucennay ameqqran Belɛid At Mejqan yettwassnen s yisem n unaẓur “Belɛid tagrawla”, deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu. Tebda tejmilt-agi, ɣef 9h00 n ssbeḥ s snat n temsikniyin, yiwet ɣef umecwar-is di tẓuri akked tudert-is, ma d tis snat n wayen yettwarun fell-as akked ttesawer-is. Ma ɣef 10h00, tella-d talilt “Anza” n uxxam n yidles i d-yecnan kra n cnawi d tezlatin. Syin akkin yella-d umeslay sɣur yimsuddsen n leqdic-agi, gar-asen tanemhalt n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, aselway n tiddukkla tdelsant “Tafat n usirem”, imeddukkal d yiqriben n unaẓur Belɛid At Mejqan, aselway n tɣiwant…atg.Ɣef 11h00 n uzal, yella-d usenɛet n yiwen usaru ameẓyan, i d-yewwin awal ɣef tudert d umecwar n ucennay ameqqran i d-tefka taddart n “Taddart ufella” deg tɣiwant n At Umalu. Deg tmeddit n wass, yella-d deg-s seg 13h00 alamma d 16h00 n tmeddit, tmeɣra n ccna sɣur ddeqs n yicennayen iqbayliyen meqqren yecban; Ṭaleb Ṭaher, Ali Meẓyan, Rabeḥ u Ferḥat, Ǧamel Kalun, Malek Bacci, Amar Ṣerṣur, Yusef Gerbas, Yasine Zawi…atg. Tin ɣur-s, ɣef 16h30 yella-d ufraq n yigerdasen d yiselkinen n usebɣes d wakas (reconnaissance), i lmend n wayen i d-yefka ucennay-agi i tezlit taqbaylit. Ma seg seg 17h00 d afella, tella-d tesfugla n taggara n tejmilt-agi meqqren i ucennay meqqren yecban Belɛid Tagrawla. Ha-t-an d acu i d-yenna Mass Belaid At Mejqan i uɣmis ɣef tejmilt-a i d as-yuɣalen : “Ad snemreɣ aṭas tiddukkla Tafat n Taddart Oufella ɣef tejmilt-agi. Deg tazwara ur zriɣ ara belli ttheggin-d leqdic-a, d ayen i yi-yesferḥen nezzah. Ḥulfaɣ s yiseɣ ɣer warrac n taddart-iw, yal ass taddart tettnerni, tajmilt ad tuɣal i yilmeẓyen-nneɣ i yeẓran d akken ulac tamurt-nniḍen am tmurt-nsen .”

  A.A/S.Y. 

  
 Deg
tdiwennit-a, newwi-d awal akked Dr Salem Aït Ali Belkacem ɣef waṭṭan Covid-19 i
t-ineṭṭḍen d wameg i t-iqubel. Yemmeslay-d, diɣ uqbel,  ɣef wayɣer i d-yesuffeɣ awal ɣef lehlak-is deg
yiẓeḍwa inmettiyen.

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen : Mi ak-yeṭṭef waṭṭan n Covid-19, tesuffɣeḍ-d awal s timmad-ik deg Facebook. Tettaruḍ-d yal ass ɣef wamek tetteddu liḥala n tezmert-ik. Tzemreḍ ad aɣ-d-tiniḍ ssebba n waya ?   
  Dr Salem Aït Ali Belkacem  : Llan sin yiswiyen mi d-uriɣ deg unnar n Facebook ɣef waṭṭan-iw. Di tazwara, bɣiɣ d nekk ara d-yefken isallen ɣef waṭṭan-inu, mačči d wayeḍ, ad yesserwet yis-i akken i as-yehwa. Bɣiɣ daɣen ad d-iniɣ d akken ulac asetḥi neɣ lɛib deg waṭṭan ɣas lukan ad yili d akilew n kuruna. I waken ad iliɣ d amedya akken ad rren medden aḍar, ad smestin iman-nsen i wakken ur ten-ittḥaz ara waṭṭan-a. Ttakeɣ-d, yal ass, kran n yisallen ɣef liḥala n tezmert-inu di Facebook, akken ad ẓren, ad ḥulfun yimdanen amek yewɛer ukilew-agi, amek ixeddem di tfekka akked lxaṭer. Ssarmeɣ ad kemleɣ lwaǧeb-inu umejjay, deg usmesten, d uḥader. Ihi, yella-d am wakken d tiɣri, d awelleh, d tullya n wallen, d asduqqes i wid yestehzayen.

  Amek i tqubleḍ aṭṭan-agi ? 
 Nekk ma yehwa-ak, gguniɣ-t. Heggaɣ iman-iw. Zaɛma. Maca mi i yi-d-yenna umejjay d akken d akilew n kuruna i yuḍneɣ, ḥulfaɣ-as am win iwumi mazal 14 n wussan kan di tudert-is. Ugadeɣ ɣef yiman-iw, ɣef twacult-iw. Ahat, snetḍeɣ-asen aṭṭan. Ugadeɣ daɣen ɣef yimeddukkal-iw wid ukkud ddukleɣ deg wussan send ad i yi-d-yebdu waṭṭan.

  Ma tzemreḍ ad d-talseḍ kra n tegnatin i ak-d-yeǧǧan ccama?  
 Seg wasmi i d-kecmeɣ  s ameẓlu n “Medecine Interne” n usegnaf asdawan n Tizi Uzzu (CHU), nekk d amenuɣ d wallaɣ-iw akken ad xedmeɣ tabɣest i yiman-iw. Rriɣ-tt i tɣuri akked tira. Fkan-iyi taxxamt weḥd-i. Ufiɣ-n azal n 15 n yimuḍan dinna. Yal wa, yeṭṭef tasga-ines, yeqqim.  Wa izad waṭan deg-s, wa ur iḥebbes si tusut, wa yugad, wa yuɣal-it-id usirem acku iḥulfa cwiṭ n tezmert, wayed xedmen-as ajeɛbub n “l’oxygène”. Ma ulac, tasusmi tezga, mkul yiwen, ilha-d d lhem-is. Walaɣ deg umeẓlu n Medecine interne, d akken zeddig, igerrez, mkul taɣawsa deg umkan-is. Rezzun-d fell-aneɣ yimejjayen snat n tikkal deg wass. Xedmen yiwen wuṭun n tilifun i wakken ad nessawal ɣur-s ma neḥwaǧ kra. Tagula di lawan, yerna telha. Aman llan, tilifunat sussmen ur sṭenṭunen ara. Nekk yenɣa-yi ɛeggu akked utxeyyeq. Aɣbel-iw ameqqran d tameṭṭut-iw akked yell-i, akked yimeddukkal ma snetḍeɣ-asen akilew.  Ayen d iqerḥen aṭas, d yiwen umuḍin i yellan yid-neɣ, ssawlen-as-d di tilifun, nnan-as-d imut baba-s i yellan d amuḍin di Balwa. Imut s kuruna. Ijreḥ tassa-w.

  Amek liḥala n sbiṭer akked yimejjayen din?   
 Tafada (l’engagement) n yiɛaggalen n tdawsa, d ayen nettwali yal ass. Seg wasmi i d-yebda unfafad-agi, ur ḥbisen, armi uɣalen ula d nutni iḥuzaten ukilew s waṭas. Kra deg-sen mmuten, ad sgunfun di talwit. Ɣas ulamma d amahil-nsen, maca uklalen tajmilt, leqder, asnemmer anect-ilaten. Llan kra deg-sen, fkan iman-nsen d iseflan i wakken ad dawin medden. Ǧǧan tiwaculin-nsen acḥal-aya. Qqimen ur wwin ara imuras, qublen anfafad s tebɣest d tirrugza. Deg umeẓlu n Medecine Interne i yeselḥu Mass Pr SALAH-MANSOUR, ad d-cehdeɣ d akken yal win iqedcen dinna, lhan-d yid-neɣ, bedden ɣur-neɣ, ddan-aɣ di lebɣi, awal aẓidan, asefhem ilaqen; wigi yakk ttekkan di tujjya-nneɣ. Ayen yelhan yelha, ur tezmireḍ ara ad d-tiniḍ dir-it.

  Llan wid ur numin ara s waṭṭan-a neɣ ahat nekkren-t xas uḍnen-t. D acu i tzemreḍ ad asen-tiniḍ? 
 Llan wid yugaden akked wid yestehzayen, llan wid iwumi kelxen yimcumen, llan wid ur numin ara, llan daɣen wid yugin ad amnen, neɣ ugaden ad amnen. Ɣas ulamma yuḍen netta, ad inker.  Llan wid izerɛen ccek gar yimdanen. Ur uminen, ur ǧǧan win ara yamnen. Anect-a, yella di yal tamnadt n umaḍal mačči kan di tmurt-nneɣ. Ɣilen msakit ma yella ugin akilew-agi, ur d-ittqerrib ara ɣur-sen. Ayen i d-nniɣ ɣef waya, drus. Tamsalt lqayet aṭas.  Di Lezzayer, anfafad n Covid-19, yuɣal d tasertit. Aḥkim yuɣen tannumi i skiddib i ugdud, ɣas yiwwas ad d-yini tidet, ur t-yettamen yiwen. Ulac laman, allaɣen ḥman, imeslayen kfan, tidet wwin-tt waman d asawen. Kra n yimdanen, yewwet-iten ukilew s allaɣ mačči ɣer turin.

  Sya ɣer da, tettili-d čaqlala gar yimejjayen akked d yimdanen s umata. Wa yeseḍlam wayeḍ. D acu twalaḍ kečč deg temsalt-a? Yella-d umennuɣ gar kra n yimuḍan akked yiɛeggalen n tdawsa. Wa yekkat deg wayeḍ. Di teswaɛt am tagi i nettidir, ur tezmireḍ ad trewleḍ i waya. Wa yugad ɣef yiman-is neɣ ɣef yimawlan-is, wayed dayen i as-tefka tezmert-is neɣ lefham-ines. Imejjayen, tikwal, ttafen-d ifasen-nsen d ilmawen. Ulac s wacu ara qablen. Lukan d lebɣi-k a yul, ad nemyuṭṭaf afus, ad neddukkel, ad nemsefham i wakken ad neɣleb akilew n corona. Amuḍin, ad iqader amejjay, amejjay ad iddu di lebɣi i umuḍin. ILaq tussna, ad tuɣal s amkan-is. Yal yiwen ad yexdem ccɣel-is, tistan ad ttuɛassent akken ilha.

  Ha-t-an tuɣal-d tirni-nniḍen n Covid-19 tugar tin iɛeddan. Amek i zemren yimdanen ad tt-qerɛen? 
 D tidet, la yettali leḥsab n wid yuḍnen kuruna. Ayagi d ayen nettwali yal ass. Mazal-aɣ di lmuja tamezwarut. Ayagi, yekka-d seg ustehzi n lɣaci. Ur ttḥadaren iman-nsen, ur ttḥadaren wiyaḍ, ladɣa wid meqqren di leɛmer. Ma tkemmel akka, ad ilin imuḍan s waṭas, gar-asen wid ara yemten. Aḥlil ma netebeɛ-itt akka, ur ikeffu ara unfafad-agi alamma yegla s waṭas n yimdanen. Nezga nenna-d, nemmeslay-d, ur neǧǧi tilizriwin, radyuwat, iɣmisen, iẓeḍwa inmettiyen (réseaux sociaux), am win iheddren i ya n baba-s. Iqqur uqerru, medlent wallen, belɛen yimezzuɣen. Tixxer imiren a wer tekker. Yerna asmesten ɣef  kuruna, d ayen isehlen maḍi. Imɣaren akked temɣarin nnig n 65 n yiseggasen ad qqimen deg yixxamen, ilmezyen, ixeddamen, ulac uɣilif ma ffɣen-d, maca, ilaq ad lsen tasadelt (masque), ur ttemsudanen ara, ur ttmaṭṭafen ara ifasen. Ad ssiriden yal tikkelt. Daya.

  Awal n taggara… 
 Awal n taggara, d asnemmer i yal wid i d-inudan fell-i, wid i d-yesteqsan, wid ibedden ɣur-i akked twacult-iw, imeddukkal, timeddukkal. Gma, laɛmum, lexwal, iḍulan. Imejjayen, inaẓuren. Tanemhalt n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, Massa Goumeziane, tebded ɣur-i. Ad as-iniɣ tanemmirt d tameqqrant. Wid iqeddcen deg usegnaf n Micli, akked wid yakk illan deg usegnaf asdawan Neddir Muḥamed n Tizi Uzzu, melba ma ttuɣ Pr SALAH-MANSOUR akked terbaɛt-is di Medecine Interne, d awezɣi ad ttuɣ lxir-nsen.  

  Yesteqsa-t Hocine Moula 

  
 Yerna-d umaynut i ccna n teqbaylit s tuffɣa n uḍebsi n ucennay Chafaa Moualfi. Aḍebṣi iwumi yefka azwel “A lezzayer ɛzizen”, d agzul ɣef waddad n yineḍruyen i izerrin ussan-a ɣef tmurt n Lezzayer. Yefren ad ilin yizwal-nniḍen i tesfift-is ɣef tayri di tuget iwumi yefka aḥric d wazal d ameqqran, am tezlatin “Ttu-yi. Bɣiɣ ad am-hedreɣ”. 

 Akken daɣen i yecna deg tezlatin tis ukkuẓet d ṣat ɣef lfuruḥ n tmeɣra imi d lawan-is tura. D tizlatin i izewwel akka “Lḥenni, tameɣra n wuzyin”. Aḍebsi-a, ad naf deg-s 7 n tezlatin, yeffeɣ-d ɣer teẓrigin New Harmonie Production. Chafaa Moualfi, d ilemẓi yesɛan 38 n yiseggasen, seg taddart n Tewrirt U Ɛisa, adewwar n Ikeǧǧan yettabaɛen ɣer wasun n Sidi Ɛic. 

 D yiwen icennun di tmeɣriwin n taddart segmi yella meẓẓi, yettawi lfen deg wul-is. D tidersi n ttawilat i t-yeǧǧan armi d ass n 15 yulyu ara d-yessuffeɣ aḍebsi-s amezwaru. Nessaram mačči d win ara yilin d aneggaru. Yenna-aɣ-d mi t-nesteqsa “Aṭas n usirem i sɛiɣ s tuffɣa n uḍebsi-a, ad ɛerḍeɣ amek ara xedmeɣ ugar sya d asawen”. 
  Kh. A.  

  
 Tezga-d tdukkla tadelsant Axxam n Dda Ɛli deg tɣiwant n Tizi Rached. Tettwaxlaq-d deg useggas 2014 deg tɣiwant-a. D tiddukkla i iqeddcen aṭas deg wannar. Gar leqdicat-is, tesɛa yiwen deg wahil-is anda yal aggur, xeddmen yiɛeggalen n tdukkla-a timlilit anda ara fernen asentel, syin ad ttekkin yinaẓuren s yisefra yesɛan assaɣ ɣer usentel i d-yettwafernen; ayen iwumi semman s trumit “Silence, on déclame”. Aggur yezrin, yella-d usentel ɣef tayri anda ilmeẓyen wwin-d yal asefru s tutlayin yemxallafen. Gar yisefra-a, uddren-d asefru n Zeddak Mouloud, L’amour n Paplo Neruda , Alger n Jean Sénac, Tameṭṭut n Si Muḥ Umḥend, d waṭas-nniḍen. Timlilit-a, d tagnit anda ilmeẓyen ad ttembaddalen timussniwin, akken daɣen ad yeffeɣ wallaɣ-nsen anda-nniḍen. Ma yella d ass-nni n sed, yella-d usentel ɣef tlelli. D yiwen usentel lqayen , d ayen akk yettnadi umdan. Aṭas n wid i yefkan tirwiḥen-nsen fell-as. Ihi, ilmeẓyen, squcḍent si yal asefru, ma yela d iɛeggalen n tdukkla, ffkan-d ttiɛad i waggur i d-iteddun akked usentel amaynut .

  Souhila Yamani 

  
 D ayen ara d-yawin aṭas n urṭaḥ i yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel d wid n taddart n Rrif deg useggas amaynut ara d-ikecmen. Mbeɛd teɣzi n uraǧu d uleqqem n yal ssenf d awal sɣur kra n tamiwin, ha-t-an ur yettɛeṭṭil, ad yebdu usenfar n ujbad n waman seg Lɛenser Azegza. Dɣa, deg yiwet n tiɣri n tikci n usenfar-a iɣef nettmeslay, i d-tessufeɣ Tenmehla n teɣbula n waman, tesseḥres tneggarut-a ɣef tkebbaniyin ara isersen ikaramen, d akken ilaq ad ilint d tid yesɛan tizemmar tigejdanin d ttawilat i tuṭṭfa n uqeddic-a. Ma d tafada taneggarut i tuṭṭfa tettuɛeyyen-d i 19 deg wayyur-a n duǧember. « Mi ara d-tbin tkebbanit i yesɛan tizemmar ilaqen ad ṭṭfent asenfar-a, ad d-teqqim kan tezrawt tamecṭuḥt ɣef tarrayt ara yettwaddmen i usemres n uqeddic deg unnar. Syinna, ahat yewwi-d sin neɣ kraḍ n wayyuren, ad bdun lecɣal ». D awal n uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, Mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi. Seg tama n yimezdaɣ, yezger ɣef wulawen-nsen ubeḥri n tumert, ulamma ḥsan d akken ad d-yuɣal uxelles n waman asmi ara kfun yiqeddicen n usiweḍ. Awi-d ukan mi asen-d-iban d aman yezdigen n teɣbalut ara ččarayen, mačči n ubaraj am wakken ɣillen kra n yiɣermanen. « Ma yewwi-d ad nxelles, ad nxelles. Xersum ur nseɛɛu aɣilif n lexsas, rnu ad tili teɣdemt deg waya ». Akka i d-tenna yiwet n tmeṭṭut seg Ayt Smaɛel.

  M. K. 

  
 Heggan-d srabes n tfellaḥt n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa yiwen usarag s wazal-is ara yilin, ass n 27 seg buğember, deg tezeqqa n uxxam n yilmeẓyen n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa. Ad yili usentel n usarag-agi ɣef  » wazal i seg d-gellun yisufar i icudden ɣer lɣella n uzemmur deg tdamsa ». Aṭas n yimussnawen n lɣella n uzemmur i d-yusan seg tesdawit n Lmulud Mammeri n Tizi-Uzzu, seg l’ITMA n Buxalfa, seg l’ITFVI n Sidi Aich d wiyad, ara d-yawin awal deg usarag-agi. Ad yezzi wawal ɣef wazal n yisufar i icudden ɣer lɣella n uzemur, ladɣa amegruc , abaliɣ d umurej. Yal asafar, yesɛa azal-is deg tdamsa, imi deg yiseggasen iɛeddan, isufar-agi ttwaḍeggaren deg ugama, dayen i d-igellun s yibaxixen ɣef ugama. Maca tura, sɛan azal-nsen yisufar-agi yemxalafen i icudden ɣer lɣella n uzemmur, dayen iɣef ad d-awin awal deg usarag –agi. Rnu ɣef waya, ad d-mmeslayen ɣef tarrayt i ilaqen deg ujmaɛ n uzemmur d waḥraz n lɣella. Ihi, ttwaɛerḍen yifellaḥen, wid yesɛan tisyar n uzemmur akked yimdanen-nniḍen i wakken ad sqerdcen timsal wa ad d-sebegnen iɣeblan-nsen i yimḍebbren teɛna temsalt. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken taɣiwant n Lemɛatqa d tamenzut deg lɣella n uzemmur, lɣella n uzemmur d yiwen uḥric s wazal-is deg tdamsa n temḍiqt- agi n leqbayel.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Tulya tunṣibt n useggas asdawan amaynut deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tella-d tasebḥit n wass-nni n lḥed yezrin 16-09-2018, seg tmazdayt n yizerfan d tmussniwin n tsertit n Boukhalfa. D imḍebber amezwaru n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu Mass Ahmed Tessa, i d-yellan ɣef lmendad n tulya-agi, ɣer tama n lwali Mass Bouderbali akked uselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu Mass Aouchiche. Azal n 9 400 n yisdawen imaynuten i ikecmen tasdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, ass-nni n lhed iɛeddan, i lmend n useggas-agi asdawan amaynut 2018-2019. Iberreḥ-d imḍebber amezwaru n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, Mass Tessa Ahmed, yenna-d: “Uṭṭun n yisdawen ijdiden i d-ikecmen ɣer tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri, i tuɣalin-agi n 2018-2019, akka tura, yewweḍ ɣer 9 400 n yisdawanen, maca yezmer ad yaweḍ alamma d 10 000 n yisdawanen, imi mazal tallit n uɛiwed n tmuɣli (recours) n uceggeɛ n yinelmaden”. I kemmel yenna-d: “ Yenqes wuṭṭun-agi ɣef useggas iɛeddan, imi ilindi 10 800 n yinelmaden i d-ikecmen, ma d aseggas-agi tasiɛt-agi ala 9 400 i yettwajerden”. D timazdayin n tujjya akked tin n yizerfan d tmussniwin n tsertit, i yuɣalen d timezwura ɣer leqraya, imi ur sɛant ara agellel (retard). Dɣa yenna-d: “Sya ɣer taggara n waggur-agi n cutember, ad yaweḍ ugemmuḍ n yinelmaden ara yuɣalen ɣer tzeɣwa-nsen, ɣer 80%. Ma ɣer tazwara n waggur n tuber, ad nessiweḍ ɣer 100%. Yefka-d diɣ uṭṭunen yerzan tasdawit n Tizi Uzzu s umata, ideg i d-iberreḥ s wuṭṭun n 6 000 n yisdawen i yeffɣen tasdawit s yigerdasen-nsen aseggas-a. Am wakken daɣen i tekseb tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri ugar n 60 000 n yinelmaden, yettwaferqen akka: Gar-asen 4 000 ar 5 000 n tmazdayt n yizerfan, 12 000 n tmazdayt n tmussniwin n tdamsa, 10 000 n yinelmaden n tmazdayt n tutlayin d tsekliwin, 10 000 wiyaḍ n tmazdayin n tmussniwin n talsa d tmetti. Yettili-d ɣef lmenda-d nsen wugar n 2 200 n yiselmaden akked 2 300 n yixeddamen. Ma ɣef tegnatin ideg yetturaǧu ad iɛeddi useggas-agi amaynut, yenna-d: “Tignatin merra ttwaheggant, 2 700 n yimukan isensegman imaynuten i yettwaheggan deg Tamda ɣer tama n 4 300 yellan yakan, i mazal ur kfin ara lecɣalel-nsen, i yetturaǧun ad wejden sya ɣer taggara n useggas-agi”. Ikemmel yenna-d: “Ulamma asnuded (grève) d azref n yisdawanen, maca ilaq ad tettili kan ma ulac tameẓẓuɣt ara asen-yeslen neɣ ulac tifrat i wuguren-nsen”. I usemekti kan, tasdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, tekseb 12 n taɣulin ideg i d-yettili ugerdas n doctorat, 145 n taɣulin n usileɣ deg master akked 83 deg turagt (licence).

  Azal n 3 532 n yisdawen i   ikecmen tasdawit n Tubiret 

 Ula d tasdawit n Akli Muḥend u Lḥaǧ n Tubiret, tella deg ttiɛad n tuɣalin n yinelmaden ɣer tesdawit i lmend n useggas asdawan amaynut 2018-2019. Azal n 3 532 n yinelmaden i d-yewwin akayad n Bac, ttwajerden deg 11 n tuzzagin (spécialités) i tekseb tesdawit n Tubiret, d uṭṭun i d-yefka wulɣu n tesdawit-agi. Am wakken daɣen i ttwaqeblent wazal n 59 n tuttriwin n ubeddel ɣer tesdawit-agi, ɣer tama n 57 n tuttriwin-nniḍen n ubeddel i d-yellan ɣer tesdawiyin-nniḍen n tmurt. Am wakken diɣ, i ttwaqbalent 91 n tuttriwin n ubeddel gar yigezda n tesdawit-agi, mebɛed mi beddlen yinelmaden-agi afran-nsen.

  Ugar n 265 000 n yinelmaden   imaynuten i ikecmen ɣer   tesdawit deg wakal aɣelnaw 

 Ugar n 265 000 n yinelmaden imaynuten i ikecmen ass-nni n lḥedd, 16-09-2018, ɣer tesdawiyin n tmurt, i lmend n useggas asdawan 2018-2019, i yessawḍen aseggas-agi ɣer umḍan n 1,7 n yimelyan di yakk annagen uselmed asdawan yellan deg tmurt merra. Isdawanen-agi s umata, ttwaferqen ɣef 50 n tesdawiyin, 13 n wammasen isdawanen, 32 n yiɣerbazen unnigen, 11 n yiɣerbazen uselmed akked 51 n yiɣerbazen yeqqnen ɣer yiḥricen-nniḍen n Uɣlif n uselmed unnig d unadi ussnan ɣer tama n wazal n 9 yiɣerbazen n uḥric uslig (double) . I lmend n unekcum-agi asdawan 2018-2019, akk ttawilat d wallalen ttwasǧehden armi ssawḍen 1.452,000 imeḍqan n walmud. Annect-agi, yella-d deffir uheggi n wazal n 67.100 imeḍqan imaynuten akk d wazal n 45.500 imṭeṛḥen ijdiden, ayen ara yessiwḍen ɣer wazal n 629.500 imeṭṛaḥen, akked wugar n seddis (06) n yiseččuyen ilemmasen (restaurant central ) i d-yellan deg wammasen isdawanen imeqqranen.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
  Aḥric wis sin, Taggara 

 Deg useggas n 1939, iɛawed zwaǧ d Faṭma At Caban, i d as-textar yemma-s i tikkelt-is snat. Tuɣal truḥ tewwi mmi-s Remḍan ɣer yemma-s ɣer Lezzayer, teǧǧa tasa n Belɛid teḥreq. Ur yerbiḥ yemma-s wala tameṭṭut-is. Urɛad rwant wallen-is mmi-s, tewwi-t yemma-s ɣer Lezzayer, teǧǧel. Yufa-d iman-is d awḥid, ulamma ɛerqen-as iberdan, yefra-tt d rray-is, yunag i tikkelt tis snat ɣer Fransa. Mi yewweḍ, ikemmel yetlef, imi yufa uletma-s Faḍma tezweǧ, ma d gma-s Muḥ Saɛid tuɣ-it deg Lmerruk. Dɣa yerra-tt kan i tissit n ccrab. Yerwa-tent uẓawali meskin. Urɛad ara yeḥlu lǧerḥ mi ara yendef wayeḍ. Yedda-tt aken-nni armi i d-yufa iman-is yuḍen, dɣa yuɣal-d daɣen ɣer taddart n Uẓru Uqellal. Yettekki deg ṭṭrad amaḍlan wis sin (1939-1945). Xas s cciɛa n “sergent-chef”, i d-yewwi si lɛesker, maca yuɣal d aserdas amagnu, i lmend n tissist-nni i itess, ur yeẓri anida yedda. Imir tuɣ-it yeqfel 30 n yiseggasen, acu kan teǧǧa-t temẓi-s. Aseggas n 1941, yufa-t-id yuḍen, ɣellint tuɣmas-is ta deffir ta. Ma deg taggara n useggas n 1943, ur yuɣal ara ɣer llka (caserne), yefka lebɣi i wul-is, yerwel-d seg tmurt n Tunes, ideg yella niqal, ɣer tmurt n Lezzayer syin ɣer taddart-is. Ma deg taggara n useggas n 1944 d tazwara n useggas n 1945, yufa-d iman-is d ameslub deg Saint-Eugène. Uggin-as wat taddart ad yekcem Aẓru Uqellal, alammi d aseggas n 1947, yuɣal iruḥ ɣer gma-s s baba-s kan Muḥ Saɛid ɣer tmurt n Lmerruk, acu kan yuggi-t ula d netta. Din din iceggeɛ-it-id ɣer Lezzayer, maca Belɛid ur d-ikemmel ara, ires deg temdint n Mɣenya, i wakken ad yezhu wa ad yemlill d urfiq-is ccrab. Wwin-t yimsulṭa ɣer Tlemsan, din i yekcem ɣer ssbiṭer i tikkelt tamezwarut, syin akkin, ssbiṭer yettak-it i wayeḍ. Yeggra-d deg ssbiṭer n Mɛesker, ddin-a i medlent wallen-is, i d as-ccuden aɣesmar-is. Ass n 12 maggu 1950, i yewweḍ lexbar ameddakkel-is afransis Le père Degezelle s lmut n uḥbib-is Belɛid Izarar. Mazal aṭas n tɣawsiwin ur neẓri ara fell-as, gar-asent amkan anida yettwamḍel. Asmi yemmut, yiwen ur yettru fell-as imi i iɣab fell-as, yiwen ur d as-yefriḥ imi i t-ttwalin d ameslub neɣ d asufaǧ. D tasekla tamaziɣt s umata neɣ taqbaylit s wuzzig, i yeǧǧlen, i iḥeznen, i yennuɣnan imi i tt-yeǧǧa usalas d wujgu i d as-ineǧren abrid.

  Amecwar-is deg tira 

 Takti-agi n tira, ur telli ara ahat deg uqerruy-is armi d aseggas n 1945, asmi i d as-d-yessuter umeddakkel-is Le père Degezelle ad d-yaru timucuha n tmurt n Leqbayel. Iṛeggem-as idrimen akked kra n ttawilat ara yiḥwiǧ deg tudert-is, dinna i tuɣ abrid takti-agi n tira s allaɣ-is. Maca iwumi ara yaru? I Le père Degezelle? Neɣ i yiman-is neɣ…? Ahat i teqbaylit? Tiririt dayen i d-yefka, i d-yeǧǧa i tsekla tamaziɣt. Deg tefyirt taneggarut n tezwert n udlis “Ittafttaren n Belɛid yura ɣef leqbayel n zzman n zik”, yenna-d: “Ilaq ad neḥseb Belɛid d netta i d imsbeddi aḥeqqani n tsekla taqbaylit yettwarun”. Yura aḍris amezwaru deg waggur n maggu 1945, yella-d d asiskel n tmacahut n Bu yidmimen. Gar talemmast n useggas n 1945 d taggara n useggas n 1946, yura 9 n yizmamen neɣ n yittafttaren s teqbaylit. Yella wayen i d-yessaskel, yecban timucuha n zik, acu kan yefka-asent udem n tetrarit (ismawen n yiwudam…atg). Ma deg wayen i d-yesnulfa netta s timmad-is, ad naf tmezgunin akked tiswelt Lwali bwedrar…atg. Iḍrisen ineggura, yura-ten deg ssbiṭer Saint-Denis du Sig gar yennayer d furar 1949, iḍrisen-agi “Tinfaliyin n tudert” neɣ “Iwenniten n tnefliyin s teqbaylit” ur d-ffiɣen ara armi d aseggas n 1987.

  Ungal amezwaru s tmaziɣt 

 Belɛid aneggal, d nettta i yuran ungal amaziɣ amezwaru di tsekla tamaziɣt, yefka-as isem n Lwali bwedrar i yura deg useggas n 1946. D aḍris n tsiwelt iwumi yefka akk ilugan d limart yettilin deg wungal, acu kan ur d-yeffiɣ ara d adlis i yiman-is, maca d netta i d ungal amenzu i tessen tsekla tamaziɣt. Belɛid amedyaz, yettuneḥsab seg yimezwura i yuran tamedyazt. Yexdem-itt i yiman-is imi yella d amedyaz s timmad-is. Ulac attafttar ideg ulac isefra. Attafttar wis 8 yura deg 1946, ala tamedyazt i yellan deg-s. Yessefra s talɣa-nni n Yusef u Qasi d Si Muḥend u Mḥend (aab/aab), yessefra diɣ s tinna n Ccix Muḥend u Lḥussin (ab/ab). Yewwi-d amaynut ula deg tmedyazt, ideg yettbeddil tameɣrut seg tseddart ɣer tayeḍ, tikwal ula deg yiwet n tseddart. Yexdem diɣ timucuha s yisefra s lqaleb-nni n Jean de La Fontaine, gar-asent tamacahut “Ayen tzerɛeḍ”.

   Timucuha
