  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ffɣen-d, ussan iεeddan, yigemmaḍ n ukayad n BAC anda i teṭṭef Tizi Uzzu taqacuct s umḍiq amezwaru s ufmiḍi n 69,18%, Ma yella d Bgayet tusa-d deg umkan wis 24 s 56,02%. Tawilayt n Bgayet, llant deg-s azal n 62 n tesnawiyin, gar-asent tasnawit Ḥusin Ayt Ḥmed n At Smaεel. Taneggarut-a, teṭṭef amḍiq wis 60, neɣ s unamek-nniḍen, tella-d gar tneggura s ufmiḍi n 37,44%. Γas akka llant kra n tmezzugin (spécialités) deg wacu yuli uswir, fkant-d udem acebḥan am tin tusnakt s ufmiḍi n 89% akked tin n tusnakt tatiknikt s 52%, meεna llant tiyeḍ sḥassfen nezzeh yimawlan i waddad-nsent, abeεda tamezzugt n tsekla d tfelseft (lettre et philosophie ) s 25% akked tin n tussna (Science) s 19% kan. Imezdaɣ n taddart-agi, ttcektin seg yigemmaḍ ladɣa ibabaten. La steqsayen ɣef ssebbat n uswir-agi. Ad d-nesmekti d akken tasnawit n At Smaεel d aseggas wis sin i d-tella deg-s tneɣrit n BAC. D ayen yessewhamen, mi ara nmuqel si yiwet n tama, tasnawit-agi, tella gar tid ur nexdim ara asunded (grève ). Rnu i waya iselmaden-is xedmen ayen iwumu zemren, imi rnan timsirin n tedhelt (soutien) i yinelmaden, ama deg ussan n taggara n ddurt neɣ deg yimuṛas. D acu i d aεewwiq ihi? S tmuɣli n umazan Mass Ɛebdun Nasir, ayagi ssebba-s d yiwen mi ara yeḍfer tamezzugt ur as-tlaq ara neɣ ur as-yezmir ara. Rnu ɣur-s, aswir n usɣer, aεemmeḍ n yibabaten d utekki-nsen deg lexsara n warraw-nsen imi ur bedden ara s idisan-nsen. Ɣer taggara, nezmer ad d-nini timuɣliwin mgaradent gar wagi d wihin.

  K. K. 

  
 Teḍra-d yiwet n twaɣit, ddurt-agi iɛeddan, tasebḥit n wass n letnayen deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu anda tettwanɣa yiwet n tmeṭṭut sɣur argaz-is. Syin, d netta i iruḥen ɣer yiɣallen n laman, yestaɛref s tmenɣiwt i yexdem. Argaz-a, ad ad yili yesɛa 60 n yisuggasen deg tudert-is. Tawaɣit-a, teǧǧa-d tugdi gar yimezdaɣ n uzniq-nni . Ar tura, ur d-tban ara sebba n tmenɣiwt-a, imi argaz-a, yugi ad yemmeslay ɣef wayen i t-yessawḍen ad yexdem-anect – a. Am wakken , daɣen, i d-teḍra twaɣit-nniḍen s ssebba n umuksid n lkarbun i yenɣan yiwen urgaz akked tmeṭṭut-is. Argaz-nni, ɣur-s 59 n yiseggasen, ma d tameṭṭut, tesɛa 47 n yiseggasen 

  S.Y. 

  
 Gar yimeɣnasen imenza n tmaziɣt deg temnaḍt n Wehran, ad naf Ǧamal Ben Ɛuf. Deg tdiwennit-a, newwi-d awal yid-s ɣef tallit-nni ideg ula d ameslay s tmaziɣt yettwagdel, ɣef leqdic deg tddukkli Numidya akked temsal-nniḍen. 

 

  Aḥric amezwaru 

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen: Anwa i d Ǧamal Ben Ɛuf ?  
 Ǧamal Benɛuf :  D ababat n twacult n semmus (5) n yigerdan. Luleγ ass n sa (7) mayyu 1960 deg Yiγil-Ali, aẓi n At Σebbas (Bgayet); maca, nekk n yiwet taddart tameẓyant isem-is “Tiniri “. Ttidireɣ deg Wehran si temẓi-w. Lliɣ u mazal-iyi d ameɣnas n tmaziɣt. Maca, tineggura-a, yerza-d fell-i waṭṭan iɣef ur bniɣ. Ḍḥiɣ-d d aceqquf ur nezmir ula i yiman-is! 

  Seg melmi i tkecmeḍ s annar n timmuɣnest ɣef tmaziɣt ?  
  “Tawekka-a n tmaziɣt, tenṭeḍ-iyi-d si temẓi-w”, acku tignatin n ẓẓmek ideg nedder tillay-nni, ur ttaǧǧant ara amdan ad yidir d arawsan, anagar kan ma yečča ul-is. Tiwtilin n yimir-nni i d-tessegra tsertit, ha ad ak-ǧǧent, ad tgezmeḍ kra uẓar i ak-icudden ɣer tgemmi-inek, ɣer tumast-inek d tmeslayt-inek… anamek-is: Ad tidireḍ d wayeḍ. Ma triḍ ad tidireḍ d kečč kan, dɣa ad tent-tcerweḍ merriɣit. Fiḥel ma zziɣ neɣ nnḍeɣ deg usmal (usenɛet) n tillay-nni n ẓẓmek d lḥerṣ. Nebda-tt s wawal deg taggara n yiseggasen-nni n 1970, syin s tɣuri n yidlisen n umezruy, ɣer tɣuri n wayen d-itteffɣen s tuffra, am uɣmis Iṭij d wayen i aɣ-d-yettawḍen sɣur Ugraw Imaziɣen… ugar ɣef wayen nettwali deg temliliyin n JSK d tezlatin iwumi nsell. Deg useggas n 1980, dɣa neṭṭef tirni deg unnar n umennuɣ s usnulfu n terbaɛt Imnayen n Numidya i yuɣalen d tiddukkla Numidya deg useggas 1990. Seg yimir-nni, ur nerkid, amennuɣ yettawi-d wayeḍ. Newwet yakk yis-sent: Addal, tasertit, idles, taẓuri… Akken i t-yenna Muḥya:“Llem-ik ddu d uḍar-ik“. 

  I tira, melmi i tt-tebdiḍ.?  
  Ddeqs-aya tura. Bdiɣ-tt s uzgar n yisefra deg useggas n 1978. Imiren, ttaruɣ-ten s Tifinaɣ. D acu kan, d tira tamazgart, mačči d tira timezgit. Di tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ kan, ini zegreɣ-d asefru. Kra seg-sen, lliɣ ssawaleɣ-ten-id di kra n temliliyin d kra n tmeɣriwin i d-yettilin deg yiseggasen n 80. Kra seg-sen tecna-ten-id terbaɛt Tilelli i d-yennulfan aseggas 1985 deg Wehran. Aḥric ameqqran seg yisefra-a, ɣban neɣ yewwi-ten waḍu i lmend n yir tignatin i seg i d-nekka. Ccwi kan, ggran-d seg-sen kra, dɣa ddan-d deg wammud n yisefra “Tujjma Tuzzma” i d-yettwazergen ɣur “L’Harmattan”, aseggas 2004. Ih! Deg-sen kra i d-yeddan deg tesɣunin “Azul” n tddukkla Numidya n Wehran, neɣ deg tesɣunt “Tidmi tamirant” n tddukkla Asirem n Wehran. Syin ɣer da, zegreɣ ɣer wayen-nniḍen: Tira n yimagraden (i d-itteffɣen di tesɣunin d yiɣmisen ama da neɣ di Merruk) ar tira n wayen i d-leqḍeɣ si timawit (timseɛraq, inzan, timucha…); ar tira n wungal, tira n twengamt, tira n ddeqs tmezgunin… Ar tura, ddeqs seg wayen uriɣ, urɛad i d-yettwazreg.

  Amek i ak-id-tusa tikti akken ad taruḍ ungal Timlilt n tɣermiwin?  
  Di tidet, d taluft n truẓi usalu, ugar n tira n wungal. Ḥṣiɣ ma zwareɣ nekkini, sakin ad iyi-d-ḍefren wiyaḍ, dɣa yeḍra-d waya. Tikti-a, tella-yi-d deg wussan mi nella neqqar tamaziɣt ɣur Kamal Uzerrad. Maca, kukraɣ nezzeh, acku ur d-ufiɣ ansay-a n tira n wungalen di tegnit n tilawt ideg nella imiren. Ayagi deg useggas n 1990, u ɣas ma Kamal Uzerrad yessebɣes-iyi aṭas, yenna-yi-d aru kan, awi-d kan ad d-yili wungal s tagi-nneɣ. Acku imiren, anagar kan ukuẓ (4) neɣ semmus (5) n wungalen i yellan akk s tamaziɣt. Maca, asenfar-a, yefka-t unebdu i lexrif i lmend n leqdic d tlufa i d-yeqqersen fell-aɣ. Dɣa, armi mmden 10 n yiseggasen deqqal d wamek yemmed. Mi t-bdiɣ ass n 12 yennayer 2000, armi yekfa ass n 17 Tuber 2000, ufiɣ-t ibeddel tadyant, ibeddel asentel, ibeddel ula d azwel. Yettwazreg-d ɣur tezrigin “L’Harmattan” deg useggas 2002 s tullin umeddakel-iw Kamal Uzerrad, wamag da di tmurt armi i as-d-yules asizreg “Achab” deg useggas 2016.

  Taggara-a, tefkiḍ aḥric meqqren n leqdic-ik i umezgun, ayɣer?  
  Anda i yessefk ad iliɣ, lliɣ. Lemmer ad nwali deg usekdeffir (rétroviseur), ad naf d akken deg yal tagnit, ṭṭfeɣ deg-s tirni, imedyaten: Si 1980 ar 1988, lliɣ d asleɣmay n terbaɛt “Imnayen n Numidya”; si 1999 ar 2000 mačči kan lliɣ gar yimesnulfuyen n tddukkliwin yellan di Wehran, “Asirem” d Numidya, maca, lliɣ deffir n waṭas n tigawin. Asmi yessefk ad slemdeɣ tamaziɣt, slemdeɣ-tt i wugar n 10 n yiseggasen. Asmi yessefk ad iliɣ deffir n usnulfu n tesɣunin, lliɣ… Ihi, asmi walaɣ ilem meqqren yellan di taɣult-a umezgun, acimi ara ɣulleɣ s wayen iwumi zemreɣ? Dɣa greɣ afus s tira, s usali n tmezgunin, d uwelleh n yilmeẓyen ɣer tẓuri-a tis-4. Yerna, amezgun-a, sqedceɣ-t d allal i uselmed n tmaziɣt yakk d uḥuddu n tumast-nneɣ.

  Amek i d-tennulfa terbaεt Tigawt d wawal?  
  Am wakken i d ak-nniɣ yakan, amezgun d yiwen n ttawil umennuɣ. Ladɣa di tmetti am tagi-nneɣ ideg idles d amawi. Ɣef waya, seg wasmi i d-neslul tiddukkla Numidya i d-yedda yid-s usenfar-a n umezgun. D acu kan nefka azal i yisenfaren akken i myezwaren deg unnar. Deg yiseggasen n 1992 i tebda tikti n usnulfu n terbaɛt n umezgun. Syin ɣer da, rnan-d kra n yimdanen i iqeqdecn yakan deg taɣult-a n umezgun. Imeddukkal-nneɣ imenza, bdan s kra n tmezgunin timeẓyanin di tmeɣriwin i nesuddus. Uraren-d yiwet n tmezgunt-nsen i yigurdan deg teɣremt n yidles n Lezzayer i lmend n temlilit n tddukkliwin timaziɣin i yesuddes Ugraw adelsan amaziɣ. Maca, armi i d-rnan wid yellan qqaren tamaziɣt deg tddukkla imiren ɣer terbaɛt iwumi semman “Tafrara” d wamek bdan asali n tmezgunin n tidet, amedya “Lqaḍi d yinexḍaben” n dda Ɛebdella Ḥaman, “Anwa yextaren” n Muḥend At Yiɣil; ssulin daɣen yiwet n upirat s yezwel “Matub ur yemmut ara” d tajmilt i Lwennas Matub, deg 1998. Dɣa tarbaɛt-a, tekki deg tfaskiwin u tewwi-d kra n warrazen. Dɣa ahanay-ines aneggaru, yella-d i lmend n tefsut n yimaziɣen deg 2002. Segmi nwala ilem-a yellan deg unnar, ladɣa di tlemmast n yineḍruyen n tefsut taberkant, yerna ttwagedlen fell-aɣ yakk iberdan n umennuɣ… Dɣa neslal-d di duǧember 2002, tarbaɛt-nniḍen, s yisem-nniḍen, s talɣa-nniḍen… Tagi d tarbaɛt “Tigawt d wawal” i igan ahany-ines amenzu deg tefsut imaziɣen 2003. Seg yimiren, teṭṭef tirni hrawen deg unnar n umezgun amaziɣ armi d aseggas n 2017. Nessaram ahat ad d-tuɣal yiwwas ɣer unnar. 

  Yella kra wass i d-tewwim arraz?  
  Mačči d yiwen warraz i d-newwi! Yurew uzemmur s warrazen. Tarbaɛt “Tigawt d wawal”, terra tili i umezgun amaziɣ i tallit n 15 n yiseggasen. Tessuli 8 tmezgunin, temger-d 32 warrazen; ugar ɣef wayen yugaren arrazen, d tizrawin yemmugen ɣef umahil-ines deg tesdawiyin n Wehran, Bgayet, Tubiret,.. ula d taprufisurt Jane Goodmann n tesdawit n Bustun di Marikan, tga amahil meqqren ɣef leqdic n “Tigawt d wawal” acku iban-as-d d akken d tirmit meqqren i uselḥu n tmaziɣt. Amahil-a-ines, temmeslay-d fell-as deg temliliyin tussnanin yeḍran di tesdawit n Weǧda (Merruk) daɣen di tesdawit n Wehran.
   Tettkemmil 

<p style="text-align:right">  Yesteqsa-t Khaled Achoui 

  
 Qqaren, yella yiwen n umcic akken kan yebda yetturar d ameẓyan, yemlal-d d uγerda d tanudda-s neγ (tizya-s). Tturaren Seg wakken myeεǧaben, ihi tturaren si ṣṣbeḥ ar tmeddit.
  Yenna-as umcic: “Ihi i imi nemsefham, azekka ad nemlil ad nurar daγen am wass-a yak?”. 
  Aγerda, yerra-as: “Ih, azekka taṣebḥit ad nemlil”. Mi yekcem uγerda s axxam-nsen, yenṭeq baba-s γur-s: ”Anida teddiḍ si ṣṣbeḥ ar tura?”. Aγerda: “Annaγ a baba, lliγ tturareγ d yiwen umeddakkel-iw amzun-it”. 
  -Isem-is umedakel-agi inek? 
  -Isem-is ah…amcic. Dγa baba-s, tbeddel ṣṣifa-s: “Annaγ ad ak-yexdeε Rebbi, qṛib temeččeḍ ur ẓriγ”. 
  Yemma-s, texlaε akken-nniḍen: ”Yak a mmi, imcac d iεdawen-nneγ, ur aγ-ḥemmlen ara i tdukli. Lemmer ad aγ-ṭṭfen, ad aγ-ččen”. Aγerda: “Semmeḥ-iyi a baba, semmeḥ-iyi a yemma, dayen ur ttεawadeγ ad uγaleγ, cwi kan selkeγ ». Si tama-nniḍen, amcic mi yewweḍ γer uxxam-nsen, yesteqsa-t baba-s: “Anida teddiḍ si ṣṣbeḥ ay amcic a mmi?”. Amcic: “A baba, lliγ zehhuγ d yiwen uḥbib-iw”. Baba-s: “Isem-is uḥbib-ik?”. Amcic: “Isem-is ah…aγerda”. Dγa tsuγ yemma-s wala baba-s: “Anwa anwa?”. Amcic: “Aγerda ayγer? Acimi?”. Baba-s: “Annaγ ay ameslub, lemmer teḥriceḍ, ad t-id-teṭṭfeḍ i wakken ad t-nečč, yak iγerdayen d ikeryen-nneγ”. Amcic: “Semmeḥ-iyi a baba, nekk d amecṭuḥ ur ssineγ ara, maca azekka ad d-yuγal i wakken ad yurar yid-i, ad t-id-ṭṭfeγ, ad t-nečč”. Azekka-nni tafejrit, yeqsed umcic s axxam, yessawel-as: “Ay aγerda, ay aγerda”. 
  Aγerda: “Anwa akka? Acu tebγiḍ?”. 
  -Nekk d aḥbib-ik, ffeγ-d ad nurar 
  -Ala, ur tturareγ ara. 
  -Acimi? 
  -Ayen akken i ak-yenna baba-k leεca, yenna-yi-t-id ula d nekk baba.

  Yahia Yanes 

  
 Seld mi yekfa amahil-is umaswaḍ n tmaziɣt Mass Abdellah Arkoub deg twilayt n Tlemsan, yerza ɣer yiselmaden n Wehran tazwara n ddurt iɛeddan. Amahil i t-yewwin ɣer Wehran yemgarad gar usenṣeb n yiwet n tselmadt d tirza n tesweḍt ɣer yiselmaden-nniḍen akked wass n usileɣ i yiselmaden merra n tmaziɣt. Yebda Mass Ɛerqub leqdic-is ass-nni n acer, 21 yebrir, s tirza ɣer uɣerbaz amenzu Ɛizi Ben Yebqa deg tama n Beṭṭiwa anida i yessenṣeb taselmadt Massa Ǧ. Smaɛil i yesɣaren yiwet n tnelmadt kan, maca deg uskasi i d-yellan ar taggara gar-as d tnemhalt n uɣerbaz d kra n yimaswaḍen, yenna dakken ilaq ad d-afen tifrat i wugur n tdersi n yinelmaden yeqqaren tamaziɣt deg tneɣriyin, s umeslay d usebɣes n yinelmaden-a, acku ur d-teqqim ara kan deg uselmad, imi aneggaru-a, axeddim-is yettili deg tesmilt s usenked n temsirin. Deg wass wis sin, arim 22 yebrir, iga umaswaḍ tirza n tesweḍt ɣer sin n yiɣerbazen yellan deg tlemmast n temdint.

 Taṣebḥit, yella deg uɣerbaz Ben Tacfin anida i iwala tamsirt n tegnit n tmenna i d-tessenɛet tselmadt ɣef useḥbiber ɣef tdawsa, ma d tameddit yeḥḍer i temsirt deg uɣerbaz El Imam El Hewwari i d-yewwi uselmad ɣef tneqqist n wuccen d yizimer. Mass Arkoub yumer aṭas s uswir n yinelmaden, acku rran lwelha-nsen akken ilaq ɣer temsirin u ddan d uṣenfar. Ar taggara, yella-d uskasi gar umaswaḍ d yal aselmad, anida i asen-yefka kra n yiwellihen d lixṣaṣ i iwala ilaq ad yettwixdem, uqbel ad asen-yefk tazmilt ɣef tirza-a. 

 Ass n arim, d ass n usileɣ deg tesnawit Cellali Xadiǧa deg tama n El Ḥasi, ṣṣbeḥ yewwi-d Mass Arkoub awal ɣef tarrayin iwulmen i uselmed n tmaziɣt ɣer yiɛerbawalen, yefka iwellihen i yiselmaden amek ara ssuddsen asenfar d tgezmin s yiman-nsen war ma smersen adlis aɣurbiz s waṭas, imi d allal ẓẓayen ɣef uswir n yinelmaden-a. Mbeɛd imekli, uɣalen-d ɣer umahil seg 13h ɣer 15h30, msebḍan yiselmaden ɣef sin n yigrawen, gan amedya n usenfar d tegzemt n waddal n ddabex uḍar s yakk irmuden. 

 Yumer aṭas umaswaḍ s uswir d unadi xeddmen yiselmaden, ama deg Wehran neɣ di Tlemsan, acku abaɣur d uswir d umḍan n yinelmaden simmal yettnernay, ayagi yakk ahat yezmer ad aɣ-d-yessebgen belli aselmed n tmaziɣt a-t-an deg ubrid iwatan. D awal-a i swayes i d-yessegra Mass Abdellah mbeɛd mi t-nesteqsa “La teddun lecɣal akken ilaq, ma nwala dakken inelmaden sɛan lebɣi ameqqran i ulmad, ɣas tadra-nsen mačči d leqbayel merra. Yella daɣen kra n lixṣaṣ yerzan asileɣ imi iselmaden d imaynuten, acu kan s temliliyin am ti simmal yettgerriz waddad”.

  Khaled Achoui 

  
 De tous segments de logements lancés dans la ville de Bouira ces dernières années, le promotionnel aidé (LPA) est celui qui enregistre le plus de difficultés dans sa concrétisation. En effet, actuellement, des centaines d’unités localisées aux quatre coins de la ville sont en souffrance et peinent à être achevées. Au total, près d’une dizaine de projets tournent au ralenti. Certains de ces projets ont été lancés en 2013, 2014, 2015 et 2016 et connaissent beaucoup de retard dans la réalisation.

 Cette situation a fait réagir des dizaines de souscripteurs, pour la plupart des fonctionnaires et cadres des différentes administrations publiques qui ont organisé de nombreuses actions de protestation pour dénoncer cet état de fait et exiger la prise de mesures nécessaires pour la relance des chantiers du LPA et leur réception dans les plus brefs délais. La semaine écoulée, et devant une situation qui s’enlise, des dizaines de souscripteurs ont tenu un énième sit-in devant l’agence foncière de wilaya pour attirer l’attention des autorités de wilaya sur des blocages qui n’ont que trop duré. 

 L’appel de ces souscripteurs a, cette fois-ci, fait réagir le wali qui a organisé jeudi dernier une visite de travail et d’inspection au niveau de nombreux chantiers du LPA, notamment ceux du 300 logements, 150 ainsi que ceux localisés dans les quartiers de l’Ecotec, la route de Haïzer ou encore à Harkat. Le wali Mustapha Limani a eu au cours de cette visite à écouter les explications des responsables des entreprises en charge de la réalisation, des responsables de l’agence foncière et de la direction du logement, mais s’est aussi entretenu avec les souscripteurs pour tenter de cerner les différents problèmes qui font que les projets peinent à être livrés. 

 Effectivement, le wali a constaté de visu l’ampleur des retards que connaissent ces projets du LPA et a promis de prendre les mesures qui s’imposent pour résoudre tous les problèmes et relancer tous les chantiers. À la fin de la visite, une réunion de travail a été présidée par le premier magistrat de la wilaya, où la situation détaillée de chaque projet a été exposée. Étaient présents à cette réunion, les responsables de l’agence foncière, les bureaux d’études et les souscripteurs. 

 À l’issue de la réunion, des instructions ont été données par le chef de l’exécutif pour accélérer les travaux de réalisation et relancer tous les chantiers du LPA de la ville de Bouira, de sorte à réceptionner ces projets durant l’été prochain.

  Djamel M. 

  
 Aṭas d tiɣiwanin di Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen ideg xussent tddukkliwin, iɣab nezzeh umussu asdukklan. Ma mačči ɣur yilemẓiyen i yella wugur, ad d-yekk si tama n tedbelt, n tedrimt neɣ n ttawilat. Gar tɣiwanin-a, tella tɣiwant n Draɛ Lqayed, di tdayra n Xerraṭa, i d-yezgan s wazal n 70 n yikilumitren ɣer usamar n waɣir n Bgayet. Di temnaḍt-a tamsedrart, xussen ayendin warmuden n tddukkliwin ara d-yennernin s lebɣi n yilemẓiyen, ara d-yawin ugar n tiẓeḍt i tudert tadigant n warrac d teqcicin. Ula d iqeddicen idelsanen, gersen dinna ayyuren, neɣ ɛad ɣas ad d-nini iseggasen iɛeddan. Gar tddukkliwin uɣur i d-iban uneḥbus n warmuden di tɣiwant-a n Draɛ Lqayed, ama d idelsanen neɣ uhu, d tiddukkla tadelsant “Idles” i d-ilulen deg wayyur n useggas 2017. Akken i d-yeqqar yisem-is, snernan-d kra n yilemẓiyen n temnaḍt-nni tiddukkla-a akken ad tefk tudert tamaynut i uḥric adelsan ɣur-sen. Maca daɣen ad tekki deg usaki n yimezdaɣ ɣef wayen akk icudden i tmagit d yidles, i umezruy akked usegmi n tudert. Akuden imenza mi d-tennulfa, tessaweḍ tessuddes-d kra n ttiɛadat di taddart, ama i usfuggel n Tefsut n Yimaziɣen, n Yennayer, neɣ ula d ayen icudden i tmetti, am usmekti d uheggi n kra i lmend n Wass aɣelnaw n umeɛḍur. D acu, tura akka ulac, ur d-yelli kra deg unnar, amzun akken tesbek tddukkla. «Aya i d-iḍerrun d ayen i d-yekkan nnig tezmert-nneɣ. Taggara-a, xussen cwiṭ yifassen, uqan yilemẓiyen ara ikemmlen aqeddic. Maca neḍmeɛ ad neg anejmuɛ ad as-nɛiweḍ asbedd i tnarit n tddukkla s yiɛeggalen d imaynuten », i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n uɛeggal n tdukkla “Idles”.
  M. K. 

  
 Mbeɛd mi tettwazgel tezrigt n yilindi, imi ur tettwaxdam ara, yuɣal-d sser taddart n Lemṣella, imi i d astuɣal tmeɣra-s n tbexsisin i dttheggin yal aseggas. Yewweḍ-d lawan n tezrigt tis 12 n tmeɣra-a, kullec yettwahegga deg taddart n Lemṣella i usterḥeb s yinebgawen-is n lɛez d lḥerma. Acḥal-a, segmi yebda uheggi-ines sɣur yiɛeggalen n Tddukkla “Tiɣilt” n taddart-agi n Lemṣella, i wakken ad ssiwḍen ad suddsen tazrigt tis mrawet d snat (12) n tmeɣra n tbexsisn. 

 Ad tili tmeɣra-agi di tezrigt-is tamaynut, ussan n 29 akked 30 ɣuct 2019, ddima deg taddart-agi n Lemṣella, yettwassnen mliḥ s tneqlin. Ahil n tezrigt-a tis 12, ad yili d anesbaɣur, am tid-nni iɛeddan ama si tama n yirmad idelsanen ama si tama n temsikniyin. Aṭas n yimsikniyen ara yilin di ttiɛad, gar-asen wid n tqendurt, wid n usɣar, wid n tamemt…atg, ara d-yerzun si tuddar-nniḍen ɣer tama n wat taddart-agi, ara d-iseknen leṣnaf n tbexsisin yemxalafen. Mbeɛd tullya tunṣibt ara d yilin ass n lexmis ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, ad tebdu temsizzelt n wunuɣ ara yilin di yal azniq n taddart. 

 Tin ɣur-s, d asarag akked uskasi ɣef yibaɣuren n lɣella-a, syin akkin, ad fken tagnit i uskan n zzwaǧ aqbur n yimaziɣen akked ccna sɣur tarbaɛt n taddart. Ma ɣer yiḍ, ad tili tmeɣra n ccna akked waṭas n leqdicat-nniḍen idelsanen. Ad ikemmel wahil azekka-in n lǧemɛa, s temsikniyin, s tegnit n ccdeḥ aqbayli, asihar n useḥḥar. Asenɛet n wansay anẓar, afran n tfelwit n teklut igerrzen deg temsizzelt-nni n wunuɣ. Am wakken daɣen, ara d-tili temsizzelt n ccna i yilmeẓyen, ad isali leqdic-agi s tmeɣra n taggara. Di taggara, ad d-nini belli leqdic adelsan, ad yettwasuddes sɣur ddeqs n yidisan, ad d-nebder gar-asen; Tiddukkla tadelsant Tiɣilt n taddart n Lemṣella akked teseqqamut n taddart-agi d waṭas n yidisan-nniḍen.
  Adaoun Ghani  

  
 Yella yakan d aneɣmas deg La Dépêche de kabylie syin yuɣal ɣer uɣmis n Le Dauphiné Libéré. Deg tdiwennit-a, yemmeslay-d ɣef tmedyazt akked tira s umata.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Amek tebdid tira ? 

  Mohamed Aouine  : Bdiɣ tira asmi lemdeɣ tira. Di tazwara, d iḍrisen i ttaruɣ, ur d-ttefɣen ara akken ad ten ɣren yimdanen. Imir-nni, ttaruɣ kan i tedfi (plaisir) akked usuzer d yimeddukkal-iw. Ttaruɣ akken ad d-iniɣ ayen i bɣiɣ. Syin, yettnerni uɣanib yal tikkelt mi ara d-aruɣ kra. Akken, daɣen, yettnerni i lmend n tɣuri, imi win ur neqqar ara idlisen, ur yezmir ara ad yaru kra, ur yezmir ara ad yessefti tikta-s. Ilaq ad nili daɣen d wid yettnadin di yal taɣawsa. Di tazwara, bdiɣt s yiḍrisen, syin akkin uɣaleɣ ɣer yisefra, tullisin, d ungalen akked wayen i d-ttaruɣ deg yiɣmisen .

  Mmeslay-aɣ-d ɣef wungal-ik « Le someil d’amour  » i turiḍ asmi tesɛiḍ 18 n yiseggasen kan  

 Ungal-agi, zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ d ungal n ulmad, imi deg-s i d-ḥefḍeɣ aṭas n tɣawsiwin i yeɛnan tira. Uriɣ-d deg-s ɣef umezruy n taddart-iw. Kra kan n yimeddukkal-iw i t-yeɣran di lweqt-nni, imi ur d-yeffiɣ ara. Uqbel ungal-a, tella daɣen tesɣunt i d-nexdem nekk akked yimeddukkal-iw s ufus n tallelt n uselmad-nneɣ n tutlayt n teɛrebt iwumi ara d-arreɣ tajmilt. Seg-s i d-tecɛel teftilt-nni n tira. Ihi, tagi d yiwet n tesɣun anda i d-nejmeɛ ayen i xeddment tulawin tiqbayliyin ama d timucuha, inzan, ccnawi neɣ isefra. Akken neɛreḍ, daɣen, ad nesuneɣ izamulen i d-qqarent war ma neṭṭqent-d. Maca axedim-agi, iɛedda kan akka imi ur d-yeffiɣ ara .

  Txeddmeḍ daɣen taklut…  

 ih , sekneɣ-d tifelwin i xedmeɣ snat n tikkal dagi di tmurt n Fransa. Meɛna, akka tura, ḥebseɣ taklut akken ad ffkeɣ uk akud-iw i tira. Yiwen wass ahat ad uɣaleɣ ɣur-s.

  Anda i tettafeḍ iman-ik   deg yisefra neɣ deg tira   n wungalen?  

 ttaruɣ ungalen akked tullisin akken kan ad sɛeddiɣ tamedyazt. Tamedyazt, tesɛa amḍiq meqqren deg tudert-iw , sekcameɣ-tt di kullec : di tira-w , di tudert-iw n yal ass. Amzun uɣaleɣ d ameɣnas n tmedyazt: ttaɛraḍeɣ ad suzreɣ tayri n tmedyazt gar wid i yi-d yezzin. Tamedyazt, mačči kan d awalen ara nessemlil. Tamedyazt, ilaq ad tili d lemri n umdan amek ara yessebgen iman-is deg umaḍal. Ilaq ad tidir akked wiyad. Am wakken i ilaq ad tidir deg umdyaz akken i d-yeqqar Georges Peros.

  Mmeslay-aɣ-d ɣef wammud n yisefra « Amen sans croire » 

 Amen sans croire, yeffeɣ-d deg Uxxam n useẓreg Brumerge dagi di tmurt n Fransa deg cutember 2016 . Tazwert, yexdem-as-tt-id umedyaz d ufeylasuf arumi François-Marie Périer. Mbaɛd ammud n Amen sans croire, yeffeɣ-d wammud-nniḍen iwumi semmaɣ « Ephémères  » deg unbir 2017 ɣer yiwen n uxxam n useẓreg .

  Amek tettwaliḍ tasekla n teqbaylit di tmurt n lɣerba  

 Aql-in tura deg 12 n yiseggasen di tmurt n lɣerba. Tidet kan, ur zmireɣ ara ad d-ffkeɣ rray-iw deg wayen yeɛnan anect-a, imi ur sɛiɣ isallen i ilaqen, maca, ɣef wayen i walaɣ, ad d-iniɣ aql-aɣ deg ubrid n sswab. Ayen yelhan ɣur-neɣ d akken tamedyazt, tufa-d irebbi anda ara tennerni. Meɛna di berra n tmurt, yewɛer mliḥ akken ad tafeḍ imeɣriyen. Dagi, d ungalen i ileḥun s waṭas. Ad d-iniɣ, ma yella mazal imedyazen anect-a, ad yuɣal ɣer wid i d asen-yettaken tameẓẓuɣt, imi amedyaz ur yezmir ara ad yili i yiman-is.

  Ahat ad txedmeḍ tasuqilt ɣer teqbaylit i wayen tettaruḍ?  

 Nekk ur zmireɣ ara ad tt-xedmeɣ, acku mi ttaruɣ s teqbaylit ur xeddmeɣ ara tasuqilt ɣer trumit. Akka dɣa ula ɣer teqbaylit. Meɛna, bɣiɣ ad waliɣ yettwasuqel wayen ttaruɣ ɣer tutlayt-iw. Llan kra n yiḍrisen-iw i d-yessuqel Mass Rezki Rabia ɣer tutlayt-iw tayemmat, ttwaliɣ-ten cebḥen ugar mi ten-uriɣ s trumit. Ahat yiwen wass, iḍrisen-iw ad ttwasuqlen ɣer tagi-nneɣ.

  D acu-ten wuguren i d-ttafem kunwi s yimyura? 

 Uguren llan. Yal yiwen d acu i t-ixuṣṣen. Kra, yewɛer fell-asen akken ad d-afen win ara asen-d-yesiẓrgen axeddim-nsen, wiyaḍ, ttafen-d iman-is war imeɣriyen. Ulac wid ara asen-yeffken afud akken ad kemmlen deg tira. Acu kan, ɣur-i ayen yugaren akk aya, d mi ara txuṣ tlelli deg tira , mi ara ilint tlisa i wayen i d-yeqqar umyaru. D wagi i d aɛewwiq meqqren ara yesfeclen amyaru.

  Yella kra id ttheggiḍ akka ɣer sdat?  

 Yal tikkelt yella umaynut. Aql-in la sewjadeɣ ungal. Tikkelt-a, yezmer ad yeffeɣ di tmurt n Lezzayer. Akken daɣen aql-in ttaruɣ ammud n yisefra .

  Azal n ddunit ɣur-k   Xdem, seggem   Awal-ik n taggara… 

 Ssarmeɣ tamurt-nneɣ ad temmlil d yirgazen ara tt-yesnernin, imi tura ilaq ad yettwabnu yimal n tsuta ara d-ileḥḥun, imal n yilmeẓyen .

  Testaqsa-t Souhila Yamani 

  
 Am yal aseggas, deg lawan-a n yimuras n unebdu, ilmeẓyen n taddart n Yilyiten deg tɣiwant n Saharidj ttemyagaren-d i wakken ad d-heggin timliliyin n ddabex n uḍar. Ahat d ttawil i yesɛan yilmeẓyen-a i wakken ad kksen lxiq i d-yessegla lixsas meqqren deg ttawilat-nniḍen yecban timkerḍiyin neɣ ixxamen n yilmeẓyen. Ɣef waya, 12 n trebbaɛ i d-yeswejden iman-nsent ad kkint deg tmeɣra-a n waddal anda i d-mlalen ula d imeqranen deg leɛmer. Ulamma ur d-telli ara akka lemɛawna seg wanda-nniḍen, ilmeẓyen n Yilyiten gren-d deg lbal-nsen d akken d nutni ara d-yefken ttawilat ilaqen i wakken am yiseggasen yezrin taggara n tedwilt-a, ad tili d tameɣra deg taddart. D acu kan, yettuɛeggen ad yebdu wurar ass n letnayen iɛeddan, maca imi i d-tella akka tmettant n yiwen n umdan, ilmeẓyen n taddart beddlen ass i wakken ad fken tagnit i twacult n win yemmuten ad ilin deg ttiɛad i temlilit tamezwarut, rnu d nutni ara d-yesneddhen i beddu n wurar. D ayen yeḍran dɣa ass n larebɛa yezrin tameddit n wass. Am wakken i aɣ-d-xebbren wid i d-yeswejden timliliyin-a d akken d tid ara yilin d tajmilt i umdan tewwi tmettant deg lawan-a dɣa. Iwulem ad d-nesmekti d akken ugar n 20 n yiseggasen-aya, yal anebdu ttilint-d akka timliliyin deg taddart, rnu ttɛeddint deg tegnatin n zhu d lferḥ, ur d-yelli cwal ama gar yimyuraren neɣ imferǧen. Tezga taggara n tedwilt d tameɣra !

  M. Smail 

  
 Ass n 25 yunyu 1998, d azemz i iresxen i lebda deg uqerruy n yal azwaw. Ass-nni, mi d-yuɣal Lwennas Meɛtub seg yiwen n usečču di Tizi Uzzu, ɛewwlen kra n yimcumen ad as-d-sɣimen di Tala Bunan.

 Wwten-t s wacḥal d tarsast, armi i t-nɣan. Seg wass-nni, neḥsa kan d imesbaṭliyen i t-yenɣan, maca d anwa-ten? Ur iban ar tura. D acu, mazal tidet n tmenɣiwt n unaẓur Lwennas Meɛtub, ass-nni n lexmis, tettezzi akka d wakka deg yigenwan n yidurar. Mazal anza-s i d-ilulen ass-nni di terga, akken i t-id-yenna, yessawal-aɣ-d seg yal tama. Yefren uɣewwaɣ ad yeɣli d argaz ilelli, ad yemmet ɣef tektiwin-is, wala ad yedder war amenzay neɣ s uzaglu ɣef yiri. Ur tban tidet ɣef tmettant-is, maca tettbin-d akken-nniḍen. Ma yella tettbin-d d anza-s i aɣ-tt-id-yesbanen, d awalen-is i aɣ-d-yemlan. Neẓra d anwi-ten yiɛdawen-is, neẓra d anwi i t-iɛuffen, neẓra d acu i aɣ-d-yecna. Deg tidet, asmi ɣilen nɣan-t, ass-nni i t-id-slulen. Imi seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ, yettaweɣ ugar deg tudert, deg wulawen, deg tmura. Acḥal dɣa i irezzun fell-as yal aseggas ɣer Tewrirt Musa anda yesteɛfa, acḥal ara yerzun fell-as ass-a, deg-s ad as-inin aql-aɣ deg ubrid-ik, deg-s ad ttrun akked Nna Ɛeljiya imeṭṭi n usmekti n tixsi i nɣan yidammen-is. Kra n win yerzan fell-as deg uẓekka-s, yewwi-d yid-s ameslay abaṭniw. Seg wakken meqqer uḥulfu, yal yiwen yettḥulfu s wayeḍ, yal yiwen isell i wayeḍ. Mi nwala i uwitay (calendrier), nufa ziɣ 20 n yiseggasen i yezrin ɣef tmenɣiwt-is, maca ɣur-neɣ ad as-tiniḍ d 20 n wussan. Leɣrur n wakud d tatut akk i yettrebbi deg wallaɣen, ur sɛin amkan tama n wanza n Lwennas Meɛtub. Daymi mazal ad yedder d tisuta umdan-a igerrzen. Ass-a, ula d agrud i d-ilulen ass mi yettwaɣḍel, yettḥulfu yessen-it, yeẓra-t, imi ur yeǧǧi ayen ur d-yenni s tezlatin-is. Kkes-d amek ur yessaki, ur iwessa neɣ ur iwanes. Ur nezmir ad d-nini ma ahat Lwennas Meɛtub yumer deg uẓekka-s s cwiṭ i d-nḥella, neɣ yeḥzen s zzhir akk i d-ileḥqen ifetti deg yal tamnaḍt. Neẓra kan iwessa-aɣ ɣef uzbu (résistance), aql-aɣ nzebbu.

  M. K. 

  
 Zrin 59 n yiseggasen ɣef tmenɣiwt n Amirouche akked Si Haoues deg udrar Thameur tama n Bousâada. Bdan tikli ɣer Tunes ass n 6 deg meɣres 1959 i wakken ad mlilen CNRA, ddan yid-sen azal n 40 n yimjuhad.

 Ffɣen tamurt n leqbayel s unẓul, gar Djelfa akked Bousâada. Acu kan, ɣef wakken i d-nnan, yeffeɣ lexbar n ubrid ara wwin ; yewweḍ ɣer yiserdasen d yimḍebbren n Fransa. Kra qqaren fehmen yiserdasen n Fransa asalli seg ttawilat n usiweḍ, wiyaḍ nnan-d yewweḍ-iten lexbar srid. Ihi, imi yesla lkulunel Ducasse s yisalli-agi, yundi-asen taxezzabit gar udra n Thameur akked udrar Djininibia i ibeɛden s wazal n 75 n yikilumitren ɣef temdint n Bousâada. Yeḍra ubaxix din imi mmuten Amirouche, Si Haoues akked 35 n yimjuhad u ttwaṭṭfen 5 deg-s. Mebɛed timenɣiwt n Amirouche akked Si Haoues, yewweḍ isalli seg Lezzayer tamaneɣt ɣer din i wakken ad ten-meḍlen s tuffra deg lkazirna n Ain El Melh. Teqqim tedyant d tuffirt armi d ass n 7 deg duǧember 1962, mi yebɣa yiwen Urumi Jean-Louis Gallet ad d-yeḍleq i sser ɣef temḍelt n sin-agi n yimjuhad. Acu kan yecreḍ idrimen. D Zouaïma i ixebbren Boumediene akked Abdelkader Chabou s tedyant-agi. Syin, ceyyɛen yineggura-gi, Cherif Mahdi d Abdelmadjid i wakken ad walin Arumi-nni. D nutni, diɣ, i yettwakelfen i wakken ad d-skeflen iẓekwan n Amirouche akked Si Haoues seg Bousaâda. Seg yimir, qqiment tfikkiwin-nsent d tuffirin deg lkazirna n yiǧadarmiyen deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt armi d ass n 24 deg tuber 1984 i asen-d-yuɣal ccan u ttwameḍlen deg tmeqber n Lɛelya. D aselway Chadli i d-yeskeflen tadyant mebɛed mi inuda mmi-s n Amirouche ɣef yiɣsan n Baba-s. Ɣef uqerru n taluft-a, ad naf tlata n yimḍebbren : Houari Boumdiene, Abdelkader Chabou akked Ahmed Bencherif.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Brahim Brahimi d yiwen uneɣmas muciɛen deg tɣamsa tilellit tazzayrit, yesɛa aṭas n igerdasen seg uselmed n tɣamsa deg Lezzayer, seg uselmed n tɣamsa n tmurt n Fransa. Ɣur-s sin yigerdasen iɛlayanen (doctorat) deg tussniwin n yisallen d tussniwin n tsertit, yemsennad (soutenu) deg tesdawit n Paris II. Brahim Brahimi, yesersel deg wagur n tuber 2009 Aɣerbaz aɣelnaw aɛlayen n tɣamsa d tussniwin n n yisallen (ENSJSI), anda yella d anemhal, yesselḥay armi yeffeɣ ɣer testaɣt (retraite) deg useggas n 2013. Lexber n lmut n Brahim Brahimi i d-yellan deg ssebt iɛeddan, 22 deg waggur n cutember, i yesɛan 72 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, yegla-d s leḥzen meqqren deg twacult n tɣamsa tazzayrit akked ttawilat n yisallen n tmurt. Aneɣmas-a, d yiwen n umdan yettwassnen, i ḥemmlen ama d inaɣmasen i iḍallen deg leɛmer, i ixeddmen deg tɣamsa, iwumi yefka afud meqqren s tasḍilin i ixeddem ɣaf tɣamsa tazzayrit, ama d ineɣmasen ilmeẓyen ixeddmen deg tɣamsa i d-yesfaydin seg tirmitin d tsegmisent n umussnaw. Deg tudert-is, yefka-d aṭas n wafud i usnugmu n tɣamsa tilellit, anda i ittekka d waṭas n yiɣmisen n tɣamsa tusligt (privée), i as-d-yeldin isebtar-nsen i tira deg yeḥricen n tudert, ladɣa deg tussniwin n tmetti d talsa. Deg yiɣmisen ilelliyen neɣ deg ttawilat n yisallen, Brahim Brahimi, yella dima i lmendad i usnerni n tmussniwin. Dɣa deg uɣmis El Wattan, yessuddes-d aṭas n timsirin ɣer yidi-s n umussnaw Belkacem Mostefaoui d Belkacem Ahcene Djabellah, i lfayda n yineɣmasen n uɣmis-agi. Deg umahil-is n timadin, Brahim Brahim, yura aṭas n yidlisen s tutlayt n tefransist, gar-asen ‘’ Le pouvoir, la presse et les intellectuels en Algérie (1989)’’, ‘’ Le pouvoir, la presse et les droit de l’homme (1998) ‘’, ‘’ Le droit à l’information à l’épreuve du parti unique (2002)’’.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Annar n tira n tmeṭṭut taqbaylit yebda yettaɣ. Mbaɛd imi i d-yeffeɣ wammud n tullisin-is amezwaru deg useggas n 2005 iumi tefka azwel “ Tawenza” anda i llant 10 n tullisin, a-t-an, ass-a, yerna-d wammud-is wis-sin. Tagi d Massa Qeddac Dalila. D yiwet n tmarut i yiselmaden tamaziɣt deg uɣerbaz alemmas. Ammud-a i d-tessufeɣ temyarut deg wussan iɛeddan, tsemma-as “Tafat taderɣalt”. Yeffeɣ-d ɣer teẓrigin El Amel. Deg tullisin-a, tewwi-d Massa Qeddac aṭas n yisental, teɛreɛḍ akken ad tennal merra ayen i d-yettilin deg tmetti. Ad nader gar yisental-a, Tamɣart d teslit-is, Tirga mxalfa, Ttufarasen yimawlan, Tadyant n tefsut, Tazeqqa n setti akked Yir tamuɣli . Mi ara walin yimeɣriyen azwel ‘’Tafat tadeɣalt’’, yal yiwen amek ara d-yessegzi anamek-is. Nesteqsa tamarut ɣef wamek i d-textar azwel akked unamek-is, a-t-an d acu i d-tenna: ‘’ Tamezwarut imi tella tullist iwumi semmaɣ akka. Di tulist-a, tella yiwet n tlemẓit iwumi teḍra tedyant anda tedderɣel ɣef tidet i as-yenḍen. Tessenz tigẓelt-is, tefka idrimen i uxḍib-is. Ɣer taggara, yexdeε-itt. Tis snat, ɣef tugna-nni n udlis, imi d tazeqqa-nni ideg tella tudert, tezga teftilt-is tecεel. Ass-a, ǧǧan-tt yimawlan-is , yeɣli-d deg-s ṭṭlam. Ad d-nesmekti, deg taggara, d akken Massa Qeddac la d-tessewjad yiwen wungal ara d-yeffɣen deg wussan i d-iteddun. Tlul Massa Deddac ass n 09 deg furar 1978. Tewwi-d akayad n BAC deg tdamsa, syin teɣra deg ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ di tesdawit n Mulud A t Mɛemmer armi d aseggas n 2002 anda i d-tewwi turagt lisens. A-tt-an, akka tura, d taselmadt n tmaziɣt deg uswir alemmas.

  Souhila Yamani 

  
 Thegga-d Tenmehla n yidles akked Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu, yiwen wahil d anesbaɣur, ad yeddu ɣef teɣzi n ddurt. Imi yebda yakkan ass-nni n lexmis 30 deg unbir 2017, ad yessali ass n ssebt 07 deg duǧamber 2017. D ahil adelsan ara d-yilin deg Uxxam n yidles n Tizi Uzzu akked Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan n lwilaya.

  Ahil n uxxam n yidles 

 Ahil yerzan Axxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri, yella-d akka: ass-nni n lexmis 30 deg waggur-nni n unbir yezrin, yemwatan akked usfugel wass n Lmulud. Dɣa deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin, llant-d kra n temsikniyin yerzan idlisen n ddin, arraten (manuscrits) n zzawiyat akked useddu n tineslemt n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Yella-d daɣen ucɛal n tcemmuɛin akked tuqqna n lḥenni. Ma deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun, yella-d usarag ɣef wazal n Lmulud, sɣur unemhal amatu n uɣlif n lecɣal n ddin mass Hocine Hamiche akked ccix Said Klouaz. D asarag i yeḥder uneɣlaf n lmur n ddin akked lwali n Tizi Uzzu, syin ɣer-s, yella-d ufraq n udlis n usefhem n yinumak n leqran s tmaziɣt. Ma deg tmeddit n wass, tella-d tegnit n ccna n ṣṣenf n ddin sɣur terbaɛt “Et aqwa” n Draa Ben Khedda, adekkar sɣur lexwan n Ath Yahia akked wid n Ath Said. Ma ɣer taggara, tella-d tɣuri n yisefra n ddin sɣur kra n yimedyazen n lwilaya. Ma deg wass-nni n ssebt 02 deg waggur-agi n duǧamber 2017, yella-d deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun, ɣef 09h30 d asawen, wass n usḥbiber d useɛlem ɣef waṭṭan “cancer”, i d-yellan s usentel-agi: “Cancer et alimentation”, i d-thegga tiddukkla “El Fedjr” n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ma deg tzeqqa tameqqrant n uxxam n yidles, seg 10h00 d afella, xedmen timsikent ɣef wass agraɣlan i uḥareb mgal aṭṭan n Sida, i d-thegga tiddukkla Idles n Tmurt n Tizi Uzzu, ma ɣef 13h30 n uzal, yella-d usarag sɣur ddeqs n yimejjayen n waṭṭan seg sbiṭer Nadir Mohammed. Ma d sendiḍelli n lḥed, 03 deg waggur-agi n duǧamber 2017, yella-d deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun, ɣef 09h00 d asawen, wass n useḥbiber d useɛlem ɣef waṭṭan Sida, i d-thegga Tenmehla n tedwest tazayezt n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ma deg tzeqqa tameqqrant n uxxam n yidles, seg 10h00 d afella, smektan-d ass amaḍlan n yimdanen imeɛḍar, i d-tḥegga Tenmehla n Tigawt Timettit (D.A.S) n Tizi Uzzu.

  Ahil n uxxam n umezgun 

 Ma d axxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, ad yili deg ttiɛad ula d netta, imi ad d-ilin deg-s wussan n umezgun wis 9 ara d-yilin d tajmilt i Muḥend u Yeḥya. D tazrigt tis rrebɛa n warraz n Muḥya i wureɣ n uḍris n umezgun ifazzen s tmaziɣt, ad d-ilin aseggas-agi ass n larebɛa 6 deg waggur-agi n duğamber 2017, akked uzekka-in n lexmis. Ad d-tili timsizzelt-agi deg tezrigt-is tis ukkuẓ n tmezgunt Muḥya n wureɣ i yuran s tmaziɣt deg uxxam n umezgun, dɣa ass n amhad i d-iteddun, ara d-banen yigemmaḍ n temsizzelt-agi, ad d-banen wid ara yawin tlata n warrazen imenza n useggas-agi.

  A. A. 

  
 Seg yizerfan imezwura i sεan warrac, d win n tɣuri. Meεna, ma nemmeslay-d ɣef uzref-agi, ilaq ad d-nesseddu daɣen ayen i as-ilaqen neɣ ayen i t-yettabaεen. Asaḍuf n tɣuri yeqqar-d: ‘’Yal aqcic yesεa azref ad iɣeṛ, yerna di tegnatin yelhan, am umḍiq iwulmen, lmakla ilaqen, akked tɣellist ( sécurité )’’. Acu kan, ur yelli wanect-agi deg uɣerbaz amenzu Ḥakem Laεyaci deg Ifra, di tɣiwant n Xerrata, ladɣa ayen icudden ɣer tɣellist. Imi leḥyud-is ceqqen, yerna seg teswiεt ɣer tayeḍ, zemren ad d-ɣlin. Ibabaten n warrac, ikcem-iten lḥir d tugdi ɣef tudert n warraw-nsen. Ladɣa imi d ccetwa i d-iteddun. «Amek ara ceggεeɣ mmi s ufus-iw ɣer yimi n tlafsa? ulac laman, yezmer ad d-yegrireb uɣerbaz-a ɣef warrac-nneɣ, yerna leḥyuḍ-is ur ttqabalen ara aṣemmiḍ». I d-yenna yiwen n ubabat. Ma yella d imeẓdaɣ n temnaḍt-agi nnan-d d akken aɣbel ur yelli ara d amaynut. Ɣef usentel-a, yerna-d yiwen: « Neεya deg ucekti, yiwen ur d-yesli i taɣuct-nneɣ. Akken nexdem neεweq: ma yella neṭṭef lwacul-nneɣ, ad asen-truḥ leqraya; ma yella nceyyeε-iten d amahi fell-asen ». Ma yella d aselway n tɣiwant yerra-asen, akken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ: «Tamsalt-agi ɣur-s mraw n yiseggasen. Deg useggas n 2018, aselway aqbuṛ n tɣiwant n Xerrata yessaweḍ aɣbel-agi ama i uselway n twilayt, ama i unemhal n usegmi n Bgayet. Lwali, yefka-asen-d awal belli ad yedhu deg-s deg useggas i d-iteddun 2019. Yerna iceyyeε-d wid i iwalan liḥala deg wacu yella uɣerbaz-agi ass n 26 ɣuct yezrin». Seld isalli-a, theddnen yimezdaɣ n taddart i yellan ttidiren di tteqlaq ameqqran.

  K. K. 

  
 Aql-it akka tura gar 5 n yimuraren akk ifazzen n ccatranj deg umaḍal. Ilul MVL deg temnaḍt n Ile-de-France deg Fransa, aseggas n 1990. Ulamma yeḥres cwiṭ wakud-is imi yezga yettinig, yeqbel Maksim ad d-yerr i kra n yisteqsiyen-nneɣ deg tdiwennit-a ɣef waddal d wurar n ccatranj!

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Seld arraz n Saint-Louis d umḍiq wis 2 deg Grand Chess Tour, ur telhi fell-ak taggara n useggas-a 2017 a Maksim. Awal ɣer waya?  

  Maksim Vacyi-Lagrav:  Ih, d tidet, maca s ujemmal, 2017 yella i nekk d aseggas afessas. Llant-d tɣawsiwin yelhan maḍi, am tid i d-tbedreḍ, maca yella daɣen umḍiq wis sin i ṭṭfeɣ deg usismel amaḍalan (classement mondial) deg teɣzi n kra n wayyuren. D asḥissef, imi iswi ameqqran n uɛeddi ɣer Tberza n Yimazwaren ( Tournoi des Candidats) ur yettwaweḍ ; iban d akken yusa-d waya ad yessenquqel tacrawt taneggarut n useggas…

  Mazal-ik akken yebɣu yili gar 5 n yimuraren ifazzen deg umaḍal. Aya yesheddin dɣa?  

 Yettban-iyi-d ssekneɣ-d s wudem yesfan d akken tura dayen aql-i gar yimuraren ifazzen n tedɣert i izemren ad sirmen ad qqimen deg umeqyas-a umdil. Dɣa ihi, aql-i qeɛɛdeɣ iman-iw deg tebdart n 5 ifazzen, ssarameɣ ad d-ḥelliɣ aneggez amaynut deg 2018.

  Ma yewwi-d fell-ak ad terreḍ i usteqsi isehlen n ubujad, ara ak-d-yinin: a Maksim amek zemreɣ ad rennuɣ tiram, ad aẓeɣ ɣer sdat deg ccatranj? Amek ara tili tririt-ik?  

 Ur ilaq ara ad nugad ad nurar, dima ma yella wamek. Nezmer daɣen ad nezrew urar, niḥqa, yelha kullec skud nesɛedday akud sdat tfelwit. Daɣen, ur ilaq ara ad nekukru, ad neɛreḍ iman-nneɣ i turart akked walbaɛḍ yeqwan fell-aɣ.

  Ɣef tmuɣli-k, nezmer ad   d-nuɣal d Akerwa (Maitre) ameqqran, nekni neggar-d aɣrum anda-nniḍen. Yettusemma war ma nefka   akk akud-nneɣ i ccatranj?  

 Ih niḥqa nezmer. Llan yimedyaten n medden i yessawḍen i waya, d acu kan d tidet ad qqimen drus-it maḍi. Llan daɣen yisadaren i d-yettuɣalen d ikerwaten imeqqranen, maca leḥqen deg tqacuct n wayen iwumi zemren, ur yili wamek ara rnun, ad alin ugar. Wi, zemren ad sɛun lebɣi ad bedlen lḥirfa, meɛna ad ṭṭfen azwel-nsen i lebda akken yebɣu yili.

  Mbeɛd tibawt deg Tberza n Yimazwaren ara yemmaggen deg kra n wayyuren, d acu-ten yisenfaren-ik i useggas-a   amaynut n 2018? 

 Ad yili d tidet 2018 d aseggas yemgarad, ulamma ad d-ilint deg-s kra n temsizzlin tixatarin, am le Grand Chess Tour d les Olympiads. Iswi-w, d asken n wudem yelhan deg temsizzlin-a, agerrez n usismel-iw amaḍalan cwiṭ, d uwenneɛ n wurar-iw ugar, akken ad iliɣ heggiɣ i tallit tamaynut n telɣuɣa n umaḍal deg 2019.

  Tanemmirt mi tqebleḍ ad d-temmeslayeḍ i yimeɣriyen n uɣmis-nneɣ azwaw. Awal n taggara i warrac i yettmennin ad d-uɣalen d « Maksim » ɣer sdat… 

 Tazwara maḍi, sbennet tadfi deg turart n ccatranj, zerɛet lebɣi i waddal-a igerrzen… D ayen i yesɛan azal.

  Yesteqsa-t Mhenni Khalifi 

  
 Yerna ussan-a kan iɛeddan umḍan n yidlisen n temkarḍit taqbaylit, s tlalit n wungal wis sin n umaru-amedyaz Mhenni Xalifi. Ungal-a amaynut iwumi yettunefk uzwel « IMEHBAL » d adlis wis ukuẓ n Mhenni Xalifi i d-yessufɣen yakan kraḍ n yidlisen uqbel-is: « Nnehda n uḥulfu », ammud n yisefra, i d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2013 s tallelt n Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad, « Asdawan », ungal-ines amezwaru i d-yessaẓreg di 2014, akked « Nna Geltum », ammud n tullisin i d-yeffɣen deg 2016. Yessekles daɣ aḍebsi n ccna « Tifrat », deg 2015. Dɣa seld asnerni n tekti d kra n wakud i d-yettewten deg leqdic d uraju, yuɣal-d umeskar, mmi-s n temnaḍt n Ayt Smaɛel, s usufeɣ n wungal-nniḍen ɣur teẓrigin Ccix Muḥend Ulḥusin. Isalli-a, yessekcem tumert deg wulawen n kra n win iḥemmlen tutlayt n Mulud At Mɛemmer, ama d imura, imedyazen, iselmaden d yakk imeɣnasen d tarwa n lasel, i yeṭṭafaren, ttganin ajdid ara yefken ugar n wazal i wayen yerzan merra taqbaylit, ama d tasekla neɣ d kra-nniḍen. War ma nettu d akken aṭas seg-sen i yellan d imeɣriyen imekdiyen n tutlayt-nsen tayemmat, i iḥemmlen ad wansen tirawt talatinit swayes ccɣabayen allaɣen, ssifsusayen ula d iqerra. Ungal « IMEHBAL », deg-s ugar n 285 n yisebtar, ttwabḍan d iḥricen i d-iḥekkun ɣef kra n temsal d tlufa yemgaraden ara yaf yimeɣri deg teɣzi-s. Deg tenfust, yella wayen i d-yeddan ɣef tmetti, neɣ ɣef tussna n tmetti, d wamek yezmer ad yennerni yir axemmem armi yuɣal d ugur, d aɣilif ameqqran. Deg-s daɣen, gar cwiṭ d waṭas, ajbad n ddhen d wallaɣ ɣer kra seg tfelseft n ddunit d tmussniwin i d-yettilin deg tudert n yal ass. Gar sin n yisenfan n tira, yeɛreḍ umeskar, ad yessemlil aqbur d umaynut, ad yeg assaɣ ijehden gar ṭṭbiɛat yemgaraden n yiwudan d tmeẓla n umalas. Aya, ad t-yaf yimeɣri seg yisebtar imezwura mi ara yebdu yettifrir-d wungal, yettban-d ugama n wuguren d yiswi-s, armi d isebtar ineggura ideg ara d-tbin tafat ɣef waṭas n yisental d tɣawsiwin. « Deg wungal-a, i uriɣ iseggasen-a iɛeddan, ɛerḍeɣ s tirawt ad d-ddmeɣ tisit, ad tt-sekneɣ i tmetti akken ad twali iman-is deg-s. Am wakken rriɣ-t d izen, s wudem n teqsiḍt, wissen ahat ad yili useggem n waṭas n tɣawsiwin n tudert sɣur wid terza taluft ». I aɣ-d-yenna umeskar n wungal-a, Mass Mhenni Xalifi. Ad d-nesmekti d akken tzemrem ad tafem ungal-a ussan-a n sdat-neɣ deg tuget n tnedlisin.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
  Acḥal n wid yettwaɣedren, teḥweṣ-iten lmut, lmut i ssidiren yiɛdawen n tudert d wid iɣunzan tilelli d cbaḥa n tmeṭṭut. Ttwanɣan imi usmen, ḥemmlen tutlayt-nsen akked tayri i fkan i tmurt-nsen. Nwan ma nɣan-ten, ad tent-quccen seg yiẓuran. Ziɣen ɣas gezmen-asen ilsawen-nsen, di taggara, yefti wawal-nsen ! Γas ma nesḥassef di rrwaḥ-is, maca netta yezmer, yebna ɣef wannect-a, d win yessawḍen ɣer taggara-s wayen iga d wayen i d-yenna. Amek i nezmer ad d-nebder Maɛtub Lwennas ma ur nerri azal i wawal-is d lmut icudden ɣur-s, ma ur nerri lwelha ɣer tmenna-ines d tlelli n umeslay i d-yesɣersen seg wass i meẓẓi ? Tudert-is, ahat wezzilet ma nessakked akud i iɛac, maca yewwi-d deg-s abrid ɣezzifen, s yiles i d-iga asurif. Ibudd-it i wiyaḍ akken ad gen amḍiq di ddunit. Yessaɣ taftilt-is deg umaḍal, yeǧǧa-d izen i talsa.

  Yerẓa leqyud  
 Yesseḥbaber ɣef yidles, inuda ɣef yiseɣ d laṣel, yennuɣ ɣef tugdut d yizerfan d wayen akk yettarran amdan d amdan. Ur yugad kra n wayen i d-yemmugger, iqubel yal tagnit s yimeslayen, yugi ad yessusem, yerẓa leqyud, akken yedder i yemmut s tmenna-ines. Tudert d lmut-is ur mgaradent ara, kkant-d sya-agi, bnant ɣef tikti d wawal d umennuɣ i t-yessawḍen s igenni. Maɛtub, seg wid i d-yetteldin allen. Γas ulamma ḥarcawet teswiɛt, ɣas ugarent-aɣ temsal n ddunit, xas ɣezzifit, maca tessidir-aɣ. Yedder-itt am yimdanen meṛṛa, netta seg wid yettruẓun asalu, seg wid izerrɛen asirem s wawal, yenǧer yis-s iberdan i ɣef tedda tsuta. Seg wid yugin lmut i tmetti i d-heggan yiṣeggaden n tmussni ; netta gar yiɛeggalen n twacult yettaẓen ɣer sdat, yella seg wid yessawalen i tudert d tumert d wayen akk i aɣ-d-irennun azal d tezmert. Yella neɣ ulac-it, nekni yis-s i nella, nettidir s wayen i d-yenna. Iqubel lmut s yidmaren-is, yumen s tektiwin-is. Am Maɛtub, ahat ur ṭṭuqqten ara ! Am netta acḥal n win yemmuten d wid yettwanfan imi i ten-id-yuli wawal. Yesḥassef seg wayen iwala, imi ɣer daxel ur yettarra, yeqqar-d ayen yettḥulfu. Iḥebber i taggara-nneɣ yettu tin-ines, yugi ẓẓur d lbaṭel, isebbel tarwiḥt-is… D ameɣras n tmagit ! Idles, tugdut d izerfan n umdan d annar n umennuɣ-is. Yeqqim-d deg umezruy seg wigad yugin tasusmi, yezdeɣ di ccfawat-nneɣ s wayen i d-yeǧǧa d wayen akk i d-yenna. Am wakken i d-yenna deg wawal-is : « Ass-agi lliɣ, azekka wissen.

  Xas tɣab tekka-s, mazal ṣṣut-is ad yebbeɛzeq  
 Nniɣ-d ayen zṛiɣ d wayen ttwaliɣ, cfut di targa ma ɣliɣ, d anza-w ara awen-d-yessiwlen » Γas lǧetta-s tefsi, tiktiwin-is ur mmutent ara, mazal llan wid yettidiren yis-sent ! Yeffeɣ-d wanza seg uẓekka-ines, yefka ṣṣut i yiɣsan-is. Yenhezz wakal d udrar s wayen i d-yenna, d isefra, d ccna yesuzunen ulawen d tasa n wid i tḥuza tmettant-ines ! D tudert i d-yemɣin si lmut-nni n leɣder ineqḍen tirwiḥin akken ad mḥun lateṛ d uẓar yeḍfer ugdud i d-yugmen seg yimeslayen-is. Imeslayen-is, rennun-d afud d waṭas n yifadden, ttaken abeḥri i turet, zgan-d mgal tatut, ugin ad knun i ucengu d rrehba i d-yeɣlin ɣef tmurt ɣas ulamma yeẓra tegguni-t lmut. Netta am tcemmaɛt ifettin, terɣa tudert-is akken ad nidir nekni s tafat-is. Uzzu n tmes-is d tazzla n yidamen-is i aɣ-yeswan akal ɣef i nteddu, ftint tektiwin-is deg-neɣ. Nḥemmel akk ayen i d-yettekken s ɣur-s, neṭṭafar-it imi yesɛa tabɣest, nettsennid ɣur-s, nettaf-it ɣer tama-nneɣ, nettraǧu timenna-ines akken ad nsel i yiman-nneɣ. Yis-s, nṣebber i lḥif d uɣilif, di tegnit n ddiq, tifrat ɣur-s i tt-nurǧa. Nettargu s usirem-is, nessuffuɣ tirga-nneɣ s tidak-is. Ma zik ahat nedderɣel ur nettwali, tura tafat i d-iga iziɣer-is tekka-d nnig ṭṭlam n wid yesnuzuyen iɣsan. Assa, igenni-nneɣ yeččur d itran yecbeḥ yis-sen, Lwennas d yiwen seg-sen, yezdi lqedd-is i lebda, iɣum tebrek n at wallaɣ yumesen… Imi ula d tasusmi d lmut, netta yedder s wawal d ṣṣut i mazal ad yebbaɛzeq, lebɣi-s d win-nneɣ, ad d-yeddu neɣ ad d-yendeq. Mazal-it gar-aneɣ, s ccna neɣ s tira, yuɣal-aɣ d izumal, yettarra-d i wallen tafat. Ayen i d-yenna d wayen i d-yecna di tudert-is, yeqqim-d akkin i lmut-is. Nettawi-t deg wul nettzuxxu yis-s di yal tama, tettuɣal-as tejmilt yal tikkelt, yuklal ayendin ! Yis-s ad neḥrez ayen nesɛa, ad neddu ɣer sdat. Tikli-nneɣ s yimru ara tt-naru, neɣ s yimi ara tt-id-neḥku ad tt-id-afen ineggura. Yenna-ak ‘’Idles-nneɣ d anagi’’, ihi d aẓar-is kan ara neḍfer.

  Hamza Sahoui 

  
 Tamentilt n lmut ur telli d yiwet, akken qqaren At zik ‘’tamettant s ssebba, lehwa s usegna’’. Seg tmentilin-agi, ad nebder tin n yisehwa (accidents). Ineggura-a, d igiman n yimdanen i neqqen yal ass deg yiberdan, am wid yeḍran ass n 14 di ɣuct yezrin, di tdayṛa n Xerrata. Asaru, yebda s yiwen n usehwu di tnezzayt n wass, akken i aɣ-d-wwḍen yisallen sɣur uḥeddu aɣarim ( Protection civile ), asehwu-a yeḍṛa ɣef 8:45 deg ubrib n Draε Lqayed i yeggugen s 70 n yikilumitren ɣef Bgayet, deg taddart n Tarwa n Faḍel. Ssebba-s d accaḍ n yiwet n tkerrust Peugeot 306. Taneggarut-a, llan deg-s sḍiṣ n yimdanen, kṛad deg-sen mmuten imir-n, gar-asen taqcict n ukuẓ n yiseggasen, llufan amectuḥ n 11 n wayyuren akked nanna-tsen mm 65 n yiseggasen. Ma yella d wid-nniḍen i yellan yid-sen jerḥen, yerna yiwet deg waddad ur nessefraḥ. Widak-agi, ttwawin s lεejlan ɣer sbiṭar n Xerrata. «Abrid-agi yellan gar Xerrata d Ṣtif, ur yesliḥ ara, yeččur d ṭṭurnat, yerna ur yettwaxdem ara akken ilaq». I aɣ-d-yenna yiwen umezdaɣ n Xerrata. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ɣef 14:50 deg yiwen n was, yeḍṛa-d usehwu-nniḍen, yerna deg yiwen n umdiq. D akamyun ameqqran n FAW, i inehher yiwen n urgaz n 46 n yiseggasen i d-yusan seg Ṣtif. Seld mi yesruḥ amnekni ( équilibre ), ihuza snat n tkeṛṛusin (4×4) n yijaḍarmiyen, yiwen n ufurgu n tumnayt i yellan yeḥbes akked d sin n yirgazen. Asehwu-a, yessegla-d 8 n yimejraḥ, gar-asen kṛaḍ n yijaḍarmiyen. D aya i yeǧǧan imezdaɣ n Draε lqayed ḥaren seg temsalt-agi, tekcem-iten tugdi ɣef warraw-nsen ladɣa. Γer taggara, ad nbed ɣef wawal n yiwen ilemẓi i d-yennan: «Neεya deg ucekti n yal ass. A win yufan yal yiwen ad yessugen iman-is deg umkan n yimawlan n wid yemmuten, imir-n ad yili xersum uḥader».

  K.K. 

  
 Le figuier d’or d yiwet n tfaska ara d-yilin di tmurt n Fransa di tezrigt-is tamezwarut. Ad tili deg usensu sɣur tiddukkla tadelsant Faḍma Nsumer akked Boudaoud cinéma, seg wass n 24 ar 28 tuber 2018. D timsizzelt anda zemren wid i d-yessufuɣen isura, ad tekkin. Yewwi-d kan fell-asen akken ad aznen isura-nsen ɣer tensa-agi : <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="3c5d515d46555b545a5550517c53494850535357125a4e" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a>. Ɣef waya, nemmeslay akked Mass Younes Boudaoud , netta d yiwen i d-yessufuɣen isura s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, ad nader gar-asen : ‘’Ma mère ma dit’’ s kraḍ n yiḥricen-is. ‘’Aqlaɣ nuɣal-d, ‘’Daa meqqran’’ s sin yiḥricen-is, ‘’Werdiya n 13’’ , ‘’Wecṭuṭi’’, ‘’Axxam n mmi’’ s sin yiḥricen-is , ‘’Blonde et brune’’ , ‘’Asaruf’’. Yenna-d d akken isura-is lulen-d di lḥif d ayen i t-yeǧǧan ass-a ad yexdem timsizzelt-a akken ad yefk afus n tallelt i yilmeẓyen Mass Boudaoud d yiwen gar wid id iheggan timsizzelt-agi, ha-t-an d acu i d-yenna i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen : ‘’Tafaska-agi, nexdem-it-id i wakken ad nefk afud i yilmeẓyen akken ad sbeggnen ayen i xeddmen imi nettwali ulac win i d-yerran lwelha ɣur-sen. Arraz ad yuɣal i le meilleur scénario , meilleur auteur, meilleur actrice. Ad tili tmeɣra i lmend n ufraq n warrazen. Acebbeḥ n tqaɛet ad yili akk d amaziɣ, ad ilin iselsa n yimaziɣen , ad tili terbaɛt n yiḍebbalen. Am wakken daɣen ara ilin aṭas n yinaẓuren ara d-yecnun. Ar tura, a-t-an llan 6 n yisura. Mačči kan d isura iqbayliyen, meɛna d imaziɣen imi ussan-d ula si Lmerruk. Tura, aql-aɣ nettraǧu, ad aɣ d-rrent kra n tddukkliwin lejwab ɣef utekki-nsent, ad d-adreɣ : tiddukkliwin si Maṣer,si Tunes… Ma yella d iɛeggalen n usenqed, ad naf : Mohend Amaloul ( d aneɣmas deg umaṭṭaf Pluriel ), Kaige Jean simon (d taneɣmast ), Lloyd Sigon ( réalisateur ), Ihlem Ben (cinéaste franco tunisienne ). Yerna-d ɣef waya : ‘’Ad xedmeɣ tiɣri i wid yebɣan ad tekkin di temsizzelt akken ad aɣ-d ceyyɛen izen mebla laɛḍil ( uqbel 12 Yulyu )akken ad asen nexdem ayen ilaqen i wakken ad asen d-rren visa nsen. Ad d-rnuɣ, ad d-iniɣ d akken asensu d wayen akk i d as-d-yezzin d nekni s tddukkla ara t-ixellṣen. Akka, ad nessifsus taswiɛt ɣef yimsizzlen. Nekni, nexdem-d tafaska-agi mebla tikerkas, mebla tixidas, imi netwali imleẓyen xas bɣan ad xeddmen, meɛna aṭas n wid i d asen-yettilin d iɛewwiqen. Ulac win ara sen-ixedmen afud. Ladɣa ssinema amaziɣ, ilaq ad d-iban akken iwata. Ma yella d araz le figuier d’or, yettwaxdem s wuraɣ. Ad d-iniɣ mreḥba i kra n win ara d-yawin axeddim-is ɣer tfaska-agi’’.

  Souhila Yamani 

  
 Aḥric wis 2

 Kra isurifen kan almi i d-yemlal aṭarus, yexcawet, tekfa fell-as ddunit, yeẓẓel deg tlemmast n ubrid yeṭṭef. Aγyul: ‘’Acuγer akka tessawaleḍ i tmettant ay aqejjun, yak ur tekcimeḍ ara εemrayen?’’. Aṭarus: ‘’Ahbuh ay ameddakkel, kfan wussan-nni ideg ttṣeggideɣ ula d izan war uguren. A tura dayen, tfut-iyi temẓi, kkawen ifadden-iw, mačči am zik mi akken ssserwaγ i bab-iw tuṭṭfa n tsekrin d wayen nniḍen di ṣṣyada, mi yella ibeṭṭu yid-i ula d tacriḥt-is, ur d iy-yettak ara kan iγsan tetten yiqejjan-nniḍen, yerna yessawal-iyi ddigurdi. Lemmer ur d-ssnesreγ ara idaṛṛen-iw, a-t-a yekkes buḥbel-iw yakan. Ihi γas akka temneε tqeṛṛut-iw i tmettant, maca amek ara ssinfe i laẓ? Amek zemreγ ad d-afeγ tawuri ideg ad d-ḥelliγ ulamma d talqimt n uγrum? Aγyul: ‘’Nniγ-ak! Kker kan γef yiman-ik ad tedduḍ yid-i γer Tizi n Kulal, ad tt-nurar d imeddaḥen γef yiman-nneγ! Nekk ad kkateγ lγiḍa n teylut, kečč d amendayer, ad d-nessis tafunast d yelli-s, d awezγi ad d-yezzi laẓ fell-aneγ’’. Aṭarus iḥulfa amzun yella anwa i t-id-yessuffγen seg telqaεt n lbir, teffeγ fell-as tikti akken yessefk, s unecṛeḥ n wul i yekker yezwi taεrurt-is, yedda yid-s. Ur lḥin ara aṭaṣ, mmuggren amcic s wudem tuli tewṛeγ am tin yettalin udmawen n at laxert : Leḥnak jjxen yakk d wallen nexrent. Aγyul: ‘’D acu n lḥif-agi i d-yeγlin fell-ak a win imeccḥen ḥala deg tamart-is segmi ara yali wass?’’. Amcic: ‘’D kečč a lerbaḥ! Ula d nekk ẓriγ ḥala zzwayel i yessnen i wesfuğğeɣ. S nnig leγbaṛ, ur yezmir ara ugudu ad d-yarew tament. Imi tettnadiḍ ad tezreḍ tidet, a-t-a ihi wayen yellan a γlulu: Tura teğğa-yi temẓi, tuγmas-iw akk γlint, ihi smenyafeγ kra ara yekk wass ḥala tiγimit γef yiri n lkanun. Mačči am zik mi neṭṭgeγ am lebraq γef yiγerdayen, mi akken mḥiγ akk zerriεa-nsen seg uxxam. Tura imi ṭṭfeγ tiγmert, ur zmireγ i kra, tewwi-yi-d lalla gar wallen-is, tεewwel ad yi-tejjijjeq, ad tefk aqeṛṛu-w d asfel, ihi kkiγ-d tawwurt, rewleγ-d. Timeccacin-iw ssmenεeγ-tent-id, maca, ur ẓriγ anida ara rreγ ixef-iw tura, i tagi mačči d tawaγit?’’ …   Tettkemmil  

  Seg tsekla taqbaylit 

  
 Mbeɛd mi i d-tuɣal temsizzelt n tira “Imura n tmurt-iw” deg tezrigt-is tis snat, yebdan deg wussan iɛeddan, yella-d ufran n yinelmaden ara igensen ladayrat-nsen (asunen) deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, s temsizzelt tamzwarut i d-yellan deg yiɣerbazen deg wussan yezrin. Tura, mi yessuli umecwar amezwaru n temsizzelt-agi n tira, ttwafernen-d wazal n 164 n yinelmaden ara imetlen asunen-nsen deg temsizzelt i d-iteddun. Dɣa, ass-nni n larebɛa 20 meɣres 2019, yella-d yiwen wass n usileɣ d uwelleh sɣur yimaswaḍen akked yimura n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Yal aswir s yimsilɣen-is; aɣerbaz amenzu yesɛa imaswaḍen d yimura n tlata n tutlayin-agi: tamaziɣt, tafransist akked taɛrabt. Ma d aɣerbaz alemmas akked tesnawit, llan diɣ yimsilɣen n tutlayt taglizit, i d-yernan aseggas-a. Ɣef teɣzi n tsebḥit n wass, yella-d uwelleh d usileɣ n yimekkiyen-agi, yal agraw s tutlayt-is d uswir-is. Imaswaḍen si tama-nsen, mmeslayen ugar ɣef tɣessa akked talɣa n uḍris, ma d imura mmeslayen ɣef tirmit-nsen deg tira, d wamek i ilaq ad naru aḍris aseklan. Ma di tmeddit n wass, tella-d tegnit n tira, anda yal anelmad ad yaru aḍris ɣef usentel i d as-yehwan. Tella-d temilit-agi n usileɣ deg tesnawit n 20 ɣuct 1956 n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, i wakken ad heggin imsizewren-agi i uswir n lwilaya. Ma d ayen ijebden lwelha-nneɣ deg temsizzelt-agi, d lferḥ meqqren swayes i d-uɣalen wid i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt-agi aseggas iɛeddan. 
 
Yetturaǧu ad yili wass wis sin n usileɣ deffir kan n yimuras-agi n tefsut uqbel timsizzelt tis snat ara d-yilin ass n, 23 yebrir 2019. Wid ara d-yifriren deg umecwar-agi wis sin, d nutni ara igensen lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu deg temsizzelt n temnaḍin, i yetturaǧun ad tili di Blida deg waggur i d-iteddun.

 Amaynut n tezrigt-agi tamaynut 
 Ma ɣef umynut n tezrigt-agi tis snat, yenna-d yimḍebber n umseddu adelsan deg tenmehla n usedwel d uselmed n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Mass Ali Ḥmed Muḥmed, belli aṭas i d-yellan d ajdid deg tedwilt-agi tamaynut. “Tamezwarut, d amahil asnas i d-yellan tameddit n wass-nni n usileɣ i wakken ad nwali ma refden iwellihen i d asen-yettunefken sɣur yimsulɣa-agi. Tis snat, d tuffɣa tasnegmant ara d-yilin i lfayda n yigerdan-a, deg wussan i d-iteddun. Tis kraḍet, d timerna n tutlayt taglizit ɣer tama n tlata-nni yellan yakan, imi d asuter d tiɣri daɣ n waṭas n yinelmaden yesɛan tanfalit igerrzen deg tutlayt-agi”. Ikemmel yenna-d : “Aseggas-agi, ad nessiweḍ ɣer 22 n yimura, ara igensen lwilaya-nneɣ deg temsizzelt n taggara, i yetturaǧun ad tili deg wagur n yulyu i d-ileḥḥun. 6 ad ilin d inelmaden n uɣerbaz amenzu, imi yal tutlayt s sin n yimura. 8 n yinelmaden-nniḍen deg uɣerbaz alemmas, sin n yinelmaden i yal tutlayt. Ula deg tesnawit, ad d-nefren 8 n yinelmaden, imi 4 n tutlayin-agi (tamaziɣt, taɛrabt, taglizit akked tefransist) swayes ttarun yinelmaden-a i yettekkan”. Mbeɛd mi i d-yella ufran n 22 n yinelmaden-agi, ara igensen lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ad ɛeddin ɣer uswir n tamiwin, i yetturaǧun ad d-yili tagarra n mayyu neɣ tazwara n yunyu. 

 Taḥawact n tezrigt tamezwarut 
 Am wakken daɣen i d-yemmeslay ɣer taggara Mass Ali Ḥmed Muḥend, ɣef tḥawact n useggas iɛeddan. Yenna-d belli : “Aseggas iɛeddan, ulamma ur nettekki ara s waṭas n yinelmaden, maca, gar setta n lwilayat-nni i d-yufraren gar 48 n lwilayat n Tmurt. Tizi Uzzu, tufrar-d s rebɛa n yimura, snat n uɣerbaz amenzu, yiwet deg uɣerbaz alemmas akked yiwen deg tesnawit”. Snat-nni n tullas n uɣerbaz amenzu, yiwet deg-sent tufrar-d di taɛrabt ma d tayeḍ di tefransit. Ma d sin-nniḍen ufraren-d deg tmaziɣt, yiwen deg tesnawit, tayeḍ deg uɣerbaz alemmas. Ikemmel yenna-d umselɣu-nneɣ: “Taḥawact n tezrigt yezrin, telḥa, tessebɣes-aɣ aṭas i wakken ad nessirem ugar deg tezrigt-agi tamaynut”. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti belli, timsizzelt-agi “Imura n tmurt-iw” deg tezrigt-is tis snat, yessuddes-itt-id Uɣlif n usegmi d uselmed akked win n yidles. D timsizzelt taɣelnawt s rebɛa n tutlayin, yettwaslemden deg uɣerbaz azzayri, yellin tiwwura-s i yinelmaden iɣurbizen yesɛan tanfalit igerrzen di kra tutlayt. Yetturaǧu, ad tili temsizwert n taggara, ideg ara d-fernen inelmaden ara yawin arazzen, yerna ad yessisreg Uɣlif n usedwel d usegmi, imuhal-agi-nsen yerna ad ttekkin deg Rreḥba tagraɣlant n udlis di tmurt n Lezzayer (SILA) 2019.
   Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ini yeffɣen i usaḍuf d yiwet gar tlufa tigejdanin i iḥuzan tuget n tmura n umaḍal, gar-asent Lezzayer. D taluft yettnernin seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ. Akka ara naf dɣa kra n yilmeẓyen i qeḍɛen layas deg tudert deg tmurt-nsen, sseqdacen yiwen yinzi anda i as-qqaren ‘’ Menyaf ad yi-yečč lḥut, wala aweṭṭuf’’. Sdat n waddad n temɛict yenḥafen aṭas deg tmurt n Lezzayer s umata d temḍiqt n Leqbayel, d lexsaṣ meqqren deg yimeḍqan n uxeddim i yelmezyen, imdanen, ass-a, qeḍɛen layas deg tudert deg uwanek deg-i tidiren. Asirem n tuget n yimdanen d inig send ara twenneɛ temɛict. Deg waggur kan iɛddan, ugar n 100 n yilmeẓyen n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa i yeṭṭfen abrid-nsen lewhi n tmurt n Turkit, syin ɣer Gres, d tmurt n Fransa. Amur ameqqran n yiminigen, d ilmeẓyen ur iɛddan ara 25 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-nsen. Icudd usirem-nsen kan ɣer tmura i irbḥen, anda, i nwan, ad afen yakk ayen i ssaramen, ur tufin ara deg tmurt-nsen. Talut n yinig yefɣen i usaḍuf s imal tetnerni, tgellu-d s yibaxixen meqqren, dɣa amḍan n yiminigen yetmettaten deg lecḍuḍ n yillel agrakal yetnerni seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ. Ɣas ma taluft teṭṭef amḍiq-is, imḍebbren n tmurt-nneɣ mazal-iten ɣelqen allen-nnsen ɣef taluft, ulac yakk lḥir i tifrat n taluft. 

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Mačči aṭas-aya segmi i d-turew yiwet n tmeṭṭut deg taddart n At Idris, taɣiwant n tṣexriwt, ukuẓ n warrac ɣef tikkelt. Ulamma ayagi d ayen i ten-yessferḥen nezzeh, meεna seg tama-nniḍen yessḥeyyer-iten daɣen. Acku, akken i d-iberreḥ jeddi-tsen, taswiεt d tin qessiḥen, imi ɣlayet tameddurt, yerna akken i neẓṛa, yiwen n llufan mi ara ad t-id-yesεu walbaɛd, yewεer ad t-id-yessker, aniεad 4 akkenq ɣef tikkelt. D ayen i yeǧǧan tawacult-a tger tiɣri i wid ixeddmen lxir i wakken ad ten-εiwnen s wayen iwumi zemmren, wa ad d-fken afus n tallelt i baba-tsen i yettaɣen ccehriya d talemmast, lmaεna-s ur yezmir ad yeḍmen tudert n yineglusen-a akked d tɣawsiwin n tudert-nniḍen. Tiddukkla Tiɣri, am yal tikkelt, tella-d di ttiεad i wakken ad texdem ayen iwumu tezmer. Dɣa, rzan yemmḍebbṛen n tddukkla-a, aselway n tɣiwant n At Smaεel akked unmazul n tɣiwant n Tṣexriwt, ass n aram yezrin, 8 deg yennayer, ɣer twacult-a, mi wwin yid-sen ddeqs n wayen I ḥwaǧen warrac-a, am uyefki, taduli, lqecc d wayen-nniḍen. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ddeqs n yimezdaɣ n taddart n At Smaεel i d-yefkan afus n tallelt i tddukkla Tiɣri i wakken ad yesmurres uqeddic-a. Ayagi s tnaga n uselway-is Mass Ɛebdun i ten-yessnemmren nezzeh, am wakken daɣen i asen-yessuter ad kemmlen deg ubrid-a yelhan. Ma yella d imawlan n warrac-a, umren ayendin s ccɣel-a igerrzen.

  Isufar 

 200 gr n uwren areqqaq

 300 gr n lfarina

 1 n tmellalt

 1 n tɣenjawt n lmakla n yiɣes 

 n lkucara

 1 n tɣenjawt n lmakla n zzit neɣ n wudi

 1 n tɣenjawt n lmakla n ssker
