<p style="text-align:right">  Hocine Moula 

  
 Mazal tettkemmil tddukkla tadelsant “Imnar n Tdukli” n Ait Aissa Mimoun leqdic-is deg usuddes n yisaragen yemxalafen. Dɣa, ass-nni n lǧemɛa, 31 maggu 2019, ɣef 21h00 n yiḍ, deg usɣim n Waggur Azeggaɣ Azzayri (CRA) n Ait Aissa Mimoun, yella-d usarag aneggaru n tddukkla-a deg waggur-agi n remḍan. D timilit n tujjya i gan sin yimejjayen-agi; aduktur Benassil Amar akked uduktur Becheker Mehdi. Wwin-d awal s telqay deg usarag-agi-nsen ɣef usentel-agi agejdan “Aṭṭan n ssker n yal ass”. Am wakken daɣen i d-mmeslayen ɣef wamek i d-yettnekkar lehlak-agi d wamek nezmer ad t-ndawi uqbel ad ifat lḥal. 

 Mass Benassil Amar, i d-yebdan ameslay deg usarag-agi, anida yesnemmer iɛeggalen n tddukkla-agi ɣef usarag-agi ɣef waṭṭan n ssker, imi ɣur-s d timilit n useɛlem d uwelleh ama i wid yuḍnen ama d wid iṣeḥḥan. Iberreḥ-d: “S temliliyin yecban tigi, ara nessiwweḍ ad nessefhem i medden aṭas n temsal yerzan aṭṭanen i yuḍnen medden. Ma d iswi-nsent d awelleh d useɛlem n yimdanen i wakken ad ḥadren iman-nsen ugar”. Syin akkin, mi yebda asarag-ines, yesbadu-d qbel aṭṭan-agi n ssker, yenna-d belli : “Lehlak-agi, qqaren-as aṭṭan uffir, imi ur yesebgan ara ɣer berra leɛyub-is.

  Ssawalen-as daɣen, aṭṭan asusam imi iteddu s ttawil deg tfekka n umdan mebla ma tḥulfaḍ i kra n uqraḥ…”. Am wakken daɣen i d-yefka leḥsabat n yimḍan deg umḍal alaḥsab n tseddut tamaḍlant n tezmert (OMS), i d-yeqqaren belli azal n 442 n yimelyan n yimdanen i yuḍnen lehlak-agi. Gar 11 n yimdanen ad yili yiwen yehlek, dayen ara aɣ-yefken leḥsab n 1/6 n yimdanen n umaḍan helken lehlak-agi n tallit-agi. Syin akkin ikemmel ameslay Mass Becheker Mehdi, anda i d-yeḥder ɣef tewsatin (leṣnaf) n waṭṭan-agi, dɣa yenna-d : “ Llan aṭas leṣnaf n lehlek n ssker, maca nexter ad d-nemmeslay ɣef sin-agi n leṣnaf igejdanen n waṭṭṭan-agi. 

 Ṣṣenf amezwaru d win yettḥazen igerdan akked yilmeẓyen ur newwiḍ ara 40 n yiseggasen. Ma d ṣṣenf wis sin, yettḥaza imeqranen yugaren 40 n yiseggasen”. Am wakken daɣen i d-yemmselay ɣef udawi-nsen, yenna-d: “Ṣṣenf-agi amenzu, yettili-d udawi-ines s usafar n lansulin (Insuline), ma d wis sin-agi, yettili-d udawi-ines s tkaciyin d tɛeqqayin…”. Yella-d diɣ wawal s teɣsef ɣef tmental i t-i d-ixeddmen d wamek yezmer ad t-yeqḍeɛ umdan. Ɣer taggara, fkan-d ayen din n yiwellihen i yimuḍan n waṭṭan-agi s ttawil n ttṣawer. Am wakken diɣ i d-mmeslayen ɣef tewtilin neɣ ayen s wayen yezmer ad yeglu waṭṭan-agi ɣef win ur nettḥadar ara, gar uderɣel, d tmettant n tgeẓal, agzam n kra di tfekka n umdan…atg.

 Mi sulin awal-nsen, yella-d uskasi sɣur wid yellan deg tzeqqa-nni, yezzi wawal deg-s ɣef waṭas n temsal i d-yeqqnen ɣef usentel-a “Aṭṭan n ssker, yerza merra tawacult” i fernen yimsirgen-agi ad yili d azwel n usarag-agi-nsen. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella wawal ɣef wacu i ilaq ad yexdem win ihelken d wayen ur nlaq ara ad t-yexdem. Sḥersen daɣen ɣef usefqed n waṭṭan-agi ɣer medden merra, ur ilaq ara ad t-yugad yiwen, imi d aṭṭan yettudawan. Ɣer taggara, ad nesmekti belli d wagi i d asarag aneggaru i d-thegga tddukkla-agi deg waggur-agi n remḍan. Imi tesuddes-d yakan sin uqbel wagi, yiwen ɣef tussnamdan (psychologie) wayeḍ ɣef tuddsa n tmetti taqbaylit.

  Tella-d tmeɣra n thara i warrac n Wat Wagennun   
 Thegga-d tddukkla tadelsant Imnar n Tdukli n At Ɛissa Mimun akked Waggur azeggaɣ azzayri yiwet n tmeɣra, ddurt iɛeddan, i lmendad n thara n yigerdan. Tɛedda tmeɣra-agi deg tugnatin yelhan imi i asen-yeɛǧeb mliḥ i twaculin n warrac i teɛna temsalt-agi n thara. Ferḥen dayen kan s leqdic am wa. Deg wawal-is, yesnemmer aṭas uselway n tddukkla Imnar n Tdukli, Mass Adaoun Abdelghani, s kra n win i d-yefkan afus n lemɛawna deg leqdic-agi, ama d anemhal n Waggur azeggaɣ azzayri, Mass Ali Kheddam iwumi tuɣal diɣ ass-nni tejmilt, ama d anemhal n uxxam n tmeɣra Le Berbère, Mass Moukhtari neɣ icennayen akked yiɛeggalen n tdukla. Mebla ma yettu tiwaculin n yigerdan. Am wakken daɣen yessarem-asen cfa s lɛejlan. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli tiddukkla Imnar n tdukli mačči d leqdic-is amezwaru.

  G Amazigh/S Yamani 

  
 Lmulud At Caɛban, d amyaru aqbayli. Illul ass 8 meɣres 1913. Yettwanɣa ass n 15 meɣres 1962 s yiffasen n OAS.

 Ass n lexmis 15 meɣres 2018, ad zemmen 56 n yiseggasen ɣef wasmi yettwanɣa uneggal d umaru Mouloud Feraoun. I lmend n usmeki-agi wis 56, ad as-tuɣal tejmilt meqqren deg taddart-is Tizi Hibel deg tɣiwant n Aït Mahmoud deg ladayra n At Douala. D leqdic adelsan anesbaɣur i d-theggi tiddukkla tadelsant yewwin isem-is “Mouloud Feraoun”, ara yebdun ass n 15 deg meɣres-agi sdat-neɣ. Yetturaǧu ad yebdu wahil ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, s kra n temsikniyin n yidlisen-is, n yimagraden n tɣamsa yettwarun fell-as, n tugniwin-ines…atg.Tin ɣur-s, ɣef 11h00 n uzal, ad sersen ɣef uẓekka-as timeqqunin n yijeǧǧigen, yerna ad sterḥmen fell-as s ddqiqa n tsusmi. Am wakken daɣen ara sersen tameqqunt-nniḍen ɣef usebdad n 18 n yimeɣrasen n tegrawla 1954-1962. Syin akin, yetturaǧu ad yili umeslay sɣur uselway n tiddukkla-agi, Mass Nessah Mokrane, akked mmi-s Ali Feraoun, tanemhalt n yidles Massa Goumziane Nabila. Am wakken daɣen ara d-ilint tnagiyin sɣur wid yeddren yid-s deg tegrawla tazzayrit. Ma ɣef 11h30 n uzal, ad d-fken ismawen n yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt n tira ɣef tudert d yimuhal n umaru Mouloud Feraoun, i d-yellan s tlata n tulayin-agi: tamaziɣt, tafransist akked taɛrabt. Seg 15h00 d tasawent, ad yili usarag ɣef tudert d yimuhal n urgaz-agi ameqqran, sɣur uselawy n tiddukkla yewwin isem-is, akked mmi-s Ali Feraoun. Ma d azekka-in n lǧemɛa 16 meɣres 2018, ad d-ilint temliliyin n ddabex uḍar d tajmilt i netta daɣen. Ɣer taggara, tirbuyaɛ irebḥen, ad awint arrazen. Am wakken daɣen yetturaǧu ad ikemmel wahil-agi ass n ssebt-agi sdat-nneɣ, s yiwet n tikli s yiviluyen sɣur tiddukkla n yinaddalen n “Les Cycliste de Tizi Ouzou”, ara yawḍen alamma d aẓekka-s. D leqdic ara d-yettwaheggin sɣur tiddukkla tadelsant Mouloud Feraoun n Tizi Hibel, s lemɛawna n Tenmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu.

  A. A 

  
 Iɛawed yeḥya-d leqdic adelsan di tɣiwant n At Ɛissa Mimun, mbeɛd ussan n yimuras n unebdu. Ihi dɣa, tiddukkla tadelsant “Imnar n Tdukli” n tɣiwant-agi, thegga-d i tikkelt-nniḍen tiwwura yellin (portes ouvertes) ɣef tddukkla-a, leqdicat-is akked umezruy-is. Ad d-yili waya, taggara n ddurt-agi sdat-nneɣ (lǧemɛa d ssebt) 12 d 13 cutember 2019, deg uɣerbaz amenzu “Hacemi d warraw-is” n taddart n Tḥanut. Syin akkin, ad tebdu tallit n ujerred ɣer yisikwan (ateliers) ama d wid n tutlayin-a : tamaziɣt, tafransist akked teglizt ama d win terbaɛt n ccna (chorale) neɣ win n usuneɣ (dessin). 

 Leqdic-a, ad d-yili ussan n 20, 21, 27 d 28 deg waggur-a n cutember ideg nella. Ma d beddu n leqraya, yetturaǧu ad yili ussan n 11 d12 tuber 2019. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti kan belli aseggas iɛeddan, ugar n 60 n yigerdan i yeɣran deg yisikwan n tutlayin-a : tamaziɣt, tafransist akked teglizit. Imi isikwan-a n usuneɣ d terbaɛt n ccna d imaynuten, armi d aseggas-a i ten-id-rnan. 

   A. A. 

  
 Deg yiwen wulɣu n tenmehla n ufraq n lgaz d trisiti (SDC) n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, sya ɣer taggara n waggur-agi n cutember ideg nella, ad yili usekcem n usafar n lgaz n temdint ɣer 3 700 n yixxamen deg lwilaya-agi. Ahil-a n usekcem n lgaz n temdint, ad yekk kraḍ n yimalas ara iḥazen n ṭam (8) n yimeḍqan. Akka ihi, ɣef wakken i d-yers deg wahil i tga tenmehla tadigant n Tizi Uzzu (SDC) n ufraq n trisiti akked lgaz n temdint, ad skecmen lgaz i 430 n tnezduɣin deg tɣiwant n Uqbil deg yimalas-agi wis sin n waggur ideg nella, ɣer tama n 663 n yixxamen-nniḍen deg tɣiwant n Uẓeffun akked tin Yibudraren deg yimalas wis kraḍ n waggur-a n cutember. Ayen i d-yeggran seg wahil-a, d 2 813 n tnezduɣin i yetturaǧu ad yili usekcem-ines ɣur-sent deg yimalas aneggaru n waggur n cutember, ɣef wakken i d-tenna tenmehla-a. 2 818 n tnezduɣin-agi, zgant-d deg 7 n yimeḍqan, yecban taɣiwant n At Zmenzer, Aẓeffun, Ɛin Zzawiya, At Xlili, Timizar, Ibudraren akked At Yanni.

  Gh. A. 

  
 Yiwet n tikkelt, yella-d ṭṛad meqqer. Ihi γlin aṭas n lmeyytin. Yiwet n tama d nettat i d-yegran, ittussemma d nutni i irebḥen ṭṛad. Yesteqsa umeqqran-nsen lεeskeṛ-ines ma ṭṭfen-d imeḥbas, nnan-as: ”Neṭṭef-d azal n εecṛa”. Yenna-asen: “Anida-ten?”. Wwin-t γer yimeḥbas-nni, iwala-ten, steqsan-t: “Acu ara asen-nexden ay ameqran?”. Yenna-asen: “Ur rennuγ ara taεkemt-nsen”. Yebda ara yesteqsay deg yimeḥbas yiwen, yiwen: “Acu d lḥirfa-k keččini? Yenna-as: “Ur sεiγ ara lḥirfa”. 
  -Ihi gzemt-as aqerru-s. 
  Yenṭeq γer wayeḍ: “Acu id lḥirfa-k?”. 
  -Ur sεiγ ara lḥirfa. 
  -Rnut-t γer umezwaru. 
  Akken armi i d-yewweḍ γer yiwen deg yimeḥbas.
  -I kečč d acu id lḥirfa-k? 
  -Nekk si zik d axerraz. 
  -Erret-tt di ṭṭerf, ur t-neqqet ara. 
  Steqsan-t lεesker-ines: ‘’Acimi ur t-tenγiḍ ara am wiyaḍ, ahaqel i mi d axerraz?’’. 
  Ameqran n lεesker: ‘’S tidett bu lḥirfa yenfeε a lukan d axerraz’’. Tamsirt-nneγ si tmacahut-agi, d akken ad nẓer belli lḥirfa tenfeε bab-is akken yebγu yili. Yal ccγel inefεen d tamussni. 

<p style="text-align:right">  Yahia Yanes 

  
 «Neɣ ḍelmeɣ», semmus n yiseggasen akken i d-yeḍfer gma-s «Asderfef». Yuɣal-d ihi unaẓur Zedek Mulud s umaynut n 14 n tezlatin ideg i d-yewwi asenqed ɣef wayen iḍerrun di tmurt iseggasen-a ineggura, d uḥulfu-is ɣef kra n tedyanin i d-yellan. 

 Di tezlit tamenzut, yebɣa unaẓur ad d-yesken axnaq i yexneq seg liḥala n tmurt armi yendeh s « A yemma yemma ». Yettmesteqsay deg-s d acu i yuɣen Tamurt-is armi i as-yeḍra wayen i as-yeḍran. Ula deg « Awi-d ukan », yecna ɣef tmurt, maca s tegzi d wamek-nniḍen. 

 Di tezlit tis snat « A wer timlilit », tban-d tezlit qessiḥ cwiṭ, abeɛda di kra n tseddarin, imi ur d-iḍewwer unaẓur ɣef ddunit akken ad d-yini ayen yebɣa ad d-yini. Ahat daɣen d asḥissef n wayen iwala s yisem-is d amedyaz, i t-yeǧǧan yenna-d tid i t-yeqqden. «Zik nettemlili-d ɣer sseḥ, d tinna i aɣ-yesdukkulen. Nettawi-tt-id am leslaḥ, nessergagay iɛdawen. Tura nettemlili-d ɣer ccḍeḥ, a-tt-an din a Muḥ Weḥsen, win i ur tɣaḍ teqbaylit, a wer timlilit !» 

 I d-yenna deg yiwet n tseddart. “Am yimeslab“, nezmer ad d-nini d lemri n Yiqbayliyen, liḥala n tudert-nsen d wamek i d-ggran deg umaḍal anida, seg wakken ttemḥuzan yidelsan, ikukra unaẓur ad qqaren yiẓuran n yidles-nneɣ war ma yuki-as di lawan Uzwaw. Yenna dɣa deg-s:
  «Yiwen yettzuxxu s warraw-is,
  Heddren tarumit.
  Qqaren-as « papa » a lxir-is,
  Baba-s yenker-it.
  Ur yeẓri ara a nnger-is,
  La yetthuddu deg yiman-is,
  ru a taqbaylit ». Tizlit “Ifukk usebrek“, i d-yessuffeɣ yakan ucennay i yimḥemmalen ayyuren iɛeddan, tettmeslay-d ɣef waddad ibeddlen n unaẓur d ssebbat i t-yeǧǧan ad iqeɛɛed iman-is d twacult-is di Fransa. Gar wayen yecna deg-s, ad naf: 
  «Ma tewweḍ a medden s awren,
  A win izemren ad yečč leḥcic. 
  A tuggict mm yiwedcen,
  Fukkent tmucuha ay aqcic.
  Ad nehmel s anda nniḍen,
  Ahat ad aɣ-d-iban uḥric.
  Xas akka ɛyan yifadden,
  Ay akken i aɣ-d-tesbeḥ meɛlic ». 
  

 Tagmat dima deg usentel, imi tt-id-yebder mmi-s n At Xelfun deg tezlit “Winna“. D ameslay deg-s ɣef tedyanin n yir tagmat. Akken i aɣ-t-id-yenna yakan, ad naf deg tezlit tis sḍis tajmilt i yerra i ugrawliw Si Lḥafid i yettɛuzzu aṭas Zedek Mulud. Ma deg tezlit ‘’Ad d-iniɣ’’, yenna abeɛda: « Ad d-iniɣ nekk d Aqvayli, mazal u mazal ». Yecna daɣen bab n “Tidderwect-iw“ ɣef lxiq d ubrid-nni aqdim, ɣef wid i t-iqerben, ideg zemren ad ɛeqlen iman-nsen waṭas n medden, am tezlatin “Ɛzizu“ d “A Tabaḥant-iw“. Ula i warrac imecṭaḥ, iga-asen tikkelt-a amur s tezlit n usuzzen iwumi isemma « I Mimmi ». 

 Ɣer taggara-a, yeɛreḍ ad yessegraw s uẓawan akk iɣerfan Imaziɣen s tezlit “Yennayer“ ideg llan azal n kraḍ n yiɣaniben. Yewwi-d ad d-nezzi ɣer uẓawan imi yella-d ubeddel ɣef wamek yesnum i wid i t-yeṭṭafaren. Llan wid iwalan yelha “usegreɣlen-nni“, llan wid yessarmen lemmer i yeqqim kan deg uɣanib-is.
  M. K. 

  
 Yerna-d ussan-agi iɛeddan yiwen n udlis n tmaziɣt, d ayen ara d-yernun abaɣur i tutlayt-agi n tyemmat. D Mass Ḥmed Nekkar, i d-yuran adlis-agi iwumi isemma s tefransist “Apprendre tamazight maintenant” neɣ s tmaziɣt “Selmed tamaziɣt tura”, i d-yessuffeɣ ɣer tezrigin Tamagit. Yebɣa umeskar, ad yessifsus taɛekkumt n uselmed n tutlayt tamaziɣt i yimdanen ifransawalen (wid yettmeslayen tafransist). I lmend n waya yessexdem tarrayt yufraren i usefhem n wayen akk yeḥwaǧ win yebɣan ad iɣer tamaziɣt, xas iles-is d afransis. Annect-agi, Isbeggen-it-id deg wawal n tazwara n udlis-agi, dɣa yenna-d belli d imdanen ur nettmeslay ara tamaziɣt i d as-d-yessutren, ad yexdem ccɣel-agi. Ma d tuddsa n udlis-agi n uselmed, tedda akken iwata lḥal, yezwer-d umaru-ines s ugemmay amaziɣ, yettwarun s rebɛa n yisekkilen-agi: tifinaɣ, talatinit, taɛrabt, akked wid n tefransist. Syin akkin d isekkilen n ugemmay amaziɣt, yal asekkil s yimedyaten, tin ɣur-s d awalen, akken armi yewweḍ ɣer tefyirt. D adlis ara yiḥwiǧ yal yiwen yebɣan imir-a ad yissin tutlayt tamaziɣt, imi yal taɣawsa iɣef ira ad imeslay fell-as, tella deg udlis-agi yettwarun s snat n tutlayin-agi: tafransist akked tmaziɣt. Yewwi-d awal deg-s umeskar ɣer wawalen n yal ass yeqqnen ɣer tfekka n umdan, ɣer uɣerbaz, ɣer uxxam ama d aqbur neɣ d amaynut, ɣer wakal d twennaḍt…atg. ad naf daɣen daxel ammud n yinzan akked kra n tmucuha i tɣuri. Am wakken daɣen ara naf iluɣma n uktazal neɣ n usnas, i wakken ad yesluɣmu imeɣriyen-is.

 Ma nger tiṭ gar yisebter n udlis-agi, ad naf Mass Ḥmed Nekkar, isemres ilugan n tira n tmaziɣt akked yiferdisen igejdanen iɣef tebna tutlayt tamaziɣt, yecban tamawalt, taseftit, tajerrumt, tirawalt akked tseddast. D adlis n 190 n yisebter, i d-yeffɣen deg tazwara n useggas-agi n 2018, yettnuzu s wazal n 800 DA deg tnedlisin. Ɣer taggara, nezmer ad d-ninni belli d idlisen yecban wagi i teḥwaǧ ass-agi tmaziɣt, i usnerni-ines d uselmed-ines i wid ur tt-nettmeslay ara.

  A. A. 

  
 Tberreḥ-d massa Nadiya Meɛtub, ussan-a imenza n yennayer s usnulfu n yiwet n tddukkla Meɛtub Lwennas Takatut d Usiweḍ. « Deg beddu-a n useggas amaziɣ, s tedfi ara d-berrḥeɣ s usnulfu n Tddukkla Meɛtub Lwennas Takatut d Usiweḍ. Nessaram ad nekki deg usiweḍ n tẓuri n Meɛtub Lwennas, ad neqdec akked kra n wid yenwan akken ad nesbedd asenfar d imekdi i waktay n wid akk igan amezruy n tmurt n yiqbayliyen d Tmazɣa, ad idirent tektiwin-nsent tisellakin ». I d-tenna Massa Meɛtub i tɣamsa. Ugar n uzuzzer d useḥbiber ɣef wayen i d-yeǧǧa Meɛtub Lwennas d taẓuri, ad tesseḥbiber tdukkla-a ula ɣef tkatut n kra n wudmawen n tẓuri d tsekla, tazayrit neɣ tazwawt. Dɣa terna-d deg wulɣu Massa Nadiya Meɛtub: « Asmi yeḍra ubaxix dayen, ḥaca nezmer ‘’ad nesnagi’’, ad neg amek ad neḥrez takatut taḥeqqanit n yimussnawen-nneɣ imeqqranen, am Mulud At Mɛemmer, Kateb Yasin d umeɛzuz-nneɣ Meɛtub Lwennas. Ad nerret azal i wayen i d-yewwi uɣref-nneɣ i talsa, ad nerret tajmilt i wid akk yennuɣen, yettnaɣen daɣ s tebɣest, i wakken ad d-snesren iman-nsen seg yizagluyen isɣananen, inmettiyen, isertanen d yidelsanen ». Seld ihi Tasbeddit Meɛtub Lwennas i d-tesnulfa uletma-s n uɣewwaɣ deg useggas n 1998, ha-t-an d nnuba n taǧǧalt-is i d-yeslalen tidukkla akken ad tekki ula d nettat s wayen iwumi tezmer deg useḥbiber ɣef tkatut n unaẓur-a, i yettwanɣan s leɣḍer ass n 25 yunyu 1998 meqrub axxam-is deg At Dwala.

  M. K. 

  
 Tasebḥit n wass-nni n larebɛa 3 deg yennayer 2017, i d as-tuɣal tejmilt tameqqrant i yitri n ccna akked tezlit taqbaylit, Brahim Izri.

 Ulamma zzemen 13 n yiseggasen ɣef wasmi yemmut, maca At taddart-is, At Leḥsen deg Wat Yanni, mazal-it yedder deg wulawen-nsen. Dɣa xedmen-as tajmilt deg zzawiya n jeddi-s Lḥaǧ Belqasem, ideg xedmen ddqiqa n tsusmi ɣef yiman-is, syin akkin llant-d tnagiwin sɣur waṭas n yinaẓuren d yiwudam n yidles. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella usmekti n umecwar-is d yimuhal-is deg ubrid n ccna d wayen akk i d-yefka i tezlit d yidles n teqbaylit.

  Tudert n Brahim Izri 

 Ilul Brahim Izri deg wass n 12 yennayer 1954, deg zzawiya n jeddi-s Lḥaǧ Belqasem, yellan deg tama n At Leḥsen deg tɣiwant n Wat Yanni. Yebda yetturar s snitra asmi yesɛa sebɛa n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, lmeɛna-s deg useggas n 1961. Imir-nni yella ilmed aẓawan deg zzawiya-agi n jeddi-s, anida llan ssexdamen kan abendayer, tijewaqin akked tẓemmarin, ma d tagiṭart ulac win i d as-issnen deg yilmeẓyen n lweqt-nni, dɣa yextar-it jeddi-s i wakken ad yekkat tagiṭart. Yeɣra deg uɣerbaz amenzu, syin deg uɣerbaz alemmas. Asmi yewweḍ ɣer tesnawit n lɛerc n Larebɛa n At Yiraten, yesɛedday aṭas n wakud deg lmusiga wala deg leqraya-s. Yezga yeddukkel d sin n yimeddukkal-agi-ines Nait Abdelaziz akked Aziz Berrahma, yid-sen i yettqeṣir tagiṭart, dɣa xedmen-d agraw n ccna d netta i rran d aqerruy fell-asen, yerna iɛawen-iten aṭas ucennay Idir. Agraw-agi-nsen, semman-as “Igudar”, yesseḥbibiren deg lweqt-nni ɣef yidles amaziɣ akked tutlayt tmaziɣt. D yiwen gar yigrawen n ccna i d-yenulfan deg yiseggasen n 60, llan wiyaḍ daɣen yekkaten ɣef wannect-a, yecban: Isulas, Inaṣliyen, Abranis, Imaziɣen Imula…atg. Ma deg yiseggasen n 70, yunag i tikkelt tamezwarut ɣer tmurt n Fransa, dɣa ifures tagnit dinna, yekkat-asen agiṭar i yicennayen-agi: Idir, Lewnis Ayt Mengellat akked Ferḥat Imaziɣen Imula. Yuɣal icennu, ur yeqqim ara kan d amẓawan neɣ d win yekkaten agiṭar. Dɣa yesselmed dinna timsirin n uẓawan, syin yuɣal isefray dɣa, deg yiseggasen n 80, yekcem s astudyu yessekles tizlit-is tamezwarut. Syin akkin yecna netta d Yidir akked Maxime le Forestier, tizlit-nni “Tizi Uzzu”. Yesɛa daɣen azal meqqren deg tefsut taberkant n yebrir 2001, yefka-asen afus n tallelt d wafud i iwatan i yilmeẓyen, ama s yidrimen-is ama s udawi d wayen-nniḍen.

  Tisfifin-is akked tezlatin-is 

 Deg useggas n 1981, i d-issufeɣ tasfift-is tamezwarut iwumi isemma “Sacrifice pour un enfant”, ideg llant 12 n tezlatin, gar-asen-: Tura d nnuba-m, Ass amcum, D ameddaḥ, Tiqubac…atg. Syin deg useggas n 1983, yerna-d tasfift tis snat iwumi iga isem “L’enfant de la terre”, ideg llan snat n tezlatin-agi: L’enfant de la terre, Tizi Uzzu. Aseggas kan mebɛed yerna-d album wis tlata iwummi yefka azwel “D acu-yi”, ideg llant 11 n tezlatin, gar-asent: Tajmilt i Sliman Ɛazem, Nnig tɣaltin, D yir aḥnunef, Wid iyi-ɛman…atg. Ma d tasfift-is tis rebɛa, yessuffeɣ-itt-id deg useggas n 1986, isemma-s “Ala, ala”. D tasfift ideg llant 10 n tezlatin, gar-asent ad nebder: Ay acewwiq, Ad cnuɣ, Ddxir, Tismin ulac…atg. Syin yeqqim alammi d 1988 i wakken ad yernu album-is wis xemsa, iwumi iga azwel-a “D ifrax i nella”. D tasfift ideg llant 9 n tezlatin, ad nader gar-asent: Semḥet-iyi, Yemma, At Mengellat, Titiche des montagnes…atg. Ma deg useggas n 1995, yesazreg-d CD wis setta iwumi isemma “A lbudala”, ideg ara naf 9 n tezlatin, gar-asen nezmer ad nefk amedya n: Amnet-iyi, I tegmat, Nadi-d lḥeqq, Ccteddu-yi…atg. S wakka, ad t-id naf belli d amedyaz, d amẓawan, d acennay i yecnan 14 n yiseggasen, yesɛa deg umecwar-is n ccna 6 n tesfifin d 83 n tezlatin s snat n tutlayin-agi: Taqbaylit akked tefransist.

  Aṭṭan-is d lmut-is 

 Yebda-t-id waṭṭan deg useggas n 2002, yedder 3 n yiseggasen n umdegger akked waṭṭan-is. Deg wass n 3 yennayer 2005 i t-teḥweṣ lmut tɣeddart, mazal urɛad yessaweḍ 51 n yiseggasen mi i yeǧǧa ddunit, maca yeǧǧa-d isem-is deg-s. Yemmut deg sbiṭer n Paris deg tmurt n Fransa, ma d tamḍelt-is, tella-d deg zzawiya n jeddi-s Lḥaǧ Belqasem deg Wat Leḥsen.Tura akka ɛeddan 13 n yiseggasen ɣef tmettant n yitri n ccna n teqbaylit Brahim Izri, maca mazal-it deg wallaɣ n yimdanen, yezga ɣef yilsawen-nsen i lmend n wayen yexdem d wayen i d-yeǧǧa. Yal tikkelt d anwa i d as-yettaran tajmilt, taddart-is yal aseggas txeddem-as asmekti, Axxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu, yexdem-as tajmilt meqqren deg yiseggasen yezrin, ula d tiddukka tadelsant Tarwa n Gaya n Reǧzwna txeddmen timsizzelt n ccna amaziɣ d tajmilt i netta deg useggas n 2016, ma d tiliẓri Berbere TV, tettmektay-it-id yal aseggas ama s tezlatin-is, ama s tmeɣriwin-is neɣ s umeslay fell-as, ama s tdiwennit-nni yexdem netta d Kamel Tarwiḥt. Yerra-s daɣen tajmilt ucennay Allawa, deg yiwet n tezlit anida i as-yeqqar: (Yella, yella ur temmuteḍ ara…). Gen deg talwit, ulamma tɣabeḍ am yitri deg yigenni, maca mazal-ik teddreḍ deg wulawen.

  Adaoun Abdelghani  

  
 Assn-nni n lexmis, 18 deg waggur-agi n maggu ideg nella, i ffɣen yiɛeggalen n Waggur azeggaɣ azzayri n tama n Ait Aissa Mimoun ɣer wakal n ladayra n Ouagenoune, i wakken ad d-jemɛen idrimen. Idrime swayes ara izmiren ad xedmen ṭṭhara i yigerdan akk inxessen deg tɣiwant-agi. Yal tassbḥit, s unecreḥ d lebɣi n temsetla i tteffɣen d igrawen yiɛeggalen n tuddsa-agi, kra ad d-zzin i tɣiwant-agi-nsen, ma d wiyaḍ ad rzun ɣer snat n tɣiwanin tijiratin; Ouagenoun akked Makouda. Lḥemla-agi, tella-d s uzwel-agi. “Ɛiwnet-aɣ, i wakken ad nizmir ad nɛiwen”. Ma d ajerred n yigerdan inxessen, iwumi bɣan yimawlan-nsen ad asen-d-ḍehren, ilaq fell-asen ad ten-jerrden deg wumuɣ n ṭṭhara, deg uxxam n Waggur azeggaɣ azzayri, yellan deg Aourir. Ajerred-agi, yebda ass-nni n ttlata 15 maggu 2018, ad yekfu ass larebɛa 30 maggu 2018. Ma d ṭṭhara n yigerdan-agi, ad d-tili ass n 27 deg waggur n Remḍan, ara d-yilin ass letnayen 11 yunyu 2018. 

   Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Deg taggara n useggas-a 2020 ara d-yeffeɣ usaru L’opium et le bâton s teqbaylit s uzwel Asebsi d Uɛekkaz. Yerra-t ɣer teqbaylit Samir Ait Belkacem s lmendad n Useqqamu Unnig n Timmuzɣa. Limmer mačči d kra n wuguren i d-mmugren deg umahil-a, tili yettuɛeggen ad d-yeffeɣ deg yiseggasen iɛeddan imi iswi n usizleg-is (adaptation) ɣer teqbaylit, d tajmilt n umulli wis 100 i win yuran adlis ‘’L’opium et le bâton’’ i yuɣalen, syin akkin, d asaru i d-yesuffeɣ Ahmed Rachedi. Wagi d amnadi, amussnaw,  amaru Mulud Mɛemmeri. ‘’Armi d tura i d-yewweḍ wass-is. Ha-t-an ihi ad d-yeffeɣ usaru-agi Asebsi d Uɛekkaz s wudem unṣib ass n, 18 deg duǧember 2020. Ass n usmekti n tlallit n Mulud Mɛemmeri i ilulen ass n, 18 deg duǧember 1917 deg Wat Yanni, lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu’’. 

 I aɣ-d-yenna Samir Ait Belkacem i yettwassnen nezzeh s leqdicat-is deg unnar  n ssinima, ladɣa s yisura LI MUČČU, KIKI, IFERFUCEN, PUČČI, ČREK, ƐLI D WAƐLI, d wiyaḍ i d-yerra ɣer teqbaylit. Ayen iwumi yeswakkeṛ tikkelt-a, yemgarad ɣef wayen iɛeddan imi ɣef wakken i t-id-ibeggen, ur ilaq ara ad d-yili ustehzi deg lecɣal yeqqnen ɣer umussnaw yecban Mulud Mɛemmeri. ‘’Armi ttekleɣ ɣef yiman-iw akked uswir-iw deg uḥric n usizleg i kkreɣ ɣer usenfar yecban wagi. Ayen yesɛan azal, ilaq-as wazal’’. I d-yenna ɣef usaru-agi. Akka dɣa, asmi ara walin yimdanen asaru Asebsi d Uɛekkaz s teqbaylit, ad as-inin yakk d tagi i d talɣa-s tamezwarut. Meḥsub, am wakken yettwaxdem s teqbaylit, syin rran-t ɣer taɛrabt. 

 Rnu ɣef wanect-a, tugniwin i yellan deg-s akka tura, ifent tid-nni n usaru-nni s taɛrabt imi ha-tent-in s HD. Ayen yugaren-aya, imi mačči d tasuqqilt i yexdem Samir Ait Belkacem i usaru-a. Ur d-yerri ara adiwenni-nni n taɛrabt ɣer teqbaylit. Netta yexdem amsasa (adaptation) u yexdem-it-id srid seg teɣbalut, seg udlis yura Mulud Mɛemmeri ‘’L’opium et le bâton’’. ‘’Xas ulamma ɛerḍeɣ akken ur ttebɛadeɣ ara mliḥ ɣef udiwenni-nni n taɛrabt, xersum deg unamek . Acu kan, nniɣ-t-id s unamek n teqbaylit ; s teqbaylit n yal ass n lweqt-nni’’. I aɣ-d-yesefhem bab n usenfar. Ayen yelhan, yelha akken i as-yenna winna. Ula d acennay Ait Menguellet mi i t-iwala deg ustidyu n Samir Ait Belkacem, yenna : ‘’Mačči d awali i walaɣ asaru-agi, meɛna ddreɣ-t’’. Amek ur t-yettidir ara, netta yecnan ‘’Tiɣri nesla mi nteṭṭeḍ, tezwar kul tayeḍ, ɣurwat ad as-tebrum ass-a’’. neɣ mi yenna :

  <em>‘’D leqrun mačči d kra </em> 

  <em>I tt-</em>  <em>ε</em>  <em>ussen amer ad texsi</em> 

  <em>Alarmi i a</em>  <em>γ</em>  <em>-d-tewweḍ ass-a</em> 

  <em>Tirgit gar-ane</em>  <em>γ</em>  <em> i d-te</em>  <em>γ</em>  <em>li</em> 

  <em>Kul wa d as</em>  <em>γ</em>  <em>er i as-d-yerna</em> 

  <em>I</em>  <em>ε</em>  <em>awen-itt yis-s ad d-teflali</em> 

  <em>Is</em>  <em>γ</em>  <em>aren-nni, ad d-gen taffa</em> 

  <em>Ajajiḥ deg yigenni ad yali’’ </em> 

 D tanagit ɣef umahil zeddigen i yettwaxedmen seg wul akked tmussni
lqayen deg uḥric-agi n ssinima s umata, s usizleg s wuzzig. 

  Hocine
Moula     

  
 Malika Ben Aḥsen, d yiwet n tlemẓit taqbaylit, i d-yekkren deg temnaḍt n Wehran, i yettidiren dinna. Ɣur-s yiwen n uṣenfar i tettheggi ɣef tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Imi nettat d tanelmadt i d-yekfan tizrawin n Master deg ugezdu n teglizit deg useggas n 2014. Tesɛedda timsizzelt akken ad tɛeddi ɣer uswir n Doctorat, dɣa din i tefren ad d-yili usentel n tezrawt-is ɣef tmaziɣt, tutlayt-is n tyemmat. D tazrawt iwumi tefka asentel “Arabophones’ attitudes towards the teaching of tamazight the case of Oran”. 

 Tebda leqdic-is akka tura qrib kraḍ n yiseggasen. Tettkemmil s unadi di temkerḍiyin ideg tezmer ad taf idlisen ara tt-yallen deg uṣenfar-is, txeddem tirza yal tikkelt ara tili tegnit ɣef tutlayt n tmaziɣt s umata s tmagit d yidles d tmeslayt, ama d timliliyin neɣ isaragen i d-yettilin deg Wehran. Yal tikkelt tḥedder, tleqqeḍ-d isallen sya u sya. Mi tesɛa akud, trezzu ula ɣer tmurt n Leqbayel, tetteg anadi-ines s lebɣi meqqren, akken ad t-tekfu deg lawan. 

 Imi yekcem uselmed n tmaziɣt ɣer uɣerbaz deg Wehran, tufa-tt daɣen d tagnit-nniḍen, anda tḥedder i temsirin daxel n tneɣriyin n tmaziɣt, mbeɛd mi d-tewwi ttesriḥ seg tenmehla n usedwel. Tettwali tarrayin swayes xeddmen yiselmaden, testeqsay-iten. Ɣer taggara, txeddem ineqqisen d tesleḍt, tettaṭṭaf tugniwin i yinelmaden akken ad tent-tseddu deg tezrawt-is. Nesteqsa-tt ɣef wayɣer i tefren tutlayt n tmaziɣt deg tezrawt-is, d wamek i tt-id-tusa tikti-a akked yiswi-ines seg usenfar-a. Tenna-aɣ-d: “Bdiɣ xeddmeɣ kra n leqdicat ɣef tmaziɣt i yiman-iw kan seg useggas n 2014, mi lliɣ qqareɣ Master. Bɣiɣ dima ad geɣ kra ɣef tutlayt-iw n tyemmat, maca ur ẓriɣ ara ɣef wacu swaswa. 

 Almi d yiwet n tikkelt taselmadt-iw di tesdawit n tsekla tafriqt, tenna-aɣ-d ameslay i mazal deg wallaɣ-iw ar ass-a ; tenna-d ma ur texdimem ara kunwi ɣef tutlayin-nwen, d iberraniyen ara igen leqdic fell-asent. Dɣa imir ɣetseɣ ad ddmeɣ amedya n Wehran ɣef walmud-inu. Asentel n taggara n tezrawt n Master yella-d ɣef « L’alternance codique des Kabyles d’Oran », yeɛni Leqbayel yettmslayen taqbaylit, maca sexlaḍen imeslayen n taɛrabt s waṭas. Mi rebḥeɣ timsizzelt n doctorat, abrid ɣef uṣenfar yella yakan yenǧer.

  Seld mi tuɣal tmaziɣt d tunṣibt u llan-d yidgan n uselmed deg uɣerbaz di Wehran, furseɣ tagnit, giɣ asentel « Les attitudes des arabphones envers l’enseignement de tamaziɣt à Oran », iswi n waya, d addud sɛan yimseɛraben di tikli n uselmed n tmaziɣt ɣer sdat, tikwal d win yelhan, tikwal-nniḍen yettxuṣṣ. Akken teẓram, adduden-a, sɛan tixuṭert meqqren deg wayen akk yerzan aselmed n yal tutlayt akken tebɣu tili. Ayɣer ala, tamuɣli-a n wid ur nettmeslay ara tamaziɣt ad d-tili seg tama tufrart (positive), u d wa i d asirem n yal aqbayli yettidiren deg temnaḍt timseɛrebt.

 Daɣen, d ameslay ɣef tebɣest d lǧehd i xeddmen yiselmaden-a akken ad tt-ssiwḍen, ad tt-sḥemmlen i yimseɛraben ɣas akken ttmagaren uguren deg waṭas n tikkal. Ma ɣef wacuɣer ferneɣ tutlayt n tmaziɣt, d leḥmala tameqqrant n tutlayt-iw i yi-izedɣen seg temẓi-w”.

<p style="text-align:right">  Khaled Achoui 

  
 Deg tdiwennit-agi, newwi-d awal ɣef wungal aneggaru akked yisenfaren i d-tettheggi temyarut Cabha Ben Gana.

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen: Di tazwara, ma tzemreḍ ad tesissneḍ iman-im i wid ur akem-nessin ara yakkan? 
  Cabḥa Ben Gana: D tasdawant deg ugezdu n tutlayt amaziɣ di tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, deg uswir n Master 2 di tuzzagt n tesnalsit. Kkreɣ-d di taddart n Kuku i d-yezgan di tɣiwant n At Yeḥya di Micli. D tamarut n yiwet n tullist i wumi semmaɣ “Amsebrid”, tura akka rniɣ adlis-iw wis sin i yellan d ungal.

  Amek armi i d-tufa Cabḥa Ben Gana timeɣrit, tasdawant, iman-s d taneggalt? 
  Di tazwara, ttaruɣ isefra, d iḍrisen imecṭaḥ, d teqsiḍen ur ttɛedday ara nnig n tlata (3) n yisebtar. Armi d asmi kecmeɣ ɣer tesdawit, uriɣ tullisin, ssufɣeɣ-d yiwet deg Ueseqqamu unnig n uimuzɣa (HCA) deg useggas n 2015. Syin akkin, dehmeɣ annar-agi n tsekla s wungal-agi amsebrid, i yuriɣ gar 2010 d 2012.

  D anwa i d acuddu amezwaru i akem-yurzen qbel ɣer tsekla, tira n wungal akked tira n tmedyazt? 
  Acuddu amenzu gar-i d tsekla tamaziɣt, yella–d ɣer tmedyazt d tizlit taqbaylit : Am Meɛtub, Zeddak Mulud, Lewnis At Mangellat, Newara…atg. Ma yella ɣer wungal s tɣuri-inu n yidlisen d wungalen yettwarun ama s tefransist ama s teqbaylit, kkreɣ-d gar wungalen.

  D yiwet daɣen gar tneggalin timezwura s teqbaylit, d acu i d aḥulfu-inem ɣef waya? 
  Di yiwet n tama, ferḥeɣ imi lliɣ gar tneggalin timenza s tutlayt n teqbaylit, di tama-nniḍen d tamsit ( responsabilité), ssarameɣ ayen uriɣ d ayen ara yefken tabɣest i tiyaḍ akken ad d-run s teqbaylit.

  Amsebrid, d taqsiḍt ɣezzifen i icudden gar Usirem d Tlelli deg wungal-a, segzu-aɣ-tt-id di kra n tefyar? 
  Assaɣ yellan gar Usirem d Tlelli, ur yeqqim ara kan d assaɣ-nni yellan gar sin yemḥemmalen, tayri-nsen d tayri yebnan ɣef tdukli. Taqsiḍt mačči ɣef yiwen n uwudam i tebna, mačči yiwet n teqsḍt i yettezzin, maca εerḍeɣ ad tent-cuddeɣ ad tent-sddukleɣ di yiwet n teqsiḍt ɣezzifen. Ɛeddeɣ-d si tmetti taqburt ar tmetti ideg nettidir tura; si taqsiḍt n Muḥend Arezqi d gma-s Ɛmer ɣer teqsiḍt n sin yilmeẓyen :Asirem d Tlelli. Meslayeɣ-d ɣef kra n tlufa i nettidir tura, ama ɣef tmuɣli n tmetti ɣer tmeṭṭut tilellit , d tmuɣli n tmeṭṭut ɣer tlelli…atg.

  Cabḥa Ben Gana d tameɣnast n tmaziɣt, d tameɣnast diɣ n yizerfan n tmeṭṭut, amek armi? 
  Tameɣnast n tmaziɣt, ahat si tutlayt i yi-ttwaksen mi mezziyeɣ. Deg uxxam, nettmeslay s teqbaylit, mi wwḍeɣ ɣer uɣerbaz, ufiɣ d tulayt-nniḍen, tutlayt-iw tuɣal di rrif, ur tesɛi ara amekkan deg wahil aɣurbiz. Ma yella d tameɣnast n yizarfan n tmeṭṭut, sleḥqeɣ-d tallit-nni ideg i tettwarez tmeṭṭut s yisem n wansayen, ulac tirga, ulac iswan, lebɣi-ines yettwamḍal deg yiman-is ; ad t-temḍel uqbel ad t-remlen. 

  D acu n umynut i d-yewwi umsebrid i tsekla tamaziɣt, ladɣa ungal amaziɣ amiran? 
  Mačči d nekk ara d yinin annect-agi, asteqsi-agi ad d-rren fell-as yimeɣriyen, d wid yellan deg uḥric amazɣan n tsekla d wid isenqaden tasekla. 

  Ahat d arraz-nni n wungal n tmeṭṭut Yamina Micakra i d akem-isbeɣsen i wakken ad t-id-sazregeḍ neɣ ad tebduḍ ungal-nniḍen? 
  Ungal-agi, ttekiɣ yis-s deg temsizzelt Yamina Micakra, imi yuɣ lḥal serseɣ-t ɣer tezrigin Imru. Ulamma yettwafren-d gar tlata-nni imenza s tutlayt n tamaziɣt, maca lliɣ serseɣ-t yakan i wakken ad d-yeffeɣ. Tabɣest, fkan-iyi-tt-id yiselmaden-iw, d yimeddukkel-iw akked leḥmmala-w i tira.

  Yadra ma yella-d usenqed-ines sɣur at tmussni uqbel ad d-yeffeɣ, neɣ akken kan xeddmen wiyaḍ imi d tamaziɣt wicqa? 
  Uqbel ad d-yeffeɣ, fkiɣ-t i wid i t-yeɣran, am Mass Saɛid Cemmax, dɣa d netta i yi-xedmen tazwert, d kra-nniḍen yellan deg uḥric-agi n tsekla. 

  D acu yettraǧun sya ɣer sdat Cabḥa Ben Gana d wungal-is? 
 Ttraǧuɣ timuɣliwin n yimeɣriyen, d usenqed n wungal-agi, imi d annect-a ahat ara i yi-ǧǧen i wakken ad d-fkeɣ ugar deg ungal i d-iteddun. Ma d nekk, ttraǧun-iyi aṭas n leqdicat, isaragen, izenza s ubuddu, tidwilin…atg.

  Sya d afella, ad tezwireḍ deg wungal wis sin neɣ deg wammud n tmedyazt i tettheggiḍ? 
  Ar tura, mazal ur i yi-d-iban ara, acu kan, ttheggiɣ ungal-nniḍen d yiwen wammud n tmedyazt.

  Awal n taggara… 
  Tamezwarut, ssarameɣ ad ilin s tuget wid yeqqaren s tmaziɣt, imi tasekla ur teḥwaǧ ara kan wid yettarun, teḥwaǧ ula d wid yeqqaren. Tin ɣur-s, ad ak-inniɣ tanemmirt i kečč, tanemmirt i kra n win i yi-d-yefkan afus n tallelt, d tebɣest segmi bdiɣ tira almi d ass n tlalit n wungal-agi Amsebrid.

<p style="text-align:right">  Yesteqsa-tt Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Teḍra-d yiwet n tirza n yiɛeggalen n Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa, ass-nni n ssebt 08 cutember 2018, ɣer temnaḍt n Tgemmunt Ɛezzuz (taɣiwant n Ayt Meḥmud, 20 n yikilumitren deg unẓul-asamer n Tizi Uzzu), akken ad ssfeqden imuhal n useḍru n usebdad n ugellid amaziɣ Massensen deg usikew (atelier) i d-yelhan yis-s. D amaray amatu n Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa, Mass Si El Hachemi Assad, i yellan ɣef uqerru n tmagla-a (délégation) n tuddssa (HCA) ɣer yid-s umesɣiwan (aselway n tɣiwant) n Lezzayer talemmast, Mass Abdelhakim Bettache, ɣer yidis n Mohamed El Hadi Hireche akked uselway n tesqamut n « Temsizwert taɣelnawt n useḍru n usebdad n Masensen », i d-yelḥan s leqdic-agi. Deg yiwen n yinaw (discours) wezzilen i tɣamsa, yerra Mass Assad tajmilt i wid akk yettekkan deg userbeḥ n tekti-a, am wakken i d-yenna : « Leqdic-agi, ad yettwanqec i lebda deg umezruy-nneɣ d win n temnaḍt-a n At Dwala, i d-yefkan aṭas i timmuzɣa ». Asbedad-a, ad yesɛu 3 n lmitrat deg teɣzi, yerna ad d-yesqam s 24 n yimelyunen n yidinaren. Yetturaǧu, ad yettwasbed deg tazwara n useggas i d-itteddun, deg umraḥ n Tafura, deg tɣiwant n Lezzayer talemmast, ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna uselway n tɣiwant n Lezzayer tamaneɣt, Mass Abdelhakim Bettache. Takti n usseḍru n usebdad n ugellid anumidi Masnsen, tella-d deg taggara n usarag-nni agraɣlan i d-yettwassuddsen ɣef ugellid-a deg temdint n Lexrub, deg lwilaya n Qsenṭina, deg useggas n 2014, ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna Mass Assad: “Asebdad-agi, seg yidis azamulan, yesɛa azal meqqren, imi ad yettekki deg useɣref (vulgarisation) n umezruy azzayri”. Ad d-nesmekti, belli timsizwert-agi taɣelnawt i useḍru n usebdad-agi, tebda deg useggas n 2015, anda i tefka teseqqamut n ufran tagnit i yinaẓuren yettenǧaren aẓru, i wakken ad ttekkint deg usenfar-a. Snat n tikkal i tfuk temsizwert-a war agemmuḍ iqqenɛen taseqqamut i d-yelhan yis-s. Sakin, deg tikkelt tis tlata, fernen asikew n “Ingel” i unǧer n uẓru, ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna Mohamed El Hadi Hireche, aselway n teseqqamut n temsizwert-a. Ɣer taggara, iger-d Mass Assad tiɣri, i lmend n waya, i yimasayen (responsables) n temdinin n Ɛennaba, Suq Ahṛas d Ɛin Timucent akken ad ḍefrent amedya n tɣiwant n Lezzayer talemmast, yerna ad ssersent isebdaden d tajmilt i wudmawen-a imezruyanen i uttekki deg usisen d tmussni n umezruy-nneɣ.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ttawilat akk, ttwaheggan akken ilaq i lmend n tuɣalin ɣer wammasen yerzan asileɣ d uselmed asadar (professionnelle), ara d-yilin deg wass wis 23 cutamber i d-iteddun, i d-iwekked uneɣlaf n usileɣ asadar, Mohamed Mebarki, deg yiwet n tdiwennit i Tnegga n yisallen n Lezzayer (APS). Dɣa deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i lmend n tuɣalin-agi ɣer yisɣuren n useḥfeḍ n lḥurfat, ttwajerden wugar n 300 n yimunan imaynuten, ara ixedmen asileɣ ɣef teɣzi n useggas deg yisɣuren n usileɣ asadar i yellan deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Si tama-s, iger-d tiɣri unemhal n usileɣ akked uselmed asadar, Rachid Louhi, i yilmeẓyen i wakken ad qesden tuddsa-agi, ara asen-ineǧren abrid n uxeddim. Ugar n 76 n tuzzagin (spécialités) ideg zemren ad fernen yilmeẓyen i ijerden iman-nsen deg wunuɣen n usileɣ i useggas-agi amaynut 2018-2019. Ajerred yebdan seg wass-nni n 15 yulyu ad yessali ass n ssebt 15 deg cutember-agi ideg nella. Ma ɣef umaynut n tuɣalin-agi, yenna-d Mass Rachid Louhi : « Nesnulfa-d 9 n tuzzagin timaynutin ara yettwaslemden seg wass amenzu n tuɣalin-agi n useggas-agi 2018-2019 ». Am wakken daɣen ara llin tiwwura-nsen kra n yisɣuren-nniḍen deg wussan-agi i d-iteddun, gar-asen : Sin-nni n wammasen imaynuten, yiwen deg Azeffoun wayeḍ deg Oued Falli, ɣer tama n tlata n tnawalin n 100 n yimukan i wammasen-agi : win n Sidi Naamane, win n Beni Yenni akked win Tizi Gheniff. Ussan n ufran n yiḥafaḍen-agi, ad ilin ass n 16, 17 akked 18 cutember 2018, ma d ass unṣib n unekcum, ad yili ass n lḥed 23 cutember i d-iteddun.

  G. A. 

  
 Am wakken neẓra, tamurt n leqbayel s umata, neɣ tamnaḍt n Wagennun s wuzig, teṭṭef deg urmud-agi n uzemmur, imi tettwassen aṭas s yiḥerqan d tferkiwin yeččuren d ṭṭjur n uzemmur, imi, daɣen, tuget n wakal n tama-a d azemmur i t-iɛemren.

 Dɣa seg wass-nni n ssebt, 28 deg waggur n tuber, i d amenzu n Leḥlal deg leḥsab n tfellaḥt ɣer yimaziɣen, i ffɣen yimezdaɣ n tudrin n temnaḍt-agi, ad jemɛen azemmur-nsen. Ɣef wakken i d-qqaren yimɣaren n tama-agi, ur beddun ara medden lqeḍ n uzemmur alamma d amenzu n Leḥlal, yerna ad rǧun ass n ttlala neɣ lexmis deg ddurt tamenzut n waggur n unbir i wakken ad jemɛen iɛeqqayen imenza. Imi ɣef leḥsab-nsen mi ara bdun deg sin wussan-agi, tettili lɣella s waṭas, yerna ula d tissirt n uzemmur, ur tettciddi ara deg wussan-nniḍen n ddurt, ilaq d ttlata neɣ d lexmis. Dɣa deg temnaḍt n Wagennun, mazal ar tura ṭṭfen deg leɛwayed-agi i icudden ɣer uzemmur. Dɣa tikkelt-agi, newwi-d awal ɣef yiwet n tessirt gar tisyar timezwura deg temnaḍt-agi n Wagennun. Lemɛineṣra-agi n uzemmur yellan deg taddart n Tḥanut, yettwassnen s yisem n Tissirt n Lḥaǧ Saɛid, i yeẓẓden i waṭas n tudrin i d as-id-yezzin, gar-asent : Tizi, Imqecren, Iɣil Buccen, Iḥdiqawen, Ibussaden, Aqawej, Ixelwiyen, Tiqubɛin, Amalu…atg. Tura ad d-nefk kra n yissalen fell-as, si tama n umezruy, seg wasmi i telli i tikkelt tamezwarut deg 1 n yennayer n useggas n 1971, ur teḥbis ara ar tura. Syin akkin uɣen-as amkan anida llan waman n uɣbalu (l’eau de source).Yuɣ-itt-id Lḥaǧ Saɛid Melyani netta d uḍeggal-is, seg temnaḍt n At Dwala, deg useggas n 1970, syin akkin deg useggas n 1971 i tebda teẓẓad azemmur i tikkelt tamezwarut. Tura akka, ɣur-s 46 deg leɛmer-is. Yerna ulamma imawlan-is imezwura yeǧǧa-ten lweqt, dɣa Lḥaǧ Saɛid Melyani yesɛa tura 93 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, ma d aḍeggal-s Kaben yemmut ad t-yerḥem Rebbi, maca arraw-nsen, ur ǧǧin ara agerruj-agi ad iruḥ gar yifassen-nsen, dɣa akken qqaren wat zik : « yessers uḥeddad afḍis, yerfed-it mmi-s ». Tura ad nuɣal ɣer leḥsabat n wayenn i icudden s azemmur akked zzit. Deg useggas mi ara yili uzemmur s waṭas, xeddmen s snat n trebbuyaɛ n yixeddamen : yiwet txeddem deg uzal, tayeḍ deg yiḍ. Xeddment gar 60 alamma d 70 n wussan, yal tarbaɛt txeddem 12 n lebrayes, yal lebris yettawi 3 n yiqenṭaren n uzemmur. Annect-a, yebɣa ad d-yinni belli ẓẓaden 24 n lebrayes neɣ 72 n yiqenṭaren n uzemmur deg 24 n ssaɛa. S umata, ẓẓaden gar 1400 alamma d 1600 n lebrayes neɣ gar 4000 alamma d 5000 n yiqenṭaren n uzemmur deg useggas. Ma yella ixuṣ uzemmur, xeddmen kan yiwet n terbɛt, azal n 30 neɣ 35 n wussan, annect-a, yebɣa ad d-yinni belli ẓẓaden 12 n lebrayes neɣ 36 n yiqenṭaren n uzemmur deg 24 n ssaɛa. S umata, ẓẓaden gar 1400 alamma d 1600 n lebrayes neɣ gar 2000 alamma d 2500 n yiqenṭaren n uzemmur deg useggas. S umata, tisirt-agi, tbeddu axeddim deg taggara n waggur-agi n duǧamber, maca aseggas-agi deg tlemmast-is, akka tura bdan s yiwet n terbaɛt, imi ur yettuqet ara uzemmur tasiɛt-a, yetturaǧu ad faken deg taggara n waggur n furar 2018. Ma d aqenṭar n uzemmur ɣef wakken i d-yenna Melyani Lwennas, yettwassnen s yisen n Akli, mmi-s n Lḥaǧ Saɛid, belli yettemxalaf uzemmur : yella win i d-yettakken 10 litrat i uqenṭar yella win i d-yefkan ilindi ugar n 20 litrat i uqerṭar, leḥsab n 60 ar 70 litrat i lebris. Deg wayen yerzan ssummat yenna-d belli « aqenṭar n uzemmur aseggas-a, yewweḍ ɣer 650DA ma d lebris ad yaweḍ ɣer 1900DA neɣ 2000DA ». Yetturaǧu netta belli litra n zzit ad teqqim s 800DA, ur trennu ara imi tella lɣella n uzemmur. Dɣa ɣer taggara ha-t-an wacu i d-aɣ-d-yenna, Melyani Lwennas yiwen gar yimawlan n tssirt-a n uzemmur : « Nessaram ilmeẓyen-nneɣ ad ṭṭfen deg ugerruj-agi n uzemmur i d aɣ-d-ǧǧan lejdud-nneɣ, u d lwaǧeb fell-aɣ nekkni s yimawlan, ad nessiḥmil arraw-nneɣ lxedma n wakal akked tfellaḥt n uzemmur, imi nettwassen yis-s mliḥ, yerna aṭas n twaculin i tɛawen zzit n uzemmur deg tudert-nsen ».

  Adaoun Ghani. 

  
  Isufar 

 – 500 g n yiferrawen n uẓegḍuf

 – 1 n tebsel

 – 1 n tbaṭaṭat

 – 1 n tfenzet n ticcert

 – 2 n tɣenjawin n lmakla n zzit uzemmur

 – Lmelḥ d ifelfel aberkan

  Aheggi 

 Deg tazwara, seḥmut taɣenjawt n zzit n uzemmur. Sqecret lebsel d ticcert. Qqlut lebsel-nni, syin, rnut-as ticcert. Terrem ɣer daxel-is iferrawen n uẓekḍuf, reggim-ten i wakken ad qqlun azal n 5’ alamma ffsin. Gezmet tura lbaṭaṭa d iḥricen imecṭaḥ, tesewwem-tt daxel n waman imelḥanen. Mi tewwa, rnut-t ɣer yiferrawen n uẓegḍuf. Mi ara as-ternum ciṭ n useqqi n uyaziḍ, ẓdem kullec. S tezmert-nwen. 

  Daya 

  
 Ass n 20 yebrir 2019 i d amulli wis 39 n Tefsut n ttmanyin, wis 18 n Tefsut Taberkant. D azemz i aɣ-d-yesmektayen ilemẓiyen-nni ileqqaqen i yeɣlin s rrsas n udabu azzayri imi kkren ad sutren tilelli, tugdut d ulmad n tutlayt-nsen deg uɣerbaz. Kra n yimalasen dɣa send ttiɛad-a n usfuggel d usmekti, aṭas n tamiwin d tddukkliwin i d-yegren tiɣri i tikli di Bgayet, Tizi Uzzu d Tubiret, abeɛda Amussu n ufraniman n Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen. Maca daɣen, seld aberriḥ-nni mucaɛen n « Xawa-xawa », i d-yeffɣen di tnekkra-a taɣerfant n ugdud azzayri, yella inuḥ usirem ɣur waṭas n yimdanen d kra n yimeɣnasen akken zun ad d-ilint tekliwin-a n usmekti ula deg temnaḍin-nniḍen n Lezzayer. I wakken xersum ad d-tbin ugar tegmat-a i ttawin ddeqs deg yimawen-nsen. 

 D acu kan, ayen i aɣ-d-yesken wass n sed 20 yebrir 2019, icuba kan wayen nwala deg yiseggasen iɛeddan, ulamma d amussu n MAK i yeṭṭfen tasga tameqqrant. Meḥsub, ulac akk win i d-yerran i tiɣri n « xawa-xawa » seg twilayin-nniḍen n Lezzayer ideg ur ssawalen taqbaylit. Ɣef waya dɣa, ddeqs n yimura, ineɣmasen d yimeɣnasen, i d-yuran deg yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen, mesteqsan ɣef wamek teffeɣ taggara taluft-a. Ad d-nesmekti d akken llant-d tekliwin di kraḍ n twilayin n tmurt n Yizwawen, ɣas ulamma yella wanida tewɛer tikli neɣ ur wwiḍen yimeɣnasen s amkan di lawan. 

 Ula d acennay amḥaddi Zedek Mulud, yuɣal-d beddemma si Fransa akken ad yelḥu d ugdud ɣef yiman n yimeɣrasen n Tefsut n ttmanyin d Tefsut taberkant. Daɣen, i uselɣu, gar wudmawen i yekkin deg tikli, yella uselway aqbur n Ugraw i yidles d tugdut (RCD) Mass Saɛid Seɛdi akked yisegbaren iqdimen n Umussu Adelsan Amaziɣ (MCB). Ma yella d akabar n FFS ur d-iban, amzun akken ur t-teɛni taluft. Ɣas ahat llan deg-s yimeɣnasen, maca tasertit n ukabar tḥettem-d abrid-nniḍen taggara-a. Seld agemmuḍ-nniḍen ideg ala Iqbayliyen i d-yesmektayen tifsutin-a n tnekkra, aṭas i yettmesteqsayen dɣa ma yella ad nessawal i Tefsut n ttmanyin «Tefsut n Yimaziɣen» neɣ «Tefsut n Yiqbayliyen»?

  M. K. 

  
 Am yal aseggas, yesmekta-d umaḍal 3 deg duǧember-a ass agraɣlan n yimeɛḍar. D tagnit dɣa akken ad ttnernayen yizerfan n tecriḥt-a n tmetti, ad ttafen yettishil uzday-nsen inmetti. Deg tmurt n Lezzayer, mačči deg liḥala igerrzen i yettidir umeɛḍur s umata, seg wakken d adday ayendin uẓayer i asen-yefka uwanek. 

 D ameslay, tazwara ɣef uɣrud (pension) amayyur i d-ttawin, i yeqqimen deg 4000 n yidinaren seg wacḥal tura d aseggas, ulamma tbeddel teɣlayt n tudert, bedlent tegnatin daɣen. Seg tama n unabaḍ, ad d-yeffeɣ kra n wawal i kra n wussan zun a-t-an lqidar n uɣrud-a ad yernu, sakkin ad tettwattu taluft. 

 Am wawal n Massa Muniya Meslem, taneɣlaft n temsetlelt, deg umaṭṭaf aɣelnaw aseggas n 2014. Ass-nni tenna-d: « Aɣrud n umeɛḍur, ad iɛeddi seg 4000 ɣer 8000 n yidinaren ». Kraḍ n yiseggasen, zrin seg yimir-nni, mazal yeṭṭef uwanek deg ustehzi-ines ɣef yimdanen-a at asrayen uzzigen. Ula d takerḍa tamaynut n umeɛḍur, tella tetturaǧu i lmend n waya deg 2016, maca ṭṭsen waman d isɣaren. 

 Seg tama-nniḍen, ttmagaren-d yimdanen-a ugur d ameqqran iɣef ulac aṭas n umeslay: wa d ugur n unekcum (accessibilité). D ayen i yeǧǧan addad-nsen a-t-an deg yir liḥala deg tmurt-nsen. Ulamma aṭas-aya segmi i d-ffɣen yisuḍaf i yettḥettimen ɣef wid ibennun ad gen ttawil n uɛeddi i umeɛḍur, abeɛda mi ara yilint tebnayin-nni d ayla n baylek, akka am tɣiwant, tasreqqest, tazeqqa n udawi, axxam n yilemẓiyen, anammas adelsan, amezgun, ssinima, taɣsert, atg. Wanag mazal ar ass-a ixuss unekcum i umeɛḍur, neɣ ulac-it yakk tikwal. « S anda ma rriɣ ur ttafeɣ anekcum akken i d-yeqqar usaḍuf. Ula d amḍiq i yemmugen i tceryulin deg uneḥbus n tkeryas n Tezmalt, ufiɣ kran-t i wid yeznuzuyen uẓẓim d lqahwa ». 

 D awal n yiwen n umiyupat seg tezmalt. I d-yernan: « ula d tumnayt deg tmacint, yak yeqqar-d usaḍuf aql-itt baṭṭel i yak imeɛḍar. Maca wid ixeddmen deg tmacint ttḥettimen-iyi ad xellseɣ. Ɣas ad asen-sekneɣ takerḍa n umeɛḍur, ad iyi-d-afen ssebba akka d wakka». Yir addad-a n yimeɛḍar, d tilawt s anda ma terriḍ deg tmurt n Lezzayer. Maca wid i teɛna taluft sɛuẓẓugen, ayyuren d yiseggasen ttɛeddin war abeddel.

  M. K. 

  
 Wissen i wacu tesseɣzef teseqqamut yettwakelfen s twennaḍt d tezdeg akked tdawsa n useqqamu aɣelnaw n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu azemz aneggaru n usersi n zzmam n uttekki deg temsizzelt-agi i yetturaǧun ad yili ass n 15 yulyu neɣ ɛad 20 yulyu 2019 ? 

 I usmekti tallit tamezwarut n ujerred n tudrin yebɣan ad ttekkint deg tezrigt tis sebɛa n temsizzelt n tezdeg Aïssat Rabah, tella-d seg 10 meɣres 2019 armi d 30 yebrir 2019. Deg taggara n waggur n yebrir, ala 15 n tuddar i ijerden iman-nsen, sɣezfen-as i tallit-agi n ujerred, i yetturaǧun ad tessali ass n 15 yulyu neɣ ɛad 20 yulyu i d-iteddun. 

 Alaḥsab n yisallen i d aɣ-yewwḍen seg teseqqamut-agi, di taggara n waggur-agi n yunyu iɛeddan, ala 63 n tudrin i yettwajerden deg tezrigt-agi tis sebɛa. Yenqqes s waṭas umḍan-agi ɣef useggas iɛeddan, i yewwḍen ɣer 102 n tuddar, dayen uɣur ssaramen yiɛeggalen n teseqqamut-agi ad t-awḍen s useɣsef n tallit n ujerred. 

 Ahat d amherkel-agi aɣerfan i d-yellan deffir n waya. Imi taseqqamut yettwakelfen s twennaḍt d tezdeg akked tdawsa deg Useqqamu-a, tessashel merra ttawilat i tuddar yenwan ad ttekkint, ilaq fell-asent ad sersent zzmamat-nsent ɣer Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya ideg tella kan tuttra n uttekki akked taččart n tferkit n uttekki. 

 Mačči am tezrigin iɛeddan, imi tikkelt-agi, tudrin yebɣan ad tekkint deg tezrigt n useggas-a ur ḥwaǧent ara ttbut n tilin (agréments) n tseqquma n tuddar, xas ulamma llant tudrin ur neksib ara tiseqquma n tuddar, zemrent tddukkiliwin n twennaḍt ad ɛemrent tiferkit-nni n uttekki.

  Amaynut d uktazal n tezrigt-agi tis ṣat 

 Ma ɣef umaynut n tezrigt-agi tamaynut, yetturaǧu ad ttwaferqen 10 n warrazen ɣef mrawet n tuddar ara d-yufraren. Ala xemsa-nni n tuddar timezwura n tezrigt iɛeddan, i izemren ad ttekkint deg tedwilt-agi tis 7, ma d tuddar yewwin arraz wis 6, wis 7, wis 8 d wis 9 akked wis 10 tezrigt iɛeddan, ur zmirent ad ttekkint deg tezrigt-agi. Ad yili diɣ, usewseɛ n teseqqamut n uktazal d usenqeḍ n temsizzelt, imi yal tanmehla tadigant ad d-tefk imgenses-ines, yerna ad yettekki uḥric n tgemmi deg usenqeḍ. 

 Am wakken daɣen, ara d-slalen timḥezwert “Best off” n tezdeg, ara d-yilin gar 5 n tuddar i d-yufraren deg semmus n tezrigin timenza, si tmezwarut-nni n 2006 armi uqbel taneggarut-agi, tinna n 2017. Ma d iswi-ines d asebɣes n ukemmel n usizdeg n tuddar-agi, ma d tadrimt yettuɛegnen i waya mazal ur d-iban ara wazal-is. Rnu ɣer tmerna n 05% deg tedrimt i yettak Useqqamu Aɣelnaw n Lwilaya i tɣiwant ideg ara d-tifrir taddart tamenzwarut, imi yewweḍ watug-agi ar 25% mačči 20% am zik. Ma si tama n tfelwit n uktazal, ad d-yili usenqeḍ ɣef 112 tenqiḍin. 

 25 tneqqiḍin rzant aseddu n yiḍuman d wammus, ma d afran iwatan n yiḍuman ɣur-s 10 n tneqqiḍin. Aɛiwed n usexdem-nsen yesɛa 10 n tneqqiḍin, xemsa-nniḍen (5) ɣef tarrayt n ujmeɛ n yiḍuman. Imeḍqan uzyizen (publique), yecban tajmaɛt, imekwan n tizegzewt… atg ɣef 15 tneqiḍin mačči 20 am useggas iɛeddan, ula d iberdan n taddart ad ttwasneqḍen kan ɣef 20 n tezmilin mačči ɣef 25 am yilindi. Ma d imeḍqan n yidles d tmussni akked yisebdaden ɣef 12 tneqiḍin, areqqeɛ d uẓeggem ɣef 10 tneqiḍin, ma d xemsa-nni i d-yeqqimen i usnerni n taddart (aménagement).

 Ɣer taggara maḍi, ad d-nesmekti belli tazrigt n useggas yezrin d taddart n Azemmour Ou Meriem i yewwin arraz amezwaru, ma d tinna uqbel-is d taddart n Tiferdoud i tt-yewwin d tamezwarut deg 2017.
  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Seg tama n Yiferḥunen, deg Tizi Uzzu, i d-yusa yisalli ara yesferḥen akk imura Izwawen abeɛda, imeɣnasen n tmaziɣt s umata. Seld ayendin n leɛtab d ugani yennulfa-d dayen uxxam n teẓrigin n Gamar d Seddiri s yisem n « Tiẓrigin Ccix Muḥend Ulḥusin ». I lmend n waya dɣa, nenced yiwen seg yimḍebbren n teẓrigin akken ad nwali tasedmirt-is tamenzut ɣef usenfar d wayen i ten-ideggren s waṭas ɣur-s. « Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ ayen i aɣ-yeǧǧan ad nger deg usenfar-a, d ayen njerreb d lmeḥna deg umaḍal n usiẓreg n udlis. Ihi nebɣa ad nɛiwen imura-nneɣ deg usiweḍ n wayen ttarun i yimeɣriyin.Ta d tamezwarut. Syinna, iban nesɛa iswi ad nexdem ɣef yidles aqbayli. Ɣef waya i tt-negzem di rray belli amur ameqqran akk n wayen ara d-nessufuɣ, ad yili s teqbaylit ». D awal n Mbarek Gamar, send ad d-yuɣal ɣer wuguren i d-mlalen deg ubrid netta akk Massa Seddiri ukud yecrek tiẓrigin. « Lemmer mačči d lebɣi akked tebɣest i nesɛa, tili ahaqel acḥal-aya segmi nuɣal ɣer deffir. Aṭas n yiɛewwiqen i d-nemmuger seg yakk tamiwin. Ula d tasekkirt (procédure) xedmen-tt meqlubi! Acḥal i nuzzel ɣer da d din, acḥal i nesber d ayyuren, maca ɣer taggara newweḍ lebɣi ». Di lawan ideg yella s tidet wugur n usiẓreg s tutlayt n Mulud At Mɛemmer, a-t-an yennerna-d uxxam ara d-yawin tafat-is i yimura ilemẓiyen, ara yerren azal ugar i yidles azwaw d umaziɣ s umata. Ad d-nerr awellih d akken ur sɛint teẓrigin-a xilla segmi d-wwint tasiregt seg uɣlif, ma d beddu n uqeddic yettwasihel i yennayer-a i d-iteddun n 2018. Teɣzi n tudert i teẓrigin-a.

   M. K. 

  
 Awras (s yisem n tẓuri) d yiwen n ucennay i ifernen ccna n cceɛbi seg temẓi-s. Yeqqim iḥemmel-it ɣas ma yeffeɣ Tamurt ideg yenǧer abrid-is, yuɣal d aɣrib fell-as. Deg tdiwennit-a, nesqerdec yid-s awal ɣef kra n temsal.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Di tazwara ini-aɣ-d d acu-t sser n leḥmala-k i ccna n cceɛbi? 

  Awaras:  Azul fell-awen! Di tazwara, kkreɣ-d di Lezzayer tamanaɣt, tamnaḍt anda i d-yennulfa i d-yufrar uẓawan n cceɛbi. Dɣa anda ddiɣ, ɣer lqahwa, aseṭṭal neɣ ulamma ɣer yimdukkal-iw, selleɣ i ṣṣenf-agi n ccna sbeḥ meddi deg yiseggasen n 80-90. Mi wwḍeɣ ɣer tesnawit, bdiɣ ḥeffḍeɣ urar n umundul akked snitra s tuɣac n Meɛtub, Gerwabi, Mesɛudi, Ccix Lḥesnawi, Ezzahi akked Lɛenqa… Ttafeɣ tadfi deg ttewceyyat, astexbeṛ neɣ deg yicewwiqen i yi-iceɣben s waṭas. Wagi d ayen yeɛnan aẓawan. Seg tama-nniḍen, isefra n cceɛbi, bedden ɣef tmedyazt taquṛant, yesɛan azal meqqṛen deg tsekla s umata. Ayen i yura Sliman Ɛazem, Meɛtub, Xelwi Lwennas, Ccix Aḥesnaw d yinaẓuṛen-nniḍen d amedya n ttbut i yeqqlen d llsas n ccna aqbayli. Fiḥel ma nettu ayen i d-ǧǧan yimezwura am Muḥend u Mḥend d yimedyazen iqbuṛen i yefkan afud i tmedyazt d uẓawan aqbayli. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ ttṛebga d wazalen yellan deg yidles-agi n cceɛbi, ttafeɣ iman-iw deg-sen acku d agerruj n tigejdit.

  Amek tettwaliḍ tizlit n cceɛbi gar yiḍelli d wass-a. D wamek yezmer ad yili yimal-is? 

 Zik cceɛbi deg tmurt n Yiqbayliyen s wazal-is. Imsefliden-is, gten acku deg wakud-nni, tella nniya, leḥya, lḥeṛma, leqdeṛ, d tayri n ṣṣfa. Imdanen ɣas d iẓawaliyen, maca teṛwa tmelɣiɣt-nsen s tjaddit. Ma d tura, d akud-nniḍen. Ihi imdanen-is, bedlen akken ibeddel zzman acku kullec d idrimen. Yekcem-aɣ-d Utaram s tiliẓṛiyat d Internet. Dɣa, ilemẓiyen n tura, ṭṭafaṛen ayen yellan deg beṛṛa n tmurt taqbaylit, smenyifen ad sellen i uẓawan amaynut i yebnan ɣef ccḍeḥ d umeslay afessas neɣ amessas i wumi qqaṛen « ccna akumiṛṣi », neɣ ccna n uɣṛum i ibeɛden s waṭas ɣef ccna n tẓuṛi taḥeqqanit. Ɣas akka qesḥen wussan ɣef cceɛbi di temnaḍin-nneɣ, maca yella uɣeṛbaz n ṣṣenf-agi di Bgayet, deg Uzeffun, deg Tizi… Ula deg Tubiret ! D ayen yessefṛaḥen s waṭas. I wakken ad yeǧhid uẓawan n cceɛbi d uẓawan aqbayli s umata, yessefk ad ilin yimsizwar s waṭas, ad d-fken tabɣest i yicennayen, ladɣa wid ur nettwassen ara neɣ ilemẓiyen. Aya ilaq ad yili seg uɣerbaz amenzu alamma d tasdawit, Neɣ ula beṛṛa uɣerbaz; di yal tamnaḍt. Yessefk awanek ad yefk allalen i wannect-a, ma ulac imal n uẓawan n cceɛbi ad yekres.

  Imi aql-ik d aɣrib ɣef tmurt-ik, amek iga waddad n yicennayen deg tmura tiberraniyin. Neɣ d acu n lɛali d temḍerrit i d-ttmagaren deg ubrid n ccna? 

 Addad n yicennayen deg tmura tiberraniyin, seg yiwet n tama, igerrez imi llan wallalen i usekles ɣas ɣlayit ssuma-s. Llant daɣen tegnatin i wakken ad ttwassnen yicennayen deg umaḍal meṛṛa. Imi dinna, ttemlilin yinaẓuṛen seg yal tamurt, annect-a d ayen yettakken nnefs amaynut i uẓawan aqbayli. Si tama nniḍen, icennayen deg tmura tijenṭaḍin yewɛeṛ-asen lḥal ad d-banen acku yeǧhed umsizwer gar yiẓawanen imeɣṛadanen (universels). Tella ula d taluft n tutlayt, acku yessefk ccna ad yili s tutlayt tafṛansist neɣ s teglizit i wakken ad iɛeddi neɣ ad d-yufrar deg wakud.

  Nsell i tezlit taqbaylit ttwasseqdacent deg-s tutlayin-nniḍen am teɛrabt d tefransist. Tikwal ula d aẓawan n leǧnas yettwacnay s tutlayt tazwawt. Amek tettwaliḍ taluft-a? 

 Yella waya! Inaẓuṛen n tura ur sseqdacen ara awal. Wid n zik d imedyazen i yernan aẓawan i wakken ad t-sselsen i tmedyazt ad as-ḥessen madden. Ma d ayen yeɛnan aẓawan n leǧnas, yettwacnan s tutlayt tazwawt, mačči d aɣbel ameqqṛan ma yella inaẓuṛen ad as-nnḍen initen d leɛqaqeṛ n teqbaylit. Maca d acu d abrid? Akken i t-ttwaliɣ d aseqdec n uẓawan-nneɣ aḥeqqani. Amedya: icewwiqen n zik, cceɛbi, afulklur… Ad as-d-nger cwiṭ n uẓawan atrar amek yexdem Meɛtub Lwennas deg tesfift « A tarwa n lḥif », yefka-as ṛṛuḥ aklasiki i teqbaylit. Neɣ akken yexdem Kamel Mesɛudi d Xelwi Lwennas i cceɛbi, mi as-fkan ini n Flamenco… Tedduḍ akkin!

  Ad d-nuɣal ɣer usufeɣ n yidlisen i d-tettheggiḍ, d uḍebsi wis sin i d-iteddun. Mmeslay-aɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef yisenfaren-a imaynuten… 

 Idlisen i d-ttheggiɣ d idlisen n yisefra. 5 i yellan tasaɛet-agi. Yal adlis yettawi 100 n yisefra. Deg yiwen seg yidlisen-nni ad d-sedduɣ kra n yisefra n Dadda neɣ ɛemmi yemmuten deg ṭṭṛad wis sin. Dadda yellan d amedyaz n Wat Yanni, d amjahed, d amḥaddi n teqbaylit. S tikli-a ad as-rreɣ tajmilt iwulmen. Llant diɣen tullisin akked tsuqilin n kra n yiḍṛisen d yisefra ibeṛṛaniyen. Am Alain, Nietzsche, Maupassant, Rimbaud… Aya deg uḥric n tsekla s umata. Ma deg uḥric n ccna, aḍebsi wis sin i d-ttheggiɣ d taseddaṛt-nniḍen. Llant deg-s tɣawsiwin timaynutin. Amedya: Byt u syaḥ, neɣ tizlit ɣezzifen umi qqaṛen « Leqṣid » i uriɣ acḥal-aya ɣef tayri d yiɣeblan-is deg tmurt. Deg-s llan 4 n yicewwiqen, aẓawan yettbeddil yal tikkelt. Amedya n ccɣel-agi ad t-id naf deg: Lmeknassiya deg cceɛbi s teɛṛabt. Azwel-ines: « Tayri n temẓi ». Tella daɣen ttewceyya d unesraf-nniḍen akken i ten-yesseqdec Lɛenqa. Nekk rriɣ-ten-id ɣer teqbaylit. Azwel-ines: Di twenza-w. Akked snat n tezlatin-nniḍen.

  Seg ccna d yisefra tegreḍ asurif ɣer usnulfu n yinzan. Acimi d widak gedged i tferneḍ? 

 Ferneɣ ayen iɣef iwumi ttḥulfuɣ mliḥ. Yezmer ad icudd ɣer usentel n tmetti, tasertit, neɣ ɣer wayen-nniḍen ulamma s yinzan. Acku inzan nettaf-iten deg yisefra, deg ccna, neɣ ula deg umezgun… Acuɣeṛ d inzan swaswa? Acku d cwiṭ i d-yeqqaṛen aṭas! Am wuṛeɣ; cwiṭ kan seg-s yesɛa azal meqqṛen. Diɣen inzan ttawḍen s lemɣawla ɣer yimsefliden, zemren ad ten-lemden di ddqiqa.

  Tanemmirt a Mass Awras. Awal-ik n taggara… 

 S tumert a Kaisa. Tanemmirt imi i yi-d-tefkiḍ tagnit i wakken ad mmeslayeɣ ɣef yisenfaṛen-iw. Ssarameɣ ccna-nneɣ ad yezdi lqedd-is, ad yefṛeḥ bab-is s lɣella n yidles ajaddiw i iteddun ɣer tatrara.

  Testeqsa-t Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Aṭas n yisenfaren i mazal i ilaq ad ttwaxdamen sya ɣer sdat, yettwajerden deg wahil n usiɣwes (aménagement) n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu.

 D ayen sawyes i d-iberreḥ Mass Awcic Yucef aselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Gar-asen, ad d-nebder, asenfar n unafag ameẓẓyan aɣelnaw di lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu akked usagan (port) adamsan, i wakken ad tennefusi taɛkumt ɣef uḥric n tdamsa di lwilaya-a. Yettaɛraḍ diɣ Useqqamu-a, ad iṣeggem yir aseddu n sin yisaganen, yellan deg temdint n Tegzirt akked Uẓeffun, i tsedduy yiwet n tkebbanit n Bgayet, i d-yelhan s uḥric-agi. Llan diɣ isenfaren n temnaḍin timguranin (tiṣnayɛiyin), yecban tin n Souamaa di Mekla d tin n Tizi Gheniff, ara d-ixelqen lɣella tameqqrant, ama si tama n udrim ama si tama n uxlaq n yimukan n uxeddim. 

 Yella diɣ uḥric n usefti deg tmerrit n udrar, imi aṭas n yimukan i yellan deg temnaḍt-agi, cebḥen yerna zemren ad ɛiwnen tadamsa n ttawil n tmerrit. Tin yernan ɣur-s, d asenfar n lebni n usagan n ujmaɛ n sselɛa, ur d-nesqamay ara aṭas, maca d ayen ara d-yawin lfayda i texriṭ n lwilaya-agi. Tella diɣ, tikti n ukemmel n ubrid n tmacint, i iḥebsen di Wad Ɛissi, ad tkemmel ɣer Yiɛeẓẓugen, maca tura akka tezrawt kan i d-yellan i wannect-a. Ma deg wayen yerzan imuhal izuyaz, sumren-d yiɛeggalen n Useqqamu-a, asewseɛ n yiberdan imeqqranen d ureqqeɛ n yiberdan n lwilaya, i yeɛyan aṭas, ur nettuɛawed ara seg useggas n 2013. Ɣer tama n uɣiwel i usekcem n lgaz ɣer tɣiwanin-agi n At Cafeɛ, Zekri akked Uqerru, imi ur sɛant lgaz n temdint. Asenfar-a d ucrik gar Bgayet d Tizi Uzzu, imi ad ad- iruḥ si Bgayet, yerna ad iḥaz 5 n tɣiwanin deg-s ɣer tama n tɣiwanin-agi i d-nebder yakan. 

 Am wakken diɣ, i yella usenfar n usekcem n trisiti ɣer 20 000 n yixxamen ur nesɛi ara ttawil-a di lwilaya-agi, i yetturaǧun ad bdun lecɣal-is deg wussan i d-iteddun. Ɣer tama n waṭas n yisenfaren-nniḍen d lecɣal imezgiyen n useqqamu, gar uheggi n tugliwin, timeɣriwin, timsizzelt Ɛissat Rabaḥ n tezdeg. Ulamma, nenna-d annect-a ɣef yisenfaren-a, maca llan wid ur nettwaxdam ara s sseba n yiɣeblan. Aṭas n wuguren i d-yettmaggar Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya-agi deg uxeddim-is ladɣa deg uḥric n usefti. 

 Llan yiɣeblan yeqqnen ɣer ddula, yecban taneḥyaft d usɛeṭṭel n yisenfaren, lexṣaṣ n tedrimt…atg. Ma si tama n yimezdaɣ, ugur ameqqran d tugin n yimezdaɣ asɛeddi neɣ axeddim n kra n usenfar deg wakal-nsen. Gar wuguren i ṣṣawḍen yiɛeggalen n useqqamu-a ad ten-frun deg yiseggasen iɛeddan, d tiririt n wazal n 321 n yiketaren n wakal yettwaferqen ɣef yimseftin ur nexdim ara isenfaren-nsen, ɣer tama n lexṣaṣ n wakal n tfellaḥt, imi lwilaya-agi aṭas n wakal n udrar i tesɛa. Yella diɣ wugur n waman, iwumi fkan azal d ameqqran, imi mi ara ifak ubaraǧ n Ssuq n Ttlata, ad yenqes uɣbel n waman n tissit. Mebla ma nettu diɣ ugur n yiḍumman, iwumi mazal ur as-d-ufin tifrat segmi qrib ad yaččer ugudu-nni ameqqran n Wad Falli.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ddurt iɛeddan, i d-tberreḥ-d tneɣlaft n ttrebga Massa Nouria Benghebrit d akken ad tili temsizzelt n yiselmaden n uswir amezwaru. Ajerred, ad yili s ttawil n internet, yebdan ass n 2-05-2018. Yewwi-d ɣef yiselmaden, ad jerrden atekki-nsen deg tensa n temsizzelt, syin ad sersen lezmam-nsen deg yiɣerbazen i d asen-fkan deg tensa-nni. Ilaq ɣef yiselmaden, ad awin yid-sen : -Ajerred i d-suffɣen si tensa n temsizzelt, agerdas n turagt neɣ nig n turagt, tizmilin umecwar-nsen di tesdawit, snat n tewlafin, asuter yettwarun i temsizzelt, takerḍa n tummast, tawriqt ara d-yesbanen addad n lɛeskar ( tagi i yirgazen kan ) akked tjellabt deg-s tansa. Ad tili temsizzelt ass n 12-06-2018. Ma yella d amḍan n yimukan i d-yettunefken i tutlayt n tmaziɣt, ad ten-naf akka : Tizi uzzu :06 n yimukan, Bgayet : 10, Tubiret : 02, Bumerdas : 36, Tabatent : 09, Ɛin timucent : 30, Blida : 08, Lzayer tamanaɣt : 21… 

   S.Yamani 

  
 Zrin 16 n yiseggasen segmi i yemmut unaẓur ameqqran, Muḥya, i igan ifadden i Teqbaylit deg unnar agraɣlan n tmezgunt d tmedyazt, neɣ ɛad deg tsekla s umata. Yewwet s wayen yufa mačči s wayen yebɣa i wakken ad d-yesbin d akken win yebɣan kra, yezmer ad t-wayeḍ xas s ttawilat ifessasen. Am wakka dɣa, yerfed imru amecṭuḥ akked yiccer n lkaɣeḍ, yeṣwakker-as i yilel n tsekla tagraɣlant i wakken ad tt-id-yerr ɣer ‘’tagi-nneɣ’’, akken yeqqar deg wawal-is. Yesseklas irennu deg tesfifin, yettak-iten baṭel. Yumen s wayen ixeddem imi yeẓra d aseḥbiber ɣef nnger n tutlayt-is akked yidlis-is. Ifaq s trekkizin s wayes i tezmer ad tbedd u ad tidir Teqbaylit. 

 Ihi, xas ulamma d tasekla tagraɣlant i d-yerra ɣer tutlayt-is, meɛna yefka-as rruḥ n teqbaylit, iman n yidles aqbayli. Mi ara teɣreḍ tamezgunt-is neɣ asefru-s, ad as-tiniḍ ilul-d s teqbaylit mačči seg tutlyt-nniḍen i d-yuɣ aẓar. Yessenas i sser n waya ugar n wiyaḍ imi ɣur-s timussniwin lqayen deg yidles akked tɣarma tagraɣlant. Ilul Abdellah Mohia ass n 1 deg unbir 1950, yemmut ass n, 7 deg duǧeber 2004.

 Ibedd Yennayer i usawen-ihi deg yigenni, yeṭṭalay-d d agessar, γur-s d ass yifen ussan: Tineqqlin, γlin-asent wafriwen-nsent. Aḍu, yettsuḍ-d s tezmert-is, lgerra ugeffur, tessebzeg akk ddunit. Ma d Mass Iṭij, yessules wudem-is, yebγa ad yeṭṭes ugeswaḥ. Yefṛeḥ, Dadda Yennayer, yekmumes deg yiwen usigna d abelbul d azuran, yettheyyi iman-is, ad yexxuc nnig yixxamen…Dγa mi yeṭṭes Dadda Yennayer, teẓrim amek: ṛṛεud-is ur ttağğan yiwen ad yeṭṭes tanafa, wannag ticki i ijexxeṛ, asxerxer-ines, yessagad ula d ilfan, wannag tura, aman…anda yufa. Ihi akka, Yennayer ad yeṭṭes, ad d-yernu γur-s mmi-s, Furar, Meγres-nsen ad d-iγerres ula d netta ticki i d-tewweḍ nnuba-s, nutni di kraḍ, ttarran ddunit am wakken nnsen kan. Tessun-tt akken i asen-yehwa, ssiriden-tt ticki i asen-yehwa, ssismiḍen-tt akken i asen-yehwa. Ẓara, yiwen wass, deg tlemmast n waggur n yennayer, telsa tabernust-is, terna tarkasin-is, tesbur taqelmunt, teγra i yemma-s:” a ye… ad ffγeγ ɣer tmazirt. « -Uh a yelli, ur yelli d ass n tuffγa ɣer tmazirt wagi! Aḍu, asemmiḍ, ageffur, agris…Ddem-d taεelğett-inem ad turareḍ, neγ ax imru ad tesxerbubceḍ γef lkaγeḍ, neγ yya ad am-d-iniγ tamacahut ». Terra-as-d: « aha, aha, bγiγ ad ffγeγ ad urareγ deg berra, ad azzle&amp;gamma,; ad iẓifeγ… ». Tenna-as yemma-s : « Ulamek a yelli, deg tmazirt d aluḍ, ageffur, a-t-an wwet ma ad tewteḍ…. ». « Acuγer a yemma akkit annect-a? » i as-tenna Ẓara. Tenna-as yemma-s : « Acku d tagrest a yelli, d yennayer ». Deg berra, d tidet, d tallast talellast, ma tmuqleḍ taleṭṭat-ik ur tt-tettwaliḍ ara. Adebbuz ahat ad t-twaliḍ, acku zur. Alemmas gar-asen γezzif. Ameccaḥ teṛbuyin, alma tuẓaḍ ɣer γur-s neγ yuẓa-d ɣer γur-k, wannag meẓẓi meẓẓi meskin ad tγileḍ ulac-it maḍi…meskin…

  Yettkemmil

   Tettwakkes-d seg Imyura.net 

  
 Tesfaydi-d tɣiwant n Tirmitin, yettabaεen ɣer dayra n Draa Ben Khedda, s tullya n yiwet n tɣessart n trumba tagrasent ( station de pompage intermédiaire) n waman tamaynut, yebdan yakan axeddim deg wass n lḥed iεeddan, 28 deg yebrir 2019. Taɣesart yettwabnan deg umḍiq iwumi qqaren El Kser, i d-yezgan gar tɣessart tadigant 1 n Ubaran d tɣessart tadigant n Hruka, d asenfar i izemren ad d-yejben azal n 150 M3 deg usrag (tsaεett). Asenfar-agi agejdan, yessefraḥ aṭas imezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Tirmitin, imi ad yekkes fell-asen aɣbel n lexṣas n waman n tissit, ladɣa deg tallit n unebdu. 

 D ayen, daɣen, ara yessishilen afraq n waman akken iwata lḥal ɣer yimezdaɣ n temḍiqt-agi. Am wakken ara d-yeglu, diɣ, walluy n tɣessart-agj tamaynut s uneḥbus n usemres n yiqadusen n waman iqburen i icudden ɣer tɣessart n Hruka d Ubaran, i d-yeggran deg yir addad. Rnu ɣef waya, d ayen ara yessisehlen axeddim ɣef srabes n umesway n Tirmitin d tsemsart n waman.

  Aheggi 

 Sxelḍet awren akked lmejḥ s waman yemmuzeɣlen i wakken ad txedmem arekti yeqquren akka ciṭ u teshel i lxedma. Dehnet ifassen-nwen s zzin uzemmur, syin terrem arekti d takurin ara yilin d timecṭaḥ, anfet-as ad azal n 30’. Ddmet-d snat n takurin, tmeslem-tent, terrem-as i yiwet zzit, tessemlilem-tent. Tura, rrem-tent s ufella n tmeqqlit ad wwent. Mi wwant, tferqem-tent gra-asent. Anfet ad kkawent azal n sin wussan, syin tgezmem-tent d imecṭaḥ. Mi tebɣam ad tessewwem, terrem-tent daxel n uyefki mi ara yeḥmu azal n 10’. S tezmert-nwen.

  Y. S. 

  
 Am wakken i t-id-ɛeyynen ssrabes n waddad n tegnawt kra n wussan ɣer deffir, yella udfel di ttiɛad tazwara n ddurt iɛeddan deg waṭas n tamiwin n tmurt n leqbayel i iɛeddan 700 n tmitratin deg teɛlayt. Ulamma ɣer kra n yiḥricen n lɣaci, igellu-d udfel-a s kra n tumert i wulawen, seg tama-nniḍen, yettawi-d aṭas n wuguren i yettarran tudert tewɛer. D ameslay ladɣa ɣef yiberdan i ireggel deg tuddar, yettaǧǧa imezdaɣ, ḥeslen deg yiwet n tama, war isufar n useḥmu d wučči. Am deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, imi tuget n tnezduɣin, zgant-d ɣef teɛlayt i yugaren 700 n tmitratin, ayen akk i d-yeɣlin d adfel iḥettem taɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, ad tesseqdec sḍis n yikamyan n tukksa n udfel seg yiberdan. Imi dɣa tanezzayt mi d-kkren, ufan-d yimezdaɣ ddeɛwa akk d tamellalt, iberdan i yessawaḍen i wul n tɣiwant ttwareglen. D ayen i yeǧǧan ula d imḍebbren n tɣiwant-a, ɛeddan s timmad-nsen ɣer temnaḍin anda ttwaḥezqen yiɣermanen, akken ad d-sbeyynen ibeddi-nsen yid-sen, ad ḥeḍren i tegnatin-nni n userreḥ n yiberdan. « Ula aseggas-a, iḥuza-aɣ-d akken ilaq udfel. Ahat iɛedda 30 n yisantimen deg tehri. Limmer mačči d iqeddacen n tɣiwant, ur tesɛiḍ anwa ara yeffɣen seg uxxam-is ». I aɣ-d-tenna yiwet n tmeṭṭut seg taddart n Tala Ɛṭa. Ilaq ad d-nini d akkken taddart-a gar tid yettenṭerrayen s waṭas mi ara d-yewwet udfel. Ddurt-a iɛeddan dɣa, send ad awḍen wid itekksen adfel, aṭas i iwalan ulamek tuffɣa s tkerrust neɣ deg tumnayt (transport), subben-d dɣa ɣef uḍar teɣzi n kraḍ n yikilumiṭren neɣ ugar. Ula d axeddim, llan wid iɛeṭṭlen ɣef umkan, llan wid ur nusi akk. Lɣaci n temnaḍt-a tafellayt, ssaramen limmer, sya ɣer sdat, tukksa n udfel ad d-tettili send 06:00 n tsebḥit, akken ad izmiren ad kkren i yiqeddicen-nsen.

  M. Smail 

  
 Ɣas ma lexsas n tedrimt d ugur amatu n waṭas n tdukkliwin, maca mazal iɛeggalen n tdukkla Tiɣri deg Ayt Smaɛel ttekkaren s lebɣi, qeddcen s wayen iwumi zemren i lfayda i yimdanen at asrayen uzzigen.
