  M. K. 

  
 Ahat llan waṭas n yimedyazen i yettwassnen s wudmawen d leqdicat-nsen, imi ttruḥun ɣer tfaskiwin, neɣ ssufuɣen-d idlisen anda yeqqar yimeɣri iznan-nsen, yettwali diɣ aswir ideg wwḍen. Ilaq ad d-nini d akken llan ula d imedyazen-nniḍen i yessefrayen s telqayt d lewqam, maca ur d-sbeyynen ara isefra-nsen. Gar yineggura-a, ad d-nebder amedyaz amersiman (modeste) Mass Yusef Tuwwazi i yeddmen imru, ad yessefru seg wacḥal d akud tura. Ilemẓi-a n bu 31 n yiseggasen, i d-ilulen deg temnaḍt n Sidi Ɛic, yefren ad yaru s tsusmi, i yiman-is kan, ɣas isefra-ines ččuren d inumak, ccbaḥa, iḥulfan, ladɣa d tidet. Imi amedyaz Abgayti iḥemmel neɣ yesmenyif ad yessefru ɣef tilawt ur nessin, ur nqebbel tikerkas. War ma nettu asentel n tayri ideg yettgerriz Yusef tifyar s wawalen icebḥen i d-yekkan seg uḥulfu azedgan, ama yella deg wul neɣ d asugen i yesseftayen tugniwin s wawal. Amedyaz-a, yeɣleb aṭṭan-is s tektiwin-is swayes i d-yesnulfay yal tikkelt. Mi ara yeqqar yiwen isefra-s simmal ad yettaf iman-is yettwajbad ɣer tayeḍ n tegnit amzun yettidir-itt. Deg-sen ad iwali talɣa iseggmen d tmeɣrut yeddukklen, tikwal ula d tin yeɣɣentren i sseqdacen yimedyazen imeqqranen. Ɣas ma Yusef Tuwwazi werǧin yekki deg tfaskiwin, maca yenǧer abrid i uswir-is s leḥmala-s i usefru aqbayli d usekkil amɛemri. Ddeqs n yisefra i yura, i yeǧǧa ttwaḥerzen i wiss melmi. Yenna deg yiwen:

 <em> “Yeggul wul-iw ur yendih </em>

 <em> Yeqqim yettnezzih </em>

 <em> Yeṭṭef aqeccab-is yewhem </em>

 <em> D ussan-aya ur yecrih </em>

 <em> Ɣef wayen ur yekrih </em>

 <em> Yettagad ad t-id-yeddem </em>

 <em> Lqum-agi ur yettnebbih </em>

 <em> Ur yesɛi ara ccbih </em>

 <em> Melmi ak-id-yeḍsa, ad ak-yessendem. </em>

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
  Asfugel n wass n Lmulud  

 Ass n aram yezrin u i lmend n usfugel n lficṭa n lmulud, tessuddes-d Tenmehla n usedwel n lwilaya n Wehran s umtawi akked Tenmehla n waddal d yilmeẓyen yiwet n temsizelt n tazzla i yinelmaden n kraḍ n yeḥricen (aɣerbaz amenzu, alemmas akked win n tesnawit). Annect-a, yella-d deg unnar ameqqran n tazzla s yiɛudiwen di tama n Ssanya. Tebda temsizzelt ɣef 9 n ṣṣbeḥ. Ttwabḍan yinelmaden d taggayin n 50 i yal yiwet i lmend n leɛmer, ar taggara n tazzla, rebḥen kraḍ n yimenza. Kkin ugar n 400 n yinelmaden, uzzlen ɣef teɣzi n 1000 n lmitrat i yesɛa unnar-nni iɣef i d-zzin. Wid i d-yufraren di temsizzelt n tikkelt-a, ad ten-awin ad kkin deg tayeḍ ara d-yilin deg wussan i d-iteddun gar waɣiren. Timsizelt-a, d tagnit daɣen i yinelmden ad kksen ɣef wul, ad d-ffɣen acemma u ad ttun leḥris n uɣerbaz si tama, ma si tayeḍ, ad yeldi wallaɣ-nsen, ad d-skeflen tiɣawsiwin timaynutin ara ten-yallen. Yis-sent, ad snernin lebɣi-nsen di tɣuri.

  Ayɣer yeḥbes utilifirik acḥal n yiseggasen-aya ? 

 Mačči d yiwen n usenfar mačči d sin i tuli takka, yeqqim kan akken. Mi gren asurif ɣer sdat, ad uɣalen s sin ɣer deffir. Akka i mmugen yisenfaren n tmurt, ulac win yebdan, ifuk akken i ilaq ad yili lḥal, neɣ xerṣum ur d-yelli ara uɛeṭṭel deg-s s kra n wagguren, tikwal ula s yiseggasen. Imdanen, ad ttrajun s lḥir melmi ara iẓer leqdic-nni tafat, ad ttmesteqsayen ayɣer i d-yella deg-s uɛeṭṭel. Maca ɣer yimḍebbren, tifrat zgant llant, ma mačči d lexṣas n tedrimt, ad d-afen timental-nniḍen. D akka i yella lḥal ɣef wayen iwumi neqqar atilifirik n Wehran. Mačči d keffu ur yekfi ara, maca yella ileḥḥu, yettwaseqdec acḥal d aseggas, asmi tbegges tmurt, ad temmager s ccbaḥa yal amerray (touriste) i d-irezzun. Deg ideg i nella, tadrimt tella, yallec yella, i ixuṣṣen d lebɣi. Amek armi atilifirik-a, yeḥbes kan akka? lawan Wid terza temsalt, ur nudan ad zṛen ayɣer, ur qelben, ad t-ṣegmen, yeqqim kan akken yettwaɛelleq zun d lexyal. Kksen idgan n umahil i yezmer ad d-yexleq usenfar-a: sneqsen asekcem n tedrimt i tdamsa; kksen i yimdanen allal n tukksa ɣef wul; allal n usiweḍ i win yebɣan ad yali ɣer tqacuct ɛlayen akk di Wehran, ladɣa i yinebgawen i d-irezzun sya ɣer da, ma ur d-glin ara s tkerrust, ur zmiren ara ad d-walin s lqerb aḥṣin n Santa Kruz deg udrar n Merǧaǧu neɣ ad zṛen amek yettwabna, amek yemmug akked wacu yellan din. Ma nga kan kra n umgarad gar twilayt meqqren am Wehran d tǧaret-is Tlemsan, ad naf aṭas n yisenfaren i yeddan akken iwata di tneggarut-a, gar-asen dɣa atilifirik yettawin seg tlemmast n temdint alamma d adeg yufraren di ccbaḥa Lalla Setti. Nezmer kan ad d-nini d lebɣi d ṛṛay iqeɛden i ixuṣṣen tamdint meqqren am Wehran akken ara teddu, ad tecbu timdinin n tmura yuẓan ɣer sdat.

  Ad d-tessuddes Wehran tafaska n waddal n rrigbi 

 Yetturaju seg wass n 10 duǧember d tasawent, ad d-tessuddes temdint n Wehran uṭṭun amezwaru n tfaska tawilayant n waddal n rrigbi s tikkin n waṭas n trebbuyaɛ n twilayin-nniḍen. D tarbaɛt iwumi ssawalen s yisem n yizgaren n waddal n Wehran akked yiwet n terbaɛt tinebgit ara d-yefken beddu n tfaska-ya. Taẓrigt-a, d tamezwarut, d tin ara d-yilin s ddaw n leɛnaya n lwali n twilayt Mulud Crifi, s lmendad n tenmehla n yilmeẓyen d waddal akked tfidiralit tazzayrit n waddal n rrigbi d (la ligue) n Wehran. Ad tili tfaska-a d adellel i temnaḍt-a, acku yettraju-tt usiher n wuraren n yilel agrakal.

  Achoui Khaled 

  
  Isufar 

 – 1 n texsayt tazeggaɣt(1,5 kg)

 – 2 s tdeggar n ticcert

 – ¼ n tlimet i igezmen d iberjan

 – 6 n tewriqin n nnaɛneɛ 

 – Taḥcict akked lmeɛdnus

 – 2 n tɣenjawin n lmakla n zzit uzemmur

 – 1 n tɣenjawt n lxel neɣ n llim

 – 1 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n lkemmun

 – Lmelḥ, ifelfel aberkan

  Aheggi 

 Sqecret taxsayt-nni tazeggaɣt, tebḍum-tt d iḥricen d ukuzen. Rret-tt daxel n tbaqit, tdehnem-tt s zzit n uzemmur, terrem-as lmelḥ, ifelfel aberkan, syin txelḍem-tt. Rret-tt daxel n lkuca azal n 30’ ar 40’. I wakken ad twalim ma tewwa, sentut tafercidt deg texsayt-nni. Mi tewwa, terrem-tt deg lmeqla, ternum-as ticcert, taḥcict, azgen n tlimet akked yisufar-nni-nniḍen i wakken ad teqlu. Syin, rekcet-ten akken ma llan. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Ass n aram iɛeddan, gan yinelmaden n tesdawit n Belgayed di tiwilayt n Wehran tigawt s umdal-nsen i tewwurt tagejdant n unekcum, mbeɛd mi ten-yuli zzɛaf ɣef waṭas n tlufa yerzan tikli i d-tewwi tedbelt n tesdawit-a. Ssebba tamezwarut i ten-yeǧǧan ad gen tigawt-a, d imi tugi tedbelt ad tessali inelmaden ɣer uswir i d-iteddun ɣas akken sɛeddan ikayaden n uḥric n ulḥaq (rattrapage), (azal n 300 n yinelmaden), d ayen i d-igellun s taččart n tesmilin n useggas amezwaru ladɣa deg taɣulin am tmussniwin tidamsanin. Annect-a, yeǧǧa ula d inelmaden imaynuten i d-yewwin akayad n BAC deg 2019, ur beddun ara taɣuri-nsen ar ass-a ɣef lǧal n wugur-a. 

 Acu kan, ɣef umeslay n yiwen ugensas n tddukkla taɣelnawt n yinelmaden izzayriyen i yekkin deg usunded, yenna-d “Llan wuguren-nniḍen i yerran tasdawit-a, ad tuɣal ɣer deffir iseggasen-a ineggura, ɣef waya i laqent tigawin n usuter i uṣeggem n tesdawit ma nebɣa s tidet ad yali uswir”. Gar wuguren-a dɣa, ibder-d uguren ipidagujiyen yerzan inelmaden n tutlayin, tussniwin n uselḥu d tdamsa akked tussna n wakal. “Ur d-tesmeḥsis ara tesdawit i leryuy n yinelmaden”. Rnu ɣer waya, ulac tagnit yettunefken i yinelmaden n Master akken ad gen isilɣen d tannanin daxel d berra n tmurt, akken xeddmen deg tesdawiyin-nniḍen. 

  Khaled Achoui  

  
 Aṭas n twiziwin i d-yettwaheggayen taggara-a deg tɣiwant n Amizur, i yeggugen s wazal n 25 n yikilumiṭren ɣef waɣir n Bgayet. Ama d iseqquma n tuddar, d tidukkliwin neɣ d ssrabes n tɣiwant, akk-nsen zdin afus deg ufus i usizdeg n ukuẓet n tɣemmar n temnaḍt-nsen. Amedya n twizi i d-yettwaheggan ussan-a yezrin kan, ideg i d-yella usizdeg n tiɣremt iwumi ssawalen « 40/500 ». Deg kra n wakud kan, ssawḍen wid ibegsen i tigawt-a, ad d-rren ccbaḥa i umkan-nni, mi as-kksen ayen merra yettenḍeggaren deg lemsaq, gar yiculliḍen, ikwaɣḍen, isɣaren d dderbiz-nniḍen. Yelha, ad d-nesmekti belli ma yella ilemẓiyen idiganen bedden s tḥerci i uqeddic, gan-t akken ilaq, aselway n tɣiwant yella i lmendad n tedwilt-a imi asen-d-iga merra allalen yessefken akken ad tesmurres, am ukamyun, tiferraḥin, atg. Am wakken daɣen yerza ɣer wadeg, ad iwali amek teddun lecɣal si tama, ad yessebɣes ilemẓiyen n taddart-is si tayeḍ. Dɣa, akka tura, llan deg wahil yisiharen-nniḍen n usizdeg ara d-yilin deg tɣiwant-a n Amizur. Rnu aṭas n yilemẓiyen i yettxemmimen ad d-snulfun tiddukkliwin-nniḍen deg tɣiwant.

  M. K. 

  
 Tella-d ddurt iɛeddan timlilit ɣef tqendurt n leqbayel di tezrigt tamezwarut , ass n 4 akked 5 yebrir deg-i nella, deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri deg Tizi Uzzu. D ayen i d-yettuheggan sɣur tiddukkla “ Espace investissement’’. D yiwet n tejmilt i d as-yuɣalen i Mass Khadidja Ḥamsi. Teḍra-d temlilit-a s lemɛawna n tɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu , Tanmehla n tmarrit d tinḍi, tanmehla n tnezzut n lwilaya , axxam n tinḍii d lḥirfat. Aṭas n wid i d-yewwin ɣer tmeskaniyin ayen akk yeɛnan tiɣawsiwin, yecban d lfeṭṭa, lebsa, tiɣawsiwin n talext akked tqendyar n leqbayel n yal tamnadt. Timsikent-a, tella-d i wakken ad sbeɣsen ixeddamen-agi n taɣult-a i wakken ad kemmlen di leqdic-a, akken daɣen ad siǧǧhiden ayen i yettwaxedmen di tmurt n lezzayer. DGar wayen i d-yewwi wahil n temlilit, ad naf : timsizzelt n tqendurt n leqbayel i icebḥen gar tixeggaḍin i d-yerzan ɣer temlilit-a . ‘‘S leqdicat i yecban wigi i nezmer, ad d-nessebgen ayen tesɛa tmurt-nneɣ, mačči kan dagi, meɛna ula di tmura n lbarrani ‘‘ d ayen i d-tenna yiwet seg tid yellan deg temsikniyen.

  S. Y. 

  
 Am leɛwayed-is, thegga-d Tddukkla Numidya n Wehran tafaska n yennayer, i d-yellan seg wass n 9 ar 12 janvier 2020. Iswi deffir leqdic n Tddukkla Numidya, d asfugel n useggas amaynut n yimaziɣen 2970, d ukemmel n teẓrigin n tfaska i d-tebda seg useggas n 2005, armi tessaweḍ ass-a ɣer teẓrigt tis 16. Niqal, ussan yezrin, ḥaren yiɛeggalen n tddukkla deg uheggi n usiher n useggas-agi, ladɣa tafaska yecban yennayer d leqdic meqqren. 

 Di lweqt ideg yuget umussu aɣerfan yeṭṭfen abrid s tikliwin, gar-asent tamdint n Wehran, d ayen i yeǧǧan leqdic adelsan ɣef teɣzi n useggas-a, ad yenqeṣ nezzeh deg waṭas n tamiwin. Maca, seld timliliyin i d-ijemɛen iɛeggalen n tddukkla ussan yezrin, ɣetsen ad kemmlen deg usfugel n yennayer, acku yesɛa azal, ɣas ma drus-iten ttawilat n uheggi i asen-yettunefken aseggas-agi.

  Yella-d wahil d anesbaɣur 

 Yebda wahil ass-nni n aram 7 yennayer 2020 ɣef 11h, s temlilit d tɣamsa deg Uxxam n tddukkla, syin azekka-nni n, 8 deg waggur i deg-i nella, ɣef 14h, d asenṣef s yinebgawen i d-yerzan seg waṭas n twilayin d ureṣṣi n temsikent deg tzeqqa n Midyatik. Ass n amhad ɣef 11h 30, yella-d usunẓu unṣib s terbaɛt n yiḍebbalen d uneḥḍur n wudmawen n yidles, ma ɣef 14h, nwala-d asarag deg tnedlist n Katidral, ɣef yisefra n Ccix Yeḥya Awasif akked kra seg umezruy d tgemmi n yennayer, d wamek qqimen yimaziɣen ar ass-a n wussan sseḥbibiren fell-as. 

 Ma tameddit n wass, ɣef 17h, deg Uxxam n umezgun n Wehran Ɛebdelqader Ɛellula, tella-d tmezgunt “Muḥ Terri”, i d-yessenked M.Letrec i d-yerzan seg TRB n Bgayet. Ass wis sin, 10 deg waggur-a ɣef 10h, d tuffɣa n yinebgawen ɣer Santa Kruz. Ma d tameddit, dima deg Midyatik, d taẓuri i warrac, s usezri n tmucuha d yisura n teqbaylit. Deg wass n 11, llan-d yisaragen ɣef tmeslayt n At Ɛebbas di tmura lɣerba sɣur uselmad asdawan di Wehran Dr Karim Waras. Deg yiḍ, deg usensu n Belgayed, d imensi n yennayer di lxaṭer n yimttekkiyen d yinebgawen akked tmeɣra n useggas amaynut 2970 ɣef 23h. 

 Deg wass ukuẓ, lḥedd, d tuffɣa deg yizenqan n temdint, d usekfel n kra n yidgan inmazrayen s lmendad n umnir imerri n tddukkla Bel Horizon, syin d asnaz n yidlisen s ubuddu sɣur yimyura, ar deqqal tella-d tmeddit n tmedyazt di TRO.Syin, ɣef 17h d ccna sɣur kra n trebbuyaɛ tiqbayliyin, d ccna n tlawin n At Snus, syin tuɣal tejmilt i umeɣnas Ǧamal Benɛuf d usali n yirmad s tukci n warrazen i yimttekkiyen. 

 I usmekti, ɣef teɣzi n wussan n tfaska, llan-d yisikwan (ateliers) n uselmed, aɣmis d usmel n tddukkla deg internet, timucuha, igelmusen n Ayrad n At Snus deg tzeqqa n Midyatik. Akken daɣen, i d-yettili yal iḍ usiwel n tmedyazt, n ccnawi d uẓawan deg usensu n Belgayed. 

  D tajmilt i Ǧamal Benɛuf  

 Deg kraḍ n yiseggasen-aya yezrin, yal mi ara d-yeḥḍer yennayer deg Wehran, tettfaraṣ-it Tddukkla Numidya s tririt n tejmilt i kra n wudem i d-yefkan i yidles amaziɣ. Seld mi rran tajmilt i baba-s n Nna Mekyusa, tameṭṭut i d-ittheggin seksu n yennayer segmi bdant tfaskiwin, ilindi d amyaru, argaz n tsekla Abdellah Haman iwumi tuɣal tejmilt, aseggas-a d nnuba n umyaru d umeɣnas Ǧamal Benɛuf, i d-imudden war cceḥḥa i teqbaylit s wayen yura d wayen yeqdec, deg uḥric n tsekla, amezgun d uselmed n tmaziɣt s tmaɣzelt (volontariat) i wazal n 15 iseggasen, ladɣa imi yuḍen sin-a n yiseggasen yezrin. 

 D asteɛref diɣen akken ur ifeccel ara u ad iẓer belli ayen iga i tmaziɣt ur iruḥ ara deg ulac. Yumer nezzeh s tejmilt-a, nesteqsa-t ɣer taggara, dɣa yenna-d “ Tanemmirt i yimeddukkal-nneɣ deg tddukkla Numidya ɣef usmekti-a, umreɣ ayendin s tejmilt-a, ssarameɣ ad iliɣ uklaleɣ xerṣum ula d cwiṭ seg waṭas n wazalen i yi-ttgen, akken daɣen i ttmenniɣ ad tili ugar tdukli gar leqbayel i izedɣen berra i tmurt n leqbayel”. 

  Khaled Achoui  

  
 Mačči aṭas n wakud segmi d-yeffeɣ uḍebsi n ccna amezwaru n ucennay Kamal Ḥammum, neɣ Kamal At Ɛmara s yisem-is azwaw. Ilemẓi-a i d-ilulen di temnaḍt n Buzgan, deg useggas n 1977, yefren ad yefk i yiseɣrez-ines azwel « Asirem », ideg ara naf 7 n tezlatin, yal yiwet s yisem-is d usentel iɣef i d-tewwi.“Awi-d afus-im”, “Tajeǧǧigt”, “Ngemmu deg yisem”, “A lhem”, “Wissen”, “Ay Itbir”, d “Cedhaɣ”, i d sebɛa n tezlatin-nni ideg i d-yenṭeq ucennay imeslayen yemgaraden d taɣect leqqaqen. Swayes i d-yessenṭeq daɣ aẓawan ḥninen s dduzan i as-yettcebbiḥen taɣect. Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef tḥawact n tezlatin n walbum-a, deg-sent ad naf s waṭas asentel n tayri, imi aql-it deg tallit-is. Maca, ula d win n lmeḥna d wayen-nniḍen, yedda-d deg umaynut-a-ines. Dɣa ma neddem-d amedya, ad d-nemmeslay ɣef tezlit tis kraḍ anda ara nsel i Kamal At Ɛmara icennu-d s usḥissef ɣef wansayen i yettwaǧǧayen, am uxxam n uẓru d ubernus. Yeqqar di tefyar-is timezwura: “Ngemmu deg yisem, neneqqes di tmussni, heddreɣ-as i gma, yefhem uberrani…”. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken acennay Kamel Ḥammum yessaweḍ ad yessekles aḍebsi-a-ines amezwaru s tallelt n umedyaz Saɛid Ḥammum. Amedyaz-a ukud yezdi isem n twacult d yiwen n yidim, i t-iɛawnen ayendin akken ad yessekles mi as-yefka imeslayen. Yettnuzu s wacḥal-aya uḍebsi-a, i win t-yebɣan.

  M. K. 

  
 Ass n 09 Yunyu i d-itteddun, ad d-tili tuffγa tunsibt n yizlan n At Wagrakal deg tmurt n Fransa. Izlan-a ara d-yeddun deg sin iḍebsiyen (disques), deg-sen 28 tezlatin (ccnawi) i cnan 28 yinaẓuren yettwassnen, ma d isefra, yura-ten umedyaz Ameẓyan Keẓẓar. Izlan-a d abeḥri ara yezzuznen iman n win ara asen-yeslen. D ccawi ara d-yessakin iḥulfan-nneγ yemmuten deg-neγ acḥal aya … D tiγri n Wagrakal i nekkni s Yiqbayliyen akken ad d-nemmekti ansa i d-nekka. D asiwel i Ugennaw-nneγ -Anẓar- akken ad d-yuγal γur-ne&amp;gamma,; nekkni ad uγal γur-s, acku seg wasmi i t-neǧǧa i aγ-yeɛreq ubrid-neγ n tidet. Izlan-a d assaγ gar tmurt-nneγ d umezruy-is. D assaγ i yezdin gar tmurt-nneγ d tmura n Wagrakal i as-d-yezzin. Acku, Tamurt n Leqbayel d yelli-s n Wagrakal, nekkni d arraw-is. Izlan n At Wagrakal d inig deg umezruy-nneγ aqbur γer tγerma-nnneγ tagrigit-tarumanit ideg nettekki ula d nekkni. D izlan-a ara aγ-yemlen d acu-a&amp;gamma,; u d acu-t umḍiq-nneγ deg talsa.

  Larbi Yahioun 

  
 Iberreḥ-d Ddiwan aɣelnaw n yizerfan n umeskar d yizerfan uqriben (ONDA) n Lezzayer s beddu n temsizzelt n warraz agraɣlan n usnulfu i yimesnulfuyen Ifriqiyen, ara d-yillin d tajmilt i tcennayt Myriam Makeba. D arraz i usebɣes n usnulfu deg Tefriqt. Ad tili tezrigt-is tamezwarut, dagi di tmurt n Lezzayer. D ddiwan-agi, ara d-yilin i lmend n usuddes n tezrigt-a tamezwarut, ideg yetturaǧu ad tili tesfugla n ufraq n warraz-agi, ass 14 cutember i d-iteddun deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt. Ad yili warraz-agi deg ddeqs n leṣnaf n usnulfu. Ma ɣef umecwar n ujerred, yal amsizwer ad ibeggen belli axeddim-nni d ayla-s yerna d asnulfu. Tis snat, ilaq ad yili yezdeɣ deg Tefriqt. Ilaq ad ceggɛen imuhal-nsen ɣer tansa n (ONDA) s tawil n lbusṭa ɣer tansa-a: 49, rue Abderrezak Halima, Bologhine neɣ ɣer mail <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="3d4d4f54451350444f545c5013505c56585f5c7d5253595c135947" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a>. Ddiwan aɣelnaw n yizerfan n umeskar d yizerfan uqriben (ONDA), yefka-d azemz n 31 ɣuct 2018, d ass aneggaru n usersi n zzmamat n yimsizewren, yebɣan ad ttekkin deg warraz-a. D arraz, yellin tiwwura-s i yimsnulfuyen ifriqiyen ifazzen, lqidar n tedrimt n warraz-agi 100.000 iduraen. Arraz-agi n usnulfu “Myriam Makeba”, d isem n tnaẓurt n Tefriqt n Wadda, inuḍḥen aṭas mgal tameḥeqqranit d lapartid deg Tefriqt. Tettekka yakan tfaska tafriqit (Panafricain), i d-yellan deg tmurt n Lezzayer deg useggas n 1969. Tlul deg useggas n 1932 deg Johannesburg, temmut deg useggas n 2008, di lɣerba di leɛmer-s 76 n yiseggasen. Tettwasen aṭas deg Tefriqt s snat n tɣawsiwin. Tamezwarut d ccna tamḥaddit deg tezlatin-is, tis snat d turart-ines deg usaru “Come Back Africa” n umarikani Lionel Rogosin, i d-yettmeslayen ɣef lbaṭṭel n yicebḥanen mgal iberkanen deg Tefriqt.

  A. A. 

  
 Ddurt iɛeddan i teldi s s wudem unṣib tmurt n Fransa tiwwura-is i Mass Issab Rebrab i wakken ad yessnerni asenfar-is. Issad rebrab d yiwen n umesbaɣur aqbayli n temnadt n Tgemmunt Ɛazzuz , i yesseftayen tadrimt-is di taɣulin yemxallafen, ama dagi di tmurt ama berra. Tikkelt-agi, yemlal d uselway n Fransa anda i as-yettunefk tesriḥ i usnerni n usenfar n usizdeg n waman i iluɣen s tarrayin timaynutin, assisdeg n waman n lebḥar akked wayen-nniḍen, di Charleville- Mézières di temnadt n Ardennes. Deg usenfar-a, ad yettwasefti wazal n 250 n yimelyunen n euros. Si tama n uselway n tmurt n Fransa, yenna-d d akken iɛjeb-as usenfar imi d ayen ara d-yawin azal n 1000 n yimekwan n uxeddim i yimezdaɣ n tama-agi, u ad ibedd ɣer tama n Rebreb deg usnerni yecban isenfaren am wigi. Akken ara yili, daɣen, d yiwen n usenfar ara yesbuɣren tamnadt-agi. Ad-nesmekti kan d akken takubbanit n Cevital teṭṭef amḍiq amenzwaru di tmurt n Lezzayer. Ma yella d anemhal-is Mass Issad rebrab, yeṭṭef amḍiq wiss 6 gar yiwudam imesbaɣuren di tefriqt , ɛla ḥsab n tesɣunt Forbes .

  S. Y. 

  
 deg yiwen unejmuɛ i d-yeḍran ddurt iɛedan di tmanaɣt akked tɣamsa , ibarreḥ-d umaṣwaḍ amatu n usegmi Mass Nedjadi Mseguem , d akken ad tili yiwet n tarrayt tamaynut deg uselmed deg uswir amenzu. Yenna-d d akken iswi n tarrayt-agi d asejhed n uswir n yinelmaden. Ɣef waya, ad xedmen yiselmaden yiwen n usuliɣ anda ara d-lemden amek ara seddun tangiwin-a s tarrayt-agi tamaynut . Akken daɣen i d-nnan belli igemmaḍ n yikayaden ineggura, ama wid n uswir amenzu neɣ n uswir alemmas, ulin ɣef wid n yiseggasen iɛeddan. Ma yella deg uswir n tesnawit, yenna-d akken akud n yikayaden ad ttwabeddlen: llan sɛeddayen yinelmaden di 4 n ussan, ad uɣal ɣer 2 n wussan d uzgen, deg useggas aɣurbiz i d-iteddun. Ma yella d ikayaden n 5 n wussan, ad uɣalen ɣer 3 n wussan d uzgen. « Anect-a, lmeɛna-s ad yettwasenqes wakud akked tangiwin, acu kan, mačči d asɛeddi ur sɛeddayen ara tangiwin-nniḍen’’. Aberreḥ-a, yesekker-d herwel deg yiẓeḍwa n internet, imi yeffeɣ wawal d akken d tutlayt n trumit akked teglizit ara yettwaksen. Syin wid yessexd amen iẓedwa-agi, begnen-d lɣiḍ-nsen ɣef leṛyuy-a. Itezzi usenqen-nsen gar tutlayin d wayen yelhan i yinelmaden. Qqaren-d:’’ Ayɣer ur d-ttilint ara tutlayin-nniḍen, d tutlayt n teknulujit’’. Gar wa d win, yal yiwen akken i d-yenna, meɛna rray aneggaru, ad yuɣal i wid yellan deg tneɣlaft n ttrebga . Akken daɣen i d-yenna belli, ad tettekki tezmilt n n uztazal di leḥsab n tezmilt n ukayad n BAC .

  Yamani Souhila 

  
 Ugar n ddurt i sɛeddan yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, akked wid n Tsexriwt, war aẓeṭṭa n tilifun uqɛid. Aya yeǧǧa imezdaɣ ad mmɣen deg wurrif akked ucewwel imeqqranen annect iḍul uɣilif-a. Ladɣa imi tikkelt-a, yekka-d wugur seg Djezzy, aẓeṭṭa n tilifun amezwaru i yelhan deg Ayt Smɛel. Wamma wid n Mobilis d Oredoo, yezga uɣbel-nsen seg waṭas-aya tura, ar ass-a urɛad yefri. « Nesteḥyar ayendin abrid-a mi d-yekka uɣilif seg uẓeṭṭa ifazzen ɣur-neɣ seg wacḥal tura d aseggas. Iḥun Rebbi ur iɛeṭṭel ugar n wakud, ufan-as-d dayen tifrat. Wamma tili wiss amek ara nexdem ». D awal n yiwet n teḥdayt seg Ayt Smaɛel. Deg yiwen n usentel, ayen yeǧǧan axrab n uẓeṭṭa-a yesqelleq nezzeh imezdaɣ n tɣiwanin i d-nebder, mačči kan imi ur zmiren ad siwlen neɣ ad ceyyɛen izen. Maca imi ula d ayen sɛan d idrimen tikwal ad d-ibin, tikwal ad iruḥ, ad ten-id-tluɛa taɣect yettwaskelsen ad as-tiniḍ ur sɛin. Ɣef leḥsab n tkebbanit n Djezzy, i terza taluft, yella icudd uɣilif-a ɣer kra n yimahilen n usetrer n uẓeṭṭa-nsen, ideg qeddcen imir-nni. Ɣef waya ihi, uznen iznan i yimsaɣen i yettwaḥuzan s uɣilif-a, ideg nezmer ad nɣer aya: « I lmend n tmehlin n usetrer, yella-d kra n uddebdeb deg uẓeṭṭa-nneɣ iḍelli. Ttxil-wat qeblet asaruf-nneɣ ɣef ucewwel i d-iḍefren ». Ad d-nerr kan awellih d akken mačči ala yiwen n wass i yexreb uẓeṭṭa, am wakken i d-yeqqar yizen, wanag azal n ddurt neɣ ugar.

  M. K. 

  
 Seg wass n 14 yunyu ideg nella tura, i tebda, deg tmurt n Rrus, Teqbuct n umaḍal n ddabex n uḍar. Taẓrigt-a aql-itt deg tis 21, kkint deg-s 32 n Tmura. Aṭas n medden i iḥemmlen addal-a, llan ḥaren amek ara walin ttiɛad-a amaḍlan i d-yettuɣalen yal 4 n yiseggasen, imi yiwen n ugraw n tregwa i yesɛan tadrimt, yeṭṭef akk tisura n usiweḍ n temliliyin i waṭas n tamiwin n ddunit. Gar tewtilin timeqqranin i d-yexdem i wid yettafaren addal deg Tefriqt n Ugafa, akken ad teg ttjara ɣef uɛrur-nsen, ilaq fell-asen ad d-aɣen adimu s ssuma ɣlayen, akken ad izmiren ad sɛun tiregwa-s lqidar n useggas. D ayen iwumi ur tessaweḍ teḥrict taẓawalit n tmetti, ur nezmir ad teḍmen xersum tamɛict yelhan. « Ayen i ɣetsen yimḍebbren n tregwa-a, d ayen ur iqebbel wallaɣ. Walan kan amek ara d-skecmen tadrimt, ur walan amek ad ssiwḍen ttiɛad i ddunit. Yak ddabex n uḍar seg waddalen i aɣ-izeddin aṭas ». I d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel. Maca, ayen i d-yusan yewwi-d abeḥri i turin n lɣaci-a, yekka-d seg tmurt n Telmant (Lalman). Imi yiwen n ugraw n tregwa n tmurt-a, yuɣ izerfan n usiweḍ, yefren ad yesɛeddi timliliyin n teqbuct n umaḍal baṭṭel, seld mi zdint tregwa-a tiɣin n temliliyin ara d-yettilin merra alamma d 15 deg yulyu. Dɣa ad d-nesmekti belli d ayen i d iswi n yiseggasen, akken ad izmiren yiẓawaliyen ad ḍefren baṭṭel ttiɛad-a. Ɣas ma yella tutlayt n uwennet tella-asen cwiṭ d ugur i tegzi, maca tumert n uḍfar n yakk timliyin baṭṭel, tɛedda akk ayen nniḍen. «Ur nudaɣ ɣef wayen i yi-ibeɛden segmi ẓriɣ llant tregwa talmanin i d-yessenɛaten baṭṭel Taqbuct n Umaḍal. Acemma ur t-fehhmeɣ d tidet seg tutlayt talmant, maca tutlayt n ddabex n uḍar nfehhem-itt merra ». I d-yenna yiwen n yilemẓi i iḥemmlen addal-a. Akka ihi i ufan medden asellak ɣur Walmanen, i ixemmen s tmuɣli tamaḍlant.

  K.K 

  
 Aṛebbi n tzizwa d yiwen n leqdic iḍefren wid iḥemmlen agama, ma neẓra abaɣur swayes i d-tgellu tamemt, ama i lǧib-nsen, ama i tdawsa d ddwa akk i d-nettagem seg-s. Taggara-a ladɣa, tennerna mliḥ taɣult-a deg umaḍal, ula di tmurt-nneɣ d abrid-a i teḍfer. Deg Wehran, deg sin n yiseggasen-a yezrin kan, yella-d ufares n 635 n yiqenṭaren n tamemt. 

 D afares igerrzen ma nesserwes-it ɣer win n yiseggasen yezrin. Sser n wannect-a, d lebɣi i sɛan yifellaḥen-a d wigi yettṛebbin tizizwa, yerna skud ma tettnernay. Yiwet n ssebba-nniḍen i d-yernan di lɣella-a, d tallelt i d-ttafen sɣur tixxamin n tfellaḥt, ɣef wakken i d-nnan kra seg wigad-agi yettṛebbin. 

 Ad naf llan wazal n 600 seg wid iqeddcen deg unnar-a, 180 deg-sen d wid ilan tikarḍiwin tisudar. Ayen daɣen yesnernan aḥric-a, d timliliyin n usileɣ i d-yettilin yal tikkelt, qrib ahat deg yal akraḍyur tettili-d yiwet n temlilit sɣur tddukkliwin, sɣur tinmehliwin d texxamin n tfellaḥt i usnerni n uswir n yifellaḥen-a d uwelleh-nsen d tarrayin i ilaq ad ḍefren akken simmal ad tettnerni lɣella-a, d kra n yiberdan i d-yewwi ur ten-sseqdacen ara deg unnar, acku gellun-d s lexsara d lmut n tzizwa. D tililiyin-a i yeǧǧan ad d-ffɣen 300 n yimsulaɣ imaynuten deg sin n wasunen kan, Ḥasi Bunif d Msergin yettwassnen s yidgan-nsen n tfellaḥt d lfirmat meqqren.

<p style="text-align:right">  Khaled Achoui 

  
 Ilul Masi Arib deg useggas n 1999, di Tizi Uzzu. Iḥemmel ad yeḍfer seg zik ayen ara d-yuɣalen d abaɣur i netta d tutlayt-is, imi qqaren: taɣemmat yesserbaḥen, tban seg temẓi. Yemmeslay-d deg tdiwennit-agi ɣef tirmit-is deg tira, arraz wis sin i yewwi deg tmedyazt d wayen-nniḍen.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Ma nuɣal cwiṭ ɣer deffir, amek i d-tufiḍ iman-ik deg unnar n tira? 

  Massi Arib:  Tira d ayen ḥemmleɣ aṭas. Seg wasmi sεiɣ 15 n yiseggasen, ḥemmleɣ tira, ḥemmleɣ ad ɣreɣ daɣen idlisen, abaεda s tutlayt taqbaylit, ama d ungalen, d ammuden n tullisin neɣ d tamedyazt. Ttafeɣ iman-iw mi ara qqareɣ. Dɣa nniɣ-as ahat ula d nekk zemreɣ ad aruɣ am wiyaḍ. Tikwal ad qqimeɣ kan akka armi ufiɣ-d imru gar yifassen-iw, sxerbubuceɣ ɣef tewriqt kra n yifyiren. Xas akken drus ttḥulfuɣ s tumert mi ara aruɣ. Ciṭ ciṭ kan, armi d-ufiɣ iman-iw, xeddmeɣ isefra. Ɣef wakken walaɣ, d taɣuri-agi n yidlisen akked tmedyazt i yi-yewwin ɣer unnar n tira.

  Amek i asen-d-yusa i yimawlan-ik d wid akk i ak-iḥemmlen yisalli n ukcam-inek deg umaḍal n yimru? 

 Yal yiwen amek yettwali. Ma nmuqel ɣer kra n yimdanen, llan ttwalin tira ur sɛint ara azal meqqren, abaεda tid n tmedyazt. D asḥissef imi ur ttakken ara azal i leqdic n yimru. Maca, llan wiyaḍ ferrḥen aṭas s wayen xeddme,ɣ ama d iselmden-iw, d imawlan-iw neɣ d imeddukkal-inu i yi-d-ttakken afud yal ass.

  Mmeslay-aɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef warraz wis sin i tewwiḍ deg tfaska n Udrar n Fad… 

 Arraz-agi, tidet kan d win ur rǧiɣ ad t-awiɣ. Ur umineɣ ara mi sliɣ i yisem-iw yewwi arraz wis sin, imi d tikkelt tamezwarut ara kkiɣ deg tfaska, s yisefra imenza. Ferḥeɣ aṭas yis-s, acku yefka-yi-d ugar n lebɣi d tebɣest i wakken ad nejreɣ abrid.

  Aṭas n yimura d yimedyazen Iqbayliyen i ak-yettwalin tesɛiḍ imal n lɛali, ara d-yefken abaɣur i tutlayt taqbaylit. D acu-t wawal-ik ɣef waya? 

 D ayen yessefraḥen aṭas mi ara waliɣ imura iqbayliyen ttakken-iyi-d afud, qqaren-iyi-d imal-ik ad igerrez. D ayen ara yi-yeǧǧen ad kemmleɣ tira n yisefra neɣ n wayen-nniḍen. Tira n tutlayt-inu d tamsalt tamezwarut ara d yi-yeǧǧen ad aruɣ i wakken ad tidir.

  Di taggara, d acu tessarameḍ ad txedmeḍ sya ɣer sdat? 

 Ssarameɣ ad d-ffɣeɣ d aselmad n tmaziɣt, ad sselmadeɣ tutlayt-inu. Ssarameɣ diɣ ad d-ffɣeɣ d amaru, ad ttaruɣ ungalen d tullisin.

  Testeqsa-t Kaissa Khalifi. 

  
 Ass-nni n letnayen iɛeddan, 3 deg duǧember, ɣelqen abrid aɣelnaw wis 12 yimezdaɣ n taddart Iqemmuden, yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu, i d-yezgan deg unzul n ugerzu, seld asɛuẓẓeg n temeẓẓuɣt n yimḍebbren teɛna temsalt ɣef wayen ssuturen ugar n 5 n yiseggasen-aya, tura. Yerkeb-iten lɣiḍ, ladɣa, ɣef lgaz n temdint d trisiti i mazal ur d-newwiḍ. Yella-d uɣlaq n ubrid deg umekkan iwumi qqaren Annar amellal. ‘’D iseggasen-aya segmi ssuturen isufar yecban-wigi i d-yewwi ɣef yemḍebbren teɛna temsalt akken ad d-awḍen i yimezdaɣ, aladɣa deg talit-agi n tegrest’’. I d-yenna yiwen deg yimezdaɣ n taddart. Sdat n uɣlaq n ubrid aɣenaw wis 12, ɣelqen yiberdan yemgaraden n ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu, dayen ur neɛǧib imsebriden. Ur tefri ara temsalt n tullya n ubrid armi i d-usan yimḍebbren teɛna temsalt i yennejmaɛen akked teseqqamut n taddart n Iqmuden dɣa Ɣer taggara n lejmaɛ, ssawḍen yimḍebbren, ad qenɛen iɛegallen n teseqqamut s faru n yiɣeblen i ten-iceɣben, syin yelli ubrid ɣef 11 n tsebḥit.

  A. Z. 

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis i iεeddan 14/12/2017, i telli s wudem unṣib tezrigt tis mraw (10) n rreḥba Ğerğer n udlis, ɣef 10h n ṣṣbah deg Temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu.

 Ad d-tili ɣef teɣzi n ddurt, imi tebda ass-nni n amhad 14/12/2017, ad tekfu azekka n aram 19/12/2017. Tella-d rreḥba-agi n tikkelt-a s usentel-agi “Tafarest taseklant d tussnant n yimura-nneɣ n tsekla: d tajmilit i Mulud Mɛemmri”. Tella-d deg semmus n yimukan, ama deg Temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant n Tizi Uzzu, ama deg Uxxam n yidles-is Lmulud At Mεemmer d tneḍfaret-is Krim Belkacem n Azazga, d Uxxam n ssinima, tella–d daɣen deg Wammas adelsan Matoub Lounès n Ain El Hammam. D rreḥba n udlis deg tezrigt-is tis mraw, ideg ttekkint wazal n 30 n tezrigin i ixedmen timsikiyin n yidlisen-nsent, ad d-nebder gar-asent: El Amel, La pensée, Tamagit, Richa Elsam, Numide(…). Am wakken daɣen i llan wazal n 40 n yimura ara ixdmen asenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen-nsen, gar-asen, Idir Bellali, Chabane Imache, Kenza Djurdjura, Lynda Koudache, Brahim Ben Taleb, Med Ameziane Tadjer…atg. Heggan-d yimsuddsen n leqdic-a ahil adelsan d amerkanti, imi yal ass seg 09h alamma d 17h n tmeddit, ttilint-d temsikniyin n yidlisen sɣur tezrigin yettekkin deg ttiɛad-agi, ttilin-d daɣen waṭas n yisenza s yibuddan sɣur yimura akked ddeqs n yisikwan yemgaraden, am wakken diɣ i d-tettili temsikent tuzigt i umaru Mulud Mɛemmri, iwumi tuɣal tejmilt aseggas-agi. Ma yella d ayen i d-yeqqimen deg wahil-agi n 5 wussan-agi iɛeddan (seg lexmis armi d letnayen), yella-d akka. Ass-nni amezwaru, deg temkerḍit tamaynut ideg i d-tella tulya tunṣibt n rreḥba-agi, ɣef 10h45, i ḥedren waṭas n yiwudam gar-asen: lwali n Tizi Uzzu, aselway n Usqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya (APW), Lounis Ait Menguellet, Taleb Tahar…atg. D waṭas n yinemhalen n uḥric n yidles. Dɣa yella deg tsebḥit-nni beddu n sin n yisikwan, n tira akked tɣuri s ttawil n Braille. Ma deg tzeqqa n yisaragen ɣef lewhi n 14h00 n tmeddit, yella-d usarag n umaru d umnadi azzayri Amine Zaoui. Ma deg umḍiq n yigerdan, yella-d usikew “Ad xedmeɣ adlis-iw” sɣur inelmaden n uɣerbaz “Atmaten Bellil”. Deg uxxam n yidles, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit deg tzeqqa n umezgun, yella-d usenɛet n usaru “L’opiun et le bêton” n Ahmed Rachdi. Ma deg tneḍfarit-is n Azazga, yella-d usiken n usaru-nni n “Le livre de la jungle” n Stephen Sommers. Ma tzeqqa n ssinima, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, yella-d uskan n usaru “La chine et encore loin” n Malek Ben Smail. Ma d ass-nni n lǧemɛa 15/12/2017, i d-yellan d ass wis sin n rreḥba-a, ha-t-an wayen i d-yellan deg-s: ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, deg tzeqqa n yisaragen n temkerḍit tamaynut, yella uskan n usaru-nni n “L’opiun et le bêton” n Ahmed Rachdi. Ma deg umḍiq n yigerdan, llan-d sin n yisikwan, yiwen ɣef 10h00 i d-yellan d timlilit akked unallas Anis Ben Taieb. Ma d wis sin-nni d usikew “ad xedmeɣ adlis-iw” sɣur inelmaden n uɣerbaz “atmaten Bellil”, yella-d ɣef 13h00 n uzal. Ma leqdicat i d-yellan deg uxxam n yidles d wigi: ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, deg tzeqqa n umezgun yella-d usiken n usaru-nni n “Le livre de la jungle” n Stephen Sommers. Ma deg umkan n yigerdan, llan-d sin n yisikwan, yiwen n tmucuha d tɣuri, wayeḍ n tira s ufus s tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Am wakken daɣen i d-llan sin-agi n yisikwan deg Tneḍfaret n uxxam n yidles, yellan deg Azazga, syin ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, yella-d usenɛet n usaru “Tarzan”. Ma deg Wammas adelsan Matoub Lounès n Ain El Hammam, yella-d deg-s uskan n usaru-nni “La Colline oubliée” n Abderhmane Bouguermouh. Ma d ass-nni n ssebt 16/12/2017, deg Temkerḍit tagejdant, tella-d deg tzeqqa n yisaragen-is, temlilit akked umaru Rachid Boudjedra, seg 10h00 alamma d 12h00 n uzal. Syin akin ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, ddima deg tzeqqa n yisaragen, tella-d temlilit tameẓyant s ṣṣenf n (Table ronde), s usentel-agi “Tafarest taseklant d tussnant n yimura-nneɣ n tsekla: d tajmilit i Mulud Mɛemmri”. D tilmilit i xedmen yimura d yimnadiyen-agi izzayriyen: Youcef Sayah, Sebkhi Nadia, Bilek Hamid, Hallouane Hacene, Bouallili Ahmed, Abdenour Abdeslam akked Yacine Si Ahmed. Ma deg umḍiq n yigerdan, llan-d sin n yisikwan, yiwen n tira d tɣuri s ttawil n Braille wis sin d winna n “Ad xedmeɣ adlis-iw” akked yinelmaden n uɣerbaz “Atmaten Bellil”. Ma deg Uxxam n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, akked Tneḍfaret-is n Azazga, llan-d leqdicat idelsanen kif-kif-iten, dɣa deg tzeqqa tameẓyant, ɣef 10h00 yella-d usenɛet n usaru-nni “L’Opium et le bêton” n Ahmed Rachdi, am wakken diɣen i d-yella usikew n usuneɣ n kra n wunuɣ seg tukkist n wungal-nni “L’Opium et le bêton” yura Mulud Mɛemmri. Yella-d diɣ usikew n tmucuha d tɣuri ɣef 10h00 deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n uxxam n yidles n Tizi Uzzu. Am wakken diɣen i d-yella uskann usaru-nni “L’Opium et le bêton” n Ahmed Rachdi. Iḍelli n lḥed 17/12/2017, deg tzeqqa n yisaragen n temkerḍit tameqqrant, yella-d wawal ɣef tira s ttawil n Braille ɣef teɣzi n wass. Dɣa lewhi n 10h30, tella-d temlilit akked unaẓur aderɣal Brahim Tayeb, syin akin ɣef 11h00 d asawen, llan-d sin n yisaragen. Amezwaru yefka-t-id Mass Abdel Djedid ɣef tlalit d unegmu n Braille, ma d wis sin yefka-t-id Mass Charaf Moussa, ɣef ulmad d uselmed n tɣuri s ttawil n Braille. Ma ɣef 13h00 n uzal, tella-d teywel d temlilit akked wid yessexdamen timkerḍiyin, sɣur Mass Boudaoud Brahim. Ma deg umḍiq n warrac ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, yella-d usikew n tɣuri d tira s ttawil n Braille, syin ɣer-s ɣef 13h00 n uzal, yella-d usikew-nni “Ad xedmeɣ adlis-iw”, sɣur yinelmaden n uɣerbaz “Atmaten Bellil”. Ma ɣef 14h00 deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun n Uxxam n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, tella-d temlilit taseklant n Massa Lynda Kouddache, i yewwin awal ɣef wungal-is aneggaru “Tamacahut taneggarut”, syin ɣef 15h00, yella-d usenzi s ubuddu n wungal-agi. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella usarag-nniḍen ɣef “Mulud Mɛemmri amussnaw”, sɣur Mass Bilek Hamid akked Mass Hallouane Hacene. Ma deg umḍiq n yigerdan, ɣef 10h00 yella-d usikew n tmucuha akked tɣuri, syin ɣur-s ɣef 11h00, tella-d temsizzelt n tteswira n Mulud Mɛemmri i icebḥen sɣur yigerdan n usikew n usuneɣ. Yella-d diɣ usenɛet n usaru “La langue de Zahra” n Fatima Sissani, ɣef 13h00 n uzal d afella, deg tzeqqa n ssinima n Tizi Uzzu. Ma i wass-a n letnayen 18/12/2017, deg tzeqqa n yisaragen n temkerḍit tagejdant n lwilaya, ad d-yili wass n usileɣ i lmend n yixeddamen n temkerḍiyin n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Timlilit tamezwarut n usileɣ, ad d-tili seg 09h00 alamma d 12h00 n uzal, sɣur Massa Chekouche Yamina. Ma d timlilit n usileɣ tis snat, ad d-tili seg 13h00 armi d 15h45 n tmeddit. Am wakken daɣen i ad d-yili usikew “Ad xedmeɣ adlis-iw” sɣur inelmaden n uɣerbaz “Méllal”, ɣef 13h00 d asawen. Ma deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun n Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu, ad tili tameddit n wass-a ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit temlilit taseklant d usenzi s ubuddu n yiwen n udlis n yiwen umaru n lwilaya. Ma deg tzeqqa n ssinima n Tizi Uzzu, ad yili usenɛet n usaru “Le Vent des Aurés” n Lakhdar Hamina, seg 13h00 n uzal d asawen. Ma d azekka 19/12/2017, ad yili d ass aneggaru n rreḥba-agi tis mraw, yetturaǧu ad yili deg-s ɣef 10h00 deg tzeqqa n yisaragen temkerḍit tamaynut, yiwen n usarag sɣur Massa Amrane Noura ɣef tarrayt i iwulmen i usnerni n tɣuri taɣerfant. Am wakken diɣ ara d-yili deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu, yiwen n umata ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, syin ɣur-s d asarag n Mass Slimane Hachi ara d-yawin awal n taggara ɣef Mulud Mɛemmri. Ɣer taggara maḍi, ad d-tili tukci n warrazen d igerdasen n usebɣes, deg Uxxam n yidles Lmulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu, i wazal n 40 n yimura i ixedmen asenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen-nsen, akked 30 n yiselkinen i yixxamen n tezrigi yettekkin deg rreḥba-a n useggas-agi. Ma d tura ad nesmekti imeɣriyen-nneɣ s yidisan i d-isuddsen rreḥba-a n udlis deg tezrigt-is tis 10, ad d-nebder gar-asen: Taneɣlaft n yidles, Tamkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri taɣerfant, Tanmehla n yidles d Uxxam n yidles n Tizi Uzzu, d tneḍfart-is n Azazga, s lemεawna n tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmri akked Tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu…atg.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Taddart n Ighil Bouchene, di tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, tuki-d tineggura-a, dɣa tger-d ɣer unnar tikti neɣ asenfar n usicbeḥ n taddart. 

 Fuṛsen yimezdaɣ n taddart tagnit-agi n ukman deg yixxamen, i wakken ad lhin s leqdic icudden ɣer tezdeg. Dɣa di tazwara n waggur-agi n remḍan, sɣamen-d i twizi n ufras n taddart si rrif armi d rrif. Kksen leḥcic, fersen tiregwa n waman, rnu ɣer waya asizdeg n yizenqan n taddart. Tuɣal tefka iẓuran tekti-a n usicbeḥ n taddart, dɣa sɣamen-as-d s wadda. Yal amezdaɣ yettɛawan s wacu yezmer, wa stexriḍt, wa s yiɣallen, wayeḍ s tikta, wayeḍ wayeḍ… Ula d aselway n tɣiwant-agi, Mass Akli Chabane, yefka-d afus n lemɛawna i yimezdaɣ n taddart-is. Takti-agi, tennerna deg wallaɣen n yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi, armi uɣalen umnen yis-s, dɣa begsen-as-d akken ilaq lḥal. Mbeɛd mi kfan asizdeg d ufras n taddart, uɣalen ɣer usicbeḥ d ureqqem-ines s waṭas n tɣawsiwin. Gar usbaɣ d usuneɣ n leḥyuḍ n taddart s yizamulen n tmurt n Leqbayel : Tilawin, ixxamen, tiliwa, amaziɣ…atg. Yal lḥid d tafelwit n teklut, i yesɛan assaɣ d yidles d tmetti n uqbayli. Am wakken diɣ i ttheggin i lebni n yiwet n tala (tasebbalt n waman) di tlemmast n taddart-agi. Yella-d diɣ ureqqeɛ n yiberdan d yiɣulad n tzeɣwa d yixxamen yellan ɣef yiri n ubrid n taddart, anda terriḍ ad ak-id-qablen yiniten n wannay amaziɣ (Awraɣ, azegzaw d umidadi). Am wakken diɣ, i d-yella usicbeḥ n tzenqatin n taddart s tɣawisiwin iwumi ɛawden asexdem; rrwadi n tkeryas, isɣaren n ṭṭjur…atg, ula d nutni rrnan-d azal-nsen deg ccbaḥa n ṭṭerf n ubrid n taddart. Mazal yettkemmil usicbeḥ n taddart-agi deg wussan-agi iɛeddan uqbel lɛid, yetturaǧu ad ikemmel ula ɣer sdat. Mbeɛd aṭas n tcemliyin i d-yellan sɣur yimezdaɣ n taddart-a, kkren yilmeẓyen-s i uslali n yiwet n tddukkla n ugama “Asnegmu”. D tiddukkla i d-yelhan tura s leqdic-agi n usicbeḥ n taddart. I lmend n waya, yenna-d uselway-is Kheddam Brahim : “Tiddukkla Asnegmu, tlul-d di tlemmast n umussu-agi uɣur i d-tekker taddart-nneɣ. Nebda-d leqdic s yisem n yimezdaɣ n taddart, yuɣal nessaweḍ, neslul-d tiddukkla-a ara d-yelhin s uḥric n ugama deg taddart-nneɣ”. Ikemmel Mass Kheddam awal-is ɣef usenfar n tddukkla-agi, ara yeddun ɣef teɣzi n tlata n yiseggasen, yenna-d : “Asenfar-nneɣ agejdan, d abeddel n wudem n taddart-nneɣ, ayɣer ala ur nessawaḍ ara ad nettekki deg temsizzelt n tezdegt Aissat Rabah, neɣ ad necbu taddart n Sahel di Bouzegene. Nessaram diɣ, tudrin-agi i aɣ-d-yezzin ad ɛandent ɣer wayen yelhan. Di taggara, ad nesnimer akk wid yettɛwanen di ccɣel-agi, ama s lqerb ama s lbeɛd.” Am wakken diɣ i iṛeggem i yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi, aṭas n yisenfaren d tɣawsiwin ara ibeddlen deg taddart-a deg uḥric n ugama d tezdeg. 

  Adaoun Adelghani  

  
 Tella-d ass n sed 15 di cutember yezrin, s ddaw leεnaya n tdukkla Axxam amaziɣ tzabut s tira n tmaziɣt, d tajmilt i umeɣnas Nur At Amara, akked tmarut Kaysa Xalifi, deg rreḥba n usmel (forum ) n udlis.Timlilit-a, tessemlal-d kra n wid iḥemmlen taqbaylit, yebɣan ad yexdem fell-as, imi argaz-agi iwumu rran tajmilt, d win i d-yefkan aṭas i teqbaylit d tmaziɣt s umata. Deg tallit anda ur llin ara aṭas n wid yettarun s tmaziɣt, netta ixeddem-aɣ-d timsirin, i yellan d llsas i umur ameqqṛan n wiḍ i d-yeffɣen ass-a d imura, d imedyazen. Amedya d tamarut taneɣmast Kaysa Xalifi, fell-as talwit, i yellan tettabaε tadwilt-is deg tiliẓṛi. Aṭas i d-yerran i tiɣri-a gar-asen imura s tutlayt tamaziɣt/taqbaylit d wid yettwassnen s timmeɣnest am Unaẓur Zedek Mouloud, Arezki Rabia akked Madjid Soula. Am akken i aɣ-tenna Massa Samia At Amara, taselwayt n tddukkla-a, i yumren nezzeh imi ṭṭuqten wid idefren abrid n urgaz-is, fkan-as azal-is i tutlayt. Dɣa tenna-aɣ-d : «Ferḥeɣ ayendin imi aṭas n Yiqbayliyen i d-yerran i teɣri, ama d amectuḥ neɣ d ameqqṛan, d argaz neɣ d tameṭṭut. Ula d tazeqqa anda i nexdem leqdic-nneɣ, teččur s lekmal-is. Usan-d azal n 120 n yimekkiyen, gar-asen 80 ttarun akken ilaq, 28 tira-nsen tgerrez, ma d ayen i d-yeggran tura kan i bdan amecwar n tira. Dɣa d ayen yessefraḥen imi llan wid inejren abrid n Nur d Kaysa ». Tkemmel deg wawal-is: « Ilaq yal yiwen, ad d-yefk ayen iwumi yezmer akken ad yidir yidles d tutlayt-nneɣ ». Γer taggara, ad d-nekfu s wawal n Dda Nur, i t-id-yugmen ula d netta sɣur Dda Lmulud : « yella yiwen, yella ulac-it, yella yiwen, ulac-it yella ». Ihi kunwi ɣas ma yella ulac-iken, tezgam deg wulawen i lebda.

  K. K. 

  
 Tamettant n Lewnis Xalifi (n Dexla Ɛli) tḥuza akk imezdaɣ n taddart n Ayt Tɛisiwt, Ayt Smaɛel s umata d yimdanen n yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen. Mi d-yewweḍ yisalli n tmettant-is ass n 12 ɣuct yezrin, di leɛmer n 35 n yiseggasen, buhan n yimeṭṭi i d-smaren medden. Ula d imdukkal-is n uxeddim, a tin s ḥulfan! Lewnis d ameddakkel aqbur, gar-aneɣ ḥaca semmus n yiseggasen deg umdur. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ nemyussan am watmaten, acku d tarwa n watmaten, lwaḥi i d-nekker, akken i nurar ddabex d wayen-nniḍen, akken i neksa lmal, akken i d-nimɣur. Lewnis yella iḥemmel mliḥ ccna d uẓawan, yetturar ula d amundul i yelmed send ad yesɛu 20 n yiseggasen. Acḥal n tikkal i d-yerza ɣur-i, nesqecmiɛ, ncennu. Aredmani segmi nemɣur, yettili-d ccna deg tuget n temliliyin-nneɣ.

 Azal n sin n wayyuren tura, yusa-d ɣer ɣur-i s umundul deg ufus, neqqim-as taswiɛt n lɛali. Acḥal i necna, netta s umundul, Meẓyan s ssnitra. Nmeslay ɣef ddeqs n yisental-nniḍen daɣen, gar-asen tagrudit, taqbaylit, Zeddak Mulud d wayen-nniḍen. Aṭas n waktayen i sɛiɣ akked Lewnis, ama n zik neɣ n taggara-a. Llan seg-sen ula d wid n unecraḥ. Yiwet n tikkelt, nella d igerdan, cniɣ-as-d yiwet n tezlit i d-snulfaɣ nekkini nniɣ-as: « Ma tsergeḍ-d wi tt-ilan tezlit-a? » Yenna-yi-d: « n Ayt Mengellat ». Ttaḍsaɣ nniɣ-as : « ayen d ayla-w ». Ula d netta yella yesnulfay-d zik awalen i tezlatin i as-iɛejben. 

 Acḥal i iḥemmel ad d-nesmekti tidak-nni! Yiwen n ubrid daɣen, nekk urɛad kcimeɣ tanubi, nemserfa ɣef yiwet n taluft neqqim ur nemlaɛi azal n kraḍ n wussan. Deg wussan-nni, ttɛebbireɣ d yiman-iw ufiɣ d nekk i iɣelḍen mačči d netta. Dɣa, mi d-yekcem s axxam-nneɣ tameddit, muddeɣ-as afus-iw akken ad nemsamaḥ. Iwehha-d ula d netta wayla-s yenna-yi-d: « akka i ixeddem win ifehmen ». Cfiɣ amzun d iḍelli ɣef waṭas n waktayen-nniḍen i izemren ad gen adlis. Lewnis, d aḥnin si temẓi. Asmi d-iban deg-neɣ waṭṭan n tmaẓwalin nekk d Kaysa, yezga yettawi-aɣ ɣer unnar n Tizwal akken ad nenher dinna avilu. Tikwal yettɛawan-aɣ ula deg yiluɣma n waddal deg uxxam. Segmi yekseb takerrust, yezga iɛerreḍ-iyi ad nḥewwes ɣer da d dihin, mi yettwali ur ssugguteɣ tuffɣiwin.

 Iseggasen-a ineggura neffeɣ kra n tikkal di taddart. Lewnis ur yeḍfir tasekla, maca iḥemmel ayen akk yellan d taẓuri; yella gar tgejda n yiwet n tkebbanit di Bgayet. Ilehhu-d d uḥric atiknikan d wayen yerzan iɣawasen (leplanat). Ɣas ur as-d-tettwaldi tewwurt n bakalurya, iga yiwet n tannant ideg i d-yewwi iman-is, yeldi ihi tawwurt-nniḍen deg umecwar-is. Tura truḥeḍ ad tesgunfuḍ tama n Kaysa Xalifi iɣef tettruḍ, seld kra n yiseggasen n umennuɣ akked waṭṭan. Sin n warraw-ik i d-teǧǧiḍ aql-iten gar yifassen n tayri d laman. Sgunfu di talwit a Lewnis-nneɣ!

  Mhenni
Khalifi 

  
 I lmend n umulli wis 8 n tmettant n yitri n ccna akked tezlit taqbaylit, i iɣaben 8 n yiseggasen-aya, smektan-d Yimkecren acennay Rahim. 13 deg waggur n furar 2010, anwa aqbayli ur necfi fell-as, ula d igenni yebra-d i yimeṭṭawen s lehwa. Ḥemlent akk wallen n wid i t-yessnen, ladɣa tid n yicennayen neǧǧret iɣezran.

 Ulamma ɛeddan yiseggasen-agi am lebraq, maca mazal imdanen cfan ɣef wasmi i d-yewweḍ yisalli n tmettant n ucennay Mouh Rahim. Ulac win ur iɣaḍ ara asmi yemmut, yeḥzen ula d adrar i t-id-yefkan. Azekka-in n temḍelt-is, ulac ansi ur d-usin ara lɣaci, ula d icennayen ddeqs i ḥedren lǧanaza-s. Ma dayen i d-ibeggnen leḥmala i t-ḥemmlen medden s tuget neɣ ifennanen s wuzzig, d tirza-nsen s ṭṭaqa ɣer tejmilt i d-as-yuɣalen ass-nni n lǧemɛa 23 furar 2018, deg taddart-is tanaslit. Ddeqs n yicennayen i d as-yerran tajmilt s tezlatin-is, ladɣa arraw n temnaḍt-is yecban: Karim Khelfaoui, Chabane Oubariz, Moh Oubelaid, Ahcene Bedrani, Rachid Zellag akked waṭas n yifennanen-nniḍen, gar-asen: Karim Addar, Karim Nait Mouhand, Remdan Mechache, Azeddin Tareb, Ferhat Medrouh…atg. Am wakken daɣen i fkan tagnit i yicennayen ilmeẓyen neɣ iḥafaḍen, i wakken ad d-awin kra n tezlatin-ines. Am wakken daɣen i d-llan yicennayen-nniḍen i d-yewwin tizlatin-nsen, gar-asen Lani Rabeh, Hassan Nait Zaim, Youcef Guerbas…atg.Tameɣra-agi, tella-d deg ttnasfa n wass armi d tameddit, maca deg tsebḥit n wass yella-d wahil s wazal-is. Dɣa ɣef 9h30 n ssbeḥ, bdant snat n temsikniyin meqqren, yiwet n ttsawer-is, tayeḍ n yimuhal-is d wayen yettwarun fell-as deg tɣamsa. Ma ɣef 11h00 n uzal, sersen tlata tmeqqunin n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka-s, syin yella-d umeslay sɣur tnemhalt n yidles Massa Goumeziane Nabila, aselway n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun Mass Akli Chabane, atmaten n Rahim d yimeddukkal-is…atg. Leqdic-agi, yella-d deg uɣerbaz amenzu “Atmaten Sahali Said, Mouhand Ouremdan” n taddart-is, ma d asuddes-ines yella-d sɣur tasqamut n taddart-is n Imekchrene, Tawacult-is, Asqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Ait Aissa Mimoun, Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Axxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n temdint-agi, d Umazday n yirmad idelsanen d yinaẓuren…atg. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, akk ttawilat ttwaheggan, imi galɛum n yimdanen i d-yeddan deg lkiran n usiweḍ i d-tefka tɣiwant-agi i lmend n wannect-a, dɣa wwin-ten ɣer Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu, i wakken ad d-awin imdanen i beɛden. Bdan-d abrid ɣef 09h30 n ssbeḥ, leḥqen-d ɣer taddart n Imekchrene ɣef 10h45 n ssbeḥ, syin ruḥen srid ɣer uẓekka-s. 

   A. A. 

  
 Badis Memḥudi d yiwen n yilemẓi n 18 n yiseggasen, d asnawi-amedyaz, d mmi-s n taddart n Tizi wal, taɣiwant n Tizi n Berbar. Yettunefk-ak warraz n yilemẓi Deg teẓrigt tis 16 n tfaska n tmedyAzt n Udrar n fad i yettuɣalen yal aseggas d tajmilt i Mulud Mɛemmeri.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Deg   tazwara, ini-d i yimeɣriyen anwa i d Badis Meḥmudi ?  

  Badis Meḥmudi  : Nekk d yiwen n yilemẓi n 18 n yiseggasen. Bdiɣ-d acrured deg unnar n tmedyazt deg 2014. D mmi-s n taddart n Tizi wal, i yettafaṛen taɣiwant n Tizi n Berbar, aql-i d anelmad deg tesnawit n Uweqas, tawilayt n Bgayet.

  Deg teẓrigt tis 16 n tfaska   n tmedyazt n Udrar n fad,   yettunefk-ak warraz n yilemẓi, amek i tḥulfaḍ s wanect-a ?  

 D tikkelt tamezwarut ara kkiɣ. Iswi-w, ur yelli ara d arraz. Ruḥeɣ kan ad lemdeɣ neɣ ad d-agmeɣ kra n tmussni. Mi i yi-d-yewweḍ yisalli n warraz-a, dayen ur umineɣ, ferḥeɣ nezzeh. D tazwara yelhan. D ayen i d-yessemɣin assirem deg-i.

  Melmi i tebdiḍ tessefruyeḍ ? 

 Tzemreḍ ad-as-tiniḍ azal n 4 n yiseggasen-aya. De tazwara, seffrayeɣ kan i yiman-iw, almi d 2016 i bdiɣ keccmeɣ s annar s wudem unṣib.

  Γef wacu i tḥemmleḍ ad   tessefruḍ ? 

 Mačči d yiwet n temsalt i ɣef ḥemmleɣ ad ssefruɣ, akken i as-qqaren « Caṭent εerqent ».

  Anwa-ten yimyura d   yinaẓuren i ɣer i d-tettagmeḍ ? 

 Mačči d yiwen neɣ d sin. Llan atas am Dustuwivski d Mulud Ferεun, ma d icennayen, yella ccix n tayri Mass Farid Ferragi akked unaẓur amḥaddi Uleḥlu.

  Ahat tesɛiḍ kra n   usenfaṛ sya ɣer sdat ? 

 Ih llan, mačči atas-aya segmi kkfiɣ yiwen n wungal, maca urεad ufiɣ taẓrigt. Akken daɣ i ttheggiɣ ammud n yisefra, ahat d t-kkfuɣ deg ussan-a i d-iteddun. Sya ɣer sdat, ad heggiɣ ammud n tmuεay d wayen-nniḍen…

  Ahat yella kra i terriḍ,   ad d-theḍreḍ fell-as ur   ak-id-steqsaɣ ara ? 

 Bɣiɣ ad hedreɣ ɣef lexṣas n ufus n tallelt, ladɣa mi ṭṭuqten wid yettruẓen ifadden, ama d wid yellan deg unnar neɣ berra i unnar.

  Send ad nfak tadiwennit-a, budd-d abruy seg tmedyazt-ik i yimeɣriyen…
