  Awal-ik n taggara swayes   ara nessali tadiwennit-a  

 Ad d-iniɣ tanemmirt i kra n wid i yissebɣasen. Ad senemreɣ kra n win sneɣ, tanemmirt daɣen i kunwi i yi-yefkan awal i wakken ad suffɣeɣ iḥulfan-iw. Ad snemmreɣ arrac n taddart n Tizi wal, iɛeggalen n tiddkkla tadelsant Adrar n fad, akked kra n win ara yeɣṛen tadiwennit-a. 

  Yesteqas-t Mouhoubi Akli 

  
 Mandi Abdelaziz, d yiwen unaẓur i ixeddmen deg taɣult n uwlaf. Yewwi aṭas n warrazen ama di tmurt n Lezzayer, Tunes, Merruk…atg. Gar-asen : Arraz amezwaru deg temsizelt taɣelnawt n uwlaf deg Tizi Uzzu; arraz wis sin deg lwilaya n Msila. Deg tdiwennit-a, newwi-d awal ɣef umahil-is akked yisenfaren i d-yettheggi sya d afella. 

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen: D anwa-t ?  
   Abdelaziz Mandi : D awelfan. Luleɣ deg Wat Yanni deg useggas n 1974. Tusa-d tikti-agi mi walaɣ yiwen n umeddkkel-iw ixeddem awlef. Tidet kan, di tazwara, ur i yi-d-tewqiɛ ara mliḥ deg-s, acku ur zriɣ d akken d taẓuri, d lebḥar lqayen. Syin akkin, walaɣ amek i ixeddem tiwlafin, amek i d-yessebgan cbaḥa deg teswira, dɣa sya i yebda umecwar-iw deg useggas n 1994.

  Acu n umekkan i tewwi teswira deg tudert n yal ass ?  
  Tawlaft, d ayen i d-yessefhamen aṭas n tɣawsiwin i nettwali: asuneɣ, areqqem, initen, tafat… Tawlast, d ayen i yettilin yal ass yid-nneɣ, acku deg bnadem, tella tiṭ tettwali ayen yakk i d as-d-yezzin d teswirat. Ihi, seg wasmi ara d-nlal, nettwali teswirat, initen. Tesɛa teswira amekkan meqqren deg tudert-nneɣ n yal ass.

  Amek-itt liḥala n uwlef deg tmrut s umata ? 
  Nesɛa aṭas n wid i t-ixeddmen akken iwata, maca d yiwet n taɣult i yettwaḥeqqren s waṭas di tmurt-nneɣ. Taɣult-agi, ur tettwassen ara aṭas. Ulac win ara d-yeffken afud i yilmeẓyen i ixeddmen deg-s. Am wakken daɣen, timetti-nneɣ, ur tqebbel ara aṭas axxedim-agi ,d amedya : ad d-teddmeḍ allal n tewleft, syin ad tleḥḥuḍ deg ubrid, neɣ di ssuq, ad ak-id-walin yimdanen amzun akken la ak- d-qqaren : « ḥadder ad i yi-d ṭfeḍ teswira’’. Ttugaden. Ur nezri ara ayen. ad d-nernu tayeḍ, wid teɛna temsalt, ur steɛerfen ara s unaẓur, ur d as-fkin ara azal i tẓuri-agi n tewlaft. Rnu ɣer waya, leɣla n wallalen i nessexdam deg umahil-agi-nneɣ. Ma yella, nuɣal-d ɣer usileɣ, ad naf d akken ulac aṭas n yiɣerbazen i ixeddmen anect-agi . Timura i iteddun ɣer sdat, fkant azal i tẓuri : ama d awelfan ama d acennay neɣ d amaru . Di tmurt-nneɣ, ur tezmireḍ ara ad tessenzeḍ tawleft deg yiẓeḍwa inmettiyen, maca di tmura-nniḍen d azref n unaẓur akken ad yesenz ayen i d-yesnulfa.

  Awal ɣef tewlafin n uberkan d umellal…  
  Tiwlafin-agi, sɛant ṣṣifa-nsent weḥd-nsent. Nekk, ttakeɣ-as icbi ɣer lfeṭṭa n At Yanni, acku d taẓuri. Ttakeɣ-as rruḥ am wakken i yi-d-yussa rruḥ si tmurt-iw n At Yanni. Ṣṣenf-agi, d win i ḥemmleɣ aṭas ad xeddmeɣ yis-s. D tigejda n uwlef , s ṣṣenf-agi, i d-tebda.

  Amek iga, ɣur-k, uwelfan igerrzen? 
  D win yessnen ad iwali, d win yessnen ad yeṭṭef asentel deg teswiɛin i icebḥen. D tiṭ-is ara iselḥun allal-is, mačči d allal-nni ara t-yesselḥun.

  D acu n ṣṣenf i tḥemmleḍ kečč ?  
  Ḥemmleɣ ad xedmeɣ s waṭas tiwlafin i d-nettmagar yal ass deg tudert-nneɣ, amedya : meḥyaf, leḥzen, tumert … Ḥemmleɣ ad awiɣ tawleft swayes ara ssiwḍeɣ izen akken iwata. Tin swayes ara iḥulfu umdan mi ara tt-yettwali, d awellah i bɣiɣ ad xedmeɣ 

  D acu n yisenfaren i d-tessewjadeḍ ?  
  Gar yisenfaren-iw : asuffeɣ n udlis anda ara d-jemɛeɣ ayen yakk i xedmeɣ deg taɣult-agi akked wayen yakk yerzan ɣer leqdicat iqburen i yeɛnan tameṭṭut. Aya, ad yili, d tajmilt i tmeṭṭut taqbaylit, d tajmilt i yemma.

  Awal n taggara…  
  Di tmurt-nneɣ, aṭas n yilmeẓyen i iḥemmlen awlef, d inaẓuren, maca anaẓur di tmurt-nneɣ ur yeswi ara, ur yesɛi ara amekkan-nni swayes ara yidir deg tmetti akken ilaq akken ttidiren yinaẓuren di tmura yennernan. Wigi i yebdan deg taɣult-agi, a win yufan ur ttruẓun ara axeddim-agi, axater mi ara txedmeḍ kra, tlaq-as tayri, neɣ fiḥel meqqar ma tesxessreḍ deg-s. « Win ixeddmen s yiffasen-is d axeddam, win ixeddmen s yifassen-is akked wallaɣ-is d inḍi, win ixeddmen s yifassen-is, s wallaɣ-is akked wul-is d anaẓur ». 

   Testeqsa-t Yamani Souhila  

  
 Santa Kruz di Wehran, d amkan ilan isem amazray. Tettwabna gar useggas 1577 d 1604 sɣur Spenyul, xedmen-tt deg umkan ɛlayen akken ad izmiren ad d-qablen aɛdaw-nsen syin.

 D aɣella n tallit-nni Santa Kruz i t-yebnan, ɣef waya i as-fkan isem-a. Ɣer tama-s, tella yiwet n tmesgida, maca medlent tewwura-s acḥal n yiseggasen-aya. Ussan-a i d-yella usunẓu-ines i tikkelt-nniḍen, s uneḥḍur n uneɣlaf n ddin, lwali n Wehran d ccix n zzawiya taɛalawit Xaled Ben Tunes akked Mass Géovanie Anjelo Bikou i d-yerzan s yisem n le Pape Fransis, d kra n yiwudam imasiḥiyen seg ugemmaḍ. Deg umeslay n uneɣlaf n ddin, yenna-d “d akken tullya n tmesgida-a d tagnit i usdukel d ureṣṣi n tmella d talwit, ilaq ad tili tlelli n teflest, yal wa ad iqader wayeḍ, akken ara d-ters talwit gar yimdanen n yiwet n tmurt”. Ladɣa ma neẓra annect-a yekcem deg tugdut d tlelli n teflest, imi yal yiwen d ilelli ɣef ubrid i ibɣa ad yaɣ, ilaq kan ad yili s uqader n wiyaḍ. D tikti yelhan, akken ara myezdin medden, ad d-tili tallelt gar-asen i ubaɣur n tmurt, ɣas ma mgaraden deg liman. Maca imeslayen-a, rran-aɣ kra n yiseggasen ɣer deffir, deg temnaḍt n Tegzirt d Yeɣẓer Ameqqran, deg waggur n remḍan, deg yiwen n unebdu yemmuẓeɣlen s waṭas, kra n yixeddamen di berra, ur zmiren ara ad ṣebren bla ma swan aman, dɣa ttwaṭṭfen sɣur yiɣallen n laman, u ttwaḥebsen kra n wussan, ɣas akken umnen s wayen-nniḍen. Ahat tullya n tmesgida-a deg Wehran d tagnit akken ad teqqen assaɣ n tegmat gar yimdanen d tirni ay akken bɣun ilin.

  Khaled. A 

  
 Yettban-d iseggasen-a ineggura simmal yettimɣur wazal n yennayer ɣur ugdud, yettnadi ad t-yefhem ugar, yettak-as akk akud ilaqen di tegnatin n lasel d tumert. 
  Dɣa, deg usamar n Bgayet, akk tiɣiwanin, grent-d irebbi i tfaska-a tansayant, abeɛda s ufus n yilemẓiyen n umussu asdukklan. Ama deg Suq Letnin, Iderginen, Xerraṭa, Ayt Smaɛel neɣ d Tasexriwt, deg yal yiwet seg temnaḍin-a yettwasuddes-d xersum yiwen n warmud i lmend n usfuggel n yennayer, ixef n useggas amaziɣ 2969. Ma nemmeslay ɣef tɣiwant n Yiderginen, d tiddukkla « Oxy-jeunes » i d-iheggan tikkelt-a armud imi deg yiseggasen yezrin, tella tettekkay kan d tikkin. Deg wahil amerkanti i d-thegga, yella-d umsizwer n tgella tansayant ifazzen, wayeḍ d win n tewlaft akk icebḥen n tɣiwant n Yiderginen akked umsizwer n temskkent yufraren. Deg Tsexriwt daɣen, am wakken i d-nberreḥ deg teẓrigin-nneɣ yezrin, gant afus deg ufus kra n tddukkliwin n tama-nni armi ssawḍent heggant-d ddeqs n yiqeddicen s wazal-nsen. Am yisaragen, timsikniyin. amsizwer n tgella, amezgun d usenɛet n tmelsi. Ma deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, ur d-yettwasuddes uqeddic d ageɛmir akken tennum tddukkla tadelsant Adrar n Fad. ḥaca amsizwer n wunud (plat) ansayan i yemmuggen, imi aṭas n tlawin i t-yettraǧun, akked usarag i yemmuggen, ass n sem 11 yennayer, deg Uxxam n yilemẓiyen Mulud At Mɛemmer n Ayt Smaɛel.
  
 <p style="text-align:right"> M. K. 
   
 Deg waɣir n Bgayet s umata, iban-d amek uqan ayendin yimeḍqan d tzeɣwa anda yezmer yilemẓi ad yelmed aẓawan neɣ ad yissin tigejda n tẓuri-a. Mačči d ayen isehlen akk ɣef yiwen ad yaf axxam-a n ulmad n tetiknikin d tarrayin n uẓawan. Ma yella deg yiseggasen yezrin, ur grin tamawt lɣaci n temnaḍt-a i lexsas-a, tura iban-asen-d waya d ugur ameqqran i wid i d-yettnekkaren ḥemmlen aẓawan d wallalen-is, akken sya ɣer sdat ad d-uɣalen d imẓawanen, d inaẓuren. Amedya n wid n Usamar-anẓul n Bgayet, ilaq-asen ad ɛeddin akkin i Uweqqas, ɣef teɣzi n ddeqs n yikilumitren, neɣ i waɣir n Bgayet maḍi, akken ad afen, s tuɛert, adeg i yebɣa lxaṭer. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ula deg uɣerbaz tuqa ayendin tanga-a (matière), am wakken uqan wid iwumi d-tsaḥ. Deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, i yeggugen s wazal n 65 n yikilumitren seg Bgayet, ttwalin yilemẓiyen i yemmalen ɣer uẓawan, yettwakkes-asen s tidet uzref, imi yal yiwen yufa ala netta i yenṭerren. « Win yebɣan ad yelmed lḥirfa, ha-t-an yella ulmas n Lberj n Mira, win yebɣan Internet, llan yisibiren, maca nekni i yebɣan aẓawan, ulac sanda ara nerr akken ad nelmed di temnaḍt-nneɣ ». D awal n yiwen n yilemẓi seg Ayt Smaɛel. Yelha ad d-nerr awellih belli, iseggasen-a ineggura kan, yella yenwa deg Ayt Smaɛel yiwen n urgaz ad isemmed asenfar n Uxxam n ulmad n uẓawan (Conservatoire) s yiselmaden d wayen ilaqen d allalen, maca ɣer taggara, yebra i ṭṭbel deg waman. « Ttxemmimeɣ ɣef usenfar-a seg waṭas-a. Maca ur kenniɣ ad yesmurres deg temnaḍt-nneɣ tamsedrart tamecṭuḥt ». Akka i iwala.

  M. K. 

  
 Ad d-tili tmeɣra n ukermus, de”g tezrigt-is tis 7, seg 11 ar 13 ɣuct i d-iteddun deg taddart n Sahel, taɣiwant n Wizgan. D taddart yettwasnen s leswar n lkermus daymi ara as-xedmen tameɣra meqqren anda ara ilint waṭas n temsikniyin d lesnaf n ukermus yemxalafen. Yala aseggas, deg unebdu, imezdaɣ-is n taddart n Sahel, ttfarasen tagnit, xeddmen-as tameɣra-agi d. Tettwassen tmurt n leqbayel s lxir d lɣella i d-ttak i yimezdaɣ-is ama d azemmur, tibexsisin neɣ Lkermus. Lkarmus d lfakya i itteksen laẓ, ladɣa tetten-t deg wussan n tegrawla, ama srid s učči-is neɣ s ubedel-is s uwren deg ssuq. Lkarmus d ddwa n ḥellu n watas n waṭṭanen, yesɛa azal meqqren di tmurt n leqbayel.

  S.Y. 

  
 Ɣas qeṣṣiḥet tyita ɣef kra n win yellan d ameɣnas n tidet, i ileḥḥun srid qbala ulamma ɣer yimi n yizem, ur yugad takurmut neɣ tamettant, imi yeẓra ɣef tidet i yedda, iɛemmed yakk i wayenni. Ma nenna-d yemmut Kamal Ddin Fexxar, yella deg-s kra n ccek, imi d amaziɣ u d amẓabi i yella. Ur teɛdil ara tmettant ɣef umeṭreḥ deg uxxam s ssebba n temɣer neɣ n waṭṭan akked tmettant daxel n lḥebs seld asunded n wacḥal d ass ɣef tuččit. Awal-nni i d-yeǧǧa Lwennas Meɛtub «Ajenwi ad d-yas s aɛenqiq, ad aɣ-zellun yiwen yiwen», yewweḍ-d lawan-is, imi wid i tt-yundin ẓran uɣur ttruḥun, ssnen aniwi i ḥebbsen. Maca, ula d tasussmi tekki deg lmut-is. Agdud-nni i d-yetteffɣen yal ass n sem yessutur rrwaḥ n unagraw, yezmer ula ad ibedd sdat n leḥbus ideg ttwakerfen yimeɣnasen n yizerfan n tidet akken ad d-yili userreḥ-nsen imi di lbaṭel ay ttwaṭṭfen, akka am Kamal Ddin Fexxar. Fell-as talwit d tmella. 

  Kh. A. 

  
 Lhan yinelmaden n tesdawit n tubiret ass-nni n ttlata, 15 tuber 2019, akken ad d-inin ‘’Ala i tefranin n 12 duǧember i d-iteddun’’, ‘’I rrwaḥ n yizamulen n unagraw’’. Am wakken i ṭṭalaben, diɣ, ‘’Asuffeɣ n yimeḥbas n rray’’. Ffyen-d yinelmaden n tesdawit Akli Muḥend Ulḥagǧ akken uɣen tannumi s umgired n tektiwin d wannayen iwraɣen, izeggaɣen d izegzawen. Dduklen-d akken ad d-inin ulac tifranin di yir tignatin yecban tigi. Ssuturen daɣen aqlaɛ n udabu seg yiẓuran imi dayen yeqqur. Ur ttun ara diɣ amennuy-nsen mgal tuddsiwin imi, ɣur-sen, tigi squcdent-d seg udabu. ‘’Ihi, ad ruhent akken ara iruh uẓar-nsent, akken ad teǧǧuǧeg tesdawit’’, i iwala yiwen unelmad. Ṭṭuqten yinelmaden yeddan si tesdawit armi d lwilaya akken ṭṭuqtent tektiwin-nsen. Ad nerr tamawt d akken ɣer tama n yinelmaden, lḥan kra n yimezday d imeɣnasen akken ad ffken afud i yilelliyen n tubiret. Tella-d tikli deg tegnatin igerrzen nezzeh ɣas ulamma aṭas i yelḥan deg-s s wulɣuten i yessawalen i ubeddel, tugdut d tlelli. Ṭṭerḍiqent tuyɣac n Maɛtub, Ideflawen d Uleḥlu amzun d Ǧerǧer s timmad-is i icennun.
  

  Nisma Tigrine 

  
 Am wakken i d-iban lḥal taggara-a, yettwaberreḥ daɣen wawal, d akken segmi d-yebda wayyur n tuẓamin, sɛeddayen yinelmaden n tesdawit n Bgayet yir tignatin deg tuget n tnezduɣin tisdawanin. Ama deg Terga Uzemmur, 1000 n wusuyen d tiyaḍ. Tamentilt n waya, tcudd ɣer tgella i asen-d-yettwaheggayen, iɣef i d-nnan ur tezmireḍ ad tt-teččeḍ. Ama d unud (plat) n ufḍar, neɣ d win n useḥḥer, ttwalin-ten yisdawanen xussen seg yakk tamiwin. Seg waya dɣa, terra-ten tmara ad rezzun ɣer yisečča n rreḥma n Bgayet, i d-yezgan meqrub tasdawit, akken ad sutren afḍar. Ulamma isečča-a, muggen abeɛda i yiẓawaliyen, i yigujilen d wid yeṭṭef lḥal deg ubrid, maca d ayen i ufan yisdawanen d asellak i truẓi n laẓ. « Am tgella n ssḥur am tin n lefḍur, d ayen ur yezmir yiwen ad iger deg yimi-s. Lbenna ulac, tisent tikwal tzad tikwal tenqes, tagella terɣa. War ma nemmeslay ɣef ciṭṭuḥ-nni i d-ttakken, seg ur yezmir ad yerwu umdan ɣas lemmer telha. Ilaq ad yuɣal, ad yessuter akken ad tamed tgella ». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n usdawan. Sya ɣer taggara n wayyur-a n remḍan, ur iban amek ara tkemmel taluft-a deg tnezduɣin tisdawanin n Bgayet. Imi deg wakud n yikayaden n taggara n useggas i d-iḍerru waya, ssaramen yilemẓiyen isdawanen lemmer zun ad telhu tegnit am acemma. D ayen ara asen-yerren ussan n remḍan d ifessasen, ara ten-yeǧǧen ad gen amek ilaq deg yikayaden.

  M. K. 

  
 Isuffeɣ-d ussan-a kan ucennay Yasin Cemmac, neɣ n Ayt Icemciwen s yisem azwaw, iseɣrez-is amenzu n ccna s uzwel n « Abrid n lehna », seld ddeqs n wayyuren n uxeddim d waṭas n yiseggasen n uraǧu. Imi Yasin acḥal netta di ddhen-is ad yessekles aḍebsi n tezlatin, maca armi d tura i d-yeqqers usenfar-a. 

 Ayen yerzan taḥawact i d-yewwi i wid iḥemmlen aẓawan, ddant-d deg umaynut-a ṭamet n tezlatin merra-merra, i d-yusan deg usismel-a: « Abrid n lehna », « Udem n talwit », « Tawla n lemḥibba », « Mi ttruɣ », « Tirga n leɣlaḍ », « Ttu-yi », « Nnecraḥ » akked « Tamussni ». Akken i t-id-qqaren yizwal, yecna yilemẓi-a, mmi-s n tɣiwant Ayt Smaɛel ɣef tlufa icudden ɣer tmetti d tikli-s, s ugmar n kra n waddaden d tikci n kra n yiwellihen s ubrid n yisefra. Yesqerdec daɣen, am tuget n yilemẓiyen, asentel d tayri di kra n tezlatin. Am wakken i d-yewwi kra n yisental-nni.

  Akken i aɣ-t-id-yenna ucennay s timmad-is, aṭas i irhen akken ad isamed asenfar-a, daymi yessaram ad yehwu amacemma i wid ara yeslen. Akka tura ihi, tzemrem ad tafem iseɣrez-a di kra n yimeḍqan deg usamar n Bgayet, di leɛḍil ad yeɛreḍ bab-is ad as-yeg asuzzer yelhan ugar. Imi akken neẓra, liḥala n unaẓur ur tessefraḥ di tmurt-a, tugart imi ula d ayen ara iɛell unfaras d umzuzzer, d netta s timmad-is i t-ixeddmen.

  M.
Azwaw 

  
 Deg wussan-agi kan, i d-yeffeɣ ɣer ssuq udlis wis sin n tmarut d tmazrayt Farida Sahoui, i wummi i tsemma Jugurta, Histoire d’un Peuple. Tulles-d deg-s tudert akked yimuhal n ugellid amaziɣ i d-as-yennan: “Ruma, i lbiɛ i win yebɣan ad tt-yaɣ”, wagi d agellid Jugurta neɣ Yugurten s yisem-is anaṣli, i d-yemmalen (yugar-iten). Temmeslay-d s telqayt ɣef tmeddurt-is, tallit s tallit. Tewwi-d daɣen awal deg-s ɣef umennuɣ-is d ṭṭradat yexdem ɣef tmurt-is. D adlis ara tafem deg temkerḍiyin s wazal n 250 DA, seg tlemmast n waggur-agi n yennayer d afella. Ass-nni n lexmis 18 yennayer 2018, i d-tberreḥ s wudem unsib n ussuffeɣ-ines ɣer ssuq, dɣa texdem yis-s asenzi s ubuddu amenzu, deg rreḥba n udlis i d-yellan taggara n ddurt-agi yezrin deg Tizi Rached. Ad-d nesmekti kan belli, Massa Farida Sahoui, tlul deg useggas n 1972 deg Azazga. D wagi i d adlis wis sin ara d-tessuffeɣ, umbeɛd mi d-tessazreg amenzu deg useggas n 2016, winna iwumi tga isem Familles Kabyles d’Algérié en Tunisie.

  A. A. 

  
 Aṭas i tekkes tallit tamaynut i d-yewwḍen d tannumiyin d leɛwayed i tuɣ ugtent deg tudrin n tmurt n Yizwawen. Ahat Azwaw ur yufi abrid iwulmen akken ad iqabel zzman atrar war ma yebra i uqbur. Imi deg uqbur i nuḥen yakk wansayen d tannumiyin-is n tudert. D ameslay ɣef lmaɛesrat, imzilen, ixxamen n uqermud, d wayendin n tɣawsiwin-nniḍen i iḍebɛen ɣef tudert n zik n Uzwaw, ass-a ḍḥant-d uqant, ttfakkant s tazzla. I lmend dɣa n tsemhuyt-a n tleqqaḍt d ubray n uzemmur, aṭas i ssarmen lemmer zemren ad d-ɛeddin seg yakk tarrayin n zik send ad d-yuɣal uzemmur-nsen d zzit. Γur kra, d taluft n usmekti n wansayen d tɣara n tudert n yimezwura, amzun d acedhi-nni i ineṭḍen i wallaɣ. Γur wiyaḍ, icudd lebɣi-nsen ɣer tezmert d tɣellist-nsen. Ttwalin timacinin timaynutin n wuzzal, ansi I d-tettɛedday zzit, ur asen-ḍemnent tazmert n tfekka akken ilaq. Ladɣa imi llant kra n lmaɛesrat tatrarin, yeqdim wuzzal-nsent armi qrib ttseddident. « Ur ẓriɣ acimi ur i yi-ččurent ara tiṭ lmaɛesrat-a timaynutin i d-yennulfan. Yal lawan n ubray n uzemmur, ad ttnadiɣ s usirem ɣef walbaɛḍ n lmaɛesrat tiqburin i yi-iqerben, maca ur ttafeɣ tin yeṭṭfen ». D tanaga n yiwen n umezdaɣ seg Ayt Smaɛel. Segmi i d-wwḍent lmaɛesrat tatrarin, aṭas i yeǧǧan lmaɛesrat-nsen timzikin ulamma llan xeddmen yis-sent akked kra n lɣaci. Walan am wakken yeɣleb-iten zzman, ur mazal ara zemren ad d-gren aɣrum s lmaɛesrat i asen-d-ǧǧan lejdud, bran i ṭṭbel deg waman. Wa yuɣ-d timacinin tatrarin, wayeḍ ibeddel tawuri akk.

  M.K. 

  
 Ɣas ma yella mgaraden wansayen seg tmurt ɣer tayeḍ, u ɣas ma yella mkul yiwen amek i d-yekker, amek i yettidir, lameεna tameṭṭut di tmetti s umata, ladɣa deg tallit yezrin, ur tesεi ara izerfan yemtawan d wid n urgaz. Ma nekkes Imaziɣen, tameṭṭut deg wakud yezrin, tella tettwaḥqeṛ ɣur kra n yiɣeṛfan. Di lawan anda i neqqen lxalat, ɣur yimaziɣen d nutenti i yeṭṭfen taqacuct. 

 Tameṭṭut tamaziɣt si zik ur tekni ara i ddel, amedya d Dihya, i yuraren nnuba n mraw n yirgazen, teffeɣ-d mgal acengu ineslem ameṣbaṭli. Ma yella deg tallit n tegrawla mgal iṛumyen, ffɣent teqbayliyin tiḥṛaṛ ɣer yidurar i wakken ad ssufɣent iεdawen, am Lalla Faḍma nsumer, d Ḥasiba Ben Buεli. Ayagi yesbeyyin-d belli tameṭṭut taqbaylit, urǧin tebra i nnif-is ɣas ma yella tezga d tilellit. 

 Lbaṭṭel d lḥif i d-yemmaren ɣef tullas deg umaḍal, demmren-tent i wakken ad kksent azeglu ɣef yiman-nsent. Ayagi, yella-d i tikkelt tamezwarut deg yiɣerfan n Marikan yedduklen deg useggas n 1909. Imi ffɣent tlawin ɣer yiberdan, ssutrent azref-nsent i uxeddim, d tlelli n umeslay d waṭas n temsal-nniḍen. Seg yimir-n uɣalent tmura sfuggulent ass-n, armi yuɣal 08 di meɣṛeṣ d ass amaḍalan n useḥbiber ɣef yizerfan n tlawin.

 D ayen ibanen, tameṭṭut d llsas n tmetti, d tigejdit n uxxam, d tala n leḥnana, d azamul n tebɣest d umennuɣ. Ihi mačči ala yiwen n wass deg useggas i tuklal i wakken ad tt-id-yemmekti yiwen. Meεna tameṭṭut, teḥwaǧ leqdeṛ, asayes, awal lεali yal ass. Tamurt yebnan ɣef tmeṭṭut, llsas-is d awezɣi ad yeɣli. Ihi nekni seg tama-nneɣ ad d-nini tafaska tamerbuḥt i tullas n umaḍal.

<p style="text-align:right">  K.K. 

  
 Tameddit n wass n lexmis 19 yulyu 2018 i d-ffɣen yigemmaḍ n ukayad n BAC, mbaɛd imi i d-berreḥ tneɣlaft n ttrebga ɣef ufmiḍ (%) n yal agezdu di tmurt. Am yal aseggas, u tikkelt tis 12, d lwilaya n Tizi uzzu s 87.47 % i yeṭṭfen taqacuct deg leḥsab n wid i irebḥen deg ukayad-a. Syin ad d-tas lwilaya n Jijel s 85.48 %. Deg umḍiq wis kraḍ, ad naf lwilaya n Skikda s 83.86 %. Syin d lwilaya n Bgayet s 83.40 % . S umata, akayad n Bac, di tmurt yewweḍ leḥsab-is ɣer 55,88%. Ma ɣef leḥsab n tangiwin, d tusnakt i yeṭṭfen amekkan amenzwaru s 64%, tussna deg umḍiq wis sin 65%. Ma yella deg umekkan aneggaru, ad naf tutlayin tibarraniyin i d iṣubben ɣef useggas iɛeddan d felsafit.

  S.Yamani 

  
 Tesfaydi-d tɣiwant n Uɣrib, yetabaɛen ɣer dayra n Uzzefun, i d-yezgan deg ugafa n umalu n Tizi Uzzu, deg tɛecret n yiseggasen iɛeddan, seg yiwen usenfar n lebni n 200 n yidigen n tenzuyt. D yiwen usenfar gar yisenfar yettujerden deg wahil n uselway n tmurt, yeɛnan lebni n 100 n yidegan n tenzuyt i yal taɣiwant. Taɣiwant n Uɣrib, tesfaydi-d s 200 n yidigan n tenzuyt, 100 n yidigan n zyada ɣef tɣiwanin-nniḍen imi meqqer umḍan n yilmeẓyen ur nesɛi ara imeḍqan n lexedma. Maca, ass-a, idigen-agi, ttwaǧǧan, gqran-d deg yir liḥala, ɣas ma lecɣal n lebni kfan deg usenfar, d acu kan mazal urɛad ssiwḍen ɣur-s trisiti, aman d lgaz n temdint. Rnu ɣef waya aẓeṭṭa n waman yimesxen (réseau d’assainissement) i urɛad kfan s lxedma. Acḥal n yiseggasen seg wasmi ttwaǧǧn yidigen-agi, ass-a a-ten-an deg yir liḥala yehtutan d waṭas n wallalen yettwakren deg-sen. Gren-d yiɛggalen n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan acḥal d tikelt tiɣri i yimḍebbren n Ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu, i wakken ad fkan tadrimt iwulmen i ukemmel n lecɣal n usenfar-agi, maca ar ass-a, ur d-fkin ara rray asɛdi ɣef liḥana n yidigen-agi.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Zyada ɣef uselmed n tmaziɣt deg uɣerbaz, yettili-d Mehenna Halit i lmendad ɣef tesɣunt Aselmad i yewwḍen akka tura ɣer wuṭṭun wis 4. Tikkelt-a, yeldi-d ul-is i Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen i wakken ad d-yerr ɣef kra n yisteqsiyen i icudden ɣer tesɣunt Aselmad, yecban isyiwen-is, isental, wid yettarun deg-s d wayen-nniḍen.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Amek i d-tusa tikti ? 

  Mehenna Halit;  Yiwen n wass, neqqim nekk d yiwen n umeddakkul deg lqahwa deg yiɛaẓẓugen, nhedder ɣef yiḍrisen s tmaziɣt imi yella lexṣas, syin tusa-yi-d akka tikti ɣer wallaɣ, dɣa nniɣ-as: ‘’Win ara ixeddmen akka tasɣunt deg ‘Internet”, ahat ad illin wid ara yarun, dagi i d-tusa tikti. Imir xedmeɣ-d ulɣu deg yigrawen n yiselmaden akken ad d-nessuffeɣ tasɣunt i wid yebɣan ad d-arun. Nebda s wuṭṭun amezwaru i d-yefɣen deg wayyur n yibrir 2017. Ass-a, newweḍ ɣer wuṭṭun wis ukkuẓ.

  Anwa yettarun deg-s, acu n   yisental i d-yettilin? 

 Deg tesɣunt Aselmad, yal win yebɣan ad yaru, ad d-yaru, ulamma nefka-as isem tasɣunt Aselmad acukan ttarun ula d win leɛmer neɣri tamaziɣt. Lmuhim ad yili uḍris s tmaziɣt. Ma d asentel, yal wa yesɛa azref i wakken ad yefren asentel ɣef wayeg ara yaru. Ɣef waya, aṭas n yisental i yellan deg tesɣunt-agi. Ma nger tamawt, ad naf uran-d ula d wid yeqqaren deg tesnawiyin.

  D acu-ten yiswiyen n usenfar-agi-nwen? 

 Tasɣunt Aselmad, tesɛa yiwen n yiswi, imi nwala lexsas deg yiḍrisen n tmaziɣt i seqdacen deg yiɣerbazen. S tesɣunt Aselmad, nebɣa ad naru iḍrisen imaynuten ara yilin i lmed n uselmed n tmaziɣt akk d win yebɣan ad ɣren s tmaziɣt.

  Acu n wuguren i   d-temmuggrem deg unnar 

 Tetteffeɣ-d tesɣunt Aselmad s talɣa n PDF. Ihi, s talɣa-agi, ulac ugur n yidrimen imi d wagi i d ugur i sɛan ass-a n wid i yebɣan ad d-suffɣen idlisen-nsen. yal mi ara d-teffeɣ, nettserriḥ-as baṭṭel deg Internet, akken ad tt-walin medden. Yella kan yiwen n wugur: Mi ara d-yawweḍ lawan n ujmaɛ n yiḍrisen, nezga nessawal i wid yuɣen tannumi akken ad aɣ-d-swejden iḍrisen-nsen di lawan.

  Acu tettraǧun, s umata,   seg yiselmaden neɣ deg yimeɣriyen ? 

 Nettraǧu deg-sen, tugart wid yettarun, acukan ur ttekkin ara s yiḍrisen-nsen deg tesɣunt akken ilaq, limmer d lebɣi ur aɣ-ttɣullun ara s yiḍrisen-nsen imi tamaziɣt tezwar kulec. Ilaq ad aɣ-ten-id-ceyyɛen imi aɣerbaz yeḥwaǧ iḍrisen-nsen. Xas ulamma llan wid yekukran, ɣillen ahat iḍrisen-nsen ur gerrzen ara, acukan yal aḍris yettwarun s tutlayt-nneɣ yecbeḥ, igerrez, yuklal akken ad yeddu deg tesɣunt.

  Acu tzemreḍ ad d-tiniḍ ɣef   uselmed n tmaziɣt akka tura? 

 Aselmed n tmaziɣt di tmurt n leqbayel, yedda ɣer sdat imi iselmaden, inelmaden, imawlan fkan azal i uselmed n tutlayt-a. Deg tama-agi, mazal timuɣnest ɣef tutlayt, rnu ɣef wanect-a imi d tama n tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Llan iselmaden imeɣnasen ixeddmen nnig tezmert-nsen akken tamaziɣt ad tennerni. Acukan berra i tama-agi, tella-d d aɣebbar s allen, imi ulac win i tt-yeqqaren, d taneɣlfat n usedwel kan i yettɣenin taɣect-nni belli tamaziɣt qqaren-tt di 48 n lwilayat. Lukan ad neḥseb acḥal n yinelmaden i yeqqaren tamaziɣt berra i tmurt n leqbayel, ad naf ur wwiḍen ara azal n yinelmaden yellan deg yiwet akka n tɣiwant tamecṭuht deg Tizi Uzzu. Deg tamiwin-agi, ssekcamen-d yimawlann iman-nsen deg yiɣerbazen, ttagin i warraw-nsen akken ad ɣren tamaziɣt. Ulamma llan kra n yinelmaden bɣan ad tt-ɣren, acukan imawlan-nsen ugin-asen imi asen-qqaren ulac d acu ara txedmem s tmaziɣt-agi. Qqaren ‘’Nebɣa i warraw-nneɣ tagnizit, meɛna ula d tin ur tt-qqaren ara. Ttafen-d kan abrid s wawal-agi ‘’nebɣa taginizit’’ akken ad gezmen abrid i uselmed n tmaziɣt. Rnu ɣer waya, tasertit n lezzayer imi tugi ad tekkes asaḍuf n taɣda n 2008 i yerran aselmed n tmaziɣt i win yebɣan, mebla ma nuttu iɛewwiqen i as-d-xeddmen i uselmed-is. 

  Yesteqsa-t   Hocine Moula 

  
 Seg tqacuct ɛlayen n udrar n Merǧaǧu i yebda ass-nni n acer yezrin uṣewwer n usaru asnegmay n warrat d udellel i lmend n wuraren n yilel agrakal ara d-yilin deg temdint n Wehran deg unebdu n useggas n 2021. Ɛlaḥsab n talɣut i aɣ-d-yewwḍen seg tenmehla tawilayant n yidles, yella-d ufran n udrar n Merǧaǧu deg tazwara, imi ɛlay. 

 Ɣef waya tugniwin timenza ara d-yettwasneɛten deg usaru-a d ccbaḥa n ucraq d walluy n yiṭij ɣef temdint n Wehran yebhan neɣ akken i as-ssawalen s taɛrabt “Lbahya”. Syin, ad ikemmel uheggi n usaru s lmendad n twilayt ara d-yilin deffir n usenfar-a. Ma d tukci n tedrimt (sponsoring), ad d-yili sɣur agraw n Sonatrac. Leqdic-a, ad ikemmel ihi ɣef teɣzi n ṣa n wussan, deg yidgan yemgaraden i d-yeskanen amezruy lqayen n temdint-a n Wehran, yecban amraḥ n yimrigen, tawenza n lebḥer (front de mer) d leqṣer n Lbay…atg.

  Ad kkin deg usali n leqdic-a waṭas n wudmawen idelsanen, inaddalen d yilmeẓyen yettwafernen akken ad d-yili usisen n temdint n Wehran seg xilla n tamiwin. Ad d-nesmekti belli tawilayt-a, tettheggi i teẓrigt-a tis 19 n wuraren n yilel agrakal s tigin n leqdicat meqqren, am tigin n taddart tagrakalt (Village Mediterranéen), d unnar meqqren yettawin ugar n 40 000 n yimferǧen di tama n Belgayed d tzeqqa n waddalen yemxalafen ara d-yekfun i 6 n yigiman akked wammasen n lɛum. Akken daɣen ara d-yili ureqqeɛ d uɛawed n waṭas n yimukan n waddal yellan yakan. 

 Ad d-ilin daɣ yirmad n ucebbeḥ n yizenqan ara d-yefken tahuski igerrzen i yimerza. Annect-a merra, akken ara iɛeddi u ad iwenneɛ usiher-a anaddal agraɣlan, imi ad d-yeglu s yiseɣ i tmurt ma iɛedda akken iwata. Seg tama-nniḍen, nelqeḍ-d yiwen isali, anda i yetturaǧu ad d-rzun yiɛeggalen n teseqqamut tagraɣlant n wuraren-a n yilel agrakal d inebgawen ɣef temdint n Wehran ass n sem i d-iteddun, akken ad muqlen u ad ẓren s anda ssawḍen lecɣal n uheggi n yidgan-a inaddalen, gar-asen ladɣa taddart tagrakalt d unnar meqqren, imi lecɣal a-ten-an deg taggara, u yetturaǧu ad d-tberreḥ teɣlift n yilmeẓyen d waddal s keffu n leqdic n unnar deg waggur-agi n yebrir sdat-neɣ.

<p style="text-align:right">  Khaled Achoui 

  
 Ass-mi yeɣli Yugurten, yettwaṭef deg Tasift n Malwan, ceklen-t s snasel n wuzzal am uεejmi-nni ameεur n Ṭelyan. Yuɣal ur yesεi tuyat akken i ten-yesεa uqbel akka, ala tayet-is kan i d-yeggran, imi tawekka, tekker-as i lǧedra tezwara-s. Tabeɛεuct-nni, tekreb deg wallaɣ-is, yekcem-it ccek n tixubta n udeggal-is, deg umennuɣ-nni aneggaru mgal Ruman. Ul-is, yemla-as-d tadyant n Buxus, allaɣ-is yeqqar-as-d: ‘’Ala ala…..wayi d idammen-iw, ur ḥsiɣ ad yesεu taɣennant d tixubta am yimezwerra. Daɣen imi afus deg-nneɣ i d-yekka, ṭmeε, tixubta d tissas….atg. Tecfiḍ ass-mi, tekker gar-nneɣ, nekk akked Ḥimṣel d gma-s-nniḍen Aderbal. Limmer d lebɣi-k a zzman, nuɣ-it seg uẓar n tjaddit, yak yella win i aɣ-yizwaren ɣer tissas-a d ufraq n tegmat. Limmer d lebɣi-k a zzman, butlufa ur as-tefkiḍ ayen i as-yehwan i umaziɣ. Ur as-tefkiḍ talwit d lehna d tumert. Ur as-teẓẓiḍ di tallit-nni ; » Tuddsa i tgelda-ines d ugdud-is deg wakal-is, am ugdud Arumani. Deg tallit-nni, ur cukkeɣ ad tili txubta d tissas gar-aneɣ seg zik ar ass-a, ilaq negrent kfant. Yugurten i d-qqnen s snasel d txelxalin n wuzzal, iḍaren-is d ifasen-is deg wakal-is, srid ɣer tesraft n Tullianum di Ruma. 

 Dinna i yesεedda ussan d iberkanen d buεeryan gar yiṣeffaḥen n ublaḍ, yettazzalen deg-s waman d iṣemmaḍen. Yugurten, yegren dinna deg tlemmast n lyali n tegrest d yennayer. Yugurten, iḥulfa iwussan-is ad akfun. Yeẓra d ussan ineggura. Ɣas daɣen asemmiḍ yewwet-it ɣer yiɣsan, ilewwa-t, iḥṣa s wanect-a. Yeṣbeɣ deg yidis-is, 6 n wussan i yesεedda di tesraft, fazen  ɣur-s aṭas, maca am wid isεedda deg wakal-is, yenṭeq yenna deg ul-is: ‘’Tura rtaḥeɣ, sεiɣ talwit, ala ussan-ayi kan i sḥuseɣ i sḥulfeɣ itudert-iw, wala ussan-nni n 15 n yiseggasen d ṭraḍ mgal aytma ( Ḥimṣel, Aderbal, Gawda, général Bumelxir, aneggaru-a, d aḍeggal-is Buxxus…..) d ucengu n Ruman. Ɣas liɣ di tallit-nni, lliɣ akken i lliɣ d agellid n Numidya Sirta, ussan-nni d taɣennant ur as-sriseɣ talwit, ur tessineɣ, ur tessineɣ tuɣalin ɣer d fir, d adham ɣer sdat. Tirɣi trennu-d i tayeḍ, tiɣremt ara  kecmeɣ, alamma tekfa tenger dayen. 

 Ur ǧǧiɣ ayetma, ur ǧǧiɣ idammen-iw, ur zriɣ, ur ḥsiɣ d acu i d-iteddun ɣer sdat-inek neɣ i wakal n Tmazɣa, ulamma sawleɣ d gma, ulamma serseɣ-d talwit. Ulamma neddukel, ulamma nṛessa adabu iṣeḥḥan, ur yizmir yiwen ad yerrez neɣ ad yekcem gar-nneɣ s tissas-is. Ulamma fkiɣ-asen Tagelda ad magen d igelliden wayetma ɣef demma n Tmazɣa d wakal-is, ulamma nṛessa tuddsa i Tgelda-nneɣ akken yiwen ur yezmir ad yekcem gar-nneɣ, akken i d-yesekcem tixubta, tissas, tiḥerci d tɣennant gar-nneɣ Urumani. Ar tura teẓẓa deg yiẓuran-nneɣ. Ulamma ur telli tɣawsa-nni n beṭṭu n ugdud teẓẓa deg uẓar-nneɣ ar ass-a, ulamma negrent tudrin, meḥsub mi llant d tiɣermin ass-a d ixerban …

  D.M. 

  
 Yegla-d ubeddel n tegnawt, ussan-a yezrin, s wussan d wuḍan isemmaḍen mačči d kra deg tamiwin n umalu n tmurt, gar-asent tamaneɣt n umalu Wehran, akken i as-qqaren. Ma nemmesslay-d ɣef yiɣerbazen, ad naf deg kra deg-sen uɣalent tneɣriyin d tixxamin tisemmaḍin seg ugris i d-yeɣlin d uṣubbu n tfesniwin n lḥamu am yakk tiwilayin n tmurt. Ɣef waya, aṭas n yinelmaden i yettcektayen ɣef wayɣer ur ḥmin ara neɣ i xuṣṣen ttawilat n useḥmu deg yiɣerbazen, ladɣa imezwura. Tikwal, tettarra-ten tmara ad lemden deg tegnatin iweɛren, akken lsan tibalṭunin-nsen. Deg tɣiwanin n usamer n twilayt, ula d kra seg tid iqerben ɣer temdint, mazal ssexdament lmazut, d ayen i t-yeǧǧan yal tikkelt iḥebbes war timental. Tikwal, yessagad imasayen n uɣerbaz ad d-teḍru kra n twaɣit, ɣef waya ssexsayen-t. U ɣas akken lgaz n temdint yezger qrib yakk akal n lwilaya, maca mazal ssemrasen asafar n lmazut deg yiɣerbazen. Ma nmuqel uṭṭunen n tneɣlaft n usegmi, ad naf tettarra azal n 400 n yimelyaren i yiṣenfaren-a, acku d ayen ilan azal akken inelmaden ad ɣren deg tegnatin igerrzen. Ula d iselmaden d yixeddamen n uɣerbaz s umata, ad gen amahil-nsen s wul, aya akk i ubaɣur d usnerni n uɣerbaz azzayri yesran i wallalen iwatan akken ara yelḥu d wakud. Maca ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan kra ‘’d tikebbaniyin yeṭṭfen iqdicen-a deg yiɣerbazen, imi ur xeddment ara akken ilaq, rnu ssemrasent tiɣawsiwin ur nelhi ara (contre façon), d ayen i tent-yettaǧǧan yal mi ara d-yezzi useggas xessrent’’.

  Khaled. A 

  
 Tiɣri i d-gren srabes n liḥala n tegnewt d uɛeggen i yimdanen ɣef leḥder yessaferrer kra n lexsarat ahat deg uḥric n twaɣiwin n yiberdan, maca yella wanda i d-nnulfant kra n lemḍarrat yeglan ula s terwiḥin. Deg yiḍ n larebɛa ɣer lexmis yezrin, ageffur d waḍu ǧehden mačči d kra, almi ula d iqudas n usufeɣ n waman, ur ssawḍen ara ad ssufɣen anect-nni n tḥemmal i yettazzalen deg yiberdan d yizenqan n temdint. Tasebḥit n wass n lexmis, iɣallen n usellek ffɣen-d i wakken ad ssifsen taɛkemt ɣef medden, imi llan kra n yimukan reglen-ten waman. Ɛerḍen ad ldin yiwet n tadimt ara yessufɣen taḥemmalt. Dɣa din, i tegla tneggarut-a s tlata seg yiɛeggalen-a n usellek. Yekker wahruḥu deg umkan, ssawḍen yimeddukkal-nsen ad d-ssukksen sin seg lmeḥna, ma d wis tlata tejbed-it tnifift ur ẓrin anda yedda. Imḍebbren n twilayt ɣef uqerru-nsen lwali Mustapha Limani, usan-d s amkan ideg teḍra twaɣit-a anda ttawilat akk iwulmen ttwasxedmen i wakken ad d-ssukksen tafekka n uɛeggal n usellek, maca mačči d ayen i isehlen fell-asen. Deg tamiwin-nniḍen, ladɣa lewhi n taddart n Yilyiten, d asyax n ubrid i d-yellan tama n lluzin n trisiti, d ayen yeǧǧan imḍebbren n uḥric-a gezmen trisiti azal n 12 n tsaɛtin i wakken ad sbeɛden taḥemmalt i d-yerran ɣer lluzin-a. D ayen yeǧǧan imezdaɣ n Yilyiten ttɛeddin-d kan seg ubrid i d-yettawin ɣer Saḥriǧ, imi win n wasif asemmaḍ yettwagzem. 

<p style="text-align:right">   Smail. M 

  
 Ugar n tira, yeɛreḍ Mhenni Xalifi ad iḥaz aṭas n yiḥricen n yidles. Nemmeslay yid-s, ha-t-an wayen i aɣ-d-yellan d awal.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Tessuffɣeḍ-d ussan-a adlis n uẓeṭṭa n wawalen. Mmeslay-aneɣ-d fell-as… 
 Mhenni Xalifi : D adlis ideg i d-greɣ kra n wuraren i d-suffɣeɣ yakan deg yisebtar n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen, gar 2014 d 2015. Yettwasiẓreg-d ɣur teẓrigin Ccix Muḥend Ulḥusin. D abrid-nniḍen i uḥraz d usnerni n tutlayt-nneɣ, imi ṣṣenf-a, ur inuḥ ar tura s waṭas deg tnedlisin-nneɣ.

  Yusa-d waya seld Aẓeṭṭa n wawalen i d-tesnulfaḍ i wurar ɣef ṭṭabla… 
 D tidet, tura ugar n sin n yiseggasen segmi i t-giɣ, d acu, ɛeṭṭleɣ deg usuffeɣ-is. Ɛni ar tura, ur d-suffɣeɣ seg-s aṭas n yimedyaten, ulamma llan wid i t-id-yessutren, bɣan ad t-tturaren akked twacult neɣ akked yimeddukkal. Iban yiswi-w deg waya; D assali n tutlayt-iw ɣer uswir n tutlayin-nniḍen. Zik, lliɣ tturareɣ kan Scrabble n tefṛansist, dɣa giɣ armi urareɣ aẓeṭṭa-a s tutlayt-iw. Nniɣ-as skud yella wamek, acimi ur yittizmir Uqbayli ad yurar Aẓeṭṭa n wawalen s tutlayt-is?

  Tewwiḍ taggara-a arraz Asya Ǧebbar n wungal ifazzen s wungal-ik Imehbal. Ɣef wacu i d-yettmeslay s umata? 
 Ameslay fell-as ad tt-yesban yiwen ala s tɣuṛi. D acu, zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ, si tama, yettmeslay-d wungal Imehbal ɣef tallit tamehbult, ɣef tmuɣliwin d tedyanin tiderwicin. Maca daɣen, yewwi-d tasleḍt ɣef tmetti tamirant d tikli-s, s yiwen n wullis ideg yella umyuzzam gar ṣṣwab, neɣ lmeɛqul, d unemgal-is. Lḥaṣul, ur yebni uzwel-is ɣef yiwudam-is kan, wanag ɣef tenfust-is d yiswi-s.

  Amek tettwaliḍ dɣa tasekla taqbaylit, d tmaziɣt s umata? 
 Aswir n tsekla s umata, iteddu akked yixemmimen d tegzi n umeskar di tazwara, syin yettban-d ɣef leḥsab d wamek tga tmetti. Ɣef tsekla taqbaylit, ttwaliɣ telḥa-d amecwaṛ yessefṛaḥ, ulamma aṭas i yellan d iɛewwiqen i as-yugin ad tecceɛceɛ. Gar wuguren-a, yella wayen akken yezreɛ uɣerbaz n Lezzayer deg uqeṛṛu n win ara d-yeffɣen seg-s. Armi i d-tennerna dɣa tsekla i iḍurren idles, amezruy d uẓar-nneɣ!

  Tekkiḍ ula deg yiṣenfaṛen n usekcem n teqbaylit ɣer umaḍal umḍin… 
 D ayen s nettḥulfu s rraḥa n tefrit. Nessekcam taqbayit deg yidigan internet, deg yiseɣẓanen, deg yisnasen, am nettat am tutlayin-nniḍen n umaḍal. Cwi kan aql-aɣ di tallit n internet d tetiknulujit. Tura ur telli ɣef yimi n nnger tutlayt-nneɣ tazwawt meskud tella deg umaḍal umḍin. D acu, ad d-uɣaleɣ ɣer taluft n useqdec, ula di internet yessefk ad tt-nesseqdac. D amedya kan, mi ara d-teffeɣ teqbaylit s wudem unsib deg uẓeṭṭa inmetti Facebook, yewwi-d ad tt-yefren yal Aqbayli. Ula d atmaten Imaziɣen-nniḍen, zemren ad tt-fernen, di leɛḍil ad ilint dinna tutlayin-nsen. Nettraǧu dɣa ad gen am nekni akked tutlayin-nsen deg unnar-a n usideg.

  Aql-ik daɣ deg unnar n ccna s teqbaylit. Mmeslay-aɣ-d cwiṭ ɣef wayen tcennuḍ… 
 Si zik cennuɣ, si zik ḥemmleɣ ad cnuɣ. ɛerḍeɣ ula ad lemdeɣ tagiṭart di tazwara n tnubi. Cennuɣ abeɛda tilufa n Uzwaw d Umaziɣ, d wayen i izemren ad yefru iɣilifen-is, am wakken cennuɣ ayen yerzan ddunit s umata, talsa, d unadi n useggem n umaḍal. Ur yettɛeṭṭil ara dɣa, ad d-yeffeɣ uḍebsi-w wis sin.

  Nwala, tɛerḍem ad tesmuzzɣem tawennaḍt deg taddart-nwen n Ayt Smaɛel. Amek yelḥa uṣenfaṛ? 
 D tidet ! Nemmeslay ɣef tikti akked lmir n tɣiwant, Mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi, i yettwassnen s temmeɣnest-is, syinna nceyyeɛ tiɣṛi i yimezdaɣ, nesnulfa-d ula d tansa « <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="9deef8ecf9f8fee9e8e9f1fce4e9f4f6ddfaf0fcf4f1b3fef2f0" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a> » i wid yebɣan afus n tallelt. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ isudd cwiṭ waya, maca mačči akken ilaq. Annect-nni d asendeh, d asmekti kan. Ayen i aɣ-yesfeṛḥen ugar, mi nwala seg yimir-nni ddeqs n temnaḍin i yekkren i usmuzzeɣ. Ulamma asenṣeb n tutlayt ibeddu seg wagens n uxxam. Mačči kan ilaq ad nettmeslay, ad nesseqdac tutlayt-nneɣ, maca yewwi-d ad d-nbeggen deg-neɣ idles-nneɣ yal ass, ma nebɣa ad nili d nekni.

  D winna, aṭas n tikkal i d-temmeslayeḍ ɣef wamek tluɣ tmeslayt-nneɣ s wawalen ibeṛṛaniyen. Amek ara yekkes wugur-a ɣef tmuɣli-k ? 
  Meskud iḍul uɣerbaz i nessaram, ara d-iṛebbin tasuta akken nebɣa nekni, mačči akken bɣan wiyaḍ, ttwaliɣ tifrat timiranin llant kan deg useqdec n wayla-nneɣ. Aseqdec! Aseqdec! War akukru d usetḥi. Ilaq ad nẓer belli aql-aɣ deg wayen icuban amennuɣ gar tutlayin akken ad d-tbin tutlayt-a neɣ d ta. Yal mi ara mmeslayeɣ s tutlayt-iw, yal mi ara aruɣ yis-s, kkiɣ deg ussider-is. Ma giɣ anemgal, kkiɣ deg tmenɣiwt-is. Daɣen, ɣas yewɛeṛ cwiṭ lḥal, maca ilaq ad nesseqdac amawal atrar akken ad tqeɛɛed tmeslayt-nneɣ di tatrara-a, ur tettmil ɣuṛ tiyaḍ. Awalen « azul » d « tanemmirt » ass-a uɣalen d iqbuṛen, akken ara yili lḥal ula ɣef wiyaḍ.

  Kečč seg wid yessnen akken ilaq tamarut Kaysa Xalifi i yellan d uletma-k. Awal akka d amecṭuḥ fell-as… 
 Fell-as talwit n lebda. Ad yeɣzif aṭas wawal-iw akken ad d-iniɣ ciṭuḥ ɣef uletma Kaysa. Ad d-iniɣ kan, si tama n tmagit, Kaysa tella d Taqbaylit i yettnadin kan amek ara teẓẓu tayri d yidles d umezruy-nneɣ ɣur yilemẓiyen d tlemẓiyin. Ulamma tesḥassef ɣef waddad n tutlayt-nneɣ deg wakal-is, tefṛeḥ ayendin mi tga ayen yellan fell-as, tura s yis-s, tessaweḍ isallen s yis-s, atg. Si tama n temdanit, tella Kaysa d talsant, d mm yiḥulfan, d tuḥdiqt armi dayen kan.

  Acu ara d-tiniḍ ɣef tnekkra-a n ugdud i ubeddel di Lezzayer ? 
 Yal tnekkra ara d-yilin akken ad yettwakkes lbaṭṭel telha. D acu kan, nessaram ad teffeɣ tikkelt-a ɣef yakk iɣeṛfan d yakk idelsan. Acku, i usmekti kan, ar tura ulac tanekkra i yeffɣen fell-aneɣ nekni s Yizwawen d Yimaziɣen s umata.

  Tanemmirt mi d-terriḍ i yisteqsiyen-nneɣ. Awal-ik n taggara… 
 Ssarameɣ ad nekki deg useɣleb n tidet ɣef tkerkest, d uzref ɣef lbaṭṭel.
  Testeqsa-t K. K. 

  
 Uguren ttidiren yimezdaɣ n tudrin d tɛekkmin yezgan fell-asen d unḥerrak i d-yettilin di tmurt qrib 6 n wagguren-aya, yessaweḍ aṭas seg yimezdaɣ-a yenṭerren ad d-sbeggnen lɣiḍ-nsen s tarrayt neɣ s tayeḍ. 

 D ayagi i yessawḍen imezdaɣ n taddart n Tifra yettabaɛen asun n Sidi Ɛic, ad d-ffɣen si tsusmi-nsen, s umdal n tɣiwant, qrib tura 25 n wussan, s lebni n yiwen n uɣrab d uslaɣ-ines deg wadeg n tewwurt n unekcum n berra. S wakka, ulac win i izemren ad yekcem. Tigawt-a, tella-d seld axebber n uselway n tɣiwant s umdal-nsen i wammas ma ur d-yerri ara i yisuturen-nsen, dɣa yesɛuẓẓeg fell-asen, d ayen i ten-yeǧǧan ad xedmen anejmuɛ iḍ n 1 yulyu 2019 deg tejmaɛt n taddart-nsen u ad ddmen s umtawi ṛṛay n umdal n tɣiwant alamma yella-d unadi meqqren deg lecɣal n uselḥu-ines d tririt i wayen yakk i ten-iceɣben, ma ulac, axxam n tɣiwant akka ara yeqqim yemdel. 

 Gar yisuturen i d-jerden deg yiwet n tifert i yuznen ɣer waṭas n teseqquma n unadi deg twilayt n Bgayet, ad naf : Tasastant ɣef lumur n uselḥu n tɣiwant d uḥbas n yiṣenfarten xemsa n yiseggasen ɣer deffir. Mi ɛeddan 15 n wussan ɣef tigawt-a, ulac acu d-yellan d amaynut, usan-d diɣ yimezdaɣ, s umecṭuḥ d umeqqran gan ass n yibeddi sdat n tewwurt-a, xedmen kra n tugniwin i d-sersen deg yiẓeḍwa inmettiyen akken ad walin merra addad n tɣiwant-nsen u ad ssutren s tidet u s lɛejlan taseqqamut n unadi ara itebɛen ladɣa aselway n tɣiwant deg waṭas n temsal. 

 Ayagi ur yessusem ara fell-as uselway n tɣiwant Rabeh Meksem i d-yerran si tama-s deg yiwen n usebter, belli wigi i d-yellan deffir n tigawin-a, sɛan iswan u mačči s lebɣi-nsen. D asmekti kan, ilindi akka imir-a daɣen medlen-as daɣen taɣiwant i teɣzi n 3 n wussan s uɛelleq n teqreɛtin d yibidunen n waman ilmawen ɣef tewwurt, acku sɛan ugur n lixṣaṣ n waman, ɣas ma d tudrin i d-yezgan ddaw n yicerfan d yidurar n teẓgi n Ukeffadu, maca yir asuddes d lecɣal n lxedma n uɛawed d tsertit ur nwulem ara, yessaweḍ at taddart n Tifra ad ṭṭfen deg wawal-nsen, ur as-berrun ara alamma tella-d tsastant n tidet. Cwi kan tella tsekka (antenne) n uḍewwar n Yikeǧǧan, zemren yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant ad d-ssuffɣen syin leɛqud n tlalit d wid n nnekwa d tnezduɣt. Deg uraǧu n tifin n tifrat i wugur-a i ttidirent waṭas n tɣiwanin deg tmurt n Leqbayel.
  Kh. A. 

  
 Ccna aɣelnaẓri s tmaziɣt d ammud n tezlatin n yicennayen iqbayliyin mechuren i yura Djamel Hoceini s uẓawan. Deg udlis-a, ad naf ccna n Ali Laimeche, Mohand Ou Idir Ait Amrane, Mahand Said Aiche, Cherif Kheddam akked Farid Ali. Zyada ɣef tira n uẓawan n tezlatin-a, yura-d Mass Hoceini tameddurt n yal acennay s snat n tutlayin : tamaziɣt d tefrensist. Am wakken i d-yessegza tarrayt-is deg tira n uẓawan akked kra n ubeddel i dèyeḍran deg tezlatin-agi ccna aɣelnaẓri. Gar tid i d-yextar, llant : ‘’I ak-yehwan tiɣzifeḍ ay iḍ’’, ‘’Kker a mmi-s umaziɣ’’, ‘’Newwi-d tafat’’ n Mohand Ou Idir Ait Amrane ; ‘’Sslam-iw’’, ‘’Nekni s yilmeẓyen’’ n Farid Ali, ‘’Leɣna-agi’’ n Cherif Kheddam ; ‘’Askuti’’ n Lounis Ait Menguellet ; ‘’A yemma ɛzizen ur ttru’’ akked ‘’Ay ilmeẓyen, beggset’’ n Mohand Said Aiche. Tizlatin-agi, zemrent ad ilint d allal gar yiselmaden akked yinelmaden. Ilul Djalem Hoceini ass n 10 deg maggu 1969 deg tama n Illoula Oumalou. D aselmad n uẓawan deg tesnawit. Yeqdec aṭas deg uḥric-agi n uẓawan, ladɣa deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu. 

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Ass n 12 deg duǧember-a, ihegga-d Uḥuddu aɣarim n Bgayet yiwet n temlilit deg Uxxam n yidles ɣef wazalen n uḥesses n medden ɣef yimihiyen n tudert s umata, d wid n tegrest abeɛda. Ɣef yimihiyen n tsemhuyt ideg nella, yebder-d Uḥuddu aɣarim amunuksid n karbun i ineqqen acḥal d tirwiḥin, acku stehzayen ɣef yiwellihen n laman. Ugar n waya, aṭas ur neẓri akk amek zemren ad ten-nɣen wallalen i seqdacen I iteddun s lgaz, ama i useḥmu neɣ i wayen-nniḍen. Deg wahil n wass-nni, muggen-d kra n yiḥuna (ateliers) n usḥulfu d uselɣu ɣef yimihiyen imeqqran, imi ula d tiferrawin ttwaferqent i lmend n waya. Am wakken i d-ttwasersent deg temsikkent ddeqs n tɣawsiwin i yesseqdac Uḥuddu aɣarim i usellek.

  M. K. 

  
 Macahu tellemcahu ad tt-yeḍbeε Ṛebbi d asaru. Yiwen urgaz yeqqar-as i mmi-s: “Ammi i wacu teṛṛiḍ akk medden d imeddukkal deg ur d-itekk nfaε? Ugadeɣ limmer ad ten-tiḥwiǧeḍ di tegnit n ddiq, yiwen ur ak-d-yeqqaṛ anεam. Mmi-s ur yesmeḥsis ara i wawal acku iɣil tizegzewt d leḥcic meṛṛa.Yeqqaṛ-as i baba-s: “Sεiɣ leḥbab yal amḍiq, mačči am kečč, ur tufiḍ ara win ara ak-iḥemmlen seg wakken teswaεreḍ timsal aṭas. Baba-s: “A mmi, nekk sεiɣ yiwen n uḥbib beṛka, deg-s lbaraka, jeṛṛbeɣ-t, ufiɣ-t d argaz. Yugi mmi-s ad yili d uḥdiq. Argaz terra-t tmara ad ixdem kra i wakken tabṛat-is ad d-taweḍ s allaɣ n win ara d-yeǧǧ d asalas n uxxam. Tusa-t-id tikti amzun-itt. Iddem ikerri, yezla-t, iɣumm-it s ubeḥnuq mellulen, yessames-it d idammen. Yuzzel ɣer mmi-s, yessawel-as: “Kker kker a mmi, teḍra-yi-d dagi taluft”. Ikker-d mmi-s s tɣawla: “Acu a baba d acu ?” Nɣiɣ yiwen s ujenwi. 

 Tenɣiḍ -t? Anida-t ?

 Ṛwaḥ ad t-twaliḍ. 
  Mi t-iwala mmi-s yexlaε, yenna-as: “A baba amek ara as-nexdem?”. Baba-s: “Ruḥ a mmi muqel-d albaεḍ seg leḥbab-ik i wakken ad aɣ-iεiwen ad t-nawi sanda ara t-nɣebbi”. Iruḥ uqcic ttnaṣfa n yiḍ, yezzi-d akk ɣef leḥbab-is, win iwumi yeḥka tadyant ad as-d-yerr: “Ala, ur zmireɣ ara i tigi”. Yuɣal-d uqcic s axxam. Baba-s: “Acimi akka ur d-tewwiḍ ara imεawnen?”. Mmi-s: “Ugin, uggaden”.

 Amek ara nexdem ihi? 

 Ruḥ a baba ɣer Dda leflani, yak d aḥbib-ik. 
  -Ad ruḥeɣ ala netta i sεiɣ.

  Yahia Yanes 

  
 Tidyanin d azwel i yefka ucennay Ali Amran i uḍebsi-ines aneggaru i d-yeffɣen ussan-agi kan, 6 deg tuber, dagi deg tmurt. Deg album-agi amaynut, ad naf 11 n tezlatin s teqbaylit akked yiwet-nniḍen s trumit i yettuneḥsaben d tarzeft, ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna. Deg tezlit tamezwarut ‘’Lxiḍ’’, yewwi-d awal Ali Amran ɣef nḥas i yettilin gar leqbayel. Kerhen mi ara d-yifrir yiwen deg-sen. ‘’Tlatin’’, d asentel iɣef i d-yemmeslay ucennay ɣef yir asirem, itezzi itenneḍ kra ur d-iban deg tudert-is. Ma deg tezlit tis tlata, yextar Ali Amran yiwen uɣbel i iceɣben aṭas n tmura, wagi d tawaɣit n lfetna. Dɣa, yefka-as azwel ‘’Dderz n lfetna’’. ‘’Sel-as i dderz lfetna, la iremmeg lebɛid. Ala imeṭṭi d lmeḥna, i izerreɛ deg ubrid. Sel-as i dderz lfetna, la iremmeg lebɛid. La yesserwat di tmura, d wa i zzman ajdid’’. Dagi deg tezlit-a, ad mxalafent tektiwin gar wid ara as-yeslen. Ad ilin wid ara tt-yeqqnen ɣer wayen iḍerrun deg umaḍal s umata, am wakken ara ilin wid ara as-yefken anamek-nniḍen. Wigi ad cudden ɣer tmurt n leqbayel. Ineggaura-a, ad gen amgarad gar wayen i d-yeqqar Ali Amran deg tazwara akked tekti n tezlit-a. Ad ilin wid ara as-yinin. ‘’Imi seg tama, yekkat deg wid yettasmen, ur qebblen yiwen ad d-yifrir. Seg tama-nniḍen, la yekkat netta s timmad-is seg wid i d-yufraren s tektiwin-nsen, u ha-t-an la yessagad medden s lfetna’’. Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, tamedyazt, ad teqqim d tamedyazt, yal yiwen ad yefhem ayen yeffɣen fell-as. Ur yettbibbi unaẓur asegzi n yimdanen. Ma d tizlit tis rebɛa, tusa-d d tajmilt i ucennay ameqqran matoub Lounes, isemma-as, dɣa ‘’Lwennas’’. Xas ulamma d tizlit igerrzen nezzeh, yuklalen azwel-is, mac aula dagi, ad ilin wid ara as-yinin acimi armi d tura i yemmekta Lwennas ? Ɛeddan ugar n 20 n yiseggasen ɣef tmettant-is. ‘’Ula d ddula, terra-s tajmilt tura !, i nesla ɣer yiwen n umdan. Deg ‘’Tidyanin’’, tizlit tis 5, iger tiṭ ucennay ɣef umezruy : yettnadi, yesteqsay. S umata, yennul Ali Amran akk isental iceɣben timetti. Akka ara naf tizlatin, ‘’Bedd’’, ‘’Sanda akka’’, ‘’Ufiɣ ur ufiɣ’’, ‘’Izleg uḍref’’, ‘’Zzaɛrura’’, ‘’Ma d ddunit-ik’’ akked tezlit s tefrensist ‘’ Celui que tu penses’’. S uẓawan i swayes yuɣ tannumi yettawi-t-id Ali Amran, nezmer ad d-nini mebla ma neɣleḍ d akken ayen yelhan, yelha dima.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Deg tdiwennit-agi, newwi-d awal ɣef waṭṭanen n yiɣersiwen, ladɣa wid i yettilin deg yiseggasen-a ineggura, akked wamek i ilaq ad d-yili useḥbiber fell-asen.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Di   tazwara, anda yewweḍ ttawil   n udawi n lmal deg tmurt n Lezzayer? 

  Kamel Aliouane  : Adawi n lmal di tmurt-nneɣ, d tawuri i yegren asurif meqqren ama deg udawi, ama deg uɛeggen ɣef waṭṭanen. Maca, aṭas n lexṣaṣ i yellan. Ticraḍ ar ass-a mazal nettawi-tent-id seg tmura-nniḍen. Amsujji n lmal mačči ala adawi i d ccɣel-is. D netta daɣen i yessenqaden neɣ i yettkunṭrulin aksum d wayen tetten medden. Taggara-a, nnant-d kra n tezrawin ula d ddwawi sɛant amihi ɣef lmal d umdan: ddwawi ma nefka-tent i lmal, nezmer ad tent-naf deg uyefki neɣ deg uksum. Aya yettḍurru tadawsa n umdan ma ṭṭuqtent, acku xeddment-d aṭṭan n uxenẓir (cancer). Amsujji n lmal ihi, yesseḥbibir ula ɣef tdawsa tazayezt (santé publique). Ɣas llan yimsujjiyen, maca yella wugur n ddwawi. Ɣlayent imi tuget seg-sent nettawi-tent-id seg Fransa. D ayen yeǧǧan imrebbiyen n lmal, ttcetkin ɣef ssumat n ddwawi-nni.

  D anwi aṭṭanen i ten-yekkaten s waṭas u seg wacu   i ten-ttekcamen? 

 Yal ccetla tesɛa aṭṭan i tt-yekkaten. Ad d-fkeɣ imedyaten: Ikerri yekkat-it ṭṭaglal i d-txeddem twekka yettidiren ɣur yiqjan. Izgaren, yella lberd ur nesɛi ddwa, dɣa wid i t-yuḍnen, ttmettaten. Aṭṭan-nniḍen iweɛren, i ttugaden aṭas yimsujjiyen, d la brucellose, neɣ tawla n Malṭa. Ur tesɛi ara ddwa, yerna amdan i tt-yuḍnen ad yuɣal d iɛiqer. Tawla i ixeddmen ticelfuxin (fievre aphteuse) deg yimi ɣur lmal amecṭuḥ d umeqqran. Ma ɣur yiyuẓaḍ, yella bucḥiḍ (la peste aviaire). Tuget n waṭṭanen-a, tekken-d seg lqella n tezdeg d unekcum n lmal aberrani ɣer tqeḍɛiwt. Wid ihelken aṭṭanen-a i d-udreɣ, deg usaḍuf, ilaq timenɣiwt-nsen imi zemren ad ten-sneṭḍen i wiyaḍ.

  Seg ddwawi n yimɣan n uxxam d tesnujjya, d anti i ineffɛen ugar deg lmal?  

 Seg zik, di tmurt n leqbayel, ssexdamen imɣan-a i tujjya n lmal. Gar-asen llan: imliles (alaterne nerprun) i ssawraɣ, tidekt deg waman i tusut d ugeḥguḥ, tikfilt (scille maritime) i tusut d waṭtan n ubeḥri ɣur yiyuẓaḍ. Llan daɣen wi: anaraf i calwaw, neɣ i waṭṭan n wallen ɣur yikerri, aqelwac d yizgaren. Tijrarḥiyin neɣ ajeǧǧig n ukermus i lmal ur nezmir ad d-yebru i waman n tasa.

  Amek yezmer yimrebbi ad   yeɛqel lmal-is mi ara t-id-ibeddu waṭṭan iweɛren? 

 Aya d ayen iweɛren tikwal ula i umsujji mačči kan i yemrebbi n lmal. Llan waṭṭanen ur d-ttbanen ara di tazwara. Imrebbi, ad yeɛqel lmal-is yuḍen ma ibeddel tikli, ur itett ara am zik. Tafunast, ad tenqes deg tuẓẓga ɣef tikkelt. Aṭṭan n tmaẓẓagin, tikwal ur as-nettfiq alamma neẓẓeg-d tafunast, ad naf ayefki yexser. Di tawla n Malṭa, tafunast neɣ tixsi ad asent-yeḍru uɣray. Imir-n dɣa i nezmer ad ncukk s waṭṭan-a. Yal aṭṭan yesɛa limarat-is. Deg tujjya, tella yiwet n taɣult i yeqqaren kan ɣef limarat n waṭṭanen d wamek ara tent-neɛqel.

  Amek ilaq ad yexdem yimrebbi i lmal-is i wakken ad yeḥrez tazmert-is? 

 Ad testeqsiḍ imsujjiyen, ad d-inin d tezdeg. Ugar n temsalmiyin (infections) ssebba-nsent d tibawt n tezdeg. Imrebbi ma yeḥrez tezdeg, iḥuder lmal-is, iḥuder tazmert-is. Ilaq daɣen ticraḍ.

  Ahat aṭṭanen i t-yettawɣen   ttilin d imihanen ɣef yimdnen, ladɣa wid yettqerriben   ɣur-sen? 

 Udreɣ-d yakan kra i tazwara: Lberd yettenṭaḍ s uzwu. Tiferḍest (la teigne) mi ara tennaleḍ aglim-is. Tawla n Malṭa, tezmer ad tɛeddi aglim n umdan xas ur yesɛi ara tifidi. Lḥasun, deg umaḍal, llant kan snat n tbaktiriyin i izemren ad ɛeddint aglim.

  Amek tettwalim amḍan n lmal gar yiḍelli d wass-a? 

 Seg wasmi d-tekker ddunit, amdan yettrebbi lmal ɣer tama-s. Amḍan n lmal ibeddel gar yiḍelli d wass-a. Aṭas n taɣulin i d-yernan: arebbi n unhal, arebbi n tberdeffelt (caille), atg. Deg yiɣersiwen n uxxam, nettwali taggara-a, aṭas i d-yernan: ifrax, ibelḥekkac. Ttrebbin-ten yimdanen i ccbaḥa. Nekni yewwi-d ad nili yid-sen. Ɣas ur neɣri ara fell-asen, yessefk ad ten-ndawi. Ur ilaq ara ad nettu d akken aṭas n waṭṭanen i ulac zik, tura ṭṭfen tasga deg tmurt-nneɣ. D ayen iweɛren, i yettawin ula d lweqt bac ad ttwakksen.

  Ma nemmeslay-d ɣef   yiɣersiwen s umata, amek yella waddad-nsen deg umaḍal? 

 Ma nuder-d iɣersiwen n teẓgi, yewwi-d ad nemmeslay ɣef ubaxix i iḍerrun deg ugama ass-a. Abeddel anezwan ulac win iselken deg-s. Deg wumuɣ aẓeggaɣ n WWF, yal aseggas irennu-d iɣersiwen i izemren ad negren ma ur nesḥbiber ara fell-asen. Di tmurt n Leqbayel, nettwali, seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ, iɣersiwen n teẓgi i yettenqasen. Tamurt n Fransa, texdem-d asaḍuf i umsujji n lmal, anda ilaq fell-as ad idawi iɣersiwen n lexla mebla ma yettuxelleṣ, ma ssawlent-as-d tdukkliwin yesseḥbibiren ɣef twennaḍt. Ass-a, tukerḍa n yiɣersiwen d tis kraḍet deg usekcem n uṣurdi deg umaḍal, seld imrigen d yiɛeqqaren. D asḥissef ameqqran.

  Tanemmirt ɣef wayen i   d-tenniḍ. Ma tesɛiḍ   awal n taggara… 

 Tanemmirt ɣef tdiwennit d wakud i yi-d-tefkiḍ. Ass-a ma amsujji yettdawi amdan, amsujji n lmal yettdawi talsa. D ahil i ḥemmleɣ aṭas. Ssarameɣ imecṭaḥ i d-yettnekkaren ad wellhen ɣer tujjya n yiɣersiwen d useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt.

  Testeqsa-t Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 D yiwen gar n terbaɛt n ccna tamḥaddit Ifguren, d ameɣnas n tmagit seg temẓi-s ar ass-a. ‘’Yečča aɣrum d aberkan’’ n lḥebs n Blida. Yura u yettaru ar ass-a iḥulfan-is akked tektiwin-is deg yidlisen. Wagi d Ahmed Nekkar i d-yeldin ul-is I Uɣmis n yimaziɣen deg tiwennit-a .     

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen: Ha-t-an tuɣaleḍ-d, tikkelt-a, s wungal ‘’Akruran’’ i yellan d tasuqqilt i l’Alchimise n Paulo Coelho. Acimi i tferneḍ ungal-a ? Amek i d-yella waya ? 
  Ahmed Nekkar : d tidet yella waya, maca am wakken i as-yenna winna n zik: iṭilli-d ur d-ikeccem. Akruran (L’Alchimiste), d ungal yura umeskar Paulo Coelho. Lemmer d lebɣi, tili yeffeɣ-d yakan deg waggur n cutember 2020. Yella-d wugur n lkaɣeḍ, (lkaɣeḍ abuffyan) ar tura akka, ugur-agi mazal-it la yettnerni, s taluft-agi n COvid-19. Nessaram ad yefru, ad d-yekcem. Di tazwara, Akruran, d ungal i imucaɛen deg umaḍal, yettwasuqel anda ma drus ɣer 80 n tutlayin. Llant maḍi kra n tnagiwin i d-yennan belli imdanen-agi mi t-ɣran, tbeddel tudert-nsen, acku uɣen-d asirem n tudert si tedyant-agi. D tadyant tafelsafant yemcubbaken yettruḥun tettuɣal-d, tettawi imeɣri di zzedwa n uzuzen-ines, yettinig di tudert n tumayt n timmad-is. Asirem, yettarew-d tilelli.  Bɣiɣ ad d-sekneɣ belli ula d taqbaylit tezmer i ṣṣenf-agi n tsekla. Bɣiɣ ad d-smektiɣ daɣen, xas akken Akruran mazal ur d-yeffiɣ ara, maca Tisbeddit tagraɣlant n Paulo Coelho, tesla s tsuqilt-agi, iɛeggalen-is ferḥen ayendin. Sutren-iyi-d maḍi ad asen-ceggɛeɣ ukuẓ (4) n yimedyaten mi ara d-yeffeɣ.

  Mebla ccek, asenfar am wa, mačči d ayen isehlen : Ama seg tama n umawal neɣ n usuqel. Ma tzemreḍ ad d-temmeslayeḍ ɣef waya ? 
 D adlis iweɛren, yennḍen, akken kan ara truḥ ad tfak tekti ad d-yuɣal ɣer waktayen imenza, am win yettejgugulen : simmal yettaẓ ɣer sdat, simmal daɣ yettuɣal-d ɣer deffir. Niqal kukraɣ ad as-greɣ irebbi, si mi kecmeɣ deg-s, ufiɣ-t yeshel maḍi. Imeɣri, ur yettaf ara ugur di tɣuri neɣ deg umawal. Mi ara yili d awal kan i yiman-is ulac ugur. Mi ara tili d tanfalit yerna ad d-tettuɣal si tallit ɣer tayeḍ kra tekka tedyant, yecban: tumayt n timmad-is: <em>légende personnelle: l’âme du monde, la pierre philosophale </em>… ameskar, yeɛreḍ isenṭeq-d ula d agama: iṭij, aḍu, igenni, ijdi, lexlawi…Tadyant-a, ufiɣ-tt d yiwen n ṣṣenf n tsekla tafelsafant ay ulac di teqbaylit-nneɣ s wudem n wungal. Ɣer ɣur-i, d tacqirrewt, nekk ara yegren irebbi i usuqel n udlis yecban wa. Daɣen tadyant-a, teḍra di Tefriqt n ugafa, ṭṭef-itt-id si tmurt n Wandalus arma d Ihramen n Maṣer. D tamurt n Umaziɣ. Iwudam i d-yettader yettsemmi-ten-id d Aɛraben, nekkini, fkiɣ-asen iseɣ n yimaziɣen anagar wid-nni ittakren, ixeddɛen, igezzmen iberdan ay ǧǧiɣ akken d Aɛraben.

  Kečč yellan d amedyaz, d amaru, tettaruḍ s tewsatin yemgaraden n tsekla, yecban ungalen, tullisin, tisuqqilin, tamedyazt…atg. Tegliḍ ula s yidlisen n tmaziɣt. Amek, d kečč i yebɣan leqdic-a, neɣ d taswiɛt i d-iḥettmen aya ? 
 Nekni s imeɣnasen, ladɣa wid iwehhan cwiṭ ɣer tira, seg wakken i d aɣ-yekcem lḥir nsemḥalleq i kra n wayen iwumi nezmer. Nezeger-d yiwet n tallit, anda annar aseklan xas ini d ilem, iselmaden imezwura yegren irebbi i uselmed, ur ufin ara d acu ara d-fken, ulac iḍrisen, ulac ungalen, uac idlisen n uselmed atg…  win i yi-icban, bdiɣ ttaruɣ tamedyazt, seg wasmi lliɣ deg uɣerbaz alemmas deg 1972/73. Di taggara n 70, nekk d kra n yimeddukkal, nesbedd-d tarbaɛt n ccna d uẓawan iwumi nsemma: Ifguren/ d tamedyazt tamḥaddit ɣef tmagit, ncennu nrennu nessawal-d isefra n umennuɣ. Deg 1983, uriɣ ungal-inu amenzu : Yugar ucerrig tafawett, yewwin arraz Mulud at Mɛemmer deg 1995 ɣur Agraw adelsan amaziɣ. Deffir wagi, ḍefren-d kraḍ n warrazen-nniḍen di ṣṣenf n tira yemgaraden: Ammud n (8) tullisin s uzwel: Daɛwessu (ɣef yiɣersiwen d win ten-yettmerriten), deg 1996. Deg 97, yerna-d wungal: Ger ẓẓebra d yifḍisen. 98, Adlis n tɣuri, d adlis i muggren s lferḥ yiselmaden di leqdic-nsen asmi d-yeffeɣ. Syin ḍefrent-d tsuqqilin ama d tullisin, ama d timucuha. Acuɣer greɣ irebbi i leqdic yecban wa: nekk yuɣ-iyi lḥal d aselmad, ɣriɣ ungalen, s taɛrabt s tefransist, tullisin, timucuha, ssneɣ amek xeddmen idlisen i unelmad, i uselmad. Ma zemreɣ ad as-semmiɣ tagi d tirmit d zzheṛ, ahat ur tt-sɛin ara yimeskaren-nniḍen iɛerḍen ad arun s teqbaylit deg yiwen n usentel kan. Ccɣel-agi iwumi sɛarrweɣ weḥd-i, yezdi-d akk timental, lexsas, lebɣi, tazmert, leḥmala. Imi i asent-zemreɣ, acuɣer ala ?

  Ɣef wakken twalaḍ kečč, d acu n tewsit n tsekla uɣur mmalen ugar yimeɣriyin n tmaziɣt/taqbaylit ? 
 Ɣef wakken walaɣ s timmad-iw, idlisen n tsekla yettnuzun ahat mebla adellel, d timucuha. D idlisen meẓẓiyen rxisen, ladɣa timucuha iteddun s tugniwin. Rnu daɣen tullisin, di tseddaṛt tis kraḍet, d ungalen, nezmer ad d-nernu imawalen. Daɣen ad yesḥissef umdan, atmaten-nneɣ ur ttaɣen ara adlis n teqbaylit. Ur ẓrin ara belli yal tikkelt ara aɣen adlis, d tutlayt-nsen iwumi ara fken tudert. D ameskar-nni iwumi ara fken tabɣest. D amazrag-nni iwumi ara fken afud ad ikemmel deg usuffeɣ n yidlisen. D idles-nneɣ ara yennernin, ad yerfed s uqerru.

  Tesɛiɣ diɣ Tizrigin Tamagit. Amek liḥala n tezrigin dɣa ? 
 Liḥala n tezrigin temgarad si ta ɣer ta. Llant tid iwumi d-tettak ddula tadrimt s tuffra, acku xeddment s tuget adlis n taɛrabt, sɛant adrim, ur d-cliɛent ara deg udlis n tmaziɣt, akken yebɣu yeffeɣ-d (ah d tamaziɣt) yerna-d kan s ufella. Llant tid ixeddmen anagar adlis n tefransist, tigi daɣ ssishilen-asent lecɣal, sɛant imeɣriyen. Ugur ameqqran di tezrigin yerran lwelha ɣer udlis n tmaziɣt, nezmer ad d-nini d tigujilin, ur rbiḥent tama. Ur sfaydint s lemɛawna n ddula, ur sfaydint s wid yettaɣen adlis n tmaziɣt akken yelha, xas ini d aqemmer i tt-nqemmer s nnif d timeɣnest. Qlilit tezrigin i d-yesuffuɣen nnig n wagim n yimedyaten deg yiwen uzwel, rnu lexsas n yimeɣriyen. Ula d tinedlisin, tikwal rennunt-d aɣbel-nsent, mi ara sen-tawiḍ adlis n tmaziɣt, ad ttezzin, ad ttennḍen: xas ini-d s leḥya i ttaṭṭafen adlis. Tamedyazt, ur d-nhedder ara fell-as, ma yella ur tt-isenz ara bab-is s ubrid n ubuddu, ur tettnuzu ara di tnedlisin ḥala di tfaskiwin neɣ di ṛṛḥabi n udlis. Dɣa seg wasmi i d-yerna wugur-agi n waḍḍan n Covid-19, tkaɛbuber teswiɛt. Aseggas n 2020 iruḥ d abuffiḥ.

  Acu ara d-tiniḍ deg tsekla tamaziɣt/taqbaylit akka tura ? 
 Aql-aɣ deg yiwet n tallit ur ẓriɣ ara amek ara tt-id-nessefhem. Lebɣi n tira yella, ugar wid yettarun imeɣriyen. Dagi ay tuḍen icc-is. Mazal d timeɣnest ara isedduyen adlis n tmaziɣt. Yella yiwen ccɣel, lemmer ad d-rren leqbayel ɣur-s lwelha, ad fken azal i udlis n teqbaylit, ahat ad tennefsusi teɛkemt. S wakka, adlis n teqbaylit ad yaɣ amkan di tnuzi am wakken yella udlis n tefransist d win n taɛrabt. Yella wugur-nniḍen, skud taqbaylit ur tetteḍman ara tudert i usdawan i d-yewwin agerdas, ur cukkeɣ ara aa naẓ ɣer sdat. Tallit n timeɣnest dayen tɛedda tmes ɣef uḥriq. Lemmer ad nessiweḍ s leqbayel ad d-nḥelli tlata-agi tewtilin: ad nesbaɛzeq tinedlisin s udlis n tmaziɣt. Acku walaɣ amek sɛan lebɣi leqbayel ɣer tira n teqbaylit-nsen. D tiwinas n yimeskaren i ijemɛen ɣur-sen ittafttaren, ur zmiren ara ad ten-id-suffɣen, ayagi meṛṛa si lqella n tedrimt d lqella n wid yettaɣen adlis n teqbaylit. Lebɣi n leqdic di tmaziɣt la yettnerni simmal, yerna di yal taɣult, ula deg uḥric amiḍan la yettfukti.

   Seg zik i tebdiḍ amennuɣ ɣef tmagit. Ma tzemreḍ ad aɣ-d-tesmektiḍ dɣa acimi i d-tesɛeddaḍ lḥebs ? 
 Amecwar-inu di taɣult-agi n tmaziɣt yebda am wakken bdan yimeɣnasen imezwura s tuffra, deg yiwet n tallit deg yuget leḥris s ucḍaḍ n tɣellist taɣensant n Bumedyen. D Agraw Imaziɣen n Paris i d aɣ-d-yefkan tawat ad nmuqel s amezruy. S wudem unṣib, bdiɣ ttaṭṭafeɣ-d tisɣunin n Agraw Imaziɣen n Paris. Yis-sent ay lemdeɣ agemmay n Tifinaɣ. Kra n uɣerbaz deg ɛeddaɣ tallit-nni, lemden-t akken ma llan. 70-72 di Borǧ Mnayel. 73-75 di Larebɛa Nat Yiraten. Asmi lliɣ di tesnawit n Larebɛa, ttemyaruɣ nekk d yiwen umeddakkel n temẓi iwumi ssawalen Hamaduc Aɛli n Tbeccarin. Netta yeqqar di tesnawit Cafɛi n Borǧ Mnayel. Asmi i d-teḍra tedyant-nni n 03 janvier di Lzzayer taluft-nni iwumi sbabben isem: “Les poseurs de bombes” deg llan yismawen imeqqran i ixedmen ccɣel-agi, ma bedreɣ-d kra gar-asen: Massin Harun, Smaɛil Meǧber, Cherradi Ḥusin, Qasi Lwennas, Baḥbuḥ Laḥsen, Cirifi Aḥsen…Nekkini yuɣ lḥal ttwaṭṭfeɣ yakan abrid amezwaru di teftist n Tegzirt sɣur iǧadermiyen, znuzuɣ tisɣunin i d-itteffɣen dagi: (Iṭij) ittwaxedment s la ronéo di Lzzayer. Tella tesɣunt-nniḍen iwumi ssawalen (OFB)…  tuṭṭfa-inu tis snat, tella-d ass n 12 janvier 1976 ɣer tewwurt n unekcum n sbiṭer n Wad ɛissi  lewhi n 7 n tmeddit. Ufiɣ ttraǧun-iyi sin yirgazen s iqeccubay, s leslaḥ n Kalachnikov ddaw ucḍaḍ. Ur i yi-iǧǧin ara maḍi ad kecmeɣ s axxam. Rnan wwin-d yiwen n uxeddam n sbiṭer iwumi ssawalen Si Belqasem. Wwin-aɣ ɣer la brigade n yiǧadermiyen di Tizi. Azekka-nni, rnan wwin-d wiyiḍ. Di txibuḍt n 2m<sup>2</sup> ggaren-aɣ di 6 di 8. Dinna i d aɣ-ǧǧan armi d 20 janvier, wwin-aɣ ar TM Axxam n teɣdemt taɣensant n Blida. Mbaɛd imalas di lfirma n yimeḥbas n yiserdasen di Blida, wwin-aɣ ɣer yiwet n tedwarit  m-tlata tzeɣwa: dinna ferqen-aɣ d tirebbaɛ ɣef texxamin-nni. Gar wid yellan yid-i di texxamt tis 3: kraḍ deg yimeddukkal i d aɣ-yeǧǧan ass-a: Idir Moulud, n Tefrit, Si Belqasem, n At Wasif, akked Rouǧan Meqqran n tewrirt Mussa. Di tzeqqa-nniḍen yella Baḥbuḥ Leḥsen ula d netta yeǧǧa-aɣ iseggasen-agi yezrin. Sɛeddan-aɣ di ccreɛ ass n 14 yunyu 1976. Deg uxxam n ccreɛ aɣensan n Blida. Leḥkem s lḥebs yemgarad seg sin yisegganen arma d 15 n yiseggasen, yecban Cirifi Aḥsen 10 sg, Baḥbuḥ laḥsen 15 sg, Accab Md Sɣir, Cami Amran… ass n wass-a, gar yimeɣnasen-agi, aṭas i yewwḍen laɛfu n Ṛebbi ulac win i ten-id-yettaddren, rnu lehlak fell-asen. Bɣiɣ ad d-smektiɣ d akken ddeqs n yisdawanen i d-yettawin isaragen ɣef umussu asertan n tmaziɣt, akken ara d-awḍen ɣer tallit-agi n 76 (Les poseurs de bombes), ttezgalen-tt, ttɛeddin fell-as amzun akken urǧin telli. Neɣ ttwalin wid tt-ixedmen d irebraben ! D lɛib fell-asen.

  Awal ɣef yisenfaren-ik n sya d afella… 
 Aseggas-agi yezrin 2020, ddeqs i qqimeɣ deg uxxam, imi ssebba n tuffɣa akka d wakka megdul, ad as-iniɣ i waḍḍan-agi n Covid-19 tanemmirt, yefka-yi tagnit suqqleɣ-d 4 n wungalen. S wazal-nsen: 1- Akruran, l’Alchimiste / 2- Tudert ger snat tmura, n Layla Awchal / 3- Aɣrum aḥerfi n Muhand Choukri Arifi. / 4- Rebelle n Maɛtub Lwennas.  / Tullisin d tmucuha i warrac s tugniwin…

  Awal-ik n taggara… 
 Imal n tmaziɣt akka ara ikemmel di tmurt n Lezzayer. Skud tadbelt n tmurt n leqbayel ur tetteddu ara s teqbaylit, ad ilin imukan n uxeddim s teqbaylit, ad d-yaweḍ wakud anda ara rewlen fell-as warraw-is.  Tiplakin deg yiberdan, ad ilint s teqbaylit. Imestagen, ad arun akk ɣef tḥuna-nsen s teqbaylit. Ad tili tiliẓri ara isedduyen ahilen-ines s teqbalit. Aɣerbaz deg ara tili tmaziɣt s wudem n tussna, mačči d tajerrumt. Ssarameɣ daɣen, yiwen wass ad d-yekker Uqbayli (industriel en matière d’ imprimerie spéciale impression livres amaziɣ). Mazal leqdic ameqqran, maca tigusa d nekkni i tent-yekkaten deg yicuḍaḍ-nneɣ, daymi negguma ad nekker… 

  Yesteqsa-t Hocine Moula 

  
 Tameddit n wass-nni n lǧemɛa 15 duǧamber 2017, ɣef lewhi n 14h00 deg tzeqqa n yisihren (spectacles) n Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, tella-d wurar n tceqquft n umezgun “Tacbaylit” i wumi i d-yexdem Mohand Ouyahia taserwest (addaptation) ɣer teqbaylit. D taceqquft i yerra ɣef usayes Toufik Kaoudji, yewwin arraz wis tlata n temsizzelt n umezgun, i d-yettilin yal aseggas deg tazwara n waggur n duǧamber. Tella s yisem-is anasli “La jarre de Lugui” n Pierre Andello, tettwaru s tefransist, syin netta yerra-tt-id ɣer teqbaylit s uzwel-agi “Tacbaylit”. Syin akkin tiddukkla tadelsant “Uqataan Oukaoudj” n taddart n Akaoudj deg tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, rran-tt ɣef usayes s lmendad n Mass Toufik Kaoudji. Uraren-d taceqquft-agi n 55 n ddqayeq, 11 n yiwudam n umezgun, gar-asen 3 n tullas akked 8 n warrac. Dɣa d Toufik Kaoudji i d awdem agejdan deg tceqquft-agi, yurar-d s yisem n Djeddi Ibrahim, ma d Hamid Rabah yurar s yisem n Ali n Dulu, ma Tédjani Yacine ilɛeb-d d anejbar. Kaoudji Mohand yeṭṭef amkan n le vizir am wakken i yeṭṭef Slimani Ahmed amḍiq n win i xeddmen timedlin. Ma d awdem Sellah Mazigh, ilɛeb-d d Wejṭiti ma d ameddakkel-is Amrouche Yacine i yeṭṭfen amkan n unzerfu (avocat) deg tceqquft-agi i ḥedren waṭas n lɣaci ulamma d taggara n ddurt yerna d lǧemɛa tameddit. Ma d tlata-nni n tullas-nniḍen, urarent-d akka, Zitouni Samia deg umkan n Tajilvant, Radi Dihia deg umḍiq n Smina n Tazart akked Henni Yasmina i d-yuraren deg ddur n Hlima n Tala. D tacegguft i d-yewwin awal ɣef tmetti taqbaylit d wamek ttidiren deg-s yimezdaɣ-is, ladɣa deg lawan-agi n uzemmur d wayen akk icudden ɣur-s. Tcudd daɣen lwelha n yimferǧen ɣer tecbaylit-nni n zzit, yettuneḥsaben d azamul n lɣella n zzit n uzemmur…atg. Ula d azekka-in n ssebt, tameddit n wass ɣef lewhi n 14h00, ddima deg tzeqqa n yisihren n Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine, yella-d wurar n tcegguft n umezgun “La Peur in transit”, yura Omar Fetmouche, syin terra-tt Massa Ziemze Lydia Beate ɣef usayes. Taceqquft-agi, tekcem deg wahil n tfaska tagraɣlant n umezgun i d-yettilin yal aseggas deg lwilaya n Bgayet. D afaris (produit) n snat n tmura Lezzayer akked Lalman, tella-d s yisem n ccaruka gar Tfaska tagraɣlant n umezgun n Bgayet (FITB) n tmurt n Lezzayer akked Useddu (GOETHE) n tmurt n Lalman.

  A. A. 

  
 Mlalen talemmast n ddurt-a yezrin umedyaz Mbarek Gamar d umaru Ɛemmar Maɛuci akked kra n yinelmaden n tesdawit Mulud At Mɛemmer, i lmend n usarag i d-heggan wid i d-yezzin i ugezdu n tmaziɣt, gar-asen aselmad Ḥsen Grici. S umata, awal n yimsaragen, yella-d abeɛda ɣef tira n tmedyazt d yisenfaren i ttheggin ɣer sdat. Imi Mbarek Gamar, seld ammud n yisefra « 99 d asefru » i d-yessaẓreg ilindi, yeqqar-d ur yettɛeṭṭil xilla wammud wis sin i iheggan. Ma yella d ilemẓi Ɛemmar Maɛuci, i d-yessufɣen ungal, aḍebsi d sin n wammuden n yisefra, yessaram ur yetteḥbas kan din meskud mazal-it yettaru. Ɣer taggara n usarag imezdi, ddeqs n yidlisen i yettunefken baṭṭel i yimeḥḍar sɣur sin n yimeskaren-a.

  M. K. 

  
 Kra n wussan tura ɣer deffir segmi bdan yimezdaɣ n waɣir n Bgayet aheggi i tmeɣra n Yennayer, neɣ Yennar. Ulamma yal yiwen amek i t-yettmagar, yal axxam acu i d-yettheggi, wanag ttiɛad n wass-a, ḥsan yis-s merra, fkan-as ddhen akken ma llan. « Mačči aṭas n tqeddicin i nexdem mi ibeddel useggas amaḍlan 2018. Maca i lmend n Yennayer nɛewwel ad as-nefk akk lḥeq-is i tmeɣra-a, imi d ayla-nneɣ. Ilaq ad neččar axxam s tgella d tumert akken ad aɣ-d-yeldi Yennayer tiwwura yelhan. Nessaram Yennayer aseɛdi i Yimaziɣen merra ». D tanaga n yiwet n tmeṭṭut seg Ayt Smaɛel. Ussan-a dɣa, kkrent akk tlawin i ubraz d usizdeg n yixxamen d yirwiḥen akken ad qablent Yennayer s wudem yelhan. Ula d inyen n ukanun, tella deg lɛadda, ilaq ad ttwakksen yiqburen-nni, ad ttwabeddlent s wiyaḍ d imaynuten. Aya yakk d asfillet i lxir d wayen igerrzen i lmend n umenzu n Yennayer. Akkin ɣer tmeddit, ulac tawacult deg Bgayet ara izeglen imensi n Yennayer, yiwen n wansay gar wansayen iqburen maḍi n usfuggel. Imensi n Yennayer ɣur yiɣermanen n Bgayet, d Yimaziɣen s umata, mačči d učči kan. Tamezwarut ilaq ad yili s uksum, menyif neɣ s umata d ayaẓiḍ ara yemmezlen d asfel akken ad iruḥ akk ccer d wuguren n useggas iɛeddan. Tis snat d azday. Deg yimensi n Yennayer, ilaq ad ḥeḍren akk yiɛeggalen n twacult anda ma bɣun ilin, i unejmuɛ n tumert d umeslay. Ḥala tilawin ireclen ma yella beɛdent tnezduɣin-nsent. Γas akken, tamɣart n uxxam, ad asent-teǧǧ amur-nsent, rnu ad d-tesres deg terbut neɣ deg uḍebsi tiɣenǧawin-nsent ad as-tiniḍ ḥeḍrent. Tis tlata, imi ḥemmlen dima Yizwawen ad sfillten i wayen lɛali, ayen akk i d-ttaɣen d tiɣawsiwin i lmend n Yennayer, d tagella neɣ d tiẓiḍanin, yessawal ɣur-sen i lxir d ssɛaya d tayri. 

  Asemɣer n wazal n Yennayer 

 Deg kra n temnaḍin n Bgayet daɣen, yella wanida mazal ttseṭṭilen i uqrur, sufuɣen-t ad iḥewwes. Ma seg tama n yikerrazen, Yennayer ɣur-sen d anagi ɣef keffu n lawan n tneqqact n wakal. Yewwi-d send Yennayer ad ilin akk medden neqcen yakan tiferkiwin-nsen. D ayen i d-yellan dɣa deg tuget n tamiwin n Bgayet, skud zerɛen yakan lɣaci akal-nsen. D ayen ibanen belli asṭeɛref s Yennayer, d tameɣra taɣelnawt tunsibt, ad d-yernu ugar n ccan i wass-a n lficṭa ɣur Umaziɣ s umata. Skud d ayen ara t-yeǧǧen ad as-yefk akud akken ilaq, war ma ibeṭṭel-d lxedma neɣ yesɛa-tt d anezgum deg uqerruy. D acu, ilaq ad d-nini d akken simmal tezzin leqrun ɣef Tmazɣa, ttawin-d yid-sen idelsan n yiɣerfan-nniḍen, truḥ armi i ten-yuɣ Yennayer, yettwaɣum deg kra n temnaḍin n tmurt n Yizwawen. Ulamma ḥsan s tisin-is, wanag yesḥissif lḥal mi ara ɣibent tigawin n usfuggel i t-id-yeṭṭafaren. « Neḥsa yal mi ara d-yekcem Yennayer. Maca ur nennum nxeddem-as kra n ccɣel d lfal ». D awal n yiwet n teḥdayt seg twacult taqbaylit. Aya, yesbeyyin-d amek yenṭer yidles-nneɣ gar wiyaḍ, d wamek tlaq tririt ikemmlen n wazal i Yennayer sya d tasawent, d usekcem n twaculin s telqey deg lmeɛna-s d tzamulit-ines. Ad tili d nnuba n tdukkliwin tidelsanin akked trebbuɛay n taddart. Imi llan snubguten aseggas agraɣlan, ttaǧǧan neɣ tettun Yennayer. Rnu ɣer-s arrac i mazal ur gzin akken iwulem azal n Yennayer d umezruy-is. Seg Ayt Smaɛel deg Usamar n Bgayet alamma d Iɣil Ɛli deg unẓul-is, tiddukkliwin yemxalafen n twilayt-a, heggan-d ahilen s wazal-nsen i lmend n umenzu n Yennayer 2968. Llant tid i yebɣan s yisaragen ara sɛelment ugar lɣaci ɣef unamek n Yennayer, llant tid i iheggan i usfuggel akken d agraw, tiyaḍ nwant ad d-inint aql-aɣ neḥsa s yennayer nhegga-as-d amur n leqdic.

   Ddeqs n tdukkliwin ara yilin di ttiɛad 

 Deg Ayt Smaɛel dɣa, akken ad tezdi Tdukkla Tadelsant Adrar n Fad tumert n Yennayer akked yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant, tesres deg wahil aheggi n zzerd ameqqran. Am wakken aṭas n tigawin tidelsanin ara d-iḍefren i lmend n warmud, am umezgun d umsizwer adelsan. Aredmani, yettbin ad yemɣur usfuggel n useggas-a ugar n yiseggasen iɛeddan. Ad d-nuɣal deg teẓrigin-nneɣ i d-iteddun s ugejdan swayes i d-yegla unekcum n Yennayer deg rreḥba n yiɣermanen n Bgayet. Yennayer ameggaz i yimeɣriyen n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen. 

  M. K. 

  
 Ad d-tili tezrigt tis mraw d semmus (15) n tfaska tagraɣlant “Ales-d taẓuri”, yettwassnen s “Raconte-Arts”, gar 19 alamma d 26 yulyu 2018, deg taddart n Tiferdoud, tamnadt i yewwin arraz amezwaru n taddart tazedgant deg tezrigt-is tis semmus (05), i d-yellan deg useggas iɛeddan.Yebda yakan uheggi i ttiɛad-agi adelsan ameqqran, sɣur tesqamut n taddart-agi n Tiferdoud akked tddukkliwin iqeddcen deg unnar di taddart-agi. Ad d-yili leqdic-agi ɣef teɣzi n tmanya wussan, imi ad yebdu s wudem unṣib ass n lexmis 19 yulyu 2018, ad yekfu ass n lexmis-nni sdat-s 26 yulyu. D tafaska i d-tsuddus yal aseggas tiddukkla n tẓuri n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, s tallelt n Useqqamu aɣerfan n Lwilaya (APW) n Tizi Uzzu, s lemɛawna n tddukkliwin akked teseqqamut n taddart ideg ara d-tili yal aseggas tfaska-agi. Deg tezrigt-agi tis 15, yetturaǧu ad d-yili wahil d anesbaɣur ɣef teɣzi n ddurt tadelsant. Ad ilint deg-s temsikniyin yemgaraden: taqendurt, idlisen, abernus, imuhal n ufus…atg. Ad ilin daɣen yisaragen, isura, uraren ama d wid n zik, ama d wid n tura. Ad d-tili, diɣ, tmenna n yisefra sɣur yimedyazen, asenzi s ubuddu sɣur yimura, timeɣriwin n ccna sɣur inaẓuren. Am wakken yetturaǧu turrart n waṭas n tmezgunin, d usuddes n ddeqs n temliliyin, d waṭas n leqdicat-nniḍen.Ɣef wakken i d-nnan, ad d-rzun ɣer tezrigt n useggas-agi, ma ulac maḍi 300 n yinaẓuren, tuget deg-sen d wid n tmurt n Lezzayer, am wakken daɣer ara d-rzun ddeqs-nniḍen seg tmura tiberraniyin, yecban: Fransa, Congo, Italie, Portugale, Espagne, Tunes, Surya, Lubnan, Palistine…atg. Ma d iswi ajejdan n tfaska-agi, d asnerni d unegmu n yidles amaziɣ d umaḍlan deg tmurt n Leqbayel, d asenɛet leṣnaf yemgaraden n tẓuri d tinḍi akked usebɣes n yinaẓuren d yinḍiyin, d uẓeṭṭa n tegmat d tdukli gar yigduden n umaḍal merra.

  A. A 

  
 Seld tuffɣa n tsemhuyt n tegrest, iban-d ubaɣur n yigeffuren i d-yewwten deg-s ɣas gan ula d kra n temḍerrit seg tama-nniḍen. Imi ma nemmeslay ɣef wakal nezmer, ad d-nini laqen-as waman s waṭas deg ccetwa, yewwi-d ad isew i wakken ḥamu n yiṭij n tsemhuyt n unebdu ur t-yettḍurru ara. Tekcem-d ihi tefsut s kra n wussan, tebda kan tesjuǧǧug imɣan-is, iban-d wamek yella aseggas-a usaɣur, d wamek irew s waṭas. Ad d-nefk amedya n temnaḍt n Ayt Smaɛel ideg gten wid yettrebbin lmal d wulli, neɣ wid itesran i tilin n yimɣan i itett lmal-nni, gar-asen asaɣur-a i yesmenyif i tuččit ugar n yiḥcicen-nniḍen. Daymi tarawt-is n useggas-a tessefreḥ nezzeh imezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, ladɣa wid yesɛan drus n tferkiwin, acku yettfakka-asen lqerḍ s lemɣawla, dɣa ttuḥettamen ad t-id-aɣen s ssuma ɣlayen. Ladɣa deg wayyuren n tegrest ideg tikwal ageffur d yir addad n tegnawt ur ttaǧǧan amdan ad yeffeɣ ad iruḥ ɣer teẓgi ansi yezmer ad d-yeqleɛ kra n yimɣan ara yečč lmal-is ma ifukk usaɣur, ur yesɛi maḍi d acu ara asen-yefk akken ur ten-ineqq laẓ. Imir-n, ur ila afran-nniḍen anagar tiɣin-ines sɣur wayeḍ, ɣas ttilin yiberdan anda yettnuzu qrib 1000 n yidinaren i yiwet n tbaliwt. Aseggas-a ihi, ad yili yemgarad ɣef wayetma-s iɛeddan skud yefti yimɣi-a n usaɣur. Imi ɣef wawal n kra n wid yessnen neɣ ijerrben timsal-a, ad tsubb ssuma n lqerḍ s waṭas, ad yuɣal yettnuzu ahat seg 300 armi d 400 n yidinaren i tbaliwt. « Numer mačči d kra mi icaḍ usaɣur aseggas-a. Ɣas iban ad nɛeṭṭel deg ccɣel n tmegra-ines, ussan n leɛtab-is ad iɣzifen daɣen, maca nhegga i waya acku neẓra abaɣur-is yuklal-it ». I d-tenna yiwet n tmeṭṭut seg Ayt Smaɛel.

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Tger-d ussan iɛeddan, deg usebter-is n Facebook, tddukkla tadelsant Taɣerma Aburɣes tiɣri i tikkin deg umsizwer n tmedyazt, ara texdem i tikkelt tamezwarut. Tiddukkla-a i d-inecden merra imedyazen i ibennun awal s teqbaylit, tra ad tesfuggel ttiɛad n 20 yebrir i d-iteddun s waṭas n leqdicat yemgaraden, gar-asen amsizwer-agi amaynut ara yemmaggen deg taddart n Aburɣes, taɣiwant n Yilula Umalu, di Tizi Uzzu. Isalli-a, dɣa yessekcem tumert deg yimedyazen i iḥemmlen ad d-inin s usefru ayen ttxemmimen, ayen s ttḥulfun, ayen i ten-yessefraḥen d wayen i ten-yesseqraḥen. Yefka-asen daɣ tagnit ad d-sbeyynen, i tikkelt-nniḍen, tizemmar-nsen deg unnar n leqdic aseklan i ttcebbiḥen s yimru d tmenna. Ad d-nebder kan d akken tidukkla tadelsant Taɣerma Aburɣes mazal ur d-tefri ɣef wass ideg ara yettwaxdem umsizwer-a i yetturaǧun zun i wass n 21 deg wayyur-a n yebrir, ɣef wakken i d-nnan deg tiɣri-nsen. Mazal ur d-tefki daɣen yakk isallen i yeɛnan tikkin deg-s. Maca i wugar n yisallen, yezmer kra n win yebɣan ad yekki, ad yessiwel ɣer wuṭṭunen-a: 0696 86 34 46 neɣ 0558 75 06 63. Imekkiyen ara yilin deg ttiɛad-nni, ad d-ɣren anagar yiwen n usefru sdat yimferrǧen d yiɛeggalen n tesqamut n yinzurfa, gar-asen amaru-amedyaz Mass Ḥsen Merric. « Nessaram, ad d-rren waṭas n yimedyazen i tiɣri-nneɣ. Kra n win yekkin ɣur-neɣ, ad as-nessiwel, ad t-nesneɣmes ɣef wass n umsizwer akken ad d-yas, ad yeḥḍer ». I aɣ-d-yenna unmazul n uselway wis sin n tddukkla tadelsant Taɣerma Aburɣes. 

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Ass n lexmis, 19-07-2018, ɣef 20h00 n yiḍ, i d-bannen yigemmaḍ n ukayad n taggara n uswir n tesnawit yettwassnen s yisem n (BAC) n useggas aɣurbiz 2017-2018. Alaḥsab n tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, azal n 12 918 n yimsizwren, i yejerden iman-nsen deg umuɣen n usεeddi n ukayad-a, maca ala 12 673 i t-isɛeddan. Leḥsab n wid i t-id-yewwin yelḥaq 8 767 s lqidar n 69, 18%, s wakka i d-tḥella amkan amezwaru deg umyezwar deg wakal aɣelnaw i tikkelt tis mraw d yiwen 10, imi seg useggas n 2008 d netta dimma i d-yettifriren. Am yal aseggas, d tullas i d-yettifriren ɣef warrac, imi lqidar n tid i t-id-yewwin yewweḍ ɣer 73,09 % ma d win n warrac, yewweḍ ɣer 63,49%. Deg umyezwar n yinelmaden, ad naf deg umḍiq yuɣal i tnelmadt Kebaili Lina, yeqqaren deg tesnawit n Dahmani Mohamed n temdint n Boghni, s tneqiṭ n 18, 68/20. Ma d amḍiq wis sin tḥerra-t-id tnelmadt Belkacem Lina, yeqqaren deg tesnawit Fadhma N’soumer n Tizi Uzzu, s tenqiṭ n 18, 17/20. Amḍiq wis kraḍ n umyezwar yeṭṭef-it unelmad Amine Ouahab, yeqqaren deg tesnawit n Laadlani Mohmed n Maatkas, yewwi-d akayad-agi s 18,12/20. Ma d inelmaden i yewwin ugar n 18/20, wwḍen ɣer 08 n yinelmaden, ma d uṭṭun n wid i d-yewwin ugar n 17/20 yelḥeqq 71. Am wakken daɣen i d-wwin wazal n 257 n yinelmaden tazmilt yugaren 16/20, ma d 553 n yinelmaden-nniḍen wwin-d ugar n 15/20. Ma deg wayen yeεnan amyezwar n tesnawiyin: d tasnawit n Amar Toumi n Tigzirt i yewwin amkan amezwaru s wazal n 94, 33%, ma d amḍiq wis sin, tewwit tesnawit n Beni Zmenzer yellan deg Wat Dwala s lqidar n 89 77%, i yeṭṭfen amḍig-agi deg BAC n useggas iɛeddan. ma d tasnawit Mohamed Said Diouani n Makouda, I yewwin ilindi amḍiq amezwar, aseggas tḥela-d amḍiq wis kraḍ, s wazal n 89,22%. Ad d-nesmekti belli, ula deg ukayad n taggara n uswir amenzu (5°) akked win n taggara n uswir alemmas (BEM) d lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i d-yufraren deg tqacuct n umḥezwar.

  A. A. 

  
 Ad as-tuɣal tejmilt meqqren i yiwen gar yisulas n tezlit taqbaylit, i yefnan tudert-is gar usefru akked uẓawan, acennay Arezki Oultache. Yetturaǧun ad yili ttiɛad-a deg taddart-is Tarihant, yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Boudjima di tama n Makouda. Tajmilt-a i yuklal acḥal-aya i lmend n wayen i d-yefka, thegga-tt-id tddukkla tadelsant n taddart Tarihant. Ad yili usiher-agi adelsan ass n lǧemɛa, 14 cutember 2018, ad d-yezdi tawacult n tẓuri s umata d tin n yicennayen s wuzzig. Ad yili wahil d amerkanti, ideg ara tebdu tejmilt-agi, ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ s usbeddi n usebdad n ucennay Arezki Oultache, ara d-yilin deg umḍiq i wumi qqaren “Agouni”, yellan deg tlemmast n taddart, i wakken kan ad yeqqim yisem-is deg tkatut akked umezruy. Am wakken daɣen ara d-yili usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka-s. Syin akkin, mi yezgen wass, ad kemmlen leqdicat-nniḍen idelsanen deg uɣerbaz amenzu Fahem Mohand n taddart-agi n Tarihant, s snat n temsikniyin, yiwet ɣef umecwar-is di tẓuri akked tudert-is, ma d tis snat n wayen yettwarun fell-as di tɣamsa akked ttsawer-is. Ad ilint diɣ, tnagiyin ɣef tudert-is sɣur yiɛeggalen n twacult-is akked yimeddukkal icennayen d wiyaḍ merra. Ad ikemmel wahil deg tmeddit n wass, ɣef lewhi n 16h, ad yili usarag d uskasi ɣef wazal n unaẓur-agi deg tezlit taqbaylit. Yetturaǧu ad tekfu tejmilt-agi, s yiwet n tmeɣra n ccna ideg ara d-ccnun aṭas n tezlatin-ines, swayes yessuzen imferǧen-is. Aṭas n yiwudam n ccna n teqbaylit i yetturaǧun ad rzun ɣer dinna i wakken ad as-rren tajmilt, i d-aɣ-d-nnan yimsuddsen n tejmilt-agi.

  A. A. 

  
 Isefra n At Zik (poèmes kabyles d’antan) d ammud n yisefra n Ramdane At Mansour s snat n tutlayin (tamaziɣt/tafrensist). Yessufeɣ-t-id Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa deg yiseggasen iɛeddan. Yesqucceḍ-d bab-is awal ɣef waṭas n yisentalen i icudden ɣer tmetti. Isefra i d-yewwi ɣer yemma-s Tassadit At Ouvavras. Akka ara naf isefra ɣef tlufa, tikta, anuju, tameddurt, tibuɣarin, llqeḍ n uzemmur d wayen-nniḍen, yecban tujjya n zik akked unecreḥ. Yal asefru, yura-as-d sdat-s Ramdane At Mansour sdat-is ayen i t-iqublen n unamek s tefrensist. Ma d talɣa n usefru, tella-d s umata AB/AB/AB. AB/CB/DB neɣ AAB/AAB/AAB. Deg tazwart n udlis, yura-d umeskar ‘’Isefra n lejdud-nneɣ, skud ur nuɣ ara yid-sen tannumi, ur newzin ara azal-nsen, ur asen-nḥulfa ara acḥal ɣlayit. Ama d wid iwumi nesla, mi nella di dduḥ, neɣ d wid n tmeɣriwin, neɣ d wid n twiziwin…atg. Ha-t-an yiwen gar yisefra i d-yegmer. ‘’Aql-iyi deg yir liḥala, At Rebbi, ad thuzzem snasel. Ay At udrar n At Yaɛla, Uḍnaɣ aṭṭan ɣer daxel. La ttrejrijeɣ am bu tawla, Yuser-iyi lḥubb imexlel. Aql-i di lḥebs a yemma, Di lḥebsd n Tizi Uzzu. A yemma, lehwa tekkat, Aḍu, la ireffed, yesrusu. Siweḍ ay abeḥri sslam, I yemma i n-ǧǧiɣ tettru’’. Ramdane At Mansour d aselmad n tesdawiyin. Isem-is aḥeqqani Ramdane Ouahes. Yura idlisen-a : Tiɣri, Isefra n At zik, Agani, Leqr an s tmaziɣt akked Amawal n yinzan n teqbaylit.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Aḥric wis sin n usarag i iga Mass Mohamed Djellaoui deg temlilit ɣef ucennay Matub Lwennas, i d-yellan deg tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, ussan n 23 d 24 deg yennayer 2019. 

 Tarrayt-agi n uḍris uffir (Le procédé du texte absent), tettban-d deg usemres n umedyazt Matub Lwennas i wayen i d as-d-tefka tgemmi tadelsant d timucuha, imi s wayen iwumi semman inagmayen limarat tizamuliyin n uḍris uffir (indexation symbolique du texte absent). Yettas-d uḍris adday d uffir deg uẓeṭta n uḍris udyiz. Amedyaz, ur t-id-yettabdar ara s lekmal-is, yettwehhi-d ɣer-s d awehhi. Imeɣri, yessefk fell-as ad yeḍfer limarat-nni tizamuliyin i wakken ad yaweḍ ɣer uḍris uffir iɣer yerra uwehhi n umedyaz.

 Tarrayt n uwehhi (Procédé de l’énnoncé allusive) (Amezrug) 
 Tarrayt-agi n uwehhi (Procédé de l’énnoncé allusive) tettban-d deg usemres n umedyazt Matub Lwennas i temsal n umezrug, imi ayen i d-jebden lwelha deg usemres-agi n uḍris adday n umezruy di tmedyazt n Matub Lwennas d anadi ɣef tidet-nni ur d-yemli umezruy n tmurt n Lezzayer ɣef teɣzi n leqrun. Bdu-tt-id seg umezruy aqbur alamma d amezruy atrar. Amezruy n tegrawla n 54 yeṭtef taqacuct deg usemres-is i uḍris adday. Yezga yettnadi ad d-yessekfel tidet tamazrayt i yeɣba udadu d yixdimen-is, aladɣa ayen i d-yeḍran i yigrawliwen-nni iḥeqaniyen n temnaḍṭ n Leqbayel.
