 Tarrayt n uwehhi (Procédé de l’énnoncé allusive) (Tagraɣlanit) 
 Ɣer tama n uḍris adday n tgemmi d uḍris adday amazrag, i yuɣen tunti akken iwata deg urti asefran n Matub Lwennas, ad naf aḍris adday agraɣlan d ṣsenf-nniḍen i yesɛan amkan deg uḍris-is udyiz. Ṣṣenf-agi n usemres n uḍris adday, yeṭṭalab timussniwin tigraɣlanin i ilaq ad tent-yesɛu umedyaz i wakken ad yessečč yis-sent aḍris-is udyiz. Matub Lwennas d yiwen gar yimedyazen-agi iwumi tufrar tmuɣli ɣer yidelsan d tsekliwin n yigduden ibeṛṛaniyen. Di tmedyazt-is, yettban-d usemres-agi n uḍris adday n tegraɣlanit di deqs n yiḍrisen-is udyizen. Ad d-neffren yiwen n usefru i d-yufraren : «Tuzzma n temɣer» Asefru Aḍris afellay/l’hypertexte Aḍris adday / l’hypotexte (l’intertexte)
  Tuzzma n temɣer. Tasfift 1993 
   <em>La neqbeɣ deg wussan-iw</em> 
  <em> Ajenwi iɛelleq nnig-i </em>
  Ciṭ ciṭ ad d-yettaẓ s ixef-iw
  Lxiḍ i t-icudden ay ifessi

 «Awehhi: Epée de Damoclès (Ajenwi neɣ ssif n Damuklis). Damuklis-agi d axdim n ugellid Denys l’Ancien, i yellan ɣef uqerru n tgelda n Syracuse, di lqern wis 5 uqbel talallit n Sidna Ɛisa. Axdim-agi, yezga teswehm-it sɛaya n ugellid Denys, dɣa yiwwas yesɣam-it ɣef ukersi n lɛerc yenna-as ṭṭef amkan-iw. Mi yeqqim deg umkan-is, lxir iɛum-d fell-s si yal tama, maca tikkelt kan irfed allen-is nnig uqerru-s, iwala ajenwi d aɣezfan nnig uqerru-s, icud s wanẓaḍ n uɛidiw, teshel tɣersi-s. Din din yeǧǧa akersi n lɛerc yuɣal s amkan-is : S wannect-a agellid, isefhem axdim-is belli ɣas tella sɛaya, lmut d ineɛman, zgan ggunin-t di yal taswiɛt.

  Taggrayt  
  S wayen akk akka i d-nebder, iban-aɣ-d s ttbut wazal yesɛa usemres n uḍris adday deg urti asefran n umedyaz Matub Lwennas, asemres i d as-yefkan i uḍris-is udyiz yiwen n uswir d aɛlayan seg tama n usugen asefra, akked d talqayt n usekkud seg tama n tikta d tmuɣliwin. Am wakken i d-yettbeggin si tama-nniḍen aswir n tmussni i yekseb umedyaz di temsal yerzan tigemmi tadelsant n umdan aqbayli, d tid n umezrug n tmurt n Lezzayer i seg i d-yessefti tidet-nni teɣba tsertit n udabu. Am wakken yezger s usemres n uḍris adday, ɣer tmussniwin tigraɣlaniyin, ansi d-yewwi tikta d tmuɣliwin timaynutin, i yegren irebbi i ṣṣfa d tezdeg n talsa d telsanit.

<p style="text-align:right">  Agzul sɣur Hocine Moula   

  
 Iberreḥ-d Usuddu aɣelnaw n usileɣ aparasnujjyan n Uweqqas ussan-a s yiwen n wulɣu i ddhen n yilemẓiyen d tlemẓiyin n Bgayet i yebɣan ad ilin d imɛawanen n umsujji n tuɣmas ɣer sdat, belli tusa-asen-d tegnit ad tt-farṣen s umsizwer i sqelɛen beddemma. Amsizwer-a, win i t-id-yewwin, ad iɛeddi srid ɣer usileɣ n yimɛawanen deg ukersi n umsujji n tuɣmas n tezmert tazayezt. Ayen yerzan ajerred, yebda yakan seg ahad yezrin, 6 unbir, ad ikemmel alamma d 25 deg wayyur-a n unbir, i yellan d azemz aneggaru. 

 Deg yiwen n usentel, ilaq ɣef win yenwan ad ijerred, ad d-iheggi akaram (dossier) ara yawi yid-s, ideg ara tili tsutert yuran s ufus, tanɣelt (copie) n tkarḍa n tmagit, tanɣelt n uselkin aɣurbiz n useggas wis kraḍ n tesnawit akked uselkin n ukraḍyur aneggaru, tukkist n tezmilin n bakalurya, rnu-as tiferkit n yisallen ara yeččar umazwar s timmad-is. Ad d-nesmekti d akken wwḍen yimeḍqan inuḥen aseggas-a di twilayt n Bgayet ɣer 15 kan. Ma d asɛeddi n umsizwer ad yili ass n, 19 duǧember 2019. 

 Ɣef wakken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ, mazal ad d-ffɣen yisallen imerniyen ɣef umsizwer-a sɣur tenmehla n Usuddu-a n Uweqqas. Ilaq ad d-nini ayendin d asḥissef i d-ibanen ɣur yilemẓiyen i yettnadin ɣef uxeddim, kra seg-sen imi drus n yimukan iwumi d-serrḥen yimasayen, wiyaḍ imi mačči d amsizwer n yifiremliyen i d-suffɣen. « Ur ẓriɣ ara ma yella ad ɛerḍeɣ zzher-iw neɣ uhu s umsizwer-a. S 15 n yimeḍqan kan, yewɛer maḍi ad trebḥeḍ sdat yimeyyaten n yilemẓiyen-nniḍen », i d-tenna yiwet n teḥdayt seg usamar n Bgayet.

  M. K. 

  
 Deg leblan i d-yefɣen seg tenmehla n tmarit d tinḍi ( Tourisme et l’Artisanat), azal n 33 n yisenfaren i yebdan s uxeddim deg ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu. Dɣa deg ussan inegura i tebda s wuden unṣib tsemhuyt n uṭuki ( saison estivale) 2018. Leqdicat, ɛumen i lmendad n tsemhuyt, ama seg tenmehla n tmarit d tinḍi d tɣiwanin teɛna temsalt, ladɣa Tigzirt d Uzeffun, ama si tama n yimḍebbren n srabes yimgaraden i yettnadin, ad qaɛden tagnit i wakken ad sɛeddin yimdanen lewqat igerrzen deg unebdu-agi i d-iteddun. Dɣa tefka-d tneɣlaft n tmarrit d tinḍi 7 n yimelyaren n santim i uwennaɛ n waddad n yimeḍqan n uɛummu n yimdanen. Aya yeɛna taɣiwant n Tegzirt d Uẓeffun.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Mazal ttkemilen leqdicat n tddukkliwin deg unnar. Tikkelt-agi, d yiwet n temsizzelt i d-yellan, ddurt iɛeddan , deg Uxxam n yilmeẓyen n tɣiwant n Wagennun. Gar tddudkliwin tidelsanin itterkkin, ad d-nebder Tiddukkla Tazazrayt n Tamda, Tiddukkla Tamussni n Wagennun , Tiddukkla Imnar Afir, aɣerbaz alemmas Boussad Mohamed . Tebda temsizzelt si 9 n tsebḥit, tedda armi d 17 n tmeddit , anda yal tiddukkla, tesbeggen-d tizeɣwa i tesɛa : aẓawa atrar akked caɛbi , amezgun , ccna , asuneɣ , imuhal n ufus , amezgun n warrac imectaḥ akked tsenselkimt. D tiddukkla tadelsant Tazazrayt n Tamda i d-iḥellan amḍiq amezwaru di tzeɣwa n uẓawan atrar, caɛbi akked umezgun. Ma d tazeqqa n ccna, ḥellan-d amḍiq wis ssin. Deg tzeqqa n usuneɣ yewwi-d yilemẓi Ousmail Koceila amḍiq wis ssin. I usmekti kan, tiddukkla-agi, tebda leqdic 3 n iseggasen-aya . Deg taggara, ttwafranent-d tddukkliwin ara ittekkin di temsizzelt tis snat ara d-yilin di kra n wussan i d-iteddun.

  Yamani Souhila 

  
 Am wakken i t-id-tɛeggen yakan deg wahil-is, kra n wussan ɣer deffir, thegga-d ddurt-a yezrin tdukkla tinmettit i yimeɛḍar d Yimuḍan Idumen « Tiɣri » n Ayt Smaɛel yiwen n wahil d amerkanti i usḥulfu n yimezdaɣ d yibabaten tugart, ɣef umihi i d-ttawin kra n wuraren n uẓeṭṭa n internet i warrac d yinubiyen. I lmend n waya, llan-d yisaragen, timsikniyin d usenzu s ubuddu n wammud n yisefra n Ɛezzun Ḥmed. Akken, ugar n yimsaragen i d-yewwin awal s teɣzi ɣef taluft-a, aṭas i iḥeḍren i ttiɛad, nnan-d awal-nsen, am uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, taselwayt n tdayra, ccix n lǧameɛ akked temsulta d yijadarmiyen. Gar wid i d-igan isaragen, ad d-nebder Massa Muḥemmadi Xadiǧa, Zemmuri Lwiza d Fares Idir, i d-yemmeslayen s umata ɣef uḥric n tnefsit d wamek ttwaṭṭafen warrac s tazzla deg tqeffet n yir uraren-a. Ula d ttrebga n yimawlan tettwabder-d s telqey, imi ulac win ara iɛassen tarwa d wayen xeddmen ma mačči d nutni. Ladɣa mi nettwali simmal berrun kra n lwaldin i ddabir agaman i sɛan ɣef teḍfert-nsen. Ɣef taluft-a dɣa, yenna-aɣ-d yiwen n ubabat seg Ayt Smaɛel: « Ma yewwi-d ad sḍelmeɣ albaɛḍ mi ara yekcem ugrud deg wuraren ifuḥanen, nekk ad sḍelmeɣ imawlan-is tazwara. Aqcic a-t-an ddaw leɛnaya-nsen nutni skud urɛad yessif ». Merra, walan, yesmurres ayendin warmud-a (activité) n Tiɣri, i yekkan seg tsebḥit armi d tazwara n tmeddit.

  M. K. 

  
 Ur telli teshel taluft n waman ɣef yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel, deg usamar n Bgayet, akuden-a ineggura. Ma yella deg unebdu ugur ameqqran, i iɛummen ɣef wat tɣiwant merra, d tuqin n waman deg tberninin n yixxamen, deg lawan-a n tewwura n tegrest, sɛan kra ugur akked tezdeg n waman i asen-d-yettawḍen. Snat n tuddar ar tura ideg i d-iban uɣilif-a n wammus deg uẓeṭṭa n ubḍaw n waman, neɣ deg yiqadusen: ti d Ayt Tɛisiwt d Tala Ɛṭa. Dɣa deg umedya n Ayt Tɛisiwt, ugar n useggas tura segmi ḥebsen kra n yimezdaɣ-is tissit n waman n tbernint. Nnig yiɣersiwen d yilefḍan i yettwawfen deg uxemmal ameqqran n waman, iban-d xesren yakk yiqadusen i d-yettawin aman armi ddeqs seg-sen yerka yerkukki. Ulamma ɛerḍen deg yiwen n wakud yimḍebbren n tɣiwant, ad bnun axemmal d amaynut iɣer rran taɣbalut, mazal luɣen waman i ččarayen wat uxxam. Dɣa, ḥala i usired d usizdeg n uxxam i ten-sseqdacen, wamma wid n tissit ttagmen-ten-id seg taliwin. « Atan tufa-aɣ-d tegrest-nniḍen s waman ur nezmir ad nesew deg uxxam-nneɣ. Nessaram ad yili uɛiwed n yiqadusen, d anezgum amezwar n yimḍebbren n tɣiwant-nneɣ ». D awal n yiwet n tmeṭṭut seg Ayt Tɛisiwt. Ilaq ad d-nini aṭas i yellan d amihi ɣef tezmert n umdan, d tezmert n tuddar s umata, mi ara yilin umsen waman n tbernint. Ma ur d-snulfan albaɛḍ n waṭṭanen iweɛren, zemren ad ilin deffir n usemmem i izemren ad ineq tikwal. Am wakken i d-yeḍra waya deg waṭas n temnaḍin n tmurt n yizwawen, amedya n Meqla deg Tizi Uzzu taggara-a kan. 

  M. K. 

  
 Thegga-d, ddurt-a yezrin, Tdukkla Aweqqas Addal d Umzel (Loisir) tuffɣa-s tis 39 seg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel ɣer tin n Tizi n Berber, ɣef teɣzi n 25 n yikilumitren. Send ad teqleɛ terbaɛt tikli, iga-asen-d uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, Mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi, ttawil n ufurgu i ten-yessawḍen armi d taddart n Tizi Lexmis. Dɣa, seg rreḥba n yideflawen, azal n 20 n yimdanen, gar-asen tameṭṭut, i yeṭṭfen iberdan n yidurar qbala ɣer uzrar-nniḍen n udrar deg tɣiwant tanaragt (taǧaret) n Tizi n Berber. Ulamma inuḥ usemmiḍ, ihewwel ucelliḍ udmawen, dman-as i waya wid ibeggsen i ttiɛad-a , ẓran mačči d ayen ara ten-yesḥebsen. Deffir umwelleh-nsen, ṭṭafaren yimekkiyen abrid, rennun sbennayen timuɣliwin icebḥen i ẓerrent wallen-nsen deg tegrest taɛeryant. D ayen i ten-yeǧǧan ur sbiren ɣef tukksa n tsewwarin-nsen akken ad sḥebsen akud kra n teswiɛt, ad ṭṭfen i lebda aktayen n tegnatin-nni ur yezmir yiwen ad yettu. Ulamma weɛren yiberdan-nni iɛlayanen, tikwal d imihanen i tikli, ur ḥulfan yiḥewwasen ala s lḥamu n tegnit d ccbaḥa n tmuɣliwin tixlafin. Imi ula d annecraḥ ttakken-as amḍiq seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ. Rnu daɣen idrizen-nsen i d-ixeddmen unuɣen icebḥen ɣef udfel amellal, send ad kecmen tilisa n Tizi n Berber. Mi ttqaraben ɣer tansa i neyycen, kfan tikli ɣef udfel azedgan, uɣalen srusuyen iḍarren ɣef tzegzewt. Armi, gar ɛeyyu d laẓ, ufan iman-nsen ilaq ad sgunfun, ad d-rren nnfu swayes zemren ad ḍerrḍen ad kemmlen. Ihi, lawan n yimekli, fernen yiwen n wadeg gar yiẓra imeqqranen akken ad ččaren iɛebbaḍ. Ad d-sewwen ula d tacrift imi yakk ttawil heggan-t si tazwara i usiɣi n tmes. Mi kemmlen tikli s uẓuɣer n yiḍarren, wwḍen ɣer wanda ara ten-yeddem ufurgu-nniḍen ɣer Aweqqas tikkelt-a, imi tuffɣa-nsen din tekfa. Maca si tura tḥar terbaɛt ɣef wazemz n tuffɣa i d-iteddun.

  M. K. 

  
 Ɣas ma tedda tussna, deg umaḍal, asurif meqqren deg yal aḥric n tudert, ɣas ma wwḍent tɣermiwin n yal agdud ɣer tqacuct s wayen i d-ufrarent i lfayda n talsa, maca assaɣ yellan gar umdan d ugama, d assaɣ lqayen deg umezruy n txelqit. D assaɣ ara idumen i lebdda. 
  Yal aɣref yesεa amezruy, d cfayat (timektit) imezdayen yezdin agdud. Dɣa ass-a, yewwi-d ɣef yal yiwen ad yeḥṣu s wazal n tgemmi n tɣerma n Yimaziɣen i d-yeǧǧan isem-is deg umezruy. Yiwen useklu yezdin yakk tigeldiwin n yilel agrakal, d netta i ɣer cuddent cfawat timagdayin, d netta i d tamagit n ugdud, wagi d tazemmurt. Tazemmurt, ayen i d-neḥka fell-as drus, ayen i as-nerra d lxir, ur nezmir ad t-id-nebder, sdat wayen i aɣ-icudden ɣur-s, d nettat i d tayemmat i d-yessekkren acḥal d tasuta. Akken i as-yenna Musa n talsa ɣef wassaɣ n ugdud ɣer umezruy-is : “S anda la tettedduḍ ay aḍar? Yenna-as: “S azar”. Ihi ass-a yewwi-d ad nerr ccan i yal abruy n tgemmi, s wayen yak i nezmer, i wakken ad neḥrez tamagit, tazemmurt. Tazemmurt, d agerruj n lebbda, yis-s i d-bnan lejedud tussna deg yal tama, d ayen iwumi qqaren, ass-a, tigemmi, ama deg tussna i icudden ɣer ulqam n uzemmur, d tarrayin-is yemgaraden seg tɣerma ɣer tayeḍ , neɣ d ayen yeεnan tiẓtin n uzemmurt, tussna i icudden ɣer ufras d ucraw. Megren-d Yimaziɣen tussna meqqren deg wassaɣ-nsen d ugama d twenaṭ, ladɣa dg wayen yeεnan aḥric n uzemmur. Dɣa, ula d tafada, tcudd ɣer uḥric n tfellaḥt, tayarza, acraw, alqam d ufras. Tcudd tussna ɣer lɣella n zzit n uzemmur, ladɣa ɣer tɣara: Allalen n ujemaε n zzit n uzemmurt, tisyar n uzemmur. Azal n tzemmurt, icudd, diɣ, ɣer tdamsa n twacult taqbaylit, d nettat i d-yettilin deg lmendad deg yal taswiεt n lḥars.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Thegga-d Tddukkla Algerie Eco-responsable s lemɛawna d tddukkla Axxamn n Dda Ɛli yiwet n twizi n ufras di tɣiwant n Tizi Rached, ass n sebt 17 di furar, si 9 n tsebḥit armi d 16 n tmeddit . Yella-d ufras deg ubrid agejdan n Tɣiwant n Tizi Rached . Si tama-nniḍen, tessawel-d tddukkla Tafrara n Yiɛezzugen i ufras ula d nettat. Leqdic-a, yella-d ass-nni n 16 di furar yerin. Rran-d yimezdaɣ i tiɣri-a imi ssawḍen ad kksen iḍuman, i wakken ad ticbiḥ tiɣremt n Yiɛezzugen . Xas ulamma ttemxalafen yiznan i ssexdament tddukkliwin deg udellel-nsen, yecba “Afus deg ufus, akken ad nekkes ammus, taɛkumt ẓzayen ad tifsus” , “Asizdeg yelha, yif-it limer ur nessamas ara” , meɛna iswi n tddukkliwin yiwen : Tezdeg n twennadt. Imi ur ilaq ara ɣef umdan ad yidir deg umkan anda llan yiḍuman. Aya, igellun-d s waṭṭanen, d ayen i yessexraben di ṣṣifa n twennadt , meɛna tineggura-a, ččuren yiberdan d iḍumman, ladɣa, tiqareɛtin n zǧaǧ. Deg yiwen n ulɣu n useggas n 2016, i d-tessufeɣ OMS, tenna-d d akken : azwu (abeḥri) n tmurt n lezzayer ur zeddig ara, tugar timura anda llant lluzinat s waṭas.

  Souhila Yamani 

  
 Sḥasfen s waṭas yifellaḥen i – yelhan s ttrebga n tzizwa ɣef lexsas meqqren deg lɣella n teɣrasin n tzizwa.

 Dɣa ɣef leḥsab n M. A., d afellaḥ i d-yelhan s ttrebga n tzizwa deg tɣiwant n Mεatqa, yenna-d d akken: «Deg teɣrasin, ulac yakk tament, am iseggasen iεeddan. Ciṭ n tament yellan akka deg teɣrast-agi, ur tkeffu ara ula d lmakla i uglaf n teɣrast». 

 Cuden yifellaḥenlexsas-agi n lɣella ɣer ugama imi ur d-yili ara unezwi iwatan deg tefsut iεeddan akken ad jemεent tzizwa ayen yakk ḥwaǧent n tlakmast (nectar) i wakken ad xeddment lɣella. Seld tirza n kra n yifellaḥen i d-yelhan s ttrebga n tzizwa deg lwilaya n Tizi-Uzzu, yenna-aɣ-d yiwen ufellaḥ i d-nemlal deg Tenmehla n srabes n tfellaḥt n Tizi-Uzzu : «Aseggas-agi, tizizwa d timecḥaḥin, ur aɣ-d-fkint ara ayen nurǧa. Yewwid fell-aɣ ad nerǧu aseggas-nniḍen ahat ad d-tili lɣella». Dɣa ula d afellaḥ-agi, icudd ssebba n lexsas-agi ɣer unezwi yellan ladɣa deg tefsut iεeddan, anda tella tefsut wezzilet nezzeh, dayen i d-yezgan d aεewwiq ɣef ujmaε n tesmektiwin i iwulmen i lxedma n tament. Kra n yifellaḥen ay nemnal deg tirza-naɣ, sεan daɣen rray-nniden. 

 Dɣa nutni ur cudden ara kan lexsas-agi ɣer tmental n ugama, maca llant ssebbat-nniḍen i d-yellan d aεewwiq ɣef usuffeɣ n lɣella yelhan n tament. Ɣas ma ifellaḥen sfaydin-d s usileɣ deg uḥric n ttrebga n tzizwa, d usileɣ deg unamek n usuffeɣ n leṣnaf ifazen n tament, maca ulac ttawilat iwatan i waya. Assegas-agi, iḥuza lexsas ula d tiɣrasin n tzizwa yettidiren deg tzeẓwa ( ruches sauvages), ɣef leḥsabn n yiwen n ufellaḥ yesεan tirmit meqqren deg uḥric-agi n tukksa n tament n tzizwa yittidiren kan deg tzeẓwa. 
  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Tsuddes tddukkla ‘’Ecovolonterre’’ n At Yanni yiwet n tmeɣra iwumi qqaren Amager n tefsut di tedwilt-is tis kraḍet, seg 27 armi d 31 deg meɣres 2018. Ass n aram 27 di meɣres, tella-d tulya tunṣibt n tmeɣra ɣef 10h, anida ḥeḍren yimḍebren idiganen d wid iqeddcen deg uddusen yimgaraden n taɣiwant. Ahil n temlilit s wazal-is, dɣa akka i rran yimsuddsen tajmiilt i Tirac Kamel, i d-sbedden asmussan areygaman, d aqqeru n amezwaru n tddukkla-agi. Deg tazwara, sersen tameqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓẓeka-ines, syin nezhen yimḥeḍren i kra n yicennayen n At Yanni d At Wasif. Mi yezgen wass, tella yiwet n lwaɛda anda čcan seksu s wuftiyen. Kemmlen yirmuden deg uxxam n yilmeẓyen KEDDAC Ali seg 14h armi d 17h anda i d-yella usuneɣ, aferkus, aseḥḥar i warrac, tisihariyin d usenzi n yimɣan d yifarisen idiganen (zzit uzemmur, tament, aɣunan). Am wakken i d-tella, diɣ, timsikent n tɣawsiwin yettwaxedmen s plastik d nwal n leqbayel. Yal ass, yettawi-d amaynut d unecreḥ i yimdanen, ladɣa arrac imectaḥ, imi tameɣra-agi teɣli-d akked yimuras-nsen. Aya, yewwi-d aṭas n lɣaci u teḍra-d tmeɣra di tegnatin yelhan nezeh. Akka i yesnemmer aṭas uselway n tddukkla n’’Ecovolonterre’’ Mass SAƐDI Ḥmed wid akk i d-yefkan afus n tallelt ama si lbeɛd, ama si lqerb. Di taggara, temdel tmeɣra n umager n tefsut tiwwur-as, ass n sed 31 di meɣres. Ferḥen yimdanen, ruḥen s ixxamen-nsen s usirem n tuɣalin ɣer tedwilt tis ukuẓet deg useggas i d-itedun. 

  Dahlal Chanez 

  
 Yuɣal-d bab n tezlit tamḥaddit Ɛli Ideflawen s walbum n ccna d amaynut ussan iɛeddan, seld lɣiba idumen aṭas n yiseggasen. Dɣa, deg tesfift-a n 2018, i wumi yefka azwel n « Abudali », yewwi-d deg-s sa (7) n tezlatin. Ayen i d-ijebden allaɣ deg-s, imi si tezlit tamezwarut, ideg yerra tajmilt i Muḥend u Yeḥya. Abeɛda deg tazwara n tezlit-agi, anda-ken i d-as-yeqqar: « Uuh! Ass-agi tcudd tyersi. Uuh! Iruḥ Muḥend u Yeḥya ». Ad d-nesmekti belli Ɛli Ideflawen yecna ayendin n yisefra n Muḥend u Yeḥya. Yeqqar-as di tezlit tis snat: « Ɣas tgezmem-iyi ifassen-iw, amer kra ad t-aruɣ. Ɣas tgezmem-iyi iḍarren-iw, amer ɣef tmurt ad lḥuɣ. Ad iyi-d-tegri taɣect-iw, ad cnuɣ ɣef tlelli ». Deg tezlit i tt-id-iḍefren, yella-d umeslay gar ubabat amɣar d tyellit, i as-yessuturen ad as-d-imel ɣef umezruy, ad as-d-yessiwel timucuha n tudert akken ad tefhem tilufa i yerzan tamurt-is. Gar tezlatin i d-yeddan, ad d-naf yuɣal-d daɣen wawal ɣef tlelli i yeɛzizen aṭas ɣef Ɛli Ideflawen, deg tezlit i wumi isemma « Yemma-s d mmi-s ». Gar wayen i d-yellan deg-s d adiwenni s ccna, d uẓawan yelhan, nezmer ad nsel ɣer taggara i: « Ay ameɛzuz-iw a mmi, a win rebbeɣ s ttnefcic. Ulamma kečč ad truḥeḍ, a mmi ḥebbreɣ-ak lɛic. A yemma ɣef tlelli, ma lluẓeɣ ad ččeɣ leḥcic ». Deg tezlit send taneggarut, ad iger yiwen tamawt i uẓawan n Lwennas Meɛtub i yerfed Ɛli Ideflawen akken ad d-yawi tamuɣli tamatut ɣef win i wumi isemma « Abudali ». Ɣer taggara, yefren bab n tezlit « Abrid » ad yekfu tazrart n tezlatin n walbum-a, s tmenna n yiwen n usefru amḥaddi, i yesɛan ayendin d anamek. 

  M. K. 

  
 Azekka n ttlata, 23 yennayer 2018, ɣef lewhi n 19h00 n tmeddit, ad tili tmeɣra meqqren n ccna deg tzeqqa n “Opéra” Boualem Bessaih, yellan deg temdint n Lezzayer tamaneɣt.

 Tameɣra-agi, ad tili d tajmilt i ucennay ameqqran Ccix Cherif Kheddam, i lmend n wayen akk i d-yefka i tezlit taqbaylit. D taneɣlaft n yidles i d-iheggan leqdic-agi adelsan, yettuneḥsaben d asmekti meẓẓiyen i urgaz meqqren aṭas, yuklalen ugar n wannect-a, maca wicqa. Tameɣa ideg ara cnun ddeqs n yicennayen imeqqranen n tezlit taqbaylit, yecban Medjahed Hamid, Ali Meziane, Taleb Tahar, Arezki Ouali…atg. Ad d-nesmekti imeɣriyen-nneɣ s tmeddurt akked tesfifin n unaẓura-agi mucaɛen deg tmurt n Lezzayer merra. Ilul ass n umenzu n yennayer deg useggas n 1927, deg taddart n Boumessaoud i ittekkin ɣer tɣiwant n Imsouhel, deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Yella d anaẓur s timmad-is, imi yella d amedyaz, d acennay yerna d amẓawan. D netta i d acennay aqbayli i yesseqdacen aṭas n wallalen n lmusiga deg tuɣac-is. Yelmed aẓawan asmi yella d ilemẓi, asmi yella deg tmurt n Fransa. Deg yiseggasen n 1950, i yexdem tizlit-is tamezwarut “Yelli-s n tmurt”. Syin akkin deg useggas n 1953, i d-yessuffeɣ tasfift-is tamenzut i wumi isemma “Nadia”, ideg llant 6 n tuɣac gar-asent: Sbaḥ lxir, Qqim di lehna, Nesɛa lḥeqq…atg. Sakin deg useggas n 1958, yerna-d album-is wis sin, iwumi iga azwel-a “Ǧerǧira”, ideg llant 15 n tezlatin, nezmer ad nebder gar-asent: Leḥbeq, Lɣerba, Lukan i d-ttuɣal temẓi, Mennaɣ ad kem-sɛuɣ d lǧar, Fehmet a medden…atg. Tin ɣur-s, sin n yiseggasen kan, yerna-d aḍebsi wis tlata “Bgayet telha”. Tlata n yiseggasen umebɛed, yerna tasfift tis rebɛa “A lemri”, ideg llant 10 n tezlatin, gar-asent: Ay itran, Anef i lemwaji, Anda luleɣ, Anda tleḥḥuḍ…atg. Deg useggas-nni dɣa yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt n Lezzayer, yuɣal ixeddem yiwet n tedwilt deg rradyu tis 2, iwumi fkan isem n “Iɣennayen n uzekka”. Syin akkin yeqqim alammi d aseggas n 1978, i wakken ad yessuffeɣ aḍebsi wis xemsa, i wumi yefka isem n “Sliɣ i yemma”, ideg llant 16 n tezlatin, ad nebder gar-asent: Ẓriɣ lxir, Ttɣenniɣ tamurt-iw, Tirga ufennan, Tasusmi, Tensa tafat. Deg useggas n 1980, i d-yessuffeɣ tasfift-is taneggarut iwumi isemma “A tilawin”, ideg llant 6 n tezlatin, gar-asent: A tin yuran, Yelli-s n tmurt-iw, Aḥbib n ddima…atg. Syin d afella, ixeddem kan timeɣriwin ɣef usayes. Ma deg useggas n 1995, yunag tikkelt-nniḍen ɣer Fransa, i wakken ad idawi. Syin ass n 23 deg yennayer 2012, yewweḍ leɛfu Ṛebbi deg sbiṭer n Paris, anida yella yettdawi yakkan. Ass n 26 deg yennayer 2012, wwin-t-id ɣer tmurt. Azekka-in n 27 yennayer yettwamḍel deg taddart-is Imsouhel. Ulamma ɛeddan tura 6 n yiseggasen ɣef lmut-is, maca mazal ṣṣut-is aḥlawan yesuzun imeẓẓuɣen-nneɣ, mazal tugna-s tressa deg wallaɣ, mazal imeslayen-is teddun-d deg wawal. Ihi xas sgunfu deg talwit a Cherif Kheddam, azal-ik meqqer, amecwar-ik ɣezzif, ma d tijmilin ayen i d ak-yettwaxedmen drus. Xas teǧǧiḍ-aɣ, maca teǧǧiḍ-aɣ-d.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
  Isufar 

 – 1 kg n berkukes – 500 gr n yibawen iquranen iqecren -1 n tmeqqunt n tɣeddiwt – 1 verre n lḥemmez – 1 n tebselt tameqqrant – 3 n tfenza n ticcert – zzit n uzemmur – 1/2 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n yifelfel aberkan – 1/2 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n lmelḥ – 1 n tɣenjawt n lmakla n ṭumaṭic yeẓdan – 1 n ṭumaṭict

  Aheggi 

 Slexset lḥemmez-nni iḍ uqbel asewwi-nsen, syin terremt-ten ad wwen daxel n tasilt akked yibawen, ciṭ n zzit n uzemmur, ticcert, taṭumaṭict, lebsel d yisufar-nni-nniḍen s waman. Anfet alamma kfan waman-nni, wwan ibawen. Imir ternum-as ciṭ ma ilaq. Tura heggit berkukes i wakken ad d-ifur tlata n tikkal. Aya mebɛed mi tewwa tɣeddiwt-nni. Sduklet kullec, terrem-t ad d-ifur yiwet n tikkelt. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Teḍra teqsidt, aggur iɛeddan, deg uɣerbaz agraɣlan azayri di tmanaɣt n tmurt n Fransa, mi teffeɣ yiwet n tnelmad seg uɣerbaz akken ad tẓal. Syin, tettwaḥbes ɣef leqraya i wazal n 7 n wussan sɣur tanemhalt n uɣerbaz, Massa Nadya Messasi. Mbaɛd tadyant-a, tegdel tnemhalt taẓallit i yinelmaden,i yiselmaden akked yixeddamen deg uɣerbaz. 

 Ddurt iɛeddan, temmeslay-d tneɣlaft n ttrebga Mass Nuriya Ben Ɣebrit ɣef wanect-a , tenna-d : “Ttruḥun-d yinelmaden ɣer uɣerbaz akken ad lemden timussniwin, ma yella d taẓallit, ad tili deg uxxam mačči deg uɣrbaz ‘’. Anect-a d ayen i d-ixelqen aṭas n wawal, ladɣa gar wid yessexdamen iẓedwa n internet : Gar wid iwumi yeɛjeb rray-agi, nnan-d d ayen yelhan limer ur nesekcam ara dyana deg yiɣerbazen. Si tama-nniḍen, llan wid i yugin rray-agi . 

 Aṭas n wawal i yuzlen sya u sya. Aṭas n wid ur neqqbil ara rray-agi. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken aṭas n yizzayriyen ur nebɣi ara taneɣlaft n usedwel. Yal tikkelt, senqaden-tt di laryuy-is, ladɣa deg wayen yeɛnan ddin. Si tama-nniḍen, llan sandicat i d-yeskecmen iman-nsen, ula d nutni ffkan-d rray-nsen. Gar-asen Mesɛud Budiba s yisem n CNAPEST i d-yenna d akken ‘’taneɣlaft n ttrebga ur ilaq ara ad d-ffeɣ s rray yecban-wagi, ladɣa imi tamurt-nneɣ tleḥḥu ɣer tefranin, d ayen i d-yeglan s waṭas n wawal. Ikemmel, yerna-d: ‘’Ur ilaq ara ad nessekcem tasertit d wayen-nniḍen ɣer taɣult n ttrebga’’. Gar wa d wayeḍ : Wiss ma yella yiswi n uɣerbaz i tmussni neɣ i wayen-nniḍen?.

<p style="text-align:right">  Y. S . 

  
 Ɣef leḥsab n wayen i d-wekkden yiɛeggalen n Useqqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa d uselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan Mass Laguel Lyes, ad tressi iman-is yiwet n terbaɛt n yiɣallen n usellek deg wussan i d-teddun deg tlemast n tɣiwant.   Si Belkacem Toudji 

  
 Akken yettwassen seg waṭas n tsuta-aya, segmi d-yennulfa deg leǧwahi n Yihendiyen d Waɛraben, ccatranj d yiwen n waddal n uqerruy i yelhan nezzeh, ama i umecṭuḥ, ama i umeqqran. Deg umaḍal merra, ayendin d tilɣuɣa akked tberziwin (tournois) n wurar-a i d-yettilin yal aseggas. Ussan-a kan i yekfa dɣa Olympiads n ccatranj, i d-yellan di tmurt n Jyurjya, ideg d tamurt n ccinwa i d-yufraren. Deg waɣir n Bgayet, mačči aṭas i yerran ddehn-nsen i usnerni n wurar-a, ama si tama n yinesdabuyen idiganen, neɣ seg tin n tddukkliwin d yimezdaɣ. Ulamma si 12 yimyuraren ifazzen di terbaɛt n Lezzayer, llan 9 si Bgayet, maca ur gerrzent ara ar tura tegnatin ideg yezmer uqrur, n wass-a ad yili azekka, gar wid yufraren deg umaḍal. « Di Bgayet ur nesɛi ara imuraren isadaren imi mazal d awanek i d-yettakken tadrimt i warmuden-nneɣ. Maca, nesɛa talɣuɣa n waɣir i d-yettilin yal aseggas, ideg llant 16 n trebbuyaɛ », i d-yenna uselway n temɣunt n Bgayet, Mass Karim Amɣar. Ugur n ukcam ɣer waddal-a yettwaḥemmlen, iban-d abeɛda deg usamar n Bgayet, imi ḥaca tarbaɛt n Uweqqas i izemren ad tili di lmendad, meskud ulac tirebbuyaɛ ama deg Ayt Smaɛel, deg Tsexriwt neɣ deg Yiderginen. « Lemmer ufiɣ, tili nesɛa deg Ayt Smaɛel tarbaɛt ideg nezmer ad nekcem, ma nebɣa ad nelmed urar neɣ ad nesnerni aswir-nneɣ deg-s. Tarbaɛt n Uweqqas, zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ tebɛed cwiṭ fell-aneɣ, meskud d inelmaden i nella, nseɛɛu ahil-nniḍen ad t-neg », i d-yenna yiwen n uqcic si temnaḍt. Ad d-nesmekti d akken llan di Bgayet ayendin d imuraren yelhan, imi llan yikerwaten igraɣlanen i qrib sawḍen akka tura 2 300 deg usismel amaḍalan elo.

  M. K. 

  
 Ilul ass n 19 cutember n useggas 1918 deg taddart n Agni Gueghrane, deg lɛerc Ath Sedka, deg temnaḍ n Ouadhias yetabaɛen ɣer lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Yekker-d deg twacult taẓawalit, baba-s d afellaḥ am yifellaḥen akk n lweqt-nni. Yekcem ɣer uɣerbaz, maca ur yeḥric ara mliḥ dɣa yettaxer-d. Si temẓi-is i iḥemmel ad iɣer timucuha n umaru afransis Jean de La Fontaine, si zik-is i icennu i yiman-is ulamma deg tallit-nni d lɛib win yettɣenin. Asmi yesɛa 11 n yiseggasen di leɛmer-is, iruḥ ɣer Lezzayer tamaneɣt, yexdem dinna ɣer yiwen n urumi, deg tama n Staoueli. Syin akin asmi yesɛa 19 n yiseggasen, yunag ɣer tmurt n Fransa, iruḥ ɣer temdint n Logway, yexdem dinna deg yiwen n lluzin. Deg useggas n 1937, sawlen-as-d yiserdasen n Fransa, i wakken ad ittekki deg ṭṭrad “Issoudun”. Ma deg useggas n 1940, yeffeɣ-d seg lɛesker n tmurt n Fransa, dɣa yeǧǧa tamdint n Logway, iruḥ ɣer Paris tamaneɣt n Fransa, dinna yexdem deg umiṭru daxel n uderbuz ( am wakken i t-yecna deg yiwet gar tezlatin-is). Sin n yiseggasen kan mbeɛd, yewwi-t lɛesker n tmurt n lalman ɣer temdint n Rhénanie, deg tama n umalu n tmurt-a, yeqqim din alammi d asmi tewwi Fransa timunent-is deg useggas n 1945. Ussan n tegrawla, imawlan-is ur ten-yeḥǧib ara lḥal n wamek tteddun lecɣal n tmurt, ladɣa adabu amaynut n 1962, ula netta daɣen yeggumma ad yessusem ɣef wayen yettwali, dɣa deffir kan n timunent n tmurt n Lezzayer deg useggas n 1962, imḍebbren n tmurt, bɣan ad t-nɣen. Maca netta yuɣal yunag tikkelt-nniḍen ɣer tmurt n Fransa, yuɣal yuɣ dinna lqahwa, icennu deg-s i yimnigen iqbayliyen, dɣa iɛjeb-iten lḥal mliḥ. Seg useggas n 1967 armi d aseggas n 1988, ur d-ɛeddant ara tezlatin-is deg rradyu n teqbaylit. Yecna azal n 92 n tezlatin, gar teqbaylit, taɛrabt n Lezzayer yettwasnen s yisem n “dderǧa” akked tefransist. Yecna akked tcennayt Nouara, Chikh Noureddine akked Mohammed Hilmi…atg.Yemmut ass n 28 yennayer 1983 di temdint n Moissac deg tmurt n Fransa, daɣa yettwamḍel dinna. Ma nsuk tiṭ ɣer ccna-s, ad naf belli Sliman d anagi n tallit-is, d ayen i d-ibanen deg tezlatin-is, a Muḥ a Muḥ, ixdem-itt ɣer uɣrib. Ɣef temẓi yenna: Temẓi-w truḥ d akerfi, asmi yexdem deg umiṭru, yecna tizlit “Deg umiṭru daxel uderbuz”. Ma ɣef yimnekecamen n tmurt n tmazɣa, yenna “Ffeɣ ay ajrad tamurt-iw”. Am wakken daɣen ara d-naf later n tmucuha n Jean de L Fontaine, imi yesseqdac aṭas iɣersiwen deg tmedyazt-is, amedya taqsiḍt-nni n lfil.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Yekker-as ussan-a Uḥraz n tẓegwa (Conservation des forêts) n waɣir n Bgayet i tedwilt n unadi d uḥsab n yigḍaḍ n waman yettɛeccicen i yellan di twilayt. Ama deg yiɣeẓran, isaffen neɣ uggugen, trezzu tsuddut-a yeqqnen ɣer ugama ɣer waṭas n yimeḍqan ideg nuḥen waman, s yiqeddacen-is, iɛeggalen n uẓeṭṭa n usiḍen n yigḍaḍ d yilemẓiyen n umussu asdukklan, txeddem-d arapul ɣef wacḥal yellan d igḍaḍ-a i yettɛeccicen, amek ttidiren d wamek fettin. 

 Dɣa, deg ukemmel n tigawt-is, yella Uḥraz n tẓegwa ussan-a yezrin di lemsaq n wasif Ageryun, deg usamar n Bgayet, ideg ɛerḍen wid iḥeḍren ad walin liḥala n yigḍaḍ-a n waman, ad ten-siḍnen deg wacḥal i d-qqimen. Ulama yewɛer akken ad tafeḍ leḥsab idetti, wanag ssawaḍen yirgazen n Uḥraz n tẓegwa ad sɛun tikti, neɣ ad sennden ɣef ufmiḍi i d-ufan. Kra seg yiɛeggalen n tddukkla « Oxy-Jeunes » i uḥraz d usnerni n tgemmi tagamant tamezrayt n Yiderginen, kkin deg warmud-a n usiḍen i d-yellan lqaɛ n wasif Ageryun, gar tɣiwant n Suq Letnin d tin n Melbu.

  Ad d-nesmekti d akken tigawin-a n usefqed d usiḍen n yigḍaḍ yettɛeccicen, llant-d taggara-a i lmend n wass amaḍalan n yigḍaḍ imhujar, i d-yettuɣalen deg 10 maggu n yal aseggas. Tura akka, akken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ, mazal tettkemmil tigawt n usiḍen n yigḍaḍ n waman, seld mi d-yeḍra usihar-nniḍen deg uggug Iɣil Amda, i d-yezgan di tama n Xerraṭa. Tuffɣiwin-a n usiḍen n yigḍaḍ, ttilin-d tanezzayt maḍi, tikwal ɣef 05:00, acku imir-nni i ttemsegrawen s waṭas deg yimeḍqan-nsen ideg caḍen waman. Ugar n wid yekkin s wudem unsib deg uqeddic, llan wid yettruḥun akken kan ad walin, neɣ ad ɛiwnen ma zemren.

  M. K. 

  
 Deg 19 meɣres iɛddan i telli tiwwura-s s wuden unṣib yiwet n tḥanut n tenzuyt n uyefki n tcekkart d isuddimen-is deg tlemmast n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa, anda ḥedren aṭas n yimḍebbren n Useqqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa, ɣef uqerru-ines aselway n Useqqamu Mass Laguel Lyes, rnu ɣef waya aṭas n yimḍebbren n srabes yemgaraden n tɣiwant, d umaɛlem n tḥanut, imḍebbren n luzin n uyefki n Draa Ben Khedda. Ugar n 5 000 n litrat n uyefki n tcekkart i d-isaḥen i tḥanut-agi yal ass, rnu ɣef waya, tanzuyt n yisuddimen yemgaraden n uyefki seg luzin n uyefki n tɣiwant n Draa Ben Khedda. Tusa-d tḥanut-agi i tifrat n yiwen n uɣbel i icuɣben aṭas aṭas tiwaculin n temḍiqt-agi, acḥal d aseggas-aya, yeɛnan lexsaṣ n uyefki n tcekkart. Daɣen, aya, ad yessifsus taɛkumt ɣef sin (02) i iferqen ayefki deg tɣiwant, ur nezmir ara ad siwḍen ayen ilaqen ɣer twaculin. Sdat n uɣbel yerzan lexsaṣ n uyefki n tcekkart, fkan yiɛgalen n Useqqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa yiwen n ttesriḥ i yiwen ilemẓi n tɣiwant i uftaḥ n tḥanut n tenzuyt n uyefki n tcekkart. Aya-agi, yella-d deg wagguren iɛddan. Seld sin leddwar segmi telli tḥanut-agi tiwwura-s, ferḥent twaculin aṭas seg tifrat n uɣbel i ten-icuɣben aṭas d iseggasen-aya.

  A. Z. 

  
 Ɣef laḥsab n yisallen i d-yenna unemhal Amatu n Tsemsert taɣelnawt n usedawen d uḥnineḍ ( Agence Nationale des Barrage et des transferts), Mass Arezki Berraki, deg umaṭaf n radyu taɣenawt, deg wussan iɛeddan, yella unessig deg usedaw n Teqsabt n ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu, dɣa iger tɣri i tkebbaniyin i wakken ad sersent ikaramen-nsent i ufran n tkebbanit ara d-yelhin s uɛawed n uwenneɛ n unessig n usedaw. D yiwet n terbaɛt n y immemmaɣen yettabaɛen ɣer ANBT, i d-yusan ɣer usedaw n Teksabt, i d-yufan anessig ( fuite d’eau) deg 70 n lmitrat deg tilqi. Yella unessig deg uḥrif (vanne) n usedaw. Deg leɛḍil n uwenneɛ d uqeɛɛed n unessig, ɣelqen yimḍebren aḥrif n usidaw, sya ar ad fernen takebbanit ara d-yelhin deg uwenneɛ n unessig deg wussan i d-iteddun.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 D ayen i d-ijebden ddhen n waṭas n medden taggara-a, ama d imezdaɣ n Bgayet neɣ d wid n twilayin tinaragin.

 Deg yal aɣilif i sɛan, ala agzam n ubrid i ufan, kra n yimdanen, d asellak akken ad d-rren i tiɣri-nsen yinesdabuyen idiganen, ad asen-d-gen ayen suturen. Ddurt iɛeddan weḥd-s, gar sem d amhad, ugar n 10 n liḥalat n ubelleɛ n yiberdan i d-ibanen. Yal tikkelt deg wanta tamnaḍt. Seg yiberdan-a i iregglen kra n yimezdaɣ, ad d-nebder abrid aɣelnaw wis 9 deg sin n yimeḍqan, Xerraṭa d Suq Letnin. Abrid aɣelnaw wis 26 deg tama n Rmila, akked ubrid aɣelnaw wis 24 deg tɣiwant n At Ksila. Deg tama n Xerraṭa, deg unekcum n ufalu, sutren abeɛda wid igan tigawt n ugzam, ad yenqes uɛeddi n yikamyan iẓayanen. Deg Melbu, ɣef wakken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ, qeflen lɣaci abrid ɣef ssebba n wakal i ugin ad yili useqdec-ines akken ur bɣan. Ma yella akkin i Kendira, deg ubrid aɣelnaw wis 75, i d-yezgan gar Kendira d Yiberbacen, d aɣilif n lgaz i yeǧǧan medden n temnaḍt-nni, rran kan i ubelleɛ n ubrid bac ad asen-d-slen yimḍebbren. Ass n ahad tasebḥit, yettwagzem daɣen ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9, gar Suq Letnin d Uweqqas. Ulamma, kra n teswiɛt kan, yuɣal yettwaserreḥ. « Yeskanay-d waya acu i sɛeddayen yimezdaɣ n yal tamnaḍt d uguren. Dɣa, imi ulac akk ayen asen-ilaqen i tudert, ttarran i ugzam n ubrid akken ad iɛeddi wawal-nsen ». I d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n Bgayet. Si tama, aṭas i d-yekkaten deg tigawt-a i yuɣalen d yir tannumi, imi acḥal d aqeddic i ibeṭtlen ɣef ssebba-s, d wacḥal d amuḍin i yewwin takabart ɣef waṭṭan-is, ur yewwiḍ ɣur ṭṭbib-is. Maca si tayeḍ, llan daɣen wid yesseḍlamen inesdabuyen i yesɛuẓẓugen i tsutriwin tigejdanin n yimezdaɣ.  M. K. 

  
 Ssebt-agi deffir-nneɣ, 20 deg waggur-a n yennayer ideg nella, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, tella-d temlilit taseklant s tewsit n “Café Littéraire” deg Wammas adelsan Ferḥat Remḍan n Buzgan deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D timlilit ideg yezzi wawal ɣef usentel-agi : turart s waṭas n wuraren deg tansa n Internet neɣ s tefransist “Dépendance aux jeux en ligne et a l’Internet”. Yewwi-d awal Mass Meḥmud Budaran awal ɣef lemḍarat swayes i d-tgellu turart n waṭas n wuraren deg Internet, ama ɣef tezmert n ugrud, ama ɣef unegmu-ines…atg. Am wakken daɣen i d-yemmeslay umaru d uduktur deg tussna n “biomedicales” deg udlis-is “La violence sociale en Algérie”, i d-yessazreg deg yiseggasen yezrin, ad yili diɣ usenzi s ubuddu-ines i wid yebɣan ad t-aɣen. Ad d-nesmekti imeɣriyen-nneɣ, belli d tagi i d timlilit taseklant tis snat deg useggas-agi amaynut n 2018, nessaram ad idum leqdic n tiddukkla-a i lebda.

  G. A. 

  
  Aḥric 1 

 Yella yiwen urgaz, yezdeγ netta d 7 n warraw-is berra i taddart. Yiwen wass deg wussan, yekcem γer taddart. Mi yewweḍ γer yixf-is, yesla i tteryel tetett At taddart yiwen, yiwen. Dɣa, yebren urgaz s tazla γer warraw-is, yenna-asen: « A tarwa, ha-tt-an tteryel, la tetett at taddart yiwen yiwen. Ha-tt-an ad tessenger taddart. Ahat tezmer ad d-tuγal γur-neγ. Kkert fell-awen ad nerwel ». Ihi, kkren rewlen. Teddun ur ẓrin anida. Ddan ddan, dγa yeεya yiwen deg-sen. D ameqran deg warraw-is. Dγa yenna-as i baba-s: « A baba nekkini εyi&amp;gamma,; ur zmir ara ad kemmleγ tikli ». Syin, yebna-as babas taxxamt s udγa&amp;gamma,; yeğğa-t din. Netta d 6 warraw-is, kemmlen tikli. Ddan, ddan, yeεya yiwen-nniḍen, dγa yebna-as baba-s taxxamt s udγa&amp;gamma,; yeğğa-t din, daɣen. Akken armi εyan akk. Aneggaru i yeεyan d mmi-s ameẓzyan deg-sen. Netta semman-as Geṭṭuc acku d ameẓyan nezzeh. D amεuc, d abexxuc kan. Ma tiḥerci, yiwen ur as-yezmir. Yenṭeq Geṭṭtuc ɣer baba-s, yenna-as: « Ula d nekk εyiγ tura a baba’’. Yerra-as-d baba-s: « Ihi ha-t-an ad ak-bnuɣ ula d kečč taxxamt s udγa&amp;gamma,; ad teffreḍ deg-s, akka ma tewweḍ-d γur-k tteryel, ur tzemmer ara ad ak-tečč ». Yenna Geṭṭuc i baba-s: « Nekkini a baba, yessefk ad i yi-tebnuḍ taxxamt s wuzzal ». Ihi, yekker baba-s, yebna-as taxxamt s wuzzal, yesbedd-as tawwurt n wuzzal. Yeqqim Geṭṭuc deg-s, ma d baba-s ikemmel abrid-is. Wissen anida ara yaweḍ. Tteryel mi tfuk at taddart-nni s tuččit, dγa teṭṭef abrid i yeṭṭef wergaz-nni d warraw-is. Deg webrid-nni tufa 6 texxamin bnant s wedγa&amp;gamma,; sεant tibbura n wesγar. Dγa terẓa tibbura-nni, tekcem γer texxamin-nni, tečča merra ayatmas n Geṭṭuc. Mi d-tewweḍ tteryel γer texxamt n Geṭṭuc, tufa-tt tebna s wuzzal. Ihi ur tezmir ara ad tt-terẓ. Ihi tebγa tteryel ad as-tzerreg i Geṭṭuc, ad d-yeffeγ seg texxamt-is i wakken ad tečč. Dγa tessawel-as: « Geṭṭuc, wa Geṭṭuc, ffeγ-d, ad tedduḍ yid-i, ad nruḥ ad d-nagem ». Yerra-as-d Geṭṭuc: « Nekkini sεiγ aman, ur d-ttagmeγ ara » … Tettkemmil 

  Akli Azwaw 

  
 Yiwen gar n lesswaq imeqqranen n ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu, ssuq n dayra n Buɣni i d-yettilin yal ddurt, deg wass n ttlata d lejjemεa seg 8h n tsebḥit ar 13h n uzal, yeggra-d acḥal-aya deg yir addad s ssebba n yiguduyen s trawnaṭ i izelgen udem n temdint-agi n Buɣni. Iguduyen s trawnaṭ, zelgen yakk tiɣmar n ssuk, d laryuf n yiberdan yellan deg tlemmast n temdint-agi, s kra n yiḍuman n yimεelmen n tḥuna n tnezzuyt, yeqqim akken yella. D luluf n yiqentaren n yiḍuman yeḍlan leryuf n ssuq. Imḍebbren teεna tamsalt stehzan aṭas deg taluft yecban tagi, dayen i izemren ad d-yeglu s yimahilen imeqqren ɣef tdawsa n yimdanen. Dɣa ula d imεelmen n tḥuna n tnezzuyt ufan-d aɣbel d wid i iqeṭṭun, imi s imal neqqsen seg ssuq-agi s ssebba n yiguduyen-agi. Tiɣri n yimεelmen n tḥuna d wid yuɣen tannumi qeṭṭun seg ssuq-agi terza asizdeg n tlemmast n temdint-agi yettwazelgen seg yiguduyen d iḍumman deg yal azniq n ssuq, d ta i tifrat n iɣeblan i icudden ɣer lebni n yinidan, i iεeggben aselḥu akken iwata ssuq-agi.

  Ali Zalouk

  Aheggi 

 Qqlut daxel n lmeqla lebsel akked tfelfelt-nni tazegzawt s zzit n uzemmur s ddaw n tmes taḥlawant kra n ddqayeq. Syin, ternum ṭumaṭic, ticcert d teḥcict, terrem-as lmelḥ. Ɣummet-t, reggut-t sya ɣer da, alamma twalam tezmer ad tefxes ṭumaṭic-nni. Rnut-as aksum, azemmur, imir smiret s ufella timellalin. Terrem-as lkemmun d teḥcict. S tezmert-nwen.

 Daya

  
 Yezzi-d umuli wis 58 n tlallit n kamel Amzal neɣ Maǧid At Waεmar, anelmad
amagday yettwanɣan ɣef ufus n yimṭurfa. Deg Tifeṛḍuḍ, taddart taεlayant n tmurt
n leqbayel, ilul Kamel Amzal ass n, 13 deg tuber 1962. Deg uɣerbaz amenzu n
taddart ara iɣer, syin ɣer uɣerbaz alemmas Ɛmar At Ccix d tesnawit n Mustafa
Ben Bulεid deg Ɛin Lḥemmam. Meẓẓi aṭas mi yebda amennuɣ ɣef tugdut, tutlayt d
yidles amaziɣ, ladɣa deg Tefsut n yimaziɣen n 1980. Deg useggas n 1981, ad d-yawi
unelmad akayad BAC n tsekla d tfelsafit akken ad yelmed tasbenyulit deg Ben Ɛeknun,
 yerna ad d-yufrar deg-s. Kamel,  ad
yemlil d waṭas n wudmawen mucaεn n umennuɣ, am Mustafa Baca d Cawqi Salḥi. Timlilit ara yernun ugar n wafud i mmi-s n Tifeṛḍuḍ i umennuɣ mgal imṭuṛfa
inselmen ara isemmin i Maǧid cciṭan azeggaɣ imi anelmad aẓelmaḍ n tektiwin yedda
mgal ilefḍan d tebrek n wallaɣen-nsen yenwan tasdawit d annar i usuzer n ṭṭlam-nsen.
Dɣa, imi Kamel Amzal d yimeddukkal-is, bɣan tugdut deg yimazdayen imaniyen anda
yal anelmad ad yesεu awal-is, ggren-t wid yettagaden tafat gar wallen-nsen s
usrusu n tebratin n ugalli ddaw tewwurt n texxamt n Kamel am tin yufa iḍ n
umenzu n unbir deg-s ggulen ad yettwaneɣ. Iḍ-nni ara yaru asefru-ines
aneggaru :

 ‘’Ay axettar ! Acḥal iseggasen iεeddan ur zriɣ

 Neɣ nezga nettwaɣ si ddunit-agi

 Ɣef εecrin i teǧǧuǧug ddunit , εecrin ! 

 Nekk di leεmer-agi ɣliɣ d amɣar

 Temɣar-iw, tezwar-d temzi…

 I wacu ara ttruɣ neɣ lumaɣ lmektub

 Imi zriɣ tedduɣ ɣer lmut ?’’ 

 Ilemzi ur d as-d-yecqi ara imi yekker s yiswi n uslali n umazday imani s uεellaq
n wulɣu i d-yessawalen ɣer unejmuε amatu, teẓḍem-d tarbaεt s yijenwiyen, wwten
aqcic ur yesεin gar yifassen-is siwa ixef lkaɣed. Ijenwiyen ara yentun deg tεebbuḍt
n Kamel. Imṭuṛfa, ur tt-qqiden ara imi ẓẓlen aqcic di lqaεa, kksen-as tablust, ssentan-as
ajenwi di tεebbuḍt-is. 

 Ad yettwaṭṭef Lassuli Fateḥ Ellah ɣer lḥebs i tmenɣiwt n Kamel, maca ad
yeffeɣ seld 4 n yiseggasen s leεfu n Cadli Ben Ben Ǧdid. Aṭas n tejmilin i yuɣalen
i uqcic n Tifeṛḍuḍ am tezlit n Uleḥlu d tin n tsekkrin n tarbaεt n ccna taddart
n Tifeṛḍuḍ :

 ‘’Γas akken lmut-ik tejreḥ-aɣ tasa,

 Yeǧǧuǧeg yisem-ik yuɣ akk timura,

  S tafat n tikti-k nufa tisura, 

 Ddmen rruḥ-ik 
ur d-ak nɣin ara, 

 Ɣer ugdud, isem-ik yeqqim-d i lebda’’ 

  Tigrin Nisma 

  
 Tikkelt-a mačči d ungal, mačči d ammud n tmedyazt neɣ n tullisin i d-yernan d amaynut ɣer tsekla tamaziɣt, maca d tasɣunt Aselmad.

 Segmi i d-tennulfa tikkelt tamezwarut deg yebrir 2017, tebda tettarew-d tiyaḍ armi i tessaweḍ ɣer tis rebɛa ussan-a kan. Tasɣunt Aselmad, tessemlal ddeqs n yimyura d yiselmaden i iḥemmlen ad d-sneṭqen imru s tutlayt n Mulud Mɛemmeri. Ha-tt-an ihi, teẓra tafat i tikkelt tis ukkuẓet. Akken i d-nenna deg yisebtar n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen, ussan yezrin, tekfa s uqɛad sɣur sin n yimsuddsen i d-yelhan yis-s. Tulmist i aɣ-ijebden tikkelt-a, d tajmilt i yuɣalen sɣur ugraw n yimyura d yiselmaden i yiman n kraḍ n wudmawen i d-yeǧǧan ilem d ugerruj deg tira n tmaziɣt. Ɣas ma mgaraden di leɛmer, maca deg unaḍeh d timmuɣnest ulac aṭas n lxilaf. Tamezwarut d uletma-tneɣ Kaysa Xalifi i aɣ-yeǧǧan deg 25 yunyu yezrin. Tekki, yakan, s yiḍrisen-is deg kraḍet n tesɣunin n Aselmad i d-yeffɣen. Am wakken, daɣen, i tella d taneɣmast ifazen deg yisebtar n Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen. Tayeḍ d Dihya Lwiz i d-yufraren s wayen i d-teǧǧa gar wammud n yisefra d wungal ‘’Gar yigenni d tmurt’’. Udem-nniḍen d Ɛebḍella Ḥaman, ameɣnas ameqqran n tmaziɣt di Wehran, argaz n tsekla i aɣ-yeǧǧan si tama-s ussan-a kan yezrin. Ɣef waya i fernen yiɛeggalen n tesɣunt ad asen-tuɣal tejmilt xersum d asmekti i leqdic i d-ǧǧan. Tamawt-nniḍen i yewwin lwelha-nneɣ, d akken iḍrisen n tikkelt-a, uddsen u ttwawelhen srid ɣer uɣerbaz, acku aṭas deg-sen zemren ad ttwasqedcen deg temsirin n tmaziɣt imir-a. Ad naf iḍrisen imsegziyen, ussnanen, wid n uglam d uḍris imesfukel. Akken daɣen i llant tullisin yemgaraden di tewsit, zemren ad tent-afen yiselmaden d tasalelt di temsirin-nsen, ladɣa di tesnawiyin d uɣerbaz alemmas. Ad naf ula d timɛayin d tmucuha ilan (yesɛan) inumak lqayen. Nnig n 28 d udem i yuran deg tesɣunt n tikkelt-a. D asmekti kan i wid yebɣan ad rzun ɣer yisebtar-is, ad kecmen deg uzeṭṭa inmetti Facebook syin ad tekkin, ad arun isem n usebter : Tasɣunt Aselmad, dɣa ad asen-d-teffeɣ s tin n tura s tid yezrin.

  Khaled. A 

  
 Liḥala n dir n ubrid di taddart n Bumahni, i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Ɛin Zawya, d aɣebel ameqqran u n waṭas aya. Ɣef wanect-a, dɣa, i xedmen, ass n, 15 deg wayyur-a, yinehharen n tkeryas n uṣiweḍ i yettawin si taddart n Bumahni ɣer temdint n Buɣni yiwen n usunded war tilist (grève illimitée) imi akken i d-yenna yiwen seg yimezdaɣ n taddart ‘’Liḥala n ubrid ur tgerrez ara, yal tikkelt nessawal i yimḍebbren akken ad d-rren ɣef teɣri-nneɣ, maca ulac win i d-yeslan. D ayen i aɣ-yeǧǧan ad nemsefham akken ad nebdu asunded’’. Ikemmel deg wawal-is: ‘’Abrid, acḥal d aseggas-aya nutni qqaren-d ur t-nxeddem ara alamma ɛeddan waman. Syin iɛedda lgaz, ar tura ulac d acu i yettwaxeddmen. Liḥala, simmal tleḥḥu ɣer deffir. Asunded-agi, yegla-d s yiɣeblan i yimezdaɣ ur nesɛi ara tikeryas. Abrid seg umkan iwumi qqaaren ‘ la cité Michel ‘ arlamma d taɣiwant taqdimt n Bumahni, ad nernu abrid i yettawin ɣer taddart Iferḥaten d win i iraben’’. Rnu ɣer wanect-a, taɣiwant n Ɛin Zawya, ur tesɛi ara, ar ass-a, aselway imi llant-d kra n cwalat gar yikubar. Aya, yegla-d s waṭas n leɛḍilat. Ssawalen yimezdaɣ n taddart n Bumehni i yimḍebbren n tɣiwant akken ad d-sslen i tiɣri-nsen , acku liḥala anda yewweḍ ubrid mačči d tin igerrzen maḍḍi. Asenfar-agi n ubrid, ilaq ad t-id frun .

  Y. S.

 -500g n uwren areqqaq

 -sel

 -zzit n uzemmur

 -lfarina

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Sxelḍet awren akked lmelḥ s waman yemmuzeɣlen i wakken ad yuɣal tarekti ara yeshilen i umsal. Ɛerket-t azal n 25’ ar 30’, rennut-as ciṭ ciṭ n waman alamma yuɣal urekti d aleqqaq. Rret i yifassen-nwen zzit n uzemmur u sbunnit arekti-nni, tanfem-as azal n 30’ ad yers. Ddmet snat n tbunniyin, tmeslem-tent s yifassen, tdehnem yiwet s zzit, syin tmedlem-tent ta ɣef ta u tɣelqem rrifat-nsent, tmeslem-tent. Syin tesewwem-tent s ufella n uḍajin. Mi cuffent, tqelbem-tent, mi wwant, teldim-tent. Anfem-asent ad qqarent sin wussan, syin tgezzmem-tent d iḥricen imecṭaḥ. Rret ayefki ɣef tmes, mi yebda yettkuffut, terrem ɣer daxel-is tacewwaḍt-agi, tanfem-as azal n 5’. Syin ternum-as zzit neɣ udi. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Yiwen wass, iwala ugellid n tmurt yelli-s meqqret, yeεni tewweḍ i zzwağ. Yeqqim yettxemmim weḥd-s, yeqqaṛ: “Ay ul-iw, yelli ṭṭuqten-d fell-as inexḍaben, maca nekk bγiγ-as argaz i tt-yuklalen s tirrugza, mačči s yidrimen”. Acku yelli-s n ugellid, ur tt-ixuṣ ara uṣurdi, ma textaṛ di kra-nniḍen. Yettxemmim ugellid armi i t-id-tusa tekti. Yessawel i kra n yixeddamen-is, yenna-asen: “Ad truḥem ad d-tesnejmaεem meṛṛa At tmurt, ad asen-tinim, agellid yuqqem-d amgarad: win ara ifazen deg-s, ad yawi tarzeft d tameqrant. 

 Yiwen seg yiqeddacen n ugellid, yenna-as: “Ay agellid, amek ara nini ma steqsan-aγ-d γef ṣṣenf n temsizzelt neγ γef warraz d acut?”? Yenna-asen ugellid: “S tidet. Amgarad d akken win ara yesrewten annar n yirden, ur yumis d aγebbaṛ, d netta ara yaγen yelli tawḥiḍt εzizen”. Akken i teḍra. Mi i yeffeγ wawal akk wid-nni i igren iman-nsen deg umgarad, ur zmiren ara acku d awezγi ad tesrewteḍ annar ur tettγebbired. Armi, a-t-an yekker-d yiwen n yilemẓi, iban yeẓwer, yenna-asen i lεesker n ugellid: “Awit-iyi-d tazart”. Fkan-as-tt-id, yebda aserwet mebla leḥder am wiyaḍ armi yekfa yuγal ala aγebbaṛ. 

 Yenna-as ugellid:”Aql-ik ala aγebbaṛ yerna ur teεriḍeḍ ara ad tḥadreḍ iman-ik, d acu i d lmeqsud-ik?”. Argaz: “Ay agellid, annar akka i yettwarwat, ma d yelli-k win yebγun, yaγ-itt”. Yerra-as ugellid: “Ih a mmi d kečč i as-iwulmen”. Lmeqsud n urgaz d akken ccγel yesεa lqanun, ur yezmir yiwen ad t-ibeddel γef lmeqsud-nniḍen, ama d asurdi ama d ayen-nniḍen, lxudma tettwaxdem akken i as-d-yewwi lḥal. Qqaṛen wat zik:-“Yir ccγel yettgalla di bab-is”.

   Yahia Yanes 

  
 Azwel n uḍris « Nnger » yura umaru Salim Benxlifa i d-yeffɣen deg useggas 2018 ɣer tezrigin Ccix Muḥend Ulḥusin. Yesɛa 124 n yisebtaren. Txdem-as tazwart Massa Nasira Abrus. D ammud n 51 n yiḍrisen i d-yusan s mennaw n tewsatin u yal aḍris s usentel–ines. Tameddurt n umaru Ilul Salim Benxlifa ass n, 29 deg maggu 1986, deg lɛerc n yimellaḥen. Yefruri-d seg twacult n Lbacir Amellaḥ. Yesɛa sin n yierdasen, yiwen deg génie civil, wayeḍ deg tmerrit. Yettaru imagraden akked yiḍrisen deg uɣmis n Yimaziɣen n « La Dépêche de Kabylie ». Salim, daɣen, d amedyaz; yesɛa adlis « Ulamek » i d-yeffɣen deg useggas 2017. Yewwi ddeqs n warrazen n tsekla deg tfaskiwin n tmedyazt i d-yettilin deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Azɣan aseklan 1- Azɣan n udlis s tmeddurt n umaru Mbeɛd taɣuri n yiḍrisen n tsekla i d-yeddan deg udlis-agi akked unadi amecṭuḥ ɣef tmeddurt n umaru, ad neɛreḍ ad neg assaɣ gar tudert n Salim Benxlifa akked unamek, isental, talɣa akked uɣanib n yiḍrisen, akken ad nekcem deg lbaḍna n udlis. a- D ilemzi Salim Benxlifa, d ilemzi yesɛan 32 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is. War ccek, ula d netta yettḥulfu swayen i yettḥulfu yal ilemẓi. Ɣef waya, ad naf asentel n tayri d umeslay ɣef telmeẓyin xas ulamma mačči ḥawla n tikal i d-yuɣal ɣer waya. Iban-d usentel-agi deg uḍris « Gar tayriwin », « Tabrat taneggarut » , « Tifrat gar tiyaḍ » … Iban usentel n tayri, yessen-as akken ilaq umaru, acku yessen ad isenfali, yesɛa tazmert taseklant deg ufran n wawalen d tenfaliyin iwulmen. 

 Yezmer ula ad iseɛceq win iwumi rqiq lḥal-is ticki ara yeqqar taqbaylit n Salim. Maca deg yiḍrisen-agi, ur yessefti ara s waṭas tazmert-agi. Ula d asentel n tuzuft-nni i ḥemmlen medden, ladɣa ilmeẓyen, yezgel-it Salim Benxlifa deg yiḍrisen-ines. Yerna iban ad as-yizmir, mačči d tazmert taseklant i t-ixuṣen wisen kan acuɣer? Neɣ, ahat, yeqqim dima usentel-agi lɛib neɣ d tugdi akked leḥya ! wisen ! Iḥuza-d sya u sya umaru ilemẓi uguren n yilmeẓyen d usiremnsen, maca ur d-yewwi ara ɣef temsal tigejdanin d wuguren imezgiyen i yettmagar yilemẓi am trewla seg tmurt, timenɣiwt n yiman, aḥqar n yilemẓi iwumi yettwakkes uzref n tlelli d umeslay, lḥerraga, uguren n usdawan, zzwaǧ n bessif… b- Yesɛa agerdas deg tmerrit Tcudd tmerrit d uḥewwes ɣer ugama akked twennaḍt. Ɣef waya i yeckunṭeḍ Salim Benxlifa deg twennaḍt ideg yettidir. Yesekcam-d imeḍqan, tiɣawsiwin akked leḥwayeǧ i nettaf deg ugama, am udrar i d-yuɣalen ahat tlata n tikal deg yiḍrisen, aman n wasif, isekla, ijeǧǧigen, tiziri, tibḥirt, ilel…atg. 

 Deg umedya, ad naf iḍrisen-agi : « Cccet », « Telha tudert di tmurt-iw »… c- D amedyaz Yewwi-d umaru Salim Benxlifa ddeqs n warrazen n tsekla deg tfaskiwin n tmedyazt, am Tfaska n Udrar n Fad neɣ Tafaska n tddukla Si Muḥend u Mḥend d Yusef Uqasi. Akken daɣen i d-yefruri seg twacult n umedyaz aqdim Si Lbacir Amellaḥ. Daya i yi-yeǧǧan ad gzuɣ acuɣer amaru yettaru s waṭas s wudem udyiz deg yiḍrisen n tesrit, bɣiɣ ad d-inniɣ ddeqs n yiḍrisen deg wammud-agi qerben mliḥ ɣer usefru. Ɣef waya, imeɣri ara ten-yeɣren, ilaq ad yesɛu tizemmar iǧehdden, ama deg umawal neɣ deg tegzi n tenfaliyin n uɣanib. 

 Ad yili d bab n twennafit iǧehdden, yettḥewissen ad yefhem, yettruzun taqerrut-is akken ad d-isbin ayen yebɣa ad d-yinni. Dayen daɣen i yi-ideggren ad gzuɣ acuɣer i d-yettuɣal usentel n tmedyazt akked tsekla s waṭas deg yiḍrisen n udlis Nnger. Tamuɣli n Salim ɣef tsekla, udem d tbadut i yefka i tmedyazt, ad ten-naf deg yiḍrisen-a: « Acu i d amedyaz ? », « Amek aka ? », « Ssbeḥ zik i bdiɣ tira »… d- Limarat n yimyura d yinaẓuren Deg udlis-agi, nettaf limarat n yimyura, inaẓuren d yimeɣnasen. Ama d igensayen neɣ d izɣarayen. Gar yismawen i d-yeddan deg yiḍrisen, ad naf Malika Dumran, Ideflawen, Ferḥat, Meɛtub, Muḥya, Xalil Ǧebran, Zarathushtra, Baudelaire, Francis Cabrel… 

 Dayen ara d-isbeggnen d akken amaru iḍal ɣer yidelsan, tiktiwin, timussniwin akked tfelsafiyin. Iban-d waya deg udlis, imi ad t-naf d anesbaɣur seg tama-agi. Iban-d d amaru ifazen . Ddeqs n lfaydat d wazalen n tsekla ara d-yelqeḍ yimeɣri, neɣ ad dyaǧew seg-s timussniwin. Nettaf limarat n tektiwin n Xalil Ǧebran. Nettaf awalen i yesexdam Muḥya, Yiwen n Uḍris, isemma-as Tuber am uzwel n taɣect n Francis Cabral « Octobre » … Tagrayt Yella wassaɣ meqqren gar tmeddurt n Salim Benxlifa akked wayen yettaru. Ur teffir ara tudert-is: tban-d s tehri deg yiḍrisen-is. Ur dneqqar ara dɣa tudert yellan deg udlis-agi teɛdel d tin yedder neɣ yettidir umeskar, meɛna yella wassaɣ meqqren. Iban-d wassaɣ-agi, ama deg talɣa d wanaw n yiḍrisen n tsekla i yefren Salim i tuddsa n yiḍrisen. Tban-d daɣen deg unamek akked yisental i d-yesekcam. Yella waya daɣen deg uɣanib, amawal d tenfaliyin i yeffren umaru I lebni n yiḍrisen. 
  Lyes Belaidi 

  
 Drus n wakud kan segmi d-tennulfa, tebda tddukkla Amzur n tlawin n Ayt Smaɛel tettekcam deg unnar n leqdic d uheggi-ines. Timeltaɣin (adhérentes) n tddukkla-a tamaynut, banent-d seg tura s wudem i d-yettakken asirem ara yesmeɣren azal n wayen merra grent deg wahil n warmuden i bɣant ad xeddment seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ. Ladɣa, segmi yewweḍ yisalli n tlallit-is ɣur yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt, laqant seg tama-nsen ayendin d asebɣes i asent-yernan ugar n lebɣi. Taggara-a ihi, aṭas n wawal i yekkren ɣef tddukkla Amzur d yisenfaren-is, armi dɣa i asent-d-telḥeq i tmeltaɣin-is tennubga sɣur umaṭṭaf Raj (Agraw, Tigawin, Ilemẓiyen) i yellan di Lezzayer tamanaɣt. S wakka, Tusa-asent-d tegnit, ad d-awint awal ɣef tddukkla i d-snernant d yiswan-is. Seld amciwer i d-yellan gar terbaɛt-nni n tlemẓiyin, tettwafren-d tmeltaɣt turmidt Massa Tiziri Idir, ad d-temmeslay i yimsefliden s yisem n tddukkla Amzur akken ad ttettwassen, si tama, ad d-tefk, diɣ, tugna ɣef leqdicat i yetturaǧun sɣur-sent, si tama-nniḍen. Deg teɣzi n tedwilt, tessaweḍ Tiziri Idir, ad tuɣal ɣer deffir ansi i d-tebda ameslay seg tazwara mi asent-d-tusa tekti n usnulfu n tddukkla, amek lḥan lecɣal n unadi n teqcicin ara yekkin deg usenfar, alami d taggara ideg yeḍra lebɣi-nsent, ṭṭfent ttesriḥ dayen. Ur tettu ara Massa Tiziri, ad d-tebder isental n uxxam n tdukkla i qrib ad tefru taluft-is, akked win n tmeṭṭut Tasmaɛlit i twala tebɛed aṭas ɣef unnar n leqdicat yecban win ideg grent. Maca deg wawal-is, tenna-d d akken s ubrid n tdukkla Amzur i tessaram ad yettwabdel waddad-nni ɣer lɛali. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken taldayt tunsibt n tddukkla Amzur n tlawin n Ayt Smaɛel, ad tili deg wussan i d-iteddun, ideg ara ttwaxedmen waṭas n warmuden yemgaraden.

  K. K. 

  
 Deg yiwet n teswiεt ur nessefraḥ ara yakk iɣer yessaweḍ waddad n uḥric n usiweḍ, deg tɣiwant n Mεatqa, yerkeb yimawlan n ttawilat n usiweḍ lɣiḍ meqqren. Deg ddurt iεeddan, nejjmaεen wid yettawin gar tɣiwant n Mεatqa d tɣiwant n Sukk El Tenin akked yimeḍebber amezwaru n dayra n Mεatqa i tifrat n yiɣeblan n usiweḍ i ten-iceɣben, ladɣa aɣbel n yimεelmen n ttawilat n usiweḍ ur nesεi ara azref ad siwḍen imdanen gar snat n tɣiwanin-agi yettemḥezwaren yimsawḍen yesɛan azref n usiweḍ. 

 Ad naf daɣen aɣbel n umḥezwar yettilin gar yimεelmen n ttawilat n usiweḍ yemgaraden, ama d wid yettawin ɣer ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu, neɣ ɣer tmḍiqt n Tizi LIlen, anda suturen i tifrat n ugur-agi.Yiwen n uɣbel-nniḍen i d-yeglan s trawnaṭ n uḥric n usiweḍ, d imeḍqan n uneḥbus n ttawilat, ladɣa faluft deg uneḥbus n yimawlan n ttawilat deg tlemmast n tɣiwant n Mεatqa, deg umḍiq iwumi qqaren Saεid Uεacur, deg ubrid n ugerzu wis 147, anda i d-xelqen lḥers ɣef yimsebriden n ubrid-agi n ugerzu. Ayen iceɣben, daɣen, aḥric-agi n usiweḍ deg tɣiwan, d imawlan n ttawilat n usiweḍ ur nesεi ara azref ad ssiwḍen imdanen ɣer tudrin yemgaraden. Ɣef waya i ssuturen seg wid teɛna temsalt aɛiwed n tmuɣli deg yilugan n uḥric-agi n usiweḍ. 

<p style="text-align:right"> Ali Zalouk 

  
 Amazday n ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles Amaziɣ n tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu, heggan-d ass-nni n ttlata yezrin 28 unbir 2017, ɣef teɣzi n wass, asenzi s ubuddu n sin wammud n tmedyazt n sin n yimedyazen. Amezwaru d Mass Gamar Mbarek i d-yewwin adlis iwumi yefka azwel “99 d asefru”, ma d wis sin d Mass Maouchi Amar, i d-yewwin adlis iwumi isemma “Temẓi tawessart”. Yella-d wannect-agi deg temkerḍit n ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ n tesdawit-a. Am wakken daɣen i d-wwin awal ɣef sin-agi n yidlisen-nsen akked tmedyazt taqbaylit s umata.

  Timsizzelt n tmedyazt akked ccna 

 Ddaw-tanmehla (sous-dirertion) n leqdicat ussnanen d yidelsanen akked yinaddalen n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, suddsen-d yiwet n temsizwert n tmedyazt i lmend n yisdawanen yeqqaren deg yigezda yemgaraden yellan deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu. D timsizzelt ideg ara d-ufranen 3 n yimedyazen isdawanen n tesdawit-agi. Ajerred yettili-d akka tura deg Ddaw-tanmehla (sous-dirertion) leqdicat ussnanen d yidelsanen akked yinaddalen n tesdawit, syin ad yili ufran n yisefra n yal agezdu sɣur unesɣammu (jury), syin akkin ad tili temsizzelt taneggarut ass n 19 maggu 2018, i lmend n wass aɣelnaw n usdawan. Wid yebɣan ad ttekkin deg temsizzelt-agi, ilaq ad jerden iman-nsen, yerna ad mudden sin n yisefra-nsen, d widak ara d-inin ass-nni n temsizwert taneggarut, ara d-yilin deg tzeqqa n yisaragen n tesdawit n Hasnaoua1. Am wakken daɣen ara d-tili temsizwert n ccna, i lfayda n yisdawanen iḥemmlen aẓawan. Yebda ujerred deg-s seg 15 unbir 2017 ad yeddu alamma d ass n 15 duǧamber 2017, deg Ddaw-tanmehla (sous-dirertion) leqdicat ussnanen d yidelsanen akked yinaddalen n tesdawit. Yal tasdawit, ad tefk sin n yisdawen-is ara yettekkin deg temsizzelt taɣelnawt n taggara ara d-yilin ass n 19 maggu 2017.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Deg tdiwennit-a, yemmeslay-d Laceb Djamel ɣef ungal-is Nna Ɣni akked waṭas n temsal i icudden ɣer tira. 

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen : Deg tazwara, iḥulfan-ik ɣef warraz-agi i yewwi ungal-ik ‘’Nna Ɣni’’… 
  Laceb Djamel : S tumert tameqṛant i sliɣ s waraz-agi i as-yettunefken i wungal « Nna Ɣni ». Tanemmirt i yiɛeggalen n teseqqamutt n uktazal i t-yeɣṛan, iwumi yeɛǧeb armi i as-fkan azal am wa ! seg tama-nniḍen, umreɣ ugar imi d arraz « Assia Djebbar », acku tadmut n tsekla-agi yella wacu i t-yesddukklen nettat d « Nna Ɣni », ayen iwumi neqqar annar n uzbay n tlawin mgal tatut, d unnar n tsekla n tlawin. Tura Assia Djebbar aṭas ɣef maḥyaf tedder tmeṭṭut, tura deg udlis-ines « Loin de Médine » ɣef lḥif-agi s yiwet n tebɣest d yiwet n tḥerci urǧin ttwalaɣ deg unnar n tsekla. Tenna-d deg-s ayen ur yezmir ad d-yini umeɣnas wala aserdas, yernu s tiẓeṭ n umeslay. 

 Yella wanda i d as-terna ula d anecṛeḥ. Nnig waya, Assia Djebbar yeẓran iman-is d tamaziɣt, tettmeslay yal mi ara d as-tettunefk tegnit ɣef wayen iwumi teqqar « Talaba n Nessus » i d-yekkan deg umyiten n At Uɣriq (Igrikiyen), anda Nesssus idel talaba s tidet teṣṣer-it. Tekkes fell-as asemmiḍ, maca tetett seg uksum-ik. Ayagi, tga-as aserwes Assia Djebbar i wayen i d-iḍerrun d ugdud Amaziɣ yessexdamen tutlayin tijenṭaḍin akken i as-fkant tagnit ad yemmeslay, ad yelmed, ad yini i t-iqerḥen, ad yeǧǧ tamussni-s i talsa, maca seg yidis-nniḍen, tutlayin yessemras tettent seg tutlayt-is. Anect-a, d ugar yetteɛeddi-d di tedmi-iw yal mi sliɣ i yisem n Assia Djebbar, ayagi icudd d usental alqayan i yellan deg ungal « Nna Ɣni ».

  Am wakken i t-id-tenniḍ yakan, yella-d wungal-agi d tajmilt dɣa i Nna Ɣni. Acuɣer ? D acu-t yisem-agi ?  
  D isem n uletma-s n Yaya ! isem-is « Ɣnima » ! D tameṭṭut i ittekkan aṭas deg usegmi-inu. D nettat uɣur reggleɣ mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ asmi i d-yurǧa kra umerret, tettḥuddu-yi, teffreɣ deg yijufar-is. Di leɛnaya-s, urǧin i d i yi-yewwiḍ lhem. Tḥemmel-iyi aṭas, yezga ufus yemmeɣ s iciwi-s akken ad d-teddem tikkelt d aẓidan, tikkelt d affayan, tikkelt ttafergust neɣ tissemlelt …Temmut d tamengurt. Send ad taweḍ ɣer wanda ara naweḍ, ṛeggmeɣ-as ad d-rreɣ isem-is. Maca asmi gziɣ d acu i d anamek d tanilla n yisem-a Ɣanima s tutlayt taɛrabt, ggumaɣ ad t-fkeɣ i yelli. Ɣanima = taklit i d-yegmer umǧahed seg unnar n ṭrad ! Rriɣ-d isem-is s tsekla imi ula d ungal yettusemma am uɛeggal deg uxxam n umaru.

  Tcebbaḍ lehlak n Nna Ɣni ɣer Teqbaylit. Awal-ik ɣef wanect-a… 
  Nnana tella tulwa aṭṭan n « Tibehbit » ayen iwumi nessawal ass-a « Alzheimer » ! Tessaweḍ-itt tatut armi tettu ula d isem-iw d yisem n ultma-s. Tettu irkel ayen yezrin, maca ayen lqayen d aweẓɣi ad yeffeɣ aqerruy-is. Urǧin tettu asefru n Ccix Muḥand U Lḥusin, neɣ ayen tessen seg wayen i d-yeǧǧa Si Muḥ U Mḥand. Inzan, umyiten, timucuha armi d taggara-s, mazal ttazalen ɣef yiles-is. Aṭṭan n « Alzheimer » yewɛeṛ mačči d kra, itekkes i umdan talsa-s, yezmer ad yerr bab-is am uɣersiw asmi ara izad, maca ɣur « Nna Ɣni » ula asmi izad deg-s waṭṭan, teqqim talsa-s deg wawal-is, yeqqim sser-is. 

  Deg wungal-a, tettawiḍ terraḍ gar zik akked tura. Acu d iswi n waya ? 
  Mačči ḥala gar zik d tura, imi yella deg-s ula d urmir , yernu s waṭas. D ungal yettmeslayen daɣen ɣef wakud. Ɛarḍeɣ ad d-awiɣ degs kra n tektufin timaynutin deg tsekla taqbaylit yewwin anzi seg unamek n tudert. Yella useqsi ayɣer nella ? I wacu annect-a ? Amek i tebda ddunit ? amek ara tenger ? …

  Terriḍ ddehn-ik ula ɣer tama n umawal (asekfel n kra n wawalen). Amek i d-tufiḍ iman-ik deg unnar-a ?  
  Imi isental yellan deg wungal n « Nna Ɣni » d amaynut ur yeshil ara, ad temmeslayeḍ fell-asen ay amdan s yimeslayen n yal ass. Ad tafeḍ iman-ik temɣeḍ ɣer yisegzawalen d yimawalen neɣ ad tɛeṛḍeḍ ad tmuddeḍ inumak d tnilliwin timaynutin i kra n yimeslayen iqburen. D yiwen seg yiswiyen igejdanen n wungal-a : tarussi n kra n yismawen ɣef kra n tikta …

  Kečč yettarun s tutlayin-nniḍen, amek i tettafeḍ iman-ik s teqbaylit ? 
  Akken qqaren icawraren : d Awezzeɛɛɛ ! Yal ṭɛam s lbenna-s, yal tutlayt s ccbaḥa-s ! Ma d taqbaylit « treq am tirgit » imeslayen-is, ttemlehwajen am yitran deg wallen n wid yeqqaren, acku akken yebɣu yili tesneḍ tutlayin-nniḍen « Tiɣri nesla mi nteṭṭeḍ » tesɛa deg umezuɣ aẓawan asufan ! Aya icudd ɣer Fsix (psychologie )n umdan, d wayen yedder di temẓi-s, assa-a ideg imussnayen ttmeslayen ɣef later i d-yettaǧaga wayen iwumi yesla llufan di tadist n yemma-s amek ara nerr deg yidis ayen yesla mi iteṭṭeḍ ? 

  Awal ɣef tsekla taqbaylit neɣ tamaziɣt s umata, akka tura… 
  Seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ, ad d-yennulfu umaynut. D anerni d temɣer i tsekla tamaziɣt. Da tasuqilt, da ungalen, da ammud n yisefra… Aya, d ayen yessefraḥen d ayen swayes ara tenfali ugar imi a-tt-aya ad d-tleḥḥu tsuta yeɣran deg uɣerbaz tamaziɣt. Tura i d-teldi allen-is ɣer tɣuri n yidlisen d tira n wiyaḍ, dɣa ad as-afen lbenna, imir ad inezzeh win xaqqen ! 

  Mebla ccekk, llan kra n yisenfaren imaynuten ?  
  Akken i as-yenna Muḥya : … Ad d-nernu, ad d-nernu ! Awi-d kan ad tili tezmert. Aṭas i yellan deg tirga, wiyaḍ d asirem. Yella wayen yellan, akken kan i d-yennunet ! Ur bɣiɣ ara ad fkeɣ lebɣi i tubdist n shala, ssarameɣ ad yili ciṭ umaynut deg inurar imaynuten akken ur nettɣimi yara ad nettgani taccuyt deg yewwa uɛaẓẓi … ayen ilhan yettebba s taqa n yesɣaren imir t ṭaṛ lmerqa. 

  Awal-ik n taggara… 
  Tanemmirt i tezrigin « IMTIDAD » ɣef uqqeru-nsent Mass Firas d umeddakkel-ines Hamid Bilek i yi-d-yefkan afud armi i d-suffɣeɣ idlisen-iw. Tanemmirt i yimeddukkal-iw n yal ass Muḥdu Remḍan Abdenbi, d Salem Usalas d Seddik Iɛazugen, d Abdennur Haǧ Saɛid . Tanemmirt i yiɛeggalen Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa ɣef uqerru-nsen Mass Assad d yiɛeggalen n Teseqqamut n uktazal n warraz « Assia Djebbar » i yimeɣriyen-iw s umata d imeɣriyen n wungal amaziɣ imi s yis-sen ara yidir umeslay amaziɣ d tsekla tamaziɣt.

  Yesteqsa-t Hocine Moula 

  
 Ass-nni n arim, 10 deg duǧember 2018, i iɛedda 20 d aseggas seg wasmi i aɣ-yeǧǧa wudem n ccna zeddigen d wawal iweznen, anaẓur Kamal Mesɛudi. Ilul Kamal ass n, 30 deg yennayer 1961, deg Buzerriɛa, ifureq tudert aseggas n 1998 deg yiwen n wass berriken s ubaxix i as-d-yeḍran deg ubrid. Ḥeznen akk wid i t-iḥemmlen d wid yesmeḥsisen i ccna azedgan. Ass-nni, yexdem yiwet n tesgilt n tiliẓri srid, mi yekfa, yeḍra wayen yeḍran deg yiwen n ubrid n tmaneɣt, tḥewweṣ-it lmut, iɣab i lebda bab n tezlit “Ccemɛa”. Tadra n Kamal Mesɛudi seg tmurt n Leqbayel, u ɣas akken ur tt-ihedder ara akken i ilaq, maca yecna tizlit n Slimane Azem “lweqt aɣeddar”, seg-s i as-yerra tajmilt. Yella yettheggi ad yecnu s teqbaylit, ɛla ḥsab n umeddakel-is anaẓur Ḥasen Aḥres, maca lmut tuker-it akken meẓẓi, 37 n ssna kan di leɛmer-is. Talwit fell-as. 

  K. A. 

  
 Ɣef wakken i d-wwin ssrabes n yisallen n rradyu tis 3, s yisem n yikewwacen n tmurt, tetteddu ad ternu ssuma n tbagiṭ deg yimalasen i d-iteddun. Ssebba n waya, ɣef wawal n wid ixeddmen deg taɣult, d lexsas n lfayda i d-mlalen taggara-a deg ṭṭjara-nsen. Nnan-d, xesren s tidet deg ulzuz s ssuma n 10 n yidinaren, i xedmen akka tura i yiwet n tɛekkazt (tabagiṭ). Imi yelha ad d-nerr awellih belli di Lezzayer tamaneɣt, llan yakan wid yessulin ssuma n tbagiṭ ɣer 15 n yidinaren. D acu kan, yugi-asen unabaḍ (lḥukuma) rray-a, rnu ɣer-s a-t-an iger kra seg-sen di ccraɛ. Aredmani, ma yeḍra-d terna di ssuma tbagiṭ, d ayen ara d-yawin ugar n unezgum d uttḥeyyer i umsaɣ, abeɛda tacriḥt n yiẓawaliyen, i yeccektayen yakan seg teɣlayt n tudert. Imi ar tura, ssuma n yisufar igejdanen n wučči, am uyefki, ssker d lxebz, mačči d wid iseɛden taxriṭ n waṭas n medden. Anef ɛad ma tettwasemres deg wannar tmernit-a deg ssuma n lxebz, deg wakuden i d-iteddun. « Ama terna ssuma n lxebz ɣer sdat neɣ uhu, ilaq ad tali tjernant taddayt n uxeddam akken ad yizmir ad iqabel tamɛict. Nṭerren ayendin tuget n yiɣermanen seg yir addad-nsen adamsan n temɛict-a ». I d-yenna yiwen n ubaba. Ɣef leḥsab n teɣbalut-nneɣ, ur yettqil uɣlif timernit-a di ssuma. Ulamma yergem i yixebbazen ad asen-d-yaf tifrat akken-nniḍen.

  K. M. 

  
 Am yal tikkelt, yettencad-d Ugraw n yimedyazen n lwilaya n Bgayet imedyazen i wakken ad xedmen taɣuri neɣ timenna n yisefra-nsen s ssut-nsen. Dɣa inebgi n ddurt-agi, ad yili d amedyaz aqbayli mucaɛen deg unnar n tmedyazt akked tira, wagi d Mass Ahcene Mariche. Ad yili ttiɛad-agi ass n lexmis-agi sdat-nneɣ, 15 furar 2018, deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n Uxxam n yidles n lwilaya n Bgayet, seg 14h00 n tmeddit d asawen. Ad ifares deg-s tagnit Mass Mariche, i wakken ad yemlil d wid i t-iḥemmlen neɣ wid iḥemmlen tamedyazt-is zeddigen aṭas, am wakken daɣen ara yeɛreḍ i wakken ad d-yawi ayen din n yisefra s yisental yemgaraden u d-yili uskasi ɣef tmedyazt-is sɣur wid iran awal aẓidan. Ihi ilit akk di ttiɛad ass n lexmis.

  Gh. Amazigh 

  
 Akken amdan ad iẓer belli ur d-yettas kra mebla laεtab. Qqarren yiwen ufellaḥ, yekker-d ṣṣbeḥ, yenṭeq ɣer temγart-is: “A tameṭṭut ayγer akka ur d-ukin ara warrac, a-t-an qrib d azal ? 
  Tamγart: «Ugin ad d-kkren εyiγ deg-sen». 
  Yekker umγar, iruḥ ad ten-id-yessaki, nnan-as: “ass-agi, neεya, γur-neγ lḥeq ad nesteεfu”.
  -S tidet, γur-wen lḥeq, maca ccγel d netta i aγ-iḥekkmen, ilaq ad nfaṛes ussan n ṣṣḥu. Ass-agi, nenna-d d asteεfu. 
 Akka ? 
 Akka. 
  Iruḥ umγar, yenṭeq γer temγart-is: “Ass-agi a tameṭṭut, γur-m anida I d-tettheggiḍ imekli neγ imensi”. 
  Yelḥeq-d lweqt n yimekli, usan-d warraw-is ad fetṛen, ufan-d ulac. Neṭqen γer yemma-tsen: “Ayγer akka a yemma ulac imekli ?” 
  Yemma-tsen: “Yugi baba-twen”. 
  Ruḥen γur-s: “A baba, acimi akka tḥebseḍ yemma-tneγ γef imekli ?” 
  Amγar: “Nnaγ ass-a d ass n usteεfu ?” 
  Ihi kullec ad yesteεfu. Tamγart, ad testeεfu, tislit kif-kif. Tuggi neγ tacuyt, teεya deg usewwi, ad testeεfu, lkanun kif-kif, ad yesteεfu.

  Yahia Yanes 

  
 I lmend n tigawin i d-yettilin i lfayda n twennaḍt d ugama, heggan-d yiḥewwasen n Yiwaquren tadwilt n wuẓẓu n lqidar n 4 000 n tmeɣrusin n yidgel deg udrar aɛlayan n Yiwaquren. Ɣef teɣzi n kraḍ n wussan, seg umhad 24 tuber armi d sem 26, kkren-as yiwiziwen i warmud-a n usnerni n teẓgi d useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt . Ad d-nesmekti d akken yella deg wahil ula d lembat deg wuḍan deg wadeg iwumi qqaren « Timducin », i yeɛlayen azal 1 300 n yimitren ɣef yilel. Dɣa, seld afḍar ass n lexmis tanezzayt, ɛeddan yimekkiyen i wuẓẓu n uḥric amezwaru n ttjur n yidgel, send ad heggin i yimensi deg udrar. 

 Azekka-nni daɣen, tella-d tedwilt n wuẓẓu, deg uḥric-is wis sin, armi d mettwal 16:00 n tmeddit, syinna uɣalent trebbuyaɛ i wadeg n tɣimit d uraǧu n yimensi, d ɛawaz ɣur kra. Deg wass aneggaru n wahil-a, sed 26 tuber, kemmlen yimheggiyen d yimekkiyen i wuẓẓu n wayen i d-yeqqimen d ttjur i uzraɛ deg yigḍa n wakal. Ayen yerzan tignatin n usteɛfu, ddeqs i d-heggan yilemẓiyen deg yiqiḍunen i sbedden di lexla, imi ula d aɛeẓẓer ɛeggnen-d si tazwara yiḥewwasen n Yiwaquren belli yezmer ad iḍul armi d tazeggant n yiḍ.

 Ula d ttawil n uḥbas n tkeryas, ufan wid akk yusan i din aparking anda ara ires ukerrus-nsen. «Yelha ccɣel-a i d-yekkan sɣur yilemẓiyen n Iwaquren. Ilaq ad d-ttheggint tddukkliwin n twennaḍt tigawin am ti, seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ », i d-yenna yiwen n urgaz i yesseḥbibiren ɣef twennaḍt.

  M. K. 

  
 Ala 9 n wussan i d aɣ-iferqen ɣef ukayad aneggaru n taggara n useggas aɣurbiz 2017-2018. D akayad i ttraǧun yisnawiyen s ccuq. Wa ixaq melmi ara iɛeddi, wa yeqqar : “Yewweḍ-d yakkan”, wayeḍ, wayeḍ… Ass n larebɛa-nniḍen ara yebdu ukayad-agi n BAC, ad yeddu ɣef teɣzi n 5 wussan, ad yekfu ass n 25 yunyu-agi ideg nella. Ma d ass n lǧemɛa 22 yunyu, ad d-yili d ass n usteɛfu. mMa d ssebt ad sɛeddin deg-s ulamma d taggara n ddurt. Uṭṭun n yimsizwiren yetturaǧun ad sɛeddin akayad-a n taggara n tesnawit, yewweḍ aseggas-agi ɣer 709.000 n yinelmaden deg 48 n lwilayt n tmurt. Deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, tebda tenmehla n usegmi aheggi n ttawilat iwulmen i wakken ad tɛeddi tezrigt n useggas-agi deg tegnatin igerrzen. Dɣa deg wayen yerzan uṭṭunen n ukayad-agi n taggara n uswir n tesnawit BAC, ara d-yilin gar 20 ar 25 deg waggur n yunyu, yetturaǧu ad t-sɛeddin wazal n 19 019 n yisnawiyen, gar-asen 8 164 d arrac ma d 10 855 d tullas. Ad xedmen akyad-agi deg 70 n wulmisen n yikayaden. Uṭṭunen-agi, ṣṣuben cwiṭ ɣef useggas iɛeddan s wazal n 10,17%, imi ilindi azal 20 955 i t-isɛeddan. Ilaq ad d-nini belli wigi ijerden iman-nsen ɣer ukayad n BAC, llan deg-sen 12 918 d inelmaden iɣurbizen (yeqqaren deg tesnawit), llan wazal n 6 101 n yinelmaden imunan. Ma d ikayaden n waddal, yuɣ lḥal sεeddan-ten yinelmaden deg tesnawiyin-nsen am useggas iεeddan. Ma ɣef wayen yerzan, afran n yisental, tenna-d Massa Benghabrit deg wussan iɛeddan: ‘’Ula d aseggas-agi sin n yisental ara yilin s lxetyar, akud daɣen uzzig n yal tanga ad yeqqim akken yella’. Ma d igemmaḍ ineggura n ukayad-agi, ad d-ilin deg waggur n yulyu i d-iteddun.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Ass-agi n letnayen 25 yunyu 2018 i wwḍen 20 n yiseggasen ɣef wasmi yettwanɣa s leɣder ucennay Matoub Lounes, s yifassen yiɛdawen n tudert akken i d asen-isemma deg yiwen gar yisefra-s. Yettwanɣa ass n 25 yunyu 1998 deg Tala Bounan di Beni Douala. Ulamma ɛeddan tura ɛecrin n yiseggasen ɣef tmettant-is, maca mazal ṣṣut-is yettbeɛziq, mazal-t yezdeɣ ulawen d wallaɣen n yimaziɣen anda ma llan deg umaḍal. Dɣa i lmend n usmekti-agi wis 20 ɣef tmenɣiwt-is, yella-d wahil d amerkatni ɣef teɣzi n ssin-agi wussan iɛeddan, ad ikemmel ass-agi alamma d lewhi n 00h00 n yiḍ. Sendiḍelli n ssebt 23 yunyu 2018, deg Uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine n Tizi Uzzu, tella-d turart n yiwet tmezgunt taẓawant, yewwin azwel-agi “Ccna i tmagit” neɣ s tefransist “Hymne à l’identité” n temsuffeɣt Lynda Hantour, i texdem d tajmilt i Matoub Lounes akked wid iruḥen d asfel deg umennuɣ ɣef tumast tamaziɣt. Ma d iḍelli n lḥed 24 yunyu 2018, yella-d i uheggi n yimukan n temsikniyin akked useqɛed n wallalen ara yiḥwiǧen deg tmeɣra n wass-a. I wass-agi n letnayen 25 yunyu 2018, ṣṣbeḥ-agi ɣef 08h00, tella-d tulya umḍiq-agi ideg ara d-yili usmekti-agi, yella-d diɣ uqabel n yinebgawen n lḥerma i d-yerzan. Ma ɣef 10h00, ad tili tazla ɣezzifen s ssenf n “Marathon”, yewwin asentel-agi “Abrid n tudert”, ara d-yilin seg umḍiq anda yettwanɣa di Tala Bounan alammi d Taourirt Moussa. Syin ɣur-s ɣef 13h00, ad d-yili ibeddi deg umkan anda yettwanɣa di Tala Bounan. Ma ɣef 14h00, ad d-yili ibeddi-nniḍen ɣef uẓekka-s deg Taourirt Moussa, ad yili diɣ usersi n waṭas n tmeqqunin n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka-s. Tin ɣur-s, ɣef 17h00, ad tili tmeɣra n ccna iwumi semman “Icennayen imeqqranen icennun Matoub”, gar-asen: Ahcene Ahres, Boudjmaa Agraw, Hocine Berhma, Hamid Matoub(…). Am wakken daɣen ara d-yili uttekki n yicennayen ilmeẓyen i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt “Anza Lounes”. Ɣef 19h00 n tmeddit, ad d-tili lweɛda i wid ara yerzun ɣer din. Ma deg yiḍ, ɣef 20h00, yetturaǧu ad d-ilint tnagiyin n yimawlan-is d yimeddukkal-is. Syin akkin yetturaǧu ad d-tili usenɛet tmeɣra “Le Zenith de Kabylie” s wudem atrar, ideg zemren ad walin wid iḥemmlen Matoub sdat-sen am wakken i tt-yexdem deg useggas n 1995”. Ma ɣef 23h00 n yiḍ, yetturaǧu ad tili tesfugla n taggara s tukci n warrazen d yigerdasen. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, leqdic-agi adelsan tsuddes-it tesbeddit Lounes Matoub s tallelt n waṭas n yidisan-nniḍen, gar-asen tiddukkliwin tidelsanin n tama-agi, isquma n 4 tɣiwanin n Beni Douala, Asqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu…atg. Ma d asentel n usmetkti-agi, yella-d akka: “Xellseɣ adrar s yidammen-iw, ad yeqqim later-iw, xas gullen ar d t-sefḍen”, i d-yettwakksen si yiwen gar uɛerqub yeṣfan n yisefra i yekseb.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Deg wussan yezrin, i d-bannen yigemmaḍ n ukayad n taggara n uswir n alemmas (BEM) n useggas aɣurbiz 2017-2018. Ɛlaḥsab n tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, azal n 14698 i yejerden iman-nsen deg umuɣen (les listes) n usεeddi n ukayad-a, gar-asen 6850 d arrac akked 7848 d tullas. Lqidar n wid i t-yewwin, yewweḍ aseggas-a ɣer 77, 71%, s wakka i d-tḥella amkan amezwaru deg umyezwar deg wakal aɣelnaw. Leḥsab-agi, yuli s wazal n 10% ɣef useggas iɛeddan, imi ilindi leḥsab yewweḍ ɣer 76, 02 %. Ma D tikkelt tis mrawet d yiwen, ideg ara d-tufrar Tizi Uzzu deg ukayad-agi, ula d win n taggara n uɣerbaz amenzu (5e) d nettat i d tamezwarut. Ma nsedda-d wid iɛeddan ɣer useggas amezwaru n tesnawit s tezmilt n useggas d tin n ukayad-agi, yewweḍ leḥsab ɣer 79,35 %. Ugar n 164 n yiɣerbazen i d-yewwin agemmuḍ yufraren ɣef winna n ugemmuḍ aɣelnaw i yewwḍen ala 56,88 %. Am wakken daɣen i d-wwin 5 n yinelmaden akayad-agi s tezmilt yufraren ɣef 19/20, rnu daɣen 80 n yinelmaden-nniḍen wwin-d ugar n 18/20. Ugar diɣ 426 n yinelmaden wwin-t-id s tenqiḍt yugaren 17/20, ma d 996 wwin-t-id s tezmilt yufraren ɣef 16/20. Ma d wid i d-yeqqimen, wwin-t-id gar 10 alamma d 15/20. Ad nsemekt kan belli, leḥsab n wid i d-yewwin akayad n 5e, yelḥaq ɣer 16642, s lqidar n 98, 07%, ma yella s wid iɛeddan s usuffeɣ (passage) yewweḍ ɣer 99,45%. Ma d leḥsab n wid ur t-d-newwi ara yewweḍ ɣer 327 n yinelmaden. Ma deg wayen yerzan igemmaḍ n ukayad n BAC, tenna-d tneɣlaft n usegmi aɣelnaw massa Nuriya Benɣebriṭ, belli ad bannen ass 22 yulyu 2018.

  Amyezwar n 10 n lwilayt   timezwura deg ukayad-a 

 Iberḥ-d tineggura-agi, ddiwan aɣelnaw n yikayaden d temzizliyin (ONEC) s 10 n lwilayat i d-iḥellan imeḍqan imenza n umyezwar deg ukayad n taggara n uswir wis sin (BEM). Asseggas-a, yewweḍ liqdar n wid i t-id-yewwin di 48 n lwilayat n tmurt ɣer 56,88%. D lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i yeṭṭfen taqacuct n umḥezwar s lqidar n 88,71%, ma d Sṭif deg umḍiq wis sin s wazal n 85,00%. Ma d amkan wis tlata tewwi-t lwilaya n Mɛeskar s lqidar n 84,99%, deg umḍiq wis rebɛa ad naf Ssuq Hras s wazal n 81,89%. Tipaza deg umḍiq wis xemsa s wazal n 81,79%, deffir-s kan deg umkan wis seta, lwilaya n Bgayet s lqidar n 81,76%. Amḍiq wis sebɛa ḥella-t-id Ǧiǧel s lqidar n 81,40%, ma d Qsenṭina s wazal n 80,51% deg umkan wis tmanya. Amkan wis tesɛa yuɣal i Annaba s lqidar n 80,14%, ma Ɛin Timucent deg umḍiq wis mraw s 79,15%.

  A. A 

  
 Uqbel tamendawt n furar 1989, ala tameslayt n taɛrabt akked tefrensist i yettwaseqdacen deg tɣamsa deg tmurt n Lezzayer, s wudem unsib.

 Xas ulamma tettwagdel tɣamsa s tmaziɣt (taqbaylit), acu kan llan kra n yiɣmisen neɣ n tesɣunin i d-itteffɣen s tuffra. Deg 1967, yessuffeɣ-d Ugraw n Yimaziɣen yiwet n tenfult (bulletin) s tfinaɣ. Syin, teffeɣ-d tesɣunt Taftilt deg useggas 1973 sɣur inelmaden n tmaziɣt n Mulud Mɛemmeri deg tesdawit n Lezzayer. Deg useggas-agi dɣa, i d-tlul tesɣunt Iṭij. Aseggas n 1974, yessuffeɣ-d Ugraw n tezrawin n tmaziɣt tanfult ɣef tsekla tamaziɣt akked tesɣunt Tisuraf. Mebɛed Tafsut n Yimaziɣen, yexleq-d Uzday n umussu amaziɣ tasɣunt Tilelli. Deg 1981, yeslal-d Uzday-agi tasɣunt Tafsut s snat n tmeslayin : taqbaylit/tafrensist. Deg tɣamsa tuffirt (1967-1980), zyada ɣef wayen i d-nebder, ad naf, tisɣunin Afud n Yixeddamen deg Fransa, Awal, Taneflit, Tamurt, Tiddukkla, Ildi, Tagrawla, Taɣerma, Tamaziɣt…atg. Akken ma llant tesɣunin-agi, ur dumment ara aṭas. Amur ameqqran deg-sent, ssuffɣent-d ma aṭas sin ar tlata wuṭṭunen. Seg useggas n 1989 d tasawent, xelqen-d yikubar RCD akked FFS sin yiɣmisen, Asalu d Amaynut. Yal yiwen s uɣmis-is. Syin akin, yessuffeɣ-d Ugraw adelsan amaziɣ aɣmis Izen Amaziɣ deg Tizi Uzzu. Yella-d, diɣ, uɣmis Idles n tddukkla tadelsant Tilelli n Goulmina. Am wakken i d-tessizreg tddukkla n Numidya n Wehran aɣmis Azul. Syin d Agraw ussnan n ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles n Tizi Uzzu, i d-yessuffɣen aɣmis Tira. Ula d tiddukkla Youcef Oukaci, tessuffeɣ-d Aɣmis amezwaru Tafuɣalt deg useggas n 1988. Ma d iɣmisen s snat n tutlayin, ad naf, Tamurt, Azul, Iles Amaziɣ, The Amaziɣ Voice, Tasɣunt uselmad, Tagmatt, Tigemmi, Imaziɣen ass-a, ABC Amazigh, Tidmi tamirant, Alger républicain (azgen n usebtar, kra n wagguren kan), El-Djazair El-Yum (ciṭ n teqbaylit s yisekkilen n taɛrabt, deg usebter aneggaru. 1991-1994), Asafu, Anadi, Timmuzɣa. Syin, yerna-d l’Hebdo n tmurt. Ma seg useggas n 2009 ar tura, ttilin 4 n yisebtar s tmaziɣt yal letnayen seg uɣmis La Dépêche de Kabylie s yisem Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen. D Aɣmis i idummen ugar n wiyaḍ imi amur ameqqran deg yiɣmisen ur ssawḍen ara ad ṭṭfen sin yiseggasen. Yella, diɣ, niqal Tiɣremt n uɣmis La Cité. Aya, s umata seg tama n tɣamsa yettwarun s tmaziɣt deg lkaɣeḍ. 

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Ass-nni n letnayen 22-10-2018 tameddit n wass, i yettwafraq warraz n uselway n tegduda i uneɣmas asaduran deg tezigt-is tis rebɛa, i lmend n usmekti s wass aɣelnaw n uneɣmas. Tadwilt tis 4 n warraz uselway n Tegduda n uneɣmas asaduran, i d-yettwasuddsen ddaw usentel « Tudert yezdin di talwit », yella-d ufraq-ines deg Lezzayer tamaneɣt. Mraw d sin (12) n yineɣmasen iqeddcen deg taggayin yemgaraden n tɣamsa. Azal n 286 n yimsizzewren i ittekkan deg temsizzelt-agi taɣelnawt, maca ala 12 deg-sen i d-yufraren. Arraz amezwaru n taggayt n tiliẓri, yettunefk i tneɣmast n Naima Manhour, ma d arraz wis sin tewwi-t Kahina Acherchour, ma d wis tlata yuɣal i tneɣmast Souhila Hrayria i ixeddem i tlata yidsent ɣer yiwet n tiliẓri tuzzigt. Arraz amenzu n taggayt n tɣamsa yuran, iṣṣaḥ-d taneɣmast Nour El Houda Taibi n uɣmis “Ennasr”, ma d wis sin iḥella-t-id uneɣmas Cherif Abdedaim n uɣmis “La Nouvelle République”, ma d arraz wis tlata d ucrik gar snat-agi n tneɣmasin: Lydia Ait Akli akked Aiza Mahdid. Ma deg wayen yerzan, taggayt n tɣamsa n rradyu, d Nawel Arar i d-yufraren s warraz amenzu, i xeddmen deg rradyu tamezwarut, arraz wis sin yuɣal i uneɣmas n rradyu El Bahdja Kamel Mhidi, ma arraz wis kraḍ yewwi-t uneɣmas Salem Kheloui n rradyu n Tizi Uzzu. Ma deg wayen yeɛnan arrazen n tɣamsa taliktrunit, ala arraz wis sin i yettwaferqen i Lounès Guermoul, ma d arraz amenzu d wis tlata ur ttwaferqen ara. Arraz n tugna igerzen, yettunefk i uwellaf Ilyes Hebache El Watan, ma d arraz n teseqqamut n ufran yettunefk i Baami Mohamed n rradyu n Tamanarasset. Am wakken daɣen i ttwaferqent 14 n cciɛat n wakaz (reconnaissance) d yiseɣ i 14 n yineɣmasen yettwassnen deg taggayin yemgaraden n tɣamsa. D aneɣlaf n teywalt Mass Djamel Kaouane, i yellan d aselway n tesfugla-agi, ɣer tama n ddeqs n yimḍebbren imeqqranen n tmurt. Yenna: “Tamurt n Lezzayer, tesseǧhed agni uɣdiman iwatan akked usishel i uneɣmas ad yexdem tawuri-ines n uselɣu akken iwata. S wawal-nniḍen, ad yili wugar n ugerrez n tegnatin ideg xeddmen yineɣmasen izzayriyen sya ɣer sdat”.

  Ali Zalouk  

  
 Yella umaru-ameɣnas Allas Di Tlelli, ass n 5 tuber yezrin, ɣef 14 :00, d inebgi n temlilit taseklant i d-tettheyyi tddukkla Azday n Uweqqas deg unammas adelsan Reḥmani Sliman. 

 S uzwel n « Taqbaylit: d acu-ten yiberdan akkin i tezɣint n Lezzayer? », yewwi-d awal ɣef tekliwin tiɣerfanin i d-yettilin yal sem i yettwali beɛdent akken ad asent-nsemmi « tagrawla ». 

 « Ɣur-i nekk d tasmessit meqqren kan, imi ulac deg-s tigejda n umussu asertan neɣ dɣa n tegrawla, am wayen icban udem neɣ takza, taɣessa, arkawalen yettwarun, taferkit n ubrid iccuden, iswan usdiden (…) », i d-yenna. Yerna yenna-d ɣef waya d akken, « d aya merra i yeǧǧan 33 n tikliwin i d-yellan yal ass n sem, d tid ur d-newwi kra d tarennawt i umennuɣ ɣef tugdut n tilawt imi teqqim-d kan di ccnawi s taεrabt ula di tmurt taqbaylit ».

 Ɣur Mass Allas Di Tlelli, « yewwi-d ad d-yili umeslay ɣef timsal tigejdanin icudden ɣer usenfaṛ n tmetti ara yettwasbedden deg umḍiq n udabu, ma yella yeɣli, am wayen yecban taggara n usεuṛṛeb n uɣerbaz d tedbelt, talakt d tlelliyin akken ma llant », i iwala. 

 Gar cwiṭ d waṭas, yebder-d daɣen umsarag taluft n ubrid iwulmen n umennuɣ d wamek ilaq ad d-yelmed yal yiwen seg temsirin Ɛimac Ɛmer, Bennay Wali, Masin Uharun, Agraw n Yimaziɣen, tanekra n Tefsut n 1980, atg. 

 Ugar n waya, yettwawi-d wawal ula ɣef taluft n yisluguten i yettwaddamen da d din, d yinumak yemgaraden i d-ttakken gar Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen d temnaḍin-nniḍen n Lezzayer, d wamek i yessefk si tura ad imuqel yal yiwen ɣef ubrid d tifrat tisertanin ara yeffɣen fell-as. 

 Seld inaw-is, yella-d uskasi akked yimeḥḍar i d-yusan s ṭṭaqa ass-nni.
