 Mbeɛd semmus (5) n wussan n uḥessen d unegzum, seg 20 ar 25 deg yunyu, ass-a ara kfun yinelmaden asɛeddi n ukayad-nsen n taggara n useggas, neɣ n BAC. D akayad agejdan, ara asen-yeldin tawwurt n unekcum ɣer tesdawit, i tezrawin tifellayin. Kra n wussan send akayad, ulamma aṭas i iheggan s tɣuri, almad d ɛawaz n wuḍan, maca aṭas daɣen i iheggan iman-nsen seg tama tapsikulujit. Imi tikwal, yettili waddad n tnefsit n yimazwaren (candidats) n yal akayad, deffir usmurres neɣ uxsar. Ɣef waya dɣa, deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, txemmem tddukkla RAJ, tigezmi n Ayt Smaɛel, i uheggi n usarag s uzwel n « Amek ad tesferkeḍ attqelleq akken ad d-tawiḍ akayad n Ubakalurya? ». Ɣas ma ur yemmug ara, ɣer taggara. Ar tura, mi mazal kan ad sɛeddin ass-a, mgaraden rryuy n yinelmaden ɣef wamek i asen-d-usan yisental. Llan wid i d-yennan fell-asen sehlen cwiṭ, abeɛda ma ihegga yiwen akken ilaq si tazwara. Am wakken llan wid i ten-iwalan weɛren, neɣ mačči akken i ten-ttraǧun. Yella-d umtawa tugart tugart ɣef tuɛert n kra n yisentel, i sɛeddan yinelmaden gar ahad d amhad yezrin. Tuget deg-sen, nnan-d belli mačči akken i ilaq ad d-asen imi, ɣef tmuɣli-nsen, win tferneḍ ur yettseɛɛid. « Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ s umata, amek i yi-d-yusa ukayad n yilindi i ufiɣ win n useggas-a ». I d-tenna yiwet n tmazwart i iɛawden i ukayad-a. Send ad d-ternu: « d acu kan, tikkelt-a heggaɣ-as ugar, rnu ur xliɛeɣ ara aṭas meskud jerrbeɣ-t yakan ». Taggara, ad d-nesmekti d akken ayen yeɛnan tiririt n yigemmaḍ n ukayaḍ-a, ad ilin ass n 22 yulyu i d-iteddun deg wadeg internet n Uxxam aɣelnaw n yikayaden d yimsizwar (ONEC).

  M. K. 

  
 Lemɛinesla d ansay aqdim, ila assaɣ d tfellaḥt. Xeddmen-t medden ass n 24 di yunyu deg uwitay n Yimaziɣen.

 Semɛinsilen medden mi tfukk tmegra akked uxeddim n lexlawi. Imir d tallit n tiwwin n yigumma (lfakya) am tbexsisin d tẓurin… Tanezzayt (ṣṣbaḥ), ad d-kkren, ad siɣen times, ad gren ɣer tmes-nni ticcicin (zbel yekkawen) i wakken ur ttafgen ara yifeṭṭiwjen. Tikwal daɣen ggaren taqeṭṭiḍt n tseṭṭa (tajeḥniḍt) n yikerri n lɛid. Times, saɣayen-tt ddaw yisekla i d-yettakken igumma am tneqlin d tfeṛṛant. ɣef wakken i d-qqaren, abbu-nni (dexxan) deg-s ddwa : yettḥarab ɣef yigumma, ur d-ɣellin ara d aɣiɣa, yernu isuffuɣ-asen ibeɛɛac ma kecmen ɣer daxel-nsen. Ttḍeggiren daɣen medden aɣebbar ɣef yifurkawen. Mi ara tttḍeggiren, qqaren-as :

  Ay aḥnin, ay ajebbar 

  A win ixelqen letmaṛ 

  Ttif aɣebbar ddekkar 

  Lɣella-inu ad tetmeṛ 

  Ayen iketben ur yeṭṭar 

 Di kra n temnaḍin, d timexḍa, deg yinurar d usuki ay saɣayen medden times mi yeɣli yiṭij. Ass n wass-a, times-agi n yinurar d usuki d aktay kan i d-yeggran deg-s. D imɣaren kan i as-id-yecfan. Qqaren belli mi tuɣ tmes-nni, ad zeggren fell-as yigerdan, ad ttreḥḥilen, ad as-qqaren :

  A lemɛinesla kkes leḥfa. 

  Qqaren daɣen : 

  Ass-agi d lemɛinesla 

  Ur aɣ-tettaɣ tawla 

  ɣef tidet ters tlaba 

  Lwil yerwel s aẓekka. 

 Deg wass n Lemɛinesla, yegdel uxeddim ɣef medden. Qqaren ur ilaq ara ad innal umdan imenda (irden…) ma ulac ad ten-yekcem uferṭeṭṭu. Tilawin, ur ilaq ara ad xedment taduṭ ma ulac ad aḍnent zzellum, ad tent-qerḥent lḥekkat-nsent (lemfaṣel). Maca, xas akken yegdel uxeddim, llant tuddar i yettfaṛasen tagnit, imi stufan yimdanen, ttagan ticemliyin (aqqedic n taddart) : ferrsen tiliwa d tmeqbar. Deg wayen iɛnan tagella (učči), ur yelli kra i d-sewwayen medden i lmend n wass n Lemɛinesla. D acu kan wid ilan azemmur d testan (lmal), sefsayen, ass-nni, udi ay jemɛen d tiwurac kra tekka tefsut. Ttaggaden medden ma yefsi wudi-nsen uqbel Lemɛinesla, ad inqedwi uyefki aṛexsas si tmaẓẓagt n tfunast-nsen. Ad teṭṭef temɣart n uxxam tiwurac n wudi, ad tent-tsefsi ɣef tmes ; dɣa seg wass-nni d asawen, yewjed wudi-nni i wučči. Yella melmi, ass-nni kan dɣa n Lemɛinesla i tetten yis-s acewwaḍ. Mi i d-yeḥder ad ččen tiremt-nsen, qqaren-as:

  Ass-a, d Lemɛinesla  

  Acewwaḍ d wudi, yella.  

  Di kra n temnaḍin, seg wakken ttarran azal meqqren i wass n Lemɛinesla, xeddmen-as timecreḍt. 

 Seg «LE RITUEL AGRAIRE» n H. GENEVOIS (s tefransist) Tasuqqilt sɣur R. ƐACUR

  
 Am yal tikkelt, deg wass n tɛacurt, tettheggi-d teseqqamut n taddart Tagemmunt Ukerruc asfugel n tɛacurt. Yettili-d usiher-a deg umekkan iwumi qqaren Iɣil Ɛisi.

 Aṭas n yimdanen i d-irezzun ɣer din i wakken ad d-ẓuren, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan kra, 40 n sellaḥ i swayes yettwassen umekkan-nni. Ma i wiyiḍ, tirza-nsen, tcudd ugar ɣer tmerrit akked tukksa n lxiq imi d ass n ustaɛfu yettwaxelsen. Akken yebɣu yili lmeqsud neɣ iswi n umdan, timililit deg Yiɣil Ɛisi deg wass n tɛacurt, d ass yemgaraden ɣef wussan-nniḍen : D ass n lferḥ akked unecreḥ ; d ass ideg tettemlili tassa d way turew imi aṭas n yimawlan i d-yettemyagaren gar-asen din ass-nni n tɛacurt. ‘’Yal aseggas, nesfugul taɛacurt akked lmulud dagi ɣur-neɣ. Ttɛedint deg tegnatin lɛali. Deg tegnatin n lferḥ, n temliliyin n yimdanen i d-yettasen seg yal tamnaḍt n tmurt n leqbayel, neɣ ɛad n tmurt n Lezzayer. Aṭas, diɣ, i d-yettuɣalen yal aseggas : Uɣalen d imezgan imi i ten-iɛeǧǧeb lḥal seg wayen iḍerrun dagi. Tella talwit, tella tukksa n lxiq, daymi i ṭṭuqtent twaculin i d-yettruḥun’’. Akka i aɣ-d-yenna Nadour M’hamed i yettmeslayen s yisem n teseqqamut n taddart Tagemmunt Ukerruc. Zyada ɣef zzyara, tella lwaɛda i wid i d-yerzan ɣer din. Yettwahegga-d seksu s uksum i qeccuc, meccuc. Lwaɛda i ssufuɣen d ’’asfel ɣef rebɛin n ssellaḥ n Yiɣil Ɛisi’’, i d-nnan. ‘’Tameɣra-agi, tettili-d d ansay u d tisirit i wakken ad tesdum aktayen-nneɣ, gar-asen tiwizi i yebdan ad neger deg tmetti taqbaylit’’, ikemmel yenna-d yimḍebber n taddart Tagemmunt Ukerruc. Xas ulamma yettili-d umgarad gar zik akked tura deg wayen yeɛnan asfugel n tɛacurt, meɛna azalen i icudden ɣer usiher-a, yeqqim d netta. Aya, ad t-naf deg temsalt-nni n unejmuɛ n yidrimen neɣ n tɣawsiwin-nniḍen iwumi qqaren Agraw. Akka, dɣa, i d-yella ass-nni n tɛacurt deg Yiɣil Ɛisi. Deg tlemmast n yiwet n texxamt, ḍewren-d d agraw ccix n lǧamaɛ akked kra n lɛeqqal n taddart, tessa-d tgertilt ɣef lqaɛa, s ufella-s amendil uɣur srusuyen ayen ttseddiqen yimdanen n yidrimen. Amur ameqqran n yibabaten ttmuddun idrimen i warraw-nsen i wakken d nutni ara ten-iseddqen. Syin, mi ssersen yigerdan ssadaqa-nsen, ad asen-d-ffken yimɣaren-nni tiḥlawatin. Acu kan, ayen yeṭṭfen lhelha-nneɣ deg Yiɣil Ɛisi d akken ulac la taqubbet neɣ aẓekka din. Mi nesteqsa, nnan-d ulac later n sellaḥ-agi dagi. Xeddmen kan asfugel dagi d tajmilt i 40 n sellaḥ n Yiɣil Ɛisi.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Abellez (bâclage) n umahil n tkebbaniyin d yiwet n temsalt yersan iman-is deg tmetti tazzayrit d tmetti taqbaylit. Aya, yerza amur ameqqran n leqdicat yemgaraden, ama d aḥric n lebni, aḥric n waman, aḥric n tfellaḥt, tikebbaniyin n lgaz d trisiti d lexdami n baylek… Yuɣal ubellez n uxeddim amzun d aṭṭan ur nḥellu lara. Iḥuza tuget n tkebbaniyin i ixeddmen isenfaren n uwanek, ulac aḥric yezgel. Yekka-d waha, deg ustehzi n srabes n wanek deg tamsalt yecban-ta, anda i d-kecment temsal-nniḍen, yecban tijɛal seqdacen yimeḍebbren n tkebbaniyin deg yisenfaren yemgaraden i wakken ad ɣelqen allen-nsen deg yir axeddim xeddment tkebbaniyin. Seld mi tewweḍ tfid s iɣes, d tiseqquma n tuddrin i d-yusan tikelt-agi mgal kra n tkebbaniyin yessemrasen abellez n uxeddim. Dɣa deg tazewara n ddurt iɛeddan, ɣelqen yiɛeggallen n teseqqamut n taddart n At Zɛim taɣiwant n Lemɛatqa i wakken ad beggnen lɣiḍ-nsen mgal abellez n uxeddim n tkebbanit i d-yelhan s uɛawed n iqadusen n waman n tissit n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa. Tessuter teseqqamut ayagi, deg yemḍebbren n Tɣiwant, ugar n useggas tura, i wakken ad rren tilas i yir lxeddma n tkebbanit n waman, imi d ayen ur iqebbel wallaɣ n umdan. Asenfar n uɛawed n yiqadusen n waman n tissit, i d-yeffɣen ugar n kraḍ (03) n yiseggasen-aya, mazal ar ass-a urɛad yessuli lecɣal-is, yezga ustehzi ɣer tkebbanit i d-yelhan s usenfar-agi. Mass T.A, Aselway n teseqqamut n taddart n At zɛim, yerkeb-it lɣiḍ meqqren seg wayen iɣer yewweḍ waddad n uselḥu n yisenfar n uwanek, d usetehzi n yimḍebbren teɛna temsalt deg uselḥu n lecɣal akken iwata lḥal. Deg wawal-is, yuɣal-d ɣef ubellez n uxeddin n tkebbanit i d-yelhan s uɛawed n iqadusen n waman n tisit, anda i d-iwekked ɣef yir axeddim n tkebbanit. Ɛezmen yiɛgallen n teseqqamut ad rren tilas i tkebbanit-agi, u ad yettuɛawed usenfar deg wussan i d-iteddun, i wakken ad yekfu lhem n yisenfaren-agi, syin ad yekfu fad ɣef yimezdaɣ, aladɣa d anebdu ara d-iteddun .

  Itri azeggaɣ azzayri   Tasqamut tadigant n Mɛatqa 

 Akken tuɣ tannumi teseqqamut tadigant n Mɛatqa n Yitri azeggaɣ azzari, s tigawin-ines n lxir, ha-tt-an la d-tethegid, akka tura, aṭas n leqdicat i lfayda n twaculin. Gar leqdicat- ines igejdanen,ad naf asuddes n temhelt n thara tamazdayt, aḍellaɛ n Remḍan i tettefraq yal tikelt ɣef twaculin yenḥafen n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa. Dɣa, i lmend n wagur n Remḍan i d-iteddun, tessuddes-d teseqqamut tadigant n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa yiwet n temhelt n thara tamazdayt i lfayda n twaculin yenḥafen n temḍiqt-agi n leqbayel. Ajared n yimeḍhar, yebda yakan seg umenzu ar 10 deg maggu deg-i nella. Aṭas n twaculin i ijerden arraw-nsent deg tmahelt-agi. Tamhelt n thara-agi, ad tili deg wass n 27 deg Remḍan. D tmlilit s wazal-is anda ara tili tmeɣra meqqren.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 I lmend n usmekti n temlilit n 20 ɣuct 1956, ihegga-d Uxxam n yidles Ali Zamoum n Tubiret, s tallelt n Umussu asddukklan n tama-a, ahil d amerkanti i d-yellan d tajmilt i Salah Sadaoui. Tebda tejmilt-agi, iḍelli n ssebt 19 ɣuct 2018, deg uɣerbaz Boubi Ali n tɣiwant n Ahnif deg tmeddit n wass. Dɣa ɣef 15h30, tella-d tulya tunṣibt n leqdic-agi, s terbaɛt n yiḍebbalen akked terbaɛt n ccḍeḥ sɣur Itran n Ali Zamoum, i ixeddmen yiwet n zzedwa igerrzen dayen kan. Syin akin, d beddu n temsikniyin yerzan imuhal d tudert n umjahed d ucennay ameqqran Salah Sadaoui. Aṭas n yimagraden n tɣamsa d tdiwenniyen yexdem i d-yettwasneɛten, ɣer tama n tudert-is d yimuhal-is akked tin n tesfifin-is…atg.Tella-d diɣ temsizzelt n usuneɣ i warrac s usentel-agi “Mi ara teddukkel tezlit akked tẓuri”. Ma d iswi n temsizwert-agi, d asebɣes n yinaẓuren n tama-agi i usnulfu d usefti deg tẓuri. Seg 17h00 n tmeddit, yella-d usarag sɣur Mass Abdelkader Bendaamache, aselway n Useqqamu aɣelnaw n tẓuriwin d tsekliwin, i d-yewwin awal ɣef tudert d yimuhal n ucennay-agi. Deffir-s kan, llant-d tnagiyin sɣur ddeqs n yicennayen yellan d imeddukkal n Salah Sadaoui, gar-asen: Kamel Hamadi, Akli Yahyaten. Ma ɣef 19h00 n yiḍ, tella-d tmeɣra n ccna meqqren, ideg i d-cnan ddeqs n yicennayen n Tubiret tizlatin n Salah Sadaoui. I wass-agi n letnayen 20 ɣuct 2018, ad ikemmel wahil deg Uxxam n yidles Ali Zamoum n Tubiret. Yebda wahil ɣef 08h00 s yiwet n temsikent meqqren yerzan tagrawla tazzayrit s umata. Ad yili usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen uqbel ad yezgen wass, ɣef uẓekka n ucennay-agi deg tmeqbert n tɣiwant n Ain Benian. Ad tili diɣ tirza ɣer usalay n umjahed n Riad El Feth i lfayda n yinaẓuren, imjuhad d warraw n ccuhada. Ma i tmeddit-a ɣef 20h00, ad tili tmeɣra n ccna swayes ara tessali tejmilt-agi n ucennay ameɣras Salah Sadaoui. Am wakken daɣen ara fken tlata warrazen i yimuhal-nni n usuneɣ i d-yellan iḍelli deg Ahnif. Yella deg wahil n tejmilt-a, asenɛet n yiwen n usaru ɣef tegrawla tazzayrit. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti d akken leqdic-agi, yessuddes-it-id Uxxam n yidles n Tubiret, s lemɛawna n Tiddukkla “Imeddukkal n Salah Sadaoui” akked Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Ahnif…atg.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Yella yiwen n urgaz, ixeddem ur yesεi deg wul-is tifenyent wala laεgez, acku yeḥsa lγella tettas-d s leεtab. Ihi, isnejmaε-d arraw-is, ihedder-asen, ineṣṣeḥ-iten i wakken ad ẓren belli lxiṛ deg ttidiren yusa-d s leεtab akked ccqa, ur illi i d-ittewwan weḥd-s, yerna afenyan yekreh-it lfaεl-is. Maca tarwa-s, zzhan di lxiṛ, tteklen γef baba-tsen, lqut deg uxxam yewjed, acimi leεtab yal ass? Segmi i ten-iwala baba-tsen, mačči d uḥdiqen, u netta d amγar, yessawel-asen, nejmaεen-d yenna-asen: « A tarwa ». Nnan-as: « Anεam”. 

 
  -Bγiγ ad aken-weṣṣiγ, ma yella mmuteγ, γurwat aql-i ffreγ yiwen ugerruj deg wakal-nneγ win ara t-yafen yawi-t. 
  -A baba mel-aγ-t ad t-id-nawi mi akka telliḍ, bḍu-aneγ-t s lḥeq. 
  -Ala, agerruj ulac win ara t-id-inadin siwa ma mmuteγ. 

  Asmi i yewweḍ wass n umγar, arraw-is uγalen γef leqrar armi yekfa, uγalen s kra n wayen ṛwan, ctaqent. Yenṭeq-d yiwen seg watmaten-nni: « Mačči, yenna-aneγ baba, ad fell-as yaεfu Rebbi, belli yeffer agerruj? Nnan-as: “S tidett”. 
  -Yyaw ad t-nqelleb. Yal yiwen neγ sin ad ṭṭfen iger alamma nufa-t, ad t-nebḍu d atmaten. 
  -Neqbel. 

  -Ddmet-d iqubac d yimegran, gellbet akal, kset aẓru alamma iban-d ugerruj yeffren, imiren yeshel beṭṭu. Ruḥen acḥal d ussan, ttin-d akk igran-nsen, armi win I ten-iwalan, iγil kerrzen s yilfan, ur d-iban wara, la agerruj la tawizet. Yenṭeq yiwen seg-sen: “Ay atma, d acu tennam? Nnan-as” “Naεteb baṭel ». 
  -Tura ay atmaten takerza i iweεren, aql-aγ nexdem-itt, yyaw meqqar ad nezreε irden, d lεib ad aγ-d-walin medden nekrez ur nezriε. Akken i teḍra, zerεen igran-nni, armi i d-ufan iman-nsen la meggren nneεma, jemεen rnan zağwen, yuγal inṭeq-d wuḥdiq gar-asen: “Ay atmaten, ziγ s tidet yella ugerruj. 

<p style="text-align:right">  Yahia Yanes  

  
 Smail At Rabeh, d mmi-s n Larebɛa n At Yiraten , yekecmen di taɣult n ufessel d lexyaḍa. Yessawḍen i wakken ad yessufeɣ taqendurt n leqbayel ɣer waṭas n tmura n umaḍal. Deg tdiwennit-a, yules-d i kra n lesrar-is.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Amek i tebdiḍ amecwar-ik di taɣult-a n llebsa ? 

  Ait Rabah Smail :  tella yemma d taxeggadt, dɣa ttwaliɣ akk amek i txeddem, yettaɛjab-iyi-d uxeddim-nni. Mi ara tettxiḍi, ḥemmleɣ ad qqimeɣ yid-s akken ad lemdeɣ kra. Dɣa s tidet aṭas i d-refdaɣ. Asmi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ, xedmeɣ asuneɣ d tesreɣta (la sculpture ) ayen akk yeɛnan taẓuri s umata. Asmi sɛiɣ 11 n yiseggasen, yessekcem-iyi baba ɣer Uxxam n yidles n Tizi uzzu akken ad lemdeɣ asuneɣ akked tesreɣta. Imir-n, ḥareɣ akken ad kecmeɣ di taɣult n lexyaḍa. Nekk deg wallaɣ-iw, tefra d wagi i d abrid-iw. Dɣa, bdiɣ ttxiḍiɣ lebsa tazayrit tamaziɣt. Xedmeɣ-d i tikkelt tamezwarut Karaku amazigh , syin Qaftan amaziɣ daɣen.

  Amek i d-tettlal tqendurt deg wallaɣ-ik ? 

 Di tezwara, ad tebdu d tikti , syin ttaɛraḍaɣ akken ad jemɛeɣ kra tnalitin sya w sya. Dɣa, aql-i la ttheggiɣ-d deg ussan-agi, ad xedmeɣ taggayt (collection) n tqendyar n temnadt n Ɛennaba. La ttnadiɣ amek ara as-skecmeɣ tanalitin timaynutin, akken ad as-teɛjeb i tmeṭṭut mi ara tt-tels. Ufiɣ-d tamurt n Leqbayel, tesɛa izumal am widak-nni i nettwali ɣef tiɣawsiwin n talext, dɣa syagi i d-beddunt. Nekk snarnayeɣ-tent, d tagi i d tikti tagejdant. Rniɣ nudaɣ kter, ur bɣiɣ ara ad qqimeɣ kan di temnadt n Leqbayel, maca nudaɣ ayen akk i yeɛnan Imaziɣen, imi iswi-w d taqendurt n yimaziɣen, i wakken ad d-tban deg umaḍal merra, mačči kan dagi ɣur-nneɣ. Amedya, taggayt n useggas-a, ad xedmeɣ taqendurt anda ara tili tnalit n Itergiyen : sxedmeɣ kraḍ n tiɣmiwin, i sexdamen Itergiyen di lbus-nsen amensay.

  Amek tessawḍed ad tessufɣeḍ taqendurt   n leqbayel ɣer tmura ? 

 Gar yiswiyen-iw dɣa wagi : ad suffɣeɣ taqendurt n leqbayel ɣer tmura tibarraniyen akken ad tettwassen, akken ad zuzreɣ idles-nneɣ , imi mi ara walin taqendurt n leqbayel, steqsayen ɣef ugdud-agi, dɣa din ara tettwassen tmurt-nneɣ.

  Ma yella nniɣ-ak-d tameṭṭut taqbaylit… 

 Tameṭṭut taqbaylit d nettat i yesbedden axxam-is, temxallaf mliḥ ɣef tlawin n umaḍal merra s nnif-is d lḥerma-s. Si tama-agi n lexyaḍa, zik ulac tameṭṭut ur nessin ara lexyaḍa, d nettat i d lsas n uxxam. Win yesɛan tameṭṭut taqbaylit, ur yettugad ara, imi yella fell-as lettkal

  D acu-ten yisenfaren n Smaɛil deg wayen yeɛnan taqendurt n Leqbayel ?  

 Aql-i la ttheggiɣ yiwet n tzeqqa n lexyaḍa tamensayt dagi di Larebɛa n At Yiraten, anda ara xedmen kan amensay. 

  Yamani Souhila 

  
 Yessufeɣ-d ussan-a unaẓur Ɛemmur Ɛebdennur aḍebsi d amaynut n ccna i izewwel «Wissen anda », ideg i d-yewwi kra n yisental i nezmer ad d-nini ṭṭuqten, s uɣanib-is netta. Deg tezlit tamezwarut dɣa, amzun yewwi-d ɣef tayri s wudem n lxiq. Am usmekti n tin akken iwumu yenna «lɣiba-m terwi allaɣ». Deg tezlit i d-iḍefren s uzwel n “Ad kem-zzmen” , d ameslay ɣef tayri n yiwen n yizri, amzun ugar n tujjma, deg-s daɣen kra n ccwami. Deg-s, abeɛda, ibedder-d ucennay s waṭas «Ul iḥemmlen». Ayen i d-yusan deg taɣect tis kraḍ, nezmer ad d-nini d tuzzma n yiman ɣef wayen yeḍran, d wayen i izemren ad d-yekk ala seg yimdanen. S useqdec n kra n wallalen i nennum deg tezlatin-is, am ubendir d tjawwaqt, yeqqar Ɛemmur Ɛebdennur deg ufyir wis sin: «Aql-iyi ɣef tɣaltin, umneɣ tikerkas, win iɛeddan yeǧǧa-yi din, beddeɣ am uɛessas…». Seg usmuzget n tezlit tis ukuẓ, s uẓawan i d-yezgan i yimeslayen, iban-d yewwi-d awal unaẓur ɣef waddad n tmetti taqbaylit abeɛda. «Nɣil d lmendad, nezga-d ɣef wayen i d-yeǧǧa bab-is, d lǧehd n uḥeddad, yettruẓun uzzal s yifadden-is», i nezmer ad nsel. Ahat d azɣan n unaẓur ɣef wayen i as-d-yezzin, s tɣara-s netta. Srid deffir-s, tusa-d tezlit ideg i yerra yis-s tajmilt s wazal-is, i win iwumi yenna: «Wiss anda trekkuḍ, wis anda teɣliḍ, asmi akken tettedduḍ, tettcerrigeḍ abriḍ, i yewɛer wakud, ass-a yekkes-aɣ lqid, ttun-k ur tettsuḍ, widak tettawiḍ». Syin akkin, ahat d tajmilt daɣen, neɣ d abdar n temnaḍt n Sidi Ɛic i ara naf deg tezlit tis 6. Deg-s s umata, icekker-d agama-s yelhan d yirgazen ufhimen i d-tessufeɣ. Deg tezlit-nniḍen, send taneggarut, d tiririt n wazal i tmussni, s ubdar n ubrid-nni n uɣerbaz akked usendeh i ulmad d tɣuri deg wakud. Ɣer taggara, d akemmel n usentel-a n tmussni akken-nniḍen, imi yecna ɣef tegzi (lefhama), ideg yeqqar: «Anida ulac lefhama, trewwel lewqama». Neɣ daɣen: «Anda ulac wid ifehmen, tarewla temneɛ bab-is».

  M. K. 

  
 Segmi yebda umussu-agi aɣerfan, i d-yebdan ass n lǧemɛa 22 yebrir 2019, tekcem tmurt deg yiwet n tallit tamxaleft deg umezruy n tmurt n Lezzayer. Mbeɛd mi yenqes s waṭas leqdic adelsan deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, ladɣa deg wayen yerzan isaragen d temliliyin n yimussnawen n yal taɣult. Yedda-d yid-s ubeddel n tmuɣliwin n tikta i d-ilulen d timaynutin, ideg yesɛa asirem ugdud azzayri. Lqid yettwakkes, abrid iregglen dayen yenǧer, ula d asalu yuɣal yessen abrid-is. Uɣalent-d tmeqwa ɣer tregwa, dayen i d-yerran leqdic ussnan d udelsan ɣer tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu. Yal ddurt, s yisaragen-is d temliliyin-is akked yinebgawen i d-yettawin awal ɣef geddac n yisental. Bdu-tt-id seg usarag n mass Said Khelil, i d-yellan ass-nni n lexmis 21 meɣres 2019 deg tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri alamma tleḥqeḍ-d ɣer yisaragen ddurt iɛeddan, anda i d-tella temlilit n tlata n yimussnawen-agi: Hocine Zehouane, Nasreddine Lezzar akked Arezki Lakabi, ass-nni n larebɛa 17 yebrir 2019, anida i d-mmeslayen ɣef tezɣent tamirant ideg tettidir ass-a tmurt n Lezzayer, d acu n tifrat i izemren ad tili sya ɣer sdat. Awal ad t-id-nawi ɣef usarag aneggaru n ddurt iɛeddan, i d-yellan ass-nni n lexmis 18 yebrir 2019, ideg yella Uduktur Said Sadi d inebgi n usarag aneggaru n ddurt yezrin.

 Limmer si 62 i tefra, tili ass-a mačči akka ! 
 Di tazwara n usarag yemmeslay-d ɣef tesfut taberkant yenna-d : “Uqbel ad bduɣ asarag, bɣiɣ ad d-iniɣ sin yimeslayen ɣef wigi i d-ileqmen ameslay di tesdawit-agi anda nella , imi syagi i tebda taluft’’. Yemmeslay-d ɣef wamek i d-tebda tefsut taberkant, d wamek i d as-ugin i Mulud Mɛemmri akken ad yexdem asarag-is. Syin ɣers, yenna-d belli “d tafsut n yiḍelli i d-yewwin tagi n wass-a”, yerna-d deg wawal-is : “Ilaq di teswiɛd am tagi yal yiwen ad yerr di lbal-is belli : “Armi d ass-a i d-tlul tmurt n Lezzayer. 

 Tamsalt yecban tagi, mačči d ayen ara iqabel umdan weḥd-s , mačči d ayen ara yefru ukabar weḥd-s”. Akken daɣen i yexdem amgarad gar umennuɣ n zik akked win n tura, ɣef waya iwekkded belli zik asmi i ttnaɣen, ur yelli ara d amennuɣ n talwit am wass-a ,yerna-d : “Akuffer-nni id aɣ-yeṭṭfen asmi igedlen i Mɛemmri asarag, yettak acbi ɣef ukuffer-agi n wass-a imi i d ak-d-nnan : “Ad nesbedd Lkadr akken ad yeḥkem fell-awen i lebda”. Gar wayen i d yenna : “Limer tebna ddewla n Lezzayer di 62 ɣef wakken i tt-ḥwaǧen yimdanen, ɣef wakken i d-yella umezruy n tmurt, ɣef wakken i nettwali tameddurt-nneɣ, tili ass-a ur nettili ara di tugnit anida ur telli ddewla, ur yelli lḥeqq, ur telli tidet. Si 62, ddwla tebda s ddraɛ, tekfa s ddraɛ”. 

 Ifures tagnit akken ad yini i yilmeẓyen i yellan s tuget deg usarag, d akken tura “ilaq ad nessers lsas n tigduda, ilaq anegzu akken ilaq ayen i iḍerrun akken ad nwali amek ara nkemmel” . Akken daɣen i d-yewwi awal ɣef yimeslayen i d-yeffɣen taggara-agi belli annay amaziɣ yettwagdel deg tmanaɣt yenna-d : “Annay amaziɣ d yiwen n uzamul i yeɛnan yakk Tafriqt n Ugafa , ilaq ad fehmen anect-agi”. Akken daɣen ur yezgil ara ayen i d-yeḍran taggara-agi mgal tulawin imi i d-yewwi awal ɣef utekki n tmeṭṭut deg tnekriwin-agi, yenna-d belli “tajmilt tameqqrant ad as-tuɣal i tmeṭṭut imi tella-d di tikliwin-agi , maca akken twalam yakk d akken llan wid iwumi ur yeɛǧib ara lḥal”. Yemmeslay-d daɣen ɣef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut . “Ay ilmeẓyen aqli-ken tettidiren yiwen n tallit d tamxalleft. Ilaq ad teẓrem ayen ara d-iḍerrun, ur ilaq ara ad aɣ-kellxen. Ilaq iɣeblan, ad rsen tura di tallit-agi n ubeddel , gar-asen : Tugdut, aseɛdel gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut , aqader n ugdud , syin ɣer-s ad ilint tefranin”. Syin, yettunefk wawal i wid yebɣan ad steqqsin Mass Saɛid Saɛdi. 

 Aṭas n yisteqsiyen i d-yellan ladɣa seg yilmeẓyen. D ayen i yessefraḥen, acku d nutni i d azekka n tmurt, d nutni i ilaq ad issinen tasertit akken ad sɛun s wayes ara qablen taswiɛt , maca nexdem tamawt d akken ulac aṭas n tulawin i d yellan deg usarag d timexḍa , d ayen i yesḥissifen, acku tameṭṭut ass-a, yewwi-d fell-as akken ad tessekcem iman-is deg yal taɣult . Iḍelli n lḥed 21 yebrir 2019, yella-d usarag amcarek amezwru n ddurt-agi, ideg i d-yemlal Oussalem Mohand Ouamer, Remdane Achab akked Salah Oudahar. Deg tlata yid-sen mmeslayen-d ɣef yimal n tmaziɣt deg Tegduda tamezwarut n tmurt n Lezzayer, i izemren ad tlal sya d afella. Am wakken daɣen yetturaǧu, ad d-yili usarag i ttraǧun yisdawanen s ccuq, wagi d win ara d-yawi Mass Mustapha Bouchachi. Yetturaǧu ad d-yili ass n larebɛa-agi sdat-nneɣ, ad d-yemmeslay deg-s ɣef usentel “Acu-tent tifratin tisertanin n tezɣent ideg tettidir tmurt n Lezzayer tineggura-a?”.

  Yamani S. / Adaoun A. 

  
  Aḥric 11, taggara 

 Takanaṛt tuḥdiqt, tezger-iten deg sin s nnuba. Teddun yesmektay-iten-id kra d ubrid-nni, ttḥulfun amzun ssnen imeḍqan-nni ideg llan. Dγa ur εeṭṭlen ara, jban kan deg yiwet n tiγilt armi walan axxam n yimawlan-nsen. Serrḥen d tazzla armi d axxam, akken kecmen deg tewwurt, ğellben γef temgerḍt n baba-tsen seg tmendit. Ameγdur n dda Mira bu yisγaren, seg wasmi yemsebḍa yid-sen, ur teffiγ teqreḥ ul-is, ma d tameṭṭut-is Miγisa, ur tt-id-tessaweḍ ara tegnit n yimir-n d tamuddirt, ufan-tt-in warraw-is tettwamḍel. Duduc, tessureg-d iciwi-s γer tγerγert, yal tiγmert tuγal ceṭṭḥent deg-s twiztin, Ḥmiṭuc yessers-d daγen ayen i d-yewwi deg uqelmun-is, yekfa lḥif, temlal tasa d win turew, yegguja laẓ seg uxxam. Ddren ussan n tmeddurt-nsen s umata almi d ass ideg yal yiwen deg-sen yewweḍ sani ara naweḍ akk.

   GM. (Izarismen Mira d Miγisa ddmeγ-ten-id seg “Aweryan n yizarismen imaziγen” n Mass Kamal Uzerrad, acku anamek n yizarismen-agi yettak anzi s ayen gan deg tmacahut yimawlan i tarwa-nsen: – Miγisa d talγa tuntit n Amiγas, Amiγis “Win icelεen, yeskaden”, seg Umyag iγas. – Mira seg Amiru neγ Amirew “tiγin n wawal; awafeq”, seg umyag mirew “aγ awal, mṣalaḥ, msefrak, wafeq”). 

  Seg kabyle.com 

  
 Tizza, d taddart am tuddar n Leqbayel merra ; d isem-is i d anamek-is (asget n tizi) . Taddart-a tezga-d di tɣiwant n Ɛemmal agezdu n bumerdes.

 Akken uɣen tannumi, yal aseggas sfugulen amenzu n yennayer iɣef i d-tella deg lmendad tddukkla « Tafat ». Tasebḥit n ssebt 13 janvier, nerza ɣer-sen akken ad nzer ayen xeddmen i lmend n yixef n useggas. Deg ubrid yettawin ɣer taddart-a, yeččur rrif-is d iblaz ( banderoles) iɣef ttwarunt tenfaliyin yesεan assaɣ akked tegnit-ayi. Syin, nemlal iεeyyalen n tdukkkla «Tafat» i yettmaggaren inebgawen s wudem yumren d uwelleh-nsen ɣer wadeg n tmeskant-ayi. Tessumer-d tddukkla-agi yiwen n wahil d amerkanti i yekkan si tsebḥit armi d tameddit. Gar wayen i d-thegga, ad naf, adal, tinḍi (artisanat), taklut, amezgun akkedd yisaragen, mebla ma nettu seksu (lmesfuf) i yinebgawen i d-yerzan ɣer din. Ayen i d-ijebden lwelha-nneɣ deg waya, d tajmilt i terra tddukkli i sin n yirgazen yewwḍen leεfu n Rebbi ilindi, wiyi d Ɛli n Saεid Buljennet akked Ḥamid n Rebbuḥ Ǧelluli. Irgazen-a, llan ttεawanen aṭas ilemziyen n «Tafat» akken i aɣ-d-yenna uselway-ines Muxtar Buljennet. Nfuṛes tagnit akked uselway-ayi, i wakken ad t-nesteqsi ɣef wayen txeddem tddukkla-nsen, ɣef waya yenna-d : « Zyada ɣef n yineḍruyen i icudden ɣer tmagit tamaziɣt, tqeddec tddukkla Tafat deg unnar n twennaḍt d umahil ametti i deg tettawes tiwaculin ixuṣṣen ». Γer taggara, ad d-nini d akken asfugel n yennayer deg Tizza, ad yeqqim yeẓẓa deg wallaɣ n yal win i d-yerzan ɣer-s, ayuz i yimezdaɣ-is d tddukkla Tafat.

  Mansour Bouljennet 

  
 Ad tili, aseggas-agi, tezrigt tis mrawet d semmuset (15) n lfeṭṭa n Ath Yenni , seg 26 yulyu alamma d ass n 3 ɣuct 2018. Azal n 150 n yiḥeddaden n lefṭṭa i yetturaǧun ad d-seknen i medden, di tmeɣra-agi, ayen heggan ɣef teɣzi n useggas. Tuget n yiḥeddaden n lfeṭṭa ara yilin di usiher-agi, ad ilin n tama n Wat Yanni, maca ad ilin daɣen wid n tamiwin-nnḍen n tmurt n Leqbayel. Tameɣra-agi n lfeṭṭa, d ttiɛad adelsan imi i d-yettili deg-s leqdic anesbaɣur. D armud adamsan daɣen, imi yettak tagnit i yinḍan (artisans) i wakken ad senzen sselɛa-nsen. Ma d iswi-ines, ɣef wakken i d-nnan yimsuddsen, d aseḥbiber d usnerni n yirmad n ufus n tmurt n Leqbayel, d uselmed n yilmeẓyen i wakken ad ṭṭfen deg lḥiraft-agi ur negrent ara. Yetturaǧu daɣen, ad ilin yisaragen yemxalafen ara d-sekren yimussnawen d yimnadiyen deg uḥric-agi n tinḍi. Ad farsen yimsuddsen n tmeɣra-agi tilin n Tuddsa (UNESCO), i wakken ad ssutren deg-sen asekcem n lfeṭṭa n At Yanni ɣer tgemmi tamaḍlant. Annect-agi, dayen i d-yenna, ussan-agi iɛeddan, uselway n tɣiwant n At Yanni, Mass Deghoul Smail. D tagnit daɣen i yinḍan d yimsuddsen n leqdic-agi, i wakken ad ssutren deg wid terza temsalt-a, yecban aɣlif n tmerrit akked yirmad iqburen, akken ad d-lhun s yiɣillifen i d-ttmagaren yiḥeddaden-agi. Ulamma yella lexṣaṣ deg lfeṭṭa akked yisufar imenza i sexdamen yinḍan-agi d leɣla-nsen di ssuq n berra, maca mazal ttkemmilen axeddim. Acu kan annect-agi, ur yeffiɣ ara fell-asen, imi ɣlayet lfeṭṭa ur tettnuzu ara s waṭas. Daya i yeǧǧan kra-nniḍen ad ǧǧen lḥirfa-agi i d-lemden ɣer lejdud-nsen, imi ɣef leḥsab-nsen ur tseččay ara aɣrum di tizi n wass-a, sdat n leɣla n temɛict. Ihi, ilit di ttiɛad gar 26 yulyu alamma d 3 ɣuct 2018.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Azal n 1 510 n yimdanen i yemmuden d wazal n 16 022 i yettwajerḥen deg 11 507 n twaɣiyin n yiberdan, i d-yeḍran seg umsedis (6 wagguren) amezwaru n useggas-agi n 2018, deg wakal n tmurt merra. D uṭṭunen i d-yefka ass-nni n larebɛa 25 yulyu 2018, Wammas Aɣelnaw n Useḥbiber ɣef Tɣelist n Yiberdan (CNPSR), i d-ssuzren ass-nni dɣa Srabes n Yisallen Izzayriyen (APS). Alaḥsab dɣa n uɣbalu-agi, ma nserwes tallit-agi ɣer tinna n useggas iɛeddan, amḍan-agi yenɣes s wazal n -6,89% yisehwa (accidants), d wazal n -10,91 n tmettanin akked -,65% n yimejraḥ. I usmeki, deg useggas n 2017, yewweḍ-d wuṭṭun n laksidat-agi ɣer 25 038, menbeɛd mi d-yenqes s wazal 3 818 ɣef winna n 2016, i yewwḍen ɣer 22 900. Deg useggas yezrin, neqsent tmettanin swazal n -8,84% ɣef tidak n 2016, ula d uṭṭun n yimejraḥ yenqes-d daɣen ɣef 2016 s wazal n 17,54%. Ma nger tamawt, ad naf d anɣes i ttenqasent twuɣa-agi seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ, d ayen isefraḥen imi mačči d rnu irennunt. Awi yufan, sya ɣer sdat, ad rnunt ad neɣsent mliḥ twaɣiyin-agi, i yettawin d lluluf n terwiḥin i itett wakal, d yimelyan n yimejraḥ, n yimeεḍar, n yigujilen…atg.

  Gh. A 

  
 Deg uḥric n tsuqqilt, yettnernin seg wass ɣer wayeḍ, tikkelt si taɛrabt tikkelt-nniḍen seg tefransist ɣer tmaziɣt. Dɣa deg wuusan-agi kan ineggura, i d-tella tsuqqilt n wungal « Pluies d’Or » n umaru-amsuɣel Mohamed Sari, ɣer tutlayt n tmaziɣt s uzwel « Igefran n wureɣ ». D mass Habib Allah Mansouri, amaswaḍ n tmaziɣt i yessuqlen adlis-agi, i yewwin arraz aseklan « Escale littéraire d’Alger » di 2016. Yessuffeɣ-it-id Mohamed Sari deg useggas n 2016 ɣer tezrigin Chihab, ma d tasuqqilt-is ɣer tmaziɣt teffeɣ-d s wafud d-iger Usqamu unnig n timmuzɣa (HCA) akk d tezrigin Chihab. « Igefran n wureɣ » neɣ s uzwel-is anaṣli « Pluies d’or », yettbeggin-d tiwtilin (ssebat) n tmuḥeqranit i d-tettidir tmetti tazzayrit deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura. Annect-agi, yella-d s tedyanin d teḥkayin yemxallafen si tallit ɣer tayeḍ, i d-yeglan s tegrawliwin daxel n tmetti. D « El Mahdi » i d awadem agejdan n wungal-agi, i yellan d ccix n lǧameɛ (limam) deg yiseggasen-nni n 1980, aṭas daɣen n teḥkayin ara naf daxel-s, yecban tin n « Cheikh M’barek » baba-s n «El Mahdi », tin Djilali Boulahbal…atg. Ɣer taggara, ad nesmekti belli, Mohamed Sari ilul deg useggas n 1958 di Cherchell, d aselmad (professeur) deg tesdawit n Lezzayer Tamaneɣt. D amaru-aneggal s snat n tutlayin (taɛrabt akked tefransist), d amsuɣel daɣen. Yura aṭas n wungalen gar-asen : « La tumeur » , « La carte magique » akked « La pluie » ɣer tama n yidlisen n tezɣent taseklant. Yettuneḥsab d yiwen tgejda timeqqranin n tsekla tazzayrit, yecban imura d yineggalen-agi : Assia Djebar, Yasmina Khadra, Mohamed Dib, Malika Mokaddem…atg.

  A. A. 

  
 Yella, acer-a iɛeddan, uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, Mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi, d inebgi n yiwet n tedwilt deg umaṭṭaf n Sumam ideg I d-yella wawal ɣef yiɣilifen d unegmu n tɣiwant deg wakud amiran. Deg teɣzi n qrib asrag, aṭas i tlufa iɣef i d-yemmeslay uselway amaynut n tɣiwant armi ahat banent-d ugar tugniwin i yimezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel i yettmesteqsayen ɣef waddad n taddart-nsen d wanda kkan lecɣal n tneflit (développement). Deg wawal-is ɣef usentel n waman, i yellan d aɣbel ageɛmir n yiɣermanen n temnaḍt-a, yenna-d Mass lmir d akken ur yettɛeṭṭil yiṭṭij ad d-yali meskud asenfar n usiweḍ n waman seg Lɛenser Azegza, teṭṭef-it yakan yiwet n tkebbanit. Tafada n keffu n lecɣal, yezmer lḥal ad truḥ kan armi d sin n yiseggasen. Ma d ayen yerzan afud (énergie), iwekked-d uselway d akken ixus aṭas deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel seg waṭas-aya tura. Ihi ama d trisiti neɣ d lgaz, yezga uɣbel-nsen yettcewwil mačči ala agdud, wanag ula d ufrinen n tɣiwant. D acu, yenna-d Sadeq Rebbaɛi a-t-an teddunt tlufa kra kra ɣer ferru, ladɣa imi aẓeṭṭa n ubdaw n lgaz yemmug seg-s 40% deg Ayt Smaɛel. Yetturaǧu tura ad kemmlent aqeddic tkebbunay i t-yeṭṭfen, imi llant ḥebsent ddeqs n teswiɛt taggara-a. Deg umecwar n tedwilt, llan-d yisiwlen n kra n yimezdaɣ i d-ibedren abeɛda lexsas n uqeddic izerben deg tzeqqa n udawi n Tizwal akked uɛeṭṭel deg usiweḍ n lgaz. Dɣa ɣef uqeddic izerben i ssutren yimezdaɣ s tussda, tallit-a taneggarut, yenna-d Mass aselway: “nutni xedmen ayen yellan fell-asen, uzzlen war aḥbas ɣer tamiwin i teɛna srid taluft-a n usbedd n uqeddic izerben”. Yerna-d dɣa, meskud yettwaṛgem-asen aṭas n tikkal, yettraǧu deg ad tɛeddi Tenmehla n tezmert tazayezt seg umeslay ɣer tigawt s usiweḍ n wayen akk I ilaqen d iqeddacen, gar yimsujjiyen d yifiremliyen, akken ad yili daɣen uqeddic izerben deg temnaḍt-a tamsedrart.

  M.K 

  
 Werɛad i d-yekcim unebdu s wudem unsib, yebda yettidir ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9 amxudneq n tkeryas i yesmeḥḥinen inehharen. D ijurriḍen d iɣezfanen n tkeryas d yikamyunen, wa yemmenṭaḍ ɣer wa, teɣzi n waṭas n tmitratin. D ayen i yesɛeṭṭilen tikli, yettaker akud. Liḥala-a, tbeddu-d abeɛda seg umaggar n yiberdan n Bgayet, seg umkan iwumi ssawalen « Katcman ». Meskud ur yekfi ɛad usenfar n usewseɛ n yiberdan-nni, tewɛer ayendin tikli dinna mettwal akuden ideg leḥḥun medden s waṭas. Ladɣa am tnezzayt d meqrub tameddit. Ulamma seg tama n ubrid-a, iteddu wugur srid akken ad yefru. Ɣef wakken i d-wwin kra n yisallen unsiben, ad yamed usenfar n usewseɛ d ureqqeɛ n umaggar n yiberdan n Bgayet, deg wayyur-a n yunyu neɣ n yulyu. « Ɛni d tixennaq i nettidir dinna seg waṭas-aya tura. Ilaq ad serrḥen i yiberdan-nniḍen, akken ad yefru uɣbel-a n yinehharen. Nessaram ur yettɛeṭṭil ara ugar ». D awal n yiwen n unehhar d ilemẓi. Si tama-nniḍen, mačči ala deg unekcum n waɣir n Bgayet i tḥerres cwiṭ tikli. Ɣas ur tebdi tsemhuyt n umerreḥ, maca mxudenqen ḥawla n yiberdan, deg kra n teswiɛin n wass. Ma nebder-d yiwen n umedya, akka ara naf, dɣa, teḥres ayendin, taggara n tmeddit, seg Suq Letnin armi d Lberj n Mira, mi ara uɣalen yimdanen d yixeddamen s ixxamen-nsen. Ulamma ahat mačči s waṭas i yettili uḥras-a, maca iteddu ad yemɣur ugar deg ussan-a i d-iteddun n unebdu. « Ttwaliɣ, yerna akk i waya uɛeṭṭel n lecɣal deg yisenfaren i d-yellan iseggasen-a ineggura di Bgayet. Ttmeslayeɣ tugart ɣef usenfar n usewseɛ n ubrid n Ɛecba n Xerraṭa, akked win n umaggar n yiberdan deg Bgayet. Lemmer ur d-yelli wannect-nni d aɛeṭṭel, ur tettiɣzif lmeḥna-nneɣ armi d tura ». D tamuɣli n yiwen n unehhar-nniḍen seg usamar n Bgayet.

  M. K. 

  
 Yekker zzhir deg usuddes n leqdicat idelsanen sɣur umussu addukklan n lwilaya n Tubiret. Dɣa, i lmend n usmekti n umulli wis 39 n tefsut n yimaziɣen (20 yebrir 1980) akked umulli wis 18 n tefsut taberkant (20 yebrir 2001), yettwahegga-d wahil d anesbaɣur ɣef teɣzi n ddurt deg taɣiwant n At Leqsar i yetabaɛen ɣer lwilaya n Tubiret. 

 Ad yebdu usiher-agi seg 23 yebrir 2019, deg tzeqqa n ODEJ n Tubiret, yetturaǧu ad yekfu wahil-agi ass n 27 yebrir 2019. Ad d-ilin deg-s sin-agi n yirmad igejdanen: Rreḥba n udlis, deg tezrigt-is tamezwarut akked tfaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt, deg tezrigt-is tis ukkuẓet.

 Tafaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt 
 D ttiɛad i ttraǧun ddeqes n yimedyazen d tmedyazin wat yiles amaziɣ, yetturaǧu ad ttekkin ddeqs n yiḥeddaden n wawal d wid yettewzanen awal deg usefru, deg tazrigt-agi tis ukkuẓet n tfaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt tamaziɣt, ara d-yilin aseggas-agi seg n lexmis 25 alamma d ass n ssebt 27 yebrir 2019, deg tzeqqa n ODEJ n lwilaya n Tubiret. 

 Imedyazen d tmedyazin i yebɣan ad ttekkin deg temsizzelt-agi, ilaq fell-asen ad aznen yiwen n usefru, yettwarun s tlatinit s ttawil n uselkim. Am wakken daɣen ilaq ɣef yal yiwen neɣ yiwet, ad iceggeɛ daɣen tukkist n warrat n tlalit d yissalen yerzan tudert-nsen (isem, aɣara, tansa, uṭṭun n usiwel). 

 Ad yili uceggeɛ n yisefra ɣer tansa-agi taliktrunit: <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="ec988d8a8d9f878db380899d9f8d9eac958d848383c28f8381" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a> Ma i wugar n yisallen, siwlet ɣer wuṭṭunen-agi: 0779.05.77.85 neɣ 0770.43.87.95. Imedyazen ara yettekkin deg tezrigt-agi tamaynut, yetturaǧu ad rzun seg waṭas n lwilayat n tmur n Lezzayer timazɣawalin, yecban: Tizi Uzzu, Bgayet, Tipaza, Bumerdas, Tubiret, Xnecla…atg. 

 Tazrigt tis snat n rreḥba n udlis 
 Am wakken daɣen i yetturaǧu, ad tili tezrigt tis snat n rreḥba n udlis n Leqsar, ara d-yilin ɣef teɣzi n ddurt. Ad tebdu ass n ttlata 23 yebrir 2019, ad tekfu ass n ssebt 27 deg waggur n yebrir i d-iteddun. D ttiɛad adelsan ameqqren, ideg yetturaǧun ad kkin waṭas n yimura imaziɣen, ara yessenzen idlisen-nsen s ubuddu. 

 Ad ilin yimedyazen ara d-yawin ammuden-nsen n tmedyazt d yineggalen ara d-yeglun s wungalen-nsen. Am wakken daɣen ara d-ilin yimura n tewsatin-nniḍen deg ttiɛad.Yetturaǧu diɣ ad d-ilint temsikniyin n yidlisen neɣ timsikniyin n usenzi sɣur ddeqs n tizrigin, ara d-yerzun si yal tama tamaziɣt. 

 Am wakken daɣen i yetturaǧu ad yili wahil n yisaragen ɣef yisental yemgaraden. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti, belli leqdicat-agi idelsanen, ad ilin tikkelt-agi d tajmilt i 7 imeɣrasen n tmaziɣt, yecban; Mulud Mɛemmri, Matub Lwennas, Muḥend Arab Bessaɛud, Sliman Ɛazem…atg. Ma d tiddukkliwin tidelsanin i d-iheggan leqdic-agi, ad naf Tiddukkla tadelsant Amaziɣ, s tallelt n tiddukkliwin-agi: Tafat, Talwit, Tadukli akked tiddukkla Leḥsan.

<p style="text-align:right">  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Tewwi-d tlemmast-a n ḥertadem kra n ubeddel di lɛada n yal ass n yimezdaɣ. Ssebba n waya d tirza ɣer lexlawi d yiɛerquben i ufras n tzemrin d ubraz n yimeḍqan. Aṭas n twaculin i igan ihi tirziwin tinsayanin n usefqed ɣer yiɛerquben-nsent akken deg-s, ad walin amek iga uzemmur d wacḥal turew tzemmurt, deg-s ad fersen tizemrin d tallunin seg yinijjel d wayen akk i izemren ad yili d asergel i tleqqaḍt igerrzen seg yakk tamiwin. “ Nesɛa tirziwin-a d tannumi seg zzman aqbur. Yal mi ara yebdu itewwa uzemmur, bab n uɛerqub ad iẓur ayla-s, ad imuqel acu ara yefres. 

 Maca tura ur rezzun ara dima am nekni zik. Tasuta n tura, tettmektay-d kan tizemrin di lawan n uzemmur », i d-tenna yiwet n temɣart. Seg tama n tarewt, ɣef wakken i d-nnan wat tzemrin, ur yeɛdil waddad seg temnaḍt ɣer tayeḍ. Deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, llant temnaḍin ideg yurew uzemmur, abeɛda deg tzemrin i d-yezgan rrif n ubrid, am wakken llant tiyaḍ ala kra n yiɛeqqayen i tzemreḍ ad twaliḍ deg yifurak.Ɣur kra n yiɣermanen n Ayt Smaɛel, icudd waya ɣer yibeddi d tzemmurt akked usgunfu-ines, imi tazemmurt tikwal am tmeṭṭut, tebɣa ad tesgunfu seg tarwa ɣer tayeḍ. 

 Maca ɣur yimdanen-nniḍen, tamentilt n waya d tadyant i iḍerrun i twennaḍt s uddebdeb akuluji akk i d-yellan. «Akken ad tarew tzemmurt s ṭṭaqa, ilaq ad tili di tdawsa igerrzen. Akken ad tili di tdawsa igerrzen, ilaq ad taf iman-is deg ugama i tessen, ad tsew aman n ugeffur di lawan, ad tt-yezwi waḍu, atg. Maca nesḥassef imi mačči d ayen i nettwali di tallit-a tamirant », d awal n yiwen n urgaz seg Ayt Smaɛel.

  M. K. 

  
  Aḥric 1u 

 Amacahu, Zik-nni, tella yiwet n tmeṭṭut tesεa snat n teqcicin. Yiwet deg-sent d tarbibt-is. Yal ass ttruḥunt γer tala ttagment-d. Yelli-s tettak-as tazeεluqt, ma yella d tarbibt-is tettak-as aγerbal. Yal ma teččar aγerbal d aman, ttenγalen-d. Almi d yiwen n wass, tefqe&amp;epsilon,; tḍegger aγerbal-nni. Tuggad ad as-tini yemma-s anida yella uγerbal. Dγa, tettbeε abrid yeṭṭef uɣerbal-nni. Tetteddu tetteddu armi i d-tufa yiwen n umeksa, 

 testeqsa-t.

 Tarbibt : Ay ameksa, ur teẓriḍ ara anida i iεedda uγerbal ? 

 Ameksa : Err-iyi-d qbel lmal-iw, ad am-d-iniγ anid iεedda.

 Tarbibt truḥ terra-as-ten-d.

 Ameksa : ihi, iεedda γer uxxam n tteryel, maca ad akem-weṣṣi&amp;gamma,; ma yella tenna-am-d : « ad am-ssukkeγ seg tewwurt neγ s tzuliγt ? », ini-as « s tzuliγt ». Ma yella tenna-am-d : « ad akem-d-ssuγ leḥrir neγ tazeggart ? », ini-as : « tazeggart». Ma yella tenna-am-d : « ad akem-d-ččareγ aγerbal-im d tiwiztin neγ d tiγredmiwin », ini-as : « d tiγredmiwin ».

 Imi tewweḍ γer uxxam n tteryel, testeqsa-tt-id.

 Tteryel : ad akem-ssukkeγ s tewwurt neγ s tzuliγt?

 Tarbibt : S tzuliγt.

 Tteryel tessukk tarbibt-nni s tewwurt.

 Tteryel : ad am-d-ssuγ leḥrir neγ tazeggart ?

 Tarbibt : S tzeggart.

 Tteryel tessa-as-d leḥrir, dγa ṭṭsent.

 Azekkuya tifawt (taṣebḥit) :

 Tteryel : ad am-d-ččareγ aγerbal-im d tiwiztin neγ tiγredmiwin?

 Tarbibt : D tiγredmiwin.

 Tteryel teččur-as-d aγerbal-is d tiwiztin.

 Imi tewweḍ tarbibt γer uxxam, teḥka-asen-d amek i d-tewwi annect-nni n twiztin. Tameṭṭut d yelli-s usment…

  Seg tgemmi n teqbaylit 

  
 Ad d-yssuddes Wammas aɣelnaw n tasensegmant (pédagogique) d tesnilest i uselmed n tamziɣt (CNPLET), iɣef yella Mass Dourari ɣef uqerruy-is, s tallelt n tesdawit n Paris 8 akked tin n Cergy-pontoise, timlilit tagraɣlant ɣef uselmed n tutlayt n tmaziɣt di tmurt n Lezzayer. Ad d-yili wannect-agi, ussan n 28 akked 29 unbir i d-iteddun, di tmurt n Lezzayer. Ad yezzi wawal deg temlilit-agi, ara yekken ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan, ɣef usentel i fernen yimsuddsen-agi i temlilit-a, ad-yili akka: “Deg ubrid n tussnalmudt n tutlayin tiyemmatin: d acu-tent temmerwiyin ɣef uselmed n tmaziɣt d usnerni-ines”. D timlilit ara d-yesddukklen imussnawen-imuzzag, iselmaden, imnadiyen deg tmussniwin n tutlayin, ara d-yerzun seg tesdawiyin n tmurt n Lezzayer akked tesdawiyin n tmura tiberraniyin. Ad d-tawi temlilit-agi ɣef waṭas n temsal, yecban aselmed n tmaziɣt i yimdanen iɛerbawalen s tussnalmud tamazzagt, tiwsatin n tussnalmudin swayes yezmer yiwen ad iselmed tamaziɣt, tarrayin yemgaraden swayes tettwaselmed d tid swayes tezmer ad tettwaselmed sya ɣer sdat. Am wakken daɣen, ara ttunefkent tnagiyin d termitin n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt…atg.

  G. A. 

  
 D ayyuren tura, segmi kkren yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel i tleqqaḍt n uzemmur, i d-yettuɣalen seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ.

 Ɣas ma yal lawan n tleqqaḍt-a, yemgarad ɣef gma-s deg wayen i d-ttakkent ṭṭjur n uzemmur; tikwal ttarwent s waṭas, tikwal d anemgal, wanag winna ur yelli d ugur ameqqran ɣur-sen skud ẓran d drus axir n wulac. Ladɣa imi seg zik, ɣas ad ixas uzemmur, yettili ddeqs n zzit. Ttafen lbaraka deg uzemmur-nni i sɛan d wayen i asen-d-yefka. Acu kan, aseggas-a, ur yelli am wid iɛeddan seg tama n lɣella n zzit-nni i ineqsen maḍi ma nmuqel i yilindi d yiḍelli yezrin. Aya, dɣa, rran-as lwelha kra n yimezwura i d-iberrin mi ara ččaren kan snat neɣ tlata n teckarin, d mi ara ldint lmeɛesrat, imi asen-ikeffu zzit send ad d-telḥeq tleqqaḍt tayeḍ. Wehmen yineggura-a imi werǧin ḥeḍren i teswiɛt am ta, anda tacekkart n 25 n yikiluyen, i niqal teggar-d seg 5 alami d 7 n tlitratin n zzit, tuɣal tettak-d ala 3 neɣ 3 d uzgen. Ma tger-d ugar, ad tt-tessaweḍ i rebɛa n tlitratin. « Aseggas-a, ɛetbeɣ aṭas deg ujmaɛ n uzemmur-iw, meɛna ur friḥeɣ mi t-id-briɣ. Iger-iyi-d drus maḍi n zzit! ». I d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ s usḥissef. Ma nuɣal-d i tmentilt n unqas n zzit, ad d-nini d taɣarit n yiɛeqqayen n uzemmur i yellan deffir. Ternuḍ-as ahat terqeq-nsen i yettaǧǧan aɣwaw ad yeṭṭef azgen seg-sen. Maca, skud anagar kra n yimezdaɣ i d-yegren ar tura drus n zzit, ma d wid-nniḍen gren-d akken nnumen, llan wid yeccukten d imḍebbren neɣ d ixeddamen n lmeɛesrat i yettakren zzit-nni i wid yewwin azemmur-nsen ad t-id-brin ɣur-sen. Daymi kukran wid i mazal ur d-brin ara, ad asen-teḍru am yimezwura; ad d-gren drus n zzit.

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Zrin 15 n yiseggasen segmi iɣab yiwen seg wudmawen i irefden taqbaylit s umezgun, yiwet gar tgejda i d-yeslulen amezgun s teqbaylit, yiwen gar yimsuqlen i d-yerran ar teqbaylit s umsasa iḍrisen igraɣlanen n yimyura mucaɛen di tmura n umaḍal. Ass-nni n, 7 duǧember iɛeddan, i d-yezzi useggas wis 15 segmi yemmut Muḥend Uyeḥya. Ɣas akken isem-agi aṭas n leqbayel i t-irefden, maca ayen yesnuɣnuyen imi ur d-yelli ara usmekti-ines neɣ tiririt n tejmilt i urgaz-a anagar yiwet n tddukkla tamecṭuḥt di tmurt n Fransa i t-id-yesmektan. 

 Wissen ahat imi tenguga temnaḍt n leqbayel seg tefranin i d-yellan d wayen i d-iḍefren n tigawin s umdal n wasunen d tɣiwanin d truẓi n tbewwaḍin akken ad d-tbeggen iman-is temgarad ɣef temnaḍin-nniḍen n tmurt n Lezzayer deg ufiqi asertan. Ahat ɣef waya i yenqes leqdic adelsan d tatut n kra n wudmawen i aɣ-yeǧǧan i d-yeǧǧan igerrujen i yidles amaziɣ, seg wid yecban Muḥya. Abdellah Mohya, yettwassnen s yisem n Muḥend Uyeḥya neɣ Muḥya, ilul ass n umnzu n unbir 1950 deg temnaḍt n Yiɛeẓẓugen. D udem n umezgun, d anallas, d bab n teqbaylit, d amedyaz, ɣas akken ur yettwassen ara aṭas sɣur aɣref azzayri neɣ agraɣlan. 

 Yessekles ifarisen-is s tarrayt taqburt ɣef wallalen n tmesliwt K7, dɣa azal n 15 deg-sent i d-yessuffeɣ di tmurt n leqbayel d tmurt n Fransa taggara n yiseggasen n 1970 d tazwara n 1980 akken kan tendeh tefsut n yimaziɣen. Muḥya, imi d win yumnen s wayen i ixeddem, yugi ad nzent tkassiḍin-is s yidrimen acku, ɛlaḥsab-is, idles ur yettnuzu ara (iswi-ines deg waya, ad d-yejbed iqbayliyen ɣer yidles-nsen, akken ara d-yeffeɣ seg wanu n tatut). Yella Muḥya gar yimenza i d-yeslulen amezgun s tenfalit taqbaylit, yefka acḥal n yiseggasen deg tudert-is i usuɣel d umsasa n yisefra, tizlatin d yiḍrisen n umezgun igraɣlanen s rruḥ n teqbaylit yeččuren d inumak lqayen d taḍsa s unecreḥ ilan azal i d-yettales s tarrayt tafelsafit yettwellihen ɣer uṛebbi, tadukkli, tagmat, d tlelli n yigduden. 

 Aṭas n yisefra-s yettwacnan sɣur inaẓuren iqbayliyen yettwassnen s tezlit tamḥaddit am Ferḥat d terbaɛt Ideflawen, ladɣa tizlit-nni “Berzidan”. Aṭas n tsutwin i d-yessaki Muḥya s yiḍrisen-is i useḥbiber ɣef tumast tamaziɣt. Isem-is d leqdicat-is ad qqimen d iɣbula i tmussni n yidles amaziɣ deg wakud amiran, ladɣa ma neẓra aṭas n tezrawin i d-yettilin ɣef wayen yexdem deg yigezduyen n tmaziɣt d tefransist deg tesdawiyin. Akken daɣen i llan kra n yiḍrisen-is deg yidlisfusen n tmaziɣt. Yemmut ass n, 7 duǧember 2004, seld aṭas n wakud d netta d amennuɣ d waṭṭan, deg temdint n Paris. 

 Gar wayen i d-yeǧǧa  
 Ad naf ifarisen i iga Muḥya bḍan ɣef tlata yiḥricen d taɣulin yemgaraden. Tamezwarut, ad naf ayen i d-yesnulfa netta s timmad-is, gar yisefra, tullisin d yiḍrisen iseklanen. Tis snat, leqdic n tsekla taɣerfant i d-yegmer sya u sya (seg umaḍal), syin isemmed-it s talɣa-ines. Tis kraḍet, ad naf ayen i iga seg tsuqqilin d umsasa n tgemmi taseklant n tmura n L’europe d tiyaḍ, iwumi imud rruḥ n teqbaylit, d wayen yellan di tmetti-ines, deg tneggarut-a ibeddel ula d ismawen (Lalla Mjilat, Ameḥmuḥ, Sifuni, Buzitwar, Piluca, Dduktur Wakli, Pernanti …).

 Ifarisen-agi gar wayen iwumi yexdem amsasa ɣer teqbaylit.
  -Am win yettrajun Rebbi (En attendant Godot) n Samuel Beckett.
  -Aneggaru ad d-yerr tawwurt (La Décision) ; Llem-ik, ddu d uḍar-ik (L’exception et la régle) n Bertolt Brecht. 
  -Tacbaylit (La jarre) n Luigi Pirandello.
  -Si Leḥlu (Le médecin malgré lui) ; Si Pertuf (Tartuffe) n Molière. 
  -Muḥend Uceɛban (Le Ressuscité) n Ucinwa Lu Xun. 
  -Si Nistri (La Farce de Maître Pathelin) n Pauvre Martin. 
  -Sin-nni (Les Emigrés) n Slawomir Mrozek, n tmurt n Pologne.
  -Muḥ n Muḥ ; n Georges Brassens.

  Khaled Achoui 

  
  Isufar

 – 100 ml n waman

 – 75 ml n uyefki

 – 10 cl n zzit

 – 1 n tcelwiḍt n yiɣes n lkuca

 – 1 n tɣenjawt n lmakla 

 n ssker n uwren

 – 2 n lkumcat n yiɛeqqayen n uzumbil

 – 1 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n lmelḥ

  Aheggi 

 Qlut-d iɛeqqayen-nni n uzumbil daxel n tmeqqlit mebla zzit neɣ udi. Sxelḍet daxel n lḥila aman, ayefki, zzit, ssker, iɣes n lkuca akked yiɛeqqayen n uzumbil, tanfem-as ad yali azal n 1h30’. Suzret-as i urekti-nni lfarina, tmesslem-d 6 n takurin, tanfem-asent diɣ ad alint azal n 30’. Seḥmut lkuca 200, terrem aɣrum ad wwent azal n 25’. Sufffet-t-id, tanfem-as ad yismiḍ. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Yiwen yiwen i ttensaren wid i d-yebnan tutlayt n tmaziɣt, i tt-id-yessawḍen s anda akka tella. S yinadiyen akked tira i swayes i d-neǧren abrid. Akken i yenna Dda Lmulud ‘’Ma yemmut umɣar neɣ tamɣart seg tmurt n Leqbayel, amzun d tamkerḍit s lekmal-is i iruḥen’’. Tikkelt-a, ɣas mačči d tamurt n Leqbayel i tt-id-yeǧǧan, maca din i tedder, i teqdec, i tessen uffiren n tmetti taqbaylit. Tigi, d snat n trumyin, xedment d tifremliyin deg sbiṭar n Micli acḥal n yiseggasen. D ayen i tt-yeǧǧan nettat d tmidawt-is tekcem-itent leḥmala n teqbaylit, dɣa cemmrent i yiɣallen akken ad gent adlis meqqren i uselmed n tmaziɣt s tarrayin ifazen d tugniwin icebḥen, s ubrid n tusnalmudt, d win iwumi semmant TIZI WWUCCEN. Tigi d Madeleine Allaine akked Lucienne Brousse, taneggarut-a, temmut ass n umhad yezrin ɣef usemmud n 88 n yiseggasen di tmaneɣt n Fransa, Paris. Tella d tamḥaddit n ugerruj adelsan n teqbaylit. Ad yeqqim yisem-is deg umezruy ɣer tama n wid akk i d-yernan abaɣur i tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Ad testeɛfu di talwit.

  Khaled. A 

  
 Tella-d ssmana-ya tfaska umi qqaren ussan n tewlaft deg Wehran neɣ « Les journées de la photo d’Oran » seg wass n sem 1 furar ar acer 3 deg-s. D tazrigt i d-yuɣalen i tikkelt tis sebɛa deg temdint n Wehran.

  Tettwahegga-d aseggas-a sɣur tarbaɛt ISOCLUB (tarbaɛt n tewlaft n tiddukkla Les Nomades Algériens) s tallelt n Usudu Arumi deg Wehran (IFO-CCF). D tafaska tagraɣlant, imi i d-tessemliliy yal aseggas ugar n 400 n yiwellafen i d-yettasen seg yal tama n Lezzayer akked lberrani.

  Aseggas-a, yella-d wahil meqqren, gar yisaragen d temsikniyen yemgaraden d temliliyin n lxedma (les ateliers). Ma d idgan ideg i d-tella tfaska-a, ad naf Asudu Arumi di Wehran, Asalay Ẓabana d tdukkla Les Nomades, seg 10h n ṣṣbeḥ almi d 18h n tmeddit. Aṭas seg wid iruḥen walan s lqerbb, imi tiwwura ldint akk i yimdanen. Tetturaju daɣen temsizelt n tewlaft i ikecmen dima deg tfaska-a, maca d tin ara d-yilin deg wussan n 24 ar 27 seg furar.

 Aṭas n temsikniyin d yisaragen i d-yellan 
 Iwakken ad iwenneɛ wahil-a adelsan, ad d-sfaydin u ad d-awin ugar n yisallen wid iḥemmlen awellef d tugna. Llan-d waṭas n yisaragen d temsikniyin ilmend n waya, ɣef teɣzi n kraḍ n wussan-a. Ma nebder-d kan timsikent i d-sneɛten yilmeẓyen n terbaɛt “Mammouth photographie Club, (MPC)”, seknen-d ahil-nsen deg umraḥ n usudu arumi, segzan-d s lqerb ayen icudden ɣer tewlaft d yiberdan i d-yewwi ɣef uwellaf ad ten-yeḍfer akken ad d-yeffeɣ d asadar. 

 Akken daɣen i tekki terbaɛt n “Trekking and Adventures in Algéria” s leqdicat-nsen yemxalafen, umren ayendin wid iwalan leqdic-a. Ayen i yernan lbenna i temlilit-a, d akken kkin deg-s waṭas n wudmawen seg tmura n berra, akken daɣ i llan wid icerken amahil akked yizzayriyen. Ma d isaragen, ad d-nebder win yexdem Mass Sofiane Bakouri s usentel (Amek ara snerniɣ asenfar-inu di twellaft).

 Akken i tga yiwen n usarag Massa Amira Hamdane (Abrid ɣer tugna). Seg tama-ines, yewwi-d Reza Deghati awal ɣef tarrayin tigejdanin i d-yessuffuɣen awellaf ifazen. Ma d iswi n tfaska-a, “ D tukci n wazal i tewlaft d tulmisin-is d usugen n uwellaf akken ad yili usnerni n tmussni n wid iqeddcen, iḥemmlen taɣult-a, acku akken neẓra, d yiwet gar yiḥricen n yidles ladɣa taggara-ya imi tennerna tetiknulujit”. I ɣ-d-yenna yiwen gar yimsuddsen n temlilit-a.

<p style="text-align:right">  Kh. A 

  
 D uguren imeqqranen i d-ttmagaren wid yeznuzuyen aplastik, seld mi tekker taggara-a tegrawla deg ssuq n uzenz d tiɣin. Yal yiwen yettnadi amek ara yesselhu tikli n uxeddim-is i simmal irennu tuɛert, ladɣa i yilemẓiyen i d-yessufɣen timacinin s ttawilat n Ansej d Anem. Ugten nezzeh yilemẓiyen-a i yeddmen acqirrew ɣas ma ẓran ad ttwalasen deg ddin i yewwi-d ad yebdu uxelles-ines deg tfada i d-yettunefken. Aya dɣa iga-asen-d seg wakud yezrin timḍerrit seld mi yenqes umahil-nsen, ur ufin win ara yaɣen sselɛa-nsen s ssuma ara ten-iɛawnen, ur sɛin swayes ara aɣen tin n wid i tt-yeznuzuyen. Armi llan ttuḥettamen tikwal, ɣas xesren, ad zzenzen s terxes neɣ ad d-aɣen s leɣla akken ur ḥebbsen ara axeddim. D aɣilif i d-yesnernan tteqlaq i widak i iwalan imanen-nsen nṭerren, imi ḥsan ma ikemmel lḥal akka, ur ssawaḍen ad d-skecmen adrim swayes ara xellsen ddin-nsen iwumi i d-yettqarab lawan. Ula d urrif yekki deg-sen, qqaren-d nutni ur yelli llum fell-asen skud xeddmen akk ayen iwumi zemren. Maca, d imsaɣen i ulac, imi ula d luzinat timeqqranin, i yexḍan Ansej d Anem, jebbden seg tama-nniḍen. Nnig waya, aṭas i yettwalin ugur-nniḍen deg tegnit i d-yettsaḥen i menwala, ɣas ur yesɛi agerdas (diplôme), ad yexdem s ttawilat Ansej d Anem. Ad d-nesmekti kan d akken nnejmaɛen ussan iɛeddan deg Tizi Uzzu wat Ansej d Anem i wakken ad ḥudden ɣef yimanen-nsen, ad as-inin i udabu, ur zmiren ara ad xellsen ayen ideg ttusalasen skud ur ileḥḥu umahil akken ilaq, ad as-ssutren daɣen ad asen-yesmeḥ ddin-nni. « Ula dagi, di Bgayet, ilaq ad d-nenṭeq, ad neccekti i uwanek ɣef yir addad deg nella. Leɛtab nerwa-t, abaɣur ulac ». I d-tenna yiwet n tlemẓit i ixedmen Ansej.

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, i yeggugen s wazal n 60 n yikilumitren ɣer Unẓul-asamar n Bgayet, tebda iseggasen-a ineggura, tettgerriz lḥala n yiberdan. Abeɛda segmi ttwadlen s ugudrun akk yiberdan iɣiwanen deg-s, am win n Tɛinsert, Tigratin, Lmerj Iɣil, neɣ daɣen Taregragt, Bumejber d Burafaɛ. Ula d amihi yezga yella deg-s, tugart deg lemsaq n ubrid-nni iwumi ur yemmug uguḍrun. Ilaq ɣef tɣiwant-nneɣ, ad t-teg gar yiɣeblan imezwura akken ad yamed uwenneɛ-ines ». I d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel. Seg tama n tɣiwant, ɣef wawal n yiwen seg yimḍebbren-is, ur ttɛeṭṭilen ad as-kemmlen i ubrid-a imi aql-it di ddhen. Ma mačči aseggas-a, ad d-yili waya tazwara n 2019.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Imezdaɣ n temdint tajḍidt n 556 n tnezduɣin salhi I i d-yezgan deg usamer n temdint n tizi Uzzu, ibɛden s wazal n 6 kl ɣef tlemmast n temdint, yerkb-iten lɣiḍ meqqren ɣef liḥala n temdint-agi yenḥafen aṭas deg yal aḥric n tuddert, ladɣa laɛḍil ixedmen srabes n lgaz, trisiti akked waman i usiweḍ n lecɣal-agi n tudert n yal ass ɣer tnezduɣin. Deg terza- nneɣ ɣer temdint-agi, ayen yeṭṭfen lewḥi-nneɣ s waṭas, d tiwaculin i yettagmen aman seg berra n tnezduɣin, yal wa d acu d allal i d-yewwi i wakken ad t-yaččar. Tamdint-agi n 556 n tnezduɣin, sɛan lexsas deg waṭas n temsal, ladɣa deg tḥuna yemxalafen d leqhawi, d yir liḥala n yibarden s sebba n ikumya yessufuɣen akal seg yisenfaren ijdiden yellan deg salḥi II d salḥi III. Aɣbel-nniḍen icuɣben imezdaɣ, d timḍiqin ustaɛfu, d temḍiqin n tzegzewt (places vertes) ur tesɛi ara temdint-agi ideg ara ilin, akka d kra n yiseggasen, azal n 1800 n tnezduɣin. Sawaḍen yimezdaɣ tiɣri i yimdḍebbren n lwilaya i wakken ad rren lewhi-nsen ɣer temdint-agi i uwennaɛ n liḥala n tuddert-nsen. Asenfar agi yebdan deg useggas n 2008, i yettuɛeggnen ad yettwaxdem deg 36 n wagguren ( 2012), yella-d deg-s laɛḍil meqqren , imi ur kcimen ara imezdaɣ ɣer tnezduɣin-nsen armi d tazwara n useggas 2017, akka u mazal asenfar-agi n Salḥi l urɛad yekfi. Atas n widak yuɣen tinezduɣin deg Salḥi l, ur d-kcimen ar ass-a ɣer tnezduɣin – nsen s sebba n yir liḥala n temdint-agi tajḍidṭ  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Mebɛed tazrigt tamezwarut n Tucbiḥt n Micli i yeḍran ilindi, ha-t-an ad teḍru tezrigt tis snat deg ussan-agi i d-iteddun. I lmend n waya, yebda ujerred d win ass-nni n 20 deg yennayer 2018, ad yeddu alamma d ass n 20 deg furar2018. Ma yella d afran n tucbiḥt, ha-t-an ad yili deg wass agraɣlan n tmeṭṭut 8 deg meɣres 2018. I tid teɛna temsalt, ad ruḥent ɣer uzaduɣ n yilmeẓyen Ǧerǧer n Ɛin El Ḥemmam i wakken ad jerrdent iman-nsent. Ilaq ad ilint gar 16 d 25 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-nsent , daɣen ad ilint, zedɣent di tɣiwant n Micli. Ma ɣef wamek ara d-yili ufran n tucbiḥt, ḍeffren yimsuddsen ilugan n temsizzelt i yettilin deg umadal, yecban tamussni igerrzen deg taɣulin yemxallafen, cbaḥa n wudem d tfekka , aseḍṣu yelhan, taqcict, ilaq ad tili tesɛa 1,65 m neɣ ugar di teɣzi. Ilaq, daɣen, ad tili ur texdim ara yakan acelleḥ n tujjya i lmend n cbaḥa, akken daɣen ilaq ad tissin ad temmeslay akken iwata imi ad d-tessbeggen tameṭṭut n Micli d tmeṭṭut taqbaylit s umata. Akken i d aɣ-d-iberreḥ yiwen seg yimḍebbren n temsizzelt, d akken ad ilin yinaẓuren ara yecnun ass n ufran n tucbiḥt n Micli. I usmekti kan, di tezrigt tamezwarut, isem n tucbiḥt yuɣal i Massa Ait Ali Mélissa .

  S.Yamani 

  
 Ussan-a yezrin, usan-d kra n yisallen i yesferḥen iselmaden imaynuten n useggas aɣurbiz 2017/2018, i d-yewwin 

 amsizwer n usɣer, llan deg wumuɣ n uraǧu (liste d’attente). Ɣas ma aṭas i isebren, qqimen acḥal war axeddim, yelḥeq-d wass deg i asen-tessawel tenmehla n usegmi n twilayt n Bgayet akken yal yiwen, ad yeṭṭef amḍiq-is deg rebɛa n tɣemmar n waɣir. Dɣa, ayen i asen-d-yeslalen tumert taggara-a, d mi ḥsan aẓayer-nsen, ɣef wakken i d-qqaren, yuɣal am win n widak yellan cwiṭ d iqburen deg lxedma-a. Meḥsub, mačči ɛeddan kan s termit yettunefk-asen ubaɣur n wid i yesɛan ugar n termit-nni, wanag tanmehla n usegmi, tesɛedda-ten amzun qedcen yakan kra n yiseggasen. Tessuli aẓayer-nsen, ur ttuneḥsaben ara d ibujaden. Isalli-nniḍen, yeqqar-d ha-t-an serḥen-d i kra n tedrimt seg tjernant-nsen tamayyurt i yellan tewḥel acḥal d ayyuren, neɣ segmi bdan asɣer deg ctember 2017. « Tura nebda nettḥulfu i teɛkemt tettifsus ɣef yirawen-nneɣ. Ulamma nger deg uqeddic mebla axelles, tikwal nteɣɣed

 iberdan, nettruḥu mebɛid akken ad nesɣer, maca ayen i d-yellan taggara-a, yekkes-aɣ cwiṭ kra n leɛtab, yessenqes-aɣ seg 

 unezgum i nella nettawi d imalasen-aya ». I d-tenna yiwet n tselmadt d tamaynut. Ad d-nesmekti d akken iselmaden merra imaynuten, bdan axdam n usileɣ segmi yebda useggas aɣurbiz, imi ɣas ini tikwal yal ddurt, ad gen asileɣ-nni deg walbaɛḍ n yiɣerbazen n waɣir n Bgayet. Aya iban, itekkes-asen ayendin seg wakud-nsen n usteɛfu, imi ula deg yimuras yezrin, wwten-d ssmana d asileɣ ɣef umaḍal n uselmed. Iban daɣen iḍurr-iten cwiṭ seg tama-nniḍen, imi aṭas seg-sen i yesɣarayen deg yidigan ibeɛden ɣef tnezduɣin-nsen, i yettuḥettamen ad gganen bɛid ɣef wat yixxamen-nsen neɣ ɣef yimawlan. Ladɣa ma nebder-d aɣilif-nni n ubdal neɣ n umbaddel i d-yettilin s tmussniwin d tudmet. Aṭas n yimukan i d-iferrɣen i wid yesselmaden mebɛid ɣef yixxamen-nsen, ‘’maca takadimit n Bgayet tferreq-iten kan s tmussni’’, ɣef wawal n yiselmaden s timmad-nsen i terza taluft. 

  Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Ɣas ma deg wussan ineggura sḥarsen srabes n uswaḍ n lexdma n tenzuytd d srabes n useḥbiber ɣef umsider (consommateur) d tnemehla n tenzuyt ɣef lemḍarra iseg d-gellun yisufar n tuččit ixesren, ɣef tdawsa n umdan, ladɣa isufar n uyefki d yisuddim-is deg tallit-agi unebddu. Icudd lewhi deg tazwara ɣer tenzuyt yeffɣen i usaḍuf. Deg wakud anda tiseddarin n lḥamu ttɛeddint tikwal akin i 40, ad naf ttwafesren yisufar n tuččit i uɣebbar d yitij, deg leryuf n yibarden akked leswaq yemgaraden, yecban timellalin, iselman akked yisuddimen n uyefki. Isufar-agi i iḥuza yiṭij d uɣebbar, xesren sɛan aṭas n usemdu (effet) ɣef tdawsa n umdan ɣef leḥsab n yimusnawen n tdawsa. S lexsaṣ n tmussni d uwelleh, ttaɣen yimdanen mebla ma ḥsan s yinalkamen n yisufar-agi ɣef tdawsa-nsen, wa iɛemmed, wa ittekka. Aɣbel, yeɛna ula d tiḥuna n tenzuyt, imḍebren n tḥuna ur sɛin ara yal tanuggit ( conscience). Deg kra n tḥuna n tudrin n temḍiqt n Leqbayel, llan yisufer n tuččit yemuffgen (périmés) acḥal-aya mazal-iten deg tḥuna, ttwafesren i tenzuyt. Deg yiwet n tḥanut n taddart n A Zɛim, yettabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Mɛatqa iɣur nekcem, nerra tamawt i kra n yisufar n tuččit, dɣa nufa tiqraɛtin n lgazuz iwumi tekfa tallit n usadur deg useggas n 2017. Isufar isuddimen n uyefki, xesren ugar n 5 n wagguren deg umsismeḍ, ṭumatic n tebwadt yemmuten ugar n sin 2 n yiseggasen mazal ar ass-a tettwafser. Ayen yugaren yakk tigi, ɣef leḥsab n kra n yimsidren, d akken imɛelmen n tḥuna n tenzuyt sexsayen i frigidiren deg yiḍ, i wakken ur ttxelisen ara aṭas n trisiti, mebla ma ḥṣan s twaɣiyin i seg ara d-glunt tigawin yecban tigi ɣef tdawsa n umsidren. Akka i d addad deg tuget n tɣiwanin n ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu, imɛalmen n tḥuna n tenzuyt ur tqadaren ara ilugan n tezdeg d lemḥadra n umsidrem, aya dayen i d-wekkden srabes n tenmehla n tenzuyt n Tizi Uzzu.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Ulamma meẓẓi di leɛmer maca leqdic-is adelsan yugar-it. D ilemẓi n 13 n yiseggasen di leɛmer, d amɣar azemni deg wawalen d tmedyazt. Yettcebbiḥ isefra-s s ṣṣut-is ḥlawen mi ara ten-id-yeqqar, wagi d Hocine Hadjam.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: D acu-t Hocuine Hadjam, uqbel   ad yili d amedyaz ? 

  Hocine Hadjam:  Uqbel ad iliɣ d amedyaz, lliɣ d anelmad deg uɣerbaz amezwaru, ma d tura deg uɣerbaz alemmas, d anaddal daɣen waddal aïkido. D aqcic ilemẓi, iḥemmlen aṭas taɣuri akked tira. Bdiɣ tamedyazt deg useggas n 2016, imir-nni lliɣ qqareɣ deg useggas wis 5 n ulmud amenzu.

  Amek armi i d-tufiḍ   iman-ik d amedyaz ? 

 Asmi liɣ deg uɣerbaz amenzu, qqareɣ isefra-nni iwezzlanen yellan daxel n udlis n tmaziɣt, uɣaleɣ ḥefḍeɣ-ten. Tikkelt tamezwarut ideg i d-neṭqeɣ s usefru, d winna n Si Muḥend u Mḥend “Igider Amerẓu”, deg tesnawit n Tasaf Ugemmun. Syin akkin, ɛerḍeɣ ad aruɣ akka kra imeslayen, wa icudd ɣer gma-s wayeḍ d asenṭeḍ kan. Ciṭ, ciṭ, armi i d-ufiɣ iman-iw xeddmeɣ isefra i yiman-iw.

  Ma yella win uɣur tlemdeḍ   neɣ i k-yettɛwanen di tmedyazt? 

 Di tazwara, bdiɣ sefruyeɣ s talɣa-nni n A/A/B n Si Muḥend u Mḥend, ufiɣ iman-iw deg-s dɣa sefruyeɣ s talɣa-agi. Lemdeɣ tamedyazt ɣer Si Muḥend u Mḥend akked Muḥua, ula ma ur ten-d-lḥiqeɣ ara, maca lemdeɣ ɣur-s s ttawil n Internet. Ma d aɛiwen, yal tikkelt mi ara xedmeɣ asefru, ad as-tefkeɣ i Hamid Ait Slimane akked Smail Aoudia, i wakken iyi-t-id-seɣtin wa iyi-d-fken timuɣliwin-nsen, armi i d-wwḍeɣ ɣer tizi n wass-a. Dɣa, ad ferseɣ tagnit ad asen-nreɣ tajmilt meqqren i nutni, imi iyi-ttɛawanen aṭas.

  I deg umawal, ma yella   win ik-yettɛwanen ? 

 Deg umawal, ulac win iyi-ttɛwanen. Si tama ttaɛraḍeɣ ad seḥbibreɣ ɣef wawalen iqburen, ma si tama-nniḍen seqdaceɣ awalen atraren i wakken ad kecmen di tmetti, yerna ur seɣdameɣ ara ireṭṭalen.

  Ma tssefruyeḍ s   lebɣi-k neɣ iɛedda-k rray? 

 Tuget n wayen ssefruyeɣ yettas-d s tehregt (inspiration) neɣ mi ara d-yessuḍ waḍu-nni n wallaɣ-iw akken i d as-qqaren kra n yifennanen. Ad qqimeɣ kan akka, alamma yerza-d yiwen usefru s aqerru dɣa din ad taruɣ. Maca llant teswiɛin ideg ttaruɣ s lebɣi akka i t-id-tenniḍ, amedya n tejmilin i ttaruɣ. Di tegnatin yecban tigi ttruẓuɣ aqerru-iw i wakken ad d-afeɣ imeslayen iwulen i usefru, maca ttnadiɣ-ten-id. Ugur yettilin deg yisefra-a, d amek ara tebduḍ asefru-nni, axaṭer mi t-tebdiḍ weḥd-s ara ikemmel.

  Yal mi ara tili tejmilt i   ucennay meqqren, ula   d kečč tettaraḍ-as tajmilt   s usefru. Sfehmeɣ-d amek ? 

 Ula aqbayli ur d-nekkir ara s yicennayen-nneɣ imeqqranen yecban El Hassnaoui, Slimane Azem, Matoub Lounes (ad ten-yerḥem Rebbi), Idir Lounes Ait Mengeullat (ad yessiɣzif Rebbi d leɛmer-nsen). Ulamma nekk ur ten-id-lḥiqeɣ ara maca ufiɣ imawlan-iw ḥemmlen-ten dɣa ula d nekk ḥemmleɣ-ten. Syin akkin yal tikkelt mi ara tuɣal tejmilt i ucennay ameqqran n teqbaylit, neɣ mi ara yecnu, ttareɣ-as ula d nekk tajmilt s usefu. Acu kan, akken yebɣu yili lḥal riɣ-as tajmilt, maca ur sawḍeɣ ara ad as-ttreɣ akken i tt-yuklal i lmend n wayen i d-yefka.

  Tettalseḍ-asen tira i yisefra-k neɣ tettaǧaḍ-ten akken   kan i d-usan? 

 Ih, ttaɛwadeɣ-asen tira, mi ara faqeɣ txuṣ tɣawsa neɣ ameslay ur yeddi d gma-s, ttbeddiɣ ula d imeslayen. Ur ttaǧeɣ ara asefru akken kan i d-yerza s allaɣ-iw, ttbeddileɣ-as i lmend n lexṣaṣ yellan deg-s. Ula d asmi, iyi-d-ttakken yimedyazen-agi i d-bedreɣ yakkan tamiɣliwin-nsen, xeddmeɣ ayen iyi-mlen, tikwal ula deg wawalen.

  Ma tettekkaḍ yakkan   di kra n tfaska n tmedyazt ? 

 Ur ttekkeɣ ara di tfaska n tmedyazt, imi meẓẓiyeɣ di leɛmer, ur iyi-tettunefk ara tegnit ad ttekkiɣ di temsizzelt. Maca ɣriɣ isefra berra n temsizzelt, yecban tinna n Udrar n Fad di Bgayet. Iswi-innu mačči d attekki deg kra n tfaska neɣ awway n kra n warraz, maca d ajmeɛ n yimsefiden d usfreḥ-nsen.

  D acu i d asirem-ik   sya ɣer sdat di tmedyazt? 

 Asirem-iw di tmedyazt, ad awḍeɣ d amedyaz ameqqran yecban Si Muḥend u Mḥend neɣ Muḥya. Ssarameɣ ad iliɣ d acennay d amaru n tmedyazt taqbaylit. Tura akka, ttheggiɣ yiwet n tesfift n yisefra ara d-yeffɣen sya ɣer sdat.

  Uqbel ad nsali, hdu-aɣ-d   tukkist si yiwen gar yisefra-k? 

 Tukkist n usefru ara awen-d-hduɣ d snat n tseddarin timezwura n usefru i wumi semmeɣ “Tudert n umedyaz”, ha-tt-an ihi:

 <em>Yiwen yiḍ ur necbi uḍan</em>

 <em>Refdeɣ imru la sefraweɣ</em>

 <em>Mektaɣ-d ayen iɛeddan</em>

 <em>Di leɛmer-iw s anda sawḍeɣ</em>

 <em>Ttruɣ ɣef temẓi iyi-ǧǧan</em>

 <em>Ɣef temɣer la ttxemimeɣ</em>

 <em>Ziɣ ddunit d awal kan</em>

 <em>Luleɣ-d i wacu ara mteɣ</em>

  Awal-ik n taggara 

 Ad k-snimmreɣ aṭas ɣef tdiwennit-agi a gma Ghani, sarammeɣ ad iliɣ fessuseɣ ɣef yimeɣriyen n Uɣmis-agi n Yimaziɣen d La Dépeche de Kabylie. Tanemmirt s tussda, i wid iyi-ḥemmlen, iyi-ttɛawanen daɣen.

  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Ghani 

  
 Seggran-d yijajiḥen n tmes yekkren deg kra n lwilayat n tmurt n Lezzayer, segmi tekcem tallit n unebdu armi d ass-nni n lexmis 18 yulyu 2019, ddeqs n txessarin meqqren. Ugar n 4260 ikeṭṭaren n tẓegwa i yerɣan deg wakal aɣelnaw, ɣef wakken it-d-yenna Unemhal Amatu n Tẓegwa Ali Mahmoudi, i d-iberḥen s undah n 578 n tmesiwin deg wakal akk n tmurt, segmi yebda unebdu. 

 Am wakken diɣ i d-glan yijajiḥen-agi n tmes, s tmerɣiwt n ṭṭjur n lfakya, iɣersiwen d yigran n nneɛma, maca ur skelsen ara srabes-a tamettant n yimdanen s yijajiḥen n tmes. Gar lwilayat i ḥuzant temsiwin-agi, ad d-nebder Tizi Uzzu, Bgayet, Tubiret, Burǧ Buɛrariǧ. Ma d lwilaya yeneṭren aṭas s tmes di tallit-agi i d-nebder d lwilaya n Tisemsilt, ideg rɣan wazal n 1126 ikeṭṭaren n tẓegwa. 

  Tiwaɣiyin n yiberdan, glant-d s lmut n 16 medden  

 Mazal twaɣiyin n yiberdan, ḥeggsent tirwiḥin n yimdanen yal ass. Deg wazal n ddurt, yeddan gar 9 alamma d 15 deg waggur-agi n yulyu ideg nella, mmuten 16 n yimdanen d wazal n 466 n yimejraḥ deg 384 n twaɣiyin i d-yeḍran. Ɣef leḥsab wulɣu n Tmehla n Yiɣallen n Laman, taḥawact-agi tuli s waṭas ɣef tin n ddurt uqbel-is. Imi di tazwara n waggur-a, ala 331 n twaɣiyin i d-yellan, yeɛni rrant s wazal n 53 n twaɣiyin n ubrid. 

 Am wakken diɣ i yennerna wuṭṭun n yimejraḥ s wazal 69 n yimdanen ɣer tama n zyada n 3 n yimdanen i yemmuten. Ma ɣef timental tigejdanin, yenna-d wulɣu-agi, belli azal n 95% n yisehwa-agi n ubrid, ssebbat-nsen d yir tanehhart , aɣiwel neɣ tazla deg tnehhert akked ɛeggu n yinehharen… atg. 
  A. A. 

  
 Ula lemmer ad d-mmeγ kra n yiwet seg sut tinzar yezgan ulint d asawen, ad as-teẓẓel afus-is akken ad yecḍeḥ yid-s, yugi, yeqqaṛ-asent: ‘’D tagi, d tagi kan ukud ara ceḍḥeγ! S nnig lewqam, d taxessaṛt”. Akken qqarrsen yidaṛrren-nsen seg uzedwi d uhuzzu n tqesrit, d tikli ad tekfu tmeγra, tekker ad tuγal s axxam, ira ad yeddu yid-s, ad tt-iwanes deg ubrid, acku ira daγen ad iẓer ansi i tt-d-wwin i tt-ilan.Tesγaffel-it kan almi yezzi udem-is γer tama-nniḍen, tekka tawwurt tessenser iman-is, teṭṭef abrid-is s tazla, terwel. Yemdekwal-d kan, iger tamawt teffe&amp;gamma,; ulac-itt dinna, yeḍfeṛ-itt si s deffir. Akken d tikli ad tt-awḍen yidaṛṛen-is, tuγ-itt tegnitt tessaweḍ yakan γer sdat uxxam, iwala-tt mi akken tekcem deg yiseqqif, tezger-it kan, tekcem tessedreg aqeṛṛu-is deg yiwet n texxamt n yetbiren. γas ur yessegmeḍ ara s tmuγli, ur iwala ara sani terra, maca icumm-itt γer din i tekcem, yurğa-tt dinna melmi ad d-ffe&amp;gamma,; almi i d-yejba baba-s n Mm Yiγiγden, yufa-d mmi-s n ugellid yettṛağu taqcict, yenna-as: ‘’Ttnadiγ yiwet n teqcict, ad tili tekcem γer texxamt –agi n yetbiren, teffer’’. Argaz, yekker iγḍel-d igenni γef tmurt, yesgerjej yakk taxxamt-nni, yeγḍel-itt-id, yesteqsa ul-is, yenna-as: ‘’Tezmer ahat ad tili d Mm Yiγiγden?’’ Terreẓ akk texxamt, ulac dacu ufan. Uγalen kecmen s axxam, ufan tuγ yiwet n teftilt d tamecṭuḥt kan akka, ula d tafat-is, tettak anzi γer tin ttwalin wid yezεillimen. Mm Yiγiγden, teẓẓel γef yiri n lkanun am tnamit, udem-is γumment-tt tbuxin. A zi&amp;gamma,; teffeγ si tewwurt n deffir n texxamt-nni, tewweḍ s temsizzelt γer ddaw useklu-nni i γer tettεenni, tekkes iceṭṭiḍen yakk d tarkasin-nni telsa, tesres-iten s ufella uẓekka n yemma-s, yeddem-iten ufṛux-nni acebḥan, nettat terra-d ijerbuben-nni iqbuṛen i yidisan-is, tuγal s lemḥirat s amḍiq-is n tguni, teḍla tibuxin i wudem-is, teẓẓel am ulaxeṛt γef yiri n lkanun, terratt i lweεd ucexxeṛ… Tettkemmil

   Yerra-tt-id seg talmanit Essaid Ait Maamar 

  
 Seld rray i ddmen yiɛeggalen n taddart n At Zɛim, yetabaɛen ɣer tɣiwant n Mɛatqa, ɣef utteki deg temsizzelt Aissat Rabah n taddart zeddigen n tmurt n Leqbayel. I lmend n waya, ihi, tessuddes-d teseqqamut n taddart s tallelt n yimezdaɣ, ass n sem iɛeddan, 16 deg waggur n unbir 2018, yiwet n temhelt n usizdeg d ugerrez n taddart. Fkan-d yimezdaɣ n taddart afud meqqren ɣer yidis n yiɛeggalen n teseqqamut deg temhalt-agi n usizdeg, anda ssawḍen ad sizedgen amur meqqren n tregwa n ubrid ameqqran icudden talemmast n tɣiwant ɣer taddart n Tizi Tzeggart, abrid i d-yeggran deg yir liḥala seld iḥemmalen n waman i d-yewwten s ṭṭaqa deg ddurt iɛeddan. Ɣas ma asizdeg n tregwa d ṭrufat n yiberdan, d timsal yeɛnan srabes n tɣiwant, maca seld lexṣas n yixeddamen deg tɣiwant, xedmen-t yimezdaɣ s lḥir d tebɣest. Segmi yuli wass, beggsen yimezdaɣ ɣer umahil-a, yal wa s wayen i yezmer : wa s yiɣallen, wa s ttawilat n usiweḍ, wa s tallelt n tedrimt i wakken ad teddu temhelt akken iwata. Ula d iɛeggalen n Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Mɛatqa, fkan-d afus n tallel deg leqdic-agi, s usemres n ttawilat n usiweḍ n yiḍuman. Yebda leqdic n usizdeg d uqeɛɛed n tregwa d leryuf n yiberdan seg tazwara n taddart : seg umḍiq iwumi qqaren Amalu n Ccix alamma d anda tekfa taddart, ugar n 25 n yikamyunen n yiḍuman i d-yettwakksen seg tregwa n taddart. Akkal-a akked yiḍuman yemgaraden, ɣelqen yakk tiregwa d iɣezran n taddart. Ad yettili leqdic-agi n usizdeg d uqeɛɛed yal taggara n ddurt sɣur imazdaɣ d yiɛeggalen n teseqqamut n taddart. Iswi n temhalin yecban tigi, d awenneɛ n tudert n yimezdaɣ, d aseḥbiber ɣef twenndtṭ d ugama. Rnu ɣef waya, d axlaq n lḥir d ifadden ɣer yimezdaɣ. I wakken, daɣen, ad ḥerzen amḍiq deg umeḥzizwar deg temsizzelt n taddart zeddigen deg tmurt n Leqbayel.

  A. Z. 

  
 Mebɛed awal i d-yeffɣen, sya u sya, ɣef yiɛeggalen n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣelnaw i yugin ad qeblen asuter-nni n ukabar PT, i yeṭṭalaben anegmu n tmaziɣt akked uselmed-is deg yal tama tmaurt, aṭas i iɣaḍ lḥal, ladɣa inelmaden n yal aḥric n leqraya. Anec-a, yeglan-d s tnekra n tmesbaniyin deg waṭas n tɣiwanin n tmurt n leqbayel. Ṭṭaqa n tmesbaniyin-agi, d inelmaden n tesnawiyin i tent-id-iheggan, akken ad sbegnen lɣiḍ-nsen mgal rray-agi. Xas ulamma ttemxallafent tenfaliyin gar : “Ma ulac tamaziɣt ulac, ulac, ulac” , “Tamaziɣt la d-tessawal, rret-as awal” , “Mačči di ssuq i tt-ufiɣ, laṣel-iw d amaziɣ” , meɛna iswi d yiwen. Deg yal tikkelt, inelmaden ttessburruyen senjaq n yimaziɣen di tufɣiwin-nsen imi d azamul n timeɣnest ɣef tutlayt d yidles. Bdant-d temesbaniyin si lwilaya n Bgayet, bbaɛzaqent di Tizi Uzz , Tuviret syin di Tbatent akked di Stif. Ula d Agezdu n tutlayt d yidles Amaziɣ n Tizi Uzzu, yessawel-d i yiwet n tmesbanit i wass-a n letnayen 11-12-2017 ara yebdun seg tesdawit n Ḥesnawa. Ma yella d tasdawit n Bgayet, nettat tekcem, yakan, deg wass-is wis 6 n usunded . Ad d-nesmekti kan, d akken Asqamu unnig n timmuzɣ yewwet-d s leqseḥ deg yisallen-agi i d-yeffɣen ɣef tmaziɣt u yenna-d d asluɣu n teswiɛt i yebɣa baba-is.

  S.Y. 

  
 Ṭṭuqtent tlufa n tmenɣit deg wussan-agi ineggura deg tmurt. Dɣa deg wass n Lεid tamezyant iεeddan, i d-yellan deg ttlata iεeddan, 4 deg waggur n yulyu 2019, yettwanɣa yiwen ilemẓi (H. M.) yessεan 40 n yiseggasen deg leεmer-is. Yezdeɣ yilemẓi-agi yettwanɣan ɣef lewhi n tmeddit deg taddart n Iḥddaden, yetabaεen ɣer tɣiwant n Mεatqa. 

 Ɣaf leḥsab n yisallen n yimezdaɣ yellan deg umḍiq anda yettwanɣa ilemẓi, tella-d twaɣit seld cwal i d-yellan gar sin n yidisan ɣef temsal ur nesεi ara yakk azal, maca (S. D.) yellan yettidir deg tmurt n Marikan, i ihelken deg walaɣ-is (yedderwec) ɣef leḥsab dima n yisallen n yimezdaɣ n temḍiqt-agi, yeddem-d lmus, u yefka ugar n kraḍ n tyitiwin s aεebuḍ d unegzum n yiẓewran n yifassen n yilemẓi i yeẓlen,sakin, deg temda n yidammen. 

 Sdat n talluft yecban d tagi, sawḍen yiɣallen n usellek ilemẓi ɣer uxxam n ttujya u llin srabes n yisertiyen yiwen n tsestent akken ad ẓren sebba n twaɣit-agi. Yeǧǧa-d yilemzi yettwanɣan tawaccult-is d warraw-is d igujilen, dɣa ula d imezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Mεatqa, ggran-d deg leḥzen meqqren, imi ilemẓi-agi, yella d win yezεan azal-is deg tmetti, yettqadaren aṭas, yetturba, ɣef leḥsab n yisallen n yimezdaɣ. Taluft-agi mačči d tamezwarut deg temḍiqt-agi n Leqbayel. 

 Dɣa deg waggur n Remḍan iεeddan, yiwet n tlemẓit n taddart n Iqubaεen, tettwanɣa deg uxxam-is s anda tezweǧ deg taddart n Carfa n Bahlul, deg Dayra n Iεzugen. Ɣef leḥsab n yisallen n srabes n laman, tilemzit-a, tenɣa-tt uletma-s n urgaz-is s tallelt n twacult-is d urgaz-is. Wwin srabes n laman tlata n yiεeggalen n twacult-agi ɣer lḥebs: argaz n tlemẓit, yemma-s d uletma-s. Akka, ssuturen yimawlan n tlemẓit deg teɣdemt, ad nadin ugar deg taluft, aṭas n temsal i mazal urεad frint. 
  Ali Zalouk  

  
 Asmi akken i trefdeḍ tawdect, i tensa tafat-ik. Tḥuza-k-id terṣast i yewwin iziɣer-inek. Refden-k yimeddukkal-ik gar yifassen-nsen, ɣillen ad ɛetqen deg ṛṛuḥ, maca tesleqfeḍ. Texsi tafat-ik akken kan tuɣ. Imɣi n tudert-ik, yegma yeǧǧuǧeg, din din qquren wafriwen-is yeqqur yisegmi. Temmuteḍ d ameɣras. Am kečč am 128 n yimeɣrasen-nniḍen yeɣlin yid-k, wa deffir wa. Ulac win yezgel ujajiḥ n Tefsut taberkant. Ayen i d-ineflen di lɣaci asmi akken i temmuteḍ di 12 maggu 2001, mačči am wass-a 12 magu2018. Aẓekka-k, qrib ad t-ttun medden, ala tasa tamcumt i d-idellun fell-as. Yal mi ara d-yaweḍ wass amcum, ad terfed icuḍaḍ-is, ad tṛuḥ ɣer dinna ad tettru. Akka i ak-teḍra a gma. Akka i teḍra i waṭas yellan am kečč. Xas ma tafekka-k truḥ, meɛna deg umezruy yura yisem-ik, ad yeqqim i lebda. S umagrad-agi, bɣiɣ ad d-ḥkuɣ ass-inek aneggaru, am wakken telliḍ teddreḍ gar-aneɣ. Deg yiles n gma-k uriɣ-d : ‘’Tlul-d ass n 19 di ɣuct 1978 di taddart Agarsafen, taɣiwant n At-Yeǧǧer. Akken tettwanɣaḍ s rsaṣ n yiǧadarmiyen n Buzgan di laɛmer-ik 23 n yiseggasen. Di 28 yebrir 2001, teffɣeḍ-d seg uxxam, temlaleḍ-d kra n yimeddukkal-is di taddart, dɣa tṣubbem ɣer tɣiwant n At Yeǧǧer, akken ad trekbem, ad truḥen ɣer Buzgan, ad tewdeḍ awdec mgal iǧadarmiyen seg wul-nni yugin tamḥeqranit d ddel. Uqbel ad tsubbeḍ, teččiḍ imekli-inek, teṭṭef-d tawlaft-inek taneggarut. Teǧǧiḍ-asen awal i yimeddukkal-ik, tenniḍ-asen: ‘Akka meqqar ma mmuteɣ sɛiɣ tawlaft’. Truḥem, tsubbem ɣer Buzgan. Mi tewḍem, lewhi n 13h00 n uzal, tufam yekker ccwal gar yilmeẓyen akked yiǧadarmiyen. Tkecmeḍ ɣer tlemmast n yilmeẓyen, ur terwileḍ ara. Teddmeḍ-d tawdect di lqaɛa, akken kan tesḥallef ad tewweteḍ, dɣa teɣliḍ ɣer lqaɛa, tawdect-nni tkemseḍ-tt deg ufus-ik, tugiḍ ad as-tebruḍ. Lɣaci, bdan ttsuɣun. Wwin-k gar yifassen-nsen, udem-ik yeččur d idammen. Tarsast, tḥuza-k-id deg umegreḍ. Sarsen-ak abeḥnuq i ljerḥ-inek yettcercuren d idammen. Syin akin, wwin-k ɣer sbiṭer n Yiɛezzugen, din subben-k ɣer sbiṭer n Tizi Uzzu. Teqqimeḍ dinna 15 n wussan, ur temḥaḥadeḍ ara deg usu-k. Ass n 12 di maggu 2001, tesleqfeḍ, qemmcent wallen-ik i lebda. Nemḍel-ik sdat n tewwurt n tɣiwant n At Yeǧǧer, akken yal win i d-iɛeddan syin ad iwali aẓekka-k. Maca, sḥasfeɣ, ass-a drus i ak-yettwalin, ala tasa tamcumt’’.

  Fahim Messaoudène 

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis iɛeddan, 18 deg yennayer 2018, i yuɣal s wudem unsib Mass Mustapha Tidjet d anemhal n walmas n unadi deg tutlayt akked yidles amaziɣ deg tesdawit n Bgayet. Mass Tidjet i yellan d aselmad deg tesdawit-agi, yettwasbedd sɣur anemhal amatu n unadi ussnan d unegmu, Pr Aourag Hafid, i d-yusan seg tneɣlaft, akked yimḍebber amezwaru n tesdawit n Bgayet. Ɣef wakken i d-nnan, ad yili umahil n ulmas-agi, yerza anadi d unegmu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ s wudem ussnan, ɣef waya, dɣa, ara ilin 7 n yiḥricen ara teɛnu temsalt-agi : tasnislit, amawal, tarrayin, tasuqqit, tasekla, tazrigt akked tiklujid s umata.
