  H.M. 

  
 Yettzid irennu umḍan n temliliyin tiseklanin taggara-a deg ukuẓ n tɣemmar n tmurt n yizwawen. Grent-d irebbi tuget n tddukkliwin tidelsanin i wahil-a s usuddes, qrib yal ddurt, n teɣlust taseklant akked walbaɛḍ n yimura seg tamiwin yemgaraden. Ahat, bdant snat n tddukkliwin anjar n ubrid d truẓi n usalu, tid n Bgayet d Tiɛwinin, akken kra n yimalasen ɣer sdat, ad ṭṭafarent yiwet deffir tayeḍ tddukkliwin-nniḍen, d timaynutin neɣ d tiqburin, s uheggi n ttiɛad-a aseklan seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ. Armi tura yuɣal d ansay deg ḥawla n tɣiwanin usihar-a aseklan. Ma nebder-d kra n temnaḍin i irefden aheggi n temliliyin-a tiseklanin, tella Buzgan, Bgayet, At Yanni, Aqbu, Melbu, Ccmini, Aweqqas d tiyaḍ. Amedya deg Uweqqas, ɣas ur sɛin yimheggiyen amḍan usdid, ahat ɛeddant akka tura 40 n temliliyin i d-yettuheggan segmi i d-iban uqeddic-a imalasan n tddukkla Azday Adelsan. Di Buzgan, ugar n temliliyin, armi yuɣal usihar-a yesɛa azayez ansayan. Ulamma acḥal i d-yeḍran d tigawin n ugdal tazwara, sɣur yinesdabuyen idiganen, maca s tddukkli n medden, i igan ula d tikliwin mgal aseḥbes n temliliyin tiseklanin, tuɣal tɛedda tidet, iɛedda rray n lɣaci. « Iwakken ad waliɣ asarag i yi-yehwan, tikwal ttaǧǧaɣ axeddim neɣ ttbeṭṭileɣ lecɣal i yi-d-yemmenden. Awi-d kan ur t-zeggleɣ ». I d-yenna yiwen seg wid yeṭṭafaren timliliyin-a. Dɣa, ula deg Usamar-anẓul n Bgayet, a-t-an tennulfa-d temlilit-nniḍen d tamaynut deg Lberj n Mira, ara yilin ɣef yiri tddukkla tilemẓit Itri n Ugergun. Seld asihar amezwaru i d-iga yiwen seg yimura n temnaḍt, ɛerḍen-d sem-a iɛeddan Mass Racid Ulebsir i d-yewwin asarag s uzwel “Acu i d-yeqqimen seg ssifat n teqbaylit? ». « D ayen igerrzen maḍi tnekkra-a n tddukkliwin i usnulfu n temliliyin tiseklalin. Nessaram kan ad ttwaɣeltent deg wayen yelhan, deg yidles-nneɣ. Wamma aheggi n teɣlust taseklant i usnerni n yidelsan-nniḍen, ur ttwaliɣ ara iwumi-tt. Lemmer ur d-tennulfa meqqar wala ». I d-yenna yiwen n urgaz seg Ayt Smaɛel.

  M. K. 

  
 Asuddis addalan (complexe sportif) n 50.000 n yimukan n Tizi Uzzu, iseg i d-tesfaydi terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n Leqbayel (JSK), ad d-yewjed deg wakud i as-d-yettuɛeggnen, di taggara n waggur n ɣuct i d-iteddun. Iberreḥ s waya, lwali n Tizi Uzzu Mahmoud Djamaa, i yerzan ɣur-s taggara n ddurt iɛeddan, anida i yessefqed aswir uɣur wwḍen lecɣal n usenfar-agi. Yenna-d deg tirza-agi-ines, belli ilaq ad d-yili uqader n wazemz n useḍru n usuddis-agi. Am wakken daɣen ilaq ad yewjed sya ɣer taggara n waggur n ɣuct 2019. 

 D asuddis addalan, ideg yella unnar yettawin 50 000 n yimukan, asensu….atg. Iberreḥ-d unemhal adigan n yilmeẓyen (DJS) n Tizi Uzzu, Abderrahmane Iltache, belli imuhal n usenfar-agi wwḍen ɣer 90% yerna, ma ulac kra n wugur seg ar imir-nni, asarir-a (infrastructure) ad d-yewjed deg Ɣuct. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, deg waggur n meɣres iɛeddan i sekben yakan 50 000 n yikersiwen n yimferǧen n unnar-agi meqqren, i d-igren s annar taluft n yisem-is.

 Imi imḍebbren n terbaɛt n JSK, nwan ad as-semmin ɣef yisem n ucennay Matoub Lounès, ma d kra n tamiwin-nniḍen, bɣant ad as-fkent isem-nniḍen. Ma d aselway n terbaɛt n JSK, Cherif Mellal, yemtawa d umsulɣu Guillaume Mulak i wakken ad yili d anemhal n usileɣ deg wammas n usileɣ n terbaɛt-agi. D amtawa ara yeddun ɣef teɣzi n 5 n yiseggasen, yetturaǧu ad yebdu axeddim-is deg waggur n yunyu i d-iteddun. D Guillaume, ara d-yelhin s usileɣ n yimurar ilmeẓyen ara d-tettrebbi terbaɛt-agi n yilmeẓyen n Leqbayel deg wammas anaddal, ara yilin deg tama n Wad Ɛisi. 

   Gh. A. 

  
 Fière Kabylie d ammud n tmucuha, tinefusin akked Yemma-s n ddunit i d-yessufeɣ Djamel Arezki ɣer tezrigin Tafat deg useggas 2017. D adlis i yura s snat n tutlayin : tamaziɣt, tafrensist, anda ara naf tlata n yiḥricen, amezwaru d Timucuha n leqbayel am Ɛli bu tlufa, Adrar aberkan, Tamacahut n yimekreḍ, Bejliman agujil, Maḥduk d Mahbul, Mm tuɛwijt n tqejjirin akked Tmacahut n Ɛli akked yemma-s taɣeddart. Ma deg uḥric wis sin, yura Djamel Arezki Tinfusin d tedyanin n yiɣersiwen, am Ddunit tetteddu d win ibedden ulamma baba-s d aɣyul, neɣ Uccen, izem d yilef, Ttif tilleli d laẓ wala tawant d tuqqna…atg. Aḥric aneggaru, Yemma-s n ddunit, yella deg-s Unẓar, Areṭṭal n taɣadt, Taɛkemt n umdan, Tala n waggazen, Wa ibennu, wa yetthuddu, syin d asteqsi ‘’I wacuɣer Leqbayel xeddmen azemmur ?’’ iɣef i d-yerra umara. Ɣef wakken i d-yenna umaru, yesqucceḍ-d ayen akka i d-yura srid seg yiɣbula, meḥsub seg yimi n yemma-s, daymi ula d taɣuri n udlis tusa-d fessuset u tjebbed ad tkemmleḍ tamacahut neɣ tanefust alamma tsellek. Zyada ɣef wanect-a, yessen umaru amek ara yesseqdec tignatin i yettilin deg tira n tmucuha d wamek ara yessiweḍ izen n uḍris i yimeɣriyen, ladɣa, imi yella netta, yakan, d amaswaḍ deg uḥric n usegmi aɣelnaw. Am wakken i yefka tagnit i wid ur nessin ara ad ɣren neɣ ad hedren taqbaylitt i wakken ad fehmen aḍris, imi i d-yura tasuqilt-is s tefrensist. Ilul Djamel Arezki ass 10 deg yennayer 1966 deg Tezmalt. Ha-t-an la yettheggi duktura-ines deg tesdawit Paris VIII. Yessufeɣ-d, yakan, Akal d wawal, am wakken i d-yessufeɣ Mohand Said Amlikech akked Yahia Bellil. Yettikki, diɣ, deg udlis De la pédagogie de projet et de l’enseignement de tamazight iɣef i d-yella deg lmendad Nasser Ait Ouali. Yerra-d ɣer tmaziɣt Ussan n uzemmur deg yidurar n leqbayel n Rachid Oulebsir. 

  Farida Elharani 

  
 Thegga-d tdukkla Asirem Guraya, deg tɣiwant n Msisna, yiwen n wahil s wazal-is, d wis 5 i t-yecban, i usḥesses ɣef temnaḍin tireḍbanin, i lmend n wass-nsent amaḍalan i d-yettuɣalen yal 2 furar. Di ttiɛad, yemgarad ayendin wahil i d-yersen i yimekkiyen n waṭas n tuddar. Imi dɣa, ugar n temsikkent tansayant i d-yettwafesren i tmuɣli, kraḍ n yimsizwar i d-yellan, rzan kraḍ n yiḥricen n medden. Amezwaru yeɛna kan arrac, i yumren ddeqs s umsizwer n usuneɣ i asen-yemmuggen. Wis sin yerza ahat s waṭas tiḥdayin, imi d amsizwer n wučči i d-iḍefren. Ma yella d wis kraḍ, yettwahegga-d kan i wid iḥemmlen tuṭṭfiwin s tsewwart akked uḥraz n uqbur. Skud amsizwer-a yessutur-d tawlaft akk taqdimt n tmellaḥt. Seld aya, ɛeddan merra yimeḥḍar i wuẓzi n ḥawla n yisekla deg yiwet n tegnit n unnecraḥ d tumert. Syin yemmug ureqqeɛ d useggem n tmellaḥt tadigant n Msisna, send ad yekker akk urbaɛ i umḍiq ansi ara tebdu tikli ɣef uḍar i tuffɣa i d-sihlen s adrar.

  M. K. 

  
 Si zik n zik, ǧǧan-aɣ-d yimezwura aṭas n tɣawsiwin d lecɣal s wacu ara nelḥu ɣer sdat. Akken neẓra akk, amaynut yettlal-d seg uqbur. Limer nedda deg ubrid-nsen, neḍfer lǧerra n udar-nsen, ilaq ur yeḍri yid-neɣ wayen yeḍran. « Ansayen n lejdud d agerruj ur irehhen ur yettnuzu». I d-tenna Nna Zwina mm 80 n yiseggasen. Mi ara ad netwali s anda i tewweḍ tmetti taqbaylit, mebla lebɣi yetteɣlayed imeṭṭi seg wallen. Taqsiḍt i aɣ-yeḍran ad tt-id-nebdu seg llsas-is, seg tmeṭṭut, tigejdit n Tmurt n Yizwawen. Amek almi teǧǧa tesmeḥ deg tqendurt? Ayen akka tbeddel-itt s ujellab ur nelli d ayla-s? Acimi? Tin yebɣan ad tesṭer iman-is, ulac acu d-yecban taqendurt n yemma d setti. Rnu i waya, anda-tent tid iḥerzen azeṭṭa? I teḥmilt-nni?. Lebni s ideqqi d wuɣud i d-ǧǧant temɣarin-nneɣ. Deg yiwen n udiwenni i d-newwi akked yiwet n tnelmadt yeqqaren tamaziɣt di tesdawit, tenna-d s usḥissef: « Agdud mebla lasel, ur as-d-yegri uẓar ara yeḍfer. D aya I aɣ-yeḍran, yeɛreq-aɣ wayla-nneɣ. Tiḥdayin n tallit-agi, ttmeslayent ala ɣef wayen ur nɣemmi. Tafekka dagi, ma d allaɣ yezger lebḥur. Idles-nneɣ ɣef wacu ɣlin yirgazen, ddan yidammen, yuɣal ur yesεi azal. D dderya n Dda Lmulud At Mεemmer meεna, ttmeslayen tutlayt n Molière». Mačči d lεib win yessnen tutlayt neɣ idles n tmura-nniḍen. Tawaɣit d win i tent-iḍefren, yeǧǧa tin n yemma-s d baba-s. Dɣa ayen yessewhamen win i ak-d-yinin nekk d aqbayli ḥemmleɣ taqbaylit-iw, ma d isem-is ur yessin ad t-id-yaru s teqbaylit-agi. Aṭas i nemḍel nerra fell-as akal, ur d-nerri s yisalli. Laṣel-nneɣ, yuḍen yerna aṭṭan-is d arraw-is. Ma tkemmel akka, ur iεeqqel baba-s mmi-s. Ihi ma ur nessider nekni agerruj-nneɣ, wiyaḍ ad t-ɣebbren.

  K.K. 

  
 Belkhir Mohamed Arezki, s yisem-is n tẓuri Belkhir Mohamed, d anaẓur, si zik-is iḥemmel ccna aqdim, isell aṭas i radyu tis snat, ladɣa tidwilin-nni n ccna. D acennay n temnaḍt n At Wagennun, yeddan deg ubrid n yinaẓuren imeqranen n tama-a. Ulamma seg useggas 1985 i yebda ccna i yiman-is, syin akkin deg useggas n 1989, iɛedda-d deg tedwilt-nni “Ifennanen n uzekka” n Mdjahed Hamid. Maca armi d 2006, i yessaweḍ ad d-yessufeɣ tasfift-is tamezwarut, iwumi isemma “Lehna”, di 2008 yerna-d tis snat, yefka-as azwel-a”Fiḥel”. 

 Syin ɣur-s, yeqqim 10 n yiseggasen, i wakken ad yernu tasfift-is taneggarut, iwumi iga isem “Fliksi-as-d”. Yesmenyif ad yecnu s ṣṣenf n cceɛbi, am wakken daɣen icennu ccna n tmeɣriwin. D isefra-s i icennu di tezlatin-is, gar yisental iɣef icennu ad nebder: Tayri, timetti, lḥif, tizlit tamḥaddit…atg. Tineggura-agi, ha-t-an deg ustudyu, yettheggi tasfift-is tis rebɛa, ideg ara ilit 10 n tezlatin. Ad nebder gar yizwal n tezlatin-a: Tajmilt i Matoub, lalla,…atg. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti kan belli, afennan Belkhir Mohand, yella yesmeḥsis i yicennayen iqburen “Slimane Azem, Salah Sadaoui…atg, armi i-d-yufa iman-is d acennay. 

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Mebɛed mi ttwaxedment kra n tezrigin n tmeɣra n uẓeṭṭa deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu, anda i d-yeḍra aṭas n uhedwir ɣef uneqqel-agi seg taddart n At Hicam ɣer temdint-a, ha-t-an yuɣal sser ɣer tmurt. Teḍra tmeɣra n uẓeṭṭa deg uxxam-is n zik. Teldi tezrigt tis 11 ass-nni n lexmis 9 deg ɣuct 2018 s wudem unṣib deg taddart n Hicam. Deg usiher-a ara idummen seg 9 ar 13 ɣuct, ḥedrent ugar n 10 n lwilayat n tmurt n Lezzayer, yal ta s temsikent-is. Xas mgaradent tɣawsiwen n 80 n yinḍan i iḥeḍren ttiɛad-agi, acu kan d aẓeṭṭa i yeṭṭfen aḥric ameqqran. Akka ara naf tiqendyar n leqbayel s lesnaf-is u s yal tama n tmurt. Zyada ɣef wanect-a, llant-d temsikniyin n tinḍi-nniḍen, yecban afexxar, lfeṭṭa, tament,…atg. Am wakken i yella usnuzu s ubuddu n sin yimyura-agi : Merriche akked Nait Abdellah. Llan-dn diɣ, isaragen, amezgun akked ccna. Ma d iswi n tmeɣra, tenna-d yiwet gar yimsuddesen : ‘’Nebɣa ad nesselmed lḥirfa-agi i tsutwin i d-iteddun imi aẓeṭṭa d ayen i aɣ-d-ǧǧan yimezwura d lamana. Xas ulamma teṣɛef teswiɛt ideg i nella, meɛna neckunṭeḍ deg tẓerbit-nneɣ u nedda d lweqt-nneɣ’’. Ma ɣef umgarad yellan gar tezrigin yeḍran deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu akked tid i d-yellan deg taddart n At Hicam, yenna-d yiwen yimḍebber : ‘’Yemgarad aṭas. Dagi deg Wat Hicam xir. Dagi, ttasen-d wid teɛna temsalt, wid yebɣan ad walin neɣ ad aɣen, mačči am Tizi, win tufiḍ yekcem u yerna mebla lmeqsud. Ula d asenzi, deg Wat Hicam i d-yettili s waṭas. Yerna, akka, ttasen-d yimerriyen ɣer taddart i wakken ad tt-issinen. Xas ulamma ulac lemɛawna-nni n zik sɣur wid teɛna temsalt, meɛna nexdem sw wayen nesɛa, ayen iwumi nezmer’’.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Deg tdiwennit-a, newwi-d awal akked umarau Madjid Oumnia ɣef udlis-is amaynut, tamsalt n tsuqilt, amek yelmed tira n tmaziɣt i yiman-is akked wayen-nniḍen.

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen : I wacuɣer tferneḍ ad tesuqleḍ tullisin n Isabelle Eberhardt ? 

  Madjid Oumnia :  Isabelle Eberhardt, d taneɣmast tamezwaut n ṭṭrad di ddunit, d tamyarut n wungalen. Ferneɣ ad suqleɣ Isabelle Eberhardt akken ad tt-id nemmekti, ad tt-nissin, d tin ilemden tira taqbaylit, maca asmi nudaɣ ɣef yidlisen-is, d wagi n tullisin i d-yeɣlin gar ifassen-iw, dɣa ɛniɣ-t. Ayagi ladɣa bɣiɣ-as-tt d tajmilt imi telmed taqbaylit weḥd-s s wallalen n tallit-nni n yiseggasen 1890, di « la Suisse ». Yerna ur tesɛi ara akk aẓar aqbayli ; yemma-s d Talmanit s laṣel, d Taṛusit di tɣelnawit imi tercel d Uṛusi.

  Amek i d-yella usuɣel n 23 n tullisin-agi ? 

 Di tazwara, bɣiɣ ad suffɣeɣ ammud n tullisin-iw, nekk. Imi ur d-smideɣ ara azal n wammud, ihi rriɣ-tent ɣer rrif. Tullisin-a, d asuqel amezwaru-inu. Ur i yi-shilent ara, ladɣa imi yura s uɣanib n tefransist n tallit-nni, acku ur ilaq ara ad yeffeɣ umdan seg yinumak n tenfalyin i d-yessuqlen ɣer teqbaylit.

   Yella-d useqdec n waṭas n wawalen atraren deg tira-k, acu n ssebba n waya ? 

  Isefk fell-aɣ tura ad neseqdec awalen atraren, ayɣer ?Llan wid yerẓan iqerra-nsen, ɛetben akken ad d-sufɣen isegzawalen ; ilaq usemres-nsen akken ad naɣ tannumi yid-sen, ma d tasuta i d-itteddun, ɣer ɣur-sen ad yuɣalen d imugna. Tella diɣen ssebba-nniḍen ; llan wawalen n tfrensist i d-yemmalen kra n tɣawsiwin iwumi ur nesɛi ara awalen-nsent iwulmen. Cwi kan llan isegzawalen. Ad rnuɣ tamawt-nniḍen : llan wawalen iqburen, n zik yettwattun, ass-a ara d-ttuɣalen amzun d imaynuten. Annect-agi diɣen cwi imi yella usegzawal Dallet i aɣ-d-yefkan afud ameqqran.

  Tullisin-agi, ttakent acbih akked tmucuha n teqbaylit ? 

 Ur ttakent ara acbih. D tullisin i d-tura ɣef tudert n tmetti n tmazɣa, amek ttidiren tamhersa, lḥif ittɛeddayen fell-asen, amek i asen-tteksen akal-nsen, ar taggara, ggran-d yinaṣliyen d iqeddacen-nsen, amek seḍmaɛen ilmeẓyen akken ad gaǧin d ispahiyen mi slaẓen tiwaculin, d tegnatin tucmitin i d-xelqen di tmetti, atg…, annect-a akk i tɣunza Isabelle Eberhardt daɣen ɣef i d-tura, daymi riɣ medden ad ɣren ɣef tmeddurt-is, ad tt-issinen ugar.

  Ɣef wakkern i d-tenniḍ, tlemdeḍ tira n teqbaylit i yiman-ik. Awal ɣef wanect-a… 

 D awal yerna d tidet. Ur faqeɣ ara armi i d-uffiɣ iman-iw ttaruɣ s tmaziɣt. Ayagi s usebɣes n umyaru, Mass Ahmed Nekkar, i yi-irecden ad kemmleɣ tira, asmi i as-fkiɣ tullisin timezwura ad tent-id-yesseɣti, acku imir mazal ttaruɣ s tucḍiwin. Ih, lemdeɣ iman-iw, maca ssutureɣ imeddukkal ssneɣ akken ad yi-d-mmlen, steqsayeɣ-ten. Llan daɣen yigrawen n teqbaylit di Facebook, ukkud lemdeɣ aṭas, d wid i yi-kksen akukru i yiwenniten ; zemreɣ ahat ad d-iniɣ d anagraw inefɛen mliḥ widak yebɣan ad lemden, ladɣa imi nettwet seg uɣerbaz.

  D adlis amezwaru wagi. Mebla ccek llan yisenfaren-nniḍen. Ma tzemreḍ ad aɣ-temmeslayeḍ fell-asen ? 

 Akka tura asenfar i yellan deg uqerru-iw d akemmel n wammud n tullisin-iw. Daɣen ssarameɣ ad rnuɣ tisuqilin n yidlisen n Isabelle Eberhardt, imi fell-as i yi-d-terṣel.

 Awal n taggara… Nekk, si zik-iw ḥemmleɣ ad ḍefreɣ ayen yeɛnan akk adlis yerzan timetti-nneɣ. Acu kan ur rriɣ ara ddhen-iw ɣer tira, armi d tura i stufaɣ i mi d amestaɣ(retraité). Ihi nniɣ-as ad snulfuɣ ccɣel i yiman-iw deg wayeg ahat ara nefɛeɣ medden. Yenna-as umedyaz-nneɣ L.A.M : « Zik, wa ihedder-itt i wayeḍ, ass-a, di lkaɣeḍ ad tt-id-afen yineggura’’.

  Yesteqsa-t Hocine Moula 

  
 Thegga-d ddurt iɛeddan tgezmi n Tizi n Berber n Tesbeddit Bgayet i yidles d tussniwin, s tallelt n tɣiwant-a, yiwen n ttiɛad n usḥesses ɣef waṭṭan n uxenẓir (lkunsir) n yidmaren, i yekkaten abeɛda tilawin. Ula d irgazen, yettili-d wanida i teṭṭfen aṭṭan-a tikwal maḍi. Deg wahil n wass-nni, d asarag i d-yemmuggen sɣur tmazzagt Massa Buǧaǧa ɣef uḥader seg waṭṭan-a n uxenẓir d wamek ilaq ad yili uɛeyyer n yal tameṭṭut ɣef zik lḥal. Imi mtawan yakk imussnawen n tesnujjya deg umaḍal d akken ma yettwawef waṭṭan di tazwara mi ara d-iban, llant aṭas n tegnatin akken ur yettḍurru neɣ ad yeḥlu yakk. Wamma ma teḥsa tmeṭṭut s waṭṭan-is mi ara ifit lḥal, ur tesɛiḍ acu tezmer ad d-teg, d ayen yettsuddun tesnujjya tatrart. Daymi lhant tegnatin n uselɣu d usḥulfu ma ttilint-d seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ, abeɛda deg yidurar. Skud mazal aṭas n tmesdurar ur neẓri d acu-t waṭṭan-a, ulamma aql-aɣ deg zzman ideg tenṭer ayendin tmeṭṭut seg-s. Ula d leḥsabat i d-iteffɣen yal aseggas ɣef umḍan amaynut n tid i yewwet waṭṭan-a axabit, mačči d wid yessefraḥen yakk. Send ad taḍen yiwet ihi, ad terwu tazzla i udawi yuqan, yelha ma tga aɛeyyer ɣur walbaɛḍ n yimsujjiyen.

  M. K. 

  
  Isufar 

 – 8 g n yiɣes

 – 2 n tɣenjawin n lmakla n ssker

 – 2 n tɣenjawin n lqahwa n lmelḥ

 – 1 n tɣenjawt n lmakla 

 n lebsel yeẓdan

 – 3 ½ n lkas n lfarina n uɣrum

 – 1/2 n tebselt igezmen 

 d timḍewwrin

 – 2 n tɣenjawin n lmakla 

 n wudi yefsin

  Aheggi 

 Sefsit s waman iɣes akked ssker daxel ufenjal ameqqran, teǧǧem-t azal n 10’. Rnut ɣer daxel-is lmelḥ, lebsel yeẓdan akked sin n lkisan n lfarina. Syin, rnut-as ciṭ n lfarina, treggim yal timerniwt. Ɣummet afenjal-nni, tanfem-as ad yali azal n ssaɛa deg umekkan yeḥman. Mi yuli, tmeslem-t d taqrist u tanfem-as ad yali i tikkelt-nniḍen azal n 40’. Seḥmut lkuca ɣer 190. Serset lebsel-nni imḍewwer s ufella n uɣrum, tdehnem-t s wudi. Sewwet-t azal n 35’. Stezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Tineggura-a, anida tezzi tiṭ-ik ama deg yiberdan neɣ deg yimukan-nniḍen, ala tiqerɛatin d tebwaḍin n uplastik ara d-temlileḍ. Ulac tardast deg wakal n tmurt, ur tḥuza ara taluft-agi n yiḍuman n uplastik. Win iwumi tenniḍ, ad ak-yini : « Mačči d nekk ara d-iqeɛden tamurt ! ». Yal wa yettara-d ṭṭlam ɣef wayeḍ ; imezdaɣ qqaren-d d tiɣiwanin ur nxeddem ara axeddim-nsent, nutenti si tama-nsent, ur sawḍent ara ɣer lebɣi-nsent, yerna seḍlament imezdaɣ. Ma d tiddukliwin i iqedcen deg uḥric n twennaḍt, ula d nutenti sḥasfent ɣef liḥala n twennaḍt di tmurt, xeddment ahat nnig tezmert-nsent. Ula d asmi i yuɣalen yiḍuman d idrimen, ur cliɛen ara yimdanen, imi d tidet d idrimen-nsen i ṭeggiren mačči d iḍuman-nsen ! 

 Mbeɛd mi d-yessawel uɣlif n twennaḍt ɣer tḥawact n yiḍuman deg wakal aɣelnaw, tettwalqeḍ-d tnecta (tasmekta) n 474,38 n yiṭunen yiḍuman n uplastik. D tigawt taɣelnawt iwumi semman « Aggur War Aplastik ». Tebda, ass n 21 cutember yezrin, ad tkemmel alamma d ass-a n, 21 tuber 2019. Ad d-yili uḍfar n tigawt-a taɣelnawt, sɣur teseqqamut n uḍfar d uktazel, yetabaɛen ɣer uɣlif n twennaḍt. Am wakken, i ssawḍen ad d-suddsen azal n 69 n yisaragen d yimyaggren deg yakk timnaḍin n tmurt, i usefhem i medden ɣef wazal d wamek ilaq ɣef umdan ad iseḥbiber ɣef ugama d twennaḍt. Rnu ɣer wahil uzzig i d-yellan i yigerdan (inelmaden) n uɣerbaz, ɣef teɣzi n 3 ssmanat n tigawt-agi. Yella-d deg-s uttekki n tmetti taɣarimt ur yesɛin tamtilt, ama d tiddukkliwin tisadarin (professionnelles), ama d tid n twennaḍt d yilemẓiyen, ama d tigrawin n yiskutiyen, ama d imezrawen (isdawanen), tiseqquma n tuddar neɣ n yimḍqan, iɣerbazen d udmawen n tmetti yettwassnen ɣer yidis n yiduba idiganen d yiɣsuren n ufran d wallus n usseqdec n wafrasen.I lmend n waya, daɣ deg lwilaya n Ǧiǧel d Ɛennaba, nulfan-d kra n tkebbaniyin i lmend n ulqaḍ n yiḍuman n uplastik, ara d-ixelqen ama d imekwan n uxeddim, ama d asizdeg n twennaḍt. Am wakken daɣen i d-heggan ticemliyin n uqɛad n kra n yimukan deg kra n lwilayat n unẓul n tmurt i wakken ad d-yili wallus n useqdec n wafrasen n uplastik, yernu iger-d uɣlif n twennaḍt tiɣri i yimdanen terza temsalt akken ad sseftin deg uḥric-agi i d-isekcamen idrimen. 

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Seld ayendin n lɣiba n ttbut ɣef melmi ara d-yeffeɣ uḍebsi-s amaynut n 2019, d utqelleq d uraǧu ɣur medden i t-iḥemmlen, a-t-an iberreḥ-d ussan-a unaẓur Zedek Mulud deg usebter-is unsib n Facebook s wazemz n, 27 tuber 2019, i tuffɣa n yiseɣrez-is, ama di Tmurt neɣ di Fransa. Ilaq ad d-nini aṭas i yeffeɣ ssber ɣef melmi ara ḍillen ɣef umaynut n Zedek Mulud d wayen iɣef yessefra, neɣ d tlufa i yesleḍ di tallit-a iɛeddan. Ladɣa ma neẓra belli tura tewweḍ ɣas ad d-nini ɣer semmus n yiseggasen segmi i d-yesres deg ulzuz aqeddic-is anaẓuran aneggaru s uzwel n « Asderfef » di taggara n 2014. 

 Ma nemmeslay-d cwiṭ ɣef wayen ara yilin di tmuqint-a tajdidt n uẓawan d usefru n mmi-s n At Xelfun, ad d-nebdu seg wayen i d-yessufeɣ s wudem azayez i lmend n tuzzya tamaḍalant, d wayen i d-yecna ihi ɣef usayes ama di Tmurt neɣ berra-s. Imi yetturaǧu ad tili deg yiseɣrez-a amaynut tezlit « Allen swant, imi yeffud » ideg yessemlal tilufa n tmetti d tsertit. Daɣen, yewwi-d ad d-teddu ula d tizlit « Teqqleḍ d lɣerba a Tamurt » s wayes i d-yemla kra n tmentilin i t-yeǧǧan yezdeɣ tura di Fransa akked twacult-is. Ugar n waya, iqarr-aɣ-d Zedek Mulud deg yiwet n tdiwennit i as-nga imalasen yezrin d akken ihegga yiwet n tezlit d tajmilt i umeɣnas Si Lḥafiḍ i lmend n uḍebsi-a n 2019. Ula d yiwet n tezlit ɣef Yennayer iban-d lḥal ad tili daɣen, rnu yecna-tt s wudem ara iḥazen akk Imaziɣen n Tmazɣa. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-yenna Zedek Mulud, yewwi-d ur tettili deg yiseɣrez tezlit-nni « Amremmu » meskud yesres-itt-id yakan deg terga-s n Youtube. Ur yettɛeṭṭil ihi uḍebsi ad d-yeffeɣ, imi ur ilaq ad t-yezgel yal Azwaw.

  M. K. 

  
 Imḍebbren n ubaraǧ n Tilesdit bdan, taggara n yimalas yezrin, yiwet n lḥemla n useɛlem ɣef lemḍerra i as-d-igellu usucef deg yibaraǧen d tmedwin anda aṭas n terwiḥin i yettruḥun. Ɣef waya, yakk ttawilat ilaqen ttwaheggan-d i wakken ad yaweḍ yisalli alamma d tudrin ibeɛden maḍi deg temnaḍin n ddayra n Bechloul. Ɣef tkerrust yettezzin, ama deg temdinin neɣ deg tudrin tettwaɛelleq nezmer ad d-nɣer : « Asucef deg yibaraǧen yessawaḍ ɣer lmut : Hadret ! » Am wakken daɣ ttwaferqent kra n tewriqin anda i d-ssegzin yimḍebbren tixeṣṣarin i d-yettilin yal aseggas. Dɣa da i d-smektan belli aman n ubaraǧ mgaraden d wid n lebḥer imi imezwura d wid i izemren ad cebbken amdan deg lqaɛa, rnu ur as-ttaǧǧan ara tagnit i wakken ad d-yifrir imi d wid fessusen s waṭas. Deg ubrid-nsen, imḍebbren n Tilesdit ur ɣfilen ara deg usmekti n yimdanen d akken yal anebdu ddeqs n terwiḥin i yettruḥun deg yimukan-a ur nesɛi ttawilat wala lɛessa, imi zgan ttilin d tifexxet i yilmeẓyen. Ɣef waya, awal-nsen iressa ɣef tikti anda abaraǧ d win i d-yettakken aman i tissit d tfellapht ur yezmir ad yili d amekkan i usucef.

  M. Smail 

  
 Yella-d, ussan iɛeddan, usizdeg n teftist talemmast n temdint n Tegzirt.

 Imi tezdeg n twennaḍt tesɛa azal d ameqqran, i tdawsa n umdan akked tdawsa n wakal s timad-is, ihi ɣef waya, i d-ttnekkaren s tebɣest tameqqrant yiɛeggalen n tddukkliwin-agi, u ssawalen-d di yal tama n tmurt i yimdanen, ladɣa deg ussan n ustaɛfu, neɣ ɛad deg tegnit-agi n ukman n bessif, i wakken ad ffɣen ɣer tukksa n yiḍumman i d-yezzin i tnezduɣin-nsen neɣ ammus i yettmenḍaren deg yal tama n tmurt. Aseggas-a, ad naf tamerrit mačči am tin n yiseggasen iɛeddan, imi yettwagdel unekcum ɣer teftisin tizuyaz n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu alamma yella-d ttesriḥ s teɣtes yeṭṭef lwali Maḥmud Ǧamɛa. Aya, yedda-d gar ttawilat n useḥbiber ɣef unfafad n Kuṛuna i yuɣen amaḍal merra. Ɣas akken tella tegdelt, maca ayagi ur yemniɛ ara iɛeggalen n tddukkla « Lions Club Tigzirt Doyen » n tɣiwant n Tegzirt i wakken ad d-ffɣen ɣer usizdeg n teftist tameqrant yellan deg tlemmast n temdint-a tinmerrit. Tagi, d tikkelt tis snat i d-gren tiɣri i yimezdaɣ akken ad ruḥen ad d-fken afus n lemɛawna, mbaɛd mi d-tella tmezwarut ass-nni n sed 06 yunyu. i lmend n usfugel n wass amaḍlan n twennaḍt, i d-yettilin yal aseggas di 05 yunyu. I usmekti, tesfaydi-d tɣiwant, dɣa, s wazal n 50 iqecwalen i deg ttaran iḍumman, bac ad d-yili uḍegger-nsen daxel. Akka i d-rran yimezdaɣ, meẓẓi meqqer i usiwel u fkan-d nnig tazmert-nsen i leqdic-a n usizdeg, ladɣa imi llan ttawilat n uḥader am : tekmamin, iqeffazen d gel hydro-alcoolique. Ɣas akken ulint tfesniwin n lḥamu, meɛna ur ḥbisen ara, kemmlen leqdic-nsen armi i as-fkan udem amaynut i teftist. Iɛeggalen n tddukkla-agi, ur ssinen ara astehzi, mudden-d tamuggint i dduṛt i d-iteddun i usizdeg n teftist-nniḍen. Yacine Meghzifene.

  
 Awal, nnan-t-id yimussnawen, d akken acengu amezwaru n twennaḍt, d amdan. Mačči d tigawt, mačči d snat i d-yettwekkiden ayagi. Imi, d netta i d tamentilt ama n usewsex n ugama d udegger n ugudu deg-s. Neɣ n uḥader d useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt, i kksen medden seg umawal n tudert-nsen. D ayen i d-yeglan s igemmaḍ i yifen tifrat iwumu yezmer walsi. 
  Ass-a, nettwali deg twennaḍt teqbeṛ, neεṛeq gar tegrest d unebdu. Umma d nnefs-nni i nesnuffus, yeččur d aɣebbaṛ akked yimikṛuben. Rnu ɣer waya, ula d tizegwa-nneɣ, ṛɣant yakk daymi i yenqes ufmiḍi n Oxygene seg twennaḍt. Ahat tiṣeddaṛin tiεlayanin n lḥamu d ssebba n tmes ineddren deg-sent. Meεna, ula d amdan ittekka daɣen deg waya, acku yettḍeggiṛ zzǧaǧ deg ugama. Ayen yessuhamen ugar, llan yiεdawen n tudert, i yesraɣayen tiẓegwa s uɛemmed. Ahat deg yiseggasen yezrin, ssendahent kra n tddukkliwin medden ɣef ubaɣuṛ n tzegwa d wazal i sεant di tudert-nneɣ n yal ass. D anemgal n useggas-a, imi yeḥbes uxeddim-nsent n usendeh d uwelleh n yimdanen. Akken neẓṛa, aṭṭan n Corona, yeḥbes medden deg yixxamen, yegdel fell-asen axeddim. Meḥsub ɣas ma yella ayagi yegla-d s ubaɣuṛ i ugama seg yiwet n tama, meεna seg tayeḍ-nniḍen, iḍuṛ-itt. Acku kra n medden rezzun ɣur-s akked twaculin-nsen, meɛna tḍeggiṛen deg-s ahicur-nsen. Ayen i nettwali tura d anagi, dɣa, ɣas tura kan i yebda unebdu, lameεna ddeqs n tẓegwa i yerɣan. Ihi, yewwi-d ɣef wid teεna temsalt ad d-afen tifrat s uɣiwel. 

  K. K.

 Ulamma aṭas n yiseggasen segmi tella war ma tesleḥ i waṭas n tlufa, imi ḥaca i tukksa n tuɣmas, acraḍ d udawi n lǧerḥ afessas, ha-t-an tetteddu deg kra n yimalasen, ad d-tuɣal tegtensujit (polyclinique) n Tizwal amek i tt-ssaramen ad d-tili yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel seg waṭas-aya. Dduzan akk, i ilaqen ihi akken, ad yili dinna uqeddic izerben (point d’urgence), ur mazal ala ayyur neɣ sin, ɣef wawal n yiwen seg yimḍebbren n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel. « Nezmer ad d-nini ḥeḍru-d ad d-yali yiṭij ɣef tɣiwant-nneɣ. Imi nemsefham lwaḥi d tamiwin i teɛna taluft i uzday n yiɣallen akken sya ɣer taggara n meɣres, ma iḍul, ad inuḥ din uqeddic izerben ». I d-tenna teɣbalut-nneɣ. I d-iwekkden d akken « di tazwara ur ileddi ara uqeddic-a izerben 24/24 n yisragen. Maca, simmal ad iqeddec, simmal ad yettnernay ». Ilaq ad d-nini deg temnaḍt tamsedrart am Ayt Smaɛel, yewwi-d tili acḥal-aya segmi inuḥ din uqeddic izerben. D iḥeyyaren i sɛeddayen yimezdaɣ-is akken ad siwḍen amuḍin deg tegnatin igerrzen i sbiṭarat yemgaraden, am win n Umrij d win n Xerraṭa. Tikwal, yella wanida ttenqasent tegnatin n usellek n walbaɛḍ ma nṭerren send ad ttwaselfun deg sbiṭarat-a ibeɛden. War ma nettu lmeḥna n tegrest, imi tikwal ireggel udfel iberdan, ur yettaǧǧa i ḥedd tuffɣa, i udawi neɣ kra-nniḍen. « D ayen i la nettraǧu seg wacḥal d aseggas tura. Nḥar dayen kan melmi ara yeldi uqeddic-a, ad naf tazeqqa-a d tamsellekt ». D awal n yiwen n ubabat seg Ayt Smaɛel. Ad d-nerr awellih d akken ula d takerrust n usellek, ad d-tettwawi seg Xerraṭa, anida tres, mi ara yebdu uqeddic-a izerben.

  M. K. 

  
 Tesker-d tkebbanit Mozilla, deg yulyu 2017, yiwen n usenfar d ameqqran n uɛqal aɣectan (reconnaissance vocale), iwumi tsemma « Common Voice ». Ma yella, deg tazwara, ala kra n tutlayin i ikecmen deg-s, acu kan deg wagguren-agi inerggura aṭas i d-yernan n tutlayin, gar-asent, dɣa, tutlayt taqbaylit. Ad d-nesmekti belli iswi n usenfar ɣer Mozilla d aheggi n taffa n yisefka n taɣect i uzayez s umata, akken ad t-tallel deg usnulfu d usihel n yisnasen neɣ n yiqeddicen n taɣect. Aya, yettuneḥsab d asurif ageɛmir i tger tutlayt taqbaylit deg umaḍal n Internet, imi tella deg-s. Yebḍa usenfar ɣef waṭas n yiḥricen, am usekcem n tefyar, taɣuri-nsent, d uwekked-nsent ma seḥḥant neɣ uhu. Imi yeldi i medden merra, yal yiwen yezmer ad d-yessumer tifyar, ad yessekles neɣ ad ibuṭi, ad d-yili ɣer taggara usiffi deg uɣerbal. Ayen icudden i usekles n taɣect, yewwi-d ɣef yal yiwen ad d-yenṭeq tifyar akken iwulem lḥal. Mebla ma yettu, ilaq ad yili deg tegnit n war lḥes d lhul, akken ad yezdig uklas-ines. D asenfar s wazal-is ara d-yawin ayendin d abaɣur i tutlayin d yiɣerfan, imi ar tura, ala 46 n tutlayin i ikecmen deg-s. Deg yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen Facebook d VK, yezga yessawal-d Muḥend Belqasem, agensas n usenfar-a deg Mozilla si tama taqbaylit, i wid akk izemren ad d-fken afus i usnerni n usenfar-a, ama s tikci n tefyar neɣ s usekles n taɣect-nsen. Aṭas i d-yerran i tiɣri, rnu mazal yettsemmid uqeddic alamma yewweḍ ukurpus, s tɣara yelhan, ɣer wazal 10 000 n yisragen n umeslaw. Mi ara d-ttwagemrent tukkisin n tuɣac n yimdanen, armi temɣur taffa n yisefka, yezmer yal yiwen ad ten-yesseqdec deg yal asenfar n taɣect i d-yettheggi, amedya asnas n ulmad n teqbaylit. Seg yiswan n usenfar-a Common Voice daɣen, d aɛiwen n tegzi tamacinant deg umeslay d umsefham akked walsiyen. S waya, tebɣa daɣen tkebbanit Mozilla ad tefk tagnit i yakk tutlayin i wakken ad sɛunt amḍiq deg internet, ulamma akka tura drus seg-sent i yerza usenfar.

  M. K. 

  
 D asḥissef ameqqran i d-yeɣlin ɣef yimezdaɣ n taddart n Ayt Idris, ass n arim iɛeddan mettwal aɣelluy n yiḍ. Ula deg yiẓeḍwan inmettiyen, sbeyynen-d akk lɣiḍ-nsen seg wayen i d-yeḍran. D yiwen n yilemẓi asnawan bu 18 n yiseggasen, s tmezwura n B. L. i wwin yiḥemmalen n wasif Ageryun mi akken yella deg lexla akked kra n yimeddukkal, ɣef wakken i yuzzel wawal. Armi yekker uḥebber fell-as ugar n 3 n yisragen akken tettwawef tfekka-s, war iẓiɣer, meqrub yiwen n umkan n uxeddim. Seg zik dɣa i yettwassen wasif-a s tuɛert-is, ladɣa, deg lawan n yigeffuren. Imi ayendin d iɣeẓran n usamar n Bgayet i yettmarayen deg-s, abeɛda wid n Xerraṭa, Tasexriwt d Ayt Smaɛel. I usmekti kan, ugar n twizi d tdukkli i tifin n umerḥun, tella-d tallelt ula sɣur yirgazen n Uḥuddu Aɣarim n waṭas n tɣiwanin akked yijadarmiyen.

  M. K. 

  
 Beggsen yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi akken ma llan: Yal wa s wayen yezmer; ama s tedrimt, ama s iɣallen , neɣ s yisufar yemgaraden d ttawilat n uxeddim deg wahil n usizdeg n taddart-nsen. 

 Sdat n ugdal n tsertit iwatan n unegmu d ugarrez n ukatar n tudert n yimdanen, seg yemḍebbren teεna tamsalt, kkrent-d i yiman-nsen temdinin d tudrin n tmurt n Leqbayel i tsertit n ugerrez d tezdeg n tudrin. Yella-d waya s lmendad n tcetlin n Useqqamu Aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi-Uzzu i d-yessudusen, yal aseggas, timsizzelt Rabah Aissat n taddart zeddigen. Tukci n tedrimt swayes i d-tgellu temsizzelt-a, tettak afud muqqren i teseqquma n tudrin, akken ad sεunt tissas ɣef tezdeg n tudrin-nsent d umḥizwar ɣef yimeḍqan imenza n temsizzelt. Yiwet gar tudrin i d-yefraren s leqdicat-is yeddan deg tsertit n usizdeg d ugerrez n tudert, d taddart n Icerqiyen yettabaɛen tɣiwant n Mεatqa. 

 Beggsen yimezdaɣ n taddart- agi akken ma llan: Yal wa s wayen yezmer; ama s tedrimt, ama s iɣallen , neɣ s yisufar yemgaraden d ttawilat n uxeddim deg wahil n usizdeg n taddart-nsen. Aṭas n tigawin d leqdicat i d-yellan s lmendad n teseqqamut n taddart n Icerqiyen, d tddukkla n useḥbiber ɣef twenaṭ, i d-yessuddsen ticemliyin d twiziwin n usizdeg, d ugerrez n tewwurt n unekcum ɣer taddart, asenqes deg usemres n wayen akk yettḍurun agama d twenaṭ. Am waken i d-tella tuẓut n yijeǧǧigen ɣef leryuf n yiberdan imeqqranen n taddart akked uqεad n yizenqan n taddart. Iban-d umgarad d ameqqran gar wakken tella taddart-agi deg yiseggasen iεeddan d tura. 

 Ula d imezdaɣ, beggnen-d lfarḥ-nsen s leqdicat-agi igerrzen, i d-yefkan tugna yelḥan i taddart. Dɣa ssaramen ad ilin seg yimezwura deg temsizzelt i d-iteddun. 

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 I lmend n wannect-agi, heggan-d ahil d anesbaɣur i d-yellan, ass-nni n ssebt-agi deffir-nneɣ, 3 meɣres 2018, deg temkerḍit n tɣiwant-agi. Dɣa ɣef 09h00 n ssbeḥ, i yebda leqdic-agi s wudem unṣib, sɣur uselway n tɣiwant n Illula Umalu, syin ɣer-s, ddeqs i d-yemmeslayen ɣef leqdic-agi adelsan akked wansay-a aqdim. Bdan ahil-nsen, s kra n temsikniyin, yecban tin n tgella neɣ lemwakel n zik (abiṣar, ameqful neɣ tafurut, seksu…), tin lfeṭṭa akked tin n tqendurin n Leqbayel, afexxar neɣ talaɣt. Tella daɣen temsikent n yidlisen n tmaziɣt, am wakken daɣen i llan kra n yimura ɣef lmendad n usenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen-nsen.Ɣef 9h30 n ssbeḥ, tella-d talilt (chorale) i d-yewwin kra n tezlatin s teqbaylit. Syin ɣer-s ɣef 10h00, yella-d usarag n umaru d umnadi deg uḥric n yidles d tutlayt tamaziɣt, Mass Rachid Oulebsir, i d-yewwin awal ɣef usentel-agi “Amager n tefsut ɣer yimaziɣen”. Mi yekfa usarag-agi, suffɣen arrac imecṭaḥ ɣer yiḥerqan d yigran, megren-d timeqqunin n yijeǧǧigen, yerna qublen tafsut s wudem yennecraḥen. Ma ɣef 11h00 n uzal, ḍrant-d snat n temsizzliyin, yiwet n tmedyazt (gar usefru akked ucewwiq), tis snat deg usewwi n arkut (plat) igerrzen. Syin akkin, ɣef 12h30 kemmlen ahil-nsen, s tɣuri n tmedyazt d yisefra, kra n ccnawi sɣur yiwet n terbaɛt n yilmeẓyen…atg. Ma ɣef 13h30 n tmeddit, seknen-d amek i d-tettili tmeɣra n zzwaǧ zik-nni, tin ɣur-s, ɣef 15h00 n tmeddit, tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n usebɣes i wid yettekkin deg leqdic-agi. S wakka ihi, i d-smektan Wat Illula Umalu ansay-agi amaziɣ aqbur, i xeddmen medden yal amenzu n tefsut deg leḥsab n yimaziɣen. Bɣan daɣen deffir n leqdic-agi, ad ẓẓun tikti n useḥbiber ɣef unsay-agi s wuzzig neɣ ɣef wansayen n lejdud-nneɣ s umata.

  Adaoun A. 

  
 Akken ad teddu deg ubrid n wahil-is i d-tga taggara-a, thegga-d, ddurt-a iɛeddan, tddukkla tadelsant Itri n Ugeryun n Tsexriwt kra n warmuden (activités) idelsanen seg 21:00 d asawen. Gar-asen dɣa, yella-d usarag-is wis kraḍ segmi i as-tekker i teɣlust taseklant deg temnaḍt. D taɣiwant n Tsexriwt i d-yezgan s wazal n 60 n yikilumitren ɣer Usamar-anẓul n waɣir n Bgayet. D Mass Buzid Bumezwed i d-yettwaɛerḍen tikkelt-a i usarag, ideg i d-yewwi awal abeɛda ɣef « Iɣẓer n Ugeryun ddaw temhersa tafransist ». Deg wakud i yekka usarag-a, i yemmugen deg unammas adelsan n Lberj n Mira, yessefti umsarag (conférencier) akken yessefk awal lwaḥi d uzayez i yenwan ad yeḥḍer. Ulamma ahat mačči aṭas n yimezdaɣ i d-yettarran ddhen-nsen ar tura i yisaragen i d-suddusen, maca s wis kraḍ-a, ẓran yiɛeggalen n tddukkla aql-iten deg ubrid i d-nejren si tazwara. Ad sḍefren asarag-a s wayeḍ, alamma i d-jebden ugar n lɣaci, imi d win i d iswi-nsen. Ɣer tama n umezgun, iwumu ssawalen Yemma-s n tẓuriwin, tessuddes-d daɣ tddukkla-a iɣef nettmeslay, asenɛet n yiwet n tceqquft n umezgun s uzwel n « Tayri d udrim ». D taceqquft i d-tewwi terbaɛt Sin n Sḍisat, i d-yusan seg tama n Tezmalt. Yura taceqquft-a Mass Ǧamal Yasad, yesres-itt-id Mass Tariq Benḥamuc. Akkin i wussan yezrin, ad d-nesmekti d akken thegga-d tddukkla yiwen n umunulug i d-yesken Mass Nadir Belluz. Ayendin n medden i yerzan ass-nni, ɛawzen deg unnecraḥ.

  M. K. 

  
 Segmi i d-yekcem uvirus n covid-19 ɣer tmurt n Lezzayer, i d-yewwi yiwen umdan yettidiren di tmurt n Fransa ɣer temdint n Blida ass n, 27 furar 2020, tugdi tennerna deg wul n yimdanen. Simmal liḥalat n waṭṭan-a, ttnernayent kra kra. Imdanen mi d-wwin s lexber belli d aḥader d usizdeg kan i d ddwa n waṭṭan, bdan ttazzalen s tuffɣa n leɛqel ɣer tnessufar (les pharmacie), akken ad ten-id-ṣiḥen kra seg yisufar-a ilaqen, ama i yimdanen neɣ i yidgan i ttxalaḍen, akken ur yettenfufud ara ugar waṭṭan-a. 

 D isufar yecban «Le gel hydro-alcoolique», iɣisem (l’alcool) d tekmamin i ttarran i wudmawen akken ur ikeccem ara uvirus. Ayen i nwala ɣef teɣzi n yimalas-a, deg merra tnessufar n temdint n Bgayet, Sidi Aich, Akbou d temdinin-nniḍen, d akken quccen yisufar-a. Tamentilt n keffu-nsen, ɛlaḥsab n kra ifarmasyanen i nesteqsa, nnan-d : “d imdanen i d ssebba s timmad-nsen”, acku ur sseqnaɛen ara s yiwet n tɣawsa i lbiɛ, d icekkaren i ttaččaren, ur ẓrin ara ayɣer. Ugur d akken aṭas seg wid-a yexlan tinessufar, ur ssexdamen ara ayen akken i ttaɣen, am tekmamin d le gel n yifassen. Tamuɣli-nniḍen, ur nelhi ara, ɣef yisallen, anida mazal ttnuzun ttawilat-a n usizdeg, ulin ɣer ssummat ur iqebbel leɛqel, am deg kra n temnaḍin, i urɛad yekcim unfafad n Corona, am umalu.

  Nnan-aɣ-d bdan ttquccun yisufar-a, drus-iten maḍi, yerna s ssumat ɣlayen, anida yewweḍ wazal n tekmamt ɣer 200 n yidinaren, iɣisem yettnuzu gar 500 d 700 n yidinaren ! Akka i teḍra ula d isufar n tuččit, anida di yal amḍiq n tmurt n leqbayel, ulin s waṭas di ssuma sɣur yimsenzuyen. D ayen i yeǧǧan imdanen ad ten-iɣiḍ lḥal, akken i d-yenna yiwen n urgaz “Mačči s ssumat yulin i ttḥaraben leǧnas aṭṭanen d lmeḥnat. Ula d ssrabes terza temsalt, ur d-giren ara iman-nsen i uḥbas n tigawin-a, ur nettmuddu ara udem yelhan i tmurt”. 

 Ur d-tewwi ara tuffɣa n leɛqel 
 Ɣef wakken i t-id-nnan waṭas n yimussnawen n tujjya, anfafad-a yuẓan deg umaḍal, mačči d amihan akken i t-ssugunen yimdanen. Ma nesserwes-it kan ɣer kra n waṭṭanen yezrin ɣef talsa, ad t-naf , ur yexdim ara tixeṣṣarin meqqren ar yimir-a, akken i yesserwet waṭṭan n tterka (La peste), ṭṭaɛun, ttifis d waṭṭan s “Sars” i ineqqen armi d 12% n yimdanen i iḥuza. Yewwi-d kan ɣef yimdanen ad ḥadren iman-nsen, ad ḍefren iwellihen n yimazzagen n tdawsa, s tezdeg d tɣimit deg uxxam, akken ur ineṭṭeḍ ara, ad yenqes u ad yezri waṭṭan-a n covid-19. Yewwi-d, ad d-nini, ula d allalen n taywalt d yizeḍwa inmettiyen, kemmlen deg udellel d usexleɛ n yimdanen. 

  Khaled Achoui  

 

  
 Aggur n furar, d aggur n usmekti n waṭas n yinaẓuren i iɣaben : wa d amulli n tlallit-is, wayeḍ d asmekti n tmettant-is. Dɣa deg ussan-agi kan, i d-llan leqdicat d tijmilin i yinaẓuren i yesɛan assaɣ akked waggur n furar.

 Gar-asen, ad d-nebder Slimane Azem, Cherif Kheddam akked Matoub. Ass-nni, dɣa, n 24 deg waggur-agi i deg-i nella i d-tesmekta taddart Tawrirt Musa Waɛmer amulli n tlallit Matub Lwennas i ilulen ass n 24 deg yennayer 1956, yettwanɣa ass n 25 yunyu 1998. Limmer mačči d At n ṭṭlam i t-iɣedren s lexdeɛ, tili ass-a, ha-t-an 62 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is. Acu kan, xas ma yella tɣab tfekkas, mazal yedder yisem-is d wayen i d-yeǧǧa. Mačči kan ɣer wid i t-yessnen neɣ i t-iqerben, meɛna ula ɣer wid werǧin ur t-nwala, ɣer wid ɛad i mazal ur d-nlul asmi i t-nɣan. Aya, iban-d ass-nni n lexmis, 24 deg yennayer 2018, anda i d-ussan yilmeẓyen s waṭas yid-sen ɣer usmekti n umulli-ines i texdem tddukkla Lsas Matoub deg taddart-is Tawrirt Musa Waɛmer. Deg usmekti-agi, dɣa, i d-yella usenẓu s wudem unsib n uzekka-s iwumi rnan kra n useqɛed u seqqfen amekkan anda yella. Am wakken i d-yella leqdic-nniḍen am yal aseggas, yecban timsikniyin akked lwaɛda. Aya yeḍra mebɛed mi sersen wid i d-yerzan timuqqunin n yiseǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka-s. I usmekti, ha-tt-an la d-tettheggi tesdawit Aberrahmane Mira n Bgayet yiwet n temlilit tagraɣlant ɣef ucennay Matub Lwennas ara yilin seg 19 ar 21 deg yunyu i d-iteddun. Am wakken i ttwaxedmen tlata n waktayen n Magister fell-as sɣur Lynda Ouattas n tesdawit n Bgayet, Rachida Fittas n tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu akked Farida Ziane n tesdawit n Montréal. Yessekles Matub 34 n albumat gar 1978 d 1998. Yura ugar 220 n yisefra.

  Gar wayen i d-ḥekkun fell-as   Matoub d yidlisen. 

 Ɣef wakken i d-nnan, seg zik, iḥemmel Matoub ad iɣer. Ihi, yiwen wass, yemlal deg lǧanaza akked Achour Ourrad (d netta i aɣ-tt-id-yennan). Yuɣ lḥal, argaz-a yesnaɣ-as tannumi yettawi-d idlisen mi ara d-yali ɣer taddart. Mi d-yewweḍ winna ɣer lǧanaza, yuɣ lḥal teqqes-it tɣirdemt. Medden akk lhan-d deg umekkan-nni n tuqsa, Matoub yettḥewwis lǧiban-is ma yella kra n udlis.

  Matoub d waman n lbir. 

 Yesɛa Matoub lbir deg uxxam-is. Seg wakken ttxassan waman deg taddart, yebna tala i Wat taddart u yessalay-as-d aman seg lbir-nni. Ttasen-d ttagmen. Yiwet n tikkelt mi d-ileḥḥu s axxam, yemmuger-d tilawin uɣalent-d mebla ma wwint-d aman. Yesteqsa-tent ɣef sebba. Nnant-as-d : ‘’la d-teqqar yemma-k, yeqqur lbir-nni’’. Mi yewweḍ s axxam, yufa yemma-s la tettess tamazirt s waman n lbir-nni. Seg zɛef-nni, yekker yerkeḍ-as akk tibḥirt-is.

  Matoub deg wass lɛid. 

 Iruḥ Matoub ɣer tejmaɛt deg wass n lɛid, yufa-n din yiwen urgaz yeqqim weḥd-s. dɣa-, yenna-as Matoub :’’nekk aql-i da axater weḥd-i i lliɣ, i kečč, acuɣer mačči deg uxxam-ik i telliḍ, ɣer warraw-ik ass-agi n lɛid ?’’ yerra-as-d winna :’’ad ak-iiniɣ kan ṣṣaḥ, setḥaɣ ad qableɣ tawacult-iw imi ur zmireɣ ara ad d-aɣeɣ ikerri n lɛid’’. Yuɣ lḥal, Matoub, yesɛa ikerri deg uxxam. Din, din, iruḥ yewwi-as-t-id.

  Matoub d iselman. 

 Yiwen wass, iruḥ ad d-yaɣ iselman deg taddart. Mi yewweḍ, yenna-as i winna yesnuzun iselmaden ad as-d-yefk arḍel (azgen n kilu). Mi i as-t-id-yefka, yessegra-as-d awal winna, yenna-as :’’Matoub s timmad-is, yewwi kan arḍel’’. Yuɣ lḥal, yefka-as Matoub 1000 idinaren. Mi iruḥ ad as-d-yerr ṣserf, yenna-as Matoub : ‘’aɣ-d yis-sen lefhama’’. Kra n tedyatin ɣef Matoub.

  Hocine Moula

  Aheggi 

 Gezmet lebsel-nni u terrem-t ad yeqlu daxel n zzit uzemmur. Syin, surget fell-as aman yeḥman, ternum-as lmelḥ, ifelfel aberkan d lkummun. Imir, terrem ibawen akked texsayt. Anfet-as ad yeww azal n 30’. Tzemrem ad teẓdem askaf-a, neɣ ad as-ternum aksum neɣ ayaziḍ. Ttheggin-t i lmend n tlalit n ugrud, neɣ deg tmeɣra. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Tettwassen taddart n At Mbarek, i yettabaεen tɣiwant n tṣexṛiwt, s leqdic adelsan n yilemẓiyen-is, ladɣa deg wayen i icudden ɣer yidles. Arrac n Tṣexṛiwt s umata, llan seg yimezwura i d-yesnulfan tiddukkliwin tidelsanin. Imi d nutni i yeldin tawwurt i ddeqs n yinaẓuṛen, εeṛden-ten-id ɣer Uxxam n yilemẓiyen, yerna deg yiseggasen n 80. Gar-asen Massa Bucafa. Akken yeqqaṛ yinzi ‘’Win i d-yettuṛebban ɣef kra, ad yemmet fell-as’’. Ihi ilemẓiyen n Tṣexṛiwt, mazal-iten qeddcen deg unnar. Aredmani zik ulac aṭaṣ n yiεeggalen di tddukkliwin, ass-a amḍan-nsen yennerna. Gar tddukkliwin i yeṭṭfen amkan iṛeṣṣan deg tɣiwant-a, tiddukkla tadelsant « Tadukkli » n At Mbarek, d tin yessεan azal meqqṛen ɣuṛ yimezdaɣ. 

 Ayagi imi, ama d aselway-is, ama d imeltaɣen-is, xeddmen ayen yellan fell-asen i wakken ad d-rren i yidles aqbayli, d umaziɣ s umata, udem-is idetti deg taddart-nsen. Ula d izerfan n At taddart, d nutni i yettazzalen fell-asen. Γef usentel-a, yewwi-d ad d-nebder belli d nutni i yessḥeṛṛṣen imḍebbṛen n tɣiwant armi i asen-d-fkan tibettiyin timeqqṛanin n ugudu. Meḥsub imezdaɣ n taddart n At Mbarek, llan ur ksiben ara ibidunen anda ara deggṛen ahicuṛ-nsen. Mebla ma nettu d akken, aɣbel-nsen ageεmir d Axxam n yidles, i yettwabellεen acḥal-ayagi. Nutni dɣa, zgan deffir n uselway n tɣiwant i waken ad as-iεiwid axeddim. 

 Tessemliliy-d tddukkla-a, daɣen, At taddart deg uxxam-is, deg ddeqs n tegnatin. Ama d timliliyin tidelsanin, ama d isaragen. Tikkelt-a, i wakken ad d-sfugglen aseggas amaynut n yimaziɣen 2970, thegga-d tddukkla tadelsant « Tadukkli » ahil d amerkanti i wussan n 10,11, akked 12 yennayer. Aṭas n leqdicat ara yilin, abeεda, timsiknin, ticeqqufin n umezgun, timsizzliyin n tuččit igerrzen. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ula d iḍebbalen ad ilin di ttiεad. Di taggara, ssxebṛen-d inebgawen-nsen belli ad d-yili yimekli i ilmend-nsen. Nessaram-asen afud uzmir.

  K. K.

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Rret seksu deg tbaqit, u tesmirem-as aman i wakken ad yelxes. Anfet-as ad yekkaw, tfetlem-t ciṭ. Syin, terrem-t ɣer tseksut, ad d-ifur. Rret-t i tikkelt-nniḍen deg tbaqit i wakken ad yessew aman-nni. Sqecret lxeḍra-nni, tgezmem-tt d iḥricen imecṭaḥ, tessewwem-tt s ufuru. Yuɣ lḥal terram iẓuran-nni n uderyis, timellalin akked yimɣan daxel n tasilt, ad wwen. Mi yewwa kullec, tgezmem-t u tesxelḍem akked lxeḍra d seksu. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Yennulfa-d di cutembeṛ yezrin aseggas n 2018 yiwen n warraz s wazal-is, swayes ad rren yimheggiyen tajmilt i tmarut Yamina Mecakṛa, i yellan d tamsujit n tnefsit daɣen.Tlul Yamina deg useggas n 1949, temmut deg win n 2013. Tessuffeɣ-d adlis  » La grotte éclatée  » (1979) akked « Arris » (1999) . Rnu ɣef waya, arraz-a d asebɣes i kra n tmeṭṭut i ḥemmlen awal, i kra n tin yerran imru d ameddakkel, i tid yesseklasen tiktiwin-nsent ɣef tferkit, ssufɣent-d tayri d iḥulfan i yettidiren deg-sent. Ayen yessefṛaḥen ugar, d amenzay n warraz-a, acku d win ara d-yilin d uzzig ( spécial ) i tira n tmeṭṭut, neɣ s unamek-nniḍen d  » Imru n tmeṭṭut « . Deg temsizzelt n teẓrigt tamezwarut, ffɣen-d yigemmaḍ ass n acer 20 di yennayer yezrin di Lezzayer tamaneɣt. Kṛad n tmaruyin i yeṭṭfen tacwawt, s kṛad n wungalen, yal yiwet deg tutlayt n tira-s: Kaysa Xalifi deg tutlayt n tmaziɣt s wungal-is  » Iḥulfan » ; Ǧamila Talbawi deg tutlayt n teεṛabt s wungal-is  » Ul n Uṣbelyuni  » i d-yeffɣen di teẓṛigin n El Waṭan akked Hidya Benṣalḥi deg tutlayt taṛumit s wungal-is.  » Ṛṛeεd  » i d-yeffɣen di teẓṛigin Frantz-Fanon. Akken yeqqar yinzi  » Akken tebɣuḍ teɣzifeḍ a yiḍ, d uleqṛar ad yali wass », ihi ayen yeẓẓa yiwen ad t-id-yemger. Ass-a tiḥeddadin n wawal megrent-d lɣella n uqeddic-nsent, ayagi, ad asent-yefk tazmert i wakken ad kemmlent abrid-nsent. Ad d-nesmekti d akken Kaysa Xalifi, tin i d-yufraren deg tutlayt tamaziɣt, tewweḍ leεfu n Yellu deg yunyu 2018, meεna ɣas agectum-is yekcem akal, tiktiwin-is mazal-itent ddrent, mazal ad idirent sya ɣer sdat. Xas akka, ulac-itt, maca ass-a tefka-d amedya i tmetti, d akken ur temmut ara, imi mazal anza n leqdic-is ɣef teqbaylit-is i tḥemmel ayendin yedder. Imeddukkal n Kaysa d wid i tt-iḥemmlen umren nezzeh, ayagi iban-d di tnaga-nsen. Ar taggara am neqqaṛ a tukyist kemm teddṛeḍ s wayen i aɣ-d-tessegṛaḍ, sgunfu di talwit a talwit. 

<p style="text-align:right"> K. K. 

  
 Sfuglent tddukkliwin tidelsanin n dayra n Wagennun, i iqedcen deg unnar n yidles, as amenzu n yennayer. Ama d tid yellan deg tɣiwant n At Ɛissa Mimun, ama deg tɣiwan Wagennun neɣ deg tɣiwant n Timizar, heggant-d leqdicat i lmend n waya. Yal yiwet s wahil-is amerkanti, yal yiwet iwumi tefren ad terr tajmilt. Nexdem tirza taggara n ddurt-agi yezrin i wakken ad nẓer amek i d-yella usmekti n yennayer deg Wagennun, sɣur tiddukkliwin n yidles.

  Di tɣiwant n At Ɛissa Mimun 

 Deg tɣiwant-agi, yella-d usfugel n yennayer sɣur snat n tddukkliwin-agi tidelsanin “Tarwa n Uqeṭɛan” n taddart n Uqawej akked tiddukkla “Tadukli tarwa n Leɛzib” n taddart n Leɛzib n Ugni n Ɛmer. Deg tazwara, ad d-nawi awal ɣef leqdic d wahil anesbaɣur n tiddukkla tadelsant “Tarwa n Uqeṭɛan”, i d-isuddsen irmad idelsanen ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan, gar 10 alamma d 12 yennayer 2018, i d-yellan d tajmilt i umaru i umeɣnas n tmaziɣt Bessaɛud Muḥend Aɛrab, yettwameḍlen deg taddart-agi n Uqawej. Deg wass-nni amezwaru, i d-yellan ass-nni n larebɛa 10 deg waggur n yennayer, seg 16h00 alamma d 18h00 n tmeddit, yella-d usarag n Mass Yunes Ɛedli, i d-yewwin awal umezruy n yennayer d wayen akk i icudden ɣur-s. Asarag-agi i d-yellan deg Uxxam n tiddukkla-agi, yeḍra-d deg tegnatin igerrzen, imi i d-yella diɣ uskasi ladɣa sɣur yinelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas yellan deg taddart-agi. Ma d ass-nni n lexmis 10 yennayer, i d-yellan d ass wis sin deg ttiɛad-agi adelsan, tella-d deg uxxam n Bessaɛud Muḥend Aɛrab deg-s temsikent ɣef tudert d yimuhal n urgaz-agi ameggran, i d-yefkan aṭas i tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ s umata. Am wakken daɣen i d-tella temsikent n tɣawsiwin timensayin n Leqbayel, i d-yellan deg uxxam n tiddukkla-a, seg 9h00 alamma d 17h00 n tmeddit. Ikemmel wahil deg tmeddit n wass, dɣa yella-d deg-s ɣef 16h00 usarag n Mass Ɛebdenur Ɛebdeslam, i d-yewwin awal ɣef tuddsa n wakud s tmuɣli neɣ s tefransist “Lorganisation agraire du temps par l’observation”. Ma ɣef 20h00 n yiḍ tella-d temlilit n temɣarin, i d-yellan d tajmilt i temɣarin n taddart-agi n Uqawej. Ma d sendiḍelli n lǧemɛa 12 yennayer 2018, i d-yellan d ass aneggaru n leqdic-agi anesbaɣur, tella-d deg-s temsikent n tɣawsiwin sexdamen medden zik, seg 9h00 alammi d 17h00 n tmeddit. Ma ɣef 9h00 n ssbeḥ, yella-d usersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef uẓekka n Bessaɛud Muḥend Aɛrab, syin akkin ɣef 9h30, llant-d tnagiyin d umeslay ɣef wayen i d-yeǧǧa Dda Muḥend. Tin ɣur-s, ɣef 10h30 n uzal, tella-d tikli uyrad sɣur yimezdaɣ deg ubrid n taddart, yettwassnen s yisem n “Carnaval”, ma ɣef 13h30 alamma d 16h00 n tmeddit, tella-d temsizzelt n uyaziḍ yufraren. Ma d tura ad nawi awal ɣef leqdic d wahil anesbaɣur n tiddukkla tadelsant “Tadukli n tarwa n Leɛzib”, i d-isuddsen irmad idelsanen ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan-agi lexmis11 akked lǧemɛa 12 yennayer 2018, i d-yellan d tazrigt tis tlata n usmekti n yennayer. Dɣa deg wass-nni wis sin, i d-yellan ass-nni n lexmis 11 yennayer, tella-d temsikent n lfeṭṭa, n tqendurin n Leqbayel, akked yidlisen d yiḍrisen n tɣamsa taqburt i d-yewwin awal ɣef unsay n yennayer di tmurt n Leqbayel, d waṭas n yisental-nniḍen.

 Ma d ass-nni n lǧemɛa 12 yennayer 2018, bdan ahil-nsen s yiwet n temsikent n tɣawsiwin n zik, syin akkin ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, tella-d terbaɛt n yiḍebbalen i d-yewwin kra n tezlatin. Mi yezgen wass, yella-d usečči n seksu s uyaziḍ i yinebgawen i d-yerzan ɣer taddart-agi n Laɛzib n Ugni n Ɛmer. Am wakken daɣen i d-tella tejmilt meqqren i umedyaz d umaru d uneggal ameqqran Ɛli Maqur n taddar-agi, iɣef wwḍen 17 n yiseggasen ɣef tmettant-is, dɣa tella-d temsikent d tnagiyin ɣef tudert-is d yimuhal-is. Ma ɣef 14h00 n uzal, fkan arrazen i yinelmaden iffazen yeqqaren deg nuɣerbaz amezwaru n taddart-agi, akked wid i d-yufraren deg yikayaden n tmaziɣt. Mmuden daɣen arrazen i yinaddalen i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt n tazla akked wid i d-yufraren deg temiliyin n ddabex n uḍar i d-tḥegga yakkan tddukkla-agi deg wussan yezrin. Ma seg 15h00 d afella, tella-d tmeɣra n ccna, sɣur aṭas n yinaẓuren n tamag-agi n At Ɛissa Mimun.

  Di tɣiwant n Wagennun 

 Ula d tiddukkla tadelsant “Tamussni” n Wagennun, tella deg ttiɛad i lmend n usfugel n yennayer n useggas-a, dɣa thegga-d ɣef teɣzi n wass-nni n ssebt 13 yennayer 2018, ahil d amerkanti s wayes i d-tesmekta tawwurt n useggas ɣer yimaziɣen. D leqdic i d-tessuddes tiddukkla-agi s tallelt n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan (APC) n Wagennun, axxam n yilmeẓyen n Wagennun, d leqdic i ɣef bedden yimdanen-agi: Tiqubɛini Nadya, Ɣiles Ḥeddad, Ḥaǧi Muḥend Saɛid akked Massa Bucarab Naṣira, i wakken ad yili deg tegnatin igerrzen. Yebda wahil adelsan ɣef 9 n ssbeḥ deg Uxxam n yilmeẓyen n Wagennun, s kra n temsikniyin n tqendurin n Leqbayel akked tgella sewwayen zik deg yennayer, timsikent n tẓuri…atg. Ma ɣef 13h00 n uzal, i tebda tmeɣra n ccna meqqren i deg cnan ddeqs n yicennayen, gar-asen: Karim Xelfawi, Ǧafer Ḥaǧi, Farid, Ḥaǧi Qader, Akli Begric, Belxir Ǧafer…at.

  Ula di tɣiwant n Timizar 

 Tiddukkla tadelsant “Tussna” n Timizar, thegga-d leqdic d amerkanti i lmend n usfugel n yennayer, dɣa gan-as tajmilt meqqren umedyaz d urgaz n umezgun n taddart-agi n Ubiẓar, wagi d Mass Nurdin At Sliman. Yella-d ttiɛad-agi adelsan sendiḍelli n ssebt 13 deg waggur n yennayer 2018, deg taddart-is n Ubiẓar, s usentel-agi: “Yennayer. D aẓar, d tiɣri n tmazɣa”. Ma d ahil, yella-d akka, deg tsebḥit n wass, llant-d tnagiyin ɣef tudert-is d yimuhal-is, syin d ameslay fell-as sɣur yimeddukkal-is, yewwi-d daɣen kra n yisefra. Tella-d diɣ temsikent n wayen akk yexdem d wayen yettwarun fell-as.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
  Isufar 

 1kg n yiselman

 ½ kg n treɣlin

 Ciṭ n teḥcict 

 6 n tdeggar n ticcert

 1 n lkas n zzit uzemmur

 1 n lkas n zzit n lqelyan

 Lkemmun, ifelfel aberkan

 1 n tɣenjawt n lmakla n wudi

 1 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n maïzena

  Aheggi 

 Rret daxel n uḍebsi, taḥcict, ticcert yeẓdan, lkemmun, ifelfel aberkan akked lmelḥ. Melmi tessardem iselman, terrem-ten s ufella n tmes taḥlawant, daxel n tkasrut i wakken ad qqlun s zzit, tanfem-asen ad wwen azal 20’. Si tama-nniḍen, sefsit udi s ufella n tmes, terrem-as lmelḥ, ifelfel n leḥlu, syin tesxelḍem-ten akked treɣlin-nni. Sxelḍet maïzina n ciṭ n waman, ternum-tt i treɣlin. Ttmaččan yiselman s lmerqa n treɣlin.

  Daya 

  
 Deg tdiwennit-a, newwi-d awal s umata ɣef tsekla akked kra n yisental imiranen, yecban takadimit, ssinima, tujjya d wayen-nniḍen.

  Aḥric 1u 

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Amek tettwaliḍ tasekla taqbaylit akka tura ? 

  Ɛmer Mezdad:  Tasekla-nneɣ, ddeqs segmi tenti asikel-ines. Iḍrisen wezzilen, am tmucuha, isefra, inzan, ɣas reṣṣan deg yiẓuran n umezruy-nneɣ, ulac win I izemren ad d-yini melmi i d-ufraren. Afulay, yezdem seg-sen. Ula d Uxeldun yebder-iten-id, yura fell-asen. Ma d iḍrisen ɣezzifen d iseggasen-aya, ideg ntin, ffutkin di lqern wis 20. Ayen yeεnan ungal atrar, d tidet, d amaynut deg tuget meqqren n tmeslayin ! Imi tawsit-a n tsekla (ssenf-a), ilul-d di Turupt uggaɣ di lqern wis 16 : llan yigduden mačči s waṭas i aɣ-yezwaren mi kecmen ɣur-s. Iṭerkiyen d Waɛraben akken kan yewweḍ lqern segmi ntin, ttarun ungalen. Ma d nekni, tura nnig 70 n yiseggasen segmi i d-yeffeɣ wungal-nneɣ amezwaru, ma neqbel « Lwali n udrar » n Belɛid At Σli d ungal. Ma tebɣiḍ, s Yiqbaylien nḥella-d amkan-nneɣ di tsekla-agi tatrart ɣas urǧin nufa anida ara nsenned, anagar s lebɣi n yimeɣnasen yettarun i tessuref tsekla-nneɣ. Tura uggaɣ neffel i 100 n wungalen s teqbaylit. Llan deg-sen wid yelhan, llan deg-sen wid ixussen. Wid yettarun akka tura, ilaq ad ssifsusen cwiṭ tira. Mer d lebɣi, deg usemres n yisekkilen, ur ilaq ad fflen akkin i ubrid i d-neǧren wid i aɣ-d-yezwaren. Ma d izen, d tiktiwin i bɣan ad sersen di lkaɣeḍ, ayen bɣan arun-t : ulac am tlelli. Tira taseklant, tezmer ad temgarad cwiṭ d tira n tjerrumt. Akka yakk timeslayin. Tajerrumt mi ara d-yeffel udeqqes-ines di tira, tezmer ad tesselwi aɣanib. Tira d aɣanib daɣen mačči d tajerrumt kan akked yilugan iquraren swayes ur ihedder yiwen. Wigi yesxuntucen di tmeslayt, tikwal yella wanida teccḍen.

  Ha-t-an tura 5 n yiseggasen seld tuffɣa-inek i tesdawit n Tubiret, tuɣaleḍ ussan-a kan i usarag-nniḍen ɣef tira n wungalen. Meslay-aneɣ-d cwiṭ fell-as… 

 D tidet, d tikkelt tis-snat i usiɣ ɣer tesdawit n Tubiret. Usiɣ imi i ttwaεerḍeɣ. Mer ur ttwaεerḍeɣ ara, tili ur ttaseɣ ara. Walaɣ tasdawit n Tubiret, ur tderreε ara am tiyaḍ, am wakken yella deg-s uzwu n tegmat, wid i tt-yessedduyen ur wwin ara abrid-nni yettawin ɣer tsekkat. Ma d isaragen-inu ɣef tira n wungalen mačči n wussan-a kan : zik, ulac tiɣilt anida ur d-wwiɣ ameslay fell-asen. Acu, di tallit-nni, am wakken nezwar cwiṭ di tazzla imi ur d-cfiɣ gan-as medden ccan i wayen i sen-d-ttawiɣ ɣef tsekla taqbaylit. Di tallit-nni, medden ur ten-tceɣɣeb ara tasekla. Ahat tura tbeddel teswiεt : wi yeẓran ? Gar wid iḥeḍren tikkelt-a, di Tubiret, ama d inelmaden, ama d iselmaden, aṭas seg-sen ɣran ungalen yakk uriɣ.

  Aṭas i yettmesteqsayen ma ad irezzu Mass Ɛmer Mezdad i temliliyin tiseklanin ma yettwaɛreḍ? 

 Tagi n uεraḍ d wat uεraḍ ɣur-s ilugan. Nekk ad ak-d-sukkeɣ leεraḍ, kečč ma yehwa-ak as-d, ma ur ak-yehwi ara, ur d-ttas ara, akken twalaḍ. Acu, nekk, ad ak-id-εerḍeɣ. Nniɣ-ak-d timlilyin-agi tiseklanin buhan i xedmeɣ seg-sent, uggaɣ nnig 60, armi i d-ggurεeɣ seg-sent i d-snesren ! Daymi kukraɣ ad greɣ aḍaḍ-iw dinna tikkelt-nniḍen. Llan daɣen wid iḥemmlen akka tirebbuya&amp;epsilon,; tijemmuya&amp;epsilon,; nekk ma tebɣiḍ d ahilaw cwiṭ, si zik i yiman-iw i xeddmeɣ, i tedduɣ, dɣa amzun tuɣal-iyi d tannumi. Axeddim di trebbuyeε alamma ibaḥ, ɣur-i d tamara kan, mi ara saliɣ kra dinna. Akud ixuṣ daymi ur ssineɣ ara aṭas i unezzeh d uferqes. Yerna, akken ad taruḍ, ilaq ad tiliḍ i yiman-ik. Tira, ilaq-as wakud. Tlaq-as daɣen tsussmi. Ma d anermes akked wid i yi-yeɣran, akked wid i yi-yeqqaren, urǧin i t-gzimeɣ. S lferḥ d ameqqran ara ttemliliɣ yid-sen mer yella wamek, mer yella wanida. Imeɣriyen, kra n wid i yi-d-yessuturen anamek n wawal neɣ n twinest, zgiɣ ttarraɣ-asen. Llan ula d wid iwumi uriɣ tizwarin neɣ iwumi seɣtaɣ irusfusen-nsen. Acu, tineggura-a, llan wid i yi-d-yeqqaren ayɣer teqqimeḍ kan di tira s « ţ », tinna n Mεemri? Amzun « ţ »-nni yeshan-iten kra. Ahat imi llan wid i asen-t-yeffren. Llan wid yettuɣalen ɣur-s di tira taseklant-nsen.

  Imi aql-ik daɣen deg unnar n tesnujjya. Ur tettwaliḍ ara xussen ayendin yidlisen i d-yettawin ɣef taɣult-a s tutlayt-nneɣ? 

 Tamurt-nneɣ taswiεt-a i teḥwaǧ d iḍbiben n lεali, wid ara idawin medden, ara ten-yettqadaren, ara sen-yemmalen. Ma d amawal n tesnujjya, les concepts-ines, allalen-ines d igraɣlanen. Aẓar-nsen d win i semrasen deg umaḍal akkit. D ireṭṭalen si tegrigit neɣ si tlatinit. Ama di tefransist, ama di taεrabt, ur ttcuḥḥun ara i yireṭṭalen. Di teswiεt-a ideg nella, tidlisin n tesnujjya s teqbaylit, uggaɣ ulac aḥiri deg-sent. Asmi ara laqent, asmi ara tent-ḥwiǧen medden, imir-n ahat ad d-ilint. Γur-wat tadimagujit yezgan di kra n yimawen.

  Seld ugur d amecṭuḥ, yuɣal-d wadeg-inek ayamun.com. Wiss ma tettuqennɛeḍ s umḍan n tirziwin i iseɛɛu, neɣ d amḍan n yizdamen n tesɣunt tamayyurt? 

 « Ayamun.com, tasɣunt n tsekla tamaziɣt » tura d aseggas wis 19 segmi tenǧer abrid-ines, cwiṭ cwiṭ. Gar wuguren d unegzum n kra n wussan i d-yettilin sya ɣer da, tasɣunt tetteffeɣ-d abrid i sin n wagguren. Aql-aɣ tura di 94 n wuṭṭunen. Wid izeddmen deg-s ha rennun-d, ha neqqsen. Zemreɣ ad ak-iniɣ aṭas i yellan d imezgiyen, ulac ass ideg ur tt-ẓuren ara. Izeddamen-a, zemreɣ ad ak-d-iniɣ ggten. Mer ad gten ugar, ad nettuqenneε ugar. Tura, sya d afella, tasɣunt, ma ulac wid ara tt-yeddmen, ad tt-seddun akken ilaq, ahat qrib ad d-yaweḍ lawan ad tt-nεekkel, acu, ad tt-neǧǧ d tameḥḍit (archive) deg uzeṭṭa. Yerna amdakkel-nni yettxellisen lekra d iseggasen-aya, uggadeɣ ad yeεyu. Ma yeɣra tadiwennit-a, ad yaf deg-s tanemmirt-a i as-sawaḍeɣ yal ass. Lemziyya-k meqqret…  Yettkemmil 

  M.K. 

  
 Ihegga-d ugraw n tsekla Tira Tura n At Yanni yiwet n tuffɣa ass n 30 deg meɣres 2018 ɣer yiwen n umḍiq i d-yezgan deg Wat Wasif deg yiwet n taddart anida leḥwari-ines mazal-itent d tiqburen n tmurt n leqbayel, tagi qqaren-as Timeɣras; i d-yettbinin am uxelxal ddaw tleṭaṭ (main du juif) n udrar n Ǧerǧer. Amdiq-a, d yiwen n yifri isem-is Ifri Ṣemmḍen. Ihi, ṭṭfen abrid-nsen ɣer Wat Wasif s lferḥ d ameqqran, ḥaren ad awḍen. Mi leḥqen ɣer taddart-nni, iqubel-iten-id udrar aɛlayan d ubeḥri aṣemmad. Bdan la ttalin tiseddarin armi i wwḍen ar taggara n ubrid. Yiwet n tugna, tecbeḥ dayen kan; isekla ǧuǧǧgen. Mi kemmlen tikli ɣer sdat, slan i ucercur n waman ; ziɣ d tala i yellan deg tama-nni. Syin, walan ifri-nni, d ayen yessewhamen. Kecmen ɣer-s deg ṭza (9) yid-sen u s tidet ufan-n lḥal ṣemmeḍ, leḥḥun ɣef yiblaḍen, timeqqwa n waman, ad d-neggint fell-asen. Walan, diɣ, ijabab yulin d wid isubben (stalagmites et stalactites), akken kan i d-bdan talalit. Ifri-a, yesɛa azal n (80 ar 100 m) deg teɣzi u yezga-d ɣef ( 940 m) deg tiddi deg usamer-agafa n tmurt. Deg taggara, ahat yal yiwen deg-wen, ad yeɛreḍ ad iruḥ ɣer yifri-a imi yesɛa azal, u itkkes lxiq i umdan. Ɣef waya, ilaq ad neeseḥbiber ɣef yimeḍqan yecban-wigi. 

  Boughareb Dihia 

  
 D taswiɛt, daɣen, i furṣen, ladɣa, yilmeẓyen i wakken ad ssizedgen izenqan d usicbeḥ n yiɣraben n taddart-agi i d-yezgan deg tɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu. Zedɣen deg taddart n Tala Athmane ugar n 9 000 n yimezdaɣ. Tettwassen aṭas, tineggura-a, s leswaq-is : ama d win n lǧemla neɣ win n lǧemɛa i d-yezgan berra n taddart deg umekkan iwumi qqaren Lbur n Wadda neɣ Agni n Tigit. Llan s umata, tlata n yiḍwaren n tnezduɣt : Tazmalt n wadda, taddart ufella akked Lexmis alemmas. Taggar-a, yerna-d Yiɣil Ufella. Ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-nnan, ula d Si Muḥend U Mḥend icekker-itt-id deg yiwen usefru imi ala deg Tala Athmane i t-kubren akken ilaq asmi i d-iɛedda syin. Yekka-d seg Tamda d abrid ɣer Yisyaxen. Asefru-a, mazal deg yimawen n yimezdaɣ. Ha-t-an amek i as-yeqqar :

<p class="has-text-align-center"> Ɛeddaɣ-d deg yiwen ubilaj messus, 
  Yezzi-as kalitus,
  Winna, qqaren-as Tamda.
  Lmakla-nsen d akermus,
  D aseqcer s ufus,
  Laẓ dinna i yesqaqa.
  Lxetyar ɣef lxetyar, d Tala Athmane,
  ṭṭɛam-nsen d aḥlawan, 
  s wudi i yeddahan.
  Mačči am Wat Yisyaxen,
  S lqahwa i ɛerḍen,
  Ziɣ yella yinebgi n waman.

 Ma ɣef leqdic s umata, ladɣa ussan-agi n ukman, yenna-d Uresqi, yiwen gar yilmeẓyen i iqeddcen deg taddart n Tala Athmane :’’Seg useggas n 2019 i nebda nekni s yilmeẓyen nxeddem tigawin dagi deg taddart n Tala Ɛetman. Nger-d iman-nneɣ s annar imi wid-nni i ilaq ad d-ssiwlen ɣer ccɣel-a, ur d-banen ara. Dɣa, syin i neddem tikti-agi i wakken ad d-nelhu s lecɣal n taddart deg wayen yeɛnan asizdeg s umata. Nebda nessinif ammus, nferres iberdan akked tzenqatin. Nettwali amek ara nefk udem icebḥen i taddart-nneɣ. Ɣef wakka dɣa i d-kkren yimezdaɣ deg yal tama n taddart, ddan deg umahil-agi. Syin, tewweḍ-d diɣ temsal-agi n waṭtan Covid-129, nger-d iman-nneɣ s annar i wakken ad nesseḥbiber ɣef terwiḥin n yimezdaɣ s uwelleh akked usizdeg n yal amḍiq, ladɣa ɣef yiberdan n unekcum ɣer daxel n taddart. Ɣef waya dɣa i neɣleq kra n yiberdan u neǧǧa kan igejdanen anda i nessizdig tikeryas i ikeccmen ɣer daxel n taddart. Yella umekkan n usizdeg deg taddart n wadda, deg taddart n ufella akked Lexmis. Seg tama n ttawilat n usizdeg, ad nesnemmer aṭas aselway n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun akked tɣiwant-nneɣ n Tizi Uzzu i aɣ-d-yefkan afus n tallelt d usebɣes. Nessaram ad nkemmel, u ad nesseqɛed iman-nneɣ ugar n waya sya d tasawent. Aql-aɣ la nettxemmim ɣef wamek ara d-ilint tuddsiwin neɣ tddukkliwin dagi ɣur-neɣ. Seg tama n cbaḥa d ureqqem n yiɣraben (leḥyuḍ) n taddart, ha-t-an yebda ussan-a kan sɣur kra n yinaẓuren-nneɣ iwumi ara nerr tajmilt tameqqrant. Ad d-nebder Sofiane Ait Amer, Amar Khiar, Youcef Moula i yeṭṭfen tama-agi n teklut, u bdan asuneɣ’’. 

<p class="has-text-align-center"> Asicbeḥ n taddart 

<p class="has-text-align-left">Ɣef wamek i d-tusa tekti-agi n teklut, yenna-d Mesṭafa : ‘’Nenna gar-aneɣ, nekni, neqqim, neqqim s sebba n Covid-19, i wacuɣer ur nettcebbiḥ ara taddart-nneɣ ? Ihi, nebda s usicbeḥ n leḥyuḍ n taddart. Mi slan yimezdaɣ s umahil-a, bdan ttaken-d afus n tallelt : yal wa d acu i aɣ-d-yefka, wa d lǧir, wayeḍ d sbiɣa…atg. Nerra-d acmumeḥ i taddart, nerra-d tadukli i yellan yakan gar yimezdaɣ. Dayen yessefraḥen nezzeh. Nessaram ad nkemmel deg umecwar i d-newwi. Ma d Said, ikemmel, yerna-d : ‘’Ad d-rnuɣ ciṭ ɣef wayen akka i d-nnan yimeddukkal :’’Xas ḥemmleɣ taddart-iw, ufiɣ-d llan wid i tt-iḥemmlen kter-iw. I usmekti kan. Neqqim deg lewziɛa-nni n 2019, d iqessaren, dɣa nenna-as i wacuɣer ur nessizdig ara taddart-nneɣ. Awal yettawi-d wayeḍ armi tuɣal d tilawt. Nebda afras n yiberdan, nekkes aɣanim d yiḍumman i ikeblen leryaf-nsen. Simmal nxeddem, simmal yetticbiḥ wudem n twennaḍt. Aya, yefka-aɣ afud meqqren i wakken ad nkemmel deg lecɣal-agi. Syin, nekka-d i taddart seg usamar-is ɣer umalu-ines. Ladɣa imi yella usebɣes n yimezdaɣ. Yal win ara neqqsed, ad d-yini ‘Aql-i da’, ama s texriḍt neɣ s wayen-nniḍen. Nuɣal nessazdeg ula d aɣerbaz amenzu i yellan deg yir liḥala. Seg yimir deg unnar armi d tallit-a n Coronavirus anda i nuɣal ɣer useḥbiber d uwelleh. Ad snemreɣ aṭas imezdaɣ i d-yerran i teɣri. Ula d lǧameɛ akked tmeqqbert, nerra-ten-id deg lbal-nneɣ. Tin ɣur-s, mačči kan d taddart-nneɣ i nessazdeg, meɛna nɛawen ula d lǧiran-nneɣ i yellan deg La Zone’’ d wiyaḍ. Ula d Ɛaziz, s wawal-is :’’Seg tama n uwren, nexdem am tudrin merra : nuzzel, newwi-d awren, syin nefreq-it ɣef yimezdaɣ. Ad snemreɣ wid yakk i aɣ-iɛawnen, taɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu, imawlan n yikamyunen, ilmeẓyen-nneɣ. Ad d-smektiɣ d akken yal axxam, yewweḍ-it umur-is mebla ma yusa-d uɛeggal-is ɣur-neɣ’’.

<p class="has-text-align-center">
   Awal n yinaẓuren Amar Khiar d Sofiane Ait Ammar 

<p class="has-text-align-left">
  Ɣef wamek i d-yella usuneɣ n tfelwin n teklut, yenna-d Amar Khiar‘’Nekk, am yilmeẓyen yakk n taddart, greɣ-d iman-iw i wakken ad ttekkiɣ deg leqdicat i d-yettilin dagi ɣur-neɣ, ama seg tama n usizdeg, n uwelleh neɣ n usicbeḥ n yimeḍqan. Imi ḥemmelɣ mliḥ aḥric-agi n teklut, dɣa nniɣ-as ad d-awiɣ aẓru-inu ɣer tama-agi n usicbeḥ n yiɣraben. Seg tazwara i truḥ tidmi-w ɣer ucennay Idir i aɣ-yeǧǧan ussan-agi kan. Ihi, nniɣ-as, ad sunɣeɣ udem-is ɣer tama n Matoub. Ha-t-an amek i d-tella tikti. Yuɣ lḥal, yella Merzouk Dib, yebɣa aya s ufella n lḥiḍ-is. Din din, tasekkurt, timellalin u bdiɣ leqdic-iw : yal tameddit, xeddmeɣ ciṭ. Akken armi i tekfa tfelwit-nni. Tura, ad ɛeddiɣ ɣer yimekwan-nniḍen i wakken ad d-nezzi yakk i taddart nekk akked yimddukkal-iw n teklut’’. Ma d Sofiane Ait Ammar i yewwin arraz amezwaru deg usuneɣ n yifɣulen (caricature) deg tfaska n useggas 2019, yerna-d deg wawal :’’Nekk d ilemẓi n 24 n yiseggasen. D anaẓur, ttnaleɣ akk ayen yeɛnan aḥric-agi n usuneɣ neɣ n teklut. Nesɛa agraw n usuneɣ, nettnejmaɛ gar-aneɣ. Nesicbiḥ daɣen tudrin s teklut. Aṭas i aɣ-d-yessawalen ɣer leqdic-agi, ladɣa tudrin-nni i ittekkin deg temsizzelt Aissat Idir n taddart zeddigen. Nxeddem timsekniyin sya ɣer da. Lemdeɣ asuneɣ deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri ne temdint n Tizi Uzzu’’. 

<p class="has-text-align-left"> Hocine Moula 

  
 Ad d-ffɣen, deg ussan i d-iteddun, kran n yidlisen imaynuten n Ahène Mariche.  Ilul Ahcène Mariche ass n, 21 deg furar 1967, deg Tala n Tulmut, taɣiwant n Tizi Raced, lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D aselmad n tfizikt, d amedyaz, d asebgar, d amekfadu deg radyu. Am wakken yesɛa daɣen tadwilt deg Berbère TV. Yesizreg i tikkelt tamezwarut ‘’Sidi Valentin’’ deg Marikan, deg tesdawit n          Corvallis deg useggas n 2005. Ɣef wamek i yettaru, yenna-d : ‘’Tiktiwin-iw am uksijen-agi i ttneffiseɣ, ladɣa deg useggas-a n 2020 i yeččuren d ineḍruyen akked yiximmimen. Deg tegniwin am tigi dɣa, i ttfaraseɣ akken ad rnuɣ aẓru-inu i lebni n teɣrem n yidles-nneɣ s tutlayt n uẓar-nneɣ’’. Ifures tagnit n ukman ɣef sebba n uvirus Covid-19 i wakken ad d-yelhu deg ukemmel n yisenfaren-is i yeqqimen akken acḥal-aya, imi ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna ‘’Ixus-iyi lweqt akken ad ten-kemmleɣ. 

 Ttwaṭṭfeɣ gar uselmed, lxedma deg tilivizyu akked usewjed n ugar n 12 n yisenfaren yerzan tasekla, idles akked wurar apidaguji. Xeddmeɣ ugar n 10 n swayeɛ i wass’’. Gar wayen i d-yessewjed akka tura, ad naf adlis n yinzan n teqbaylit. Ɣef waya, ikemmel yenna-d ’’Selkeɣ adlis-iw n yinzan n teqbaylit ay bdiɣ seg 36 n yiseggasen-aya. Mi akken i lliɣ deg tesnawit. Gemreɣ-d ugar n 7 000 deg tudrin n tmurt n leqbayel. Ttfaraseɣ tagnit deg tfaskiwin akked tmeɣriwin tidelsanin i wakken ad jemɛen ayen iwumi waɛaɣ. Yal mi ara d-yili umeslay gar-i d wayeḍ neɣ d ugraw n yimdanen, ttfaraseɣ tagnit, ttaruɣ yal anzi i d-inesren i walebɛaḍ. Tanemmirt i yal yiwen d yiwet i yi-d-yefkan anzi, mebla ma ttuɣ yemma (iɣsan-is di talwit) i yi-d-yennan ugar n 1 000 d anzi d ttɣawsiwin tidelsanin-nniḍen. 

 Yal anzi, yekka-d seg yimi ɣer tmeẓẓuɣt ; seg Tizi ar Bgayet, seg Sṭif ar BBA, seg Tubiret ar Bumerdas. Ula deg temdinin-nniḍen. Wigi, d inzan ur nelli ara yakan deg yidlisen imi i d-leqḍeɣ amur ameqqran deg-sen ɣer yimɣaren ur neɣri ara. Dɣa, ad d-greɣ tiɣri i wiyaḍ i wakken ad kemmlen agmar-agi imi ayen i d-jemɛen nekk, yettuneḥsab d tiqit n waman deg lebḥar’’. Ma ɣef usteqsi n tuffɣa n udlis-ines Taqbaylit s yinzan, yerra-aɣ-d ’’Ad d-yeffeɣ deg ussan-agi ɣer tezrigin Richa Elsam s uzwel Taqbaylit n yinzan’’.  Ula deg uḥric n temseɛraq, yewweḍ Ahcène Mariche ɣer lebɣi-s imi i d-yesnulfa ugar n 2 000 n temseɛraq. ‘’Wagi d acqirew-iw. Nniɣ i yiman-iw, ilaq ad d-snulfuɣ ugar n 2 000 d timseɛreqt. Ha-t-an ihi, wwḍeɣ s iswi. Ferqeɣ leqdic-agi ɣef 4 n yidlisen, yal yiwen llant deg-s 500 n temseɛraq. Ad d-yeffeɣ udlis amezwaru deg ussan i d-iteddun s uzwel Timsaɛraq n Mass Mariche. Ma d tasuqqilt ɣer tefrensist n yidlisen-a, yexdem-itt Ameziane Lounis. 

 Ad d-yeffeɣ udlis amezwaru deg taggara n waggur s uzwel Les Devinettes de Mr Mariche. Ula d ammud n yisefra s tmaziɣt i yerǧan azal n 8 n yiseggasen, yewweḍ-d wass-is ad d-yeffeɣ ula d netta. ‘’Tewweḍ-d nuba ula i wammud-iw n yisefra i yettraǧun asizreg azal n 8 n yiseggasen-aya. Dayen, selkeɣ-t, yewjed i usuffeɣ’’, i d-yerna deg wawal-is.  Ula d asuqqel ɣer teglizit n wammud n yisefra Tazlagt n tikta i texdem Ghalia Bedrani, ha-tt-an tewjed ɣef wakken i t-iwekked umedyaz. S wakka ara wwḍen 4 n yidlisen n Ahcène Mariche i yettuseqqlen ɣer teglizit. Iger afus-is ula deg uḥric-agi n tmucuha, imi i d-yettheggi tira n waṭas deg-sen. ‘’D timucuha i yi-d-tessawel yemma, tameṭṭut-iw akked tḍeggal-iw. Ad tent-aruɣ s tmaziɣt, syin ad tent-rreɣ ɣer taɛrabt, tafrensist akked teglizit. 

 D timucuha s usuneɣ n Samir Brahim.  Ad tent-id-sizergeɣ gar-aɣ d kra n wakud’’. Ur yettu ara Ahcène Mariche aḥric n ttrebga imi netta d ababat s warraw-is. Ɣef waya dɣa i d-ihegga aṭas n leqdicat i warrac imecṭaḥ. ‘’Ula seg warraw-iw, jebbdeɣ-d tiktiwin. Ilaq ula d nutni ad asen-dduɣ deg lebɣi seg wayen ḥwaǧen, ama deg unnar n yidles, n tsekla neɣ tpidagujit. Swejdeɣ-d ula d ammud n yinan n yiɣersiwen, uraren s tkarḍiwin…atg. D ttawilat i zemren ad uraren yimawlan akked warraw-nsen, neɣ ɛad ara sqedcen yiselmaden deg uɣerbaz. Am wakka, ḥemmleɣ idles-iw,  Taqbaylit. Yerna nekk, ur berruɣ ara i ṭṭbel deg waman mi ara bɣuɣ taɣawsa. Ur ttethennayeɣ ara alamma sɛiɣ-tt gar yifassen-iw. 

 Leɛtab, ur t-id-nettader, akken qqaren. Ayen xeddmeɣ akk, dayen beqquɣ, d asirem-iw. Yerna yal taɣawsa, tettak azal i tayeḍ, tettak azal i leqdic. Bɣiɣ ad afent leɛwayed-nneɣ amekkan-nsent deg tmetti, ad yaɣ uẓar-nsent deg wulawen n tsuta i d-iteddun. Ad yili waya, ma yella ṭṭfen deg yidles, tutlayt d wayen icudden ɣur-sen. Ilaq ad d-akin yimdanen s leɛjel, taswiɛt tessewḥac’’. Ma deg uḥric n uselmed, yexdem Mass Mariche adlis n yisefra apidaguji, d amnir i yiselmaden n tefrensist n yal aswir. D adlis anda llan waṭas n yisental yemgaraden. D isefra i d-yefren gar 5 n wammuden-is n tefrensist. Am wakken ad yeg tirmit-a deg tutlayt tamaziɣt akked teglizit. La yettraǧu diɣ asekles n CD slam n tmedyazt-is s teqbaylit ara yernun ɣer din yellan yakan : Taɛezzult-is d Tiderray. Ɣer taggara, yesnemmer kra n win i as-yefkan afus n tallelt, yekfa-tt akka ‘’Tanemmirt i yimeɣriyen n Uɣmis, i Smail Benhamna, Youcef Aouchiche, Farid Rabia, Lounes Amziane, Idir Bellali, Nabil Boudraa et Yousef Saiah’’.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Mačči d tikkelt, mačči d snat i ḍrant temsal-a deg yiberdan armi amḍan n yisehwa irennu seg wass ɣer wayeḍ. Ayagi tamentilt-is ahat seg yiwet n tama d iberdan ixesren, lameεna seg tama-nniḍen, ula d inehhaṛen ur ttqadaren ara akk iṣuḍaf n tenheṛt. 

 Nezmer ad d-nini d akken ula d talsawit ur tnuḥ deg kra n wulawen n wid yesseddayen tikeryas, acku ur ttḥadaren ula mi ara nehhṛen di tuddar, anda i ttilin warrac imectaḥ. Daymi i d-ttilin yisehwa i igellun s terwiḥin n yineglusen, i d-yeldin melmi kan allen-nsen di tudert. Amedya, d taqṛuṛt B. Aya seg tɣiwant n Sedduq, i yesεan kan 4 n yiseggasen di leεmeṛ-is. 

 Aya teddhem-itt tkeṛṛust sdat n uxxam-nsen, temmut imir-n imi d tiyita qeṛṛiḥen i tečča. Ad d-nesmekti d akken tadyant, teḍṛa ass n acer, 28 yulyu yezrin, yerna mačči d tamezwarut di twilayt n Bgayet imi, i usmekti, ula di tɣiwant n At Smaεel, sin n yiṣinaṛyuyen i yeglan s tudert n warrac imectaḥ ilindi. Ccil akken qqaṛen lmut s tacaṛt, meεna deg temsal am tigi, aḥader yeɣleb aqader. 

 Ula d taɣdemt ulac di tmurt-a, wama amek ara ineɣ yiwen alufan, syin ad ikemmel tudert-is mebla aḥaseb ? ihi yewwi-d ɣef wid teεna temsalt ad d-ssufɣen aṣaḍuf ara ten-iḥeṛmen ama seg tnehṛa, neɣ seg yizerfan-nsen-nniḍen, ahat ad ḥebsen yisura-a. 
  K. K. 

  
 Aṭas n yidisan i d-iheggan ddurt n tgemmi tadelsant tamaziɣt, i lmend n usfugel n yennayer. Dɣa muggren ansay-agi n yennayer s wahil d amerkanti, imi d-llant wazal n 22 n temsikniyin n waṭas n tewsatin n tẓuri: tiqendyar, lfeṭṭa, aẓeṭṭa, lmakla, iselsa, tamemt, llant ula d tid n yidlisen akked tezrigin n HCA, CNPPAH, tamkerḍit taɣelnawt….atg. Ass-nni n lḥed 7 deg yennayer 2018, deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n umezgun seg 10h00 d asawen, tella-d tezlagt n yisaragen, sɣur Mass Slimane Hachi, Mass Abdenour Abdeslam, Mass Brahim Tazaghart, Said Chemakh, Hamid Bilek akked Bouzidi Mustapha. Syin akkin ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, yella-d usenɛet n usaru-agi “Yennayer di Wehran” n umsuffeɣ Karim Said El Hadj. Am wakken daɣen i d-llan 3 n yisikwan i lfayda n yigerdan, deg umḍiq n yisikwan, seg 10h00 alamma d 12h00. Yella win tira n tfinaɣ akked uxeddim n tkerḍiwin n usisrem, yella diɣ win n usuneɣ akked win n tira n tfinaɣ. Ma d ass-nni n letnayen 8 deg waggur-agi ideg nella, ḍran-d semmus n yisaragen, sɣur: Mass Rabhi Allaoua, Mass Challal Mustapha, Mass Sid Ali Lahlou, Mass Bourdouz Abdenacer akked Mass Mohamed Ghebrini. Yella-d diɣ ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, usenεet n usaru n Mass Cherif Mammeri ɣef yennayer. Ass-nni ttlata 9 deg yennayer 2018, seg 10h00 alamma d 12h00 n uzal, llan-d tlata n yisikwan-agi: win tira n tfinaɣ akked uxeddim n tkerḍiwin n usisrem, yella diɣ win n usuneɣ. Ma ɣef 13h00 n uzal, yella-d usenɛet n usaru-nni n Mass Cherif Mammeri, i d-yewwin awal ɣef yennayer. Ass-nni n larebɛa 10 deg yennayer 2018, seg 10h00 alamma d 12h00 n uzal, llan-d kraḍ n yisikwan, yiwen n tira n tfinaɣ, wayeḍ n usuneɣ, wayeḍ n lxedma n tkerḍiwin n usisrem. Ma deg wass-nni n lexmis 11 deg waggur-a ideg nella, ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, deg umḍiq n temsikniyin, tella-d temsizzelt n rruba tamensayt tuzzigt n yennayer, gar yimekkiyen n lwilayat-agi: Blida, Khenchela, Adrar, Jijel, akked Tizi Uzzu.

  A. A. 

  
 Seg timsal iɣef yezga umdan yettḥadar, d tazmert-ines. Daymi yezga ixeddem ala ayen ilaqen i wakken ad tt-yehrez. Gar waddal d yiḍes, lmakla, tesεa azal meqqer di temsalt-agi. Lameεna taneggarut-a, akken i d-tettak tazmert, i tezmer ad d-tili d ssebba n waṭṭan. Yerna, ayagi, ḥsan yis-s akk medden, ladɣa di tallit ideg nettidir. D ayen i yeǧǧan imeẓdaɣ n taddart n Tala Ɛta deg At Smaεel, ttcektin akken ma llan, yerna zeεfen aṭas imi mazal llan yimdanen i d-yettaɣen iselman ixeṣren i d-yettelḥaqen ɣer taddart-agi. « Wehmeɣ deg win ad d-yaɣen asardin-agi, ur yettugad ɣef tezmert-is, neɣ d tin n warraw-is. Yerna ilaq ad nili akkit mgal, acku ayagi yeεna-aɣ merra». I d-yenna yiwen n urgaz n taddart-agi. Imi d tazmert i d-ikecmen deg unnar, ur ssusmen ara Wat taddart ɣef uɣbel-agi, imi aṭas deg-sen i yemsefhamen ad ssiwḍen tamsalt-agi i uselway n tɣiwant i wakken sya ɣer sdat ad yili ussefqed (contrôle) i wid yesnuzun iselman-agi. Tugart imi ddeqs deg-sen ur nettqadar iṣudaf n tezdeg d uḥraz. Ɣef usentel-agi, tenna-aɣ-d yiwet n tmeṭṭut: « Ufan iman-nsen, ulac win i ten-yettεassan. Ttawin-aɣ-d lḥut d aqdim, acku ttaǧǧan-t almi tuli ssuma-s di ssuq i wakken ad t-id-ssufɣen. Ilaq ad dduklen yimezdaɣ i wakken ad d-afen tifrat ». Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti d akken tamsalt-agi, ur telli d tin n yiwet n taddart neɣ snat. Aɣbel-agi, ur yelli d amaynut, yella deg waṭas n tuddar ladɣa, tigad n udrar. Akken ssaramen yimdanen, ilaq wid teεna temsalt, ad walin deg waya s lemɣawla.

  K. K. 

  
 Mbeɛd mi iɣab azal 13 n yiseggasen ɣef unnar n ccna, ha-t-an yuɣal-d ussan-agi ineggra ucennay ilmeẓi Chabane Ou Bariz, mmi-s n taddart n Lazib Igounane Ameur di tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun. Seg useggas n 2006 mi d-yessuffeɣ tasfift-is taneggarut, iwumi isemma “Ddrewceɣ”, i yeǧǧa amḍal n uẓawan i yeɛceq segmi meẓẓi. Yuɣal yettɣenni kan sya ɣer da d tejmilin neɣ di tmeɣriwin. Ass-nni n ssebt iɛeddan 6-4-2019, i yewweḍ leɛtab-is ɣer tafat, anda yeṣṣaweḍ ad yesuffeɣ snat n tesfifin ɣef yiwet n tikkelt. D snat n tesfifin timaynutin, i d-yessufeɣ ucennay-agi ilmeẓi Chabane Ou Bariz ɣer tezrigin “Edition Tadukli” n Tizi Uzzu. Deg-sent maraw d snat (12) n tezlatin yeččuren d sser d wawal ḥlawen, zeddigen. Isental igejdanen n snat-agi n tesfifin, cudden deg tuget ɣer tmetti, gar tejmilin, liḥala n tmurt, tudert n umeɛḍur, lehmum n ddunit…atg. Di tesfift tamezwarut, i wummi isemma “Lezzayer”, yecna deg-s setta (6) n tezlatin s teqbaylit tamsarit, iweznen, icebḥen aṭas. Gar yizwal n 06 n tuɣac yellan deg-s nezmer ad d-nɣer: Weyya-k ay ul-iw, Yettzad lhem-iw, Lezzayer…atg. Di tezlit-agi taneggarut “Lezzayer”, i yextar d azwel n album-agi, yettmeslay-d deg-s ɣef liḥala n tmurt n Lezzayer. Ma di tesfift tis snat, iwumi isemma “Ruḥ di laman”, yecna diɣ deg-s setta n tuɣac. Azwel n uḍebsi-agi, yekkes-it-id seg yiwet n tezlit swayes i d as-yerra i yemma-s (yemmuten) tajmilt meqqren. Ɣer tama n tezlit-agi, llant xemsa-nniḍen, ad d-nebder: Ameɛḍur, zzman…atg.Ɣer taggara, nessaram-as tuɣalin igerrzen i ucennay-agi yeččuren d tabɣest, nessaram-as daɣen amecwar ɣezzifen sya d tasawent.

  A. A. 

  
 Akken yella lḥal deg yakk timura n ddunit, isɣuren iɣurbizen (établissements scolaires) zgan d amḍiq ideg yettidir udlis s umata. S tallelt n uwanek i yettakken i tdeblin tadrimt beddemma i tiɣin n yidlisen, ad naf deg yal asɣur aɣurbiz ( aɣerbaz amenzu, alemmas, tasnawit, tasdawit, atg) tamkarḍit i yettwasbedden i umager n yidlisen. Maca seg yidlisen i tent-yeččarayen, yaḍra anwi iwumi d-tsaḥ nnuba tageɛmirt? Neɣ anwi idlisen i d-ttaɣen s waṭas yisɣuren-a? 

 Nesteqsa yiwen i iqerben i yiwet n tesnawit deg usamar n Bgayet, ha-t-a wacu i aɣ-d-yenna: « Ilaq ad nẓer d akken ayen i d-ttawin yisɣuren itteddun ɣef leḥsab n wayen i yesɣaray neɣ n wayen i yesɛa d tangiwin. Dɣa, imi taqbaylit d tanga kan, meḥsub mačči d tutlayt n uselmed, drus maḍi i tesɛa d amur di temkarḍit. Llan kra n yinemhalen i irennun ttaɣen-d s temmeɣnest kan, maca ur llin ara aṭas ». Nesteqsa daɣen at teẓrigin, iban-aɣ-d am wakken ur yesɛi udlis aqbayli azal ɣur yimḍebbren n yisɣuren. 

 « Nekk ar tura urɛad uɣen yisɣuren idlisen seg teẓrigin-nneɣ. Nessuter kra seg-sen, maca amzun smeɛdzen ad aɣen adlis aqbayli », i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n umaẓrag si Tizi Uzzu. Nenced di Bgayet amaẓrag-nniḍen ur nesɛi aṭas-aya segmi yebda, yenna-aɣ-d belli d tiɣiwanin i yebɣan ad awint sɣur-s: « A-t-an ttheyyiɣ-d kra n yidlisen ad ten-awiɣ i kra n tɣiwanin i yi-ten-id-yessutren. Isɣuren iɣurbizen ur d-seknen ar tura nniya yesfan i tiɣin », i d-iberreḥ. Iban-aɣ-d ihi ur ttaɣen s waṭas yisɣuren iɣurbizen adlis aqbayli n yigerdan neɣ n yimeqqranen, akken ttaɣen idlisen i yuran s tutlayin-nniḍen.

  M. K. 

  
 Aṭas n tudrin i d-yejjamaɛen idrimen i yimuḍan i wakken ad dawin, ladɣa i wid iwumi ilaq udawi deg tmura n berra. Ayendin d amuḍin i yeḥlan, uɣalen s tezmert-nsen ɣer twacult-nsen imi i d-tella tcemlit n unejmuɛ n yidrimen deg tuddar. Tacemlit-a, dɣa, ha-tt-an tebda, ddurt-a, deg taddart n Tala Ɛetman, taɣiwant n Tizi Uzzu. Mbeɛd mi d-yessuter yiwen yilemẓi afus n tallelt deg taddart i wakken ad ɛiwnen yemma-s ad tdawi deg Fransa, nnejmaɛen yimezdaɣ n taddart n Tala Ɛetman u fran-tt deg rray-nsen i wakken ad as-gen irebbi i usuter-agi. Ihi, xedmen taseqqamut i tiddin n tcemlit n unejmuɛ n yidrimen i yebdan leqdic-is ass-nni n lǧemɛa, 26-02-2021, tameddit.

  Ad tkemmel tcemlit alamma yewweḍ wazal n yidrimen ara teḥwiǧ tmuḍint-a. Tezzin yilmeẓyen i d-yejjamaɛen idrimen ɣef tudrin akked temdinin n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Ttruḥun ṣbeḥ zik, yal wa s amekkan i t-yeɛnan : ad iruḥ anda i t-tjerred tesseqamut n tiddin n tigawt. Syin, mi d-uɣalen wid i d-ijemɛen idrimen, ad ten-teḥseb tesseqamut u ad d-tefk leḥsab n wass-nni. Seg tama-nniḍen, yettili-uheggi n trubbuyaɛ ara yeffɣen azekka-nni daɣen. Ad awin yid-sen tibewwaḍin n unejmuɛ n yidrimen i wakken ad bdun tigawt-nsen srid azekka-nni ṣbeḥ. Ayen yessefraḥen u yettaken afud ameqqran, d lebɣi akked tebɣest i yesɛan yilmeẓyen ɣer tigawt-a : s lḥir i ttraǧun ass i deg-i ara fɣen s annar i wakken ad d-jemɛen idrimen i tmuḍint-agi n taddart-nsen. 

 Ttbanen-d yiḥulfan-nsen deg umeslay-nsen alamma tɣelliḍ d nutni i d imuḍan. Aya akk, yettak afud ameqqran i yimezdaɣ n Tala Ɛetman imi ilaq fell-asen ad d-jmɛen qrib amelyar n yisentimen. Acu kan, aya mačči d ugur imi ass amezwaru kan, jemɛen-d 60 n yimelyan n yisentimen. Ma ɣef lehlak n tmuḍint, u ɣef leḥsab n lekwaɣeḍ n yimejjawen, tameṭṭut-a, mmuten-as tgeẓẓal-is i snat, syin tuɣal ur tettwali ara. Ihi, ilaq-as udawi deg tmurt n Fransa. 

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Deg yiwet n temlilit i d-yellan deg teẓrigt tis 8 n Tmeɣra n tzemmurt, i d-suddes tddukkla tadelsant Tigejdit n At Zaim, d tesqamut n taddart n At Zɛim, i d-yellan seg 21 ɣer 24 meɣres iɛeddan. Deg temlilit-a, bedren-d yimḍebbren, deg yisaragen-nsen i d-yewwin ɣef usentel ’’Azemmur d uzekka-s’’, aṭas n yiɣeblen i iɛeggben aḥric n lɣella n uzemmur deg temḍiqt n leqbayel. Anemhal n Srabes n tfellaḥt n ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu, yuɣal-d s wawal ɣef yiɣeblan yerzan aḥric-agi n tfellaḥt n temḍiqt n leqbayel. Akka dɣa i d-yuder aɣbel n tenzuyt n zzit n uzemmur, yenna-d :’’Yewwi-d ad d-nexlaq tiddukliwin ara yesselḥun lecɣal n lɣella n zzit n uzemmur, wa ad senzent lɣella ama deg ssuq aɣelnaw neɣ deg ssuq agraɣlan’’. Rnu ɣef waya, yehder-d ɣef uɣbel n tɣara n zzit n uzemmur n temḍiqt n leqbayel i d-yewwi ɣef yifellaḥen, ad wenɛen deg lɣella-nsen s usemres n tarrayin tussnanin deg usufeɣ n zzit n uzemmur. Dɣa, aɛawed n tmuɣli deg waṭas n tarrayin tiqburin i icudden ɣer lɣella n uzemmur. Ama dayen yeɛnan akud n ucraw n uzemmur, akud n ujmaɛ n uzemmur neɣ n umḍiq n ujmaɛ n zzit n uzemmur. Deg wayen i d-yenna, daɣen, d assudes i ixussen deg uḥric-agi, yal wa ileḥḥu akken yufa. Am wakken i d-yewwi awal diɣ ɣef udriz (labellisation) n usafer n zzit n uzemmur n temḍiqt n leqbayel, i wakken ad tesɛu azal-is deg ssuq agraɣlan. Anemhal n tfellaḥt, seg tama-s, yebder-d aṭas n yisenfaren ara yilin deg wahil n srabes-is, ama dayen yeɛnan adrizn wazal n 60 n yisufar iqburen ( produits de terroirs ) gar-asen zzit n uzemmur n leqbayel, aftaḥ n yiberdan n tfellaḥt i lefayda n yifellaḥen, alqam, anefrus aked tiẓẓdin.
