Am wakken diɣ ara d-yili usenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen sɣur ddeqs n yimura ara d-yerren i teɣri n tiddukkla “Saḥel”. Ad d-ilin diɣ tmeɣriwin n ccna, turart n tmezgunin akked yisaragen deg wahil i d-yettwaheggan bdemma i wannect-a. Ad tili tmeɣra-agi, s ddaw leɛnaya n uselway n Usqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, Tanmehla n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzz, Tiddukkla tadelsant “Saḥel”, Tasqamut n taddart-agi n Saḥel, akked Usqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Buzgan. S tallelt n waṭas n tiddukkliwin-nniḍen. 

  Adaoun Ghani  

  
  Isufar   

 acedluḥ (aksum amelḥan)

 -1 n tebselt

 -1 n ṭumaṭict

 -uraw n lḥemmeẓ

 -Uraw n lubya n tmurt

 -Ciṭ n lubya tazegzawt

 -Ciṭ n texsayt

 -Zrudiyya

 -Ifelfel aberkan, lkesbar yeẓdan (iɛeqqaren)

 -lmelḥ

 -Seksu

  Aheggi  

 Gezmet lebsel, ṭumaṭic, zrudiyya, syin terrem-ten ɣer daxel n tasilt. Qlut-ten s ciṭ n zzit. Rnut tura lḥemmeẓ, lubya n tmurt, lubya tazegzawt, iɛeqqaren akked lmelḥ. Smiret ayen ilaqen n waman, syin ternum-as acedluḥ-nni u tanfem-as ad yeww azal n 30’. Uqbel ad yeww s kra n lweqt, rnut-as taxsayt. Yuɣ lḥal theggam seksu ad d-ifur. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Ad d-theggi temnaḍt n Bni Mɛuc tafaska n tazart ara d-yilin ɣef teɣzi n semmus n wussan, seg 1 ar 5 tuber 2019. D taẓrigt tis 17 ara d-yezzin aseggas-a, imi nuɣ tannumi yal aseggas akka imir-a tessuddus-d temnaḍt-a i d-yezgan deg tama n Ṣedduq leqdic-agi. D tiddukkla tadelsant Figuiculteur n Bni Mɛuc ara as-yilin i lmendad i tfaska-a s tallelt n tɣiwant. Ɣef wakken i d-nnan kra seg yimsuddsen n leqdic-a, “Ahil ad yili d anesbaɣur, ad neɛreḍ amek ara yif tidwilin yezrin”. Deg wahil, ad d-tili temsikent ɣef teɣzi n yakk ussan n tfaska, aṭas n tewsatin n tazart ara d-yersen deg temsikent. 

 Wid ara yerzun ɣer umkan ad d-skeflen leṣnaf yemxalafen n tazart i tekseb temnaḍt-agi, akken daɣen ara yili lḥeq n wid yebɣan ad aɣen, imi ad yili uznaz n yisufar-nniḍen igamanen insayanen am tazart taqurant, zzit, ddeqs n tewsatin n tamemt taḥrurt, akunfitur n tazart, lxel n tazart … Ma deg sin n wussan imenza n tfaska, yeɛni azekka n aram d seldazekka n ahad, ad d-yili yiwen n usarag aɣelnaw, d asarag ussnan adamsan amezwaru ara d-yilin di tmurt n Lezzayer ɣef usafar n tazart, deg tesnawit Loudjani Hachemi deg temdint n At Mɛuc, s uttiki n tesdawiyin n Bgayet d Sṭif. 

 Deg-s ad d-awin awal ɣef tarrayin tussnanin d tdamsanin d wamek i d-yettili unadi deg ṣṣenf-agi n tazart akked unamek n tuẓut-ines deg tmurt n Lezzayer s umata. Tafaska-a, ad tili daɣen d tagnit i yifellaḥen ad d-mmsemlilen gar-asen, ad mmeslayen u ad mbaddalen tirmi-nsen i lfayda n unegmu n usafar-a n tazart. Deg ttiɛadat i iɛeddan, aṭas n yimdanen i irezzun ɣer tfaska-a, akken ad d-awin ama d tamussni ama d asekfel n wayen ur ssinen ara. 

 I usmekti, tettuneḥsab temnaḍt n At Mɛuc d tamnaḍt ideg tuget lɣella n tazart deg yakk tamurt n Lezzayer. Tettwaxdam lɣella-a akken iwata sɣur imezdaɣ-is seg wid iḍefren lḥirfa-a, armi taggara-a llan wid yesseftin tadrimt, gan tikebbunay timecṭaḥ, maca ssarmen amer tɛawen-iten Tenmehla d Teɣlift n tfellaḥt akken ad sseftin ugar di ccɣel-a, acku d asafar yesɛan azal, i d-yettuɣalen s waṭas n lfayda ama i umdan, ama i tmurt s umata.

  Kh. A. 

  
 Ur telli Ṛṛum, d tiɣremt yellan am tiyiḍ. D tiɣremt tanaṣlit i yeǧǧan lǧeṛṛa deg umezruy n talsa d yigiman n yisebtaren i yettwuran s uṛeɣ d yimeṭṭawen.

 Dayen i isehlen maḍi ad tɛeccqeḍ deg-s ɣas d tikkelt tamezwarut deg-i ara tesserseḍ iḍaṛṛen-ik deg-s : d aḥulfu ur tessineḍ yakan ara ak-izedɣen, ladɣa ma d tirza-inek tamezwarut ɣer-s. Ṛṛum d tamaneɣt i icebbḥen nezzeh ɣas akken tikebbaniyin ɛerḍen-t ad as-sekksent kra di thuski-ines s udellel di yal tiɣmert n yifuras-sent, i wakken ad senzent i yimerrayen, i d-irezzun d igiman yal aseggas, ɣer tmurt n Ṭṭelyan . Akken yella d anzi , ‘’Iberdan akk, ttawin ɣer Ṛṛum’’, d tidet mi ara tawḍeḍ ɣer « Forum » arumani, tugna tamezwarut ara d-yerzun ɣer-k, d akken tiɣremt-agi, tella deg yizri, tuɣ adeg ameqqran deg umaḍal, ama d taskekt neɣ tasedga i d-yeqqimen deg wayen i d-yeggran deg yiɣerban i mazal bedden ur ɣlin ara. U yal adɣeɣ yettbeggin-d d akken taɣerma tarumanit, teǧehden akken ǧehden iɣallen d wallaɣen n win i tt-yebnan. Mi ara yaweḍ umerray ɣer Ṛṛum, amḍiq amezwaru i ɣef ara inadi d Tala n « Trevi », d yiwet n tala i yezgan teččuṛ d imerrayen n yal tamurt di ddunit. I wakken ad d-txedmeḍ tawlaft, ilaq-as ṣṣbeṛ n sidna Yub, imi yal yiwen send ad yexdem tawlaft, ilaq ad ideggeṛ yiwent n tferdist n yidrimen ɣer Tala n Trevi. D ansay neɣ d lfal i wakken ad ad-tuɣaleḍ tikkelt-nniḍen ɣur-s. Gar wid nesteqsa dinna nnan-d d akken ‘’yal ass, taɣiwant n Ṛṛum, tleqeḍ-d alamma 2000 euros i yettuɣalen ɣer yiwet n tdukkla yettεawanen imeɣban. Adeg-nniḍen anda ur tezmireḍ ara ad terzuḍ ɣer Ṛṛum war ma terziḍ ɣur-s, wagi Colesseo (colisée) d azamul n Ṛṛum i yebna ugellid Vespasien deg useggas 70 send talalit n Ɛisa. Ifuk lebni-ines deg useggas n 80 sɣur agellid Titus. Colesseo, d taqacuct anda tewweḍ tasedga n tɣerma tarumanit, d asayas i yezmer ad yawi alamma d 75 000 n yimdanen anda ttwalin ihanayen n yimenaɣen (les gladiateurs).

  Asekraf n Tullianum   neɣ anza n Yugurten 

 Tamawt-nniḍen, d akken Ṛṛum, d tiɣremt yeččuren d tiliwa di yal adeg. Tella yiwet, tin i yiwwin allen-iw, d tiliwa d Navona. Tasreɣta-ines, tecbeḥ nezzeh. Tebḍa ɣef kraḍ n yiḥricen u yal tala s thuski-s. Yal amerray d acu i t-yewwin ɣer Ṛṛum : wa d tahuski wayeḍ d asgunfu. Maca, ma telliḍ d amaziɣ, ad twaliḍ Ṛṛum s tmuɣli-nniḍen, ladɣa tradat yellan gar yigelliden-nneɣ am Yugurten d Masensen d yigelliden irumaniyen . Nekk, rseɣ deg unafag n Ṛṛum ɣef 11 n yiḍ, maca ufiɣ-tt tzehher , llan yiṭruliyen, ldin yisečča. Leḥḥun medden deg yiberdan ɣas akken semmeḍ lḥal. Anect-agi, ibegen-d d akken tamurt-nneɣ, mazal abrid ɣezzif i wakken ad tizmir i tmerrit akken iwata . Azekka-nni akken yuli wass, ṭṭfeɣ abrid ɣer « Forum » arumani i d-yezgan deg umḍiq n « Piazza Venezia », di tmaneɣt n Ṛṛum. Yewɛer, ad ak-yeɛreq ubrid imi kullec yesuddes : yal aɣlad s yisem-is, Imi wwdeɣ ɣer umḍiq, ufiɣ-d iman-iw sdat n Usekraf n Tullianum, maca deg tilawt, Asekraf n Tullianum yella s ddaw n teglizt (église) San Giuseppe dei Falegnami. Deg usnubeg, tin yellan din, tenna-d : ‘’Ma yella tebɣiḍ ad tkecmeḍ ɣer Usekraf akked Forum arumani neɣ… Mazal ur d-tfuk ara awal, nniɣ-as : ‘’Bɣiɣ ad kecmeɣ ɣer Usekraf n Tullianum seld ad waliɣ ayen-nniḍen. Xelseɣ 10 euros. Tekcem yid-neɣ temnirt-nni (la guide) ɣer Usekraf. Tebda tettmeslay-d ɣef umezruy n Usekraf s teglizit d yismawen yettwassnen i yettwaḥebsen deg-s, maca akken sliɣ i yisem n Numidya, neggzeɣ-d, nniɣ-as: ‘’D anect-agi i ttnadiɣ. « The kig of Numidia Jugurtha  » Tezmumeg-d temnirt-nni, ahat mačči d amaziɣ amezwaru ara ixedmen am nekk, twehha-d ɣer uɣṛab i d aɣ-id-iqublen, tenna-d : ‘’Wali deg umuɣ-inna yettwaɛelqen ad tafeḍ isem d useggas deg-i yettwanɣa ugellid Yugurten’’. Imi qerbeɣ, ufiɣ yura-d: GIVGVRTA RE DI NVMIDIA MORTO PER FAME AN 104 A.C.  » Yugurten agellid n Numidya, yemmut s laẓ deg useggas 104 send talilit n Ɛisa’’. Deg umuɣ-nni, twanɣan akk yimeḥbas s tmezliwt neɣ s txennaqt, ala Yugurten i yemmuten s laẓ. Imi lliɣ xdmeɣ-d tiwlafin i yisem ugellid Yugurten, mektaɣ-d Lwennas Maεtub ula netta yerza-d ɣer usekraf n Tullianum akken i d-ttbegginent tewlafin yellan deg uxxam-is deg Tewrirt n Musa. Ahat ula d netta yugem-d ciṭ n yiman n uzbu n ugellid-nneɣ deg usalay-agi. Seld, nerna nsub ɣer uswir yellan ddaw-nneɣ anda yella lḥebs, yettweɣleq si yal tama, yedyeq ayen din. Asteqsi amezwaru. Amek adeg am wagi, ad yawi tafekka n Yugurten ? Mebla ccek isɛedda Yugurten ussan qessiḥen uqbel ad yessufeɣ taneffut (rruḥ) : laẓ, ṭlam d leɛtab. Maca ayen yugaren aya, d lexdeɛ n wid yellan yid-s, Buxus i t-yesenzen seld imi isuɣes taflest d akken Ṛṛum tettnadi talwit seld 7 yiseggasen n tṛad. Ur yexsir ara ṭrad Yugurten, ur yessris ara amrig, maca yettwawet s deffir sɣur wid yenwa d atmaten-is. Mmektaɣ-d d netta i d aɣ-d-yeǧǧan ‘’ad nerrez wala ad neknu « . Din i gziɣ d akken ur yelli ara d awal kan imi walaɣ-t d tigawt. Ur t-teǧǧi ara Ṛṛum i laẓ, armi teẓra d tidet d win ur nettnuzu ur nkennu . Sḍis n wussan deg Ṛṛum, aṭas n yimeḍqan i d-walaɣ, maca , tugna n Yugurten, tugi ad teffeɣ aqerruy-iw. Dɣa nniɣ-as :’’ Ad aruɣ ayen walaɣ, ahat ad yennefsusi ciṭuḥ lxaṭer-iw.

  Dahmani Bilal 

  
 Akken qqaren, ‘’ddunit akka i tebna ɣef yiɣeblan akked ccḥani’’. Amdan di tudert-is n yal ass, yettmagar-d aṭas n yiεewwiqen seg ur yeslik yiwen, imi d wagi i d aṣaduf n tudert. Meεna deg umager n yiɣeblan-a d uḥuffu ɣef tifrat, mgaradent tmuɣliwin seg yiwen ɣer wayed, εlaḥsab n uswir n uxemmem n umdan. Di temnaḍt n At Smaεel, tennulfa-d yiwet n ṣṣifa, iseggasen-a iεeddan, imi uɣalen igezzanen sεan azal meqqren deg tmetti, armi nezmer ad d-nini ṭṭfen amḍiq ireṣṣan nezzeh, imi azal-nsen tura, yugar ɣer waṭas, win n yimsujjiyen. Nesteqsa aṭas n medden ɣef usentel-a, nufa ɣur-sen timuɣliwin mxalafen, am temɣarin i yettwalin tagezzant d tin i iqerben nezzeh ar win i aɣ-d-ixelqen, acku teẓra s temsal i yeḍran d tid ara ad d-yeḍrun sya ɣer sdat, mebla ma tessen neɣ tesεa isallen ɣef umdan. Ma d tilemẓiyin, ttwalint tigezzanin-a, am umssujji n tnefsit, acku ttbinent-asent-d d tiḥeddadin n wawal. Meḥsub s wawal neɣ sin ad ssifsusent ɣef wul-nsent yeččuren. Amedya, d tiḥdayin ur nezwiǧ, yerna ɣas ad tafeḍ teɣra tesεa aswir, meεna deg temsal am tigi, tesεa taflest deg tgezzanin-a. Am wakken, daɣen, i nemmeslay d wid yellan mgal-nsent, imi ttwalin-tent d aṭṭan n tmeṭṭi, ttsummunt deg yidrimen n medden, yerna ttarrant aswir n umdan ɣer deffir, ttaǧǧant-t yesruḥu taflest-is deg win i t-id-ixelqen. Ma yella d axeṣṣar ageεmir d tid yettdemmiren ɣer wayen n dir. Imi s tmuɣli-nsen, tifrat n yiɣeblan ur telli deg waya, meεna deg tebɣest d tmadit n umdan.

  K. K. 

  
 Ass-nni n lexmis 21 deg waggur n duǧamber 2017, i d yeffeɣ ɣer tezrigin Massinissa album aneggaru n ucennay d umedyaz ameqqran Taleb Tahar, s yisem ‘’Tuqqna tuffra’’, d tajmilt Kheloui Lounès. Llant 9 n tezlatin, i icebḥen, ama si tama n lmusiga, ama seg tama n yimeslayen anda i yecna ɣef waṭas n yisental s yizwilen-a: Agellid, Jeddi, jida, Aṭṭan, Qqim kan qqim, Dduḥ-iw gar sin leqrun, Amehraz, Lefhama, Ameksa, amendil. Dɣa tasebḥit n wass-nni n lexmis yezrin, deg tzeqqa n temsikniyin n Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n Tizi Uzzu, yella-d usenzi s ubuddu n tesfift-agi, am wakken daɣen i d-yella usarag n tɣamsa sɣur ufennan-agi Taleb Tahar, Nabila Goumiziane s yisem-is d tanemhalt n yidles n Tizi Uzzu akked Ouardia n rradyu tis snat. Syin akkin d askasi sɣur wid i t-iḥemmlen i wazal n 45 n ddqayeq. Am wakken daɣen i d-tella temsikent n yimagraden n tɣamsa ɣef tudert d yimuhal akked tugniwin n unaẓur-agi ameqqran yessulin aswir n tezlit taqbaylit. Ma ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit d asawen, tella-d tmeɣra n ccna sɣur-s, ideg i d-yecna ddeqs n tezlatin-is, gar teqdimin akked tejdidin n tesfift-agi. Am wakken daɣen i d-ccnan kra n yicennayen kra n tezlatin-is. Aṭas n yicennayen i yellan deg tmeɣra-agi, gar-asen: Rabeh Ouferhat, Ahcene Nait Zaim, Djamy Kerdja…atg. Ha-t-an wayen i d-yenna i Uɣmis n yimaziɣen: “Ferḥeɣ aṭas, imi tamezwarut ssawḍeɣ ad d-ssufɣeɣ tasfift-agi, ferḥeɣ daɣen imi i tt-id-qublen medden s lferḥ d tebɣest, aṭas i d-yerzan ass-a s Axxam n yidles uɣen-tt. Yinnekmal lferḥ-iw imi walaɣ tazeqqa tameqqrant n Uxxam n yidles teččur armi d ulamek. Ad snimreɣ aṭas imẓawanen ilmeẓyen imi d nutni i d itran n ccna azekk. Tanemmirt, diɣ, i wid akk i d-yefkan afud deg leqdic-agi’’

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Tameddit n wass-nni n lǧemɛa iɛeddan, 2 ɣuct 2019, temlal tasa d way turew deg uɣerbaz amenzu n taddart n Lemṣella, di tɣiwant n Yilula Umalu. 

 D tagnit ideg mlalen akk yinelmaden ɣer tama n yiselmaden-nsen ɣer tama diɣ n yimawlan-nsen. Ala acmumeḥ d lferḥ i d-yettbanen ɣef wudmawen, ma d ilsawen ur cuḥḥen ara i uqessar d usmekti n wayen sɛeddan akk yinelmaden yeɣran deg uɣerbaz-agi. Tebda tfugla-agi i d-yettwasuddsen i lmend n yinelmaden n taddart-a, i d-yufraren deg yikayaden-agi unṣiben (Aswir wis 5, BEM akked BAC). Mbeɛd awal n tazwara, n uselway n tddukkla tadelsant Tiɣilt, i d-iheggan leqdic-agi. Yesseḥres deg umeslay-is ɣef wazal n usebɣes n yinelmaden-agi d usirem n umecwar aɣezzfan di leqraya-nsen. 

 Ttwaferqen warrazen d yigerdasen n usebɣes ɣef merra yinelmaden n taddart-agi i d-yufraren s yigemmaḍ yelhan deg tlata ikayaden unṣiben i useggas-agi aɣurbiz 2018/2019. Fkan azal n 12 n warrazen, 7 seg-sen i yinelmaden i d-yewwin akayad n uswir wis 5, 3 n warrazen-nniḍen i yinelmaden i d-yewwin akayad n BEM ɣer tama sin n warrazen i yettunefken i wid i d-irebḥen akayad n BAC. 

 Am wakken diɣ i d-llan kra n leqdicat idelsanen-nniḍen ɣer tama n ufraq n warrazen-agi. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli d taddart n Lemṣella i d-yettheggin yal aseggas tameɣra n tbexsisin, maca tezgel tazrigt n yilindi, tili ara d-yilin d tis 12. Ma d tazrigt tis 13, ad tili aseggas-a ussan n 29 d 30 ɣuct 2019. 
  Adaoun Ghani  

  
 Tamɣart n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, 65 n yikilumitren ɣer unẓul-asamar n Bgayet, d Nna Ḥedda n Ayt Uggaɛrab n Ayt Ɛmer d Ḥmed s yisem-is aqbayli, neɣ Ɛerfi s yisem-is amiran n tedbelt. Deg yixef-is tura akka tasut (lqern) d 11 n yiseggasen, imi tlul ass n 9 furar 1907, deg tallit-nni ideg tamhersa tafransist tḥuza aṭas n yiḥricen d taɣulin deg tudert n yimesdurar. Mi nerza ɣur-s, nemmeslay yid-s, ugar n terẓen n leɛqel-is i mazal deg umḍiq-is, ɣas iɛedda zzman, tban-d Nna Ḥedda tessen amek ara tessefti awal, neɣ amek ara tqesser s ucmummeḥ mi ara as-yehwu. S ccfawa-nni i tekseb, tessawaḍ, tettuɣal i yizri yeggugen akken ad aɣ-d-tmel kra seg umezruy n Ayt Smaɛel abeɛda, d tudert tamzikt i tuɣ ttidiren. Ula mi d-yettwawi wawal ɣef tallit tamirant, tatrara d kra n leɛwayed i d-ikecmen, tesḥassef ayendin Nna Ḥedda. Awal sin ad d-tini: « Nekni zik mačči akka », nettat tettḥerrik ifassen-is akkin akka. Tban-aɣ-d daɣen, tugad ula ɣef tsuta i d-iteddun, amek ara tili, ara tidir. Ula d ccfawat n tallit n tegrawla, mazal resxent deg uqerruy-is imi, akken yebɣu yili, yewɛer lbaṭṭel i tatut. Ɣas ma tura teǧǧa-tt tezmert n yiḍarren d yiɣallen, isul tesɛa Nna Ḥedda kra n tezmert deg wallaɣ-is ɣas teḥḍer i waṭas n tsutwin, ɣas buhan i iɛeddan fell-as. Nessaram-as dɣa ad tdum, ad teɣzif tudert-is i wid akk i tt-iḥemmlen.

  M. K. 

  
 Ilul Besεud MuḥendAεrab ass n 24 deg duǧember deg Yiwaḍiyen di Tizi uzzu. Yella d aselmad deg Tgemmunt Leǧdidn uqbel ad yekcem s Akabar n uɣref azzayri PPA, syin ɣer FLN d ALN. Yettuceggeε ɣer Merruk ad yawi leslaḥ deg yiwet n teɣdelt maca yettwaṭṭef, u yettwaḥbes, maca yuɣal-d ɣer tmurt-is mi tewwi Lezzayer timmunent-is deg useggas 1962 Ameɣnas-a, urǧin yeqbel lεeskar n tlisa d tsertit-nsen. 

 Yessuffeɣ-d adlis-is «Heureux les martyrs qui n’ont rien vu» deg 1963 anda i d-yemmeslay yef tmenɣiwt n Ɛebban Remdan, lmut n Ɛmiruc Ayt Ḥemmuda d si Lḥewwas. Am wakken i d-yehder diɣ ɣef ddel yedder deg yiwet n tuɣdaḍt (la mission) ayen yeǧǧan imsulta ad nadin fell-as. Deg taddart-is ara yeddari armi d tanekra n yiɣallen inemlayen FFS deg useggas n 1963. Maca s umsedfar n yineḍruyen d imḍebbren n tnekra ukud ur yemsefham ara, ad yaf d-iman-is deg Merruk, syin ɣer Fṛansa anda yedda deg lbabur daxel n texzant. Aseggas kan umbaεed, ad yessufeɣ adlis-nniden «FFS, espoir et trahison». Seg yimir-n i tebda tegnit n leḥris ɣef Bessεud Muḥend Aɛrab armi yewweḍ ɣer Legliz, dinna ara yezweǧ d Dorothy Bannon, yessen deg Fṛansa. 

 Ad sεun aqcic, isem-is Yuba. S ufus n tallelt i dfkan yineɣmassen izzayriyen isdwaniyen d yimeɣnasen-nniḍen, ad yuyal umaziɣ ɣer tmurt-is deg useggas n 1997. Yelal-d umeɣnas n tmagit d yidles amaziɣ ɣer tama n yimddukkal-nniden, am Tawes Ɛemruc Agraw Amaziy i unadi d tezrewt idelsanen i yefkan afud i yimeynasen yeqqimen deg tmurt. Gan ussan n ddurt s tmaziɣt, imḍanen, tasawast d wannay amaziɣ d ugemmay n tfinaɣ deffir-ayagi, yekker leḥris ɣef tmaziɣt sɣur wid yettawin ɣer lḥebs arrac yuran isekkilen n tfinaɣ ɣef iselsa-nsen armi d Tafsut n 1980. Yemmut deg umenzu n yennayer 2002, deg sbiter n tmurt n Legliz. 

  Nisma Tigrine  

  
 Yubasin, neɣ Ɛisat Milud, lasel-is n Yiɣil Ɛli, maca ilul di Wehran ass n 13 unbir 1967, acku tawacult-is tettruḥu ɣer Wehran, tettuɣal-d ɣer Tmurt. Isem i as-tefka twacult-is, yeddem-it ɣef jeddi-s i yemmuten d amjahed. Yeɣra u yesɛedda Yubasin temẓi-s di taddart n Tqurabt akked kra n yimeddukkal, gar-asen Ḥmed Leḥlu, Uleḥlu Buxalfa d wiyaḍ. Segmi yella d amecṭuḥ, iɛerreḍ ad yecnu, weḥd-s neɣ akked yimiddiyen di lexla, ad yessefru, ad yurar ssnitra, ad d-yeg aẓawan. 

 Deg 1985, yuɣal ɣer temdint n Wehran, anda i d-yemlal aṭas n yinaẓuren d yimeɣnasen, am yimedyazen Ɛebdella Munnah d Ǧerraḥ Uremḍan, ameɣnas Ɛebdella Ḥaman, amaru Ǧamal Benɛuf d ucennay Racid Lɛubi. Deg useggas n 1986, yebda ixeddem timeɣriwin di tesdawit n Wehran, syin yekcem ɣer terbaɛt iwumi qqaren « Aɣerrabu n tmedyazt isefra ». Mi d-teffeɣ s annar tddukkla Numidya n Wehran, yettekkay seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ deg wahil-is, mi ara as-d-ssiwlen. Armi d 1989, yessekles tasfift-is tamenzut s uzwel n « Imeṭṭi n ugujil ». Imir-nni, iɛedda-d i tikkelt tamenzut di tiliẓri n Tmurt n Lezzayer. Deg 1991, yella seg wid i d-yesbedden tiddukkla Asirem n Wehran, akked Kamal Nayt Zerrad, Ɛebdella Ḥaman d wiyaḍ. 

 Seld tisullya-s di Tmurt, yexdem aẓeṭṭa n tqecwula (vannerie), imi d anaẓur i iḥemmlen mliḥ allalen-nni n zik. Syin, deg 1999, yessekles tasfift-is tis snat, am wakken yella d imesbeddi n tddukkla « Tala n tmaziɣt ». Mi d-teḍra Tefsut Taberkant n 2001, yerna-d tasfift-nniḍen iwumi isemma « Tilelli », ideg yerra tajmilt i yimeɣrasen iqbayliyen. Seg 2006, iqeɛɛed iman-is akked twacult-is di Tmurt. Seg tikkin deg tfaskiwin n tmedyazt d tfuggliwin n yimulliyen imaziɣen, yuɣal-d deg 2011, s uḍebsi wayeḍ, izewwel-it « Timanit ». Tura akka, a-t-an la yettheggi album amaynut, ara d-yeffɣen imalasen i d-iteddun. Yubasin d win iḥemmlen taẓuri, i yebnan amennuɣ-is ɣef teqbaylit d tmaziɣt, d useḥbiber ɣef yidles-is. 

  M. K. 

  
 Ass-nni n ssebt, 24 deg furar 2018, ɣef 15h00 n tmeddit i tebda s wudem unṣib tezrigt tis 16 n tfaska tadelsant taɣelnawt n usaru amaziɣ deg uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine n temdint n Tizi Uzzu.

 Ulamma nuɣen tanummi yimsuddsen n tfaska-a, theggin-tt-id yal taggara n waggur n duǧember n yal aseggas, maca aseggas-agi, ǧǧan-tt alammi d taggara n waggur-agi n furar ideg nella, s wakka nezmer ad-nini belli zeglen yiwen n useggas. Acu kan, mačči d lebɣi-nsen imi walan drus maḍi i isersen zzmam n uttekki deg waggur n tuber, dɣa sɣezfen-asen ttiɛad alammi d 31 deg waggur n duǧember 2017.

  17 n yisura i yellan   deg tfaska 

 Deg tazwara, ṭṭfen-d yimsuddsen n tfaska-agi 43 n yisura s leṣnaf yemxalafen, mebeɛd tefren-d tesqamut n uktazal 17 n yisura kan ara yemḥezwaren ɣef tzemmurt n wureɣ i useggas n 2018. Tella-d tulya tunṣibt n tfaska-agi deg Uxxam n umezgun amniḍan, sɣur uneɣlaf n yidles Mass Azeddine Mihoubi, lwali n Tizi Uzzu Mass Mohamed Bouderbali akked tnemhalt n yidles Massa Goumeziane Nabila d waṭas n yinaẓuren-nniḍen. Yella-d wawal s telqey sɣur imsuddes n tfaska-agi, yecban Mass Mahiout akked tnemhalt n yidles n Tizi Uzzu ɣef tezrigt n useggas-agi i d as-yuɣalen d tajmilt i Mulud Mɛemmri. Syin akin, yella-d usenɛet n usaru-nni “Ɛuhdeɣ-kem” yewwin tazemmurt n wureɣ n tezrigt iɛeddan. Tafaska-agi, d leqdic-agi adelsan, ad yeddu ɣef teɣzi n 5 n wussan, imi yebda s wudem unsib ass n sed iεeddan 24 deg waggur n furar 2018, ad yekfu ass n 28 deg waggur-a ideg nella. Ad ilint deg-s ddeqs n temsikniyin, ama ɣef tudert d yimuhal n umaru Mulud Mɛemmeri ama ɣef usaru d ssinima tamaziɣt s umata. Am wakken daɣen ara d-ilin tlata n yisikwan-agi (ateliers) ɣef teɣzi n ddurt, amezwaru d “Master Class” iɣef ara yili ɣef lendad-is Mass Chérif Aggoune, ma d wis sin d “asikew n tsegbart” iɣef ara yili Mass Aziz Boukrouni ɣef lmendad-is, ma d aneggaru d “asikew n useḥfeḍ n ssinima i yilmeẓyen” ad d-yili s lmendad n Mass Hakim Abdelfattah.Tazrigt-agi tis 16 n useggas-agi, gan-tt d tajmilt i unaẓur ameqqran d umussnaw n tmaziɣt Mulud Mɛemmri, i yettuneḥsaben d azamul n tmussni d yidles amaziɣ s umata. Annect-agi, ad ikemmel deg wahil n tesmiḍent-is, i yebdan deg useggas iɛeddan. Ma ɣef yiswiyen n tezrigt-agi tis 16, yenna-d Mass Mahiout Farid imsuddes n tfaska-a akked Massa Goumeziane Nabila d tanemhalt n yidles, deg usarag i d-fkan ass-nni letnayen 19 furar 2018 deg uxxam n yidles, d asali n uswir n ssinima tamaziɣt akked usebɣes n yilmeẓyen i iqedcen deg unnar-agi. Deg tezrigt n useggas-agi, ad tili temsizzelt gar 17 n yisura n tmaziɣt, gar-asen sebɛa-agi n yisura wezzilen: Lunǧa, Tayri deffir lḥif, Tazeǧǧigt n leḥlal, Tagzemt tamenzut, Lexṣas, Taɛekkumt n tudert. Llan daɣen tlata-a n yisura ɣezzifen: Anekkar n lxir, Amendil, Tudert. Am wakken daɣen i llan sebɛa-nniḍen s tewsit n ufetray (documentaire).

  Ad ilin yisura n umsizwer deg Uxxam n yidles 

 Timsizwert n yisura aseggas-agi, yettili-d kan deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri. Ma d asenɛet n yisura yettekkin deg-s, yettili-d akka : iḍelli n lḥed 25 furar 2018, i d-yellan d ass amezwaru n temsiszwert, mḥezwaren 5 n yisura-agi yemxalafen. Ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, sneɛten-d sin-agi n yisura n tumliwin : « Taqbaylit ; amezruy d tmiṭulujit tamaziɣt » n umsuffeɣ Ali Hadjaz, wis sin d « Iẓuran n yizelwan (amezruy n tezlatin timẓabiyin) » n umsuffeɣ Hammu Oudjana. Ma deg tmeddit n wass, seknen-d tlata-nniḍen. Ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit d sin-agi n yisura wezzilen : amezwaru d « Lunǧa » n umsuffeɣ Omar Belkacemi, ma d wis sin d « Tayri deffir lḥif » n umsuffeɣ Tilelli Salhi. Aneggaru, yella-d asaru meqqren, iɛedda-d ɣef 15h30 n tmeddit s uzwel-a « Anekkar n lxir » n umsuffeɣ Achour Amazith. Ma d ass-agi n letnayen, 26 furar 2018, ara yillin d ass wiss sin n temsiszwert, ideg ara mḥezwaren 6 n yisura-agi yemxalafen. Ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, sneɛten-d tlata-agi n yisura n tumliwin : « Iẓuran n yigraren » n umsuffeɣ Oussama Rai, wis sin d « Tamnaḍt n Leqbayel ; «(Asikel deg ugama) » n umsuffeɣ Mohamed Fali, ma d wis kraḍ d asaru-a « Tigerman n Lewras » n temsuffeɣt Hida Cheurfi. Ma deg tmeddit n wass, seknen-d tlata-nniḍen. Dɣa ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit d sin-agi n yisura wezzilen : amezwaru d « Tazeǧǧigt n leḥlal » n umsuffeɣ Ali Reggan, ma d wis sin d « Tagzemt tamenzut » n umsuffeɣ Roreddine Kebaili. Aneggaru, d asaru meqqren, ad d-iɛeddi ɣef 15h30 n tmeddit s uzwel-a « Amendil » n umsuffeɣ Hakim Rahim. Ma d azekka n ttlata, 27 deg furar, d ass aneggaru n temḥezwert-agi n yisura, ad d-yili deg-s usenεet n setta-agi n yisura ineggura. Dɣa ɣef 10h00, ad d-seknen sin-a n yisura n ufetray: « Asalay » n umsuffeɣ Djamel Bacha akked « Imeksawen igenni » n umsuffeɣ Abdenour Laceb. Am wakken diɣen ara d-seknen tlata-nniḍen n yisura wezzilen ɣef 14h00 d tasawent, amezwaru d « Lexṣas » n umsuffeɣ Si Smail Arab, wis sin d « Taɛekkumt n tudert» n umsuffeɣ Omar Amroun, ma d wis tlata d asaru-agi « Human» n umsuffeɣ Issam Taachit. Ma d asaru aneggaru, ad yili ɣef 15h30 s uzwel-agi « Tudert» n umsuffeɣ Rabah Dichou. Ihi d isura-agi akk ara tektazel tesqamut n ufran, iɣef yella Mass Tahar Boukfla d aselway n tesqamut ɣer tama n 6 n yiɛeggalen. Yetturaǧu ad fken aṭas n warrazen i wid ara d-yufraren, gar warrazen-agi ad nebder : Arraz n tzemmurt n uwreɣ, arraz n lsinaryu iffazen, arraz n usegbar (acteur) ara d-yufraren deg temsizzel-agi…atg. Am wakken i d-tettili tzeqqa tameẓyant n Uxxam n yidles deg ttiɛad s tlata n yisaragen, yal ass ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ. Asarag amezwaru, yella-d iḍelli n lḥed, 25 furar 2018, ɣef usentel-agi “Tawrirt n tatut, seg wungal ɣer usaru”, sɣur Mass Said Chemakh ( aselmad-amnadi deg tesnilest tamaziɣt) akked Massa Latifa Lafer (d tuzzigt deg ssinima tamaziɣt). Ma d wis sin, ad yili ass-agi n letnayen, 26 furar 2018, ɣef usentel-agi: “Mohamed Iguerbouchène; amsuddes azzayri n lmusiga n yisura, yettwassnen deg umaḍal”, sɣur Mass Ounoughene Mouloud. Ma d asarag aneggaru, ad yili azekka n ttlata, 27 furar 2018, ad d-yawi deg-s awal Mass Salim Aggar ( d imsuffeɣ, d aneɣmas) ɣef usentel-a: “Mi ara yesnerni usaru azal n yidles amaziɣ”. Ma d ahil n tuqribin (proximité), yettili-d yal ass ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, dɣa iḍelli n lḥed, sneɛten-d asaru-agi “Lalla Faḍma n Sumer” n umsuffeɣ Belkacem Hadjadj, deg tzeqqa n ssinima n Draa Ben Khedda. Ma d ass-a n letnayen, ad yili usenɛet n usaru-agi n “Tewrirt yettwattun” n umsuffeɣ Abderahmane Bouguermouh, deg tzeqqa n ssinima n Tigzirt. Ma d azekka n letnayen, yetturaǧu ad yili uskan n usaru-agi “Lehyuf d uɛekkaz” n umssuffeɣ Ahmed Rachdi, ara d-yilin deg tzeqqa n ssinima n Larbaa Nath Irathen. Am wakken daɣen i yettili wulmis adelsan Matoub Lounes n Ain El Hammam, deg ttiɛad s tlata-agi n yisura : “Tawrirt yettwattun”, “Lehyuf d uɛekkaz” akked “L’Héroïne”, ara d-yilin mestebaɛen deg wussan-a, iḍelli n lḥed, ass-a n letnayen akked uzekka n ttlata. Ula d Taneḍfart n uxxam n yidles yellan deg Azazaga, tettili-d deg ttiɛad s tlata-agi n yisura : “Lehyuf d uɛekkaz”, “L’Héroïne” akked “Zeus”, ara d-yilin mestebaɛen deg wussan-a, iḍelli n lḥed, ass-a n letnayen akked uzekka n ttlata. Ma d tukci n warrazen I xid I d-yufraren, ad tili ass n 28/02/2018, ɣef 15h00 n tmeddit, deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer.

   

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Deg wulɣu n tɣamsa n Tddukla Tamatut n Yimɛelmen Izzayriyen ( AGEA), tger-d tiɣri, deg ddurt iɛeddan, seg tamanaɣt n Lezzayer, ɣef udiwenni aɣelnaw i icudden ɣer tuttriwin yeɛnan iḥricen n tsertit d tdamsa, ladɣa deg uḥric n lebni, anda i d-yella uneḥbus n wazal n 3 650 n tkebbaniyin n lebni seg waggur n yennayer 2018. Aya yeglan s ustixer n 275 000 n yixeddamen seg useggas n 2017 ɣer wass-a. Ad naf, diɣ, ugar n 360 000 n tkebbaniyin i iqeddcen deg yir addad. 

 Deg unejmuɛ amatu amagnu, ssawlen-d yiɛeggalen n tddukkla (AGEA) i udiwenni aɣelnaw i usqerdec n tuttriwin i icudden ɣer tsertit d tdamsa, imi addad n luluf n tkebbaniyin timeqqranin n lebni, ixeddimen n baylek d tkebbaniyin n tsafut (BTPH) zemren seg wakud ɣer wayeḍ ad d-ttuḥebsen seg uxeddim. Wekkden-d yiɛeggalen iḥeḍren anejmuɛ n tddukkla d akken s kra n lḥir i d-yellan, ur yessaweḍ ara ad d-yeǧǧ tikebbaniyin ad xeddment akken iwata, s ssebba n waddad n tsertit d tdamsa i la tettidir tmurt. 

  Tger-d tddukkla-agi tiɣri i udiwenni aɣelnaw d imḍebbren n Uwanek, i tifin n tifrat s lemɣawla i temsal icudden ɣer yiɣeblan ttidirent tkebbaniyin tizzayriyin, ama d tidak n baylek , neɣ tusligin. Dayen ara d-yawin lfayda i tmurt d tdamsa taɣelnawt, ɣef leḥsab-nsen. Gar yisumar n tifrat n yiɣeblan n tkebbaniyin n lebni i d-tefka tddukkla AGEA, ad naf, deg tazwara, aneḥbus n lejrida n tkebbaniyin yesɛan amḍiq n tewwtin n yisenfaren imeqqṛanen, tuksa n lḥers d tiwsi ɣef tkebbaniyin n lebni, aɛiwed n tmuɣli deg yilugen n uselḥu n lecɣal n tkebbaniyin, tukci n ufus n tallelt d wafud i usmal n tnezduɣin. Daɣen tukci n tuɣdaḍin n ungim (conception) d uḍfar i tnariyin n tezrawin tizzayriyin d tlallit n temḍiqt n leqdicat i icudden kan ɣer uḥric n lebni. Tmenna tddukkla n AGEA talallit n yiwen n usanay aɣelnaw, ara d-yelhin s tallelt n tkebbaniyin timectaḥ d tlemmasin (PME) d tkebbaniyin timectaḥ d tlemmasin n temguri (PMI). 

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Ass n larebɛa yezrin, aselway n tigduda, Abdelaziz Bouteflika yessemlal-d ineɣlafen i merra deg uxxam n tselwayt i wakken ad tt-yegzem deg rray deg kra n temsal yerzan tadrimt d tmaziɣt. tamezwarut, aselway n tegduda, yebɣa ad isers ɣef lsas iseḥḥan tamsalt n tedrimt anda ara yili yiwen n wassaɣ iǧehden gar useqqamu n yiɣlifen d win n uɣerfan aɣelnaw. Ma d tamsalt n tmaziɣt, iwulem ad d-nini belli iɣilifen d yimecriwen ttwakksen imi Bouteflika, igzem-itt deg rray i uɛiwed n usaḍuf n 1963 i d-ibeggnen lejrida n leɛyudat. Dɣa dagi i d-yella umwata ɣef uɛiwed n tmuɣli n lejrida-a anda ara yettureṣṣi yennayer gar leɛyudat tiɣelnawin. D rray ara yerren tilisa i leckuk izedɣen imdanen imi, iwulem daɣ ad t-id-nesmekti, deg waggur n yennayer yezrin, mi akken i yuɣal umenzu n yennayer d tameɣra i yizzayriyen merra, yuzzel wawal d akken imi d-yusa kan d ass n lǧemɛa i d-yella waya. Ahat, s ubeddel n lejrida-a, ad kfun yir imeslayen, d lawan ad nqabel aya s lferḥ. Tis snat, d tamsalt n tkadimit i d-yuɣalen deg useqqamu-a n yineɣlafen, anda aselway n tigduda yessuter d akken ad d-yili uheyyi s lɛejlan n usaḍuf ara yesseddun taseqqamut-a. Wigi, mebla ccekk, d igumma i d-yesseɣres ugdud s umata, d yimeɣnasen beddemma ur neɣfil ɣef lasel d tjaddit. D lawan i wakken ad yettwakkes zzerb i tmaziɣt yettezzin kan gar warraw-is, nnig n lkanun. Asaḍuf-a, ad yessemɣi afriwen i tutlayt ɛzizen ɣef Mɛemmri, ad taɣ timnaḍin n Lezzayer i merra. Ulamma ass-a, 38 n twilayin ideg tella, maca ur tḥuz ara inelmaden imerra, imi llant twilayin ideg yella yiwen n uselmad. Tura akka, s uzday n lqedd ara taweḍ, mi akken ara d-yernu lqanun n uselmed-is am nettat am tangayin-nniḍen, mačči i win i tt-yebɣan kan. Akka i yella deg wawal, win iteddun ɣef tidet yessawaḍ, d ta i d liḥala n tmaziɣt, imi d tanaslit, yewweḍ-d wass ideg i as-d-yuɣal wazal-is. 

  M. Smail 

  
 Mebla ccek, aṭas n taɣulin i d-ijebden amdan akken ad tent-iḥemmel, s yis-sent ara yesɛedday lewqat-is ilmawen. Llan wid i ijebbed waddal, akken llan wid i thewwu taɣult n ccna d uẓawan. Ula d tira tewwi amur-is seg wid iḥemmlen imru. Tella yiwet n taɣult-nniḍen, akken i d taqburt, akken i mazal azal-is deg tudert tatrart. Ssinima, d yiwen n umkan i d-ijemɛen imdanen, meqqer neɣ meẓẓi, d argaz neɣ d tameṭṭut, seg wid i yewwi usugen n yisura i d-yettnulfun d imaynuten neɣ ɣas ula d wid yellan d iqburen, acku d adeg ideg ara iḥuss umdan s usteɛfu n wallaɣ. Ɣas ma yettḍafar tigawin n usaru, meɛna tigawin-a, ad t-ǧǧent ad yidir asinaryu s lqerb, neɣ am wakken d aɛeggal gar yigensasen-is. 

 Tamdint n Wehran akken i meqqer umezruy-is, akken i yeṭṭef uḥric n ssinima aṭas n yimekwan, imi d yiwet n temdint iɣef i d-ɛeddan waṭas n leǧnas d yimnekcamen, am Iṭerkiyen, Spenyul d Yirumyen. Bnan ixxamen n ssinima s tuget, d ayen i t-yerran d yiwet seg tgejgda n yidles. Acu kan, deg lweqt-a amiran, yuder-as nezzeh wazal i uḥric-a n ssinima di temnaḍt-a, ggran-d ddeqs seg yixxamen-a imazrayen d ilmawen, d ixerban, yuli-ten uɣebbar. Yella wanda uɣalen, ɛad, d idgan n temliliyin n wid ur nesɛi ccɣel. Armi taggara-a uɣalen yixxamen n ssinima n Wehran ččuren d lewsex seg tsegray n tissit d wayen-nniḍen.

 Ma d timental mačči d yiwet, ahat imi deg lawan-a qwan wallalen atraren n tetiknulujit i yerran imdanen ad dhun d umaḍal atrar u ad ǧǧen imeḍqan-a insayenen yesɛan azal ameqqran deg yidles amatu n umdan. Llant ssebbat-nniḍen, d astehzi n tejmayɛin tidiganin i yeǧǧan imekwan-a ad asen-truḥ lqima. Deg Wehran, kif kif-itent tmental, ɣef wakken i d-iwekked yiwen n umasay aqdim di tɣiwant n Wehran, d imasayen n yidles d wid n tɣiwanin i yefkan afus armi tuder taɣult-a. Yenna-d daɣen belli segmi uɣalen yidgan-a gar yifassen n yimɛellmen i ten-yuɣen s udrim seld mi llan sselḥuyen-ten ssrabes n tɣiwant akked umaris aɣelnaw n yidles d uselɣu, ma d imɛellmen-a ur llin ara d imawlan n ssinima. Rebɛa kan n yixxamen n ssinima i d-yeqqimen leḥḥun, mbeɛd mi llan zik d imeyyaten, wigi llan deg tlmemast n temdint, am tzeqqa Es Saɛada, El Fatḥ, Merǧaǧu akked El Maɣreb. 

 Tiyaḍ, anagar isem i d-yeqqimen deg-sent, ɣas azal-nsent deg umezruy meqqer. Annect-a, yeǧǧa aṭas n yimdanen iḥemmlen ad rzun ɣer ssinima ad sḥasfen ɣef wudem i deg i d-yegra uḥric-a d wanda yewwed deg temdint meqqren am Wehran, yettwakkes ama i yimawlan, ama i tarwa-nsen wadeg adelsan iḥemmlen ad ssezrin lewqat-nsen u ad sbeɣren cwiṭ timussniwin-nsen deg unnar-a. 

   Kh. A.  

  
 Yessegra-d wulɣu i d-tesuffeɣ deg wussan yezrin tneɣlaft n usedwel Massa Nurya Ben Ɣebriṭ s tugin n usemres n ddin, gar-asen taẓallit deg uɣerbaz, aṭas n yisteqsiyen d wawal yuzzlen deg yiɣmisen, tiliẓriyin d yiẓedwan inmettiyen, d taluft yeflen ula akkin i yilel. D isali i d-yeglan s wurrif meqqren ladɣa seg tama n yimẓulla d yikabaren i icudden leqdic-nsen ɣer ddin d yisalafiyen yettnadin kan timental ideg ara yezzer uɣerbaz azzayri ɣer lqaɛ akken ur d-yettali.

  Deg tedmi-nsen, taẓallit d yiwet seg tgejda n ddin swayes i tbedd tmurt, ur yezmir yiwen ad yaweḍ ɣur-s. Ɣef waya, tamuɣli-nsen teqqar-d ulac fell-as ma ttẓallan yinelmaden deg uɣerbaz lawan n tuddna. I wakken ad rren tiririt d tneɣlaft ɣer wadeg-is, ssawḍen gan yiwet n tẓallit i d-snulfan d tamaynut deg yiwen n wakud deg waṭas n yiɣerbazen (wid yellan mgal ṛṛay n tneɣlaft), d tin iwumi fkan isem n tẓallit n zzkara, war ma iḥerrek ula d yiwen seg yimasayen yeṭṭfen tamurt. Ɣas akken taneɣlaft n usegmi, ur d-tessuffeɣ ara isali-a s teqṣeḥ, maca s wudem ussnan, u tenna-d d akken yal adeg s leqdic-is.

  Taẓallit i win yebɣan ad iẓal deg uxxam i d-tettili neɣ di tmesgida, ma d aɣerbaz, yemmug i usegmi d leqraya d tmussni d urfad n uswir n uɣerbaz azzayri, akken ahat yiwen wass yezmer ad yettwaserwes ɣer usegmi di tmura yuẓan yennuflin iḥricen meqqren deg tussna. U ɣas akken kra seg yicenga-a n tmussni, ččan-d Massa Ben Ɣebriṭ s wurrif , di tɣamsa d yiẓedwan inmettiyen ladɣa, s uberreḥ-nsen s tukksa n Massa Ben Ɣebriṭ seg umkan-is, maca nettat teṭṭef deg ṛṛay-is, imi teẓra d tameẓla (logique). Seg yiwet n tama-nniḍen, llan kra n yimasayen isertanen neɣ udmawen iqeddcen deg taɣult n usegmi i d-yefkan awal-nsen s ubrid n tmussni d leɛqel, imi fkan azref i tneɣlaft, u nnan-d belli yal taɣawsa ilaq ad tili deg wadeg-is. D amedya n Amin Zawi, Saɛid Cemmax, Ɛellawa Rabḥi d waṭas-nniḍen i d-yennan “Ma nebɣa ur nettuɣal ara ɣer yiseggasen berriken i yezrin ɣef tmurt, yewwi-d ad neǧǧ tilufa n ddin deg wadeg-nsent, ma d aɣerbaz seg-s ara d-frurin wat tmussni d tussan ara irefden tamurt deg yimal”.

 D amedya n Amin Zawi, Saɛid Cemmax, Ɛellawa Rabḥi d waṭas-nniḍen i d-yennan “Ma nebɣa ur nettuɣal ara ɣer yiseggasen berriken i yezrin ɣef tmurt, yewwi-d ad neǧǧ tilufa n ddin deg wadeg-nsent, ma d aɣerbaz seg-s ara d-frurin wat tmussni d tussan ara irefden tamurt deg yimal”.

 Aserwes n usegmi akked tmura yuẓan 
 Ma nerra lwelha-nneɣ ɣer wahil n uselmed deg uɣerbaz amenzu ladɣa, imi d wa i d adda n usegmi, ad d-naf almud n usegmi n ddin yella seg useggas amenzu alamma d aneggaru. Ma nesserwes gar uselmed deg Lezzayer d kra n tmura yelḥan nezzeh deg leqraya, am umedya n tmurt n Japon, ad d-naf aselmed deg uswir adda, ɣur-sen d tukci n tmussniwin iwatan aswir n unelmad deg leɛmer-nni, d uskan n yiberdan i ilaqen akken ad ten-yeḍfer unelmad.

 Sɛan yiwen n walmud isem-is asedwel n tudba (éducation de morale), ma d anelmad ad yettɛeddi seg uswir ɣer wayeḍ segmi ara yekcem deg useggas amenzu alamma d aseggas wis kraḍ, acku iswi d aselmed i unelmad inumak n yiberdan yelhan. Maca ɣur-neɣ, ad naf ahil, yeččur mačči d kra seg mi ara yekcem unelmad deg useggas-is amenzu. Rnu ɣer wannect-a merra, aselmed n ulmud n tesreḍt i unelmad ɣef leɛmer n ṭam n yiseggasen, d ayen ur nkeččem ara deg usegmi n tilawt, acku aqcic yesra i tmussni d wamek ara yelmed tira d umeslay, ma d tamsalt n ddin, yewwi-d ad tt-id-yessekfel weḥd-s skud yettimɣur. 

<p style="text-align:right">   Kh. A. 

  
 Ass n ssebt tameddit, deg usuddis ulimpik Mohamed Boudiaf deg Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, i tekfa s wudem unṣib tezrigt tis kraḍet (3) n turarin tifriqiyin n yilemẓyen(JAJ-2018). D tameɣra i d-yesseknen cbaḥa d timmeṛkantit n yidles afriqi. Ɣer taggara n tesfugla-a, teddem tgelda n Lesotho nnuba-ines , i wakken ad tessuddes tuzya tis 4 n turarin-a deg tmurt-is, deg useggas n 2022. D aneɣlaf amenzu , Ahmed Ouyahia, i d-iberḥen s wudem unṣib, s yisem n uselway n tagduda, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, s keffu n tezrigt tis 3 n turarin tifriqiyin n yilemẓiyen (JAJ-2018). Tafugla daɣen, ideg ḥedṛen deg-s ddeqs n yiwudam yesɛan azal d yiɛeggalen n yinubaḍ ifriqiyen yemxallafen (iselwayen, igelda), ɣer yidis n yismawen yesɛan azal deg waṭas n tsudutin tinaddalin tigraɣlanin i d-yerzan, i wakken ad ilin deg turarin timenẓawanin. Menbeɛd, mraw (10) n wussan n temssizzelt, ideg ttikin wugar n 3.000 n yinaddalen deg 30 n tugrinin yemgaraden, i igensen n 54 n tmura tifriqiyin timtekkiyin deg tezrigt-a n useggas-a, i d-yellan dagi di tmurt n Lezzayer gar 18 alamma d 28 yulyu 2018. Tamurt n Lezzayer i d-isuddsen tazrigt-a, teṭṭef amḍiq wis sin deg umyezwar amatu n cciɛat, menbeɛ amḍiq amezwaru i teṭṭef tmurt n Maṣer. Inaddalen Izzayriyen ḥellalen-d azal n 2016 n cciɛat, gar-asent 69 n wureɣ (ddheb), 64 n lfeṭṭa akked 83 n unedrez (Bronze). Ma si tama-s, aneɣlaf n yilmeẓyen d waddal mass Hattab Mohamed, yenna-d : « Igemmaḍ-agi gerrzen, ulamma ur nurǧa ara annect-a, maca d ayen yessefraḥen, imi i d-nufrar 54 n tmura deg umkan wis sin deffir n Maṣer. Acu kan mazal aheggi n yinaddalen-agi i ttiɛadat i d-iteddun…».

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Ass n 25 yunyu, d ass amcum ideg tensa tcemmaεt n yiwen unaẓuṛ isebblen tudert-is i Teqbaylit d umennuɣ fell-as. Anwa ur nessin Lwennas Meεtub. Netta i as-yennan  » Imi i d-luleɣ d Aqbayli, isem-iw imenɣi, ɣas teḥfa tddukkli ad tt-id-smesdeɣ ». D yiwen n wawal i yeččuṛen d lemεani, deg-s ijemled amennuɣ-is ɣef tmagit, akked usirem-is, ad iwali Leqbayel ddukklen, zdin tiktiwin-nsen bac ad awḍen ɣer lebɣi. Ulac asentel ur d-yewwi ara fell-as tizlit, neɣ s unamek-nniḍen, d anaẓuṛ d wawal. Dɣa s tezlatin-is, yeṣṣaweḍ yezlez timetti taqbaylit, neɣ n tmaziɣt s umata. Yessemɣi deg-sent tayri n yidles-nneɣ, d uḥulfu n zzux s wayen i nekseb d ansayen. 

 Meḥsub, d netta i d-yesduqqṣen amur ameqqṛan n wid yellan ur faqen ara. Γas d lḥif i t-id-iṛebban, urǧin yekna-as, d anemgal, d netta as-yemlan tizi n leslak, akken yenna deg wawal-is. Lwennas yella d aɣewwaɣ, yal aεewwiq yesseɣleb fell-as. Daymi i xuṣṣent tefyar ara d-naru ass-a , imi, amecwaṛ-is yeɣɣenter. Ayagi imi, d tafekka kan i ikecmen akal, wamma tiktiwin-is mazal-iten ddrent, yerna ad d-idirent i lebda. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, ur ixulef usmekti n tmettant n yizem aseggas-a ɣef wid iεeddan.

  Γas ma yella tasertit n waṭṭan tbeddel kra n tlufa. Aredmani, ddeqs n yiqeddicen i yellan ilmend n waya. D tajmilt s wazal-is i as-rran waytma-s, ama di Tizi Uzzu, Bgayet neɣ Tubiret. Ulamma di beṛṛa n tmurt, llan-d kra n yiqeddicen, d ismektiyen ɣef Lwennas d umennuɣ-is.   K.K. 

  
 Segmi tewwet tnezlezt tamezwarut ass n 6 furar deg temnaḍt n Unẓul-asamar n Bgayet, ugar n mraw n tnezlaz-nniḍen, ma drus, i d-iḍefren armi d ussan-a. Ulamma tiseddarin-nsent, ad ilint d timecṭaḥ ɣef Sellum n Ricter, maca argagi-a n tmurt i yugin ad yeḥbes deg tama-a, yegla-d s kra, neɣ ahat s ddeqs, n ukukru d tugdi deg wulawen n yimezdaɣ. Abeɛda imi deg tannumi, tzellez tmurt deg leǧwahi-a ala gar tallit iruḥen seg magguu armi d unbir, ma deg tegrest, aya walan-t medden d amaynut, acku werǧin tezlez annect-a deg drus n wakud. « Sebbat n zzenzlat-a deg temnaḍt-nneɣ ayen d mi ur terɛiḍ ara ɣur-neɣ maḍi, acḥal tura d ayyuren. Ahat xussen waman deg yigenni. Ula d ageffur d udfel yewwi-d tili wwin-d rrɛuḍ, maca ur nesli i kra ». I d-tenna yiwet n temɣart. Ɣef tmuɣli n yimussnawen n taɣult, azlaz-a amectuḥ seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ, mačči d amihan. Llan wid i d-yeqqaren yelha, meskud tamurt tesnuffus kra kra, tessufuɣ-d tiḥersi i yellan deg-s. Ad d-nesmekti d akken tanezlezt tamezwarut n furar iɛeddan, i yewwḍen ɣer 4,2 n tseddarin, aṭas i tesseḥbes n lecɣas i kra n wakud, aṭas i d-tessufeɣ n medden ɣer berra n yixxamen-nsen daɣen. Tura akka, ssaramen lɣaci mi d-tekcem tefsut, ad terked dayen tmurt, ad uɣalen waman i tregwa-nsen.

  M. K. 

  
 Sendiḍelli n ssebt, amenzu deg waggur-agi n cutember 2018, i tessuli tezrigt tamezwarut n tfaska “Anebdu s tmedyazt d uẓawan”, i d-yellan deg taddart n Boudjelil, deg Larbaa Nath Irathen. D asiher adelsan i d-ilulen ussan-agi kan, maca yuɣ akk ulawen n wid yerzan ɣer dinna. Tella-d deg taggara n ddurt-agi yezrin, tebda ass-nni n lexmis 29 ɣuct 2018, temdel tiwwura-as ssebt-agi kan deffir-nneɣ. Ma d ahil anesbaɣur i d-yellan ɣef teɣzi n 03 n wussan, yella-d akka: Di tsebḥit n wass-nni n lexmis, ɣef 10h00 tella-d tulya tunṣibt n tfaska-agi. Syin akkin yella-d wawal sɣur uselway n Tiddukkla Amezyab n lehna akked imseddu n tkebbanit EMEV, i d-yellan deffir n usuddes n leqdic-agi. Deffir n yimeslayen n sin-agi n yimsuddsen, tella-d tejmilt i warrac imecṭah n taddart-agi n Boudjelil. Syin akkin, ɣef 10h30, tettunefk tegnit i tmedyazt akked ccna. Tin ɣur-s ɣef 10h45, lant-d snat n temliliyin tiseklanin. Tamezwarut, sɣur tmarut Akila Kadaoui, i d-yewwin awal ɣef usentel-agi “Hassi-Mesfesoukh, taddart anda sɛeddeɣ temẓi-w”. Tis snat, tella-d sɣur Massa Fairouz Racham, i d-imeslayen ɣef usentel-agi “ Enchantée de ton départ”. Deffir-sent kan, yella-d uskasi, ideg i d-rrant ɣef yisteqsiyen n yimsefliden. Tettuunefk daɣen tegnit tikkelt tis snat i tmedyazt akked ccna, uqbel ad yessali wahil n tsebḥit n wass. Deg tmeddit n wass, ɣef 14h00 n uzal, llant-d snat n temliliyin tiseklanin-nniḍen, sɣur Nadjib Stambouli akked Akli Derouaz, syin akkin yella-d uskasi. Ma ɣef 17h30, yella-d usarag ameẓyan s ṣṣenf n (table ronde), ideg yezzi umeslay ɣef tmedyazt taqburt akked tmirant, sɣur ddqes n yimedyazen, gar-asen: Nordine Ait Slimane, Abdenour Abdesselam, Abderrahmane Djelfaoui…atg. Ikemmel wahil deg yiḍ, dɣa ɣef 20h00, tella-d taɣuri n yisefra i d-yettwastebɛen s uẓawan aḥlawan. Aṭas n yimedyazen i d-yewwin isefra-nsen, gar-asen: Idir Bellali, Ourda Baziz Cherifi, Faiza Acitani…atg. Kfant-tt s tulsa n tmacahut akked tmeɣra n cca, ideg iɣenna Malek Kazeoui akked waṭas n yicennayen-nniḍen. Ass-nni n lǧemɛa, i d-yellan d ass wis sin n tfaska-agi, ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, bdan-tt s ccna akked yisefra. Syin akkin, ɣef 10h15 , lant-d snat n temliliyin tiseklanin akked uskasi. Tamezwarut, sɣur Mass Mouloud Ounoughene, i d-yewwin awal ɣef tezlit tamirant. Tis snat, tella-d sɣur Massa Lazhari Labter akked Massa Samira Bendris, i d-imeslayen ɣef tezlit “Ḥizya”. Tella-d diɣ tmenna n yisefra i d-yettwastebɛen s lmusiga. Ma ɣef 16h00 n tmeddit, yella-d usenɛet n sin n yisura, deffir-sen kan yella-d uskasi fell-asen. Ɣef 17h30 d tasawent, yella-d usarag ameẓyan s ṣṣenf n (table ronde), ideg yezzi umeslay ɣef wamek ttwalin yicennayen d yimedyazen tizlit, sɣur ddqes n yimedyazen akked yinaẓuren, gar-asen: Nordine Ait Slimane, Karim Abranis, Belaid Tagrawla, Rabah Ouferhat…atg. Ikemmel wahil deg yiḍ, dɣa ɣef 20h00, tella-d tɣuri n yisefra i d-yettwastebɛen s uẓawan aḥlawan. Aṭas n yimedyazen i d-yewwin isefra-nsen, gar-asen: Nordine Ait Slimane, Hamid Ibri, Mbarek Guemar…atg. Ssulin leqdic-nsen, s yiwet n tmeɣra n ccna meqqren, ideg ccnan ddeqs n yinaẓuren, gar-asen: Idir Bellali, Hocine Ouagueni, Fares Chemmam…atg. Ass-nni aneggaru, n tfaska-a, i d-yellan sendiḍelli n ssebt, yella-d deg-s, ɣef 10h00 ccna akked yisefra. Syin akkin ɣef 10h15, lant-d snat n temliliyin tiseklanin akked uskasi, sɣur Mass Mohand Magani akked Mass Djaoudat Guessouma. Tin ɣur-s, tella-d diɣ tmenna n yisefra i d-yettwastebɛen s lmusiga. Ɣef 11h30 n uzal, llant diɣ snat temiliyin tiseklanin-nniḍen sɣur sin-agi n yimura: Mohamed Aziz akked Abderrahmane Yefsah, i d-yewwin awal ɣef yidlisen-nsen ineggura. Deg tmeddit n wass, ɣef 16h30 d afella, yella-d usarag ameẓyan s ṣṣenf n (table ronde), ɣef wungal amaziɣ, d wanda yeṣṣaweḍ, i d-yezdin gar ddqes n yineggalen, gar-asen: Hacene Halouan, Mohand Arkat, Hamid Bilek…atg. Syin akkin ɣef 18h30h n tmeddit, tella-d tegnit i tɣuri n yisefra sɣur qeddac n yimedyazen, gar-asen: Ahcene Mariche, Mohand Nait Abdellah, Lounes Ameziane, Slimane Belharat d wiyaḍ-nniḍen. Tella-d diɣen tmeɣra n ccna ɣef lewhi n 22h00 n yiḍ, anda ccnan ayen din n yicennayen, ad nebder gar-asen: Belaid Tagrawla, Rabah Ouferhat, Takfarinas Ferhat, Brahim Tayeb…atg. Am wakken diɣ i d-tella tesfugla n taggara, ideg fkan arrazen i wid i d-yufraren deg yisikwan i yettwaxdamen. Llant-d daɣen temsikniyin n tfelwitin n teklut sɣur ddqes n yinaẓuren, mebla ma ttuɣ asenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen i d-yellan sɣur yimura d yimedyazen. Ad nesmekti kan belli, taddart-agi n Boudjelil, tewwi yakan arraz wis xemsa n taddart tazedgant deg tezrigt n 2016. Ɣer taggara, ad nini belli d tiddukkla tadelsant “Amezyab n lehna” n taddart n Boudjelil s tallelt n tkebbanit n usuddes n tmesbaniyin tidelsanin, tidelsanin akked tussnanin (EMEV), i d-yellan deffirn usuddes n tezrigt tamezwarut n tfaska “Anebdu s tmedyazt d uẓawan”.
