 -1 n uyaziḍ

 -2 n tbeslin

 -2 n tɣenjawin 

 n lmakla n zzit

 -1 n tɣenjawt n lmakla

 n wudi

 -1 n wamud n lḥmmez

 -500 g n lleft 

  -3 n tdeggar n zrudiya

 – lmelḥ, ifelfel aberkan

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Gezmet ayaziḍ-nni d iftaten, glut-t daxel n tasilt s wudi, lebsel igezmen, ifelfel aberkan akked lmelḥ. Terrem-as azal n litra n waman, ternum-as lḥemmez, syin teǧǧem-t ar d-yazyag. Rret recta daxel n tseksut, terremt s ufella n tasilt ad teww azal n 25’. Kkset-d taselsut, teslexsem recta s waman, syin, terrem-tt s ufella n tasilt, tɣumem-tt, ad tkemmel tiwwin. Mi ara yeww uzaziḍ-nni, rret lleft akked zrudiya, ad teww.

  S tezmert-nwen. 

  Daya 

  
 Segmi d-tettqarab tfaska tameẓyant n yinselmen, seld ayyur n tuẓamin, yebda uɣerman n usamar n Bgayet yettḥulfu s teɣlayt n yisufar n wučči, abeɛda tidelt (lxeḍra) d yigumma. Ulamma taɣlayt-a, tban-d yakan ddeqs n wakud ɣer deffir, maca deg tuffɣiwin tineggura i ulzuz i walan tuget n medden yir agemmuḍ ɣef texriṭ-nsen. Imi aṭas iwumi gren irebbi, akken ad sfugglen lɛid n ufḍar s yal ssenf n yisufar, llan wid i d-imuggren sdat-sen ulamek. « Zemreɣ kan ad d-iniɣ d tuqqda i aɣ-teqqden s sswami-a. Ulayɣer akk ad yessirem uẓawali ad d-yaɣ ayen yebɣa wul-is ». I d-yenna yiwen n umezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel. Ilaq ad d-nini belli yerna-d waya aṭas n wurrif i yiɣermanen, ugar n wayen sɛan d iɣeblan inmettiyen. Tikwal d aḥric n yimarkantiyen i yettcektayen ɣef duru ma terna di ssuma n yisufar, ama d igejdanen seg-sen neɣ d wiyaḍ. Amek ihi ara yili waddad n ugellil, ur nessawaḍ tikwal tajernant taddayt yettwaḍemnen (SMIG) i wayyur. Deg waya, mačči ala lxeḍra i yeɣlayen, imi tewweḍ llubya ɣer 240 n yidinaren i ukilu, cclaḍa ɣer 140 n yidinaren, iṭenṭumen ɣer 120 n yidinaren. Maca, ula seg tama n yigumma, seld mi qeɛden cwiṭ di ssuma, ulin ubanan d uḍeffu (teffaḥ) am wakken ur asen-yettizmir qrib ula yiwen. Tura akka deg Lberj n Mira d Ayt Smaɛel, yewweḍ ubanan ɣer 650 n yidinaren i ukilu. « Greɣ zun ad d-aɣeɣ akilu n teffaḥ ussan-a kan. Maca akken kan i yi-d-yerra umsenzu i tririt-iw mi steqsaɣ acḥal ssuma-s, dindin bedleɣ rray. D awezɣi ad serrfeɣ ugar n 1000 n yidinaren i ukilu n teffaḥ ». I d-yenna s usḥissif uɣerman-nniḍen. Di teswiɛt-a, llan wid yerran llum srid ɣef yimetjariyen idiganen, war ma walan ansi i d-tettas sselɛa-nni. Imi ɣef wawal n at tḥuna, nutni teddun kan akken yedda ulzuz aɣelnaw. Meḥsub ma yella uɣen-d isufar s rrxa, ad ten-aɣen medden rexsen, ma wwḍen-asen-d ɣlayit di ssuma, ad ten-awin medden ɣlayen. 

  M. K.  

  
 Ɣas ma qrib dayen ad yekfu useggas aɣurbiz 2017-2018, mazal inelmaden n tesnawit tamaynut, iwumi fkan, deg wakud yezrin, isem n urgaz n tegrawla Ḥusin Ayt Ḥmed, ttmagaren-d lexsasat di tɣuri-nsen. Ma nuɣal ɣer deffir, yewwi-d ad d-nebder aɣilif amezwaru i d-yellan deg-s, imi d-iban lexsas n yiselmaden d win iḍurren aṭas arrac n tesnawit-nni. Aya mbeɛd mi asen-yexreb wahil imi qqimen acḥal d ussan war timsirin akk i asen-ilaqen. Qqaren kan ɣur kra n yiselmaden i d-yettwaheggan send ad yebdu useggas amaynut n tɣuri. Armi dɣa rwan araǧu akken i d-ttwawfen yiselmaden-nni ixussen, yefra wugur mi qqlen zemren ad ɣren ula d isragen i yellan ttruḥen-asen. Maca, ɣas tettwareqqeɛ yiwet n taluft yennerna-d uɣilif-nniḍen n usunded i iḥettmen aṭas n yinelmaden n tmurt, gar-asen wid n tesnawit n Ḥusin Ayt Ḥmed, ad ḥebsen leqraya, ad qqimen tawala taɣezfant deg yixxamen-nsen d wakken uɣalen ɣer leqraya n yal ass. Dɣa ula deg ddurt-a yezrin, mi sɛeddayen yinelmaden ikayaden n ukraḍyur aneggaru, ur asen-tettwaxdem ara tgella deg twala n usɛeddi-nni. D wayeḍ n lexsas ur neɛjib i warrac d yimawlan-nsen, ladɣa imi deg wussan-nniḍen n tɣuri, yettwaggay-d wučči i yinelmaden. Meḥsub lexsas-a ur asen-yehwi ara seg yiwet n tama, acku yella-d di lawan ideg mazal ciṭ n wakud i wakken ad yekfu useggas aɣurbiz, ad bdun yimuras n usgunfu deg unebdu-a i d-yettaẓen. Aṭas i ssarmen limmer ttwasseččen warrac ula deg teswiɛt n yikayaden, ɣas sɛeddayen kan izegnaten n wussan, imi llan yinelmaden ibeɛden ɣef yixxamen-nsen, sruḥuyen ugar n wakud deg ubrid, sebbren i laẓ nnig ɛeyyu n truẓi n uqerruy deg yikayaden. Di taggara, ad d-nesmekti d akken anemhal n tesnawit n Ḥusin Ayt Ḥmed Mass Racid Rebbaɛi yesneɣmes arrac s uzemz n useɣti n yikayaden ara yilin seg wass n 27 alamma d 31 maggu 2018, iger-asen daɣen tiɣri ad ḥeḍren i useɣti-nni acku yezmer ad ilint tuccḍiwin ara iḍelmen albaɛḍ seg-sen. Ma ɣef yinelmaden ara yesɛeddin akayad n BAC, yenna-d Mass Rebbaɛi ad asen-ǧǧen tasnawit teldi alamma d ass n 19 deg wayyur n yunyu.

  Kaissa Khalifi. 

  
 Deg umenzu n waggur n cutember 2018, rnan yimɛelmen n ttawilat n usiweḍ gar Dayra n Mɛatqa ( Taɣiwant n Ṣsuk n Letniyen, d tɣiwant Mɛatqa) d ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu, ssuma n usiweḍ s wazal n 10 n yidinaren. Yella-d waya mebla ma sɛelmen ula d yiwen, ama d tanmehla n usiweḍ n Tizi Uzzu, ama d imsiklen (voyageurs). Sdat n array-agi n tmerna, imsiklen n yal ass yettawin abrid-agi n ugerzu wis 147, yerkeb-iten lɣiḍ meqqren. Dɣa ɣef leḥsab n yimeslayen-nsen, aya dayen yeffɣen i usaḍuf, dayen i d-yellan mebla ma sɛelmen imsiklen d imḍebbren teɛna temsalt. Yiwen imsikel ur yufi ara ula d awalen iwatan akken ad d-ibeggen lɣiḍ-ines sdat n array-agi n tmerna, dɣa yenna-d : ‘’Deg tmurt-a, yal wa ixeddem akken yebɣa, ala taḥraymit ɣer tayeḍ. Timerna deg yal isufar ɣef leḥsab n wudmawen. Seg dqiqa ɣer tayeḍ, s lebɣi n yal yiwen, ad yernu akken yebɣa, amzun ulac imḍebbren n uwanak . Tamurt, ha-tt-an la tleḥḥu srid s iɣzer. Dɣa amek ara yeqbel wallaɣ n umdan timerna deg tewtilin yecban tidak n usiweḍ n temḍiqt-agi-nneɣ ? Ulac amḍiq anda ḥebsen ttawilat-nsen, gren-naɣ sdaw n tlegwit-nni (pont) n unnar amellal, amzun d ilfan, mebla ma ḥṣan s imihan n umḍiq-agi. Rnu ɣef yimsiklen, ḥebbsen-ten deg tlemmast n ubrid ameqqran, dayen i d-yeglan s waṭas n twaɣiyin ɣef yimsiklen. Amek akka ad neqbel s tmerna ? Ur sɛin ara ula d tesriḥ n tmerna seg tenmehla n usiweḍ.’’ Tawiɣit, d akken ula gar-asen yimsiwḍen, ur dduklen ara ɣef yiwen n rray, amur ameqqran deg-sen ur qbilen ara rray-agi n tmerna, dɣa yal wa iteddu d lebɣi-is. Wa itekkes kan am zzik, wa yerna deg ssuma.Tanmehla n usiweḍ n ugerzu n Tizi-Uzzu, seg yidis-is, tewwet-d deg rray-agi n tmerna, mazal ar tura urɛad i d-tufa tifrat i temsalt-agi. Iɣeblan, zgan gar sin yidisan, imsiwḍen d tenmehla n usiweḍ, seg useggas n 2013 ɣer wass-a. Aya, yusa-d seld aɣbel n tufɣa n yimsiwḍen n dayra n Mɛatqa seg umḍiq n uneḥbus n ttawilat n usiweḍ n Bouhinoune, ɣer umḍiqt i deg llan tura s sseba n ssuma yulin i d-ḍelben yimḍebbren n umḍiq-agi n uneḥbus. Rnu ɣef waya, yella-d deg sin wagguren iɛeddan uneḥbus ɣef lxedma s sseba n tuksa n lekwaɣeḍ i wugar n 15 n yimɛelmen n ttawilat n usiweḍ s sseba n unekcum n ttawilat ɣer tamdint.

   Ali Zalouk 

  
 D ayen yesseḥzanen akk imeɣnasen i yennuɣen d iseggasen-aya ɣef usṭeɛref s tmaziɣt sɣur adabu. Ɣas d tunsibt tutlayt-a di tmendawt, teqqar-d tilawt d akken mazal-itt mačči d tunsibt ɣur ugdud. 

 Ma nekkes taggayt n yimura, ar ass-a deg wussan d timawit i yettselliken tutlayt imi ur tettwasmuzzeɣ twennaḍt akken i d-yewwi lḥal. Ama deg tḥuna, deg tzeɣwa, deg yisensa, deg yifurguyen neɣ rrif ubrid, ulac ad as-yettunefk umkan i tmaziɣt deg wakal amaziɣ.

 Nnan-d yicennayen ɣef waya  
 Nesteqsa kra n yicennayen ɣef taluft-a, banen-aɣ ur gzin addud-a, ɣas ɛerḍen ad gren tiɣri i ugdud. Yiwen seg-sen d Buǧemɛa Agraw i yesɛan tacrift di Bgayet, yura sdat-s s teqbaylit. «D ayen i ilaqen aseqdec n tutlayt deg yal amḍiq. Yella wawal n tmendawt, yella wawal n uɣref. Tura ma yella axxam neɣ taɣawsa d ayla n lḥukuma, d nettat i yewwi-d ad tserref idrimen ad teg tamaziɣt.

 Ma d ayla n wuslig, d netta kan i yettusalasen ad yaru tutlayt-is. Meskud mačči d ayen yellan megdul, d nekni ara yekkren i usenfar», i d-yenna. Ɣur ucennay Yasin Zwawi, i d-iberrḥen s uklip-ines amaynu s kraḍ n tutlayin, ilaq ad yili useqdec n teqbaylit deg yal aḥric. Yenna-aɣ-d: «Ixus s tidet useqdec n tmaziɣt berra sɣur ugdud. 

 Asmi rziɣ i Kanada di 2010, ufiɣ dinna azrug acinwa yura akk s tcinwat. Ula da di Bgayet anda xeddmen Yicinwaten, uran ipanuyen s tutlayt-nsen. Ihi aseqdec n tutlayt d ccɣel-nneɣ merra ». Ula d Ḥasan Aḥres yefka-aɣ-d tamuɣli-s ɣef useqdec n tutlayt di berra. « Asenseb n tidet ma yella yeḍfer-d useqdec n tutlayt. Ilaq ad d-tekcem tutlayt-nneɣ di twennaḍt-nneɣ, ad tt-neqqar, ad tt-nettwali deg yal amkan akken ad tt-nennam. Acku aql-aɣ nẓer amek teṭṭfen amḍiq deg umeslay-nneɣ wawalen iberraniyen», i iwala.

 Nnan-d yiselwayen n tɣiwanin 
 Iger-d tiɣri, ussan iɛeddan, uselway n tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, Mass Sadeq Rebbaɛi, i yimsenza-nsen akken ad arun s ufella n tḥuna s tmaziɣt. Ɣef waya yemmeslay-aɣ-d: «Ahat mačči aṭas-aya segmi nebda nesmuzzuɣ tawennaḍt n tɣiwant-nneɣ, maca di tallit-a ala aɣunzu n tutlayt-nneɣ i izemren ad yili d ssebba. 

 Ihi, tiɣri-w ad tt-ceggɛeɣ ula i yiselwayen n tɣiwanin, imi yelha ad nessendeh nekni imezdaɣ ɣef wawal n usmuzzeɣ n twennaḍt». Ma ɣur uselway n tɣiwant n Yiderginen, Mass Racid Xalef, ad yili waya d acqirrew ɣer sdat i nutni d tdukkliwin-nsen. «Nella nedder cwiṭ tirmit-a n usmuzzeɣ n twennaḍt ɣur-neɣ. Mačči s yipanuyen, maca s tbeḥnuqin i nettɛelliq deg yal tama. D acu, tura ttwaɣent. Ɣef waya, aql-aɣ nebɣa ad as-nbedd sya d tasawent i usenfar-a», i aɣ-d-iwekked. Di lawan ihi ideg tutlayt d tunsibt di tmendawt seg 2016 akken i tt-yebɣa ugdud, melmi ara tt-yessenseb dɣa netta?

<p style="text-align:right">  M. K. 

  
 Ulamma deg tmendawt n tmurt n Lezzayer yedda-d umagrad i d-yeqqaren tella tlelli n tesreṭ, meḥsub yesɛa azref yal aɣerman ad yeḍfer ddin i as-yehwan, wanag mačči d ayen i d-ibanen deg unnar. Aya imi, ma nemmeslay-d ɣef yimasiḥen n Tmurt n Yiqbayliyen, ayendin d uguren d lḥers i sɛeddayen ama sɣur yimḍebbren, neɣ ula sɣur kra n trebbuyaɛ n yimdanen. Ussan-a dɣa, di temnaḍt n Buǧima, yefka Mass lwali n Tizi Uzzu asuneḍ i umdal n tmesgida i yellan din, d amḍiq n talwit d tuẓin ɣer Yellu i ddeqs n yimasiḥen. 

 Akken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ, yeṭṭef umasay n tmesgida n Buǧima Mass Mesɛud Taklit, ass n, 03 ɣuct yezrin, yiwet n tnecda sɣur ssrabes n yiǧadarmiyen n Makuda, akken ad as-d-mmeslayen ɣef lebɣi n lwali i ubelleɛ n tmesgida-a. I usmekti, lwali-a n Tizi Uzzu yella ɣef uqerruy n Tɣerdayt kra n yiseggasen tura ɣer deffir. Ma d sebba n umdal-a, tcudd ɣer ttesriḥ i ur tesɛi tmesgida, akken i d-iban lḥal. 

 «Ad aken-d-nesneɣmes d akken aram i d-iteddun, 6 ɣuct 2019, ad nekker i umdal n tmesgida-nwen s uxemmel. Ad awen-d-nefk akud i uheggi d usefreɣ n yidigan», d izen i ceggɛen yiǧadarmiyen ɣef wawal n teɣbalut-nneɣ. Seld taluft-a, ddeqs n yimeɣnasen i d-ibeggnen ibeddi-nsen ɣer yidis n yimasiḥen n tama-a n Buǧima. Wwten-d deg tigawt-a i walan d tamḥeqranit, d attɛeddi ɣef tlelli n ddin. «Mačči akk d azref ad tettwamdel tmesgida acku ur frint kra n tlufa n ujerred. Lemmer d abenyan-nniḍen, ur kenniɣ ad gen lḥers ɣef wat-is, akken gan d wat tmesgida», i d-yenna yiwen n yilemẓi. 
  M. K. 

  
  Isufar   

 – 300 g n lfarina

 – 150 g n wudi

 – 3/4 n lkas n uyefki

 – 1/2 n tcelwiḍt n yiɣes

 – Lmelḥ, ssker

 – 6 n tetteffaḥin

 – 1 n tlimet

  Aheggi  

 Sxelḍet akken iwata lfarina akked yiɣes. Rnut-as udi, ssker, ayefki akked lmelḥ, teggumt d takurin. Ḥerrit titteffaḥin, terrem-tent daxel n teṭawwant, ternum-as ciṭ n ssker. Anfet-as ad yeww azal n 6’, reggit-t sya ɣer da. Meslet arekti-nni, terrem daxel-is tteffaḥ, tɣummem-t. Erret-t ɣer lkuca azal n 45’. Mi yewwa, rnut-as iẓmi n llim. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Isufar </span>

 – 15 n tbaṭatatin timecṭaḥ – 2 n tfenza n ticcert – Taḥcict – Lmelḥ – Ifelfel aberkan – 1 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n lkemmun – 1/2 n tɣenjawt n lqahwa n yifelfel aḥlawan – 5 n tɣenjawin n lmakla n zzit uzemmur

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Sirdet mliḥ tibaṭatatin-nni axater ad wennt s yiclem-nsent, syin terrem-tent daxel n tasilt ternum lmelḥ, s ufella n tmes azal n 30’. Ttwalit s lmus ma yella wwant neɣ ala. Mi wwant, smiret-asent aman isemmaḍen, tecqecrem-tent. Erret zzit daxel lmeqla akked yisufar-nni-nniḍen yeqqimen, tanfem ad qqlun azal n snat n ddqayeq, syin terrem lbaṭata s ufella ad d-teqqlu ula d nettat.

  S tezmert-nwen Daya 

  
 Ass n amhad, 28 di duǧember 2017, tella-d yiwet n tmeɣra di tzeqqa n Opéra n Lezzayer ‘ Buɛlam Bessayeh ‘ ɣef 10h i lmend n usfugel n ussegas wis 100 n tlalit n umyaru d umussnaw ameqqran Lmulud At Mɛemmer. Tajmilt-agi, tella-d s ddaw n leɛnaya tunnigt n uselway n tegduda d Useqamu unnig n timuzɣa akked lbusta n Lezzayer imi i d-suffɣen yiwen n yiziwel s teswira n Lmulud At Mɛemmer s wazal n 50 idinaren. Di temlilit-a, yerza-d umaray amatu n Usqamu unnig n timuzɣa Mass Si El Hacmi Ɛessad, aneɣlaf n wadal d yilmeẓyen Mass Uld Ɛli Lhadi , taneɣlaft n teywult d tesnaffukest Massa Iman Huda Ferɛun akked unesɣamu n uselway n tigduda. Am wakken i d-rzan, daɣen, aṭas n yimdanen si yal tamiwin n tmurt: Timimun, Tamenrasṭ, At Yanni, wid n Lezzayer tamanaɣt d wiyad. Ihi, ass-a, ruḥen-d yimeddukal n Lmulud At Mɛemmer s lferḥ d ameqqran i wakken ad-as-rren tajmilt, u ayen d-nnan fell-as drus imi ɣezzif umecwar n Lmulud At Mɛemmeri. Tella-d, diɣ, temsikent n yiwen n tɣuri s tegnatin n 10 tedqiqin n leqdic i yexdem Usqamu unnig n timuzɣa deg ussegas-a n 2017 ɣef tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ t i lmend n lqern n tlallit n Lmulud At Mêmmer, fkan arrazen i krad n yimeddukal-is, deg-sen Mass Mulay Seddiq Sliman, fkan wayeḍ i unesɣamu n uselway n tigduda. Ccnan tezlatin n unaẓur ameqran Idir s ɣur inelmaden n uɣerbaz alemmas n At Yanni Lɛerbi At Ɛmer d At Wacif, d ccnawi n Ahelil Gurara s ɣur tarbaɛt n Timimun. Mass EL Hacmi Ɛessad akked Massa Iman Huda Ferɛun, sstenyan di taggara n temlilit-a ɣef le yiziwel-agi amaynut, ara yettwanzen di lbustat n tmurt n Lezzayer. Ihi, ass-a, nezmer ad d-nini s ttbut d akken ‘’ Yella walebɛaḍ, yella ulac-it, yella walebɛaḍ, ulac-it yella ‘’ 

  Dahlal Chanez  

  
 Ass n 16 di yennayer 1992, terrid-d i tiɣri i wakken ad d-taseḍ ɣer tmurt mi akken talafsa tger-d s annar i wakken ad tt-tessenger. Qessiḥet teswiɛt, yeɛreq ccedd i uyeddid, maca tenwiḍ d akken ur tezmir ad tili tyita nnig n tin n umnekcam i tqubleḍ acḥal d aseggas. Meɛna, d tiyita n watmaten i iɣelben tin n uɛdaw. Akken kan i tebdiḍ asizdeg n teswiɛt, sɣamen-ak-d deg Annaba ass n 29 di yunyu 1992, setta kan n wagguren segmi telliḍ deg leḥkem. Tamettant-ik temgarad akk d tiyaḍ, imi ula d tiliẓri teṭṭef-ik-id srid mi k-nɣan. D acu kan, imeslayen ineggura iwumi i d-tebriḍ ad qqimen i lebda deg cfawat n widen yeḥsan acimi i d-tuɣaleḍ. Assaɣ i ak-yurzen ɣer tmurt d win i ak-yeǧǧan tebddeḍ deg wudem n unekcam Arumi almi d timmunent. Telliḍ seg wid yezdin iɣallen n yizzayriyen deg tlalit n Tirni ara irefden imrigen. Di tal tama n tmurt, di lawan n lḥers, anda ma teddiḍ umnen-k yimdanen ladɣa deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Telliḍ d azamul n umennuɣ, d azamul n tegmat. Meɛna, am kečč am yimeddukkal-ik n umennuɣ, tezzi fell-èawen tegnit iwakken wa yemmut, wa yenfa wa yettwaḥbes. Akka i tḍerru mbeɛd tagrawla. D tamurt n Lmerruk i ak-d-igren irebbi iwakken ad tidireḍ deg-s, teǧǧiḍ tin akken iɣef tɛettbeḍ. Tamettant-ik tsers-d rrehba ɣef tmurt, aṭas iwumi teqḍeɛ layas n tifrat n ccedda. Deffir-k, ugar n 200 000 n wid yemmuten, aṭas ttwaffren d waṭṭanen ur nesɛi leḥsab. Rrebrab ibegges-d ad iquc tamurt, ufan abrid seg temmuteḍ. Tura akka, adlis-nni i turiḍ anda i tegreḍ asteqsi : Sani i tetteddu Lezzayer ? ur d-yelli deffir-s win ara d-yawin tiririt. Nebluhmet, neqqim ! Ṭṭes di talwit, tnejreḍ-d iswi i ccetla, wissen kan melmi ara t-taweḍ ?

  M. Smail 

  
 Macahu tellemcahu ad tt-yeḍbeε Ṛebbi d asaru. Yiwet n tikkelt, tenna-as tmeṭṭut-is i ugellid: “Dɣa ay argaz ma s tidet tḥemmleḍ-iyi, ad ak-sutreɣ kra”. 
  Agellid: “ D acut? Bɣiɣ ad i iy-id-tuqmeḍ tasumta ad teččar s rric n yifrax meṛṛa yettidiren dagi. 

 D ayagi? D ayen isehlen. 
  Iruḥ urgaz, yessawel meṛṛa i leḍyur yellan. Yessegraw-iten-id, yenna-asen: “Yal yiwen deg-wen, ad i yi-d-yefk yiwen n yincew si rric-is i wakken ad uqmeɣ tasumta i tmeṭṭut d arraz. Ihi mi bdan ad d-ssawalen i leḍyur yiwen yiwen s yismawen-nsen, ufan ixuṣ ṣibbus.
  Yenna-as ugellid: “Ad d-truḥem, ad t-id-nadim”. 
  Ruḥen, nudan-t, wwin-t-id, yenṭeq ugellid: “A ṣibbus, εni ur teẓriḍ ara belli snejmaεeɣ-d yakk ifṛax?”. 

 Σelmeɣ ay agellid, acu kan snat n temsal, ceɣbent-iyi, ur tent-fhimeɣ ara, yuɣal a ttxemmimeɣ fell-asent armi ttuɣ ula d anejmaε-agi. 

 D acu-tent akka temsal-agi?

 D anwi i aṭas di ddunit, d ussan neɣ d uḍan? D anwi i aṭas di ddunit d irgazen neɣ d tilawin? 

 Nekk wallaɣ ussan d wuḍan kif kif, irgazen d tlawin daɣen kif kif, ayagi mačči d timsal! 

 Ihi nekk mi akka I n-εeṭṭleɣ mačči akka i yufiɣ ixef-is. 

 Amek ihi? 

 Gar wussan d wuḍan, d ussan i yeqqwan. 

 Amek? 

 Iḍ unebdu mi ara d tεum tziri, rnut-id s ussan acku deg-s izmer ad ixdem umdan. 
  Ma d irgazen d tlawin, ugar tilawin. 

 Amek? Ayɣer?

 Argaz ma yella teḥkem-it tmeṭṭut ɣef wayen ur nemεin, ɣas rnu-t ɣer tmeṭṭut. 
  Agellid yefhem tamsalt, yenṭeq ɣer sibbus: “S tidet a ṣibbus, ɣur-k lḥeqq”. Dɣa imir kan yefhem tamsalt belli fell-as i tt-id-yewwi, yenṭeq ɣer yifrax-nni, yenna-asen: “Dayen ɣas uɣalet ɣer wansi i d-tekkam, yefra unejmuε’’.

  Yahia Yanes 

  
 Yal azniq deg-s tudert, sya d imdanen yettqessiṛen, yettezmumugen, 
 sya d inaẓuren yemgaraden i d-icennun akk leṣnaf yellan n tezlatin neɣ yesunuɣen deg yiɣerban akked d imekwan n mechuren n taddart, yecban Tajmaɛt.

 Seg wass n, 19 ar 26 yulyu 2019,teɛmer tumert taddart n Saḥel. Yal azniq deg-s tudert, sya d imdanen yettqessiṛen, yettezmumugen, sya d inaẓuren yemgaraden i d-icennun akk leṣnaf yellan n tezlatin neɣ yesunuɣen deg yiɣerban akked d imekwan n mechuren n taddart, yecban Tajmaɛt. Tettunefk tegnit i yal yiwen i wakken ad d-yini ayen i d as-yellan deg wul neɣ deg wallaɣ. 

 Ass-a yuɣal-d wazal i tlaba d tayri gar yimdanen. Akka i d Tafaska n Siwel-d tiẓuriwin i d yellan aseggas-agi di taddart n Saḥel i d-yezgan deg unẓul n Buzeggan di lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu deg tezrigt-a tis 16. Ass n 25 yulyu, d tagnit anda wid i d-yerzan ɣer din, ḥeḍren, deg tmeddit, i yiḍ n usiwel n tmucuha. Mlalen-d deg yiwen n umkan n taddart, deg uzaɣar. Ssan-as tizerbiyin, i wakken ad qqimen ɣer lqaɛa. Wid i d-yusan, slan i tmucuha, zzin-as-d i tẓeqqa-nni s tcemmuɛin, ttezɣududent, ttemceruruqent. Llan-t temɣarin, irgazen, tulawin d yilmeẓyen. Bɣan akk ad slen i tmucuha i d-wwin yinebgawen n tfaska i d-yusan si ukuẓet n tamawin n tmurt n Lezzayer neɣ si tmura n lberrani. 

 Ṭṭfen imukan qqimen, syin bdant tmucuha, ttɛeddin wid-nni tent-id-yettalsen s nnuba. Gerrzen dayen kan yinalasen, yerna di kra n tegnatin qqaren-d i yimferǧen ad cnun yid-sen, ad ɛeggḍen am nutni. Dayen i yernan cbaḥa i yiḍ-nni. Ma di tejmaɛt n taddart, llan-t tirebbuyaɛ n yimdanen cennu-n, ceṭṭḥen, u llan-d daɣen aṭas n leqdicat-nniḍen ama d idles, tasekla, unuɣ di leḥyuḍ…atg. Siwel-d Tiẓuriwini, d tafaska i d-yessakayen tilelli, i d-yettaran asirem d laman gar yimdanen. Yewwi-d kan ad nesnnemer wid-ak i tt-id-yessuddsen d wid meṛṛa i d-as-yefkan azal. Ilaq yal aseggas, ad nrezzu ɣer tfaska-agi, si yal tama n tmurt n leqbayel, imi terra-d rruḥ i tudrin. 
  Dahlal Chanez 

  
 TUSSATIN d amud n tullisin d-yefɣen di yennayer 2968 /2018 deg-s azal n sdis n tullisin yemgaraden di teɣzi d temzi, izewwal-nsent d wi : Azemzi, Tayri d wawal, Tirgazin, Timlilit, Tagrawla, Tayri d wayen-nniḍen.Tullisin-agi, ttwarunt deg waṭas n talliyin, kked seg useggas n 1998 alamma d win 2012. Dɣa ttmeslayent ɣef tlufa yellan di talliyin-agi; am yinig ɣer tmura n berra, iɣeblan n uxeddim, tagrawla… Maca, asentel n tayri, yella akk di tullisin. Tagi d tukkist tameẓyant: «Yergagi ufus n Jeğğiga seg tira imeslayen-nni, dɣa tessers imru, terfed aqerru-ines s yigenni… tḍegger d asawen yiwen uqadus n nnefs iḥuzen taftilt n trisiti… Teqqim akken kra n wakud ur iban ɣer wacu i tettmuqul… Allen-is ɣer ssqef, maca ur tettwali kra… Ɣer tagara, terra-d aqerru-s ɣer ṭtabla, tḍegger aεrur-is ɣer deffir, tsend-it ɣer ukersi, twala am wakken ameslay yewweḍ ɣer taggara-s imiren. Maca, si tama-nniḍen, ur tebɣi ara ad tekfu tira-s s yir ameslay yettruẓun asirem…» (As.24)

  Sɣur ameskar Balouli Ferhat 

  
 Ass-nni n ttlata 5 yunyu 2018 i zzmen 16 n yiseggasen ɣef wasmi teḥzen tezlit taqbaylit. Tuɣal d tagujilt, imi i tt-yeǧǧa yiwen gar tgejda-s, acu kan yeǧǧa-as-d. Ass-nni n larebɛa mi d-yewweḍ lexbar, teḥzen temnaḍt n Makuda imi yemmut mmi-s i d-trebba acḥal d aseggas. D ilemẓi n 45 n yiseggasen kan d leɛmer, mi medlent wallen-is, yeǧǧa ddunit ur tt-yeṛwi yezger ɣer laxart. Wagi ihi d acennay ameqqran Ḥmiduc.

 Ḥmiduc, neɣ s yisem-is n tidet Ḥmed Xeddim (Ahmed khedim), yella d acennay azzayri s tutlayt n teqbaylit. Ilul ass n 14 ɣuct 1956 deg wakud n tegrawla deg Agni n Waklan deg taddart n Ɛeṭṭuc, taɣiwant n Makuda, deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, deg tmurt n Leqbayel. Deg useggas n 1964 i yecna i tikkelt tamezwarut ɣef usayes akked ucennay Racid Meṣbaḥi, dɣa yefka-as afud meqqren akken ad yecnu. Tizlit akk tamezwarut yecna d asefru-nni « A Wiza semmeḥ-as » i yura s timmad-is. Syin akin, yebda asekles n yiḍebsiyen armi yeṣṣaweḍ 8 n yiḍebsiyen. Amezwaru, yecna-t deg useggas n 1980, ma d sin n yineggura, yessuffeɣ-iten-id deg useggas n 1993. Yesɛa yiwe n ṣṣut dayen kan, d win n waqqur. Ulac ilemẓi neɣ tilemẓit ur yessuzen ara. Ḥemmlent akk yilmeẓyen. Yecna gar 1978 armi d 2001, mi yuḍen. Yemmut ass n 5 yunyu 2002, deg temdint n Marseille n tmurt n Fransa, di leɛmer-is ala 45 n yiseggasen. Ma d ssebba n tmettant-is d aṭṭan n tgeẓẓal, i t-yeṭṭfen acḥal d lweqt. Ass n 11 yunyu 2002, wwin-d lǧessa-s s axxam-is yellan deg taddart n Taksebt. Wallant medden i tikkelt taneggarut. Aṭas n yinaẓuren imeqqranen i iḥedren tamḍelt-is, yecban : Lewnis At Mengellat, Baɛziz, Amar u Rabaḥ, Buǧemɛa Agraw…atg. Yettwamḍel deg taddart-is tanaṣlit Agni n Waklan.

  Iḍebsiyen-is d tezlatin-ines : 

 Deg useggas n 1980 : Kkert ay Aytma !

 1- A Wiza semmeḥ-as / 2- Ay aḥbib / 3-Mi bdiɣ abrid / 4- Kkert ay aytma ! / 5- Seṭṭac di leɛmer-is / 6- La ttɣaḍen / 7- Lbumba / 8- Nadya ruḥ.

  Deg useggas n 1981 : Inna-as Inna-as. 

 1- Ini-as ini-s / 2- Izem i d-trebba tsedda / 3- Tusa-d listiqlal / 4- Ṣṣber ad ṣebreɣ / 5- Tenɣiḍ-iyi-d / 6- Sawlen-iyi-d / 7- Lḥebs / 8- Fell-am a lalla.

  Deg useggas n 1982 : Lemḥiba-w   temmut. 

 1- Lemḥiba-w temmut / 2- Lḥebs / 3- Ṣṣber ad ṣebreɣ / 4- Fell-m a lalla / 5- Tusd listiqlal / 6- Axabit.

  Deg useggas n 1983 : Kker a gma ad nruḥ. 

 1- Kker a gma ad nruḥ / 2- Ay arfiq / 3- Ru ay iẓri-w / 4- Gulleɣ ɣef zzwaǧ / 5- Mmektaɣ-d asmi la ttruɣ / 6- Nniɣ-am a tuzyint ṣṣber.

  Deg useggas n 1984 : Sidi Lmir. 

 1- A tin yettarǧun tafsut / 2- A Sidi Lmir / 3- Fiḥel ma tettruḍ ay ul / 4-Lliɣ yid-m s laman / 5- Tawizet n ṭnac / 6- Ad tkellex, terwi fell-i.

  Deg useggas n 1985 : Alger-Tunis. 

 1- Lexbar ajdid / 2- Asmi akken fudeɣ ddunit / 3- Si Lezzayer ɣer Tunes / 4- Tenna-iyi-d qbel ad truḥeḍ / 5- A Bab yigenwan / 6 Ziɣ Sin Ay tesliḍ.

  Deg useggas n 1986 : Targit. 

 1- Tessefreḥ-iyi targit / 2- Fudeɣ a wi yeswan / 3- Akken kan yeffeɣ Uṛumi / 4- Instrumental / 5- Cbiɣ / 6- Ay Ageffur n meɣres / 6- Tɣaḍ-iyi tuzyint.

  Deg useggas n 1988 : Ayayay. 

 1- Ayayay / 2- Allen-iw deg wallen-is / 3- Igenni / 4- Instrumental / 5- Tamurt / 6- Rwaḥ rwaḥ / 7- Yak tenniḍ-iyi / 8- Akursi.

  Deg useggas n 1991 : Le parti. 

 1- Le parti / 2- Afrux / 3- Mm yimezran / 4- A tin / 5- Lif Lba (Asɛerab) / 6- A Tajeǧǧigt.

  Deg useggas n 1993 : Azzayri. 

 1- L’adresse (Tansa) / 2- Ay ul-iw / 3- Tayri / 4- Acu / 5- Tabani / 6- A mmi-s n udrar / 7- Ayen Ayen / 8- A Baba.

  Deg useggas n 1993 : Tafat. 

 1- Tafat / 2- Ma d kemm / 3- Taɣzalt / 4- Awi-t / 5- Ahya ay arrac / 6- Lḥif / 7-Nekk yid-m / 8- Ay itbir.

 Seg wasmi yemmut ar ass-a, aṭas n tejmilin i d as-yuɣalen, ama deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri ama deg tmurt n Fransa neɣ deg tama n Makuda. Yal tikkelt anwa idis ara as-yerren tajmilt, tikkelt-agi d nnuba-nneɣ. Ulamma tugna-s neɣ udem-is iɣab fell-aɣ, maca mazal ṣṣut-is ḥlawen yezzuzun-aɣ yal tikkelt mi ara as-nsel. Xas iruḥ netta, meɛna yessegra-d deffir-s agerruj ur nfennu, iseg i d-ttagmen yilmeẓyen. 

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Yerkeb lɣiḍ imezdaɣ n 510 n tnezduɣin deg yiɣrem n Timunent (Fleurus zik-nni) ɣef yir liḥala i deg i d-yeggra ugmam-nsen. Berrḥen ussan-a srid ɣer uqerru amezwaru n twilayt akken ad d-iger iman-is, ad yefru uguren-nsen, ma ulac ula d nutni ad kkren ɣer tigawt. Ɛlaḥsab n umeslay-nsen, ma ugin ad asen-d-slen s tin n leɛqel, ad kkren ɣer yiɣil. Mi nesteqsa yiwen n umezdaɣ n tama-nni, yesmar-itent-id yiwet yiwet. Yenna-d ɣas akken seg useggas n 1980 i ten-yuɣ lḥal deg umkan-a, maca tameddurt deg-s tettcabi ɣer tin n zik. Ma nmuqel iberdan d liḥala-nsen, seg wakken ɣzen di yal tama, ula d tikli ɣef uḍar tettaɛer. Tikwal di tegrest, tettarra-ten tmara ad gen ticekkarin i yiḍarren neɣ ad lsen libuṭ, akken ur ttaččaren ara d aluḍ. Ula d inelmaden n yiɣerbazen, ur ten-zgilen ara wugur-a, daɣen, imi yella wamur-nsen n lixṣas: teddun yisnawiyen alamma qrib 4 km ɣef uḍar i wakken ad awḍen ɣer tɣiwant Ben Friḥa, ad kecmen tineɣriyin-nsen. Ɣef waya, ttcetkayen yimawlan akken ad d-yili lbenyan n tesnawit ɣur-sen, akken daɣen ad yenqes lḥif ɣef warraw-nsen. Ma nkemmel deg lixṣas dima, nnan-d yimezdaɣ ‘’ur d-nettaf ara ammas n udawi, u ma yella-d kra n umuḍin s lɛejlan, ad t-awi almma d tiɣiwanin i aɣ-d-yezzin. Tikwal, yettfat lawan uqbel ad awḍen, ladɣa ma d tameṭṭut ara d-yerbun’’. Lɣiḍ n yimezdaɣ-a, yessaweḍ armi ula d tiɣawsiwin n yal ass deg yixxamen, am unegzum n waman d trisiti yal tikkelt. Uguren-a merra, mmeslayen yakan fell-asen acḥal d abrid i yimasayen n tɣiwant, maca ulac tiririt i d-yekkan seg tama-nsen. Ɣef waya i ceyyɛen srid ɣer lwali I wakken ad iṣeggem addad n tmetti ideg ttidiren, ad ttuneḥsaben d imdanen i llan am nutni am wiyaḍ. Iɛewwiqen-a n yir tudert merra, bla ma nettu takerḍiwin i ten-yeggunin di yal taswiɛt sɣur kra n yiberraniyen, d ayen i yeǧǧan tafesna n ufeqqiɛ-nsen tuli dima. Dɣa tifrat, ad d-tban amek ara tili deg wussan i d-iteddun. 

  Khaled Achoui  

  
 Ad d-tili tezrigt n useggas-agi taggara n waggur n furar, imi deg yiseggasen yezrin tettili-d ddima deg taggara n waggur n duǧember. Wid iḥemmlen ssinima neɣ isura, tikkelt-agi, ad qqimen alamma d ass-n ssebt, 24 deg furar 2018, i wakken ad ẓren tullya tunṣibt n tezrigt tis 16 n tfaska tadelsant taɣelnawt n usaru amaziɣ deg uxxam n umezgun amniḍan Kateb Yacine n temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Maca, ar tura ur d-wwiḍen ara waṭas n yisallen sɣur yidisan n yidles, mazal ur d-iban ara iwumi ara tuɣal tejmilt n useggas-agi, mazal ur d-iban ara wahil unsib n tfaska-agi. Yetturaǧu ad yili deg wahil n tezrigt-agi tis 16, aṭas n leqdicat idelsanen ara d-yilin, gar usenɛet n yisura, isaragen ɣef ssinima, timsikniyin, isikwan…atg. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, ass-nni n lḥed, 31 deg waggur n duǧember 2017, i d azemz aneggaru n usersi n yisura ara yettekkin deg temsizzelt n useggas-agi.

  A.A. 

  
 Aṭas n yisenfaren i yettwajerrden, taggara-a, deg tɣiwant n Amizur, i yeggugen s wazal n 25 n yikilumitren seg waɣir n Bgayet. Ddeqs seg yisenfaren i yebdan yakan, ttwaṭṭfen sɣur termisin i asen-izemren, tban-d daɣ tfada (ddili) n keffu-nsen. Wiyaḍ qrib ad bdun neɣ teffeɣ-d tiɣri i tuṭṭfa i ten-yeɛnan. Dɣa, ɣef wulɣuyen i d-tessufuɣ i wat termisin, i buhan n yisenfaren, ddeqs i d-yellan taggara-a deg tɣiwant-a, am tiɣri i uqeɛɛed n ubrid yettawin ɣer Taddart Tameqqrant akked tiɣri i tuṭṭfa n usenfar yerzan tiɣin n kra n wallalen. Deg-sent yewwi-d ulɣu akk tilɣa i yeɛnan asenfar, akked tewtilin ilaqen akken ad yezmir bab n termist ad yesres akaram-is deg tɣiwant ussan-a. D ayen iɣef ɛewwlen yimḍebbren n tɣiwant-a iɣef i d-nemmeslay, imi ula d imezdaɣ n temnaḍt-nni yeṭṭef-iten lḥir ayendin, seg waṭas-aya, melmi ara d-lalen yisenfaren i ttganin. Ihi, usan-d yisenfaren-a ad d-awin ugar n tneflit ɣer sdat i tɣiwant-a icebḥen. Ilaq ad d-nemmeslay ɣef uḥric n teywalt d usiweḍ n telɣut i ijehden ayendin deg tɣiwant-a n Amizur, imi ugar n wadeg internet i tesɛa, tesnulfa-d daɣ asebter deg uẓeṭṭa n facebook akken ad tili teqreb ugar i yiɣermanen-is. 

  M. K. 

  
 Deg tdiwennit-agi, yemmeslay-d Mass Aouchiche Youcef, aselway n useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, iɛeddan s ukabar n FFS, ɣef yisenfaren s umata, annar n JSK, aseqdec n tmaziɣt akked temsal-nniḍen i icudden ɣer lwilaya… 

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Di tazwara, ma tzemmreḍ ad aɣ-d-tinniḍ anda yewweḍ usenfar n lebni n usebdad n ugellid Cacnaq di temdint n Tizi Uzzu ? 
 Aouchiche Youcef : Lecɣal n lebni n usebdad i ugellid Cacnaq, teddun akken iwata lḥal. Aql-aɣ, nettraǧu ineǧǧaren n uẓru ad aɣ-d-awin tawleft taneggarut ara nesqerdec d umussnaw n umezruy aqbur, i yeṭṭafaren asenfar-agi s lqerb. Nebɣa ad d-nessekcem imussnawen n umezruy, i wakken ur nttaɣlaḍ ara, imi ulac tugna n ugellid-agi Cacnaq. Syin akkin, ad bdun axeddim n usebdad-agi s timmad-is, wagi si tama, ma si tama-nniḍen, d aheggi n umḍiq ideg ara yettwassbed. Nebɣa ad t-nesbed deg tlemmast n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, nesumer-d yakan yiwen umḍiq n unekcum ɣer temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Yetturaǧu, ad nessiweḍ ad nelli asebdad-agi i lmend n yennayer 2970 (2020), acu kan, nessaram ur d-nettmaggar ara aṭas n wuguren deg ubrid-nneɣ. Nebɣa ad yili usebdad-agi s unedrez (bronze), i d aɣ-iḥettmen ad t-id-nexdem di Blida.

  Ansi i d awen-id-tusa tikti n lebni-ines u d acu i d yiswi-nwen deffir waya ? 
 Tikti n lebni n usebdad-agi n Cacnaq, tusa-aɣ-d asmi nesfugel yennayer iɛeddan (2969). Nemsefham s yiɛeggalen n Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i wakken ad nerr azal i tmagit-nneɣ d umezruy-nneɣ. Yerna, Cacnaq, d yiwen i yuran isem-is s yisekkilen n wureɣ deg umezruy n Tefriqt n Ugafa. Nekni nwala belli deg umaḍal merra ulac tama i d as-yerran tajmilt i urgaz-agi n umezruy, akken i tt-yuklal. Lebni n usebdad-agi, ad yili si tama d tajmilt meqqren, ma si tama-nniḍen, d tuɣalin ɣer yiẓuran-nneɣ d tmagit-nneɣ. I wakken, daɣen tasuta-agi tamirant neɣ tid i d-iteddun ad issinent amezruy-nsent. Aseqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya, yessaram s usebdad-agi ad as-yerr tajmilt i ugellid Cacnaq, imi d lwaǧeb fell-aɣ waya.

  Ma yella wamek, ara aɣ-d-tefkeḍ taḥawact n wahil-ik, mbeɛd ugar n useggas d uzgen segmi telliḍ ɣef uqerru n Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu ? 
 Mačči d ayen isehlen ad d-nefk taḥawact n useggas d uzgen, maca ad neɛreḍ ad d-nemmeslay ɣef yisenfaen imeqqranen. Aṭas n lecɣal i yettwaxdamen deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, annect-agi yusa-d s uxeddim amcarek gar Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya d yiselwayen n tɣiwanin akked yimezdaɣ-nneɣ diɣen. Mi d-nusa, nufa-d lwilya n Tizi Uzzu tesɛa agellel (retard) d ameqqran deg unegmu, ladɣa deg wayen yerzan tadamsa d tmettit. Nekeni deg wahil-nneɣ, nefka azal d ameqqran i wannect-a, i wakken lwilaya-nneɣ ad tecbu tiyaḍ. Nebda s tisedduyin d tdeblin iwulmen, nesnerna aḥric n temguri (industrie) d wayen-nniḍen. Ad d-kemmleɣ deg yisenfaren yebdan yakan i nekemmel nekni gar-asen: Asenfar n unnar n 50 000 n yimukan n Boukhalfa, swayes i d-tesfaydi lwilaya-nneɣ, i yesɛan azal meqqren deg unegmu deg lwilya n Tizi Uzzu. Asenfar wis sin, d abrid ameqqran ara yeqqnen gar temdint n Tizi Uzzu ɣer ubrid Asammar-Amalu. Abrid-agi yettwaxdamen, amur txeddem lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, imuhal-is imeqqranen kfan. Qqimen-d kan sin n yixenduqen, imi i d-nemmugger uguren di lebni-nsen. Iqqim-d diɣ amur-nniḍen d lwilaya n Tubiret i t-ixeddmen. Yella diɣ usenfar n ubaraǧ n Souk N’tlata, anda lḥan aṭas lecɣal n lebni-ines, d ayen ara yessifsusen taɛekkumt n uɣbel n waman n tissit. Nesɛa diɣ asenfar n usiwweḍ s ttawil n tilifirik, anda nessaweḍ ad nfak aḥric amenzu n usenfar-agi, yeqqnen akka tura gar temdint n Tizi Uzzu alamma taɣrest n Bouhinoun. Ɣer tama n yisenfaren-agi, yecban aɛiwed d useggem n uḥric n tmerrit d yisensuyen, imi tuget deg-sen ilaq ad ttuɛawden, maca imi llan kra n yisensa ideg ur ddin ara lecɣal akken iwata neɣ ɛad ur bdin ara maḍi, yegla-d s wugur-nniḍen n lexṣaṣ n yimukan n lembat n medden. Ula deg uḥric n lebni, aṭas i nuẓa ɣer sdat, ama deg wayen yeɛnan AADL, ama deg tnezduɣin timettiyin neɣ deg tmezduɣin LSP. Ad d-rnuɣ ad d-fkeɣ taḥawact n uḥric n waddal d yilmeẓyen, imi segmi i d-nusa nessaweḍ ɣer 49 n yinurar n wurar, iwumi nefka ussan iɛeddan tadrimt, i d aɣ-d-isqamen s 94 n yimelyaren. Nerna azal n 80 n yimelyaren i 10 n yinurar i yettwajerden yakan i wakken ad ttwaṣegmen sya ɣer sdat. Am wakken diɣ i nefka 89 n yimelyaren i wakken ad d-neɣrem tixessarin swayes i d-tegla ccetwa-nni iɛeddan ladɣa di Tegzirt d tamiwin i tt-iqerben. Nesebɣes diɣ aḥric n usefti di tfellaḥt, dɣa nessaweḍ ɣer umḍiq amenzu deg wakal aɣelnaw deg usafar n uyefki, dayen i d aɣ-yesferḥen aṭas. Ula d lɣella n zzit uzemmur d tbexsisin akked tamemt, yettkemmil usefti deg-sent, i wakken ad nessiweḍ ɣer lebɣi-nneɣ. Yettban-d wannect-agi, deg usebɣes n tddukkliwin d ssrabes n tfellaḥt, i iqeddcen deg lɣellat-agi. Rnu ɣur-s, ddeqs n yisenfaren-nniḍen yettwaxdamen di lwilaya-nneɣ ɣer tama n leqdic n yal ass. 

  Gar yisenfaren imaynuten i d-tewwim, d tukci n tedrimt i tɣiwanin i wakken ad snernit aseqdec n tutlayt tamaziɣt. Awal ɣef wannect-a ? 
  Nekni s yiɛeggalen n Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya, negzem-itt di rray deg temsalt-agi n useqdec d usnerni n tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Imi segmi tuɣal tmaziɣt d tutlayt taɣelnawt tunṣibt, nezwer s usemres-ines deg Useqqamu-a. D nekni i d Aseqqamu amenzu i yuran tilwiḥin yakk yellan daxel n Useqqamu-agi-nneɣ s tmaziɣt, am wakken daɣen i d-nesuzur yis-s ayen nxeddem. I wakken ad taf amkan i d as-ilaqen, ilaq ɣef tsedduyin d yimḍebbren d yimezdaɣ, ad yexdem ayen zemren, yal yiwen di taɣult-is i lmend n userni n tutlayt-agi-nneɣ. I lmend n waya, Aseqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yefka tadrimt n 40 n yimelyunen i yal taɣiwant, i wakken ad taru tilwiḥin n tnilwin s tmaziɣt. Am wakken diɣ, i d-neslul arraz n tɣiwant ara yesqedcen tamaziɣt ugar deg wakal-is, yetturaǧu ad yettwafraq deg tmeɣra n usfuggel n yennayer 2070. Arraz-agi, deg tezrigt-is tamezwarut, ad iḥaz aṭas n yiḥricen, yezmer ad yili n twennaḍ, yezmer ad yili d tedbelt neɣ ama deg useddu n tɣiwant n yal ass. Taseqqamut n yidles n Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilaya s tallelt n Ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt n tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri, ṭṭafaren axeddimen-agi. Ma d iswi-nneɣ deffir waya, d axlaq n temḥezwert gar 67 n tɣiwanin-nneɣ ɣer tama n usnerni n tutlayt tamaziɣt di tmetti. Nessarem ad d-yawi warraz-agi ayen yelhan i lwilaya-nneɣ, am wakken i t-yewwi warraz n Aissat Rabah n tezdeg deg uḥric n useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt.

  Dɣa, ma tzemmreḍ ad aɣ-tefkeḍ taḥawact n tezrigt-agi tis sebɛa n temsizzelt Aissat Rabah n tezdeg ? 
 Mbeɛd mi tessuli tallit tamezwarut n ujerred akked tis snat n ujerred n tudrin yebɣan ad ttekkint deg tezrigt tis sebɛa n temsizzelt n tezdeg Aïssat Rabah, yessulin ussan-agi kan deffir-nneɣ, ugar n 70 n tuddar i ijerden iman-nsen i tezrigt-agi tamaynut. Ulamma, yenqqes s waṭas wuṭṭun-agi ɣef useggas iɛeddan, i yewwḍen ɣer 102 n tuddar, maca nessaram ad tili xir n tezrigt iɛeddan. Syin akkin deg wussan i d-iteddun, ad tebdu Tesmilt yettwakelfen s twennaḍt d tezdeg akked tdawsa deg Useqqamu-a tuffɣiwin-is ɣer tuddar yettekkan deg tezrigt-agi i usenqeḍ-nsent. Nessaram ad nessiweḍ, ad d-nefk arrazen-agi, i lmend n usmekti n umulli n tmenɣiwt n Aissat Rabah, ass n 12 tuber i d-iteddun. Ma deg wayen yerzan amaynut n tezrigt-agi tamaynut, neslul-d timḥezwert “Best off” n tezdeg, ara d-yilin gar 6 n tuddar i d-yufraren deg seddiset n tezrigin timenza. Ma d iswi-ines d asebɣes n ukemmel n usizdeg n tuddar-agi, imi nekni nettḥettim ɣef tuddar i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt-agi. Ma d arraz yettuɛeggnen i temḥezwert-agi, mazal ur d-iban ara wazal-is u yerna ur iban ara ma ala taddart tamenzut neɣ snat-nni timenza ara d-yufraren iwumi ara nmudd arraz. Ɣer tama n waṭas n yilugan-nniḍen d usishel n ujerred.

  Annar amaynut n terbaɛt n JSK, yeṭṭili-d ur d-ikeccem… 
 Annar-agi mačči kan n terbaɛt n JSK, d annar akk i terbuyaɛ n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, maca tarbaɛt n JSK iban belli deg-s ara tetturar. Ilaq ad nekfu deg-s axeddim di tallit iqerben, imi neḥwaǧ mliḥ agerraw anaddal n 50 000 n yimukan. Imi d ayen ara d yawin lfayda ama si tama n tdamsa ama si tama n usnerni n waddalen di lwilaya-nneɣ. Ahat annar n ddabex, ad ifak sya ɣer taggara n useggas-agi n 2019, imi ur yeqqim ara aṭas deg-s, mazal kan tuẓẓut n leḥcic (gazon) d tririt n ugeryaj. Ma d agerraw s timmad-is, wissen ma ad ifak sya ar amseddis amenzu n useggas n 2020. Ilaq ad tɛelmem belli asenfar-agi yeḥbes imi txuṣ tedrimt, imi am wakken teẓram tikebbaniyin-agi ixedmen deg-s xeddment s usebru, syin ad ttwaxlaṣent, maca annect-agi yettɛeṭṭil, dayen i d-yeglan s uḥbas n uxeddim deg-s.

  Awal-ik n taggara… 
 Deg wawal-iw n taggara, ad awen-iniɣ tanemmirt-nwen s tussda imi tefkam azal i uxeddim i ixeddem Useqqamu Aɣerfan n Lwilya n Tizi Uzzu. Tanemmirt-nwen daɣen, imi tettekkam s tira-nwen deg uɣmis-agi deg usnerni n tutlayt tamaziɣt, imi diɣ tgam azal i tutlayt-agi s tukci n 4 n yisebtar s tmaziɣt deg uɣmis-nwen. Awi yufan ass-a, iɣmisen akk n tmurt-nneɣ ad fken azal i tmeslayt-agi-nneɣ imi tura ulac win izermren ad d-yaf ssebba, segmi tuɣal d taɣelnawt tunṣibt. Ɣer taggara, ad asen-nini i yimezdaɣ-nneɣ, aql-aɣ yid-wen, nettakkawen-d tameẓẓuɣt ddima, memli i d aɣ-teḥwaǧem nella. 
  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ulamma ala 4 n yiɣallen (ikilumiṭren), i tebɛed taddart n Tmizar n Leɣbar ɣef n Tizi Uzzu, maca ftin deg-s wuguren n yimezdaɣ. Taddart-agi mazal ar ass-a n wussan tettidir iseggasen-agi ineggura lexṣaṣ d ameqqran, deg yiḥricen d yisenfaren yemgarden n tudert tartar, gar-asen: yir liḥala n yiberdan, imḍiqen i yilmeẓyen, aɣbel n waman n tissit, trisiti deg yiberdan…atg. Ssuturen yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi n Tmizar n Leɣbar deg yimḍebbren teεna temsalt, ama d wid n Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan (APC) n Tizi Uzzu ama d wid n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i wakken ad d-rren lwelha-nsen ɣer taddart-agi yenḥafen aṭas si yal tama. Mebεed mi ttidiren akka tura deg tegnatin qessiḥen. Nnan-d yimezdaɣ-is belli taddart-agi si zik tettwaεzel, yerna mazal ar tura tettwaḥqer, acku ulac tadrimt yettwaxeṣsen i yisenfaren n unegmu i lfayda n taddart-agi, ara yessifsusen taεkumt ɣef tudert-nsen. Yenna-aɣ-d yiwen n umezdaɣ : « Taddart-agi akk i d taneggarut deg tɣiwant-a, ma nger tamawt ɣer tuddar-nniḍen n tɣiwant. I wumi annect-agi n tneḥyaf gar tudrin n yiwet n tɣiwant ». Ma d iɣeblan i d-ttmagaren yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi yal ass, ad naf deg tazwara aɣbel n waman n tissit, imi tikwal tteddun-asen-d waman ur nelhi ara deg yiteyyuten-agi iqdimen i mazal, yerna tikwal ur d-ttkafin ara i usuter n yimezdaɣ, yettnarnin yal ass. Cetkayen daɣen, ɣef ukemmel n usuffeɣ n waman n yizuliɣen seg yixxamen-nsen; imi mazal kra n yimezdaɣ ur tt-sɛin ara. Aɣbel-nniḍen i yerwin imezdaɣ-agi d win n yiberdan; imi abrid yeqqnen gar ubrid ameqqran n Tezmalt d win yettawin ɣer umkan iwumi qqaren Imenxan. D adeg anda zedɣent ugar n 20 n twaculin, ttɛeddayen yal ass deg waluḍ d yixmir (aḥlalaḍ) imi cwiṭ-nni n ubrid yellan yeččur d aman. Ayen i d-yernan asḥissef n yimezdaɣ-agi, imi d abrid i ttawin warraw-nsen ɣer uɣerbaz. Yella diɣ lexṣaṣ n teftilin n tafat n yiberdan, d tqenṭyar d tregwa yessuffuɣen aman. Llant tid yettwaxdamen zik, tura ilaq ad ttuεawdent, llant tid i ilaqen ad ttwaxdament, maca mazal ur d-tent-id-εnin ara ar imir-a. D annect-agi akk n yiɣeblan i yerran tudert n twaculin n taddart n Tmizar n Leɣbar, ladɣa amḍiq-agi n Yimenxan, ttidirent deg lḥif d lmeḥna. Ɣef waya, ssuturent deg yimḍebbren, ad d-lhin deg wuguren iceɣben allaɣ-nsen, u ad d-afen tifrat i yiɣeblan-agi s tazzla. Imi ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna yiwen umezdaɣ n tama-agi : « Imḍebbren-agi, hder neɣ qqim, am win yettmeslayen i uɛezzug».

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Ass n lǧemɛa-agi sdat-nneɣ 16 furar 2018, ad tili tmeɣra s temsetla ɣef lmendad n ugrud-agi Salim Ouares, deg tzeqqa n yisihren n Uxxam n yilmeẓyen n taddart n Tezmalt. D tameɣra n tallelt i d-yettwaheggan sɣur tiddukkla timettit-tadelsant akedd talsant “Liberté” s lemɛawna “Tanit imal” n yineḍruyen akked temsetla (solidarité), s lmendad daɣen n Samir Bouakline. Yetturaǧu deg tmeɣra-agi, ad cnun wazal n 8 n yicennayen-agi : Taleb Tahar, Si Lakhal, Arezki Menadi, Siham Hammadi, Moh Arif, Fawzi Bessaoud, Dalila Brahim, Malek Kezoui…atg. Anekcum ɣer tmeɣra-agi, ad d-yili s wazal n 300 DA kan, d azal uzmil (prix syomblique). Ad d-nesmekti belli, imsuddsen-agi xdmen leqdic-a i wakken ad d-jemɛen ayen iwumi zemren n yidrimen i wakken ad ten-fken i ugrud-agi Salim Ouares, i yenḍerren aṭas tineggura-agi. 

   A. A
