 – 1 n tɣenjawt n leḥbaq

  Aheggi 

 Qlut-d lxedra daxel n zzit yeḥman, teẓdem ajelbin s urubut. Daxel n lḥila, sxelḍet akk isufar-nni. Syin terrem-ten daxem n lkuca, ad wwen azal n 30’. Ferqet-t d icfiren s ṭumaṭic yeẓdan akked yiferrawanen n cclaḍa n Ccinwa. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Deg tɣerɣart n usuter, ad naf d akken suturen yinelmaden awenneɛ n waddad n uḥric n usiweḍ asdawan, i d-yeggran deg yir addad.

 Inelmaden n tesdawit n Tamda yetabaɛen ɣer tesdawit n Lmulud Mɛemmeri i izedɣen deg tɣiwanin yemgaraden ( Friḥa, Larebɛa n At Yiraten, Buzeggan, Iɛezzuggen, At Dwala, Buǧiima…atg) n ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu, medlen deg larebɛa iɛeddan, 28 deg unbir 2018, tiwwura n tenmehla n srabes n tesdawit. Aya, yella-d sdat n yir addad n uḥric n usiweḍ asdawan, i iweɛren nezzeh. Rnu ɣef waya, lexsaṣ meqqren n ttawilat n usiweḍ ɣer tɣiwanin n ugerzu n Tizi- Uzzu. Yerkeb-iten lɣiḍ meqqren yinelmaden-a, ayen i ten-yeǧǧan ad medlen tiwwura n tenmehla i d-yelhan s lecɣal n yinelmaden. Tella-d tigawt-a, dɣa, ɣef 8 n tsebḥit deg wuddem n yimḍebren-is. Deg tɣerɣart n usuter, ad naf d akken suturen yinelmaden awenneɛ n waddad n uḥric n usiweḍ asdawan, i d-yeggran deg yir addad. Ɣef wanect-a, yenna-d yiwen deg-sen :’’ ttawilat n usiweḍ yessawaḍen inelmaden ɣer tɣiwanin , ɛyan mliḥ mliḥ, ur sliḥen ara i usiweḍ, ladɣa ɣer tɣiwanin ibeɛden’’. Aɣbel n tacart n ttawilat n usiweḍ, yezmer ad yeglu s ibaxixen meqqren, ama ɣef yinelmaden neɣ ɣef yinehharen n ttawilat-agi. Ayen ikemmlen deg lɣiḍ n yinelmaden d asɛuẓzeg n tmeẓzuɣt n unemhal n lecɣal n tesdawil, ur d yarin ara acḥal aya ɣef wayen ssuturen yinelmaden.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel, 65 n yikilumiṭren ɣer Unẓul-asamar n Bgayet, i d-tennulfa tddukkla tinmettit i yimeɛḍar d yimuḍan idumen « Tiɣri ». Tura azal n 4 n yiseggasen i yezrin, ayen tessaweḍ tga tddukkla-a yessefreḥ ddeqs n yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt-a. Aya acku, si tama tinmettit ladɣa, tewwi-d xilla n ubeddel d ubaɣur i yimdanen iɣef tettnaɣ. Gar yisenfaren-is imeqqranen dɣa, tella tneɣrit tuzzigt i d-teslal deg 2016 i warrac at wasrayen uzzigen i ilemmden deg-s kra n tarrayin d temsirin.

 Ugar n tekci n wadeg d tegnit i kra n yiṭuṭaḥen imuḍan i yettwagin deg uɣerbaz unsib, iselmaden n tneɣrit-a tuzzigt, gar-asen imsujjiyen n tnefsit, sselmaden ayendin d tilufa i yimecṭaḥ-a, rnu ttɛawanen-ten ad d-leqqḍen tamussni. Degmi yelha wahil i xedmen, sendilindi ssawḍen skecmen yiwen n uqcic n wat asrayen uzzigen deg uɣerbaz amagnu anda ara ikemmel taɣuri-s, aseggas-a daɣen yetturaǧu ad tkemmel tneɣrit-a, rnu ad skecmen yiwen n ugrud-nniḍen deg uɣerbaz azayez. Ad d-nerr awellih d akken aṭas n tigawin i d-tettheggi tddukkla « Tiɣri ». Taneggarut-is ussan-a kan, i lmend n wass n tikci n yidammen, thegga-d ahil beddemma, seg 9h00 n tnezzayt armi d 12h00 n wass, i ujmaɛ n yidim. 

 Ɣer uxxam n yilemẓiyen n Ayt Smaɛel, ddeqs n yimdanen i yerzan ad fken cwiṭ seg yidammen-nsen, gar-asen wid yennumen yakan tignatin-a n tikci, d wid iwumi teḍra i tikkelt tamenzut neɣ tis snat. Ɣer taggara ihi, 40 n yisɛeddiyen i d-yellan, s wazal 30 n yimekciyen i yettwajerrden. Tigawt-a, teḍra-d s tallelt n usɣur azayez n udawi n Xerraṭa. Am dima, tga-d tddukkla « Tiɣri » aya deg wahil-is, imi txemmem ɣef yimuḍan d yimejraḥ i yesran i yidammen deg yisbiṭaren.
  M. K. 

  
 yal agdud yesɛa idles, yal agdud yettaǧa-d kra ara t-yessemxalfen ɣef wayeḍ.

 Ma yella nenna-d agdud amaziɣ, deg-s ad d-nader tameṭṭut. Isem-is Tamaziɣt, meɛna ur telli d tilellit, imi si zik yella-d fell-as uzaglu, d ayen i tt-ideggren, ad teṭṭef abrid anda i tessunuɣ, i waakken ad temmeslay s tsussmi kan gar-as d yiman-is, gar-as d uxeddim-is. Gar tarrayin n umeslay n tmeṭṭut tamaziɣt n zik-nni, ad nebder arqam n ticraḍ. D acu-tent ticraḍ ? Iwumi i tent-xeddmen ? Ticraḍ d unnuɣ neɣ d arqam i xeddment tlawin n tmazɣa ɣef tfekka-nsent . D ayen i yellan deg yidles amaziɣ. Aṭas n yizumal i ttarqament tlawin : yal yiwen yesɛa anamek-is ; yal yiwen yessefra-d kra. Amzun akken d izen i tebɣa tmeṭṭut ad d-tazen, imi tuɣal di rrif, dɣa teṭṭef leqdic-a akken ad tessufeɣ ayen i tettḥulfu d wayen i tebɣa. Tettuɣal d tilellit i kra n wakud kan, teqqar-d ayen tebɣa mebla tugdi mebla akukru. Izumal-nni tettarqam ɣef tfekka-is, nettwali-ten daɣen ɣef wallalen i txeddem s talext, ɣef leḥyuḍ n uxxam-is. Mačči kan d aya imi llan daɣen ɣef yiceṭṭiḍen i tẓeṭṭ ama d iɛlawen ama d ayen-nniḍen. Sya ad negzu belli tameṭṭut tamaziɣt, tettarqam ayen akk i d-yezzin ula d tafekka-is . Sɛan tecraḍ azalen-nniḍen, bexlaf-aya, imi llant kra sexdament ticraḍ i udawi ɣef waṭṭanen yemxallafen. Qqaren-t-d kra n temɣarin d akken ticraḍ, sebɛadent tiṭ tamcumt ɣef tin i tent-yesɛan di tfekka-s. Akken daɣen i tent-xeddment i tmeṭṭut iwumi ttmettaten lufanat imi ɛla ḥsab-nsent, ttḥarabent ɣef ugrud-nni. Llant tid i tent-ixeddmen mi ara nnaɣent akked walbaɛd akken mi ara walint ticraḍ-nni, ad d-mmektint ayen i d-asent yexdem. Am wakken, diɣ, llant tid i tent-ixeddmen akken ad icbiḥent. Meɛna nufa-d kra n tlawin tiqbayliyin nnant-d : ‘’Di tallit-nni n tegrawla, xeddment anect-a akken iserdasen irumiyen ur tent-id-ttmuqulen ara’’. Ma d amek i tent-xeddmen, yettili-d akka : di tazwara, ad celḥent amekkan-nni anda bɣant ad reqqment, syin ad as-sɛeddint ibawen izegzawen, acku sɛan tiɣmi. Llant tiyaḍ, sexdament bufsus , syin ad ḥukkent nnila. Ma dayen i d-segzayen yizumal-a, ad d-naf yal yiwen s unamek-is : llan wid i d-yessegzayen axxam, tudert, tilelli, tamurt, tazemmurt…atg. Ticraḍ d ayen i yellan uqbel ad yaweḍ lislam ɣer Tefriqt ugafa .

  Yamani Souhila 

  
 Seld ayendin d asuter d uraǧu, teddun yilemẓiyen n tɣiwant n Tsexriwt, 60 n yikilumitren ɣer Unẓul-asamar n Bgayet, ad tthennin si taluft n unnar-nsen aɣiwan n Lberj n Mira ur nelli ar tura akken i t-ssaramen. 

 Aṭas-aya nutni suturen abeɛda ad as-temmag lqaɛa n ugazun akken ad ḍemnen kra n tɣellist i yiman-nsen, imi walan ɛeṭṭlen ayendin akk yimdebbren iɛeddan seg tɣiwant ur d-lhin d waya ulamma d aqbur nezzeh unnar. Ɣef usentel-a, am wakken i t-id-newwi yakan deg Uɣmis n Yimaziɣen, llan heggan yilemẓiyen n taddart-a ula d yiwen n uberriḥ d ameqqran ideg i d-cektayen ɣef uɣilif-nsen. Si tama-nniḍen, gar wayen ṭṭalaben daɣen yinaddalen n tɣiwant-a ɣef wayen yerzan annar-a, d lebni n yimeḍqan n yiɣimi i yimnezzhen akked usbedd n texxamin n usuccef d ubeddel n tmelsiwt. 

 Dɣa, deg tirza-ines yezrin deg duǧember, iger lwali n Bgayet tamawt i txessast-a, yerra i tiɣri n yilemẓiyen-a. Aya, mi yessuter deg unemhal n yilemẓiyen d waddalen n Bgayet ad yesseqleɛ s tazzla ulɣu n tiɣri i tikci n usenfar-a i yerzan taduli n unnar n Lberj n Mira s ugazun. Ugar n waya, ɣef wawal n teɣbalut-nneɣ, yesseḥres lwali ɣef beddu n yiqeddicen deg wussan-a akken ad afen iman-nsen deg taɣult-a yilemẓiyen n temnaḍt-nni, rnu yessuter deg uselway n tɣiwant n Tsexriwt, Mass Maǧid Buǧiṭ, ad as-d-iheggi taferrawt tatiknikt ideg ara d-ddun akk lecɣal iwumi yesra unnar-a aɣiwan, am ureqqeɛ n tseddarin n yimferrǧen akked texxamin n ubeddel n tmelsiwt. 

 Akka tura, ttraǧun kan yilemẓiyen n temnaḍt-a, ad yettwasemres kullec deg unnar akken ur yettɣimi wawal d amiru (lweɛd) ideg ɛyan yakan, imi beggnen-d aya aṭas n tikkal deg tigawin merra i gan deg wayen iɛeddan. 

<p style="text-align:right"> M. K. 

  
 Deg ukemmel n leqdic n tddukkliwin tidelsanin deg waɣir n Wehran, tiddukkla Imeɣri amecṭuḥ (Le petit lecteur), tqeddec war aḥbas. Dɣa deg yimalas-a, d taẓrigt tis kraḍet n tfaska n tmucuha i d-yezzin, akken i tennum tettheggi-tt-id yal aseggas. 

 Yella-d leqdic ɣef teɣzi n ukkuẓ n wussan, seg wass n sed 22 ar aram 25 yunyu 2019. Ass-nni n ssebt i yebda leqdic seg Uxxam n tddukkla Numidya i yekkin s tallelt. 

 Dɣa yesnubget-d uɛeggal n tddukkla-a, anmazul n uselway, Mass Akli Weɛmara d snat n tlawin, Massa Paule Latore seg tmurt n Fransa, d Naɛima Mehailia seg Lezzayer, i d-yulsen timucuha s tefransist d taɛrabt. Ma d Akli seg tama-s, yessawel-d s teqbaylit tamacahut “Aɛudiw n baba merǧan”, i d-yewwin ɣef userdun n ugellid d tlata yessi-s d warraw-nsent, d temsizzelt i asen-yexdem, d wanwa iwumi ara d-yeǧǧ aserdun. S usmuzget s tmeẓẓuɣt n warrac imecṭaḥ i d-wwin yimawlan-nsen, arrac-a ḍefren tasiwelt n tmucuha s tumert. 

 Asmi tekfa tsiwelt n tmucuha, tella-d tegnit n usenɛet n leqdic n kra seg yiɛeggalen n tddukkla i iqeddcen di tsusmi. D timucuha i d-yeffɣen d idlisen s wunuɣen yehhuskin d yiwen uḍebsi ussid i d-yeddan daxel i tmesliwt, am tmacahut “Tuɛwijt n yiḍarren, taxerrabt n lewḥuc”. Leqdic-a, sɛeddan-t-id deg tiliẓri tameqqrant i iɛellqen deg wammas n tzeqqa. 

 D tagnit ladɣa i warrac-a akken ad ṭṭfen di teqbaylit-nsen, daɣen d asekfel n leqdic n tddukkla sɣur snat n tnebgiwin i d-yerzan s lferḥ. Ar taggara, nesteqsa imsuddes n tedwilt Akli, yenna-aɣ-d: “Tamacahut d yiwet n tarrayt n usedhu d uselmed d urebbi n yimecṭaḥ, anida ula deg tmura yuẓan am Marikan d Lalman, tamacahut teṭṭef adeg s wazal-is deg tmetti. Ɣef waya, yal mi ara tettunefk tegnit, nxeddem-d leqdicat ɣef tmucuha deg tddukkla”. 

 D asmekti kan, imi ur ḥḍiren ara yinelmaden yeqqaren tamaziɣt deg uɣerbaz akken i nnumen deg sin n yiseggasen yezrin, anda i ḥeḍren i teswiɛin-a s tedwast (intention), acku imir-a deg yimuras i ten-yuɣ lḥal. 
  Khaled Achoui. 

  
 Deg wussan-agi iɛeddan, i d-yessuffeɣ Mass Ahcene Mariche yiwen wurar i yal amdan imeẓyanen. Yessazreg-itt-id ɣer tezrigin “Art Plume” n Tizi Rached, yettnuzzu s wazal n 200 DA. Iger-d deg-s, 50 n yisteqsiyen, yal asteqsi s usebter-is weḥd-s, ma d tiririyin-nsen, llant deg usebtar daɣen weḥd-s. D timseɛraq neɣ timsefra i yerra s talɣa n yisteqsiyen, i icudden ɣer yidles-nneɣ. Ttawin-d yisteqsiyen-agi awal ɣef 34 n yiɣersiwen, i yettidiren deg umaḍal ideg nettidir. Tuget deg-sen d wid nettwali yal ass, gar-asen, Ayaziḍ, Azger, Taɣaḍt, Tamcict, Tizizwit…atg. Yal asteqsi, ibeddu s tneflit-agi: “Anwa i d-as-yennan”, syin akkin ad tt-id-yeḍfer usteqsi-nni s ddaw-s kan. Ula d tiwerqin-nni, iɣef ttwarun ccebḥent aṭas imi sɛant rrqem yesɛan assaɣ d tudert n umdan amaziɣ. Tabewaḍt ideg i d-ddant, llant deg-s 51 n tewriqin, yeččuren d tamussni akked sser. D urar ara d-yawin abaɣur i yal win ara t-yesɛun, zemren ad t-uraren sin medden. Yiwen ad isteqsay, dɣa ma yufa-d tiririt rrbeḥ a tafat, ma ulac ad as-yefk winna-nniḍen tiririt iwatan. D urar i yezmer ad yurar umeqqran neɣ umeẓyan, ur yettwaxdam ara kan i usɛeddi n lweqt, maca d win n tmussni d usnerni n tzemmar n umdan. Ad d-nesmekti belli, Mass Ahcene Mariche, ilul ass n 21 deg wayyur n Furar 1967, di taddart n Tala Tulmut i d-yezgan d tɣiwant n Tizi Rached. D aselmad n Tɣarant neɣ Tsengama (la physique) u d aselmad n tesnalkimt (infortatique), yesɣer deg uɣerbaz alemmas (C E M) Metrak Omar, deg tɣiwant n Tizi Rached. Deg uḥric n tẓuri, yeqdec deg waṭas yiḥricen yemgarden n lfen, xas ma yebda s tira n yisefra d tmedyazt u mazal-t deg-s ar ass-a. Maca yurar yakkan deg yisura n tmaziɣt amedya :asaru n « Wardiya n Ṭriz » d usaru « Ineẓra mazal ad nẓer »…atg. D amedyaz diɣ, seg useggas n 1984 imir yesɛa 17 n yiseggasen kan di leɛmer-is. Deg tefsut n 2005, i d-yesuffeɣ ammud n yisefra-ines amezwaru, imir yella yeqqar di tesdawit n  » l’Oregin State  » di tmurt n Marikan. Yeffka-as azwel  » Iḍ Yukin  » neɣ « Les Nuit Volubiles », ideg id-llan 23 n yisefra. Seg yimir ar ass-a, ɣur-s ugar n 14 n wammuden tmedyazt s rrebɛa n tutlayin-agi; tamaziɣt, taɛrabt, tafransist akked teglizit. Gar wayen yura ad d-nebder: Taԑezzult-iw, Iḍ Yukin, Tidderray, Contusions, La Toupie et L’échelle…atg.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 S tallelt n Usɣur azayez n tdawsa n Udekkar i d-thegga tddukkla tadelsant Itri n Yiburayen taẓrigt tis snat n tfaska n yimeqqranen, neɣ n yiwessura n taddart, i yeflen akkin i 100 n yiseggasen di tmeddurt-nsen. Deg sin n wussan n usihar, ayendin d armud i d-yettwaheggan i lfayda n yimezdaɣ n temnaḍt-nni d tid i as-d-yezzin. Imi ass n amhad, ahil yerza tilawin abeɛda, i yettwaɛerḍen ɣer uɛayer ɣef uxenẓir n tebbuct. Ulamma yella ukukru sɣur tlawin seg waṭṭan-a i d-yeḍḥan gar yiɛdawen-nsent imezwura, wanag ddeqs seg-sent i iɛawlen ad gent tigawt-a n useḥbiber d uḥezzeb. Syin akkin, mettwal 16:00 n tmeddit, tella-d temlilit n ddabex n uḍar gar yimuraren iqburen n tɣiwant n Tifra. Ma yella azekka-nni sem, seg 09:00 d tasawent, ttwasersent-d temsikniyin i icudden ɣer udlis akked tinḍi. Armi d 10:00, yella-d usqerdec n wawal ɣef temḍerrit n ddexxan d kra n waṭṭanen, send ad d-yettsuddes usihar-nniḍen i yimuḍan, maca tikkelt-a i uɛayer ɣef waṭṭan n ssker d waddad n yidammen. Ɣef 13:00 n tmeddit, temmug tejmilt i yiwessura n taddart i iḥeḍren ɣef usayes, s tikci n tfelwiyin n yiseɣ. Ad d-nesmekti d akken awessar n tɣiwant n Tifra akka tura yesɛa deg yixef-is tasut (lqern) d sin n yiseggasen. Ɣer taggara, send ad d-taweḍ temdelt n tfaska-a deg teẓrigt-is tis snat, iga ucennay Lwaliya Busaɛad tameɣra n ccna akken yella deg wahil. « Tɛedda deg tegnatin yelhan tejmilt-a i yimɣaren-nneɣ imeqqranen », i aɣ-d-yenna uselway n tddukkla Itri n Yiburayen, Mass Murad Tuwwak. Send ad d-yernu: « Mi d-snulfaɣ tafaska-a, lliɣ d aɛeggal deg Useqqamu aɣiwan n Tifra. Seg yimir-nni, azal n kraḍ n yiseggasen tura, ur d-yelli usuddes n teẓrigt tis snat. Ɣef waya i nemsefham di tddukkla, ad nuɣal ad tt-id-nheggi, ɣas nɛeṭṭel ». 

<p style="text-align:right"> M. K. 

  
 Aḥric wis 2

 Azekka-nni cwiṭ am acemma, a-t-an yewweḍ-d Mḥend uccen, isers iman-is ddaw ttejṛa, yebda la icennu: « Ad i yi-d-tḍeggreḍ yiwen deg warraw-ik, neɣ ad n-ali&amp;gamma,; ad ken-ččeɣ irekelli ». Ihi, isɣi-nni, yerra-as-id : «Ali-d ma tzemreḍ ad d-taliḍ » . Yekker Mḥend uccen yenna-as : « Ay amcum, ad jelbe&amp;gamma,; ad n-aliɣ, ad ken-ččeγ irkelli ». Xas akken yuggad-it, isγi-nni yemekta-d ayen i as-yenna uwtul n lexla , yerra-as-id: « Ali-d ma tzemreḍ ad d-taliḍ. » Iwexxeṛ iman-is ɣer deffir Mḥend uccen, ijelleb, yeɣli-d ɣer lqaεa! Iɛawed abrid wis ssin, ijeleb yeɣli-d ɣer lqaɛa! Yuγal akken iwala isɣi yeṭṭef deg wawal is, yeṭṭef abrid-is iṛuḥ ad isterwes anda-nniḍen. Zrin akken kra n wussan, yuɣal yisɣi-nni amcum yebda yettcedhi arraw-is, yebɣa ad ten-iẓeṛ. Mi d tameddit n wass, yebda ala yettru yeqqar-as: « Wisen amek i teḍṛa d warraw iw, aqli-yi cedhaɣ ad ten-ẓṛeγ! ». Cwiṭ ama acemma, yusa-d uwtul nni n lexla yenna-as: « Acu i ak-yuγen akka diγen a gma isγi, acuγer akka i tettruḍ?». Ihi yerra-as-id yisɣi: « Aqli-yi di yir wukud, cedhaγ arraw-iw, acḥal-aya ur ten-ẓriγ »! Armi i t-iɣaḍ yisγi-nni, yekker yenna-as: « Aha tura ṣfeḍ imeṭṭawen-ik, azekka, ad neddukkel, ad nṛuh γer Mḥend uccen, ad nḥettem fell-as, ad ak-ten-id-yerr! ». Azekka nni, ddukklen, ṭṭefen abrid-nsen, ṛuḥen ad qelben γef Mḥend uccen. Cwiṭ am acemma, walan-t la d-iteddu γur-sen. Yekker uwtul-nni n lexla, yenṭeq ɣer ɣur-s yenna-as: « A Mḥend uccen, yewweḍ-d wakud akken ad as-d-terreḍ arraw-is i yisγi » Dayen tura ad yili lemden tisurtin n ddin! Iwala Mḥend uccen dayen yettwaḥres, yekker yerra-as-id: « A-ten-id la lemden tasuret taneggarut, aset-d azekka, ad asen-teslem! » Isɣi-nni yeǧǧuǧeg-d wudem-is, yecmumeḥ d cituḥ  (…Tettkemmil) 

  Seg tgemmi n teqbaylit 

  
 Ttɛeddayen iseggasen, ttawin udmawen d wayen deg-sen yeḍran, s wayen yelhan d wayen ur nelhi. Maca, isemktiyen ttɣiman, urǧin ad sefḍen seg wallaɣ. Tigawin ur ttmettatent ara, akken i as-yenna Dda Lmulud deg wawal-is “Yella walebɛaḍ ulac-it, yella. Yella walebɛaḍ yella, ulac-it”. Muḥemmed Uharu d yiwen deg-sen, ɣas ulac-it, maca s wayen i d-yeǧǧa d leqdic d yigerrujen yella. Amennuɣ ɣef tumast, mazal nettwali-t, yella u d awezɣi ur yettili ara. 

 Imi d yiwen seg yimeɣnasen imenza i irefden tikti n tmaziɣt d unaḍaḥ fell-as. D yiwen i yumnen s umennuɣ ɣef tutlayt-is, deg yiwet n tallit n ẓẓmik d leḥris, anida i tessaweḍ tsertit n yimir, ad teṭṭef ɣer leḥbus win ara d-ineṭṭqen yiwen n wawal s teqbaylit deg tmanaɣt. Muḥemmed Uharun d yimdukal-is, d wid ur nerri ara aḍar ɣer deffir, kemmlen di leqdic-nsen ɣas s tuffra, acku ẓran ma nuḍḥen nutni, ad d-taweḍ tallit ideg tamaziɣt ad d-teffeɣ ɣer unnar, ad d-tenser seg lebḥer n tatut. Baba-s yeɣli d ameɣras deg tegrawla n Lezzayer aseggas n 1958, ma d yemma-s, temmut deg twaɣit n ubrid, mi d-tuɣal deg tirza ɣur-s si lḥebs n Berwageyya. Ilul Muḥemmed Uharun deg Tefrit, tamnaḍt n Uqbu di Bgayet, ass n 13 yebrir 1944. 

 Akken yekcem ɣer uɣerbaz, yella d anelmad ifazen. Seld tagrawla, deg 1963, yekcem ɣer wammas n tarwa n ccuhada deg temdint n Lɛelma. Aseggass n 1967, yekcem ɣer C.N.E.T n Sidi Ɛic, syin iruḥ ikemmel taɣuri-s di tesnawit n Delles, din i d-yewwi akayad n BAC. Dɣa, teldi-as-d tesdawit n Lezzayer tiwwura. Din i t-id-tekcem tikti n umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt, seld timliliyin akked Mulud Mɛemri, imir dɣa i yebda anadi d usekfel n laṣel. Yessaweḍ ula ad yeg tisuqilin i temsirin n tfizikt, akken ad d-ibeggen belli tamaziɣt tezmer i tussna am nettat am tutlayin-nniḍen. Gar yiseggasen n 1972 d 1975, yesnulfa-d snat n tesɣunin s tmaziɣt i yettwarun s tifinaɣ “Iṭij, Taftilt”. 

 Yekki gar wid isersen lbumbat i tiliẓri taɣelnawt di tlemmast n tmanaɣt ass n, 5 yennayer 1976, akked Smaɛil Meǧber, Lwennas Qasi d Ḥusin Cerradi d wiyaḍ-nniḍen. Ttwaṭṭfen ɣer lḥebs n Tazult (Lambèse). Din i yesɛedda 11 d aseggas, gar ucqerri (agression) n tfekka d wawal. Mbeɛd isuturen n twaculin-nsen d twacult tamagdayt gar yinaẓuren, imyura d yimnadiyen n tallit-nni, yella-d usuffeɣ-nsen si lḥebs ass n, 5 yulyu 1987. Muḥemmed Uharun, ikemmel deg ubrid n tira, dɣa yura ammud n tmedyazt “Abrid n tlelli”.

  Yura daɣen timsirin ɣef tjerrumt n tmaziɣt, u yeɛreḍ ad d-yessuqel leqran ɣer tmaziɣt, d netta i yuran asefru “Monsieur le président” i yecna Meɛtub Lwennas deg yiwet gar tezlatin-is icebḥen. Syin ikemmel amennuɣ deg urebbi n umussu adelsan amaziɣ, yella gar yimsuddsen n temlilit tis snat n MCB deg yulyu 1989 deg Tizi Uzzu. Yemmut Muḥemmud Uharun ass n, 22 maggu 1996, yeǧǧa-d deffir-s tameṭṭut-is d snat n yessi-s. Yemmut akken i d-ilul, di lḥif d lmizirya, maca udem-is ad yeqqim deg umezruy, ma d isem-is ur iseffeḍ ara imi d azamul gar yizumal n umennuɣ ɣef tidet. D natta i d bab n wawal “Ma d aɛebbuḍ i yettarran imdanen deɣlen, nekk aɛebbuḍ-iw ɛemdeɣ ad t-ččareɣ d iẓra”.

  Kh. A. 

  
 Xas xussent tuddar deg waṭas n temsal, meεna llant tɣawsiwin yezmer yiwen ad yeqmec allen-is fell-asent, acu kan llant tiyaḍ d anemgal, imi d awezɣi ad yessusem fell-asent umdan. Amedya, tamsalt n tekliniyin n tarrawt. Atas n medden i yettcektin seg waddad-agi, imi d tudert n tmeṭṭut d mmi-s i teεna taluftt. Di Tdayra n Iɣil Ɛli, imezḍaɣ ikcem-iten lḥir d tteqlaq ɣef waya. D anezgum meqqer ladɣa i tullas i yellan s tadist. Tineggura-a, rnu i leqriḥ d wayen sεeddayent, tekcem-itent-id tugdi ɣef tudert-nsent. Ɣef usentel-a tenna-aɣ-d yiwet n tmeṭṭut: « Ur zriɣ ma yella ad qableɣ tarrawt neɣ d tugdi ɣef mmi i izemren ad yemmet deg ubrid, acku abrid ɣezzif alamma d Aqbu ». Ma d argaz-is seg tama-s yenna-d: «Ulac ula d taklinit tusligt (privée), ɣas ma yella ur lliɣ seg wid yesεan, meεna ɣas ad ten-id-reḍleɣ yidrimen-nni, awi-d ukan ad ttuhenniɣ seg tama n mmi akked tmeṭṭut-iw ». At taddart, yeffeɣ-iten leεqel imi llant deg wakud iεeddan tekliniyin, ma d tura kksen-tent. Yerna yenna-aɣ-d wayeḍ :« Amek akka? nuɣal nteddu ɣer deffir? Tadayṛa n Yiɣil Ɛli i yeggugen azal n 24 n yikilumitṛen ɣef tin n Uqbu, yerna tesεa atas n yimezdaɣ, ulac deg-s ttawilat i tarrawt n tmeṭṭut. Ilaq ad d-afen wid teεna temsalt tifrat i uɣbel-agi ». Ad d-nesmekti d akken aṭas n tuddar i yettidiren ugur-agi, ladɣa imesdurar, am tɣiwant n Tmuqra deg Uqbu, taɣiwant n At Smaεel d waṭas n tiyaḍ.

  K.K. 

  
 Akken qqarenb ‘’Tasdawit mačči kan d amekkkan n tussna, meɛna ilaq ad tili daɣen d aḥric i tẓuri, imi taẓuri d yen icebḥen, d ayen i d-yezzuzuren iḥulfan n umdan ama s ccnawi, s yisefra d wayen yecban anect-a’’. Ihi, tasdawit n Mulud Mɛemmri, tefka-as azal i tẓuri s yiwet n temsizzelt i d-yettuheggan, ussan iɛeddan. Tebda acḥal-aya. Ma d timlilit n taggara, teḍra-d ass n 28 deg furar 2018, tella-d d tajmilt i Lmuld At Mɛemmer imi d asmeki n tmettant-is. 

 Yella-d ɣef uqarru n usiher-a Mass Sliman Belḥaret, anda i d-xeddmen aṭas n tzeɣwa : ccna, isefra, tamezgunt, inaw. Yella-d leqdic deg tzeqqa n yisaragen n tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmri, tasebḥit n wass n larebɛa. Aṭas n yinebgawen i d-yusan ɣer temlilita ama di tesqamut n usenqed ama d wid i d-yerzan kken ad as-rren tajmilt i Lmulud At Mɛemmer. Deg wahil n tsebḥit, ɛeddan-d wid ijerden ɣer tzeqqa n tmedyazt sdat : Mass Kaci Saâdi , anda i d-wwin yinelmaden isefra s yisental yemxallafen yecban tayri, tamagit, tameṭṭut d tfelsafit ( ayen i d-ikecmen d amaynut ɣer tmedyazt n teqbaylit). Syin d tazeqqa n yinawen anda i wwin s tuget yisental ɣef tmeṭṭut. Ma d ahil n tmeddit, yerza tamezgunt. ‘’Leqbayel d inaẓuren n tidet si zik-nsen. Ferḥeɣ s yilmeẓyen-agi imi xedmen leqdic icebḥen’’, d wigi i d imeslyen i d-yenna Mass Said Zanoun i yellan d aɛeggal deg tesqamut n usenqed n yinawen. Akken daɣen i suznen yinelmaden imferǧen s leswat yemxallafen : yal yiwen d acu n ṣṣenf n uẓawan i d-yewwi. Ma nexdem tamawt, ad naf d akken, llant aṭas n teqcicin deg tzeqqa-agi.

  Ayen i d-nnan  

 « Anṣuf yiswen ɣer tedyant-a n taggarra n temsizzelt i d-netthegi acḥal-aya, tagi d tajmilt i umussnaw-nneɣ, deg temsizzelt-a, ad nefren wid iqefzen di yal tazeqqa. Nessaram ad ilin leqdicat yecban-wigi di tesdawit » , wagi d ayen i d-yenna Mass Allich Rachid ( d amaṣwaḍ n tmaziɣt ). Ma yella d Mass Belḥaret yenna-d : « Di tazwara, ugadeɣ ur d-ttasen ara aṭas n yinelmaden, maca akken kan slan s temsizzelt, bdan ajerred. Din i yi-d-tuɣal tarwiḥit. Di tazwara, llan 130 n yinelmaden, syin nefren-d widak ara iɛeddin ass-a. Ad asen-iniɣ tanemmirt-nwen ɣef lwelha-agi i d-trram. Wagi d lebyan d akken inelmaden, ḥwaǧen win ara sen-yeṭṭfen afus, ad asen ixedmen ljehd akken ad sbeynen ayen i snen. Ma yella d timsizzelt, d tajmilt i umussnaw. Ayen i d-yeǧǧa d azamul, tajmilt-is meqqret. Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ, nesɛa zzher imi i t-nesɛa. Lukan ur yelli ara, yezmer tutlayt n tmaziɣt ur tettuɣal ara d tunṣibt. Mulud Mɛemmri, yuklal leqder meqqren. Di taggara, bɣiɣ ad snemreɣ Mass Tessa anemhal n tesdawit i yi-d-ixedmen tabɣest seg wasmi i bdiɣ leqdic di tesdawit , imi yefka-iyi annar anda ara xedmeɣ leqdicat yecban-wigi « . ha-ten-in yigemmaḍ

  Tamedyazt:  1 Kaddour Rabah, 2 Boualem Mouhend Arezki, 3 Haroune Karim 

  Ccna:  1 Fetta Waliti, 2 Chekai Tiziri, 3 Yasmine Taleb. 

  Tamezgunt  : 1 Kermoune Akli, 2 Benbekkou Smail 

  Inaw  : 1 Ibarsyane Jugurtha, 2 Oukid Yasmine

  Yamani Souhila 

  
 Ass n 10 tuber yezrin, ihegga-d lwali amaynut n Bgayet, Mass Ḥmed Maɛbed, yiwet n temlilit akked yimazanen (députés)n twilayt n Bgayet i umeslay ɣef waṭas n tlufa i icudden ɣer tneflit abeɛda, akked yineḍruyen i d-yettnulfun taggara-a. Ula d Mass Mhenni Ḥadadu, aselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan n lwilya, yeḥḍer i ttiɛad n wass-nni. Deg umlaqi-a dɣa, i yekkan qrib ukuẓ (4) n yisragen, yella-d umciwer d umbaddal n tektiwin ɣef wayendin d tilufa i iceɣben aɣerman akked waddad amiran n waɣir n Bgayet. Din ihi, yettwawi-d wawal ɣef ddeqs n yisenfaren iɣef yuzzel wawal imalasen iɛeddan, d wid i urɛad yekfi ccɣel-nsen, neɣ yessutur-d ugdud ad ttwajerrden s uzrab. Ad d-nebder seg-sen abrid amadaf (la pénétrante) ur nettɛeṭṭil ara ad tamed, Sbiṭar n Bgayet, asenfar n tramway, abrid n Ɛecba n Xerraṭa i ṭṭfent snat n tkebbuniyin Taṭurkit-Tazayrit, lgaz agaman deg temnaḍin timesdurar akked usnulfu n tyuga i ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9 d ubrid n tmacint n Bgayet. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, ɣef ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9, yella yura umazan n FFS, Mass Nasir Ɛebdun, i uneɣlaf n yiqeddicen izuyaz, ideg i as-yessuter ad d-yeslal s teɣseb asenfar deg ubrid-nni i yuɣalen d amihi n tidet i yinehharen. Daɣen, deg tɣimit-a i asen-d-yellan, bedren-d yimḍebbren kra n yisental-nniḍen iseg tenṭer Bgayet, am temɛayt n ugzam n yiberdan i yetteɣzifen trennu, lebni berra i usaḍuf, tamsalt n tnezduɣt s umata, tasdawit tamaynut n Amizur, asefti n tedrimt s yisenfaren yemgaraden, tirza n yineɣlafen ɣer Bgayet akked taluft n tezdeg n tɣiwanin d tamiwin i iɛemren s yiguduyen sanda ma terriḍ, deg usamar neɣ deg umalu.

  M. K. 

  
 Newwi-d deg tdiwennit-a awal akked ucennay n tayri n yiḥulfan, Ḥasan Aḥres, ɣef umecwar-is n tẓuri d ccna s umata.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Ma tebɣiḍ ad as-nebdu si tejmilt   i ak-rran di Marikan.   Ḥku-aɣ-d cwiṭ fell-as ? 

  Ḥasan Aḥres :  Di Marikan, cniɣ snat n tikkal i lmend n snat n tirziwin. Abrid amezwaru, deg 2013, mi d-ɛeddaɣ sɣur yimeddukkal n Kanada anda nerra tajmilt i Lwennas Meɛtub, ɛeddaɣ i Marikan, cniɣ di Philadelphia, Boston, New-York, San Francisco. Deg 2015, uɣaleɣ ɣer Marikan. Cniɣ deg kraḍ n yimukan, kfiɣ s temdint n Kulumbis. D Sunya Ayt Ḥmed i d taselwayt n tddukkla-nni. Dinna i yi-rran tajmilt s uḥḍar n BRTV. Ad snemreɣ akk tiddukkliwin-nni iqeddcen. Yal mi ara aɣ-ɛerḍen, nettak-d ayen iwumi nezmer. Ula d lɣaci, ttruḥun-d. Aya yesbeyyin-d tayri, irennu-aɣ-d ifadden. Ttarran-aɣ-d ugar n wayen i asen-nettak.

  Ad d-nuɣal ɣer tezlit n tayri   i tcennuḍ s tayri. Imi nettwali   tikwal aɛuffu deg kra n tezlatin,   am tefyar-nni «Wekkleɣ-am   Sidi Rebbi», neɣ «Buddeɣ-am lmeḥna». Maca kečč   teqqareḍ-as «seḍs-itt»… 

 Tayri d aḥulfu ukyis. Ma tḥemmleḍ amdan, ur ilaq ad t-tḥemmleḍ i keččini kan, maca i netta daɣen. Ad as-tebɣuḍ ad yili di lehna, ad yefreḥ. Ma tḥemmleḍ tameṭṭut, mačči ma ur ak-d-tsaḥ, dayen diri-tt, dayen tkerheḍ-tt. Ma ḥemmleɣ yiwen, ad as-menniɣ ala ayen n lɛali, ad bɣuɣ ad yefreḥ. Akka kan i zemreɣ ad as-d-sbeyyneɣ belli d tidet ḥemmleɣ-t. Yelha ad teqqim tezlit n tayri tesɛa kan ssifa n tayri.

  Ma nebder-d tizlit-nni « A ddunit ḥbes ad rseɣ », i d-yesmektayen tifelseft s uzwel-is. Deg wanti tignatin i tt-txedmeḍ ? 

 Iḍerru-aɣ waya merra deg ddunit. Xedmeɣ tizlit-nni deg yiwet n teswiɛt n leḥzen d layas. Nekk ur xeddmeɣ tizlatin s ukmandi. Deg lawan-nni, walaɣ ddunit am wakken d lkar, ur i yi-tehwi tansa iɣer i yi-yettawi, nniɣ-as: ‘’A ddunit bɣiɣ ad subbeɣ’’.

  Yal yiwen amek yeɣra tizlit-ik tamaynut « Wwt nneḥ ». Ini-aɣ-d ciṭuḥ fell-as ? 

 Zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ, bniɣ tizlit-nni ɣef wayen akk ddreɣ d tirmit deg ddunit. Walaɣ d akken tifrat n tuget n yiɣilifen d nneḥ. Ma yebɣa umdan talwit, ad irewwel seg wanda tella temḍerrit. Qqaren-d mi ara d-yewwet waḍu, anef-as ad iɛeddi. S umata, tessawal tezlit-a i tmussni, degmi ur tt-xdimeɣ ara asmi sɛiɣ 20 n yiseggasen.

  Aql-ik seg wid i as-yettruḥen kra kra, akken ad d-awin amaynut… 

 Yella waya. Bɣiɣ ad d-ssufuɣeɣ ayen ḥulfaɣ, mačči ad ččareɣ kan aḍebsi. Ma ur sɛiɣ ayen iwatan ad t-id-fkeɣ, yif ad serseɣ iman-iw, wala ad kellxeɣ medden. Mi ara d-ssufɣeɣ iseɣrez, tzemreḍ ad iyi-d-tiniḍ ur i yi-yeɛǧib ara, maca ur i yi-d-teqqareḍ ara diri-t.

  Amek tettwaliḍ addad n unaẓur akka tura ? 

 Anaẓur yewwi daɛwessu. Nesḥassef imi ur yettusṭeɛref s tẓuri di tmurt-nneɣ. Di tmura n madden, yesɛa azal unaẓur, ma ɣur-neɣ ay akken tgiḍ mačči akken. Γef waya, i d-qqareɣ amzun yettwadɛa unaẓur. Anaẓur am llazuq, mi deg-s ssker telhiḍ, mi ak-yeffeɣ dayen ad ak-ḍeggren. Ad ak-d-rnuɣ yiwet, ḥala anaẓur i yettmettaten sin n yiberdan. Ad ak-d-iniɣ ayɣer: yettili-d tikwal wanida anaẓur yettaǧǧa-t uzayez-ines, ama kksen-as amekkan wiyeḍ, neɣ yemɣur, neɣ… Dinna d tamettant tamezwarut. Tamettant tis snat d tin yeɛnan medden merra.

   

  Waqila tesnulfaḍ-ḍ teẓrigin   taggara-a ? Meslay-aneɣ-d   cwiṭ ɣef usenfar-a ? 

 D tidet, friɣ-tt d yiman-iw, ad ldiɣ tiẓrigin. Ɛyiɣ seg wuguren i d-ttmagareɣ akken ad d-suffɣeɣ. Rnu kečč ad d-tessufɣeḍ, wiyaḍ ad rebḥen. Ugur-nniḍen, imi tuget n yimaẓragen d imsenza kan, xḍan akk i tẓuri. Yiwen n was, wwiɣ aḍebsi-inu ɣer umaẓrag, yenna-yi-d ha-t-an ulac tizlatin n ccḍeḥ. Armi t-fkiɣ i wayeḍ yessufeɣ-it-id, rnu yelḥa akken ilaq. Aredmani, segmi yella upiraṭi, yimɣur ugar wugur n usiẓreg. Tura amaẓrag yesɛa azref.

  Neẓra terza-k taluft n tmaziɣt. Acu d awal-ik ɣef usenseb-ines ? 

 Akka i d-nnan, ma d tidet. Lḥasul, ayen yeɛnan asenseb-a n tmaziɣt, mačči d taluft n teɣtas neɣ n yimagraden. Aya d taluft n tigawt d usemres deg unnar. Amedya n uselmed-ines, ilaq ad yili d amaran war ameslay. Seg tama-nniḍen, yewwi-d fell-aɣ ad neḥbes deg usuter kan. Ilaq ad nfares, ad nesnerni tafarest (production) deg yal aḥric, acku mačči ḥaca tizlit i yellan.

  Ur nezmir ara ad nfak ameslay war ma nebder-d Meɛtub Lwennas i neẓra yersex deg uqerruy-ik… 

 Qqareɣ-t-id dima, Lwennas segmi yemmut d lɛehd i as-fkiɣ. Yal mi ara aliɣ s asayes, ilaq xersum ad d-awiɣ yiwet seg tezlatin-is. Nekk ɣur-i, akken i as-ttarraɣ tijmilin, akken i t-snemmireɣ. Ula d taluft-a, teqqen i yimenzayen, imi aṭas i llan ur bɣin mi d-smektayeɣ Lwennas. Llan wid i yi-d-yennan, ma tebɣiḍ ad trebḥeḍ ṭṭixxer i Lwennas Meɛtub.

  Yadra tecniḍ tizlatin i telliḍ theggiḍ-d i Kamal Mesɛudi send ad yemmet ? 

 Mazal. Ttraǧuɣ ad afeɣ albaɛḍ i yesɛan taɣect-is, i izemren ad yecnu aɣanib-is, imi d tizlatin d tizedganin. Neɣ ma ulac, yezmer lḥal ad tent-cnuɣ nekkini.

  Ini-aɣ-d kra ɣef umaynut i d-tettheggiḍ  

 Smenyifeɣ ad nemmeslay tura ciṭuḥ fell-as, alamma i d-yeffeɣ. Lḥasun, ad ilint deg-s 10 n tezlatin, ma d tuffɣa-s, aseggas-a ma yebɣa Rebbi.

  Awal-ik n taggara i wid i ak-iḥemmlen… 

 Ad asen-iniɣ tanemmirt mi d-teddam yid-i armi d ass-a. Ma ɣezzif leɛmer, mazal ad tent-id-necnu gar-aneɣ, akken yeqqar Lwennas Meɛtub. 

   Yesteqsa-t M. K. 

  
 Sdat n wanawen n wagguren-agi ineggura i d-yexdem uneɣlaf amezwaru n tmur n Lezzayer, Mass Ahmed Ouyahia i wugdud, ɣef liḥala n tdamsa n tmurt ur nessefraḥ ara, yezdeɣ lxuf imezdaɣ s leɣla n temɛict i seg ara d-yeglu useggas n 2018.

 Dɣa deg taluft yecban tagi, imḍebbren n tmurt n Lezzayer, suffɣen-d aṭas n yisaḍufen d lebḍanat i lmendad n uselḥu n lecɣal n tmurt mgal taluft -agi i iɛeggben akk iḥricen n tdamsa, maca, daɣen, aya dayen d d-yeglun s waṭas n yinelkamen ɣef liḥala n temɛict n ugdud azzayri. Dɣa asaḍuf n tedrimt n 2018, qeblen s tuget yiɛeggalen n Usqamu aɣerfan aɣelnaw (APN), d uneḥbus n waṭas n yisufer ara d-tawi tmurt seg tmura-nniḍen , aya yak ad d-yeglu s tmerna deg waṭas n yisufar n tudert n yal ass, dɣa asaḍuf n tedrimt, ijerred deg yiwen gar imagraden-is, timerna deg leswami n yisufar n trisiti, lgaz, aman, lmazut d lissens, ayen ara d-yeglun s tmerna deg leswami n yeḥricen-nniḍen n tdamsa. Sdat n liḥala-agi, imezdaɣ n Tiz-Uzzu, yezedɣ-iten lxuf meqqren ɣef leɣla n temɛict swayeg ara d-yeglu useggas amaynut 2018, dɣa deg wussen-agi, bdant swami n yisufar s tmerna, aya yeɛna dɣa isufar n lxedra yeqquren : laɛdes, lubyan, lḥemmes d waṭas-nniḍen.  »Yiwet n liḥala ur nesefraḥ ara akk imdanen, imi yal mi ara ibeddel useggas, igduden n tmura n umaḍal ferḥen s useggas ajdid, ma d nekni nḥezzen s yal aseggas ajdid s sebba n yir liḥala n uselḥu n lecɣal n lmurt » Dayen i seg yesḥisef yiwen umezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Buzeggan. Deg liḥala yecban tagi ur nessefraḥ ara akk , aṭas n yilmeẓyen , bɣan ad ruḥen ɣer tmura-nniḍen anda i nwan ad afen ayen i bɣan.

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Aḥric 1u

  Amacahu… 

 Yiwen wass, iteddu Mḥend uccen d ubrid-is, yesterwis deg teẓgi d acu ara yaf ad t-yečč. Cwiṭ am acemma, iwala yiwen yesɣi d warraw-is deg lɛec-nsen, yersen ɣef yixef n ṭṭejṛa. Ihi yerfed aqerru-is, yenna-as i yesγi-nni: « Ad i yi-d-tḍeggreḍ yiwen deg warraw-ik, neɣ ad n-aliɣ ad aken-ččeɣ irkleli. Isɣi-nni, yebda yettergigi : yuggad ɣef warraw-is, maca yegguma ad as-yaɣ awal. Ihi Mḥend uccen, yerra iman-is yerfa, iɛawed yenna-as: « Ay amcum, ad i yi-d-tḍeggereḍ yiwen deg warraw-ik, neɣ ad n-aliɣ, ad aken-ččeɣ akken ma tellam». Ihi yuggad yisɣi-nni γef warraw-is, dɣa iḍegger-as-d yiwen deg-sen. Mi i t-id-yeṭṭef, yerfed-it, yenna-as i yisɣi-nni : « Ur taggad, ad t-awiɣ kan akken ad as-slemdeɣ tiṣurtin n ddin ineslem akked taɛrabt. Azekka-nni, ha-t-an yuɣal-d. Yeqqim ddaw n ṭṭejra yenna-as i yisɣi nni : « Ad i yi-d-tḍeggreḍ yiwen deg warraw-ik, neγ ad n-ali&amp;gamma,; ad aken-ččeγ irkelli ». Xas akken yuggad-it, maca yumen-it, dγa iḍegger-as-d yiwen deg warraw-is. Akken yal abrid mi ara d-yas Mḥend uccen ad as-d-iḍeggeṛ yiwen deg warraw-is, armi i as-d-yeqqim yiwen d aneggaru. Akken d tameddit n wass, yebda yettru, la yettlumu deg yiman-is, yeqqar:

 « I tura, amek ara xedmeɣ, azekka ad d-yuɣal Mḥend uccen ad aɣ-yečč irkelli». Cwiṭ am acemma, ha-t-an iεedda-d uwtul n lexla. Akken i t-iwala yettru, yekker yenna-as: « D acu akka i ak-yuɣen a gma isγi, ayen tettruḍ? Isɣi, yeḥka-as-id ayen yeḍran yid s, awtul-nni n lexla imuqel-it yenna-as: « Ay aɛeggun, ay ungif, ikkelex-ik ! Anda akka i teẓriḍ uccen yettalin γef ṭṭejṛa ! Aha tura, sfeḍ imeṭṭawen-ik, ad ak-wessiγ d acu ara as-tiniḍ, azekka mi ara d-yuγal ». Azekka mi ara ak-d-yini « deggeṛ-iyi-d yiwen deg warraw ik, neɣ ad n-aliɣ ad aken-ččeɣ akken ma tellam ! Ini-as: Ali-d ma tzemreḍ ad d-taliḍ . Maca, ṭṭef kan deg wawal-ik.γur-k ad tuggadeḍ » …Tettkemmil 

  Seg tgemmi n teqbaylit 

  
 Yella yiwen n ufellaḥ, ala tamussni i d rras lmal-is, maca nnif d lḥerma d agerruj iγef yesseḥbibir nezzeh. Ihi yiwen n wass, yennuγ d tmeṭṭut-is armi i t-tluqeb, tenna-as: « Lukan sεiγ zzher, nekk seg uxxam n wid yeγṛan, ur ttaγeγ ara afellaḥ leεmer nekcim aγerbaz. Atmaten-iw d At leqlam γef umeẓẓuγ ». Afellaḥ, mi yesla i lehduṛ-agi, yettwajreḥ, acku yeẓra sani i yerran. Dɣa , yenna-yas: « Ihi imi ttwaḥeqqṛeγ akk, ad truḥed tura γer uxxam-nwen, ad ten-testeqsiḍ γef wayen akk ad awen-iniγ. Ma ur d-tewwiḍ ara tiririt iseḥḥan ; ad tuγaleḍ, acku win yeγran mačči d nekkini. Tenna-as: « Bbuh ! Ur yelli usteqsi iwumi ur sεin watmaten-iw tiririt ». Yenna-as: « Ini-asen acu i yerẓagen deg ddunit ? D acu i iẓiḍen di ddunit? ». Tenna-as: « Ah d aya ! tura ara ruḥeγ ». Yuɣ lḥal mmi-tsen la issel i wayen iḍeṛṛun. Yeḥsa yemma-s ur d-tettawi tiririt ilaqen, yessen baba-s d bu lemεun, xwal-is d At-zzux n baṭel. Yuggad γef yemma-s, yeffeγ si ṭṭaq n teεrict, yezwar s abrid, ad iqabel yemma-s. Yemlal yid-s mi tleḥḥu, yenna-as: « Yemma tewwiḍ-d tiririt? ». Tenna-as: « Meεlum ». Yenna-as: « Acu-tt? ». Tenna-as: « I iẓiḍen d tament, i yerẓagen d qeḍṛan ». Dγa, yewwet anyir-is, yenna-as: « Acu i yi-yeğğan zwareγ-am-d s abrid ». Tenna-as: « Ayγer? ». Ynna-as: « Lemmer ad isel i tiririt-a, ad am-yebḍu aqerru. Ma tebγiḍ, ad tkemmleḍ ussan-im yid-ne&amp;gamma,; ini-as terẓeg d ccer, tiẓedt d lxir. Yuγal mi tewweḍ s axxam, yenna-as urgaz-is: « Amek ihi? » ? Tenna-as: « Ad ak-qaṛṛen i yerẓagen d ccer, i iẓiden d lxir. Argaz mi yesla i tririt yuzzel srid ɣer tγurfet, yufa-n mmi-s ulac-it. Yefhem tamsalt, iruḥ-d s azniq yaf mmi-s di beṛṛa, yenna-as: « Imi tselkeḍ wiyaḍ, sellek tura iman-ik. Baba-s: « Acu i iγelben times? ». Mmi-s: « D aman ». Baba-s: « Acu i iγelben aman? ». Mmi-s: « D asawen ». Baba-s: « D acu i iγelben asawen? Mmi-s: « D aɛidiw ». Baba-s: « D acu i iγelben aɛidiw? » Mmi-s: « D argaz ». Baba-s: « D acu i iγelben argaz? » Mmi-s: « D tameṭṭut ».

  Yahia Yanes 

  
 Aṭas n wawal d umeslay i d-ssegrant tmesbaniyin d unḥerrak i d-yettilin taggara-a deg wakal n tmurt. Tuffɣa n ugdud ɣer ubrid akken ad d-yini berka, ala i leḥkem amesbaṭli i inehren tamurt ɣer usyax 20 n yiseggasen-aya, teǧǧa iɣmisen, tiliẓriyin tuzzigin neɣ tigraɣlanin n tmura n berra, ad ḍefrent s lqerb tidyanin-a, segmi bdant ass n 22 furar 2019. Aneɣmas, amyaru Youcef Zirem, yuɣal 57 n yiseggasen ɣer deffir, yuɣal ɣer useggas n timmunent 1962, s udlis-is i d-yessuffeɣ ussan-a kan deg tmurt n Fransa, win iwumi yefka asentel “La Cinquième mascarade”. D adlis i d-yewwin awal ɣef waddad aserti d tudert tinmettit yeǧǧan ukkuẓ n yilmeẓyen ad ssirmen abeddel ɣer wayen yelhan, ɣer tlelli, ɣer yiseɣ, ɣer teɣdemt tinmettit u ɣer tayri yettwagedlen s tmuɣli-nniḍen. Maca ilmeẓyen-a, ɛerḍen ad ḍefren abrid n tidet, ɣas ma yella ttemlilen-d iɛewwiqen. Mass Youcef Zirem, yeglem-d tudert n Sabrina, Farid, Malika d Xaled yettidiren di lmizirya d teqṣeḥ ugar n 40 n yiseggasen-aya. Ameskar yessegra-d s uzbu n yilmeẓyen-a i mazal ssaramen tafat, ṭṭfen deg tikli ar sdat. Ungal-a s umata, yewwi-d ɣef yiwet n tallit n umezruy iɣef d-tɛedda tmurt seg 9 cutember 1962 ar tazwara n useggas n 2019. Ameskar n udlis Youcef Zirem, d amyaru, d amedyaz, d aneggal u d aneɣmas azzayri, ilul ass n 16 ɣuct 1964 deg Ukeffadu. Yettaru s tutlayt tafransist, yettidir deg tmurt n Fransa. Yekcem s annar n tira seg useggas n 1995. Gar yidlisen i yura : La Vie est un grand mensonge (1995), Le Chemin de l’éternité (2009), Le Semeur d’amour (2012), La Porte de la mer (2016), Matoub Lounès la fin tragique d’un poète (2018)…atg.
  Khaled Achoui  

  
 Zedek Mulud seg yinaẓuren-nni i yeddmen s wudem ifazzen tizlit taqbaylit. Nemlal-it i lmend n tejmilt i yuɣalen i Lwennas MeƐtub, deg unnar aɣurbiz n Bgayet, yeqbel ad d-yerr ɣef yisteqsiyen-nneɣ. 

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Awal ɣef tejmilt-a i yuɣalen i Lwennas MeƐtub ideg aql-ik d inebgi n yiseɣ… 
 Zedek Mulud : Lwennas yuklal ugar n tejmilt. A win yufan, yal tikkelt ad d-ttilint temliliyin yecban ta. Lwennas d yiwen n urgaz i yennuɣen ɣef teqbaylit d yidles, d unadi n tidet. Nusa-d ass-a ad as-nerr tajmilt am wakken yella da gar-aneɣ.

  Nezmer ad d-nini aql-ik deg ubrid-is, imi ula d medden llan ḥemmlen ad ak-ssiwilen « MeƐtub wis sin »… 
 Amek ara ak-d-iniɣ… Lwennas d Lwennas. D tidet tecrek-aɣ teqbaylit d umennuɣ ɣef tmagit, wamma ulac win izemren ad yili d wayeḍ. Lwennas yexdem akk tazmert-is, tura yeǧǧa-d isem-is. Ssarameɣ wigad ara d-yekkren deffir, ad kemmlen i umennuɣ. Akka kan i tezmer ad tili. D tidet ixuss gar-aneɣ, maca akken neqqar, win uɣur i d-teggra ad tt-yessiweḍ. Ahat ad d-yas wass ideg ara d-yeḍru yiswi iɣef nnuɣen yimeɣnasen n teqbaylit.

  Mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut ara tecnuḍ di Bgayet ? 
 Mačči d tikkelt tamezwarut maca aṭas-aya ur cniɣ da. Tikkelt taneggarut segmi cniɣ deg temdint n Bgayet, deg unnar-a waqila, tettuɣal ahat ɣer 2002.

  D acu d sebba n waya ? 
 Akken teẓriḍ, di tmurt-nneɣ, d awanek i yesselḥayen tilufa n yidles. D asḥissef! Ur ttaǧǧan imdanen ad qedcen.Ttmagaren-d iɛewwiqen. Yal tikkelt tlaq tsiregt…

  Ɣer taggara, tettwasaẓ tuffɣa n walbum-ik amaynut… 
 D tidet. Nezmer ad d-nini tura yewjed walbum. Mazal kan kra n lecɣal ineggura. Ad d-yeffeɣ deg wayyur-a n yulyu, neɣ deg ɣuct ma iɛeṭṭel. Lḥasul, deg unebdu-a.

  Meslay-aɣ-d akka cwiṭ fell-as ? 
 Ad yesɛu walbum-a 14 n tezlatin. Ad ilint deg-s, am dima, tezlatin n umennuɣ, akked tiyaḍ. Amennuɣ yella deg-neɣ. Ad d-teddu deg-s tejmilt i Si Lḥafiḍ.

  Awal-ik ɣef warraz n tezlit tamḥaddit i ak-d-tefka tddukkla taqbaylit n Lyon s yifassen n Nadiya MeƐtub, taǧǧalt n uɣewwaɣ? 
 D ayen i yi-d-irennun afud akken ad kemmleɣ deg ubrid-iw n ccna. Rnu heggan-t-id d tamuffirt. Ur bniɣ ara ɣef tigawt-nni. D ayen i yi-yesferḥen, abeɛda imi d Nadiya i yi-t-id-imudden. Aya, si tama, d asṭeɛref s wayen xeddmeɣ. Ad ten-snemmreɣ aṭas aṭas.

  Kra n wayyuren kan i d-yeqqimen i Zénith-ik amezwaru. Anda yewweḍ uheggi ? 
 Aql-aɣ tura nettheggi i usihar-a. D ayen ara igerrzen, imi aṭas i yuɣen yakan imukan-nsen. Dɣa, i Zénith-iw amezwaru, ssarameɣ ad igerrez akken ad ferḥeɣ, ad ferḥen medden, ad tefreḥ teqbaylit.
  Yesteqsa-t M. K. 

  
 Ass-nni n lḥed yezrin, 24/12/2017, i d-bannen yigemmaḍ ineggura n temlilit tis 11 n tfaska taɣelnawt n tmedyazt n Ṣummam, i d-tettheggi yal aseggas tddukkla tadelsant Itri adelsan n Uqbu.

 Tazrigt n useggas-agi, tella-d seg 21 alamma d 24 deg duğamber 2017, deg Uxxam n yilmeẓyen Abderrhman Fares n Uqbu, deg lwilaya n Bgayet. Timlilit-agi, gan-tt d tajmilt i sin n yimedyazen meqqren, Ḥmed Laḥlu, i yellan deffir n tlallit n tfaska-agi deg useggas n 2005, d Mass Murad Raḥman, d netta i d-yufraren deg tezrigt tamezwarut n tafaska-a, i d-yellan deg 15 duǧamber 2005 d tajmilt i umedyaz ameqqran Si Muḥend u Mḥend. Tasebḥit n wass-nni n ssebt, 23/12/2017, i d-tefka tesqamut n yinzurfa 6 n warazzen imenza, gar-asen 3 n tmedyazt tartar, ma d tlata-nni-nniḍen n tmedyazt tamensayt, akked tlata n warrazen-nniḍen. Dɣa deg tewsit n tmedyazt tartar, yufrar-d Mass Xeṭṭabi Ḥmed deg umḍiq amenzu s tenqiḍt n 14,33/20, syin d Mass Harwan Aɛmer deg umḍiq wis sin s tezmilt-a n 13,33/20, ma deg umkan wis kraḍ yufrar-d Mass Mennas Ali s tezmilt-agi n 13,16/20. Ma d arraz-nni n tewsit n tmedyazt tartart, deg umkan amezwaru yufrar-d Mass Fellag Saɛid s tenqiḍt-a 13,83/20, ma d arraz wis sin yewwi-t Mass Barac Seddiq s tezmilt-agi n 13,16/20, ma d arraz wis tlata tewwi-t Massa Sidiri Fahima s tenqiḍt-a n 12/96/20. Am wakken daɣen i tefka tesqamut n yinzurfa tlata n warrazen-nniḍen i tlata n yimedyazen-nniḍen n snat-agi n tewsatin n tmedyazt. Dɣa arraz n tesqamut yewwi-t Mass Nayli Yidir seg tewsit n tmedyazt tatrar s tezmilt-agi n 11,66/20. Ma deg tewsit n tmedyazt tamensayt, tefka sin n warrazen, dɣa arraz n tmeṭṭut yuɣal i Massa Ṣwaleḥ Ṣabrina s tezmilt-agi n 12,83/20, ma d win n usebɣes tefka-t i Mass Kassuri Jamel s tneqiḍt-a n 12,16. Ad d-nesmekti kan s wahil n temlilit-agi deg tezrigt-is tis mraw d yiwen, yella-d akka ass-nni n lexmis yezrin 21/12/2017 ɣef 14h 30m, deg Uxxam n yilmeẓyen A. Fares s temlilit n yimedyazen d umeslay sɣur kra n yimḍebren d yiεeggalen n tddukkla akked uselway-is. Ґef 15h yella-d ufraq n tecmilt (ammuden n tmedyazt) i yimedyazen i d-yufraren deg tezrigt tis mraw, Syin akkin yella-d umɛeẓber gar sin n yimedyazen-agi Ḥmed Laḥlu d Murad Raḥman i wumi tuɣal tejmilt aseggas-agi. Ma ɣef 21h00, tella-d temllilit gar yimedyazen d tesqamut n uktazal, iɣef yella Mass Zidan Yasin d aselway, ma d Mass Ɛekkuc Naṣer akked Massa Bulifa Ḥanan d iɛeggalen n tesqamut. Ma deg wass-nni n sem, 22 deg duğamber 2017 ɣef 10h, yella-d uḥric amezwaru n temsizzelt n tmedyazt alamma d 12h00, syin akkin ɣef 13h30, yella-d usarag d uskasi sɣur Mass Abdenour Abdeslam (d amnadi d amaru) s usentel-agi « Amecwar i d-telḥa tmedyazt tmaziɣt ». Ma ɣef 15h00m, yella-d uḥric wis sin n tmesizzelt-agi n tmedyazt, syin ɣef 17h00 m tella-d tmenna n yisefra sɣur Mass Murad Raḥman, yetbeε-it-id uskasi sɣur wid iḥedren. Ma d deg wass wis kraḍ, 23 deg duğamber 2017, ɣef 10h00m, yella-d uḥric wis tlata n temsizzelt n tmedyazt alamma d d 12h00. Syin ɣer-s ɣef 14h00, yella-d uḥric aneggaru n temsizwert gar yimedyazen. Ma ɣef 16h00m, tella-d tmenna n tmedyazt sɣur Mass Ḥmed Laḥlu, din din yetbeε-it-id uskasi sɣur wid yellan din. Ma d ass aneggaru, 24 deg duğamber 2017, tella-d tukci n yigerdasen n uttekki i wid yettekkin deg temlilit-agi tis mraw d yiwen, am wakken daɣen fkan arrazen i ttesɛa n yimedyaz-nni i d-nebder yakkan , akked d tesfuglan taggara si 10h00 n ssbeḥ d asawen. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella ɣef teɣzi n 4 wussan-agi, usenzi s ubuddu sɣur waṭas n yimura d yimedyazen, nezmer ad d-nebder gar-asen: Ḥsen Maric,Yidir Bellali, Yusef Haruni, Brahim Ben Ṭaleb, Kenza Ǧurǧura, Muhmed Nat Abdella…Ɣer taggara maḍi, ad nesmekti belli, azal n 60 n yimedyazen i yemḥezwaren ɣef setta n yimeḍqan imenza, gar-asen 17 n yimedyazen i imḥezwaren ɣef tlata-nni n warazen imezwura n tmedyazt tartar, ma d 43 n yimedyazen-nni-nniḍen mḥezwaren ɣef kraḍ-nni n warrazen tmedyazt tamensayt. Imedyazen d tmedyazin yekkin deg temsizzelt n tikkelt-a, usan-d seg ṭam n lwilayat: Tizi Uzzu, Tubiret, Lezzayer Tamaneɣt, Bumerdas, Blida, Sṭif, Tamenrasat d Bgayet.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
  Mass Mokrani, d imḍebber diɣ n sant n
tkebbaniyin timeẓyanin-a “Randonnées Events” akked “Tizi Events”,  i iqedcen deg tmerrit akked usulzuz
(marketing). Am wakken diɣ yettkellil dduktura-s di tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu. Yesazreg-d
diɣ yiwen n udlis, iwumi isemma “Marketing digital et promotion du tourisme
patrimonial”. Deg tdiwennit-a, newwi-d awal akked umaru, aduktur d unaẓur n teklut
Mokrani Lotfi, ɣef uḥric n tmerrit akked usulzuz. Amek daɣen i d-yewwi lḥal ad
teddu tdamsa n tmurt ɣer tama n usefti deg uḥric n tmerrit. 

  Aɣmis n yimaziɣen: Di tazwara, s kra n wawalen kan, amek-it waddad n usenzi s ttawil n Internet di tmurt n Lezzayer? 
  Mokrani Lotfi :  Liḥala n tunzuzt s ttawil n Internet deg tmurt-nneɣ, mazal-itt ur tuɣ ara aẓar mliḥ imi melmi kan i tebda dagi. Nezmzer ad d-nini akken kan i tger imɣi, imi mazal nebɛed aṭas ɣef tmura-nniḍen. Annect-agi, yella-d s ugellel (aɛeṭṭel) n usexdem n ttawilat atraren, ladɣa deg yiḥricen-agi n tunzuzt, tamerrit akked tdamsa. Xas ulamma tebda temhelt-agi n tuzuzt s ttawil n Internet, meɛna ur tettuqet ara mliḥ di tmurt-nneɣ. 

  Acu n yibaɣuren i tesɛa tunzuzt s ttawil n internet ? 
 Aṭas n yibaɣuren s wacu i d-tgellu, ama ɣef tkebbaniyin neɣ imsenziyen ama ɣef yimsaɣen. Tamezwarut, yettili-d ufran d lbiɛ mebla ma yerza yiwen ɣer umkan. Rnu ɣer waya, tettak tagnit i medden akken ad ẓren ayen bɣan, melmi i asen-yehwa, 24 ssaɛa ɣef 24 ssaɛa yerna yal ass. Am wakken diɣ yeṭṭaman asiweḍ n yisufar s ixxamen n yimsaɣen…atg.

  Tamerrit, tadamsa, taẓuri akked tira, awal ɣef yiḥricen-agi ideg tegreḍ iman-ik? 
 Aḥric n usulzuz (marketing), ideg qeddceɣ d amenzu, imi d win i d tuzzagt-iw di tesdawit, sɛiɣ deg-s turagt d ugerdas n Master, tura akka, ttkemmileɣ duktura, di tuzzagt n Tesnermmist n tmerrit. Am wakken diɣ, i greɣ iman-iw deg unnar n tẓuri, imi xeddmeɣ taklut, yerna ɣriɣ-tt deg Uɣerbaz n Tẓuriwin Tihuskiyin, yerna diɣ sexdameɣ-tt deg uxeddim-iw n usulzuz. Rnu ɣer waya, qeddceɣ deg uḥric n tmerrit ideg ttuxesseɣ akked tira diɣ. Am wakkeɣ ttakkeɣ afud i yilmeẓyen, i wakken ad sbedden tikebbanyin timeẓyanin (Start ups), imi d nutenti i izemren ad ɛiwnent tadamsa n tmurt. 

  D acu n wassaɣ yellan gar unnar-ik n unadi neɣ n uxeddim akked tẓuri? 
 Tamezwarut, taẓuri n teklut d ayen ḥemmleɣ, yerna yekcem diɣ deg uxeddim-iw n usulzuz. Imi, taklut, unuɣ, tiɣmiwin kecment merra deg udellel i yesɛan azal di tunzuzt. Tis snat, ula d aḥric n usulzuz d nekk i t-yextaren, imi ḥemmleɣ-t. D annect-agi, i d-yeglan s wassaɣ ameẓlay gar wayen xeddmeɣ di tesdawit d wayen sɛiɣ d lḥirfa. Imi ass-a, yewwi-d ɣef yal yiwen ad yissin akk ayen i as-yezzin i unnar-is, imi ur ilaq ara kan ad yeṭṭef deg wayen kan ideg yettuxesses. 

  Ma txeddmeḍ kan taklut i yiman-ik neɣ tettekkaḍ yis-s di temsikniyin? 
 Deg unnar n tẓuri, yal anaẓur s umaḍal-is, d netta i t-yessnen, din i yettaf iman-is. Nekk ur xeddmeɣ ara kan tifelwiyin n teklut i tedfi (plaisir), meɛna ttekkeɣ yis-s di temsikniyin ama dagi di tmurt-nneɣ ama deg tmura n berra (Tunes, Lmerruk…). Am wakken diɣ tgensiseɣ taddart-iw deg waṭas n leqdicat, imi d nettat i d-irebban tteɛraḍeɣ ad d-fkeɣ tazmert-iw d wafud-iw u ad tt-id-sbineɣ s wayen xeddmeɣ.

  Di tfelwiyin-ik n teklut, temmaleḍ aṭas ɣer yidles amaziɣ, amek armi? 
 D tidet, deg wayen xeddmeɣ di teklut, yeqqen srid ɣer yidles amaziɣ d wansayen-is akked tinḍi-s. Imi seg yizamulen n yidles amaziɣ ; afexxar, lfeṭṭa, ticraḍ dinna i d-ttagmeɣ ayen xeddmeɣ. Ḥemmleɣ mliḥ izamulen-agi, imi yal yiwen deg-sen d izen, ula d nekk syin i d-ttaddameɣ iznan-inu. Xedmeɣ ɣef yidles, ɣef tmeṭṭut, ɣef tuddar…atg.

  Ad nemmeslay ciṭ ɣef udlis-ik amenzu, ma tebɣiḍ? 
 Deg useggas n 2019, sazergeɣ-d  yiwen n udlis neɣ n umnir, i wumi semmeɣ “Marketing digital et promotion du tourisme patrimonial”, yeffeɣ-d di tmurt n Lalman, urɛad i d-yekcim ɣer Lezzayer. Am wakken diɣ i yettnuzu di kra n tensiwin (amazon). Wwiɣ-d awal deg-s ɣef tmeɣriwin d tfaskiwin tidelsanin i d-yettilin di Tizi Uzzu. Iswi-inu deffir waya, d aseḥbiber ɣef tgemmi-nneɣ, yerna ad t-issinen leǧnan n umaḍal merra. Imi tura, s ttawil n Internet, nezmer ad nesenz ɣer berra ayen nekseb, ur neḥwaǧ ara timsikent neɣ tafska. Ad yekcem yiwen ɣer tensa flan, ad yaf ayen yebɣa. Am wakken, diɣ, i yezmer ad d-yejbed lwelha n yimerrayen iberraniyen, akken ad d-rzun ɣer da. 

  D acu n yisenfaren i tettheggiḍ ɣer sdat ? 
 Aṭas n yisenfaren i yellan gar yifassen-nneɣ. Asenfar amezwaru, d asnerni d tmerrit di tmurt-nneɣ s ttawil n tirza n umerreḥ, tikli deg udrar, tuffɣa ɣer Ṣseḥra…atg. Asenfar-iw wis sin, d aheggi n tarist-iw (thèse) n dduktura, ddima deg uḥric-iw n unadi asdawan. Ma deg uḥric n tẓuri d tira, ttheggiɣ adlis, anda ara d-greɣ akk ayen xedmeɣ di teklut, d usegzi n unamek-nsen s 4 n tutlayin-a: tamaziɣt, tafransit, taglizit akked taɛrabt. 

  Ma tebɣiḍ ad tegreḍ tiɣri i yilmeẓyen yesɛan isenfaren i bɣan ad xedmen… 
 Ad d-greɣ tiɣri i yilmeẓyen-nneɣ yebɣan ad xedmen isenfaren-nsen, nekk s timmad-iw greɣ-d iman-iw akken ad ten-ɛiwneɣ deg uxlaq n tkebbaniyin timeẓyanin am wakken diɣ ara iliɣ d imwelleh-nsen. Ad d-greɣ diɣ tiɣri i yisdawanen-nneɣ, ilaq seg useggas amenzu n tesdawit ara xemmemen ɣef usenfar-nsen mačči alamma kfan leqraya di tesdawit. 

  Ma tzemreɣ ad aɣ-d-tefkeḍ awal-ik n taggara n tiwennit-a? 
 Di taggara, ad d-nini belli yewwi-d lḥal ad nefk azal aṭas i tmerrit di tmurt-nneɣ, imi nezmer yis-s ad d-nsali tadamsa n tmurt n Lezzayer. Gar-nneɣ s yizzayriyen nezmer ad nexdem timerrit ara d-yuɣalen s lfayda i tmurt-nneɣ ɣer tama n usebɣes n tisin n yiberraniyen. Am wakken diɣ, ara d-ssutreɣ deg yisdawnen yettheggin tarisin-nsen, ilaq ad xedmen asenfar n taggara n ulmud mačči d akatay n taggara n ulmud ara xedmen, imi ilaq ad as-xedmen asnas deg unnar ur yettɣama ara kan d tiẓri. Ad as-nini diɣ i Uɣmis n yimaziɣen, tanemmirt-is imi i d aɣ-yefka amkan deg yisebtar-is.

  Yesteqsa-t Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Ass-nni n larebɛa 19 yunyu 2018, yella-d usarag n tɣamsa i tesker Massa Malika Matoub, s yisem-is d taselwayt n tesbeddit (fondation) Matoub Lounes, deg tzeqqa tameẓyant n Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu. Temmeslay-d ɣef tlata n temsal tigejdanin. Tezwar-d deg taluft-nni n tmettan-is, dɣa tenna-d: “Uqbel ad nẓer anwa i t-yenɣan, ilaq ad nẓer ayɣer d wamek yettwanɣa?”. Tuɣal-d daɣen ɣer tnagit taneggarut i d-yefka ucennay Zedek Mouloud, mmi-s n temnaḍt-is n Ath Douala, mebɛed 20 n yiseggasen ɣef tmenɣiwt-is, ideg i d-yenna i tɣamsa: “Wwḍeɣ 10 n ddqayeq mebɛed timenɣiwt n Lounes, ufiɣ mazal-t dinna, llan daɣen 3 neɣ 4 yimdanen i ḍuneɣ d imezdaɣ. Ufiɣ daɣen 5 n yiǧadrmiyen dinna deg umkan”. Tenna-d diɣ belli ha-t-an yewjed i wakken ad d-yefk tanagit-is sdat n teɣdemt tazzayrit. Tkemmel tenna-d: “Ur nezmir ara ad tt-nesɛeddi kan akka, neḍleb deg ccreɛ aɛiwed n tulya n zzmam n tmenɣit n ucennay amḥaddi Matoub Lounes, imi i d-tella tnagit-agi tamaynut. Taluft n Dda Lounes, ur terzi ara kan tawacult-is, maca d tamsalt n tmetti s umata”. Tamsalt tis snat iɣef i d-tmeslay, d ahil n usmekti n umulli wis 20 ɣef tmettant n ufennan yesseḥbibiren ɣef yizefan n umdan Matoub Lounes. Tefka-d ugar n yisallen ɣef usmekti-agi ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan-agi, 23-24 d 25 yunyu 2018 deg Taourirth Moussa. Ma ɣef umaynut deg wahil n useggas-agi, tenna-d: “Ad yili usenɛed n tmeɣra “Le Zenith de Kabylie” s wudem atrar, ideg zemren ad walin wid iḥemmlen Matoub sdat-sen am wakken i tt-yexdem deg useggas n 1995”. Taluft tis tlata iɣef i d-tehder terza aswir uɣur tewweḍ temsalt-agi n tmettant n gma-s Lounes. Deg wawal-is tenna: “ Mazal ur d-neṣṣaweḍ ara tadrimt ilaqen i wakken ad nkemmel aḥtac d unadi alqayen deg taluft-agi. Maca tidet, akken qqaren wat zik: ‘ Akken yebɣu yiɣzif yiḍ, labud ad d-tifrit tafat. Tafat-nneɣ nekni d tidet”. Deg uskasi, steqsan-tt ɣef wassaɣ yellan gar-as akked umazzan Nordine Ait Hamouda, tenna-d : “Asteqsi i d as-ttakkeɣ yal tikkelt d wa: “Anwa i d as-id-yessawlen 5 ddqayeq deffir lmut n Matoub ?” Yugi ad d-yefk tiririt i usteqsi-agi”. Ma ɣef yixef n tifrat n taluft-agi, tenna-d: “Ma tewwi-d ad myagareɣ d Hassan Hattab, ad t-ẓreɣ ma yebɣa, awi-d kan ad naweḍ ɣer tidet”. Ma ɣer taggara n usarag-agi, terra tajmilt tameqqrant i wid i d-yefkan afus n tallelt i wakken ad d-yili usmekti-agi wis 20 ɣef tmettant n unaẓur d ucennay Matoub Lounes. Ama d tidukliwin, tiɣiwanin n Ath Douala akked tudrin-is, “ONDA” akked “ONCI”, imezdaɣ n Taourirth Moussa…atg. Am wakken daɣen i d-tger tiɣri i wid ara d-yasen, tenna deg-s: “Win iḥemmlen Matoub, ad d-iruḥ ass n 25 yunyu, ad as-yerr tajmilt, ula d netta tajmilt-is meqqret, nekni ad asen-sterḥeb yis-s akken iwulem lḥal…”.

  A. A. 

  
 Ulac win ur negri tamawt i wayen iḍerrun ussan-a deg uḥric n usegmi n tmurt. Sandika n CNAPESTE yesseɣzef asunded-ines armi ur ɣɣaren warrac.

 Ayen yesḥissifen aṭas d mi ɣilen-t waṭas, ad yefru, maca yerna d timernit. Asunded-a i yellan yeɛna kan tiwilayin n Bgayet, Tizi Uzzu d Blida, yuɣal taggara-a d aɣelnaw, amek i d-yenna yiwen n yimḍebber seg CNAPESTE n Lezzayer. Ɣef wawal-is, ssebba n uɛum i tɛum deg tmurt, d asewɛer n taluft i d-yekkan seg tama n Uɣlif n usegmi, deg wadeg n ferru-ines, armi ula d nutni kkren-d d wid akk ixedmen asunded deg twilayin-a timezwura i d-nebder.Ilaq ad d-nini belli, akken yebɣu yili lḥal, akken yebɣu yili wugur neɣ akken bɣun ilin kra n yiɛeqqayen ɣef umsifham i ulac gar Uɣlif n usegmi d yimḍebbren n CNAPESTE, meɛna d arrac i yenṭerren deg tazwara. Aṭas i asen-iruḥen deg ukraḍyur amezwaru, mazal yettruḥ-asen deg ukraḍyur-a wis sin.Seg tama n yibabaten n warrac, d ayen ibanen yeṭṭef-iten wurrif d ameqqran mi ttwalin deg warraw-nsen ur qqimen, ur ɣrin; ɣas ad ruḥen tasebḥit ɣer uɣerbaz, ttuɣalen-d dindin s ixxamen. Armi dɣa, llan wid i d-yessawlen i tikli i wakken ad narfen, ad d-sbeggnen aɣiḍi-nsen ɣef wayen iḍerrun i tarwa-nsen. «Tiddukkliwin n yibabaten n warrac, ḥarent, ur ufint tifrat gar yifassen-nsent, imi ɣef leḥsab n waṭas, ugur yezmer kan ad yefru ma yella-d umtawa gar Sandika aɣelnaw akked Uɣlif n usegmi ». Akka i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen n ubabat seg Ayt Smaɛel. Asunded-a i mazal ur yeḥbis deg tmurt, yeǧǧa aṭas n wid ur t-nebɣi, am warrac, ibabaten d kra n yiselmaden yellan mgal, ad ttakken kan asteqsi-a i yimanen-nsen: “ar melmi ara ikemmel?”.

  0,73% kan i d-yerran tiɣri i Cnapeste deg Tizi uzzu 

 Kra n yiselmaden kan i d-yerran i teɣri n sandika Cnapeste i d-yessawlen ɣer usunded aɣelnaw i yebdan ass-nni n 30 deg yennayer iɛeddan. Ɣef wakken i t-id-yenna unemhal n usegmi n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu i yineɣmasen i yemlal deg yiwen usarag, ass-nni n larebɛa, 31 deg yennayer 2018, ala 0,73 % i iḥebsen ɣef uselmed deg lwilaya. Ɣer yimḍebber-agi amezwaru n uḥric n leqraya deg Tizi Uzzu, ssebba tamezwarut i yeǧǧan iselmaden ur tbiɛen ara asunded-agi aɣelnaw, tesɛa assaɣ ɣer wayen yeḍran, yakan, deg lwilaya, imi ussan-agi kan i yuɣalen ɣer uselmed, mebɛed mi d-yella usunded-nsen deg lwilaya seg 20 deg unbir 2017 armi d 11 deg yennayer 2018. Aya, yegla-d s leɛḍil deg wahil aɣurbiz. Limer ad kemmlen ihi ɣef uneḥbus, yezmer ad asen-iruḥ useggas i yinelmaden, ɣef wakken i walan yiselmaden akked yimḍebbren n usegmi n lwilaya. I usmekti, yessawel-d sandika Cnapeste ɣer uneḥbus n leqraya ass 20 deg unbir 2017, mebɛed mi tettewwet yiwet n tselmadt sɣur yiwet n srabes n laman (tapulist) deg tenmehla n usegmi n Tizi Uzzu, sdat n sin yimḍebbren n tenmehla-a, ɣef wakken i d-yenna Cnapeste. Syin, tekcem tuddsa-agi deg usunded u ḍelben astixer n sin yimḍebbren-agi i wakken ad uɣalen ɣer uselmed. Acu kan, ur asen-d-ddan ara yimḍebbren deg lebɣi imi, ineggura-agi, nekkren ayen yeḍran imi, ɣef wakken i d-qqaren, ulac ttbut ɣef wayen i d-yenna sandika, ihi ulamek ara stixren sin yixeddamen mebla ssebba, ɛlaḥsab-nsen. Deg taggara, ufan-asen-d tifrat, suffɣen sin-nni n yimḍebbren ɣer usteɛfu, seg leɛḍil ad tefru akken iwata imi yiwen deg-sen ad yeffeɣ tastaɣt, wayeḍ ad as-beddlen amekkan.

  Mazal yettkemmil   usunded deg Bgayet 

 Mazal yettkemmil uneḥbus ɣef uselmed, uɣur i d-yessawel sandika Cnapeste, deg lwilya n Bgayet. Aneḥubus i yebdan, yakan, deg wass-nni n 16 deg yennayer iɛeddan. Seg yimir ar tura, aṭas n tmesbaniyin, gar tikliwin akked d yibeddiyen, i texdem tuddsa-agi deg temdint n Bgayet. Tebda-tt azekka-nni n usunded, 17 deg yennayer 2018, s ibeddi sdat n tenmehla n usegmi n lwilaya n Bgayet, syin texdem wayeḍ akked tikli ass-nni n 29 deg yennayer yezrin imi ula d ccreɛ yenna-d d akken asunded-agi n Cnapeste ha-t-an berra i lqanun. Ass-nni, dɣa, deg yibeddi sdat n tenmehla i d-yenna yimḍebber n sandika, Slimane Zenati, d akken sandika-nsen ad ḍefren asunded aɣelnaw seg uzekka d tasawent, meḥsub seg 30 deg yennayer 2018. Ma ɣef ssebba n unesḥbus ɣef lxedma, yerra ṭṭlima Mass Zenati ɣef tenmehla n usegmi n Bgayet ur nquder ara ayen ɣef wayeg msefhamen deg temliliyin i xedmen netta d tenmehla-agi deg ussan n 9 d 11 duǧember 2017. Ɣef wakken i d-yemmeslay yimḍebber-a n sandika, aṭas n temsal i mazal ur frint ara, xas akken mmsefhamen fell-asent. Acu kan, seg yimir ar ass-a, yal tama tesseḍlam tayeḍ, tettarra-tt-id ɣef tayeḍ deg ucbak-agi i deg-i weqqɛen yinelmaden akked yimawlan-nsen. 

  Kaissa Khalifi/H. M. 

  
 Am deg tmura merra n ddunit, yesfuggel Uḥuddu aɣarim (Protection civile) n Bgayet ass-is amaḍalan, i d-yettuɣalen yal amenzu n meɣres, s wahil d amerkanti, ɣef teɣzi n waṭas n wussan. D ttiɛad i yebdan dɣa seg wass n 23 furar iɛeddan armi d 1 n meɣres-a ideg nella, s uberriḥ n “Aḥuddu aɣarim d tsuda tiɣelnawin i usefrek yettsuddun n twaɣiyin ». Iswi n usfuggel-a, akken i d-yedda deg ulɣu i aɣ-d-yewwḍen sɣur Uḥuddu aɣarim n waɣir n Bgayet, d asḥulfu n uzayez ɣef uḥezzeb d usellek izerben, akken ad heggin medden i uqabel n kra n umihi neɣ n twaɣit i d-yellan. Am wakken daɣen, yesɛa usfuggel-a iswan mgaraden seg useggas ɣer wayeḍ, imi dɣa yebdel ula d aberriḥ, neɣ d asentel n useggas-a n 2018. «Ass-a, ulamma weɛrit tegnatin n tudert tatrart, acu kan mtawant merra tmura d akken aḥuddu mgal ibaxixen d tɣellist taɣelnawt, qqnen wa ɣer wa, ma d aḥuddu mgal tiwaɣiyin tigamanin d tid s i d-igellu umdan, ilaq ad yeqqim d anezgum amezwaru, akken ad tettwaḍmen tudert yelhan n yiɣerfan…». Ta, d tukkist seg yizen n Mass Vladimir Kuvshinov, amaray amatu n OIPC, i lmend n wass amaḍalan n Uḥuddu aɣarim 2018. Gar wayen i d-yellan ihi deg wahil, ad naf aheggi n tazzla deg temdint n Bgayet. Asuddes n tberziwin ( tournois ) tinaddalin, am ddabex amafag. Ma yella seg umenzu n meɣres d asawen, ldint tewwura deg yakk ixxamen n Uḥuddu aɣarim n Bgayet. Am wakken i d-yella warmud deg Uxxam n yidles n Bgayet. Imi, seld taldayt tunsibt n temzikknin, sɣur lwali akked unemhal n Uḥuddu aɣarim, yewweḍ-d wakud n uḍilli ɣef temsiknin yemgaraden i d-yersen,yecban allalen n usellek, d kra n leḥsabat n yiseggasen yezrin. Ḍefrent-d syin kra n tigawin timecṭaḥ n uḥesses n uzayez i d-yerzan i usihar-a. Rnu daɣ, tella-d tikci n warrazen i yimifriren d wid yernan deg tberziwin, akked warrazen n yiseɣ i wid yewwin tastaɣt seg yiqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim.

  M. K. 

  
 Saɛid Sifaw, neɣ Lmeḥruq, d amedyaz Amaziɣ n Libya. Ilul deg 1946, di Agadu, deg yirebbi n yidurar n Neffusa, anẓul-amalu n tmurt n Libya n wass-a. Yella yettwassen abeɛda s yisefra-is, timmeɣnest-is d umennuɣ-is imegzi mgal adabu amhersan n Muɛemmer Lqeddafi, imi ɣur yal Amaziɣ n Libya, ad yeqqim d azamul d timmuzɣa d uzbu di temnaḍt-a n Tmazɣa. Ugar n tẓuri n wawal, yeɣra Saɛid Sifaw tasnujjya di tmurt n Maser. Maca, ɣef tmentilt n yimagraden i yettaru imir-nni, tettwakkes-as teggazt-is. D ayen i t-iḥettmen ad yuɣal ɣer Trablus deg 1967, ad iɣer azref, anda i d-iḥella agerdas n ubugaṭu. Deg useggas 1979, yeslek Saɛid Sifaw seg tmettant deg yiwet n txazabit. Yeḍra-as yiwen n usehwu (accident) n ubrid d amihan, i as-d-wwin ssrabes n udabu n Libya, ɣef wawal amatu i yuzzlen. Seg usehwu-a, tenṭeḍ tɛuḍert amedyaz, armi ikemmel tudert-is d ameɛḍur n tfekka. D ayen i t-yeǧǧan, seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ, yettdawi berra tmurt-is. Seg wayen i yura, ad naf yegmer-d ddeqs n tmucuha d teqsiḍin n tgemmi n tmurt-is, am wakken yura ddeqs n yisefra s tmaziɣt n Libya d teɛrabt. Di tudert-is, yessuffeɣ-d sin n yidlisin, « Taɣect n tzeggant n yiḍ », d ammud n tmucuha i yettwasuqlen ɣer teɛrabt, akked wammud n tmedyazt « Isefra isusamen ». Seg umezruy, ass n 15 yunyu 2009, ugin yimḍebbren n tmurt n Merruk ad d-yettwasken i tɣamsa Udlis aberkan n Saɛid Sifaw deg Uqusis n Tɣamsa n Rribaṭ. Seg wayen i d-yennulfan ɣef yiman n Saɛid Sifaw, yella yiwen n warraz iɣef ur nesɛi ddeqs n yisallen. Isem-is warraz-a « Arraz Saɛid Sifaw », yettunefk i Muḥemmed Farid Zalhud deg useggas n 1997. Seg yisefra i yura, ad d-nebder kan “Amezruy-nneɣ”, “Tidet”, “Tayri”, “Idles-nwen” akked “Amussnaw”. Sin-a ineggura dɣa, yecna-ten Ferḥat Imaziɣen Imula deg tezlatin i yettwassnen ayendin. Yemmut Saɛid Sifaw deg useggas n 1994, di Ǧerba, tamurt n Tunes. M. K.

  
 Ssebt-nni iɛeddan, 3 deg waggur-agi n meɣres, i d-tella tesfugla n taggara n tezrigt tis 12 n warraz Mulud Mɛemmeri, i d-tettheggi yal aseggas tiddukkla n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. Deg tzeqqa tameqqrant n uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri i d-tella tmeɣra-agi n tukci n warrazen i yinelmaden i d-yufraren. Leqdic adelsan s wazal-is, ideg ferqen azal n 30 n warrazen i yinelmaden n 3 n yiswiren n ulmud. Dɣa deg uswir n ulmud amenzu fkan 10 n warrazen i yinelmaden n yiɣerbazen imenza, 10 n warrazen-nniḍen fkan-ten i yinelmaden n uswir wis sin (aɣerbaz alemmas), am wakken daɣen i fkan 10 wiyaḍ i yinelmaden n tesnawiyin. Ma d amḥezwar n yinelmaden, yella-d akka: deg temssizelt n tzabut n yiɣerbazen imenza d Damou Lisa, n uɣerbaz amezwaru Remous Saada n Boughni, i d-yufranen deg umḍiq amenzu. Ma deg temssizelt n tzabut n yiɣerbazen ilemmasen (CEM) d Sekouane Amel, n uɣerbaz alemmas Akli Amar n Bouzeguène, i yewwin amkan amezwaru. Ma deg temsizzelt n ufares s tira, i d-yellan i lmend n yinelmaden n tesnawit, d Hikoune Dehbia n tesnawit Abane Remdane n temdit n Tizi Uzzu, i d-iḥellan arraz amenzu. Am wakken daɣen i tt-gan yiɛeggalen n tiddukkla-agi, d tajmilt i 23 n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt lwilaya Tizi Uzzu i d-tessuffeɣ tannant tamezwarut n 1995, iwumi qqaren tannant n Mulud Mɛemmeri, i isekecmen tamaziɣt s aɣerbaz azzayri. Iselmaden-agi yeffɣen ɣer tesɣimt, terra-asen tiddukkla-agi tajmilt s yisefkan (cadeaux) i lmend n wayen i d-fkan i tmaziɣt. Ɣer taggara, ad nesmekti belli leqdic-agi tettheggi-t-id yal aseggas tiddukkla n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt s talellt n tenmehla n usegmi akked tin n yidles n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Imezdaɣ n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun, ɣelqen ddur-agi yezrin Aseqqamu n tkabbanit tazzayrit n waman ADE. Yella-d uɣlaq-agi, mebɛed mi yurǧan yimezdaɣ-agi akken tbeddel tegnit, acu kan ur d-yelli, dɣa ɛeddan ɣer tigawt-agi n ubleɛ-ines.

 Xedmen annect-agi, i wakken ad d-beggnen lxiḍ-nsen ɣef liḥala i ttidiren, imi ɛeddan ddeqs n wussan ur d-uɣalen ara waman. Imezdaɣ n taddart n Ighil Bouchene, s wuzzig, ctaqen, ad wallin taqqudirt n waman tettuddum-d seg tbarninin n yixxamen-nsen, yerna deg tallit n tefsut. Imi ɣef leḥsab-nsen d yir afraq n waman i yellan mačči d lexṣaṣ i xuṣṣen. Rnu ɣer waya, yir asexdem n waman sɣur yimezdaɣ n tuddar yellan rrif n ubrid, imi sefsadent s waṭas aman, ma d nutni ctaqen-ten ula i tissit. Tasebḥit n wass-nni n ttlata 24 yebrir 2018, nejmaɛen yiɛeggalen n tesqamut n taddart akked yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi sdat n Useqqamu n tkebbanit-agi, dɣa gezmen-tt deg rray. Syin akin, yella-d uɣlaq n tkebbanit tazzayrit i waman “ADE”. Ma si tama n yimḍebbren n tkebbanit-agi, sefhamen-d tamsalt-agi n lexṣaṣ n waman deg tɣiwant-agi s tmuɣli-nniḍen. Imi ɣef wakken i t-id-nnan, deg tazwara xuṣṣen waman deg wuggug n Teksebt akked yinuyen n waman, tis snat azal n 40% seg waman i d-yettruḥen ɣer tɣiwant-agi, ttruḥen deg yissafen, imi tiregwa neɣ iteyyuten i d-yettawin aman ɛyan acḥal-aya. Yenna-aɣ-d yiwen gar yimezdaɣ n taddart-agi: «Mačči d lmuḥal i d awen-d-nessuter, neɣ d aman 24h/24h neɣ ahat 7j/7j, maca nebɣa kan ad nesԑu aman am nekni am tudrin-nniḍen, daya kan i nebɣa a wid teԑna temsalt-a. Ur ilaq ara, yiwen ad yettɛemmir isitiren d lebyur i wakken ur tettxaṣan ara deg unebdu, wayeḍ ur ten-yerwi ara deg tefsut annef-as tura deg unebdu». Ugur n waman tettidir-it tɣiwant-agi n Ait Aissa Mimoun deg yiseggasen-agi ineggura, maca kra ttwalin belli mačči d aman ur d-neɣli ara s xilla neɣ d lexsas i xuṣṣen deg yigelmimen akked yisaffen, maca d afraq i ferqen ur nelli ara deg umkan-is. Ma d wiyaḍ, ttafen-d tisebbiwin s wayen yellan d axeddim-nsen, acu kan fkan afus deg-s. 

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Atas i d-yeffɣen d idlisen ɣef uɣewwaɣ Lwennas Meɛtub, seg useggas n 1998 d tasawent. Tuget nyimeskaren-nsen, d imaruyen i yuran yakan kra n yidlisen, neɣ d iqriben n Lwennas Meɛtub, akka amuletma-s Malika d tmeṭṭut-is Nadya. Adlis aneggaru I d-yeffɣen am tesleḍt ɣef umennuɣ d yisefra n Meɛtub Lwennas, yura-t mmi-s n tɣiwant n Tsexriwt, Hebbac Yasin, i yellan d amedyaz d amaru, s uzwel n «Matoub Lounes, le chemin vers le mythe». Send-is s kra n wussan, newwi-d awal deg yisebtar-a ɣef tektabt n Teyyeb Iqubac, neɣ Ɛebdelli, mi d-yessaẓreg adlis-is iwumi yefka azwel: «Matoub Lounès : Notes et souvenirs d’un compagnon de lutte». 

 Caḍen yimuranniḍen i d-yewwin tasleḍt, tanaga, neɣ d tamuɣli-nsen ɣef Meɛtub Lwennas amdan, amedyaz-acennay, neɣ agrawliw, am Muḥemmed Gaya i yuran «Anazbay». Ilaq ad d-nini d netta i yuran adlis amezwaru ɣef Meɛtub Lwennas s teqbaylit. Seg wid yuran daɣen, yella Yalla Seddiqi i d-yessuffɣen adlis «Mon nom est combat» ideg nezmer ad naf isefra n mmi-s n Tewrirt Musa. Ɣef wawal n umeskar, ula d Lwennas Meɛtub s timmad-is iwelleh-it di tudert-is akken ad yaru isefra war tuccḍiwin n unamek. Newwi-d daɣen deg Uɣmis-a n Yimaziɣen isalli n tuffɣa n udlis n umaru-aneɣmas Yusef Zirem, i isemma: «Matoub Lounès, la fin tragique d’un poète». Deg-s, akken i aɣ-d-yenna, yewwi-d kra n tnagiwin i ur nettwassen sɣur buhan n medden. Ddeqs I mazal seg wid i yuran idlisen ɣef Meɛtub Lwennas, garasen iberraniyen. Aya, war ma nebder-d ikatayen d tezrawin isdawanen i iweɛren ad ten-neḥseb. Ula d tisɣunin, caḍent tigad i d-yeffɣen ɣef Meɛtub Lwennas, taneggarut-is d tinna n Useqqamu unnig n Timmuzɣa I d-yeffɣen deg yunyu yezrin.

   Kh. A. 

  
 Ttkemmilent tmesbaniyin d tikliwin di temnadt n leqbayel. Anect-a, akken ad sbeggnen lɣiḍ-nsen mgal rray i d-yeffɣen ussan-agi ineggura. Tikli i d-yellan ass n 11-12-2017 tettuhegga-d sɣur yinelmaden n tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmri akken i d-berḥen mačči d ikubar isertiyen i tt-id-iheggan. Aṭas n wid i d-yerran i teɣri n yisdawanen akken ad ttekkin di tikli, qeccuc meccuc neɣlen-d ɣer tizi uzzu akken ad inin s yiwen n wawal : Ma ulac Tamaziɣt ulac , ulac , ulac. Ma yella deg Tizi Uzzu akked Bgayet, ɛeddant tmesbaniyin deg teswiɛin n talwit, deg tesdawit n Akli Mouhend oulhadj n Tubiret, yekker waṭas n cwalat. Ayen yeǧǧan imḍebbren n tesdawit ad suffɣen yiwen n ulɣu i d-yeqqaren belli ad tettwaɣleq tesdawit war ma nnan-d azemz n tuɣalin ɣer uselmed, imi leqraya ur tezmir ara ad tili s cwalat-a. Ma yella d tasdawit n Bgayet, kecmen yisdawanen di ddurt tis snat n usunded. Si tama-nniḍen, Agezdu n tutlayt d yidles Amaziɣ n Tizi Uzzu ula d netta mazal yeṭṭef di rray-is d akken ad ikemmel usended. I lmend n wayen akk la iḍerrun, nesteqsa-d amaswaḍ n tmaziɣt di Tizi Uzzu Mass Boussad Kebir ɣef rray-is deg wayen i iḍerrun , yenna-d : « mi ara nwali tikliwin i d-yettilin ɣef tmaziɣt, yettuɣal-d ubeḥri i turet, maca si tama-nniḍen, anida-tt tuddsa ara iwellhen amussu n yilmeẓyen i wakken ur d-yettenfal ara ɣer wayen i izemren ad d-yezzi fell-aɣ azekka », yerna-d deg uɣarab-is n facebook d akken : « Tiddukliwin tidelsanin ara yessdukklen iɣallen ɣef yiwen n yiswi. Tugget deg-sent, mmutent neɣ uɣent abrid n ṭṭbel d lɣiḍa. Anida-tt tdukla n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt n Tizi Uzzu ? » ikemmel deg wawal-is : « Ur ilaq ara kan ad teḥbes ɣef tikliwin, maca ayen yugaren akk aya, ilaq axeddim ɣef Tmaziɣt , win yebɣan ad seggem, iseggem iman-is ». Nesteqsa-t ɣef uzekka n Tmaziɣt , yenna-d : « Imal n tmaziɣt, deg yiles n yimawlan-is, tifrat deg-nneɣ kan ara d-tas ».

  Souhila Yamani 

  
 Tiɣri n umsmekti, d album aneggaru n tcennayt Ferruǧa. Ad naf deg-s 10 n tezlatin s yisental yemgaraden : Tagmat, Meqqer ccan-im, Tafriqt, Ay aḥbib a leɛqel, Lexdeɛ, Iwalen s yinzan, Itran n lebda, D Imaziɣen, Abrid n tmacahut akked Aseggas atrar. D tizlatin iwumi texdem netta aẓawan, ma isefra, tewwi-d sya u sya. Tegmer-d ɣer Ahcène Marriche, Salah Amrane, Kader Bouchlaghem, Si Lhocine Ait Ourab Sfaw Twawa. Ula seg tama n usekles, aṭas i as-d-yefkan afus n tallelt. Tacennayt Ferruǧa i yettuneḥsaben d tacennayt n tezlit tamḥaddit, tesseḥbibir diɣ ɣef tgemmi d wayen akk i icudden ɣer yidles amaziɣ s umata. Mačči kan s teqbaylit i tcennu, meɛna tettawi-d isefra deg tmeslayin-nniḍen n tmaziɣt, ama tid yellan deg tmurt n Lezzayer, am temẓabit, tatergit, tacenwit d tiyaḍ, ama deg tmura n tefriqt ugafa, yecba Lmerruk, Tunes, Libya…atg. ‘’Bɣiɣ ad ttekkiɣ ula d nekk deg lebni n tutlayt s umata. Xas ulamma yal yiwen amek yettmeslay, meɛna nebɣa ad ttemsefhamen Yimaziɣen gar-asen. D wagi i d iswi-inu imi cennuɣ s tmeslayin-nniḍen n tmaziɣt’’, i aɣ-d-tenna tnaẓurt Ferruǧa. Ad nesmekti kan d akken aṭas n tejmilin i terra i yimeɣnasen n tmaziɣt akked wid yefkan idammen-nsen ɣef tmagit, yecban Mulud Mɛemmeri, Matub Lwennas, Muḥya neɣ Masinisa Germaḥ i yeɣlin d amezwaru deg Tefsut taberkant. Tɛawed tecna diɣ i kra n tezlatin, am Anujil n ucennay amẓabi Adel. Am wakken terra tajmilt i tlawin s tezlit ‘’Lli allaɣ-ik’’ deg useggas n 2004, acu kan ar tura mazal ur d-teffiɣ ara taɣect-a. Tecna diɣ ‘’Tanekra’’ deg useggas n 2003. Aṭas n tmeɣriwin n ccna i tga i tddukkliwin tidelsanin n tmurt n leqbayel mebla ma teḍleb deg-sent acemma. Afud igerrzen akked umecwar ɣezzifen i tcennayt.

  Hocine Moula

Seg tama-nne&amp;gamma,; nessaram di yal tikkelt, ad nili deg lmendad i twaculin yenṭerren meqqar ahat ad d-nerr deg-sent cwiṭ n usirem yal mi ara nizmir».   M. Smail 

  
 Sendiḍelli n ssebt, 7 deg waggur-agi n yebrir ideg nella, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, tella-d temlilit deg Uzday adelsan Rahmani Slimane n Aokas deg lwilaya n Bgayet. D timlilit ideg i d-yemmeslay aselmad n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit n Abderrahmane Mira n Bgayet akked uneggal aqbayli Lahdir Sidali, yezzi wawal deg usarag-agi-ines ɣef wungal-is amezwaru “Tirga n wul”. D tagnit ideg i d-imeslay i wid iḥemmlen tasekla tamaziɣt ɣef tegnatin n tira n wungal-agi d wayen akk i icudden ɣur-s, am wakken daɣen i d-yexdem agzul awezzlan n tedyant n wungal-agi. Yehder-d diɣen s umata ɣef wungal-agi-ines “Tirga n wul”, ama ɣef wayen yeɛnan awdem agejdan (Sima) n wungal-agi akked yiwudam-nniḍen yellan deg-s. Yewwi-d daɣen awal ɣef tira n wungal s teqbaylit d tirmit-is netta imi s timmad-is d aneggal. Yella-d daɣen uskasi sɣur wid i iffuden tamussni d yidles, ma d netta yeɛreḍ amek ara d-yerr akk i yisteqsiyen i d as-yettunefken ɣef teɣzi n ssaɛa. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli Mass Lahdir Sidali, d aselmad n tutlayt tamaziɣt deg ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ n tesdawit n Targa n uzemmur n lwilaya n Bgayet, yesselmed daɣen deg yiwet n tesnawit ddima deg lwilaya n Bgayet. Tura akka, yettekemmil tizrawin-ines deg tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, imi yettheggi agerdas n Doctorat deg tsekla tamaziɣt. D “Tirga n wul” i d adlis neɣ ungal-is amezwaru, yeffeɣ-d deg waggur-nni n meɣres iɛeddan ɣer tezrigin Tafat n Bgayet. 

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Isufar </span>

 -2 kg n uwren n yirden -1 kg n yibawen iquranen -½ kg n lḥemmez mesure de pois chiche – ifelfel aberkan, lmelḥ, lkemmun

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Uqbel ad d-yaweḍ usewwi n uftiyen, Ilaq ad llexsen yisufar-agi, ibawen, irden akked lḥemmez yiwen yiḍ daxel n waman. Azekka-nni, rrem-ten daxel n tasilt i wakken ad wwen s waman. Teǧǧem-ten azal n snat n swayeɛ s ufella n tmes taḥlawant. Azgen n ssaɛa,uqbel ad wwen, rnut-asen ifelfel aberkan akked ciṭ n lkemmun. Ttmaččan wuftiyen d iḥmayanen. S tezmert-nwen. Daya

  
  Aḥric 1u 

 Faskan, d amdan i iḥemmlen talwit aṭas, d yiwen iγuccen mi ara isel i yimdanen ttemkeččawen neγ ttemčaqlalen γef kra neγ kra. Yiwet tikkelt, iga akka ad yefru sin, yečča-tt-id s tεekkazt. Dγa yennuγna ugar γef wayen yenneqraḥ. Yenna d yiman-is seg yimir-nni ad yennejli γef taddart-nni-ines. Dγa yeddem aεekkaz, yeffeγ si taddart. Teẓra-t-id yiwet n tjeğigt tamecṭuḥt, tenna-as: ‘’Anida tettedduḍ akka a Faskan?’’. Yerra-as: ‘’Ad nnejliγ γef taddart-agi-nneγ ideg yegget umkeččaw gar yimdanen; ad nadiγ anda ur ttnaγen ara medden, ad zedγeγ dinna’’. Tenna-as tjeğğigt-nni: ‘’Ad dduγ yid-k’’. Dγa tenṭeg γef tayet n Faskan, tedda yid-s. Ddan akka cwiṭ, ufan ijeğğigen γef yiri n ubrid. Sastnen daγen Faskan sani iteddu, imi asen-yenna, ddan-d ula d nutni yid-s. Seg yimir anda yufa ijeğğigen, imi ẓran d acu yettnadi, ddan yid-s. Ddan ayen ddan, lḥan ayen lḥan, ufan yiwet n taddart γef yiri n wasif. Asif-nni yerked, yezzi-as-d i taddart-nni kra yellan d imγi, kra yellan d ajeğğig. Yenna-as Faskan: ‘’Deg taddart-agi, tella talwit, tettbin γef lebεid. Kecmen ɣer taddart-nni, Faskan akk d ijeğğigen-nni yeddan yid-s. Nsan dinna. Ar tafrara, yesla i medden ttnaγen. Yekker-d yessasten acimi. Nnan-as-d d yiwen iwumi ukren iselman(iḥutiwen) i yefser γef yiri n wasif, yerra-tt-id γef unarag-is(lğar-is). Dγa yessaki-d Faskan ijeğğigen-nni i d-yeddan yid-s, yenna-asen: ‘’Yyaw a ziγ ula di taddart-agi ttnaγen medden γef ulac. Ihi kemmlen abrid-nsen. Ijeğğigen-nni yakk yellan γef yiri n wasif ddan yid-s. Ur yeqqim ujeğğig deg taddart-nni…

  Tettkemmil Imyura.net 

  
 Gar tdukliwin tidelsanin timenza i yellan deg unnar n yidles, ad naf tiddukkla tadelsant Tigejdit N At Zɛim i d-yettwaxelqen deg useggas n 1990, mebɛed tufɣaɣ n tmendawt tamaynut n 1989 i yesemḥen i uslali n yikabaren n tsertit d tdukliwin yemxalafen.

  Amecwar n teddukla 

 Tigejdit, d ajgu alemmas n yixxamen n leqbayen d nettat i d lsas n uxxam. Tiddukkla-a, tewwi-d amecwar ɣezzifen, imi tella yakan tqeddec deg unnar n yidles seg yiseggasen n 1980 anda i d-tesileɣ aṭas n terbuyaɛ n umezgun akkd cenna, maca tiddukla tlul-d s wudem unsib deg useggas n 1990. Iɛeggalen n tdukla d imezdaɣ n taddart n At Zɛim, taɣiwant n lemɛatqa. Sɛan lḥir meqqren deg useḥbiber ɣef wansayen, leɛwayed d tgemmi. Aya, yettili-d s leqdicat yemxalafen i d-tetteheggi tdukla tadelsant seg wasmi d-tettwaxleq ar ass-a.

  Asalay n tdukla 

 D yiwet n tikti s wazal-is i d-fkan yiɛeggalen n Umusu adelsan n Tgejdit N At Zɛim. Xedmen asalay-a deg uxxam n tesqamut n taddart anda i d-gemren akk ayen yesɛan assaɣ d tgemmi d yidles amaziɣ s umata. Deg usalay-agi, ad naf aṭas n wallalen iqburen i sseqdacen leqbayel deg tudert-nsen n yal ass, ladɣa deg yiseggasen yezrin. Nezmer ad nebder kra seg wallalen-agi i icudden agdud aqbayli ɣer umezruy -ines d tmagit-nsen : llan wallalen n ufexxar neɣ n talaxt, sseqdacen yimdanen deg tudert-nsen, aladɣa leḥwal anda jemɛen lɣellat yemxalafen, am ukufi anda ḥerzen nneɛma d tazart, tugicin, abuseqqi, sḍel, d wallalen n tyerza, n uzeṭṭa d waṭas-nniḍen yeɛnan tigemmi.

  Aheggi n tmeɣra n tzemmurt 

 Gar tjur (isekla ) yesɛan azal meqqren deg tɣerma tamaziɣt seg send tallalit n Sidna Ɛisa ɣer wass-a, tella tzemmurt i yettuneḥsaben d azamul ɣer yimaziɣen. Ɣef wanect-a ihi, i as-tefka tdukla Tigejdidt N At Zɛim azal ameqqran imi gar leqdicat-is igejdanen d aheggi n tmeɣra n tzemurt, i yebdan deg useggas n 2009. Seg yimir, ttheggin-d yiɛegalen n tdukla-agi akked yimezdaɣ n taddart tameɣra n tzemurt, i yettilin d tajmilt i tejra n uzemmur u d abrid n useḥbiber ɣef tejra-agi. Tettili-d tmeɣra-agi yal aseggas deg taggara n ujmaɛ n lɣella deg wagur n meɣres , d tagnit anda ttemlilin akk yimḍebbren n tfellaḥt, imussnawen, imɛelmen n tesyar d yifellaḥen i yesqerdicen ɣef yiɣeblan yemxalafen.

  Tigejdit d aɣerbaz deg umezgun 

 Ayen iɣer tezzi lwelha deg leqdic n tdukla-a, d aḥric n umezgun, imi seg wasmi d-tettwaxleq ɣer tura, tesɛa ma drus 20 n tceqqufin n umezgun, d watas n sketchs. Amur ameqqran n tceqqufin, heddrent-d ɣef waṭas n yisental, aladɣa timetti, leɣerba, tilelli, tugdut, Tawacult…atg. Gar tceqqqufin-agi, ad naf, taceqquft Imeḥbas, Tacbaylit, Aɣerbaz, Pinuca d waṭas-nniḍen. Rnu ɣef wayen akk i d-nebdar, leqdicat yeɛnan amezruy, tasekla, tamedyazt, azẓawan d ccna… ɣer yidis n temsirin n zyada i yinelmaden n yeswiren yemxalafen, d wid yetteheggin i yikayaden. Deg leḥsab aneggaru i d-tefka tenmehla n yidles, azal n 6 000 n tdukliwin tidelsanin i inegren, tid d-yeggran d ixutay. 

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Tebda tezrigt tamezwarut n Rreḥba taɣelnawt n tfellaḥt d usnulfu, tasebḥitn wass-agi n letnayen amenzu n tuber 2018, ad ikemmel ttiɛad azekka d seldazekka.

 D tazeqqa n waddal Said Tazrou n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ideg i d-yettili leqdic-agi meqqren, yewwin asentel-agi: “Asnulfu i lmend n teɣlest timseččit”. D taxxamt n tfellaḥt n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu (CAW) i d tamsuddest n rreḥba-agi i ijemlen ugar n 300 n yimsikniyen, i d-yerzan seg 13 n lwilayat n tmurt n Lezzayer. Ma d iswi n rreḥba-agi, “D asexdem n wallalen atraren deg tfellaḥt ara d-yuɣalen s ubaɣur ɣef tdamsa n tmurt”, i d-yenna imḍebber amezwaru n ssrabes n tfellaḥt n lwilaya-a Mass Laib Makhlouf. Ikemmel yenna-d “D abrid swayes ara neǧǧren abrid gar tesdawit akked yifellaḥen, i wakken ad yili usfaydi s tmussni d yinadiyen n yisdawen-agi deg uḥric-agi n tfellaḥt akked tiknulujit tamaynut”. Am wakken daɣen i d-yenna belli, “ Rreḥba-agi d tagnit daɣen, ara d-yessemlilen imussnawen n tiknulujit d yifellaḥen, i wakken ad yili useḥres n usexdem n tarrayin tijdidin n ufares, yettɛawanen deg usnerni n lɣella d usefti ugar di kra n urmud i ixeddem ufellaḥ”. Walan-tt diɣ yimsuddsen-agi, d ttawil i usnerni n useǧhed n tɣara n yifarisen idiganen, d tallelt daɣen s tmuɣli tatrart i ufellaḥ d imsefti s umata. Rnu ɣur-s, d tagnit i useǧhed n wassaɣ gar uḥric n tfellaḥt d win n unadi ussnan (tasdawit). Yetturaǧu sya ar seldazekka, ad rzun ɣer din wazal n 200 000 n yimerriyen, ama si lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu ama seg lwilayat-nniḍen n tmurt. Azal n 100 n yimseftiyen deg uḥric n tfellaḥt i d-yeskanen axeddim-nsen, 90 n yimsikniyen-nniḍen iseftan deg uḥric n tdamsa, ttmalen-d i medden ayla-nsen. Ugar n 120 n yimsikniyen-nniḍen d wid ixeddmen aseglet (transformatoin) n yisufar-a: ayefki, aguglu, tamemt…atg d wiyaḍ. Mazal ad ikemmel wahil n rreḥba-agi tamezwarut, deg sin wussan-agi sdat-nneɣ, gar yisaragen akked temsikniyin, asenɛet n tarrayin timaynutin n tfellaḥt, akked waṭas n leqdicat-nniḍen. Am wakken diɣ ara d-ilint snat n temsizzliyin, yiwet deg uḥric n tfellaḥt tayeḍ deg usnulfu, ad ttwaferqen warrazen n temsizzliyin-agi ass n larabɛa deg tesfugla n taggara. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, rreḥba-agi tettili-d s tallelt n waṭas n yidisan di lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, yecban tanmehla n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu n ssrabes n tfellaḥt, aseqqamu aɣerfan awilay (APW)…atg ɣer tama n ssrabes n tfellaḥt n lwilaya-a timsuddest.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Iberreḥ-d yimḍebber i ibedden i lmendad n tesɣunt Aselmad, Mass Mhenna Halit, d akken aheggi i tesɣunt deg wuṭṭun-is wis semmus a-t-an deg ubrid. Tasɣunt n tikkelt-a, ad d-tili i lmend n yennayer 2969, ɣef waya i d-yefka azemz n beddu n uceyyeɛ n yiḍrisen ara yilin gar 25 unbir d 25 duǧember 2018. D tagnit i wid i ḥemmlen tira s tmaziɣt ad kkin s yiḍrisen-nsen. Deg yiwet n tama, mačči ala iselmaden i izemren ad kkin. Seg tama-nniḍen,ɣef wakken i d-yenna daɣen, tikkelt-a mačči ala s yiḍrisen n tsekla neɣ s tmucuha i yezmer umyaru ad yekki, maca ula d win yesɛan neɣ ixedmen timsirin n tmaziɣt s tarrayt ur nelli ara yakan, yezmer ad tent-iceyyeɛ. D tagnit, ama i yiselmaden ara yafen tallelt deg temsirin-a, ama i yinelmaden, ara d-iḥiwcen ayen iwumi sran. I win yebɣan ihi, yeggra-d kan, ad d-yazen ɣer usebter n Facebook “Tasɣunt Aselmad“ neɣ “Mehenna Firmus Halit”. Ahaw ihi, tasɣunt Aselamd la ken-tettraǧu, ad awen-teqqar cemmret i yiɣallen tarum. Sya ar yimir, afud igerrzen.

  A. K. 

  
 Aṭas n wansayen i tesεa tmurt n leqbayel, tessemgarad-itt ɣef tiyaḍ. Am tmeɣriwin, aẓawan, llebsa akked wayen icudden ɣer tgella neɣ tazuri.

 Xas ulamma temxalaf teflest, tikwal yettwazday ddin. Seg leεwayed i d-ǧǧan lejdud, d azday n tdukli n at taddart, ad naf zzerd (timecṛet), i d-ttheggin yimḍebbren n tuddar i wakken ad as-fken lḥeq-is uẓawali, neɣ agujil. Ansay-agi, d ttiεad i tegmat d tumert, d timlilit i d-yessemlalayen aṭas n medden i d-irezzun ula seg tɣiwanin-nniḍen. Ass n sed iεeddan, tewweḍ-d nnuba n At Smaεel. Yella-d ttiεad deg ljamaε n Tizi Lwali deg At Tεisiwt. Imeqqranen n taddart, uɣen-d azal n 5 n wayyugen (izgaren), ma yella d lweεdat, teggeḍ ar 7 n yiqelwacen. Send timezliwt n yiqerruyen-a, yella-d unejmuε gar-asen, ideg i d-berrḥen s ssuma n yiwet n tunt i ileḥqen ɣer 2 400 DA. Wid i d-yerzan, ɣas ma yella zran belli ssuma n tunt tettruḥu seg 2 000 armi d 2 600 DA, meεna tessewhem-iten ssuma-a, imi ttwalin-tt ɣlayet aṭas.
