Yenna-aɣ-d yiwen n urgaz:« Limer ad d-aɣeɣ 2 n lkilu seg tḥanut ara ffɣeɣ deg temsalt, 2 400 DA ɣlay aṭas, yerna mačči d taɣara yelhan ». Ma yella d yiwen umɣar yenna-aɣ-d: « Ad t-id-aɣeɣ ɣas ma yella s umelyun, ad t-id-aɣeɣ s tinna n nnif i wakken ansay-a ur yettruḥu ara. Yerna idrimen-agi ur ttruḥun sani, ad ilin i ubaɣur n yiẓawaliyen d yigujilen n taddart s umata ».

   K.K. 

  
 Ass-nni n lǧemɛa 18 maggu 2018, yella-d wammas adelsan n Smaoun deg ttiɛad n usuddes n yiwet n temlilit taseklant s wazal-is akked Mass Ahmed Djenadi imsuffeɣ n ssinima. D asarag ideg i d-yewwi awal s telqeyt ɣef wayen yerzan ssinima amaziɣ s umata d tin n teqbaylit s wuzzig. Lewhi n 21h00 n yiḍ, tazeqqa teččur, tasussmi ters-d ɣer lqaɛa. Imir yebda bab n usarag awal-is ɣef usentel-agi: “Ssinima n teqbaylit, gar tamaɣant akked tmeẓriwt”. Imselay-d deg-s Mass Djenadi, ɣef teɣzi n uzgen n ssaɛa ɣef yisurifen imenza i d-tewwi ssinma s teqbaylit, d wanda tewweḍ deg tizi n wass-a. Ihder-d diɣ ɣef umecwar d tegnatin ideg i d-tɛedda deg umezruy-is, am wakken daɣen i d-imeslay ɣef tɣara n ssinma n teqbaylit, i yellan gar cwiṭ d waṭas. Mi yessuli awal-is, yella-d uskasi s yisteqsiyen d tririt. Ma ɣef lewhi n 22h00 n yiḍ, yella usenɛet n usaru-agi n teqbaylit “Wwin-t, wwin-t”, ɣef teɣzi n ssaɛa d uzgen, syin yella i tikkelt-nniḍen uskasi, acu kan tikkelt-a ɣef usaru-agi. Ad nesmekti kan belli, asaru-agi “Wwin-t, wwin-t” d netta i d amsuffeɣ-ines.

  Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Ass n letnayen, 29 deg yebrir-agi yezrin, llan-d yikayaden yerzan imdanen yellan deg wammas n uɛiwed n ttrebga i d-yezgan deg temdint tajdidt deg Wehran. Sserzin akayad-a wazal n 265 yimeḥbas ɣef teɣzi n wass. Tanezzayt, llan-d yikayaden n umezruy d tussna i wid yesɛan aswir n tesnawit, tutlayt n taɛrabt d tusnakt i wid yesɛan aswir amenzu deg usedwel. Ma d tameddit, sɛeddan tutlayt n tefransist i yiswiren deg sin. 

 D iselmaden n yiɣerbazen i d-yellan i lmendad n tɛessast n yikayaden-a d tuddsa deg tmarit n ufraq n yisteqsiyen d ujmaɛ n tferkitin n tririyin. Yal aseggas lawan-a, yettili-d ukayad akka am wa, acku kra seg wid ara d-yufraren deg tsuddutin-a, ssenqasen-asen-d seg wakud i asen-ḥekmen, tikwal yettaweḍ almi d aseggas neɣ sin i wid iḥekmen s 10 n yiseggasen d asawen. Daɣen d tagnit akken ad qerben acemma ɣer tudert icudden ɣer tmetti u ad ttun lemḥan d tmental iɣef ttwarzen.

  K. A. 

  
 Tutlayt n tmaziɣt d yidles n teqbaylit sran i leqdic ur nḥebbes ara, akken ad ṭṭfen deg umrar n zzman ur ttneqraḍen ara. Ayagi yessebgan-it-id leqdic i tt-gen warraw-is, yal wa deg taɣult i iḥemmel, yal wa s ttawil d tezmert i as-yettunefken. 

 Acu kan ayen yessewhamen yessefraḥen ɣef yiwet n tikkelt, d akken llan wid ur nelli ara d Iqbayliyen, maca yella wayen i ten-id-ijebbden ɣur-s. Imi refden taqbaylit, nudan, qedcen fell-as mačči d cwiṭ, ǧǧan-d igerrujen ur nrekku, ur nkeffu. Seg Ben Sdira, ar Jean Marie Dallet, ar Madeleine Allaine d Lucienne Brousse, ar waṭas n yicennayen seg Lurup neɣ si Marikan i icerken leqdic d yinaẓuren iqbayliyen am Yidir, Akli D, Ali Amrane…atg.

 Uli Rohde d yiwet i iḍefren abrid-a, d yiwet i irefden taqbaylit s tfenṭazit ɣas ur d-tlul ara d taqbaylit neɣ d tamaziɣt. D tin i d-yekkren deg tmura n lǧennet, tadra-ines seg tmurt n Lalman yettwassnen s waṭas n yimezdaɣ iqbayliyen. Tettidir Uli di tmurt n Fransa, dɣa din i tessen ddeqs n yimeɣnasen d yinaẓuren. 

 D ayen i tt-yeǧǧan ad d-tessekfel lesrar lqayen n teqbaylit, acku nettat d tin i iḥemmlen anadi di tẓuri d yidles akken bɣun ilin. Imi tufa di teqbaylit d tutlayt n umezruy, d tutlayt n yidles, d idles n unefli, dɣa annect-a yeǧǧa-tt ad tecrek, ad tekki deg yal anda tella temlilit neɣ tfaska neɣ tmeɣra i icudden ɣer teqbaylit. Talmant-agi, anda ma tedda tettban si lebɛid s teksiwt-nni n teqbayliyin i as-yernan di thuski i tekseb, i d-tewret seg ccbaḥa n talmaniyin. 

 Telmed kra deg teqbaylit, seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ, tettali-d ɣer usayes, tcennu tizlatin n Lwennas Meɛtub i teḥfeḍ seg wul, uqbel ad tebdu ameslay, labud ad d-tezwar seg wazul. Trezzu ula ɣer tmura n tmazɣa yal mi d-teḥḍer tegnit, ama di Merruk neɣ di Lezzayer. Talmant-agi i d-tekseb teqbaylit, tezga tessebɣas kra n wayen i icudden ɣer tmazɣa deg usebter-is n uẓeṭṭa inmetti Facebook, s tira neɣ s tvidyutin, ula d isem-is tefka-as rruḥ n teqbaylit, ad t-naf yura akka Uli ul-iw Rohde. Ayendin n Leqbayel i yeṭṭafaren leqdic-is. Uli Rohde d amedya n tidet i wid-nni yeqqaren tamaziɣt yeǧǧa-tt zzman. 

 D amedya n ṣṣeḥ i wid yekkaten ṭṭbel deg waman. D amedya n lebda i wid yebɣan ad ttwassnen ɣef uɛrur n teqbaylit d usenqed n tidet d wid iqeddcen s tkerkas. Tanemmirt i tmeɣnast-a, teɣzi n leɛmer d wafud anezmar i as-nessaram.
  Khaled Achoui 

  
 Tettwassen tɣiwant n Tsexṛiwt s yidigan icebḥen nezzeh, amedya acercuṛ n Kefrida, d win n Tẓebbucin. Mebla ma nettu ccbaḥa n yidurar, am udrar Amellal, d udrar n Takkuct. 

 Lameεna tahuski-a ur tt-fuṛsen ara yemḍebbṛen n tɣiwant akken ilaq, imi ur fkan ara azal i ugerruj-a agaman, dɣa tala n Tmizert d amedya. Taneggarut-a i d-yezgan di taddart n At Ɛli Umḥend, d asεay d agaεmir i yimezdaɣ, acku, rnu i waman-is iṣemmaḍen i d-yettarran ṛṛuḥ i umuḍin, aman-is d lεali-ten daɣen i wid yesεan lehlak n tgeẓẓal. Daymi i d-rezzun ɣur-s ula seg tuddar-nniḍen. 

 Ad d-nesmekti d akken, liḥala n tala-a ur tellhi ara, imi acḥal-ayagi segmi i tettwabna, ihi ilaq-as ureqqeε s temɣawla. Xas ma yella wid teεna temsalt sεuzzgen imeẓẓuɣen-nsen, lamaɛna faqen yilemẓiyen n taddart d akken zemren ad tt-ḥerzen nutni, xeṛṣum s wayen iwumu zemmren. 

 D ayen i ten-yeǧǧan, gren-d tiɣṛi i yimezdaɣ i waken ad ten-εiwnen s wayen ṣṣawḍen. Di laεḍil ad d-jemεen cwiṭ n temεiwna, arrac-a ad zwiren deg usizdeg-is. Dɣa, Nessaram-assen afud igerrzen di leqdic-nsen.
  K. K. 

  
 Yella-d ass-nni n letnayen 19 meɣres 2018, ɣef 11h00 d tasawent, usarag sɣur uselmad d umnadi Said Chemakh akked umeɣnas Mouloud Lounaouci. Wwin-d awal ɣef temsalt n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ s umata. Ma d asentel n temlilit-agi taseklant d wagi: “Timmuzɣa, d tidet d tidin ɣer sdat neɣ d tirga mxalfa”. Fursen yimsaragen-agi tagnit i wakken ad cidden aṭas n tlufa yerzan tamaziɣt ass-a. Yella-d usqerdec n tikta gar-asen d yisdawanen d yiselmaden yeččuren tazeqqa n yisaragen n Ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ n tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu. D mass Lounaouci, i d-yebdan ameslay ɣef umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt. Yuɣal s amezruy n temsalt-agi, yebda-tt-id si tezɣent tamaziɣt 1949, syin iruḥ ɣer tallit n timunent 1962-1963, ikemmel armi i d-yelḥeq ɣer tefsut n yimaziɣen 1980 akked tefsut taberkant 2001. Syin akkin, yemmeslay-d daɣen ɣef wayen i d-yettwaḥellan s umennuɣ-agi, yefka-d imedyaten n usnulfu n yigezda n tmaziɣt, asekcem-ines deg uɣerbaz…atg. Deg umeslay-is ɣef tmurt umaziɣ, yenna-d: “D timmuzɣa s timmad-is i d tamurt-nneɣ, d Tafriqt n ugafa i d ayla-nneɣ”. Yewwi-d awal daɣen ɣef usurif ameqqran i d-telḥa tmaziɣt: di 2002 tuɣal tmaziɣt d tutlayt taɣelnawt di tmurt n Lezzayer; di 2016 tuɣal d tameslayt taɣelnawt tunṣibt am taɛrabt. Ɣef wannect-agi, yenna-d s usḥisef: “Limmer d lebɣi d tidet d tutlayt tunṣibt am taɛrabt, tili fkan-as ttawilat i d as-iwulmen”. Yerna yenna-d: “Nettwaxdaɛ s tmendawt n 2016, imi deg umagrad wis 4 i d-yennan belli ula d nettat d tutlayt tunṣibt. Acuɣer ur tt-id-seddan ara deg umagrad wis 212, i d-yettmeslayen ɣef lsisan n ddula tazzayrit ur netbeddil ara, dinna nnan-d belli d taɛrabt i d tutlayt taɣelnawt tunṣibt n uwanek. Ihi s wakka iban-d belli tella tnemgalt gar sin-agi n yimagraden”. Ikemmel yenna-d: “Ayen i d-fkan s ufus ayeffus ad teksen s ufus aẓelmaḍ, ulamma mačči s lebɣi n udabu i d-tettunefk tmaziɣt, imi d taswiɛt i t-iḥettmem ad tt-id-yefk”. Am wakken daɣen i d-yewwi awal ɣef tkadimit n tmaziɣt ara d-yilin deg wussan i d-iteddun, yenna-d belli yuggad ɣef tiddin-is, ur ilaq ara ad nebru i ṭṭbel deg waman. Ilaq ad tili d takadimit ara ixedmen i tmaziɣt merra, ilaq d tin iqeddcen, yettnadin, ara yellin tiwwura-s i uskasi. Ula d imḍebbren-is, ilaq ad ilin d imeɣnasen iqeddcen i lmend n tutlayt. Ma ɣef tantaliwin timaziɣin yenna-d: “Ilaq yal yiwen ad yexdem s tmeslayt-is, sya ɣer sdat ad d-tifrir yiwet ɣef tiyaḍ i wakken ad tuɣal d tamaziɣt”. Ɣer taggara n usarag-ines, yefka-d izen i yinelmaden ilmeẓyen i d-tewwi teswiɛt ad ilin d imeɣnasen. Ma si tama-s Said Chemakh, i d-yemmeslayen aṭas ɣef tiddin n tmaziɣt di tmendawt n tmurt n Lezzayer, yenna-d belli: “D tidet, yella umgared gar umekkan n tutlayt taɛrabt d win n tutlayt tamaziɣt”. Iserwes gar tantaliwin, dɣa yenna-d : “I 14 n tantaliwin timaziɣin, ur mxalafent ara taseddast neɣ tajerrumt, mgaradent kan deg umawal akked yireṭṭalen”. Yemmeslay-d daɣen ɣef wamek negrent tutlayin n umaḍal, dɣa yefka-d leḥsabat n UNESCO, i d-yeqqaren belli gar 600 000 n tutlayin yellan deg ddunit, sya ɣer 2050 azal n 300 000 seg-sent ad negrent, amur ameqqran deg-sent d tutlayin timawiyin. Nutni ḥesben tamaziɣt gar tutlayin i qrib ad suffɣent tarwiḥt, ihi ilaq fell-aɣ ad nesseḥbiber fell-as, uqbel ad ifat lḥal. Imi akka tura ddeqs n tantaliyin n tmaziɣt i inegren deg tmurt-nneɣ, amedya n tgergent akked tzennatit…atg. Ikemmel ameslay-is ɣef umecwar i d-telḥa tmaziɣt, yenna-d belli: “Nezger-d i wasif mazal yettraǧǧu-aɣ lebḥer, ihi mazal leqdic s waṭas sya ɣer sdat”. Ijeb-d daɣen tamsalt n usiskel n tmaziɣt, ibeggen-d rray-is deg-s dɣa yenna: “Nekni nextar asekkil n tlatinit, imi nebɣa ad tennerni tmaziɣt deg yal iḥricen, ma d imussnawen-agi n ddqiqa taneggarut yebɣan ad tt-arun s taɛrabt, awer tettwaru ayaxir, ma d asekkil n tifinaɣ ad yeqqim d azamul”. Ma ɣef 14h00 d tasawent, yella-d uskasi ama sɣur yinelmaden n ugezdu n tmaziɣt ama s yigezda n tutlayin-nniḍen neɣ si tama n yiselmaden n ugezdu-agi i d-iheggan leqdic-agi. 

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Isufar </span>

 -Snat n tmeqqunin n bibras

 – awren

 -zzit n uzemmur

 -snat n tdeggar n ticcert

 -tibselt

 -ifelfel azegzaw

 -lmelḥ

 <span style="text-decoration: underline;"> Aheggi </span>

 Sirdet bibras-nni, syin tgezmem-t d iḥricen imecṭaḥ, d ireqqaqen. Terrem-t daxel n tbaqit, ternum-as awren, lebsel, ifelfel azezaw, ticcert akked lmelḥ. Txelḍem-ten s ufus mebla ma tɛerkem-ten. Imir ternum-as 3 n tɣenjawin n lmakla n zzit uzemmur, ternum tɛerkem-t. Jemɛet-d arekti-nni, txedmem snat n takurin. Suzret lfarina ɣef telwiḥt i ɣef txeddmem, tmeslem takurt-nni d taqrist s ufus. Seḥmut aḍajin, syin tewwet taqrist-nni seg yal tama. S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Zik-nni, ḥekkun d akken tella yiwet n temɣart, yesɛan taɣadt, teqqim aggur n yennayer kamel, ur teksi ara aɣersiw-is imi, aseggas-nni, yexser lḥal mačči d izli : ageffur, adfel akked usemmiḍ, zgan deg wussan n waggur-nni. Asmi ifuk yennayer, tecreq-d tafukt, yeḍher-d lḥal. Teffeɣ-d temɣart-nni akked taɣadt-is, tekker tetmesxir ɣef yennayer, tenna-as : « Xemsa deg wallen-ik ! Tfukkeḍ, truḥeḍ, ur tesɛiḍ d acu i yi-txedmeḍ ! ». Akken i as-yesla yennayer, yezɛef, yerza ɣer furar, yenna-as: « Ttxil-k a ɛemmi Furar, rḍel-iyi yiwen wass deg wussan-ik, ad nɣeɣ tamɣart-agi, aqemmuc n lɛar ! ». Yerḍel-as Furar yiwen wass deg wussan-is. Ciṭ kan akka, teččur-d tegnewt s usigna, la tberreq, la treɛɛed, tebda-d lehwa syin d adfel, yettzuffu-d waḍu. Tamɣart-nni, di berra, teqqur s usemmiḍ, temmut, nettat d taɣadt-is. Seg wass-nni, yettusemma wass aneggaru n yennayer d amerḍil n temɣarin. Xas ulamma, ḥekkun-d akk ɣef temɣart-a akked waggur n yennayer, acu kan yal tamnadt n tmazɣa, amek i d-tettawi taqsidt-a. Llan wid i d-yeqqaren, yiwen wass kan i d-yerḍel yennayer ɣer furar. Llan wiyaḍ,qqaren-dyemsex usemmid tamɣart, dɣa, yerra-tt d asebdad. Yella anda i d-ttilin sebɛa n wussan n umerḍil. Seg wakken terkeb tugdi ifellaḥen seg teqsidt-agi, zik-nni, uɣalen ur ssufuɣen ara lmal-nsen akk aggur n yennayer. I wakken ad sdergen tugdi-agi,qqaren-as, nttaǧǧa lmal deg udaynin imi sseḥmuyen axxam deg waggur n yennayer, i isemmḍen ugar n wiyaḍ deg useggas. Ɣef wanect-a, diɣ, i d-snulfan ssuk deg yal tamnadt,ɣef wakken i d-ḥekkun. Seg tmurt Merruk akked Libya, ssexlaɛen s temɣart-agi igerdan i yettagin ad ččen akken iwata imensi n yennayer, qqaren-asen : « Ad teččem imensi-nwen, neɣ ad d-tas temɣart, ad teldi akerciw-nwen, ad t-teččar s walim ».

  S tgemmi n tmaziɣt 

  
 Gadry seg yicennayen at lasel aferkan, i icennun seg wacḥal-aya tura tizlatin n uɣewwaɣ Lwennas Meɛtub. Nesteqsa-t di tdiwennit-a, yerra-aɣ-d. 

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen : Meslay-aɣ-d cwiṭ fell-ak… 
 Gadry : Luleɣ di Fransa, di temnaḍt n Aubervilliers i d-yezgan di Seine-Saint-Denis. Yemma d Tafransist, baba d Aɣinyan. Ddreɣ, mɣureɣ di Saint Denis, di wis 93. Daymi aql-i d bu sin n yiẓuran s yidles afransis! 

  Amek tesliḍ s Meɛtub Lwennas i tikkelt tamezwarut ? 
 Ahat yesḥeyyir waya, maca ssneɣ Meɛtub Lwennas deg wass n lexmis 25 yunyu 1998, deg uɣmis n tiliẓri n tmeddit, nekk lliɣ ɛad d agrud. Ass-nni i as-tettwacelqef tudert! 

  Syin akkin, tebdiḍ tettsaraxeḍ-t, tcennuḍ tizlatin-is. Neɣ amek ?  
 Syin akkin, ssneɣ tizlatin-is i igerrzen ayendin s ubrid n yemma i d-yettawin seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ tisfifin d timaynutin d ayla-s ɣer uxxam. Bdiɣ dindin cennuɣ-tent-id war ma nudaɣ akk ad tent-lemdeɣ tazwara. Deg-s d ccna mačči d aɛaned acku, akken ttwaliɣ, ulac win izemren ad iɛaned ayen ur nettwaɛanad. Iban-iyi-d dɣa, urǧin i d-yusa waya ɣer wallaɣ-iw. D acu kan, d tidet, ɛerrḍeɣ ad iliɣ d imekdi i tezlatin-is tinasliyin. Neɣ akken-nniḍen, ad d-iniɣ mi ara cennuɣ, neɣ tturareɣ-d tizmilin, xeddmeɣ ɣef leḥsab n wamek ttḥulfuɣ daxel-iw.

  Neẓra yewɛer ad tecnuḍ s tutlayt ur tfehhmeḍ. Meslay-aneɣ-d ɣef waya d wayen i k-yerran ɣur Meɛtub Lwennas ?  
 Akken i ak-d-nniɣ yakan, mačči di ddhen-iw tazwara ad lemdeɣ tuɣac-is. Ḥemmleɣ-tent d tidet, maca urǧin sugneɣ-d ad lemdeɣ ad cennuɣ s tutlayt-a igerrzen, i yi-d-ibanen tewɛer imi d tanesbaɣurt. Ɣer taggara, iban-d ugemmuḍ-a. Tidet kan, qedceɣ maca war ma wwiɣ-d s lexber ! Ma d ayen i yi-ijebden ɣer Meɛtub Lwennas, d tizlatin-is uqbel kullci, iban!, Yesɛa aɣanib weḥd-s, i tuɣ ur ssineɣ deg wayen iɛeddan, maca am wakken yettban-iyi-d d awaculan, n twacult. Amzun lliɣ ssneɣ-tent yakan deg waṭas-aya !

  D anti-ten tezlatin-is i tcennuḍ s waṭas?  
 I uzayez, ad d-iniɣ tizlatin i cennuɣ s waṭas d tid i d-yettbanen ḥemmlen-tent ugar medden, i d-yettawin taḥawact n umecwar n Meɛtub Lwennas. 

  Tesɛiḍ aṭas n yineḍfaren di Tmurt n Yizwawen d Tmazɣa. Awal-ik ɣef waya…  
 Iban-iyi-d ur rǧiɣ, neɣ ur gziɣ ara amek zemreɣ ad sɛuɣ ineḍfaren. D acu kan, ahat yessaweḍ ad iḥaz uqeddic-iw, ad yeɛjeb ddeqs n yimdanen, acku ttawaḍen-iyi-d seg waṭas d aseggas tura, ar ass-a, yiznan n usebɣes, n usnemmer d yibeddi ɣur-i, seg waṭas n tamiwin. Ɛni, d ayen i yi-yesferḥen ! D aya i yi-yeǧǧan ad d-snulfuɣ targa-w n YouTube taggara-a, acku buhan i yi-yessutren aya. Iban-d yewwi-d tili ahat ddiɣ-asen di lebɣi lawan-nni! Lḥasul, d iseɣ ɣur-i mi ḥsiɣ ɛejbeɣ i waṭas n Yizwawen, i yellan d aɣref n yirgazen d tlawin s ttzuxxuɣ aṭas, i ttqadareɣ, i ttɛuzzuɣ.

  Yaḍra tesɛiḍ kra n yisenfaren ?  
 Taggara, ad d-iniɣ belli akken yella lḥal akked tuget n yirgazen d tlawin di ddunit, sɛiɣ ula d nekk isenfaren. Yiwen seg-sen d aheyyi n yigalaten di Lezzayer, send kullci, deg wul n Tmurt n leqbayel ɛzizen i cedhaɣ buhan. Maca, ahat daɣen anda-nniḍen, ma yella ad yekki waya deg usiweḍ n uqeddic, amezruy, amennuɣ, tiktiwin, izen n Meɛtub Lwennas akked yidles-is d win n yirgazen d tlawin i yennan UHU i lbaṭṭel, i yemmuten s yibeddi wala ma ddren knan! 

  Awal-ik n taggara…  
 Awal-iw n taggara, ad d-iniɣ, akken i t-id-qqareɣ dima, tezmer Tmurt n leqbayel ad tzux s tarwa-s. Aɣref-a Amaziɣ i ttawiɣ i lebda deg wul-iw, d ttbut d akken nezmer ad nenɣ akk imazunen i nebɣa, s waṭas n tweḥcanit, maca d awezɣi ad nessusem iznan-nsen. Tanemmirt.
  Yesteqsa-t M. K. 

  
 Tenna-as : « I wakken ad nefγen, ilaq ad tezluḍ tafunast tamezgult, tin leεmeṛ nuriw, ad tt-tebḍud mnaṣef, nnefṣ ad t-id-tdegṛeḍ, ad n-ssaliγ arraw-iw, nnefṣ-nniḍen mi t-id-tdegṛeḍ ad n-aliγ nekkini » . Yekker urgaz yexdem i as-tenna. Mi d-teffeγ yenna-as urgaz-is ad as-d tini d acu i yeḍṛan yid-s, tenna-as : « Awit-d qbel stut i yerran gma d izerzer ! » Wwin-d stut tefka-as aman i yizerzer, yesswa-ten, yuγal-d gma-s akken yella. Ma yella d ultma-s, tessuter teqcict deg urgaz-is ad tt-zlun, ad tt-tesseww d lweεda, tceggeε taklit γer uxxam n ya-n-baba-s tenna-as : « Ad truḥeḍ ad as-tawiḍ tunṭict-agi i ya-n-baba ad as-tiniḍ d yelli-m i am-tt-id-yefkan, rnan γur-s wakniwen ». Tṛuḥ teklit, texdem akk ayen i as-tenna, ya-n-baba-s tamcumt tef̣f̣ef tunṭict s lfeṛḥ d ameqqran tesliliw rnan wakniwen γer yelli-s, tefreq lweεda i tǧiratin d teḥbibin, teqqim nettat d yelli-s tamecṭuḥt ad ččent, tettent, tettent armi twala teqcict-nni tiṭ n ultma-s, tenna-as : » A nnaγ a yemma tagi d tiṭ n Nanna Ca ! » . Tin, tini-as : « Ečč, ad yečč Ṛebbi aqerru-m, nanna-m, terbeḥ ha-tt-an deg uxxam-is s warraw-is ». Taqcict, tetteqlilih, tettεawad-as akken i yemma-s, almi twala tufa d tidet, dγa tekker i umeǧǧed d usemmermeγ: « A nnaγ a tiǧiratin, ččiγ aksum n yelli, a kra n tin iwumi fkiγ tunṭict ru fell-i timeqqict ». Ma yella d tagujilt-nni, tεac nettat d warraw-is, d gma-s, d urgaz-is di lehna d lfeṛḥ. Tamacahut-iw lwad lwad, wwiγ-tt-id i warraw n lleǧwad, uccanen ad ten-yeqqed Ṛebbi. Ma d nekkni ad aγ-yeεfu Ṛebbi.

  S tgemmi n teqbayli 

  
  Aḥric wis 3 

 Azekka-nni, tessefqed s aẓekka n yemma-s am yal ass, tewwi yid-s axeclaw-nni, teẓẓa-t γef uẓekka, tettru, tettru, tettru almi uγalen yimeṭṭawen-is ugaren taεwint, yeswa yis-sen uxeclaw-nni. Yegma uxclaw-nni, yerna yeffγ-d deg-s yiwen useklu “ ttejṛa “ igerrzen. Tuɣal Mm yiγiγden, trezzu kraḍ n tikkal deg wass γer uẓekka n yemma-s, tettru, tettεenni s ddaw useklu-nni. Yal tikkelt tettwali yiwen ufṛux d acebḥan yettadad gar yifurkan-is. Mi tεenna deg-s kra, ad as-t-id-iḍeggerr din, din war tuzya d tunḍa neγ yejneε yefne&amp;epsilon,; ugur ur yelli. Yewweḍ-d wass ideg agellid n at Mliyikečč ira ad isseḥḍer tameγra ideg ad tt-id-uraren iḍebbalen, icennayen, tawsa d waẓ akin, ad yenced akk tullas n yal tamnaṭ akken ad yefren mmi-s tin ad as-yeččaṛen tiṭ. Akken i d-yewweḍ isalli, tirbibin n baba-s n Mm yiγiγden, uccagent γer lewqam war ma uḥtament. Ssawḍent-as isalli ula i nettat mi akken i d as-sawlent, nnant-as: ‘’Aha tura eğğ leqdic-nni, yya-d mmceḍ-aγ iqeṛṛa-nne&amp;gamma,; wenneε-a&amp;gamma,; gerrez-a&amp;gamma,; ssfeḍ-aγ daγen tarkasin alamma ttiṛṛiqent akken yessefk, nennubget s tujjma deg lbeṛj ugellid i lmend n tmeγra ara yesker akken ad yaf mmi-s tin ara yessenquqlen ul-is, ad tuγal d tameṭṭut-is ‘’. Teqdec-asent M yiγiγden akk ayen uṛğant seg-s, maca tettru daγen, acku ira wul-is ad teddu γer ccḍeḥ ula d nettat. Tessuter di yambaba-s “ tameṭṭut n baba-s” ad as-tanef ad teddu d yessi-s. Yambaba-s: ‘’Amek a yelli? Kemm a M yiγiγden yugaren sidna Yub ara yeddun s wammus d tebrek-nni yakk i kem-yulin γer tmeγra ugellid?’’ Ula d icettiḍen d tarkasin n menwala mačči tesεiḍ-ten am kemm am tezyiwin-im, ad aγ-d-ternuḍ tura ccḍeḥ-im? Ah a lalla, ah a lalla!’’ Seg wakken teggumma M yiγiγden ad as-tebru i wawal, terreẓ-as aqeṛṛu i yambaba-s s uεenni, tuγal tesseγli-d imeslayen-agi deg yimi-s taggara, tenna-as: ‘’H-t-an surgeγ-am iγiγden γer teqbuct n tεedsin, ad am-fkeγ snat tmirin (sswayeε), ma tessawḍeḍ tsefḍeḍ akk lğerra n yiγiγden, terriḍ yal aεeqqa yettiṛṛiq amzun werğin yumis, ad medleγ allen-iw, ad am-anfe&amp;gamma,; ad tedduḍ yid-sent. Taqcict akken tesla i lehḍuṛ-nni, teffeγ γer beṛṛa, terra γer deffir teḥnact, tessawel s igenni:

<blockquote>
  ‘’Ay aεssas ur neččax, ay at wass-a d yimir-n. 

  Azent-iy-id yakk ifrax, ceyyeεt-iy-id itbiren! 

  Yelwa s tqabubt s txenfuct, 

  Ad yesfed iγiγden seg teqbuct!” 

</blockquote>
 Tekcem γer teḥnact, tessa yiwet n tmeḥremt tazedgant γef tγerγert, tesmar-d γur-s tiεedsin-nni s iγiγden isebken fell-asent, teslal kan taqbuct-nni s waman almi i as-d-ččuṛen sin yitbiren tawwurt, din, din ḍefren-ten-id akk yifṛax yellan s ddaw yigenni mecḥen akk iγiγden-nni…

   Tettkemmil 

   Yerra-tt-id seg talmanit Essaid Ait Maamar 

  
 Medden akk ttcektin seg waddad n twennadt-nneɣ, ladɣa segmi i d-yekcem unebdu. Anda teddiḍ ad tafeḍ ahicur. Ama deg yiberdan-nneɣ, di tẓegwa, neɣ deg wafayen (littoraux). Ula d ibraḥen ur sliken ara, acku imezdaɣ n tuddar, zgan ttdeggiṛen amḍur-nsen sdat n yixxamen. D anwa-t umasay? Γas akka awanek ur yefki ara azal meqqer i temsalt-agi, imi urǧin llan-d yiṣudaf mgal adegger n ugudu di yal amḍiq. Rnu i waya, aṭas n tdayṛiwin ur nesεi amkan anda ara ḍeggrent iḍumman-nsent am tin n Yiɣil Ɛli i t-yettawin almi d Ssur Lɣezlan di Tubiret. Meεna ula d imdanen εemmden ttekkan deg wannect-a. Yak win yebɣan ad ibeddel ttexmam ad yezwir deg yiman-is?. Ur ilaq ara yiwen ad yessenṭeḍ tisebbiwin ɣer udabu kan. Imi win yebɣan, yezmer. Nesteqsa ddeqs n medden ɣef tifrat i ttwalin i uɣbel-agi.« Xussen ttawilat di tmurt-nneɣ. Aql-iken tettwalim timura iteddun ɣer sdat. Ahicur-agi atas ur nezri belli d agerruj, imi ayen yellan deg-s akk nezmer ad as-nεiwed aseqdec». I d-yenna Mass H.T d axeddam deg luzin. Si tama-nniḍen, tenna-aɣ-d yiwet n tmeṭṭut: « A win yufan yal yiwen ad yezwir deg uzrug-ines, ad t-yessezdeg, syin ad tizdig taddart, ad ilint tismin yelhan gar yimdanen, tid iwumu qqaren tismin n uεaned». Ihi limer ad yili lebɣi d usḥulfu n medden s wazal n wallus (recyclage) atas ara ibeddlen. Imi nnulfant-d ddeqs n tkebbaniyin n wallus i yeḥwaǧen afus n tallelt n yimdanen. Ladɣa deg ufran n uhicur-agi i ilaqen ad yebdu seg yixxamen. Ma d wayeḍ iwala ‘’Akka cwiya sɣur-i, azuḥ s ɣur-k, ad nbeddel addad ɣer wayen yelhan.

  K. K. 

  
 Ass n 8 deg meɣres, d ass agraɣlan n tmeṭṭut, d ass n usmekti n tmeḥḥqranit d meḥyaf i tettidir tmeṭṭut deg ddunit merra.

 D ass anda i d-tessutur tameṭṭut izerfan-is i iwatan ad ilin am win urgaz deg yal aḥric n tudert. Tameṭṭut mačči kan d takuzint, neɣ d ccɣul n uxxam. Tameṭṭut, d ajeǧǧigt, tameṭṭut, d asirem , d azekka n yiḍelli. Zik, tameṭṭut taqbaylit, ur nesɛi ara azref akken ad temmeslay, akken ad d-sbeggen ayen tezmar ad texdem. Xas akken, meɛan texdem, teǧǧa-d. Ma yella d ass n wass-a, teffeɣ-d tmeṭṭut si ṭṭlam-nni n zik akken ad d-tini : ‘’Zemreɣ ugar n tkuzint, ugar n wayen i yellan deg wallaɣ-nwen’’. Ttbut, ad t-naf deg unnar, imi ass-a, ha-tt-an taselmadt, d tanemhalt, d taneɣlaft, d timḍebber n tkabbanit…atg. Kecment yal aḥric n tudert, ula d annar i yellan zik i yirgazen kan, yecba lɛesker, iɣallen n laman d wid n usellek, kecment ula d annar n waddal n umennuɣ.

  Deg unnar n waddal 

 Lilia Akkouch d yiwet n tlemẓit i yesɛan 24 n yiseggasen di leɛmer-is , d yelli-s n temdint n Uqbu. Lilia, d tanaddalt deg la boxe Thai, tewwi-d amḍiq amezwaru deg talɣuɣa n ddunit n boxe Thai i d-yellan di temdint n Ban Nong Pru di tmurt n Thailand mgal yiwet n tnaddalt n tmurt n Marikan, anda Yelli-s n Uqbu tḥerra-d-d amḍiq amezwaru. D ayen i tt-yeǧǧan akken ad tili d talɣuɣt n ddunit n waddal n boxe Thai. Tekecmen Lilia deg waddal-a deg useggas n 2010 di temdint n Uqbu. Ɣef wid i as-yefkan afus n tallelt, tenna-d : ‘’Kecmeɣ deg waddal-a imi baba ula d netta d alɣuɣ n boxe englaise , gma daɣen d alɣuɣ n box thailansaise. Anect-a, iɛawen-iyi aṭas deg umecwar-iw. Di tazwara, yella baba mgal tikti–agi akken ad kecmeɣ deg boxe, imi d addal iweɛren aṭas, maca nek bɣiɣ-t. Syin ɣers, yuɣal yeqbel, yefka-iyi-d aṭas n wafud’’. Ma ɣef tmuɣli n tmetti s umata ɣef waddal-a, twala d akken :’’ Tamuɣli n timetti ɣer tmeṭṭut ur treḥḥem ara, meɛna nekk ur i yi-tewqiɛ ara deg-sen, zriɣ belli ad-yas wass anda tameṭṭut ad ten-tessusem s lebɣi-is, s leqdicat-is deg tmetti’’. Terna-d deg wawal-is ɣef tmeṭṭut taqbaylit : ‘’Ad iniɣ i tlawin tiqbayliyin, ur ttagademt ara ma yella tebɣamt ad tawḍemt ɣer tɣawsa , xas ulamma aṭas n yiɛewwiqen ara d-tafemt deg ubrid-nkent. Ilaq fell-akent, ad tsebremt, ad tinimt d akken tzemremt. Tiqbayliyin anda i tent-terriḍ, ad d-awint amekkan-nsentMačči kan daya i d-tefka Bgayet, imi tella daɣen tnaddalt-nniḍen. Xas ulamma tesɛa 19 n yiseggasen kan di leɛmer-is, meɛna tessaweḍ gar leɛlali deg waddal unti. Tagi d Thala Chikh. Thala, d tanelmadt n tutlayt n trumit, d tanaddalt n Judo. Tewwi-d amḍiq amezwaru deg talɣuɣa n Lezzayer. Tebda amecwar-is asmi tesɛa 6 n yiseggasen di leɛmar-is, tesɛa kraḍ n cciɛat n wureɣ. Tewwi-d amḍiq wis kraḍ di Talɣuɣa n tefriqt di tmurt n Maṣer. Aseggas iɛeddan, tewwi-d amḍiq wis kraḍ deg talɣuɣ n tmura taɛrabin di tmurt n Tunes. Nesteqsa Thala Chikh ɣef tmeṭṭut n wass-a, tenna-d : “Tameṭṭut taqbaylit n wass-a, teṭṭef tasga deg waddal”. 

 Yamani Souhila

  Tucbiḥt tamaziɣt n umaḍal 

 Aṭas n yicennayen i d-yewwin awal ɣef ccbaḥa n tmeṭṭut. Ccbaḥa-is d ayen i d-yettaken tahregt (inspiration ) i umedyaz akken ad yessefruri gar yifyar n yisefra-is ɣef ccbaḥa.

 Ad tili teẓrigt tamezwarut ‘’Tucbiḥit Tamaziɣit n umaḍal’’, ass n sebt, 10 di Meɣres, deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri. Yebda ujerred acḥal-aya. Aṭas n yiwudam yettwasnen i d-necden ɣer temsizelt-agi ad d-nader : Lounis Ait Manguellit, Hacen Ahris, Akli Yahiatène, Rabah Madjer, Safy Boutella , Hacen Benzirari, Lila Akkouche (Tanaddalt ), Said Hilmi, Djaffer Ait Manguellat, Ouali Rezki, Hakim Salhi , Massinissa chaoui, Mourad Guerbez , Djamila Mansouri, Ssouad Khelfaoui. Nesteqsa imḍebbar i d-iheggan timsizzelt-agi Mass Idir Saoudi ɣef yiswi-s yenna-d : “Sɛiɣ kraḍ n yiswiyen: amenzu bɣiɣ ad semlileɣ imaziɣen s temsizelt-a akken qqaren ‘ad temlal tassa d way turew’, syin akkin, bɣiɣ ad sbegnneɣ ccbaḥa n teqbaylit. Am wakken daɣen ssarameɣ limer ad d-yuɣal d yiwent tfaska ara d-yettilin yal aseggas’’, yerna-d : “Aṭas n yiwudam imaziɣen ara d-yilin d inebgawen n lḥerma di temsizzelt-agi , ssarameɣ d tin ara iɛeddin akken iwata”. 

  Yamani Souhila 

  
 Seg ssrabes n tujjya ideg i d-yettemlil umezdaɣ n Ayt Smaɛel aṭas n wuguren akken ad d-yeqḍu ccɣel-is, yella win yerzan taɣult n udawi n tuɣmas. Ama deg sbiṭar amecṭuḥ n Tizwal neɣ ɣur umsujji uslig. Ɣas mgaraden cwiṭ wuguren, maca sebba tagejdant, ɣef wawal n waṭas n yiɣermanen, d tin icudden ɣer tuqin n yimsujjiyen i yettxessen deg waṭṭanen n tuɣmas. Deg tzeqqa n Tizwal, seg wakken ḥaca yiwen n umsujji n tuɣmas i iqeddcen deg-s, yezga yeččaray wumuɣ n uraǧu armi d-ttɣiman wid iwumi ur d-tettsiḥ nnuba. Tikwal, yettekkar umennuɣ gar medden i d-irezzun d yiqeddacen neɣ d yimsujjiyen i yettabaɛen tazeqqa-nni. « Neɛya dayen deg yir liḥala n tzeqqa n Tizwal. Amek ṭṭebbat xussen maḍi deg-s, aduz (lanistizi) dima ifukk, nutni rzan sexdamen tudemt ɣef yimuḍan. Ilaq ɣef wid terza taluft, ad aɣ-frun aɣbel-a s zzirban », i d-tenna yiwet n tmeṭṭut seg Ayt Smaɛel. Ugar n waya, ula d imsujjiyen i ileddin tizeɣwa i yiman-nsen, ur ṭṭuqten ara deg tɣiwant n Ayt Smaɛel imi ḥaca yiwen i inuḥen seg wacḥal d aseggas tura. Yeǧǧa waya lɣaci teṭṭfen-d s tuɛert nnuba, abeɛda i ubeddel n uɣesmar neɣ i uselden (uplumbi) n tuɣmas-nsen. D ayen sɛeddayen dɣa tuget n yinelmaden i iɣesben deg udawi n walbaɛḍ n waṭṭanen n tuɣmas-nsen. « Ala deg yimuras i yeshel ɣef yiwen ad idawi tuɣmas, acku ɣas ad yettḥettem ad yerǧu ussan, ahil-is d ilem d ilem. Maca di teswiɛt-a, ilaq ad tbeṭṭleḍ axeddim berdayen i tuṭṭfa n nnuba d uqḍaw n ccɣel-nni », i d-yenna yiwen n ubabat. Si tama-nniḍen, yewwi-d ad d-nemmeslay ɣef teɣlayt n sswami ɣur umsujji uslig n tuɣmas ur d-nettsubbu seg 800 n yidinaren i uqlaɛ kan, wamma ayen-nniḍen s wugar maḍi. 

  M. K. 

  
 Sendiḍelli n ssebt, 22 deg waggur-agi n yunyu ideg nella, ɣef 14h00 n tmeddit, tella-d temlilit tis 98 n tidukla tadelsant Tiɛwinin n Buzgan. 

 D asarag, i d-yesduri deg Wammas adelsan Ferḥat Remḍan n tama n Buzgan deg lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu. D timlilit ideg i d-temmeslay tmarut d tneggalt akked tmedyazt Massa Cabḥa Ben Gana i d-yewwin awal s telqay ɣef wazal n tira s tutlayt n tmaziɣt, ladɣa tantala taqbaylit, imi ɣef wakken i t-id-tenna: “Ad meslayeɣ kan ɣef tira s teqbaylit, imi s kra n wayen ɣriɣ d ungal s teqbaylit i yettwaru, sarmeɣ yiwwas ad ɣreɣ ayen yettwarun s tantaliyin-nniḍen”.

  Tmeslay-d diɣ ɣef wungal yettwarun s teqbaylit, d acu i d azal-is deg tsekla tamaziɣt d tmaḍlant s umata. Tfurest diɣen tagnit, tneggalt-agi tilemẓit n 30 n yiseggasen, tewwi-d awal ɣef wazal n tutlayt d usenfali yis-is, anida i d-tenna belli: “S ttawil n tutlayt i nessawaḍ ad nsenfali ayen i d aɣ-iqerḥen, s yimeslayen i d aɣ-iɛeǧben…”. Am wakken daɣen, i d-tutlay ɣef tira n wungal-is amenzu i wumi tga isem-agi “Amsebrid” i d-yeffɣen deg furar yezrin ɣer tezrigin Imru di Tizi Uzzu, yerna yis-s i tufrar deg temsizzelt n tira Yamina Micakra n wungal amaziɣ deg useggas n 2018. 

 
 Yella-d daɣen uskasi sɣur wid i iffuden tamussni d yidles, imi netta teɛreḍ amek ara d-terr akk i yisteqsiyen i d as-yettunefken ɣef teɣzi n ssaɛa. Ɣer taggara maḍi, tella-d tegnit n usenzi s ubuddu n wungal-agi-ines i tura gar 2010 d 2012, i d-yeffɣen di furar 2019. 

 Ad d-nesmekti kan belli Cabḥa Ben Gana, d taneggalt s tmaziɣt s wugal-is amenzu “Amsebrid”, d tamarut daɣen n tullist “Amsebrid” di 2015. D tasdawantt deg ugezdu n tutlayt amaziɣ di tesdawt n Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, deg uswir n master 2 di tuzzagt n tsenalsit. Tlul ass n 30/12/1989, deg taddart n Kuku i d-yezgan di tɣiwant n At Yeḥya di Micli. 
  A. A. 

  
 Yal tikkelt tettnarnay tsekla tamaziɣt. Tikelt-a, d Mass Mohand Mechaour i d-yessufɣen ungal iwumi isemma Abrid n tefsut .Yeffɣen-d wungal-a ɣer teẓrigin Richa Elsam , ddurt i iɛeddan. Deg-s, yewwi-d amaru taqsidt n yiwetn teqcict isem-is Tafsut, i d-yekkren di tmurt n Fransa. Mi muqqret, tuɣal-d ɣer tmurt akked yimawlan-is akken ad bedden ɣer jeddi-s. Imir, ad yekcem uwadem iwumi isemma Amaziɣ. Ihi, tlul-d tayri gar-asen di tesnawit. Syin tefraq-iten tesdawit: nettat di Tizi Uzzu , ma yella d Amaziɣ di Lezzayer. Maca, tayri, teqqim am zik, armi i d-kkrent tmesbaniyin n 2001. Seg wurrif, ǧǧan tayri, uɣalen ɣer umennuɣ. Akka, dɣa, ara ilin waṭas n yineḍruyen ara. Tazwart n wungal, yexdem-itt-id Mass Rabḥi Ɛellawa. Ma yella d taggara,, yura-tt Mass Saɛid Cemmax. Yesɛa wungal 135 n yisebtar . Mass Mechaour d ilemẓi n 32 n yiseggasen. Yeɣra deg ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ di tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu. Syin, yewwi-d master di tesdawit n Bgayet. Akka tura, a-t-an yetthegi tazrawt n doctorat di tesnalest di temdint n Wehran .

  Y.S. 

  
 D tasqamut n taddart n Yiḥiṭussen akked Tiddukkla tadelsant “Sebɛa Zbari” n taddart-agi n Yiḥiṭussen, i d-iheggan tazrigt-agi tis ukkuẓet (4) n tfaska n tmeẓla (la forge), i yeddan ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan.

 Tebda tasebḥit n wass-nni n letnayen 6 deg waggur n ɣuct, tekfa tameddit n wass-nni larebɛa 8 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Tazrigt-agi tis rebɛa, fkan-as asentel “Tameẓla tamensayt: d tigemmi i usebɣer n tdamsa tamsedrart”. Tafaska-agi, tella-d deg usalay n taddart akked usebdad n yimeɣrasen n tegrawla tazzayrit 1954-1962. Llan-t ddeqs n temsikniyin, yecban, timsikent n wallalen n uḥeddad neɣ n umẓil d usegzi n twuri n yal yiwen seg-sen, sɣur yiḥeddaden n taddart-agi i mazal ṭṭfen deg tefḍisin-nni i d asen-ǧǧan yimawlan-nsen. Am wakken yella deg yinzi. “Yessers uḥeddad tafḍist, irfed-itt mmi-s”. Am wakken daɣen i d-yella umeslay s tewzel ɣef umahil n uḥiṭus, imi qqaren isem n taddart-agi, anamek-ines d iḥeddaden. Mebla ma nettu timsikniyin n lfeṭṭa , n talaɣt, n yidlisen, n tamemt, zzit…atg. Am wakken daɣen i d-llan waṭas n leqdicat, deg tṣebḥit n wass-nni n letnayen, mebɛed tulya tunṣibt n tezrigt-agi tamaynut. Dɣa, ad naf, asersi n tmeqqunt n yijeǧǧigen ɣef usebdad n yimjuhad n taddart d uskan n wamek i d-yettili uxeddim n kra n tɣawsa n tmeẓla. Ma di tmeddit n wass, yella-d usarag n umnadi deg umezruy Mass Zinedine Kacimi n tesdawit n Tubiret, i d-yewwin awal ɣef tmeẓla tamensayt d wayen icudden ɣur-s. Azekka-nni n ttlata 07-08-2018, yella-d diɣ usarag n Mass Arezki Hammoum ɣef useḥbiber ɣef twennaḍt, deg tṣebḥit n wass. Ma di tmeddit, tella-d temsikent n lbus n tlawin n leqbayel (défilé de mode) am wakken diɣ i d-yella wurar n lxalat, sɣur tilawin d telmẓyin n taddart-agi n Yiḥiṭusen. Ma deg yiḍ, d taḍsa d unecreḥ i d-yellan i wat taddart. Ass-nni n larebɛa 08-08-2018, i d-yellan d ass aneggaru n tfaska-agi di tezrigt-is tis rebɛa, yella-d deg-s usiken anaddal (exhibitions sportiives) n waddal n Vo vietnam. Rnu ɣef waya, tasfugla n taggara i d-yella s tmeɣra n ccna meqqren ideg ccnan ddeqs n yicennayen. Ma d iswi deffir leqdic-agi, ɣef wakken i d-nnan, bɣan yimsuddsen n tfaska-agi, ad ṣṣiwḍen taẓuri-agi d umahil-agi i tsutwin timaynutin, i wakken ad ẓren amek tga lxedma n wuzzal, d wamek xeddmen allalen n wuzzal sexdamen yal ass, ama d agelzim, taqabact, afḍis…atg. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer wazal tesɛa tẓuri-agi deg tmetti, ad naf teṭṭef amḍiq d ameqqran, d ayen i d-yettbanen deg waṭas n yinzan, gar-asen: “Xeddmen uzzal mi yeḥma”, yella,diɣ, winna i d-nebder yakan. Tella daɣen tenfalit i d-yekkan seg umahil-agi, daymi qqaren: “Gar ẓẓebra d yifḍisen”.

  A.Gh. 

  
 I lmend n usmekti n tmenɣiwt n unazbay Maɛtub lwennas,  aṭas n tejmilin i d as-yuɣalen di yal tiɣmert,  ama dagi di tmurt ama di tmura n lberrani acku Maɛtub mačči d menwala. Gar tejmilin-agi, tella-d yiwet n tmezgunt  ass-nni n,  26/06/2021,  sɣur tiddukkla tadelsant Tirẓa ireẓnen  iwumi semman “Tamanigt n tmagit”. Yeḍra-d waya  deg uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine n Tizi Uzzu.

 Ma ɣef uḍris n tmezgunt, tenna-d tin i t-yuran, Lynda Hantour:’’  D yiwen n uḍris i uriɣ d tajmilt i Maɛtub lwennas d wid akk yeɣlin ɣef tmagit, ɣef wid akk i mazal la qeddcen fell-as. Nessenṭeq-d deg-s Tahar Djaout akked Mouloud Mammeri. Nessenṭeq-d deg-s Saɛid amnadi, d tajmilt i Saɛid Cemmax d wid akk mazal la xeddmen ar ass-a. Akken daɣen i d- nessenṭaq deg-s yelli-s Nabila d tajmilt n Nabila Ǧaḥnin. Nerra daɣen tajmilt i Bessaɛud Muḥend Aɛrab, Smaɛil Bellac. Di tmezgunt-a, yella Kossayla ara yeffɣen akked baba-s d jeddi-s ɣer lexla i wakken ad as d-cnun tizlatin n Maɛtub akken ad yelmed tutlayt, ccna akked tmeɣnest ɣef tmagit. Syin akkin, kosayla ad yimɣur, baba-s d jeddi-s ad awḍen leɛfu n Rebbi. Ticki icedha-ten, ad iruḥ ɣer uẓekka n lwennas imi baba-s ur yesɛi ara aẓekka. Syin akkin ad d-yenṭeq uẓekka n lwennas. Di taggara n tmezgunt, ad yili yizen’’.

   Txedmed tamezgunt-a yakan deg 2018 ?    
  Lynda Hantour : Ih xedmeɣ-tt yakan. Nurar-itt- id sin n yiberdan di Tizi Uzzu, yiwen ubrid deg Bgayet. Tura, ɛawdeɣ-as sɣezfeɣ-as aḍris, rniɣ-d iwudam. Amedya, deg useggas n 2018 ulac adiwenni gar Djaout akked Mammeri, tura rniɣ-t id, akken daɣen i d-rniɣ Saɛid amnadi akked yelli-s Nabila, rniɣ-as yiwet n tezlit tamḥaddit.

  Yella kra i tettheggi  ama deg umezgun neɣ di tira n ungalen ?  
 Aql-in sewjadeɣ ad d-yeffeɣ “Tamanigt n tmagit” d aḍris i tddukkliwin tidelsanin i yebɣan ad xeddment tacquft-agi , axaṭer d yiwet n tejmilt i lwennas d wid akk i ixedmen ɣef tmagit. Ihi, ilaq ad asent-uɣal tejmilt di yal amḍiq, syin akkin ad t-id-xedmeɣ d asaru akken ad walin asuffeɣ amek i yettwaxdem , akken daɣen ad jemmleɣ akk tizlatin i nexdem deg tmezgunt-a deg yiwen n uḍebsi, akken kan ad nessifsus leqdic i tddukkliwin, acku axeddim deg umezgun yeḥwaǧ   tadrimt, iɣallen akked waṭas n wafud. Ɣef wanect-agi i bɣiɣ ad d-yeffeɣ akka , akken ad sneqseɣ ciṭ ɣef wid yebɣan ad xedmen tamezgunt-a’’. Am awkken  nesteqsa Mass SAdoukiI Abdessamed, netta i ixedmen takurigrafit n tmezgunt, a-t-an d acu i d-yenna : “Tamezgunt, temmeslay-d ɣef tmagit tamaziɣt. Iwudam i d-yellan deg-s xeddmen ɣef tmaziɣt ladɣa s yimru. Ilaq ass-a nekni ad nḥader ɣef tmagit-nneɣ, ladɣa tasuta-agi i d-ileḥḥun, ilaq ad asen-nemmeslay, ad asen-neselmed aḍris. Nekk, d tidet ur fehmeɣ ara aṭas taqbaylit, maca fehmeɣ d akken Massa Hantour texṭar akken iwata imeslayen i uḍris i wakken ad wayeḍ yizen-is. Ussa-nni mi nettheggi tamezgunt, tesseḥres aṭas ɣef yimeslayen ara sxedmen, d ayen yelhan, acku s wanect-agi ara teqqim tmeslayt, ara nesseḥbiber fell-as’’.

  G.M.  Aṭas n yilmeẓyen i yerran ddehn-nsen, iseggasen-agi ineggura, ɣer tmezgunin,  yal mi ara d-tili yiwet, nettaf  tazeqqa n Uxxam n umezgun Kateb Yacine, teččur.

 Yamani Souhila

  
 Tamedyazt, ur tesɛi leɛmer, ur tettcawar. Ur teǧǧa amɣar wala aterras, terna tegla ula s yilemẓi. Ddurt iɛeddan, i d-ilul yiwen udlis-nniḍen n tmedyazt i d-yewwin ɣef ddeqs n yisental d tmuɣliwin. “Aẓar yeṭṭafar tara”, d ammud n tmedyazt amenzu n umedyaz ilemẓi Ḥusin Ḥaǧam. D adlis bu 64 n yisebtar, llan deg-s 29 n yisefra. Yettnuzu deg tnedlisin s wazal n 200 DA, yeffeɣ-d ɣer tezrigin Ccix Muḥend u Lḥusin n Tizi Uzzu. 

 Win ara iḍillen ɣer daxel-is, ad t-id-tqabel tezwert n umedyaz Mbarek Gemmar. Syin ad yekcem di lebḥer n yisefra, wa ad d-ijbed wayeḍ, ur t-yesrusu alamma yekfa-t s tɣuri, imi icudd am sensela. Gar yisental, ara d-imager yimeɣri n wammud-a, ad naf isefra ɣef tmeṭṭut, isefra ɣef 08 meɣres i yellan ass agraɣlan n tmeṭṭut. Yessefra diɣ ɣef tmaziɣt akked timmuzɣa, yerra diɣen tijmilin i yirgazen-agi n teqbaylit imeqqranen: Sliman Ɛazem d Muḥya. Tettban-d timanit n umedyaz-agi amecṭuḥ deg tira-s, acku yessefra ɣef waddal imi netta d anaddal, yura diɣ asefru ɣef tudert n umedyaz, ideg i d-yemla i medden amek yettwali win i t-yecban; win tezdeɣ tmedyazt. 

 Mi ara tettiḍ isebtar n udlis-a, gar yizwal ara d-ijebden lwelha-k d wigi: Aceqqiq di tegmat, Tilelli, 20 di yebrir n 1980, JSK, Lweqt amessas, adlis ideg i d-as yerra tajmilt, dɣa yenna-as : 
  Ɣer adlis deg-s ad tlemdeḍ
  Lebɣi-k ɣur-s ad tawḍeḍ
  Tudert-ik ad as-lhun wussan (…)
  Ḥusin Ḥaǧam, ulamma meẓẓi di leɛmer maca leqdic-is adelsan yugar-it. D ilemẓi n 14 n yiseggasen kan di leɛmer-is, meɛna d amɣar azemni deg wawal akked tmedyazt. Ilul ass n 10 yunyu 2005 di taddart n At Ṣellan, taɣiwant n Uqbil, di Micli. Isurifen-is imenza deg tmedyazt, bdan deg useggas n 2016, asmi yella yeqqar deg useggas wis 5 n ulmud amenzu. Iḥella-d arraz wis sin n tfaska n tmedyazt timezdit deg useggas-a n 2019, i d-thegga tddukkla Taflest n Tizi Uzzu. D yiwen n yilemẓi yeččuren d tabɣest d lebɣi, yettekki deg waṭas n lqidicat idelsanen, yal mi ara as-tettunefk tegnit i waya. 

 D yiwen umedyaz amecṭuḥ, i iqedcen d waṭas n yizamulen n teqbaylit: Yidir, At Mengellat, Ɛellawa…atg. Afud igerrzen i umeskar d umecwar ɣezzifen deg uḥric-a n tẓuri s umata.

  Adaoun Ghani 

  
 Sendiḍelli n ssebt, 05 deg waggur-agi n maggu ideg nella, ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, i d-tella temlilit tamezwarut deg useggas-agi amaynut n 2018, sɣur uneggal d umejjay Ɛmer Mezdad. Tella-d deg tzeqqa tameqqrant (Amphi) n ugezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ n tesdawit Muḥend Akli U Lḥaǧ n Tubiret. Yemmeslay-d deg-s ɣef usentel-agi agejdan “Tirmit n tira taneggalt ɣer Ɛmer Mezdad”, am wakken i d-yewwi awal s telqayt ɣef tira n wungalen-is s uzzig akked wungal akbayli s umata. Yezzi daɣen awal deg temlilit-agi, ɣef tira n wungal s teqbaylit d tirmit-is netta imi s timmad-is d aneggal. Amek armi i d-yezger seg tujjya ɣer tira n tsekla ladɣa ungal? Neɣ s wawal-nniḍen amek armi i d-yufa iman-is d aneggal n xemsa wungalen, ulamma netta d amejjay? Yella-d daɣen uskasi sɣur wid i iffuden tamussni d yidles, imi netta yeɛreḍ amek ara d-yerr akk i yisteqsiyen i d as-yettunefken ɣef teɣzi n ssaɛa. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli Ɛmer Mezdad, d aneggal n xemsa wungalen-agi s teqbaylit: Iḍ d wass 1990, Tagrest urɣu 2000, Ass-nni 2006, Tettḍili-d, ur d tkeččem 2014, Yiwen wass deg tefsut 2015. Am wakken daɣen yura ammuden n tmedyazt akked tullisin, yesizrig-d diɣ tasɣunt Ayamun.

  Gh. A. 

  
 Tella-d ddurt yezrin, tezrigt tamezwarut n rreḥba tadigant, i d-yellan deg tzeqqa n waddalen n Uxxam n yilmeẓyen n tɣiwant n Tizi Rached, i d-yezgan deg wul n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, ur tebɛed ara s waṭas ɣef temdit-a. D tazrigt yeddan ɣef teɣzi n 2 wussan, imi telli tiwwura-a ass-nni n larebɛa 24 tuber 2018, tessuli ass-nni n lexmis iɛeddan 25 deg waggur-agi ideg nella. Tella-d tesfugla n tulya tunṣibt, tasbebḥit n wass-nni n larebɛa, anda i d-iberreḥ uselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Tizi Rached Mass Sekrane Mokrane s tulya n rreḥba-agi. Deg wawal-is, yuɣal-d dɣa ɣer wazal sɛant tfaskiwin-agi n tfellaḥt ɣef tdamsa ama ɣef tmurt, ama ɣef yimezdaɣ. Ma ɣef wahil n rreḥba-agi, yella-d d anesbaɣur, anda i llant wazal n 40 n temsikniyin sɣur ugar n 45 n yimsikniyen i d-yerzan seg 4 n tɣemmar n ladayra n Tizi Rached. D timsikniyin yemgaraden, i icudden merra ɣer tfellaḥt, yecban allalen imaynuten d yiqburen swayes xeddmen ifellaḥen, isufar yemxalafen: iḥbuben, zzit, tamemt…atg. Massa Aklil d timḍebbert deg texxamt n tfellaḥt n At Dwala, tuɣal-d ɣer yiswi n rreḥba-agi, tenna-d: “D tagnit i yimezdaɣ n dayra n Tizi Rached i wakken ad issinen isufar i xeddmen yifellaḥen-nsen, d tagnit daɣen i yifellaḥen n tama-agi, ad d-seknen i yimezdaɣ imuhal-nsen”. Am wakken daɣen i d-llan sin n yisaragen ass-nni n larebɛa, yiwen ɣef uzemmur d wayen i icudden ɣur-s, ma d wis, sin yella-d ɣef tazart, imi tamnaḍt-agi n Tizi Rached tettwassen s yiniɣman. Ma si tama-s, Massa Akbal d taɛeggalt deg tɣiwant, tenna-d : “Nessaram yiwwas, ad nwali tazart akked zzit n Tizi Rached deg tɣara igerrzen ayɣer ala deg umḍiq amezwaru di tmurt n leqbayel, imi tettwassen s wannect-a”. Mass Oukaci Slimane, d imsiken n yisufar n confiture, yenna-d: “Nessaram sya ɣer sdat, ad ugtent tegnatin yecban tigi, imi ugur-nneɣ nekni s yimseftiyen deg uḥric n tfellaḥt, d lexsas n leswaq n tunzzut”. Ma d tasfugla n taggara, i d- yellan ass-nni n lexmis tameddit n wass, ttunefken deg-s yigerdasen n uttekki i yimsikniyen-agi i d-yerran i teɣri n Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n Tizi Rached. Yenna-d deg-s Mass Sekrane: “D tazrigt tamewarut, ur tettili d taneggarut imi tɛedda deg tegnatin igerrzen”.

   A. A. 

  
 «Comment optimiser votre ordinateur?» neɣ amek ara (tsenyeffeḍ) tesskeḍ aselkim-ik? D wagi i d azwel i d as-yefka umaru Omar Atmimou i udlis-is. Yeffeɣ-d udlis-a n tsenselkimt (informatique) deg wussan-agi iɛeddan ɣer tezrigin “La pensée” n Tizi Uzzu. D allal ussnan ara yiḥwiǧ yal amdan yesɛan aselkim (ordinateur), ladɣa win iwumi ẓẓay neɣ ur nteddu ara akken iwata lḥal. D adlis n 80 n yisebtar, yettwaru s tutlayt n tefransist. Yettnuzu deg tnedlisin s wazal n 270 Da. Isegzay-d deg-s umeskar, amek i ilaq ad yissin win ara d-yemmagren uguren deg uselkim-ines. D wacu n tarrayin ara yessexdem i wakken ad yerr aselkim-is iteddu akken iwata. Am wakken i t-id-yenna deg tezwer; “Ur teḥwaǧeḍ ara ad tiliḍ d amussnaw deg tsenselkimt i wakken ad teseḥbibreḍ u ad tsegmeḍ aselkim-ik. Ilaq kan, ad tḍefreḍ adlis-agi, yiwet yiwet alamma tessawḍeḍ ɣer ugemmuḍ i tettraǧuḍ”. Ad naf deg wahil n udlis-agi, aṭas n tarrayin swayes yezmer umdan ad iseggem aselkim-is, ama si tama n taẓẓayt, ad t-yerr fessus, ama si tama n tkatit ideg yezmer ad d-isenɣes seg-s amkan. Ad yaf daɣen win ara yesqedcen adlis-a, amek yessizdeg aḍebsi yeqquren (disque dur), timerna n urured n tuqqna n Internet…atg. Ayen ara yesishilen asexdem n udlis-agi, d tugniwin i d-yefka i yal asurif iɣef i ilaq ad iɛeddi fell-as umdan. Yessegzay-d yis-sent iznan n tucḍiwin (messages d’erreur) i d-yettefɣen ɣef ugdil (écran) n uselkim, d wamek i ilaq ad yexdem. Ma ɣef tira n udlis-agi, yenna-d belli: “D agemmu n waṭas n yiseggasen n unadi, d wagi i d asentel n ugerdas-is n magister. D ayen smerseɣ (appliquer) nekk s timmad-iw, yerna wwḍeɣ ɣer ugemmuḍ igerrzen. Ɣer taggara, yessaram ad yesuqqel adlis-agi-ines ɣer tutlayt tamaziɣt, yerna ad yili d abaɣur i tmussni n yal amdan. Ad d-nesmekti kan belli, d wagi i d adlis amezwaru n uselmad-agi n tsenselkimt deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu. Omar Atmimou, yettheggi agerdas n Doctorat deg tesdwait Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu. Yewwi-d yakan agerdas n magister n uzarunay (électronique) deg useggas n 2014 akked win n ujenyur uṭumatik deg useggas n 2009.

  A. A. 

  
 Yekfa usfugel n yennayer deg Wehran s yiwen n wass n tezrawt seg tnezzayt armi d tameddit, ass-nni n arim 14 yennayer, ɣef yiwen wudem, mačči aṭas-aya segmi i aɣ-yeǧǧa. D udem n tegrawla, n tsekla, n tira, n umezgun d tmedyazt, wagi d Abdellah Haman. 

 Tafaska i d-thegga tddukkla Numidya aseggas-a i lmend n yennayer, tettwabud-as i rruḥ-is, ma neẓra d akken aṭas i yeqdec daxel, rnu d yiwen seg wid i d-yeslulen tiddukkla-a ɣer tama n umussnaw Kamal Uzerrad. Dɣa deg Uxxam n uɣmis El Ǧumhurya i as-tuɣal tejmilt i yuklal. 

 Aṭas n wudmawen i yellan din, gar-asen amaray amatu n Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa Ɛessad, kra n yiselmaden n tesdawit, ma nebder-d kan Buǧemɛa Ɛezziri, Meqqran Cixi, Crifa Bilak. Anemhal n uɣmis El Ǧumhurya, d uselway n tddukkla Numidya d yiɛeggalen-nniḍen am Ǧamal Benɛuf, Hewwari Bessay d Nadya Bennaɛmer, Saɛid Zeɛnun, tawacult d yimeddukkal n Dda Ɛebḍella d waṭas n yimdanen-nniḍen. 

 Yebda leqdic s umeslay n yal win i t-yessnen, yefka-d tamuɣli wezzilen fell-as. Umbeɛd, yella-d usenɛet n yiqeddicen yakk i d-yeǧǧa (19 n leqdicat, gar wungalen, ammuden, tisuqqilin d tmucuha). Syin, tella-d tɣuri n kra n yisefra-s sɣur imeddukkal n Numidya. Ar taggara, d tukci n warraz n yiseɣ sɣur Aseqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa d uɣmis El Ǧumhurya i twacult n Ḥaman deg tegnatin n lferḥ igerrzen. 

 Wid akk i d-yemmeslayen, mwatan d akken yiwen am Dda Ɛebḍella, d udem ur nettwattuy ara, acku d agerruj mucaɛen i d-yeǧǧa deffir-s i yidles n tmaziɣt, war ma nettu daɣen d udem n tegrawla, imi d amjahed i yekkin deg tegrawla deg tama n umalu, akken ad d-tḥelli tmurt timunent-is. Yettwaṭṭef di Sidi Belɛebbas, aseggas n 1957, yeḥkem fell-as s lḥebs s 20 n yiseggasen, armi d timunent i d-yeffeɣ. 

 Uqbel ad yerr akud-is i lxedma n lexyaḍa akken ad yessider tawacult-is akked leqdic war aḥbas ɣef yidles amaziɣ seg yiseggasen n 1960. Rnan nna-d, d akken Ḥaman d tmital-is d imedyaten i tsutwin i d-yettnekkaren, s ugerruj adelsan i d-yeǧǧa d tebɣest yesɛa ɣef leḥmala n tmurt-is, ɣef waya i ilaq ad yili usidef n yiqeddicen-is ɣer wahilen n uɣerbaz neɣ n tesdawit, ma neẓra belli d lfayda ara d-agmen seg-sen. 

 D asmekti kan, imi yella-d usemmi n yiwen n uɣerbaz alemmas ɣef yisem-is, ahat d isalli n tumert ara t-yeǧǧen ad igen u ad yesteɛfu di talwit. Tefreḥ nezzeh twacult-is, tameṭṭut-is d warraw-is s usmekti meqqran am wa, ladɣa imi i d-yusa deg lawan n usfugel n useggas amaynut n yimaziɣen, yennayer. Tanemmirt daɣen tettuɣal i unemhal n uɣmis El Ǧumhurya, i yettilin yal tikkelt di ttiɛad mi ara terzu temsalt idles d tutlayt n tmaziɣt, s tumert i d-yettelday tiwwura n uɣmis i leqdicat am wigi.

<p style="text-align:right">  Khaled Acho ui

  
 Ad tili yiwent temlilit tagraɣlant ɣef ugellid anumidi Sifaks (202-250 uqbel talalit n Sidna Ɛisa), deg wussan 22 d 23 ctember i d-iteddun deg Ɛin Timucent.

 D annect-agi, swayes i d-iberreh umaru amatu n Useqqamu unnig i timmuzɣa, Mass Si El Hachemi Assad, deg waggur-nni n yunyu yezrin di Skikda. Asentel n usarag-agi, ad d-yili akka: «Tagelda n Yimasisilen (Numidya Tutrimt), Sifaks d umtawa n Siga (206 uqbel Sidna Ɛisa». D tagnit daɣen ideg ara d-mlilen yimnadiyen isdawanen d yimazarayen, i wakken ad skasin ɣef umezruy d yigaluzen n Numidya tutrimt ddaw tgelda n ugellid Sifaks. Ad meslayen daɣen ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan-agi, ɣef tgemmi n yimeḍqan isenzikiyen (sites archéologiques), yellan deg wakal n tgelda n Imasisiliyen, i yettnuneḥsaben d agerruj ideg teffer tmussni n umezruy d yiẓuran n ugdud amaziɣ amesbaɣur i mazal ur yettwassnen ara imi ulac tizrawin fell-as. Di teɣzi n temlilit-a n Ɛin Timmuccent neɣ di Lmersa Ben Mhidi ( i d-yezgan ɣer tama n Siga), ara d-yili wawal s telqayt sɣur yimussnawen ara d-yasen si tesdawiyin tizzayriyin akked tberraniyin. Ad d-mmeslayen ɣef temsal tussnanin yerzan amezruy n tgelda n Imasisiliyen d unbaḍ (leḥkem) n ugellid-agi amaziɣ. Am wakken diɣ, ara d-yili deg umyager-a i usduqqes n unadi deg temnaḍt-a tamazrayt d uheggi n tecmilt ɣef yimahilen iqburen d yitraren ara d-yellin ɣef temdinin n tgelda-a tanumidit yesɛan azal meqqren deg umezruy n ugdug amaziɣ s wuzzig d win n talsa s umata.

  Tiɣri i yimnadiyen 

 Iger-d umaray amatu n Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa, tiɣri i yimnadiyen yebɣan ad ttekkin deg temlilit-agi. Yessegza-d deg-s timsal-agi, yerzan ilugan n uttekki deg ttiɛad-agi ameqqran. Tamezwarut, isaragen ara d-yilin, ur ilaq ara ad ffɣen i yisental-a: Tawacult tagedlant n Imasisiliyen, Agellid Sifaks, Assaɣen yezdin gar Sifaks akked Ruma d Qarṭaǧ uqbel timlilit n Siga, Timlilit n Siga. Timentiliyin d yigemmaḍ n wassaɣen i d-yellan di tallit n tgelda n Yimasisiliyen, Inadiyen n tasenzikit, n umezruy akked n tsedga n temdinin-a: Siga, Sirta, Gunugu, Luy, Tipaza… Ad yili uceggeɛ n yizwal n teywalin d yigzulen n yisaragen n wid yebɣan ad ttekkin deg temlilit-a, ɣer tansiwin-agi: <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="294a46475d484a5d69414a48044d5307465b4e" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a> / <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="5724323425322336253e3623173f34367a332d79382530" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a> / <a class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="631004230b00024e07194d0c1104" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection">[email protected]</a>, annect-agi send 28 yulyu 2018. Isumar n yisaragen, ilaq ur ttɛeddayen ara 300 n wawalen, yerna ilaq ad seddun tameddurt-nsen. Ma d iḍrisen n yisaragen ilaq ad d-leḥqen uqbel ass n 24 deg unbir 2018, i wakken ad yili usiẓreg n wammud n yisaragen n temlilit. Ma ɣef yifukal n usuddes n temlilit-agi tussnant, yenna-d Mass Assad : «Nebɣa-tt d tagnit i yimnadiyen yerran lwelha-nsen ɣer temnaḍt-agi. Ad mmeslayen ɣef wayen yellan d wayen ur nelli, ama d tizrawin neɣ d imagraden neɣ d idlisen i d-yewwin ɣef tallit-agi n umezruy n tmurt-nneɣ ur nettwassen ara aṭas ». Ikemmel yenna-d ɣef yiswiyen n temlilit-a : « Tamezwarut, d asebɣes n yinadiyen ɣef tgelda n Imasisiliyen d usenɛet n yinadiyen d tezrawin yettwaxdamen yakan ɣef temnaḍt-agi n tmurt-nneɣ. Tis snat, d asaki ɣef useḥbiber i ilaqen ad d-yili ɣef tgemmi taɣelnawt n temnaḍt-agi tamazrayt Siga akked uslali n wassaɣen d yiẓedwan gar yemnadiyen yerran lwelha-nsen ɣer usentel-agi n tgelda n Imasisiliyen».

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Xas ulamma turar tarbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel (JSK) s wudem yelhan, ma yella neqren-t ɣer wayen iɛeddan, acu kan ur tessaweḍ ara ad terbeḥ tarbaɛt n CSC i yellan akka tura ɣef uqerru n telɣuɣa.

     Deg tazwara n temlilit, kecmen-d yimyurar n JSK s lebɣi d ameqqran i wakken ad rebḥen timilit-a, imi ugar n 8 n tenqiḍin i sruḥen deg unnar n Tizi Uzzu. Akka dɣa i yessaweḍ umyurar Mesbaḥi ad yaweḍ s iswi deg ddqiqa tis 27 n temlilit. Tkemmel tarbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n leqbayel s wudem yelhan armi d taggara n uḥric amezwaru n temlilit. Ma d tarbaɛt n CSC, ur texdim kra ara yessergigin acebbak n JSC. Amur ameqqran n lweqt, sɛeddan-t yimyurar inebgawen deg tama-nsen. Wissen ma s tḥerci i qqimen ɣer deffir, neɣ ttraǧun tagnit iwatan i wakken ad ẓedmen, ma neẓra d akken tarbaɛt n CSC, trebbaḥ timliliyin-is, s umata, deg uḥric wis sin. Yebda uḥric wis sin s uswir-nni n uḥric amezwaru, acu kan tura d tarbaɛt n CSC i yesḥersen taswiɛt ɣef tarbaɛt n JSK, d nutni i yesɛan lebɣi ugar ilmeẓyen n leqbayel. S wakka, dɣa, i ssawḍen ad d-awin iswi-nsen amezwaru. Syin, yeldi ubrid ɣer sdat, qqlen yimyurar n CSC d nutni i isedduyen timlilit akken i asen-yehwa armi i d-rnan iswi-nniḍen sdat Abdat i yellan yettferriǧ deg yumyurar n CSC mi yettheggi ad yewwet ddabex-nni. Iswi wis sin i yeǧǧan ad terbeḥ tarbaɛt n CSC s 2 ɣer 1. Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, tɛedda temlilit deg tegnit igerrzen, mebla ma yella-d kra n cwal daxel n unnar. Acu kan, xas yella lebɣi ɣer yimyurar n tarbaɛt n yilmeẓyen n JSK, meɛna ur zmiren ara ad d-fken nnig wayen sɛan : aswir-nsen yewweḍ tilisa. S yimyurar am wigi, ha-t-an ad d-yuɣal wugur-nni n yilindi. Beddlen yimḍebbren, ttuxellasen yimyurar, yeččur-d unnar n umezwaru n unbir n Tizi Uzzu s yimferǧen, meɛna ur ibeddel kra ɣer yimyuraren, ur zmiren ara ad rebḥen deg Tizi uzzu. Ihi, akken i as-qqaren ‘’Tissirt mi ara tt-taɣ deg ryac, ur d as-d-xedmen yiɣuraf’’.

  Hocine Moula   

 

  
 Sendiḍelli n ssebt n, 21 duǧamber 2019, i yebda leqdic adelsan i d-yettwaheggan i lmend n yimuras n tegrest iɣurbizen, ama deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer n Tizi Uzzu, ama deg tneḍfart-is n Azazga. D ttiεad-agi adelsan, deg tezrigt-is tis rebɛa, ara ad yilin i lfayda n warrac imeẓyanen, alamma d 30 deg waggur-agi n duğamber ideg nella. D tagnit ideg ara faṛsen yilmeẓyen imuras-nsen n ccetwa, yerna ad sgunfun cwiṭ seg ulmud mebɛed akraḍyur n leqraya. Dɣa deg wahil n Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, ttilint-d temsikniyin-a n yidlisen n yigerdan, yal ass seg 09h00 alamma d 16h00 n tmeddit. 

 Am wakken diɣ i d-ttilin yisenza s yibudan n yidlisen n warrac ɣef teɣzi n ddurt-a tadelsant. Ass-nni n ssebt iɛeddan, yella-d usiher n tulya n tezrigt-agi tamaynut n yimuras sɣur yimseḍṣi “Kimous d Kouki” sɣur Youcef akked Ibrahim. Syin akkin d ashier i d-tewwi tddukkla tadelsant “Tiɣilt-nneɣ”. I yiḍelli n lḥed 22/12/2019, yella-d usikew n useɣmi (coloriage) seg 10h00 ar 12h00. Syin akin seg 14h armi d 16h00 deg tzeqqa n umezgun, yella-d usiher n tddukkla tadelsant Ibturen. Ma d ass-agi n letnayen 23/12/2019, tasebḥit, ad d-ilin aṭas n leqdicat idelsanen sɣur tddukkla tussnant Itran. Am wakken diɣen ara d-yili ɣer tmeddit usiher n yimseḍsi Moumou et Mimi. 

 Ma seg wass-a ɣer wass n letnayen i d-iteddun, aṭas n leqdicat-nniḍen ara d-yilin gar tmeɣra n ugraw Amaḍal Kids, timezgunin, asarag ɣef yigerdan, d yisikwan (asuneɣ, tira…atg). Deg tneḍfart n Uxxam n Yidles, yellan di Azazga, ad yebdu wahil azekka alamma d ass n letnayen 30/12/2019. Azekka n ttlata 24/12/2019, deg umḍiq n yisikwan, ad d-yili usikew n tira, asuneɣ d useɣmi ɣer tama n usarag ɣef yinelmaden, am wakken daɣen ara d-tili tegnit n usenzi s ubuddu n udlis “Uccen d umeksa” n Kamel n Bentaha. Am wakken daɣen ara d-ilin ddeqs n yirmad-nniḍen ɣef teɣzi n ddurt-a d tazwra n ddurt i d-iteddun, gar-asen: isikwan n yimahilen n ufus, asuneɣ, timucuha akked tmeɣra n ccna d ugraw Amaḍal Kids…atg.

 … Ula deg Xeṛṛaṭa  
 Seld akṛaḍyur n uxeddim, d leḥṛiṣ ɣef warrac, telḥeq-d teswiεt n usgunfu i yeḥwaǧen nezzeh. Ladɣa wid n uswir amenzu, imi nutni mazal-iten meẓẓiyit. Rnu ɣer waya, ahil n leqṛaya-nsen i iweɛren fell-asen. Acku, seg yiwet n tama, yeččuṛ mliḥ, seg tama-nniḍen, ulac deg-s ayen ara yessixfifen ɣef uqcic εeggu. Ass n 19 duǧember yezrin, yemxalaf ɣef wid yezrin ɣur yinelmaden imecṭaḥ. Ayagi yettban deg wudmawen-nsen, dɣa umren ayendin, imi yewweḍ-d lawan ad as-fken i turart azref-is. D tidet, yal yiwen amek ara yesεeddi imuṛas-is. Lameεna tella temsalt i ten-icerken, ad kksen ɣef wulawen-nsen akken ma llan. Ɣef waya dɣa i d-lhan yimḍebbṛen n tɣiwant n Xeṛṛaṭa d warrac-nsen, d wamek ara sɛeddin imuṛas imi i asen-heggan ahil d ameṛkanti. Ayagi ad yili deg Tzeqqa n umezgun 8 mayu 1945. 

 Ddeqs n tceqqufin n umezgun i d-heggan i ttiεad-a. Ad d-nesmekti d akken, isental n tceqqufin-a, ad d-yernun, melba ccekk, tamussni i warrac. Am wakken ara tili daɣen, turart n tuffra akked yiseḥḥaren. I yisalli, ahil ad d-yebdu ass n 20 duǧember alamma d ass n 27 deg wayyur-a. Ihi d tagnit i win yebɣan ad ifaṛes asteεfu, d tmussni deg yiwen n ttiεad. Arrac d yimawlan-nsen, umren mliḥ s ccɣel-a, ɣef usentel-a yenna-aɣ-d yiwen n ubabat: « Arraw-iw, wwin-d igemmaḍ igerrzen deg yikayaden-nsen, lliɣ ttxemmimeɣ anda ara ten-awiɣ deg yimuṛaṣ-a. Tura imi i aɣ-d-xedmen timliliyin-a, ad ferneɣ kra n wussan, ad ten-awiɣ. Acku d ayen yelhan mliḥ, imi rnu i tmussni ara d-awin, d tagnit i wakken ad myussanen d warrac-nniḍen ». Ikemmel deg wawal-is yenna-d : « Ssarameɣ akk imawlan, ad d-rren s lexbar s ubaɣuṛ n temlilin-a i warraw-nsen ».

  GH. A. / K. K. 

  
 Thegga-d, ussan iɛeddan, tddukkla tadelsant Taflest, deg Tizi Uzzu, taẓrigt tamezwarut n tmedyazt timezdit s uḥḍar n kra n umḍan n yimedyazen, imi yella yerza ɛaruḍ kra n wid iwumi tehwa tekti. Dɣa, deg lqidar n yiwen n wass kan, ɛeddan-d kra n yimedyazen i d-yewwin isefra akken lwaḥid, ɣef wakken i aɣ-d-tenna tselwayt n tddukkla-a tilemẓit i d-iheggan ttiɛad, Massa Fahima Seddiri. Ɣur kra n yimedyazen, tiwin n yisefra imezdiyen yettak-d i uzayez tamuɣli-nniḍen ɣef uḥulfu d yizen n usefru, imi yal amedyaz s tektiwin-is, s tmenna-s, s taɣect-is, atg. « Tgerrez dayen kan teẓrigt-a tamezwarut, ɣas xussen wallalen ». I d-tenna tselwayt n tddukkla timheggit. Send ad d-ternu, ad d-temmeslay ɣef yiswi n tfaska-a: « Nebɣa s tfaska-a n tmedyazt timezdit tamaynut, ad d-nesnulfu tafaska s wudem-nniḍen. Walaɣ taggara-a imedyazen, wa ijebbed akka, wa akkin. Nniɣ-as yelha ad ten-nezdi, imi asefru imezdi ad t-id-awin ugar n sin n yimedyazen. Ula d arraz n temlilit, ad yili daɣen d imezdi ». S teẓrigt-a tamezwarut, ssaramen yimheggiyen ad yili yenǧer ubrid i teẓrigin-nniḍen, akken ad wennɛent ugar tegnatin, ad temɣur daɣen tfaska. Ɣef tnaga n yiwen n yimekki, akken yebɣu yili, d ayen yelhan wayen i d-tefka teẓrigt-a tamenzut, abeɛda imi wwḍen iswi n uzday.

  M. K. 

  
 D acennay, ulamma meẓẓi di leɛmer, maca meqqer ccan-is d wazal-is. D bu ṣṣut ḥlawen akked uẓawan igerren, wagi d Ait Lakhal Mehemed, mmi-s n Tizi Uzzu. D anaẓur s timmad-is, imi icennu yerna yessefray. Yettawi-d isefra neɣ tizlatin i t-iɛejben ɣer yimedyazen d yicennayen-nniḍen s tfenṭazit. Ilul deg useggas n 1976 deg taddart n Tajdiout deg ladayra n Maatkas.Yebda ccna deg useggas n 1983, imir-nni yettales-asen i tezlatin n yicennayen imeqqranen i tessen tezlit taqbaylit. Syin akkin deg useggas n 1998, iɛedda-d deg nnuba-nni “Iɣennayen n Uzekka” n Mdjahed Hamid snat n tikkal. Syinna, yenǧer-d abrid ɣer ccna, dɣa deg useggas n 2003, yessuffeɣ-d tasfift-is tamezwarut “Imeṭṭi n layas” ɣer tezrigin Igawawen. Llant deg-s 8 n tezlatin, 7 deg-sent d aɛiwed i iɛawawed yecna-tent, ma yiwet deg-sent “Imeṭṭi n Layas”, d ayla-s. Tin ɣur-s di 2004, yessuffeɣ-d tasfift-is tis snat “A yemma!”. Llant deg-s 08 n tuɣac, 6 deg-sent d ayen yexdem netta, snat-nni-nniḍen n yicennayen-agi; Youcef Abdjaoui akked El Hasnaoui. Mebɛed mi d-yemlal aṭas n wuguren, yeḥbes azal n 7 n yiseggasen. Dɣa di 2011, yessazreg-d album-is wis tlata “Ilaq usirem”, ideg ara naf 12 n tezlatin, 11 deg-sent d netta i ten-yuran i d asen-ixedmen lmusiga, ma tinna-nni-nniḍen d ameddakkel-is ad-tt-d-yefkan yecna-tt. Deg tazwara-agi n 2018, i d-yerna aḍebsi wis rebɛa ɣer umecwar-is di ccna. D album i wummi isemma “Tajmilt i Matoub, Yir aqbayli”. Dɣa tizlit-agi, yecna-tt yakan Matoub, maca netta yerra-as yis-s tajmilt. D aḍebsi-ines aneggaru, ideg 8 n tezlatin, 7 d ayla-s netta, ma d tis 08 d tajmilt-agi n Lounes Matoub. Gar tezlatin yellan deg-s, ad d-nebder; Lesleḥ (allal n uẓawan), Yurez-iyi lqid, Nndama, Leɛrac, Lwerd lyasmin, Ṭṭejra n ččina…atg. Yessuffeɣ-tent-id ɣer tezrigin “Guraya musique” n Bgayet, imi ɣef leḥsab-is ur yeɛǧib ara usekles-nni yexdem deg Tizi Uzzu deg yiwen ustudyu. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti kan belli, ha-t-an yettheggi yiwen n album amaynut ara d-yeffɣen deg useggas n 2019 i d-iteddun neɣ ɣer sdat. Ma deg wawal-is, yebɣa ad yessiweḍ izen-agi: “Mi ara tafeḍ yiwen yettɣenni s teqbaylit ɣef teqbaylit, maca ugur deffir wayeḍ. Ad tafeḍ iɛewwiqen ara k-iɛekren i wakken ur d-tettbaneḍ ara, yettuɣaḍ lḥal aṭas, maca ur d asen-nkennu ara”.

  A. A 

  
 I lmend n wass amaḍlan n temsetla talsant (solidarité huimane) i d-yettilin yal aseggas deg wass n 11 yennayer, tiddukkla tadelsant “Inegman” n Taddart n Ikhelouienne, thegga-d ass-nni n lexmis yiwet n teswiɛt n telkensit (collection) neɣ ajmaɛ n yidammen i lfayda n yimuḍan yetteḥwiǧin ddima cci-a. Yella-d ujmaɛ-agi n yidammen tama n lbusṭa n tɣiwant n Ait Aissa Mimoun neɣ sdat n uɣerbaz amenzu Oudiai Mohamed n Ikhelouienne, i deg i d-jemɛen ddeqs n yidammen, syin akkin wwin-ten ɣer sbiṭer asdawan Nadir Mohamed n Tizi Uzzu. Ddeqs n yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant-agi n Ait Aissa Mimoun i d-yerran i tiɣri n tiddukkla-agi, u yerna llan d imsetlanen akked watmaten-nsen imuḍan, meqqar deg wass amaḍlan n tesmetla.

  A. A 

  
 D ammud n 14 tullisin, deg-s 160 n yisebtar. D adlis yuran s tmaziɣt, s tewsit n tesrit. Yeffeɣ-d ɣer tezrigin El Amel deg 10 meɣres-agi iɛeddan. Azwel-ines “Tajmilt i waṭṭan”, i yellan yakan d azwel n tullist taneggarut n udlis-agi. Yettnuzu s wazal n 390 DA deg tnedlisin. Ma d tazwarut n udlis-agi, yura-tt uneggal Rachid Boukherroub, i d as-yefkan afus n tallelt.

  Tameskart 

 Tamsiwt Tinhinane Harrache, tlul ass n 15 ɣuct 1994 di taddart Afir, di tɣiwant n Boudjima. D tilemẓit n 24 n yiseggasen deg leɛmer-is, akka tura, tettkemmil almud-ines deg tesdawit n Mulud Mɛemmeri deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu. Tettheggi iman-is i wakken ad d-tawi agerdas n lmastir deg tsekla tamaziɣt. Ulamma deg useggas n 2014 i tebda tira s tmaziɣt, ama n wungalen, n yisefra neɣ n tullisin. D ungal-agi “Tajmilt i waṭṭan”, iɣef ara d-nawi awal deg umagrad-a.

  Izwal 

 Am wakken i t-id-nniɣ yakan, d ammud n 14 n tullisin. Ihi ha-ten-in rbeɛṭac-agi n yizwal; 1- Tagujilt, 2- Taqcict n tesdawit, 3- D tidet yellan, 4- Awejrireḥ, 5- Mḥend ur nefri, 6- I lḥeqq-iw, anida-t?, 7- Asaru n ddunit, 8- Aẓekka, 9- Tinifift, 10- Yir aṭṭan, 11- Asirem, 12- Mačči d nekk, 13- Tayri-iw, 14- Tajmilt i waṭṭan.

  Isental 

 Tefren tmarut-agi tilemẓit, ad d-tmeslay deg wammud-agi n tullisin, ɣef ddeqs n wuguren i tettidir tmeṭṭut neɣ tilemẓit taqbaylit ɣer tama n yilemẓi. Ma nger tamawt ɣef yisental-agi, ad d-naf bḍan ɣef snat n taggayin. Tamezwarut, d tin n yisental imaynuten ur nettaf ara deg tullisin-nniḍen. D nettat i d tamezwarut i d-imeslayen ɣef kra n temsal tettwali tmetti d lɛib, d lɛer; yecban tunzuft gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut, assaɣen i d-yettilin gar yilemẓi d tlemẓit. Temmeslay-d daɣen ɣef tunzuft gar yirgazen neɣ gar yilmeẓyen, amedya n tullist “D tidet yellan” akked tullist “Mḥend ur nefri”…atg. Ma d taggayt tis snat, d tinna n yisental i d-yettuɣalen yal tikkelt, am tayri tamezwarut, izerfan n tmeṭṭut, ɣef waṭṭan, ɣef tyemmat d tassa-s…atg. Imedyaten ɣef yisental-agi; tullist “Taqcict n tesdawit”d “Tayri-w”, sin-agi n yisental ɣef tayri. Ma d “Aẓekka” akked “I lḥeqq-iw, anida-t”, d sin isental ɣef yizerfan n tmeṭṭut. Ma tullist “Yir aṭṭan” d “Tajmilt i waṭṭan”, wwin-t-d awal ɣef sin yisental yemyekcamen gar tayri d waṭṭan. Ma nger kan tamawt ɣer yisental-agi, ad naf, d isental tettidir tmetti tazzayrit s umata d wid tettidir tmetti taqaylit s wuzzig. D timsal yeqqnen daɣen ɣer tudert n tlemẓit neɣ ilemẓi aqbayli, d wayen ttidiren yal ass deg tmetti i d asen-d-yezzin. D isental n tilawt, imi ɣef wakken i d-tenna, d ayen twala neɣ d ayen i d as-d-ulsen medden n tedyanin i d-tura d tullisin, mačči d asugen i tent-id-sugen s wallaɣ-is.

  Aglam 

 Tinhinane Harrache, ur tefki ara azal ameqqran i uglam n yiwudam igejdanen i yellan deg yal tullist. D tinfaliyin i tesseqdec s waṭas, Md: deg sbt 11, “…. yuɣal am uydi, icuba Sidna Yub neɣ ameṣmar-nni yundin ɣef telwiḥt…”. Yella-d kan uglam s umata, mačči am wakken n nennum, nettaf-d aglam n tfekka d ṭṭbiɛa. Ula d aglam n wadeg, yettili-d cwiṭ sya ɣer da, deg yal tullist, acu kan mačči s waṭas. Md: deg sbt 24, “Tekcem tamdint n Tizi Wezzu, tufa d amaḍal-nniḍen, udmawen ijdiden, timeḍqatin d timaynutin…”.

  Amawal 

 Ma si tama n umawal, ad naf tameskart ur yessemres ara aṭas n wawalen imaynuten, ala deg tegnatin ilaqen kan. Md: deg sbt 11, i wakken ad d-tinni “ihuǧer” tenna-d “yuneg”. I wakken daɣen ad d-tinni “ijdiden” tenna-d “Imaynuten”. Ma deg sbt 22, tenna-d “amejjay” deg umkan n “ṭṭbib”, “Taqcict n tesdawit”. Ma deg sbt 47 “tiliẓri” deg umḍiq n “tilivizyun…atg. Am wakken daɣen ara naf tessexdem awalen n teqbaylit iqburen, Md: deg wawalen-agi; “awejrireḥ” deg umkan n “umejruḥ”, “ḥenturi” deg umkan n “ɛeryan”, “taqeddact” deg umḍiq n “txeddamt”…atg. Teseqdec diɣ awalen ireṭṭalen, i wakken ad tesenɣes deg wawalen atraren. Md: tenna-d “Takuzint” mačči tanawalt, tenna-d “ddula” mačči “awanek”, tenna-d diɣ “ṭumubil” deg umkan n “tkerrust”…atg.

 Taɣessa n tullist

 Yal tullist temgarad ɣef wultma-s, ulac tin icuban tayeḍ deg waṭas n temsal yerzan taɣessa n tullist. Si tama n teɣzi d tewzel, tullist “Aẓekka”, d tullist tameẓyant ma d tullist “Asaru n ddunit”, d tullist tameqqrant. Ma si tama n tegnatin n tullist, ur d-ttbanent ara mliḥ am wakken nuɣ tanumi. Yal tagnit yella wacu i d-tt-id-yemmalen, ladɣa inamalen n wadeg. Ma d aglam, ur d-yelli ara s umatu ɣer wuzzig, ama deg yiwudam igejdanen ama deg wadeg ideg teḍra tedyant-nni. Annect-agi, yebɣa ad d-yinni belli, Tinhinane, teffeɣ i uɣanib-nni (lqaleb) n zik, tewwi-d amayut.

  Inaw n tsiwelt 

 Anallas akked tnallast i d-yettallsen tidyanin-agi, bḍan ɣef sin. Yella unallas agensay, ideg i d-iḥekku ɣef wayen yedder neɣ yettwali. Amedya n tullisin-agi; “D tidet yellan”, “Awejrireḥ”, “Mḥend ur nefri”, “I lḥeqq-iw, anda-t”, “Aẓekka”, “Yir aṭṭan”…atg. Zemreɣ ad-inniɣ tuget seg 14 n tullisin yellan deg wammud-agi, ttwalsent-id s yinaw usrid. Ala rebɛa seg-sent i d-yettwalsen s yinaw arusrid. D tullisin i d-yeḥka unallas azeɣray neɣ s wawal-nniḍen yella berra n uḍris, ur yelli ara d awadem am umezwaru-nni. Ihi tullisin-agi, d tigi; “Asaru n ddunit”, “tagujilt”, “taqcict n tesdawit” akked “asirem”.

  Tutlayt 

 D taqbaylit timserreḥt, ur teččur ara d tinfalyin iǧehden s waṭas. Yettwafham unamek n tefyirt s sshala, imi tamarut tettales-d tidyanin-agi srid. Acu kan di kra n tikkal, tesseqdac inzan deg umkan n wawal usrid. Md: deg sbt 43: “yečča d wuccen, yettru d umeksa”, deg sbt 71: “ttruɣ ɣef bu yidɣaɣen, weqɛeɣ deg bu yiṣlaḍen”. Ur nettaf ara aṭas n wawalen iweɛren i tigzi neɣ i ufham ɣer yimeɣri, imi ur d-nettemlili ara tinfaliyin ideg yeffer unamek-nsent.

 Tira

 Ma nmuqqel ɣer uswir-ines n leqraya, mebɛed 5 n yiseggasen n ulmud deg tesdawit, ilaq ur ṭṭuqqutent ara tucḍiwin n tira. Imi cukkeɣ d tira-nni kan n temɣawla neɣ n tazla, lukan tɛawed taɣur-ines aṭas ara tessenqes. Tucḍiwin-agi ad tent-nebḍu akka;

 • Addad ilelli d waddad amaruz: “i iɣallen-is” maca ilaq “i yiɣallen-is” sbt 12, “deg aggur” maca ilaq “deg waggur” sbt 13.

 • Tizdit gar yisem d urbib ameskan: “anda niḍen” maca ilaq “anda-nniḍen” sbt 13.

 • Tizdit gar umyag d tzelɣa n tnila “d”: Ilaq “mlaleɣ-d” mačči “mlaleɣ d” sbt 138.

 • Taseftit n yimyagen: “hgi” maca ilaq “heggi” sbt 105, “ifehmeɣ” maca ilaq “i fehmeɣ”.

 • Gar usenkad akked umqim awsil-is: “aqli-iyi” maca ilaq “aql-iyi” sbt 124.

 • Tusdda n tjerrumt: Ilaq “iḥemmlen” mačči “iḥemlen” sbt 138.

 Tamawt : Nefren-d kra seg yigulen-agi, imi mačči d izli i yellan, maca neɛreḍ ad d-nekkes kra kan seg-sen.

  Taggrayt 

 Taggrayt n wawal d tagi. Adlis-agi d taffa, ad d-yernu ɣer umeqqun n tsekla tamaziɣt. D win ara as-d-yawin abaɣur i teqbaylit, d win ara d-yeqqimen deg umezruy n tsekla-ines. Awal ǧǧan-t-id imezwura: “Ulac tirect ur nesɛi akerfa”, ihi ulac win ixedmen lewqam mebla ma yessexṣe di tazwara. Ɣer taggara, ad d-nesmekti kan belli Massa Harrache Tinhinane, tettheggi adlis-nniḍen ara yilin d ungal s teqbaylit, ad d-yefɣen deg yiseggasen i d-iteddun.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Deg yiwen n wulɣu i aɣ-d-yewwḍen ussan-a kan sɣur Uḥuddu aɣarim n waɣir n Bgayet, yedda-d leḥsab n yineḍruyen d twaɣiyin i d-yeḍran ass n 30 meɣres-a iɛeddan. Imi, akken i d-nnan, ass n sed yella d aberkan si tama n twaɣiyin, daɣen d aẓayan si tama n tuffɣiwin. Ɣef yisalli-nsen, ffɣen tazwara ɣur yiwen n urgaz i izemren ad yili yenwa ad yenɣ iman-is seld mi d-ineggez seg ubraḥ n Gueydon n Bgayet. Yettawawef yemmut di tiyita-nni, syin, yettwawi ɣer texxamt n yimattanen di sbiṭer n Bgayet. Ass-nni daɣen, tella-d tuffɣa n yirgazen n usellek n Uḥuddu aɣarim ɣer ubrid aɣelnaw wis 12, deg temnaḍt n Teɛzibt, taɣiwant n Wad Ɣir, seld amyeẓdam n yiwen n tkerrust akked umuṭu. Iseggra-d usehwu-a, yiwen n umejruḥ yenṭer akked tmettant n yiwen n urgaz bu 33 n yiseggasen, i isuffɣen tarwiḥt deg umkan-nni, ɣef wawal n teɣbalut-nneɣ. Akkin i uɣelluy n yiḍ, mettwal 19:26, ffɣen yiqeddacen n Uḥuddu aɣarim ɣer ubrid aɣelnaw wis 09, meqrub lluzin n Sentex n Xerraṭa. Aya seld amyeẓdam i d-yellan gar tkerrust Renault Symbole akked Dacia Logane. Iḥun Rebbi ur d-telli tmettant deg laksida-a, imi d-tegla kan s kra n yimejraḥ. Ma nga aserwes gar ukraḍyur amezwaru n 2018 d win n 2019, ad naf ttwajerrden deg win n yilindi 332 n yisehwa n ubrid, i yeglan s 08 n yimdanen, seggran-d 359 n yimejraḥ. Ma yella deg win n useggas-a, armi d 30 meɣres-a, ttwajerrden 395 n yisehwa, s 11 n yimattanen d 439 n yimejraḥ. Akken yebɣu yili, ssebba tamezwarut n yisehwa n ubrid, ad teqqim tcudd i umdan. Ihi yelha usmekti ɣef uḥader. 

  M. K. 

  
 Ɣef leḥsab n wayen i d-wakden yiɛeggalen n Usqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa deg wussan ineggura, azal n 60 n tnezduɣin i yellan ttwajerden deg wahil n lebni n umages ( habitat rural), ttwaferqent ɣef yimezdaɣ yenḥafen deg tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa. Ɣas ulamma amḍan-agi n tallelt n lebni n umages drus maḍi, ma nesmars-it d umḍan n yimdanen yessutren tallett, anda yettwajerden ugar n 1200 n yikaramen n tallelt, maca 60 n tnezduɣin-agi, ad snaqṣent aɣbel n tnezduɣin i iceɣben imezdaɣ n tɣiwant-agi yenḥafen. Deg teswiɛt anda tamurt, teɣli-d deg uɣbel n lexsas n tedrimt sdat n ussubu n leswami n upitul deg ssuk n umaḍal, tuget n yiḥricen n uwanek ttwaɛegben. Dɣa, yegla ula s wahil n tallelt n lebni n umages, iḥuza-t uɣbel-agi, dɣa imḍebren sneqsen aṭas deg tallelt.

   Ali Zalouk 

  
 Am yal tikkelt, yettheggi-d Ugraw adelsan Mouloud Feraoun n Uɣernaz unnig ENSB n Buzariɛa leqdicat i yerzan ɣer yidles amaziɣ akked tẓuri-is. Tikkelt-a, suddsen-d yiɛeggalen-is, i lmend n umulli-is wis 10, yiwet n temsizzelt n tmedyazt ifazen. D tajmilt i umaru ameqqran Mulud Farɛun. Ihi, yal yiwen i yessazzalen imeslayen, i yessefruyen, yezmer ad ijerred iman-is deg temsizzelt-a. Acu kan, yewwi-d fell-as ad-asen yazen sin n yisefra i yettwarun s tmaziɣt ɣer tensa-nsen n Facebook ( club culturel : Mouloud Feraoun ensb ). Win ara i ttekkin, ad yettwasenqed ɣef tira akked ususru n usefru-s . Ad tili temsizzelt di tzeqqa n Mulud Ferɛun deg tesdawit n Buzariɛa, ass n 15 deg maggu 2018. Mi i d-nesteqsa yiwen seg yiɛeggalen n ugraw-a, yenna-d : ‘’Nekni d inelmaen deg tesdawit-a n Buzariɛa, tikkelt-a nextar akken ad-as nerr tajmilt-a i Mulud Ferɛun. Ma d leqdic-a, ɛawnen-aɣ deg-s kra n yiselmaden. Am wakken yella daɣen useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa, ɣef uqerru-s Mass El Hechemi Assad akked Mass Bilek . Yerna yenna-d d akken mmi-s n Mulud Ferɛun ad yili d inebgi n lḥerma di temsizzelt-a.

  Ahil i d-yettwaheggan 

 I wass-agi n letnayen 14 meɣres 2018, yella-d usarag n Ali Ferɛun (mmi-s n Mulud Ferɛun) i d-imeslayen ɣef tira d umecwar n yiwet gar tgejda n tsekla tazzayrit neɣ ɛad tamaḍlant maḍi. Tella-d diɣ temsikent meqqren ɣef tudert d wayen i d-yeǧǧa Mulud Ferɛun, tella daɣen temsikent-nniḍen n waṭas n tɣawsiwin timaziɣin. Ad d-tili diɣ ɣef teɣzi n wass-a, turart n tlata n tmezgunin s teqbaylit. Yiwet deg-sent d iɛeggalen n ugraw-agi ara tt-id-yuraren, ma d snat-nni-nniḍen d tirza i d-rzan seg At Yeḥya Mussa akked Mɛatqa. Ma i uzekka n ttlata, yetturaǧu, ad tili timsizzelt n tmedyazt deg tezrigt-is tis kraḍet (03). D timsizzelt ara d-yilin deg Uɣerbaz unnig n yiselmaden (ENSB) n Bouzareah di Lezzayer Tamaneɣt. D timsizwzert yellin tiwwura-s i imedyazen merra, i yettfeṣilen awal s tutlayt n tmaziɣt. Ma ɣef tegnatin n temsizwert-agi, yenna Mass Amrar Ṣufyan: “Yal amedyaz ad d-iɣer sin n yisefra s tmaziɣt u ad ten-yefk ttwarun s uselkim i tesqamut n ufran. Ad yettwaḥsab ɣef snat n tɣawsiwin kan, tamezwarut d tira, imi ilaq ad iqader ilugan n tira n tmaziɣt. Tis snat d udem swayes ara yessusru neɣ ara d-iɣer isefra-nni-ines”. Ma ɣef yiswi n temsizzelt-agi, ikemmel yenna-d: “D tagnit i yimedyazen-agi imeẓyanen, ideg ara myagaren d yimedyazen imeqqranen n teqbaylit, i wakken ad ten-welhen u ten-ɛiwen i wakken ad kemmlen ɣer sdat”. Yetturaǧu ad ttekkin deg-s ddeqs n yimedyazen, ara d-yerzun seg waṭas n yiɣerbazen n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu, i wakken ad myeḥezwaren ɣef tlata-nni n yimeḍqan imenza.

  S.Y./A.A. 

  
 Wid akk iḥemmlen urar n ccatranj, ladɣa deg ttawil n usnas, zemren sya d tasawent ad fernen « Taqbaylit » deg wumuɣ n tutlayin n usnas aziraz Chess.com. Mbeɛd kra n yimalasen n uqeddic, ssawḍen yimsidag (imsuqal) ad d-rren si teglizit ɣer tutlayt n Mulud At Mɛemmer, ugar n 6000 n wawalen. Dɣa, ma nekkes kan tira n temsirin, i yellan kan s teglizit ar tura, tinefrunin-nniḍen llant merra s teqbaylit. Tazwara, ḥaca deg ulqem Beta i nezmer ad naf taqbaylit, imi d tallit n uɛraḍ, maca tura tettwassekcem ula deg ulqem azayez unsib. Ihi, wid iḥemmlen urar-a, zemren kan ad kecmen ɣer Play Store, ad d-zedmen asnas-a ara asen-d-yemmeslayen s teqbaylit. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ula d asenfar n usuqel n wadeg Web n Chess.com ɣer teqbaylit, ha-t-an ileḥḥu akka tura. S wugar n 44 000 n wawalen, ahat ad yeṭṭef usenfar-a kra n wakud akken ad yamed. Aya ad d-yawi ugar n ubaɣur i tutlayt taqbaylit i yettnernin seg lweqt ɣer wayeḍ.

  Kaisa Khalifi 

  
 Ass n, 21 di furar 2019, ɣef 14h, tella-d yiwet n temlilit n tsekla akked temyarut Lynda Cwiten i yeɣran tasekla taglizit, deg temkerḍit tagejdant n tɣuri tazayezt n Tizi Uzzu. Timilit i yezzin ɣef ungal-ines  » Pôv Cheveux  » s tutlayt n tefranṣiṣt. Deg-s, temmeslay-d ɣef tlelli n tmeṭṭut d yirgazen i ttbessifen ɣef tlawin-nsen kra n tɣawsiwin u nutni xeddmen lebɣi-nsen. Tessegzi-d temyarut asentel n ungal-is i d-yeffɣen deg usseggas n 2017 ɣer tezrigt El Kalima. 

 Deg tzeqqa n yisaragen n temkerḍit, llan-d yimeḥḍar n lḥerma deg-sen: Ali Ferεun, anemhal n Uxxam n yidles Mulud At Mεemmer d tnemhalt n yidles Massa Nabila Gumeẓian d yimferǧen-nniḍen i d-yefkan isteqsiyen mi d-yella uskasi, anda i asen-d-terra temyarut s wul zeddigen. Di taggara n temlilit, fkan agerdas n utteki i temyarut, u syin yella-d usenzi n yidlisen s ubuddu. Tesɛa temyarut Lynda Cwiten ifarisen i d-sewwǧad i useggas-agi n 2019 u alaḥsab akken i t-id-tenna, ad ilin sin n wungalen imaynuten. 
  

<p style="text-align:right"> Dahlal Chanez 

  
 Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Awal s tewzel ɣef tezrigt-agi tis 13 n tmedyat?
 
Akli Outamazirt: D ttiɛad adelsan, i nxeddem yal aseggas. D timlilit ideg nettkemmil abrid-nneɣ n umennuɣ d leqdic. D tameɣra n tmedyazt d yimedyazen akked tmedyazin. Aseggas-a, newweḍ ɣer tedwilt tis 13 n temlilit n tmedyazt tamaziɣt d Ṣummam.

  D acu-t umaynut n tezrigt-a ? 
  Amaynut ahat ulac mebɣir ma nuder-d tajmilt yettuɣalen. Akka am usggass-a, ad as-ner tajmilt i yiwen umedyaz ameqqran n teqbaylit, wagi d Ḥmed Laḥlu. 

  D acu-tt tiɣri-nwen i yimedyazen ? 
  Imedyazen a win yufan ilemẓiyen ad ttekkin s waṭas, imi tagnit teḥwaǧ ixulaf, teḥwaǧ aleqqem. Ma yella imedyazen ur d-ttasen ara, ladɣa imaynuten imeẓyanen, ad d-naf iman-nneɣ am wid i teddzen aman neɣ yesserwaten annar d ilem. Daymi i nessawal i yimedyazen i mazal yettkukrun, ur d-nban ara, i wakken ad d-ruḥen. Ad asen-iniɣ d tagnit i kunwi akken ad teslem ad awen-slen. Ad ttweznem ayen i txedmem, d tagnit n usenqed. Ma yella rewwlen ɣef temliliyin, ad ḥsun belli rewwlen ɣaf usɣerbel.

  Awal ɣef tejmilt n Ḥmed Laḥlu ? 
  Tajmilt i Ḥmed Laḥlu, imi netta neḥseb-it d aɛeggal n tddukkla. D netta i yellan deffir n tlallit n temlilit n tmedyazt n Yitri Adelsan n Uqbu netta d Dda Buɛlam Messusi. Yella diɣ deffir n tikti n usebded n usebdad n Si Muḥ u Mḥend. Win i wumi terra tajmilt tddukkla-nneɣ deg temlilit tamenzut. Mass Ḥmed Laḥlu, yewwi-d abrid yemgarad d wiyaḍ i t-yezwaren deg uḥric n tmedyazt, imi netta yeffeɣ-d yessufeɣ-d tamedyazt yid-s, imi diɣ yebɣa ad yerr azal i usefru d umedyaz. Ḥmed Laḥlu, d amedyaz yerran rruḥ i wawal armi yuɣal awal d tugna d tagit, d tanagit ɣer wawal yettilin deffir wawal.

  D acu-ten wuguren i d-tettmaggarem yal tikkelt mi ara tt-id-suddsem? 
  Akken bɣun ilin wuguren nugi ad asen-neknu, imi nekni deg tddukkla, neqqar akken i d-yusa wass ad t-yeks umeksa, imi numen s wayen nxeddem, nwala s anida nteddu. Ssarameɣ kan imedyazen d tmedyazin, ad aɣ-d-fehmen. Ma yella wayen ur ad asen-d-nmudd, armi ur t-nesɛi ara, wamma aɣullu ur nettɣullu ara. Ma dayen-nniḍen, d ayen ttwalin akk medden, imi nekni neṭṭef rruḥ, timliliyin n tmedyazt bdant ttxasant, ihi akken yebɣu yili nekka-t ad nessider timlilit n tmedyazt n tddukkla tadelsant Itri adelsan n Uqbu. Menyif tella neɣ ulac.

  Awal n taggara ? 
  Ad asen-iniɣ i yimedyazen, aru-t-d. Nekni nefka-awen tagnit, kunwi ur tt-tzeggelt ara. Cwiṭ sɣur-nneɣ cwiṭ sɣur-wen, akken ad nesnerni tamedyazt, akken ad as-neg amkan i umedyaz d tmedyazt. Axxam d axxam-nwen, timlilit d timlilit-nwen, ansuf yis-wen. Ula d kečč diɣen tanemmit-ik d tameqqrrant, imi yal abrid tettmudduḍ-aɣ tagnit ad d-nmeslay.

  Yesteqsa-t Gh. A. 

  
 Γas akka neẓra akkit belli tudert ur tettdum ara, ɣes ma yella ubrid n taggara d yiwen, meεna ulac d acu yellan qerriḥ ugar n tmettant. Taneggarut-a, ur telli d yiwet, imi yal yiwen amek ara yemmet. Wagi s usehwu, winna s lehlak, wayeḍ ahat mebla tamentilt. Nabil Keddar, d yiwen n yilemẓi i yesεan azal n 35 n yiseggasen, ḥemmlen-t akkit medden. Imi yettusen s wul-is meqqer, d ṭadsa ur nettixir ɣef wudem-is. Nabil, yella yeznuzu lḥut deg ssuq n Xerrata. D argaz iḥemmlen axeddim-is. Meεna tamettant ur tzeggel ula d yiwen. Ass n sed yezrin, 8 cutember, iṛuḥ yilemẓi-a, ad iseggeḍ iselman, am yal ass, ɣas akken ur yeẓri belli ur d-yettuɣal ara. Cwiṭ n yisragen i iεeddan segmi i yelḥeq, yettwaberreḥ yisalli n tmettant-is. Nabil, yeɣreq deg umḍiq i yellan d taɣbalut n lqut-is. Seld isalli-a, ṛuḥen aṭas n yimezdaɣ ɣer umḍiq-nni ahat i wakken ad t-id-sellken. Meεna ifut lḥal, Rebbi yexdem ccɣel-is. Γas ma yella kecmen deg waman, ttqelliben fell-as, ur t-ufin ara. Yerna ddeqs n wakud, nutni d aεṛaḍ. Ma d wiyaḍ seg tama-nniḍen, ssawlen i yimeggiyen n Uḥuddu aɣarim. Ineggura-a, rran-d i tiɣri, rnu ayen yeseffraḥen s tidet d yiwen n uqeddac seg-sen i yellan deg yimuṛas, i d-yusan s tazzla imi I as-ɣran. Wagi d Mass » Reḍwan F « , i yufan tafekka-s, ijbed-itt-id seg waman, s ufus n tallelt n yimeddukkal-is. Medden merra i iḥeḍren dinna, snemmren-t ɣef leqdic-is, ma yella d netta yerra-asen : « Ulac d acu giɣ, d wagi ay d axeddim-iw, am nekk, am yemeddukkal-iw». Imawlan-is d wid i t-yesnen, snemmren seg tama-nsen kra n win i d-yegren afus-is i temεiwna. Nettazen talwit i umerḥum.

   K. K. 

  
 Ulac yakk ccekk d akken tuget n wid iḥemmlen urar n ccatranj, ur zgilen ayen i d-yeḍran d ineḍruyen ddurt-a iɛeddan, ama d talɣuɣa n tefriqt n yimecṭaḥ, talɣuɣa n umaḍal deg tmurt n Saɛudiya neɣ d tin n uẓeṭṭa n internet i d-tettheggi chess.com. Deg tmurt-a, ihi i d-nebder, i temmug telɣuɣa n umaḍal n ccatranj King Salman. gar yimuraren akk ifazzen deg umaḍal d kra seg wid iɛeddan 1 400 deg usismel elo. Ahat xussen kan kraḍ n Yimarikanen; am Hikaru Nakamura, i yugin taggara-a turart deg Saɛudiya. Akked Tukranit talɣuɣt n umaḍal Anna Muzychuk , seg tama n tlawin, i yugin ula d nettat ad truḥ ɣef kra n ssebbat i d-tenna rzant tilelli-ines nettat. Teɣzi n tberza-a, aṭas i d-yellan d tiram yelhan, s uswir aɛlayan daɣen. Am wakken ddeqs n yimɛadalen i yettwajerrḍen. Deg temsizzelt-a, ur yebdi ara akken ilaq ulɣuɣ n umaḍal Magnus Karlsen deg tiram tiruradin. Maca yella yesra kan i ukuẓ n wussan akken ad d-yuɣal deg blitz i uswir swayes yettwassen. Armi dɣa seg mraw n tiram (parties), yerna ṭam iga amɛadal di snat. S waya yerra-d azwel-is n ulɣuɣ deg blitz. Deg talɣuɣa n tlawin, d Nana Dzagnidz i d-iḥellan azwel i useggas seld mi turar ula d nettat aṭas n tiram yelhan. Dɣa, yebda yettban-d mliḥ taggara-a ccatranj n tlawin deg umaḍal merra. Ma yella deg ssenf arurad, d Ahendiw Viswanathan Anand i d-iḥellan azwel n useggas 2017 seld mi yebda akken yessaram gedged. D awal ɣef talɣuɣa n Speed Chess Championship. i d-ijemɛen Anurviji Magnus Karlsen d Umarikan Hikaru Nakamura, d amezwaru-a i d-iḥellan daɣ azwel n useggas-a i tikkelt tis snat ta deffir ta, s ugemmuḍ n 18-9.

  M. K. 

  
 Yezga yettili-d uɣbel n lexsaṣ n waman n tissit deg tɣiwant n Mɛatqa, yal tallit n unebddu. Dɣa deg wussan-agi ineggura, yerkeb-iten lɣiḍ tseqquma n tudrin n tɣiwant ɣef waddad n Tnegla n waman. Aɣbel yeɛna tuget n temnaḍin. Ɣef leḥsab n kra n yimezdaɣ n taddart n At Zɛim, ugar n snat n ledwar-aya, ur sɛin aman.
