Llan kra n yizenqan anda ur sɛin ara aman ugar n waggur, am tudrin n Lbir, Iɣil Aɛwen, Tajdiwt, At Aḥmed, At Ɛissa Uzyen, Icarqiyen d Tizi- Mnus …atg, dayen i ten-icuɣben aṭas, ladɣa tid yenḥafen, ur nezmir ara ad d-taɣ tanutfi ( citerne) n waman s 2000 DA i yiwet. Imḍebren n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa teɛna temsalt, nnan-d yakka-d lexsaṣ deg Waman aɣrem n Tsaddurt imi cudden deg yiseggasen ineggura ɣer temdint tamaynut n Wad Fali. Rnu ɣef waya, d akken azeṭṭa addad n dir i seg i d-ggrann yiqadusen. Ɣef leḥsab n yimḍebber n tɣiwant, d akken tcudd tifrat ɣer keffu n usenfar n uẓeṭta n waman i d-yezgan deg unẓul n tɣiwant.

  A. Z. 

  
 Tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ yers-d fell-asen leḥzen imi snat n tgejda iɣef sennden ɣlint. Ruḥent sanda akken ara n-qqiment i lebda. Amek ihi ur d-yettru ara yigenni ɣef sin n yirgazen yefkan tudert-nsen i merra ɣef tutlayt n tmaziɣt d yidles-is.

 Dda Abdellah Haman, mmi-s n At Dawed, yuklal ass-a ad as-nerr tajmilt xas ulamma s wawal kan d kra n yijerriden, acku yura amecwar n tudert s yisekkilen n wureɣ. Deg temẓi-s, ibedd mgal amnekcam Afrensis, i wakken ad ikemmel amecwar-is deg umennuɣ ɣef tutlayt-is. Netta, mačči seg wid yeqqaren nḥemmel tamaziɣt, meɛna yella seg wid i tt-iḥemlen, i tt-yettarun, i tt-yesselmaden. Aya, ibeggen-it-id s yidlisen yura d yisargen i d-yesker di yal tagnit, ladɣa anda yettidir deg Wehran. Talallit n Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa yerna-as afud meqqren i umeɣnas i wakken ad yettili deg tfaskiwin. Yezzi-d meḥsub i waṭas n temnaḍin n tmurt anda yessuzer tamussni-s d timidt-is deg leqdic ɣef tutlayt d yidles amaziɣAss-a, tamettant tecellqef-it uqbel ad yidir ayen akk i yessaram ad t-iwali : tamaziɣt tuɣ timnaḍin n tmurt n Lezzayer merra. Ass n 9 cutember yezrin i yewweḍ leɛfu n Rebbi umeɣnas ameqqran n tmaziɣt, amyaru, amedyaz, amjahed Dda Ɛebḍella Ḥaman ɣef usemmud n 82 n yiseggasen, di temdint n Wehran, mbeɛd lehlak iḍullen. Ssmana-a taneggarut, yekcem ɣer sbiṭer, izad fell-as waṭṭan, yewweḍ s anda ara naweḍ akk. Dda Ɛebḍella, yenǧer-d abrid n timmuɣnest segmi yella meẓẓi, yessezri iseggasen n tegrawla tazzayrit deg tkurmut n Berwageyya, Lambez d Wehran. Dɣa imir i yebda yettaru deg yiseggasen-nni n 50 timezgunin d yisefra. Syin ikemmel deg ubrid n tira mi tefra tegrawla, yella gar wid i d-yeslulen tiddudkla Numidya n Wehran, yexdem ayendin d asarag deg yirebbi-s. Uɣalent-as waṭas n tejmilin dinna neɣ di tmurt n Leqbayel. Yettuneḥsab d ababat n tsekla tamaziɣt deg Wehran, acku d netta i d-ineǧren abrid n tira s tmaziɣt. Gar wayen yura, ad naf : Ɛmer n wewriz (tamacahut), Merwas di lberǧ n yiṭij 1 d 2 (tamezgunt), Amjaḥ, Tawaɣit n tayri (ungalen), Tudert-iw di tegrawla (tanaga)… atg. Tella-d temḍelt-is ass-nni n letnayen yezrin ɣef lweḥda n uzal s uneḥḍur n waṭas n yiwudam n tsekla tamaziɣt, imyura, imedyazen d yinaẓuren. Ad iṣebber Rebbi tawacult-is, yeǧǧa-asen-d lbaraka. Moulay Seddik Slimane, tigejdit-nniḍen n temnaḍt n Timimun i yessufɣen tarwiḥt kra kan n wussan mbeɛd tamettant n Dda Abdellah Ḥaman. S tidet, yeḥzen Uhellil n Gurara, imi d nettat i yellan deffir tikti-agi i yesnerna Dda Lmulud. D ameddakkel-is, d amwelleh-is deg tama-agi n tneẓruft, Moulay yella-d di lmendad i usufeɣ n ugerruj n tmahaqt. D aɛessas ɣef yidles, yettḥarab ɣef tutlayt, tettunefk-as tegnit ad yelmil d Dda Lmulud i wakken ad sbedden ayen yellan deg timawit ad yettwajerred s tira. Amecwar-nsen ɣezzif, lebɣi-nsen ur yesɛi tilas, maca ɣas akken ur ssawḍen ara ɣer taggara n yiswi, lsas i sersen yeǧǧhed, ireṣṣa. Gnet di talwit.

  S. M. / K. A. 

  
 Ass-agi n letnayen 8 deg waggur n yennayer 2018, i d-teffeɣ ɣer ssuq tesɣunt “Isekkilen” n tiddukkla tadelsant Itri n Uzekka n taddart n Yixelwiyen deg tɣiwant n At Ɛissa Mimun. D uṭṭun amezwaru n tesɣunt-agi tamkerḍeyurt ( ara d-itteffɣen yal 3 wagguren), ad tettnuzu deg tnedlisin s wazal n 100 DA. D tasɣunt yuran s snat n tutlayin-agi tamaziɣt akked tefransist, i d-yewwin awal ɣef ddeqs n yisental d temsal yemgaraden. Ad naf deg-s snat n tdiwenniyin, yiwet n Muḥend n Ayt Abdella ( d yiwen gar 24 n yimeḥbas n tefsut n yimaziɣen, d amedyaz d amaru daɣen), ma d tis snat d tin n Muḥend Arkat, s yisem-is d mmi-s n temnaḍt-agi yerna d aneggal u d amaru s teqbaylit. Am wakken daɣen ara naf 11 n yimagraden-nniḍen s teqbaylit, gar tmucuha d tullisin d yiḍrisen n yinelmaden i d-yufraren deg temsizzelt i xedmen yakkan deg 20 yebrir 2017. Llan daɣen yisental n tussna, ladɣa ɣef tdawsa d waṭtan n Sida. Am wakken diɣ i fursen tagnit i wakken ad as-rren tajmilt i umedyaz d umaru ameqqran Ɛli Maqur, i d-tefka temnaḍt-agi. Seddan-d daɣen kra n tukkisin seg yisefra yura deg udlis “Ul Yerɣan”. Llan daɣen yiḍrisen i d-yewwin awal ɣef wazal n tmeṭṭut deg tmetti, d kra n wansayen n tmurt n Leqbayel, am yennayer. Llan daɣen 4 n yiḍrisen s tutlayt n tefransist, i d-yewwin awal ɣef umecwar n tezlit taqbaylit, agzul n tmezgunt “L’Mir” i tetturar tiddukkla-agi zik, yella daɣen wayeḍ ɣef tefsut taberkant n 2001. Ma ɣer taggara, ad naf kra n temseɛraq d tririt-nsen, llan daɣen kra n yinzan s teqbaylit d tefransist, gan ula d amkan i wurraren, gar-asen: Suduku, Taruẓi n uqerruy, Awal uffir, Azeṭṭa n wawalen…atg. Llant diɣ kra n tugniwin n leqdicat d yiremmad n tiddukkla-agi i iqeddcen deg unnar n yidles seg 2008. I lmend n waya, ha-t-an wayen i d-yenna uselway n tiddukkla-agi, Mass Amar Bedrani: “S lferḥ d ameqqran i nekker i usbeddi n tesɣunt-agi, imi i tikkelt tamezwarut deg umezruy n tiddukkla “Itri n Uzekka”. Nekkni nqubl-itt s tumert meqqren nessam daɣen imeɣriyen neɣ imezdaɣ n temnaḍt-nneɣ ad ferḥen yis-s. Ad ferseɣ tagnit i wakken ad snimreɣ akk imdanen i d-yefkan afus i wakken ad tlal tesɣunt-agi, ama yeqqreb neɣ yebɛed”. S wakka ad naf belli d tasɣunt n yidles, d tasɣunt tussnant, nessaram-as teɣzi n leɛmer i tesɣunt d tiddukkla-agi, d tikli ɣer sdat.

  Adaoun Abdelghani 

  
 Deg yiwet n tebrat i iceyyeɛ ussan yezrin i uneɣlaf n yiqeddicen izuyaz, yessutur umazan (député) amaynu n ugraw aparlaman n Tirni n Yiɣallen Inemlayen FFS, mass Nasir Ɛebdun, amuqel deg yir liḥala ideg yella ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9 i iteqqnen abeɛda tiwilayin n ufella ɣer tid n n daxel, neɣ ula d tid n usamar ɣer tid n umalu. Inecced-it deg-s ad d-yernu abrid-nniḍen i umecwar-a iɣef i d-nettmeslay, n ubrid aɣelnaw. Deg uḍris i yura mass Ɛebdun nezmer ad nɣer: « Mass aneɣlaf, iteqqen tawilayt n Bgayet i tin n Seṭṭif ubrid aɣelnaw wis 09 ɣef teɣzi n 109 n yikilumitren. Ad yeqqim umur seg tlata seg ubrid-a ur yesɛi abrid ayugan. D win i d aḥric alemmas i iteqqnen gar tɣiwanin n Suq Letnin d Xerraṭa armi d tilisa n waɣir n Seṭṭif. Asisleg n ubrid-a gar tzewrin n yimezdaɣ n Temnaḍt d twilayin tinaragin, imi yettuneḥsab d win yessawaḍen, yesɛeddayen daɣ gar twilayin n Ssaḥel: Bgayet d Jijel, akked tid n daxel… »

 Daɣen, deg yiwen n yizen yenna umazan-a: « yesseklas ubrid-a amḍan n wugar n 25.000 n tkerrusin d 10.000 n yikamyan yal ass (…) ». Ad d-nesmekti belli taluft-a iɣef yura mass Nasir Ɛebdun aṭas-aya segmi tella d anezgum n yimezdaɣ n Bgayet merra, abeɛda iseqdacen n ubrid aɣelnaw wis 9. Imi segmi ara d-yaweḍ unehhar deg Suq Letnin, deg tisin-is seg Bgayet, ad ifakk din ubrid ayugan i yettarran tikli teshel. Dɣa, deg yiwen n ubrid tikwal ḥeccir ayendin, daɣen d amihan, ara d-ikemmel armi d Xerraṭa. Deg ubrid-is dɣa, ilaq-as ad iɛeddi seg ufalu mu ssawalen « Afalu n tmettant ».

  M. K. 

  
 Mačči d ayen yessefraḥen i iḍerrun taggara-a deg lbanka n Xerraṭa, i sɛeddayen yakk imɣaren i tt-yettekɛmen akken ad d-frun lecɣal-nsen. Ma yella deg wakuden yezrin ttafen yimeqqranen deg leɛmer sshala deg tuddma n yimuren-nsen n tedrimt, i ttalasen yal ayyur neɣ yal kraḍ n wayyuren, seg lbanka n Xerraṭa, tiswiɛin-a tineggura yenneqlab-asen waddad. Aṭas n yimɣaren d temɣarin i yeccektayen s usḥissef ɣef wayen sɛeddayen merra daxel lbanka-nni, d tuɛert i d-ttmagaren iwakken ad awin kan ayla. Ɣef wawal i d-ḥekkun yimɣaren-a, nezmer ad d-nini uggten lḥif d lbaṭṭel i yettwaxdamen fell-asen, imi llan ttuḥettamen ad rǧun ugar n sebɛa n tseɛtin akken ad asen-d-telḥeq nnuba n tuṭṭfa n tedrimt. Aya iban yewɛer-asen nezzeh, ladɣa imi ur wwiḍen 10 n yikersiyen i yersen dinna i yiɣimi. Meḥsub ala imezwura i ikecmen ɣer lbanka-nni i yettafen tagnit n tɣimit fell-asen. Ma d widak-nniḍen terra-ten tmara ad ttraǧun s yibeddi, ad sebren i ɛeyyu. Nnig lexsas n ttawil n usraḥi i iḍurren imeqqranen-nni, ula d aɣilif n usɛeddi n nnwabi war leḥsabat n uzref ur ten-yezgil ara. Ɣas ma llan yimɣaren i yettaǧǧan iḍes, ttruḥun zik maḍi ad d-jebden tadrimt-nsen, ad uɣalen zik ɣer yixxamen, maca tikwal d wid yusan deffir-sen i sɛeddayen uqbel-nsen. Tikwal daɣen teffɣen-d mebla ma fran ccɣel i ten-yecqan, tteqqalen deg wussan-nniḍen. « Ruḥeɣ d lexmis tanezzayt ad d-ddmeɣ tadrimt-iw seg lbanka n Xerraṭa. Rwiɣ araǧu dinna, di taggara nnan-iyi-d ur iyi-tt-id-ttakken alama d ass n acer acku ɛeṭṭleɣ deg wawwaḍ. Mi uɣaleɣ d lḥedd ɣef lxemsa n tsebḥit, niqal ugin daɣen ad iyi-sɛeddin, wanag ur asen-susmeɣ tikkelt-nni. Qqimeɣ din armi d 14:sr akken i tt-id-wwiɣ ». I d-tenna yiwet n temɣart seg Ayt Smaɛel. Ɣef tnagiyin n wid i teɛna taluft, ssebba n lbaṭṭel-a yettmaggan ɣef yimɣaren deg lbanka n Xerraṭa, teqqen s waṭas ɣer uzwir i ttezwaren yiqeddacen-is deg wid yettruḥun ad sersen d tarusi idrimen, mačči ad d-awin. Ternuḍ-as itikiyen ur ttakken i widak i tt-yettekcamen iwakken ad yili lḥeqq, ad ibin d anwa ileḥqen send wayeḍ, d wanwa ara iɛeddin uqbel wayeḍ. Armi yewweḍ uɣilif ɣer yiniɣ d uṭebbeɛ gar yimɣaren, yal wa yebɣa ad zwiren deg-s. Dɣa tetteggra-d temḍerrit i temɣarin d wid yuḍnen.

  K.K .

  
 Yiwen n yinaw i d-yettuɣalen yal tikkelt deg yisaragen i d-yettilin ɣef unegmu deg ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu, wagi d anezruy n temḍiqin (désequilibre régional).

 Dɣa ma nessemres kan gar tɣiwanin n ugerzu, ad naf amgarad meqqren, ladɣa gar tɣiwanin n ugafa n Tizi Uzzu i d-iḥerzen amur ameqqren deg unegmu deg yal aḥric n tdamsa. Ma yella d tiɣiwanin n unẓul n ugerzu, mazal-tent deg yir addad deg yal aḥric n tdamsa. Ɣas ma d yiwet n tɣiwant i ijerden isem-is s wuraɣ deg yisebtar n tegrawla n 1954, u ɣas ma tefka-d aṭas n wudmawen n umezruy yennuɣen mgal acengu afransi-is, yecban Krim Belkacem d wiyaḍ-nniḍen, ar ass-a, mazal taɣiwant n At Yaḥya Mussa gar tɣiwanin timaɛḍar n ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu ɣer yidis n tɣiwant n Mɛatqa.

  Aɣbel n lgaz n temdint d waman n tissit 

 Ɣas ma imḍebbren n ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu, ɣef uqerru-nsen lwali yewɛeden acḥal d tikkelt deg tirziwin-ines ɣer tɣiwant s tifrat n uɣbel-agi n lgaz n temdint merra tnezduɣin n temḍiqt, maca deg tilawt, mazal aṭas n twaculin n tɣiwant, ad sɛeddint tagrest mebla lgaz n temdint. Ad kemmlent akked lḥif n teqraɛtin n lgaz. Aɣbel-nniḍen i iḥuzan tamḍiqt-agi n leqbayel, d aɣbel n waman n tissit. Dɣa ula deg tallit-agi n tegrest, ulac aman. Amedya n taddart n Helli, ur nesɛi ara aman n tissit ugar n sin (02) wagguren-aya s sebba n wansig deg yiqadusen n waman. Yezga uɣbel-agi n waman deg tudrin n tɣiwant, ladɣa deg tallit n unebdu, anda tikwal ur d-ttuɣalen ara waman ugar n sin (2) wagguren.

  Taɣiwant mebla annaren n waddalen d inidan n usnuffes i yilmeẓyen 

 Ur sɛin ara yilmeẓyen n tɣiwant n At Yahia Moussa anda ara rren : la ixxamen n yilmeẓyen, anda ara kksen lxiq, la inurar n waddal yemgaraden. Akka i uɣen amekkan yir cufat uɣent deg taggayt-agi n yilmeẓyen, ladɣa lehyuf d tissit n ccrab.

  Yir addad n yiberdan 

 Ṭṭuqqten yiɣeblan deg tɣiwant-agi. Gar-asen yir addad n uẓeṭṭa n yiberdan yemgaraden n tɣiwant ur nemɛin ara i telḥin n ṭumubilat, yeɣza deg yal tardast s sebba n waman n ugeffur, imi ugar n 8 n yiseggasen-aya, ur iɛawed ubrid.

  Aɣbel n tnezduɣin 

 Ɣer yidis n tuqet n tɣiwanin n ugerzu n TiziUuzzu, yezga uɣbel n tnezduɣin d aɣbel d ameqqran, ladɣa imi ala ahil n tallelt n tnezduɣin n lebni i yellan kan deg tɣiwant-agi. Akka ara naf, dɣa, ugar n 1 500 n yimdanen, i yessuturen tallelt i lebni. Ṭṭuqqten yiɣeblen, ama deg uḥric n tdawsa, deg usefti, deg wahilen n unegmu n tɣiwant…atg. Ɣef waya i ssuturen yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant deg yimḍebbren n ugerzu n Tizi Uzzu i wakken ad d-rren lewhi ɣer tɣiwant-nsen maɛḍuren deg yal aḥric, ad d-afen tifrat i yiɣeblan i deg ttɛiccin. 

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Yal aseggas yettezzi-d akken tarwa-s ad t-tesfugel, ad as-terr azal. Acku d azemz yesɛan azal, yettuɣal-d s yiseɣ, syin i d-yebda ubrid. Yejmeɛ-d idles, tutlayt, amennuɣ, asirem d tmaziɣt. D aggur n yebrir, yettwarfed s lḥir, sɣur wid ur nettwexxir. D tafsut umaziɣ, yesddukklen Leqbayel. Deg wazemz yecban wagi, d tikliwin deg ubrid s usenǧaq n tlelli, d isaragen, d ccnawi, d timeɣriwin d lfuruḥ i d-yettilin deg yal tama. Tafsut n Yimaziɣen d aneḍruy i yettwasfuglen 39 n yiseggasen-aya ar ass-a. Kullec yebda-d s tidet ass n 10 deg meɣres 1980 mbeɛd mi yugi udabu n tallit-nni ad d-yili usarag n Mulud Mɛemri ɣef tmedyazt n teqbaylit taqburt. Seld agdal n usarag-a, tamurt n Leqbayel merra teddukel u tekker mgal tamḥeqranit-a d maḥyaf-a ɣef tutlayt n lejdud. Tettwaḥsab d tanekra taɣerfant tamezwarut deg tmurt n Lezzayer segmi i d-tḥella timunent-is deg 1962. Llant-d tmesbaniyin d yisundad deg tmurt n Leqbayel akked Lezzayer tamanaɣt, maca tiririt n udabu ɣef wannect-a, tella-d qeṣṣiḥet, acku aṭas n wid yettwaṭṭfen d wid yettwawten seg yimesbaniyen. Ass n 20 di yebrir 1980, yella-d userreḥ n wid yettwaṭṭfen, akken daɣ i d-yella uɛiwed n usɛeddi n ukayad n lbak i tikkelt tis snat, tanemmirt tettuɣal i tuddsa n tesnawiyin n tmurt n Leqbayel i yellan tettnaḍaḥ iman-is deg unnar lawan-nni. Seg yimir ar ass-a, yettwasfugel wass n 20 yebrir deg tmurt n Leqbayel d tirni, yal mi ara d-yeḥḍer ttilit-d tfaskiwin d tmeɣriwin n ccna sɣur tiddukliwin tidelsanin. D ass n lficṭa daɣen, imi iɣerbazen meddlen tiwwura-nsen deg wass yecban assen. 

  Kh. A 

  
 S rbeḥ-agi-ines sdat n terbaɛt Horoya Conakry, tettedu srid JSK ɣer uḥric i d-iteddun n telɣuɣa n Tefriqt. 

 Sdat n waṭas n yimferǧen i d-yerzan ass-nni n sebt, 14 deg cutember 2019, ɣer unnar n umenzu n unbir n temdint n Tizi Uzzu, tessaweḍ tarbaɛt n Yilmeẓyen n leqbayel i wakken ad terbeḥ sin (2) n yiswiyen ɣer ulac HAConakry. Iswiyen i d-yewwi yilemẓi ifazen Banouh i yuraren akken iwata timlilit armi d ddqiqa tis 84’. Xas ulamma aṭas i d-yewwten deg-s uqbe ad t-walin yetturar deg unnar, meɛna ibeggen-d belli yezmer ad d-yawi ugar i terbaɛt n Yilmeẓyen n leqbayel. 

 Dayen i yeḍran dɣa sendiḍelli n sebt. Tekcem terbaɛt n JSK s annar s lebɣi meqqren i wakken ad terbeḥ timlilit s waṭas n yiswiyen ayen ara yessishilen timlilit n tuɣalin ɣer Conakry, acu mačči dayen isehlen sdat n terbaɛt n HAC i yetturaren ula d nettat s lebɣi ameqqran. Xas ulamma aṭas n tegnatin i as-iruḥen I terbaɛt n JSK i wakken ad d-tawi iswiyen, ladɣa deg ddqayeq 2’, 4’, 18’, 28’, 44’, sɣur Addadi, Banouh, Souyad d wiyaḍ, meɛna armi d ddqiqa tis 51’ i yessekcem Banouh ddabex ɣer daxel ucebbak n Moussa Camara, aɛessas n terbaɛt n HAConakry.

  Aya, ur yessefcil ara imyurar n HAC, imi ɛerḍen ad d-rren ttar kra n ddqayeq kan ɣef yiswi amezwaru n JSK, acu kan tarbaɛt n Yilmeẓyen n leqbayel i yernan iswi-nniḍen. Iswi i d-yewwi dima Banouh deg ddqiqa tis 66’. S sin n yiswiyen ɣer ulac i tkemmel temlilit armi d taggara-s. Gar wid yellan deg temlilit-agi, nezmer ad d-nader Sendjak. Am wakken daɣen i truḥ trisiti uqbel ad yebdu uḥric wis sin n temlilit, acu kan tuɣal-d snat n ddqayeq kan.

  Hocine Moula   

  
 Deg yimalas yezrin i kfant tmeɣriwin n ccna n unebdu, i d-yettilin timeddiyin n wass (deg yiḍ) di temdint di tzeqqa El Maɣreb, di Wehran. Am yal tameddint, di temdinin n tmurt n Lezzayer s umata, ladɣa tid yecban Lezzayer tamanaɣt, Bgayet, Tizi, Wehran, Qsenṭina d tiyaḍ, mugent-d timeɣriwin-agi i d-isgerwen tiwaculin s lferḥ akken ad kksent ɣef lxaṭer-nsent, ad ttunt aɣamac qeṣṣiḥen n uzal. D timeɣriwin ideg ccnan yinaẓuren yemxalafen n tmurt. Ma nuɣal-d ɣer temdint n Wehran, ahat qrib yal sin neɣ kraḍ n wussan, tettelday tzeqqa El Maɣreb tiwwura-s i twaculin i d-yettasen s umata deg yal tiɣmert n temdint-agi. Aṭas n yicennayen i d-yulin ɣef tseddart n ccna ɣef teɣzi n unebdu, dɣa imi tamdint n Wehran d tin yettwazedɣen s waṭas n leqbayel, ama d wid i d-yekkren din, ṭṭfen di teqbaylit-nsen neɣ d wid i iruḥen seg tmurt n Leqbayel i lxedma d wayen-nniḍen, ɣef waya ihi ula d icennayen n tmurt n Leqbayel yella wamur-nsen, ssawlen-asen-d i wakken ad kkin u ad ccnun di tmeɣriwin-agi. Ad d-nebder gar-asen tameɣra yexdem Wakli Yeḥyaten ɣer tama n Qasi d Wali Buseɛd deg yiḍ n 12 deg waggur n yulyu, akked tmeɣra meqqren n Ṭakfarinas ass n 13 di ɣuct, d tin daɣen i d-yessemlalen Massa Bucafa, Murad Gerbas d tlemẓit i wumi i d-yeflali yitri n ccna Silya Wled Muḥend ass n waram 28 ɣuct deg usensu meqqren n Miridyan. D tignatin am tigi i d-yessemlalayen dɣa leqbayel akken ad mmeẓren, ad myukkasen lxiq n lebɛada ɣef tmurt n lejdud ladɣa wid ur nerzi ara aṭas-aya ɣer tmurt n yidurar. Am wakken daɣen ad kksen ɣef wul u ad ceḍḥen s tumert. Sya d afella, ad d-ilint ama d tifaskiwin n yidles, ama d timeɣriwin n ccna, ama d timliliyin ideg ara d-yili wawal ɣef yidles, ccna neɣ ula d aselmed n tmaziɣt d tgemmi s umata di temnaḍt-agi i ilaq ad tili d ul n tutlayt n tmaziɣt, d aɣbalu iseg ara d-teffeɣ tegmat d wazal n ccna aqbayli berra i tmurt n Leqbayel.

  Khaled Achoui 

  
 I tikkelt tamezwarut deg umezruy n talsa, tettwasken-d i umaḍal merra tugna n uxjiḍ aberkan, i yellan ar tura d lbaḍna n umeɣrad. Yella-d waya i lmend n usarag i gan kra n yimasayen n radyu atiliskup uhlis (Event Horizon Telescope), i yellan d aẓeṭṭa agraɣlan n uwali. Ixeddem uxjiḍ-a aberkan, ɣef wawal n yimussnawen, azal n 40 yimelyaren n yikilumitren deg ukdu (diamètre), yettusemma ugar n kraḍ n yimelyan n tikkal ɣef win n Wakal. Ad d-nesmekti d akken tawlaft i d-yettwaseknen mačči d tin n Sagittaire A*, axjiḍ aberkan i d-yezgan di tlemmast n umazellaw-nneɣ, maca d tin n uxjiḍ aberkan n Messier 87. Asurif-a d ameqqran deg umezruy n tsengama, imi ula d yiwen seg wid yekkin deg usenfar-a yenna-d walan ayen tuɣ ɣillen ur yettmeẓra. Aẓeṭṭa-a n ṭam n yitiliskupen n lqaɛa, yebda deg useggas n 2012. 

 Yal yiwen yettwasres deg walbaɛḍ n tamiwin deg umaḍal, akken ad d-yennulfu ɣer taggara « Utiliskup ameqqran ». Tlul-d tugna-a, seld aslaḍ n yiṭira-ukṭiyen n yisefka i d-yettwagemren deg yebrir n useggas n 2017. Dɣa, ugar n 200 n yimsṭrufiziken i yekkin deg uqeddic-a imezdi swayes nessaweḍ nwala later n uxjiḍ aberkan. Yelha ad d-nselɣu daɣen belli yal atiliskup yettarew-d azal n 350 n yiṭira-ukṭiyen i wass. Mi ttwaḥerzen yakk isefka deg yiḍebsiyen iquranen iwennɛen, ttwaceyyɛen Usudu Max Planck deg Telmant d MIT Haystack Observatory akken ad ttwazdin. Din i ten-id-rran ɣer tugna s useqdec n wallalen isenselkamen ifazzen. Ɣef waya yessefham-d umsṭrufizik Olivier Hernandez, belli ma yella wwḍen i ugmuḍ-a armi semlalen aṭas n yiṭiliskupen i yeqqnen i uẓeṭṭa. Simmal yettzid umḍan n yitiliskupen, simmal tberreq tugna. I wugar n telɣut, axjiḍ aberkan d taɣawsa deg umeɣrad s tufayt d tameqqrant maḍi deg yiwen n ubleɣ d amecṭuḥ aṭas. 

 Ayen akk yekkan fell-as ad yettwačč, ama d itran, lgaz neɣ ulamma d tafat. Yewwi-d ad d-nesmekti d akken tiẓri-a n wazuḥ n tafat i yettilin rrif uxjiḍ aberkan, yella yemmeslay-d fell-as umussnaw Stephen Hawking. Dɣa, llan wid i d-yeqqaren lemmer mazal-it yedder, tili ahat i netta ara yettunefk warraz Nobel deg tfizikt.
   M. K. 

  
 D ayen i yellan yetturaǧu seg waṭas-aya sɣur yimezdaɣ n tɣiwant-a n Ukeffadu akked tid i tt-iqerben. Ladɣa imi yella yessemɣi asirem-a uselway aqbur n tɣiwant-a Mass Mhenni Ḥadadu, i yuɣalen seg tefranin n unbir iɛeddan d aselway n Useqqamu aɣerfan n twilayt n Bgayet. Yella yessuter Mass Ḥadadu deg lwali n Bgayet, mi yerza i Ukeffadu deg Ccmini, ass n 26 yebrir 2017, ad iwali amek ara yebnu axxam n Uḥuddu aɣarim deg temnaḍt-nni akken ad iɣesseb ugar usellek d tallelt i yettunefkayen i lɣaci deg tegnatin yemgaraden. Dɣa lawan-nni i yeqbel asumer mass lwali, inebbeh wid i teɛna taluft ad bdun deg usbedd n uxxam-a akken ad yettwaldi taggara n useggas-a yezrin 2017. D ayen i yemmuggen ihi, imi, ass n 31 deg duǧember-a, mettwal 13:00, yeldi tiwwura-s uxxam amaynut n Uḥuddu aɣarim deg Ukeffadu akken ad yili d timerna i yiḥricen-nniḍen n win n Sidi Ɛic. S wakka ara yilin yiqeddicen-a n usellek qerben ugar i yiɣermanen n temnaḍt-a n Bgayet, imi d win i d iswi n yinesdabuyen, ama d wid n tɣiwant neɣ n twilayt . Ad d-nesmekti d akken s uxxam-a, sin-nniḍen i yettwabnan, seld win n Wadɣir d Yilmaten, i yebdan lxedma deg 2017.Tettarra-d awellih Tenmehla n Uḥuddu aɣarim n Bgayet ɣef wazal i fkan yimḍebbren n waɣir n Bgayet i tsutriwin-nsen akken simmal ad ttwenniɛen aqeddic ugar i rraḥa n ugdud.

  M. K. 

  
 Akken neẓra, addad n tesdawiyin di Lezzayer s umata, ama si tama n tneflit neɣ n uswir, ur yelli d win yessefraḥen. Lexsas i n-yellan, yeǧǧa isdawanen imiyupaten abeɛda, d yimeɛḍar s umata, ur ttafen akk iman-nsen di tesdawiyin imi weɛrent tegnatin ideg ɣɣaren, neɣ ideg gganen daɣ. Ulac ama d tadrimt i ilaqen, ama d amɛiwen n tudert tinmettit (AVS), ama d iberdan i wawwaḍ (accessibilité), ama d ttawilat-nniḍen i asen-yettarran liḥala teshel di tesdawit, neɣ di tnezduɣt tasdawant. Ulamma llan ddeqs n yigrawen i ten-yettḥuddun, i yekkaten ɣef yizerfan-nsen, am tddukkla n yimiyupaten n Bgayet (DEFI), wanag ulac ad seggmen lecɣal akken ad tgerrez liḥala-nsen. Tewɛer n tegnit armi ddeqs seg-sen i issuturen lviza n tezrawt i Fransa akken ad unagen ɣer din, ad kemmlen dinna i umecwar-nsen n tɣuri. D asirem iɣer wwḍen kra seg-sen, imi ḥemmlen taɣuri, ur bɣin ara ad d-ḥebsen di tesdawit. 

 Dɣa, iseggasen-a ineggura, llan yimiyupen i yessawḍen rzan ɣer Fransa, ttkemmilen akka tura tizrawin-nsen dinna. Ahat ad d-nebder win ifersen abrid deg, Lbacir Buqir, mi yunag ɣer Fransa ikemmel tizrawin-is, yerna yercel ad yebnu tawacult. Syin, ḍefren-t yimiyupaten-nniḍen, yecban atmaten Muḥend-Saɛid Igi d Crif i yusan aseggas-a kan. Am wakken terza Ḥayat Benkerru i d-yewwin duktura di tsenselkimt ayyuren-a yezrin. Seg-sen, yella daɣen Talbi Farid i yunagen mačči aṭas-aya. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ttaɣen di Fransa armi azal n 900 n yiyuruten, rnu sɛan azref i umɛiwen 4 n yisragen i wass. «D asḥissef mi ara nwali liḥala n yimiyupaten-nneɣ di tmurt-nsen. Ilaq xersum ad ten-iɛawen uwanek ugar si tama n tedrimt», i d-tenna Nura Ayt Ɛebderreḥman, taselwayt n tddukkla n yimiyupaten n Bgayet.
  M. K. 

  
 Xas ulamma yettili-d ciṭ n unecreḥ deg wuḍan n Remḍan, acu kan yettaǧǧa-d camma deg texriṭ n umdan.

 Akken i as-yenna winna « Xeddmeɣ, yettader uḍellaɛ ». Tettserrif tmetti ugar n wayen i d-tettḥelli. Akken bɣunt xedment twaculin leḥsab i umesruf deg waggur n Remḍan, ttafent-d zyada n tedrim, i ilaqen, deg wayen ɣef wayeg ur bnin ara, neɣ deg wayen iwumi ur gin ara azal ameqqran. Am tẓidanin n yal ass, ttawilat n usiweḍ, ciṭ n tedrimt i warrac, timeɣriwin n ccna d wayen-nniḍen. Aya si tama. Wammag ayen i tent-yugaren merra, d asnerni n ssuma deg yal asafar n wučči i d-yettilin mi qrib ad d-yaweḍ Remḍan, neɣ ɛad deg taggara-as, deg wussan n lɛid. « Remḍan-agi, yuɣal d lɛada, mačči d lɛibada. D aggur n baḥwasu : ala win ur nwaɛa ara i kra. Yerna qqaren-d zaɛma d agur n useddeq akked uɣiḍi, meɛna nettwali akk anemgal-nsen. Yuɣal Remḍan d ass n wurfan, d ass n ukerciw ». I iwala yiwen umɣar. Ula d tiwaɣiyin n yiberdan, ttilint-d s tuget deg waggur n Remḍan ɣef wakken i t-id-nnan srabes n usellek. Ttilin-d twaɣiyin-agi s sebba n wurrif n yinehharen akked uɣseb deg tenhart-nsen. Rnu ɣef wanect-a, ccwalat d umqelleɛ i yettilin deg yal tazniqt ɣef wayen ur nesɛi azal : ɣef ciṭ kan akka n umeslay, ad tafeḍ sin ttnaɣen, ttemyergamen. Tikwal, ssawaḍen-tt akk s ifassen. « Wammag iɛessasen n ddin, fiḥel ma nudder-iten-id. Wid-nni yerran iman-nsen deg umekkan n Rebbi. ‘Nutni deg yigenni, netta deg lqaɛa’. Ad ttɛassan win yeččan deg Remḍan i wakken ad t-wwten, meɛna ur ttwalin ara imeɣban-nni ur ntett ara ɣef teɣzi n useggas », i aɣ-d-yenna Nadir, ikemmel deg wawal-is « Taggara-a, ha-ten-in la ttgallan deg teḥdayin : tid ur nettlusu ara lḥijab, ad tent-wwten s l’acide. Ruḥ tura kečč, ad tidireḍ akked wigi ! Ma nedda-tt akka, nniɣ-awen ad nuɣal srid ɣer deffir, ɣer yiseggasen-nni n 1990. Ttun yimdanen ayen akk iɛeddan fell-asen ». Ma d Rabah, seg tama n Wat Wagennun, yenna-d : « Cwi kan, llant tamiwin-nniḍen anda mazal ttgallan s jmaɛliman. Nukni seg tama n Wat Wagennun, ulac akk uguren-agi n Remḍan : win yebɣan, yuẓum ; win yebɣan, yečč-it. Tetten ɛinani am wussan-nniḍen. Ur d-yecliɛ umdan deg wayeḍ. Yal wa deg ccɣel-is. Yal wa aqerru-is deg tcacit-is. Deg leɛmer sliɣ i sin yimdanen mqellaɛen ɣef ssebba n Remḍan dagi deg tama-agi-nneɣ ». Ula d Hakim, yedda-d deg rray-a. « Ttilint-d, yal iḍ, tmeɣriwin deg Bujimaɛ. Ttruḥunt-d twaculint i wakken ad kksen ciṭ ɣef lxater-nsent, ad ferǧent icennayen yettɣennin din-a, yerna d timeɣriwin deg berra, deg uɛerqub. Slant i waṭas n yicennayen, yecban, Zedek Mouloud, Allaoua, Ali Amrane, Ali Ferhati,…atg, meɛna deg leɛmir teḍra lḥaǧa, neɣ čaqlala. Ttɛeddayent tmeɣriwin-a deg sser d liser. Deg talwit akked lemqadra. Yerna, ur yelli din la aǧadarmi neɣ apulis. Llan kan yilmeẓyen i yesseḥbibiren ɣef talwit akked lemqadra, s yifassen ilmawen, meɛna s tiẓedt n yilsawen n Teqbaylit-nsen ». Ulamma, sɛeddant twaculin-a uḍan igerrzen, acu kan, ẓrant mazal lmesruf-nniḍen, ad tent-yenced. Lmesruf n leɛyudat, lɛed tameẓyant d tmeqqrant, imuras n warrac, syin tuɣalin ɣer uɣerbaz. Mebla ma ddant-d tmeɣriwin n zwaǧ i yettilin deg unebdu…Akken yebɣu yili lḥal, lɛid tameggaz i yal yiwen. 

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Mettiǧi d yiwet n taddart i yettabaεen ɣer tɣiwant n Uqbu. Akken i aɣ-d-nnan, zgan yimezdaɣ-is d acekti seg waddad n taddart-nsen. Imi ur ttwaxedmen yiberdan-is, ur ksiben ttawilat n tudert yelhan. S unamek-nniḍen, ula d aman xuṣṣen nezzeh ɣuṛ-sen. Rnu ɣer waya, ula d trisiti, llan imeḍqan ur tt-sεin ara. Γef leḥsab n teɣbalut-nneɣ, tuɣal temnaḍt-a di rrif, ulac win i d-yedhan yid-s. D ayen i yeǧǧan imezdaɣ-is msefhamen gar-asen, syin ffɣen-d s rray d akken ilaq ad d-afen tifrat s uɣiwel i uɣbel-a. Acku addad n temnaḍt-nsen ur yeṣṣefṛaḥ ara. Daymi i d-ffɣen kra n warraw n taddart, bellεen Axxam n tɣiwant n Uqbu ass n arim, 16 di ctembeṛ yezrin. 

 Ad d-nesmekti d akken aɣbel-a ur yelli d amaynut, lameεna acḥal-ayagi nutni ttcektin, ssuturen deg yimḍebbṛen n tɣiwant, ad d-afen tifrat i iwulmen. Meεna ineggura-a, sεuzzgen imezzuɣen-nsen, ɣef wakken i t-id-wekkden wat taddart. Γef waya, ihi, i bellεen Axxam n tɣiwant, alamma rran-d yimḍebbṛen-is xeṛsum i kra n wayen ssuturen. Ula d madden, sbeɣsen-ten ɣef wayen i xedmen, ayagi imi ruḥen srid ɣer tɣiwant bellεen-tt, mačči am wiyaḍ i yettazalen i ubellaε n yeberdan, mebla ma sḥesben i yigemmaḍ.

  K.K 

  
 Yella-d usmekti wis 39 n tefsut n yimaziɣen, ussan n 27 d 28 deg yibrir 2019, s yiwet n temlilit i tga tddukkla Tawacult tagrawlit n lwilaya n Tizi Uzzu deg uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri n temdin-agi.

 Ɣef teɣzi n sin wussan, wwin-d awal yimsaragen ɣef wamek i d-ḍrant tedyanin n tmanyin akked wanda i teddun temsal ass-a n wussan. Gar wid i yekkan deg usiher-a, ad naf wid i iḥeḍren i tnekkra imir-nni, yecban Lounaouci, Tari Aziz, Yidir Ahmed Zaid, Achab Ramdane, Hebib Youcef, Oussalem Med Ouamar akked kra n wudmawen n umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt n tura, am Hakim Saheb, Said Chemakh d Hamou Boumedine. Deg usarag i d-yefka Ramdane Achab, u uqbel ad d-yawi awal ɣef tedyanin n Tefsut n yimaziɣen, yesmekta-d idlisen i yettwarun ɣef umennuɣ n tmaziɣt s umata, anda i d-yefka dɣa, izwilen n yidlisen-agi, am “Le journal des évenements de 1980”, n Rachid Chaker, “Imaziɣen ass-a” n Salem Chaker, “Chronologie du movement berbère” n Guennon Ali, “ Algérie, citoyenneté et identité” n Brahim Salhi…atg.

 “Tadyant n 1980, mačči seg yigenni i d-teɣli, meɛna yella-d umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt uqbel yakan. Llant-d tedyanin uqbel tmanyin i yerfed Umussun aɣelnaw deg yirebbi-s”, i d-yenna Ramdane Achab sdat n waṭas n yimeddukkal-is n umennuɣ s daxel n tzeqqa n Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmri. Am wakken i d-iwekked d akken akk timeslayin i yeṭṭfen taqacuct akka tura deg umaḍal, llant akk d tutlayin n yimnekcamen. Dɣa, ɣef wanect-a, iwala d akken: “Taglizit, tafrensist, taɛrabt neɣ tiyaḍ, d timeslayin n wid yesteɛmren wiyaḍ. 

 D timeslayin i yettuḥettmen s ddreɛ d zẓur ɣef yigduden i yettwaḥeqqren”. Uqbel-aya, yenna-d Mass Achab belli awal n tmaziɣt ɣur-s, yerza timeslayin-agi: Taqbaylit, tacawit, tamẓabit, tatergit…atg. “Ma nniɣ-d Tamaziɣt, meḥsub qessdeɣ-d taqbaylit, tamẓabit, tacawit akked tiyaḍ, mačči kan yiwet n tmeslayt”. Ma ɣef wayen icerken neɣ yessemgaraden Tafsut n tmanyin akked umussu-agi n tura, walan kra d akken yella wayen i ten-yesdukklen, am wakken i d-yella wayen i ten-yessemxalfen. Gar wayen i cerken snat n tnekkriwin-agi, d amennuɣ s wudem n talwit. 

 Ma dayen i ten-iferqen, ad naf d akken amennuɣ n tmanyin, refden-t s umata kra n yiwudam i d-yufraren imir. Ma d tura, ulac win yettmeslayen s yisem n umussa-agi aɣerfan. Xas ulamma, mmsefhamen akk ɣef wamek i ilaq ara ikemmel umennuɣ deg unnar, acu kan walan ur yettbeddil ara kra ma yella ur ibeddel ara wudem n tiddin n uwanak.

  Hocine Moula  

  
 Akken tella tarrayt tamirant n tudert, tban-d am wakken ur yeddi yid-s umdan, yeɣli-d akk seg-s, abeɛda di Tmurt n leqbayel, imi fell-as ara d-nawi awal. Tezleg n uwanek d usames n tesreṭ, rebban-d aɣerman iwumi ɛerqen yiberdan, armi ur tbedd tidet, ur tbedd teɣdemt, ur ibedd yidles. Seg wakken yella-d uttɛeddi d ageɛmir ɣef usaḍuf n tudert seg wacḥal d aseggas tura, yeggra-d uḍebber deg tesga, yir rray di tlemmast. Armi tbessel tettahda tmetti, acku ur tesɛi ilugan n tudert, ur tufi imrebbi wala d imwelleh ara d-yesseknen sswab d lɛali. 

 Ahat yerza waya amaḍal merra, imi seg wakken yettwakkes wazal i uqerru, yal amdan iẓerr iman-is d aqerru n yiman-is, yal amdan iẓerr iman-is d imegzi ugar n wayeḍ, ɣas mačči akken i tella; imdanen d isenfan, tigzi d iswiren. Seg waya, teɛreq tmetti deg ubrid, tesnulfay-d iɣilifen iwumi ur tezmir. Yuɣal, gar yimdanen, ur iban win yesɛan tiktiwin ɣef win ur tent-nesɛi. Ula d amennuɣ yezga yejhed di tmetti acku aqerru ara yefrun timsal ulac-it. Neɣ dɣa, ayen i yeṭṭfen amḍiq n uqerru-a, d ayen ur nelli d abrid, neɣ deg teklalit. 

 Nwala iseggasen-a ineggura ayen tuɣ i d-yettrasen d tilufa i tlemmast n tejmaɛt, qqiment tura kan di texxamt, neɣ ɣur tmeṭṭut kan. Ama yelha rray neɣ diri-t, neḥder i waṭas n tegnatin ideg bḍant teslatin atmaten, tikwal ula ɣef temsal i yerzan abaɣur n taddart s umata. S tejmaɛt n taddart, d yirgazen akk at sswab d lhiba i tt-iɛemren, yella di tmetti leqder, tella lḥerma, i iruḥen deg wakud-a amiran ideg nettidir. Aredmani, lmizan n tudert tuɣ ur as-iruḥ i tmetti akken yella lḥal tura, yal aɛeggal amek yesderfif, yal yiwen amek yesdurɣul war ma iban-as-d ubrid. Si tama tayeḍ, nwala amek i dḥettment kra n tamiwin isuḍaf iwerdanen ɣur Yiqbayliyen segmi ɣabent tuget n tjemmuyaɛ deg tudrin d tuddar, terna teɣba Leɛnaya-nsen. 

 Nettwali di Tmurt Taqbaylit amek ttruḥun wansayen-is, rennun wazalen-is, ɣef yisem n wansay awerdan neɣ n tesreṭ. Segmi tekkes tuddsa n tmetti, i tuɣ tella s tejmaɛt, yexreb kullec di tal taddart. Akken ad d-yuɣal wayen iɛerqen, ad terked taddart amacemma, yessefk ad d-tuɣal tejmaɛt ara yesselḥayen tilufa, ara yettqeɛɛiden ussan, ara yilin d leɛnaya. 
  M. K.  

  
 Ilul Tahar Djaout deg taddart n Wulxu ass n, 11 deg yennayer 1954. D amaẓuẓ n uxxam. Yeɣra deg taddart-is armi i uɣalen yiselmaden-is ɣer Fṛanṣa seld timunnent n Lezzayer. Ass-nni, yeɣlin-d yigenni ɣef uqcic i iḥemmlen aṭas aɣerbaz. Asmi twala akken tawacult-is, ruḥen ɣer Lezzayer tamanaɣt akken ad iɣer yerna s tcemmaɛin. Xas ulamma qessiḥet temɛict ɣef twacult maca Tahar Djaout, yeẓwer aṭas deg uɣerbaz. Yezweǧ deg useggas n 1979, yesɛa snat n teqcicin. Mi yemmut umaru aneɣmas, yeǧǧa-d tameṭṭut-is-tilemẓit s tadist. Yebda tira s tmedyazt anda i d-tufrar nezzeh, syin ɣer tira n tullist. Tamezwarut-is « Les insoumis » deg useggas n 1970 i yewwin arraz n temsizelt taseklant Zones des tempêtes. Seg tmedyazt ɣer wungal s « L’Exproprié » deg useggas n 1974. Yurar mmi-s n Wulxu deg wayen yakk ixeddem. Am wakken yekcem diɣ ɣer tɣamsa, yella deg uɣmis El Moudjahid akked Algerie Actualité. Yessufeɣ-d ungal-nniḍen « Les chercheurs d’os » deg useggas n 1984. Imir d abrid ɣer Fṛansa netta d twacult-is akken ad iɣer taɣamsa, netta yesɛan yakan agerdis n tusnakt. Ikemmel tira s wungal « Les Vigiles » deg useggas n 1991. Mi d-yuɣal ɣer tmurt, d tasertit ara iceɣben aneɣmas, ladɣa ayen yesserwat arrebrab deg Lezzayer. deg tegnatin-agi i d-yuslal aɣmis Ruptures akked Arezki Metref d yineɣmasen-nniḍen . Aṭas n wat n ṭṭlam iwumi ur teɛǧib ara tira n Tahar Djaout am wid-nni iqussmen s abrid sdat uxxam-is deg Lezzayer, wwten-t s ṛṣaṣ i yewwin amaru-amedyaz-aneɣamas ɣer lkuma armi d ass wis sin n yunyu 1993, anda yerna ɣer yimeɣṛasen n tlelli d tugdut. Seld lmut-is, yeffeɣ-d yiwen wungal isem is «Le dernier été de la raison». Gar tejmilin i as-yuɣalen i Tahat Djaout, ad naf tin i as-yerra Matoub Lounes s tezlit ‘’A Kenza yelli-s’’. Anda i as-yeqqar : ‘’A Kenza a yelli, ur ttru ara, d iseflan neɣli ɣef Lezzayer n uzekka (…) Iṣeggaden n tmusni, ɣef tmurt, ɣeḍlen-d rrehba’’. 

  Tigrin Nisma 

  
 Tberreḥ-d ddurt iɛeddan tselwayt n tesbeddit Matub Lwennas, Malika Matub, s yisenfaren igejdanen n tesbeddit-agi, deg usarag i tga deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri i lmend n usfugel n umulli n wis 63 n tlalit n «Uɣewwaɣ». 

 texdem-d diɣ taḥawact n 20 n yiseggasen n wayen ay tga Tesbeddit n Matub Lwennas yernu tebder-d isenfaren imeqranen i tga tesbeddit-a ɣer yidis n yisurifen i usifrer n tidet n tmenɣiwt n gma-s, asebded n usalay uslig ara tsedduy tesbeddit. Tenna-d belli asenfar n usalay « iswi-ines d aḥraz n tkatut d tgemmi n umedyaz Lwennas Matub ». Tiɣawsiwin tudmawanin n ucennay Matub Lwennas (1956-1998), d tigemmi i ucennay-amedyaz yerna ad rsen deg usalay i d-gan d tajmilt i unaẓur-a, ɣef wakken i t-id-tenna tselwayt n Tesbeddit n Matub Lwennas ass n letnayen yezrin deg Tizi Uzzu. « Tiɣawsiwin-ines tudmawanen, gar-asent allalen-ines n uẓawan, takeṛṛust ideg yettwanɣa ass n 25 Yunyu 1998, ula d iceṭṭiḍen-is ad ttwaḥerzen acku d aḥric seg tkatut tamazdayt ». Am wakken daɣen i tekkes ccek ɣef kra n temsal, yeqqnen ɣer usalay-agi, anda i d-tenna : « Asalay-a, ad yili d uslig (privé), maca ad yettwabnu deg yiwen wadeg yettabaɛen ɣer teɣlift n usegmi aɣelnaw. Ttunefkent-aɣ-d 3 n tzeɣwa deg uɣerbaz amenzu Mbarek Matub n taddart n Tewrit Mussa Waɛmer, yerna ad t-bnun sdat uxxam n Lwennas, mačči deg uxxam-is, ɣef wakken ay d-tenna.

 Tadrimt tusligt i tezrawin ara yettwaxdamen fell-as 
 Gar yisenfaren-nniḍen uɣur terra lwelha-s tesbeddit Matub Lwennas, d tukci n tedrimt tusligt (bourse) i lmend n usebɣes n tezrawin ara yettwaxdamen ɣef leqdic merra n ucennay Matub. Ad tettunefk i yisdawanen d yimnadiyen ara ixedmen tizrawin-nsen deg taɣulin yemxalafen ɣef ugerruj n Lwennas (adlis aɣewway, tizlatin-is, aẓawan-is…). Annect-agi, ad yili s tallelt n usqamu ussnan n tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, ara d-yefken tulmisin i ilaqen i wakken ad tefk tesbeddit-agi tadrimt, ɣef wakken i t-id-tenna Malika Matub. Am wakken daɣen, i d-tberreḥ Malika Matub, taselway n tesbeddit-agi, belli ad yili sya ɣer sdat lebni n yiwen n uɣerbaz n uẓawan, ara yawin isem n Matub Lwennas. Ara d-yilin ɣef leḥsab-is deg temdint n Tizi Uzzu. 

<p style="text-align:right">   Ghani Amazigh 

  
 Yetturar uselmad nnuba tameqqṛant deg usegmi n tmetti s umata, imi, deffir usegmi n tyemmat, aselmad mačči kan d win i d-yessegzayen timsirin, lameεna d win ineǧǧṛen abrid n unelmad i yimal n lεali, daymi i as-fkan azal meqqṛen tmura n umaḍal. Ma yella di tmurt n Lezzayer, d anemgal, dɣa rran-t di rrif seg yal tama, ama seg tama n yizerfan, neɣ d tin n wazal. Ladɣa iselmaden n uswir amezwaru, imi d nutni i yesɣarayen, d nutni i d iεessasen n warrac, d iqeddacen n tneččit daɣen.

  Rnu ɣer waya, ahil n useɣri-nsen i yeččuren nezzeh, rnu-t ɣer wakud i iḥeṛṣen akken ilaq fell-asen. Dɣa aselmad n uswir-a, yesεa ugar n 30 n yisragen i ddurt. Lḥif-a i ttidiren, yeṣṣuẓi fell-asen, d ayen i ten-yeǧǧan aseggas-a uran tabrat i uneɣlaf n usegmi, fuṛṣen akud n tnekra n ugdud, anda i as-ssutren ad iwali deg temsalt-nsen, ad asen-iεel ttawil. Seg wayen i ssutren yiselmaden-a, ad sεun izerfan mtawan akked wid n uɣerbaz alemmas, d wid n tesnawit. Aneɣlaf n usegmi, yerra-d i usiwel-nsen s uɣiwel, yefra-asen yiwen n uɣbel i llan yakan sεan-t, d azemz n yikayaden. Aredmani, d inelmaden n tesnawit, d wid uɣerbaz alemmas i ixeddmen ikayaden d imezwura, d nutni daɣen i iteffɣen imuṛaṣ uqbel. 

 Ma yella d aseggas-a, azemz n yikayaden d yiwen deg kṛaḍ n yiɣerbazen. Iselmaden n uɣerbaz amezwaru yehwa-asen waya, dɣa yenna-aɣ-d yiwen : « Ayagi yeffeɣ ɣef warrac, imi εyan mliḥ seg wahil yeččuṛen, yuɣal uqcic ur iteṭṭef ara, neɣ s unamek-nniḍen ẓẓay i tegzi. Ma yella seg tama-nneɣ, ula d nekni nuklal asteεfu seld aseggas n uxeddim iweεṛen ».

  K. K. 

  
 Ass n 25 yebrir yezrin i d amulli wis 42 segmi d-yella ugraw n ccna amḥaddi “Tagrawla” ass n 25 yebrir 1977, deg tesdawit n tussniwin d tetiknulujit n Bab ẓẓewwar. D tarbaɛt n semmus n yisdawanen deg tusnakt i t-id-yesnulfan, gar-asen: Idir, Xlifa, Ḥsen, Ḥsisu d Ɛumar. Syin akkin, sin n yiseggasen seld, yerna-d ɣur-s bu tbatrit Murad Benɛamer, ur nɛeṭṭel deg-s iruḥ. Deg useggas n 1980, yekcem deg-s Belɛid, deg 1982 yekcem Lwennas, armi d 1984 d Fazil i yernan ɣer terbaɛt. Yesekles ugraw Tagrawla tasfift tamezwarut deg 1981 deg Paris, ɣer teẓrigin Amina. 

 Ddant-d deg-s tezlatin yecban « Igujilen », « Afrik » (Taferka), « Nerreẓ », Tiɣri », « Taddart-inu », « Jida », « Tga tiṭ ». Akken i d-yeqqar yisem-is, yusa-d ugraw Tagrawla akken ad d-yawi amaynut i tmetti, ad yennaɣ s uẓawan, ad yesaki imdanen ɣef tmagit d yidles, am kra n yigrawen n tallit-nni. Ula d awal-a « tagrawla », nezmer ad d-nini yezga imir-nni deg yilsawen n kra n taggayin n medden i ifaqen, imi ḥsan s temḥeqranit i d-iseɣli umnekcam, i d-iḥettem syin akkin udabu n Lezzayer fell-asen. Deg yizen n tezlatin n ugraw Tagrawla, aṭas i ikecmen deg uḥric n temḥaddit si tazwara n umecwar-is. 

 Am tezlit ideg i d-smektayen awal n Masensen « Tafriqt i Yifriqen ». Neɣ d tin ideg ddmen awal n Si Muḥend Umḥend i yennan « Ad nerreẓ wala ad neknu ». D waṭas n tezlatin-nniḍen ideg nezmer ad nsel ala i ccna ɣef tlelli n Tmazɣa d Yimaziɣen s umata, akked tegrawla ara igen talast i usehres. Yewwi-d ad d-nerr awellih ɣef wamek qrib ade temmet taggara-a tezlit tamḥaddit, ma nga aserwes i yiseggasen-nni n 1970, 1980 d 1990.

   M. K. 

  
 AAd d-yessuddes Usemtar n lwilaya gar yimsudar n uḥric n ttrebga n tzizwa (CLIFA), s tallelt n Uxxam n tfellaḥt n Tizi Uzzu, Tanmehla n Srabes n Tfellaḥt d Ulemmas n l’ITMAS n Boukhalfa, taɣlamt (caravane) tamezwarut n usileɣ deg ttrebga n tzizwa. Ad yebdu wahil n teɣlamt ass n, sed 5 seg waggur n tubeṛ deg dayra n Buzgen. Syin, ad ikemmel umecwaṛ n teɣlamt ass n amhad, 10 seg waggur n tubeṛ deg dayra n Draɛ Ben Xxedda. 

 Ad iḥaz usileɣ daɣen dayra n Ɛin Lḥemmam, ass n aram, 15 seg tubeṛ. Ade tili taggara n umecwaṛ n teɣlamt ass n aram, 22 seg tubeṛ, deg dayra n Friḥa. Sɛan azal meqqren leqdicat yecban wigi deg uḥric-agi n ttrebga n tzizwa, dayen ara d-yefken afud i usnerni n tfellaḥt, anda yella lexṣas deg lɣella d tɣara n tament. Dɣa ɣef leḥsab n yimussnawen n tfellaḥt, aya icudd s waṭas ɣer usileɣ n yifellaḥen, i d-yesfaydin seg wahilen n tallelt i d-yefka uwanak. Dɣa taɣlamt-agi n usileɣ d ttagnit i yifellaḥen i wakken ad d-refden seg tmussniwin timaynutin deg ttrebga n tzizwa. 

 Iɛeggalen n yidisan yemgaraden i d-iheggan leqdic-agi, gren tiɣri i yifellaḥen i d-yelhan s ttrebga n tzizwa i wakken ad d-asen s ṭṭaqa, ad sfaydin seg temsirin n usileɣ, ara d-fken yimussnawen n uḥric-agi yesselmad deg Ulemmas n ITMAS n Boukhalfa. 

  Ali Zalouk 

  
 Yiwen gar yisenfar igejdanen deg tɣiwant n lemɛatqa ara ḥazent tuget n tudrin, d asenfer n ubeddel n yiqadusen n waman n tissit. Asenfer-a, yebda deg useggas n 2015, syin yeḥbes s sebba n tedrimt ur as-yettunefken ara i tekbanit i d-yelhan s uxeddim n usenfar- agi. Aneḥbus-a, yegla-d s uɛeggeb n waṭas n yisenfar n unegmu deg tɣiwant, ladɣa isenfaren n uɛawed n yiberdan imeqqranen d yiberdan i yellan deg tlemmast n tudrin. Xesren yiberdan-agi s sebba n usɛedi n yiqadusen n waman d lgaz. Seld rray n iɛeggalen n Usqamu aɣerfan n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa ɣef uɛawed n yibardan n kra n tuddrin, tisquma n tudrin n tɣiwant llant mgal rray-agi ara ma ikemmel usenfar n ubeddel n yiqadusen n waman. Tisquma n tuddrin n tɣiwant n Lemɛatqa yennejmaɛt acḥal d tikelt d uselway n Useqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan ɣef usenfar-agi, ur d-ufin ara tifrat, rnu ɣef aya lejmaɛ yellan d unemhal n waman n ugerzu n Tiz-Uzzu i tifin n tifrat yerzan asenfar-agi, maca ar ass-a mazal asenfer yeḥbes yegla-d s uɛeggeb n yisenfar-nniḍen. Iselwayen n tesquma n tudrin, gren-d tiɣri i yimḍebbren teɛna temsalt i tifin n tifrat i uɣbel-agi n ubeddel n yiqadusen, imi iqadusen iqburen n wuzal, rkan , zemren ad -dglun s lehlakat i yimezdaɣ.

  A. Z. 

  
 Ass-nni n ttlata yezrin, 5 deg waggur-agi n meɣres 2019, i d-tefka tneɣlaft n Usegmi aɣelnaw Massa Nouria Benghabrit, deg tansa (le site) n tneɣlaft-is leğrida n ukayad n waddal i yinelmaden imunan. Akayad-agi, yerza imsizewren n taggara n ulmud alemmas (BEM) d win n taggara n ulmud n tesnawit (BAC). 

 Ad yili ukayad-agi n waddal i yinelmaden imunan, gar 21 meɣres-agi alamma d 06 deg waggur n yebrir i d-iteddun.Yetturaǧu ad t-sɛeddin wazal n 198 262 n yinelmaden imunan yettheggin akayad n BAC i tezrigt-agi 2019, gar-asen 117 526 d arrac ma d 80 736 i d-yeqqimen d tullas. Ad yili usɛeddi-ines deg 187 n wammasen n uɛeddi, ma d uṭṭun amatu n yinelmaden imunan, yettheggin akayad-agi n BAC, yewweḍ aseggas-a ɣer 262 415. 

 Am wakken daɣen yetturaǧu, ad t-sɛeddin wazal n 11 763 n yinelmaden imunan yettheggin akayad n BEM. Gar-asen 8 256 d arrac d 3 505 n tullas, ara isɛeddin deg 57 n wammasen n usɛeddi. Ma d uṭṭun amatu n yinelmaden imunan yettheggin iman-nsen i ukayad n BEM, yewweḍ ɣer 19 352 n yinelmaden. Ma d ikayaden unṣiben n taggara n useggas-agi aɣurbiz 2018 / 2019, yetturaǧu ad qqimen akken i ten-id-tessumer tneɣlaft n usegmi, di tazwara n waggur n cutember iɛeddan. 

 Ad nebdu seg ukayad n taggara n uswir amenzu 5e, i yetturaǧun ad d-yili ass n larebɛa 29 deg waggur n maggu(29/05/2019). Ma d win n taggara n uswir n ulmud alemmas, yettwassnen s yisem n BEM, ad d-yili seg wass n lḥed 09 alamma d ass n ttlata 11 seg waggur yunyu (09-10-11/05/2019). Ma d win n taggara n uswir n tsenawit neɣ ayen iwumi qqaren BAC, yetturaǧu ad d-yili seg wass lḥed 16 yunyu arma d ass lexmis 20 deg waggur n yunyu (16-17-18-19-20/06/2019).

<p style="text-align:right">  Adaoun Ghani 

  
 Ad yili deg ussan i d-iteddun ttiεad ara d-yessemlalen Iṛemmasen i d-yewwin asmad (crédit) seg Ansej, Angem, akk d Cnac. Ddeqs seg wid i d-yeffɣen si tesdawit s igerdasen, acu kan ur ufin ara axeddim, yerna taswiεt mačči d tin yezmer ad iqabel yiwen s yiɣimi. Γef waya, aṭas deg-sen i as-yennan ahat tifrat ma yella xedmeɣ i yiman-iw. Ledɣa imi imḍebber n uwanek, akken i d yenna, yerra azal meqqer i terbaεt n yilmeẓyen i d-iteffɣen si tesdawit. Yefka-sen tagnit I wakken ad xedmen, ad d-ssufɣen tazmert d tfasa-nsen (énergie ) ɣef wayen ara d-yawin abaɣur i tdamsa n tmurt. D ayen mi i iserreḥ i terbaεt-agi bac ad refden iman-nsen s yismaden ibankanen. Ihi yal yiwen ad yeldi takebbanit-is deg leqdic as-yehwan, yal wa deg wacu yeẓwer. Meεna, akken qqaren ‘’tirga mxalfa’’. Targit d usirem-nsen ffɣent akken-nniḍen. Aṭas n yiεewwiqen i d-muggren. Si yiwet n tama, sεan lebɣi ad xedmen, si tayeḍ, ufan-d iman-nsen di lexṣas ageεmir di ttawilat. D ayen i ten-yeǧǧan ttcektayen seg waddad-agi i ttidiren. «Am win iwumu fkan aɣrum, netta meskin ur yesεi ara uglan. Fkan-aɣ-d axeddim, kksen-aɣ wid ukud ara nexdem. Ansi ara d-awiɣ sselεa? Iwumi ara senzeɣ? Yiwen ur d-yeddi yid-neɣ». I d-yenna yiwen seg wid i d-yessuffɣen tarmiṣt s ttawil n Ansej. Ilemẓiyen-agi, tḍaq fell-asen teswiεt, anezgum d ttexmam yeṭṭafar-iten. Dɣa tiddukkla CAME n Tizi Uzzu tesla-d i taɣect n yinesmalen-agi (promoteurs), imi nettat tqeddec ɣef yizerfan-nsen. Daymi i d-terra i usiwel-nsen, yerna tessumer-d anejmuε ameqqran n yiṛemmasen sdat n tneggiwin(Agences) n Ansej, Cnac akked Angem. Ihi ttiεad-nsen ad yili ass n 26 di yulyu i d-iteddun i wakken ad mmeslayen ɣef wayen i ten-iceɣben, ad ssiwḍen akken ma llan i tifrat n lεali.

  Isufar 

 – 1 kg n seksu

 – zzit n uzemmur, lmelḥ

 – 500 gr n uksum

 – 1 n tebselt

 – 4 n tezruddeyyatin

 – 2 n lleft

 – 1 n ṭumaṭic yewwan mliḥ

 – 1 kg n tɣeddiwt

 – 1 n lkas n lḥemmez

 – 1 n tɣenjawt n ṭumaṭic yeẓdan

 – 1/2 n tɣenjawt n yifelfel aberkan

  Aheggi 

 Sizedget taɣeddiwt u tesqeccrem-tt, kkset-as lexyuḍ-nni. Syin tgezmem-tt d iḥricen n 4 cm. Terrem-tt daxel n waman yesɛan llim. Imir, tessewwem-tt daxel n waman imelḥen. Gezmet aksum d iftaten, terrem-t daxel n tasilt ad yeww, ternum-as lebsel, leɛqaqer, ṭumaṭic akked zzit. Rwit-t akken iwata, terrem-as lmelḥ akked yifelfel aberkan, tanfem-as ɣef tmes azal n 10’. Syin, rret lḥemmez. Rnut snat n litrat n waman, tanfem ad yeww azal n 25’. Kkset-d aksum uqbel ad ad ternum lxedra (taga, zrudiyya d lleft). S tezmert-nwen.

  Daya 

  
 Ɣef leḥsab n wulɣu i aɣ-d-yewwḍen tanezzayt n wass n ahad yezrin, 9 deg wayyur n maggu, yewwi-d uḥuddu aɣarim (Protection civile) n Bgayet isalli ɣef usellek, tasebḥit n wass-nni, mettwal 01:05, n xemsa n yimdanen d irgazen, i yesɛan gar 18 d 37 n yiseggasen deg umdur. Akken i d-yewwi wulɣu-a, ɣlin yimdanen-a deg tqeffet n umunuksid n karbum, seld mi d-rzan seg Suq Ahras, ɣer yiwet n tnezduɣt di tlemmast n temdint n Suq Letnin. Ɣef wayen i d-tenna teɣbalut-a daɣen, qrib i t-yenɣa lgaz-a, i d-iteffɣen seg ufurnu n useḥmu n waman, lemmer mačči d tiḥerci n yirgazen n usellek, i ten-id-yessufɣen, wwin-ten dindin ɣer tzeqqa n udawi n temdint-nni. Si tama-nniḍen, ad d-nesmekti d akken yettkemmil uḥuddu aɣarim tidwilin-is n usḥulfu mgal indaren n tmes, imi la d-iteddu unebdu.

  M. K. 

  
 Thamila d isem i as-yefka ucennay ilemẓi Ghanou i walbum-is amezwru, i d-yeffɣen deg useggas-agi n 2018. Deg-s 8 n tezlatin anda i yefren unaẓur asental agejdan i iceɣben amur ameqqran n tnida-s, wagi d asentel n tayri. Ula d isem n uḍebsi yerza aḥulfu-agi. S yiwet n taɣuct igerrzen nezzeh d uẓawan afessas, yessenṭṭeq-d Ghanou inzizen swayes tcudd tayri, yecban Zzin-iw, Taḥawact-iw, Qqim yid-i, Lila, Thamila, neɣ D ssiɛqa, Timkecmin akked Lemnam. Ghanou Boussaïd s yisem aḥeqqani, yebɣa ad yeddu s tezlatin-agi-ines akked wid isedduyen, akka tura, ccna aqbayli s umata, ladɣa ccna-agi afessas imi i t-yuɣ lḥal, dɣa, yettɣenni deg tmeɣriwin, ɣef wakken i aɣ-t-id-yenna. Xas ulamma d anelmad deg tesdawit Mulud Mɛemmeri n Tizi Uzzu, maca yessaweḍ ad yezdi ulmud-is akked ccna-s akken iwata lḥal. Am wakken i yelmed, diɣ, timsirin n uẓawan deg Uxxam n yidles Mulud Mɛemmeri deg temdin n Tizi Uzzu. Ha-t-an akka tura yettheggi, i wussan i d-iteddun, yiwet n tezlit ara yilin d assaɣ gar uḍebsi-ines-agi amezwaru akked uḍebsi-s wis sin ara d-yeffɣen sya d afella. Ma ɣef usekles n walbum-agi amezwaru iwumi yexdem netta s timma-is aẓawan akked yisefra, yessawal i waṭas n yimẓawanen i as-d-yefkan afus n tallelt. Nezmer ad d-nebder Dahmane Ben Dahmane, Toufik Lazali, Hafid et Nabil Hamzaoui, Azeddine Idir akked wiyaḍ. Acennay Ghanou, yuklal asebɣes imi yesddukkel tussna akked tẓuri, aya akk d ayen ara yesnernin idles d tutlayt taqbaylit s umata. Afud igerrzen.

  Hocine Moula 

  
 Thegga-d tddukkla « Oxy-jeunes » n tɣiwant n Yiderginen, ass n 30 yunyu iɛeddan, kra n yiḥuna (ateliers) n usileɣ i lfayda n yilemẓiyen i yeṭṭafaren amussu asdukklan. Deg wazal n 20 yid-sen, yal yiwen seg wanta tamnaḍt i d-yusa, ḥeḍren yilemẓiyen-a i kraḍ n yiḥuna n usileɣ, akken, tugart tugart, ad sgerrzen aswir-nsen deg usefrek, daɣen ad issinen ad d-ttakken i tddukkla ideg qeddcen ugar n wayen i d-fkan yakan. Ama d wid n Yijermunen, Ayt Smaɛel, Tasexriwt, Ticci, Bgayet neɣ n Yiderginen, akk-nsen ɛewwlen ad d-zzin i ṭṭabla n ulmad i lmend n ttiɛad-a. S umata, yella-d wawal deg yiḥuna-a ɣef teywalt, ama daxel neɣ berra tddukkla, ɣef usefrek d ferru n yimcubbaken i d-yettilin, akked tddukkli deg umussu asdukklan akked tmetti. Ɣef tnaga n yiɛeggalen n tddukkla timheggit « Oxy-jeunes », sefraḥent ayendin tikkin n yisegbaren (acteurs) d yimeltaɣen n tddukkliwin deg uḥanu, deg yiwet n tegnit n umbaddal n tektiwin d unecraḥ. Yewwi-d, ad d-nesmekti belli, mi d-muggen dayen kraḍ n yiḥuna-a, yeḍfer-iten-id uskasi s wazal-is ɣef umaḍal n tddukkla. Ula d taselwayt n tdayra n Yiderginen akked unemhal n CSP llan dinna gar wiyaḍ-nniḍen. Seld tigawt-a, ɣef wakken i d-tewwi teɣbalut-nneɣ i iqerben i tddukkla « Oxy-jeunes », ayendin i d-yesnagan s uqeddic igerrzen i d-tessuddes tddukkla-a tilemẓit n Yiderginen. Am wakken llan wid i d-izeɣnen s wudem yelhan, fkan-d rray-nsen i useggem n kra n tlufa i icudden i uheggi s umata. Mi tɛedda tigawt akken ilaq, tesnemmir tddukkla akk ilemẓiyen i d-yerran i tiɣri, merra wid i d-yusan d inebgawen, d wid yekkin deg uheggi d usenɛet n yiḥuna.

  M. K. 

  
 Tebɛed taddart Iɣil Mḥend ɣef tɣiwant n Ait chafaa s wazal n 12Km. Tamuɣli si taddart-a srid ɣer yilel , tezgad di temdint n Uzeffun, tesɛa amekkan-is deg umezruy n tmurt. Akken i d-ḥekkun yimezdaɣ-is, aṭas n yiserdassen n Cix Aḥeddad i yettwameḍlen di taddart-a, di lwaqt-nni n tegrawla. Acu kan, seg yimir-n ar ass-a, liḥala n tmeqbart ur tgerrez ara. Ɣef waya, ssuturen yimezdaɣ n taddart di tenmehla n yimjuhad akken ad smuzget i teɣri i d-xedmen, ad d-tefk afus n lemɛawna akken ad yettwajarred umekkan-agi d amdiq n umezruy n tmurt. Am wakken daɣen, ad ttɛawen taddart-a deg useqɛed n umekkan-agi, akken i d-ibarreḥ yiwen seg yimezdaɣ : “ Nekni s yimezdaɣ n taddart n Iɣil Mḥend, nebda aseqɛed deg umekkan-a, meɛna mačči d ayen i nezmar ad nexdem weḥd-neɣ. Ihi nessutur deg tenmehla n yimjuhad n ugezdu n Tizi Uzzu akken ad d-smeḥses i wayen nessutur, yerna-d : ‘’Ha-t-an, ad nexdem asebdad deg umekkan-agi i wakken amezruy n taddart ur yettali ara fell-as uɣebbar n tatut, akken tasuta i d-iteddun, ad twali amezruy n temnaḍt “ . Akken i d-nnan imɣaren n taddart, ad ilin azal n 490 n yiserdasen i yettwameḍlen deg tmeqbart-a . Ad d-nesmekti belli taɣiwant n Ait chafaa, tefka-d aṭas n yiwudam, ger-asen : Tahar Djaout , Bachir Hadj Ali , Mohamed Aouine .

  Yamani Souhila 

  
 Tamurt n Lezzayer ɣef tewwura n usmekti n tefsut n Yimaziɣen. 38 n yiseggasen i yezrin ɣef tedyant-a yessakin acḥal d Azzayri, yerẓan asalu i usekfel n yidles d tutlayt tamaziɣt. D asarag n Mulud Mɛemmeri, yettumenɛen deg tesdawit n Tizi Uzzu, i d-ifeggḍen ayen yellan deg ubuqal. I wakken ad ilint di cfawat, d isdawayen n tmaneɣt i d-yeffɣen ass n 7 deg yebrir 1980 i wakken ad suɣen, maca din yendeh, din yettwaqmeḍ, imi urɛad i slin medden s tikli, adebbuz yexdem cɣel-is. Deg yiḍ n 19 deg yibrir, deg tesdawit n Oued Aissi, yettwaddem rray i wakken ad d-tili tmesbanit. Urɛad yuli wass, kecmen yiserdasen ɣer tesdawit, yekker waruḥu : tiyita, taruẓi, aseḥbas n wid yettmeslayen s yisem n yisdawanen. Ɣer tsebḥit, 24 i yettwaṭṭfen, ma d imejraḥ, ur yelli leḥsab. Ɣas akken yella-d waya, tamesbanit tella-d ass n 20 deg yebrir, yettwakkes ẓẓerb n tugdi, teffeɣ-d taluft n tmaziɣt ɣer unnar. D ayen dɣa i yessakin medden, imi yeffeɣ lxuf, yuɣal usuter n tmaziɣt yettnerni, yettihriw i wakken ad isami aṭas n temnaḍin. Ɣas ulamma adabu yettarra-d s leqseḥ di yal tikkelt, maca abrid yenjer, mačči d ayen ara yeffer udebbuz. Ama d tidyanin n 1981 neɣ ahat tid 1985, Imaziɣen ur brin i ṭṭbel deg waman, asuter d winna, ur yelli uneqleb deg wawal. Ilaq ad nerǧu alamma d tuber 1988 anda i tenhewwal tmurt, i wakken ad yili ttriḥ i uslali n yikabaren n tsertit, tiddukkliwin tidelsanin, d teseqquma-nniḍen. Lulen-d yikabaren, ssutren tamaziɣt, lḥan fell-as, a rbeḥ a tafat ! Yeffeɣ-d ugemmud amezwaru deg 1990, mi akken i d-yella ttriḥ i uselmed n tmaziɣt deg tesdawit. Yennerna, i wakken deg 1994, yella-d uɣunzu n uɣerbaz di tmurt n Leqbayel almi qrib d taggara n useggaz aɣurbiz, anda i d-yella umwata gar udabu d umussu adelsan. Ilul-d Useqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa, tella-d tannant tamezwarut n yiselmaden n tmaziɣt deg Ben Aknoun i wakken deg tuber 1995, 16 n twilayin iɣer yewweḍ uselmed n tmaziɣt. Yettnerni deg yiseggasen, ixetti deg wiyaḍ, meɛna ur yezmir ad yenger imi ass-a 38 n twilayin ideg tella tmaziɣt, u mazal rbeḥ ɣer sdat. Yella-d lixṣas, meɛna ad as-nifrir akken i nufrar i tmezwura. Ɣas akka mazal ur yuɣal ara uselmed-is am nettat am tutlayin, maca ad d-yaweḍ wass-is, imi axeddim deg unnar yella, wid yesselmaden llan, rnu bedden. « Ilaq ad d-nemmekti d akken nebda-d s yimenɣi deg yiberdan, asuɣu, timesbaniyin i wakken ass-a ad tili tutlayt-a deg tesdawit s uswir ɛlayen, deg tesnawit deg ukayad n BAC, deg uɣerbaz alemmas deg ukayad n BEM, deg uɣerbaz amezwaru. Yennayer, yettuneḥsab d ass n tmeɣra s wudem unṣib, takadimit deg ubrid n usebded-ines. Tutlayt tessaweḍ ad tili deg tmendawt, d taɣelnawt d tunṣibt. Ur d-neqqar ara d ayen, kullec yefra, meɛna ayen i d-nḥella ur yezmir yiwen ad t-yenkeṛ. Yak, yenna-d Lwennas deg wawal-is Win i as-yennan tamaziɣt tefna, d win iɣelten ayen ur d-iḥerri ara», i d-yenna yiwen umeɣnas n tmaziɣt. Tura akka, ama d tiddukkliwin tidelsanin, ama d ikabaren n tsertit neɣ d iɣerbazen, ssewjaden leqdic meqqren i wakken ad sfuglen s tefsut-a s lɛezza d lḥerma, imi ‘’tikli ɣef tidet tessawaḍ’’. 

  M. Smail 

  
 Yebda Useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan (APC) n Boudjima, iɣef yella ɣef uqerruy-is Mass Boukherroub Samil, aselway n tɣiwant-agi, yettheggi iman-is i tezrigt tis semmus n rreḥba n udlis n Boudjima.

 Ad tili tezrigt n useggas-agi, gar 19 alamma d 21 yebrir-agi ideg nella, deg temkerḍit n tɣiwant “Mohand Abdellah, (Mohia)”. D rreḥba n udlis deg tezrigt-is tis xemsa, ideg ara ttekkint wazal n 25 tezrigin, ara d-yasen seg ddeqs n lwilayt n tmurt, am Lezzayer tamaneɣt, Tizi Uzzu, Bgayet, Qsenṭina…atg. Gar tezrigin-agi ara d-yerzun ɣer rreḥba-agi, ad d-nebder gar-asent: Barzakh, Alpha, Casbah, Koukou, Tafat, La pensée, Tamagit, Richa Elsam…atg. Am wakken daɣen, ara yilin wugar n 50 n yimura d yimedyazen ara yexdem asenzi s ubuddu n yidlisen-nsen d wammuden-nsen n tmedyazt. Ad d-nadder kra ineggalen ara ixedmen asenzi s ubuddu n wungalen-nsen, gar-asen; Rachid Boukherroub, Ali Hadjaz, Amine Zaoui, Rabah Benamghar, Youcef Merahi…atg. Ad ilin daɣen yimura ilmeẓyen n tama-agi n Ouagenoun, yecban; Tinhinane Harrache, Aziz Dilem, Adaoun Abdelghani d wiyaḍ-nniḍen. Am wakken daɣen ara budden ammuden-nsen n tmedyazt yimedyazen-agi; Ahcene Mariche, Zoulikha Touati, Lounes Amezian, Idir Bellali…atg. Imsuddsen n rreḥba-a, heggan-d leqdicat-nniḍen i lmend n ttiɛad-agi adelsan i ttraǧun s ccuq wid iffuden tamussni n tussna akked yidles. Imi yettuneḥsab d amḍiq ussnan ideg ttemlilin yimura d yimeɣriyen-nsen, yettili-d diɣ ubeddel n tikta gar yimdanen. I lemend n wannect-agi akk, ad d-yili wahil adelsan anesbaɣur, gar yisaragen d yisikwan akked waṭas n tɣawsiwin-nniḍen ara d-yilin di ttiɛad ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan. Ma d ahil unṣib ad d-yili akka, i wass n lexmis 19 yebrir 2018, ara yilin d ass amezwaru n rreḥba-agi, yetturaǧu ad yili deg-s ɣef 10h00 n ssbeḥ, tulya tunṣibt n tezrigt tis xemsa n rreḥba-agi n udlis, syin ɣur-s d ameslay sɣur yimsuddsen n leqdic-agi. Ma seg 13h00 alamma d 16h00 n tmeddit, ad d-ilin sin n yisaragen di ttiɛad, amezwru ad d-yesker Mass Rabar Sebaa ɣef tutlayt, ma d wis sin sɣur Mass Younes Adli, ara d-yawin awal ɣef umezruy. Ma i wass n lǧemɛa 20 yebrir, yetturaǧu ad d-yili deg-s ussisen n sin yidlisen-agi “Nomades burlants” n Massa Amina Mekakhli akked “La boite de L’islam” n Mass Amine Zaoui. Ad d-meslayen fell-asen yimeskaren i ten-yuran i yimeɣriyen, ma deg tmeddit n wass ad yili usarag ameẓyan s ṣṣenf n “Table ronde”, sɣur Abdelmadjid Merdaci, Sofiane Hadjadj, Youcef Tounsi akked Habib Tengour, ara yerren tajmilt i Noureddine Saadi. Ma seg 14h30 n tmeddit, yetturaǧu ad d-yili usarag wis tlata n umaru Tarik Djerroud. Yetturaǧu daɣen ad yili ussisen n sin yidlisen-agi “D wagi i d asirem-iw” n Mass Zarouri Mustapha akked “Excuses d’outre tombe” n Mass Kheir-Eddine Merrad Boudia. Ara d-imeslayen i yimeɣriyen ɣef yidlisen-agi i yuran. Ma deg tmeddit n was, ad yili usarag ameẓyan s ṣṣenf n “Table ronde”, sɣur Mass Said Chemakh, Allaoua Rabhi akked Amar Imegrachene. Syin akkin ɣef 14h30 n tmeddit, ad d-yili usarag wis rrebɛa ɣef Si Muḥend U Mḥend sɣur umaru amnadi Rachid Oulbsir. Am wakken daɣen i yetturaǧu, ad yili wahil uzzig n yisikwan ɣef teɣzi n tlata wussan, gar-asen asikew n tmucuha, asikew n teklut, asikew n usnulfu, win n usuneɣ…atg. Ad tili diɣen tiddukkla tadelsant Lyra n Boudjima, deg ttiɛad s turart n yiwet n tmezgunt s tmaziɣt.

  Ha-t-an wayen i d-yenna Mass Boukherroub Samil: 

 “D akemmel i nkemmel ayen i d-nebda yakan, acu kan yal aseggas nettaɛraḍ ad d-nawi iwudam imaynuten i wakken ad ten-issinen madden. Nebɣa diɣ ad d-nesbin imura n temnaḍt-nneɣ, ladɣa ilemẓyen seg-sen, yerna ad asen-nefk tagnit i wakken ad senzen idlisen-nsen wa ad magren imeɣriyen-nsen. Iswi-nneɣ agejdan d aseqreb n udlis s imeɣri u d tagnit daɣen n tmussni gar umeɣri akked umaru. Nekk ttwaliɣ rreḥba n udlis am taggara n teqbuct n ddunit, i yettḥettimen lɣaci ad ferǧen ad slen…atg, ula d rreḥba n udlis akken, tettak lebɣi i medden akken ad ɣren, akken ad issinen. Ssarameɣ kan, tiɣiwanin-nniḍen n ladayra-nneɣ, ad xedment akka neɣ ugar, i wakken ad d-nessuffeɣ tamnaḍt-agi n Ouagenoun seg tatut, ad tuɣal ad tettwibder am temnaḍin-nniḍen”.

  G. A. 

  
 Seld kra n yidlisen i yettwarun ɣef ugrawliw Lwennas Meɛtub, abeɛda wid n Yala Seddiqi, Muḥemmed Gaya, Nadya d Malika Meɛtub, a-t-an yessufeɣ-d ussan-a kan Mass Ṭeyyeb Iqubac, neɣ Ɛebdelli s yisem adeblan, yiwen n udlis d amaynut s uzwel « Matoub Lounès, notes et souvenirs d’un compagnon de lutte », ɣer teẓrigin Fauves éditions n Paris. Deg wugar n 170 n yisebtar i tegber, yewwi-d umeskar deg tektabt-a aṭas n tnagiwin ɣef Lwennas Meɛtub, ayen yedder yid-s d wayen ur d-yenni fell-as ar tura. Maca daɣen, ɣef wawal n bab n udlis, ad yaf yimeɣri tidet yerzan kra n tedyanin d wugar n tafat ɣef wayen ur nban ar tura akken ilaq i wid iḥemmlen anaẓur-a aɣewwaɣ, i d-yesɛeddan akk tudert-is d amennuɣ, akken yenna deg yiwet seg tezlatin-is: “Imi i d-luleɣ d Aqbayli, isem-iw imenɣi”. Dɣa, nezmer ad nɣer aya s tefransist, deg tduli n berra n udlis: « Lwennas yella dima d aliketrun ilelli, neɣ ugar n waya. Tella d ssebba, war ccek, i t-yeǧǧan yettban-d am wakken d amdan-nni ur bɣin di tmurt-is ɣur kra n yigrawen isertanen, n tddukkliwin i d-ilulen deg tnekkra taqbaylit-tamaziɣt n 20 yebrir 1980, d waṭas n wudmawen idelsanen akked yinaẓuren i yettwaḥesben d imḥaddiyen ». Ihi, ɣas ini yefka-d umaru deg udlis-a, timentilin i yeǧǧan mmi-s n tewrirt Musa yuɣal, yiwen n wakud akken, rewwlen fell-as kra n yimdanen n tsertit neɣ n yidles. Ayendin d isteqsiyen iɣef yeɛreḍ umeskar ad d-yerr s wayen ixuleḍ Lwennas Meɛtub abeɛda, d wayen iwala, neɣ yettwali, deg unnar. Ayen yerzan asuffeɣ n udlis-a di Tmurt, yenna-aɣ-d Mass Ṭeyyeb Iqubac: « Aql-i walaɣ yiwen n umaẓrag di Tmurt. Yezmer lḥal ad t-id-yessuffeɣ deg wayyur i d-iteddun ». Ilul Ṭeyyeb Iqubac di Tewrirt Ɛemruc, di Bgayet, aseggas n 1953. Seg useggas n 1975, netta yettidir di Fransa. Yettwassen s temmeɣnest, s yisefra-s, d tdukli-is akked uɣewwaɣ.

   M. K. 

  
 Tella-d temlilit i d-ijemɛen iselmaden n tmaziɣt n umalu n tmurt (aɣir n Wehran) akked umaswaḍ i d-yellan i lmendad-nsen, Mass Abdellah Arkoub. Leqdic-a iɣef yerza umaswaḍ, yekcem deg usenṣeb n kraḍ n yiselmaden (sin n uɣerbaz amenzu, yiwen n uɣerbaz alemmas). Ifures tagnit Mass Arkoub I wakken ad yessuter seg uɣella n usileɣ deg tenmehla n usedwel akken ad d-ssudsen timlilit n usileɣ ara t-id-yesgerwen d yiselmaden-a i yiwen n wass. D ayen i d-yellan ass n arim, 15 deg tuber 2018, seg 9 n ssbeḥ armi d 16 n tmeddit. Ula d iselmaden, fursen tagnit deg-s, bedren-d akk uguren i d-ttemlilin deg unnar segmi bdan, acku aselmed n tmaziɣt i yiɛerbawalen mačči am uselmed-ines deg tmurt n leqbayel. Rnan-d fkan-d u sumren-d tarrayin i sseqdacen di tneɣrit d wamek sselḥuyen timsirin-nsen akked yinelmaden. D isteqsiyen iɣef i d-yerra umaswaḍ-nsen s yiwellihen i asen-d-yefka ɣef teɣzi n wass, d wamek i ilaq ad mɛamalen s lekyasa akked leḥdaqa d yinelmaden neɣ d yimawlan-nsen akken ara asen-sḥemmlen tamaziɣt, ladɣa imi taɣult-a d tamaynut di temnaḍin-agi. Akken daɣen i d-yella umeslay ɣef ugbur i ilaqen ad yili deg uṣenfar deg tesmilin yecban tigi, imi i asen-yefka iṣenfaren ara ḍefren ladɣa i uswir amenzu n tmaziɣt (aseggas wis ukkuẓ). D ass igerrzen i ssezrin yiselmaden-a s lferḥ, aṭas i d-ugmen, rnu ula d imḍebbren n wammas-nni ideg d-tella temlilit, umren u snesfen akken iwata yis-sen. Ad d-nesmeki kan belli aselmed n tmaziɣt di Wehran, yebda deg useggas n 2015 s yiwen n uselmad kan, imir-a yewweḍ umḍan ɣer 9 n yiselmaden. D Mass Arkoub Abdellah akken i d-nezwar deg-s i d amaswaḍ yellan i lmendad-nsen, s zzyada ɣef wasunen yeṭṭef di Tizi Uzzu, nenna-d yerna yeṭṭef iselmaden n Wehran, yerna wid n Sidi Belɛebbas d wid n Tala Yemsan.

  Khaled. A. 

  
 Tettkemmil tecrift taseklant i d-tettheggi seg tikkelt ɣer tayeḍ tddukkla Asaki n tɣiwant n Ticci, i d-yezgan s wazal n 16 n yikilumitren ɣer Usamar n waɣir n Bgayet. Dɣa, ass n sed, 16 deg wayyur-a ideg nella, d amaru-aneɣmas aqbayli Mass Allas Di Tlelli i yellan d inebgi n temnaḍt-a mm yiftisen, akken ad d-yawi awal ɣef udlis-is aneggaru i d-yesuffeɣ d tajmilt i tmeɣnast n tlelli Katya Bengana, s uzwel n « Katia Bengana : La lycéenne qui a nargué l’islamisme». 

 Deg wayen i d-yenna deg usarag, i idumen azal n 4 n yisragen, yemmeslay-d abeɛda umsarag ɣef umennuɣ n Katya mgal lḥiǧab d tesnakta taɛrabt-tineslemt. Yewwi-d daɣ awal Mass Allas ɣef yizen n Katya ɣef wayen yerzan lḥiǧab i d-ibanen d ansay aqbur deg Usamar Alemmas, azal n 80 n leqrun send talalit n Ɛisa. Ansay-a, yufa-d iman-is di tεebranit, send ad t-yerfed Saint Tertullien di tmasiḥit, ɣas ur d-yeddi di Ṭṭura (Bible). Yemmeslay-d Allas dɣa amek yuɣal uceṭṭiḍ-a d ttawil i urkaḍ n tmeṭṭut d usfaḍ n yidelsan iwerdanen.

 Deg usarag, yella-d daɣ umeslay ɣef tlawin i iqeblen lmut wala azaglu n usberbar-nni, d ɣef kra n tlufa n tsertit. Ma d isteqsiyen, qqnen ladɣa ɣer yiseggasen-nni n rrebrab, ɣer tmetti taqbaylit, ɣer tlelli n umdan d ɣer tmagit s umata.Ɣer taggara n temlilit, deg wadeg n usenzi s ubuddu am wakken yella di tannumi, yefren Allas Di Tlelli ad yeg tikci s ubuddu n udlis-a ɣef tlemẓit Katya Bengana. « Di tmuɣli-w, anecfu (la mémoire) n yimeɣrasen d wasaḍen i yeddren di yiwet n tallit yid-nneɣ, ur d-yewwi ara ad yenz s yidrimen. 

 D tamsalt n tezdeg d leqder i nutni d yimawlan-nnsen (…) », i aɣ-d-yenna Allas Di Tlelli. Ad d-nesmekti d akken ddeqs n yimura, imeɣnasen d yicennayen i yekkin deg udlis-a imezdi, seg-sen ad d-nebder Yusef Zirem, Malika Dumran, Zedek Mulud, Kamal Tarwiḥt d wiyaḍ. Aqeddic n ubuddu n udlis i tnubit-a i d-yesbeggnen addud-is mgal arkaḍ n yizerfan, yebda-t umeskar, ɣef wawal-is, ugar n 4 n yiseggasen ɣer deffir. Syinna, mi d-mden akk yiḍrisen n yimekkiyen, yeffeɣ-d kra n wakud aredqal ɣer teẓrigin La Pensée n Tizi Uzzu. 

<p style="text-align:right">  M. K. 

  
 Deg yiseggasen yezrin, ur yelli deg lbal n yimdanen d akken aḥric n usellek ad yili d annar uɣur ara adfent tulawin. D tasga meḥsub yettwaheggan i wid yesɛan tabɣest acku d amager n twaɣiwin n yiberdan, n tmes, n zlezla, leḥmali d waṭas n lecɣal ideg ṭṭuqten lehmum. Maca, akken i llan yirgazen ikesben tabɣest i llant tulawin sut tebɣest. Hafida Laouadi, d yiwet n tmeṭṭut yessaramen seg temẓi-s i wakken ad tili « d tanejbart » i wid yeḍrurin. Akken kan i d-teffeɣ seg tesdawit d tajenyurt, tekcem annar n usellek deg useggas n 2007 s usellun (grade) n lyuṭna. Mi tekfa tannant, aseggas mbeɛd, tuɣal d lqebṭan anda i tella d timḍebbert deg tnedbalt n uḥric-a yellan deg temdint n Tubiret. Deg 2011, tbeddel amekkan, tuɣal d tanemhalt deg yiwet n tenmehla yellan dima di Tubiret, uqbel ad d-tuɣal alamma d tanmehla-nsen. Deg waggur n yulyu 2017, tettuɛeggen d timḍebbert deg Bechloul anda i tella weḥd-s gar yirgazen, mi d-tenna : « Aql-i xeddmeɣ gar yirgazen, ala nekk i d tameṭṭut gar-asen, maca ur d-mmugreɣ ara iɣeblan. Amahil-nneɣ, iteddu akken iwata, ttqabaleɣ tiswiɛin akken bɣunt ilint, imi ḥemleɣ aḥric-a n usellek. » Am wakken i aɣ-d-tenna Massa Laouadi, d akken tura deg uḥric n usellek aṭas n tlawin i yettuɛeggnen i wakken ad d-lhint d usellek deg teswiɛin iweɛren ayen yecban alluy ɣer wanda yebɛed d wayen icudden s asellek seg yifran.

   M. Smail 

  
 Asenfar n useggem d tduli n wannaren, yeffeɣ-d i waṭas n tɣiwanin tallit-a taneggarut, gar-asent taɣiwant n Yiderginen i d-yezgan s tebɛed n wazal n 45 n yikilumitren ɣer Usamar n Bgayet. Dɣa, seld kra n uɛeṭṭel i icudden abeɛda ɣer lexsas n tedrimt, qrib yekfa usenfar s timmad, n tduli n unnar agejdan, imi temmug yakan tduli. ‘’Tura akka, nezmer ad d-nini amur ameqqran n lecɣal yemmug meskud qqimen-d kan sin. Yettusemma, tura mi nessa taduli i unnar, yeqqim-d kan usbedd n yijqa n tafat akked cwiṭ n ureqqeɛ daxel n unnar », i aɣ-d-yenna yiwen seg yimḍebbren n tɣiwant n Yiderginen. Yewwi-d ad d-nini xussen ayendin yimeḍqan d tzeɣwa ideg zemren ad d-sbeyyinen tizemmar-nsen yilemẓiyen n tɣiwant-a n Yiderginen, ama d ayen yerzan ɣer uḥric n waddal, isilaɣ, ɣer yidles d yiḥricen-nniḍen. Ɣef waya areqqeɛ n unnar-nsen aɣiwan i d-yezgan di tlemmast n Yiderginen, ad ten-yeǧǧ xersum ad ssemrasen addal n ddabex n uḍar s wugar n rraḥa d tɣellist. Tugart-tugart ma neẓra belli deg wayaqeddac, llan ur ttheyyin s waṭas tiberziwin (tournois) acku ur sɛin annar iwulmen, neɣ ma heyyan-d ad d-heyyin anda-nniḍen. « Aṭas-aya nettraǧu annar-nneɣ deg waddad igerrzen am wa. Tura yella wamek ara nesṭuqqut seg warmuden inaddalen. D ayen iseg ara d-sfaydin ama d arrac imecṭaḥ neɣ d ilemẓiyen », i d-yenna yiwen seg Yiderginen. Ad d-nesmekti d akken yeffeɣ-d usenfar-a i tɣiwant n Yiderginen s yidrimen n wayen iwumi qqaren FCCL. Yekker-d s wazal n 43 n yimelyan n dinar, neɣ ugar n 04 n yimelyaren n santim. Deg-s, gar cwiṭ n waṭas, taduli n unnar s ugazun, abnaw n ufrag d tseddarin, asbedd n unagraw n ujmaɛ n waman n ugeffur, asbedd n tafat d ubnaw n texxamin n usteɛfu d ucuccef.
  M. K. 

  
 I lmend n tlallit n teẓrigin Ccix Muḥend Ulḥusin, i yellan ɣef uqerru-s sin n yimedyazen: Mbarek Gamar d Fahima Seddiri, newwi-d awal akked Massa Seddiri ɣef teẓrigin-a d ɣef kra n tlufa-nniḍen.

  Aɣmis n Yimaziɣen: Mbeɛd acḥal d akud kunwi d tazzla, tessawḍem ad d-tesnulfum tiẓrigin timaynutin. Amek iga uḥulfu-nwen? 

  Fahima Seddiri:  Nefreḥ mačči d kra, acku aṭas i neɛteb i wakken ad naweḍ iswi. Tura zemreɣ ad d-iniɣ nger nnehda ɣas iqeddicen-nniḍen ttraǧun-aɣ. Maca, skud ayen yellan d agejdan tefra taluft-is, neẓra nezger tuɛert, aql-aɣ nhegga i kullec.

  Seg melmi d wamek i awen-d-tusa tekti ad tegrem deg usenfar-a? 

 Seg yilindi di temlilit n tmedyazt n Uqbu, nella nettmeslay nekk d Dda Mbarek ɣef usenfar-agi. Nniɣ-as belli bɣiɣ ad d-ssufɣeɣ ammud n yisefra, dɣa yemmeslay-yi-d d akken yemlal-d aṭas n wuguren mi d-yessufeɣ adlis-nni-ines “99 d asefru”. Akka i d-tebda tekti. Syin d afella tennerna mi yi-d-isumer ad nekker ad d-nesnulfu tiẓrigin-nneɣ. Nekk si tama-w, dindin i as-rriɣ s “ih”.

  Ahat mačči s teshel i tewwḍem iswi? 

 Akka! Asenfar-agi yusa-d yewɛer, maca nekker-as s tebɣest. Ula d lebɣi ur aɣ-yenqis, ɣas nemmuger-d iɛewwiqen. Iban send ad iger yiwen deg kra, ilaq ad yili ihegga i wuguren i yezmer ad d-yemlil. Nekni dɣa, nqubel-iten, ur ten-neǧǧi ad aɣ-sḥebsen abrid, acku ayen iɣef nelḥa d wayen iɣef ara nelḥu, neẓra yuklal leɛtab.

  Ma nebder-d isem-nsent, d anta tamentilt i ken-yeǧǧan ad asent-tsemmim tiẓrigin Ccix Muḥend Ulḥusin? 

 Seld imi nemcawer gar-aneɣ, neɣtes ad asent-nefk isem-agi. Aṭas n yismawen i yellan deg wumuɣ, i nella nettxemmim d anwa ara yersen fell-sent. Dɣa, di taggara nefren ad ilint s yisem: Tiẓrigin Ccix Muḥend Ulḥusin. Akka meqqar d tajmilt i as-nerra i umussnaw-a amazray, d umedyaz-a ameqqran.

  Tura mi d-nnulfant dayen, d anwa leqdic i d-tettheggim? 

 Ahil meqqer, maca leqdic amenzu ad yili d tajmilt i yiwet n tmedyazt taqbaylit. Isem-is ad awen-t-ǧǧeɣ d tamuffirt i mi ara d-yeffeɣ udlis ma yebɣa Rebbi.

  Ad d-nuɣal ɣer Fahima Seddiri tamedyazt. Amek addad-im akked yisefra? 

 Nekk ttidireɣ s usefru, akked tira s umata. Teẓriḍ kan addad n yirummas n tmedyazt nekk d tameslubt seg-sen.

  Acu tenniḍ ɣef umecwar i d-telḥiḍ ar tura deg umaḍal n tmedyazt? 

 Ahat amecwar ur yelli wezzil. Maca, ur t-twaliɣ ara ɣezzif imi tikli-inu di tira ssarameɣ ad teddu s teɣzi n tudert-iw. Werǧin ǧǧiɣ imru segmi t-ddmeɣ tikkelt tamezwarut. Ɣef waya i bɣiɣ ad yezg ɣur-i, ad bnuɣ yis-s ayen i urɛad bniɣ.

  S yisem-im d tamedyazt i d-yufraren deg tfaskiwin, amek tettwaliḍ aswir n tmedyazin Tiqbayliyin? 

 Nekk ad d-iniɣ igerrez skud yal tafaska ttlalent-d tmedyazin timaynutin. Skud daɣen nettwali tilemẓiyin gant-as azal i usefru, mazal ad taẓ tmedyazt n tlawin-nneɣ ɣer sdat.

  Tanemmirt ɣef tririyin. Awal-im n taggara… 

 Ssarameɣ tiẓrigin-agi d ayen ara d-yawin ugar n tegnatin i yakk wid yettarun s tmaziɣt. D ayen ara d-yernun afud i tutlayt-nneɣ. Ad snemreɣ Dda Mbarek ɣef uɛiwen-ines. Tanemmirt i kemm a Kaissa i yi-d-yefkan tagnit.

  Testeqsa-tt Kaissa Khalifi 

  
 Aḥris 1u Deg uḥric-a n tesleḍt, ad nẓer limarat n timawit deg tullisin yellan deg wammud “Tuɣalin”, ad d-nwali amek i d-ttagmen yimyura imaziɣen seg tgemmi d yidles imawi, gar-asen Ɛmer Mezdad.?

 Ad d-nẓer, diɣ, d acu-tent tewsatin yellan deg timawit i d-yettbanen deg yiḍrisen-is imaynuten, deg-s ad nwali aseqdec-is i tewsatin-a.Tizrawin i yettwaxdmen ɣef ufares aseklan n Ɛmer Mezdad, beggnent-d d akken d amaru yettuɣalen s waṭas ɣer timawit akken ad yebnu iḍrisen-is. Gar-asen Amer Ameziane, i d-yennan : “ Mezdad d ameskar yettwaɣran aṭas acku tira-s, ɣas ulamma d tamaynut, tuɣ-d aẓar si teskla taqburt. Yesseqdac xilla n leṣnaf n tsekla taqdimt ama d tamacahut, ama d lemtul ama d ayen -nniḍen”. Ula deg wammud-a i nextar i tesleḍt, yesseqdec tiwsatin n timawit: Timucuha d iwudam-nsent, inzan d tumgisin…

  Ticraḍ n timawit deg   tullisin Tuɣalin s ubrid n umyeḍres   Assaɣ yezdin timlilit n   sin yeḍrisen deg tullisin-a 

 Assaɣ yezdin timlilit n sin n yiḍrisen, d annaw tesɛa tmiḍrant “amyeḍres”, daɣen ɣer daxel n wassaɣen yezdin timlilit n sin n yiḍrisen, llan wannawen , s yis-sen ara nessiweḍ ad d-nekkes ticraḍ n timawit yesseqdec Ɛmer Mezdad.

  Aɣbalu (référence) 

 Aɣbalu dayen i d-yettawi umaru seg uḍris-nniḍen, dayen i d-yettbanen, maca ur d-yeskan ara aḍris ansi i d-yettwakkes.Ihi, Ɛmer Mezdad yessexdam iɣbula, dayen ara d-nwali deg yimedyaten-agi :

  Iwudam n tmucuha 

 Yuwi-d iwudam yellan deg tmucuha yellan deg timawit am : waɣzen, tteryel, azemni, tiwkilin, talafsa,…Ula d wid yellan deg tneqqist (fable) am wuccen . 

 Ma nektazal akken ilaq iwudam-a yesseqdac umsekar-a, ad d-nesmekti d acu i tawuri-s deg tmucuha n zik, mi ara d-nader “tteryel” , “awaɣezniw” di tmucuha n zik, d sin n yiwudam i itetten ayen ufan sdat-nsen. Ula s umdan zemren ad glun yis-s. Yal tamacahut tamezduɣt n sin yiwudam-a deg umkan yestewḥacen d win daɣen ibeɛden. Amdya : yura-d deg sb wis 17, tullist tamenzut « Tuɣalin » : « Yemmekti-d timucuha n wasmi yella d ameẓyan ,wissen axxam-a ma d awaɣezniw, neɣ d tteryel i t-izdɣen. Ma d win yesseblaɛen arrac neɣ d tin i ten-yeggaren di tkufit alamma jjin, ad d-awin taksumt, imir ad tent-tečč d ilqaqen » Deg-s, ad negzu d akken amaru yesseqdec iwudam-a n tmacahut taqbaylit d aɣbalu (référence ) dayen i d- ibanen deg uswir n teḥkayt (histoire) n Ɛmer Mezdad mi i d-yudder sin n yiwudam-a. Yebɣa ad d-yeglem ugar axxam- nni i yufan akken, imi yakan yestewḥac. Tis snat, d ṭṭrad ur zran ara d acu ara afen ɣer daxel n uxxam-nni. Ɣef waya, yuɣal ɣer sin n yiwudam-a. Rnu ɣer wanect-a, ddhen-is win ara yeɣran tullist-a, ilaq fell-as ad yuɣal ɣer tmucuha n teqbaylit akken ad yegzu ugar d acu d sin iwudam-a. Deg umdya-nniḍen sb :73 “ Ad k-id-yekkes gar yiɣesmaren n yiwaɣezniwen ma zemmen fell-ak”. Dagi ameskar yebɣa ad-yessebggen azalen n tddukkli, d anwa i d ameddakkel n tidet . Dayen i d –yenna deg uswir n yinnaw, d tikta-s ɣef yir atmaten, am wakkan llan imeddukkal ugaren atmaten deg tegmat yellan gar-asen. Deg tullist tis snat « Inebgi n yiḍ-nni »,sb 41. Yuɣal deg tullist-a ɣer yiwudem i yellan d asugen deg tmucuha n teqbaylit “Tiwkilin”. “Times deg ukanun la tettiriq, la tettweccim iɣerban s tili-s, tetturar yis-sen, amzun ambiwel yefka-asen tudert , neɣ maḍi ttwazdɣen :tarbaɛt n tewkilin tul-ten la gezzrent deg-sen …”. Yekfa-asent tudert, yuɣal ɣer tewkilin i yellan deg tmucuha i yettwassnen, sɛant tizemmar ad xedment ayen asent-yehwan, dayen ur yezmir ad iwali umadan, neɣ ad t-imassi s ufus-is, d asugen kan. Sb 77: “Mi kecmen deg uɛebbuḍ n lbabur amzun kecmen deg uɛebbuḍ n tlafsa yesggurṭiyen arrac’’. Ɛmer Mezdad, yesseqdec “talafsa” , yuɣal ɣer uwudam-a yellan deg tmucuha d teqsiḍin n zik, d ayen yellan d asugen , yis-s i sexlaɛen arrac , akken ad ugaden. Yuɣal ɣur-s akken ad yeglem ugar lbabur-nni, ira ad d-yini amek i meqqer iwessef-it ɣer tlafsa i yettwassnen deg tmetti taqbaylit tamensayt. Talafsa d tin yettidiren anda llan waman, s umata tettili deg tliwa. Deg tmucuha, ilaq aṣad ad ineɣ talafsa akken ad idiren di talwit ,yerna ad tilli lɣella, am wakken daɣen I as-qqaren “talafsa m sebɛa iqerra”. Daɣen gar yiwudam n tmucuha yesseqdec d aɣbalu, ad naf “Azemni” dayen i d-yebder deg sb 89. “Nenna-d amdan-a ur yelli d menwala d Amusnaw neɣ d azemni. Yessen amek teddunt temsal …”.

  Iwudam igejedanen iɣef tebna tmetti taqbaylit tamensayt : amedya   sb: 89 “Amusnaw”. 

 Amusnaw deg tmetti taqbaylit tamensayt, d win yesɛan azal meqqren, imi d netta i iferrun ccwal yettilin ama gar yiderman, tiqbilin neɣ gar leɛrac . D ayen i d-yettilin s tmussni-nsen, neɣ ula s yisefra nsen, daɣen. Yuɣal Ɛmer Mezdad, yesseqdec-it d aɣbalu, imi iwala newweḍ ɣer tallit anda ulac Amusnaw. Zik, fell-asen i tbeddd tmetti. Izen-a, dagi, yenna-t-id umaru deg uswir n yinnaw. Yuɣal ɣer uwudam “Azemni” imi deg tmucuha n teqbaylit, azemni d win yessnen, yesɛa tirmit d tmussni, d amdan i icurffen deg yal tamsalt. Deg tmucuha, d Azemni ara as-d-yeffken lxiḍ n tifrat i wasaḍ (héro) yettnadin ɣef wayen yebɣa. Tuget n tmucuha , d azemni i as-d-yettakken tifrat akken ad temmed twuri-s.

  Iɣersiwen n tneqqisin 

 Gar ticraḍ n timawit i d-yeddem daɣen umaru-a, d iɣersiwen n tneqqisin yellan deg tmetti taqbaylit tamensayit. Dayen ara d-nwali deg umdya-a. Sb 107: “Twalaḍ ay uccen, tuɣal tgersa s aḍref, kečč tuɣaleḍ-d ɣer ubrid”.Yessexdem aɣersiw , “Uccen”d aɣbalu i yellan deg tneqqisin n zik, mi ara d-addren kan awal uccen, yal yiwen yettruḥu srid ɣer tḥila d teḥerci.Yesseqdec-it d aɣbalu akken ad d-ibeggen tiḥerci n uwudam. Dɣa icubat ɣer ɣur-s.Yudder-t-id daɣen deg Sb:63 deg tullist “Am iẓiwec deg waddad”. “akka i d Lmulud Awaḍi ,anida i tt-iger tuɣ ,anda isewweq ad yessis “I teddu yid-s lmelk”asmi id-illul tesečča-s yemma-s taqejjirt n wuccen ,lḥasun akka i yeqqar”…
